Kumbhaghonam Edition

7. droNaparva

droNaparva - adhyAya 001

.. shrIH ..

7.1. adhyAyaH 001

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

dhR^itarAShTreNa sa~njayaMprati bhIpmapAtAnantarIyakaduryodhanAdivR^ittAntaprashnaH.. 1 .. sa~njayena yodhAnAM sharaNatvena karNAhvAne kathite dhR^itarAShTrasya karNavR^ittAntaprashnaH.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-1-0 (44647) shrIvedavyAsAya namaH. 7-1-0x (4256) nArAyaNaM namaskR^itya naraM chaiva narottamam. devIM sarasvatIM vyAsaM tato jayamudIrayet.. 7-1-1 (44648) janamejaya uvAcha. 7-1-1x (4257) tamapratimasatvaujobalavIryaparAkramam. hataM devavrataM shrutvA pA~nchAlyena shikhaNDinA.. 7-1-1 (44649) dhR^itarAShTrastato rAjA shokavyAkUlalochanaH. kimacheShTata viprarShe hate pitAx vIryavAn.. 7-1-2 (44650) tasya putro hi bhagavAnbhIShbhadroNamukhai rathaiH. pamajitya maheShvAsAnpANDava rAjyamichChati.. 7-1-3 (44651) tasminhA tu bhagavankatau sarvadhanuShmatAm. yadacheShTata kauravastanme brUhi tapaudhana.. 7-1-4 (44652) vaishampAyana uvAcha. 7-1-5x (4258) nihataM pitaraM shrutvA dhR^itarAShTro janAdhipaH. lebhe na shAntiM kauravyashchintAshaukaparAyaNaH.. 7-1-5 (44653) tatva chintayato duHkhamanishaM pArthivasya tat. AjagAma vishuddhAtmA punargAvalgaNistadA.. 7-1-6 (44654) `vyAsaprasAdAdvij~nAya sarvaM vR^ittAntamuttamam. sainikAnAM cha sarveShAM senayorubhayostadA'.. 7-1-7 (44655) shibirAtsa~njayaM prAptaM nishi nAgAhvayaM puram. Abhvikeyo mAhAraja dhR^itarAShTro.anvapR^ichChata.. 7-1-8 (44656) shrutvA bhIShmasya nidhanamaprahR^iShTamanA bhR^isham. putrANAM jayamAkA~NkShanvilalApAturo yathA.. 7-1-9 (44657) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-1-10x (4259) saMshochya tu mahAtmAnaM bhIShmaM bhImaparAkramam. kimakArShuHparaM tAta kuravaH kAlachoditAH.. 7-1-10 (44658) tasminvinihate shUre durAdharShe mahAtmani. kiM nu svitkuravo.akArShurnimagnAH shokasAgare.. 7-1-11 (44659) tadudIrNaM mahatsainyaM trailokyasyApi sa~njaya. bhayamutpAdayettIvraM pANDavAnAM mahAtmanAm.. 7-1-12 (44660) ko hi dauryodhane sainye pumAnAsInmahArathaH. yaM prApya samare vIrA na trasyanti mahAbhaye.. 7-1-13 (44661) devavrate tu nihate kurUNAmR^iShabhe tadA. kimakArShurnR^ipatayastanmamAchakShva sa~njayA.. 7-1-14 (44662) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-1-15x (4260) shR^iNu rAjannekamanA vachanaM bruvato mama. yatte putrAstadAkArShurhate devavrate mR^idhe.. 7-1-15 (44663) nihate tu tadA bhIShme rAjansatyaparAkrame. tAvakAH pANDaveyAshcha prAdhyAyanta pR^ithakpR^ithak.. 7-1-16 (44664) vismitAshcha prahR^iShTAshcha kShatradharmaM nishAmya te. svadharmaM nindamAnAste pramipatya mahAtmane.. 7-1-17 (44665) shayanaM kalpayAmAsurbhIShmAyAmitakarmaNe. sopadhAnaM naravyAghra sharaiH sannataparvabhiH.. 7-1-18 (44666) vidhAya rakShAM bhIShmAya samAbhAShya parasparam. anumAnya cha gA~NgeyaM kR^itvA chApi pradakShiNam.. 7-1-19 (44667) krodhasaMraktanayanAH samavetya parasparam. punaryuddhAya nirjagmuH kShatriyAH kAlachoditAH.. 7-1-20 (44668) tatastUryaninAdaishcha bherINAM ninadena cha. tAvakAnAmanIkAni pareShAM cha viniryayuH.. 7-1-21 (44669) vyAvR^itte.aryamNi rAjendra patite jAhnavIsute. amarpavashamApannAH kAlopahatachetasaH.. 7-1-22 (44670) anAdR^itya vachaH pathyaM gA~Ngeyasya mahAtmanaH. niryayurbharatashreShTAH shastrANyAdAya satvarAH.. 7-1-23 (44671) mohAttava saputrasya vadhAchChAntanavasya cha. kauravA mnR^ityunA.a.ahUtAH sahitAH sarvarAjabhiH.. 7-1-24 (44672) ajAvaya ivAgopA vane shvApadasaMkule. `karNakarNeti chAkranda~nCheShA bhArata pArthivAH'. bhR^ishamudvignamanaso hInA devavratena te.. 7-1-25 (44673) patite bharatashreShThe babhUva kuruvAhinI. dyaurivApetanakShatrA hInaM khamiva vAyunA.. 7-1-26 (44674) vipannasasyeva mahI vAkchaivAsaMskR^itA yathA. AsurIva yathA senA nigR^ihIte nR^ipe valau.. 7-1-27 (44675) vidhaveva vArArohA shuShkatoyeva nimnagA. vR^ikairiva vane ruddhA pR^ipatI hatayUthapA.. 7-1-28 (44676) sharabhA.a.ahatasiMheva mahatI girikandarA. sA senA bharatashreShThe patite jAhnavIsute.. 7-1-29 (44677) viShvagvAtAhatishubdhA naurivAsInmahArNave. valibhiH pANDavairvIrairlabdhalakShairbhR^ishArditA.. 7-1-30 (44678) sA tadAsIdbhR^ishaM senA vyAkulAshvarathadvipA. vipannabhUyiShThanarA kR^ipaNA dhvastamAnasA.. 7-1-31 (44679) tasyAM trastA nR^ipatayaH sainikAshcha pR^ithagvidhAH. pAtAla iva majjanto hInA devavratena te. 7-1-32 (44680) karNasya kuravo.asmArShuH sa hi devavratopamaH. sarvashastrabhR^itAM shreShThaM rochamAnamivAtithim.. 7-1-33 (44681) bandhumApadgatasyeva tamevopAgamanmanaH. chukrushuH karmakarNeti tatra bhArata pArthivAH.. 7-1-34 (44682) rAdheyaM hitamasmAkaM sUtaputraM tanutyajam. sa hi nAbudhyata tadA dashAhAni mahAyashAH.. 7-1-35 (44683) sAmAtyabandhuH karNo vai tamAnayata mAchiram. bhIShNeNa hi mahAbAhuH sarvakShatrasya pashyataH.. 7-1-36 (44684) ratheShu gaNyamAneShu balavikramashAliShu. sha~NkhyAto.ardharathaH karNo dviguNaH sannararShabhaH.. 7-1-37 (44685) rathAtirakShasa~NkhyAyAM yo.agraNIH shUrasambhataH. sAsurAnapi deveshAnraNe yo yoddhumR^itsahet.. 7-1-38 (44686) sa tu tenaiva kopena rAjangA~NgeyamuktavAn. tvayi jIkate kauravya nAhaM yotsye kadAchana. 7-1-39 (44687) tvayA tu pANDaveyeShu nihateShu mahAmR^idhe. duryodhanamanuj~nApya vanaM yAsyAmi kaurava.. 7-1-40 (44688) hate vA tvayi pArthaistu yudhi svargamupeyuShi. hantAsmyekarathenaiva kR^itsnAnvAnmanyase rathA.. 7-1-41 (44689) evamuktvA mahAbAhurdashAhAnyeka eva sa. nAyudhyata tataH karNaH putrasya tava saMyate.. 7-1-42 (44690) bhIShmaH samaravikrAntaH pANDaveyasya bhArata. jaghAna samare yodhAnasa~NkhyeyaparAkramaH.. 7-1-43 (44691) tasmiMstu nihate shUre satyasandhe mahaujasi. tvatsutAH varNamasmArpustartukAmA iva plavam.. 7-1-44 (44692) tAvakAstava putrAshcha sahitAH sarvarAjabhiH. hA karNa iti chAkrandankAlo.ayamiti abravan.. 7-1-45 (44693) evaM te sma hi rAdheyaM sUtaputraM nataxxxx chukrushuH sahitA yodhAxxxxxxxxxxx.. 7-1-46 (44694) jAmadagnyAbhyanuj~nAtamastre durvArapauruSham. agamanno manaH karNaM bandhumAtyayikeShviva.. 7-1-47 (44695) sa hi shakto raNe rAja~nstrAtumasmAnmahAbhayAt.. tridashAniva govindaH satataM sumahAbhayAt.. 7-1-48 (44696) vaishampAyana uvAcha. 7-1-49x (4261) tathA tu sa~njayaM karNaM kIrtayantaM punaH punaH. AshIviShavaduchChvasya dhR^itarAShTro.abravIdidam.. 7-1-49 (44697) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-1-50x (4262) yattadvaikartanaM karNamagamadvo manastadA. upyarakShatsa rAdheyaH sUtaputrastanutyajaH.. 7-1-50 (44698) api tanna mR^iShAkArShItkachchitsatyaparAkramaH. sambhAntAnAM tadArtAnAM trastAnAM trANamichChatAM.. 7-1-51 (44699) api tatpUrayAMchakre dhanurdharavaro yudhi. yattadvinihate bhIShme kauravANAmapAkR^itam.. 7-1-52 (44700) tatkhaNDaM pUrayankarNaH pareShAmAdadhadbhayam. sa hi vai puruShavyAghro loke sa~njaya kathyate.. 7-1-53 (44701) 7-1-54 (44702) ArtAnAM bAndhavAnAM cha krandatAM cha visheShataH. parityajya raNe prANAMstattrANArthaM cha sharma cha. kR^itavAnmama putrANAM jayAshAM saphalAmapi..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-1-1 satyaM xxx mahatyapi duHkhakAraNe vaikalyarAhityam. ojo xxmaM valaxxxvalaM sharIradArDhyam. 5-1- 5-1- 5-1- 5-1- 5-1- 5-1- 5-1- 5-1- 5-1- 5-1- 5-1-
droNaparva - adhyAya 002

.. shrIH ..

7.2. adhyAyaH 002

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

karNena pANDavochChedanapUrvakaM duryodhanAya rAjyadAnaM pratij~nAya yuddhAyAbhiyAnam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-2-0 (44703) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-2-0x (4263) hataM bhIShmamathAdhirathirviditvA bhinnAM nAvaM vAridhAvatyagAdhe. sodaryavadvyasanAtsUtaputraH saMtArayiShyaMstava putrasya senAm.. 7-2-1 (44704) shrutvA tu karNaH puruShendramachyutaM nipAtitaM shAntanavaM mahAratham. athopayAyAtsahasArikarShaNo dhanurdharANAM pravarastadA nR^ipa.. 7-2-2 (44705) hate tu rathasattame parairnimajjatIM nAvamivArNave kurUn. piteva putrAMstvarito.abhyayAttataH santArayiShyaMstava putrasya senAm.. 7-2-3 (44706) sammR^ijya divyaM dhanurAtatajyaM sa rAmadattaM ripusa~NghahantA. bANAMshcha kAlAnalavAyukalpAnullAlayanvAkyamidaM babhAShe. 7-2-4 (44707) karNa uvAcha. yasmindhR^itirbuddhiparAkramaujaH satyaM smR^itirvIraguNAshcha sarve. astrANi divyAnyatha saMnatihrIH priyA cha vAganasUyA cha bhIShme.. 7-2-4x (4264) sadA kR^itaj~ne dvijashatrughAtake sanAtanaM chandramasIva lakShmIH. sa chetprashAntaH paravIrahantA manye hatAneva cha sarvavIrAn.. 7-2-5 (44708) neha dhruvaM ki~Nchana jAtu vidyate. loke hyasminkarmaNo.anityayogAt. sUryodaye ko hi vimuktasa~Nshayo bhAvaM kurvItAryamahAvrate hate.. 7-2-6 (44709) vasuprabhAve vasuvIryasaMbhave gate vasUneva vasuMdharAdhipe. vasUni putrAMshcha vasuMdharAM tathA kurUMshcha shochadhvamimAM cha vAhinIm.. 7-2-7 (44710) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-1-8x (4265) mahAprabhAve varade nipAtite lokeshvare shAstari chAmitaujasi. parAjiteShu bharateShu durmanAH karNo bhR^ishaM nyashvasadashru vartayan.. 7-2-8 (44711) idaM cha rAdheyavacho nishamya sutAshcha rAjaMstava sainikAshcha ha. parasparaM chukrushurArtijaM muhustadAshru netrairmumuchushcha shabdavat.. 7-2-9 (44712) pravartamAne tu punarmahAhave vigAhyamAnAsu chamUShu pArthivaiH. athAbravIddharShakaraM tadA vacho ratharpabhAnsarvamahAratharShabhaH.. 7-2-10 (44713) jagatyanitye satataM pradhAvati prachintayannasthiramadya lakShaye. bhavatsu tiShThatsviha pAtito mR^idhe niriprakAshaH kurupu~NgavaH katham.. 7-2-11 (44714) nipAtite shAntanave mahArathe divAkare bhUtalamAsthite yathA. na pArthivAH soDhumalaM dhanaMjayaM giripravoDhAramivAnilaM drumAH.. 7-2-12 (44715) hatapradhAnaM tvidamArtarUpaM parairhatotsAhamanAthamadya vai. maryA kukhNAM paripAlyamAhave balaM yathA tena mahAtmanA tathA.. 7-2-13 (44716) samAhite chAtmani bhAramIdR^ishaM jagattathA.anityamidaM cha lakShaye. nipAtitaM chAhavashauNDamAhakhe kathaM nu kuryAmahamIdR^ishe bhayam.. 7-2-14 (44717) ahaM tu tAnkuruvR^iShabhAnajihmagaiH praveshayanyamasadanaM charanraNe. yashaH paraM jagati vibhAvya vartitA parairhato bhuvi shayitAthavA punaH.. 7-2-15 (44718) yudhiShThiro dhR^itimatisatyasatvavAn vR^ikodaro gajashatatulyavikramaH. tathArjunastridashavarAtmajo yuvA na tadbalaM sujayamihAmarairapi.. 7-2-16 (44719) yamau raNe yatra yamopamau bale sasAtyakiryatra cha devakIsutaH. na tadbalaM kApuruSho.abhyupeyivAnnivartate bhR^ityumukhAdivAsubhR^it.. 7-2-17 (44720) tapo.abhyudIrNaM tapasaiva bAdhyate balaM balenaiva tathA manasvibhiH. manashcha me shatrunivAraNe dhruM svarakShaNe chAchalavadvyavasthitam.. 7-2-18 (44721) evaM chaiShAM bAdhamAnaH prabhAvaM gatvaivAhaM tA~njayAmyadya sUta. mitradroho marShaNIyo na me.ayaM bhagne sainye yaH sameyAtsa mitram.. 7-2-19 (44722) kartAsmyetatsatpuruShAryakarma tyaktvA prANAnanuyAsyAmi bhIShmam. sarvAnsa~Nkhye shatrusha~NghAnhaniShye hatastairvA vIralokaM prapatsye.. 7-2-20 (44723) saMprAkruShTe ruditastrIkumAre parAhate pauruShe dhArtarAShTre. mayA kR^ityamiti jAnAmi sUta tasmAdrAj~nastvadya shatrUnvijeShye.. 7-2-21 (44724) kurUnrakShanpANDuputrA~njighAMsaMstyaktvA prANAnghorarUpe raNe.asmin. sarvAnsa~Nkhye shatrusa~NghAnnihatya dAsyAmyahaM dharmaxxxxxxxx 7-2-22 (44725) nibadhyatAM me kavachaM vichitraM haimaM shubhraM maNiratnAvabhAsi. shirastrANaM chArkasamAnabhAsaM dhanuH sharAMshchAgnivipAhikalpAn.. 7-2-23 (44726) upAsa~NgAnpoDasha yojayantu dhanUmpi divyAni tathA.a.aharantu. asIMshcha shaktIshcha gadAshcha gurvIH sha~NkhaM cha jAmbUnadachitranAlam.. 7-2-24 (44727) imAM raukmIM nAgakakShyAM vichitrAM dhvajaM jaitraM divyamindIvarA~Nkam. shlakShNairvastrairvipramR^ijyAnayantu chitrAM mAlAM chArubaddhAM salAjAm.. 7-2-25 (44728) ashvAnagryAnpANDurAbhraprakAshAn puShTAnsnAtAnmantrapUtAbhiradbhiH. taptairbhANDaiH kA~nchanairabhyupetAn shIghrA~nshIghraM sUtaputrAnayasva.. 7-2-26 (44729) rathaM chAgryaM hemamAlAvanaddhaM ratnaishchitraM sUryachandraprakAshaiH. dravyairyuktaM samprahAropapannairbAhairyuktaM tUrNamAvartayasva.. 7-2-27 (44730) chitrANi chApAni cha vegavanti jyAshchottamAH sannahanopapannAH. tUNAMshcha pUrNAnmahataH sharANAmAsAdya gAtrAvaraNAni chaiva.. 7-2-28 (44731) prAyAtrikaM chAnayatAshu sarvaM pUrNaM kAntyA vIrakAMsyAM cha haimam. AnIya mAlAmavabadhya chA~Nge pravAdayantvAshu jayAya bherIH.. 7-2-29 (44732) prayAhi mUtAshu yataH kirITI vR^ikodaro dharmasuto yamau cha. tAnvA haniShyAmi sametya sa~Nkhye bhIShmo yathaiShyAmi hato dviShadbhiH.. 7-2-30 (44733) yasminrAjA satyadhR^itiryudhiShThiraH samAsthito bhImasenArjunau cha. vAsudevaH sAtyakiH sR^iMjayAshcha manye balaM tadajayyaM mahIpaiH.. 7-2-31 (44734) taM chenmR^ityuH sarvaharo.abhirakShetsadA.apramattaH samare kirITinam. tathApi hantAsmi sametya sa~Nkhye yAsyAmi vA bhIShmamukho yamAya.. 7-2-32 (44735) na tvevAhaM na gamiShyAmi teShAM madhye sharANAM tatra chAhaM bravImi. mitradruho durbalabhaktayo ye pApAtmAno na mamaite sahAyAH.. 7-2-33 (44736) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-2-34x (4266) samR^iddhimantaM rathamuttamaM dR^iDhaM sakUbaraM hemapariShkR^itaM shubham. patAkinaM vAtajavairhayottamairyuktaM samAsthAya yayau jayAya.. 7-2-34 (44737) sampUjyamAnaH kurubhirmahAtmA ratharShabho devagaNairyathendraH. yayau tadAyodhanamugradhanvA yatrAvasAnaM bharatarShabhasya.. 7-2-35 (44738) varUthinA mahatA sadhvajena suvarNamuktAmaNiratnamAlinA. sadashvayuktena rathena karNo meghasvanenArka ivAmitaujAH.. 7-2-36 (44739) hutAshanAbhaH sa hutAshanaprabhe shubhaH shubhe vai svarathe dhanurdharaH. sthito rarAjAdhirathirmahArathaH svayaM vimAne surarADivAsthitaH.. .. 7-2-37 (44740) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi droNAbhiShekaparvaNi dvitIyo.adhyAyaH.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-2-1 5-2- 5-2- 5-2- 5-2- 5-2- 5-2- 5-2- 5-2- 5-2- 5-2- 5-2-
droNaparva - adhyAya 003

.. shrIH ..

7.3. adhyAyaH 003

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

karNena bhIShmametya yuddhAnaj~nAyAchanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-1-0 (44741) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-1-0x (4267) sharavalpe mahAtmAnaM shayAnamamitaujasam. mahAshatasamUMhana samudramiva shoShitam.. 7-1-1 (44742) dR^iShTvA pitAmahaM bhIShmaM sarvakShatrAntakaM gurum. divyairastrairmaheShvAsaM pAtitaM savyasAchinA. jayANA tava putrANAM saMbhagnA sharma varma cha.. 7-1-2 (44743) apAxNAmiva dvIpamagAdhe gAdhamichChatAm. stotamA yAmuneneva sharaugheNa pariplutam.. 7-1-3 (44744) mahAntamiva mainAkamahAryaM bhuvi pAtitam. taxxxyutamivAdityaM shakrasyevAmR^itaM hR^itam.. 7-1-4 (44745) shatakratubhivAchintyaM purA vR^itreNA nirjitam. mahonaM sarvasainyasya yudhi bhIShmaM nipAtitam.. 7-1-5 (44746) kakudaM sarvasainyAnAM lakShma sarvadhanuShmatAm. dhanantayasharairvyAptaM pitaraM te mahAvratam. 7-1-6 (44747) taM vIrashayane vIraM shayAnaM puruSharpabham. bhIShmamAdhirathirdR^iShTvA bharatAnAM pitAmaham.. 7-1-7 (44748) praskandya sa rathAttUrNaM shokamohapariplutaH. `padybhAmeva jagAmArto bAShpavyAkulalochanaH'.. abhivAdyA~njaliM baddhvA vandamAno.abhyabhAShata.. 7-1-8 (44749) karNo.ahamasmi bhadraM te vada mAmabhi bhArata. puNyayA kShemayA vAchA chakShuShA chAvalokaya.. 7-1-9 (44750) na nUnaM sukR^itasyeha phalaM kashchitsamashnute. yatra dharmaparo vR^iddhaH shete bhuvi bhavAniha.. 7-1-10 (44751) koshasa~nchayane mantre vyUhe praharaNeShu cha. nAhamanyaM prapashyAmi kurUNAM kurupu~Ngava.. 7-1-11 (44752) buddhyA vishuddhayA yukto yaH kurUMstArayedbhayAt. yodhAMstvamapluve hitvA pitulokaM gamiShyasi.. 7-1-12 (44753) adyaprabhR^iti sa~NkruddhA vyAghrA iva mR^igakShayam. pANDavA bharatashreShTha kariShyanti kurukShayam.. 7-1-13 (44754) adya gANDIvadhopeNa vIryaj~nAH savyasAchinaH. kuravaH santrasiShyanti vajraghoShAdivAsurAH.. 7-1-14 (44755) adya gANDIvamuktAnAmashanInAmiva xxxH. trAsayiShyati bANAnAM kurUnanyAMshcha pathixx 7-1-15 (44756) samiddho.agniryathA vIra mahAjvAlo drumAndaxxxt. dhArtarAShTrAH idhakShyanti tathA bANAH kirITixx 7-1-16 (44757) yena yena prasarato vAyvagnI sahitau vane. tena tena pradahato bhUrigulmatR^iNadrumAn.. 7-1-17 (44758) yAdR^isho.agniH samudbhUtastAdR^ikpArtho na saMshayaH. yathA vAyurnaravyAghra tathA kR^iShNo saMshayaH.. 7-1-18 (44759) xxdataH pA~nchajanyasya rasato gANDivasya cha. shrutvA sarvANi sainyAni trAsaM yAsyanti bhArata. 7-1-19 (44760) kapidhvajasyotpatato rathasyAmitrakarshinaH. shabdaM soDhuM na shakShyanti tvAmR^ite vIra pArthivAH.. 7-1-20 (44761) ko hyarjunaM yodhayituM tvadanyaH pArthivo.arhati. yasya divyAni karmANi pravadanti manIShiNaH. 7-1-21 (44762) amAnuShaishcha saMgrAmaM tryambakeNa mahAtmanA. tasmAchchaiva varaM prApto duShprApashchAkR^itAtmabhiH.. 7-1-22 (44763) ko.anyaH shakto raNe jetuM pUrvaM yo na jitastvayA. jito yena raNe rAmo bhavatA vIryashAlinA. 7-1-23 (44764) kShatriyAntakaro ghoro devadAnavadarpahA. `sopyadyAbhihataH shete sharaiH protaH shikhaNDinA.. 7-1-24 (44765) tamadyAhaM pANDavaM yuddhashauNDamamR^iShyamANo bhavatA chAnushiShTaH. AshIviShaM haShTiharaM sughoraM shUraM shakShyAmyastrabalAnnihantum.. .. 7-1-25 (44766) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi droNAbhiShekaparvaNi tR^itIyo.adhyAyaH.. 3 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-1-6 kakudaM shreShTham 5-1-19 xxxtaH shabdaM kurvataH.. 5-1-22 amAnuShairnivAtakavachAdibhiH.. 5-1-3 tR^itIyo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 004

.. shrIH ..

7.4. adhyAyaH 004

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

bhIShmAnuj~nAtasya karNasya yuddhAyA.a.agamanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-1-0 (44767) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-1-0x (4268) tasya lAlapyamAnasya kuruvR^iddhaH pitAmahaH. deshakAlochitaM vAkyamabravItprItamAnasaH.. 7-1-1 (44768) bhIShma uvAcha. 7-1-2x (4269) samudra iva sindhUnAM jyotiShAmiva bhAskaraH. satyasya cha yathA santo bIjAnAmiva chorvarA.. 7-1-2 (44769) parjanya iva bhUtAnAM pratiShThA suhR^idAM bhavAn. bAndhavAstvA.anujIvantu svAduvR^ikShamivANQDajAH.. 7-1-3 (44770) mAnahA bhava shatrUNAM mitrANAM nandivardhanaH. kauravANAM bhava gatiryathA viShNurdivaukasAm.. 7-1-4 (44771) svabAhubalavIryeNa dhArtarAShTrapriyaiShiNA. karNa rAjapuraM gatvA kAmbhojA nirjitAstvayA.. 7-1-5 (44772) girivrajagatAshchApi nagnajitpramukhA nR^ipAH. ambaShThAshcha videhAshcha gAndhArAshcha jitAstvayA.. 7-1-6 (44773) himavaddurganilayAH kirAtA raNakarkashAH. duryodhanasya vashagAstvayA karNa purA kR^itAH.. 7-1-7 (44774) utkalA mekalAH pauNDrAH kali~NgAndhrAshcha saMyuge. niShAdAshcha trigartAshcha bAhlIkAshcha jitAstvayA 7-1-8 (44775) tatratatra cha saMgrAme duryodhanahitaiShiNA. bahavashcha jitAH karNa tvayA vIrA mahaujasA.. 7-1-9 (44776) yathA duryodhanasyAtaH saj~nAtikulabAndhavaH. tathA tvamapi sarveShAM kauravANAM gatirbhava.. 7-1-10 (44777) shiveshanAbhivadAmi tvAM gachCha yudhyasva shatrubhiH. anushAsya kurUnsarvAndhatsva duryodhane jayam.. 7-1-11 (44778) bhavAnpautrasamo.asmAkaM yathA duryodhanastathA. tavApi dharmataH sarve yathA tasya vayaM tathA.. 7-1-12 (44779) yaunAtsambandhakAlloke vishiShTaM sa~NgataM satAm. sadbhiH sa~NgamamichChanti tasmAtprAj~nAH parairapi.. 7-1-13 (44780) sa satyasa~Ngaro bhUtvA mamedamiti nishchitaH. kurUNAM pAlaya balaM yathA duryodhanastathA.. 7-1-14 (44781) `yathA cha kuravo yuddhe yodhayanti sma pANDavAn. tathA karNa tvayA kAryaM duryodhanahitaiShiNA'.. 7-1-15 (44782) nishamya vachanaM tasya charaNAvabhivAdya cha. yayau vaikartanaH karNastUrNamAyodhanaM prati.. 7-1-16 (44783) so.abhivIkShya naraughANAM sthAnamapratimaM mahat. vyUDhapraharaNoraskaM sainyaM tatsamabR^iMhayat.. 7-1-17 (44784) hR^iShitAH kuravaH sarve duryodhanapurogamAH. upAgataM mahAbAhuM sarvAnIkapuraHsaram.. 7-1-18 (44785) 7-1-19 (44786) karNaM dR^iShTvA mahAtmAnaM yuddhAya samupasthitam. kShveDitAsphoTitaravaiH siMhanAdaravairapi. dhanuHshabdaishcha vividhaiH kuravaH samapUjayan..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-1-3 arthapatiH pradhAnasvAmI..
droNaparva - adhyAya 005

7.5. adhyAyaH 005

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

duryodhanapR^iShTena karNena tamprati droNasya sainApatyakaraNavidhAnam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-1-0 (44787) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-1-0x (4270) rathasthaM puruShavyAghraM dR^iShTA karNamavasthitam. hR^iShTo duryodhano rAjannidaM vachanamabravIt.. 7-1-1 (44788) sanAthamiva manye.ahaM bhavatA pAlitaM balam. atra kiM nu samarthaM yaddhitaM tatsampradhAryatAm.. 7-1-2 (44789) karNa uvAcha. 7-1-3x (4271) brUhi naH puruShavyAghra tvaM hi prAj~natamo nR^iShu. yathA chArthapatiH kR^ityaM pashyate na tathetaraH.. 7-1-3 (44790) te sma sarve tava vachaH shrotukAmA nareshvara. nAnyAyyaM hi bhavAnvAkyaM brUyAditi matirmama.. 7-1-4 (44791) duryodhana uvAcha. 7-1-5x (4272) bhIShmaH senApraNetA.a.asIdvayasA vikrameNa cha. shrutena chopasampannaH sarvairyodhagaNaistathA.. 7-1-5 (44792) tenAtiyashasA karNa ghnatA shatrugaNAnmama. suyuddhena dashAhAni pAlitAH smo mahAtmanA.. 7-1-6 (44793) tasminnasukaraM karma kR^itavatyAsthite divam. kaM tu senApraNetAraM manyase tadanantaram.. 7-1-7 (44794) na vinA nAyakaM senA muhUrtamapi tiShThati. `AhaveShu visheSheNa bhraShTanetreShvivA~njanam.' AhaveShvAhavashreShTha netR^ihIneva naurjale.. 7-1-8 (44795) yathA hyakarNadhArA nau rathashchAsArathiryathA. dravedyatheShTaM tadvatsyAdR^ite senApatiM balam.. 7-1-9 (44796) adeshiko yathA sArthaH sarvaH kR^ichChraM samR^ichChati. anAyakA tathA senA sarvAndoShAnsamarchChati.. 7-1-10 (44797) sa bhAvanvIkShya sarveShu mAmakeShu mahAtmasu. pashya senApatiM yuktamanu shAntanavAdiha.. 7-1-11 (44798) yaM hi senAprametAraM bhavAnvakShyati saMyuge. taM vayaM sahitAH sarve kariShyAmo na saMshayaH. 7-1-12 (44799) karNa uvAcha. 7-1-13x (4273) sarva eva mahAtmAna ime puruShasattamAH. senApatitvamarhanti nAtra kAryA vichAraNA.. 7-1-13 (44800) kulasaMhananaj~nAnairbalavikramabuddhibhiH. yuktAH shrutaj~nA dhImanta AhaveShvanivartinaH.. 7-1-14 (44801) yugapanna tu te shakyAH kartuM sarve puraHsarAH. eka eva tu kartavyo yasminvaisheShikA guNAH.. 7-1-15 (44802) anyonyaspardhinAM hyeShAM yadyekaM tvaM kariShyasi. sheShA vimanaso vyaktaM na yotsyanti hitAstava.. 7-1-16 (44803) ayaM cha sarvayodhAnAmAchAryaH sthivaro guruH. yuktaH senApatiH kartuM droNaH shastrabhR^itAM varaH.. 7-1-17 (44804) ko hi tiShThati durdharShe droNe shastrabhR^itAM vare. senApatiHsyAdanyosmAchChukrA~NgirasadarshanAt.. 7-1-18 (44805) na cha so.apyasti te yodhaH sarvarAjasu bhArata. droNaM yaH samare yAntamanuyAsyati saMyuge.. 7-1-19 (44806) eSha senApraNetR^INAmeSha shastrabhR^itAmapi. eSha buddhimatAM chaiva shreShTho rAjangurustava.. 7-1-20 (44807) evaM duryodhanAchAryamAshu senApatiM kuru. jigIShanto surAnsa~Nkhye kArtikeyamivAmarAH.. .. 7-1-21 (44808) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi droNAbhiShekaparvaNi pa~nchamo.adhyAyaH.. 5 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-1-8 netA karNadhAraH.. 5-1-10 adeshiko.agresararahitaH. 5-1-14 saMhananaM sharIram.. 5-1-18 shukrA~NgirasadarshanAchChukrabR^ihaspatitulyAt. 5-1-5 pa~nchamo.adhyAyaH..

7.6. adhyAyaH 006

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

duryodhanena droNamprati sainApatyasvIkAraprArthanA.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-1-0 (44809) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-1-0x (4274) karNasya vachanaM shrutvA rAjA duryodhanastadA. senAmadhyagataM droNamidaM vachanamabravIt.. 7-1-1 (44810) duryodhana uvAcha. 7-1-2x (4275) varNashraiShThyAtkulotpattyA shrutena vayasA dhiyA. vIryAddAkShyAdadhR^iShyatvAdarthaj~nAnAnnayAjjayAt.. 7-1-2 (44811) tapasA cha kR^itaj~natvAdvR^iddhaH sarvaguNairapi. yukto bhavatsashro goptA rAj~nAmanyo na vidyate.. 7-1-3 (44812) sa bhavAnpAtu naH sarvAndevAniva shatakratuH. bhavannetrAH parA~njetumichChAmo dvijasattama.. 7-1-4 (44813) rudrANAmiva kApAlirvasUnAmiva pAvakaH. kubera iva yakShANAM marutAmiva vAsavaH.. 7-1-5 (44814) vasiShTha iva viprANAM tejasAmiva bhAskaraH. pitR^INAmiva dharmendro yAdasAmiva chAmburAT.. 7-1-6 (44815) nakShatrANAmiva shashI ditijAnAmivoshanAH. `sarveShAmiva lokAnAM vishvasya cha yathA kShayaH'.. 7-1-7 (44816) vishvotpattisthitilaye shreShTho nArAyaNaH prabhuH. evaM senApraNetR^INAM mama senApatirbhava.. 7-1-8 (44817) akShauhiNyo dashaikA cha vashagAH santu te.anagha. tAbhiH shatrUnprativyUhya jahIndro dAnavAniva.. 7-1-9 (44818) prayAtu no bhavAnagre devAnAmiva pAvakiH. anuyAsyAmahe tvA.a.ajau saurabheyA ivarShabham.. 7-1-10 (44819) ugradhanvA maheShvAso divyaM viShphArayandhanuH. dR^iShTvA bhavantaM sa~NgrAme nArjunaH prahariShyati.. 7-1-11 (44820) dhruvaM yudhiShThiraM sa~Nkhye sAnubandhaM sabAndhavam. jeShyAmi puruShavyAghra bhavAnsenApatiryadi.. 7-1-12 (44821) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-1-13x (4276) evamukte tato droNaM jayetyUchurnarAdhipAH. siMhanAdena mahatA harShayantastavAtmajam.. 7-1-13 (44822) sainikAshcha mudA yuktA vardhayanti dvijottamam. duryodhanaM puraskR^itya prArthayanto mahadyashaH. duryodhanaM tato rAjandroNo vachanamabravIt.. .. 7-1-14 (44823) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi droNAbhiShekaparvaNi ShaShTho.adhyAyaH.. 6 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-1-4 bhavAnnesraM tenA yeShAM te.. 5-1-6 dharmendro yamaH. amburAT varuNaH.. 5-1-10 pAvakiH skandaH.. 5-1-6 ShaShTo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 007

.. shrIH ..

7.7. adhyAyaH 007

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

duryodhanena droNasya sainApatye.abhiShechanam.. 1 .. droNayuddhavarNanam.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-1-0 (44824) droNa uvAcha. 7-1-0x (4277) vedaM ShaDa~NgaM vedAhamarthavidyAM cha mAnavIm. traiyyambakamatheShvastraM shastrANi vividhAni cha.. 7-1-1 (44825) ye chApyuktA mayi guNA bhavadbhirjayakA~NkShibhiH. chikIrShustAnahaM sarvAnyodhayiShyAmi pANDavAn.. 7-1-2 (44826) pArShataM tu raNe rAjanna haniShye katha~nchana. sa hi sR^iShTo vadhArthAya mamaiva puruSharShabhaH.. 7-1-3 (44827) yodhayiShyAmi sainyAni nAshayansarvasomakAn. na cha mAM pANDavA yuddhe yodhayiShyanti harShitAH.. 7-1-4 (44828) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-1-5x (4278) sa evamabhyanuj~nAtashchakre senApatiM tataH. droNaM tava suto rAjanvidhidR^iShTena karmaNA.. 7-1-5 (44829) athAbhiShiShichurdroNaM duryodhanamukhA nR^ipAH. `svastivAdaravaishchAnyaiH shlakShNaishchAnyairmanoramaiH'. sainApatye yathA skandaM purA shakramukhAH surAH.. 7-1-6 (44830) tato vAditraghoSheNa sha~NkhAnAM cha mahAsvanaiH. prAdurAsItkR^ite droNe harShaH senApatau tadA.. 7-1-7 (44831) tataH puNyAhaghoSheNa sAshIrvAdasvanena cha. saMstavairgItashabdaishcha sUtamAgadhabandinAm.. 7-1-8 (44832) jayashabdairdvijAgryANAM subhagAnartitaistathA. satkR^itya vidhinA droNaM menire pANDavA~njitAn.. 7-1-9 (44833) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-1-10x (4279) sainApatyaM tu saMprApya bhAradvAjo mahArathaH. yuyutsurvyUhya sainyAni prAyAttava sutaiH saha.. 7-1-10 (44834) saindhavashcha kali~Ngashcha vikarNashcha tavAtmajaH. dakShiNaM pArshvamAsthAya samatiShThanta daMshitAH.. 7-1-11 (44835) prapakShaH shakunisteShAM pravarairhayasAdibhiH. yayau gAndhArakaiH sArdhaM vimalaprAsayodhibhiH.. 7-1-12 (44836) kR^ipashcha kR^itavarmA cha chitraseno viviMshatiH. duHshAsanamukhA yattAH savyaM pakShamapAlayan.. 7-1-13 (44837) teShAM prapakShAH kAmbhojAH sudakShiNapussarAH. yayurashchairmahAvegaiH shakAshcha yavanaiH saha.. 7-1-14 (44838) madrAstrigartAH sAmbaShThAH pratIchyodIchyamAlavAH. shibayaH shUrasenAshcha shUdrAshcha maladaiH saha.. 7-1-15 (44839) sauvIrAH kitavAH prAchyA dAkShiNAtyAshcha sarvashaH. navAtmajaM puraskR^itya sUtaputrasya pR^iShThataH.. 7-1-16 (44840) harShayantaH svasainyAni yayustava sutaiH saha. pravaraH sarvayodhAnAM baleShu balamAdadham.. 7-1-17 (44841) yayau vaikartanaH karNaH pramukhe sarvadhanvinAm. tasya dIpto mahAkAyaH svAnyanIkAniharShayan.. 7-1-18 (44842) hastikakShyo gahAketurbabhau sUryasamadyutiH. na bhIShmavyasanaM kashchidR^iShTvA karNamamanyata.. 7-1-19 (44843) vishokAshchAbhavansarve rAjAnaH kurubhiH saha. hR^iShTAshcha bahavo yodhAstatrAjalpanta vegataH.. 7-1-20 (44844) na hi karNaM raNe dR^iShTvA yudhi sthAsyanti pANDavAH. karNo hi samare shakto jetuM devAnsavAsavAn.. 7-1-21 (44845) kimu pANDusutAnyuddhe hInavIryaparAkramAn. bhIShmeNa tu raNe pArthAH pAlitA bAhushAlinA.. 7-1-22 (44846) tAMstu karNaH sharaistIkShNairnAshayiShyati saMyuge. evaM bruvantaste.anyonyaM hR^iShTarUpA vishAMpate.. 7-1-23 (44847) rAdheyaM pUjayantashcha prashaMsantashcha niryayuH. asmAkaM shakaTavyUhoM droNena vihito.abhavat.. 7-1-24 (44848) pareShAM krau~ncha evAsIdvyUho rAjanmahAtmanAm. prIyamANena vihito dharmarAjena bhArata.. 7-1-25 (44849) vyUhapramukhatasteShAM tasthatuH puruSharShabhau. vAnaradhvajamuchChritya viShvaksenadhanaMjayau.. 7-1-26 (44850) kakudaM sarvasainyAnAM dhAma sarvadhanuShmatAm. AdityapathagaH ketuH pArthasyAmitatejasaH.. 7-1-27 (44851) dIpayAmAsa tatsainyaM pANDavasya mahAtmanaH. yathA prajvalitaH sUryo yugAnte vai vasuMdharAm.. 7-1-28 (44852) dIpyandR^ishyeta hi tathA ketuH sarvatra dhImataH. yodhAnAmarjunaH shreShTho gANDIvaM dhanuShAM varam.. 7-1-29 (44853) vAsudevashcha bhUtAnAM chakrANAM cha sudarshanam. chatvAryetAni tejA~nsi vaha~nshvetahayo rathaH.. 7-1-30 (44854) pareShAmagratastasthau kAlachakramivodyatam. evaM tau sumahAtmAnau balasenAgragAvubhau.. 7-1-31 (44855) tAvakAnAM mukhe karNaH pareShAM cha dhanaMjayaH. tato jayAbhisaMrabdhau parasparavadhaiShiNau.. 7-1-32 (44856) avekShetAM tadAnyonyaM samare karNapANDavau. tataH prayAte sahasA bhAradvAje mahArathe.. 7-1-33 (44857) siMhanAdena ghoreNa vasudhA samakampata. tatastumulamAkAshamAvR^iNotsadivAkaram.. 7-1-34 (44858) vAtodbhUtaM rajastIvraM kausheyanikaropamam. vavarSha dyauranabhrA.api mAMsAsthirudhirANyuta.. 7-1-35 (44859) gR^idhrAH shyenA bakAH ka~NkA vAyasAshcha sahasrashaH. uparyupari senAM te tadA paryapatannR^ipa.. 7-1-36 (44860) gomAyavashcha prAkroshanbhayadAndAruNAnravAn. akArShurapasavyaM cha bahushaH pR^itanAM tava.. 7-1-37 (44861) chikhAdiShanto mAMsAni pipAsantashcha shoNitam. apataddIpyamAnA cha sanirghAtA sakampanA.. 7-1-38 (44862) ulkA jvalantI sa~NgrAme puchChenAvR^itya sarvashaH. pariveSho mahAMshchApi savidyutstanayitnumAn.. 7-1-39 (44863) bhAskarasyAbhavadrAjanprayAte vAhinIpatau. ete chAnye cha bahavaH prAdurAsansudAruNAH. utpAtA yudhi vIrANAM jIvitakShayakAriNaH.. 7-1-40 (44864) tataH pravavR^ite yuddhaM parasparavadhaiShiNAm. kurupANDavasainyAnAM shabdenApUrayajjagat.. 7-1-41 (44865) te tvanyonyaM susaMrabdhAH pANDavAH kauravaiH saha. abhyaghnannishitaiH shastrairjayagR^iddhAH prahAriNaH.. 7-1-42 (44866) sa pANDavAnAM mahatIM maheShvAso mahAdyutiH. vegenAbhyadravatsenAM kira~nsharashataiH shitaiH.. 7-1-43 (44867) droNamabhyudyataM dR^iShTvA pANDavAH sahasR^i~njayaiH. pratyagR^ihNaMstadA rAja~nCharavarShaiH pR^ithakpR^ithak.. 7-1-44 (44868) vikShobhyamANaA droNena bhidyamAnA mahAchamUH. vyashIryata sapA~nchAlA vAteneva valAhakAH.. 7-1-45 (44869) bahUnIha vikurvANo divyAnyastrANi saMyuge. apIDayatkShaNenaiva droNaH pANDavasR^i~njayAn.. 7-1-46 (44870) te vadhyamAnA droNena vAsaveneva dAnavAH. pA~nchAlAH samakampanta dhR^iShTadyumnapurogamAH.. 7-1-47 (44871) tato divyAstravichChUro yAj~nasenirmahArathaH. abhinachCharavarSheNa droNAnIkamanekadhA.. 7-1-48 (44872) droNasya sharavarShANi sharavarSheNa pArShataH. sannivArya tataH sarvAnkurUnapyavadhIdbalI.. 7-1-49 (44873) saMyamya tu tato droNaH samavasthApya chAhave. svamanIkaM maheShvAsaH pArShataM samupAdravat.. 7-1-50 (44874) sa bANavarShaM sumahadasR^ijatpArShataM prati. maghavAnsamabhikruddhaH sahasA dAnavAniva.. 7-1-51 (44875) te kampyamAnA droNena bANaiH pANDavasR^i~njayAH. punaHpunarabhajyanta siMhenaivetare mR^igAH.. 7-1-52 (44876) tathA paryapatadroNaH pANDavAnAM bale balI. alAtachakravadrAjaMstadadbhutamivAbhavat.. 7-1-53 (44877) khacharanagarakalpaM kalpitaM shAstradR^iShTyA chaladanilapatAkaM hlAdanaM valgitAshvam. sphaTikavimalaketuM trAsanaM shAtravANAM rathavaramadhirUDhaH sa~njahArArisenAm.. .. 7-1-54 (44878) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi droNAbhiShekaparvaNi

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-1-9 subhagAnartitaiH saubhAgyavatInR^ittaiH.. 5-1-27 AdityapathagaH AkAshagaH.. 5-1-54 hlAdanaM yodbhurAnandajananam.. 5-1-7 saptamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 008

.. shrIH ..

7.8. adhyAyaH 008

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sa~njayena dhR^itarAShTraM prati droNaparAkramavarNanapUrvakaM tannidhanakathanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-1-0 (44879) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-1-0x (4280) tathA droNamabhighnantaM sAshvasUtarathadvipAn. vyathitAH pANDavA dR^iShTvA na chainaM paryavArayan.. 7-1-1 (44880) tato yudhiShThiro rAjA dhR^iShTadyumnadhana~njayau. abravItsarvato yattaiH kumbhayonirnivAryatAm.. 7-1-2 (44881) tatrainamarjunashchaiva dhR^iShTadyumnashcha pArShataH. `ye chAnye pArthivA rAjanpANDavasyAnusainikAH. pratyagR^ihNaMstatastatra samAgachChanmahArathAH.. 7-1-3 (44882) kekayA bhImasenashcha saubhadro.atha ghaTotkachaH. yudhiShThiro yamau mAtsyo drudashchAtmajaiH saha.. 7-1-4 (44883) draupadeyAshcha saMhR^iShTA dhR^iShTaketuH sasAtyakiH. chekitAnashcha sa~Nkruddho yuyutsushcha mahArathaH.. 7-1-5 (44884) ye chAnye pArthivA rAjanpANDavasyAnuyAyinaH. kulavIryAnurUpANi chakruH karmANyanekashaH.. 7-1-6 (44885) saMbhidyamAnAM tAM dR^iShTvA pANDavairvAhinIM raNe. vyAvR^itya chakShuShI kopAdbhAradvAjo.anvavaikShata.. 7-1-7 (44886) sa tIvraM kopamAsthAya rathe samaradurjayaH. vyadhamatpANDavAnIkaM mahAbhrANIva mArutaH.. 7-1-8 (44887) rathAnashvAnnarAnnAgAnabhidhAvannitastataH. chachAronmattavaddroNo vR^iddho.api taruNo yathA.. 7-1-9 (44888) tasya shoNitadigdhA~NgAH shoNAste vAtaraMhasaH. AjAneyA hayA rAjannavishrAntAH sukhaM yayuH.. 7-1-10 (44889) tamantakamiva kruddhamApatantaM yatavratam. dR^iShTvA samprAdravanyodhAH pANDavasya tatastataH.. 7-1-11 (44890) teShAM prAdravatAM bhImaH punarAvartatAmapi.. pashyatAM tiShThatAM chAsIchChabdaH paramadAruNaH.. 7-1-12 (44891) shUrANAM harShajanano bhIrUNAM bhayavardhanaH. dyAvApR^ithivyorvivaraM pUrayAmAsa sarvataH.. 7-1-13 (44892) tataH punarapi droNo nAma vishrAvayanyudhi. akarodraudramAtmAnaM kira~nCharashataiH parAn.. 7-1-14 (44893) sa tathA teShvanIkeShu pANDuputrasya mAriSha. kAlavadvyacharaddroNo yuveva sthaviro balI.. 7-1-15 (44894) utkR^itya cha shirAMsyugro bAhUnapi subhUShaNAn. kR^itvA shUnyAnrathopasthAnudakroshanmahAravAn.. 7-1-16 (44895) tasya harShapraNAdena bANavarSheNa cha prabho. prAkampanta raNe yodhA gAvaH shItArditA iva.. 7-1-17 (44896) droNasya rathaghoSheNa maurvIniShpeShaNena cha. dhanuHshabdena chAkAshe shabdaH samabhavanmahAn.. 7-1-18 (44897) athAsya dhanuSho bANA nissarantaH sahasrashaH. vyApya sarvA dishaH peturnAgAshvarathapattiShu. 7-1-19 (44898) taM kArmukamahAvegamastrajvalitapAvakam. droNamAsAdayA~nchakruH pA~nchAlAH pANDavaiH saha.. 7-1-20 (44899) sanAgarathapattyashvAnprAhiNodyamasAdanam. achirAdakaroddoNo mahIM shoNitakardamAm.. 7-1-21 (44900) tanvatA paramAstrANi sharAnsatatamasyatA. droNena vihitaM dikShu sharajAlamadR^ishyata.. 7-1-22 (44901) padAtiShu rathAshveShu vAraNeShu cha sarvashaH. tasya vidyudivAbhreShu charanketuradR^ishyata.. 7-1-23 (44902) sakekayAnAM pravarAMshcha pa~ncha pA~nchAlarAjaM cha sharaiH pramathya. yudhiShThirAnIkamadInasatvo droNo.abhyayAtkArmukabANapANiH.. 7-1-24 (44903) taM bhImasenashcha dhana~njayashcha shineshcha naptA drupadAtmajashcha. shaibyAtmajaH kAshipatiH shibishcha dR^iShTvA nadanto vyakira~nCharaughaiH.. 7-1-25 (44904) `teShAM sharA droNasharairnikR^ittA bhUmAvadR^ishyanta vivartamAnAH. shreNIkR^itAH saMyati moghavegA dvIpe nadInAmiva kAsharohAH'.. 7-1-26 (44905) te droNabANAsanavipramuktAH patatriNaH kA~nchanachitrapu~NkhAH. bhittvA sharIrANi gajAshvayUnAM jagmurmahIM shoNitadigdhavAjAH.. 7-1-27 (44906) sA yodhasa~Nghaishcha rathaishcha bhUmiH sharairvibhinnairgajavAjibhishcha. prachChAdyamAnA patitairbabhUva samAvR^itA dyauriva kAlameghaiH.. 7-1-28 (44907) shaineyabhImArjunavAhinIshaM saubhradrapA~nchAlasakAshirAjam. anyAMshcha vIrAnsamare mamarda droNaH sutAnAM tava bhUtikAmaH.. 7-1-29 (44908) etAni chAnyAni cha kauravendra karmANi kR^itvA samare mahAtmA. pratApya lokAniva kAlasUryo droNo gataH svargamito hi rAjan.. 7-1-30 (44909) evaM rukmarathaH shUro hatvA shatasahasrashaH. pANQDavAnAM raNe yodhAnpArShatena nipAtitaH.. 7-1-31 (44910) akShauhiNImabhyadhikAM shUrANAmanivartinAm. nihatya pashchAddhR^itimAnagachChatparamAM gatim.. 7-1-32 (44911) pANDavaiH sahapA~nchAlairashivaiH krUrakarmabhiH. hato rukmaratho rAjankR^itvA karma suduShkaram.. 7-1-33 (44912) tato ninAdo bhUtAnAmAkAshe samajAyata. sainyAnAM cha tato rAjannAchArye nihate yudhi.. 7-1-34 (44913) dyAM dharAM khaM disho vApi pradisharshchAnunAdayan. aho dhigiti bhUtAnAM shabdaH samabhAvadbhR^isham.. 7-1-35 (44914) devatAH pitarashchaiva pUrve ye chAsya bAndhavAH. dadR^ishurnihataM tatra bhAradvAjaM mahAratham.. 7-1-36 (44915) pANDavAstu jayaM labdhvA siMhanAdAnprachakrire. siMhanAdena mahatA samakampata medinI.. 7-1-37 (44916) `vichitrajAmbUnadabhUShitadhvajaM mahArathaM rukmarathaM nipAtitam. .. 7-1-38 (44917) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi droNAbhiShekaparvaNi aShTamo.adhyAyaH.. 8 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-1-12 bhImaH shabda iti sambandhaH.. 5-1-8 aShTamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 009

.. shrIH ..

7.9. adhyAyaH 009

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

droNamaraNashrAviNo dhR^itarAShTrasya tadguNAnuvarNanapUrvakaM shochanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-1-0 (44918) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-1-0x (4281) kiM kurvANaM raNe droNaM jaghruH pANDavasR^i~njayAH. tathA nipuNamastreShu sarvashastrabhR^itAmapi.. 7-1-1 (44919) rathaH paryapatadvA.asya dhanurvA.ashIryatAsyataH. pramatto vA.abhavaddoNo yathA mR^ityumupeyivAn.. 7-1-2 (44920) kathaM nu pArShatastAta shatrubhirduShpradharShaNam. kirantamiShusa~NghAtAnrukmapu~NkhAnanekashaH.. 7-1-3 (44921) kShiprahastaM dvijashreShThaM kR^itinaM chitrayodhinam. dUreShupAtinaM dAntamastrayuddheShu pAragam.. 7-1-4 (44922) pA~nchAlaputro nyavadhIddivyAstradharamachyutam. kurvANaM dAruNaM karma raNe yattaM mahAratham.. 7-1-5 (44923) vyaktaM hi daivaM balavatpauruShAditi me matiH. yaddroNo nihataH shUraH pArShatena mahAtmanA.. 7-1-6 (44924) astraM chaturvidhaM vIre yasminnAsItpratiShThitam. tamiShvastradharAchAryaM droNaM shaMsasi me hatam.. 7-1-7 (44925) shrutvA hataM rukmarathaM vaiyAghraparivAraNam. jAtarUpapariShkAraM nAdya shokamapAnude.. 7-1-8 (44926) na nUnaM paraduHkhena mriyate ko.api sa~njaya. yatra droNamahaM shrutvA hataM jIvAmi mandadhIH. daivameva paraM manye nanvanarthaM hi pauruSham.. 7-1-9 (44927) ashmasAramayaM nUrna hR^idayaM sudR^iDhaM mama. yachChrutvA nihataM droNaM shatadhA na vidIryate.. 7-1-10 (44928) brAhme daive tatheShvastre yamupAsanguNArthinaH. brAhmaNA rAjaputrAshcha sa kathaM mR^ityunA hR^itaH.. 7-1-11 (44929) shoShaNaM sAgarasyeva meroriva visarpaNam. patanaM bhAskarasyeva na mR^iShye droNapAtanam.. 7-1-12 (44930) duShTAnAM pratiSheddhAsIddhArmikANAM cha rakShitA. yo.ahAsItkR^ipaNasyArthe prANAnapi parantapaH.. 7-1-13 (44931) mandAnAM mama putrANAM jayAshA yasya vikrame. bR^ihaspatyushanastulyo buddhyA sa nihataH katham.. 7-1-14 (44932) `guNAnAM sarvayodhAnAM sthitirAsInmahAdyutiH. yaM mR^ityurvashagastiShThetsa kathaM mR^ityunA hataH'.. 7-1-15 (44933) te cha shoNA bR^ihanto.ashvAshChannA jAlairhiraNmayaiH. rathe vAtajavA yuktAH sarvashastrAtigA raNe.. 7-1-16 (44934) balino heShiNo dAntAH saindhavAH sAdhuvAhinaH. dR^iDhAH sa~NgrAmamadhyeShu kachchidAsanna vihvalAH.. 7-1-17 (44935) kariNAM bR^iMhatAM yuddhe sha~NkhadundubhiniHsvanaiH. jyAkShepasharavarShANAM shastrANAM cha sahiShNavaH.. 7-1-18 (44936) AshaMsantaH parA~njetuM jitashvAsA jitavyathAH. hayAH parAjitAH shIghrA bhAradvAjarathodvahAH.. 7-1-19 (44937) te sma rukmarathe yuktA naravIrasamAsthitAH. kathaM nAbhyataraMstAta pANDavAnAmanIkinIm.. 7-1-20 (44938) jAtarUpapariShkarAmAsthAya rathamuttamam. bhAradvAjaH kimakarodyudhi satyaparAkramaH.. 7-1-21 (44939) vidyAM yasyopajIvanti sarvalokadhanurdharAH. sa satyasandho balavAndroNaH kimakarodyudhi.. 7-1-22 (44940) divi shakramiva shreShThaM mahAmAtraM dhanurbhR^itAm. ke nu taM raudrakarmANaM yuddhe pratyudyayU rathAH.. 7-1-23 (44941) nanu rukmarathaM dR^iShTvA prAdravanti sma pANDavAH. divyamastraM vikurvANaM raNe tasminmahAbalam.. 7-1-24 (44942) utAho sarvasainyena dharmarAjaH sahAnujaH. pA~nchAlapragraho droNaM sarvataH samavArayat.. 7-1-25 (44943) nUnamAvArayatpArtho rathino.anyAnajihmagaiH. tato droNaM samaharatpArShataH pApakarmakR^it.. 7-1-26 (44944) nahyahaM paripashyAmi vadhe ka~nchana shuShmiNaH. dhR^iShTadyumnAdR^ite raudrAtpAlyamAnAtkirITinA.. 7-1-27 (44945) `utAho sarvasainyena dharmarAjaH sahAnujaH. utsR^ijya sarvasainyAni droNaM tamabhidudruve'.. 7-1-28 (44946) tairvR^itaH sarvataH kShudraiH pA~nchAlApashadaistataH. kekayaishchedikArUshairmatsyairanyaishcha bhUmipaiH.. 7-1-29 (44947) vyAkulIkR^itamAchAryaM pipIlairuragaM yathA. karmaNyasukare saktaM jaghAneti matirmama.. 7-1-30 (44948) yo.adhItya chaturo vedAnsA~NgAnAkhyAnapa~nchamAn. brAhmaNAnAM pratiShThAsItsrotasAmiva sAgaraH.. 7-1-31 (44949) kShatraM cha brahma chaiveha yo.abhyatiShThatparantapaH. `dR^iptAnAM pratiSheddhA cha chakShurAsIdachakShuShAm.. 7-1-32 (44950) amarShI chAvalipteShu dhArmikeShu cha dhArmikaH'. sa kathaM brAhmaNo vR^iddhaH shastreNa vadhamAptavAn.. 7-1-33 (44951) amarShiNA marShitavAnklishyamAnAnsadA mayA. anarhamANAnkaunteyAnkarmaNastasya tatphalam.. 7-1-34 (44952) yasya karmAnujIvanti loke sarvadhanurbhR^itaH. sa satyasandhaH sukR^itI shrIkAmairnihataH katham.. 7-1-35 (44953) divi shakra iva shreShTho mahAsatvo mahAbalaH. sa kathaM nihataH pArthaiH kShudramatsyairyathA timiH.. 7-1-36 (44954) kShiprahastashcha balavAndR^iDhaghanvArimardanaH. na yasya vijayAkA~NkShI viShayaM prApya jIvati.. 7-1-37 (44955) yaM dvau na jahataH shabdau jIvamAnaM kadAchana. brAhmashcha vedakAmAnAM jyAghoShashcha dhanuShmatAm.. 7-1-38 (44956) adInaM puruShavyAghraM hImantamaparAjitam. tamiShvAsavarAchArye droNaM jaghnuH kathaM rathAH.. 7-1-39 (44957) `nAhaM manye hataM droNaM sa hi lokamayotsyata. ko hi shakto raNe jetumanAdhR^iShyayashobalam.. 7-1-40 (44958) brahmakalpo bhavedbrAhme kShAtre nArAyaNopamaH. brahmakShatre cha yasyAstAM vashe sthANorivAkhile.. 7-1-41 (44959) sarvAnhi mAmakAnvIrAnsahAshvarathaku~njarAn. yudhiShThirasya tapasA hatAnmanyAmahe kurUn'.. 7-1-42 (44960) kathaM sa~njaya durdharShamanAdhR^iShyayashobalam. pashyatAM puruShendrANAM samare pArShato.avadhIt.. 7-1-43 (44961) ke purastAdayudhyanta rakShanto droNamantikAt. ke nu pashchAdavartanta gachChato durgamAM gatim.. 7-1-44 (44962) ke.arakShandakShiNaM chakraM savyaM ke cha mahAtmanaH. purastAtke cha vIrasya yudhyamAnasya saMyuge.. 7-1-45 (44963) ke cha tasmiMstanUstyaktvA pratIpaM mR^ityumAvrajan. droNasya samare vIrAH ke.akurvanta parAM dhR^itim.. 7-1-46 (44964) kachchinnainaM bhayAnmandAH kShatriyA vyajahanraNe. rakShitArastataH shUnye kachchittairna hataH paraiH.. 7-1-47 (44965) na sa pR^iShThamarestrAsAdraNe shauryAtpradarshayet. parAmapyApadaM prApya sa kathaM nihataH paraiH.. 7-1-48 (44966) etadAryeNa kartavyaM kR^ichChrAsvApatsu sa~njaya. parAkramedyathA shaktyA tachcha tasminpratiShThitam. `yo yathAshakti yuddhyeta dviShadbhiHsvAMshcha pAlayan.. 7-1-49 (44967) kachchinnainaM bhayAtkShudrAH pArthebhyaH pradadU raNe. goptR^ibhistaiH samutsR^iShTaH kachchinnaiSha parairhataH.. 7-1-50 (44968) dhR^iShTadyumnaM prapashyAmi nighnantamiva brAhmaNam. vAryamANaM raNe tAta drauNinA.amitatejasA'.. 7-1-51 (44969) muhyate me manastAta kathA tAvannivAryatAm. bhUyastu labdhasaMj~nastvAM paripR^ichChAmi sa~njaya.. .. 7-1-52 (44970) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi droNAbhiShekaparvaNi navamo.adhyAyaH.. 9 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-1-2 asyataH sharAniti sheShaH.. 5-1-17 balinastejasvinaH.. 5-1-23 mahAmAtraM pradhAnam.. 5-1-25 pA~nchAlampragrahaH pA~njAlaH pragraho bandharajuryasya 5-1-27 shuShmiNastejasvinaH.. 5-1-29 apashado.adhamaH.. 5-1-31 AkhyAnaM purANabhAratAdi.. 5-1-9 navamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 010

.. shrIH ..

7.10. adhyAyaH 010

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

droNamaraNashravaNena mUrChitasya dhR^itarAShTrasya pirachArikAbhirjalasechanAdinA samudbodhanam.. 1 .. dhR^itarAShTreNa sa~njayamprati yuddhakathanachodanA.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-10-0 (44971) vaishampAyana uvAcha. 7-10-0x (4282) evaM pR^iShTvA sUtaputraM hR^ichChokenArdito bhR^isham. jaye nirAshaH putrANAM dhR^itarAShTro.apatatkShitau.. 7-10-1 (44972) taM visaMj~naM nipatinta siShichuH parichArikAH. jalenAtyarthashItena jIvantyaH puNyagandhinA.. 7-10-2 (44973) patitaM chainamAlokya samastA bharatastriyaH. parivavrurmahArAjamaspR^ishaMshchaiva pANibhiH.. 7-10-3 (44974) utthApya chainaM shanakai rAjAnaM pR^ithivItalAt. AsanaM prApayAmAsurbAShpakaNThyo varAnanAH.. 7-10-4 (44975) AsanaM prApya rAjA tu mUrchChayA.abhipariplutaH. nishcheShTo.atiShThata tadA vIjyamAnaH samantataH.. 7-10-5 (44976) sa labdhvA shanakaiH saMj~nAM vepamAno mahIpatiH. punargAvalgaNiM sUtaM paryapR^ichChadyathAtatham.. 7-10-6 (44977) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-10-7x (4283) yaH sa udyannivAdityo jyotiShA praNudaMstamaH. ajAtashatrumAyAntaM kastaM droNAdavArayat.. 7-10-7 (44978) prabhinnamiva mAta~NgaM yathA kruddhaM tarasvinam. prasannavadanaM dR^iShTvA pratidviradagAminam.. 7-10-8 (44979) vAsitAsa~Ngame yadvadajayyaM pratiyUthapaiH. nijaghAna raNe vIrAnvIraH puruShasattamaH.. 7-10-9 (44980) yo hyeko hi mahAvIryo nirdaheddhorachakShuShA. kR^itsnaM duryodhanabalaM dhR^itimAnsatyasa~NgaraH.. 7-10-10 (44981) chakShurhaNaM jaye saktamiShvAsadharamachyutam. dAntaM bahumataM loke ke shUrAH paryavArayan.. 7-10-11 (44982) ke duShpradharShaM rAjAnamiShvAsadharamachyutam. samAsedurnaravyAghraM kaunteyaM tatra mAmakAH.. 7-10-12 (44983) tarasaivAbhipadyAtha yo vai droNamupAdravat. yaH karoti mahatkarma shatrUNAM vai mahAbalaH.. 7-10-13 (44984) mahAkAyo mahotsAho nAgAyutasamo bale. taM bhImasenamAyAntaM ke shUrAH paryavArayan.. 7-10-14 (44985) yadAyAjjaladaprakhyo rathaH paramavIryavAn. parjanya iva bIbhatsustumulAmashanIM sR^ijan.. 7-10-15 (44986) visR^ija~nCharajAlAni varShANi maghavAniva. avasphUrjandishaH sarvAstalanemisvanena cha.. 7-10-16 (44987) chApavidyutprabho ghoro rathagulmavalAhakaH. sanemighoShastanitaH sharashabdAtibandhuraH.. 7-10-17 (44988) roShanirjitajImUto manobhiprAyashIghragaH. marmAtigo bANadharastumulaH shoNitodakaiH.. 7-10-18 (44989) samplAvayandishaH sarvA mAnavairAstaranmahIm. bhImaniHsvanito raudro duryodhanapurogamAn.. 7-10-19 (44990) yuddhe.abhyaShi~nchadvijayo gArdhrapatraiH shilAshitaiH. gANDIvaM dhArayandhImAnkIdR^ishaM vo manastadA.. 7-10-20 (44991) iShusambAdhamAkAshaM kurvankapivaradhvajaH. yadAyAtkathamAsIttu tadA pArthaM samIkShatAm.. 7-10-21 (44992) kachchidgANDIvashabdena na praNashyati vai balam. yadvaH sabhairavaM kurvannarjuno bhR^ishamanvayAt.. 7-10-22 (44993) kachchinnApAnudatprAmAniShubhirvo dhana~njayaH. vAto vegAdivAvidhyanmeghA~nsharagaNairnR^ipAn.. 7-10-23 (44994) ko hi gANDIvadhanvAnaM raNe soDhuM naro.arhati. yamuShashchutya senAgre janaH sarvo vidIryate.. 7-10-24 (44995) yatsenAH samakampanta yadvIrAnaspR^ishadbhayam. ke tatra nAjahurdroNaM ke kShudrAH prAdravanbhayAt.. 7-10-25 (44996) ke vA tatra tanUstyaktvA pratIpaM mR^ityumAvrajan. amAnuShANAM jetAraM yuddheShvapi dhana~njayam.. 7-10-26 (44997) na cha vegaM sitAshvasya visahiShyanti mAmakAH. gANDIvasya cha nirghoShaM prAvR^iDjaladaniHsvanam.. 7-10-27 (44998) viShvakseno yasya yantA yasya yoddhA dhana~nchayaH. ashakyaH sa ratho jetuM manye devAsurairapi.. 7-10-28 (44999) sukumAro yuvA shUro darshanIyashcha pANDavaH. medhAvI nipuNo dhImAnyudhi satyaparAkramaH.. 7-10-29 (45000) ArAvaM vipulaM kurvanvyathayansarvasainikAn. yadAyAnnakulo droNaM ke shUrAH paryavArayan.. 7-10-30 (45001) AshIviSha iva kruddhaH sahadevo yadA.abhyayAt. kadanaM kariShya~nshatrUNAM tejasA durjayo yudhi.. 7-10-31 (45002) AryavratamamogheShuM hImantamaparAjitam. sahadevaM tamAyAntaM ke shUrAH paryavArayan.. 7-10-32 (45003) yastu sauvIrarAjasya pramathya mahatIM chamUm. Adatta mahiShIM bhojAM kAmyAM sarvA~NgashobhanAm.. 7-10-33 (45004) satyaM dhR^itishcha shauryaM cha brahmacharyaM cha kevalam. sarvANi yuyudhAne.asminnityAni puruSharShabhe.. 7-10-34 (45005) balinaM satyakarmANamadInamaparAjitam. vAsudevasamaM yuddhe vAsudevAdanantaram.. 7-10-35 (45006) dhana~njayopadeshena shreShThamiShvastrakarmaNi. pArthena samamastreShu kastaM droNAdavArayat.. 7-10-36 (45007) vR^iShNInAM pravaraM vIraM shUraM sarvadhanuShmatAm. rAmeNa samamastreShu yashasA vikrameNa cha.. 7-10-37 (45008) satyaM dhR^itirmatiH shauryaM brAhmaM chAstramanuttamam. sAtvate tAni sarvANi trailokyamiva keshave.. 7-10-38 (45009) tameva~NguNasampannaM durvAramapi daivataiH. samAsAdya maheShvAsaM ke shUrAH paryavArayan.. 7-10-39 (45010) pA~nchAleShUttamaM vIramuttamAbhijanapriyam. nityamuttamakarmANamuttamaujasamAhave.. 7-10-40 (45011) yuktaM dhana~njayahite mamAnarthArthamutthitam. yamavaishravaNAdityamahendravaruNopamam.. 7-10-41 (45012) mahArathaM samAkhyAtaM droNAyodyatamAhave. tyajantaM tumule prANAnke shUrAH samavArayan.. 7-10-42 (45013) ekopasR^itya chedibhyaH pANDavAnyaH samAshritaH. dhR^iShTaketuM samAyAntaM droNaM kastaM nyavArayat.. 7-10-43 (45014) yo.avadhItketumAnvIro rAjaputraM durAsadam. aparAntagiridvAre droNAtkastaM nyavArayat.. 7-10-44 (45015) strImpusayornaravyAghro yaH sa veda guNAguNAn. shikhaNDinaM yAj~nasenimamlAnamanasaM yudhi.. 7-10-45 (45016) devavratasya samare hetuM mR^ityormahAtmanaH. droNAyAbhimukhaM yAntaM ke shUrAH paryavArayan.. 7-10-46 (45017) yasminnabhyadhikA vIre guNAH sarve dhana~njayAt. yasminnastrANi satyaM cha brahmacharyaM cha sarvadA.. 7-10-47 (45018) vAsudevasamaM vIrye dhana~njayasamaM bale. tejasA.a.adityasadR^ishaM bR^ihaspatisamaM matau.. 7-10-48 (45019) abhimanyuM mahAtmAnaM vyAttAnanamivAntakam. droNAyAbhimukhaM yAntaM ke shUrAH samavArayan.. 7-10-49 (45020) taruNastaruNapraj~naH saubhadraH paravIrahA. yadAbhyadhAvadvai droNaM tadA.a.asIdvo manaH kathaM.. 7-10-50 (45021) draupadeyA naravyAghrAH samudramiva sindhavaH. yadroNamAdravansa~Nkhye ke shUrAstAnnyavArayan.. 7-10-51 (45022) ete dvAdasha varShANi krIDAmutsR^ijya bAlakAH. astrArthamavasanbhIShme bibhrato vratamuttamam.. 7-10-52 (45023) kShatra~njayaH kShatradevaH kShatravarmA cha mAnadaH. dhR^iShTadyumnAtmajA vIrAH ke tAndroNAdavArayan.. 7-10-53 (45024) shatAdvishiShTaM yaM yuddhe samamanyanta vR^iShNayaH. chekitAnaM maheShvAsaM kastaM droNAdavArayat.. 7-10-54 (45025) vArdhakShemiH kali~NgAnAM yaH kanyAmAharadyudhi. anAdhR^iShTiradInAtmA kastaM droNAdavArayat.. 7-10-55 (45026) bhrAtaraH pa~ncha kaikeyA dhArmikAH satyavikramAH. indragopakasa~NkAshA raktavarmAyudhadhvajAH.. 7-10-56 (45027) mAtR^iShvasuH sutA vIrAH pANDavAnAM jayArthinaH. tAndroNaM hantumAyAtAnke vIrAH paryavArayan.. 7-10-57 (45028) yaM yodhayanto rAjAno nAjayanvAraNAvate. ShaNmAsAnapi saMrabdhA jighAMsanto yudhAM patiM.. 7-10-58 (45029) dhanuShmatAM varaM shUraM satyasandhaM mahAbalam. droNAtkastaM naravyAghraM yuyutsuM paryavArayat.. 7-10-59 (45030) yaH putraM kAshirAjasya vArANasyAM mahAratham. samare strIShu gR^idhyantaM bhallenApAharadrathAt.. 7-10-60 (45031) dhR^iShTadyumnaM maheShvAsaM pArthAnAM mantradhAriNam. yuktaM duryodhanAnarthe sR^iShTaM droNavadhAya cha.. 7-10-61 (45032) nirdahantaM raNe yodhAndArayantaM cha sarvataH. droNAbhimukhamAyAntaM ke shUrAH paryavArayan.. 7-10-62 (45033) utsa~Nga iva samvR^iddhaM drupadasyAstravittamam. shaikhaNDinaM shastraguptaM ke droNAdavArayan.. 7-10-63 (45034) ya imAM pR^ithivIM kR^itsnAM charmavatsamaveShTayat. mahatA rathaghoSheNa mukhyArighno mahArathaH.. 7-10-64 (45035) dashAshvamedhAnAjahe svannapAnAptadakShiNAn. nirargalAnsarvamedhAnputravatpAlayanprajAH.. 7-10-65 (45036) visR^iShTA dakShiNA yasya ga~NgAjalamavArayat. ga~NgAsrotasi yAvatyaH sikatA apyasheShataH. tAvatIrgA dadau vIra ushInarasuto.adhvare.. 7-10-66 (45037) na pUrve nApare chakruridaM kechana mAnavAH. itIdaM chukrushurdevAH kR^ite karmaNi duShkare.. 7-10-67 (45038) pashyAmastriShu lokeShu na taM saMsthAsnuchAriShu. jAtaM chApi janiShyantaM dvitIyaM chApi sAmpratam.. 7-10-68 (45039) anyamaushInarAchChebyAddhuro voDhAramityuta. gatiM yasya na yAsyanti mAnuShA lokavAsinaH.. 7-10-69 (45040) tasya naptAramAyAntaM shaibyaM kaH samavArayat. droNAyAbhimukhaM yattaM vyAttAnanamivAntakam.. 7-10-70 (45041) virATasya rathAnIkaM matsyasyAmitraghAtinaH. prepsantaM samare droNaM ke vIrAH paryavArayan.. 7-10-71 (45042) sadyo vR^ikodarAjjAto mahAbalaparAkramaH. mAyAvI rAkShaso vIro yasmAnmama mahadbhayam.. 7-10-72 (45043) pArthAnAM jayakAmaM taM taM putrANAM mama kaNTakam. ghaTotkachaM mahAtmAnaM kastaM droNAdavArayat.. 7-10-73 (45044) ete chAnye cha bahavo yeShAmajitaM yudhi. tyaktAraH saMyuge prANAnkiM teShAmajitaM yudhi.. 7-10-74 (45045) yeShAM cha puruShavyAghraH shAr~NgadhanvA vyapAshrayaH.. lokAnAM gururatyarthaM lokanAthaH sanAtanaH. 7-10-75 (45046) nArAyaNoraNe nAtho divyo divyAtmakaH prabhuH.. yasya divyAni karmANi pravadanti manIShiNaH. 7-10-76 (45047) tAnyahaM kIrtayiShyAmi bhaktyA sthairyArthamAtmanaH.. .. 7-10-77 (45048) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi droNAbhiShekaparvaNi dashamo.adhyAyaH.. 10 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-10-8 saH prasiddhaH. tamajAtashatrum AyAntaM dR^iShTvA droNAtkaH avArayadityanvayaH.. 5-10-15 yadA ayAt yadA cha duryodhanapurogamAngArdhrapatrairabhyaShi~nchattadA vo manaH krIdR^ishamabhUditi ShaShThenAnvayaH.. 5-10-34 yuyudhAne sAtyakau.. 5-10-38 sAtvate sAtyakau.. 5-10-68 sthAsruchAriShu sthAvaraja~NgamAtmakeShu. snamityasya vyavahitena pashyAma ityanena sambandhaH.. 5-10-10 dashamo.adhyAyaH.. 10 ..
droNaparva - adhyAya 011

.. shrIH ..

7.11. adhyAyaH 011

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

dhR^itarAShTreNa prasa~NgAdbhaktyudrekeNa--shrIkR^iShNacharitrAnukIrtanam.. 1 .. dhR^itarAShTreNa bahudhA vichintya sa~njayamprati yuddhakathanachodanA.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-11-0 (45049) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-11-0x (4284) shR^iNu divyAni karmANi vAsudevasya sa~njaya. kR^itavAnyAni govindo yathA nAnyAHpumAnkvachit.. 7-11-1 (45050) saMvardhatA gopakule bAlenaiva mahAtmanA. vikhyApitaM balaM bAhvostriShu lokeShu sa~njaya.. 7-11-2 (45051) pUtanAM shakaTaM hatvA keshinaM chaiva vAjinam. R^iShabhaM dhenukaM chaiva ariShTaM cha mahAbalam.. 7-11-3 (45052) dAvAnmuktvA mahAbAhurdhR^itvA govardhanaM nigim. chANUraM muShTikaM chaiva ra~Ngamadhye nihatya cha.. 7-11-4 (45053) pralambaM narakaM jambhaM pIThaM chApi mahAsuram. muruM chAntakasa~NkAshamavadhItpuShkarekShaNaH.. 7-11-5 (45054) tathA kaMso mahAtejA jarAsandhena pAlitaH. vikrameNaiva kR^iShNena sagaNaH pAtito raNe.. 7-11-6 (45055) sunAmA raNavikrAntaH samagrAkShauhiNIpatiH. bhojarAjasya madhyastho bhrAtA kaMsasya vIryavAn.. 7-11-7 (45056) baladevadvitIyena kR^iShNenAmitraghAtinA. tarasvI samare dagdhaH sasainyaH shUrasenarAT.. 7-11-8 (45057) durvAsA nAma viprarShistathA paramakopanaH. ArAdhitaH sadAreNa sa chAsmai pradadau varAn.. 7-11-9 (45058) tathA gAndhArarAjasya sutAM vIraH svayaMvare. nirjitya pR^ithivIpAlAnAvahatpuShkarekShaNaH.. 7-11-10 (45059) amR^iShyamANA rAjAno yasya jAtyA hayA iva. rathe vaivAhike yuktAH pratodena kR^itavraNAH.. 7-11-11 (45060) jarAsandhaM mahAbAhumupAyena janArdanaH. pareNa ghAtayAmAsa samagrAkShauhiNIpatim.. 7-11-12 (45061) chedirAjaM cha vikrAntaM rAjasenApatiM balI. arghe vivadamAnaM cha jaghAna pashuvattadA.. 7-11-13 (45062) saubhaM daityapuraM khasthaM shAlvaguptaM durAsadam. samudrakukShau vikramya pAtayAmAsa mAdhavaH.. 7-11-14 (45063) a~NgAnva~NgAnkali~NgaMshcha mAgadhAnkAshikosalAn. vAtsyagArgyakarUShAMshcha pauNDrAMshchApyajayadraNe.. 7-11-15 (45064) AvantyAndAkShiNAtyAMshcha pArvatIyAndasherakAn. kAshmIrakAnaurasikAnpishAchAMshcha samudgalAn.. 7-11-16 (45065) kAmbhojAnvATadhAnAMshcha cholAnpANDyAMshcha sa~njaya. trigartAnmAlavAMshchaiva daradAMshcha sudurjayAn.. 7-11-17 (45066) nAnAdigbhyashcha samprAptAnkhashAMshchaiva shakAMstathA. jitavAnpuNDarIkAkSho yavanaM cha sahAnugam.. 7-11-18 (45067) pravishya makarAvAsaM yAdogaNaniShevitam. jigAya varuNaM sa~Nkhye salilAntargataM purA.. 7-11-19 (45068) yudhi pa~nchajanaM hatvA daityaM pAtAlavAsinam. pA~nchajanyaM hR^iShIkesho divyaM sha~NkhamavAptavAn.. 7-11-20 (45069) khANDave pArthasahitastoShayitvA hutAshanam. AgneyamastraM durdharShaM chakraM lebhe mahAbalaH.. 7-11-21 (45070) vainateyaM samAruhya trAsayitvA.amarAvatIm. mahendrabhavanAdvIraH pArijAtamupAnayat.. 7-11-22 (45071) tachcha marShitavA~nshakro jAnaMstasya parAkramam. rAj~nAM chApyajitaM kaMchitkR^iShNeneha na shushruma.. 7-11-23 (45072) yachcha tanmahadAshcharyaM sabhAyAM mama sa~njaya. kR^itavAnpuNDarIkAkShaH kastadanya ihArhati.. 7-11-24 (45073) yachcha bhaktyA prasanno.ahamadrAkShaM kR^iShNamIshvaram. tanme suviditaM sarvaM pratyakShamiva chAgamam.. 7-11-25 (45074) nAnto vikramayuktasya buddhyA yuktasya vA punaH. karmaNAM shakyate gantuM hR^iShIkeshasya sa~njaya.. 7-11-26 (45075) tathA gadashcha sAmbashcha pradyumno.atha vidUrathaH. agAvaho.aniruddhashcha chArudeShNaH sasAraNaH.. 7-11-27 (45076) ulmuko nishaThashchaiva jhillI babhrushcha vIryavAn. pR^ithushcha vipR^ithushchaiva shamI~Nko.athArimejayaH.. 7-11-28 (45077) ete.anye balavantashcha vR^iShNivIrAH prahAriNaH. kathaMchitpANjavAnIkaM shrayeyuH samare sthitAH.. 7-11-29 (45078) AhUtA vR^iShNivIreNa keshavena mahAtmanA. tataH saMshayitaM sarve bhavediti matirmama.. 7-11-30 (45079) nAgAyutabalo vIraH kailAsashikharopamaH. vanamAlI halI rAmastatra yatra janArdanaH.. 7-11-31 (45080) yamAhuH sarvapitaraM vAsudevaM dvijAtayaH. api vA hyeSha pANDUnAM yotsyate.arthAya sa~njaya.. 7-11-32 (45081) sa yadA tAta sannahyetpANDavArthAya sa~njaya. na tadA pratisaMyoddhA bhavitA tatra kashchana.. 7-11-33 (45082) yadi sma kuravaH sarve jayeyurnAma pANDavAn. vArShNeyo.arthAya teShAM vai gR^ihNIyAchChastramuttamam.. 7-11-34 (45083) tataH sarvAnnaravyAghro hatvA narapatInraNe. kauravAMshcha mahAbAhuHkuntyai dadyAtsa medinIm.. 7-11-35 (45084) yasya yantA hR^iShIkesho yoddhA yasya dhana~njayaH. rathasya tasya kaH sa~Nkhye pratyanIko bhavedrathaH.. 7-11-36 (45085) na kenachidupAyena kurUNAM dR^ishyate jayaH. tasmAnme sarvamAchakShva yathA yuddhamavartata.. 7-11-37 (45086) arjunaH keshavasyAtmA kR^iShNo.apyAtmA kirITinaH. arjune vijayo nityaM kR^iShNe kIrtishcha shAshvatI.. 7-11-38 (45087) sarveShvapi cha lokeShu bIbhatsuraparAjitaH. prAdhAnyenaiva bhUyiShThamameyAH keshave guNAH.. 7-11-39 (45088) mohAdduryodhanaH kR^iShNaM yo na vettIha keshavam. mohito daivayogena mR^ityupAshapuraskR^itaH. 7-11-40 (45089) na veda kR^iShNaM dAshArhamarjunaM chaiva pANDavam. pUrvadevau mahAtmAnau naranArAyaNAvubhau.. 7-11-41 (45090) ekAtmAnau dvidhAbhUtau dR^ishyete mAnavairbhuvi. manasApi hi durdharShau senAmetAM yashasvinau.. 7-11-42 (45091) nAshayetAmihechChantau mAnuShatvAchcha nechChataH. yugasyeva viparyAso lokAnAmiva mohanam.. 7-11-43 (45092) bhIShmasya cha vadhastAta droNasya cha mahAtmanaH. na hyeva brahmacharyeNa na vedAdhyayanena cha.. 7-11-44 (45093) na kriyAbhirna chAstreNa mR^ityoH kashchinnirvAyate. lokasambhAvitau vIrau kR^itAstrau yuddhadurmadau.. 7-11-45 (45094) bhIShmadroNau hatau shrutvA kinnu jIvAmi sa~njaya. yAM tAM shriyamasUyAmaH purA dR^iShTvA yudhiShThire.. 7-11-46 (45095) adya tAmanujAnImo bhIShmadroNavadhena ha. matkR^ite chApyanuprAptaH kurUNAmeSha sa~NkShayaH.. 7-11-47 (45096) pakvAnAM hi vadhe sUta vajrAyante tR^iNAnyuta. anantamidamaishvaryaM loke prApto yudhiShThiraH.. 7-11-48 (45097) yasya kopAnmahAtmAnau bhIShmadroNau nipAtitau. prAptaH prakR^itito dharmo na dharmo mAmakAnprati.. 7-11-49 (45098) krUraH sarvavinAshAya kAlo.asau nAtivartate. anyathA chintitA hyarthA naraistAta manasvibhiH. anyathaiva prapadyante daivAditi matirmama.. 7-11-50 (45099) tasmAdaparihArye.arthe samprApte kR^ichChra uttame. apAraNIye dushchintye yathAbhUtaM prachakShva me.. .. 7-11-51 (45100) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi droNAbhiShekaparvaNi ekAdasho.adhyAyaH.. 11 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-11-6 vikrameNaiva astraM chinA.. 5-11-12 pareNa bhImena.. 5-11-11 ekAdasho.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 012

.. shrIH ..

7.12. adhyAyaH 012

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

droNachoditena duryodhanena yudhiShThirasya jIvagrAhaM grahaNavaraNam.. 1 .. droNena arjunAsannidhAne tadvrahaNe pratij~nAte duryo dhanena taduddhoShaNam.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-12-0 (45101) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-12-0x (4285) `shushrUShasva sthiro bhUtvAM shaMsato mama bhArata'. hanta te kathayiShyAmi sarvaM pratyakShadarshivAn. yathA satyaparo droNaH sAditAH pANDusR^i~njayaiH.. 7-12-1 (45102) senApatitvaM samprApya bhAradvAjo mahArathaH. madhye sarvasya sainyasya putraM te vAkyamabravIt.. 7-12-2 (45103) yatkauravANAmR^iShabhAdApageyAdanantaram. sainApatye tvayA rAjannadya satkR^itavAnaham.. 7-12-3 (45104) sadR^ishaM karmaNastasya phalaM prApnuhi bhArata. karomi kAmaM kaM te.adya pravR^iNIShva yamichChasi.. 7-12-4 (45105) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-12-5x (4286) tato duryodhano rAjA karNaduHshAsanAdibhiH. sammantryovAcha durdharShamAchAryaM jayatAM varam.. 7-12-5 (45106) dadAsi chedvaraM mahyaM jIvagrAhaM yudhiShThiram. gR^ihItvA rayinAM shreShThaM matsamIpamihAnaya.. 7-12-6 (45107) `ichCheyaM vai mahAtmAnaM dharmAtmAnaM yudhiShThiram. bhrAtR^iNAM pashyatAmeva jIvagrAheNa me dvija.. 7-12-7 (45108) gR^ihItvA rathinAM shreShThaM matsakAshamihAnaya. prINAmyanena kAryeNa sasuhR^ijjanabAndhavaH.. 7-12-8 (45109) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-12-9x (4287) tataH kurUNAmAchAryaH shrutvA putrasya te vachaH. senAM praharShayansarvAmidaM vachanamabravIt.. 7-12-9 (45110) dhanyaH kuntIsuto rAjanyasya grahaNamichChasi. na vadhaM tasya durdharSha varamadya prayAchase.. 7-12-10 (45111) kimarthaM cha naravyAghra na vadhaM tasya kA~NkShase. nAshaMsasi kriyAmetAM matto duryodhana dhruvam.. 7-12-11 (45112) AhosviddharmarAjasya dveShTA kashchinna vidyate. yadIchChasi tvaM jIvantaM kulaM rakShasi chAtmanaH.. 7-12-12 (45113) athavA bharatashreShTha nirjitya yudhi pANDavAn. rAjyAMshaM prati dattvA cha saubhrAtraM kartumichChasi.. 7-12-13 (45114) dhanyaH kuntIsuto rAjA sujAtaM chAsya dhImataH. ajAtashatrutA satyA tasya yatsnihyate bhavAn.. 7-12-14 (45115) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-12-15x (4288) droNena chaivamuktasya tava putrasya bhArata. sahasA niHsR^ito bhAvo yosya nityaM hR^idi sthitaH.. 7-12-15 (45116) nAkAro gUhituM shakyo bR^ihaspatisamairapi. tasmAttava suto rAjanprahR^iShTo vAkyamabravIt.. 7-12-16 (45117) vadhe kuntIsutasyAjau nAchArya vijayo mama. hate yudhiShThire pArthA hanyuHsarvAnhi no dhruvam.. 7-12-17 (45118) naiva shakyA raNe sarve nihantumamarairapi. `yadi sarve haniShyante pANDavAH sasutA mR^idhe.. 7-12-18 (45119) tataH kR^itsnaM vashe kR^itvA niHsheShaM nR^ipamaNDalam. sasAgaravanAM sphItAM vijitya vasudhAmimAm.. 7-12-19 (45120) viShNurdAsyati kR^iShNAyai kuntyai vA puruShottamaH'. yadyeSha chaiShAM sheShaHsyAtsa evAsmAnna sheShayet.. 7-12-20 (45121) satyapratij~ne tvAnIte punardyUtena nirjite. `tasmi~njIvati chAyAte hyupAyairbahubhiH kR^itaiH'. punaryAsyantyaraNyAya pANDavAstamanuvratAH.. 7-12-21 (45122) so.ayaM mama jayo vyaktaM dIrghakAlaM bhaviShyati. ato na vadhamichChAmi dharmarAjasya karhichit.. 7-12-22 (45123) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-12-23x (4289) tasya jihmamabhiprAyaM j~nAtvA droNo.arthatattvavit. taM varaM sAntaraM tasmai dadau saMchintya buddhimAn.. 7-12-23 (45124) droNa uvAcha. 7-12-24x (4290) na chedyudhiShThiraM vIraH pAlayedarjuno yudhi. manyasva pANDavashreShThamAnItaM vashamAtmanaH.. 7-12-24 (45125) na hi shakyo raNe pArthaH sendrairdevAsurairapi. pratyudyAtumatastAta na tasmAddharShayAmyaham.. 7-12-25 (45126) asaMshayaM sa me shiShyo matpUrvashchAstrakarmaNi. taruNaH sukR^itI yukta ekAyanagatashcha saH.. 7-12-26 (45127) astrANIndrAchcha rudrAchcha bhUyAMsi samavAptavAn. amarShitashcha te rAjaMstato nAmarShayAmyaham.. 7-12-27 (45128) sa chApakramyatAM yuddhAdyenopAyena shakyate. apanIte tataH pArthe dharmarAjo jitastvayA.. 7-12-28 (45129) grahaNe hi jayastasya na vadhe puruSharShabha. `grahaNaM hi vadhAttasya dharmarAjasya manyase'. anenaivAbhyupAyena grahaNaM samupaiShyasi.. 7-12-29 (45130) ahaM gR^ihItvA rAjAnaM satyadharmaparAyaNam. AnayiShyAmi te rAjanvashamadya na saMshayaH.. 7-12-30 (45131) yadi syAsyati sa~NgrAme muhUrtamapi me.agrataH. apanIte naravyAghre kuntIputre dhana~njaye.. 7-12-31 (45132) phalgunasya samIpe tu na hi shakyo yudhiShThiraH. grahItuM samare rAjansendrairapi surAsuraiH.. 7-12-32 (45133) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-12-33x (4291) `evamukte tadA tasminyuddhe devAsuropame'. sAntaraM tu pratij~nAte rAj~no droNena nigrahe. gR^ihItaM tamamanyanta tava putrAH subAlishAH.. 7-12-33 (45134) tato duryodhanenApi grahaNaM pANDavasya tat. `skandhAvAreShu sarveShu yathAsthAneShu mAriSha'. sainyasthAneShu sarveShu sughoShitamarindama.. 7-12-34 (45135) pANDaveyeShu sApekShaM droNaM jAnAti te sutaH. tataH pratij~nAsthairyArthaM sa mantro bahulIkR^itaH.. .. 7-12-35 (45136) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi droNAbhiShekaparvaNi dvAdasho.adhyAyaH.. 12 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-12-11 etAM vadharUpAM kriyAM matto nAshaMsasi na sambhAvayasi.. 5-12-12 tadichChasi tvaM iti ka.kha.pAThaH.. 5-12-14 sujAtaM shobhanaM janma 5-12-22 vyaktaM niyatam.. 5-12-26 matpUrvaH ahaM pUrvo gururyasya ekAyanagataH jayamaraNAnyataranishchayavAn.. 5-12-35 bahulIkR^itaH pratij~nAM na tyajediti bahuShu prakAshitaH.. 5-12-12 dvAdasho.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 013

.. shrIH ..

7.13. adhyAyaH 013

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

arjunena droNapratij~nAbhItasya yudhiShThirasya samAshvAsanam.. 1 .. yuddhArambho droNaparAkramashcha.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-13-0 (45137) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-13-0x (4292) sAntare tu pratij~nAne rAj~no droNena nigrahe. tataste sainikAH shrutvA taM yudhiShThiranigraham. siMhanAdaravAMshchakrurbAhushabdAMshcha kR^itsnashaH.. 7-13-1 (45138) tachcha sarvaM yathAnyAyaM dharmarAjena bhArata. AptaishchAraiH parij~nAtaM bhAradvAjachikIrShitam.. 7-13-2 (45139) tataH sarvAnsamAnAyya bhrAtR^inanyAMshcha sarvashaH. avravIddharmarAjastu dhana~njayamidaM vachaH.. 7-13-3 (45140) shrutaM te puruShavyAghra droNasyAdya chikIrShitam. yathA tanna bhavetsatyaM tathA nItirvidhIyatAm.. 7-13-4 (45141) sAntaraM hi pratij~nAtaM droNenAmitraghAtinA. tachchAntaramamogheShau tvayi tena samAhitam.. 7-13-5 (45142) tattvamadya mahAbAho yudhyasva madanantaram. yathA duryodhanaH kAmaM nemaM droNAdavApnuyAt.. 7-13-6 (45143) arjuna uvAcha. 7-13-7x (4293) yathA me na vadhaH kArya AchAryasya katha~nchana. tathA tava parityAgo na me rAjaMshchikIrShitaH.. 7-13-7 (45144) apyevaM pANDava prANAnutsR^ijeyamahaM yudhi. pratiyAtA.ahamAchAryaM tvAM na jahyAM katha~nchana.. 7-13-8 (45145) tvAM nigR^ihyAhave rAjandhArtarAShTro yamichChati. na sa taM jIvaloke.asminkAmaM prAptA katha~nchana.. 7-13-9 (45146) prapateddyauH sanakShatrA pR^ithivI shakalI bhavet. na tvAM droNo nigR^ihNIyAjjIvamAne mayi dhruvam.. 7-13-10 (45147) yadi tasya raNe sAhyaM kurute vajrabhR^itsvayam. viShNurvA sahito devairna tvAM prApsyatyasau mR^idhe.. 7-13-11 (45148) mayi jIvati rAjendra na bhayaM kartumarhasi. droNAdastrabhR^itAM shreShThAtsarvashastrabhR^itAmapi.. 7-13-12 (45149) anyachcha brUyAM rAjendra pratij~nAM mama nishchalAm.. 7-13-13 (45150) na smarAmyanR^itaM tAvanna smarAmi parAjayam. na smarAmi pratishrutya vismR^itya manasva.akR^itam.. 7-13-14 (45151) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-13-15x (4294) tataH sha~NkhAshcha bheryashcha mR^ida~NgAshchAnakaiH saha. prAvAdyanta mahArAja pANDavAnAM niveshane.. 7-13-15 (45152) siMhanAdashcha saMjaj~ne pANDavAnAM mahAtmanAm.. dhanurjyAtalashabdashcha gaganaspR^iksubhairavaH.. 7-13-16 (45153) shrutvA sha~Nkhasya nirghoShaM pANDavasya mahaujasaH. tvadIyeShvapyanIkeShu vAditrANyabhijaghnire.. 7-13-17 (45154) tato vyUDhAnyanIkAni tava teShAM cha bhArata. shanairupeyuranyonyaM yotsyamAnAni saMyuge.. 7-13-18 (45155) tataH pravavR^ite yuddhaM tumulaM romaharShaNam. pANDavAnAM kurUNAM cha droNapA~nchAlyayorapi.. 7-13-19 (45156) yatamAnAH prayatena droNAnIkavishAtane. na shekuH sR^i~njayA yuddhe taddhi droNena pAlitam.. 7-13-20 (45157) tathaiva tava putrasya rathodArAH prahAriNaH. na shekuH pANDavIM senAM pAlyamAnAM kirITInA.. 7-13-21 (45158) AstAM te stimite sene rakShyamANe parasparam. samprasupte yathA naktaM vanarAjyau supuShpite.. 7-13-22 (45159) tato rukmaratho rAjannarkeNeva virAjatA. varUthinA viniShpatya vyacharatpR^itanAmukhe.. 7-13-23 (45160) tamudyantaM rathenaikamAshukAriNamAhave. anekamiva santrasAnmenire pANDusR^i~njayAH.. 7-13-24 (45161) tena muktAH sharA ghorA vicheruH sarvatodisham. trAsayanto mahArAja pANDaveyasya vAhinIm.. 7-13-25 (45162) madhyandinamanuprApto gabhastishatasaMvR^itaH. yathA dR^ishyeta gharmoshustathA droNo.apyadR^ishyata.. 7-13-26 (45163) na chainaM pANDaveyAnAM kashchichChaknoti bhArata. vIkShituM samare kruddhaM mahendramiva dAnavAH.. 7-13-27 (45164) mohayitvA tataH sainyaM bhAradvAjaH pratApavAn. dhR^iShTadyumnabalaM tUrNaM vyadhamannishitaiH sharaiH.. 7-13-28 (45165) sa dishaH sarvato ruddhvA saMvR^itya khamajihmagaiH. pArShato yatra tatrainAmabhinatpANDuvAhinIm.. .. 7-13-29 (45166) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi droNAbhiShekaparvaNi ekAdashadivasayuddhe trayodasho.adhyAyaH.. 13 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-13-22 samprasupte kR^itapatrasa~Nkoche.. 5-13-23 varUthinA rathena.. 5-13-13 trayodasho.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 014

.. shrIH ..

7.14. adhyAyaH 014

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

droNayuddhaM dvairathayuddhamabhimanyuparAkramashcha.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-14-0 (45167) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-14-0x (4295) tataH sa pANDavAnIke janayansumahadbhayam. vyacharatpR^itanAM droNo dahankakShamivAnalaH.. 7-14-1 (45168) nirdahantamanIkAni sAkShAdagnimivotthitam. dR^iShTvA rukmarathaM kruddhaM samakampanta sR^i~njayAH.. 7-14-2 (45169) satataM kR^iShyataH sa~Nkhye dhanuSho.asyAshukAriNaH. jyAghoShaH shushruve.atyarthaM visphUrjitamivAshaneH.. 7-14-3 (45170) rathinaH sAdinashchaiva nAgAnashvAnpadAtinaH. raudrA hastavatA muktAH sammR^idganti ssa sAyakAH.. 7-14-4 (45171) nAnadyamAnaH parjanyaH pravR^iddhaH shuchisa~NkShaye. ashmavarShamivAvarShatpareShAmAvahadbhayam.. 7-14-5 (45172) vicharansa dishaH sarvAH senAM sa~NkShobhayanprabhuH. vardhayAmAsa santrAsaM shAtravANAmamAnuSham.. 7-14-6 (45173) tasya vidyudivAbhreShu chApaM hemapariShkR^itam. bhrAjamAnaM rathe tasmindR^ishyate sma mahAbhayam.. 7-14-7 (45174) sa vIraH satyavAnprAj~no dharmanityaH sadA punaH. yugAntakAlavaddhorAM raudrAM prAvartayannadIm.. 7-14-8 (45175) amarShavegaprabhavAM kravyAdagaNasa~NkulAm. balaughaiH sarvataH pUrNAM dhvajavR^ikShApahAriNIm.. 7-14-9 (45176) shoNitodAM rathAvartAM hastyashvakR^itarodhasam. kavachoDupasaMyuktAM mAMsapa~NkasamAkulAm.. 7-14-10 (45177) medomajjAsthisikatAmuShmIShachayaphenilAm.. sa~NgrAmajaladApUrNAM prAsamatsyasamAkulAm.. 7-14-11 (45178) naranAgAshvakalilAM sharavegaughavAhinIm. sharIradArusa~NghATAM rathakachChapasa~NkulAm.. 7-14-12 (45179) uttamA~NgaiH pa~NkajinIM nistriMshajhaShasa~NkulAm. rathanAgahUdopetAM nAnAbhAraNabhUShitAm.. 7-14-13 (45180) mahArathashatAvartAM bhUmireNUrmimAlinIm. mahAvIryavatAM sa~Nkhye sutarAM bhIrudustarAm.. 7-14-14 (45181) sharIrashatasambAdhAM gR^idhraka~NkaniShevitAm. mahArathasahasrANi nayantIM yamasAdanam.. 7-14-15 (45182) shUlavyAlasamAkIrNAM prANivAjiniShevitAm. ChinnakShatramahAhaMsAM mukuTANDajasevitAm.. 7-14-16 (45183) chakrakUrmA~NgadAnakrAM sharakShudrajhaShAkulAm. bakagR^idhrasR^igAlAnAM ghorasa~NghairniShevitAm.. 7-14-17 (45184) nihatAnprANinaH sa~Nkhye droNena balinA raNe. vahantIM pitR^ilokAya shatasho rAjasattama.. 7-14-18 (45185) shar^IrashatasambAdhAM keshashaivalashAdvalAm. nadIM prAvartayadrAjanbhIrUpaNAM bhayavardhinIm.. 7-14-19 (45186) tarjayantamanIkAni tAni tAni mahAratham. sarvato.abhyadravandroNaM yudhiShThirapurogamAH.. 7-14-20 (45187) tAnabhidravataH shUrAMstAvakA dR^iDhavikramAH. sarvataH pratyagR^ihNanta tadabhUdromaharShaNam.. 7-14-21 (45188) shatamAyastu shakuniH sahadevaM samAdravat. saniyantR^idhvajarathaM vivyAgha nishitaiH sharaiH.. 7-14-22 (45189) tasya mAdrIsutaH ketuM dhanuH sUtaM hayAnapi. nAtikruddhaH sharaishChittvA ShaShThyA vivyAdha saubalam. `bhittvA cha sharavarSheNa shakuniM pratyavArayat'.. 7-14-23 (45190) gadAM gR^ihItvA shakuniH prachaskanda rathottamAt. sa tasya gadayA rAjanrathAtsUtamapAtayat.. 7-14-24 (45191) tatastau virathau rAjangadAhastau mahAbalau. chikrIDatU raNe shUrau sashR^i~NgAviva parvatau.. 7-14-25 (45192) droNaH pA~nchAladAyAdaM vivyAdha nishitaiH sharaiH. tayostatra mahArAja bANavarShaiH prakAshitam. khadyotairiva chAkAshaM pradoShe puruSharShabha.. 7-14-26 (45193) viviMshatiM bhImaseno viMshatyA nishitaiH sharaiH. viddhvA nAkampayadvIrastadadbhutamivAbhavat.. 7-14-27 (45194) viviMshatistu sahasA vyashvaketusharAsanam. bhImaM chakre mahArAja tataH sainyAnyapUjayan.. 7-14-28 (45195) sa tanna mamR^iShe vIraH shatrorvikramamAhave. tato.asya gadayA dAntAnhayAtsarvAnapAtayat.. 7-14-29 (45196) hatAshvAtsa rathAdrAjangR^ihya charma mahAbalaH. abhyayAdbhImasenaM tu matto mattamiva dvipam.. 7-14-30 (45197) shalyastu nakulaM vIraH svasrIyaM priyamAtmanaH. vivyAdha prahasanbANairlAlayankopayanniva.. 7-14-31 (45198) tasyAshvAnAtapatraM cha dhvajaM sUtamatho dhanuH. nipAtya nakulaH sa~Nkhye sha~NkhaM dadhmau pratApavAn.. 7-14-32 (45199) dhR^iShTaketuH kR^ipeNAstA~nChittvA bahuvidhA~nCharAn. kR^ipaM vivyAdha saptatyA dhvajaM chAsya tribhiH sharaiH.. 7-14-33 (45200) taM kR^ipaH sharavarSheNa mahatA samavArayat. vivyAdha cha raNe vipro dhR^iShTaketumamarShaNam.. 7-14-34 (45201) sAtyakiH kR^itavarmANaM nArAchena stanAntare. viddhvA vivyAdha saptatyA punaranyaiH smayanniva.. 7-14-35 (45202) taM bhojaH saptasaptatyA viddhvA.a.ashu nishitaiH sharaiH. nAkampayata shaineyaM shIghro vAyurivAchalam.. 7-14-36 (45203) senApatiH susharmANaM bhR^ishaM marmasvatADayat. sa chApi taM tomareNa jatrudeshe.abhyatADayat.. 7-14-37 (45204) vaikartanaM tu samare virATaH pratyavArayat. saha matsyairmahAvIryaistadadbhutamivAbhavat.. 7-14-38 (45205) tatpauruShamabhUttatra sUtaputrasya dAruNam. yatsainyaM vArayAmAsa sharaiH sannataparvabhiH.. 7-14-39 (45206) drupadastu svayaM rAjA bhagadattena sa~NgataH. tayoryuddhaM mahArAja chitrarUpamivAbhavat.. 7-14-40 (45207) bhagadattastu rAjAnaM drupadaM nataparvabhiH. saniyantR^idhvajarathaM vivyAdha puruSharShabhaH.. 7-14-41 (45208) drupadastu tataH kruddho bhagadattaM mahAratham. AjaghAnorasi kShipraM shareNAnataparvaNA.. 7-14-42 (45209) yuddhaM yodhavarau loke saumadattishikhaNDinau. bhUtAnAM trAsajananaM chakrAte.astravishAradau.. 7-14-43 (45210) bhUrishravA raNe rAjanyAj~naseniM mahAratham. mahatA sAyakaughena chChAdayAmAsa vIryavAn.. 7-14-44 (45211) shikhaNDI tu tataH kruddhaH saumadattiM vishAmpate. navatyA sAyakAnAM tu kampayAmAsa bhArata.. 7-14-45 (45212) rAkShasau raudrakarmANau heDimbAlambusAvubhau. chakrAte.atyudbhutaM yuddhaM parasparajayaiShiNau.. 7-14-46 (45213) mAyAshatasR^ijau dR^iptau mAyAbhiritaretaram. antarhitau cheratustau bhR^ishaM vismayakAriNau.. 7-14-47 (45214) chekitAno.anuvindena yuyudhe chAtibhairavam. yathA devAsure yuddhe balashakrau mahAbalau.. 7-14-48 (45215) lakShmaNaH kShatradevena vimardamakarodbhR^isham. yathA viShNuH purA rAjanhiraNyAkSheNa saMyuge.. 7-14-49 (45216) tataH prachalitAshvena vidhivatkalpitena cha. rathenAbhyapatadrAjansaubhadraM pauravo pauravo nadan.. 7-14-50 (45217) tato.abhyayAtsa tvarito yuddhAkA~NkShI mahAbalaH. tena chakre mahadyuddhamabhimanyurarindamaH.. 7-14-51 (45218) pauravastvatha saubhadraM sharavrAtairavAkirat. tasyArjunirdhvajaM ChatraM dhanushchorvyAmapAtayat.. 7-14-52 (45219) saubhadraH pauravaM tvanyairviddhvA saptabhirAshugaiH. pa~nchabhistasya vivyAdha hayAnsUnaM cha sAyakaiH.. 7-14-53 (45220) tataH praharShayansenAM siMhavadvinadanmuhuH. samAdattArjunistUrNaM pauravAntakaraM sharam.. 7-14-54 (45221) taM tu sandhitamAj~nAya sAyakaM ghoradarshanam. dvAbhyAM sharAbhyAM hArdikyashchichCheda sasharaM dhanuH.. 7-14-55 (45222) tadutsR^ijya dhanushChinnaM saubhadraH paravIrahA. udbabarha sitaM kha~NgamAdadanAH sharAvaram.. 7-14-56 (45223) sa tenAnekatAreNa charmaNA kR^itahastavat. bhrAntAsinA charanmArgAndarshayanvIryamAtmanaH.. 7-14-57 (45224) bhrAmitaM punaruddhAntamAdhUtaM punarutthitam. charmanistriMshayo rAjannirvisheShamadR^ishyata.. 7-14-58 (45225) sa pauravarathasyeShAmAplutya sahasA nadan. pauravaM rathamAsthAya keshapakShe parAmR^ishat.. 7-14-59 (45226) jaghAnAsya padA sUtamasinA pAtayaddhR^ijam. vikShobhyAmbhonidhiM tArkShyastaM nAgamiva chAkShipat.. 7-14-60 (45227) tamAgalitakeshAntaM dadR^ishuH sarvapArthivAH. ukShANamiva siMhena pAtyamAnamachetasam.. 7-14-61 (45228) tamArjunivashaM prAptaM kR^iShyamANamanAthavat. pauravaM pAtitaM dR^iShTvA nAmR^iShyata jayadrUthaH.. 7-14-62 (45229) sa barhibarhAvatataM ki~NkiNIshatajAlavat. charma chAdAya kha~NgaM cha nadanparyapatadrathAt.. 7-14-63 (45230) tataH saindhavamAlokya kArShNirutsR^ijya pauravam. utpapAta rathAttUrNaM shyenavannipapAta cha. 7-14-64 (45231) prAsapaTTishanistriMshA~nChatrubhiH samprachoditAn. chichCheda chAsinA kArShNishcharmaNA saMrurodha cha.. 7-14-65 (45232) sa darshayitvA sainyAnAM svabAhubalamAtmanaH. tamudyamya mahAkha~NgaM charma chAtha punarbalI.. 7-14-66 (45233) vR^iddhakShatrasya dAyAdaM pituratyantavairiNam. sasArAbhimukhaH shUraH shArdUla iva ku~njaram.. 7-14-67 (45234) tau parasparamAsAdya khahgadantanakhAyudhau. hR^iShTavatsamprajahAte vyAghrakesariNAviva.. 7-14-68 (45235) sampAteShvabhighAteShu nipAteShvasicharmaNoH. na tayorantaraM kashchiddadarsha narasiMhayoH.. 7-14-69 (45236) avakShepo.asinirhAdaH shastrAntaranidarshanam. bAhyAntaranipAtashcha nirvishemadR^ishyata.. 7-14-70 (45237) bAhyamAbhyantaraM chaiva charantau mArgamuttamam. dadR^ishAte mahAtmAnau sapakShAviva parvatau.. 7-14-71 (45238) tato vikShipataH kha~NgaM saubhadrasya yashasvinaH. sharAvaraNapakShAnte prajahAra jayadrathaH.. 7-14-72 (45239) rukmapatrAntare saktastasmiMshcharmaNi bhAsvare. sindhurAjabaloddhUtaH so.abhajyata mahAnasiH.. 7-14-73 (45240) bhagnamAj~nAya nistriMshamavaplutya padAni ShaT. adR^ishyata nimeSheNa svarathaM punarAsthitaH.. 7-14-74 (45241) taM kArShNiM samarAnmuktamAsthitaM rathamuttamam. sahitAH sarvarAjAnaH parivavruH samantataH.. 7-14-75 (45242) tatashcharma cha kha~NgaM cha samutkShipya mahAbalaH. nanAdArjunadAyAdaH prekShamANo jayadratham.. 7-14-76 (45243) sindhurAjaM parityajya saubhadraH paravIrahA. tApayAmAsa tatsainyaM bhuvanaM bhAskaro yathA.. 7-14-77 (45244) tasya sarvAyasIM shaktiM shalyaH kanakabhUShaNAm. chikShepa samare ghorAM dIptAmagnishikhAmiva.. 7-14-78 (45245) tAmavaplutya jagrAha vikoshaM chAkarodasim. vainateyo yathA kArShNiH patantamuragottamam.. 7-14-79 (45246) tasya lAShavamAj~nAya satvaM chAmitatejasaH. sahitAH sarvarAjAnaH siMhanAdamathAnadan.. 7-14-80 (45247) tatastAmeva shalyasya saubhadraH paravIrahA. mumocha bhujavIryeNa vaidUryavikR^itAM shitAm.. 7-14-81 (45248) sA tasya rathamAsAdya nirmuktabhujagopamA. jaghAna sUtaM shalyasya rathAchchainamapAtayat.. 7-14-82 (45249) tato virATadrupadau dhR^iShTaketuryudhiShThiraH. sAtyakiH kekayA bhImo dhR^iShTadyumnashikhaNDinau.. 7-14-83 (45250) yamau cha draupadeyAshcha sAdhusAdhviti chukrushuH. bANashabdAshcha vividhAH siMhanAdAshcha puShkalAH.. 7-14-84 (45251) prAdurAsanharShayantaH saubhadramapalAyinam. tannAmR^iShyanta putrAste shatrorvijayalakShaNam.. 7-14-85 (45252) athainaM sahasA sarve samantAnnishitaiH sharaiH. abhyAkiranmahArAja jaladA iva parvatam.. 7-14-86 (45253) teShAM cha priyamanvichChansUtasya cha parAbhavam. ArtAyaniramitraghnaH kruddhaH saubhadramabhyayAt.. .. 7-14-87 (45254) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi droNAbhiShekaparvaNi ekAdashadivasayuddhe chaturdasho.adhyAyaH.. 14 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-14-5 shuchisa~NkShaye grIShmAnte.. 5-14-16 prANina eva vAjinaH pakShiNaH.. 5-14-87 parAbhavaM prekShyeti sheShaH.. 5-14-14 chaturdasho.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 015

.. shrIH ..

7.15. adhyAyaH 015

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-15-0 (45255) .. 7-15-50 (45306) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi droNAbhiShekaparvaNi

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-15-1 5-15- 5-15- 5-15- 5-15- 5-15- 5-15- 5-15- 5-15- 5-15- 5-15- 5-15-
droNaparva - adhyAya 016

.. shrIH ..

7.16. adhyAyaH 016

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

droNena yudhiShThiragrahaNodyame arjumena tadbha~NgaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-16-0 (45307) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-16-0x (4297) tadbalaM sumahaddIrNaM tvadIyaM prekShya vIryavAn. dadhAraiko raNe pANDUnvR^iShaseno.astramAyayA.. 7-16-1 (45308) sharA dasha disho muktA vR^iShasenena saMyuge. vicheruste vinirbhidya naravAjirathadvipAn.. 7-16-2 (45309) tasya dIptA mahAbANA vivishcheruH sahasrashaH. bhAnoriva mahArAja gharmakAle marIchayaH.. 7-16-3 (45310) tenArditA mahArAja rathinaH sAdinastathA. nipetururvyAM sahasA vAtabhagnA iva drumAH.. 7-16-4 (45311) hayaughAMshcha rathaughAMshcha gajaughAMshcha mahArathaH. apAtayadraNe rAja~nshatasho.atha sahasrashaH.. 7-16-5 (45312) dR^iShTvA tamekaM samare vicharantamabhItavat. sahitAH sarvarAjAnaH parivavruH samantataH.. 7-16-6 (45313) nAkulistu shatAnIko vR^iShasenaM samabhyayAt. vivyAdha chainaM dashabhirnArAchairmarmabhedibhiH.. 7-16-7 (45314) tasya karNAtmajashchApaM ChittvA ketumapAtayat. taM bhrAtaraM parIpsanto draupadeyAH samabhyayuH.. 7-16-8 (45315) karNAtmajaM sharavrAtairadR^ishyaM
