chakrura~njasA. tAnnadanto.abhyadhAvanta droNaputramukhA rathAH.. 7-16-9 (45316) ChAdayanto mahArAja draupadeyAnmahArathAn. sharairnAnAvidhaistUrNaM parvatA~njaladA iva.. 7-16-10 (45317) tAnpANDavAH pratyagR^ihNaMstvaritAH putragR^iddhinaH. pA~nchAlAH kekayA matsyAH sR^i~njayAshchodyatAyudhAH.. 7-16-11 (45318) tadyuddhamabhavaddhoraM sumahadromaharShaNam. tvadIyaiH pANDuputrANAM devAnAmiva dAnavaiH.. 7-16-12 (45319) evaM yuyudhire vIrAH saMrabdhAH kurupANDavAH. parasparamudIkShantaH parasparakR^itAgasaH.. 7-16-13 (45320) teShAM dadR^ishire kopAdvapUmShyamitatejasAm. yuyutsUnAmivAkAshe patattrivarabhoginAm.. 7-16-14 (45321) bhImakarNakR^ipadroNadrauNipArShatasAtyakaiH. babhAse sa raNoddeshaH kAlasUryairivoditaiH.. 7-16-15 (45322) `prajAnAM saMkShaye ghore yathA sUryodayo bhavet. shUrANAmudayastadvadAsItpuruShasattama'.. 7-16-16 (45323) tadAsIttumulaM yuddhaM nighnatAmitaretaram. mahAbalAnAM balibhirdAnavAnAM yathA suraiH.. 7-16-17 (45324) tato yudhiShThirAnIkamuddhUtArNavaniHsvanam. tvadIyamavadhItsainyaM saMpradrutamahAratham.. 7-16-18 (45325) tatprabhagnaM balaM dR^iShTvA shatrubhirbhR^ishamarditam. alaM drutena vaH shUrA iti droNo.abhyabhAShata.. 7-16-19 (45326) `bhAradvAjamamarShashcha vikramashcha samAvishat. samuddhR^itya niSha~NgAchcha dhanurjyAmavamR^ijya cha. mahAsharadhanuShpANiryantAramidamabravIt.. 7-16-20 (45327) sArathe yAhi yatraiSha pANDareNa virAjatA. dhriyamANena chCheNa rAjA tiShThati dharmarAT.. 7-16-21 (45328) tadetaddIryate sainyaM dhArtarAShTramanekadhA. etatsaMstambhayiShyAmi prativArya yudhiShThiram.. 7-16-22 (45329) na hi mAmabhivarShantaM saMyuge tAta pANDavAH. mAtsyapA~nchAlarAjAnaH sarve cha sahasomakAH.. 7-16-23 (45330) arjuno matprasAdAddhi mahAstrANi samAptavAn. na mAmutsahate tAta na bhImo na cha sAtyakiH.. 7-16-24 (45331) matprasAdAddhi bIbhatsuH parameShvAsatAM gataH. mamaivAstraM vijAnAti dhR^iShTadyumno.api pArShataH.. 7-16-25 (45332) nAyaM saMrakShituM kAlaH prANAMstAta jayaiShiNA. yAhi sargaM puraskR^itya yashase cha jayAya cha.. 7-16-26 (45333) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-16-27x (4298) evaM sa~nchodito yantA droNamabhyavahattataH.. 7-16-27 (45334) tadA.ashvahR^idayenAshvAnabhimantryAshu harShayan. rathena savarUthena bhAsvareNa virAjatA.. 7-16-28 (45335) taM karUshAshcha mAtsyAshcha chedayashcha sasAtvatAH. pANDavAshcha sapA~nchAlAH sahitAH paryavArayan'.. 7-16-29 (45336) tataH shoNahayaH kruddhashchaturdanta iva dvipaH. pravishya pANDavAnIkaM yudhiShThiramupAdravat.. 7-16-30 (45337) tamAvidhyachChitairbANaiH ka~NkapatrairyudhiShThiraH. tasya droNo dhanushChitvA taM drutaM samupAdravat.. 7-16-31 (45338) chakrarakShaH kumArastu pA~nchAlAnAM yashaskaraH. dadhAra droNamAyAntaM veleva saritAM patim.. 7-16-32 (45339) droNaM nivAritaM dR^iShTvA kumAreNa dvijarShabham. siMhanAdaravo hyAsItsAdhusAdhviti bhAShitam.. 7-16-33 (45340) kumArastu tato droNaM sAyakena mahAhave. vivyAdhorasi sa~NkruddhaH siMhavachcha nadanmuhuH.. 7-16-34 (45341) saMvArya cha raNe droNaM kumArastu mahAbalaH. sharairanekasAhasraiH kR^itahasto jitashramaH.. 7-16-35 (45342) taM shUramAryavratinaM mantrAstreShu kR^itashchamam. chakrarakShataM parAmR^idrAtkumAraM dvijapu~NgavaH.. 7-16-36 (45343) sa madhyaM prApya sainyAnAM sarvAH pravicharandishaH. tava sainyasya goptAsIdbhAradvAjo dvijarShabhaH.. 7-16-37 (45344) shikhaNDinaM dvAdashabhirviMshatyA chottamaujasam. nakulaM pa~nchabhirviddhvA sahadevaM cha saptabhiH.. 7-16-38 (45345) yudhiShThiraM dvAdashabhirdraupadeyAMstribhistribhiH. sAtyakiM pa~nchabhirviddhvA matsyaM cha dashabhiH sharaiH.. 7-16-39 (45346) vyakShobhayadraNe yodhAnyathAmukhyamabhidravan. abhyavartataM samprepsuH kuntIputraM yudhiShThiram.. 7-16-40 (45347) yugandharastato rAjanbhAradvAjaM mahAratham. vArayAmAsa sa~NkrudvaM vAtoddhatamivArNavam.. 7-16-41 (45348) yudhiShThiraM sa viddhvA tu sharaiH sannataparvabhiH. yugandharaM tu bhallane rathanIDAdapAtayat.. 7-16-42 (45349) `taM vijitya mahAtejA bhAradvAjo mahAmanAH. abhyavartata samprepsuH kuntIputraM yudhiShThiram'.. 7-16-43 (45350) tato virATadrupadau kekayAH sAtyakiH shibiH. vyAghradattashcha pA~nchalyaH siMhasenashcha vIryavAn.. 7-16-44 (45351) ete chAnye cha bahavaH parIpsanto yudhiShThiram. Avavrustasya panthAnaM kirantaH sAyakAnbahUn.. 7-16-45 (45352) vyAghradattastu pA~nchAlyo droNaM vivyAdha mArgaNaiH. pa~nchAshatA shitai rAjaMstata uchchukrushurjanAH.. 7-16-46 (45353) tvaritaM siMhasenastu droNaM viddhvA mahAratham. prAhasatsahasA hR^iShTastrAsayanvai mahArathAn.. 7-16-47 (45354) tato viShphArya nayane dhanurjyAmavamR^ijya cha. talashabdaM mahatkR^itvA droNastaM samupAdravat.. 7-16-48 (45355) tatastu siMhasenasya shiraH kAyAtsakuNDalam. vyAghradattasya chAkramya bhallAbhyAmAharadbalI.. 7-16-49 (45356) tAnpramR^ijya sharavrAtaiH pANDavAnAM mahArathAn. yudhiShThirarathAbhyAshe tasthau mR^ityurivAntakaH.. 7-16-50 (45357) tato.abhavanmahAshabdo rAjanyaudhiShThire bale. hR^ito rAjeti yodhAnAM samIpasthe yatavrate.. 7-16-51 (45358) abruvansainikAstatra dR^iShTvA droNasya vikramam. adya rAjA dhArtarAShTraH kR^itArtho vai bhaviShyati.. 7-16-52 (45359) asminmahUrte droNastu pANDavaM gR^ihya harShitaH. AgamiShyati no nUnaM dhArtarAShTrasya saMyuge.. 7-16-53 (45360) evaM sa~njalpatAM teShAM tAvakAnAM mahArathaH. AyAjjavena kaunteyo rathaghoSheNa nAdayan.. 7-16-54 (45361) shoNitodAM rathAvartAM kR^itvA vishasane nadIm. shUrAsthichayasa~NkIrNAM pretakUlApahAriNIm.. 7-16-55 (45362) tAM sharaughamahAphenAM prAsamatsyasamAkulAm. nadImuttIrya vegena kurUnvidrAvya pANDavaH.. 7-16-56 (45363) tataH kirITi sahasA droNAnIkamupAdravat. ChAdayanniShujAlena mahatA mohayanniva.. 7-16-57 (45364) shIghramabhyasyato bANAnsandadhAnasya chAnisham. nAntaraM dadR^ishe kashchitkaunteyasya yashasvinaH.. 7-16-58 (45365) na disho nAntarikShaM cha na dyaurnaiva cha medinI. adR^ishyanta mahArAja bANabhUtA ivAbhavan.. 7-16-59 (45366) nAdR^ishyata tadA rAjaMstatra ki~nchana saMyuge. bANAndhakAre mahati kR^ite gANDIvadhanvanA.. 7-16-60 (45367) sUrye chAstamanuprApte tamasA chAbhisaMvR^ite. nAj~nAyata tadA shatrurna suhR^inna cha kashchana. 7-16-61 (45368) tato.avahAraM chakruste droNaduryodhanAdayaH. tAnviditvA punastrastA na yuddhamanasaH parAn.. 7-16-62 (45369) svAnyanIkAni bIbhatsuH shanakairavahArayat. tato.abhituShTuvuH pArthaM prahR^iShTAH pANDusR^i~njayAH.. 7-16-63 (45370) pA~nchAlAshcha manoj~nAbhirvAgbhiH sUryamivarShayaH. eM svashibiraM prAyAjjitvA shatrUndhana~njayaH.. 7-16-64 (45371) pR^iShThataH sarvasainyAnAM mudito vai sakeshavaH.. masAragalvarkamuvarNarUpairvajrapravAlasphaTikaishcha mukhyaiH. 7-16-65 (45372) chitre rathe pANDusuto babhAse nakShatrachitre viyatIva chandraH.. .. 7-16-66 (45373) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi droNAbhiShekaparvaNi ekAdashadivasayuddhe ShoDasho.adhyAyaH.. 16 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-16-1 astramAyayA astrakaushalena.. 5-16-14 patattrivarabhoginAmiva patattrivaro garuDaH. bhoginaH sarpAH.. 5-16-19 drutena palAyitena.. 5-16-55 vishasane yuddhe.. 5-16-66 masAraH indranIlaH. galvarkaH padmarAgaH.. 5-16-16 ShoDasho.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 017

.. shrIH ..

7.17. adhyAyaH 017

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

saMshaptakairAhUtasyArjunasya yudhiShThirarakShaNe satyajitaM niyojya tAnprati yuddhAya gamanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-17-0 (45374) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-17-0x (4299) te sene shibiraM gatvA nyavishetAM vishAmpate. yathAbhAgaM yathAnyAyaM yathAgulmaM cha sarvashaH.. 7-17-1 (45375) kR^itvA.avahAraM sainyAnAM droNaH paramadurmanAH. duryodhanamabhiprekShya savrIDamidamabravIt.. 7-17-2 (45376) uktametanmayA pUrvaM na tiShThati dhanjaye. shakyo grahItuM sa~NgrAme devairapi yudhiShThiraH.. 7-17-3 (45377) iti tadvaH prayatatAM kR^itaM pArthena saMyuge. mA visha~NkIrvacho mahyamajeyau kR^iShNapANDavau.. 7-17-4 (45378) apanIte tu yogena kenachichChvetavAhane. tata eShyati te rAjanvashameSha yudhiShThiraH.. 7-17-5 (45379) kashchidAhUya taM sa~Nkhye deshamanyaM prakarShatu. tamajitvA na kaunteyo nivarteta katha~nchana.. 7-17-6 (45380) etasminnantare shUnyedharmarAjamahaM nR^ipa. grahIShyAmi chamUM bhittvA dhR^iShTadyumnasya pashyataH.. 7-17-7 (45381) arjunena parityakto na chettrAsAtpalAyate. mAmupAyAntamAlokya gR^ihItaM viddhi pANDavam.. 7-17-8 (45382) evaM te.ahaM mahArAja dharmaputraM yudhiShThiram. samAneShyAmi sagaNaM vashamadya na saMshayaH.. 7-17-9 (45383) yadi tiShThati sa~NgrAme muhUrtamapi pANDavaH. athApayAti sa~NgrAmAdvijayAttadvishiShyate.. 7-17-10 (45384) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-17-11x (4300) droNasya tadvachaH shrutvA trigartAdhipatistadA. bhrAtR^ibhiH sahito rAjannidaM vachanamabravIt.. 7-17-11 (45385) vayaM vinikR^itA rAjansadA gANDIvadhanvanA. anAgaHsvapi chAgastatkR^itamasmAsu tena vai.. 7-17-12 (45386) te vayaM smaramANAstAnvinikArAnpR^ithagvidhAn. krodhAgninA dahyamAnA hyashemahi sadA nishi.. 7-17-13 (45387) sa no diShTyA.astrasampannashchakShurviShayamAgataH. kartAraH smarayaM karma yachchikIrShAma hR^idgatam.. 7-17-14 (45388) bhavatashcha priyaM yatsyAdasmAkaM cha yashaskaram. vayamenaM haniShyAmo nikR^iShyAyodhanAdbahiH.. 7-17-15 (45389) adyAstvanarjunA bhUmiratrigartA.avA punaH. satyaM te pratijAnImo naitanmithyA bhaviShyati.. 7-17-16 (45390) evaM satyarathashchoktvA satyavarmA cha bhArata. satyavratashcha satyeShuH satyakarmA tathaiva cha.. 7-17-17 (45391) sahitA bhrAtaraH pa~ncha rathAnAmayutena cha. nyavartanta mahArAja kR^itvA shapathamAhave.. 7-17-18 (45392) mAlavAstuNDikerAshcha rathAnAmayutaistribhiH. susharmA cha naravyAghrastrigartaH prasthalAdhipaH.. 7-17-19 (45393) mAvellakairlalitthaishcha sahito madrakairapi. rathAnAmayutenaiva so.agamaddhAtR^ibhiH saha.. 7-17-20 (45394) nAnAjanapadebhyashcha rathAnAmayutaM punaH. samutthitaM vishiShTAnAM shapathArthamupAgamat.. 7-17-21 (45395) tato jvalanamAnarchya hutvA sarve pR^ithakpR^ithak. jagR^ihuH kushachIrANi chitrANi kavachAni cha.. 7-17-22 (45396) te cha baddhatanutrANA ghR^itAktAH kushachIriNaH. maurvImekhalino vIrAH sahasrashatadakShiNAH.. 7-17-23 (45397) yajvAnaH putriNo lokyAH kR^itakR^ityAstanutyajaH. yokShyamANAstadA.a.atmAnaM yashasA vijayena cha.. 7-17-24 (45398) brahmacharyushrutimukhaiH kratubhishchAptadakShiNaiH. prApyA.NllokAnsuyuddhena kShiprameva yiyAsavaH.. 7-17-25 (45399) brAhmamAMstarpayitvA cha niShkAndatvA pR^ithakpR^ithak. gAshcha vAsAMsi cha punaH samAbhAShya parasparam.. 7-17-26 (45400) `dvijamukhyaiH samuditaiH kR^itasvastyayanAshiShaH. muditAshcha prahR^iShTAshcha jalaM saMspR^ishya nirmalam'.. 7-17-27 (45401) prajvAlya kR^iShNavartmAnamupAgamya raNavratam. tasminnagnau tadA chakruH pratij~nAM dR^iDhanishchayAH.. 7-17-28 (45402) shR^iNvatAM sarvabhUtAnAmuchchairvAcho babhAShire. sarve dhana~njayavadhe pratij~nAM chApi chakrire. 7-17-29 (45403) ye vai lokAshchAvratinAM ye chaiva brahmaghAtinAm. madyapasya cha ye lokA gurudAraratasya cha.. 7-17-30 (45404) brahmasvahAriNashchaiva rAjapiNDApahAriNaH. sharaNAgataM cha tyajato yAchamAnaM tathA ghnataH.. 7-17-31 (45405) agAradAhinAM chaiva ye cha gAM nighnatAmapi. apakAriNAM cha ye lokA ye cha brahmadviShAmapi.. 7-17-32 (45406) svabhAryAmR^itukAleShu mohAdvai nAbhigachChatAm. shrAddhamaithunikAnAM cha ye chApyAtmApahAriNAm.. 7-17-33 (45407) nyAsApahAriNAM ye cha shrutaM nAshayatAM cha ye. klIbane yudhyamAnAnAM ye cha nIchAnusAriNAm.. 7-17-34 (45408) nAstikAnAM cha ye lokA ye.agnimAtR^ipitR^ityajAm. tAnApnuyAmahe lokAnye cha pApakR^itAmapi.. 7-17-35 (45409) yadyahatvA vayaM yuddhe nivartema dhana~njayam. tena chAbhyarditAstrAsAdbhavemahi parA~NmukhAH.. 7-17-36 (45410) yadi tvasukaraM loke karma kuryAma saMyuge. iShTA.NllokAnprApnuyAmo vayamadya na saMshayaH.. 7-17-37 (45411) evamuktvA tadA rAjaMste.abhyavartanta saMyuge. Ahvayanto.arjunaM vIrAH pitR^ijuShTAM dishaM prati.. 7-17-38 (45412) AhUtastairnaravyAghraiH pArthaH parapura~nchayaH. dharmarAjamidaM vAkyamapadAntaramabravIt.. 7-17-39 (45413) AhUto na nivarteyamiti me vratamAhitam. saMshaptakAshcha mAM rAjannAhvayanti mahAmR^idhe.. 7-17-40 (45414) eSha cha bhrAtR^ibhiH sArdhaM susharmA.a.ahvayate raNe. vadhAya sagaNasyAsya mAmanuj~nAtumarhasi.. 7-17-41 (45415) naitachChaknomi saMsoDhumAhvAnaM puruSharShabha. satyaM te pratijAnAmi hatAnviddhi parAnyudhi.. 7-17-42 (45416) yudhiShThira uvAcha. 7-17-42x (4301) shrutaM te tattvatastAta yaddroNasya chikIrShitam. yathA tadanR^itaM tasya bhavetattvaM samAchara.. 7-17-43 (45417) droNo hi balavA~nshUraH kR^itAstrashcha jitashramaH. pratij~nAtaM cha tenaitadgrahaNaM me mahAratha.. 7-17-44 (45418) arjuna uvAcha. 7-17-45x (4302) ayaM vai satyajidrAjannadya tvAM rakShitA yudhi. dhriyamANe cha pA~nchAlye nAchAryaH kAmamApsyati.. 7-17-45 (45419) hate tu puruShavyAghre raNe satyajiti prabho. sarvairapi sametairvA na sthAtavyaM kathaMchana.. 7-17-46 (45420) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-17-47x (4303) anuj~nAtastato rAj~nA pariShvaktashcha phalgunaH. premNA dR^iShTashcha bahudhA hyAshiShashchAsya yojitAH.. 7-17-47 (45421) vihAyainaM tataH pArthastrigartAnpratyayAdbalI. kShudhitaH kShudvighAtArthaM siMho mR^igagaNAniva.. 7-17-48 (45422) tato dauryodhanaM sainyaM mudA paramayA yutam. R^ite.arjunaM bhR^ishaM kruddhaM dharmarAjasya nigrahe.. 7-17-49 (45423) tato.anyonyena te sainye samAjagmaturojasA. ga~NgAsarayvau vegena prAvR^iShIvolbaNodake.. .. 7-17-50 (45424) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi droNAbhiShekaparvaNi saptadasho.adhyAyaH.. 17 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-17-5 yogena upAyena.. 5-17-24 lokyAH puNyalokArhAH.. 5-17-25 brahmacharyaM vedavratAcharaNam. shrutirvedAdhyayanaM te eva mukhaM pradhAnaM yeShu taiH. karmabhiriti sheShaH.. 5-17-33 AtmApahAriNAM svajAtigopakAnAm.. 5-17-34 shrutaM pratij~nAtam.. 5-17-39 apadAntaramavyavahitam.. 5-17-17 saptadasho.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 018

.. shrIH ..

7.18. adhyAyaH 018

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

arjunasya saMshaptakaiH saha yuddham.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-18-0 (45425) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-18-0x (4304) tataH saMshaptakA rAjansame deshe vyavasthitAH. vyUDhAnIkai rathaireva chandrArdhAkhyairmudA yutAH.. 7-18-1 (45426) te kirITinamAyAntaM dR^iShTvA harSheNa mAriSha. `atIva samprahR^iShTAste hyupalakShya dhana~njayam'. udakroshannaravyAghrAH shabdena mahatA tadA.. 7-18-2 (45427) sa dishaH pradishaH sarvA nabhashchaiva samAvR^iNot. AvR^itatvAcha lokasya nAsIttatra pratisvanaH.. 7-18-3 (45428) so.atIva saMprahR^iShTAMstAnupalabhya dhana~njayaH. ki~nchidabhyutsmayankR^iShNamidaM vachanamabravIt.. 7-18-4 (45429) devakIputra pashyemAnmumUrShUnadya saMyuge. bhrAtR^IMstraigartakAnetAnroditavye praharShitAn.. 7-18-5 (45430) athavA harShakAlo.ayaM traigartAnAmasaMshayam. kunarairduravApAnhi lokAnprApsyanti saMyuge. `mayA hatA hiM sa~NgrAme lokAnprApsyanti puShkalAn' evamuktvA mahAbAhurhR^iShIkeshaM tato.arjunaH. AsasAda raNe vyUDhAM trigartAnAmanIkinIm.. 7-18-6 (45431) sa devadattamAdAya sha~NkhaM hemapariShkR^itam. dadhmau vegena mahatA ghoSheNApUrayandishaH.. 7-18-8 (45432) tena shabdena vitrastA saMshaptakavarUthinI. vicheShTA.avasthitA sa~Nkhye hyashmasAramayI yathA.. 7-18-9 (45433) `sA senA bharatashreShTha nishcheShTA shushubhe tadA. chitre paTe yathA nyastA kushalaiH shilpibhirnaraiH.. 7-18-10 (45434) svanena tena sainyAnAM divamAvR^iNvatA tadA. sasvanA pR^ithivI sarvA tathaiva cha mahodadhiH. svanena tena sainyAnAM karNAstu badhirIkR^itAH'.. 7-18-11 (45435) vAhAsteShAM vivR^ittAkShAH stabdhakarNashirodharAH. viShTabdhacharaNA mUtraM rudhiraM cha prasusruvuH. `tato vyupAramachChabdaH prahR^iShTAste tato.abhavan'.. 7-18-12 (45436) upalabhya tataH saMj~nAmavasthApya cha vAhinIm. yugapatpANDuputrAya chikShipuH ka~NkapatriNaH.. 7-18-13 (45437) tAnarjunaH sahasrANi dashapa~nchabhirAshugaiH. anAgatAneva sharaishchichChedAshu parAkramI.. 7-18-14 (45438) tatoQrjunaM shitairbANairdashabhirdashabhiH punaH. prAvidhyanta tataH pArthastAnavidhyattribhistribhiH.. 7-18-15 (45439) ekaikastu tataH pArthaM rAjanvivyAdha pa~nchabhiH. sa cha tAnprativivyAdha dvAbhyAM dvAbhyAM parAkramI.. 7-18-16 (45440) bhUya eva tu sa~NkruddhAstvarjunaM sahakeshavam. ApUraya~nsharaistIkShNaistaTAkamiva vR^iShTibhiH.. 7-18-17 (45441) tataH sharasahasrANi prApatannarjunaM prati. bhramarANAmiva vrAtAH phullaM drumagaNaM vane.. 7-18-18 (45442) tataH subAhustriMshadbhiradrisAramayaiH sharaiH. avidhyadiShubhirgADhaM kirITe savyasAchinam.. 7-18-19 (45443) taiH kirITi kirITasthairhemapu~NkhairajihmagaiH. shAtakumbhamayApIDo babhau yUpa ivochChritaH.. 7-18-20 (45444) hastAvApaM subAhostu bhallena yudhi pANDavaH. chichCheda taM chaiva punaH sharavarShairavAkirat.. 7-18-21 (45445) tataH susharmA dashabhiH surathastu kirITinam. sudharmA sudhanushchaiva subAhushcha samArpayat.. 7-18-22 (45446) tAMstu sarvAnpR^ithagbANairvAnarapravaradhvajaH. pratyavidhyaddhvajAMshchaiShAM bhallaishchichCheda sAyakAn.. 7-18-23 (45447) sudhanvano dhanushChittvA hayAMshchAsyAvadhIchCharaiH. athAsya sashirastrANaM shiraH kAyAdapAtayat.. 7-18-24 (45448) `jahAra pArthaH sainyeShu sahasre dve cha yodhinAm'. tasminnipatite vIre trastAstasya padAnugAH.. 7-18-25 (45449) `bhUyiShThaM pratiruddhA ye hatairyodhairyashasvinaH'. vyadravanta bhayAdbhItA yatra dauryodhanaM balam.. 7-18-26 (45450) tato jaghAnaM sa~Nkruddho vAsavistAM mahAchamUm. sharajAlairavichChinnaistamaH sUrya ivAMshubhiH.. 7-18-27 (45451) tato bhagne bale tasminvipralIne samantataH. savyasAchini sa~Nkrudve traigartAnbhayamAvishat.. 7-18-28 (45452) te vadhyamAnAH pArthena sharaiH sannataparvabhiH. amuhyaMstatratatraiva trastA mR^igagaNA iva.. 7-18-29 (45453) tatastrigartarAT kruddhastAnuvAcha mahArathAn. alaM drutena vaH shUrA na bhayaM kartumarhatha.. 7-18-30 (45454) shaptvA.atha shapathAnghorAnsarvasainyasya pashyataH. gatvA dauryodhanaM sainyaM kiM vai vakShyatha mukhyashaH. 7-18-31 (45455) nAvahAsyAH kathaM loke karmaNA.anena saMyuge. bhavema sahitAH sarve nivartadhvaM yathAbalam.. 7-18-32 (45456) evamuktAstu te rAjannudakroshanmuhurmuhuH. sha~NkhAMshcha dadhmire vIrA harShayantaH parasparam.. 7-18-33 (45457) tataste sannyavartantaM saMshaptakagaNAH punaH. nArAyaNAshcha gopAlA mR^ityuM kR^itvA.anivartanam.. .. 7-18-34 (45458) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi droNAbhiShekaparvaNi aShTAdasho.adhyAyaH.. 18 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-18-1 vyuhyAnIkaM rathaireva chandrAkAraM mudA yutAH iti jha pAThaH.. 5-18-18 aShTAdasho.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 019

.. shrIH ..

7.19. adhyAyaH 019

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

arjunasya saMshaptakaiH saha yuddham.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-19-0 (45459) sa~ncha uvAcha. 7-19-0x (4305) dR^iShTA tu sannivR^ittAMstAnsaMshaptakagaNAnpunaH. vAsudevaM mahAtmAnamarjunaH samabhAShata.. 7-19-1 (45460) chodayAshvAnhR^iShIkesha saMshaptakagaNAnprati. naite hAsyanti sa~NgrAmaM jIvanta iti me matiH.. 7-19-2 (45461) pashya me.astrabalaM ghoraM bAhvoriShvasanasya cha. adyaitAnpAtayiShyAmi kruddho rudraH pashUniva.. 7-19-3 (45462) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-19-4x (4306) tataH kR^iShNaH smitaM kR^itvA pratinandya shivena tam. prAveshayata durdharSho yatrayatraichChadarjunaH.. 7-19-4 (45463) sa ratho bhrAjate.atyarthamuhyamAno raNe tadA. uhyamAnamivAkAshe vimAnaM pANDurairhayaiH.. 7-19-5 (45464) maNDalAni tatashchakre gatapratyAgatAni che. yathA shakraratho rAjanyuddhe devAsure purA.. 7-19-6 (45465) atha nArAyaNAH kruddhA vividhAyudhapANayaH. ChAdayantaH sharavrAtaiH parivavrurdhana~njayam.. 7-19-7 (45466) adR^ishyaM cha muhUrtena chakruste bharatarShabha. kR^iShNena sahitaM yuddhe kuntIputraM dhana~njayam.. 7-19-8 (45467) kruddhastu phalgunaH sa~Nkhye dviguNIkR^itavikramaH. gANDIvaM dhanurAmR^ijya tUrNaM jagrAha saMyuge.. 7-19-9 (45468) baddhvA cha bhrukuTiM vaktre krodhasya pratilakShaNam. devadattaM mahAsha~NkhaM pUrayAmAsa pANDavaH.. 7-19-10 (45469) athAstramarisa~NghaghnaM tvAShTramabhyasyadarjunaH. tato rUpasahasrANi prAdurAsanpR^ithakpR^ithak.. 7-19-11 (45470) arjunapratirUpaistairnAnArUpairvimohitAH. anyonyenArjunaM matvA svamAtmAnaM cha jaghnire.. 7-19-12 (45471) ayamarjuno.ayaM govinda imau pANDavayAdavau. iti bruvANAH saMmUDhA jaghnuranyonyamAhave.. 7-19-13 (45472) `anyonyaM samare jaghnustAvakA bharatarShabha'. mohitAH paramAstreNa kShayaM jagmuH parasparam.. 7-19-14 (45473) `rudhirokShitagAtrAste prekShamANaH parasparam'. ashobhanta raNe yodhAH puShpitA iva kiMshukAH.. 7-19-15 (45474) `rudhirotpIDanAste tu rudhireNa samukShitAH. chandanasya raseneva vyabhrAjanta raNAjire.. 7-19-16 (45475) tataH prasahya bIbhatsurvyAkShipadgANDivaM dhanuH. nyahanattA~nCharaistIkShNaistamaH sUrya ivAMshubhiH.. 7-19-17 (45476) hatAvashiShTAste bhUyaH parivArya dhana~njayam. sAshvadhvajarathaM chakruradR^ishyaM sharavR^iShTibhiH'.. 7-19-18 (45477) tataH sharasahasrANi tairvimuktAni bhasmasAt. kR^itvA tadastraM tAnvIrAnanayadyamasAdanam.. 7-19-19 (45478) atha prahasya bIbhatsurlalitthAnmAlavAnapi. mAvellakAMstrigartAMshcha yaudheyAMshchArdayachCharaiH.. 7-19-20 (45479) te hanyamAnA vIreNa kShatriyAH kAlachoditAH. vyasR^ija~nCharajAlAni pArthe nAnAvidhAni cha.. 7-19-21 (45480) na dhvajo nArjunastatra na ratho na cha keshavaH. pratyadR^ishyata ghoreNa sharavarSheNa saMvR^itaH.. 7-19-22 (45481) tataste labdhalakShatvAdanyonyamabhichukrushuH. hatau kR^iShNAviti prItyA vAsAMsyAdudhuvustadA.. 7-19-23 (45482) bherImR^ida~Ngasha~NkhAMshcha dadhmurvIrAH sahasrashaH. siMhanAdaravAMshchogrAMshchakrire tatra mAriSha.. 7-19-24 (45483) tataH prasiShvide kR^iShNaH khinnashchArjunamabravIt. kvAsi pArtha na pashyAmi kachchijjIvasi shatruhan.. 7-19-25 (45484) tasya tadbhAShitaM shrutvA tvaramANo dhana~njayaH. vAyavyAstreNa tairastAM sharavR^iShTimapAharat.. 7-19-26 (45485) tataH saMshaptakavrAtAnsAshvadviparathAyudhAn. uvAha bhagavAnvAyuH shuShkaparmachayAniva.. 7-19-27 (45486) uhyamAnAstu te rAjanbahvashobhanta vAyunA. praDInAH pakShiNaH kAle vR^ikShebhya iva mAriSha.. 7-19-28 (45487) tAMstathA vyAkulIkR^itya tvaramANo dhana~njayaH. jaghAna nishitairbANaiH sahasrANi shatAni cha.. 7-19-29 (45488) shirAMsi bhallairaharadbAhUnapi cha sAyudhAn. hastihastopamAMshchorU~nsharairurvyAmapAtayat.. 7-19-30 (45489) pR^iShThachChinnAnvicharaNAnvimastakadR^iga~NgulIn. nAnA~NgAvayavairhInAMshchakArArIndhana~njayaH.. 7-19-31 (45490) gandharvanagarAkArAnvidhivatkalpitAnrathAn. sharairvishakalIkurvaMshchakre vyashvarathadvipAn.. 7-19-32 (45491) muNDatAlavanAnIva tatratatra chakAshire. ChinnA rathadhvajavrAtAH kechittatra kvachitkvachit.. 7-19-33 (45492) sottarAyudhino nAgAH sapatAkA~NkushadhvajAH. petuH shakrAshanihatA drumavanta ivAchalAH.. 7-19-34 (45493) chAmarApIDakavachAH srastAntranayanAstathA. sArohAsturagAH petuH pArtabANahatAH kShitau.. 7-19-35 (45494) vipraviddhAsinArAchAshChinnavarmarShTishaktayaH. pattayashchinnavarmANaH kR^ipaNAH sherate hatAH.. 7-19-36 (45495) tairhatairhanyamAnaishcha patadbhiH patitairapi. bhramadbhirniShTanadbhishcha krUramAyodhanaM babhau.. 7-19-37 (45496) rajashcha chApyabhavaddurgA kabandhashatasa~NkulA.. tadbabhau raudrabIbhatsaM bIbhatsoryAnamAhave. 7-19-38 (45497) AkrIDamiva rudrasya ghnataH kAlAtyaye pashUn.. kate vadhyamAnAH pArthena vyAkulAshvarathadvipAH. 7-19-39 (45498) tamevAbhimukhAH kShINAH shakrasyAtithitAM gatAH.. sA bhUmIrbharatashreShTha nihataistairmahArathaiH. 7-19-40 (45499) AstIrNA sambabhau sarvA pretIbhUtaiH samantataH.. etasminnantare chaiva pramatte savyasAchini. 7-19-41 (45500) vyUDhAnIkastato droNo yudhiShThiramupAdravat.. taM pratyagR^ihNaMstvaritA vyUDhAnIkAH prahAriNaH. 7-19-42 (45501) yudhiShThiraM parIpsantastadAsIttumulaM mahat.. .. 7-19-43 (45502) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi saMshaptakavadhaparvaNi dvAdashadivasayuddhe ekonaviMsho.adhyAyaH.. 19 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-19-34 sottarAyudhinaH uparigatairyodhaiH sahitAH.. 5-19-19 ekonaviMsho.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 020

.. shrIH ..

7.20. adhyAyaH 020

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sa~NkulayuddhavarNanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-20-0 (45503) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-20-0x (4307) pariNAmya nishAM tAM tu bhAradvAjo mahArathaH. uktvA subahu rAjendra vachanaM vai suyodhanam.. 7-20-1 (45504) vidhAya goptR^InpArthasya saMshaptakagaNaiH saha. niShkrAnte cha tadA pArthe saMshaptakavadhaM prati.. 7-20-2 (45505) vyUDhAnIkastato droNaH pANDavAnAM mahAchamUm. abhyayAdbharatashreShTha dharmarAjajighR^ikShayA.. 7-20-3 (45506) vyUDhAM dR^iShTvA suparNena bhAradvAjasya tAM chamUm. vyUhena maNDalArdhena pratyavyUhadyudhiShThiraH.. 7-20-4 (45507) mukhaM tvAsItsuparNasya bhAradvAjo mahArathaH. shiro duryodhano rAjA sodaryaiH sAnugairvR^itaH.. 7-20-5 (45508) chakShuShI kR^itavarmA.a.asIdgautamashchAsyatAM varaH.. 7-20-6 (45509) bhUtasharmA kShemasharmA karakAkShashcha vIryavAn. kali~NgAH siMhalAH prAchyAH shUrA bhIrA dasherakAH.. 7-20-7 (45510) shakA yavanakAmbhojAstathA haMsapathAshcha ye. grIvAyAM shUrasenAshcha darandA madrakekayAH. gajAshvarathapattyoghAstasthuH paramadaMshitAH.. 7-20-8 (45511) bhUrishravAstathA shalyaH somadattashcha bAhlikaH. akShauhiNyA vR^itA vIrA dakShiNaM pArshvamAsthitAH.. 7-20-9 (45512) vindAnuvindAvAvantyau kAmbhojashcha sudakShiNaH. vAmaM pArshvaM samAshritya droNaputrAgrataH sthitAH.. 7-20-10 (45513) pR^iShThe kali~NgAH sAmbaShThA mAgadhAH pauNDramadrakAH. gAndhArAH shakunAH prAchyAH pArvatIyA vasAtayaH.. 7-20-11 (45514) puchChe vaikartanaH karNaH saputraj~nAtibAndhavaH. mahatyA senayA tasthau nAnAjanapadotthayA.. 7-20-12 (45515) jayadratho bhImarathaH sampAtirR^iShabho jayaH. bhUmi~njayo vR^iShakrAtho naiShadhashcha mahAbalaH.. 7-20-13 (45516) vR^itA balena mahatA brahmalokapariShkR^itAH. vyUhasyorasi te rAjansthitA yuddhavishAradAH.. 7-20-14 (45517) droNena vihito vyUhaH padAtyashvarathadvipaiH. vAtoddhUtArNavAkAraH pranR^itta iva lakShyate.. 7-20-15 (45518) tasya pakShaprapakShebhyo niShpatanti yuyutsavaH. savidyutstanitA meghAH sarvadigbhyaH ivoShNage.. 7-20-16 (45519) tasya prAgjyotiSho madhye vidhivatkalpitaM gajam. AsthitaH shushubhe rAjannaMshumAnudaye yathA.. 7-20-17 (45520) mAlyadAmavatA rAja~nshvetachChatreNa dhAryatA. kR^ittikAyogayuktena paurNamAsyAmivendunA.. 7-20-18 (45521) nIlA~njanachayaprakhyo madAndho dvirado babhau. ativR^iShTo mahAmeghairyathA syAtparvato mahAn.. 7-20-19 (45522) nAnAnR^ipatibhirvIrai rvividhAyudhabhUShaNaiH. samanvitaH pArvatIyaiH shakro devagaNairiva.. 7-20-20 (45523) tato yudhiShThiraH prekShya vyUhaM tamatimAnuSham. ajayyamaribhiH sa~Nkhye pArShataM vAkyamabravIt.. 7-20-21 (45524) brAhmaNasya vashaM nAhamiyAmadya yathA prabho. pArAvatasavarNAshva tathA nItirvidhIyatAm.. 7-20-22 (45525) dhR^iShTadyumna uvAcha. 7-20-23x (4308) droNasya yatamAnasya vashaM naiShyasi suvrata. ahamAvArayiShyAmi droNamadya sahAnugam.. 7-20-23 (45526) mayi jIvati kauravya nodvegaM kartumarhasi. na hi shakto raNe droNo vijetuM mAM katha~nchana.. 7-20-24 (45527) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-20-25x (4309) evamuktvA kiranbANAndrupadasya suto balI. pArAvatasavarNAshvaH svayaM droNamupAdravat.. 7-20-25 (45528) aniShTadarshanaM dR^iShTvA dhR^iShTadyumnamavasthitam. kShaNenaivAbhavaddroNo nAtihR^iShTamanA iva.. 7-20-26 (45529) `sa hi jAto mahArAja droNasya nidhanaM prati.. 7-20-27 (45530) martyadharmatayA tasmAdbhAradvAjo vyamuhyata. nAshakattatra tatki~nchidanIkaM prativIkShitum.. 7-20-28 (45531) tataH kiranniShUMstIkShNAndrupadasya varUthinIm. bharAdvAjo yayau tUrNaM pArShataM varjayanyudhi. drupadasya mahatsainyaM dArayAmAsa brAhmaNaH'.. 7-20-29 (45532) taM tu samprekShya putraste durmukhaH shatrukarShaNaH. priyaM chikIrShurdroNasya dhR^iShTadyumnamavArayat.. 7-20-30 (45533) sa samprahArastumulaH sughoraH samapadyata. pArShatasya cha shUrasya durmukhasya cha bhArata.. 7-20-31 (45534) pArShataH sharajAlena kShipraM prachChAdya durmukham. bhAradvAjaM sharaugheNa mahatA samavArayat.. 7-20-32 (45535) droNAvAritaM dR^iShTvA bhR^ishAyastastavAtmajaH. nAnAli~NgaiH sharavrAtaiH pArShataM samamohayat.. 7-20-33 (45536) tayorviShaktayoH sa~Nkhye pA~nchAlyakurumukhyayoH. droNo yaudhiShThiraM sainyaM bahudhA vyadhamachCharaiH.. 7-20-34 (45537) anilena yathA.abhrANi vichChinnAni samantataH. tathA pArthasya sainyAni vichChinnAni kvachitkvachit.. 7-20-35 (45538) muhUrtamiva tadyuddhamAsInmadhuradarshanam. tata unmattavadrAjannirmaryAdamavartata.. 7-20-36 (45539) `naiva khaM na disho bhUmirbabhAse na cha bhAskaraH'. naiva sve na pare rAjannAj~nAyanta parasparam. anumAnena saMj~nAbhiryuddhaM tatsamavartata.. 7-20-37 (45540) chUDAmaNiShu niShkeShu bhUShaNeShvapi varmasu. teShAmAdityavarNAbhA rashmayaH prachakAshire.. 7-20-38 (45541) tatprakIrNapatAkAnAM rathavAraNavAjinAm. balAkAshabalAbhrAmaM dadR^ishe rUpamAhave.. 7-20-39 (45542) narAneva narA jaghnarudagrAshcha hayA hayAn. rathAMshcha rathino jaghnurvAraNA varavAraNAn.. 7-20-40 (45543) samuchChritapatAkAnAM gajAnAM paramadvipaiH. kShaNena tumulo ghoraH sa~NgrAmaH samapadyata.. 7-20-41 (45544) teShAM saMsaktagAtrANAM karShatAmitaretaram. dantasa~NghAtasa~NgharShAtsadhUmo.agnirajAyata.. 7-20-42 (45545) viprakIrNapatAkAste viShANajanitAgnayaH. babhUvuH khaM samAsAdya savidyuta ivAmbudAH.. 7-20-43 (45546) vikShipadbhirnadadbhishcha nipatadbhishcha vAraNaiH. sambabhUva mahI kIrNA meghairdyauriva vArShikI.. 7-20-44 (45547) teShAmAhanyamAnAnAM bANatomaraR^iShTibhiH. vAraNAnAM ravo jaj~ne meghAnAmiva sampuve.. 7-20-45 (45548) tomarAbhihatAH kechidbANaishcha paramadvipAH. vitresuH sarvanAgAnAM shabdamevApare.asR^ijan.. 7-20-46 (45549) viShANAbhihatAshchApi kechittatra gajA gajaiH. chakrurArtasvanaM ghoramutpAtajaladA iva.. 7-20-47 (45550) pratIpAH kriyamANAshcha vAraNA varavAraNaiH. unmathya punarAjagmuH preritAH paramA~NkushaiH.. 7-20-48 (45551) mahAmAtrairmahAmAtrAstADitAH sharatomaraiH. gajebhyaH pR^ithivIM jagmurmuktapraharaNA~NkushAH.. 7-20-49 (45552) nirmanuShyAshcha mAta~NgA vinadantastatastataH. ChinnAbhrANIva sampetuH sampravishya parasparam.. 7-20-50 (45553) hatAnparivahantashcha patitAnpatitAyudhAn. disho jagmurmahAnAgAH kechidekacharA iva.. 7-20-51 (45554) tADitAstADyamAnAshcha tomararShTiparashvathaiH. peturArtasvanaM kR^itvA tadA vishasane gajAH.. 7-20-52 (45555) teShAM shailopamaiH kAyairnipatadbhiH samantataH. AhatA sahasA bhUmishchakampe cha nanAda cha.. 7-20-53 (45556) sAditaiH sagajArohaiH sapatAkaiH samantataH. mAta~NgaiH shushubhe bhUmirvikIrNairiva parvataiH.. 7-20-54 (45557) gajasthAshcha mahAmAtrA nirbhinnahR^idayA raNe. rathibhiH pAtitA bhallairvikIrNA~NkushatomarAH.. 7-20-55 (45558) krau~nchavadvinadanto.anye nArAchAbhihatA gajAH. parAnsvAMshchApi mR^idgantaH paripeturdisho dasha.. 7-20-56 (45559) gajAshvarathayodhAnAM sharIraughasamAvR^itA. babhUva pR^ithivI rAjanmAMsashoNitakardamA.. 7-20-57 (45560) pramathya cha viShANAgraiH samutkShiptAshcha vAraNaiH. sachakrAshcha vichakrAshcha rathaireva mahArathAH.. 7-20-58 (45561) rathAshcha rathibhirhInA nirmanuShyAshcha vAjinaH. hatArohAshcha mAta~NgA disho jagmurbhayAturAH.. 7-20-59 (45562) jaghAnAtra pitA putraM putrashcha pitaraM tathA. ityAsIttumulaM yuddhaM na prAj~nAyata ki~nchana.. 7-20-60 (45563) Agulphebhyo.avasIdante narA lohitakardamaiH. dIpyamAnaiH parikShiptA dAvairiva mahAdrumAH.. 7-20-61 (45564) shoNitaiH sichyamAnAni vastrANi kavachAni cha. ChatrANi cha patAkAshcha sarvaM raktamadR^ishyata.. 7-20-62 (45565) hayaughAshcha rathaughAshcha naraughAshcha nipAtitAH. saMkShuNNAH punarAvR^itya bahudhA rathanemibhiH.. 7-20-63 (45566) sagajaughamahAvegaH parAsunarashaivalaH. rathaughatumulAvartaH prababhau sainyasAgaraH.. 7-20-64 (45567) taM vAhanamahAnaubhiryodhA jayadhanaiShiNaH. avagAhyAtha majjanto naiva mohaM prachakrire.. 7-20-65 (45568) sharavarShAbhivR^iShTeShu yodheShva~nchitalakShmasu. na teShvachittatAM lebhe kashchidAhatalakShaNaH.. 7-20-66 (45569) vartamAne tathA yuddhe ghorarUpe bhaya~Nkare. mohayitvA parAndroNo yudhiShThiramupAdravat.. .. 7-20-67 (45570) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi saMshaptakavadhaparvaNi dvAdashadivasayuddhe viMsho.adhyAyaH.. 20 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-20-16 uShNage gharmAtyaye.. 5-20-18 paurNamAsyAM kR^ittikAyogayuktena indunA. shAradapUrNachandreNetyarthaH.. 5-20-26 aniShTadarshanaM svamR^ityuhetutvAt.. 5-20-33 bhR^ishAyasto.atiprayatnavAn.. 5-20-51 ekacharAH dvipAntaradarshanAsahAH.. 5-20-66 achittatAM moham.. 5-20-20 viMsho.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 021

.. shrIH ..

7.21. adhyAyaH 021

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

yudhiShThiraM jighR^ikShato droNasya satyajitA nirAdhaH.. 1 .. droNena satyajiti nihate bhayAdyudhiShThirasyApayAnam.. 2 .. punaryudhiShThiraM jighR^ikShuNA droNena pA~nchAlyAdInAM hananam.. 3 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-21-0 (45571) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-21-0x (4310) tato yudhiShThiro droNaM dR^iShTvAntikamupAgatam. mahatA sharavarSheNa pratyagR^ihNAdabhItavat.. 7-21-1 (45572) tato halahalAshabda AsIdyaudhiShThire bale. jighR^ikShati mahAsiMhe gajAnAmiva yUthapam.. 7-21-2 (45573) dR^iShTvA droNaM tataH shUraH satyajitsatyavikramaH. yudhiShThiramabhiprepsurAchAryaM samupAdravat.. 7-21-3 (45574) tata AchAryapA~nchAlyau yuyudhAte mahAbalau. vikShobhayantau tatsainyamindravairochanAviva.. 7-21-4 (45575) tato droNaM maheShvAsaH satyajitsatyavikramaH. avidhyannishitAgreNa paramAstraM vidarshayan.. 7-21-5 (45576) tathAsya sAratheH pa~ncha sharAnsarpaviShopamAn. amu~nchadantakaprakhyAnsaMmumohAsya sArathiH.. 7-21-6 (45577) athAsya sahasA.avidhyaddhayAndashabhirAshugaiH. dashabhirdashabhiH kruddha ubhau cha pArShNisArathI.. 7-21-7 (45578) maNDalaM tu samAvR^itya vicharanpR^itanAmukhe. dhvajaM chichCheda cha kruddho droNasyAmitrakarShaNaH.. 7-21-8 (45579) droNastu tatsamAlokya charitaM tasya saMyuge. manasA chintayAmAsa prAptakAlamarindamaH.. 7-21-9 (45580) tataH satyajitaM tIkShNairdashabhirmarmabhedabhiH. avidhyachChIghramAchAryashChittvA.asya sasharaM dhanuH.. 7-21-10 (45581) sa shIghrataramAdAya dhanuranyatpratApavAn. droNamabyahanadrAjaMstriMshatA ka~NkapatribhiH.. 7-21-11 (45582) dR^iShTvA satyajitA droNaM grasyamAnamivAhave. vR^ikaH sharashataistIkShNaiH pA~nchAlyo droNamArdayat.. 7-21-12 (45583) sa~nChAdyamAnaM samare droNaM dR^iShTvA mahAratham. chukrushuH pANDavA rAjanvastrANi dudhuvushcha ha.. 7-21-13 (45584) vR^ikastu paramakruddho droNaM ShaShTyA stanAntare. vivyAdha balavAnrAjaMstadadbhutamivAbhavat.. 7-21-14 (45585) droNastu sharavarSheNa chChAdyamAno mahArathaH. vegaM chakre mahAvegaH krodhAdudvR^itya chakShuShI.. 7-21-15 (45586) tataH satyajitashchApaM ChittvA droNo vR^ikasya cha. ShaDbhiH sasUtaM sahayaM sharairdroNo.avadhIdvR^ikam.. 7-21-16 (45587) athAnyaddhanurAdAya satyajidvegavattaram. sAshvaM sasUtaM vishikhairdroNaM vivyAdha sadhvajam.. 7-21-17 (45588) sa tanna mamR^iShe droNaH pA~nchAlyenArdito mR^idhe. tatastasya vinAshAya satvaraM vyasR^ijachCharAn.. 7-21-18 (45589) hayAndhvajaM dhanurmuShTimubhau cha pArShNisArathI. avAkirattato droNaH sharavarShaiH sahasrashaH.. 7-21-19 (45590) tathA sa~nChidyamAneShu kArmukeShu punaHpunaH. pA~nchAlyaH paramAstraj~naH shoNAshvaM samayodhayat.. 7-21-20 (45591) sa satyajitamAlokya tathodIrNaM mahAhave. ardhachandreNa chichCheda shirastasya mahAtmanaH.. 7-21-21 (45592) tasminhate mahAmAtre pA~nchAlAnAM mahArathe. apAyAjjavanairashvairdroNAttrasto yudhiShThiraH.. 7-21-22 (45593) pA~nchAlAH kekayA mAtsyAshchedikArUshakosalAH. yudhiShThiramabhIpsanto dR^iShTvA droNamupAdravan.. 7-21-23 (45594) tato yudhiShThiraM prepsurAchAryaH shatrupUgahA. vyadhamattAnyanIkAni tUlarAshimivAnalaH.. 7-21-24 (45595) nirdahantamanIkAni tAni tAni punaHpunaH. droNaM matsyAdavarajaH shatAnIko.abhyavartata.. 7-21-25 (45596) sUryarashmipratIkAshaiH karmAraparimArjitaiH. ShaDbhiH sasUtaM sahayaM droNaM viddhvA.anadadbhR^isham.. 7-21-26 (45597) krUrAya karmaNe yuktashchikIrShuH karma duShkaram. avAkirachCharashatairbhAradvAjaM mahAratham.. 7-21-27 (45598) tasya nAnadato droNaH shiraH kAyAtsakuNDalam. kShureNApAharatturNaM tato matsyAH pradudruvuH.. 7-21-28 (45599) matsyA~njitvA.ajayachchedInkarUshAnkekayAnapi. pA~nchAlAnsR^i~njayAnpANDUnbhAradvAjaH punaHpunaH.. 7-21-29 (45600) taM dahantamanIkAni kruddhamagniM yathA vanam. dR^iShTvA rukmarathaM vIraM samakampanta sR^i~njayAH.. 7-21-30 (45601) ubhAbhyAM sandadhAnasya dhanurasyAshukAriNaH. jyAghoSho nighnato.amitrAndikShusarvAsu shushruve.. 7-21-31 (45602) nAgAnashvAnpadAtIMshcha rathino gajasAdinaH. raudrA hastavatA muktAH pramathnanti sma sAyakAH.. 7-21-32 (45603) nAnadyamAnaH parjanyo mishravAto himAtyaye. ashmavarShamivAvarShanpareShAM bhayamAdadhat.. 7-21-33 (45604) sarvA dishaH samacharatsainyaM vikShobhayanniva. balI shUro maheShvAso mitrANAmabhaya~NkaraH.. 7-21-34 (45605) tasya vidyudivAbhreShu chApaM hemapariShkR^itam. dikShu sarvAsu pashyAmo droNasyAmitatejasaH.. 7-21-35 (45606) shobhamAnAM dhvaje chAsya vedImadrAkShya bhArata. himavachChikharAkAraM charataH saMyuge bhR^isham.. 7-21-36 (45607) droNastu pANDavAnIke chakAra kadanaM mahat. yathA daityagaNe viShNuH surAsuranamaskR^itaH.. 7-21-37 (45608) sa shUraH satyavAkprAj~no balavAnsatyavikramaH. mahAnubhAvaH kalpAnte raudrAM bhIruvibhIShaNAm.. 7-21-38 (45609) kavachormidhvajAvartAM martyakUlApahAriNIm.. gajavAjimahAgrAhAmasimInAM durAsadAm.. 7-21-39 (45610) vIrAsyisharkarAM raudrAM bherImurajakachChapAm. charmavarmaplavAM ghorAM keshashaivalashAdvalAm.. 7-21-40 (45611) sharaughiNIM dhanuHsrotAM bAhupannagasa~NkulAm. raNabhUmivahAM tIvrAM kurusR^i~njayavAhinIm.. 7-21-41 (45612) manuShyashIrShapAShANAM shaktimInAM gadoDupAm. uShNIShaphenavasanAM vikIrNAntrasarIsR^ipAm.. 7-21-42 (45613) vIrApahAriNImugrAM mAMsashomitakardamAm. hastigrAhAM ketuvR^ikShAM kShatriyANAM nimajjanIm.. 7-21-43 (45614) krUrAM sharIrasa~NghATAM sAdinakrAM duratyayAm. droNaH prAvartayattatra nadImantakagAminIm.. 7-21-44 (45615) kravyAdagaNasa~njuShTAM shvashR^igAlagaNAyutAm. niShevitAM mahAraudraiH pishitAshaiH samantataH.. 7-21-45 (45616) taM dahantamanIkAni rathodAraM kR^itAntavat. sarvato.abhyadravandroNaM kuntIputrapurogamAH.. 7-21-46 (45617) te droNaM sahitAH shUrAH sarvataH pratyavArayan. gabhastibhirivAdityaM tapantaM bhuvanaM yathA.. 7-21-47 (45618) taM tu shUraM maheShvAsaM tAvakA.abhyudyatAyudhAH. rAjAno rAjaputrAshcha samantAtparyavArayan.. 7-21-48 (45619) shikhaNDI tu tato droNaM pa~nchabhirnataparvabhiH. kShatravarmA cha viMshatyA vasudAnashcha pa~nchabhiH.. 7-21-49 (45620) uttamaujAstribhirbANaiH kShatradevashcha saptabhiH. sAtyakishcha shatenAjau yudhAmanyustathA.aShTabhiH.. 7-21-50 (45621) yudhiShThiro dvAdashabhirdroNaM vivyAdha sAyakaiH. dhR^iShTadyumnashcha dashabhishchekitAnastribhiH sharaiH.. 7-21-51 (45622) tato droNaH satyasandhaH prabhinna iva ku~njaraH. abhyatItya sthAnIkaM dR^iDhasenamapAtayat.. 7-21-52 (45623) tato rAjAnamAsAdya praharantamabhItavat. avidhyannavabhiH kShemaM sa hataHprApatadrathAt.. 7-21-53 (45624) sa madhyaM prApya sainyAnAM sarvAH pravicharandishaH. trAtA hyabhavadanyeShAM na trAtavyaH kathaMchana.. 7-21-54 (45625) shikhaNDinaM dvAdashabhirviMshatyA chottamaujasam. vasudAnaM cha bhallena praiShayadyamasAdanam.. 7-21-55 (45626) ashItyA kShatravarmANaM ShaDviMshatyA sudakShiNam. kShatradevaM tu bhallena rathanIDADapAtayat.. 7-21-56 (45627) yudhAmanyuM chatuHShaShTyA triMshatA chaiva sAtyakim. viddhvA rukmarathastUrNaM yudhiShThiramupAdravat.. 7-21-57 (45628) tato yudhiShThiraH kShipraM guruto rAjasattamaH. apAyA~njavanairashvaiH pA~nchAlyo droNamabhyayAt.. 7-21-58 (45629) taM droNaH sadhanuShkaM tu sAshvayantAramAkShiNot. sa hataH prApatadbhUmau rathAjjyotirivAmbarAt. `hatvA taM vibabhau droNaH kurubhiH parivAritaH.. 7-21-59 (45630) vArdhakShemistu vArShNeyo droNaM viddhvA sharottamaiH. navabhishcha mahIpAlaH punarvivyAdha pa~nchabhiH.. 7-21-60 (45631) sa sAtyakishchatuShShaShTyA rAjanvivyAdha sAyakaiH. suchitro dashabhirbANairdroNaM vidvvA.anadadbalI.. 7-21-61 (45632) taM droNaH samare rAja~nsharavarShairavAkirat. apAtayattayo droNaH suchitraM sahasArathim.. 7-21-62 (45633) sAshvaM cha samare rAjanhato vai prApatatkShitau. pAtyamAno mahArAja babhau jyotirivAmbarAt.. 7-21-63 (45634) tasminhate rAjaputre pA~nchAlAnAM yashaskare. hata droNaM hata droNamityAsInniHsvano mahAn.. 7-21-64 (45635) tAMstathA bhR^ishasaMrabdhAnpA~nchAlAnmatsyakekayAn. sR^i~njayAnpANDavAMshchaiva droNo vyakShobhayadbalI.. 7-21-65 (45636) sAtyakiM chekitAnaM cha dhR^iShTadyumnashikhaNQDinau. vArdhakShemiM chaitraseniM senAbinduM suvarchasam.. 7-21-66 (45637) etAMshchAnyAMshcha subahUnnAnAjanapadeshvarAn. sarvAndroNo.ajayadyuddhe kurubhiH parivAritaH.. 7-21-67 (45638) tAvakAshcha mahArAja jayaM labdhvA mahAhave. pANDaveyAnraNe jaghnurdravamANAnsamantataH.. 7-21-68 (45639) te dAnavA ivendreNa vadhyamAnA mahAtmanA. pA~nchAlAH kekayA mAtsyAH samakampanta bhArata.. .. 7-21-69 (45640) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi saMshaptakavadhaparvaNi dvAdashadivasayuddhe ekaviMsho.adhyAyaH.. 21 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-21-55 ubhayatra vidvveti sheShaH.. 5-21-58 pA~nchAlyo nAmnA.. 5-21-21 ekaviMsho.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 022

.. shrIH ..

7.22. adhyAyaH 022

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

droNaparAkramahR^iShTena duryodhanena karNaM sambodhya bhImasenAdyavaj~nAne kR^ite karNena bhImAdInAM prashaMsanapUrvakamanavaj~neyatvakathanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-22-0 (45641) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-22-0x (4311) bhAradvAjena bhagneShu pANDaveShu mahAmR^idhe. pA~nchAleShu cha sarveShu kashchidanyo.abhyavartata.. 7-22-1 (45642) AryAM yuddhe matiM kR^itvA kShatriyANAM yashaskarIm. asevitAM kApuruShaiH sevitAM puruSharShabhaiH.. 7-22-2 (45643) sa hi vIronnataH shUro yo bhagneShu nivartate. aho nAsItpumAnkashchiddR^iShTvA droNaM vyavasthitam.. 7-22-3 (45644) jR^imbhamANamiva vyAghraM prabhinnamiva ku~njaram. tyajantamAhave prANAnsannaddhaM chitrayodhinam.. 7-22-4 (45645) maheShvAsaM naravyAghraM dviShatAM bhayavardhanam. kR^itaj~naM satyanirataM duryodhanahitaiShiNam.. 7-22-5 (45646) bhAradvAjaM tathA.anIke dR^iShTvA shUramavasthitam. ke shUrAH sannyavartanta tanmamAchakShva sa~njaya.. 7-22-6 (45647) sa~nchaya uvAcha. 7-22-7x (4312) tAndR^iShTvA chalitAnsa~Nkhye praNunnAndroNasAyakaiH. pA~nchAlAnpANvAnmAtsyAnsR^i~njayAMshchedikekayAn.. 7-22-7 (45648) droNachApavimuktena sharaugheNAshu hAriNA. sindhoriva mahaudhena hiyamANAnyathA plavAn.. 7-22-8 (45649) kauravAH siMhanAdena nAnAvAdyasvanena cha. rathadvipanarAMshchaiva sarvataH samavArayan.. 7-22-9 (45650) tAnpashyansainyamadhyastho rAjA svajanasamvR^itaH. duryodhano.abravItkarNaM prahR^iShTaH prahasanniva.. 7-22-10 (45651) duryodhana uvAcha. 7-22-11x (4313) pashya rAdheya pA~nchAlAnpraNunnAndroNasAyakaiH. siMheneva mR^igAnvanyAMstrAsitAndR^iDhadhanvanA.. 7-22-11 (45652) naite jAtu punaryuddhamIheyuriti me matiH. yathA tu bhagnA droNena vAteneva mahAdrumAH.. 7-22-12 (45653) ardyamAnAH sharairete rukmapu~NkhairmahAtmanA. pathA naikena gachChanti ghUrNamAnAstatastataH.. 7-22-13 (45654) sanniruddhAshcha kauravyairdroNena cha mahAtmanA. ete.anye maNDalIbhUtAH pAvakeneva ku~njarAH.. 7-22-14 (45655) bhramarairiva chAviShTA droNasya nishitaiH sharaiH. anyonyaM samalIyanta palAyanaparAyaNAH.. 7-22-15 (45656) eSha bhImo mahAkrodhI hInaH pANDavasR^i~njayaiH. madIyairAvR^ito yodhaiH karNa nandayatIva mAm.. 7-22-16 (45657) vyaktaM droNamayaM lokamadya pashyati durmatiH. nirAsho jIvitAnnUnamadya rAjyAchcha pANDavaH.. 7-22-17 (45658) karNa uvAcha. 7-22-18x (4314) naiSha jAtu mahAbAhurjIvannAhavamutsR^ijet. na chemAnpuruShavyAghra siMhanAdAnsahiShyati.. 7-22-18 (45659) na chApi pANDavA yuddhe bhajyeranniti me matiH. shUrAshcha balavantashcha kR^itAstrA yuddhadurmadAH.. 7-22-19 (45660) viShAgnidyUtasa~NkleshAnvanavAsaM cha pANDavAH. smaramANA na hAsyanti sa~NgrAmamiti me matiH.. 7-22-20 (45661) nivR^itto hi mahAbAhuramitaujA vR^ikodaraH. varAnvarAnhi kaunteyo rathodArAnhaniShyati.. 7-22-21 (45662) asinA dhanuShA shakyA hayairnAgairnarai sthaiH. Ayasena cha daNDena vrAtAnvrAtAnhaniShyati.. 7-22-22 (45663) tamenamanuvartante sAtyakipramukhA rathAH. pA~nchAlAH kekayA mAstyAH pAshDavAshcha visheShataH.. 7-22-23 (45664) shUrAshcha balavantashcha vikrAntAshcha mahArathAH. vinighnantashcha bhImena saMrabdhenAbhichoditAH.. 7-22-24 (45665) te droNamabhivartante sarvataH kurupu~NgavAH. vR^ikodaraM parIpsantaH sUryamabhragaNA iva.. 7-22-25 (45666) `samareShu tu nirdiShTAH pANDavAH kR^iShNabAndhavAH. pA~nchAlAH kekayA mAtsyAH pANDaveyAshcha sarvashaH.. 7-22-26 (45667) shUrAshcha balavantashcha vikrAntAshcha mahArathAH. hImantaH shatrumaraNe nipuNAH puNyalakShaNAH.. 7-22-27 (45668) bahavaH pArthivA rAjaMsteShAM vashagatA raNe. mAvamaMsthAH pANDavAMstvaM nArAyaNapurogamAn.. 7-22-28 (45669) ekAyanagatA hyete pIDayeyuryatavratam. arakShamANaM shalabhA yathA dIpaM mumUrShavaH.. 7-22-29 (45670) asaMshayaM kR^itAstrAshcha paryAptAshchApi vAraNe. atibhAramahaM manye bhAradvAje samAhitam.. 7-22-30 (45671) te shIghramanugachChAmo yatra droNo vyavasthitaH. kokA iva mahAnAgaM mA vai hanyuryatavratam.. 7-22-31 (45672) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-22-32x (4315) rAdheyasya vachaH shrutvA rAjA duryodhanastataH. bhrAtR^ibhiH sahito rAjanprAyAddroNarathaM prati.. 7-22-32 (45673) tatrArAvo mahAnAsIdekaM droNaM jighAMsatAm. pANDavAnAM nivR^ittAnAM nAnAvarNairhayottamaiH.. .. 7-22-33 (45674) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi saMshaptakavadhaparvaNi dvAdashadivasayuddhe dvAviMsho.adhyAyaH.. 22 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-22-1 abhyavartata kim.. 5-22-31 koko vR^ikaH.. 5-22-22 dvAviMsho.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 023

.. shrIH ..

7.23. adhyAyaH 023

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-23-0 (45675) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-23-0x (4316) sarveShAmeva me brUhi rathachihvAni sa~njaya. ye droNamabhyavartanta kruddhA bhImapurogamAH. `tAnyahaM shrotumichChAmi vistareNa pR^ithakpR^ithak.. 7-23-1 (45676) dUyate me manastAta droNaM prati parantapam. shrutvA bhIShmasya nidhanaM tadvadetadbhaviShyati'.. 7-23-2 (45677) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-23-3x (4317) R^ikShavarNairhayairdR^iShTvA vyAyachChantaM vR^ikodaram. rajatAshvastataH shUraH shaineyaH sannyavartata.. 7-23-3 (45678) sAra~NgAshvo yudhAmanyuH svayaM pratvarayanhayAn. paryavartata durdharShaH kruddho droNarathaM prati.. 7-23-4 (45679) pArAvatasavarNaistu hemabhANDairmahAjavaiH. pA~nchAlarAjasya suto dhR^iShTadyumno nyavartata.. 7-23-5 (45680) pitaraM tu pariprepsuH kShatradharmA yatavrataH. siddhiM chAsya parAM kA~NkSha~nshoNAshvaH sannyavartata.. 7-23-6 (45681) padmapatranibhAMshchAshvAnmallikAkShAnsvala~NkR^itAn. shaikhaNQDiH kShatradevastu svayaM pratvarayanyayau.. 7-23-7 (45682) darshanIyAstu kAmbhojAH shukapatraparichChadAH. vahanto nakulaM shIghraM tAvakAnAbhidudruvuH.. 7-23-8 (45683) kR^iShNAstu meghasa~NkAshA avahannuttamaujasam. durdharShAyAbhisandhAya kruddhaM yuddhAya bhArata.. 7-23-9 (45684) tathA tittirikalmAShA hayA vAtasamA jave. avahaMstumule yuddhe sahadevamudAyudham.. 7-23-10 (45685) dantavarNAstu rAjAnaM kAlavAlA yudhiShThiram. bhImavegA naravyAghramavahanvAtaraMhasaH.. 7-23-11 (45686) hemottamapratichChannairhayairvAtasamairjave. abhyavartanta sainyAni sarvANyeva yudhiShThiram.. 7-23-12 (45687) rAj~nastvanantaro rAjA pA~nchAlyo drupado.abhavat. jAtarUpamayachChatraH sarvaistairabhirakShitaH.. 7-23-13 (45688) lalAmairharibhiryuktaH sarvashabdakShamairyudhi. rAj~naM madhye maheShvAsaH shAntabhIrabhyavartata.. 7-23-14 (45689) taM virATo.anvayAchChIghraM saha sarvairmahArathaiH. kekayAshcha sikhaNDI cha dhR^iShTaketustathaiva cha. svaiH svaiH sainyaiH parivR^itA mAtsyarAjAnamanvayuH.. 7-23-15 (45690) taM tu pATalipuShpANAM samavarNA hayottamAH. vahamAnA vyarAjanta mAstyasyAmitraghAtinaH.. 7-23-16 (45691) haridrAsamavarNAstu javanA hemamAlinaH. putraM virATarAjasya satvaraM samudAvahan.. 7-23-17 (45692) indragopakavarNaishcha bhrAtaraH pa~ncha kekayAH. jAtarUpasamAbhAsAH sarve lohitakadhvajAH.. 7-23-18 (45693) te hemamAlinaH shUrAH sarve yuddhavishAradAH. varShanta iva jImUtAH pratyadR^ishyanta daMshitAH.. 7-23-19 (45694) AmapAtranikAshAstu pA~nchAlyamamitaujasam. dattAstumburuNA divyAH shikhaNDinamudAvahan.. 7-23-20 (45695) tathA dvAdashasAhasrAH pA~nchAlAnAM mahArathAH. teShAM tu ShaTsahasrANi ye shikhaNDinamanvayuH.. 7-23-21 (45696) putraM tu shishupAlasya narasiMhasya mAriSha. AkrIDanto vahanti sma sAra~NgashabalA hayAH.. 7-23-22 (45697) dhR^iShTaketustu chedInAmR^iShabho.atibaloditaH. kAmbhojaiH shabalairashvairabhyavartata durjayaH.. 7-23-23 (45698) bR^ihatkShatraM tu kaikeyaM sukumAraM hayottamAH. palAladhUmasa~NkAshAH saindhavAH shIghramAvahan.. 7-23-24 (45699) mallikAkShAH padmavarNA bAhlijAtAH svala~NkR^itAH. shUraM shikhaNDinaH putramR^ikShadevamudAvahan.. 7-23-25 (45700) rukmabhANDapratichChannAH kausheyasadR^ishA hayAH. kShamAvanto.avahansa~Nkhye senAbindumarindamam.. 7-23-26 (45701) yuvAnamavahanyuddhe krau~nchavarNA hayottamAH. kAshyasyAbhibhuvaH putraM sukumAraM mahAratham.. 7-23-27 (45702) shvetAstu prativindhyantaM kR^iShNagrIvA manojavAH. yantuH preShyakarA rAjanrAjaputramudAvahan.. 7-23-28 (45703) sutasomaM tu yodhAgryaM bhImaputraM mahAbalam. mAShapuShpasavarNAstamavahanvAjino raNe.. 7-23-29 (45704) sahasrasomapratimo babhUva pure kurUNAmudayendunAmni. tasmi~njAtaH somasaMkrandamadhye yasmAttasmAtsutasomo.abhavatsaH.. 7-23-30 (45705) nAkuliM tu shatAnIkaM shAlapuShpanibhA hayAH. AdityataruNaprakhyAH shlAghanIyamudAvahan.. 7-23-31 (45706) kA~nchanApihitairyoktrairmayUragrIvasannibhAH. draupadeyaM naravyAghraM shrutakarmANamAhave.. 7-23-32 (45707) shrutakIrtiM shrutanidhiM draupadeyaM hayottamAH. UhuH pArthasamaM yuddhe chAShapatranibhA hayAH.. 7-23-33 (45708) yamAhuradhyardhaguNaM kR^iShNAtpArthAchcha saMyuge. abhimanyuM pisha~NgAstaM kumAramavahanraNe.. 7-23-34 (45709) ekastu dhArtarAShTrebhyaH pANDavAnyaH samAshritaH. taM bR^ihanto mahAkAyA yuyutsumavahanraNe. `ye tu puShkarasArasya tulyavarNA hayottamAH'.. 7-23-35 (45710) palAlakANDavarNAstu vArdhakShemiM tarasvinam. UhuH sutumule yuddhe hayA hR^iShTAH svala~NkR^itAH.. 7-23-36 (45711) kumAraM shitipAdAstu rukmachitrairurashChadaiH. sauchittimavahadyuddhe yantuH preShyakarA hayAH.. 7-23-37 (45712) rukmapIThAvakIrNAstu kausheyasadR^ishA hayAH. suvarNamAlinaH kShAntAH shreNimantamudAvahan.. 7-23-38 (45713) rukmamAlAdharAH shUrA hemapR^iShThAH svala~NkR^itAH. kAshirAjaM narashreShThaM shlAghanIyamudAvahan.. 7-23-39 (45714) astrANAM cha dhanurvede brAhme vede cha pAragam. taM satyadhR^itimAyAntamarUNAH samupAvahan.. 7-23-40 (45715) yaH sa pA~nchAlasenAnIdroNamaMshamakalpayat. pArAvatasavarNAstaM dhR^iShTadyumnamudAvahan.. 7-23-41 (45716) tamanvayAtsatyadhR^itiH sauchittiryuddhadurmadaH. shreNimAnvasudAnashcha putraH kAshyasya chAbhibhUH.. 7-23-42 (45717) yuktaiH paramakAmbhojairjavanairhemamAlibhiH. bhIShayanto dviShatsainyaM yamavaishravaNopamAH.. 7-23-43 (45718) prabhadrakAstu kAmbhojAH ShaTsahasrANyudAyudhAH. nAnAvarNairhayaiH shreShThairhemavarNarathadhvajAH.. 7-23-44 (45719) sharavrAtairvidhunvantaH shatrUnvitatakArmukAH. samAnamR^ityavo bhUtvA dhR^iShTadyumnaM samanvayuH.. 7-23-45 (45720) babhrukausheyavarNAstu suvarNavaramAlinaH. UhuramlAnamanasashchekitAnaM hayottamAH.. 7-23-46 (45721) indrAyudhasavarNaistu kuntibhojo hayottamaiH. AyAtsadashvaiH purujinmAtulaH savyasAchinaH.. 7-23-47 (45722) antarikShasavarNAstu tArakAchitritA iva. rAjAnaM rochamAnaM te hayAH sa~Nkhye samAvahan.. 7-23-48 (45723) karburAH shitipAdAstu svarNajAlaparichChadAH. jArAsandhiM hayAH shreShThAH sahadevamudAvahan.. 7-23-49 (45724) ye tu puShkaranAlasya samavarNA hayottamAH. jave shyenasamAshchitrAH sudAmAnamudAvahan.. 7-23-50 (45725) shashalohitavarNAstu pANDurodgatarAjayaH. pA~nchAlyaM gopateH putraM siMhasenamudAvahan.. 7-23-51 (45726) pA~nchAlAnAM naravyAghro yaH khyAto janamejayaH. tasya sarShapapuShpANAM tulyavarNA hayottamAH.. 7-23-52 (45727) mAShavarNAshcha javanA bR^ihanto hemamAlinaH. dadhipR^iShThAshchitramukhAH pA~nchAlyamavahandrutam.. 7-23-53 (45728) shUrAshcha bhadrakAshchaiva sharakANDanibhA hayAH. padmaki~njalkavarNAbhA daNDadhAramudAvahan.. 7-23-54 (45729) rAsabhAruNavarNAbhAH pR^iShThato mUShikaprabhAH. valganta iva saMyattA vyAghradattamudAvahan.. 7-23-55 (45730) harayaH kAlakAshchitrAshchitramAlyavibhUShitAH. sudhanvAnaM naravyAghraM pA~nchAlyaM samudAvahan.. 7-23-56 (45731) indrAshanisamasparshA indragopakasannibhAH. kAye chitrAntarAshchitrAshchitrAyudhamudAvahan.. 7-23-57 (45732) bibhrato hepamAlAstu chakravAkodarA hayAH. kosalAdhipateH putraM sukShatraM vAjino.avahan.. 7-23-58 (45733) shabalAstu bR^ihanto.ashvA dAntA jAmbUnadasrajaH. yuddhe satyadhR^itiM kShemimavahanprAMshavaH shubhAH.. 7-23-59 (45734) ekavarNena sarveNa dhvajena kavachena cha. ashvaishcha dhanuShA chaiva shuklaiH shuklo nyavartata.. 7-23-60 (45735) samudrasenaputraM tu sAmudrA rudratejasam. ashvAH shashA~NkasadR^ishAshchandrasenamudAvahan.. 7-23-61 (45736) nIlotpalasavarNAstu tapanIyavibhUShitAH. shaibyaM chitrarathaM sa~Nkhye chitramAlyA.avahanhayAH.. 7-23-62 (45737) kalAyapuShpavarNAstu shvetalohitarAjayaH. rathasenaM hayashreShThAH samUhuryuddhadurmadam.. 7-23-63 (45738) yaM tu sarvamanuShyebhyaH prAhuH shUrataraM nR^ipam. taM paTachcharahantAraM shukavarNA.avahanhayAH.. 7-23-64 (45739) chitrAyudhaM chitramAlyaM chitravarmAyudhadhvajam. UhuH kiMshukapuShpANAM samavarNA hayottamAH.. 7-23-65 (45740) ekavarNena sarveNa dhvajena kavachena cha. dhanuShA rathavAhaishcha nIlairnIlo.abhyavartata.. 7-23-66 (45741) nAnArUpai ratnachihnairvarUtharathakArmukaiH. vAjidhvajapatAkAbhishchitraishchitro.abhyavartata.. 7-23-67 (45742) ye tu puShkaravarNasya tulyavarNA hayottamAH. te rochamAnasya sutaM hemavarNamudAvahan.. 7-23-68 (45743) yodhAshcha bhadrakArAshcha sharadaNDAnudaNDayaH. shvetANDAH kukkuTANDAbhA daNDaketuM hayA.avahan.. 7-23-69 (45744) keshave na hate sa~Nkhye pitaryatha narAdhipe. bhinne kapATe pANQDAnAM vidruteShu cha bandhuShu.. 7-23-70 (45745) bhIShmAdavApya chAstrANi droNAdrAmAtkR^ipAttathA. astraiH samatvaM samprApya rukmikarNArjunAchyutaiH.. 7-23-71 (45746) iyeSha dvArakAM hantuM kR^itsnAM jetuM cha medinIm. nivAritastataH prAj~naiH suhR^idbhirhitakAmyayA.. 7-23-72 (45747) vairAnubandhamutsajya svarAjyamanushAsti yaH. sa sAgaradhvajaH pANDyashchandrarashminibhairhayaiH.. 7-23-73 (45748) vaiDUryajAlasa~nChannairvIryadraviNamAshritaH. divyaM visphArayaMshchApaM droNamabhyadravadbalI.. 7-23-74 (45749) ArakUTakavarNAshcha hayAH pANDyAnuyAyinAm. avahanrathamukhyAnAmayutAni chaturdasha.. 7-23-75 (45750) nAnAvarNena rUpeNa nAnAkR^itimukhA hayAH. rathachakradhvajaM vIraM ghaTotkachamudAvahan.. 7-23-76 (45751) bhAratAnAM sametAnAmutsR^ijyaiko matAni yaH. gato yudhiShThiraM bhaktyA tyaktvA sarvamabhIpsitam.. 7-23-77 (45752) lohitAkShaM mahAbAhuM yuyutsuM makaradhvajam. mahAsatvA mahAkAyAH sauvarNasyandane sthitam.. 7-23-78 (45753) suvarNavarNA dharmaj~namanIkasthaM yudhiShThiram. rAjashreShThaM hayashreShThAH sarvataH pR^iShThato.anvayuH.. 7-23-79 (45754) varNairuchchAvachairanyaiH sadashvAnAM prabhadrakAH. sannyavartanta yuddhAya bahavo devarUpiNaH.. 7-23-80 (45755) te yattA bhImasenena sahitAH kA~nchanadhvajAH. pratyadR^ishyanta rAjendra sendrA iva divaukasaH.. 7-23-81 (45756) atyarochata tAnsarvAndhR^iShThadyumnaH samAgatAn. sarvANyati cha sainyAni bhAradvAjo vyarochata.. 7-23-82 (45757) atIva shushubhe tasya dhvajaH kR^iShNAjinottaraH. kamaNDalurmahArAja jAtarUpamayaH shubhaH.. 7-23-83 (45758) dhvajaM tu bhImasenasya vai2DUryamaNilochanam. bhrAjamAnaM mahAsiMhaM rAjantaM dR^iShTavAnaham.. 7-23-84 (45759) dhvajaM tu kururAjasya pANDavasya mahaujasaH. dR^iShTavAnasmi sauvarNaM somaM grahagaNAnvitam.. 7-23-85 (45760) mR^ida~Ngau chAtra vipulau divyau nandopanandakau. yantreNAhanyamAnau cha susvanau harShavardhanau.. 7-23-86 (45761) sharabhaM pR^iShThasauvarNaM nakulasya mahAdhvajam. apashyAma rathetyugraM bhIShayANamavasthitam.. 7-23-87 (45762) haMsastu rAjataH shrImAndhvaje ghaNTApatAkavAn. sahadevasya durdharSho dviShatAM shokavardhanaH.. 7-23-88 (45763) pa~nchAnAM draupadeyAnAM pratimAdhvajabhUShaNam. dharmamArutashakrANAmashvinoshcha mahAtmanoH.. 7-23-89 (45764) abhimanyoH kumArasya shAr~NgapakShI hiraNmayaH. rathe dhvajavaro rAjaMstaptachAmIkarojjvalaH.. 7-23-90 (45765) ghaTotkachasya rAjendra dhvaje gR^idhro vyarochata. ashvAshcha kAmagAstasya rAvaNasya purA yathA.. 7-23-91 (45766) mAhendraM cha dhanurdivyaM dharmarAje yudhiShThire. vAyavyaM bhImasenasya dhanurdivyamabhUnnR^ipa.. 7-23-92 (45767) trailokyarakShaNArthAya brahmaNA sR^iShTamAyudham. taddivyamajaraM chaiva phAlgunArthAya vai dhanuH.. 7-23-93 (45768) vaiShNavaM nakulAyAtha sahadevAya chAshchijam. ghaTotkachAya paulastyaM dhanurdivyaM bhayAmakam.. 7-23-94 (45769) raudramAgneyakauberaM yAmyaM girishameva cha. pa~nchAnAM draupadeyAnAM dhanUratnAni bhArata.. 7-23-95 (45770) raudraM dhanurvaraM shreShThaM lebhe yadrohiNIsutaH. tattuShTaH pradadau rAmaH saubhadrAya mahAtmane.. 7-23-96 (45771) ete chAnye cha bahavo dhvajA hemavibhUShitAH. tatrAdR^ishyanta shUrANAM dviShatAM shokavardhanAH.. 7-23-97 (45772) tadabhUddhvajasambAdhamakApuruShasevitam. droNAnIkaM mahArAja paTe chitramivArpitam.. 7-23-98 (45773) shushruvunArmagotrANi vIrANAM saMyuge tadA. droNamAdravatAM rAjansvayaMvara ivAhave.. .. 7-23-99 (45774) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi saMshaptakavadhaparvaNi dvAdashadivasayuddhe trayoviMsho.adhyAyaH.. 23 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-23-1 rathachihnAni hayAn dhvajAMshchetyarthaH.. 5-23-3 vyAyachChantaM nivartamAnam.. 5-23-4 sitanIlAruNo varNaH sAra~NgasadR^ishashcha saH.. 5-23-5 pArAvatakapotAbhaH sitanIlasamanvayAt.. 5-23-6 shoNaH kokanadachChaviH.. 5-23-7 mallikAkShAnnirmalekShaNAn.. 5-23-8 mahAlalATajadhanaskandhavakShojavA hayAH. dIrghagrIvAyatA hasvamuShkAH kAmbhojakAH smR^itAH. shukapatraparichChadAH shukapatrAbharomANaH.. 5-23-11 dantavarNaH gajadantagaurAH.. 5-23-14 shvetaM lalATamadhyashthaM tArArUpaM hayasya yat. lalAmaM chApi tatprAhurlalAmo.ashvastadanvitaH. sakesarANi romANi suvarNabhAni yasya tu. hariHsa sa varNato.ashvastu pItakausheyasannibhaH.. 5-23-16 pATalipuShpANAM samavarNAH shvetaraktAH.. 5-23-17 virATarAjasya putra uttaram.. 5-23-20 AmapAtranikAshAH malinashvetAH.. 5-23-26 kShamAvanto vinItAH.. 5-23-28 preShyakarAH ichChAnuvidhAyinaH.. 5-23-30 sahasrasomapratimaH somasahasrasamaH saumyatama ityarthaH. tasmin udayendunAmni udayenduparyAye pure shakraprastha eva somasa~NkrandaH somAbhiShavaNaM tasya madhye. tamadhikR^itya tatphenenetyarthastasmAddhotoH.. 5-23-31 shAlapuShpanibhAH raktapItAH.. 5-23-32 yoktrairAbandhaiH. mayUragrIvo marakatavisheShaH.. 5-23-34 pisha~NgAH kapilAH.. 5-23-36 palAlakANDo niShphalavrIhidaNDastadvarNAH.. 5-23-37 rukmapIThena rukmavarNena pIThena pR^iShThenAvakIrNA vyAptAH.. 5-23-40 aruNA avyaktarAgAH.. 5-23-41 dhR^iShTadyumnasya punarvachanaM droNahantR^itvadR^iDhIkaraNArtham.. 5-23-46 babhrukausheyavarNAH pi~NgagaurAH .. 5-23-47 indrAyudhasavarNaiMstrivarNaiH.. 5-23-48 antarikShasavarNA nIlAH .. 5-23-49 karburAshchitrAH.. 5-23-53 mAShavarNAH malinashyAmAH.. 5-23-54 bhadrakAH shobhanashirasaH. sharakANDanibhAH sitagaurAH.. 5-23-55 rAsabhAruNavarNAbhA aruNamalinAH. mUShikaprabhAH malinashvetAH.. 5-23-56 kAlakAH kR^iShNamastakAH.. 5-23-57 chitrAntarA vichitrAvakAshAH. chitrA adbhutadarshanAH.. 5-23-58 chakravAkodarA IShachChvetAH.. 5-23-63 kalAyapuShpavarNAH mishrashyAmAH.. 5-23-64 paTachcharANAmasuravisheShANAM hantAraM samudrAdhipam.. 5-23-69 yodhA yuddhakShamAH. bhadrakArAH shobhanakriyAH. sharadaNDaH sharaprakANDa iva anudaNDiH pR^iShThavaMsho yeShAm. sitagaurapR^iShThA ityarthaH.. 5-23-70 kapATe nagaravisheShe.. 5-23-75 ATarUShakavarNAbhAH iti jha pAThaH. tatra ATarUShakasya vAsakasya kusumaM tadvarNasadR^ishavarNA ityarthaH.. 5-23-78 hayA avahan iti pUrvasmAdanukR^iShyate.. 5-23-79 suvarNavarNA iti pUrvottarAnvayi.. 5-23-86 nandopanandakau nAmnA.. 5-23-23 trayoviMsho.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 024

.. shrIH ..

7.24. adhyAyaH 024

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

dhR^itarAShTreNa putrAnprati shochanapUrvakaM sa~njayamprati yuddhakathanachodanA.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-24-0 (45775) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-24-0x (4318) vyathayeyurime senAM devAnAmapi sa~njaya. Ahave ye nyavartanta vR^ikodaramukhA nR^ipAH.. 7-24-1 (45776) samprayuktaH kilaivAyaM diShTairbhavati pUruShaH. tasminneva cha sarvArthAH pradR^ishyante pR^ithagvidhAH.. 7-24-2 (45777) dIrghaM viproShitaH kAlamaraNye jaTilo.ajinI. aj~nAtashchaiva lokasya vijahAra yudhiShThiraH.. 7-24-3 (45778) sa eva mahatIM senAM samAvartayadAhave. kimanyaddaivasaMyogAnmama putrAbhavAya cha.. 7-24-4 (45779) yukta eva hi bhAgyena dhruvamutpadyate naraH. sa tathA.a.akR^iShyate tena na yathA svayamichChati.. 7-24-5 (45780) dyUtavyasanamAsAdya kleshito hi yudhiShThiraH. sa punarbhAgadheyena sahAyAnupalabdhavAn.. 7-24-6 (45781) arthe me kekayA labdhAH kAshikA kosalAshchaye. chedInAM chArdhamapare mAme va samupAshritAH.. 7-24-7 (45782) pR^ithivI bhUyasI tAta mama pArthasya no tathA. iti mAmabravItsUta mando duryodhanaH purA.. 7-24-8 (45783) tasya senAsamUhasya madhye droNaH surakShitaH. nihataH pArShatenAjau kimanyadbhAgadheyataH.. 7-24-9 (45784) madhye rAj~nAM mahAbAhuM sadA yuddhAbhinandinam. sarvAstrapAragaM droNaM kathaM mR^ityurupeyivAn.. 7-24-10 (45785) samanuprAptakR^ichChro.ahaM mohaM paramamAgataH. bhIShmadroNau hatau shrutvA nAhaM jIvitumutsahe.. 7-24-11 (45786) yanmAM kShattA.abravIttAta prapashyanputragR^iddhinam. duryodhanena tatsarvaM prAptaM sUta mayA saha.. 7-24-12 (45787) nR^ishaMsaM tu paraM tAta tyaktvA duryodhanaM yadi. putrasheShaM chikIrSheyaM kR^itsnaM na maraNaM vrajet.. 7-24-13 (45788) yo hi dharmaM parityajya bhavatyarthaparo naraH. so.asmAchcha hIyate lokAtkShudrabhAvaM cha gachChati.. 7-24-14 (45789) adya chApyasya rAShTrasya kR^itochChedasya sa~njaya. avasheShaM na pashyAmi kakude mR^idite sati.. 7-24-15 (45790) kathaM syAdavasheSho hi dhuryayorabhyatItayoH. yau nityamupajIvAmaH kShamiNau puruSharShabhau.. 7-24-16 (45791) vyaktameva cha me shaMsa yathA yuddhamavartata. ke.ayudhyanke vyapAkurvanke kShudrAH prAdravanbhayAt.. 7-24-17 (45792) dhanu~njayaM cha me shaMsa yadyachchakre ratharShabhaH. tasmAdbhayaM no bhUyiShThaM bhrAtR^ivyAchcha vR^ikodarAt.. 7-24-18 (45793) yathA.asIchcha nivR^itteShu pANDaveyeShu sa~njaya. mama sainyAvasheShasya sannipAtaH sudAruNaH.. 7-24-19 (45794) kathaM cha vo manastAta nivR^itteShvabhavattadA. mAmakAnAM cha ye shUrAH ke kAMstatra nyavArayan.. .. 7-24-20 (45795) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi saMshaptakavadhaparvaNi chaturviMsho.adhyAyaH.. 24 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-24-2 saMprayuktaH sambaddhaH. bhavati utpadyate. tasmin diShTa eva.. 5-24-18 bhrAtR^ivyAdamitrAt.. 5-24-24 chaturvisho.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 025

.. shrIH ..

7.25. adhyAyaH 025

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

dvandvayuddhavarNanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-25-0 (45796) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-25-0x (4319) mahadbhairavamAsInnaH sannivR^itteShu pANDuShu. dR^iShTvA droNaM ChAdyamAnaM tairbhAskaramivAmbudaiH.. 7-25-1 (45797) taishchodbhUtaM rajastIvramavachakre chamUM tava. tato hatamamaMsyAma droNaM dR^iShTipathe hate.. 7-25-2 (45798) tAMstu shUrAnmaheShvAsAnkrUraM karma chikIrShataH. dR^iShTvA duryodhanastUrNaM svasainyaM samachUchudat.. 7-25-3 (45799) yathAshakti yathotsAhaM yathAsatvaM narAdhipAH. vArayadhvaM yathAyogaM pANDavAnAmanIkinIm.. 7-25-4 (45800) tato durmarShaNo bhImamabhyagachChatsutastava. ArAddR^iShTvA kiranbANairichChandoNasya jIvitam.. 7-25-5 (45801) taM bANeravatastAra kruddho mR^ityurivAhave. taM cha bhImo.atudadbANaistadA.a.asIttumulaM mahat.. 7-25-6 (45802) ta IshvarasamAdiShTAH prAj~nAH shUrAH prahAriNaH. rAjyaM mR^ityubhayaM tyaktvA pratyatiShThanparAnyudhi.. 7-25-7 (45803) kR^itavarmA shineH pautraM droNaM prepsuM vishAmpate. paryavArayadAyAntaM shUraM samarashobhinam.. 7-25-8 (45804) taM shaineyaH sharavrAtaiH kruddhaH kruddhamavArayat. kR^itavarmA cha shaineyaM matto mattamiva dvipam.. 7-25-9 (45805) saindhavaH kShatravarmANamAyAntaM nishitaiH sharaiH. ugradhanvA maheShvAsaM yattato droNAdavArayat.. 7-25-10 (45806) kShatravarmA sindhupateshChittvA ketatanakArmuke. nArAchairdashabhiH kruddhaH sarvamarmasvatADayat.. 7-25-11 (45807) athAnyaddhanurAdAya saindhavaH kR^itahastavat. vivyAdha kShatravarmANaM raNe sarvAyasaiH sharaiH.. 7-25-12 (45808) yuyutsuM pANDavArthAya yatamAnaM mahAratham. subAhurbhArataM shUraM yatto droNAdavArayat.. 7-25-13 (45809) subAhoH sadhanurbANAvasyataH parighopamau. yuyutsuH shitapItAbhyAM kShurAbhyAmachChinadbhujau.. 7-25-14 (45810) rAjAnaM pANDavashreShThaM dharmAtmAnaM yudhiShThiram. veleva sAgaraM kShubdhaM madrarAT samavArayat.. 7-25-15 (45811) taM dharmarAjo bahubhirmarmabhidbhiravAkirat. madreshastaM chatuHShaShTyA sharairviddhvA.anadadbhR^isham.. 7-25-16 (45812) tasya nAnadataH ketumuchchakarta cha kArmukam. kShurAbhyAM pANDavo jyeShThastata uchchukrushurjanAH.. 7-25-17 (45813) tathaiva rAjA bAhlIko rAjAnaM drupadaM sharaiH. AdravantaM sahAnIkaH sahAnIkaM nyavArayat.. 7-25-18 (45814) tadyuddhamabhavaddhoraM vR^iddhayoH sahasenayoH. yathA mahAyUthapayordvipayoH samprabhinnayoH.. 7-25-19 (45815) vindAnuvindAvAvantyau virATaM matsyamArchChatAm. sahasainyau sahAnIkaM yathendrAgnI purA balim.. 7-25-20 (45816) tadutpi~njalakaM yuddhamAsIddevAsuropamam. matsyAnAM kekayaiH sArdhamabhItAshvarathadvipam.. 7-25-21 (45817) nAkuliM tu shatAnIkaM bhUtakarmA sabhApatiH. asyantamiShujAlAni yAntaM droNAdavArayat.. 7-25-22 (45818) tato nakuladAyAdastribhirbhallaiH susaMshitaiH. chakre vibAhushirasaM bhUtakarmANamAhave.. 7-25-23 (45819) sutasomaM tu vikrAntamAyAntaM taM sharaughiNam. droNAyAbhimukhaM vIraM sAlvo bANairavArayat.. 7-25-24 (45820) sa tu bhImarathaH sAlvamAshugairAyasaiH shitaiH. ShaDbhiH sAshvaniyantAramanayadyamasAdanam.. 7-25-25 (45821) shrutakIrtiM samAyAntaM mayUrasadR^ishairhayaiH. chitraseno mahArAja tava pautraM nyavArayat.. 7-25-26 (45822) tamArjuniH sharaishchakre pitR^ivyaM jarjharachChavim. sharaishcha draupadIputraM chitrasenaH samAvR^iNot.. 7-25-27 (45823) kirantaM sharajAlAni prabhinnamiva ku~njaram. shrutakarmANamAyAntaM daushshAsaniravArayat.. 7-25-28 (45824) tau pautrau tava durdharShau parasparavadhaiShiNau. pitR^INAmarthasiddhyarthaM chakraturyuddhamuttamam.. 7-25-29 (45825) tiShThantamagre taM dR^iShTvA prativindhyaM mahAhave. drauNirmAnaM pituH kurvanmArgaNaiH samavArayat.. 7-25-30 (45826) taM kruddhaM prativivyAdha prativindhyaH shitaiH sharaiH. siMhalA~NgUlalakShmANaM piturarthe vyavasthitam.. 7-25-31 (45827) pravapanniva bIjAni bIjakAle kR^iShIvalaH. drauNAyanirdraupadeyaM sharavarShairavAkirat.. 7-25-32 (45828) yastu shUratamo rAjannubhayoH senayormataH. taM paTachcharahantAraM lakShmaNaH samavArayat.. 7-25-33 (45829) sa lakShmaNasyeShvasanaM ChittvA lakShma cha bhArata. lakShmaNe sharajAlAni visR^ijanbahvashobhata.. 7-25-34 (45830) tato.abhimanyuH karmANi kurvantaM chitrayodhinam. ArjuniH kR^itinaM shUraM lakShmaNaM samayodhayat.. 7-25-35 (45831) sa samprahArastumulastayorAsInmahAtmanoH. shrotR^INAmIkShitR^INAM cha bhR^ishaM prItivivardhanaH.. 7-25-36 (45832) vikarNastu mahAprAj~no yAj~naseniM shikhaNDinam. paryavArayadAyAntaM yuvAnaM samare yuvA.. 7-25-37 (45833) tatastamiShujAlena yAj~naseniH samAvR^iNot. vidhUya tadbANajAlaM babhau tava suto balI.. 7-25-38 (45834) a~Ngado.abhimukhaM vIramuttamaujasamAhave. droNAyAbhimukhaM yAntaM sharaugheNa nyavArayat.. 7-25-39 (45835) sa samprahArastumulastayoH puruShasiMhayoH. sainikAnAM cha sarveShAM tayoshcha prItivardhanaH.. 7-25-40 (45836) durmukhastu maheShvAso vIraM purujitaM balI. droNAyAbhimukhaM yAntaM vatsadantairavArayat.. 7-25-41 (45837) sa durmukhaM bhruvormadhye nArAchenAbhyatADayat. tasya taddhi babhau vaktraM sanAlamiva pa~Nkajam.. 7-25-42 (45838) karNastu kekayAnbhrAtR^Inpa~ncha lohitakadhvajAn. droNAyAbhimukhaM yAtA~nsharavarShairavArayat.. 7-25-43 (45839) te chainaM bhR^ishasantaptAH sharavarShairavAkiran. sa cha tAMshChAdayAmAsa sharajAlaiH punaH punaH.. 7-25-44 (45840) naiva karNo na te pa~ncha dadR^isharbANasaMvR^itAH. sAshvasUtadhvajarathAH parasparasharAchitAH.. 7-25-45 (45841) putrAste durjayashchaiva jayashcha vijayashcha ha. nIlakAshyajayatsenAMstrayastrInpratyavArayan.. 7-25-46 (45842) tadyuddhamabhavaddhoramIkShitR^iprItivardhanam. siMhavyAghratarakShUNAM yatharkShamahiSharShabhaiH.. 7-25-47 (45843) kShemadhUrtibR^ihantau tu bhrAtarau sAtvataM yudhi. droNAyAbhimukhaM yAntaM sharaistIkShNaistatakShatuH.. 7-25-48 (45844) tayostasya cha tadyuddhamatyadbhutamivAbhavat. siMhasya dvipamukhyAbhyAM prabhinnAbhyAM yathA vane. 7-25-49 (45845) rAjAnaM tu tathAmbaShThamekaM yuddhAbhinandinam. chedirAjaH sharAnasyankruddho droNAdavArayat.. 7-25-50 (45846) tato.ambaShTho.asthibhedinyA nirabhidyachChalAkayA. sa tyaktvA sasharaM chApaM rathAdbhUmimupAgamat.. 7-25-51 (45847) vArdhakShemiM tu vArShNeyaM kR^ipaH shAradvataH sharaiH. akShudraH kShudrakairbANaiH kruddharUpamavArayat.. 7-25-52 (45848) yudhyantau kR^ipavArShNeyau ye.apashyaMshchitrayodhinau. te yuddhAsaktamanaso nAnyaM bubudhire kriyAm.. 7-25-53 (45849) saumadattistu rAjAnaM maNimantamatandritam. paryavArayadAyAntaM yasho droNasya varghayan.. 7-25-54 (45850) sa saumadattestvaritashchitreShvasanaketane. punaH patAkAM sUtaM chachChatraM chApAtayadrathAt.. 7-25-55 (45851) athAplutya rathAttUrNaM yUpaketuramitrahA. sAshvasUtadhvajarathaM taM chakarta varAsinA.. 7-25-56 (45852) rathaM cha svaM samAsthAya dhanurAdAya chAparam. svayaM yachChanhayAnrAjanvyadhamatpANDavIM chamUm.. 7-25-57 (45853) pANDyamindramivAyAntamasurAnprati durjayam. samarthaH sAyakaughena vR^iShaseno nyavArayat.. 7-25-58 (45854) `athAjagAma haiDimbo mahAmAyo mahAbalaH. pitR^INAM hitamanvichChandahankauravavAhinIm'.. 7-25-59 (45855) gadAparighanistriMshapaTTasAyoghanopalaiH. kaDa~NgarairbhushuNDIbhiH prAsaistomarasAyakaiH.. 7-25-60 (45856) musalairmudgaraishchakrairnbhiNDipAlaparashvathaiH. pAMsuvAtAgnisalilairbhasmaloShThatR^iNadrumaiH.. 7-25-61 (45857) Atudanprarujanbha~njannighnanvidrAvayankShipan. senAM vibhIShayannAyAddoNaprepsurghaTotkachaH.. 7-25-62 (45858) taM tu nAnApraharaNairnAnAyuddhavisheShaNaiH. rAkShasaM rAkShasaH kruddhaH samAjaghne hyalambusaH.. 7-25-63 (45859) tayostadabhavadyuddhaM rakShogrAmaNimukhyayoH. tAdR^igyAdR^ikpurAvR^ittaM shambarAmararAjayoH.. 7-25-64 (45860) evaM dvandvashatAnyAsanrathavAraNavAjinAm. padAtInAM cha bhadraM te tava teShAM cha sa~Nkule.. 7-25-65 (45861) naitAdR^isho dR^iShTapUrvaH sa~NgrAmo naiva cha shrutaH. droNasyAbhAvabhAve tu prasaktAnAM parasparam.. 7-25-66 (45862) idaM ghoramidaM chitramidaM raudramiti prabho. tatra yuddhAnyadR^ishyanta pratatAni bahUni cha.. .. 7-25-67 (45863) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi saMshaptakavadhaparvaNi dvAdashadivasayuddhe pa~nchaviMsho.adhyAyaH.. 25 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-25-1 bhIrorbhAvo bhairavaM bhayamiti yAvat.. 5-25-2 dR^iShTipathe gate iti ~Na pAThaH.. 5-25-7 bAhyaM mR^ityubhayaM iti ka.~Na.pAThaH.. 5-25-21 utpi~njalakamatyantAkulam. tadadbhutatamaM yuddhaM iti ka.~Na.pAThaH.. 5-25-22 bhUtakarmA sabhApatiriti dvinAmA.. 5-25-25 bhImaratho rAjabhrAtA.. 5-25-45 dadR^ishuH dadR^ishire.. 5-25-51 shalAkayA sha~NkunA.. 5-25-60 ayoghAnA kaDa~NgarairdaNDaiH.. 5-25-62 Atudan vyathayan. prarujanvidhyan. bha~njan Amardayan. nighnan mArayan. vidrAvayanpalAyayan. kShipanprerayan.. 5-25-66 AbhAvabhAve mAraNe rakShaNe cha.. 5-25-25 pa~nchaviMsho.adhyAyaH.. 25 ..
droNaparva - adhyAya 026

.. shrIH ..

7.26. adhyAyaH 026

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

bhagadattaparAkramavarNanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-26-0 (45864) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-26-0x (4320) teShvevaM sannivR^itteShu pratyudyAteShu bhAgashaH. kathaM yuyudhire pArthA mAmakAshcha tarasvinaH.. 7-26-1 (45865) kimarjunashchApyakarotsaMshaptakabalaM prati. saMshaptakA vA pArthasya kimakurvata sa~njaya.. 7-26-2 (45866) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-26-3x (4321) tathA teShu nivR^itteShu pratyudyAteShu bhAgashaH. svayamabhyadravadbhImaM nAgAnIkena te sutaH.. 7-26-3 (45867) sa nAga iva nAgena govR^iSheNeva govR^iShaH. samAhUtaH svayaM rAj~nA nAgAnIkamupAdravat.. 7-26-4 (45868) sa yuddhakushalaH pArtho bAhuvIryeNa chAnvitaH. abhinatku~njarAnIkamachireNaiva mAriSha.. 7-26-5 (45869) te gajA girisa~NkAshAH kSharantaH sarvato madam. bhImasenasya nArAchairvimukhA vimadIkR^itAH.. 7-26-6 (45870) vidhamedabhrajAlAni yathA vAyuH samuddhataH. vyadhamattAnyanIkAni tathaiva pavanAtmajaH.. 7-26-7 (45871) sa teShu visR^ijanbANAnbhImo nAgeShvashobhata. bhuvaneShviva sarveShu gabhastInudito raviH.. 7-26-8 (45872) te bhImabANAbhihatAH saMsyUtA vibabhurgajAH. gabhastibhirivArkasya vyomni nAnAbalAhakAH.. 7-26-9 (45873) tathA gajAnAM kadanaM kurvANamanilAtmajam. kruddho duryodhano.abhyetya pratyavidhyachChitaiH sharaiH.. 7-26-10 (45874) tataH kShaNena kShitipaM kShatajapratimekShaNaH. kShayaM ninIShurnishitairbhImo vivyAdha patribhiH.. 7-26-11 (45875) sa sharAchitasarvA~NgaH kruddho vivyAdha pANDavam. nArAchairarkarashmyAbhairbhImasenaM smayanniva.. 7-26-12 (45876) tasya nAgaM maNimayaM ratnachitradhvaje sthitam. bhallAbhyAM kArmukaM chaiva kShipraM chichCheda pANDavaH.. 7-26-13 (45877) duryodhanaM pIDyamAnaM dR^iShTvA bhImena mAriSha. chukShobhayiShurabhyAgAda~Ngo mAta~NgamAsthitaH.. 7-26-14 (45878) tamApatantaM nAgendramambudapratimasvanam. kumbhAntare bhImaseno nArAchairArdayadbhR^isham.. 7-26-15 (45879) tasya kAyaM vinirbhidya nyamajjaddharaNItale. tataH papAta dvirado vajrAhata ivAchalaH.. 7-26-16 (45880) tasvAvarjitanAgasya mlechChasyAdhaH patiShyataH. shirashchichCheda bhallena kShiprakArI vR^ikodaraH.. 7-26-17 (45881) tasminnipatite vIre samprAdravata sA chamUH. sambhrAntAshvadviparathA padAtInavamR^idgatI.. 7-26-18 (45882) teShvanIkeShu bhagneShu vidravatsu samantataH. prAgjyotiShastato bhImaM ku~njareNa samAdravat.. 7-26-19 (45883) yena nAgena maghavAnajayaddaityadAnavAn. tadanvayena nAgena bhImasenamupAdravat.. 7-26-20 (45884) sa nAgapravaro bhImaM sahasA samupAdravat. shravaNAbhyAmatho dvAbhyAM saMhatena kareNa cha.. 7-26-21 (45885) vyAvR^ittanayanaH krudvaH pramathanniva pANDavam. vR^ikodararathaM sAshvamavisheShamachUrNayat.. 7-26-22 (45886) padbhyAM bhImo.apyatho dhAvaMstasya gAtreShvalIyata. jAnanna~njalikAvedhaM nApAkrAmata pANDavaH.. 7-26-23 (45887) gAtrAbhyantarago bhUtvA kareNAtADayanmuhuH. lAlayAmAsa taM nAgaM vadhAkA~NkShiNamavyayam.. 7-26-24 (45888) kulAlachakravannAgastadA tUrNamathAbhramat. nAgAyutabalaH shrImAnkAlayAno vR^ikodaram.. 7-26-25 (45889) bhImo.api niShkramya tataH supratIkAgrato.abhavat. bhImaM kareNAvanamya jAnubhyAmabhyatADayat.. 7-26-26 (45890) grIvAyAM veShTayitvainaM sa gajo hantumaihata. karaveShTaM bhImaseno bhramaM dattvA vyamochayat.. 7-26-27 (45891) punargAtrANi nAgasya pravivesha vR^ikodaraH. yAvatpratigajAyAtaM svabalaM pratyavaikShata. bhImopi nAgagAtrebhyo viniHsR^ityApayAjjavAt.. 7-26-28 (45892) tataH sarvasya sainyasya nAdaH samabhavanmahAn. aho dhi~Ngihato bhImaH kujjareNeti mAriSha.. 7-26-29 (45893) tena nAgena santrastA pANDavAnAmanIkinI. sahasA.abhyadravadrAjanyatra tasyau vR^ikodaraH.. 7-26-30 (45894) tato yudhiShThiro rAjA hataM matvA vR^ikodaram. bhagadattaM sapA~nchAlyaH sarvataH samavArayat.. 7-26-31 (45895) taM rathaM rathinAM shreShThAH parivArya parantapAH. avAkira~nsharaistIkShNaiH shatasho.atha sahasrashaH.. 7-26-32 (45896) sa vighAtaM pR^iShatkAnAma~Nkushena samAharan. kShaNena pANDupA~njAlAnvyadhamatparvateshvaraH.. 7-26-33 (45897) tadadbhutamapashyAma bhagadattasya saMyuge. tathA vR^iddhasya charitaM ku~njareNa vishAmpate.. 7-26-34 (45898) tato rAjA dashArNAnAM prAgjyotiShamupAdravat. tiryagyAtena nAgena samadenAshugAminA.. 7-26-35 (45899) tayoryuddhaM samabhavannAgayorbhImarUpayoH. sapakShayoH parvatayoryathA sadrumayoH purA.. 7-26-36 (45900) prAgjyotiShapaternAgaH sannivR^ittyApasR^itya cha. pArshve dashArNAdhipaterbhittvA nAgamapAtayat.. 7-26-37 (45901) tomaraiH sUryarashmyAbhairbhagadatto.atha saptabhiH. jaghAna dviradasthaM taM shatruM prachalitAsanam.. 7-26-38 (45902) vyavachChidya tu rAjAnaM bhagadattaM yudhiShThiraH. rathAnIkena mahatA sarvataH paryavArayat.. 7-26-39 (45903) sa ku~njarastho rathibhiH shushubhe sarvato vR^itaH. parvate vanamadhyastho jvalanniva hutAshanaH.. 7-26-40 (45904) maNDalaM sarvataH shliShTaM rathinAmugradhanvinAm. kiratAM sharavarShANi sa nAgaH paryavartata.. 7-26-41 (45905) tataH prAgjyotiSho rAjA parigR^ihya mahAgajam. preShayAmAsa sahasA yuyudhAnarathaM prati.. 7-26-42 (45906) `ApatantaM cha samprekShya nAgaM sAtvatapu~NgavaH. avidhyatpa~nchabhirbANaiH shitairAshIviShopamaiH'.. 7-26-43 (45907) shineH pautrasya tu rathaM parigR^ihya mahAdvipaH. abhichikShepa vegena yuyudhAnastvapAkramat.. 7-26-44 (45908) bR^ihataH saindhavAnashvAnsamutthApyatha sArathiH. tasthau sAtyakimAsAdya samplutastaM rathaM prati.. 7-26-45 (45909) sa tu labdhvAntaraM nAgastvarito rathamaNDalAt. niShpatansatataM sarvAnparichikShepa pArthivAn.. 7-26-46 (45910) te tvAshugatinA tena trAsyamAnA nararShabhAH. tamekaM dviradaM sa~Nkhye menire shatasho dvipAn.. 7-26-47 (45911) te gajasthena kAlyante bhagadattena pArthivAH. airAvatasthena yathA devarAjena dAnavAH.. 7-26-48 (45912) teShAM pradravatAM bhImaH pA~nchAlAnAmitastataH. gajavAjikR^itaH shabdaH sumahAnsamajAyata.. 7-26-49 (45913) bhagadattena samare kAlyamAneShu pANDuShu. prAgjyotiShamabhikruddhaH punarbhImaH samabhyayAt.. 7-26-50 (45914) tasyAbhidravato vAhAnhastamuktena vAriNA. siktvA vyatrAsayannAgaste pArthasaharaMstataH.. 7-26-51 (45915) tatastamabhyayAttUrNaM ruchiparvA kR^itIsutaH. samaghna~nCharavarSheNa rathasyo.antakasannibhaH.. 7-26-52 (45916) tataH sa ruchiparvANaM shareNAnataparvaNA. suparvA parvatapatirninye vaivasvatakShayam.. 7-26-53 (45917) tasminnipatite vIre saubhadro draupadIsutaH. chekitAno dhR^iShTaketuryayutsushchArdayandvipam.. 7-26-54 (45918) ta enaM sharadhArAbhirdhArAbhiriva toyadAH. siShichurbhairavAnnAdAnvinadanto jighAMsavaH.. 7-26-55 (45919) tataH pArShNya~NkushA~NguShThaiH kR^itinA chodito dvipaH. prasAritakaraH prAyAtstabdhakarNekShaNo drutam.. 7-26-56 (45920) so.adhiShThAya padA vAhAnyuyutsoH sUtamArujat. yuyutsustu rathAdrAjannapAkrAmattvarAnvitaH.. 7-26-57 (45921) tataH pANDavayodhAste nAgarAjaM sharairdrutam. siShichurbhairavAnnAdAnvinadanto jighAMsavaH.. 7-26-58 (45922) putrastu tava sambhrAntaH saubhadrasyApluto ratham. sa ku~njarastho visR^ijanniShUnariShu pArthivaH. babhau rashmInivAdityo bhuvaneShu samutsR^ijan.. 7-26-59 (45923) tamArjunirdvAdashabhiryuyutsurdashabhiH sharaiH. tribhistribhirdraupadeyA dhR^iShTaketushcha vivyadhuH.. 7-26-60 (45924) `chekitAnaH chatuHShaShTyA sottarAyudhikaM punaH. pratyavidhyattataH sarvAnbhagadattastribhistribhiH'.. 7-26-61 (45925) so.atiyatnArpitairbANairAchito dvirado babhau. saMsyUta iva sUryasya rashmibhirjalado mahAn.. 7-26-62 (45926) niyantuH shilpayatnAbhyAM prerito.arisharArditaH. parichikShepa tAnnAgaH sa ripUnsavyadakShiNam.. 7-26-63 (45927) gopAla iva daNDena yathA pashugaNAnvane. sa~NkAlayati tAM senAM bhagadattastathA muhuH.. 7-26-64 (45928) kShipraM shyenAbhiprannAnAM vAyasAnAmiva svanaH. babhUva pANDaveyAnAM bhR^ishaM vidravatAM svanaH.. 7-26-65 (45929) sa nAgarAjaH pravarA~NkushAhataH purA sapakSho.adrivaro yathA nR^ipa. bhayaM tadA ripuShu samAdadhadbhR^ishaM vaNigjanAnAM kShubhito yathA.arNavaH.. 7-26-66 (45930) tato dhvanirdviradarathAshvapArthivai rbhayAdravadbhirjanito.atibhairavaH. kShitiM viyad dyAM vidisho dishastathA samAvR^iNotpArthivasaMyuge tataH.. 7-26-67 (45931) sa tena nAgapravareNa pArthivo bhR^ishaM jagAhe dviShatAmanIkinIm. purA suguptAM vibudhairivAhave virochano devavarUtinImiva.. 7-26-68 (45932) bhR^ishaM vavau jvalanasakho viyadrajaH samAvR^iNonmuhurapi chaiva sainikAn. tamekanAgaM gaNasho yathA gajAn samantato drutamatha menire janAH.. .. 7-26-69 (45933) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi saMshaptakavadhaparvaNi dvAdashadivasayuddhe ShaDviMsho.adhyAyaH.. 26 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-26-17 AvarjitaH patanapravaNo nAgo yasya.. 5-26-21 saMhatena sa~Nkuchitena .. 5-26-35 tiryagyAtena pArshvatogAminA.. 5-26-39 vyavachChidya viddhvA.. 5-26-41 paryavartata bhrAntavAn.. 5-26-45 samutthApya sthirIkR^itya.. 5-26-52 suparvA pArvatIsutaH iti ka.~Na.pAThaH.. 5-26-53 suparvA shobhanA~NgasaMdhiH.. 5-26-67 viyadAkAsham. dyAM svargam.. 5-26-26 ShaDviMsho.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 027

.. shrIH ..

7.27. adhyAyaH 027

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

arjunena saMshaptakAnAM hananam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text
