7-27-0 (45934) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-27-0x (4322) yanmAM pArthasya sa~NgrAme karmANi paripR^ichChasi. tR^ichChR^iNuShva mahAbAho pArtho yadakarodraNe.. 7-27-1 (45935) rajo dR^iShTvA samudbhUtaM shrutvA cha gajaniHsvanam. bhagadatte vikurvANe kaunteyaH kR^iShNamabravIt.. 7-27-2 (45936) yathA prAgjyotiSho rAjA gajena madhusUdana. tvaramANo.abhiniShkrAnto dhruvaM tasyaiSha niHsvanaH.. 7-27-3 (45937) indrAdanavaraH sa~Nkhye gajayAnavishAradaH. prathamo gajaghodhAnAM pR^ithivyAmiti me matiH.. 7-27-4 (45938) sa chApi dviradashreShThaH sadA.apratigajo yudhi. sarvashastrAtigaH sa~Nkhye kR^itakarmA jitaklamaH.. 7-27-5 (45939) sahaH sastranipAtAnAmagnisparshasya chAnagha. sa pANQDavabalaM sarvamadyaiko nAshayiShyati.. 7-27-6 (45940) `siMhanAdaM mahatkR^itvA dhanurbANaravaiH saha. vidrAvyamANaM sampashya hatabhUyiShThanAyakam. dR^iShTvA vinadya sahasA mama senAM pramR^idgati'.. 7-27-7 (45941) na chAvAbhyAmR^ite.anyo.asti shaktastaM pratibAdhitum. tvaramANastato yAhi yataH prAgjyotiShAdhipaH.. 7-27-8 (45942) dR^iptaM sa~Nkhye dvipabalAdvayasA chApi vismitam. adyainaM preShayiShyAmi balahantuH priyAtithim.. 7-27-9 (45943) vachanAdatha kR^iShNastu prayayau savyasAchinaH. dIryate bhagadattena yatra pANDavavAhinI.. 7-27-10 (45944) taM prayAntaM tataH pashchAdAhvayanto mahArathAH. saMshaptakAH samArohansahasrANi chaturdasha.. 7-27-11 (45945) dashaiva tu sahasrANi trigartAnAM mahArathAH. chatvAri cha sahasrANi vAsudevasya chAnugAH.. 7-27-12 (45946) dIryamANAM chamUM dR^iShTvA bhagadattena mAniSha. AhUyamAnasya cha tairabhavaddhR^idayaM dvidhA.. 7-27-13 (45947) kinnu shreyaskaraM karma bhavedadyetyachintayat. iha vA vinivarteyaM gachCheyaM vA yudhiShThiram.. 7-27-14 (45948) tasya buddhyA vichAryaivamarjunasya kurUdvaha. abhavadbhUyasI buddhiH saMshaptakavadhe sthirA.. 7-27-15 (45949) sa sannivR^ittaH sahasA kapipravaraketanaH. eko rathasahasrANi nihantuM vAsavI raNe.. 7-27-16 (45950) sA hi duryodhanasyAsInmatiH karNasya chobhayoH. arjunasya vadhopAye yA vai dvaidhamakalpayat.. 7-27-17 (45951) sa tu dolAyamAno.abUddvaidhIbhAvena pANDavaH. vadhena tu narAgryANAmakarottAM mR^iShA tadA.. 7-27-18 (45952) tataH shatasahasrANi sharANAM nataparvaNAm. asR^ijannarjune rAjansaMshaptakamahArathAH.. 7-27-19 (45953) naiva kuntIsutaH pArtho naiva kR^iShNo janArdanaH. na hayA na ratho rAjandR^ishyante sma sharaishchitAH.. 7-27-20 (45954) tadA mohamanuprAptaH siShvide hi janArdanaH. tatastAnprAyashaH pArtho brahmAstreNa nijaghnivAn.. 7-27-21 (45955) shatashaH pANayashChinnAH seShujyAtalakArmukAH. ketavo vAjinaH sUtA rathinashchApatankShitau.. 7-27-22 (45956) drumAchalAgrAmbudharaiH samakAyAH sukalpitAH. hatArohAH kShitau peturdvipAH pArthasharAhatAH.. 7-27-23 (45957) vipraviddhakuthA nAgAshChinnabhANDAH parAsavaH. sArohAstu raNe peturmathitA mArgaNairbhR^isham.. 7-27-24 (45958) sarShTiprAsAsinakharAH samudgaraparashvathAH. vichChinnA bAhavaH peturnR^iNAM bhallaiH kirITinA.. 7-27-25 (45959) bAlAdityAmbujendUnAM tulyarUpANi mAriSha. saMchChinnAnyarjunasharaiH shirAMsyurvI prapedire.. 7-27-26 (45960) jajvAlAla~NkR^itA senA patribhiH prANibhojanaiH. nAnArUpaistadA.amitrAnkruddhenighnati phalgune.. 7-27-27 (45961) kShobhayantaM tadA senAM dviradaM nalinImiva. dhana~njayaM bhUtagaNAH sAdhusAdhvityapUjayan.. 7-27-28 (45962) dR^iShTvA tatkarma pArthasya vAsavasyeva mAdhavaH. vismayaM paramaM gatvA prA~njalistamuvAcha ha.. 7-27-29 (45963) karmaitatpArtha shakreNa yamena dhanadena cha. duShkaraM samare yatte kR^itamadyeti me matiH.. 7-27-30 (45964) yugapachchaiva sa~NgrAme shatasho.atha sahasrashaH. patitA eva me dR^iShTAH saMshaptakamahArathAH.. 7-27-31 (45965) saMshaptakAMstato hatvA bhUyiShThA ye vyavasthitAH. bhagadattAya yAhIti kR^iShNaM pArtho.abhyanodayat.. .. 7-27-32 (45966) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi saMshaptakavadhaparvaNi dvAdashadivasayuddhe saptaviMsho.adhyAyaH.. 27 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-27-2 vikurvANe vividhAH kriyAH kurvANe.. 5-27-6 sahaH soDhA. pachAdyacha.. 5-27-9 vismitaM rUDhAha~NkAram.. 5-27-11 samArohansaMvR^itavantaH.. 5-27-27 saptaviMsho.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 028

.. shrIH ..

7.28. adhyAyaH 028

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

bhagadattArjunasamAgamaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-28-0 (45967) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-28-0x (4323) yiyAsatastataH kR^iShNaH pArthasyAshvAnmanojavAn. sampraiShIddhemasa~nChannAndroNAnIkAya santvaran.. 7-28-1 (45968) taM prayAntaM kurushreShThaM svAMstrAtuM droNatApitAn. susharmA bhrAtR^ibhiH sArdhaM yuddhArthI pR^iShThato.anvayAt.. 7-28-2 (45969) tataH shvetahayaH kR^iShNamabravIdajita~njayaH. eSha mAM bhrAtR^ibhiH sArdhaM susharmA.a.ahvayate.achyuta.. 7-28-3 (45970) dIryate chottareNaiva tatsainyaM madhusUdana. dvaidhIbhUtaM mano me.adya kR^itaM saMshaptakairidam.. 7-28-4 (45971) kinnu saMshaptakAnhanmi svAnrakShAmyahitArditAn. iti me tvaM mataM vetsi tatra kiM sukR^itaM bhavet.. 7-28-5 (45972) evamuktastu dAshArhaH syandanaM pratyavartayat. yena trigartAdhipatiH pANDavaM samupAhvayat.. 7-28-6 (45973) tato.arjunaH susharmANaM viddhvA saptabhirAshugaiH. dhvajaM dhanushchAsya tathA kShurAbhyAM samakR^intata.. 7-28-7 (45974) trigartAdhipateshchApi bhrAtaraM Sha~NbhirAshugaiH. sAshvaM sasUtaM tvaritaH pArthaH praiShIdyamakShayam.. 7-28-8 (45975) tato bhujagasa~NkAshAM susharmA shaktimAyasIm. chikShepArjunamAdishya vAsudevAya tomaram.. 7-28-9 (45976) shaktiM tribhiH sharaishChittvA tomaraM tribhirarjunaH. susharmANaM sharavrAtairmohayitvA nyavartayat.. 7-28-10 (45977) taM vAsavamivAyAntaM bhUrivarShaM sharaughiNam. rAjaMstAvakasainyAnAM nograM kashchidavArayat.. 7-28-11 (45978) tato dhana~njayo bANaiH sarvAneva mahArathAn. AyAdvinighnankauravyAndahankakShamivAnalaH.. 7-28-12 (45979) tasya vegamasahyaM taM kuntIputrasya dhImataH. nAshaknuvaMste saMsoDhuM sparshamagneriva prajAH.. 7-28-13 (45980) saMveShTayannanIkAni sharavarSheNa pANDavaH. suparNa iva nAgendraM prAyAtprAgjyotiShaM prati.. 7-28-14 (45981) yattadAnAmayajjiShNurbharatAnAmapApinAm. dhanuH kShemakaraM sa~Nkhye dviShatAmashruvardhanam.. 7-28-15 (45982) tadeva tava putrasya rAjandurdyUtadevinaH. kR^ite kShatravinAshAya dhanurAyachChadarjunaH.. 7-28-16 (45983) tathA vikShobhyamANA sA pArthena tava vAhinI. vyashIryata mahArAja naurivAsAdya parvatam.. 7-28-17 (45984) tato dashasahasrANi nyavartanta dhanuShmatAm. matiM kR^itvA raNe krUrAM vIrA jayaparAjaye.. 7-28-18 (45985) vyapetahR^idayatrAsA AvavrustaM mahArathAH. ArchChatpArtho guruM bhAraM sarvabhArasaho yudhi.. 7-28-19 (45986) yathA nalavanaM kruddhaH prabhinnaH ShaShTihAyanaH. mR^idgIyAttadvadAyastaH pArtho.amR^idgAchchamUM tava.. 7-28-20 (45987) tasminpramathite sainye bhagadatto narAdhipaH. tena nAgena sahasA dhana~njayamupAdravat.. 7-28-21 (45988) taM rathena naravyAghraH pratyagR^ihNAddhana~njayaH. sa sannipAtastumulo babhUva naranAgayoH.. 7-28-22 (45989) kalpitAbhyAM yathAshAstraM rathena cha gajena cha. sa~NgrAme cheraturvIrau bhagadattadhana~njayau.. 7-28-23 (45990) tato jImUtasa~NkAshAnnAgAdindra iva prabhuH. abhyavarShachCharaugheNa bhagadatto dhana~njayam.. 7-28-24 (45991) sa chApi sharavarShaM taM sharavarSheNa vAsivaH. aprAptameva chichCheda bhagadattasya vIryavAn.. 7-28-25 (45992) tataH prAgjyotiSho rAjA sharavarShe nivArite. saMraktanayano roShAtpArthaM punaravAkirat.. 7-28-26 (45993) sa tathA sharavarSheNa pArthaM samabhihatya vai. chodayAmAsa taM nAgaM vadhAyAchyutapArthayoH.. 7-28-27 (45994) tamApatantaM dviradaM dR^iShTvA kruddhamivAntakam. chakre.apasavyaM tvaritaH syandanena janArdanaH.. 7-28-28 (45995) samprAptamapi neyeSha parAvR^ittaM mahAdvipam. sArohaM mR^ityusAtkartuM smarandharmaM dhana~njayaH.. 7-28-29 (45996) sa tu nAgo dviparathAnhayAMshchAmR^idya mAriSha. prAhiNonmR^ityulokAya tataH kruddho dhana~njayaH.. .. 7-28-30 (45997) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi saMshaptakavadhaparvaNi dvAdashadivasayuddhe aShTAviMsho.adhyAyaH.. 28 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-28-16 AyachChadgR^ihItavAn. yadevArjunasya dhanurbharatAnAM kShemakaramAsIttadeva tvatputranimittaM kShatrakShayakaramabhavaditi vAkyArthaH 5-28-28 aShTAviMsho.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 029

.. shrIH ..

7.29. adhyAyaH 029

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

arjunena sagajasya bhagadattasya vadhaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-29-0 (45998) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-29-0x (4324) tathA kruddhaH kimakarodbhagadattasya pANDavaH. prAgjyotiSho vA pArthasya tanme shaMsa yathAtatham.. 7-29-1 (45999) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-29-2x (4325) prAgjyotiSheNa saMsaktAvubhau dAshArhapANDavau. mR^ityudaMShTrAntikaM prAptau sarvabhUtAni menire.. 7-29-2 (46000) tathA tu sharavarShANi pAtayatyanishaM prabho. gajaskandhAnmahArAja kR^iShNayoH syandanasthayoH.. 7-29-3 (46001) atha kArShNAyasairbANaiH pUrNakArmukaniHsR^itaiH. avidhyaddevakIputraM hemapu~NkhaiH shilAshitaiH.. 7-29-4 (46002) agnisparshasamAstIkShNA bhagadattena choditAH. nirbhidya devakIputraM kShitiM jagmuH suvAsasaH.. 7-29-5 (46003) tasya pArtho dhanushChittvA parivAraM nihatya cha. lAlayanniva rAjAnaM bhagadattamayodhayat.. 7-29-6 (46004) so.arkarashminibhAMstIkShNAMstomarAnvai chaturdasha. apreShayatsavyasAchI dvidhaikaikamathAchChinat.. 7-29-7 (46005) tato nAgasya tadvarma vyadhamatpAkashAsaniH. sharajAlena mahatA tadvyashIryata bhUtale.. 7-29-8 (46006) shIrNavarmA sa tu gajaH sharaiH subhR^ishamarditaH. babhau dhArAnipAtAkto vyabhraH parvatarADiva.. 7-29-9 (46007) tataH prAgjyotiShaH shaktiM hemadaNDAmayasmayIm. vyasR^ijadvAsudevAya dvidhA tAmarjuno.achChinat.. 7-29-10 (46008) tatashChatraM dhvajaM chaiva chChittvA rAj~no.arjunaH sharaiH. vivyAdha dashabhistUrNamutsmayanparvateshvaram.. 7-29-11 (46009) so.atividdho.arjunasharaiH supu~NkhaiH ka~NkapatribhiH. bhagadattastataH kruddhaH pANDavasya janAdhipaH.. 7-29-12 (46010) vyasR^ijattomarAnmUrdhni shvetAshvasyonnAda cha. tairarjunasya samare kirITaM parivartitam.. 7-29-13 (46011) parivR^ittaM kirITaM tadyamayanneva pANDavaH. sudR^iShTaH kriyatAM loka iti rAjAnamabravIt.. 7-29-14 (46012) evamuktastu sa~NkruddhaH sharavarSheNa pANDavam. abhyavarShatsa govindaM dhanurAdAya bhAsvaram.. 7-29-15 (46013) tasya pArtho dhanushChittvA tUNIrAnsannikR^itya cha. tvaramANo dvisaptatyA sarvamarmasvatADayat.. 7-29-16 (46014) viddhastato.ativyathito vaiShNavAstramudIrayan. abhimantryA~NkushaM kruddho vyasR^ijatpANDavorasi.. 7-29-17 (46015) visR^iShTaM bhagadattena tadastraM sarvaghAti vai. urasA pratijagrAha pArthaM sa~nChAdya keshavaH.. 7-29-18 (46016) vaijayantyabhavanmAlA tadastraM keshavorasi. padmakoshavichitrA sA sarvartukusumotkarA.. 7-29-19 (46017) jvalanArkenduvarNAbhA pAvakojjvalapallavA. tayA padmapalAshinyA vAtakampitapatrayA.. 7-29-20 (46018) shushubhe.abhyadhikaM shauriratasIpuShpasannibhaH. tato.arjunaH klAntamanAH keshavaM pratyabhAShata.. 7-29-21 (46019) ayudhyamAnasturagAnsaMyantAsmi janArdana. ityuktvA puNDarIkAkSha pratij~nAM svAM na rakShasi.. 7-29-22 (46020) yadyahaM vyasanI vA syAmashakto vA nivAraNe. tatastvayaivaM kAryaM syAnna tu kAryaM mayi sthite.. 7-29-23 (46021) sabANaH sadhanushchAhaM sasuhAsuramAnuShAn. shakto lokAnimA~njetuM tachchApi viditaM tava.. 7-29-24 (46022) tato.arjunaM vAsudevaH pratyuvAchAryavadvachaH. shR^iNu guhyamidaM pArtha purAvR^ittaM yathA.anagha.. 7-29-25 (46023) `yeyaM bhUtadharA devI sarvabhUtadharA dharA. sakAmA lokakartAraM nArAyaNamupasthitA.. 7-29-26 (46024) sa sa~Ngatya tayA sArdhaM prItastasyA varaM dadau. sA vavre viShNusadR^ishaM putramastraM cha vaiShNavam.. 7-29-27 (46025) babhUva cha sutastasyA narako nAma vishrutaH. astraM cha vaiShNavaM tasmai dadau nArAyaNaH svayam.. 7-29-28 (46026) tadevaM narakasyAsIdastraM sarvAhitAntakam. tasmAtprAgjyotiShaM prAptaM sarvashastravighAtanam.. 7-29-29 (46027) nAsyAvadhyo.asti loke.asminmadanyaH kashchidarjuna. tasmAnmayA kR^itaM hyetanmA bhUtte buddhiranyathA.. 7-29-30 (46028) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-29-31x (4326) anunIya tu dAshArhaH pANDavaM tvarito.abravIt. jahi prAgjyotiShaM kShipraM vAkyasheShaM cha me shR^iNu'.. 7-29-31 (46029) chaturmUrtirahaM shashvallokatrANArthamudyataH. AtmAnaM pravibhajyeha lokAnAM hitamAdadhe.. 7-29-32 (46030) ekA mUrtistapashcharyAM kurute me bhuvi sthitA. aparA pashyati jagatkurvANaM sAdhvasAdhunI.. 7-29-33 (46031) aparA kurute karma mAnuShaM lokamAshritA. shete chaturthIM tvaparA nidrAM varShasahasrikIm.. 7-29-34 (46032) yA.asau varShasahasrAnte mUrtiruttiShThate mama. varArhebhyo varA~nshreShThAMstasminkAle dadAti sA.. 7-29-35 (46033) taM tu kAlamanuprAptaM viditvA pR^ithivI tadA. ayAchata varaM yanmAM narakArthAya tachChR^iNu.. 7-29-36 (46034) devAnAM dAnavAnAM cha avadhyastanayo.astu me. upeto vaiShNavAstreNa tanme tvaM dAtumarhasi.. 7-29-37 (46035) evaM varamahaM shrutvA jagatyAstanaye tadA. amoghamastraM prAyachChaM vaiShNavaM paramaM purA.. 7-29-38 (46036) avochaM chaitadastraM vai hyamoghaM bhavatu kShame. narakasyAbhirakShArthaM nainaM kashchidvadhiShyati.. 7-29-39 (46037) anenAstreNa te guptaH sutaH parabalArdanaH. bhaviShyati durAdharShaH sarvalokeShu sarvadA.. 7-29-40 (46038) tathetyuktvA gatA devI kR^itakAmA manasvinI. sa chApyAsIddurAdharSho narakaH shatrutApanaH.. 7-29-41 (46039) tasmAtprAgjyotiShaM prAptaM tadastraM pArtha mAmakam. nAsyAvadhyo.asti lokeShu sendrarudreShu mAriSha.. 7-29-42 (46040) tanmayA tvatkR^ite chaitadanyathaivopanirmitam. viyuktaM paramAstreNa jahi pArtha mahAsuram.. 7-29-43 (46041) `avadhyo.ayaM mahAstreNa bhagadattaH surAsuraiH'. vairiNaM jahi durdharShaM bhagadattaM suradviSham. yathA.ahaM jaghnivAnpUrvaM hitArthaM narakaM tathA.. 7-29-44 (46042) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-29-45x (4327) evamuktastadA pArthaH keshavena mahAtmanA. bhagadattaM shitairbANaiH sahasA samavAkirat.. 7-29-45 (46043) tataH pArtho mahAbAhurasambhrAnto mahAmanAH. kumbhayorantare nAgaM nArAchena samArpayat.. 7-29-46 (46044) sa samAsAdya taM nAgaM bANo vajra ivAchalam. abhyagAtsaha pu~Nkhena valmIkamiva pannagaH.. 7-29-47 (46045) sa karI bhagadattena preryamANo muhurmuhuH. na karoti vachastasya daridrasyeva yoShitA.. 7-29-48 (46046) sa tu viShTabhya gAtrANi dantAbhyAmavaniM yayau. nadannArtasvanaM prANAnutsasarja mahAdvipaH.. 7-29-49 (46047) tato gANDIvadhanvAnamabhyabhAShata keshavaH. ayaM mahattaraH pArtha palitena samAvR^itaH.. 7-29-50 (46048) valIsa~nChannanayanaH shUraH paramadrurjayaH. akShNorunmIlanArthAya baddhapaTTo hyasau nR^ipaH.. 7-29-51 (46049) devavAkyAtprachichCheda shareNa bhR^ishamarjunaH. ChinnamAtreM.ashuke tasminruddhanetro babhUva saH.. 7-29-52 (46050) tamomayaM jaganmene bhagadattaH pratApavAn. tatashchandrArdhabimbena bANena nataparvaNA.. 7-29-53 (46051) bibheda hR^idayaM rAj~no bhagadattasya pANDavaH. sa bhinnahR^idayo rAjA bhagadattaH kirITinA.. 7-29-54 (46052) sharAsanaM sharAMshchaiva gatAsuH pramumocha ha. shirasastasya vibhraShTaM papAta cha varAMshukam. nAlatADanavibhraShTaM palAshaM nalinAdiva.. 7-29-55 (46053) sa hemamAlI tapanIyabhANDA tpapAta nAgAdgirisannikAshAt. supuShpito mArutavegabhagno mahIdharAgrAdiva karNikAraH.. 7-29-56 (46054) nihatya taM narapatimindravikramaM sasvAyamindrasya tadaindrirAhave. tato.aparAMstava jayakA~NkShiNo narAn babha~nja vAyurbalavAndrumAniva.. .. 7-29-57 (46055) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi saMshaptakavadhaparvaNi dvAdashadivasayuddhe ekonatriMsho.adhyAyaH.. 29 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-29-33 ekA mUrtirbadarikAshrame nArAyaNarUpA. aSharA paramAtmarUpA .. 5-29-34 aparA rAmakR^iShNAdirUpA. aparA jalashAyinI.. 5-29-48 yoShitA bhAgurimate TAp.. 5-29-29 ekonatriMsho.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 030

.. shrIH ..

7.30. adhyAyaH 030

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

arjunayuddhavarNanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-30-0 (46056) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-30-0x (4328) priyamindrasya satataM sakhAyamamitaujasam. hatvA prAgjyotiShaM pArthaH pradakShiNamavartata.. 7-30-1 (46057) tato gAndhArarAjasya sutau parapura~njayau. ardetAmarjunaM sa~Nkhye bhrAtarau vR^iShakAchalau.. 7-30-2 (46058) tau sametyArjunaM vIrau puraH pashchAchcha dhanvitau. avidhyetAM mahAvegairnishitairAshugairbhR^isham.. 7-30-3 (46059) vR^iShakasya hayAnsUtaM dhanushChatraM rathaM dhvajam. tilasho vyadhamatpArthaH saubalasya shitaiH sharaiH.. 7-30-4 (46060) tato.arjunaH sharavrAtairjAnApraharaNairapi. gAndhArAnAkulAMshchakre saubalapramukhAnpunaH.. 7-30-5 (46061) tataH pa~nchashatAnvIrAngAndhArAnudyatAyudhAn. prAhiNonmR^ityulokAya kruddho bANairdhana~njayaH.. 7-30-6 (46062) hatAshvAttu rathAttUrNamavatIrya mahAbhujaH. Aruroha rathaM bhrAturanyashcha dhanurAdade.. 7-30-7 (46063) tAvekarathamArUDhau bhrAtarau vR^iShakAchalau. sharavarSheNa bIbhatsumavidhyetAM muhurmuhuH.. 7-30-8 (46064) syAlau tava mahAtmAnau rAjAnau vR^iShakAchalau. bhR^ishaM vijaghnatuH pArthamindraM vR^itrabalAviva.. 7-30-9 (46065) labdhalakShau tu gAndhArAvahatAM pANDavaM punaH. naidAghavArShikau mAsau lokaM gharmAMshubhiryathA.. 7-30-10 (46066) tau rathasthau naravyAghrau rAjAnau vR^iShakAchalau. saMshchiShTA~Ngau sthitau rAja~njaghAnaikeShuNA.arjunaH.. 7-30-11 (46067) tau rathAtsiMhasaMkAshau lohitAkShau mahAbhujau. rAjansampetaturvIrau sodaryAvekalakShaNau.. 7-30-12 (46068) tayorbhUmiM gatau dehau rathAdbandhujanapriyau. yasho dashaH dishaH puNyaM gamayitvA vyavasthitau.. 7-30-13 (46069) dR^iShTvA vinihatau sa~Nkhye mAtulAvapalAyinau. bhR^ishaM mumuchurashrUNi putrAstava vishAMpate.. 7-30-14 (46070) nihatau bhrAtarau dR^iShTvA mAyAshatavishAradaH. kR^iShNau sammohanmAyAM vidadhe shakunistataH.. 7-30-15 (46071) laguDAyoguDAshmAnaH shataghnyashcha sashaktayaH. gadAparighanistriMshashUlamudgarapaTTasAH.. 7-30-16 (46072) sakampanarShTinakharA musalAni parashvathAH. kShurAH kShurapranAlIkA vatsadantAsthisandhayaH.. 7-30-17 (46073) chakrANi vishikhAH prAsA vividhAnyAyudhAni cha. prapetuH shatasho digbhyaH pradigbhyashchArjunaM prati.. 7-30-18 (46074) kharoShTramahiShAH siMhA vyAghrAH sR^imarachitrakAH. R^ikShAH sAlAvR^ikA gR^idhrAH kapayashcha sarIsR^ipAH.. 7-30-19 (46075) vividhAni cha rakShAMsi kShudhitAnyarjunaM prati. sa~NkruddhAnyabhyadhAvanta vividhAni vayAMsi cha.. 7-30-20 (46076) tato divyAstravichChUraH kuntIputro dhana~njayaH. visR^ijanniShujAlAni sahasA tAnyatADayat.. 7-30-21 (46077) te hanyamAnAH shUreNa pravaraiH sAyakairdR^iDhaiH. viruvanto mahArAvAnvineshuH sarvato hatAH.. 7-30-22 (46078) tatastamaH prAdurabhUdarjunasya rathaM prati. tasmAchcha tamaso vachAH krUrAH pArthamabhartsayan.. 7-30-23 (46079) tattamo bhairavaM ghoraM bhayakartR^i mahAhave. uttamAstreNa mahatA jyautiSheNArjuno.avadhIt.. 7-30-24 (46080) hate tasmi~njalaughAstu prAdurAsanbhayAnakAH. ambhasastasya nAshArthamAdityAstramathArjunaH. prAyu~NktAmbhastatastena prAyasho.astreNa shoShitam.. 7-30-25 (46081) evaM bahuvidhA mAyAH saubalasya kR^itAH kR^itAH. jaghAnAstrabalenAshu prahasannarjuno.abravIt.. 7-30-26 (46082) `durdyUtadevingAndhAre nAkShAnkShipati gANDivam. jvalitAnnishitAMstIkShNA~nsharAnkShipatigANDivaM'.. 7-30-27 (46083) tadA hatAsu mAyAsu trasto.arjunasharAhataH. apAyA~njavanairashvaiH shakuniH prAkR^ito yathA.. 7-30-28 (46084) tato.arjuno.astravichChaighryaM darshayannAtmano.ariShu. abhyavarShachCharaudheNa kauravANAmanIkinIm.. 7-30-29 (46085) sA hanyamAnA pArthena tava putrasya vAhinI. dvaidhIbhUtA mahArAja ga~NgevAsAdya parvatam.. 7-30-30 (46086) droNamevAnvapadyanta kechittatra nararShabhAH. kechidduryodhanaM rAjannardyamAnAH kirITinA.. 7-30-31 (46087) nApashyAma tatastvenaM sainye vai rajasAvR^ite. gANDIvasya cha nirghoShaH shruto dakShiNato mayA.. 7-30-32 (46088) sha~NkhadundubhinirghoShaM vAditrANAM cha niHsvanam. gANDIvasya tu nirghoSho vyatikramyAspR^ishaddivam.. 7-30-33 (46089) tataH punardakShiNataH sa~NgrAmashchitrayodhinAm. suyuddhaM chArjunasyAsIdahaM droNamanviyAm.. 7-30-34 (46090) yaudhiShThirAbhyanIkAni praharanti tatastataH. nAnAvidhAnyanIkAni putrANAM tava bhArata. arjuno vyadhamatkAle divIvAbhrANi mArutaH.. 7-30-35 (46091) taM vAsavamivAyAntaM bhUrivarShaM sharaughiNam. maheShvAsA naravyAghrA nograM kechidavArayan.. 7-30-36 (46092) te hanyamAnAH pArthena tvadIyA vyathitA bhR^isham. svAneva bahavo jaghnurvidravantastatastataH.. 7-30-37 (46093) te.arjunena sharA muktAH ka~NkapatrAstanuchChidaH. shalabhA iva sampetuH saMvR^iNvAnA disho dasha.. 7-30-38 (46094) turagaM rathinaM nAgaM padAtimapi mAriSha. vinirbhidya kShitiM jagmurvalmIkamiva pannagAH.. 7-30-39 (46095) na cha dvitIyaM vyasR^ijatku~njarAshvanareShu saH. pR^ithagekasharArugNA nipetuste gatAsavaH.. 7-30-40 (46096) hatairmanuShyaurdviradaishcha sarvataH sharAbhisR^iShTaishcha hayairnipAtitaiH. tadA.ashvagomAyubalAbhinAditaM vichitramAyodhashiro babhUva tat.. 7-30-41 (46097) pitA sutaM tyajati suhR^idvaraM suhR^it tathaiva putraH pitaraM sharAturaH. svarakShaNe kR^itamatayastadA janA satyajanti vAhAnapi pArthapIDitAH.. .. 7-30-42 (46098) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi droNAbhiShekaparvaNi

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-30-10 varShashabdo.ayamR^ituvachanaH. nidAghartusambandhinAvityarthaH. gharmAMshubhistIkShNakiraNaiH. lokaM gharmombubhiryathA iti ka.~Na.pAThaH.. 5-30-17 kampanayaShTyaH. kShurA kShurAkR^itiphalakAH. kShuraprAstUgramadhyaphalakAH. nAlIkA nalikayA kShepyAH. vatsadantA gopotakadantAkAraphalakAH. asthisandhayo.asthimayaphalakAH.. 5-30-18 vishikhAH phaNitrAkAraphalakAH.. 5-30-19 sUmarA gavayAH. chitrako vyAghrabhedaH. sAlAvR^ikAH shvAnaH.. 5-30-32 enamarjunam.. 5-30-41 sharAbhisR^iShTairbANAbhihataiH. Ayodhashiro raNA~NgaNam.. 5-30-30 triMsho.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 031

.. shrIH ..

7.31. adhyAyaH 031

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

ashvatthAmnA nIlasya vadhaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-31-0 (46099) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-31-0x (4329) teShvanIkeShu bhagneShu pANDuputreNa sa~njaya. 5-31-1bchalitAnAM drutAnAM cha kathamAsInmanAMsi vaH.. 7-31-1 (46100) AnIkAnAM prabhagnAnAmavasthAnamapashyatAm. duShkaraM pratisandhAnaM tanmamAchakShva sa~njaya.. 7-31-2 (46101) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-31-3x (4330) tathApi tava putrasya priyakAmA vishAmpate. yashaH pravIrA lokeShu rakShanto droNamanvayuH.. 7-31-3 (46102) samudyateShu chAstreShu samprApte cha yudhiShThire. akurvannAryakarmANi bhairave satyabhItavat.. 7-31-4 (46103) antaraM bhImasenasya prApatannamitaujasaH. sAtyakeshchaiva vIrasya dhR^iShTadyumnasya vA vibho.. 7-31-5 (46104) droNaM droNamiti krUrAH pA~nchAlAH samachodayan. mA droNamiti putrAste kurUnsarvAnachodayan.. 7-31-6 (46105) droNaM droNamiti hyeke mA droNamiti chApare. kurUNAM pANDavAnAM cha droNadyUtamavateta.. 7-31-7 (46106) yaMyaM pramathate droNaH pA~nchAlAnAM rathavrajam. tatratatra tu pA~nchAlyo dhR^iShTadyumno.abhyavartata.. 7-31-8 (46107) teShAM bhAgyaviparyAsaiH sa~NgrAme bhairave sati. vIrAH samAsadanvIrAnkurvanto bhairavaM ravam.. 7-31-9 (46108) akampanIyAH shatrUNAM babhUvustatra pANDavAH. akampayannanIkAni smarantaH kleshamAtmanaH.. 7-31-10 (46109) te tvamarShavashaM prAptA hImantaH satvachoditAH. tyaktvA prANAnnyavartanta ghnanto droNaM mahAhave.. 7-31-11 (46110) ayAsamiva sampAtaH shilAnAmiva chAbhavat. dIvyatAM tumule yuddhe prANairamitatejasAm.. 7-31-12 (46111) nAnusmaranti sa~NgrAmamapi vR^iddhAstathAvidham. ye pUrvadevairdevAnAmapashyanyuddhamadbhutam.. 7-31-13 (46112) prAkampateva pR^ithivI tasminvIrAvasAdane. nivartatA balaughena mahatA bhArapIDitA.. 7-31-14 (46113) ghUrNato.api balaughasya divaM stabdhveva niHsvanaH. ajAtashatrostatsainyamAvivesha subhairavaH.. 7-31-15 (46114) samAsAdya tu pANDUnAmanIkAni sahasrashaH. droNena charatA sa~Nkhye prabhagnAni shitaiH sharaiH.. 7-31-16 (46115) teShu pramathyamAneShu droNenAdbhutakarmaNA. paryavarAyadAsAdya droNaM senApatiH svayam.. 7-31-17 (46116) tadadbhutamabhUdyuddhaM droNapA~nchAlayostathA. naiva tasyopamA kAchiditi me nishchitA matiH.. 7-31-18 (46117) tato nIlo.analaprakhyo dadAha kuruvAhinIm. sharaskuli~NgashchApArchirdihankakShamivAnalaH.. 7-31-19 (46118) taM dahantamanIkAni droNaputraH pratApavAn. pUrvAbhibhAShI sushlakShNaM smayamAno.abhyabhAShata.. 7-31-20 (46119) nIla kiM bahubhirdagdhaistava yodhaiH sarArchiShA. mayaikena hi yudhyasva kruddhaH prahara chAshu mAm.. 7-31-21 (46120) taM padmanikarAkAraM padmapatranibhekShaNam. vyAkoshapadmAbhamukho nIlo vivyAdha sAyakaiH.. 7-31-22 (46121) tenApi viddhaH sahasA drauNirbhallaiH shitaistribhiH. dhanurdhvajaM cha chChatraM cha dviShataH sannyakR^intata.. 7-31-23 (46122) sa plutaH syandanAttasmAnnIlashcharmavarAsibhR^it. drauNAyaneH shiraH kAyAddhartumaichChatpatattrivat.. 7-31-24 (46123) tasyodyatAseH sunasaM shiraH kAyAtsakuNDalam. bhallenApAharaddrauNiH smayamAna ivAnagha.. 7-31-25 (46124) sampUrNachandrAbhamukhaH padmapatranibhekShaNaH. prAMshurutpalapatrAbho nihato nyapatadbhuvi.. 7-31-26 (46125) tataH pravivyathe senA pANDavI bhR^ishamAkulA. AchAryaputreNa hate nIle jvalitatejasi.. 7-31-27 (46126) achintayaMshcha te sarve pANDavAnAM mahArathAH. kathaM no vAsavistrAyAchChatrubhya iti mAriSha.. 7-31-28 (46127) dakShiNena tu senAyAH kurute kadanaM balI. saMshaptakAvasheShasya nArAyaNabalasya cha.. .. 7-31-29 (46128) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi saMshaptakavadhaparvaNi dvAdashadivasayuddhe ekatriMsho.adhyAyaH.. 31 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-31-5 antaraM Chidram. prApatansR^itavantaH.. 5-31-7 pANDavAnyAma ityeva mA droNamiti chApare iti kaH pAThaH.. 5-31-9 samAsadanpratigatavantaH.. 5-31-11 nyavartanta bhayebhyo nivR^ittAH. satyachoditAH iti ka.gha.~Na. pAThaH.. 5-31-31 ekatriMsho.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 032

.. shrIH ..

7.32. adhyAyaH 032

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sa~NkulayuddhavarNanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-32-0 (46129) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-32-0x (4331) pratighAtaM tu sainyasya nAmR^iShyata vR^ikodaraH. so.abhyAhanadguruM ShaShTyA karNaM cha dashabhiH sharaiH.. 7-32-1 (46130) tasya droNaH shitairbANaistIkShNadhArairajihmagaiH. jIvitAntamabhiprepsurmarmaNyAshu jaghAna ha.. 7-32-2 (46131) AnantaryamabhiprepsuH ShaDviMshatyA shamArpayat. karNo dvAdashabhirbANairashvatthAmA cha saptabhiH.. 7-32-3 (46132) Sha~Nbhirduryodhano rAjA tata enamathAkirat. bhImaseno.api tAnsarvAnpratyavidhyanmahAbalaH.. 7-32-4 (46133) droNaM pa~nchAshateShUNAM karNaM cha dashabhiH sharaiH. daryodhanaM dvAdashabhirdauNimaShTAbhirAshugaiH.. 7-32-5 (46134) ArAvaM tumulaM kurvannabhyavartata tAnraNe. tasminsantyati prAmAnmR^ityusAdhAraNIkR^ite.. 7-32-6 (46135) ajAtashatrustAnyodhAnbhImaM trAtetyachodayat. te yayurbhImasenasya samIpamamitaujasaH.. 7-32-7 (46136) yuyudhAnaprabhR^itayo mAdrIputrau cha pANDavau. te sametya susaMrabdhAH sahitAH puruSharShabhAH.. 7-32-8 (46137) maheShvAsavarairguptA droNAnIkaM bibhitsavaH. samApeturmahAvIryA bhImaprabhR^itayo rathAH.. 7-32-9 (46138) tAnpratyagR^ihNAdavyagro droNo.api rathinAM varaH. mahArathAnatibalAnvIrAnsamarayodhinaH.. 7-32-10 (46139) bAhyaM mR^ityubhayaM kR^itvA tAvakAnpANDavA yayuH. sAdinaH sAdino.abyaghnaMstathaiva rathino rathAn.. 7-32-11 (46140) asishaktyR^iShTisa~NghAtairyuddhamAsItparashvathaiH. prakR^iShTamasiyuddhaM cha babhUva kaTukodayam.. 7-32-12 (46141) ku~njarANAM cha sampAte yuddhamAsItsudAruNam. apatatku~njarAdanyo hayAdanyastvavAkshirAH.. 7-32-13 (46142) naro bANavinirbhinno rathAdanyashcha mAriSha. tatrAnyasya cha samparde patitasya vivarmaNaH.. 7-32-14 (46143) shiraH pradhvaMsayAmAsa vakShasyAkramya ku~njaraH. aparAMshchApare.amR^idranvAraNAH patitAnnarAn.. 7-32-15 (46144) viShANaishchAvaniM gatvA vyabhindanrathino bahUn. narAntraiH kechidapare viShANAlagnasaMshrayaiH.. 7-32-16 (46145) babhramuH samare nAgA mR^idrantaH shatasho narAn. kArShNAyasatanutrANAnnarAshvarathaku~njarAn.. 7-32-17 (46146) patitAnpothayA~nchakrurdvipAH sthUlanalAniva. gR^idhrapatrAdhivAsAMsi shayanAni nAradhipAH.. 7-32-18 (46147) hImantaH kAlasamparkAtsuduHsvAnyanusherate. hanti smAtra pitA putraM rathenAbhyetya saMyuge.. 7-32-19 (46148) putrashcha pitaraM mohAnnirmaryAdamavartata. ratho bhagno dhvajashChinnashChatramurvyoM nipAtitam.. 7-32-20 (46149) yugArdhaM chChinnamAdAya pradudrAva tathA hayaH. sAsirbAhurnipatitaH shirashChinnaM sakuNDalam.. 7-32-21 (46150) gajenAkShipya balinA rathaH sa~nchUrNitaH kShitau. rathinA tADito nAgo nArAchenApatatkShitau.. 7-32-22 (46151) sArohashchApatadvAjI gejenAbhyAhato bhR^isham. nirmaryAdaM mahadyuddhamavartata sudAruNam.. 7-32-23 (46152) hA tAta hA putra sakhe kvAsi tiShTha kva dhAvasi. praharAhara jahmenaM smitashveDitagarjitaiH. ityevamuchchairatyarthaM shrUyante vividhA giraH.. 7-32-24 (46153) narasyAshvasya nAgsya samasa~njata shoNitam. upAshAmyadrajo bhaumaM bhIrUnkashmalamAvishat.. 7-32-25 (46154) chakreNa chakramAsAdya vIro vIrasya saMyuge. atIteShupathe kAle jahAra gadayA siraH.. 7-32-26 (46155) asItkeshaparAmarsho muShTiyuddhaM cha dAruNam. nakhairdantaishcha sUrANAmadvIpe dvIpamichChatAm.. 7-32-27 (46156) tatrAchChidyata shUrasya sakha~Ngo bAhurudyataH. sadhunashchAparasyApi sasharaH sA~NkushastathA.. 7-32-28 (46157) Akroshadanyamanyo.atra tathA.anyo vimukho.adravat. anyaH prAptasya chAnyasya shiraH kAyAdapAharat.. 7-32-29 (46158) sashabdamadravachchAnyaH shabdAdanyo.atrasadbhR^isham. svAnanyo.atha parAnanyo jaghAna nishitaiH sharaiH.. 7-32-30 (46159) girishR^i~NgopamashchAtra nArAchena nipAtitaH. mAta~Ngo nyapatadbhUmau nadIrodha ivoShNage.. 7-32-31 (46160) tathaiva rathinaM nAgaH kSharangiririvArujan. abhyatiShThatpadA bhUmau sahAshvaM sahasArathim.. 7-32-32 (46161) shUrAnpraharato dR^iShTvA kR^itAshstrAnrudhirokShitAn. bahUnapyAvishanmoho bhIrUnhR^idayadurbalAn.. 7-32-33 (46162) sarvamAvignamabhavanna prAj~nAyata ki~nchana. sainyena rajasA dhvastaM nirmaryAdamavartata.. 7-32-34 (46163) tataH senApatiH shIghramayaM krAla iti bruvan. nityAbhitvaritAneva tvarayAmAsa pANDavAn.. 7-32-35 (46164) kurvantaH shAsanaM tasya pANDavA bAhushAlinaH. saro haMsA ivApeturghnanto droNarathaM prati.. 7-32-36 (46165) gR^ihNItAdravatAnyonyaM vibhItA vinikR^intata. ityAsIttumulaH shabdo durdharShasya rathaM prati.. 7-32-37 (46166) tato droNaH kR^ipaH karNo drauNI rAjA jayadrathaH. vindAnuvindAvAvantyau shalyashchaitAnnyavArayan.. 7-32-38 (46167) te tvAryadharmasaMrabdhA durnivArA durAsadAH. sharArtA na jahurdroNaM pA~nchAlAH pANDavai saha.. 7-32-39 (46168) tato droNo.atisaMkruddho visR^ija~nshatashaH sharAn. chedipA~nchAlapANDUnAmakarotkadanaM mahat.. 7-32-40 (46169) tasya jyAtalanirghoShaH shushruve dikShaM mAriSha. vajrasaMhrAdasa~NkAshastrAsayanmAnavAnbahUn.. 7-32-41 (46170) etasminnantare jiShNurjitvA saMshaptakAnbahUn. abhyayAttatra yatrAsau droNaH pANDUnpramardati.. 7-32-42 (46171) tA~nsharaughAnmahAvartA~nshoNitodAnmahAhadAn. tIrNaH saMshaptakAnhatvA pratyadR^ishyata phalgunaH.. 7-32-43 (46172) tasya kIrtimato lakShma sUryapratimatejasaH. dIpyamAnamapashyAma tejasA vAnaradhvajam.. 7-32-44 (46173) saMshaptakasamudraM tamuchChoShyAstragabhastibhiH. sa pANDavayugAntArkaH kurUnapyabhyatItapat.. 7-32-45 (46174) pradadAha kurUnsarvAnarjunaH shastratejasA. yugAnte sarvabhUtAni dhUmaketurivotthitaH.. 7-32-46 (46175) tena bANasahasraudhairgajAshvarathayodhinaH. tADyamAnAH kShitiM jagmurmuktakeshAHsharArditAH.. 7-32-47 (46176) kechidArtasvanaM chakrurvineshurapare punaH. pArthabANahatAH kechinnipeturvigatAsavaH.. 7-32-48 (46177) teShAmutpatitAnkAMshchitpatitAMshcha parA~NmukhAn. na jaghAnArjuno yodhAnyodhavratamanusmaran.. 7-32-49 (46178) te vikIrNarathAshchitrAH prAyashashcha parA~NmukhaH. kuravaH karNakarNeti hAheti cha vichukrushuH.. 7-32-50 (46179) tamAdhirathirAkrandaM vij~nAya sharaNaiShiNAm. mA bhaiShTeti pratishrutya yayAvabhimukho.arjunam.. 7-32-51 (46180) sa bhAratarathashreShThaH sarvabhArataharShaNaH. prAdushchakre tadAgneyamastramastravidAM vAraH.. 7-32-52 (46181) tasya dIptasharaughasya dIptachApadharasya cha. `vAruNena tadastreNa vidhUyAtha dhana~njayaH'. sharaughA~nsharajAlena vidudhAva dhana~njayaH.. 7-32-53 (46182) tathaivAdhirathistasya bANAjjvalitatejasaH. astramastreNa saMvArya prANadadvisR^ija~nsharAn.. 7-32-54 (46183) dhR^iShTadyumnashcha bhImashcha sAtyakishcha mahArathaH. vivyadhuH karNamAsAdya tribhistribhirajihmagaiH.. 7-32-55 (46184) arjunAstraM tu rAdheyaH saMvArya sharavR^iShTibhiH. teShAM trayANAM chApAni chichCheda vishikhaistribhiH.. 7-32-56 (46185) te nikR^ittAyughAH shUrA nirviShA bhujagA iva. rathashaktIH samutkShipya bhR^ishaM siMhA ivAnadan.. 7-32-57 (46186) tA bhujAgrairmahAvegA nisR^iShTA bhujagopamAH. dIpyamAnA mahAshaktyo jagmurAdhirathiM prati.. 7-32-58 (46187) tA nikR^itya sharavrAtaistribhistribhirajihmagaiH. nanAda balavAnkarNaH pArthAya visR^ija~nsharAn.. 7-32-59 (46188) arjunashchApi rAdheyaM viddhvA saptabhirAshugaiH. karNAdavarajaM bANairjaghAna nishitaiH sharaiH.. 7-32-60 (46189) tataH shatruMjayaM hatvA pArthaH Sha~NbhirajihmagaiH. jahAra sadyo bhallena vipATasya shiro rathAt.. 7-32-61 (46190) pashyatAM dhArtarAShTrANAmekenaiva kirITinA. pramukhe sUtaputrasya sodaryA nihatAstrayaH.. 7-32-62 (46191) tato bhImaH samutpatya svarathAdvainateyavat. varAsinA karNapakShA~njadhAna dasha pa~ncha cha.. 7-32-63 (46192) punastu rathamAsthAya dhanurAdAya chAparam. vivyAdha dashabhiH karNaM sUtamashvAMshcha pa~nchabhiH.. 7-32-64 (46193) dhR^iShTadyumno.apyasivaraM charma chAdAya bhAsvaram. jaghAna chandravarmANaM bR^ihatkShatraM cha naiShadham.. 7-32-65 (46194) tataH svarathamAsthAya pA~nchAlyo.anyachcha kArmukam. AdAya karNaM vivyAdha trisaptatyA nadanraNe.. 7-32-66 (46195) shaineyo.apyanyadAdAya dhanurindusamadyutiH. sUtaputraM chatuHShaShTyA viddhvA siMha ivAnadat.. 7-32-67 (46196) bhallAbhyAM sAdhu muktAbhyAM ChittvA karNasya kArmukam. punaH karNaM tribhirbANairbAhvorurasi chArpayat.. 7-32-68 (46197) tato duryodhano droNo rAjA chaiva jayadrathaH. nimQajjamAnaM rAdheyamujjahruH sAtyakArNavAt.. 7-32-69 (46198) pattyashvarathamAta~NgAstvadIyAH shatasho.apare. karNamevAbhyadhAvanta trAsyamAnAH prahAriNaH.. 7-32-70 (46199) dhR^iShTadyumnashcha bhImashcha saubhadro.arjuna eva cha. nakulaH sahadevashcha sAtyakiM jugupU raNe.. 7-32-71 (46200) evameSha mahAraudraH kShayArthaM sarvadhanvinAm. tAvakAnAM pareShAM cha tyaktvA prANAnabhUdraNaH.. padAtirathanAgAshvA gajAshvarathapattibhiH. rathino nAgapattyashvairatha pattIratha dvipaiH.. 7-32-72 (46201) ashvairashvA gajairnAgA rathino rathibhiH saha. saMyuktAH samadR^ishyanta pattayashchApi pattibhiH.. evaM sukalilaM yuddhamAsItkravyAdaharShaNam. mahadbhistairabhItAnAM yamarAShTravivardhanam.. 7-32-74 (46202) tato hatA nararathavAjiku~njarai ranekasho dviparathapattivAjinaH. gajairgajA rathibhirudAyudhA rathA. hayairhayAH pattigaNaishcha pattayaH.. 7-32-76 (46203) rathairdvipA dviradavarairmahAhayA hayairnarA vararathibhishcha vAjinaH. nirastajihvAdashanekShaNAH kShitau kShayaM gatAH pramathitavarmabhUShaNAH.. 7-32-77 (46204) tathA parairbahukaraNairvarAyudhai- rhatA gatAH pratibhayadarshanAH kShitim. vipothitA hayagajapAdatADitA bhR^ishAkulA rathamukhanemibhiH kShatAH.. 7-32-78 (46205) pramodane shvApadapakShirakShasAM janakShaye vartati tatra dAruNe. mahAbalAste kupitAH parasparaM niShUdayantaH pravicherurojasA.. 7-32-79 (46206) tato bale bhR^ishalulite parasparaM nirIkShamANe rudhiraughasamplute. divAkare.astaMgirimAsthite shanai rubhe prayAte shibirAya bhArata.. .. 7-32-80 (46207) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi saMshaptakavadhaparvaNi dvAdashadivasayuddhAvahAre dvAtriMsho.adhyAyaH.. 32 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-32-6 mR^ityusAdhAraNIkR^ite maraNatulyAvasthAM gamite.. 5-32-12 kaTukasya paruShasyodayo yatra.. 5-32-16 avinaM gatvA abhitya. viShANAlagnasaMshrayaiH dantalagnaikadeshaiH.. 5-32-18 gR^idhrapakShAdhivAsAMsi gR^idhrapakShAstaraNAni.. 5-32-25 samasajjata ghanatAmagamat.. 5-32-26 atItaH iShupathaH sharAvakAsho yatra.. 5-32-27 dvIpamAshrayam.. 5-32-29 Akroshat AhUtavAn.. 5-32-32 kSharanmadamiti sheShaH. rathinaM tathaiva sahasArathiM arthAdrathaM cha padA Arujan bhUmau abhyatiShThadityanvayaH.. 5-32-37 vibhItA abhItAH. durdharShasya droNasya.. 5-32-39 AryadharmeNa saMrabdhAH sodyamAH.. 5-32-53 vidudhAva khaNDitavAn.. 5-32-61 vighAtasya shira iti ka.pAThaH.. 5-32-72 prANAMstyaktvA yudhyatAmiti sheShaH.. 5-32-75 abhItAnAmabhimukhAgatAnAM bhayahInAnAM vA.. 5-32-78 bahukaraNairanekaprakriyaiH. rathamukhAnAM rathamukhyAnAM nemibhishchakrAntaiH.. 5-32-32 dvAtriMsho.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 033

.. shrIH ..

7.33. adhyAyaH 033

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

yudhiShThirasyAgrahaNAt durmanAyamAnaM duryodhanaM prati droNena kasyachinmahArathasya hananapratij~nA.. 1 .. sa~njayena dhR^itarAShTraM prati sa~NkShepato.abhimanyuvadhakathanam.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-33-0 (46208) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-33-0x (4332) pUrvamasmAsu bhagneShu phalgugenAmitaujasA. droNe cha moghasa~Nkalpe rakShite cha yudhiShThire.. 7-33-1 (46209) sarve vidhvastakavachAstAvakA yudhi nirjitAH. rajasvalA bhR^ishodvignA vIkShamANA disho dasha.. 7-33-2 (46210) avahAraM tataH kR^itvA bhAradvAjasya sammate. labdhalakShaiH sharairbhinnA bhR^ishAvahasitA raNe.. 7-33-3 (46211) shlAghamAneShu bhUteShu phalgunasyAmitAnguNAn. keshavasya cha sauhArde kIrtyamAne.arjunaM prati.. 7-33-4 (46212) abhishastA ivAbhUvandhyAnamUkatvamAsthitAH. tataH prabhAtasamaye droNaM druyodhano.abravIt.. 7-33-5 (46213) praNayAdabhimAnAchcha dviShadvR^iddhyA cha durmanAH. shR^iNvatAM sarvayodhAnAM saMrabdho vAkyakovidaH.. 7-33-6 (46214) nUnaM vayaM vadhyapakShe bhavato dvijasattama. tathAhi nAgrahIH prAptaM samIpe.adya yudhiShThiram.. 7-33-7 (46215) ichChataste na muchyeta chakShuHprApto raNe ripuH. jighR^ikShato rakShyamANaH sAmarairapi pANDavaiH.. 7-33-8 (46216) varaM dattvA mama prItaH pashchAdvikR^itavAnasi. AshAbha~NgaM na kurvanti bhaktasyAryAH katha~nchana.. 7-33-9 (46217) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-33-10x (4333) tato.aprItastathoktaH sanbhAradvAjo.abravInnR^ipam. nArhase mAM tathA j~nAtuM ghaTamAnaM tava priye.. 7-33-10 (46218) sasurAsuragandharvAH sayakShoragarAkShasAH. nAlaM lokA raNe jetuM pAlyamAnaM kirITinA.. 7-33-11 (46219) vishvasR^igyatra govindaH pR^itanAnIstathA.arjunaH. tatra kasya balaM krAmedanyatra tryambakAtprabhoH.. 7-33-12 (46220) satyaM tAta bravImyadya naitajjAtvanyathA bhavet. adyaikaM pravaraM ka~nchitpAtayiShye mahAratham.. 7-33-13 (46221) chakrabyUhaM vidhAsyAmi yo.abhedyastridashairapi. yogena kenachidrAjannarjunastvapanIyatAm.. 7-33-14 (46222) na hyaj~nAtamasAdhyaM vA tasya sa~Nkhye.asti ki~nchana. tena hyupAttaM sakalaM sarvaj~nAnamitastataH.. 7-33-15 (46223) droNena vyAhR^ite tvevaM saMshaptakagaNAH punaH. AhvayannarjunaM sa~Nkhye dakShiNAmabhito disham.. 7-33-16 (46224) tato.arjunasyAtha paraiH sArdhaM samabhavadraNaH. tAdR^isho yAdR^isho nAnyaH shruto dR^iShTopi vA kvachit. 7-33-17 (46225) tatra droNena vihito vyUho rAjanvyarochata. charanmadhyandine sUryaH pratapanniva durdR^ishaH.. 7-33-18 (46226) taM chAbhimanyurvachanAtpiturjyeShThasya bhArata. bibheda durbhidaM sa~Nkhye chakravyUhamanekadhA.. 7-33-19 (46227) sa kR^itvA duShkaraM karma hatvA vIrAnsahasrashaH. rAjaputrashataM hatvA kausalyaM cha bR^ihadbalam.. 7-33-20 (46228) mahArathaM shalyaputraM pautraM te lakShmaNaM tathA. ShaTsu vIreShu saMsakto dauHshAsanivashaM gataH. saubhadraH pR^ithivIpAla jahau prANAnparantapa.. 7-33-21 (46229) vayaM paramasaMhR^iShTAH pANDavAH shokakarshitAH. saubhadre nihate rAjannavahAramakurmahi.. 7-33-22 (46230) `janamejaya uvAcha. 7-33-23x (4334) samarodyuktakarmANaH karmabhirvya~njitashramAH. sakR^iShNAH pANDavAH pa~ncha devairapi durAsadAH.. 7-33-23 (46231) shashvatkarmAnvayairbuddhyA prakR^ityA yashasA shriyA. na bhUto bhavitA vApi kR^iShNasya sadR^ishaH pumAn.. 7-33-24 (46232) satyadharmatapodAnairdvijapUjAdibhirguNaiH. sadehastridivaM prApto rAjA kila yudhiShThiraH.. 7-33-25 (46233) yugAnte chAntakashchaiva jAmadagnyashcha kIrtimAn. raNastho bhImasenashcha kathyante sadR^ishAstrayaH.. 7-33-26 (46234) pratij~nAkarmadakShasya raNe gANDIvadhanvanaH. upamAM nAdhigachChAmi pArthasya sadR^ishIM kShitau.. 7-33-27 (46235) guruvAtsalyamatyantaM naibhR^ityaM vinayo damaH. nakule tvAbhirUpyaM cha shauryaM cha niyatAni ShaT.. 7-33-28 (46236) shrutamAdhuryagAmbhIryasattvarUpaparAkramaiH. sadR^isho devayorvIraH sahadevaH kilAshvinoH.. 7-33-29 (46237) ye cha kR^iShNe guNAH sphItAH pANDaveShu cha ye guNAH. abhimanyau kilaikasthA dR^ishyante te guNAH shubhAH.. 7-33-30 (46238) yudhiShThirasya shauryeNa kR^iShNasya charitena cha. karmaNA bhImasenasya sadR^ishaM bhImakarmaNaH.. 7-33-31 (46239) dhana~njayasya rUpeNa vikrameNa shubhena cha. vinaye sahadevasya sadR^ishaM nakulasya cha.. 7-33-32 (46240) abhimanyuM dvijashreShTha saubhadramaparAjitam. shrotumichChAmi kArtsnyena kathamAyodhane hataH.. 7-33-33 (46241) vaishampAyana uvAcha. 7-33-34x (4335) abhimanyuM hataM shrutvA dhR^itarAShTro janAdhipaH. vistareNa mahArAja paryapR^ichChatsa sa~njayam'.. 7-33-34 (46242) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-33-35x (4336) putraM puruShasiMhasya sa~njayAprAptayauvanam. raNe vinihataM shrutvA bhR^ishaM me dIryate manaH.. 7-33-35 (46243) dAruNaH kShatradharmo.ayaM vihito dharmakartR^ibhiH. yatra rAjyepsavaH shUrA bAle shastramapAtayan.. 7-33-36 (46244) bAlamatyantasukhinaM vicharantamabhItavat. kR^itAstrA bahavo jaghnurbrUhi gAvalgaNe katham.. 7-33-37 (46245) bibitsatA rathAnIkaM saubhadreNAmitaujasA. vikrIDitaM yathA sa~Nkhye tanmamAchakShva sa~njaya.. 7-33-38 (46246) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-33-39x (4337) yanmAM pR^ichChasi rAjendra saubhadrasya nipAtanam. tatte kArtsnyena vakShyAmi shR^iNu rAjansamAhitaH.. 7-33-39 (46247) vikrIDitaM kumAreNa yathAnIkaM bibhitsatA. ArugNAshcha yathA vIrA duHsAdhyAshchApi vipluve.. 7-33-40 (46248) dAvAgnyabhiparItAnAM bhUrigulmatR^iNadrume. vanaukasAmivAraNye tvadIyAnAmabhUdbhayam.. .. 7-33-41 (46249) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi trayastriMsho.adhyAyaH.. 33 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-33-2 rajasvalA dhUlivyAptAH.. 5-33-9 vikR^itavAnanyathA kR^itavAn.. 5-33-15 kalAbhiH sahitaM sakalam. ito.asmattaH. tato.anyataH.. 5-33-21 ShaTsu droNadrauNikR^ipakarNabhojashalyeShu.. 5-33-28 naibhR^ityaM kR^itakartavyAprakAshanam.. 5-33-36 dharmakartR^ibhirmanvAdibhiH.. 5-33-33 trayastriMsho.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 034

.. shrIH ..

7.34. adhyAyaH 034

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

droNena padmavyUharachanA.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-34-0 (46250) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-34-0x (4338) sthiro bhava mahArAja shokaM dhAraya durdharam. mahAntaM bandhunAshaM te kathayiShyAmi tachChR^ishu.. 7-34-1 (46251) padmavyUho mahArAja AchAryeNAbhikalpitaH. tatra padmopamAH sarve rAjAno viniveshitAH.. 7-34-2 (46252) kumArA rAjalokasya nikShiptAH kesaropAmAH. karNikAstho mahArAja tasya duryodhano.abhavat.. 7-34-3 (46253) kR^itAbhisamayAH sarve suvarNavikR^itadhvajAH. raktAmbaradharAH sarve sarve raktavibhUShaNAH.. 7-34-4 (46254) sarve raktapatAkAshcha sarve vai hemamAlinaH. chandanAgurudigdhA~NgAH sragviNaH sUkShmavAsasaH.. 7-34-5 (46255) sahitAH paryadhAvanta kArShNi pratiyuyutsavaH. teShAM dashasahasrANi babhUvurdR^iDhadhanvinAm.. 7-34-6 (46256) pautraM tava puraskR^itya lakShmaNaM priyadarshanam. anyonyasamaduHkhAste anyonyasamasAhasAH.. 7-34-7 (46257) anyonyaM spardhamAnAshcha anyonyasya hite ratAH. duryodhanastu rAjendra sainyamadhye vyavasthitaH.. 7-34-8 (46258) karNaduHshAsanakR^ipairvR^ito rAjA mahArathaiH. devarAjopamaH shrImA~nshvetachChatrAbhisaMvR^itaH.. 7-34-9 (46259) chAmaravyajanAkShepairudayanniva bhAskaraH. pramukhe tasya sainyasya droNo.avasthita nAyakaH.. 7-34-10 (46260) sindhurAjastathA.atiShThachChrImAnmerurivAchalaH. sindhurAjasya pArshvasthA ashvatthAmapurogamAH.. 7-34-11 (46261) sutAstava mahArAja triMshattridashasannibhAH. gAndhArarAjaH kitavaH shalyo bhUrishravAstathA.. 7-34-12 (46262) pArshvataH sindhurAjasya vyarAjanta mahArathAH. tataH pravavR^ite yuddhaM tumulaM lomaharShaNam. tAvakAnAM pareShAM cha mR^ityuM kR^itvA nivartanam.. .. 7-34-13 (46263) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi trayodashadivasayuddhe chatustriMsho.adhyAyaH.. 34 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-34-2 chakravyUha iti jha.pAThaH.. 5-34-10 pramukhe.agre. sainyasya nAyako droNaH. avasthitetichChandonurodhAdvisargalopaH.. 5-34-34 chatustriMsho.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 035

.. shrIH ..

7.35. adhyAyaH 035

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

yudhiShThireNAbhimanyumprati padmavyUhabhedanachodanA.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-35-0 (46264) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-35-0x (4339) tadanIkamanAdhR^iShTaM bhAradvAjena rakShitam. pArthAH samabhyavartanta bhImasenapurogamAH.. 7-35-1 (46265) sAtyakishchekitAnashcha dhR^iShTadyumnashcha pArShataH. kuntibhojashcha vikrAnto drupadashcha mahArathaH.. 7-35-2 (46266) ArjuniH kShatradharmA cha bR^ihatkShatrashcha vIryavAn. chedipo dhR^iShTaketushcha mAdrIputrau ghaTotkachaH.. 7-35-3 (46267) yudhAmanyushcha vikrAntaH shikhaNDI chAparAjitaH. utaktamaujAshcha durdharSho virATashcha mahArathaH.. 7-35-4 (46268) draupadeyAshcha saMrabdhAH shaishupAlishcha vIryavAn. kekayAshcha mahAvIryAH sR^i~njayAshcha sahasrashaH.. 7-35-5 (46269) ete chAnye cha sagaNAH kR^itAstrA yuddhadurmadAH. samabhyadhAvansahasA bhAradvAjaM yuyutsavaH.. 7-35-6 (46270) samIpe vartamAnAMstAnbhAradvAjo.ativIryavAn. asambhrAntaH sharaugheNa mahatA samavArayat.. 7-35-7 (46271) mahaughaH salilasyeva girimAsAdya durbhidam. droNaM te nAbhyavartanta velAmiva jalAshayAH.. 7-35-8 (46272) pIDyamAnAH sharai rAjandroNachApaviniHsR^itaiH. na shekuH pramukhe sthAtuM bhAradvAjasya pANDavAH.. 7-35-9 (46273) tadadbhutamapashyAma droNasya bhujayorbalam. yadenaM nAbhyavartanta pA~nchAlAH sR^i~njayaiH saha.. 7-35-10 (46274) tamAyAntamabhikruddhaM droNaM dR^iShTvA yudhiShThiraH. bahudhA chintayAmAsa droNasya prativAraNam.. 7-35-11 (46275) ashakyaM tu tamanyena droNaM mattvA yudhiShThiraH. aviShahyaM gura bhAraM saubhadre samavAsR^ijat.. 7-35-12 (46276) vAsudevAdanavaraM phalgunAchchAmitaujasam. abravItparavIraghnamabhimanyumidaM vachaH.. 7-35-13 (46277) yudhiShThira uvAcha. 7-35-14x (4340) etya no nArjuno garhedyathA tAta tathA kuru. droNAnIkasya na vayaM vidmo bhedaM katha~nchana.. 7-35-14 (46278) tvaM vA.arjuno vA kR^iShNo vA bhindyAtpradyumna eva vA. droNAnIkaM mahAbAho pa~nchamo nopapadyate.. 7-35-15 (46279) abhimanyo varaM tAta yAche tvAM dAtumarhasi. pitR^INAM mAtulAnAM cha sainyAnAM chaiva sarvashaH.. 7-35-16 (46280) dhana~njayo hi nastAta garhayedetya saMyugAt. kShipramastraM samAdAya droNAnIkaM vishAtaya.. 7-35-17 (46281) abhimanyuruvAcha. 7-35-18x (4341) droNasya dR^iDhamatyugramanIkapravaraM yudhi. pitR^INAM jayamAkA~NkShannavagAhe.avilambitam.. 7-35-18 (46282) upadiShTo hi me pitrA yogo.anIkavishAtane. notsahe hi vinirgantumahaM kasyA~nchidApadi.. 7-35-19 (46283) yudhiShThira uvAcha. 7-35-20x (4342) bhindhyanIkaM yudhAMshcheShTha dvAraM sa~njanayasva naH. vayaM tvA.anugamiShyAmo yena tvaM tAta yAsyasi.. 7-35-20 (46284) dhana~njayasamaM yuddhe tvAM vayaM tAta saMyute. praNidhAyAnuyAsyAmo rakShantaH sarvatomukhAH.. 7-35-21 (46285) bhIma uvAcha. 7-35-22x (4343) ahaM tvA.anugamiShyAmi dhR^iShTadyumno.atha sAtyakiH. pA~nchalAH kekayA mAtsyAstathA sarve prabhadrakAH.. 7-35-22 (46286) sakR^idbhinnaM tvayA vyUhaM tatra tatra punaH punaH. vayaM pradhvaMsayiShyAmo nighnAmAnA varAnvarAn.. 7-35-23 (46287) abhimanyuruvAcha. 7-35-24x (4344) ahametatpravekShyAmi droNAnIkaM durAsadam. pata~Nga iva sa~Nkruddho jvalitaM jAtavedasam.. 7-35-24 (46288) tatkarmAdya kariShyAmi hitaM yadvaMshayordvayoH. mAtulasya cha yatprItiM kariShyati pitushcha me.. 7-35-25 (46289) shishunaikena sa~Ngrame kAlyamAnAni sa~NghashaH. drakShyanti sarvabhUtAni dviShatsainyAni vai mayA.. 7-35-26 (46290) nAhaM pArthena jAtaH syAM na cha jAtaH subhadrayA. yadi me saMyuge kashchijjIvito nAdya muchyate.. 7-35-27 (46291) yadi chaikarathenAhaM samagraM kShatramaNDalam. na karomyaShTadhA yuddhe na bhavAmyarjunAtmajaH.. 7-35-28 (46292) yudhiShThira uvAcha. 7-35-29x (4345) evaM te bhAShamANasya balaM saubhadra vardhatAm. yatsamutsahase bhettuM droNAnIkaM durAsadam.. 7-35-29 (46293) rakShitaM puruShavyAghrairmaheShvAsairmahAbalai. sAdhyarudramaruttulyairvasvagnyAdityavikramaiH.. 7-35-30 (46294) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-35-31x (4346) tasya tadvachanaM shrutvA sa yantAramachodayat.. 7-35-31 (46295) sumitrAshvAnraNe kShipraM droNAnIkAya chodaya.. .. 7-35-32 (46296) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi trayodhashadivasayuddhe pa~nchatriMsho.adhyAyaH.. 35 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-35-16 mAtulAnAM sAtyakiprabhR^itInAm.. 5-35-19 yoga upAyo yuktirvA .. 5-35-21 praNidhAya pravishya.. 5-35-35 pa~nchatriMshoH.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 036

.. shrIH ..

7.36. adhyAyaH 036

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

abhimanyuyuddhavarNanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-36-0 (46297) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-36-0x (4347) saubhadrastadvachaH shrutvA dharmarAjasya dhImataH. achodayata yantAraM droNAnIkAya bhArata.. 7-36-1 (46298) tena sa~nchodyamAnastu yAhiyAhIti sArathiH. pratyuvAcha tato rAjannabhimanyumidaM vachaH.. 7-36-2 (46299) atibhAro.ayamAyuShmannAhitastvayi pANDavaiH. sampradhArya kShaNaM buddhyA tatastvaM yoddhumarhasi.. 7-36-3 (46300) AchAryo hi kR^itI droNaH paramAstre kR^itashramaH. tvaM tu bAlaH sa balavAnsa~NgrAmANAmakovidaH.. 7-36-4 (46301) tato.abhimanyuH prahasansArathiM vAkyamabravIt. sArathe konvayaM droNaH samagraM kShatrameva vA.. 7-36-5 (46302) `vyavasAyo hi me yoddhuM raNotsavasamudyataH'. airAvatagataM shakraM sahAmaragaNairaham.. 7-36-6 (46303) athavA rudramIshAnaM sarvabhUtagaNArchitam. yodhayeyaM raNamukhe na me kShatre.adya vismayaH.. 7-36-7 (46304) `yachchaitatpashyase sUta sayodhAshvarathadvipam'. tanmamAdya dviShatsainyaM kalAmarhati ShoDashIm.. 7-36-8 (46305) api vishvajitaM viShNuM mAtulaM prApya sUtaja. pitaraM chArjunaM yuddhe na bhIrmAmupayAsyati.. 7-36-9 (46306) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-36-10x (4348) evamapyuchyamAnaH sa sArathistaM punaH punaH. vIra te tena mA yuddhamiti saubhadramabravIt'.. 7-36-10 (46307) abhimanyushcha tAM vAchaM kadarthIkR^itya sAratheH. yAhItyevAbravIdenaM droNAnIkAya mAchiram.. 7-36-11 (46308) tataH sannodayAmAsa hayAnAshu trihAyanAn. nAtihR^iShTamanAH sUto hemabhANDaparichChadAn.. 7-36-12 (46309) te preShitAH sumitreNa droNAnIkAya vAjinaH. droNamabhyadravanrAjanmahAvegA mahAbalAH.. 7-36-13 (46310) tamudIkShya tathAyAntaM sarve droNapurogamAH. abhyavartanta kauravyAH pANDavAshcha tamanvayuH.. 7-36-14 (46311) sakarNikArapravarochChritadhvajaH suvarNavarmA.a.arjunirarjunAdvaraH. yuyutsayA droNamukhAnmahArathAn samAsadatsiMhashishuryathA dvipAn.. 7-36-15 (46312) te viMshatipade yattAH samprahAraM prachakrire. AsIdgA~Nga ivAvarto muhUrtamudadhAviva.. 7-36-16 (46313) shUrANAM yudhyamAnAnAM nighnatAmitaretaram. sa~NgrAmastumulo rAjanprAvartata sudAruNaH.. 7-36-17 (46314) pravartamAne sa~NgrAme tasminnatibhaya~Nkare. droNasya miShato vyUhaM bhittvA vyacharadArjuniH.. 7-36-18 (46315) `tadabhedyamanAdhR^iShyaM droNAnIkaM sudurjayam. bhittvArjunirasambhrAnto viveshAchintyavikramaH'.. 7-36-19 (46316) taM praviShTaM vinighnantaM shatrusa~NghAnmahAbalam. hastyashvarathapattyaughAH parivavrurudAyudhAH.. 7-36-20 (46317) nAnAvAditraninadaiH kShveDitotkruShTagarjitaiH. hu~NkAraiH siMhanAdaishcha tiShTha tiShTheti niHsvanaiH.. 7-36-21 (46318) ghorairhalahalAshabdairmAgAstiShThaihi mAmiti. asAvahamamitreti pravadanto muhurmuhuH.. 7-36-22 (46319) bR^iMhitaiH shi~njitairhAsaiH karanemisvanairapi. sannAdayanto vasudhAmabhidudruvurArjunim.. 7-36-23 (46320) teShAmApatatAM vIraH shIghrayodhI mahAbalaH. kShiprAstro nyavadhIdrAjanmarmaj~no marmabhedibhiH.. 7-36-24 (46321) te hanyamAnA vivashA nAnAli~NgaiH shitaiH sharaiH. abhipetuH subahushaH shalabhA iva pAvakam.. 7-36-25 (46322) tatasteShAM sharIraishcha sharIrAvayavaishcha saH. santaMstAra kShitiM kShipraM kushairvedimivAdhvare.. 7-36-26 (46323) baddhagodhA~NgulitrANAnsasharAsanasAyakAn. sAsicharmA~NkushAbhIShUnsatomaraparashvathAn.. 7-36-27 (46324) sagadAyoguDaprAsAnsarShTitomarapaTTasAn. sabhiNDipAlaparighAnyashaktivarakampanAn.. 7-36-28 (46325) sapratodamahAsha~NkhAnsakuntAnsakachagrahAn. samudgarakShepaNIyAnsapAshaparighopalAn.. 7-36-29 (46326) sakeyUrA~NgadAnbAhUnhR^idyagandhAnulepanAn. sQa~nchichChedArjunirvR^ittAMstvadIyAnAM sahasrashaH.. 7-36-30 (46327) taiH sphuradbhirmahArAja shushubhe bhUH sulohitaiH. pa~nchAsyaiH pannagaishChinnairgaruDeneva mAriSha.. 7-36-31 (46328) sunAsAnanakeshAntairavraNaishchArukuNDalaiH. sandaShTauShThapuTaiH krodhAtkSharadbhiH shoNitaM bahu.. 7-36-32 (46329) sachArumukuToShNIShairmaNiratnavibhUShitaiH. vinAlanalinAkArairdivAkarashashiprabhaiH.. 7-36-33 (46330) hitapriyaMvadaiH kAle bahubhiH puNyagandhibhiH. dviShachChirobhiH pR^ithivIM sa vai tastAra phAlguniH.. 7-36-34 (46331) gandharvanagarAkArAnvidhivatkalpitAnrathAn. vIShAmukhAnvitriveNUnnyastadaNDakabandhurAn.. 7-36-35 (46332) vija~NghAkUbarAMstatra vinemIMshra vyarAnapi. vichakropaskaropasthAnbhagnopakaraNAnapi.. 7-36-36 (46333) `samAsthitAnyodhavarairdAntAshvAnsAdhusArathIn. vipatAkAdhvajachChatrAnvitUNIrAyudhAnapi.. 7-36-37 (46334) prapAtitopastaraNAnhatayodhAnsahasrashaH. sharairvishakalIkurvandikShu sarvAsvadR^ishyata.. 7-36-38 (46335) punardvipAndvipArohAnvaijayantya~NkushadhvajAn. tUNAnvarmANyatho kakShyA graiveyAMshcha sakambalAn.. 7-36-39 (46336) ghaNTAH shuNDAviShANAgrA~nChatramAlAH padAnugAn. sharairnishitadhArAgraiH shAtravANAmashAtayat.. 7-36-40 (46337) vanAyujAnpArvatIyAnkAmbhojAnatha bAhlikAn. sthiravAladhikarNAkShA~njavanAnsAdhuvAhinaH.. 7-36-41 (46338) ArUDhA~nshikShitairyodhaiH shaktyR^iShTiprAsayodhibhiH. vidhvastachAmaramukhAnvipraviddhaprakIrNakAn.. 7-36-42 (46339) nirastajihvAnayanAnniShkIrNAntrayakR^iddhanAn. hatArohAMshChinnaghaNTAnkravyAdagaNamodakAn.. 7-36-43 (46340) nikR^ittacharmakavachA~nshakR^inmUtrAsR^igAplutAn. nipAtayannashvavarAMstAvakAnsa vyarochata. eko viShNurivAchintyaM kR^itvA karma suduShkaram.. 7-36-44 (46341) tathA nirmAthitaM tena chatura~NgabalaM mahat. yathA.asurabalaM ghoraM tryambakena mahaujasA.. 7-36-45 (46342) kR^itvA karma raNe.asahyaM parairArjunirAhave. abhinachcha padAtyoghAMstvadIyAneva sarvashaH.. 7-36-46 (46343) evamekena tAM senAM saubhadreNa sitaiH sharaiH. bhR^ishaM viprahatAM dR^iShTvA skandenevAsurIM chamUm.. 7-36-47 (46344) tvadIyAstava putrAshcha vIkShamANA disho dasha. saMshuShkAsyAshchalannetrAH prasvinnA romaharShiNaH.. 7-36-48 (46345) palAyanakR^itotsAhA nirutsAhA dviShajjaye. gotranAmabhiranyonyaM krandanto jIvitaiShiNaH.. 7-36-49 (46346) hatAnputrAnpitR^InbhrAtR^InbandhUnsambandhinastathA. prAtiShThanta samutsR^ijya tvarayanto hayadvipAn.. .. 7-36-50 (46347) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi trayodashadivasayuddhe ShaTtriMsho.adhyAyaH.. 36 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-36-16 viMshatiriti vyUhaparyAyaH. taduktaM. viMshatya~NgatayA vyUho viMshatirvyapadishyate iti. viMshateH pade rakShaNe. padaM vyavasitatrANasthAnalakShmA~NgrivastuShvityamaraH. taM vishantaM tato yattA iti ka. pAThaH. te vishantaM mudA yuktA iti gha.~Na. pAThaH.. 5-36-21 kShveDitaM dhvanivisheShaH. utkruShTamAhvAnam. gArjitaM hanyantAM hanyantAmiti vachaH.. 5-36-29 kachagraho.a~NkushaH.. 5-36-36 upastho rathakroDaH.. 5-36-43 yakR^itkAlakhaNDam.. 5-36-45 vya~NgaM tava valaM mahat iti jha.pAThaH.. 5-36-36 ShaTtriMsho.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 037

.. shrIH ..

7.37. adhyAyaH 037

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

abhimanyuparAkramavarNanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-37-0 (46348) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-37-0x (4349) tAM prabhAgnAM chamUM dR^iShTvA saubhadreNAmitaujasA. duryodhano bhR^ishaM kruddhaH svayaM saubhadramabhyayAt.. 7-37-1 (46349) tato rAjAnamAvR^ittaM saubhadraM prati saMyuge. dR^iShTvA droNo.abravIdyodhAnparIpsadhvaM narAdhipam.. 7-37-2 (46350) purA.abhimanyurlakShaM naH pashyatAM hanti vIryavAn. tamAdravata mAbhaiShTa kShipraM rakShata kauravam. 7-37-3 (46351) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-37-4x (4350) `evamuktAstatastena bhAradvAjena dhImatA'. kR^itaj~nAnabalotsedhAH suhR^ido jitakAshinaH. trAsyamAnA bhayAdvIraM parivavrustavAtmajam.. 7-37-4 (46352) droNo drauNiH kR^ipaH karNaH kR^itavarmA cha saubalaH. bR^ihadbalo madrarAjo bhUrirbhUrishravAH shalaH.. 7-37-5 (46353) pauravo vR^iShasenashcha visR^ijantaH shitA~nsharAn. saubhadraM sharavarSheNa mahatA samavAkiran.. 7-37-6 (46354) sammohayitvA tamatha duryodhanamamochayan. AsyAdgrAsamivAkShiptaM mamR^iShe nArjunAtmajaH.. 7-37-7 (46355) tA~nsharaugheNa mahatA sAshvasUtAnmahArathAn. vimukhIkR^itya saubhadraH siMhanAdamathAnadat.. 7-37-8 (46356) tasya nAdaM tataH shrutvA siMhasyevAmiShaiShiNaH. nAmR^iShyanta susaMrabdhAH punardroNamukhA rathAH.. 7-37-9 (46357) ta enaM koShThakIkR^itya rathavaMshena mAriSha. vyasR^ijanniShujAlAni nAnAli~NgAni sa~NghashaH.. 7-37-10 (46358) tAnyantarikShe chichCheda pautraste nishitaiH sharaiH. tAMshchaiva prativivyAdha tadadbhutamivAbhavat.. 7-37-11 (46359) `tato rathapadAtyoghAH ku~njarAH sAdinashcha ha'. kopitAstena shUreNa sharairAshIviShopamaiH. parivabrurjighAMsantaH saubhadramaparAjitam.. 7-37-12 (46360) samudramiva paryastaM tvadIyaM taM balArNavam. dadhAraiko.arjunirbANairvelevodvR^ittamarNavam.. 7-37-13 (46361) shUrANAM yudhyamAnAnAM nighnatAmitaretaram. abhimanyoH pareShAM cha nAsItkashchitparA~NmukhaH.. 7-37-14 (46362) tasmiMstu ghore sa~NgrAme vartamAne bhaya~Nkare. duHsaho navabhirbANairabhimanyumavidhyata.. 7-37-15 (46363) duHshAno dvAdashabhiH kR^ipaH shAradvatastribhiH. droNastu saptadashabhiH sharairAshIviShopamaiH.. 7-37-16 (46364) viviMshatistu saptatyA kR^itavarmA cha saptabhiH. bR^ihadbalastathA.aShTAbhirashvatthAmA cha saptabhiH.. 7-37-17 (46365) bhUrishravAstribhirbANairmadreshaH Sha~NbhirAshugaiH. dvAbhyAM sharAbhyAM shakunistribhirduryodhano nR^ipaH.. 7-37-18 (46366) sa tu tAnprativivyAdha tribhistribhirajihmagaiH. 7-37-19 (46367) nR^ityanniva mahArAja chApahastaH pratApavAn.. 7-37-19 (46368) tato.abhimanyuH sa~NkruddhastrAsyamAnastavAtmajaiH. vidarshayanvai sumahachChikShaurasakR^itaM balam.. 7-37-20 (46369) garuDAnilaraMhobhiryanturvAkyakarairhayaiH. abhyadravata taM kArShNimashmakendraH kR^itatvaraH.. 7-37-21 (46370) ashvAshchAshmakamAdAya tvaramANA.abhyahArayan. vivyAdha dashabhirbANaistiShThatiShTheti chAbravIt.. 7-37-22 (46371) tasyAbhimanyurdashabhirhayAnsUtaM dhvajaM sharaiH. bAhU dhanuH shirashchorvyAM smayamAno.abhyapAtayat.. 7-37-23 (46372) tatastasminhate vIre saubhadreNAshmakeshvare. sa~nchachAla balaM sarvaM palAyanaparAyaNam.. 7-37-24 (46373) tataH karNaH kR^ipo droNo drauNirgAndhArarAT shalaH. shalyo bhUrishravAH krAthaH somadatto viviMshatiH. vR^iShasenaH suSheNashcha kuNDabhedI pratardanaH.. 7-37-25 (46374) bR^indArako lalitthashcha prabAhurdIrghalochanaH. duryodhanashcha sa~NkruddhaH sharavarShairavAkiran.. 7-37-26 (46375) so.atividdho maheShvAsairabhimanyurajihmagaiH. sharamAdatta karNAya varmakAyAvabhedinam.. 7-37-27 (46376) tasya bhittvA tanutrANaM dehaM nirbhidya chAshugaH. prAvishaddharaNIM vegAdvalmI kamiva pannagaH.. 7-37-28 (46377) sa tenAtiprahAreNa vyathito vihvalanniva. sa~nchachAla raNe karNaH kShitikampe yathA.achalaH.. 7-37-29 (46378) tathAnyairnishitairbANaiH suSheNaM dIrghalochanam. kuNDabhediM cha sa~NkruddhastribhistrInavadhIdbalI.. 7-37-30 (46379) karNastaM pa~nchaviMshatyA nArAchAnAM samArpayat. ashvatthAmA cha viMshatyA kR^itavarmA cha saptabhiH.. 7-37-31 (46380) sa sharAchitasarvA~NgaH kruddhaH shakrAtmajAtmajaH. vicharandadR^ishe sainye pAshahasta ivAntakaH.. 7-37-32 (46381) shalyaM cha sharavarSheNa samIpasthAmavAkirat. udakroshanmahAbAhustava sainyAni bhIShayan.. 7-37-33 (46382) tataH sa viddho.astravidA marmabhidbhirajihmagaiH. shalyo rAjanrathopasthe niShasAda mumoha cha.. 7-37-34 (46383) taM hi dR^iShTvA tathA viddhaM saubhadreNa yashAsvinA. samprAdravachchamUH sarvA bhAradvAjasya pashyataH.. 7-37-35 (46384) samprekShya taM mahAbAhuM rukmapu~NkhaiH samAvR^itam. tvadIyAH prapalAyante mR^igAH siMhArditA iva.. 7-37-36 (46385) `saubhadrasharanirbhagnAH samare.amaravikramAH. evaM shalyo vimR^iditastava pautreNa bhArata'.. 7-37-37 (46386) sa tu raNayashasA.abhipUjyamAnaH pitR^isurachAraNasiddhayakShasa~NgaiH avanitalagataishcha bhUtasa~Nghai-- rativibabhau hutabhugyathA.a.ajyasiktaH.. .. 7-37-38 (46387) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi trayodashadivasayuddhe saptatriMsho.adhyAyaH.. 37 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-37- trAsyamAnAH pAlayiShyantaH.. 5-37- paryastaM utkrAntamaryAdam.. 5-37- shikShaurasakR^itaM abhyAsakR^itaM nisargabhavaM cha..
droNaparva - adhyAya 038

.. shrIH ..

7.38. adhyAyaH 038

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

abhimanyuparAkramavarNanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-38-0 (46388) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-38-0x (4351) tathA pramathamAnaM taM maheShvAsAnajihmagaiH. ArjuniM mAmakAH sa~Nkhye ke tvenaM samavArayan.. 7-38-1 (46389) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-38-2x (4352) shR^iNu rAjankumArasya raNe vikrIDitaM mahat. bibhitsato rathAnIkaM bhAradvAjena rakShitam.. 7-38-2 (46390) madreshaM sAditaM dR^iShTvA saubhadreNAshugai raNe. shalyAdavarajaH kruddha krinbANAnsamabhyayAt.. 7-38-3 (46391) sa viddhvA dashabhirbANaiH sAshvayantAramArjunim. udakroshanmahAshabdaM tiShThatiShTheti chAbravIt.. 7-38-4 (46392) tasyArjuniH shirogrIvaM pANipAdaM dhanurhayAn. ChatraM dhvajaM niyantAraM triveNuM chApyupaskaram.. 7-38-5 (46393) chakraM yugaM cha tUNIraM hyanukarShaM sAyakaiH. patAkAM chakragoptArau sarvopakaraNAni cha.. 7-38-6 (46394) laghuhastaH prachichCheda dadR^ishe taM na kashchana. sa papAta kShitau kShINaH praviddhAbharaNAmbaraH.. 7-38-7 (46395) vAyuneva mahAchaityaH samUlaM chitravedikaH. anugAstasya vitrastAH prAdravansarvato dishaH.. 7-38-8 (46396) ArjuneH karma taddR^iShTvA sampraNeduH samantataH. nAdena sarvabhUtAni sAdhusAdhviti bhArata.. 7-38-9 (46397) shalyabhrAtaryathArugNe bahushastasya sainikAH. kulAdhivAsanAmAni shrAvayanto.arjunAtmajam.. 7-38-10 (46398) abhyadhAvanta sa~NkruddhA vividhAyudhapANayaH. rathairashvairgajaishchAnye padbhishchAnye balotkaTAH.. 7-38-11 (46399) bANashabdena mahatA rathanemisvanena cha. huMkAraiH kShveDitotkR^iShTaiH siMhanAdaiH sagarjitaiH.. 7-38-12 (46400) jyAtalatrasvanairanye garjanto.arjunanandanam. bruvantashcha na no jIvanmokShyase jIvitAditi.. 7-38-13 (46401) tAMstathA bruvato dR^iShTvA saubhadraH prahasanniva. yo yosmai prAharatpUrvaM taM taM vivyAdha patribhiH.. 7-38-14 (46402) sandarshayiShyannastrANi vichitrANi laghUni cha. ArjuniH samare shUro mR^idupUrvamayudhyata.. 7-38-15 (46403) vAsudevAdupAttaM yadastraM yachcha dhana~njayAt. adarshayata tatkArShNiH kR^iShNAbhyAmavisheShavat.. 7-38-16 (46404) dUramasya guruM bhAraM sAdhvasaM cha punaH punaH. sandadhadvisR^ijaMshcheShUnnirvisheShamadR^ishyata.. 7-38-17 (46405) chApamaNDalamevAsya visphuraddikShvadR^ishyata. sudIptasya sharatkAle saviturmaNDalaM yathA.. 7-38-18 (46406) jyAshabdaH shushruve tasya talashabdashcha dAruNaH. mahAshanimuchaH kAle payodasyeva niHsvanaH.. 7-38-19 (46407) hImAnamarShI saubhadro mAnakR^itpriyadarshanaH. sammimAnayiShurvIrAniShvastraishchApyayudhyata.. 7-38-20 (46408) mR^idurbhUtvA mahArAja dAruNaH samapadyata. varShAbhyatIto bhagavA~nsharadIva divAkaraH.. 7-38-21 (46409) sharAnvichitrAnsubahUnrukmapu~NkhA~nshilAshitAn. mumocha shatashaH kruddho gabhastIniva bhAskaraH.. 7-38-22 (46410) kShuraprairvatsadantaishcha vipATheshcha mahAyashAH. nArAchairardhachandrAbhairbhallaira~njalikairapi.. 7-38-23 (46411) avAkiradrathAnIkaM bhAradvAjasya pashyataH. tatastatsainyamabhavadvimukhaM sharapIDitam.. .. 7-38-24 (46412) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi trayodashadivasayuddhe aShTatriMsho.adhyAyaH.. 38 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-38-5 talpaM iti pAThe rathagatashayyAm.. 5-38-10 adhivAso nivAsaH.. 5-38-16 avisheShavattulyamityarthaH.. 5-38-17 asya nirasya.. 5-38-38 aShTatriMsho.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 039

.. shrIH ..

7.39. adhyAyaH 039

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

dushshAsanAbhimanyusamAgamaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-39-0 (46413) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-39-0x (4353) dvaidhIbhavati me chittaM shuchA tuShTyA cha sa~njaya. mama putrasya yatnainyaM saubhadraH samavArayat.. 7-39-1 (46414) vistareNaiva me shaMsa sarvaM gAvalgaNe punaH. vikrIDitaM kumArasya skandasyevAsuraiH saha.. 7-39-2 (46415) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-39-3x (4354) hanta te sampravakShyAmi vimardamatidAruNam. ekasya cha bahUnAM cha yathAsIttumulo raNaH.. 7-39-3 (46416) abhimanyuH kR^itotsAhaH kR^itotsAhAnarindamAn. rathastho rathinaH sarvAMstAvakAnabhyavarShayat.. 7-39-4 (46417) droNaM karNaM kR^ipaM shalyaM drauNiM bhojaM bR^ihadbalam.. duryodhanaM saumadattiM shakuniM cha mahAbalam.. 7-39-5 (46418) nAnAnR^ipAnnR^ipasutAnsainyAni vividhAni cha. alAtachakravatsarvAMshcharanbANaiH samArpayat.. 7-39-6 (46419) nighnannamitrAnsaubhadraH paramAstraiH pratApavAn. adarshayata tejasvI dikShu sarvAsu bhArata.. 7-39-7 (46420) taddR^iShTvA charitaM tasya saubhadrasyAmitaujasaH. samakampanta sainyAni tvadIyAni sahasrashaH.. 7-39-8 (46421) athAbravInmahAprAj~no bhAradvAjaH pratApavAn. harSheNotphullanayanaH kR^ipamAbhAShya satvaram.. 7-39-9 (46422) ghaTayanniva marmANi putrasya tava bhArata. abhimanyuM raNe dR^iShTvA tadA raNavishAradam.. 7-39-10 (46423) droNa uvAcha. 7-39-11x (4355) eSha gachChati saubhadraH pArthAnAM prathito yuvA. nandayansuhR^idaH sarvAnrAjAnaM cha yudhiShThiram.. 7-39-11 (46424) nakulaM sahadevaM cha bhImasenaM cha pANDavam. bandhUnsambandhinashchAnyAnmadhyasthAnsuhR^idastathA.. 7-39-12 (46425) nAsya yuddhe samaM manye ka~nchidanyaM dhanurdharam. ichChanhanyAdimAM senAM kimarthamapi nechChati.. 7-39-13 (46426) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-39-14x (4356) droNasya prItisaMyuktaM shrutvA vAkyaM tavAtmajaH. ArjuniM prati sa~Nkruddho droNaM dR^iShTvA smayanniva.. 7-39-14 (46427) atha duryodhanaH karNamabravIdbAhlikaM nR^ipaH. duHshAsanaM madrarAjaM tAMstathA.anyAnmahArathAn.. 7-39-15 (46428) sarvabhUrdhAbhiShiktAnAmAchAryo brahmavittamaH. arjunasya sutaM mUDhaM nAyaM hantumihechChati.. 7-39-16 (46429) na hyasya samare yuddhyedantako.apyAtatAyinaH. kima~Nga punarevAnyo martyaH satyaM bravImi vaH.. 7-39-17 (46430) arjunasya sutaM tveSha shiShyatvAdabhirakShati. shiShyAH putrAshcha dayitAstadapatyaM cha dharmiNAm.. 7-39-18 (46431) saMrakShyamANo droNena manyate vIryamAtmanaH. AtmasambhAvito mUDhastaM pramathnIta mAchiram.. 7-39-19 (46432) evamuktAstu te rAj~nA sAtvatIputramabhyayuH. saMrabdhAste jighAMsanto bhAradvAjasya pashyataH.. 7-39-20 (46433) duHshAsanastu tachChrutvA duryodhanavachastadA. abravItkurushArdUla duryodhanamidaM vachaH.. 7-39-21 (46434) ahamenaM haniShyAmi mahArAja bravImi te. miShatAM pANDu putrANAM pA~nchAlAnAM cha pashyatAm.. 7-39-22 (46435) grasiShyAmyadya saubhadraM yathA rAhurdivAkaram. utkrushya chAbravIdvAkyaM kururAjamidaM punaH.. 7-39-23 (46436) shrutvA kR^iShNau mayA grastaM saubhadramatimAninau. gamiShyataH pretalokaM jIvalokAnna saMshayaH.. 7-39-24 (46437) tau cha shrutvA mR^itau vyaktaM pANDoH kShetrodbhavAH sutAH. ekAhvA sasuhR^idvargAH klaibyAddhAsyanti jIvitam.. 7-39-25 (46438) tasmAdasminhate shatrau hatAH sarve.ahitAstava. shivena mAM dhyAhi rAjanneSha hanmi ripUMstava.. 7-39-26 (46439) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-39-27x (4357) evamuktvA.anadadrAjanputro duHshAsanastava. saubhadramabhyayAtkruddhaH sharavarShairavAkiran.. 7-39-27 (46440) tamatikruddhamAyAntaM tava putramariMdamaH. abhimanyuH sharaistIkShNaiH ShaDviMshatyA samArpayat.. 7-39-28 (46441) duHshAsanastu sa~NkruddhaH prabhinna iva ku~njaraH. ayodhayata saubhadramabhimanyushcha taM raNe.. 7-39-29 (46442) tau maNDalAni chitrANi rathAbhyAM savyadakShiNam. charamANAvayudhyetAM rathashikShAvishAradau.. 7-39-30 (46443) atha paNavamR^ida~NgadundubhInAM krakachamahAnakabherijharjharANam. ninadamatibhR^ishaM narAH prachakru-- rlavaNajalodbhavasiMhanAdamishram.. .. 7-39-31 (46444) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi trayodashadivasayuddhe ekonachatvAriMsho.adhyAyaH.. 39 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-39-17 a~NgetyasUyAyAm.. 5-39-18 dharmiNAmiti solluNTham.. 5-39-19 AtmasaMbhAvitaH ahameveti sambhAvanAmArUDhaH.. 5-39-31 lavaNajalodbhavaH sha~NkhaH.. 5-39-39 ekonachatvAriMsho.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 040

7.40. adhyAyaH 040

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

abhimanyunA karNaduHshAsanaparAjayaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-40-0 (46445) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-40-0x (4358) `tataH samabhavadyuddhaM tayoH puruShasiMhayoH. tasminkAle mahAbAhuH saubhadraH paravIrahA.. 7-40-1 (46446) sasharaM kArmukaM ChittvA lAghavena vyapAtayat. duHshAsanaM sharaistIkShNaiH saMtatakSha samantataH'.. 7-40-2 (46447) sharavikShatagAtraM tu pratyamitramavasthitam. abhimanyuH smayandhImAnduHshAsanamathAbravIt.. 7-40-3 (46448) diShTyA pashyAmi sa~Ngrame mAninaM shUramAgatam. niShThuraM tyaktadharmANamAkroshanaparAyaNam.. 7-40-4 (46449) yatsabhAyAM tvayA rAj~no dhR^itarAShTrasya shR^iNvataH. kopitaH paruShairvAkyairdharmarAjo yudhiShThiraH.. 7-40-5 (46450) jayonmattena bhImashcha bahvabaddhaM prabhAShitaH. akShakUTaM samAshritya saubalasyAtmano balam.. 7-40-6 (46451) tattvayedamanuprAptaM tasya kopAnmahAtmanaH. paravittApahArasya kodhasyAprashamasya cha.. 7-40-7 (46452) lobhasya j~nAnanAshasya drohasyAtyAhitasya cha. pitR^INAM mama rAjyasya haraNasyogradhanvinAm.. 7-40-8 (46453) tattvayedamanuprAptaM prakopAdvai mahAtmanAm. sa tasyogramadharmasya phalaM prApnuhi durmate.. 7-40-9 (46454) shAsitA.asmyadya te bANaiH sarvasainyasya pashyataH. adyAhamanR^iNastasya kopasya bhavitA raNe.. 7-40-10 (46455) amarShitAyAH kR^iShNAyAH kA~NkShitasya cha me pituH. adya kauravya bhImasya bhavitAsmyanR^iNo yudhi. na hi me mokShyase jIvanyadi notsR^ijase raNaM.. 7-40-11 (46456) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-40-12x (4359) evamuktvA mahAbAhurbANaM duHshAsanAntakam. saMdadhe paravIraghnaH kAlAgnyanilavarchasam.. 7-40-12 (46457) tasyorastUrNamAsAdya jatrudeshe vibhidya tam. jagAma saha pu~Nkhena valmIkamiva pannagaH. athainaM pa~nchaviMshatyA punareva samArpayat.. 7-40-13 (46458) sharairagnisamasparshairAkarNasamachoditaiH. sa gADhaviddho vyathito rathopastha upAvishat. duHshAsano mahArAja kashmalaM chAvishanmahat.. sArathistvaramANastu duHshAsanamachetanam. raNamadhyAdapovAha saubhadrasharapIDitam.. 7-40-14 (46459) pANDavA draupadeyAshcha virATashcha samIkShya tam. pA~nchAlAH kekayAshchaiva siMhanAdamathAnadan.. 7-40-16 (46460) vAditrANi cha sarvANi nAnAli~NgAni sarvashaH. prAvAdayanta saMhR^iShTAH pANDUnAM tatra sainikAH.. 7-40-17 (46461) apashyansmayamAnAshcha saubhadrasya vicheShTitam. atyantavairiNaM dR^iptaM dR^iShTvA shatruM parAjitam.. 7-40-18 (46462) dharmamArutashakrANAmashvinoH pratimAstathA. dhArayanto dhvajAgreShu draupadeyA mahArathAH.. 7-40-19 (46463) sAtyakishchekitAnashcha dhR^iShTadyumnashikhaNDinau. kekayA dhR^iShTaketushcha mAtsyAH pA~nchAlasR^i~njayAH.. 7-40-20 (46464) pANDavAshcha mudA yuktA yudhiShThirapurogamAH. abhyadravanta tvaritA droNAnIkaM bibhitsavaH.. 7-40-21 (46465) tato.abhavanmahAyuddhaM tvadIyAnAM paraiH saha. jayamAkA~NkShamANAnAM shUrANAmanivartinAm.. 7-40-22 (46466) tathA tu vartamAne vai sa~NgrAme.atibhayaMkare. duryodhano mahArAja rAdheyamidamabravIt.. 7-40-23 (46467) pashya duHshAsanaM vIramabhimanyuvashaMgatam. pratapantamivAdityaM nighnantaM shAtravAnraNe. 7-40-24 (46468) atha chaite susaMrabdhAH siMhA iva balotkaTAH. saubhadramudyatAstrAtumabhyadhAvanta pANDavAH.. 7-40-25 (46469) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-40-26x (4360) tataH karNaH sharaistIkShNairabhimanyuM durAsadam. abhyavarShata sa~NkruddhaH putrasya hitakR^ittava.. 7-40-26 (46470) tasya chAnucharAMstIkShNairvivyAgha parameShubhiH. avaj~nApUrvakaM shUraH saubhadrasya paraNAjire.. 7-40-27 (46471) abhimanyustu rAdheyaM trisaptatyA shilImukhaiH. avidhyattvarito rAjandroNaM prepsurmahAmanAH.. 7-40-28 (46472) taM tathA nAshakatkashchiddoNAdvArayituM rathI. ArujantaM rathavrAtAnvajrahastAtmajAtmajam.. 7-40-29 (46473) tataH karNo jayaprepsurmAnI sarvadhanuShmatAm. saubhadraM shatasho.avidhyaduttamAstrANi darshayan.. 7-40-30 (46474) so.astrairastravidAM shreShTho rAmashiShyaH pratApavAn. samare shatrudurdharShamabhimanyumapIDayat.. 7-40-31 (46475) sa tathA pIDyamAnastu rAdheyenAstravR^iShTibhiH. samare.amarasa~NkAshaH saubhadro na vyashIryata.. 7-40-32 (46476) tataH shilAshitaistIkShNairbhallairAnataparvabhiH. ChittvA dhanUMShi shUrANAmArjuniH karNamArdayat.. 7-40-33 (46477) dhanurmaNDalanirmuktaiH sharairAshIviShopamaiH. sachChatradhvajayantAraM sAshvamAshu smayanniva.. 7-40-34 (46478) karNo.api chAsya chikShepa bANAnsannataparvaNaH. asambrAntashcha tAnsarvAnagR^ihNAtphalgunAtmajaH.. 7-40-35 (46479) tato muhUrtAtkarNasya bANenaikena vIryavAn. sadhvajaM kArmukaM vIrashChittvA bhUmAvapAtayat.. 7-40-36 (46480) tataH kR^ichChragataM karNaM dR^iShTvA karNAdanantaraH. saubhadramabhyayAttUrNaM dR^iDhamudyamya kArmukam.. 7-40-37 (46481) tata uchchukrushuH pArthAsteShAM chAnucharA janAH. vAditrANi cha sa~njaghnaH saubhadraM chApi tuShTuvuH.. .. 7-40-38 (46482) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi trayodashadivasayuddhe chatvAriMsho.adhyAyaH.. 40 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-40-8 atyAhitasya jIvAnapekShakarmaNaH. sAhasasyetiyAvat.. 5-40-40 chatvAriMsho.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 041

.. shrIH ..

7.41. adhyAyaH 041

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

abhimanyuparAkramavarNanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-41-0 (46483) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-41-0x (4361) so.abhyagachChaddhanuShpANirjyAM vikarShanpunaH punaH. sachChatradhvajayantAraM sAshvamAshu smayanniva.. 7-41-1 (46484) so.apidhyaddashabhirbANairabhimanyuM durAsadam. sachChatradhvajayantAraM sAshvamAshu smayanniva.. 7-41-2 (46485) pitR^ipaitAmahaM karma kurvANamatimAnuSham. dR^iShTvArditaM sharaiH kArShmiM tvadIyA hR^iShitA.abhavan.. 7-41-3 (46486) tasyAbhimanyurAyamya smayannekena patriNA. shiraH prachyAvayAmAsa tadrathAtprApatadbhuvi.. 7-41-4 (46487) karNikAramivAdhUtaM vAtenApatitaM nagAt. `karNAnujaM cha samprekShya tAvakA vyathitA.abhavan'. bhrAtaraM nihataM dR^iShTvA karNashchAsItparA~NmukhaH.. 7-41-5 (46488) vimukhIkR^itya karNaM tu saubhadraH ka~NkapatribhiH. anyAnapi maheShvAsAMstUrNamevAbhidudruve.. 7-41-6 (46489) tatastadvitataM senyaM hastyashvarathapattimat. kraddho.abhimanyurabhinattigmatejA mahArathaH.. 7-41-7 (46490) karNastu bahubhirbANairardyamAno.abhimanyunA. apAyAjjavanairashvaistato.anIkamabhidravat.. 7-41-8 (46491) `tiMShTha karNa maheShvAsa kR^ipa duryodhaneti cha. droNasya kroshato rAjaMstadanIkamabhajyata'.. 7-41-9 (46492) shalabhairiva chAkAshaM dhArAbhiriva parvataH. abhimanyo sharaishChannaM na prAj~nAyata ki~nchana.. 7-41-10 (46493) tAvakAnAM tu yodhAnAM vadhyatAM nishitaiH sharaiH. anyatra saindhavAdrAjanna sma kashchidatiShThata.. 7-41-11 (46494) saubhadrastu tataH sha~NkhaM pradhmAya puruSharShabhaH.. shIghramabhyapatatsenAM bhAratIM bharatarShabha.. 7-41-12 (46495) sa kakShe.agnirivotsR^iShTo nirdahaMstarasA ripUn. madhye bhAratasainyAnAmArjuniH paryavartata.. 7-41-13 (46496) rathanAgAshvamanujAnardayannishitaiH sharaiH. sampravishyAkarodbhUmiM kabandhagaNasa~NkulAm.. 7-41-14 (46497) saubhadrachApaprabhavairnikR^ittAH parameShubhiH. svAnevAbhimukhAndhnantaH prAdrava~njIvitArthinaH.. 7-41-15 (46498) te ghorA raudrakarmANo vipAThA bahavaH shitAH. nighnto rathanAgAshvA~njagmurAshu vasundharAm.. 7-41-16 (46499) sAyudhAH sA~NgulitrANAH sagadAH sA~NgadA raNe. dR^ishyante bAhavashchinnA hemAbhAraNabhUShitAH.. 7-41-17 (46500) sharAshchApAni kha~NgAshcha sharIrANi shirAMsi cha. sakuNDalAni sragvINi bhUmAvAsansahasrashaH.. 7-41-18 (46501) sopaskarairadhiShThAnairIShAdaNDakabandhuraiH. akShairvimathitaishchakrairbahudhA patitairyugaiH.. 7-41-19 (46502) shaktichApAsibhishchaiva patitaishcha mahAdhvajaiH. charmachApasharaishchaiva vyavakIrNaiH samantatataH.. 7-41-20 (46503) nihataiH kShatriyairashvairvAraNaishcha vishAmpate. agamyarUpA pR^ithivI kShaNenAsItsudAruNA.. 7-41-21 (46504) vadhyatAM rAjaputrANAM krandatAmitaretaram. prAdurAsInmahAshabdo bhIrUNAM bhayavardhanaH.. 7-41-22 (46505) sa shabdo bharatashcheShTha dishaH sarvA vyanAdayat.. saubhadrashchAdravatsenAM ghnanvarAshvarathadvipAn.. 7-41-23 (46506) kakShamagnirivotsR^iShTo nirdahaMstarasA ripUn. madhye bhAratasainyAnAmArjuniH pratyadR^ishyata.. 7-41-24 (46507) vicharantaM dishaH sarvAH pradishashchApi bhArata. taM tadA nAnupashyAmaH sainye cha rajasA.a.avR^ite.. 7-41-25 (46508) AdadAnaM gajAshvAnAM NAM chAyuMShi bhArata. kShamena bhUyaH pashyAmaH sUryaM madhyaMdine yathA.. 7-41-26 (46509) abhimanyuM mahArAja pratapantaM dviShadgaNAn. sa vAsavasamaH sa~Nkhye vAsavasyAtmajAtmajaH.. 7-41-27 (46510) abhimanyurmahArAja sainyamadhye vyarochata. `yathA purA vahnisutaH surasainyeShu vIryavAn'.. .. 7-41-28 (46511) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi trayodashadivasayuddhe ekachatvAriMsho.adhyAyaH.. 41 ..
droNaparva - adhyAya 042

.. shrIH ..

7.42. adhyAyaH 042

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sQa~njayena dhR^itarAShTraM prati abhimanyumanugatAnAM jayadgathena nirodhakathanam.. 1 .. tathA jayadgathasya rudrAt pANDavanirodharUpavaralAbhakathanam.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-42-0 (46512) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-42-0x (4362) bAlamatyantasukhinaM svabAhubaladarpitam. yuddheShvakushalaM vIraM kulaputraM tanutyajam.. 7-42-1 (46513) gAhamAnamanIkAni sadashvaishcha trihAyanaiH. api yaudhiShThirAtsainyAtkashchidanvapatadbalI.. 7-42-2 (46514) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-42-3x (4363) yudhiShThiro bhImasenaH shikhaNDI sAtyakiryamau. dhR^iShTadyumno virATashcha drupadashcha sa~NkekayaH.. 7-42-3 (46515) dhR^iShTaketushcha saMrabdho mAtsyAshchAbhyapatanraNe. tenaiva tu pathA yAntaH pitaro mAtulaiH saha.. 7-42-4 (46516) abhyadravanparIpsanto vyUDhAnIkAH prahAriNaH. tAndR^iShTvA dravataH shUrAMstvadIyA vimukhA.abhavan.. 7-42-5 (46517) tatastadvimukhaM dR^iShTvA tava sUnormahadbalam. jAmAtA tava tejasvI saMstambhayiShurAdravat.. 7-42-6 (46518) saindhavasya mahArAja putro rAjA jayadrathaH. sa putragR^iddhinaH pArthAnsahasainyAnavArayat.. 7-42-7 (46519) ugradhanvA maheShvAso divyamastramudIrayan. vArdhakShatrirupAsedhatpravaNAdiva ku~njaraH.. 7-42-8 (46520) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-42-9x (4364) katibhAramahaM manye saindhave sa~njayAhitam. yadekaH pANDavAnkruddhAnpuprepsUnavArayat.. 7-42-9 (46521) atyadbhutamahaM manye balaM shauryaM cha saindhave. tasya prabrUhi me vIryaM karma chAgryaM mahAtmanaH.. 7-42-10 (46522) kiM japtaM hutamiShTaM vA kiM sutaptamatho tapaH. `damo vA brahmacharyaM vA sUta yachchAsya sattama.. 7-42-11 (46523) devaM katamamArAdhya viShNumIshAnamabjajam. sindhurAT tanaye saktAnkruddhAnpArthAnavArayat.. 7-42-12 (46524) naivaM kR^itaM mahatkarma bhIShmeNAj~nAsiShaM tathA'. sindhurAjo hi yenaikaH pANDavAnsamavArayat.. 7-42-13 (46525) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-42-14x (4365) dvIpadIharaNe yattadbhImasenena nirjitaH. mAnAtsa taptavAnrAjA varArthI sumahattapaH.. 7-42-14 (46526) indriyANIndriyArthebhyaH priyebhyaH sannivartya saH. kShutpipAsAtakapasahaH kR^isho dhamanisantataH.. 7-42-15 (46527) devamArAdhayachCharvaM gR^iNanbrahma sanAtanam. bhaktAnukampI bhagavAMstasya chakre tato dayAm.. 7-42-16 (46528) svapnAnte.apyatha chaivAha haraH sindhupateH sutam. varaM vR^iNIShva prIto.asmi jayadratha kimichChasi.. 7-42-17 (46529) evamuktastu sharveNa sindhurAjo jayadrathaH. uvAcha praNato rudraM prA~njalirniyatAtmavAn.. 7-42-18 (46530) pANDaveyAnahaM sa~Nkhye bhImavIryaparAkramAn. vArayeyaM rathenaikaH samastAniti bhArata.. 7-42-19 (46531) evamuktastu devesho jayadrathamathAbravIt. dadAmi te varaM saumya vinA pArthaM dhana~njayam. vArayiShyasi sa~NgrAme chaturaH pANDunandanAn.. 7-42-20 (46532) `ekAhamiti rAjendra tatraivAntaradhIyata'. evamastviti deveshamuktvAbuddhyata pArthivaH.. 7-42-21 (46533) sa tena varadAnena divyenAstbalena cha. ekaH saMvArayAmAsa pANDavAnAmanIkinIm.. 7-42-22 (46534) tasya jyAtalaghoSheNa kShatriyAnbhayamAvishat. parAMstu tava sainyasya harShaH paramako.abhavat.. 7-42-23 (46535) dR^iShTvA tu kShatriyA bhAraM saindhave sarvamAhitam. utkrushyAbhyadravanrAjanyena yaudhiShThiraM balam.. .. 7-42-24 (46536) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi trayodashadivasayuddhe dvichatvAriMsho.adhyAyaH.. 42 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-42-8 pravaNAnnimnapradeshaM pnApya.. 5-42-10 balaM sAmarthyam. shauryamutsAhaH vIryaM prabhAvam.. 5-42-42 dvichatvAriMsho.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 043

.. shrIH ..

7.43. adhyAyaH 043

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

jayadrathena rudravarAt vyUhapathaM pidhAya pANDavAdinirodhaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-43-0 (46537) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-43-0x (4366) yanmAM pR^ichChasi rAjendra sindhurAjasya vikramam. shR^iNu tatsarvamAkhyAsye yathA pANDUnayodhayat.. 7-43-1 (46538) tamUhurvAjino vashyAH saindhavAH sAdhuvAhinaH. vikurvANA bR^ihanto.ashvAH shvasanoparaMhasaH.. 7-43-2 (46539) gandharvanagarAkAraM vidhivatkalpitaM ratham. tasyAbhyashobhayatketurvArAho rAjato mahAn.. 7-43-3 (46540) shvetashchatrapatAkAbhishchAmaravyajanena cha. sa babhau rAjali~NgaistaistArApatirivAmbare.. 7-43-4 (46541) muktAvajramaNisvarNairbhUShitaM tadayasmayam. varUthaM vibabhau tasya jyotirbhiH
