khamivAvR^itam.. 7-43-5 (46542) sa viShphArya mahachchApaM kiranniShugaNAnbahUna. tatkaNDaM pUrayAmAsa yadArjuniradArayat.. 7-43-6 (46543) sa sAtyakiM tribhirbANairaShTabhishcha vR^ikodaram. dhR^iShTadyumnaM tathA ShaShTyA virATaM dashabhiH sharaiH.. 7-43-7 (46544) drupadaM pa~nchabhistIkShNaiH saptabhishcha shikhaNDinam. kekayAnpa~nchaviMshatyA draupadeyAMstribhistribhiH.. 7-43-8 (46545) yudhiShThiraM tu saptatyA tataH sheShAnapAnudat. iShujAlena mahatA tadadbhutamivAbhavat.. 7-43-9 (46546) athAsya shitapItena bhallenAdishya kArmukam. chichCheda prahasanrAjA dharmaputraH pratApavAn.. 7-43-10 (46547) akShNornimeShamAtreNa so.anyadAdAya kArmukam. vivyAdha dashabhiH pArthaM tAMshchaivAnyAMstribhistribhiH.. 7-43-11 (46548) tattasya lAghavaM j~nAtvA bhImo bhallaistribhistribhiH. dhanurdhvajaM cha chChatraM cha kShitau kShipramapAtayat.. 7-43-12 (46549) so.anyadAdAya balavAnsajjaM kR^itvA cha kArmukam. bhImasyApAtayatketuM dhanurashvAMshcha mAriSha.. 7-43-13 (46550) sa hatAshvAdavaplutya chChinnadhanvA rathottamAt. sotyakerApluto yAnaM giryagramiva kesarI.. 7-43-14 (46551) tatastvadIyAH saMhR^iShTAH sAdhusAdhviti vAdinaH. sindhurAjasya tatkarma prekShyAshraddheyamadbhutam.. 7-43-15 (46552) sa~NkruddhAnpANDavAneko yaddadhArAstratejasA. tattasya karma bhUtAni sarvANyevAbhyapUjayan.. 7-43-16 (46553) saubhadreNa hataiH pUrvaM sottarAyodhibhirdvipaiH. pANDUnAM darshitaH panthAH saindhavena nivAritaH.. 7-43-17 (46554) yatamAnAstu te vIrA mAtsyapA~nchAlakekayAH. pANDavAshchAnvapadyanta pratishekurna saindhavam.. 7-43-18 (46555) yo yo hi yatate bhettuM droNAnIkaM tavAhitaH. tattameva varaM prApya saindhavaH pratyavArayat.. .. 7-43-19 (46556) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhamanyuvadhaparvaNi trayodashadivasayuddhe trichatvAriMsho.adhyAyaH.. 43 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-43-5 varUthaM rathaveShTanam.. 5-43-10 Adishya eSha chChinadmItyuddishya.. 5-43-43 trichatvAriMsho.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 044

.. shrIH ..

7.44. adhyAyaH 044

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

abhimanyuparAkramavarNanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-44-0 (46557) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-44-0x (4367) saindhavena niruddheShu jayagR^iddhiShu pANQDuShu. sughoramabhavadyuddhaM tvadIyAnAM paraiH saha.. 7-44-1 (46558) pravishyAthArjuniH senAM satyasandho durAsadaH. vyakShobhayata tejasvI makaraH sAgaraM yathA.. 7-44-2 (46559) taM tathA sharavarSheNa ChAdayantamariMdamam. yathA pradhAnAH saubhadramabhyayuH kurusattamAH.. 7-44-3 (46560) teShAM tasya cha sammardo dAruNaH samapadyata. sR^ijatAM sharavarShANi prasaktamamitaujasAm.. 7-44-4 (46561) rathavrajena saMruddhastairamitraistathA.a.arjuniH. vR^iShasenasya yantAraM hatvA chichCheda kArmukam.. 7-44-5 (46562) taM cha vivyAdha balavAMstasya chAshvAnajihmagaiH. vAtAyamAnaistairashvairvisaMj~no.apahR^ito raNAt.. 7-44-6 (46563) tenAntareNAbhimanyoryantApAsArayadratham. rathavrajAstato hR^iShTAH sAdhusAdhviti chukrushuH.. 7-44-7 (46564) taM siMhamiva sa~NkruddhaM pramathnantaM sharairarIn. ArAdAyAntamabhyetya vasAtIyo.abhyayAddrutam.. 7-44-8 (46565) so.abhimanyuM sharaiH ShaShTyA rukmapu~NkairavAkirat. abravIchcha na me jIva~njIvato yudhi mokShyase.. 7-44-9 (46566) tamayasmayavarmANamiShuNA dUrapAtinA. vivyAdha hR^idi saubhadraH sa papAta vyasuH kShitau.. 7-44-10 (46567) vasAtIyaM hataM dR^iShTvA kruddhAH kShatriyapu~NgavAH. parivavrustadA rAjaMstava pautraM jighAMsavaH.. 7-44-11 (46568) viShphArayantashchApAni nAnArUpANyanekashaH. tadyuddhamabhavadraudraM saubhadrasyAribhiH saha.. 7-44-12 (46569) teShAM sharAnseShvasanA~nsharIrANi shirAMsi cha. sakuNDalAni sragvINi kruddhashchichCheda phAlguniH.. 7-44-13 (46570) sakha~NgAH sA~NgulitrANAH sapaTTasaparashvathAH. adR^ishyanta bhujAshChinnA hemAbharaNabhUShitAH.. 7-44-14 (46571) sragbhirAbharaNairvastraiH patitairvividhairdhvajaiH. varmabhishcharmabhirhArairmukuTaishChatrachAmaraiH.. 7-44-15 (46572) upaskarairadhiShThAnairIShAdaNDakabandhuraiH. akShairvimathitaishchakrairbhagnaishcha bahudhA yugaiH.. 7-44-16 (46573) anukarShaiH patAkAbhistathA sArathivAjibhiH. rathaishcha bhagnairnAgaishcha hataiH kIrNAbhavanmahI.. 7-44-17 (46574) nihataiH kShatriyaiH shUrairnAnAjanapadeshvaraiH. jayagR^iddhairvR^itA bhUmirdAruNA samapadyata.. 7-44-18 (46575) disho vicharatastasya sarvAshcha pradishastathA. raNe.abhimanyoH kruddhasya rUpamantaradhIyata.. 7-44-19 (46576) kA~nchanaM yadyadasyAsIdvarma chAbharaNAni cha. dhanuShashcha sharANAM cha tadapashyAma kevalam.. 7-44-20 (46577) taM tadA nAshakatkashchichchakShurbhyAmabhivIkShitum. AdadAnaM sharairyodhAnmadhye sUryamiva sthitam.. .. 7-44-21 (46578) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi trayodashadivasayuddhe chatushchatvAriMsho.adhyAyaH.. 44 ..
droNaparva - adhyAya 045

.. shrIH ..

7.45. adhyAyaH 045

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

abhimanyoH parAkramaH tena duryodhanaparAjayaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-45-0 (46579) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-45-0x (4368) AdadAnastu shUrANAmAyuMShyabhavadArjuniH. antakaH sarvabhUtAnAM prANAnkAla ivAgate.. 7-45-1 (46580) sa shakra iva vikrAntaH shakrasUnoH suto balI. abhimanyustadAnIkaM loDayansamadR^ishyata.. 7-45-2 (46581) pravishyaiva tu rAjendra kShatriyendrAntakopamaH. satyashravasamAdatta vyAghro mR^igamivolbaNaH.. 7-45-3 (46582) satyashravasi chAkShipte tvaramANA mahArathAH. pragR^ihya vipulaM shastramabhimanyumupAdravan.. 7-45-4 (46583) ahaMpUrvamahaMpUrvamiti kShatriyapu~NgavAH. spardhamAnAH samAjagmurjighAMsanto.arjunAtmajam.. 7-45-5 (46584) kShatriyANAmanIkAni pradrutAnyabhidhAvatAm. jagrAha timirAsAdya kShudramatsyAnivArNive.. 7-45-6 (46585) ye kechana gatAstasya samIpamapalAyinaH. na te pratinyavartanta samudrAdiva sindhavaH.. 7-45-7 (46586) mahAgrahagR^ihIteva vAtavegabhayArditA. samakampata sA senA vibhraShTA naurivArNave.. 7-45-8 (46587) atha rukmaratho nAma madreshvarasuto balI. trastAmAshvAsayansenAmatrasto vAkyamabravIt.. 7-45-9 (46588) alaM trAsena vaH shUrA naiSha kashchinmayi sthite. ahamenaM grIhaShyAmi jIvagrAhaM na saMshayaH.. 7-45-10 (46589) evamuktvA tu saubhadramabhidudrAva vIryavAn. sukalpitenohyamAnaH syandanena virAjatA.. 7-45-11 (46590) so.abhimanyuM tribhirbANairviddhvA vakShasyathAnadat. tribhishcha dakShiNe bAhau savye cha nishitaistribhiH.. 7-45-12 (46591) sa tasyeShvasanaM ChittvA phAlguniH savyadakShiNau. bhujau shirashcha svakShibhru kShitau kShipramapAtayat.. 7-45-13 (46592) dR^iShTvA rukmarathaM rugNaM putraM shalyasya mAninam. jIvagrAhaM jighR^ikShantaM saubhadreNa yashasvinA.. 7-45-14 (46593) sa~NgrAmadurmadA rAjanrAjaputrAH prahAriNaH. vayasyAH shalyaputrasya suvarNavikR^itadhvajAH.. 7-45-15 (46594) tAlamAtrANi chApAni vikarShanto mahAbalAH. ArjuniM sharavarSheNa samantAtparyavArayan.. 7-45-16 (46595) shUraiH nikShAbalopetaistaruNairatyamarShaNaiH. dR^iShTvaikaM samare shUraM saubhadramaparAjitam.. 7-45-17 (46596) ChAdyamAnaM sharavrAtairhR^iShTo duryodhano.abhavat. vaivasvatasya bhavanaM gataM hyemamanyata.. 7-45-18 (46597) suvarNapu~NkhairiShubhirnAnAli~NgaiH sutejanaiH. adR^ishyamArjuniM chakrurnimeShAtte nR^ipAtmajAH.. 7-45-19 (46598) sasUtAshvadhvajaM tasya syandanaM taM cha mAriSha. AchitaM samapashyAma shvAvidhaM shalalairiva.. 7-45-20 (46599) sa gADhaviddhaH kruddhashcha totrairgaja ivArditaH. gAndharvamastramAyachChadrathamAyAM cha bhArata.. 7-45-21 (46600) arjuno tapastaptvA gandharvebhyo yadAhR^itam. tumburupramukhebhyo vai tenAmohayatAhitAn.. 7-45-22 (46601) ekadhA shatadhA rAjandR^ishyate sma sahasradhA. alAtachakravatsa~Nkhye kShipramastrANi darshayan.. 7-45-23 (46602) rathacharyAstramAyAbhirmohayitvA parantapaH. bibheda shatadhA rAja~nsharIrANi mahIkShitAm.. 7-45-24 (46603) prANAH prANabhR^itAM sa~Nkhye preShitA nishitaiH sharaiH. rAjanprApurasuM lokaM sharIrANyavaniM yayuH.. 7-45-25 (46604) dhanUMShyashvAnniyantR^IMshcha dhvajAnbAhUMshcha sA~NgadAn. sirAMsi cha shitairbANaisteShAM chichCheda phAlguniH.. 7-45-26 (46605) chUtArAmo yathA bhagnaH pa~nchavarShaH phalopagaH. rAjaputrashataM tadvatsaubhadreNa nipAtitam.. 7-45-27 (46606) kruddhAshIviShasa~NkAshAnsukumArAnsukhochitAn. ekena nihatAndR^iShTvA bhIto duryodhano.abhavat.. 7-45-28 (46607) rathinaH ku~njarAnashvAnpadAtIMshchAvamarditAn. dR^iShTvA duryodhanaH kShipramupAyAttamamarShitaH.. 7-45-29 (46608) tayoH kShaNamivApUrvaH sa~NgrAmaH samapadyata. athAbhavatte vimukhaH putraH sharashatAhataH.. .. 7-45-30 (46609) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi trayodashadisayuddhe pa~nchatvAriMsho.adhyAyaH.. 45 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-45- AyachChatprayuktavAn. rathamAyAM durlakShyAM rathashikShAm.. 5-45- phalopagaH phalonmukhaH.. 5-45- pa~nchachatvAriMsho.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 046

.. shrIH ..

7.46. adhyAyaH 046

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

abhimanyunA duryodhanasUnorlakShmaNasya vadhaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-46-0 (46610) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-46-0x (4369) yathA vadasi me sUta ekasya bahubhiH saha. sa~NgrAmaM tumulaM ghoraM jayaM chaiva mahAtmanaH.. 7-46-1 (46611) ashraddheyamivAshcharyaM saubhadrasyAtha vikramam. kintu nAtyadbhutaM teShAM yeShAM dharmo vyapAshrayaH.. 7-46-2 (46612) duryodhane cha vimukhe rAjaputrashate hate. saubhadre pratipattiM kAM pratyapadyanta mAmakAH.. 7-46-3 (46613) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-46-4x (4370) saMshuShkAsyAshchalannetrAH prasvinnA romaharShaNAH. pAlayanakR^itotsAhA nirutsAhA dviShQajjaye.. 7-46-4 (46614) hatAnbhrAtR^InpitR^InputrAnsuhR^itsambandhibAndhavAn. utsR^ijyotsR^ijya sa~njagmustvarayanto hayadvipAn.. 7-46-5 (46615) tAnprabhagnAMstathA dR^iShTvA droNo drauNirbR^ihadbalaH. kR^ipo duryodhanaH karNaH kR^itavarmAtha saubalaH.. 7-46-6 (46616) abhyadhAvansusa~NkruddhAH saubhadramaparAjitam. te tu pautreNa te rAjanprAyasho vimukhIkR^itAH. `saubhadreNa mahArAja shakrapratimatejasA'.. 7-46-7 (46617) ekastu sukhasaMvR^iddho bAlyAddarpAchcha nirbhayaH. iShvastravinmahAtejA lakShmaNo.arjunimabhyayAt.. 7-46-8 (46618) tamanvagevAsya pitA putragR^iddhI nyavartata. anuduryodhanaM chAnye nyavartanta mahArathAH.. 7-46-9 (46619) taM te.abhiShiShichurbANairmeghA girimivAmbubhiH. sa tu tAnpramamAthaiko viShvagvAto yathAmbudAn.. 7-46-10 (46620) pautraM tava cha durdharShaM lakShmaNaM priyadarshanam. pituH samIpe tiShThantaM shUramudyatakArmukam.. 7-46-11 (46621) atyantasukhasaMvR^iddhaM dhaneshvarasutopamam. AsasAda raNe kArShNirmatto mattamiva dvipam. `siMhashAbo vane shashvatpuNDarIkashishuM yathA'.. 7-46-12 (46622) lakShmaNena tu sa~Ngamya saubhadraH paravIrahA. sharaiH sunishitaistIkShNairbAhvorurasi chArpayat.. 7-46-13 (46623) sa~Nkruddhau vai mahArAja daNDAhata ivoragaH. pautrastava mahArAja tava pautramabhAShata.. 7-46-14 (46624) sudR^iShTaH kriyatAM loko hyamuM lokaM gamiShyasi. pashyatAM bAndhavAnAM tvAM nayAmi yamasAdanam.. 7-46-15 (46625) evamuktvA tato bhallaM saubhadraH paravIrahA. udbabarha mahAbAhurnirmuktoragasannibham.. 7-46-16 (46626) sa tasya bhujanirmukto lakShmaNasya sudarshanam. sunasaM subhru keshAntaM shiro.ahArShItsakuNDalam.. 7-46-17 (46627) `pautrastu tava durdharShaM lakShmaNaM priyadarshanam. pituH samIpe tiShThantaM prAhiNodyamasAdanam.. 7-46-18 (46628) atyantasukhasaMvR^iddhaM dhaneshvarasutopamam'. lakShmaNAM nihataM dR^iShTvA hAhetyuchchukrushurjanAH.. 7-46-19 (46629) tato duryodhanaH kruddhaH priye putre nipAtite. hatainamiti chukrosha kShatriyAnkShatriyarShabhaH.. 7-46-20 (46630) tato droNaH kR^ipaH karNo droNaputro bR^ihadbalaH. kR^itavarmA cha hArdikyaH ShaDrathAH paryavArayan.. 7-46-21 (46631) tAMstu viddhA shitairbANairvimukhIkR^itya chArjuniH. vegenAbhyapatatkruddhaH saindhavasya mahadbalam.. 7-46-22 (46632) Avavrustasya panthAnaM gajAnIkena daMshitAH. kali~NgAshcha niShAdAshcha krAthaputrashcha vIryavAn. tatprasaktamivAtyarthaM yuddhamAsIdvishAmpate.. 7-46-23 (46633) tatastatku~njarAnIkaM vyadhamaddhR^iShTamArjuniH. yathA vAyurnityagatirjaladA~nshatasho.ambare.. 7-46-24 (46634) tataH kruddhAH sharavrAtai rAjAnaH samavArayan. athetare sannivR^ittAH punardroNamukhA rathAH. paramAstrANi dhunvAnAH saubhadramabhidudruvuH.. 7-46-25 (46635) tAnnivAryArjunirbANaiH krAthaputramayodhayat. sharaugheNAprameyeNa tvaramANo jighausayA.. 7-46-26 (46636) sadhanurbANakeyUrau bAhU samukuTaM shiraH. sachChatradhvajayantAraM rathaM chAshvAnnyapAtayat.. 7-46-27 (46637) kulashIlashrutibalaiH kIrtyA chAstrabalena cha. yukte tasminhate vIrAH prAyasho vimukhA.abhavan.. .. 7-46-28 (46638) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi trayodashadivasayuddhe ShaTchatvAriMsho.adhyAyaH.. 46 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-46-3 pratipattiM pratividhAnam.. 5-46-10 viShvagvAto.asheShadigvAtaH.. 5-46-17 keshAntaM keshairmanoharam. antaH prAnte.antike madhye svarUpe cha manohare ityabhidhAnAt.. 5-46-23 dhR^iShTaM pragalbham.. 5-46-46 ShaTchatvAriMsho.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 047

.. shrIH ..

7.47. adhyAyaH 047

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

abhimanyuparAkramavarNanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-47-0 (46639) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-47-0x (4371) tathA praviShTaM taruNaM saubhadramaparAjitam. kulAnurUpaM kurvANaM sa~NgrAmeShvaparAjitam.. 7-47-1 (46640) AjAneyaiH subalibhiryAntamashvaistrihAyanaiH. plavamAnamivAkAshe ke shUrAH samavArayan.. 7-47-2 (46641) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-47-3x (4372) abhimanyuH pravishyaitAMstAvakAnnishitaiH sharaiH. akarotpArthivAnsarvAnvimukhAnpANDunandanaH.. 7-47-3 (46642) taM tu droNaH kR^ipaH karNo drauNishcha sabR^ihadbalaH. kR^itavarmA cha hArdikyaH ShaDrathAH paryavArayan.. 7-47-4 (46643) dR^iShTvA tu saindhave bhAramatimAtraM samAhitam. sainyaM tava mahArAja yudhiShThiramupAdravat.. 7-47-5 (46644) saubhadramitare vIramabhyavarSha~nsharAmbubhiH. tAlamAtrANi chApAni vikarShanto mahAbalAH.. 7-47-6 (46645) tAMstu sarvAnmaheShvAsAnsarvavidyAsu niShThitAn. vyadR^iShTambhayadraNe bANaiH saubhadraH paravIrahA.. 7-47-7 (46646) droNaM pa~nchAshatAvidhyadviMshatyA cha bR^ihadbalam. ashItyA kR^itavarmANaM kR^ipaM ShaShTyA shilImukhaiH.. 7-47-8 (46647) rukmapu~NkhairmahAvegairAkarNasamachoditaiH. avidhyaddashabhirbANairashvatthAmAnamArjuniH.. 7-47-9 (46648) karNaM cha karNinA karNe pItena cha shitena cha. phAlgunirdviShatAM madhye vivyAdha parameShuNA.. 7-47-10 (46649) pAtayitvA kR^ipasyAshvAMstathobhau pArShNisArathI. athainaM dashabhirbANaiH pratyavidhyatstanAntare.. 7-47-11 (46650) tato bR^indArakaM vIraM kurUNAM kIrtivardhanam. putrANAM tava vIrANAM pashyatAmavadhIdbalI.. 7-47-12 (46651) taM drauNiH pa~nchaviMshatyA kShudrakANAM samArpayat. varaMvaramamitrANAmArujantamabhItavat.. 7-47-13 (46652) sa tu bANaiH shitaistUrNaM pratyavidhyata mAriSha. pashyatAM dhArtarAShTrANAmashvatthAmAnamArjuniH.. 7-47-14 (46653) ShaShTyA sharANAM taM drauNistigmadhAraiH sutejanaiH. ugrairnAkampayadviddhvA mainAkamiva parvatam.. 7-47-15 (46654) sa tu drauNiM trisaptatyA hemapu~NghairajihmagaiH. pratyavidhyanmahAtejA balavAnapakAriNam.. 7-47-16 (46655) tasmindroNo bANashataM putragR^iddhI nyapAtayat. ashvatthAmA tathA.aShTau cha parIpsanpitaraM raNe.. 7-47-17 (46656) karNo dvAviMshatiM bhallAnkR^itavarmA cha viMshatim. bR^ihadbalastu pa~nchAshatkR^ipaH shAradvato dasha.. 7-47-18 (46657) tAMstu pratyavadhItsarvAndashabhirdashabhiH sharaiH. tairardyamAnaH saubhadraH sarvato nishitaiH sharaiH.. 7-47-19 (46658) taM kosalAnAmadhipaH karNinA.atADayaddhR^idi. sa tasyAshvAndhvajaM chApaM sUtaM chApAtayatkShitau.. 7-47-20 (46659) atha kosalarAjastu virathaH kha~NgracharmadhR^it. iyeSha phAlguneH kAyAchChiro hartuM sakuNDalam.. 7-47-21 (46660) sa kosalAnAmadhipaM rAjaputraM bR^ihadbalam. hR^idi vivyAdha vANena sa bhinnahR^idayo.apatat.. 7-47-22 (46661) babha~nja cha sahasrANi dasha rAj~nAM mahAtmanAm. sR^ijatAmashivA vAchaH kha~NgakArmukadhAriNAm.. 7-47-23 (46662) tathA bR^ihadbalaM hatvA saubhadro vyacharadraNe. vyaShTambhayanmaheShvAso yodhAMstava sharAmbubhiH.. .. 7-47-24 (46663) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi troyadashadivasayuddhe saptachatvAriMsho.adhyAyaH.. 47 ..
droNaparva - adhyAya 048

.. shrIH ..

7.48. adhyAyaH 048

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

droNAdibhiH ShaDbhirabhimanyorvirathIkaraNam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-48-0 (46664) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-48-0x (4373) sa karNaM karNinA karNe punarvivyAdha phAlguniH. sharaiH pa~nchAshatA chainamavidhyatkopayanbhR^isham.. 7-48-1 (46665) prativivyAdha rAdheyastAvadbhiratha taM punaH. sharairAchitasarvA~Ngo bahvashobhata bhArata.. 7-48-2 (46666) karNaM chApyakarotkruddho rudhirotpIDavAhinam. karNo.api vibabhau shUraH sharaishChinno.asR^igAtapluH. `sandhAnugataparyantaH sharadIva divAkaraH'.. 7-48-3 (46667) tAvubhau sharachitrA~Ngau rudhireNa samukShitau. babhUvaturmahAtmAnau puShpitAviva kiMshukau.. 7-48-4 (46668) atha karNasya sachivAnShaT shUrAMshchitrayodhinaH. sAshvasUtadhvajarathAnsaubhadro nijaghAna ha.. 7-48-5 (46669) tathetarAnmaheShvAsAndashabhirdashabhiH sharaiH. pratyavidhyadasambhrAntastadadbhutamivAbhavat.. 7-48-6 (46670) mAgadhasya tathA putraM hatvA ShaDbhirajihmagaiH. sAshvaM sasUtaM taruNamashvaketumapAtayat.. 7-48-7 (46671) mArtikAvatakaM bhojaM tataH ku~njaraketanam. kShurapreNa samunmathya nanAda visR^ijansharAn.. 7-48-8 (46672) tasya dauHshAsanirviddhvA chaturbhishchaturo hayAn. sUtamekena vivyAdha dashabhishchArjunAtmajam.. 7-48-9 (46673) tato dauHshAsaniM kArShNirviddhvA saptabhirAshugaiH. saMrambhAdraktanayano vAkyamuchchairathAbravIt.. 7-48-10 (46674) pitA tavAhavaM tyaktvA gataH kApuruSho yathA. diShTyA tvamapi jAnIShe yoddhuM na tvadya mokShyase.. 7-48-11 (46675) etAvaduktvA vachanaM karmAraparimArjitam. nArAchaM visasarjAsmai taM drauNistribhirAchChinat.. 7-48-12 (46676) tasyArjunirdhvajaM ChittvA shalyaM tribhiratADayat. taM shalyo navabhirbANairgArdhrapatrairatADayat.. 7-48-13 (46677) hR^idyasambhrAntavadrAjaMstadadbhutamivAbhavat. tasyArjunirdhvajaM ChittvA hatvobhau pArShNisArathI.. 7-48-14 (46678) taM vivyAdhAyasaiH ShaDbhiH sopAkrAmadrathAntaram. shatru~njayaM chandraketuM meghavegaM suvarchasam.. 7-48-15 (46679) sUryabhAsaM cha pa~nchaitAnhatvA vivyAdha saubalam. taM saubalastribhirviddhvA duryodhanamathAbravIt.. 7-48-16 (46680) sarva enaM vimathnImaH puraikaikaM hinasti naH. athAbravItpunardroNaM karNo vaikartano raNe.. 7-48-17 (46681) purA sarvAnpramathnAti brUhyasya vadhammAshu naH. tato droNo maheShvAsaH sarvAMstAnpratyabhAShata.. 7-48-18 (46682) asti vA.asyAntaraM ki~nchitkumArasyAtha pashyata. anvasya pitaraM chAdya charataH sarvato disham.. 7-48-19 (46683) shIghratAM narasiMhasya pANDaveyasya pashyata. dhanurmaNDalamevAsya rathamArgeShu dR^ishyate.. 7-48-20 (46684) saMdadhAnasya vishikhA~nshIghraM chaiva vimu~nchataH. Arujannapi me prANAnmohayannapi sAyakaiH.. 7-48-21 (46685) praharShayati mAM bhUyaH saubhadraH paravIrahA. atimAnaM dadhAtyeSha saubhadro vicharanraNe.. 7-48-22 (46686) antaraM yasya saMrabdhA na pashyanti mahArathAH. asyato laghuhastasya dishaH sarvA maheShubhiH. na visheShaM prapashyAmi raNe gANDIvadhanvanaH.. 7-48-23 (46687) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-48-24x (4374) atha karNaH punardroNamAhArjunisharAhataH. sthAtavyamiti tiShThAmi pIDyamAno.abhimanyunA.. 7-48-24 (46688) tejasvinaH kumArasya sharAH paramadAruNAH. kShiNvanti hR^idayaM me.adya ghorAH pAvakatejasaH.. 7-48-25 (46689) tamAchAryo.abravItkarNaM shanakaiH prahasanniva. abhedyamasya kavachaM yuvA chAshuparAkramaH.. 7-48-26 (46690) upadiShTA mayA chAsya pituH kavachadhAraNA. tAmeSha nikhilAM vetti dhruvaM parapura~njayaH.. 7-48-27 (46691) shakyaM tvasya dhanushChettuM jyAM cha bANaiH samAhitaiH. abhIShUMshcha hayAMshchaiva tathobhau pArShNisArathI.. 7-48-28 (46692) etatkuru maheShvAsa rAdheya yadi shakyate. athainaM vimukhIkR^itya pashchAtpraharaNaM kuru.. 7-48-29 (46693) sadhanuShko na shakyo.ayamapi jetuM surAsuraiH. virathaM vidhanuShkaM cha kuruShvainaM yadIchChasi.. `punaH sthitena kenApi duHshako jetumArjuniH'.. 7-48-30 (46694) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-48-31x (4375) tadAchAryavachaH shrutvA karNo vaikartanastvaran. asyato laghuhastasya pR^iShThato dhanurAchChinat.. 7-48-31 (46695) ashvAnasyAvadhIddoNo gautamaH pArShNisArathI. sheShAstu chChinnadhanvAnaM sharavarShairavAkiran.. 7-48-32 (46696) tvaramANAstvarAkAle virathaM ShaNmahArathAH. sharavarShairakaruNA bAlamekamavAkiran.. 7-48-33 (46697) sa chChinnadhanvA virathaH svadharmamanupAlayan. kha~NgacharmadharaH shrImAnutpapAta vihAyasA.. 7-48-34 (46698) mArgaiH sakaushikAdyaishcha lAghavena balena cha. Arjunirvyacharadyvomni bhR^ishaM vai pakShirADiva.. 7-48-35 (46699) mayyeva nipatatyeSha sAsirityUrdhvadR^iShTayaH. vivyadhustaM maheShvAsaM samare ChidradarsinaH.. 7-48-36 (46700) kShurapreNa mahAtejAstvaramANaH sapatnajit.. 7-48-37 (46701) rAdheyo nishitairbANairvyadhamachcharma chottamam.. 7-48-38 (46702) vyasicharmeShupUrNA~NgaH so.antarikShAtpunaH kShitim. Asthitashchakramudyamya droNaM kruddho.abhyadhAvata.. 7-48-39 (46703) sa chakrareNUkajjvalashobhitA~Ngo babhAvatIvojjvalachakrapANiH. raNe.abhimanyuH kShaNamAsa raudraH sa vAsudevAnukR^itiM prakurvan.. 7-48-40 (46704) srutarudhirakR^itaikarAgavastro bhrukuTipuTAkulito.atisiMhanAdaH. prabhuramitabalo raNe.abhimanyu-- rnR^ipavaramadhyagato bhR^ishaM vyarAjat.. .. 7-48-41 (46705) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi trayodashadivasayuddhe aShTachatvAriMsho.adhyAyaH.. 48 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-48-18 vadhaM vadhopAyam.. 5-48-19 aNvapyasyAntaraM hyadya iti jha.pAThaH.. 5-48-35 kaushikaM sarvatobhadram.. 5-48-48 aShTachatvAriMsho.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 049

.. shrIH ..

7.49. adhyAyaH 049

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

abhimanyuvadhaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-49-0 (46706) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-49-0x (4376) viShNoH svasurnandakaraH sa viShNvAyudhabhUShaNaH. rarAjAtirathaH sa~Nkhye janArdana ivAparaH.. 7-49-1 (46707) mArutoddhUtakeshAntamudyatArivarAyudham. vapuH samIkShya pR^ithvIshA duHsamIkShyaM surairapi.. 7-49-2 (46708) `yadi pANitalAdetachchakraM mu~ncheta phAlguniH. varadAnAnmAtulasya viShNoshchakramivApatet'.. 7-49-3 (46709) tachchakraM bhR^ishamudvignAH saMchichChiduranekadhA. mahArathastataH kArShmiH sa jagrAha mahAgadAm.. 7-49-4 (46710) vidhanuHsyandanAsistairvichakrashchAribhiH kR^itaH. abhimanyurgadApANirashvatthAmAnamArdayat.. 7-49-5 (46711) sa gadAmudyatAM dR^iShTvA jvalantImashanImiva. apAkrAmadrathopasthAdvikramAMstrInnararShabhaH.. 7-49-6 (46712) tasyAshvAngadayA hatvA tathobhau pArShNisArathI. sharAchitA~NgaH saubhadraH shvAvidvatsamadR^ishyata.. 7-49-7 (46713) tataH subaladAyAdaM kAlikeyamapothayat. jaghAna chAsyAnucharAngAndhArAnsaptasaptatim.. 7-49-8 (46714) punashchaiva vasAtIyA~njaghAna rathino dasha. kekayAnAM rathAnsapta hatvA cha dasha ku~njarAn. dauHshAsanirathaM sAshvaM gadayA samapothayat.. 7-49-9 (46715) tato dauHshasaniH kruddho gadAmudyamya mAriSha. abhidudrAva saubhadraM tiShThatiShTheti chAbravIt.. 7-49-10 (46716) tAvudyatagadau vIrAvanyonyavadhakA~NkShiNau. bhrAtR^ivyau samprajahAte pureva tryambakAndhakau.. 7-49-11 (46717) tAvanyonyaM gadAgrAbhyAmAhatya patitau kShitau. indradhvajAvivotsR^iShTau raNamadhye paraMtapau.. 7-49-12 (46718) dauHshAsanirathotthAya kurUNAM kIrtivardhanaH. uttiShThamAnaM saubhadraM gadayA mUrdhnyatADayat.. 7-49-13 (46719) gadAvegena mahatA vyAyAmena cha mohitaH. vichetA nyapatadbhUmau saubhadraH paravIrahA.. 7-49-14 (46720) evaM vinihato rAjanneko bahubhirAhave. kShobhayitvA chamUM sarvAM nalinImiva ku~njaraH.. 7-49-15 (46721) ashobhata hato vIro vyAdhairvanagajo yathA. taM tathA patitaM shUraM tAvakAH paryavArayan.. 7-49-16 (46722) dAvaM dagdhvA yathA shAntaM pAvakaM shishirAtyaye. vimR^idvya nagashR^i~NgANi sannivR^ittamivAnilam.. 7-49-17 (46723) astiM gatamivAdityaM taptvA bhArata vAhinIm. upaplutaM yathA somaM saMshuShkamiva sAgasm.. 7-49-18 (46724) pUrNachandrAbhavadanaM kAkapakShavR^itAlikam. taM bhUmau patitaM dR^iShTvA tAvakAste mahArathAH. mudA paramayA yuktAshchukrushuH siMhavanmuhuH.. 7-49-19 (46725) AsItparamako harShastAvakAnAM vishAmpate. itareShAM tu vIrANAM netrebhyaH prApatajjalam.. 7-49-20 (46726) antarikShe cha bhUtAni prAkroshanta vishAmpate. dR^iShTvA nipatitaM vIraM chyutaM chandramivAmbarAt.. 7-49-21 (46727) droNakarNamukhaiH ShaDbhirdhArtarAShTrairmahArathaiH. eko.ayaM nihataH shete naiSha dharmo mato hi naH.. 7-49-22 (46728) tasminvinihate vIre bahvashobhata medinI. dyauryathA pUrNachandreNa nakShatragaNamAlinI.. 7-49-23 (46729) rukmapu~Nkhaishcha sampUrNA rudhiraughapariplutA. uttamA~Ngaishcha shUrANAM bhrAjamAnaiH sakuNDalaiH.. 7-49-24 (46730) vichitraishcha paristomaiH patAkAbhishcha saMvR^itA. chAmaraishcha kuthAbhishcha praviddhaishchAmbarottamaiH.. 7-49-25 (46731) rathAshvanaranAgAnAmala~NkAraishcha suprabhaiH. kha~NgaiH sunishitaiH pItairnirmuktairbhujagairiva.. 7-49-26 (46732) chApaishcha vividhaishChinnaiH shaktyR^iShTiprAsakampanaiH. vividhaishchAyudhaishchAnyaiH saMvR^itA bhUrashobhata.. 7-49-27 (46733) `niShTanadbhiratIvAnyairudvahadrudhirasravaiH. naraiH patadbhiH patitairavanI svadhikaM babhau.. 7-49-28 (46734) vAjibhishchApi nirjIvaiH shvasadbhiH shoNitokShitaiH. sArohairviShamA bhUmiH saubhadreNa nipAtitaiH.. 7-49-29 (46735) sA~NkushaiH samahAmAtraiH sarvamAyudhaketubhiH. parvatairiva vidhvastairvishikhairmathitairgajaiH.. 7-49-30 (46736) pR^ithivyAnukIrNaishcha ashvasArathiyodhibhiH. hadairiva prakShubhitairhR^itanAgai rathottamaiH.. 7-49-31 (46737) padAtisa~Nghaishcha hatairvividhAyudhabhUShaNaiH. bhIrUNAM trAsajananI ghorarUpA.abhavanmahI.. 7-49-32 (46738) taM dR^iShTvA patitaM bhUmau chandrArkasadR^ishadyutim. tAvakAnAM parA prItiH pANDUnAM chAbhavadvyathA.. 7-49-33 (46739) abhimanyau hate rAja~nshishuke.aprAptayauvane. samprAdravachchamUH sarvA dharmarAjasya pashyataH.. 7-49-34 (46740) dIryamANaM balaM dR^iShTvA saubhadre vinipAtite. ajAtashatrustAnvIrAnidaM vachanamabravIt.. 7-49-35 (46741) svargameSha gataH shUro yo hato na parA~NmukhaH. saMstambhayata mAbhaiShTa vijeShyAmo raNe ripUn.. 7-49-36 (46742) ityevaM sa mahAtejA duHkhitebhyo mahAdyutiH. dharmarAjo yudhAM shreShTho bruvanduHkhamapAnudat.. 7-49-37 (46743) yuddhe hyAshIviShAkArAnrAjaputrAnraNe ripUn. pUrvaM nihatya sa~NgrAme pashchAdArjunirabhyayAt.. 7-49-38 (46744) hatvA dashasahasrANi kausalyaM cha mahAratham. kR^iShNArjunasamaH kArShNiH shakralokaM gato dhruvam.. 7-49-39 (46745) rathAshvanaramAta~NgAnvinihatya sahasrashaH. avitR^iptaH sa sa~NgrAmAdashochyaH puNyakarmakR^it. 7-49-40 (46746) gataH puNyakR^itAM lokA~nshAshvatAnpuNyanirjitAn.. .. 7-49-41 (46747) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi trayodashadivasayuddhe ekonapa~nchAshattamo.adhyAyaH.. 49 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-49-18 upaplutaM rAhugrastam.. 5-49-19 kAkapakShAvR^itAkShikaM iti jha pAThaH.. 5-49-30 vishAkhonmathitairgajaiH iti ka.pAThaH.. 5-49-31 vyashvasArathiyodhibhiH iti ka.pAThaH.. 5-49-49 ekonapa~nchAshattamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 050

.. shrIH ..

7.50. adhyAyaH 050

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

yuddhabhUmivarNanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-50-0 (46748) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-50-0x (4377) vayaM tu pravaraM hatvA teShAM taiH sharapIDitAH. niveshAyAbhyupAyAmaH sAyAhne rudhirokShitAH.. 7-50-1 (46749) nirIkShamANAstu vayaM pare chAyodhanaM shanaiH. apayAtA mahArAja glAniM prAptA vichetasaH.. 7-50-2 (46750) tato nishAyA divasasya chAshivaH shivArutaiH sandhiravartatAdbhutaH. kusheshayApIDanibhe divAkare vilambamAne.astamupetya parvatam.. 7-50-3 (46751) varAsishaktyR^iShTivarUthacharmaNAM vibhUShaNAnAM cha samAkShipanprabhAH. divaM cha bhUmiM cha samAnayanniva priyAM tanuM bhAnurupaiti pAvakam.. 7-50-4 (46752) mahAbhrakUTAchalashR^i~Ngasannibhai-- rgajairanekairiva vajrapAtitaiH. savaijayantya~NkushavarmayantR^ibhi-- rnipAtitairnaShTagatishchitA kShitiH.. 7-50-5 (46753) hateshvaraishchUrNitachakrakUbarai-- rhatAshvasUtairvipatAkaketubhiH. mahArathairbhUH shushubhe vichUrNitaiH purairivAmitrahatairnarAdhipa.. 7-50-6 (46754) rathAshvabR^indaiH sahasAdibhirhataiH praviddhabhANDAbharaNaiH pR^ithagvidhaiH. nirastajihvAdashanAntralochanai-- rdharA babhau ghoravirUpadarshanA.. 7-50-7 (46755) praviddhavarmAbhaNAmbarAyudhA vipannahastyashvarathAnugA narAH. mahArhashayyAstaraNochitAstadA kShitAvanAthA iva sherate hatAH.. 7-50-8 (46756) atIva hR^iShTAH shvashR^igAlavAyasA bakAH suparNAshcha vR^ikAstarakShavaH. vayAMsyasR^ikpAnyatha rakShasAM gaNAH pishAchasa~NghAshcha sudAruNA raNe.. 7-50-9 (46757) tvacho vinirbhidya pibanvasAmasR^ik tathaiva majjAH pishitAni chAshnuvan. vapAM vilumpanti hasanti gAnti cha prakarShamANAH kuNapAnyanekashaH.. 7-50-10 (46758) sharIrasa~NghATavahA hyasR^igjalA rathoDupA ku~njarashailasa~NkaTA. manuShyashIrShopalamAMsakardamA praviddhanAnAvidhashastramAlinI.. 7-50-11 (46759) bhayAvahA vaitaraNIva dustarA pravartitA yodhavaraistadA nadI. uvAha madhyena raNAjire bhR^ishaM bhayAvahA dInamR^itapravAhinI.. 7-50-12 (46760) pibanti cha snAnti cha yatra durdR^ishAH pishAchasa~NghAstu nadanti bhairavAH. sunanditAH praNabhR^itAM kShayaMkarAH samAnabhakShAH shvasR^igAlapakShiNaH.. 7-50-13 (46761) tathA tadAyodhanamugradarshanaM nishAmukhe pitR^ipatirAShTravardhanam. nirIkShamANaH shanakairjahurnarAH samutthitA nR^ittakabandhasa~Nkulam.. 7-50-14 (46762) apetavidhvastamahArhabhUShaNaM nipAtitaM shakrasamaM mahAbalam. raNe.abhimanyuM dadR^ishustadA janA vyapoDhahavyaM sadasIva pAvakam.. .. 7-50-15 (46763) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi trayodashadivasayuddhAvahAre pa~nchAshattamo.adhyAyaH.. 50 ..
droNaparva - adhyAya 051

.. shrIH ..

7.51. adhyAyaH 051

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

yudhiShThirasyAbhimanyumanushochya vilApaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-51-0 (46764) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-51-0x (4378) hate tasminmahAvIrye saubhadre rathayUthape. vimuktarathasannAhAH sarve nikShiptakArmukAH.. 7-51-1 (46765) upopaviShTA rAjAnaM parivArya yudhiShThiram. tadeva yuddhaM dhyAyantaH saubhadragatamAnasAH.. 7-51-2 (46766) tato yudhiShThiro rAjA vilalApa suduHkhitaH. tato yudhiShThiro rAjA vilalApa suduHkhitaH. 7-51-3 (46767) abhimanyau hate vIre bhrAtuH putre mahArathe.. 7-51-4 (46768) yudhiShThira uvAcha. 7-51-4x (4379) enaM jitvA kR^ipaM shalyaM rAjAnaM cha suyodhanam. dro.NNaM drauNiM maheShvAsaM tathaivAnyAnmahArathAn.. 7-51-4 (46769) droNAnIkamasambAdhaM mama priyachikIrShayA. `hatvA shatrugaNAnvIrAneSha shete mahArathaH.. 7-51-5 (46770) kR^itAstrayu ddhakushalAnmaheShvAsAnmahAbalAn. kulashaH pUNairyuktA~nChUrAnvikhyAtapauruShAn.. 7-51-6 (46771) droNena rprAhetaM vyUhamabhedyamamarairapi. adR^iShTapUrvamasmAbhiH padmaM chakrAyudhapriyaH'.. 7-51-7 (46772) bhittvA madhyaM praviShTo.asau gomadhyamiva kesarI. `vikrIDitaM raNe tena nighnatA vai parAnvarAn'.. 7-51-8 (46773) yasya shUrA maheShvAsAH pratyanIkagatA raNe. prabhagnA vinivartante kR^itAstrA yuddhadurmadAH.. 7-51-9 (46774) atyantashatrurasmAkaM yena duHshAsanaH sharaiH. kShipraM hyabhimukhaH sa~Nkhye visaMj~no vimukhIkR^itaH.. 7-51-10 (46775) sa tIrtvA dustaraM vIro droNAnIkamahArNavam. prApya dauHshAsaniM kArShNiH prApto vaivasvatakShayam.. 7-51-11 (46776) kathaM drakShyAmi kaunteyaM saubhadre nihate.arjunam. subhadrAM vA mahAbhAgAM priyaM putramapashyatIm.. 7-51-12 (46777) `hatavatsAM yathA dhenuM taddR^irshanakR^itonmukhIm'. kiMsvidvakShyAmyapetArthamakliShTamasama~njasam. tAvubhau prativakShyAmi hR^iShIkeshadhana~njayau.. 7-51-13 (46778) ahameva subhadrAyAH keshavArjunayorapi. priyakAmo jayAkA~NkShI kR^itavAnidamapriyam.. 7-51-14 (46779) na lubdho budhyate doShA.NllobhAnmohAtpravartate. madhulipsurhi nApashyaM prapAtamahamIdR^isham.. 7-51-15 (46780) yo hi bhojye puraskAryo yAneShu shayaneShu cha. bhUShaNeShu cha so.asmAbhirbAlo yudhi puraskR^itaH.. 7-51-16 (46781) kathaM hi bAlastaruNo yuddhAnAmavishAradaH. sadashva iva sambAdhe viShame kShemamarhati.. 7-51-17 (46782) no cheddhi vayamapyenaM mahImanushayImahi. bIbhatsoH kopadIptasya dagdhAH kR^ipaNachakShuShA.. 7-51-18 (46783) alubdho mitamAnhImAnkShamAvAnrUpavAnbalI. vapuShmAnmAnakR^idvIraH priyaH satyaparAkramaH.. 7-51-19 (46784) yasya shlAghanti vibudhAH karmANyUrjitakarmaNaH. nivAtakavachA~njaghne kAlakeyAMshcha vIryavAn.. 7-51-20 (46785) mahendrashatravo yena hiraNyapuravAsinaH. akShNornimeShamAtreNa paulobhAH sagaNA hatAH.. 7-51-21 (46786) parebhyo.apyabhayArthibhyo yo dadAtyabhayaM vibhuH. tasyAsmAbhirna shakitastrAtumapyAtmajo balI.. 7-51-22 (46787) bhayaM tu sumahatprAptaM dhArtarAShTrAnmahAbalAn. pArthaH putravadhAtkruddhaH kauravA~nshoShayiShyati.. 7-51-23 (46788) kShudraH kShudrasahAyashcha svapakShakShayakArakaH. vyaktaM duryodhano dR^iShTvA shochanhAsyati jIvitaM.. 7-51-24 (46789) na me jayaH prItikaro na rAjyaM na chAmaratvaM na suraiH salokatA. imaM samIkShyAprativIryapauruShaM nipAtitaM devavarAtmajAtmajam.. .. 7-51-25 (46790) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi ekapa~nchAshattamo.adhyAyaH.. 51 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-51-5 asaMbAdhaM apratIghAtam.. 5-51-13 asama~njasamayuktarUpam.. 5-51-17 sambAdhe gahane.. 5-51-19 enaM abhimanyuM anuchenna mahIM shayImahi tadA krodhadIptasya bIbhatsoH kR^ipaNenAvasannena chakShuShA dagdhA bhavemahItyanvayaH.. 5-51-19 vapuShmAMstejasvI.. 5-51-51 ekapa~nchAshattamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 052

.. shrIH ..

7.52. adhyAyaH 052

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

yudhiShThirAshvAsanAya vyAsena tamprati akampanopAkhyAnakathanopakramaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-52-0 (46791) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-52-0x (4380) evaM vilapamAne tu kuntIputre yudhiShThire. kR^iShNadvaipAyanastatra AjagAma mahAnR^iShiH.. 7-52-1 (46792) atha dR^iShTvA mahAtmAnaM pANDuputro yudhiShThiraH. yuktAsano dInamanAH pUjAM chakre mahAtmanaH.. 7-52-2 (46793) archayitvA yathAnyAyamupaviShTaM yudhiShThiraH. abravIchChokasantapto bhrAtuH putravadhena cha.. 7-52-3 (46794) adharmayuktairbahubhiH parivArya mahArathaiH. yudhyamAno maheShvAsaiH saubhadro nihato raNe.. 7-52-4 (46795) bAlashcha bAlabuddhishcha vIrashcha paravIrahA. anupAyena sa~NgrAme yudhyamAno vinAshitaH.. 7-52-5 (46796) mayA proktaH sa sa~NgrAme dvAraM sa~njanayasva naH. praviShTe.abhyantare tasminsaindhavena nivAritAH.. 7-52-6 (46797) nanu nAma samaM yuddhameShTavyaM yuddhajIvibhiH. idaM chaivAsamaM yuddhamIdR^ishaM yatkR^itaM paraiH.. 7-52-7 (46798) tenAsmi bhR^ishasantaptaH shokabAShpasamAkulaH. shamaM naivAdhigachChAmi chintayAnaH punaH punaH.. 7-52-8 (46799) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-52-9x (4381) taM tathA vilapantaM vai shokavyAkulamAnasam. uvAcha sAntvayanvyAso yudhiShThiramidaM vachaH.. 7-52-9 (46800) vyAsa uvAcha. 7-52-10x (4382) yudhiShThira mahAprAj~na sarvashAstravishArada. vyasaneShu na muhyanti tvAdR^ishA bharatarShabha.. 7-52-10 (46801) svargameSha gataH shUraH shatrUnhatvA bahUnraNe. abAlasadR^ishaM karma kR^itvA vai puruShottamaH.. 7-52-11 (46802) anatikramaNIyo vai vidhireSha yudhiShThira. devadAnavagandharvAnmUtyurharati bhArata.. 7-52-12 (46803) yudhiShThira uvAcha. 7-52-13x (4383) ime vai pR^ithivIpAlAH sherate pR^ithivItale. nihatAH pR^itanAmadhye mR^itasaMj~nA mahAbalAH.. 7-52-13 (46804) nAgAyutabalAshchAnye vAyuvegabalAstathA. ta ete nihatAH sa~Nkhye tulyarUpA narairnarAH.. 7-52-14 (46805) naiShAM pashyAmi hantAraM prANinAM saMyuge kvachit. vikrameNopasampannAstapobalasamanvitAH.. 7-52-15 (46806) jetavyamiti chAnyonyaM yeShAM nityaM hR^idi sthitam. atha cheme hatAH prAj~nAH sherate vigatAyuShaH.. 7-52-16 (46807) mR^itA iti cha shabdoyaM vartate cha tato.arthavat. ime mR^itA mahIpAlAH prAyasho bhImavikramAH.. 7-52-17 (46808) nishcheShTA nirabhImAnAH shUrAH shatruvashaMgatAH. rAjaputrAshcha saMrabdhA vaishvAnaramukhaM gatAH.. 7-52-18 (46809) atra me saMshayaH prAptaH kutaH saMj~nA mR^itA iti. kasya mR^ityuH kuto mR^ityuH kena mR^ityurimAH prajAH. haratyamarasa~NkAsha tanme brUhi pitAmaha.. 7-52-19 (46810) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-52-20x (4384) taM tathA paripR^ichChantaM kuntIputraM yudhiShThiram. AshvAsanamidaM vAkyamuvAcha bhagavAnR^iShiH.. 7-52-20 (46811) vyAsa uvAcha. 7-52-21x (4385) atrApyudAharantImamitihAsaM purAtanam. akampanasya kathitaM nAradena purA nR^ipa.. 7-52-21 (46812) sa chApi rAjA rAjendra putravyasanamuttamam. aprasahyatamaM loke prAptavAniti naH shrutam.. 7-52-22 (46813) tadahaM sampravakShyAmi mR^ityoH prabhavamuttamam. tatastvaM mokShyase duHkhAtsnehabandhanasaMshrayAt.. 7-52-23 (46814) samastapAparAshighnaM shR^iNu kIrtayato mama. dhanyamAkhyAnamAyuShyaM shokaghnaM puShTivardhanam.. 7-52-24 (46815) pavitramarisa~NghaghnaM pa~NgalAnAM cha ma~Ngalam. yathaiva vedAdhyayanamupAkhyAnamidaM tathA.. 7-52-25 (46816) shravaNIyaM mahArAja prAtarnityaM nR^ipottamaiH. putrAnAyuShmato rAjyamIhamAnaiH shriyaM tathA.. 7-52-26 (46817) purA kR^itayuge tAta AsIdrAjA hyakampanaH. sa shatruvashamApanno madhye sa~NgrAmamUrdhani. `yodhayAmAsa balavAnbaddhashchAsIdakampanaH'.. 7-52-27 (46818) tasya putro harirnAma nArAyaNasamo bale. shrImAnkR^itAstro medhAvI yudhi shakropamo balI.. 7-52-28 (46819) `sa dR^iShTvA pitaraM yuddhe tadavasthaM mahAdyutiH. achintayitvA maraNaM shatrumadhyaM tato.avishat.. 7-52-29 (46820) sa shatrubhiH parivR^ito bahudhA raNamUrdhani. yodhayAmAsa tAnsarvAnsarvAstrakushalo balI.. 7-52-30 (46821) varShanbANasahasrANi shatruShvamitavikramaH. padAtirathanAgAshvAnpramamAtha mahAbalaH.. 7-52-31 (46822) sa sharairAchitashchakrairgadAbhirmusalairapi. mR^idganrathasahasrANi padAtInvAjivAraNAn.. 7-52-32 (46823) parAnIkaM vibhidyAjau mokShayitvA cha taM nR^ipam. punarevAkarodyuddhaM shatrumadhyagato balI.. 7-52-33 (46824) tataste rathinaH sarve sametya punarAhave. jaghnustaM parivAryaikaM tomarairiva ku~njaram'.. 7-52-34 (46825) sa karma duShkaraM kR^itvA sa~NgrAme shatrutApanaH. shatrubhirnihataH sa~Nkhye pR^itAnAyAM yudhiShThira.. 7-52-35 (46826) dviShadbhirnihataM dR^iShTvA priyaM putramakampanaH. amarShajanitakrodha AhavAtsahasA.a.agataH.. 7-52-36 (46827) sa rAjA pretakR^ityAni tasya kR^itvA shuchAnvitaH. shochannahani rAtrau cha nAlabhatsukhamAtmanaH.. 7-52-37 (46828) tasya shokaM viditvA tu putravyasanasambhavam. AjagAmAtha devarShirnArado.asya samIpataH.. 7-52-38 (46829) sa tu rAjA mahAbhAgo dR^iShTvA devarShisattamam. pUjayitvA yathAnyAyaM kathAmakathayattadA.. 7-52-39 (46830) tasya sarvaM samAchaShTa yathAvR^ittaM yudhiShThira. shatrubhirvijayaM sa~Nkhye putrasya cha vadhaM tathA.. 7-52-40 (46831) akampana uvAcha. 7-52-41x (4386) mama putro mahAvIrya indraviShNusamadyutiH. shatrubhirbahubhiH sa~Nkhye parAkramya hato balI.. 7-52-41 (46832) shR^iNu me prANinAM chApi mR^ityuH prabhavate kila. ka eSha mR^ityurbhagavankiMvIryabalapauruShaH. etadichChAmi tattvena shrotuM matimatAM vara.. 7-52-42 (46833) vyAsa uvAcha. 7-52-43x (4387) tasya tadvachanaM shrutvA nArado varadaH prabhuH. AkhyAnamidamAchaShTa putrashokApahaM mahat.. 7-52-43 (46834) nArada uvAcha. 7-52-44x (4388) shR^iNu rAjanmahAbAho AkhyAnaM bahuvistaram. yathAvR^ittaM shrutaM chaiva mayA.api vasudhAdhipa.. 7-52-44 (46835) prajAH sR^iShTA tadA brahmA Adisarge pitAmahaH. asaMhR^itaM mahAtejA dR^iShTvA jagadidaM prabhuH.. 7-52-45 (46836) tasya chintA samutpannA saMhAraM prati pArthiva. chintayanna hyasau deva saMhAraM vasudhAdhipa.. 7-52-46 (46837) tasya roShAnmahArAja mukhebhyo.agnirajAyata. tena sarvA disho vyAptAH sAntardeshA didhakShatA.. 7-52-47 (46838) tato divaM bhuvaM chaiva jvAlAmAlAsamAkulam. chAracharaM jagatsarvaM dadAha bhagavAnprabhuH.. 7-52-48 (46839) tato hatAni bhUtAni charANi sthAvarANi cha. mahatA krodhavegena trAsayanniva vIryavAn. 7-52-49 (46840) tato rudro jaTI syANurnishAcharapatirharaH. jagAma sharaNaM devaM brahmANaM parameShThinam.. 7-52-50 (46841) tasminnApatite sthANau prajAnAM hitakAmyayA. abravItparamo devo jvalanniva mahAmuniH.. 7-52-51 (46842) kiM karma kAmaM kAmArha kAmAjjAto.asi putraka. kariShyAmi priyaM sarvaM brUhi sthANo yadichChasi.. .. 7-52-52 (46843) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi dvipa~nchAshattamo.adhyAyaH.. 52 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-52-6 dvAraM sa~njanayasveti mayA ukta iti sambandhaH. nivAritaH tamanupravishanta iti sheShaH.. 5-52-19 kasya mR^ityuH ka iti sheShaH.. 5-52-47 khebhya iti pAThe shrotrAdichChidrebhyaH.. 5-52-52 dvipa~nchAshattamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 053

.. shrIH ..

7.53. adhyAyaH 053

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

brahmarudrasaMvAdaH.. 1 .. brahmaNA prajAsaMhArAya mR^ityudevIsarjanam.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-53-0 (46844) sthANuruvAcha. 7-53-0x (4389) prajAsarganimittaM hi kR^ito yatnastvayA vibho. tvayA sR^iShTAshcha vR^iddhAshcha bhUtagrAmAH pR^ithagvidhAH.. 7-53-1 (46845) tAstaveha punaH krodhAtprajA nashyanti sarvashaH. tA dR^iShTvA mama kAruNyaM prasIda bhagavanprabho.. 7-53-2 (46846) brahmovAcha. 7-53-3x (4390) saMhartuM na cha me kAma etadevaM bhavediti. pR^ithivyA hitakAmaM tu tato mAM manyurAvishat.. 7-53-3 (46847) iyaM sannA tadA devI bhArArtA samachUchudat. saMhArArthaM mahAdeva bhAreNAbhihatA satI.. 7-53-4 (46848) tato.ahaM nAdhigachChAmi buddhyA bahu vichArayan. saMhAramaprameyasya tato mAM manyurAvishat.. 7-53-5 (46849) rudra uvAcha. 7-53-6x (4391) saMhArArthaM prasIdasva mAruSho vasudhAdhipa. mA prajAH sthAvarAshchaiva ja~NgamAshcha vyanInashaH.. 7-53-6 (46850) tava prasAdAdbhagavannidaM vartettridhA jagat. anAgatamatItaM cha yachcha samprati vartate.. 7-53-7 (46851) bhagavankrodhasandIptaH krodhAdagnimavAsR^ijat. sa dahatyashmakUTAni drumAMshcha saritastathA.. 7-53-8 (46852) palvalAni cha sarvANi sarvai chaiva tR^iNolapAH. sthAvaraM ja~NgamaM chaiva niHsheShaM kurute jagat.. 7-53-9 (46853) tadetadbhasmasAdbhUtaM jagatsthAvaraja~Ngamam. prasIda bhagavansa tvaM roSho na syAdvaro mama.. 7-53-10 (46854) sarve hi sR^iShTA nashyanti tava deva kathaMchana. tasmAnnivartatAM tejastvayyevedaM pralIyatAm.. 7-53-11 (46855) upAyamanyaM sampashya prajAnAM hitakAmyayA. yatheme prANinaH sarve nirvarteraMstathA kuru.. 7-53-12 (46856) abhAvaM neha gachCheyurutsannajananAH prajAH. bhavatA hi niyukto.ahaM prAnAM pAlane vibhA. dayA te na samutpannA prajAsu vibudheshvara.. 7-53-13 (46857) mA vinashyejjagannAtha jagatsthAvaraja~Ngamam. prasAdAbhimukhaM devaM tasmAdevaM bravImyaham.. 7-53-14 (46858) nArada uvAcha. 7-53-15x (4392) shrutvA hi vachanaM devaH prajAnAM hitakAraNe. tejaH sandhArayAmAsa punarevAntarAtmani.. 7-53-15 (46859) tato.agnimupasaMhR^itya bhagavA.NllokasatkR^itaH. pravR^ittaM cha nivR^ittaM cha kalpayAmAsa vai prabhuH.. 7-53-16 (46860) upasaMharatastasya tamagniM roShajaM tathA. prAdurbabhUva vishvebhyo gobhyonArI mahAtmanaH.. 7-53-17 (46861) kR^iShNaraktA tathA pi~NgA raktajihvAsyalochanA. kuNDalAbhyAM cha rAjendra taptAbhyAM taptabhUShaNA.. 7-53-18 (46862) sA niHsR^itya tathA khebhyo dakShiNAM dishamAshritA. smayamAnA cha sA.avekShya devau vishveshvarAvubhau.. 7-53-19 (46863) `tAM tu tatra tadA devIM brahmA lokapitAmahaH. uktavAnmadhuraM vAkyaM sAntvayitvA punaH punaH'. mR^ityo iti mahIpAla jahi chemAH prajA iti.. 7-53-20 (46864) tvaM hi saMhArabuddhyA.atha prAdurbhUtA ruSho mama. tasmAtsaMhara sarvAstvaM prajAH sajaDapaNDitAH.. 7-53-21 (46865) avisheSheNa chaiva tvaM prajAH saMhara bhAmini. mama tvaM hi niyogena tataH shreyo hyavApsyAsi.. 7-53-22 (46866) nArada uvAcha. 7-53-23x (4393) evamuktA tu sA tena mR^ityuH kamalalochanA. prArudadbhR^ishasaMvignA prApatannashrubindavaH.. 7-53-23 (46867) pANibhyAM pratijagrAha tAnyashrUNi pitAmahaH. sarvabhUtahitArthAya tAM chApyanunayattadA.. .. 7-53-24 (46868) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi tripa~nchAshattamo.adhyAyaH.. 53 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-53-2 kAruNyaM jAtamiti sheShaH.. 5-53-5 aprameyasyAnantasya jagata iti sheShaH. ahiMsyasyetivArthaH.. 5-53-6 saMhArArthaM mAruShaH roShaM mAkArShIH kintu prasIdasva.. 5-53-10 tava roSho na syAditi mama mahyaM varo.astviti yojanA.. 5-53-13 utsannajananAH prakShINasantAnAH.. 5-53-16 pravR^ittaM karma sR^iShTihetum. nivR^ittaM karma mokShahetum.. 5-53-17 gobhya indriyachChidrebhyaH.. 5-53-19 devau brahmarudrau.. 5-53-20 maruNaM mR^itprANaviyogastamanyasyechChatIti mR^ityuritmarthaH. iti Aheti sheShaH.. 5-53-21 ruSho roShAt.. 5-53-53 tripa~nchAshattamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 054

.. shrIH ..

7.54. adhyAyaH 054

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

nAradena mR^ityubrahmasaMvAdakathanena akampanasya shokapariharaNam.. 1 .. vyAsenAkampanopAkhyAnakathanAt yudhiShThirasya shokApanodanam.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-54-0 (46869) nArada uvAcha. 7-54-0x (4394) vinIya duHkamabalA Atmanyeva prajApatim. uvAcha prA~njalirbhUtvA latevAvarjitA punaH.. 7-54-1 (46870) mR^ityuruvAcha. 7-54-2x (4395) tvayA sR^iShTA kathaM nArI IdR^ishI vadatAM vara. krUraM karmAhitaM kuryAM mUDheva parijAnatI.. 7-54-2 (46871) bibhemyahamadharmAddhi prasIda bhagavanprabho. priyAnputrAnvayasyAMshcha bhAtR^inmAtR^IH pitR^InpatIn.. 7-54-3 (46872) apadhyAsyanti ye deva mR^itAMstebhyo bibhemyaham. kR^ipaNAnAM hi rudatAM ye patantyashrubindavaH.. 7-54-4 (46873) tebhyo.ahaM bhagavanbhItA sharaNaM tvA.ahamAgatA. yamasya bhavanaM deva gachCheyaM na surottama.. 7-54-5 (46874) kAyena vinayopetA mUrdhnodagranakhena cha. etadichChAmyahaM kAmaM tvatto lokapitAmaha.. 7-54-6 (46875) ichCheyaM tvatprasAdAddhi tapastaptuM prajeshvara. pradishemaM varaM deva tvaM mahyaM bhagavanprabho.. 7-54-7 (46876) tvayA hyuktA gamiShyAmi dhenukAshramamuttamam. tatra tapsye tapastItraM tavaivArAdhane ratA.. 7-54-8 (46877) na hi shakShyAmi devesha prANAnprANabhR^itAM priyAn. hartuM vilapamAnAnAmadharmAdabhirakSha mAm.. 7-54-9 (46878) brahmovAcha. 7-54-10x (4396) mR^ityo sa~NkalpitA.asi tvaM prajAsaMhArahetunA. gachCha saMhara sarvAstvaM prajA mA te vichAraNA.. 7-54-10 (46879) bhavitA tvetadevaM hi naitajjAtvanyathA bhavet. bhava tvaninditA loke kuruShva vachanaM mama.. 7-54-11 (46880) nArada uvAcha. 7-54-12x (4397) evamuktA bhagavatA prA~njalishchApyavA~NmukhI. saMhAre nAkarodbuddhiM prajAnAM hitakAmyayA.. 7-54-12 (46881) tUShNImAsIttadA devaH prajAnAmIshvareshvaraH. prasAdaM chAgamatkShipramAtmanaiva prajApatiH.. 7-54-13 (46882) smayamAnashcha devesho lokAnsarvAnavekShya cha. lokAstvAsanyathApUrvaM dR^iShTAstenApamanyunA.. 7-54-14 (46883) nivR^ittaroShe tasmiMstu bhagavatyaparAjite. sA kanyA.api jagAmA.atha samIpAttasya dhImataH.. 7-54-15 (46884) apamR^ityApratishrutya prajAsaMharaNaM tadA. tvaramANA cha rAjendra mR^ityurdhenukamabhyagAt.. 7-54-16 (46885) sA tatra paramaM tIvraM chachAra vratamuttamam. sA tada hyekapAdena tasthau padmAni ShoDasha.. 7-54-17 (46886) pa~ncha chAbdAni kAruNyAtprajAnAM tu hitaiShiNI. indriyANIndriyArthebhyaH priyebhyaH sannivartya sA.. 7-54-18 (46887) tatastvekena pAdena punaranyAni sapta vai. tasthau padmAni ShaT chaiva sapta chaikaM cha pArthivA.. 7-54-19 (46888) tataH padmAyutaM tAta mR^igaiH saha chachAra sA. punargatvA tato nandAM puNyAM shItAmalodakAm.. 7-54-20 (46889) apsu varShasahasrANi sapta chaikaM cha sA.anayat. dhArayitvA tu niyamaM nandAyAM vItakalmaShA.. 7-54-21 (46890) sA pUrvaM kaushikIM puNyAM jagAma niyamaidhitA. tatra vAyujalAhArA chachAra niyamaM punaH.. 7-54-22 (46891) saptaga~NgAsu sA puNyA kanyA vetasakeShu cha. tapovisheShairbahubhiH karShayaddehamAtmanaH.. 7-54-23 (46892) tato gatvA tu sA ga~NgAM mahAmeruM cha kevalam. tasthau chAshmeva nishcheShTA prANAyAmaparAyaNA.. 7-54-24 (46893) punarhimavato mUrdhni yatra devAH purA.ayajan. tatrA~NguShThena sA tasthau nikharvaMla paramA shubhA.. 7-54-25 (46894) puShkareShvatha gokarNe naimiShe malaye tathA. akarshayatsvakaM dehaM niyamairmAnasapriyaiH.. 7-54-26 (46895) ananyadevatA nityaM dR^iDhabhaktA pitAmahe. tasthau pitAmahaM chaiva toShayAmAsa dharmataH.. 7-54-27 (46896) tatastAmabravItprIto lokAnAM prabhavo.avyayaH. saumyena manasA rAjanprItaH prItamanAstadA.. 7-54-28 (46897) mR^ityo kimidamatyantaM tapAMsi charasIti ha. tato.abravItpunarmR^ityurbhagavantaM pitAmaham.. 7-54-29 (46898) nA.ahaM hanyAM prajA deva svasthAshchAkroshatIstathA. etadichChAmi sarvesha tvatto varamahaM prabho.. 7-54-30 (46899) adharmabhayabhItA.asmi tato.ahaM tapa AsthitA. bhItAyAstu mahAbhAga prayachChAbhayamavyaya.. 7-54-31 (46900) ArtA chAnAgasI nArI yAchAmi bhava me gatiH. tAmabravIttato devo bhUtabhavyabhaviShyavit.. 7-54-32 (46901) adharmo nAsti te mR^ityo saMharantyA imAH prajAH. mayA choktaM mR^iShA bhadre bhavitA na katha~nchana.. 7-54-33 (46902) tasmAtsaMhara kalyANi prajAH sarvAshchaturvidhAH. dharmaH sanAtanashcha tvAM sarvathA pAvayiShyati.. 7-54-34 (46903) lokapAlo yamashchaiva sahAyA vyAdhayashcha te. ahaM cha vibudhAshchaiva punardAsyAma te varam.. 7-54-35 (46904) yathA tvamenasA muktA virajAH khyAtimeShyasi. 7-54-36 (46905) nArada uvAcha. saivamuktA mahArAja kR^itA~njaliridaM vibhum. 7-54-36x (4398) punarevAbravIdvAkyaM prasAdya shirasA tadA. yadyevametatkartavyaM dharmato nAstyato bhayam.. 7-54-37 (46906) tavAj~nA mUrdhni me nyastA yatte vakShyAmi tachChR^iNu. lobhaH krodho.abhyasUyerShyA droho mohashcha dehinAM.. 7-54-38 (46907) ahUshchAnyonyaparuShA dehaM bhindyuH pR^ithigvadhAH. 7-54-39 (46908) brahmovAcha. 7-54-39x (4399) tathA bhaviShyate mR^ityo sAdhu saMhara bhoH prajAH. adharmaste na bhavitA nApadhyAsyAmyahaM shubhe.. 7-54-39 (46909) yAnyashrubindUni kare mamAsaM-- ste vyAdhayaH prANinAmAtmajAtAH. te mArayiShyanti narAngatAsU-- nnAdharmaste bhavitA mA sma bhaiShIH.. 7-54-40 (46910) nAdharmaste bhavitA prANinAM vai tvaM vai dharmastvaM hi dharmasya cheshA. dharmyA bhUtvA dharmanityA dharitrI tasmAtprANAnsarvathemAnniyachCha.. 7-54-41 (46911) `prAptA tathA no bhavitA kadAchi-- devaM mayAdyaiva niyojyase tvam'. sarveShAM vai prANinAM kAmaroShau santyajya tvaM saMharasveha jIvAn. yeShAM dharmAste bhaviShyantyanantA mithyAvR^ittaM mArayiShyatyadharmaH.. 7-54-42 (46912) tenAtmAnaM pAvayasvAtmanA tvaM pApe.a.atmAnaM majjayiShyantyasatyAt. tasmAtkAmaM roShamapyAgataM tvaM santyajyAntaH saMharasveti jIvAn.. 7-54-43 (46913) nArada uvAcha. 7-54-44x (4400) sA vai bhImA mR^ityusaMj~nopadeshA-- chChApAdbhItA bADhamityabravIttam. sA cha prANaM prANinAmantakAle kAmakrodhau tyajya haratyasaktA.. 7-54-44 (46914) mR^ityustveShAM vyAdhayastatprasUtA vyAdhI rogo rujyate yena jantuH. sarveShAM cha prANinAM prAyaNAnte tasmAchChokaM mAkR^ithA niShphalaM tvam.. 7-54-45 (46915) sarve devAH prANibhiH prAyaNAnte gatvA vR^ittAH sannivR^ittAstathaiva. evaM sarve prANinastatra gatvA vR^ittA devA martyavadrAjasiMha.. 7-54-46 (46916) vAyurbhImo bhImanAdo mahaujA bhettA dehAnprANinAM sarvago.asau. no vA vR^ittiM kadAchi-- tprApnotyugro.anantatejovishiShTaH.. 7-54-47 (46917) sarve devA martyasaMj~nAvishiShTA-- stasmAtputraM mAshucho rAjasiMha. svargaM prApto modate te tanUjo nityaM ramyAnvIralokAnavApya.. 7-54-48 (46918) tyaktvA duHkhaM sa~NgataH puNyakR^idbhi-- reShA mR^ityurdevadiShTA prajAnAm. prApte kAle saMharantI yathAva-- tsvayaM kR^itA prANaharA prajAnAm.. 7-54-49 (46919) AtmAnaM vai prANino ghnanti sarve naitAnmR^ityurdaNDapANirhinasti. tasmAnmR^itAnnAnushochanti dhIrA mR^ityuM j~nAtvA nishchayaM brahmasR^iShTam. itthaM sR^iShTiM devaklR^iptAM viditvA putrAnnaShTAchChokamAshu tyajasva.. 7-54-50 (46920) dvaipAyana uvAcha. 7-54-51x (4401) etachChrutvArthavadvAkyaM nAradena prakAshitam. uvAchAkampano rAjA sakhAyaM nAradaM tathA.. 7-54-51 (46921) vyapetashokaH prIto.asmi bhagavannR^iShisattama. shrutvetihAsaM tvattastu kR^itArtho.asmyabhivAdaye.. 7-54-52 (46922) tathokto nAradastena rAj~nA devarShisattamaH. jagAma nandanaM shIghramashokavanamAtmanaH.. 7-54-53 (46923) puNyaM yashasyaM svargyaM cha dhanyamAyuShyameva cha. asyetihAsasya sadA shravaNaM shrAvaNaM tathA.. 7-54-54 (46924) etadarthapadaM shrutvA tadA rAjA yudhiShThira. kShatradharmaM cha vij~nAya shUrANAM cha parAM gatim. samprApto.asau mahAvIryaH svargalokaM mahArathaH.. 7-54-55 (46925) abhimanyuH parAnhatvA pramukhe sarvadhanvinAm. yudhyamAno maheShvAso hataH so.abhimukho raNe.. 7-54-56 (46926) asinA gadayA shaktyA dhanuShA cha mahArathaH. virajAH somasUnuH sa punastatra pralIyate.. 7-54-57 (46927) tasmAtparAM dhR^itiM kR^itvA bhrAtR^ibhiH saha pANDava. apramattaH susannaddhaH shIghraM yoddhumupAkrama.. .. 7-54-58 (46928) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi chatuHpa~nchAsho.adhyAyaH.. 54 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-54-6 udagranakhena a~njalinA. vinayopetA sharaNAgatAsmItyarthaH.. 5-54-14 apamanyunA gatAmarSheNetyarthaH.. 5-54-16 apratishrutyAna~NgIkR^itya.. 5-54-17 padmaM shataM koThyo varShANi tAni ShoDasha pa~ncha cha.. 5-54-39 anyonyaparuShA vAgiti sheShaH.. 5-54-45 prAyaNAnte AyuShyakarmaNo.avasAne.. 5-54-46 sarve iti. devA indriyANi. prANibhiH jIvaiH) saha. gatvA tatraiva paraloke. vR^ittA vR^ittavantaH. punarbhUtvA sannivR^ittA bhavanti. martyabhAvArthA eva devA indrAdayaH martyavadeva gatvA vR^ittA bhavanti natu nivR^ittA bhavanti martyabhAvAya. karmadevA eva nivartante natvAjAnadevAsteShAM kramamuktiyogyatvAditi bhAvaH.. 5-54-48 sarvedevA iti. martyatvaM maraNadharmatvaM brahmAdInAmapi svAbhAvikamastyato.anarthakaH shoka ityarthaH.. 5-54-49 svayameva svasya mR^ityuH athApi janAnAM prANaharA mR^ityurjanAdanyeti kalpanA kR^itA anabhij~nairiti sheShaH.. 5-54-50 naShTAta jAtamiti sheShaH.. 5-54-53 chatuHpa~nchAshattamo.adhyAyaH.. 54 ..
droNaparva - adhyAya 055

.. shrIH ..

7.55. adhyAyaH 055

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

vyAsena yudhiShThiraM prati ShoDasharAjakIyAkhyAnakathanaprArambhaH.. 1 .. nAradena sR^i~njayamprati maruttarAjacharitakathanam.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-55-0 (46929) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-55-0x (4402) shrutvA mR^ityusamutpattiM karmANyanupamAni cha. dharmarAjaH punarvAkyaM prasAdyainamathAbravIt.. 7-55-1 (46930) yudhiShThira uvAcha. 7-55-2x (4403) guravaH puNyakarmANaH shakrapratimavikramAH. pUrvaM rAjarShayo brahmankiyanto mR^ityunA hatAH.. 7-55-2 (46931) bhUya eva tu mAM tathyairvachobhirabhibR^iMhaya. rAjarShINAM purANAnAM samAshvAsaya karmabhiH.. 7-55-3 (46932) kiyantyo dakShiNA dattAH kAshcha dattA mahAtmabhiH. rAjarShibhiH puNyakR^idbhistadbhavAnprabravItu me.. 7-55-4 (46933) `vyAsa uvAcha. 7-55-5x (4404) anyepi yajvanAM lokA anye chApi tapasvinAm. kShamAvatAM cha trIMllokA~nshUrA gachChanti bhArata.. 7-55-5 (46934) kShatriyasya tuM sa~NgrAme shatrUnhatvA hatasya vA. phalamatyantamityAhurdharmashAstravido janAH.. 7-55-6 (46935) vedavidyAvratasnAtA yajvAnaH putriNashcha ye. tebhyaH parArthyA yajvAno yajvabhyashcha tanutyajaH.. 7-55-7 (46936) sa vIro yajvano nityaM kShatriyAnArjunirgataH. lokAnpuNyatamAniShTAniti viddhi vishAmpate.. 7-55-8 (46937) sarveShAM nR^ipasiMhAnAM shR^iNu yaj~nAnnR^ipottama. tAnatikramya gachChanti svargakAmAstanutyajaH.. 7-55-9 (46938) yudhiShThira uvAcha. 7-55-10x (4405) sarveShAM yajvanAM yaj~naM shrotumichChAmi suvrata. dakShiNAshchAnurUpebhyo dattA rAjarShisattamaiH'.. 7-55-10 (46939) vyAsa uvAcha. 7-55-11x (4406) shaibyasya nR^ipateH punaH sR^i~njayo nAma nAmataH. sakhAyau tasya chevobhau R^iShI parvatanAradau.. 7-55-11 (46940) tau kadAchidgR^ihaM tasya praviShTau taddidR^ikShayA. vidhivachchArchitau tena prItau tatroShatuH sukham.. 7-55-12 (46941) taM kadAchitsukhAsInaM tAbhyAM saha shuchismitA. duhitA.abhyAgamatkanyA sR^i~njayaM varavarNinI.. 7-55-13 (46942) tayA.abhivAditaH kanyAmabhyanandadyathAvidhi. tatsali~NgAbhirAshIrbhiriShTAbhirabhitaH sthitAm.. 7-55-14 (46943) tAM nirIkShyAbravIdvAkyaM parvataH prahasanniva. kasyeyaM cha~nchalApA~NgI sarvalakShaNasammatA.. 7-55-15 (46944) uShA svidbhAH svidarkasya jvalanasya shikhApi vA. shrIrddriH kIrtiMrdhR^itiH ShuShTiH siddhishchandramasaH prabhA.. 7-55-16 (46945) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-55-17x (4407) evaM bruvANaM devarShiM nR^ipatiH sR^i~njayo.abravIt. mameyaM bhagavankanyA varyA varamabhIpsati.. 7-55-17 (46946) nAradastvabravIdenaM dehi mahyamimAM nR^ipa. bhAryArthaM sumahachChreyaH prAptuM chedichChase nR^ipa.. 7-55-18 (46947) dadAnItyevaM saMhR^iShTaH sR^i~njayaH prAha nAradam. 7-55-19 (46948) vyAsa uvAcha. `evamukte nR^ipatinA krodhaparyAkulekShaNaH'. parvatastu susa~Nkruddho nAradaM vAkyamabravIt.. 7-55-19x (4408) pUrvaM mamaiva manasA viddhi bhAryAM vR^itAmR^iShe. yasmAdapAcharastasmAtsvargaM na gachChasi.. 7-55-20 (46949) evamukto nAradastaM pratyuvAchottaraM vachaH. manovAgbuddhisambhAShA satyaM toyamathAgnayaH.. 7-55-21 (46950) pANigrahamamantrAshcha prathitaM dAralakShaNam. na tveShAM nishchitA niShThA tvayA sA manasA smR^itA.. 7-55-22 (46951) `evaM vidvAMstu mAM yasmAdanuvyAhR^itavAnasi'. tasmAttvamapi na svargaM gamiShyasi mayA vinA. anyonyamevaM shaptvA vai tasthatustatra tau tadA.. 7-55-23 (46952) atha so.api nR^ipo viprAnpAnAchChAdanabhojanaiH. putrakAmaH paraM shaktyA yatnAchchopAcharachChuchiH.. 7-55-24 (46953) tasya prasannA viprendrAH kadAchitputradarshinaH. tapaHsvAdhyAyaniratA vedavedA~NgapAragAH.. 7-55-25 (46954) sahitA nAradaM prAhurdehyasmai putramIpsitam. tathetyuktvA dvijairuktaH sR^i~njayaM nArado.abravIt.. 7-55-26 (46955) tubhyaM prasannA rAjarShe putramIpsanti brAhmaNAH. varaM vR^iNIShva bhadraM te yAdR^ishaM putramIpsitam.. 7-55-27 (46956) tathoktaH prA~njalI rAjA putraM vavre guNAnvitam. yashasvinaM kIrtimantaM tejasvinamarindamam.. 7-55-28 (46957) yasya mUtraM purIShaM cha kledaH svedashcha kA~nchanam. `sarvaM bhavetprasAdAdvai tAdR^ishaM tanayaM vR^iNe.. 7-55-29 (46958) vyAsa uvAcha. 7-55-30x (4409) tathA bhaviShyatItyukte jaj~ne tasyopsitaH sutaH. kA~nchanasyAkaraH shrImAnprasAdAdvai sukA~NkShitaH.. 7-55-30 (46959) ruditasya cha netrAbhyAmapatattasya netrajam. mUtraM purIShaM svedashcha sarvaM bhavati kA~nchanam'. suvarNaShThIvirityeva tasya nAmAbhavatkR^itam.. 7-55-31 (46960) tasminvarapradAnena vardhayatyamitaM dhanam. kArayAmAsa nR^ipatiH sauvarNaM sarvamIpsitam.. 7-55-32 (46961) gR^ihaprAkAradurgANi brAhmaNAvasathAnyapi. shayyAsanAni yAnAni sthAlIpiTharabhAjanam.. 7-55-33 (46962) tasya rAj~no.api yadveshma bAhyAshchopaskarAshcha ye. sarvaM tatkA~nchanamayaM kAlena parivardhitam.. 7-55-34 (46963) atha dasyugaNAH shrutvA dR^iShTvA chainaM tathAvidham. sambhUya tasya nR^ipateH samArabdhAshchikIrShitum.. 7-55-35 (46964) kechittatrAbruvanrAj~naH putraM gR^ihNIma vai svayam. so.asyAkaraH kA~nchanasya tasya yatnaM charAmahe.. 7-55-36 (46965) tataste dasyavo lubdhAH pravishya nR^ipatergR^iham. rAjaputraM tathA.a.ajahruH suvarNaShThIvinaM balAt.. 7-55-37 (46966) gR^ihyainamanupAyaj~nA nItvA.araNyamachetasaH. hatvA vishasya chApashya.N llubdhA vasu na ki~nchana.. 7-55-38 (46967) tasya prANairvimuktasya naShTaM tatkA~nchanaM varam. dasyavashcha tadA.anyonyaM jaghnurmUrkhA vichetasaH.. 7-55-39 (46968) hatvA parasparaM naShTAH kumAraM chAdbhutaM bhuvi. asambhAvyaM gatA ghoraM narakaM duShTakAriNaH.. 7-55-40 (46969) taM dR^iShTvA nihataM putraM varadattaM mahAtapAH. vilalApa suduHkhArto bahudhA karuNaM nR^ipaH.. 7-55-41 (46970) vilapantaM nishamyAtha putrashokahataM nR^ipam. pratyadR^ishyata devarShirnAradastasya sannidhau.. 7-55-42 (46971) uvAcha chainaM duHkhArtaM vilapantamachetasam. sR^i~njayaM nArado yadyattannibodha yudhiShThira.. 7-55-43 (46972) nArada uvAcha. 7-55-44x (4410) `tyaja shokaM mahArAja vaiklabyaM tyaja buddhiman. na mR^itaH shochato jIvenmuhyato vA narAdhipa.. 7-55-44 (46973) tyaja shokaM nR^ipashreShTha na shochanti bhavadvidhAH. vIro bhavAnmahArAja j~nAnavR^iddho.api me mataH'. kAmAnAmavitR^iptastvaM sR^i~njayeha mariShyasi.. 7-55-45 (46974) yasya chaite vayaM gehe uShitA brahmavAdinaH. AvikShitaM maruttaM cha mR^itaM sR^i~njaya shushruma.. 7-55-46 (46975) saMvarto yAjayAmAsa spardhayA vai bR^ihaspateH. yasmai rAjarShaye prAdAddhanaM sa bhagavAnprabhuH. haimaM himavataH pAdaM yiyakShorvividhaiH savaiH.. 7-55-47 (46976) yasya sendrAmaragaNA bR^ihaspatipurogamAH. devA vishvasR^ijaH sarve yajanAnte samAsate. yaj~navATasya sauvarNAH sarve chAsanparichChadAH.. 7-55-48 (46977) yasya sarvaM tadA hyannaM manobhiprAyagaM shuchi. kAmato bubhujurviprAH sarve chAnnArthino dvijAH. payo dadhi ghR^itaM kShaudraM bhakShyaM bhojyaM cha shobhanam.. 7-55-49 (46978) yasya yaj~neShu sarveShu vAsAMsyAbharaNAni cha. IpsitAnyupatiShThante prahR^iShTAnvedapAragAn.. 7-55-50 (46979) marutaH pariveShTAro maruttasyAbhavangR^ihe. AvikShitasya rAjarShervishvedevAH sabhAsadaH.. 7-55-51 (46980) yasya vIryavato rAj~naH suvR^iShTyA sasyasampadaH. havirbhistarpitA yena samyakklR^iptairdivaukasaH.. 7-55-52 (46981) R^iShINAM cha pitR^INAM cha devAnAM sukhajIvinam. brahmacharyashrutimukhaiH sarvairdAnaishcha sarvadA.. 7-55-53 (46982) shayanAsanapAnAni svarNarAshIshcha dustyajAH. tatsarvamamitaM vittaM dattaM viprebhya ichChayA.. 7-55-54 (46983) sonudhyAtastu shakreNa prajAH kR^itvA nirAmayAH. shraddadhAno jitA.NllokAngataH puNyaduho.akShayAn.. 7-55-55 (46984) saprajaH sanR^ipAmAtyaH sadArApatyabAndhavaH. yauvanena sahasrAbdaM marutto rAjyamanvashAt.. 7-55-56 (46985) sa chenmamAra sR^i~njaya chaturbhadratarastvayA. putrAtpuNyatarastubhyaM mA putramanutapyathAH. ayajvAnamadakShiNyamabhi shvaityetyudAharat.. .. 7-55-57 (46986) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi ShoDasharAjakIye pa~nchapa~nchAshattamo.adhyAyaH.. 55 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-55-14 tatsali~NgAbhistasyAnurUpAbhiH. abhitaH pArshvataH.. 5-55-22 natveShA nishchitA niShThA maitrI saptapadI satAM iti ~Na. pAThaH. niShThA saptamadI satAM iti gha. pAThaH. saptapadI smR^itA iti jha. pAThaH.. 5-55-23 shaptvAvai tatra vatsaramUShatuH iti ka.pAThaH.. 5-55-25 putramIpsavaH iti gha.~Na.jha.pAThaH.. 5-55-26 dvijairuktato nAradastathetyuktvA sR^i~njayamabravIdityanvayaH.. 5-55-29 kledaH shleShmAdiH.. 5-55-31 suvarNaShThIvirityanena gaNDUShAdikamapi kA~nchanaM bhavatIti sUchitam.. 5-55-35 chikIrShitumapakAraM kartum. kR^IhiMsAyAmityasya rUpam.. 5-55-47 savaiH yaj~naiH.. 5-55-57 chaturbhadrataraH dharmaj~nAnavairAgyaishvaryANi chatvAri bhadrANi. dharmArthakAmabalAnItyanye tubhyaM tava. ayajvAnamadakShiNyaM putraM abhilakShya mAnutapyathAH he shvaitya shvityaputra iti udAharannAradaH sR^i~njayaM pratIti vyAsavAkyam. adAkShiNyaM iti jha.pAThaH.. 5-55-55 pa~nchapa~nchAshattamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 056

.. shrIH ..

7.56. adhyAyaH 056

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

nAradena sR^i~njayamprati suhotracharitrakIrtanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-56-0 (46987) nArada uvAcha. 7-56-0x (4411) suhotraM nAma rAjAnaM mR^itaM sR^i~njaya shushruma. ekavIramashakyaM tamamarairabhivIkShitum.. 7-56-1 (46988) yaH prApya rAjyaM dharmeNa R^itvi~NmantripurohitAn. sammAnya chAtmanaH shreyaH pR^iShTvA teShAM mate sthitaH.. 7-56-2 (46989) prajAnAM pAlanaM dharmo dAnamijyA dviShajjayaH. etatsuhotro vij~nAya dharmyamaichChaddhanAgamam.. 7-56-3 (46990) dharmeNArAdhayandevAnbANaiH shatrU~njayaMstathA. sarvANyapi cha bhUtAni svaguNairanvara~njayat.. 7-56-4 (46991) yo bhuktvemAM vasumatIM mlechChATavikavarjitAm. yasmai vavarSha parjanyo hiraNyaM parivatsarAn.. 7-56-5 (46992) hairaNyAstatra vAhinyaH svairiNyo vyavahanpurA. grAhAnkarkaTakAMshchaiva matsyAMshcha vividhAnbahUn.. 7-56-6 (46993) kAmAnvarShati parjanyo rUpyANi vividhAni cha. sauvarNAnyaprameyANi vApyashcha kroshasammitAH.. 7-56-7 (46994) sahasraM vAmanAnkubjAnnakrAnmakarakachChapAn. sauvarNAnvihitAndR^iShTvA tato.asmayata vai tadA.. 7-56-8 (46995) tatsuvarNamaparyantaM rAjarShiH kurujA~Ngale. IjAno vitate yaj~ne brAhmaNebhyo hyamanyata.. 7-56-9 (46996) so.ashvamedhasahasreNa rAjasUyashatena cha. puNyaiH kShatriyayaj~naishcha prabhUtavaradakShiNaiH.. 7-56-10 (46997) kAmyanaimittikAjasrairiShTveShTAM gatimAptavAn. sa chenmamAra sR^i~njaya chaturbhadratarastvayA.. 7-56-11 (46998) putrAtpuNyatarastubhyaM mA putramanutapyathAH. ayajvAnamadakShiNyamabhi shvaityetyudAharat.. .. 7-56-12 (46999) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi ShoDasharAjakIye ShaTpa~nchAshattamo.adhyAyaH.. 56 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-56-6 hairaNyA hiraNmayAH grAhAdayo.api. vAhinyo nadyaH. svairiNyaH sarvajanopabhogyAH.. 5-56-56 ShaTpa~nchAshattamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 057

.. shrIH ..

7.57. adhyAyaH 057

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

nAradena sR^i~njayamprati a~NgarAjaguNavarNanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-57-0 (47000) nArada uvAcha. 7-57-0x (4412) a~NgaM cha pauravaM vIraM mR^itaM sR^i~njaya shushruma. sahasraM yaH sahasrANAM shvetAnashvAnavAsR^ijat.. 7-57-1 (47001) tasyAshvamedhe rAjarSherdeshAddeshAtsamIyuShAm. shikShAkSharavidhij~nAnAM nAsItsa~NkhyA vipashchitAm.. 7-57-2 (47002) vedavidyAvratasnAtA vadAnyAH priyadarshanAH. subhikShAchChAdanagR^ihAH sushayyAsanabhojanAH.. 7-57-3 (47003) naTanartakagandharvaiH pUrNakairvardhamAnakaiH. nityodyogaishcha krIDadbhistatra sma pariharShitAH.. 7-57-4 (47004) yaj~ne yaj~ne yathAkAlaM dakShiNAH so.atyakAlayat. dvipAndashasahasrAkhyAnadAtkA~nchanasaMvR^itAn.. 7-57-5 (47005) yaH sahasraM sahasrANi kanyA hemavibhUShitAH.. dhUryujAshvagajArUDhAH sagR^ihakShetragoshatAH. 7-57-6 (47006) shataM shatasahasrANi svarNamAlAnatharShabhAn.. gavAM sahasrAnucharAndakShiNAmatyakAlayat. 7-57-7 (47007) hemashR^i~Ngyo raupyakhurAH savatsAH kAMsyadohanAH.. dAsIdAsakharoShTrAMshcha prAdAdAjAvikaM bahu. 7-57-8 (47008) ratnAnAM vividhAnAM cha vividhAMshchAnnaparvatAn.. tasminsaMvitate yaj~ne dakShiNAmatyakAlayat. 7-57-9 (47009) tatrAsya gAthA gAyanti ye purANavido janAH.. `a~Ngasya yajamAnasya api viShNupade vayam. 7-57-10 (47010) amAdyadindruH somena dakShiNAbhirdvijAtayaH. devamAnuShagandharvAMshchAtyarochanta dakShiNAH'.. 7-57-11 (47011) a~Ngasya yajamAnasya svadharmAdhigatAH shubhAH. guNottarAstu kratavastasyAsansArvakAmikAH.. 7-57-12 (47012) sa chenmamAra sR^i~njaya chaturbhadratastvayA. putrAtpuNyatarastubhyaM mA putramanutapyathAH. ayajvAnamadakShiNyamabhi shvaityetyudAharat.. .. 7-57-13 (47013) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi ShoDasharAjakIye saptapa~nchAshattamo.adhyAyaH.. 57 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-57-2 rAjarSheH sarve devAH samAyayuH iti Dha.pAThaH.. 5-57-4 pUrNakaiH svarNachUDaiH. vardhamAnakaiH ArArtikahastaiH.. 5-57-7 dhUryujA rathAH.. 5-57-57 saptapa~nchAshattamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 058

.. shrIH ..

7.58. adhyAyaH 058

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

nAradena sR^i~njayamprati shibivaibhavashaMsanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-58-0 (47014) nArada uvAcha. 7-58-0x (4413) shibimaushInaraM chApi mR^itaM sR^i~njaya shushruma. ya imAM pR^ithivIM sarvAM charmavatparyaveShTayat.. 7-58-1 (47015) sAdridvIpArNavavanAM rathaghoSheNa nAdayan. sa shibiryaShTumanvichChanmukhyaH sarvasapatnajit.. 7-58-2 (47016) tena yaj~nairbahuvidhairiShTaM paryAptadakShiNaiH. avihiMsya janAnanyAnavApa vasu puShkalam.. 7-58-3 (47017) sarvamUrdhAbhiShiktAnAM sammataH so.abhavadyudhi. ajayachchAshvamedhairyo vijitya pR^ithivImimAm.. 7-58-4 (47018) nirargalairbahuphalairniShkakoTisahasradaH. `bibharti dakShiNA yasya ga~NgAyAH srota AvR^iNot'.. 7-58-5 (47019) hastyashvapashubhirdhAnyairmR^igairgojAvibhistathA. vividhaiH pR^ithivIM puNyAM shibirbrAhmaNasAtkarot.. 7-58-6 (47020) yAvatyo varShato dhArA yAvatyo divi tArakAH. yAvatyaH sikatA gA~Ngyo yAvanmerormahopalAH.. 7-58-7 (47021) udanvati cha yAvanti ratnAni prANino.api cha. tAvatIradadadgA vai shibiraushInaro.adhvare.. 7-58-8 (47022) nodyantAraM dhurastasya ka~nchidanyaM prajApatiH. bhUtaM bhavyaM bhavantaM vA nAdhyagachChannarottamam.. 7-58-9 (47023) tasyAsanvividhA yaj~nAH sarvakAmaiH samanvitAH. hemayUpAsanagR^ihA hemaprAkAratoraNAH.. 7-58-10 (47024) shuchisvAdvannapAnaM cha brAhmaNAH prayutAyutAH. nAnAbhakShyaiH priyakathAH payodadhimahAhadAH.. 7-58-11 (47025) tasyAsanyaj~navATeShu nadyaH shubhrAnnaparvatAH. pibata snAta khAdadhvamiti yatrochyate janaiH.. 7-58-12 (47026) yasmai prAdAdvaraM rudrastuShTaH puNyena karmaNA. akShayaM dadato vittaM shraddhA kIrtistathA kriyAH.. 7-58-13 (47027) yathoktameva bhUtAnAM priyatvaM svargamuttamam. etA.NllabdhvA varAniShTA~nshibiH kAle divaM gataH.. 7-58-14 (47028) sa chenmamAra sR^i~njaya chaturbhadratarastvayA. putrAtpuNyatarastubhyaM mA putramanutapyathAH. ayajvAnamadakShiNyamabhi shvaityetyudAharat.. .. 7-58-15 (47029) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi ShoDasharAjakIye aShTapa~nchAshattamo.adhyAyaH.. 58 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-58-1 paryaveShTayat svAdhInAmakarot.. 5-58-5 koTisahasrashaH iti ka.gha.~Na.pAThaH.. 5-58-9 tasya shiberdhuraH kAryabhArasya uyantAraM voDhAraM praj~nApatiH sraShTA svasR^iShTau nAdhyagachChat.. 5-58-13 dadato rAj~no vittAdikamakShayamastviti rudro varaM dadAviti sambandhaH.. 5-58-58 aShTapa~nchAshattamo.adhyAyaH.. 58 ..
droNaparva - adhyAya 059

.. shrIH ..

7.59. adhyAyaH 059

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sR^i~njayamprati nAradena rAmama~NimAnuvarNanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-59-0 (47030) nArada uvAcha. 7-59-0x (4414) rAmaM dAsharathiM chaiva mR^itaM sR^i~njaya shushruma. yaM prajA anvamodanta pitA putramivaurasam. asa~NkhyeyA guNA yasminnAsannamitatejasi.. 7-59-1 (47031) yashchaturdashavarShANi nideshAtpiturachyutaH. vane vanitayA sArdhamavasallakShmaNAgrajaH.. 7-59-2 (47032) jaghAna cha janasthAne rAkShasAnmanujarShabhaH. tapasvinAM rakShaNArthaM sahasrANi chaturdasha.. 7-59-3 (47033) tatraiva vasatastasya rAvaNo nAma rAkShasaH. jahAra bhAryAM vaidehIM sammohyainaM sahAnujam.. 7-59-4 (47034) `rAmo hR^itAM rAkShasena bhAryAM shrutvA jaTAyuShaH. AturaH shokasantapto rAmo.agachChaddharIshvaram.. 7-59-5 (47035) tena rAmaH susa~Ngamya vAnaraishcha mahAbalaiH. AjagAmodadheH pAraM setuM kR^itvA mahArNave.. 7-59-6 (47036) tatra hatvA tu paulastyAnsasuhR^idgaNabAndhavAn. mAyAvinaM mahAghoraM rAvaNaM lokakaNTakam'.. 7-59-7 (47037) surAsurairavadhyaM taM devabrAhmaNakaNTakam. jaghAna sa mahAbAhuH paulastyaM sagaNaM raNe.. 7-59-8 (47038) `hatvA tatra ripuM sa~Nkhye bhAryayA saha sa~NgataH. sa cha la~NkeshvaraM chakre dharmAtmAnaM vibhIShaNam.. 7-59-9 (47039) bhAryayA saha saMyuktastato vAnarasenayA. ayodhyAmAgato vIraH puShpakeNa virAjatA.. 7-59-10 (47040) tatra rAjanpraviShTaH sannayodhyAyAM mahAyashAH. mAtR^IrvayasyAnsachivAnR^itvijaH sapurohitAn.. 7-59-11 (47041) shushrUShamANaH satataM mantribhishchAbhiShechitaH. visR^ijya harirAjAnaM hanumantaM sahA~Ngadam.. 7-59-12 (47042) bhrAtaraM bharataM vIraM shatrughnaM chaiva lakShmaNam. pUjayanparayA prItyA vaidehyA chAbhipUjitaH.. 7-59-13 (47043) dashavarShasahasrANi dashavarShashatAni cha. chatuHsagAraparyantAM pR^ithivImanvashAsata.. 7-59-14 (47044) ashvamedhashatairIjaM kratubhirbhUridakShiNaiH. yashcha vipraprasAdena sarvakAmAnavApya cha'.. 7-59-15 (47045) samprApya vidhivadrAjyaM sarvabhUtAnukampanaH. `sarvadvIpAnavaShTabhya prajA dharmeNa pAlayan'.. 7-59-16 (47046) sa nirgalaM mukhyatamamashvamedhashataM prabhuH. AjahAra sureshasya haviShA mudamAharan. anyaishcha vividhairyaj~nairIje bahuguNairnR^ipaH.. 7-59-17 (47047) kShutpipAse.ajayadrAmaH sarvarogAMshcha dehinAm. satataM guNasampanno dIpyamAnaH svatejasA.. 7-59-18 (47048) atisarvANi bhUtAni rAmo dAsharathirbabhau. R^iShINAM devatAnAM cha mAnuShANAM cha sarvashaH. pR^ithivyAM saha vAso.abhUdrAme rAjyaM prashAsati.. 7-59-19 (47049) nAhIyata tadA prAmaH prANinAM na tadA vyathA. prANApAnau samAvAstAM rAme rAjyaM prashAsati.. 7-59-20 (47050) paryadIpyanta tejAMsi tadA.anarthAshcha nAbhavan. dIrghAyuShaH prajAH sarvA yuvA na mriyate tadA.. 7-59-21 (47051) vedaishchaturbhiH suprItAH prApnuvanti divaukasaH. havyaM kavyaM cha vividhaM niShpUrtaM hutameva cha.. 7-59-22 (47052) adaMshamashakA deshA naShTavyAlasarIsR^ipAH. nApyu prANabhR^itAM mR^ityurnAkAle jvalano.adahat.. 7-59-23 (47053) adharmaruchayo lubdhA mUrkhA vA nAbhavaMstadA. shiShTeShTaprAj~nakarmANaH sarve varNAstadA.abhavan.. 7-59-24 (47054) svadhAM pUjAM cha rakShobhirjanasthAne praNAshitAm. prAdAnnihatya rakShAMsi pitR^idevebhya IshvaraH.. 7-59-25 (47055) sahasraputrAH puruShA dashavarShashatAyuShaH. na cha jyeShThAH kaniShThebhyastadA shrAddhAni kurvate.. 7-59-26 (47056) shyAmo yuvA lohitAkSho mattamAta~NgavikramaH. AjAnubAhuH subhujaH siMhaskandho mahAbalaH.. 7-59-27 (47057) dashavarShasahasrANi dashavarShashatAni cha. sarvabhUtamanaHkAnto rAmo rAjyamakArayat.. 7-59-28 (47058) rAmo rAmo rAma iti prajAnAmabhavatkathA. rAmabhUtaM jagadabhUdrAme rAjyaM prashAsati.. 7-59-29 (47059) chaturvidhAH prajA rAmaH svargaM nItvA divaM gataH. AtmechChayA pratiShThApya rAjavaMshamihAShTadhA.. 7-59-30 (47060) sa chenmamAra sR^i~njaya chaturbhadratarastvayA. putrAtpuNyatarastubhyaM mA putramanutapyathAH. ayajvAnamadakShiNyamabhi shvaityetyudAharat.. .. 7-59-31 (47061) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi ShoDasharAjakIye ekonaShaShTitamo.adhyAyaH.. 59 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-59-17 sa nirargalajAnmukhyAnashvamedhA~nshataM prabhuH iti ~Na. pAThaH. AjahAra mahAjaj~naM prajA dharmeNa pAlayan. nirargalaM sajArUthyamashvamedhaM cha taM vibhuH iti jha. pAThaH. AjahAra rameshasya iti ~Na. pAThaH.. 5-59-19 pR^ithivyAM mAnuShANAM pratyakShA devAdayo vicharanti puNyAtishayAt.. 5-59-20 prANo balam.. 5-59-22 niShpUrtaM jaThIkArAmAdi. hutamiShTham. suprItA brAhmaNAH shAkhapAragAH iti ~Na. pAThaH.. 5-59-29 rAmAdrAmaM jagadabhUt iti gha.jha.pAThaH. tatra rAmaM abhirAmam.. 5-59-59 ekonaShaShTitamo.adhyAyaH.. 59 ..
droNaparva - adhyAya 060

.. shrIH ..

7.60. adhyAyaH 060

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

nAradena sR^i~njayamprati bhagIrathacharitrakathanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-60-0 (47062) nArada uvAcha. 7-60-0x (4415) bhagIrathaM cha rAjAnaM mR^itaM sR^i~njaya shushruma. `paritrANAya pUrveShAM yena ga~NgA.avatAritA.. 7-60-1 (47063) yasyendro bAhuvIryeNa prIto rAj~no mahAtmanaH. so.ashvamedhashatairIje samAptavaradakShiNaiH.. 7-60-2 (47064) havirmantrAnnasampannairdevAnAmAdadhau mudam'. yena bhAgIrathI ga~NgA chayanaiH kA~nchanaishchitA.. 7-60-3 (47065) yaH sahasraM sahasrANAM kanyA hemavibhUShitAH. rAj~nashcha rAjaputrAMshcha brAhmaNebhyo hyamanyata.. 7-60-4 (47066) sarvA rathagatAH kanyA rathAH sarve chaturyujaH. ratherathe shataM nAgAH sarve vai hemamAlinaH.. 7-60-5 (47067) sahasramashvAshchaikaikaM gajAnAM pR^iShThato.anvayuH. ashveashve shataM gAvo gavAM pashchAdajAvikam.. 7-60-6 (47068) tenAkrAntA janaughena dakShiNA bhUyasIrdadat. upahvare.ativyathitA tasyA~Nke niShasAda ha.. 7-60-7 (47069) tathA mAgIrathI ga~NgA hyUrdhvagA hyabhavatpurA. duhitR^itvaM gatA rAj~naH putratvamagamattadA.. 7-60-8 (47070) tAM tu gAthA jaguH prItA gandharvAH sUryavarchasaH. pitR^idevamanuShyANAM shR^iNvatAM valguvAdinaH.. 7-60-9 (47071) bhagIrathaM yajamAnamaikShvAkuM bhUridakShiNam. ga~NgA samudragA devI vavre pitaramIshvaram.. 7-60-10 (47072) tasya sendraiH suragaNairdevairyaj~naH svala~NkR^itaH. samyakparigR^ihItashcha shAntavighno nirAmayaH.. 7-60-11 (47073) yo ya ichCheta vipro vai yatrayatrAtmanaH priyam. bhagIrathastadA prItastatratatrAdadadvashI.. 7-60-12 (47074) nAdeyaM brAhmaNasyAsIdyasya yatsyAtpriyaM dhanam. so.api vipraprasAdena brahmalokaM gato nR^ipaH.. 7-60-13 (47075) yena yAtau makhamukhau dishAshAviha pAdapAH. tenAvasthAtumichChanti taM gatvA rAjamIshvaram.. 7-60-14 (47076) sa chenmamAra sR^i~njaya chaturbhadratarastvayA. putrAtpuNyatarastubhyaM mA putramanutapyathAH. ayajvAnamadakShiNyamabhi shvaityetyudAharat.. .. 7-60-15 (47077) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi ShoDasharAjakIye ShaShTitamo.adhyAyaH.. 60 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-60-3 chayanaiH kA~nchanaishchitA svarNeShTakamayaiH kratvarthasyaNDilairvyAptA chayanairiShTakAsopAnairvA kUladvaye udgamAtsaMgamaparyantaM nichiteti vArthaH.. 5-60-4 rAj~nashcha rAjaputrAMshchAtikramyeti sheShaH. brAhmaNebhyaH amanyata dattavAn.. 5-60-7 yena hetunA upahvare samIpe bhUyasIrdakShiNA dadat rAjA Aste tena hetunA ga~NgA janaughabhAreNa AkrAntA vetrayaShTivattIrapradeshe natiM prAptA satI ativyathitA.atastasyA~Nke niShasAdaha. dakShiNAbhAreNa tIrapradeshe.avanate pravAhAmbu rAj~no.a~NkaparyantamAgatamityarthaH.. 5-60-8 putratvaM narakAttrANakartR^itvam.. 5-60-12 vashI yogI yogaprabhAvAt. yo yatra deshe yat ichChetsa tatra prApnu yAdityarthaH.. 5-60-14 ye.anuyAtA abhimukhA diMshamadyApi pAdapAH. AnatAstasthurichChantastamanvAgantumIshvaram iti ka.pAThaH. anetrAstasthuH iti ka. ~Na. pAThaH.. 5-60-60 ShaShTitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 061

.. shrIH ..

7.61. adhyAyaH 061

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

nAradena sa~njayamprati dilIpaprabhAvavarNanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-61-0 (47078) nArada uvAcha. 7-61-0x (4416) dilIpaM chApi rAjendra mR^itAM sR^i~njaya shushruma. yasya yaj~nashateShvAsanprayutAyutasho dvijAH.. 7-61-1 (47079) tantraj~nAnArthasampannA yajvAnaH putrapautriNaH. `svachChandAH puNyagandhAshcha subhakShA hemamAlinaH. yasya karmANi bhUriNi kathayanti manIShiNaH'.. 7-61-2 (47080) ya imAM vasusampUrNAM vasudhAM vasudhAdhipaH. IjAno vitate yaj~ne brAhmaNebhyo hyamanyata.. 7-61-3 (47081) `rAjAno vitate yaj~ne upahArAnupAharan'. dilIpasya tu yaj~neShu kR^itaH panthA hiraNmayaH. taM dharma iva kurvANAH sendrA devAH samAgaman.. 7-61-4 (47082) sahasraM yatra mAta~NgA agachChanparvatopamAH. sauvarNaM chAbhavatsarvaM sadaH paramabhAsvaram.. 7-61-5 (47083) rasAnAM chAbhavankulyA bhakShyANAM chApi parvatAH. sahasravyAmA nR^ipate yUpAshchAsanhiraNmayAH.. 7-61-6 (47084) chaShAlaprachaShAlau cha yasya yUpe hiraNmayau. nR^ityantyapsaraso yatra ShaTsahasrANi sapta cha.. 7-61-7 (47085) yatra vINAM vAdayati prItyA vishvAvasuH svayam. sarvabhUtAnyamanyanta mama vAdayatIti tam.. 7-61-8 (47086) rAgakhANDavabhojyaishcha mattAH patiShu sherate.. 7-61-9 (47087) tadetadadbhutaM manye anyairna sadR^ishaM nR^ipaiH. yadapsu yudhyamAnasya chakre na paripetatuH.. 7-61-10 (47088) rAjAnaM dR^iDhadhanvAnaM dilIpaM satyavAdinam. ye.apashyanbhUridakShiNyaM te.api svargajito narAH.. 7-61-11 (47089) pa~ncha shabdA na jIryanti dilIpasya niveshane. svAdhyAyaghoSho jyAghoShaH pibatAshnIta khAdata.. 7-61-12 (47090) sa chenmamAra sR^i~njaya chaturbhadratarastvayA. putrAtpuNyatarastubhyaM mA putramanutapyathAH. ayajvAnamadakShiNyamabhi shvaityetyudAharat.. .. 7-61-13 (47091) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi ShoDasharAjakIye ekaShaShTitamo.adhyAyaH.. 61 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-61-2 tantra kriyA.. 5-61-4 panthA hiraNmayaH. hiraNmayyaH srucho bhavantIti vidhimArgastata Arabhya pravR^itta ityarthaH.. 5-61-9 rAgakhaNDavaM guDodanam. parpaTiketi vaidarbhAH. yadyoShA hemasachChannA mattAH pathiShu sherate iti ~Na.Da.pAThaH. pathi susherate iti ka. pAThaH. rAgasvANDavabhojyaishcha mattAH pathiShu sherate iti gha.pAThaH.. 5-61-10 apsu na paripetatuH na mamajjatuH. yasyApyayudhyamAnasya chakre na parimardanam iti ka. pAThaH.. 5-61-61 ekaShaShTitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 062

.. shrIH ..

7.62. adhyAyaH 062

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

nAradena sR^i~njayamprati mAndhAtR^icharitAbhidhAnam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-62-0 (47092) nArada uvAcha. 7-62-0x (4417) mAndhatAraM yauvanAshvaM mR^itaM sR^i~njaya shushruma. yaM devAvashvinau garbhe pituH pArshve chakarShatuH.. 7-62-1 (47093) mR^igayAM vicharanrAjA tR^iShitaH klAntavAhanaH. dhUmaM dR^iShTvA.agamatsatraM pR^iShadAjyamavApa saH.. 7-62-2 (47094) taM dR^iShTvA yuvanAshvasya jaThare ravisannibham. garbhaM nirUhaturdevAvashvinau bhiShajAM varau.. 7-62-3 (47095) taM dR^iShTvA piturutsa~Nge shayAnaM devavarchasam. anyonyamabruvandevAH kamayaM dhAsyatIti vai.. 7-62-4 (47096) mAmevAyaM dhayatva~Nga iti ha smAha vAsavaH. tato~Ngulibhyo hIndrasya prAdurAsItpayo.amR^itam.. 7-62-5 (47097) mAM dhAsyatIti kAraNyAdyadindro hyanvakampayat. tasmAttu mAndhAtetyevaM nAma tasyAdbhutaM kR^itam.. 7-62-6 (47098) tatastu dhArAM payaso ghR^itasya cha mahAtmanaH. tasyAsye yauvanAshvasya pANirindrasya chAsravat.. 7-62-7 (47099) apibatpANimindrasya sa chApyahgA.abhyavardhata. so.abhavaddvAdashasamo dvAdashAhena vIryavAn.. 7-62-8 (47100) imAM cha pR^ithivIM kR^itsnAmekAhnA sa vyajIjayat. dharmAtmA dhR^itimAnvIraH satyasandho jitendriyaH.. 7-62-9 (47101) janamejayaM sudhanvAnaM gayaM pUruM bR^ihadratham. asitaM cha nR^igaM chaiva mAndhAtA mAnavo.ajayat.. 7-62-10 (47102) udeti cha yataH sUryo yatra cha pratitiShThati. tatsarvaM yauvanAshvasya mAndhAtuH kShetramuchyate.. 7-62-11 (47103) so.ashvamedhashatairiShTvA rAjasUyashatena cha. adadadrohitAnmatsyAnbrAhmaNebhyo vishAmpate.. 7-62-12 (47104) hairaNyAnyojanotsedhAnAyatA~nshatayojanam. bahuprakArAnsusvAdUnbhakShyabhojyAnnaparvatAn.. 7-62-13 (47105) atiriktaM brAhmaNebhyo bhu~njAno hIyate janaH.. 7-62-14 (47106) bhakShyAnnapAnanichayAH shushubhustvannaparvatAH. ghR^itahadAH sUpapa~NkA dadhiphenAM guDodakAH.. 7-62-15 (47107) rurudhuH parvatAnnadyo madhukShIravahAH shubhAH. devAsurA narA yakShA gandharvoragapakShiNaH.. 7-62-16 (47108) viprAstatrAgatAshchAsanvedavedA~NgapAragAH. brAhmaNA R^iShayashchApi nAsaMstatrAvipashchitaH.. 7-62-17 (47109) samudrAntAM vasumatIM vasupUrNAM tu sarvataH. sa tAM brAhmaNasAtkR^itvA jagAma svAngR^ihAnprati.. 7-62-18 (47110) `rAjA.api vividhairiShTvA yaj~nairvividhadakShiNaiH'. gataH puNyakR^itAM lokAnvyApya svayashasA
