dishaH.. 7-62-19 (47111) sa chenmamAra sR^i~njaya chaturbhadratarastvayA. putrAtpuNyatarastubhyaM mA putramanutapyathAH. ayajvAnamadakShiNyamabhi shvaityetyudAharat.. .. 7-62-20 (47112) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi ShoDasharAjakIye dviShaShTitamo.adhyAyaH.. 62 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-62-6 tasmAnmAndhAtarityevaM iti ka.pAThaH.. 5-62-8 dvAdashasamo dvAdashavArShikaH. shaya iti pAThe dvAdashahastaH. vyajIjayadvijitavAn.. 5-62-13 rohitAn lohitabhUpradeshAnpadmarAgakhanimato vA matsyAndeshavisheShAn. hairaNyAn svarNAkarayuktAn. janotsedhAn janeShu utsedha uchChrAyo yeShAM tAn. matsyadeshotpanne hi nadyAvadyApi paramparayA pUrvAparau samudrau gachChata iti teShAmuchChritatvaM prasiddham. rohitAnashvAn iti ka.~Na.pAThaH.. 5-62-14 atiriktamavashiShTaM bhu~njAno jana eva hIyate tatvannamityarthaH.. 5-62-62 dviShaShTitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 063

.. shrIH ..

7.63. adhyAyaH 063

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

nArada uvAcha.

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-63-0 (47113) nArada uvAcha. 7-63-0x (4418) yayAtiM nAhuShaM chaiva mR^itaM sR^i~njaya shushruma. `ya imAM pR^ithivIM jitvA sasamudrAM saparvatAm.. 7-63-1 (47114) shamyAprAsena nirmAya vedIH sannatadakShiNAH. IjAnaH kratubhiH puNyaiH paryagachChatpradakShiNam'.. 7-63-2 (47115) rAjasUyashatairiShTvA so.ashvamedhashatena cha. puNDarIkasahasreNa vAjapeyashataistathA.. 7-63-3 (47116) atirAtrasahasreNa chAturmAsyaishcha kAmataH. agniShTomaishcha vividhaiH satraishcha prAjyadakShiNaiH.. 7-63-4 (47117) abrAhmaNAnAM yadvittaM pR^ithivyAmasti ki~nchana. tatsarvaM parisa~NkhyAya tato brAhmaNasAtkarot.. 7-63-5 (47118) sarasvatI puNyatamA nadInAM tathA samudrAH saritaH sAdrayashcha. IjAnAya puNyatamAya rAj~ne ghR^itaM payo duduhurnAhuShAya.. 7-63-6 (47119) vyUDhe devAsure yuddhe kR^itvA devasahAyatAm. chaturdhA vyabhajatsarvAM chaturbhyaH pR^ithivImimAm.. 7-63-7 (47120) yaj~nairnAnAvidhairiShTvA prajAmutpAdya chottamAm. devayAnyAM chaushanasyAM sharmiShThAyAM cha dharmataH.. 7-63-8 (47121) devAraNyeShu sarveShu vijahArAmaropamaH. AtmanaH kAmachAreNa dvitIya iva vArAvaH.. 7-63-9 (47122) yadA nAbhyagamachChAntiM kAmAnAM sarvavedavit. tato gAthAmimAM gItvA sadAraH prAvishadvanam.. 7-63-10 (47123) yatpR^ithivyAM vrIhiyavaM hiraNyaM pashavaH striyaH. nAlamekasya tatsarvamiti matvA shamaM vrajet.. 7-63-11 (47124) evaM kAmAnparityajya yayAtirdhR^itimetya cha. pUruM rAjye pratiShThApya prayAto vanamIshvaraH.. 7-63-12 (47125) sa chenmamAra sR^i~njaya chaturbhadratarastvayA. putrAtpuNyatarastubhyaM mA putramanutapyathAH. ayajvAnamadakShiNyamabhi shvaityetyudAharat.. .. 7-63-13 (47126) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi ShoDasharAjakIye triShaShTitamo.adhyAyaH.. 63 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-63-4 prAjyadakShiNaiH bahudakShiNaiH.. 5-63-5 abrAhmaNAnAM brAhmaNadveShiNAm. mlechChAnAmiti yAvat. parisa~NkyAya apahR^itya.. 5-63-7 chaturbhyaH R^itvigbhyaH. prAchIdigghoturdakShiNAdhvaryorityAdishruteH.. 5-63-63 triShaShTitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 064

.. shrIH ..

7.64. adhyAyaH 064

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

nAradena sR^i~njayampratyambarIShavibhavAbhidhAnam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-64-0 (47127) nArada uvAcha. 7-64-0x (4419) nAbhAgamambarIShaM cha mR^itaM sR^i~njaya shushruma. yaH sahasraM sahasrANAM rAj~nAM chaikastvayodhayat.. 7-64-1 (47128) jigIShamANAH sa~NgrAme samantAdvairiNo.abhyayuH. astrayuddhavido ghorAH sR^ijantashchAshivA giraH.. 7-64-2 (47129) balalAghavashikShAbhisteShAM so.astrabalena cha. ChatrAyudhadhvajarathAMshChittvA prAsAngatavyathaH.. 7-64-3 (47130) ta enaM muktasannAhAH prArthaya~njIvitaiShiNaH. sharaNyamIyuH sharaNaM tava sma iti vAdinaH.. 7-64-4 (47131) sa tu tAnvashagAnkR^itvA jitvA chemAM vasundharAm. Ije yaj~nashatairiShTairyathA shakrastathA.anaghaH.. 7-64-5 (47132) bubhujuH sarvasampannamannamanye janAH sadA. tasminyaj~ne tu viprendrAH santR^iptAH paramArchitAH.. 7-64-6 (47133) modakAnpUrikApUpAnsvAdupUrNAshcha shaShkulIH. karambhAnpR^ithumR^idvIkA annAni sukR^itAni cha.. 7-64-7 (47134) sUpAnmaireyakApUpAnrAgaShADavapAnakAn. mR^iShTAnnAni suyuktAni mR^idUni surabhINi cha.. 7-64-8 (47135) ghR^itaM madhu payastoyaM dadhIni rasavanti cha. phalaM mUlaM susvAdu dvijAstatropabhu~njate.. 7-64-9 (47136) madanIyAni pApAni viditvA chAtmanaH sukham. apibanta yathAkAmaM pAnapA gItavAditaiH.. 7-64-10 (47137) tatra sma gAthA gAyanti kShIbA hR^iShTAH paThanti cha. nAbhAgastutisaMyuktA nanR^itushcha sahasrashaH.. 7-64-11 (47138) teShu yaj~neShvambarISho dakShiNAmatyakAlayat. rAj~nAM shatasahasrANi dashaprayutayAjinAm.. 7-64-12 (47139) hiraNyakavachAnsarvA~nshvetachChatraprakIrNakAn. hiraNyasyandanArUDhAnsAnuyAtraparichChAdAn.. 7-64-13 (47140) IjAno vitate yaj~ne dakShiNAmatyakAlayat. mUrdhAbhiShiktAMshcha nR^ipAnrAjaputrashatAni cha.. 7-64-14 (47141) sa daNDakoshanichayAnbrAhmaNebhyo hyamanyata. naivaM pUrve janAshchakrurna kariShyanti chApare.. 7-64-15 (47142) yadambarISho nR^ipatiH karotyamitadakShiNaH. ityevamanumodante prItA yasya maharShayaH.. 7-64-16 (47143) sa chenmamAra sR^i~njaya chaturbhadratarastvayA. putrAtpuNyatarastubhyaM mA putramanutapyathAH. ayajvAnamadakShiNyamabhi shvaityetyudAharat.. .. 7-64-17 (47144) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi ShoDasharAjakIye chatuHShaShTitamo.adhyAyaH.. 64 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-64-8 sUpAdyoraNDakAnyUShAn iti ka.~Na.pAThaH.. 5-64-10 mAdanIyAni madakarANi surAdIni. pApAni pApahetUnIti j~nAtvApi sukhalipsavaH pibantItyarthaH. madanIyAni pAnAni vidaMshAnAtmanaH priyAn. papustatra yathAkAmaM pAnapA(kA) gItakAH param iti ka.pAThaH).. 5-64-12 atyakAlayaddAtuM niShkAsitavAn. jitA rAjAn eva sopaskaradakShiNAtvena dattAH. teShAM rAjyAni te rAjAnashcha brAhmaNasAtkR^itA ityarthaH.. 5-64-64 chatuHShaShThitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 065

.. shrIH ..

7.65. adhyAyaH 065

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

nAradena sR^i~njayamprati shashibinduyashonuvarNanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-65-0 (47145) nArada uvAcha. 7-65-0x (4420) shashibinduM cha rAjAnaM mR^itaM sR^i~njaya shushruma. ya Ije vividhairyaj~naiH shrImAnsatyaparAkramaH.. 7-65-1 (47146) tasya bhAryAsahasrANAM shatamAsInmahAtmanaH. ekaikasyAM cha bhAryAyAM sahasraM tanayAbhavan.. 7-65-2 (47147) te kumArAH parAkrAntAH sarve niyutayAjinaH. rAjAnaH kratubhirmukhyairIjAnA vedapAragAH.. 7-65-3 (47148) hiraNyakavachAH sarve sarve chottamadhanvinaH. sarve.ashvamedhairIjAnAH kumArAH shAshibindavAH.. 7-65-4 (47149) tAnashvamedhe rAjendro brAhmaNebhyodadatpitA. shataMshataM rathagajA ekaikaM pR^iShThato.anvayuH.. 7-65-5 (47150) rAjaputraM tadA kanyAstapanIyasvala~NkR^itAH. kanyA~NkanyAM shataM nAgA nAgenAge shataM rathAH.. 7-65-6 (47151) ratherathe shataM chAshvA balino hemamAlinaH. ashveashve gosahasraM gavAM pa~nchAshadAvikAH.. 7-65-7 (47152) etaddhanamaparyAptamashvamedhe mahAmasve. shashibindurmahAbhAgo brAhmaNebhyo hyamanyata.. 7-65-8 (47153) vArkShAshcha yUpA yAvanta ashvamedhe mahAmakhe. te tathaiva punashchAnye tAvantaH kA~nchanAbhavan.. 7-65-9 (47154) bhakShyAnnapAnanichayAH parvatAH kroshamuchChritAH. tasyAshvamedhe nirvR^itte rAj~naH shiShTAstrayodasha.. 7-65-10 (47155) tuShTapuShTajanAkIrNAM shAntavighnAmanAmayAm. 7-65-11 (47156) shashibindurimAM bhUmiM chiraM bhuktvA divaM gataH.. 7-65-11 (47157) sa chenmamAra sR^i~njaya chaturbhadratarastvayA. putrAtpuNyatarastubhyaM mA putramanutapyathAH. ayajvAnamadakShiNyamabhi shvaityetyudAharat.. .. 7-65-12 (47158) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi ShoDasharAjakIye pa~nchaShaShTitamo.adhyAyaH.. 65 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-65- trayodashAstra nichayAH shiShTAH.. 5-65- pa~nchaShaShTitamo.adhyAyaH.. 65 ..
droNaparva - adhyAya 066

.. shrIH ..

7.66. adhyAyaH 066

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

nAradena sR^i~njayamprati gayaguNAnuvarNanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-66-0 (47159) nArada uvAcha. 7-66-0x (4421) gayaM chAdhUrtarajasaM mR^itaM sR^i~njaya shushruma. ye vai varShashata rAjA hutashiShTAshano.abhavat.. 7-66-1 (47160) tasmai hyagnirvaraM prAdAttato vavre varaM gayaH. tapasA brahmacharyeNa vratena niyamena cha.. 7-66-2 (47161) gurUNAM cha prasAdena vedAnichChAmi veditum. svadharmeNAvihiMsyAnyAndhanamichChAmi chAkShayam.. 7-66-3 (47162) vipreShu dadatashchaiva shraddhA bhavatu nityashaH. kanyAsu cha savarNAsu suprajastvaM cha me bhavet.. 7-66-4 (47163) annamojo maho mahyaM dharme me ramatAM manaH. avighnaM chAstu me nityaM dharmakAryeShu pAvaka.. 7-66-5 (47164) tathA bhiShyatItyuktvA tatraivAntaradhIyata. gayo hyavApya tatsarvaM dharmeNArAdhaya~njagat.. 7-66-6 (47165) sa darshapUrNamAsAbhyAM kAleShvAgrayaNena cha. chAturmAsyaishcha vividhairyaj~naishchAvAptadakShiNaiH.. 7-66-7 (47166) ayajachChraddhayA rAjA parisaMvatsarA~nshatam. gavAM shatasahasrANi shatamashvashatAni cha.. 7-66-8 (47167) shataM niShkasahasrANi gavAM chApyayutAni ShaT. utthAyotthAya samprAdAtparisaMvatsarA~nshatam.. 7-66-9 (47168) nakShatreShu cha sarveShu dadannakShatradakShiNAH. Ije cha vividhairyaj~nairyathA somo.a~NgirA yathA.. 7-66-10 (47169) sauvarNAM pR^ithivIM kR^itvA ya imAM pramisharkarAm. viprebhyaH prAdadadrAjA so.ashvamedhe mahAmakhe.. 7-66-11 (47170) jAmbUnadamayA yUpAH sarve ratnaparichChadAH. gayasyAsansamR^iddhAstu sarvabhUtamanoharAH.. 7-66-12 (47171) sarvakAmasamR^iddhaM cha prAdAdannaM gayastadA. brAhmamebhyaH prahR^iShTebhyaH sarvabhUtebhya eva cha.. 7-66-13 (47172) sasamudravanadvIpanadInadavaneShu cha. nagareShu cha rAShTreShu divi vyomni cha ye.avasan.. 7-66-14 (47173) bhUtagrAmAshcha vividhAH santR^iptA yaj~nasampadA. gayasya sadR^isho yaj~no nAstyanya iti te.abruvan.. 7-66-15 (47174) ShaTtriMshadyojanAyAmA triMshadyojanamAyatA. pashchAtpurashchaturviMshadvedI hyAsIddhiraNmayI.. 7-66-16 (47175) gayasya yajamAnasya muktAvajramaNistR^itA. prAdAtsa brAhmaNebhyo.atha vAsAMsyAbharaNAni cha.. 7-66-17 (47176) yathoktA dakShiNAshchAnyA viprebhyo bhUridakShiNaH. yatra bhojanashiShTasya parvatAH pa~nchaviMshatiH.. 7-66-18 (47177) kulyAshcha kShIravAhinyo rasAnAM chApabhavaMstadA. vastrAbharaNagandhAnAM shArayashcha pR^ithagvidhAH.. 7-66-19 (47178) yasya prabhAvAchcha gayastriShu lokeShu vishrutaH. vaTashchAkShayyakaraNaH puNyaM brahmasarashcha tat.. 7-66-20 (47179) sa chenmamAra sQa~njaya chaturbhadratarastvayA. putrAtpuNyatarastubhyaM mA putramanutapyathAH. ayajvAnamadakShiNyamabhi shvaityetyudAharat.. .. 7-66-21 (47180) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi ShoDasharAjakIye ShaTShaShTitamo.adhyAyaH.. 66 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-66-1 gayaM chAmUrtarayasaM iti gha. jha.pAThaH.. 5-66-4 pAtreShu dadataH sAme shraddhA bhavatu iti ka.~Na.Da.pAThaH.. 5-66-7 paurNamAsAbhya iti gha. pAThaH.. 5-66-10 nakShatravihitA dakShiNAH.. 5-66-20 yasya prasAdAdrAyatrI triShu lokeShu vishrutA iti ka.pAThaH.. 5-66-66 ShaTShaShTitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 067

.. shrIH ..

7.67. adhyAyaH 067

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

nAradena sR^i~njayamprati rantidevacharitrakIrtanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-67-0 (47181) nArada uvAcha. 7-67-0x (4422) sA~NkR^itiM rantidevaM cha mR^itaM sR^i~njaya shushruma. yasya dvishatasAhasrA AsansUdA mahAtmanaH.. 7-67-1 (47182) gR^ihAnabhyAgatAnviprAnatithInpariveShakAH. pakvaMpakvaM divArAtraM varAnnamamR^itopamam.. 7-67-2 (47183) nyAyenAdhigataM vittaM brAhmaNebhyo hyamanyata. vedAnadhItya dharmeNa yashchakre dviShato vashe.. 7-67-3 (47184) upasthitAshcha pashavaH svayaM yaM shaMsitavratam. bahavaH svargamichChanto vidhivatsatrayAjinam.. 7-67-4 (47185) nadI mahAnasAdyasya pravR^itaktA charmarAshitaH. tasmAchcharmaNvatI nAma khyAtA puNyA saridvarA.. 7-67-5 (47186) brAhmaNebhyo dadanniShkAnsauvarNAnsa prabhAvataH. tubhyaM niShkaM tubhyaM niShkamiti ha sma prabhAShate.. 7-67-6 (47187) tubhyantubhyamiti prAdAnniShkAnniShkAnsahasrashaH. tata punaH samAshvAsya niShkAneva prayachChati.. 7-67-7 (47188) alpaM dattaM mayA.adyeti niShkakoTiM sahasrashaH. ekAhnA tAmyati tataH kvAdya viprA iti bruvan.. 7-67-8 (47189) dvijapANiviyogena duHkhaM me shAshvataM mahat. bhaviShyati na sandeha evaM rAjA.adadadvasu.. 7-67-9 (47190) sahasrashashcha sauvarNAnvR^iShabhAngoshatAnugAn. sAShTaM shataM suvarNAnAM niShkamAhurdhanaM tathA.. 7-67-10 (47191) adhyardhamAsamadadadbrAhmaNebhyaH shataM samAH. agnihotropakaraNaM yaj~nopakaraNaM cha yat.. 7-67-11 (47192) R^iShibhyaH karakAnkumbhAnsthAlIH piTharameva cha. shayanAsanAyAnAni prAsAdAMshcha gR^ihANi cha.. 7-67-12 (47193) vR^ikShAMshcha vividhAndadyAdannAni cha dhanAni cha. sarvaM sauvarNamevAsIdrantidevasya dhImataH.. 7-67-13 (47194) tatrAsya gAthA gAyanti ye purANavido janAH. rantidevasya tAM dR^iShTvA samR^iddhimatimAnuShIm.. 7-67-14 (47195) naitAdR^ishaM dR^iShTapUrvaM kuberasadaneShvapi. dhanaM cha pUryamANaM naH kiM punarmanujeShviti.. 7-67-15 (47196) vyaktaM vasvokasAreyamityuchustatra vismitAH. sA~NkR^ite rantidevasya yAM rAtrimatithirvaset.. 7-67-16 (47197) Alabhyanta tadA gAvaH sahasrANyekaviMshatiH. tatra sma sUdAH kroshanti sumR^iShTamaNikuNDalAH.. 7-67-17 (47198) sUpaM bhUyiShThamashnIdhvaM nAdya mAMsaM yathA purA. rantidevasya yatki~nchitsauvarNamabhavattadA.. 7-67-18 (47199) tatsarvaM vitate yaj~ne brAhmaNebhyo hyamanyata. pratyakShaM tasya havyAni pratigR^ihNanti devatAH.. 7-67-19 (47200) kavyAni pitaraH kAle sarvakAmAndvijottamAH. sa chenmamAra sR^i~njaya chaturbhadratarastvayA.. 7-67-20 (47201) putrAtpuNDatarastubhyaM mA putramanutapyathAH. ayajvAnamadakShiNyamabhi shvaityetyudAharat.. .. 7-67-21 (47202) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi ShoDasharAjakIye saptaShaShTitamo.adhyAyaH.. 67 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-67-3 nyAyenAdhigataM vittaM yenAkShayyaM iti ka.~Na. pAThaH.. 5-67-8 ekAnhA dAsyati punaH ko.anyastatsampradAsyati iti gha.jha.pAThaH.. 5-67-10 pAribhAShikaM niShkamAha sahasrasha iti.. 5-67-11 adhyardhamAsaM pakShe pakShe ityarthaH. shataM samA iti vAkyasheShAt.. 5-67-15 dhanaM cha pUrNamAsAdya iti gha.~Na.pAThaH.. 5-67-16 vasvokasArA salopa ArShaH. kanakamayAni okAMsi sAro yasyAH sA tathA.. 5-67-18 nAdyAshnIta yathA purA iti ka. pAThaH.. 5-67-67 saptaShaShTitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 068

.. shrIH ..

7.68. adhyAyaH 068

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

nAradena sR^i~njayamprati bharatacharitakathanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-68-0 (47203) nArada uvAcha. 7-68-0x (4423) dauShyanti bharataM chApi mR^itaM sR^i~njaya shushruma. karmANyasukarANyanyaiH kR^itavAnyaH shishurvane.. 7-68-1 (47204) himAvadAtAnyaH siMhAnnakhadaMShTrAyudhAnbalI. nirvIryAMstarasA kR^itvA vichakarSha babandha cha.. 7-68-2 (47205) krUrAMshchogratarAnvyAghrAndamitvA chAkarodvashe. manaHshilA iva shilAH saMyuktA jaturAshibhiH.. 7-68-3 (47206) trAyalAdIMshchAtibalavAnsupratIkAngajAnapi. daMShTrAsu gR^ihya vimukhA~nshuShkAsyAnakarodvashe.. 7-68-4 (47207) mahiShAnapyatibalo balino vichakarSha ha. siMhAnAM cha sudR^iptAnAM shatAnyAkarShayadbalAt.. 7-68-5 (47208) balinaH sR^imarAnkha~NgAnnAnAsattvAni chApyuta. kR^ichChraprANAnvane baddhvA damayitvApyavAsR^ijat.. 7-68-6 (47209) taM sarvadamanetyAhurdvijAstenAsya karmaNA. taM pratyaShedhajjananI mA satvAni vyanInashaH.. 7-68-7 (47210) so.ashvamedhashateneje yamunAmanu vIryavAn. trishataishcha sarasvatyAM ga~NgAmanu chatuHshataiH.. 7-68-8 (47211) sau.ashvamedhasahasreNa rAjasUyashatena cha. punarIje mahAyaj~naiH samAptavaradakShiNaiH.. 7-68-9 (47212) agniShTomAtirAtrANAmukthyavishvajitAM cha saH. vAjapeyasahasrAmAM sahasraishcha susaMvR^itaiH.. 7-68-10 (47213) iShTvA shAkuntalo rAjA tarpayitvA dvijAndhanaiH. sahasraM yatra padmAnAM kaNvAya bharato dadau. jAmbUnadasya shuddhasya kanakasya mahAyashAH.. 7-68-11 (47214) yasya yUpAH satavyAmAH pariNAhena kA~nchanAH. samAgamya dvijaiH sArdhe sendrairdevaiH samuchChritAH.. 7-68-12 (47215) ala~NkR^itAnrAjamAnAnsarvaratnairmanoharaiH. hairaNyAndviradAnashvAnrathAnuShTrAnajAvikAn.. 7-68-13 (47216) dAsI dAsaM dhanaM dhAnyaM gAH savatsAH payasvinIH. grAmAngR^ihAMshcha kShetrANi vividhAMshcha parichChadAn.. 7-68-14 (47217) koTIshatAyutAMshchaiva brAhmaNebhyo hyamanyata. chakravartI hyadInAtmA jitArirhyajitaH paraiH.. 7-68-15 (47218) sa chenmamAra sR^i~njaya chaturbhadratarastvayA. putrAtpuNyatarastubhyaM mA putramanutapyathAH. ayajvAnamadakShiNyamabhi shvaityetyudAharat.. .. 7-68-16 (47219) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi ShoDasharAjakIye aShTaShaShTitamo.adhyAyaH.. 68 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-68-1 shuchirvane iti ka.~Na.pAThaH.. 5-68-3 krurAniti. yathA manaHshilAmayAH shilAH jaturAshibhirlAbhApujjairyuktAstatsadR^ishAn raktabinduyuktAn raktapItavarNAn vyAghravisheShAn vashe.akarodityarthaH. shilAH prabhutvAjjanakAshinaH iti ka. pAThaH.. 5-68-12 vyAmo hastachatuShTayam. pariNAhena dairghyeNa .. 5-68-68 aShTaShaShTitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 069

.. shrIH ..

7.69. adhyAyaH 069

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

nAradena sR^i~njayamprati pR^ithucharibrakathanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-69-0 (47220) nArada uvAcha. 7-69-0x (4424) puthuM vainyaM cha rAjAnaM mR^itaM sR^i~njaya shushruma. yamabyaShi~nchatsammantrya rAjasUye maharShayaH.. 7-69-1 (47221) ayaM naH prathayiShyeta sarvAnityabhavatpR^ithuH. kShatAnnastrAsyate sarvAnatyevaM kShatriyo.abhavat.. 7-69-2 (47222) pR^ithuM vainyaM prajA dR^iShTvA raktAH smeti yadabruvan. tato rAjeti nAmAsya anurAgAdajAyata.. 7-69-3 (47223) akR^iShTapachyA pR^ithivI AsIdvainyasya kAmadhuk. sarvAH samAdughA gAvaH puTakepuTake madhu.. 7-69-4 (47224) AsanhiraNmayA vR^ikShAH sukhasparshAH sukhAvahAH. teShAM chIraxx saMvItAH prajAsteShveva sherate.. 7-69-5 (47225) phalAnyamR^itakalpAni svAdUni cha madhUni cha. teShAmAsIttadA.a.ahAro nirAhArAshcha nAbhavan.. 7-69-6 (47226) arogAH sarvasiddhArthA manuShyA hyakutobhayAH. nyavasanta yathAkAmaM vR^ikSheShu cha guhAsu cha.. 7-69-7 (47227) pravibhAgo na rAShTrANAM purANAM chAbhavattadA. yathAsukhaM yathAkAmaM tathaitA muditAH prajAH.. 7-69-8 (47228) tasya saMstambhitA hyApaH samudramabhiyAsyataH. parvatAshcha dadurmArgaM dhvajabha~Ngashcha nAbhavat.. 7-69-9 (47229) taM vanaspatayaH shailA devAsuranaroragAH. saptarShayaH puNyajanA gandharvApsaraso.api cha. pitarashcha sukhAsInamabhigamyedamabruvan.. 7-69-10 (47230) samrADasi kShatriyo.asi rAjA goptA pitA.asi naH. dehyasmabhyaM mahArAja prabhuH sannIpsitAnvarAn. yairvayaM shAshvataM tR^iptA vartayiShyAmahe sukham.. 7-69-11 (47231) `vij~nApitaH prajAbhistu prajAnAM hitakAmyayA. dhanurgR^ihya pR^iShatkAMshcha vasudhAmAdravadbalI.. 7-69-12 (47232) tato vainyabhayAdrAjangaurbhUtvA prAdravanmahI. tAM pR^ithurdhanurAdAya dravantImanvasArayat.. 7-69-13 (47233) sA lokAnbrahmalokAdIngatvA vainyabhayArditA. sA dadarshAgrato vainyaM kArmukodyatapANikam.. 7-69-14 (47234) jvaladbhirvishikhairbANairdIptatejaHsamadyutim. mahAyogaM mahAtmAnaM durdharShamamarairapi.. 7-69-15 (47235) alabhantI paritrANaM vainyamevAbhyapadyata. kR^itA~njalipuTA rAjanpUjyaM lokaistribhistadA.. 7-69-16 (47236) uvAcha chainaM nAdharmyaM strIvadhaM kartumarhasi. kathaM dhArayitA chAsi prajA rAjanmayA vinA.. 7-69-17 (47237) pR^ithuruvAcha. 7-69-18x (4425) ekasyArthAya yo hanyAdAtmano vA parasya vA. ekaM prANAnbahUnvApi prANinAM nAsti pAtakaM.. 7-69-18 (47238) yasmiMstu nihate bhadre bahavaH sukhamedhate. tasminhate tvadhaM nAsti pAtakaM nopabhujyate.. 7-69-19 (47239) so.ahaM pAlanimittaM tvAM badhiShyAmi vasuMdhare. yadi chedvachanAdadya na kariShyasi me priyam.. 7-69-20 (47240) tvAM nihatya tu bANena machChAsanaparA~NmukhIm. AtmAnaM prathayitvA.ahaM prajA dhArayitA svayaM.. 7-69-21 (47241) sukhaM vachanamAsthAya mama dharmabhR^itAM vare. sQa~njIvaya prajA nityaM shaktA hyasi vasundhare.. 7-69-22 (47242) duhitR^itvaM cha me gachCha evametanmahAsharam. niyachCheyaM tvadarthAya udyataM ghoradarshanam.. 7-69-23 (47243) bhUmiruvAcha. 7-69-24x (4426) sarvametanmahArAja vidhAsyAsi parantapa. vatsaM tvaM pashya rAjanvai kShareyaM yena vatsalA.. 7-69-24 (47244) samAM tu kuru sarvaj~na mAM tu dharmabhR^itAM vara. yathA viShyandamAnaM vai kShIraM sarvatra bhAvaye.. 7-69-25 (47245) nArada uvAcha. 7-69-26x (4427) tata utsArayAmAsa shilAjAlAni sarvashaH. pR^ithurvainyastadA rAjA tena shailA vivardhitAH.. 7-69-26 (47246) na hi pUrvanisarge vai viShame vasudhAtale. pravibhAgaH purANAM vA grAmANAM vA mahIpate.. 7-69-27 (47247) na sasyAni na gorakShyaM na kR^iShirna vaNikpathaH. vainyAtprabhR^iti rAjendara sarvasyaitasya sambhavaH.. 7-69-28 (47248) yatrayatra cha sAmyaM tu bhUmAvAsItkilAnagha. tatratatra prajAstAta nivAsamabhirochayan. kR^ichChreNa cha mahArAja ityevamanushushruma.. 7-69-29 (47249) tathetyuktvA punarvainyo gR^ihItvA.a.ajagavaM dhanuH. sharAMshchApratimAnghorAMshchintayitvA.abravInmahIm.. 7-69-30 (47250) pR^ithuruvAcha. 7-69-31x (4428) ehyehi vasudhe kShipraM kSharaibhyaH kA~NkShitaM payaH. machChasanAtigAM vai tvAM pramathiShyAmyahaM sharaiH.. 7-69-31 (47251) nArada uvAcha. 7-69-32x (4429) tathoktA sA.atmanaH shreyashchintayitvA.abravItpR^ithum. 7-69-32 (47252) bhUmiruvAcha. vatsaM pAtrANi dogdhR^IMshcha kShIrANi cha samAdisha.. 7-69-32x (4430) tato dAsyAmyahaM bhadra sarvaM yasya yathepsitam. duhitR^itve cha mAM vIra sa~Nkalpayitumarhasi.. 7-69-33 (47253) nArada uvAcha.' 7-69-34x (4431) tathetyuktvA pR^ithuH sarvaM vidhAnamakarodvashI. tato bhUtanikAyAstAM vasudhAM duduhustadA.. 7-69-34 (47254) tAM vanaspatayaH pUrvaM samuttasthurdudhukShavaH. sA.atiShThadvatsalA vatsaM dogdhR^ipAtrANi chechChatI.. 7-69-35 (47255) vatso.abhUtpuShpitaH sAlaH plakSho dogdhA.abhavattadA. ChinnaprarohaNaM dugdhaM pAtramaudumbaraM shubham.. 7-69-36 (47256) udayaH parvato vatso merurdogdhA mahAgiriH. ratnAnyoShadhayo dugdhaM pAtramastamayaM tathA.. 7-69-37 (47257) `devAnAM vatsa indro.abhUtpAtraM dArumayaM tathA'. dogdhA cha savitA devo dugdhamUrjaskaraM priyam.. 7-69-38 (47258) asurA duduhurmAyAmayaHpAtre tu tAM tadA. dogdhA dvimUrdhA tatrAsIdvatsashchAsIdvirochanaH.. 7-69-39 (47259) kR^iShiM cha sasyaM cha narA duduhuH pR^ithivItale. svAyaMbhuvo manurvatsasteShAM dogdhA.abhavatpR^ithuH.. 7-69-40 (47260) alAbupAtre cha tathA viShaM dugdhA vasundharA. dhR^itarAShTro.abhavaddogdhA teShAM vatsastu takShakaH.. 7-69-41 (47261) saptarShibhirbrahma dugdhA tathA chAkliShTakarmabhiH. dogdhA bR^ihaspatiH pAtraM Chando vatsashcha somarAT.. 7-69-42 (47262) antardhAnaM chAmapAtre dugdhA puNyajanairvirAT. dogdhA vaishravaNasteShAM vatsashchAsIdvR^iShadhvajaH.. 7-69-43 (47263) puNyagandhAnpadmapAtre gandharvApsaraso.aduhan. vatsashchitrarathasteShAM dogdhA vishvaruchiH prabhuH.. 7-69-44 (47264) svadhAM rajatapAtreShu duduhuH pitarashcha tAm. vatso vaivasvatasteShAM yamo dogdhAntakastadA.. 7-69-45 (47265) evaM nikAyaistairdugdhA payo.abhIShTaM hi sA virAT. yairvartayanti te hyadya pAtrairvatsaishcha nityashaH.. 7-69-46 (47266) yaj~naishcha vividhairiShTvA pR^ithurvainyaH pratApavAn. santarpayitvA bhUtAni sarvaiH kAmairmanaHpriyaiH.. 7-69-47 (47267) hairaNyAnakarodrAjA ye kechitpArthivA bhuvi. tAnbrAhmaNebhyaH prAyachChadashvamedhe mahAmakhe.. 7-69-48 (47268) sa ShaShTiM gosahasrANi ShaShTiM nAgashatAni cha. sauvarNAnakarodrAjA brAhmaNebhyashcha tAndadau.. 7-69-49 (47269) imAM cha pR^ithivIM sarvAM maNiratnavibhUShitAm. sauvarNImakarodrAjA brAhmaNebhyashcha tAM dadau.. 7-69-50 (47270) sa chenmamAra sR^i~njaya chaturbhadratarastvayA. putrAtpuNyatarastubhyaM mA putramanutapyathAH. ayajvAnamadakShiNyamabhi shvaityetyudAharat.. .. 7-69-51 (47271) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi ShoDasharAjakIye ekonasaptatitamo.adhyAyaH.. 69 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-69-1 dhvajabha~NgastoraNAdinA.. 5-69-39 dvimUrdhA shukro.abhUt iti ka.~Na.Da.pAThaH.. 5-69-43 virAT pR^ithivI. vatsashchAsItkuverakaH iti.pAThaH.. 5-69-44 dogdhA vasurapi prabhuH iti ka.~Na.Da.pAThaH.. 5-69-45 vatso.atra vatsarasteShAM ka.~Na.pAThaH.. 5-69-46 nivartayanti te rudrAdiShTe vainyena sarvashaH iti ka. pAThaH. yairvartayanti te tR^iptAdiShTe vainyena sarvashaH iti ~Na. pAThaH. ye varShayanti te pAtraiH vatsairdogdhaishcha nityashaH iti ~Na. pAThaH.. 5-69-48 pArthivAH pR^ithvIsaMvandhipadArthAH.. 5-69-69 ekonasaptatitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 070

.. shrIH ..

7.70. adhyAyaH 070

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sR^i~njayamprati nAradena parashurAmaprabhAvavarNanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-70-0 (47272) nArada uvAcha. 7-70-0x (4432) rAmo mahAtapAH shUro vIro lokanamaskR^itaH. jAmadagnyo.apyatiyashA avitR^ipto mariShyati.. 7-70-1 (47273) yashchAstramanuparyeti bhUmiM kurvanvipAMsulAm. nachAsIdvikriyA yasya prApya shriyamanuttamAm.. 7-70-2 (47274) `jAmadagnyo na te rAjankachchichChrotramupAgataH. yenaikena purA rAjankruddhena hatabandhunA.. 7-70-3 (47275) bhR^igubhistAmbhamAnena trAhi rAmeti visvaram. triHsaptakR^itvo bhUmiryatkR^itA niHkShatriyA purA'.. 7-70-4 (47276) yaH kShatriyaiH parAmR^iShTe vatse pitari chAbruvan. tato.avadhItkArtavIryamajitaM samare paraiH.. 7-70-5 (47277) kShatriyANAM chatuHShaShTimayutAni sahasrashaH. tadA mR^ityoH sametAni ekena dhanuShA.ajayat.. 7-70-6 (47278) brahmadviShAM chAtha tasminhasrANi chaturdasha. punaranyAnnijagrAha dantakUre jaghAna ha.. 7-70-7 (47279) sahasraM musalenAhansahasramasinA.avadhIt. udbandhanAtsahasraM cha sahasramudake kR^itam.. 7-70-8 (47280) dantAnbha~NktvA sahasrasya bhinnakarNAMstathA.akarot. tataH saptasahasrANAM kuTudhR^ipamapAyayat.. 7-70-9 (47281) shiShTAnvadhvA cha hatvA vai teShAM mR^irdhni vibhidya cha. guNAvatImuttareNa khANDavAddakShiNena cha. giryante shatasAhasrA haihayAH samare hatAH.. 7-70-10 (47282) sarathAshvagajA vIrA nihatAstatra sherate. piturvadhAmarShitena jAmadagnyena dhImatA.. 7-70-11 (47283) nijaghne dashasAhasrAnrAmaH parashunA tadA. na hyamR^iShyata tA vAcho yAstairbhR^ishamudIritAH.. 7-70-12 (47284) bhR^igau rAmAbhidhAveti yadAkrandandvijottamAH. tataH kAshmIradaradAnkuntikShudrakamAlavAn.. 7-70-13 (47285) a~Ngava~Ngakali~NgAMshcha videhAMstAmraliptakAn. rakShovAhAnvItihotrAMstrigartAnmArtikAvatAn.. 7-70-14 (47286) shibInanyAMshcha rAjanyAndeshAndeshAnsahasrashaH. nijaghAna shitairbANairjAmadagnyaH pratApavAn.. 7-70-15 (47287) koTIshatasahasrANi kShatriyANAM sahasrashaH. indragopakavarNasya bandhujIvanibhasya cha.. 7-70-16 (47288) rudhirasya parIvAhaiH pUrayitvA sarAMsi cha. sarvAnaShTAdasha dvIpAnvashamAnIya bhArgavaH.. 7-70-17 (47289) Ije kratushataiH puNyaiH samAptavaradakShiNaiH. vedImaShTanalotsedhAM sauvarNAM vidhinirmitAm.. 7-70-18 (47290) sarvaratnashataiH pUrNAM patAkAshatamAlinIm. grAmyAraNyaiH pashugaNaiH sampUrNAM cha mahImimAm.. 7-70-19 (47291) rAmasya jAmadagnyasya pratijagrAha kashyapaH. tataH shatasahasrANi dvipendrAnhemabhUShaNAn.. 7-70-20 (47292) nirdasyuM pR^ithivIM kR^itvA shiShTeShTajanasa~NkulAm. kashyapAya dadau rAmo hayamedhe mahAmakhe.. 7-70-21 (47293) triHsaptakR^itvaH pR^ithivIM kR^itvA niHkShatriyAM prabhuH. iShTvA kratushatairvIro brAhmaNebhyo hyamanyata.. 7-70-22 (47294) saptadvIpAM vasumatIM mArIcho.agR^ihNata dvijaH. rAmaM provAcha nirgachCha vasudhAto mamAj~nayA.. 7-70-23 (47295) sa kashyapasya vachanAtprotsArya saritAmpatim. iShupAte yudhAM shreShThaH kurvanbrAhmaNashAsanam.. 7-70-24 (47296) adhyAvasadgirishreShThaM mahendraM parvatottamam. evaM guNashatairyukto bhR^igUNAM kIrtivardhanaH.. 7-70-25 (47297) jAmadagnyo hyatiyashA mariShyati mahAdyutiH. tvayA chaturbhadrataraH puNyAtpuNyatarastava.. 7-70-26 (47298) ayajvAnamadakShiNyaM mA putramanutapyathAH. ete chaturbhadratarAstvayA bhadrashatAdhikAH. mR^itA naravarashreShTha mariShyanti cha sR^i~njaya.. .. 7-70-27 (47299) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi ShoDasharAjakIye saptatitamo.adhyAyaH.. 70 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-70-1 ye mR^itAste.atItA ye vartamAnAste.api. mariShyantyevetyAha rAma iti.. 5-70-5 kShatriyaiH kArtavIryaputraiH. abruvannavikatthayan.. 5-70-6 mR^ityormR^ityumavadhIkR^itya.. 5-70-7 tasmiMstanmadhye eva. dantakrUramiti pAThe taddeshAdhipatim.. 5-70-8 udbandhanAdvR^ikShashAkhAvalambanAt.. 5-70-9 kaNadhUmamapAyayat iti ka.~Na.pAThaH.. 5-70-12 tairAshramavAsibhiH.. 5-70-18 aShTanaletyatra nalashabdashchaturhastavachanaH.. 5-70-70 saptatitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 071

.. shrIH ..

7.71. adhyAyaH 071

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

yudhiShThiraM samAshvAsya svAshramagamanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-71-0 (47300) vyAsa uvAcha. 7-71-0x (4433) puNyamAkhyAnamAyuShyaM shrutvA ShoDasharAjakam. avyAharannarapatistUShNImAsItsa sR^i~njayaH.. 7-71-1 (47301) tamabravIttadA dInaM nArado bhagavAnR^iShiH. kachchinmayA vyAhR^itaM yaddhR^idaye tatsthitaM tava.. 7-71-2 (47302) Ahosvidantato naShTaM shrAddhaM shUdrIpatAviva. sa evamuktaH pratyAha prA~njaliH sR^i~njayastadA.. 7-71-3 (47303) putrashokApahaM shrutvA dhanyamAkhyAnamuttamam. rAjarShINAM purANAnAM yajvanAM dakShiNAvatAm.. 7-71-4 (47304) vismayena hR^ite shoke tamasIvArkatejasA. vipApmA.asmyavyathopeto brUhi kiM karavANyaham.. 7-71-5 (47305) nArada uvAcha. 7-71-6x (4434) diShTyApahatashokastvaM vR^iNIShveha yadichChasi. tatte sampatsyate sarvaM na mR^iShAvAdino vayam.. 7-71-6 (47306) sR^i~njaya uvAcha. 7-71-7x (4435) pAvito.ahamanenaiva prasanno yadbhavAnmam. prasanno yasya bhagavAnna tasyAstIha durlabham.. 7-71-7 (47307) nArada uvAcha. 7-71-8x (4436) punardadAmi te putraM dasyubhirnihataM vR^ithA. uddhR^itya narakAtkaShTAtpashuvatprokShitaM yathA.. 7-71-8 (47308) vyAsa uvAcha. 7-71-9x (4437) prAdurAsIttataH putraH sR^i~njayasyAdbhutaprabhaH. prasannenarShiNA dattaH kuberatanayopamaH.. 7-71-9 (47309) tataH sa~Ngamya putreNa prItimAnabhavannR^ipaH. Ije cha kratubhiH puNyaiH samAptavaradakShiNaiH.. 7-71-10 (47310) akR^itArthashcha bhItashcha na cha sannAhakovidaH. ayajvAchAnapatyashcha tato.asau jIvitaH punaH.. 7-71-11 (47311) shUro vIraH kR^itArthashcha pramathyArInsahasrashaH. abhimanyurgataH svargaM sa~NgrAme.abhimukhAhataH.. 7-71-12 (47312) brahmacharyeNa yA.NllokAnprajayA cha shrutena cha. iShTaishcha kratubhiryAnti tAMste putro.akShayAngataH.. 7-71-13 (47313) vidvAMsaH karmabhiH puNyaiH svargamIhanti nityashaH. na tu svargAdayaM lokaH kAmyate svargavAsibhiH.. 7-71-14 (47314) tasmAtsvargagataM putramarjunasya hataM raNe. na chehAnayituM shakyaM ki~nchidaprApyamIhitam.. 7-71-15 (47315) yAM yogino dhyAnaviviktadarshanAH prayAnti yAM chottamayajvino janAH. tapobhiriddhairanuyAnti yAM tathA tAmakShayAM te tanayo gato gatim.. 7-71-16 (47316) antAtpunarbhAvagato virAjate rAjeva vIro hyamR^itAtmarashmibhiH. tAmaindavImAtmatanuM dvijochitAM gato.abhimanyurna sa shokamarhati.. 7-71-17 (47317) evaM j~nAtvA sthiro bhUtvA mA shucho dhairyamApnuhi. jIvanhi puruShaH shochyo na tu svargagato.anagha.. 7-71-18 (47318) shochato hi mahArAja aghamevAbhivardhate. tasmAchChokaM parityajya shreyase prayatedbudhaH.. 7-71-19 (47319) praharShaM prItimAnandaM priyamutsiktachittatAm. etadAhurbudhAH shauchamashauchaM shoka uchyate.. 7-71-20 (47320) evaM vidvansamuttiShTha prayato bhava mA shuchaH. shrutaste sambhavo mR^ityostapAMsyanupamAni cha.. 7-71-21 (47321) sarvabhUtasamatvaM cha brahmaNA chApi choditam. sR^i~njayasya tu putro.asau mR^itaH sa~njIvitaH shrutaH.. 7-71-22 (47322) evaM vidvanmahArAja mA shuchaH sAdhayAmyaham. etAvaduktvA bhagavAMstatraivAntaradhIyata.. 7-71-23 (47323) vAgIshAne bhagavati vyAse vyabhranabhaHprabhe. gate matimatAM shreShThe samAshvAsya yudhiShThiram.. 7-71-24 (47324) pUrveShAM pArthivendrANaAM mahendrapratimaujasAm. nyAyAdhigatavittAnAM tAM shrutvA yaj~nasampadam.. 7-71-25 (47325) sampUjya manasA vidvAnvishoko.abhUdyudhiShThiraH. punashchAchintayaddInaH kiMsvidvakShye dhana~njayam.. .. 7-71-26 (47326) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi abhimanyuvadhaparvaNi ekasaptatitamo.adhyAyaH.. 71 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-71-5 vismayena puNyAkhyAnashravaNajanitachittavistAreNa.. 5-71-15 nehAniyatinA hyasya kiM chidavyAptamIhate iti ka.pAThaH. na chehAnayituM shakyaM kiM chiraM prApyamIhatA iti ~Na. pAThaH. nehAneyatinA hyasya ki~nchidaprApyamIshituH iti Da.pAThaH.. 5-71-17 antAnmaraNAt. bhAvagataH sampatprAptaH. dvijochitAM dvijairabhimatAm.. 5-71-19 adhaM duHkham.. 5-71-71 ekasaptatitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 072

.. shrIH ..

7.72. adhyAyaH 072

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

abhimanyumanushochyArjunasya vilApaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-72-0 (47327) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-72-0x (4438) atha saMshaptakaiH sArdhaM yudhyamAne dhana~njaye. abhimanyau hate chApi bAle balavatAM vare.. 7-72-1 (47328) maharShisattame yAte vyAse sa tu yudhiShThiraH. pANDavAH kimathA.akArShuH shokopahatachetasaH.. 7-72-2 (47329) kathaM saMshaptakebhyo vA nivR^itto vAnaradhvajaH. kena vA kathitastasya prashAntaH sutapAvakaH. etanme shaMsa tattvena sarvameveha sa~njaya.. 7-72-3 (47330) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-72-4x (4439) shR^iNu rAjanyathA tebhyo nivR^ittaH kR^iShNasArathiH. tataH sarvANi sainyAni dahankR^iShNagatiryathA.. 7-72-4 (47331) samprayAte.astamAditye saMdhyAkAla upasthite. ayAtasyAtmashibiraM nimittairaghashaMsibhiH.. 7-72-5 (47332) yachchAsInmAnasaM tasya yachcha kR^iShNena bhAShitam. yathA cha kathitastasya nihataH sutapAvakaH. vistareNaiva me sarvaM bruvataH shR^iNu mAriSha'.. 7-72-6 (47333) tasminnahani nirvR^itte ghore prANabhR^itAM kShaye. Aditye.asta~Ngate shrImAnsandhyAkAla upasthite.. 7-72-7 (47334) vyapayAteShu vAsAya sarveShu bharatarShabha. hatvA saMshaptakavrAtAndivyairastraiH kapidhvajaH.. 7-72-8 (47335) prAyAtsvashibiraM jiShNurjaitramAsthAya taM ratham. gachChanneva cha govindaM sAshrukaNTho.abhyabhAShata.. 7-72-9 (47336) kiM tu me hR^idayaM trastaM vAkva sajjati keshava. syandane nAvatiShThAmi gAtraiH sIdAmi chAchyuta.. 7-72-10 (47337) aniShTaM chaiva me shliShTaM hR^idayAnnApasarpati. bhuviye dikShu chAtyugrA utpAtAstrAsayanti mAm.. 7-72-11 (47338) bahuprakArA dR^ishyante sarva evAghashaMsinaH. api svasti bhavedrAj~naH sAmAtyasya gurormama.. 7-72-12 (47339) vAsudeva uvAcha. 7-72-13x (4440) vyaktaM shivaM sahabhrAturdharmarAjasya pANDava. mA shuchaHki~nchidevAnyattatrAniShTaM bhaviShyati.. 7-72-13 (47340) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-72-14x (4441) tataH sandhyAmupAsyaiva vIrau vIrAvasAdane. kathayantau raNe vR^ittaM prayAtau rathamAsthitau.. 7-72-14 (47341) tataH svashibiraM prAptau hatAmitrau hatadviShau. vAsudevo.arjunashchaiva kR^itvA karma suduShkaram.. 7-72-15 (47342) dhvastAkAramivAlekhyaM saMvIkShya shibiraM svakam. bIbhatsurabravItkR^iShNamasvasthahR^idayastataH.. 7-72-16 (47343) nadanti nAdya tUryANi ma~NgalyAni janArdana. mishrA dundubhinirdhoShaiH sha~NkhAshchADambaraiH saha.. 7-72-17 (47344) vINA naivAdya vAdyante shamyAtAlasvanaiH saha. ma~NgalyAni cha gItAni na gAyanti paThanti cha.. 7-72-18 (47345) stutiyuktAni ramyANi mamAnIkeShu bandinaH. yodhAshchApi hi mAM dR^iShTvA nivartante hyadhomukhAH.. 7-72-19 (47346) karmANi cha yathApUrvaM kR^itvA nAbhivadanti mAm. api svasti bhavedadya bhrAtR^ibhyo mama mAdhava.. 7-72-20 (47347) na hi shuddhyati me bhAvo dR^iShTvA svajanamAkulam. api pA~nchAlarAjasya virATasya cha mAnada.. 7-72-21 (47348) sarveShAM chaiva yodhAnAM sAmagryaM syAnmamAchyuta. na cha mAmadya saubhadraH prahR^iShTo bhrAtR^ibhiH saha. raNAdAyAntamuchitaM pratyudyAti hasanniva.. 7-72-22 (47349) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-72-23x (4442) evaM sa~Nkathayantau tau praviShTau shibiraM svakam. dadR^ishAte bhR^ishAsvasthAnpANDavAnnaShTachetasaH.. 7-72-23 (47350) dR^iShTvA bhrAtR^iMshcha putrAMshcha vimanA vAnaradhvajaH. apashyaMshchaiva saubhadramidaM vachanamabravIt.. 7-72-24 (47351) mukhavarNo.aprasanno vaH sarveShAmeva lakShyate. na chAbhimanyuM pashyAmi na cha mAM pratinandatha.. 7-72-25 (47352) mayA shrutashcha droNena padmavyUho vinirmitaH. na cha vastasya bhettA.asti vinA saubhadramarbhakam.. 7-72-26 (47353) na chopadiShTastasyAsInmayAnIkAdvinirgamaH. kachchinna bAlo yuShmAbhiH parAnIkaM praveshitaH.. 7-72-27 (47354) bhittvA.anIkaM maheShvAsaH pareShAM bahubhiryudhi. kachchinna nihataH sa~Nkhye saubhadraH paravIrahA.. 7-72-28 (47355) lohitAkShaM mahAbAhuM jAtaM siMhamivAdriShu. upendrasadR^ishaM brUta kathamAyodhane hataH.. 7-72-29 (47356) sukumAraM maheShvAsaM vAsavasyAtmajAtmajam. sadA mama priyaM brUta kathamAyodhane hataH.. 7-72-30 (47357) subhadrAyAH priyaM putraM draupadyAH keshavasya cha. ambAyAshcha priyaM nityaM kovadhItkAlamohitaH.. 7-72-31 (47358) sadR^isho vR^iShNivIrasya keshavasya mahAtmanaH. vikramashrutamAhAtmyaiH kathamAyodhane hataH.. 7-72-32 (47359) vArShNeyIdayitaM shUraM mayA satatalAlitam. yadi putraM na pashyAmi yAsyAmi yamasAdanam.. 7-72-33 (47360) mR^iduku~nchitakeshAntaM bAlaM bAlamR^igekShaNam. mattadviradavikrAntaM siMhapotamivodgatam.. 7-72-34 (47361) smitAbhibhAShiNaM dAntaM guruvAkyakaraM sadA. bAlye.apyatulakarmANaM priyavAkyamamatsaram.. 7-72-35 (47362) mahotsAhaM mahAbAhuM dIrgharAjIvalochanam. bhaktAnukampinaM dAntaM na cha nIchAnusAriNam.. 7-72-36 (47363) kR^itaj~naM j~nAnasampannaM kR^itAstrabhanivartinam. yuddhAbhinandinaM nityaM dviShatAM bhayavardhanam.. 7-72-37 (47364) sveShAM priyahite yuktaM pitR^INAM jayagR^iddhinam. na cha pUrvaM prahartAraM samprame naShTasambhramam. yadi putraM na pashyAmi yAsyAmi yamasAdanam.. 7-72-38 (47365) ratheShu gaNyamAneShu gaNitaM taM mahAratham. mayA.adhyardhaguNaM sa~Nkhye taruNaM bAhushAlinam.. 7-72-39 (47366) pradyumnasya priyaM nityaM keshavasya mamaiva cha. yadi putraM na pashyAmi yAsyAmi yamasAdanam.. 7-72-40 (47367) sunasaM sulalATAntaM svakShibhrUdashanachChadam. apashyatastadvadanaM kA shAntirhR^idayasya me.. 7-72-41 (47368) tantrIsvanasukhaM ramyaM puMskokilasamadhvanim. ashR^iNvataH svanaM tasya kA shAntirhR^idayasya me.. 7-72-42 (47369) rUpaM chApratimaM tasya tridashaishchApi durlabham. apashyato hi vIrasya kA shAntirhR^idayasya me.. 7-72-43 (47370) abhivAdanadakShaM taM pitR^INAM vachane ratam. nAdyAhaM yadi pashyAmi kA shAntirhR^idayasya me.. 7-72-44 (47371) sukumAraH sadA vIro mahArhashayanochitaH. bhUmAvanAthavachChete nUnaM nAthavatAM varaH.. 7-72-45 (47372) shayAnaM samupAsanti yaM purA paramastriyaH. tamadya vipraviddhA~NgamupAsantyashivAH shivAH.. 7-72-46 (47373) yaH purA bodhyate suptaH sUtamAgadhabandibhiH. bodhayantyadya taM nUnaM shvApadA vikR^itaiH svanaiH.. 7-72-47 (47374) ChatrachChAyAsamuchitaM tasya tadvadanaM shubham. nUnamadya rajodhvastaM raNareNuH kariShyati.. 7-72-48 (47375) hA putrakAvitR^iptasya satataM putradarshane. bhAgyahInasya kAlena yathA me nIyase balAt.. 7-72-49 (47376) sA cha saMyamanI nUnaM sadA sukR^itinAM gatiH. svabhAbhirmohitA ramyA tvayA.atyarthaM virAjate.. 7-72-50 (47377) nUnaM vaivasvatashcha tvAM varuNashcha priyAtithim. shatakraturdhaneshashcha prAptamarchantyabhIrukam.. 7-72-51 (47378) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-72-52x (4443) evaM vilapya bahudhA bhinnapoto vagigyathA. duHkhena mahatA.aviShTo yudhiShThiramapR^ichChata.. 7-72-52 (47379) `kathaM tvayi cha bhIme cha dhR^iShTadyumne cha jIvati. sAtyake shakravikrAnte saubhadro nihataH paraiH'.. 7-72-53 (47380) kachchitsa kadanaM kR^itvA pareShAM kurunandana. svargato.abhimukhaH sa~Nkhye yudhyamAno nararShabhaiH.. 7-72-54 (47381) sa nUnaM bahubhiryattairyudhyamAno nararShabhaiH. asahAyaH sahAyArthI mAmanudhyAtavAndhruvam.. 7-72-55 (47382) pIDyamAnaH sharairbAlastAta sAdhvabhidhAva mAm. iti vipralapanmanye nR^ishaMsairbhuvi pAtitaH.. 7-72-56 (47383) athavA matprasUtaH sa svasrIyo mAdhavasya cha. subhadrAyAM cha sambhUto na chaivaM vaktumarhati.. 7-72-57 (47384) vajrasAramayaM nUnaM hR^idayaM sudR^iDhaM mama. apashyato dIrghabAhuM raktAkShaM yanna dIryate.. 7-72-58 (47385) kathaM bAle maheShvAsA nR^ishaMsA marmabhedinaH. svasrIye vAsudevasya mama putre.akShipa~nsharAn.. 7-72-59 (47386) yo mAM nityamadInAtmA pratyudgamyAbhinandati. upayAntaM ripUnhatvA so.adya mAM kiM na pashyati.. 7-72-60 (47387) nUnaM sa pAtitaH shete dharaNyAM rudhirokShitaH. shobhayanmedinIM gAtrairAditya iva pAtitaH.. 7-72-61 (47388) subhadrAmanushochAmi yA putramapalAyinam. raNe vinihataM shrutvA shokArtA vai vina~NkShati.. 7-72-62 (47389) subhadrA vakShyate kiM mAmabimanyumapashyatI. draupadIM chaiva duHkhArtAM kiM vA vakShyAmi tAmaham.. 7-72-63 (47390) vajrasAramayaM nUnaM hR^idayaM yanna yAsyati. sahasradhA vadhUM dR^iShTvA rudatIM shokakarshitAm.. 7-72-64 (47391) hR^iShTAnAM dhArtarAShTrANAM siMhanAdo mayA shrutaH. yuyutsushchApi kR^iShNena shruto vIrAnupAlabhan.. 7-72-65 (47392) ashaknuvantaH pArthasya bAlaM hatvA mahAbalam. kiM na lajjantyadharmaj~nAH pArthivA dR^ishyatAM balam.. 7-72-66 (47393) kiM tayorvipriyaM kR^itvA keshavArjunayormR^idhe. siMhavannadatha prItAH shokakAla upasthite.. 7-72-67 (47394) AgamiShyati vaH kShipraM phalaM pApasya karmaNaH. adharmo hi kR^itastIvraH kathaM syAdaphalashchiram.. 7-72-68 (47395) iti tAnparibhAShanvai vaishyAputro mahAmatiH. apAyAchChastramutsR^ijya kopaduHkhasamanvitaH.. 7-72-69 (47396) kimarthametannAkhyAtaM tvayA kR^iShNa raNe mama. adhakShyaM tAnahaM krUrAMstadA sarvAnmahArathAn.. 7-72-70 (47397) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-72-71x (4444) putrashokArditaM pArthaM dhyAyantaM sAshrulochanam. nigR^ihya vAsudevastaM putrAdhibhirabhiplutam. maivamityabravItkR^iShNastIvrashokasamanvitam.. 7-72-71 (47398) sarveShAmeSha vai panthAH shUrANAmanivartinAm. kShatriyANAM visheSheNa yeShAM naH shastrajIvikA.. 7-72-72 (47399) eShA vai yudhyamAnAnAM shUrANAmanivartinAm. vihitA sarvashAstraj~nairgatirmatimatAM vara.. 7-72-73 (47400) dhruvaM hi yuddhe maraNaM shUrAmAmanivartinAm. gataH puNyakR^itAM lokAnabhimanyurna saMshayaH.. 7-72-74 (47401) etachcha sarvavIrANAM kA~NkShitaM bharatarShabha. sa~NgrAme.abhimukhA mR^ityuM prApnuyAmeti mAnada.. 7-72-75 (47402) sa cha vIrAnraNe hatvA rAjaputrAnmahAbalAn. vIrairAkA~NkShitaM mR^ityuM samprApto.abhimukhaM raNe.. 7-72-76 (47403) mA shuchaH puruShavyAghra pUrvaireSha sanAtanaH. dharmakR^idbhiH kR^ito dharmaH kShatriyANAM raNe kShayaH.. 7-72-77 (47404) ime te bhrAtaraH sarve dInA bharatasattama. tvayi shokasamAviShTe nR^ipAshcha suhR^idastava.. 7-72-78 (47405) etAMshcha vachasA sAmnA samAshvAsaya mAnada. viditaM veditavyaM te na shokaM kartumarhasi.. 7-72-79 (47406) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-72-80x (4445) evamAshvAsitaH pArthaH kR^iShNenAdbhutakarmaNA. tato.abravIttadA bhrAtR^InsarvAnpArthaH sagadgadam.. 7-72-80 (47407) sa dIrghabAhuH pR^ithvaMso dIrgharAjIvalochanaH. abhimanyuryathA vR^ittaH shrotumichChAmyahaM tathA.. 7-72-81 (47408) sanAgasyandanahayAnsa~NgrAme nihatAnmayA. kShipraM drakShyanti te nUnaM mama putraM nihatya vai.. 7-72-82 (47409) kathaM cha vaH kR^itAstrANAM sarveShAM shastrapANinAm. saubhadro nidhanaM gachChedvajriNApi samAgataH.. 7-72-83 (47410) yadyevamahamaj~nAsyamashaktAnrakShaNe mama. sUnoH pANDavapA~nchAlAnagopsyaM taM mahAraNe.. 7-72-84 (47411) kathaM cha vo rathasyAnAM sharavarShANi mu~nchatAm. nIto.abhimanyurnidhanaM kadarthIkR^itya vaH paraiH.. 7-72-85 (47412) aho vaH pauruShaM nAsti na cha vo.asti parAkramaH. yatrAbhimanyuH samare pashyatAM vo nipAtitaH.. 7-72-86 (47413) AtmAnameva garheyaM yadahaM vai sudurbalAn. yuShmAnAj~nAya niryAto bhIrUnakR^itanishchayAn.. 7-72-87 (47414) AhosvidbhUShaNArthAya varmashastrAyudhAni vaH. vAchastu vaktuM saMsatsu mama putramarakShatAm.. 7-72-88 (47415) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-72-89x (4446) evamuktvA tato vAkyamatiShThadvai varAsimAn. na smAshakyata bIbhatsuH kenachitprasamIkShitum.. 7-72-89 (47416) tamantakamiva kruddhaM niHshvasantaM muhurmuhuH. `mahendramiva tiShThantaM vajrodyatamahAbhujam'. putrashokAbhisantaptamashrupUrNamukhaM tadA.. 7-72-90 (47417) na bhAShituM shaknuvanti draShTuM vA suhR^ido.arjunam. anyatra vAsudevAdvA jyeShThAdvA pANDunandanAt.. 7-72-91 (47418) sarvAsvavasthAsu hitAvarjunasya manonugau. bahumAnAtpriyatvAchcha tAvenaM vaktamarhataH.. 7-72-92 (47419) tatastaM putrashokena bhR^ishaM pIDitamAnasam. rAjIvalochanaM kruddhaM rAjA vachanamabravIt.. .. 7-72-93 (47420) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi pratij~nAparvaNi dvisaptatitamo.adhyAyaH.. 72 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-72-11 shliShTamanubaddham.. 5-72-17 ADambaraistUryaravaiH.. 5-72-49 yatheti kathamarthe.. 5-72-70 vAsudeva uvAcha. kimarthametannAkhyAtaM tvayA pArtha raNe mama iti Ta.pAThaH.. 5-72-72 dvisaptatitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 073

.. shrIH ..

7.73. adhyAyaH 073

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

yudhiShThireNArjunampratyabhimanyunidhanaprakArakathanam.. 1 .. arjunena sashapathaM jayadrathavadhapratij~nA.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-73-0 (47421) yudhiShThira uvAcha. 7-73-0x (4447) tvayi yAte mahAbAho saMshaptakabalaM prati. prayatnamakarottIvramAchAryo prahaNe mama.. 7-73-1 (47422) vyUDhAnIkaM tato droNaM yatamAnaM mahAmR^idhe. prativyUhya sahAnIkAH pratyarudhma vayaM balAt.. 7-73-2 (47423) sa vAryamANo rathibhirmayi chApi surakShite. asmAnabhijagAmAshu pIDayannishitaiH sharaiH.. 7-73-3 (47424) te pIDyamAnA droNena droNAnIkaM na shaknumaH. prativIkShitumapyAjau bhettuM tatkuta eva tu.. 7-73-4 (47425) tatastamapratirathamahaM saubhadramabravam. droNAnIkamidaM bhinddhi dvAraM sa~njanayasva naH.. 7-73-5 (47426) sa tathA chodito.asmAbhiH sadashva iva vIryavAn. asahyamapi taM bhAraM voDhumevopachakrame.. 7-73-6 (47427) sa tavAstropadeshena vIryeNa cha samanvitaH. prAvishattadbalaM bAlaH suparNa iva sAgaram.. 7-73-7 (47428) te.anuyAtA vayaM vIraM sAtvatIputramAhave. praveShTukAmAstenaiva yena sa prAvishachchamUm.. 7-73-8 (47429) tataH saindhavako rAjA kShudrastAta jayadrathaH. varadAnena rudrasya sarvAnnaH samavArayat.. 7-73-9 (47430) tato droNaH kR^ipaH karNo drauNiH kausalya eva cha. kR^itavarmA cha saubhadraM ShaDrathAH paryavArayan.. 7-73-10 (47431) parivArya tu taiH sarvairyudhi bAlo mahArathaiH. yatamAnaH paraM shaktyA bahubhirvirathIkR^itaH.. 7-73-11 (47432) tato dauHshAsaniH kShipraM tathA tairvirathIkR^itam. `saMshayaM paramaM prAptaM padAtinamavasthitam. gadAhasto.abhyayAttUrNaM jighAMsuraparAjitam.. 7-73-12 (47433) gadinaM tvatha taM dR^iShTvA vAsavasyAtmajAtmajaH. sa jagrAha gadAM vIro gadAyuddhavishAradaH.. 7-73-13 (47434) gadAmaNDalamArgasthau sarvakShatrasya pashyataH. tau samprajagmaturvIrAvanyonyasyAntaraiShaNau.. 7-73-14 (47435) tAvanyonyaM gadAgrAbhyAM tADitau yuddhadurmadau. indradhvajAvivotsR^iShTau gatasatvau mahIMgatau.. 7-73-15 (47436) dauHshAsanirathotthAya kurUNAM kIrtivardhanaH. uttiShThamAnaM saubhadraM gadayA mUrdhnyatADayat.. 7-73-16 (47437) gadAvegena mahatA vyAyAmena cha mohitaH. vimanA nyapatadbhUmau saubhadraH paravIrahA.. 7-73-17 (47438) sa tu hatvA sahasrANi dvipAshvarathapattinAm'. rAjaputrashataM chAgryaM vIrAMshchAlakShitAnbahUn.. 7-73-18 (47439) bR^ihadbalaM cha rAjAnaM svargeNa samayojayat. `gataH sukR^itinAM lokAnye cha svargajitAM shubhAH.. 7-73-19 (47440) adInastrAsaya~nChatrUnnandayitvA cha bAndhavAn. asakR^innAma vishrAvya pitR^INAM mAtulasya cha'.. 7-73-20 (47441) vIro diShTAntamApannaH shochayanvAndhavAnbahUn. `tataH sma shokasantaptA bhavatA.adya sameyuShaH'.. 7-73-21 (47442) etAvadeva nirvR^ittamasmAkaM shokavardhanam. sa chaivaM puruShavyAghraH svargalokamavAptavAn.. 7-73-22 (47443) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-73-23x (4448) tato.arjuno vachaH shrutvA dharmarAjena bhAShitam. hA putra iti niHshvasya vyathito nyapatadbhuvi.. 7-73-23 (47444) viShaNNavadanAH sarve parivArya dhana~njayam. netrairanimiShairdInAH pratyavaikShanparasparam.. 7-73-24 (47445) pratilabhya tataH saMj~nAM vAsaviH krodhamUrchChitaH. kampamAno jvareNeva niHshvasaMshcha muhurmuhuH.. 7-73-25 (47446) pANiM pANau viniShpiShya dantAnkaTakaTAyya cha. `trishikhAM bhrukuTIM kR^itvA krodhasaMraktalochanaH'. unmatta iva viprekShannidaM vachanamabravIt.. 7-73-26 (47447) arjuna uvAcha. 7-73-27x (4449) satyaM vaH pratijAnAmi shvo.asmi hantA.ajayadratham. na chedvadhabhayAdbhIto dhArtarAShTrAnprahAsyati.. 7-73-27 (47448) na chAsmA~nsharaNaM gachChetkR^iShNaM vA puruShottamam. bhavantaM vA mahArAja shvo.asmi hantA jayadratham.. 7-73-28 (47449) dhArtarAShTrapriyakaraM mayi vismR^itasauhR^idam. pApaM bAlavadhe hetuM shvo.asmi hantA jayadratham.. 7-73-29 (47450) rakShamANAshcha taM sa~Nkhye ye mAM yotsyanti kechana. api droNakR^ipau rAja~nChAdayiShyAmi tA~nCharaiH.. 7-73-30 (47451) yadyetadevaM sa~NgrAme na kuryAM puruSharShabhAH. mA sma puNyakR^itAM lokAnprApnuyAM shUrasammatAn.. 7-73-31 (47452) ye lokA mAtR^ihantR^INAM ye chApi pitR^ighAtinAm. gurudAragatAnAM ye pishunAnAM cha ye sadA.. 7-73-32 (47453) sAdhUnasUyatAM ye cha ye chApi parivAdinAm. ye cha nikShepahantR^INAM ye cha vishvAsaghAtinAm.. 7-73-33 (47454) bhuktapUrvAM striyaM ye cha nindatAmaghashaMsinAm. brahmaghnAnAM cha ye lokA ye cha goghAtinAmapi.. 7-73-34 (47455) pAyasaM vA yavAnnaM vA shAkaM kR^isarameva vA. saMyAvApUpamAMsAni ye cha lokA vR^ithAshnatAm. tAnanhAyAdhigachCheyaM na cheddhanyAM jayadratham.. 7-73-35 (47456) vedAdhyAyinamatyarthaM saMshitaM vA dvijottamam. avamanyamAno yAnyAti vR^iddhAnsAdhUngurUMstathA.. 7-73-36 (47457) spR^ishato brAhmaNaM gAM cha pAdenAgniM cha yA bhavet. yA.apsu shleShma purIShaM cha mUtraM vA mu~nchatAM gatiH. tAM gachCheyaM gatiM kaShTAM na cheddhanyAM jayadratham.. 7-73-37 (47458) nagnasya snAyamAnasya yA cha vandhyA.atithergatiH. utkochinAM mR^iShoktInAM va~nchakAnAM cha yA gatiH.. 7-73-38 (47459) AtmApahAriNAM yA cha yA cha mithyAbhishaMsinAm. bhR^ityaiH sandR^ishyamAnAnAM putradArAshritaistathA.. 7-73-39 (47460) asaMvibhajya kShudrANAM yA gatirmiShTamashnatAm. tAM gachCheyaM gatiM ghorAM na cheddhanyAM jayadratham.. 7-73-40 (47461) saMshritaM chApi yastyaktvA sAdhuM tadvachane ratam. na bibharti nR^isaMsAtmA nindate chopakAriNam.. 7-73-41 (47462) arhate prAtiveshyAya shrAddhaM yo na dadAti cha. anarhebhyashcha yo dadyAdvR^iShalIpataye tathA.. 7-73-42 (47463) madyapo bhinnamaryAdaH kR^itaghno bhartR^inindakaH. teShAM gatimiyAM kShipraM na cheddhAnyAM jayadratham.. 7-73-43 (47464) bhu~njAnAnAM tu savyena utsa~Nge chApi khAdatAm. pAlAshamAsanaM chaiva tindukairdantadhAvanam.. 7-73-44 (47465) ye chAvarjayatAM lokAH svapatAM cha tathoShasi. shItabhItAshcha ye viprA raNabhItAshcha kShatriyAH.. 7-73-45 (47466) ekakUpodakagrAme vedadhvanivivarjite. ShaNmAsaM tatra vasatAM tathA shAstraM vinindatAm.. 7-73-46 (47467) divAmaithuninAM chApi divaseShu cha sherate. agAradAhinAM chaiva garadAnAM cha ye matAH.. 7-73-47 (47468) agnyAtithyavihInAshcha gopAneShu cha vighnadAH. rajasvalAM sevayantaH kanyAM shulkena dAyinaH.. 7-73-48 (47469) yA cha vai bahuyAjinAM brAhmaNAnAM shvavR^ittinAm. AsyamaithunikAnAM cha ye divAmaithune ratAH.. 7-73-49 (47470) brAhmaNasya pratishrutya yo vai lobhAddadAti na. teShAM gatiM gamiShyAmi shvo na hanyAM jayadratham.. 7-73-50 (47471) dharmAdapetA ye chAnye mayA nAtrAnukIrtitAH. ye chAnukIrtitAsteShAM gatiM kShipramavApnuyAm.. 7-73-51 (47472) yadi vyuShTAmimAM rAtriM shvo na hanyAM jayadratham. imAM chApyaparAM bhUyaH pratij~nAM me nibodhata.. 7-73-52 (47473) yadyasminna hatte pApe sUryo.astamupayAsyati. ihaiva sampraveShTA.ahaM jvalitaM jAtavedasam.. 7-73-53 (47474) asurasuramanuShyAH pakShiNo voragA vA pitR^irajanicharA vA brahmadevarShayo vA. charamacharamapIdaM yatparaM chApi tasmA-- ttadapi mama ripuM taM rakShituM naiva shaktAH.. 7-73-54 (47475) yadi vishati rasAtalaM tadagryaM viyadapi devapuraM diteH puraM vA. tadapi sharashatairahaM prabhAte bhR^ishamabhimanyuripoH shiro.abhihartA.. 7-73-55 (47476) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-73-56x (4450) evamuktvA vichikShepa gANDIvaM savyadakShiNam. tasya sarvamatikramya dhanuHshabdo.aspR^ishaddivam.. 7-73-56 (47477) arjunena pratij~nAte pA~nchajanyaM janArdanaH. pradadhmau tatra sa~Nkruddho devadattaM cha phalgunaH.. 7-73-57 (47478) sa pA~nchajanyo.achyutavaktravAyunA bhR^ishaM supUrNodaraniHsR^itadhvaniH. jagatsapAtAlaviyaddigIshvaraM prakampayAmAsa yugAtyaye yathA.. 7-73-58 (47479) tato vAditraghoShAshcha prAdurAsansahasrashaH. siMhanAdashcha pANDUnAM pratij~nAte mahAtmanA.. 7-73-59 (47480) `prAnR^ityadiva gANDIvaM sharAstUNIgatA mudA. nirAkrAmanniva tadA svayameva mR^idhaiShiNaH.. 7-73-60 (47481) bhImasenaH susaMhR^iShTaH pratyabhAShata bhArata. dhana~njayamabhiprekShya harShagadgadayA girA.. 7-73-61 (47482) pratij~nodbhavashabdena kR^iShNasha~Nkhasvanena cha. nihato dhArtarAShTro.ayaM sAnubandhaH suyodhanaH.. 7-73-62 (47483) atha mR^iditatamAgryadAmamAlyaM tava sutashokamayaM cha roShajAtam. vyapanudati mahAprabhAvasena-- nnaravara vAkyamidaM mahArthamiShTam.. 7-73-63 (47484) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-73-64x (4451) atha sha~Nkhyaishcha bherIbhiH paNavaiH sainikAstathA. sasUtamAgadhA jiShNuM stutibhiH samapUjayan.. 7-73-64 (47485) tadA bhImaM balaM sarve tena nAdena mohitam. tAvakaM tanmahArAja viShaNNaM samapadyata'.. .. 7-73-65 (47486) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi pratij~nAparvaNi trisaptatitamo.adhyAyaH.. 73 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-73-38 vandhyApateH iti ~Na. pAThaH. utkroshakAnR^itAnAM cha iti ka. pAThaH. utkoTikAnR^itAnAM cha iti Ta.~Na.pAThaH.. 5-73-39 AtmApahAriNAM AtmAnamanyathA prakAshayatAm.. 5-73-42 vR^iShalI shUdrA kanyAbhAve rajasvalA vA.. 5-73-55 diteriti. kArye kAraNopachArAddaityAnAmityarthaH.. 5-73-73 trisaptatitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 074

.. shrIH ..

7.74. adhyAyaH 074

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

arjunapratij~nAshravaNachakitasya jayadrathasya droNaturyodhanAshyAsanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-74-0 (47487) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-74-0x (4452) shrutvA tu taM mahAshabdaM pANDUnAM putragR^iddhinAm. chAraiH praveditastrastaH samutthAya jayadrathaH.. 7-74-1 (47488) shokasammUDhahR^idayo duHkhenAbhyAhato bhR^isham. majjamAna ivAgAdhe vipule shokasAgare. jagAma samitiM rAj~nAM saindhavo vimR^ishanbahu.. 7-74-2 (47489) sa teShAM naradevAnAM sakAshe paryadevayat. abhimanyupiturbhItaH savrIDo vAkyamabravIt.. 7-74-3 (47490) yo.asau pANDoH kila kShetre jAtaH shakreNa kAminA. sa ninIShati durbuddhirmAM kilaikaM yamakShayam.. 7-74-4 (47491) svasti vo.astu gamiShyAmi svagR^ihaM jIvitepsayA. 7-74-5 (47492) athavAstrapratibalAstrAta mAM kShatriyarShabhAH. pArthena prArthitaM vIrAste sandatta mamAbhayam.. 7-74-6 (47493) droNaduryodhanakR^ipAH karNamadreshabAhlikAH. duHshAsanAdayaH shaktAstrAtumapyantakArditam.. 7-74-7 (47494) kima~Nga punarekena phalgunena jighAMsatA. na trAsyanti bhavanto mAM samastAH patayaH kShiteH.. 7-74-8 (47495) pratij~nAM pANDaveyAnAM shrutvA mama mahadbhayam. sIdanti mama gAtrANi mumUrShoriva pArthivAH.. 7-74-9 (47496) vadho nUnaM pratij~nAto mama gANDIvadhanvanA. tathAhi hR^iShTAH kroshanti shokakAle.api pANDavAH.. 7-74-10 (47497) tanna devA na gandharvA nAsuroragarAkShasAH. utsahante.anyathA kartuM kuta eva narAdhipAH.. 7-74-11 (47498) tasmAnmAmanujAnIta bhadraM vo.astu nararShabhAH. adarshanaM gamiShyAmi na mAM drakShyanti pANDavAH.. 7-74-12 (47499) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-74-13x (4453) evaM vilapamAnaM taM bhayAdvyAkulachetasam. AtmakAryagarIyastvAdrAjA duryodhano.abravIt.. 7-74-13 (47500) na bhetavyaM naravyAghra ko hi tvAM puruSharShabha. madhye kShatriyavIrANAM tiShThantaM prArthayedyudhi.. 7-74-14 (47501) `eteShAM naradevAnAM mattamAta~NgagAminAm. sa~NghAtamupayAtAnAmapi vibhyetpurandaraH'.. 7-74-15 (47502) ahaM vaikartanaH karNashchitraseno viviMshatiH. bhUrishravAH shalaH shalyo vR^iShaseno durAsadaH.. 7-74-16 (47503) purumitro jayo bhojaH kAmbhojashcha sudakShiNaH. satyavrato mahAbAhurvikarNo durmukhashcha ha.. 7-74-17 (47504) duHshAsanaH subAhushcha kAli~NgashchApyudAyudhaH. vindAnuvindAvAvantyau droNo drauNishcha saubalaH.. 7-74-18 (47505) `mAyAvI balavA~nChUro rAkShasashchApyalambusaH'. ete chAnye cha bahavo nAnAjanapadeshvarAH. sasainyAstvAbhigopsyanti vyetu te mAnaso jvaraH.. 7-74-19 (47506) tvaM chApi rathinAM shreShThaH svayaM shUro.amitadyute. sa kathaM pANDaveyebhyo bhayaM pashyasi vaindhava.. 7-74-20 (47507) akShauhiNyo mahAvIrya madIyAstava rakShaNe. yattA yotsyanti mAbhaistvaM saindhava vyetu te bhayam.. 7-74-21 (47508) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-74-22x (4454) evamAshvAsito rAjanputreNa tava saindhavaH. duryodhanena sahito droNaM rAtrAvupAgamat.. 7-74-22 (47509) upasa~NgR^ihya charaNau droNAya sa vishAmpatiH. upopavishya praNataH paryapR^ichChadidaM vachaH.. 7-74-23 (47510) nimitte dUrapAtitve laghutve dR^iDhavedhane. mama bravItu bhagavAnvisheShaM phalgunasya cha.. 7-74-24 (47511) vidyAvisheShamichChAmi j~nAtumAchArya tattvataH. arjunasyAtmanashchaiva yAthAtathyaM prachakShva me.. 7-74-25 (47512) droNa uvAcha. 7-74-26x (4455) samamAchAryakaM tAta tava chaivArjunasya cha. yogAdduHkhoShitatvAchcha tasmAttvatto.adhiko.arjunaH.. 7-74-26 (47513) na tu te yudhi santrAsaH kAryaH pArthAtkatha~nchana. ahaM hi rakShitA tAta bhayAttvAM nAtra saMshayaH.. 7-74-27 (47514) na hi madbAhuguptasya prabhavantyamarA api. vyUhayiShyAmi taM vyUhaM yaM pArtho na tariShyati.. 7-74-28 (47515) tasmAdyudhyasva mAbhaistvaM svadharmamanupAlaya. pitR^ipaitAmahaM mArgamanuyAhi mahAratha.. 7-74-29 (47516) adhItA vidhivadvedA agnayaH suhutAstvayA. iShTaM cha bahubhiryaj~nairna te mR^ityurbhaya~NkaraH.. 7-74-30 (47517) durlabhaM mAnuShairmandairmahAbhAgyamavApya tu. bhujavIryArjitA.NllokAndivyAnprApsyasyanuttamAn.. 7-74-31 (47518) kuravaH pANDavAshchaiva vR^iShNayo.anye cha mAnavAH. ahaM cha sahaputreNa adhruvA iti chintyatAm.. 7-74-32 (47519) paryAyeNa vayaM sarve kAlena balinA hatAH. paralokaM gamiShyAmaH svaiHsvaiH karmabhiranvitAH.. 7-74-33 (47520) tapastaptvA tu yA.NllokAnprApnuvanti tapasvinaH. kShatradharmAshritAH vIrAH kShatriyAH prApnuvanti tAn.. 7-74-34 (47521) evamAshvAsito rAjA bhAradvAjena saindhavaH. apAnudadbhayaM pArthAdyuddhAya cha mano dadhe.. 7-74-35 (47522) tataH praharShaH sainyAnAM tasya chAsIdvishAmpate. vAditrANAM dhvanishchograH siMhanAdaravaiH saha.. .. 7-74-36 (47523) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi pratij~nAparvaNi chatuHsaptatitamo.adhyAyaH.. 74 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-74-4 kiletyaruchau.. 5-74-5 svagR^ihAjjIvitepsayA iti ~Na. pAThaH.. 5-74-6 pArthena pArthivA vIrAstaMddadadhvaM mamAbhayam iti ka.Ta.pAThaH.. 5-74-24 nimitte lakShyabhedane.. 5-74-26 yogAdabhyAsAt. duHkhochitatvAchcha iti ka.Ta.~Na.pAThaH.. 5-74-30 mR^ityubhavaM bhayam iti ka.pAThaH.. 5-74-74 chatuHsaptatitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 075

.. shrIH ..

7.75. adhyAyaH 075

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

shrIkR^iShNenArjunamprati droNAdibhirjayadratharakShaNapratij~nAdikathanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-75-0 (47524) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-75-0x (4456) pratij~nAte tu pArthena sindhurAjavadhe tadA. vAsudevo mahAbAhurdhana~njayamabhAShata.. 7-75-1 (47525) bhrAtR^INAM matamaj~nAya tvayA vAchA pratishrutam. saindhavaM chAsmi hanteti tatsAhasamidaM kR^itam.. 7-75-2 (47526) asammantrya mayA sArdhamatibhAro.ayamudyataH. kathaM tu sarvalokasya nAvahAsyA bhavemahi.. 7-75-3 (47527) dhArtarAShTrasya shibire ye tu praNihitAshcharAH. ta ime shIghramAgamya pravR^ittiM vedayanti naH.. 7-75-4 (47528) tvayA vai sampratij~nAte sindhurAjavadhe prabho. siMhanAdaH savAditraH sumahAniha taiH shrutaH.. 7-75-5 (47529) tena shabdena vitrastA dhArtarAShTrAH sasaindhavAH. nAkasmAtsiMhanAdo.ayamiti matvA vyavasthitAH.. 7-75-6 (47530) sumahA~nshabdasampAtaH kauravANAM mahAbhuja. AsInnAgAshvapattInAM rathaghoShashcha bhairavaH.. 7-75-7 (47531) abhimanyorvadhaM shrutvA dhruvamArto dhana~njayaH. rAtrau niryAsyati krodhAtiti mattvA vyavasthitAH.. 7-75-8 (47532) taishchArebhya iyaM kR^itsnA shrutA satyavatastava. pratij~nA sindhurAjasya vadhe rAjIvalochana.. 7-75-9 (47533) tato vimanasaH sarve trastAH kShudramR^igA iva. AsansuyodhanAmAtyAH sa cha rAjA jayadrathaH.. 7-75-10 (47534) athotthAya sahAmAtyairdInaH svashivirAtkila. ayAtsauvIrasindhUnAmIshvaro rAjasaMsadam.. 7-75-11 (47535) sa mantrakAle saMmantrya sarvAM naishreyasIM kriyAm. suyodhanamidaM vAkyamabravIdrAjasaMsadi.. 7-75-12 (47536) mAmasau putrahanteti shvo.abhiyAtA dhana~njayaH. pratij~nAto hi senAyA madhye tena vadho mama.. 7-75-13 (47537) tAM na devA na gandharvA nAsuroragarAkShasAH. utsahante.anyathA kartuM pratij~nAM savyasAchinaH.. 7-75-14 (47538) te mAM rakShata sa~NgrAme mA vo mUrdhni dhana~njayaH. padaM kR^itvA.a.apnuyAllakShyaM yuktaM pratividhIyatAm.. 7-75-15 (47539) atha rakShA na me samyakkriyate kurunandana. anujAnIhi mAM rAjangamiShyAmi gR^ihAnprati.. 7-75-16 (47540) evamuktastvavAkshIrSho vimanAH sasuyodhanaH. shrutvA taM samayaM tasya dhyAnamevAnvapadyata.. 7-75-17 (47541) tamArtamabhisamprekShya rAjA kila sa saindhavaH. mR^idu chAtmahitaM chaiva sApekShamidamuktavAn.. 7-75-18 (47542) neha pashyAmi bhavatAM tathAvIryaM dhanurdharam. yo.arjunasyAstramastreNa pratihanyAnmahAhave.. 7-75-19 (47543) vAsudevasahAyasya gANDIvaM dhunvato dhanuH. ko.arjunasyAgratastiShThetsAkShAdapi shatakratuH.. 7-75-20 (47544) maheshvaro.api pArthena shrUyate yodhinaH purA. padAtinA mahAvIryo girau himavati prabhuH.. 7-75-21 (47545) dAnavAnAM sahasrANi hiraNyapuravAsinAm. jaghAnaikarathenaiva devarAjaprachoditaH.. 7-75-22 (47546) samAyukto hi kaunteyo bAsudevena dhImatA. sAmarAnapi lokAMstrInhanyAditi matirmama.. 7-75-23 (47547) so.ahamichChAmyanuj~nAtuM rakShituM vA mahAtmanA. droNena sahaputreNa vIreNa yadi manyase.. 7-75-24 (47548) shrIbhagavAnuvAcha. 7-75-25x (4457) sa rAj~nA svayamAchAryo bhR^ishamatrArthito.arjuna. saMvidhAnaM cha vihitaM rathAshcha kila sajjitAH.. 7-75-25 (47549) karNo bhUrishravA drauNirvR^iShasenashcha durjayaH. kR^ipashcha madrarAjashcha ShaDete.asya purogamAH.. 7-75-26 (47550) shakaTaH padmakashchArdho vyUho droNena nirmitaH. padmakarNikamadhyasthaH sUchI pArshve jayadrathaH.. 7-75-27 (47551) sthAsyate rakShite vIraiH sindhurAT sa sudurmadaH. dhanuShyastre cha vIrye cha prANe chaiva tathaurase.. 7-75-28 (47552) aviShahyatamA hyete nishchitAH pArtha ShaDrathAH. etAnajitvA sagaNAnnaiva prApyo jayadrathaH.. 7-75-29 (47553) teShAmekaikasho vIryaM ShaNNAM tvamanuchintaya. sahitA hi naravyAghra na shakyA jetuma~njasA.. 7-75-30 (47554) bhUyastu mantrayiShyAmi nItimAtmahitAya vai. mantraj~naiH sachivaiH sArdhaM suhR^idbhiH kAryasiddhaye.. .. 7-75-31 (47555) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi pratij~nAparvaNi pa~nchasaptatitamo.adhyAyaH.. 75 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-75-2 ashabdo niShedhe. aj~nAtvetyarthaH.. 5-75-25 saMvidhAnaM pratividhAnam.. 5-75-27 padmavyUhaH pashchArdhe pashchAdbhAge yasya. sUchI sUchImukho vyUhaH.. 5-75-75 pa~nchasaptatitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 076

.. shrIH ..

7.76. adhyAyaH 076

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

arjunena shrIkR^iShNamprati svasAmarthyakathanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-76-0 (47556) arjuna uvAcha. 7-76-0x (4458) ShaDrathAndhArtarAShTrasya manyase yAnbalAdhikAn. teShAM vIryaM mamArdhena na tulyamiti me matiH.. 7-76-1 (47557) astramastreNa sarveShAmeteShAM madhusUdana. mayA drakShyasi nirbhinnaM jayadrathavadhaiShiNA.. 7-76-2 (47558) droNasya miShatashchAhaM sagaNasya vipashchitaH. mUrdhAnaM sindhurAjasya pAtayiShyAmi bhUtale.. 7-76-3 (47559) yadi sAdhyAshcha rudrAshcha vasavashcha sahAshvinaH. marutashcha sahendreNa vishvedevAH saheshvarAH.. 7-76-4 (47560) pitaraH sahagandharvAH suparNAH sAgarAdrayaH. dyaurviyatpR^ithivI cheyaM dishashcha sadigIshvarAH.. 7-76-5 (47561) grAmyAraNyAni bhUtAni sthAvarANi charANi cha. trAtAraH sindhurAjasya bhavanti madhusUdana.. 7-76-6 (47562) tathApi bANairnihataM shvo draShTAsi raNe mayA. satyena cha shape kR^iShNa tathaivAyudhamAlabhe.. 7-76-7 (47563) yasya goptA maheShvAso droNaH pApasya durmateH. tameva prathamaM droNamabhiyAsyAmi keshava.. 7-76-8 (47564) tasminyuddhamidaM baddhaM manyate sa suyodhanaH. tasmAttasyaiva senAgraM bhittvA yAsyAmi saindhavam.. 7-76-9 (47565) draShTAsi shvo maheShvAsAnnArAchaistigmatejitaiH. shR^i~NgANIva girervajrairdAryamANAnmayA yudhi.. 7-76-10 (47566) naranAgAshvadehebhyo visraviShyati shoNitam. pataddhyaH patitebhyashcha vibhinnebhyaH shitaiH sharaiH.. 7-76-11 (47567) gANDIvapreShitA bANA mano.anilasamA jave. nR^inAgAshvAnvidehAsUnkartArashcha sahasrashaH.. 7-76-12 (47568) shakrAdbhIShmAtkR^ipAddroNAddevAdrudrAchcha yanmayA. upAttamastraM ghoraM taddaShTAro.atra narA yudhi.. 7-76-13 (47569) brAhmeNAstreNa chAstrANi hanyamAnAni saMyuge. mayA draShTA.asi sarveShAM saindhavasyAbhirakShiNAm.. 7-76-14 (47570) sharavegasamutkR^ittai rAj~nAM keshava mUrdhabhiH. AstIryamANAM pR^ithivIM draShTA.asi shvo mayA yudhi.. 7-76-15 (47571) kravyAdAMstarpayiShyAmi drAvayiShyAmi shAtravAn. suhR^ido nandayiShyAmi pramathiShyAmi saindhavam.. 7-76-16 (47572) bahvAgaskR^itkusaMbandhI pApadeshasamudbhavaH. mayA saindhavako rAjA hataH svA~nshochayiShyati.. 7-76-17 (47573) sarve kShIrAnnabhoktAraH pApAchArA raNAjire. mayA sarAjakA bANairhatA nashyanti saindhavAH.. 7-76-18 (47574) tathA prabhAte kartA.asmi yathA kR^iShNa suyodhanaH. nAnyaM dhanurdharaM loke maMsyate matsamaM yudhi.. 7-76-19 (47575) `gANDIvaM cha dhanurdivyaM yoddhAraM cha dhana~njam. yantAraM cha hR^iShIkeshaM ko.ativarteta saMyuge'.. 7-76-20 (47576) tava prasAdAdbhagavankiMnAvAptaM raNe mama. aviShahyaM hR^iShIkesha kiM jAnanmAM vigarhase.. 7-76-21 (47577) yathA lakShma sthiraM chandre samudre cha yathA jalam. evametAM pratij~nAM me satyAM viddhi janArdana.. 7-76-22 (47578) mAvamaMsthA mamAstrANi mAvamaMsthAshcha gANDivam. mAvamaMsthA balaM bAhvormAvamaMsthA dhana~njayam.. 7-76-23 (47579) gANDIvaM cha dhanurdivyaM yoddhA chAhaM nararShabha. tvaM cha yantA hR^iShIkesha kinnu syAdajitaM mayA.. 7-76-24 (47580) yathAbhiyAya sa~NgramaM na jito vai jayAmi cha. tena satyena sa~NgrAme hataM viddhi jayadratham.. 7-76-25 (47581) `tvaM cha mAdhava sarvaM tattathA pratividhAsyasi. yathA ripUNAM miShatAM pramathiShyAmi saindhavam'.. 7-76-26 (47582) dhruvaM vai brAhmaNe satyaM dhruvA sAdhuShu sannatiH. shrIrdhruvA.api cha dakSheShu dhruvo nArAyaNe jayaH.. 7-76-27 (47583) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-76-28x (4459) evamuktvA hR^iShIkeshaM svayamAtmAnamAtmanA. sandideshArjuno nardanvAsaviH keshavaM prabhum.. 7-76-28 (47584) yathA prabhAtAM rajanIM kalpitaH syAdrathottamaH. tathA kAryaM tvayA kR^iShNa pratij~nA syAdyathA dhruvA.. .. 7-76-29 (47585) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi pratij~nAparvaNi ShaTsaptatitamo.adhyAyaH.. 76 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-76-9 tasmin droNe. yuddhaM baddhamiva baddhaM ekAntajayena sthirIkR^itam .. 5-76-76 ShaTsaptatitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 077

.. shrIH ..

7.77. adhyAyaH 077

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

shrIkR^iShNena subhadrAsamAshvAsanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-77-0 (47586) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-77-0x (4460) tAM nishAM duHkhashokArtau niHshvasantAvivoragau. nidrAM naivopalebhAte vAsudevadhana~njayau.. 7-77-1 (47587) naranArAyaNau kruddhau j~nAtvA devAH savAsavAH. vyathitAshchintayAmAsuH kiMsvidetadbhaviShyati.. 7-77-2 (47588) vavushcha dAruNA vAtA rUkShA ghorAbhishaMsinaH. sakabandhastathA.a.aditye parighaH samadR^ishyata.. 7-77-3 (47589) shuShkAshanyashcha niShpetuH sanirghAtAH savidyutaH. chachAla chApi pR^ithivI sashailavanakAnanA.. 7-77-4 (47590) chukShubhushcha mahArAja sAgArA makarAlayAH. pratisrotaHpravR^ittAshcha tathA gantuM samudragAH.. 7-77-5 (47591) rathAshvanaranAgAnAM pravR^ittamadharottaram. kravyAdAnAM pramodArthaM yamarAShTravivR^iddhaye.. 7-77-6 (47592) vAhanAni shakR^inmUtre mumuchU rurudushcha ha. tAndR^iShTvA dAruNAnsarvAnutpAtA.NllomaharShaNAn.. 7-77-7 (47593) sarve te vyathitAH sainyAstvadIyA bharatarShabhA. shrutvA mahAbalasyogrAM pratij~nAM savyasAchinaH.. 7-77-8 (47594) atha kR^iShNaM mahAbAhurabravItpAkashAsaniH. AshvAsaya subhadrAM tvaM bhaginIM snuShayA saha.. 7-77-9 (47595) snuShAM chAsyA vayasyAshcha vishokAH kuru mAdhava. sAmnA satyena yuktena vachasA.a.ashvAsaya prabho.. 7-77-10 (47596) tato.arjunagR^ihaM gatvA vAsudevaH sudurmanAH. bhaginIM putrashokArtAmAshvAsayata duHkhitAm.. 7-77-11 (47597) vAsudeva uvAcha. 7-77-12x (4461) mA shokaM kuru vArShNeyi kumAraM prati sasnuShA. sarveShAM prANinAM bhIru niShThaiShA kAlanirmitA.. 7-77-12 (47598) kule jAtasya vIrasya kShatriyasya visheShataH. sadR^ishaM maraNaM hyetattava putrasya mA shuchaH.. 7-77-13 (47599) diShTyA mahAratho dhIraH pitustulyaparAkramaH. kShAtreNa vidhinA prApto vIrAbhilaShitAM gatim.. 7-77-14 (47600) jitvA subahushaH shatrUnpreShayitvA cha mR^ityave. gataH puNyakR^itAM lokAnsarvakAmaduho.akShayAn.. 7-77-15 (47601) tapasA brahmacharyeNa shrutena praj~nayApi cha. santo yAM gatimichChanti tAM prAptastava putrakaH.. 7-77-16 (47602) vIrasUrvIrapatnI tvaM vIrajA vIrabAndhavA. mA shuchastanayaM bhadre gataHsa paramAM gatim.. 7-77-17 (47603) `svAdhyAyayuktaM brAhmamI yAchitAraM `svAdhyAyayuktaM brAhmaNI yAchitAraM gaurboDhAraM kShipragantAramashvA. dAsaM shUdrA karmakAraM tu vaishyA shUraM sUte tvadvidhA rAjaputrI'.. 7-77-18 (47604) prApsyate chApyasau pApaH saindhavo bAlaghAtakaH. adharmasyAsya tu phalaM sasuhR^idgaNabAndhavaH.. 7-77-19 (47605) vyuShTAyAM tu varArohe rajanyAM pApakarmakR^it. na hi mokShyati pArthAtsa praviShTo.apyamarAvatIm.. 7-77-20 (47606) shvaH shiraH pAdamUlaM te saindhavasyAhR^itaM dhruvam. paddhyAM pramathitAsi tvaM vishokA bhava mA rudaH.. 7-77-21 (47607) kShatradharmaM puraskR^itya gataH shUraH satAM gatim. vayaM cha prApnuyAmeha ye chAnye shastrajIvinaH.. 7-77-22 (47608) vyUDhorasko mahAbAhuranivartI ripuvrajAt. gatastava varArohe putraH svargaM jvaraM jahi.. 7-77-23 (47609) anuyAtashcha pitaraM mAtR^ipakShaM cha vIryavAn. sahasrasho ripUnhatvA hataH shUro mahArathaH.. 7-77-24 (47610) AshvAsaya snuShAM rAj~ni mA shuchaH kShatriye bhR^isham. shvaH priyaM sumahachChrutvA vishokA bhava nandini.. 7-77-25 (47611) yatpArthena pratij~nAtaM tattathA na tadanyathA. chikIrShitaM hi te bharturna bhavejjAtu niShphalam.. 7-77-26 (47612) yadi cha manujapannagAH pishAchA rajanichachArAH patagAH surAsurAshcha. raNagatamabhiyAnti sindhurAjaM na sa bhavitA saha tairapi prabhAte.. .. 7-77-27 (47613) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi pratij~nAparvaNi saptasaptatitamo.adhyAyaH.. 77 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-77-27 abhiyAnti rakShiShyanti.. 5-77-77 saptasaptatitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 078

.. shrIH ..

7.78. adhyAyaH 078

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

abhimanyumanushochya vilapantyAH subhadrAyAH kR^iShNenAshvAsanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-78-0 (47614) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-78-0x (4462) etachChrutvA vachastasya keshavasya mahAtmanaH. subhadrA putrashokArtA vilalApa suduHkhitA.. 7-78-1 (47615) hA putrA mama mandAyAH kathametyAsi saMyugam. nidhanaM prAptavAMstAta pitustulyaparAkramaH.. 7-78-2 (47616) kathamindIvarashyAmaM sudaMShTraM chArulochanam. mukhaM te dR^ishyate vatsa guNThitaM raNareNunA.. 7-78-3 (47617) nUnaM shUraM nipatitaM tvAM pashyantyanivartinam. sushirogrIvabAhvaMsaM vyUDhoraskaM natodaram.. 7-78-4 (47618) chArUpachitasarvA~NgaM svakShaM shastrakShatAchitam. bhUtAni tvAM nirIkShante bhUmau chandramivoditam.. 7-78-5 (47619) shayanIyaM purA.adhyuShya spardhyAstaraNasaMvR^itam. bhUmAvadya kathaM sheShe vipraviddhaH sukhochitaH.. 7-78-6 (47620) yo.anvAsyata purA vIro varastrIbhirmahAbhujaH. kathamanvAsyate so.adya shivAbhiH patito mR^idhe.. 7-78-7 (47621) yo.astUyata purA hR^iShTaiH sUtamAgadhabandibhiH. so.adya kravyAdgaNairghorairvinadadbhirupAsyeta.. 7-78-8 (47622) pANDaveShu cha nAtheShu vR^iShNivIreShu vA vibho. pA~nchAleShu cha vIreShu hataH kenAsyanAthavat.. 7-78-9 (47623) `yatra tvaM keshave nAthe satyanAtho yathA hataH'. atR^iptadarshanA putra darshanasya tavAnagha. mandabhAgyA gamiShyAmi vyaktamadya yamakShayam.. 7-78-10 (47624) vishAlAkShaM sukeshAntaM chAruvAkyaM sugandhi cha. tava putra kadA bhUyo mukhaM drakShyAmi nirvraNam.. 7-78-11 (47625) dhigbalaM bhImasenasya dhikpArthasya dhanuShmatAm. dhigvIryaM vR^iShNivIrANAM chA~nchAlAnAM cha dhigbalaM.. 7-78-12 (47626) dhikkekayAMstathA chedInmatsyAMshchaivAtha sR^i~njayAn. ye tvAM raNagataM vIraM na shekurabhirakShitum.. 7-78-13 (47627) adya pashyAmi pR^ithivIM shUnyAmiva hatatviSham. abhimanyumapashyantI shokavyAkulalochanA.. 7-78-14 (47628) svasrIyaM vAsudevasya putraM gANDavIdhanvanaH. kathaM tvA.atirathaM vIraM drakShyAmyadya nipAtitam.. 7-78-15 (47629) ehyehi tR^iShito vatsa stanau pUrNau pibAshu me. a~NkamAruhya mandAyA hyatR^iptAyAshcha darshane.. 7-78-16 (47630) hA vIra dR^iShTo naShTashcha dhanaM svapna ivAsi me. aho hyanityaM mAnuShyaM jalabudbudacha~nchalam.. 7-78-17 (47631) imAM te taruNIM bhAryAM tavAdhibhirabhiplutAm. `uttarAmuttamAM jAtyA sushIlAM priya bhAShiNIm.. 7-78-18 (47632) shanakaiH parirabhyainAM snuShAM mama yashasvinIm. sukumArIM vishAlAkShIM pUrNachandranibhAnanAm.. 7-78-19 (47633) bAlapallavatanva~NgIM mattamAta~NgagAminIm. bimbAdharoShThImabalAmabhimanyo praharShaya.. 7-78-20 (47634) tvayA vinA kathaM putra jIrNAM patitamAnasAm'. imAM sandhArayiShyAmi vR^iShabhAdiva dhenukAm.. 7-78-21 (47635) aho hyakAle prasthAnaM kR^itavAnasi putraka. vihAya phalakAle mAM sugR^iddhAM tava darshane.. 7-78-22 (47636) nUnaM gatiH kR^itAntasya prAj~nairapi sudurvidA. yatra tvaM keshave nAthe sa~NgrAme.anAthavaddhataH.. 7-78-23 (47637) yajvanAM dAnashIlAnAM brAhmaNAnAM kR^itAtmanAm. charitabrahmacharyANAM puNyatIrthAvagAhinAm.. 7-78-24 (47638) kR^itaj~nAnAM vadAnyAnAM gurushushrUShiNAmapi. sahasradakShiNAnAM cha yA gatistAmavApnuhi.. 7-78-25 (47639) yA gatiryudhyamAnAnAM shUrANAmanivartinAm. hatvArInnihatAnAM cha sa~NgrAme tAM gati vraja.. 7-78-26 (47640) gosahasrapradAtR^INAM kratudAnAM cha yA gatiH. naiveshikaM chAbhimataM dadatAM yA gatiH shubhA.. 7-78-27 (47641) brAhmaNebhyaH sharaNyebhyo nidhiM nidadhatAM cha yA. yA chApi nyastadaNDAnAM tAM gatiM vraja putraka.. 7-78-28 (47642) brahmacharyeNa yAM yAnti munayaH saMshitavratAH. ekapatnyashcha yAM yAnti tAM gatiM vraja putraka.. 7-78-29 (47643) rAj~nA sucharitairyA cha gatirbhavati shAshvatI. charamAshramiNAM puNyaiH sevitAnAM puraH sthitaiH.. 7-78-30 (47644) dInAnukampinAM yA cha satataM saMvibhAginAm. paishunyAchcha nivR^ittAnAM tAM gatiM vraja putraka.. 7-78-31 (47645) vratinAM dharmashIlAnAM gurushushrUShiNAmapi. amoghAtithinAM yA cha tAM gatiM vraja putraka.. 7-78-32 (47646) kR^ichChreShu yA dhArayatAmAtmAnaM vyasaneShu cha. gatiH shokAgnidagdhAnAM tAM gatiM vraja putraka.. 7-78-33 (47647) mAtApitroshcha shushrUShAM kalpayantIha ye sadA. svadAraniratAnAM cha yA gatistAmavApnuhi.. 7-78-34 (47648) R^itukAle svakAM bhAryAM gachChatAM yA manIShiNAm. parastrIbhyo nivR^ittAnAM tAM gatiM vraja putraka.. 7-78-35 (47649) sAmnA ye sarvabhUtAni pashyanti gatamatsarAH. nAruntudAnAM kShamiNAM yA gatistAmavApnuhi.. 7-78-36 (47650) madhumAMsAnnivR^ittAnAM madAddR^imbhAttathA.anR^itAt. paropatApAdanyAyAttAM gatiM vraja putraka.. 7-78-37 (47651) hImantaH sarvashAstraj~nA j~nAnatR^iptA jitendriyAH. yAM gatiM sAdhavo yAnti tAM gatiM vraja putraka.. 7-78-38 (47652) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-78-39x (4463) evaM vilapatIM dInAM subhadrAM shokakarshitAm. anvapadyata pA~nchAlI vairATisahitAM tadA.. 7-78-39 (47653) sA prakAmaM ruditvA cha vilapya cha suduHkhitA. unmattavattadA rAjanvisaMj~nA patitA kShitau.. 7-78-40 (47654) sopachArastu kR^iShNastAM duHkhitAM bhR^ishaduHkhitaH. siktvAmbhasA samAshvAsya tattaduktvA hitaM vachaH.. 7-78-41 (47655) visaMj~nakalpAM rudatImapaviddhAM pravepatIm. bhaginIM puNDarIkAkSha idaM vachanamabravIt.. 7-78-42 (47656) subhadre mA shuchaH putraM pA~nchAlyAshvAsayottarAm. gato.abhimanyuH prathitAM gatiM kShatriyapu~NgavaH.. 7-78-43 (47657) ye chAnye.api kule santi puruShA no varAnane. sarve na te gatiM yAnti yA.abhimanyoryashasvinaH.. 7-78-44 (47658) kuryAma tadvayaM karma kuryuryutsuhR^idashcha naH. kR^itavAnyAdR^igadyaikastava putro mahArathaH.. 7-78-45 (47659) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-78-46x (4464) evamAshvAsya bhaginIM draupadImapi chottarAm. pArthasyaiva mahAbAhuH pArshvamAgAdarindamaH.. 7-78-46 (47660) tato.abhyanuj~nAya nR^ipAnkR^iShNo bandhUMstathA.arjunam. viveshAntaH pure rAjaMste cha jagmuH svamAlayam.. .. 7-78-47 (47661) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi pratij~nAparvaNi aShTasaptatitamo.adhyAyaH.. 78 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-78-27 naiveshikaM sopakaraNaM gR^iham. naiveshikAyeti pAThe gR^ihAshramonmukhAya vidyAvratasnAtAya. abhimataM vivAhopayuktam.. 5-78-28 nyastadaNDAnAM nirastAbhimAnAnAm. daNDo strI laguDe pumAnityu pakramya dame yame.abimAnecheti medinI.. 5-78-29 ekapatnyaH pativratAH.. 5-78-78 aShTasaptatitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 079

.. shrIH ..

7.79. adhyAyaH 079

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

shrIkR^iShNena rAtrAvarjunena tryambakAya balipradApanam.. 1 .. kR^iShNadArukasambhAShaNam.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-79-0 (47662) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-79-0x (4465) tato.arjunasya bhavanaM pravishyApratimaM vibhuH. spR^iShTvAmbhaH puNDarIkAkShaH sthaNDile shubhalakShaNe. santastAra shubhAM shayyAM darbhairvaidUryasannibhaiH.. 7-79-1 (47663) tato mAlyena vidhivallAjairgandhaiH suma~NgalaiH. ala~nchakAra tAM shayyAM parivAryAyudhottamaiH.. 7-79-2 (47664) tataH spR^iShTodakaM pArthaM vinItaparichArakam. naityakaM darshayA~nchakre naishaM traiyambakaM balim.. 7-79-3 (47665) tataH prItamanAH pArtho gandhamAlyaishcha mAdhavam. ala~NkR^ityopahAraM taM naishaM tasmai nyavedayat.. 7-79-4 (47666) sAdhusAdhviti govindaH phalgunaM pratyabhAShata.. 7-79-5 (47667) supyatAM pArtha bhadraM te kalyANAya vrajAmyaham. sthApayitvA tato dvAsthAngoptR^IMshchAttAyudhAnnarAn.. 7-79-6 (47668) dArukAnugataH shrImAnvivesha shibiraM svakam. shishye cha shayane shubhre bahukR^itya vichintayan.. 7-79-7 (47669) pArthAya sarvaM bhagavA~nshokaduHkhApahaM vidhim. vyadadhAtpuNDarIkAkShastejodyutivivardhanam.. 7-79-8 (47670) yogamAsthAya yuktAtmA sarveShAmIshvareshvaraH. shreyaskAmaH pR^ithuyashA viShNurjiShNupriya~NkaraH.. 7-79-9 (47671) na pANDavAnAM shibire kashchitsuShvApa tAM nishAm. prajAgaraH sarvajanaM hyAvivesha vishAmpate.. 7-79-10 (47672) putrashokAbhitaptena pratij~nAto mahAtmanA. shvaH sindhurAjasya vadhaH kAryo gANDIvadhanvanA.. 7-79-11 (47673) tatkathaM nu mahAbAhurvAsaviH paravIrahA. pratij~nAM saphalAM kuryAditi te samachintayan.. 7-79-12 (47674) kaShTaM hIdaM vyavasitaM pANDavena mahAtmanA. putrashokAbhibhUtena pratij~nA mahatI kR^itA.. 7-79-13 (47675) bhrAtarashchApi vikrAntA bahulAni balAni cha. dhR^itarAShTrasya putreNa sarvataH sanniveshitAH.. 7-79-14 (47676) sa hatvA saindhavaM sa~Nkhye punaretu jayI sukhI. `hatvA ripugaNaM sarvaM pArayitvA mahAvratam.. 7-79-15 (47677) yadyasti sukR^itaM ki~nchidasmAkaM hantu saindhavam. jitvA sarvAnripUnpArthastrAtu no.asmAnmahAbhayAt.. 7-79-16 (47678) evamAshaMsamAnAste kechittasthurupashrutim. shrutvA cheShTaM sumanaso vyaktamAshaMsire jayam.. 7-79-17 (47679) bhavitA nu kathaM kR^ityamidamityabruva~njanAH'. shvo.ahatvA sindhurAjaM vai dhUmaketuM pravekShyati.. 7-79-18 (47680) na shakyamanR^itAM kartuM pratij~nAM vijayena hi. `mahaddhi sAhasaM pArthaH kR^itavAchChokamohitaH'.. 7-79-19 (47681) dharmaputraH kathaM rAjA bhaviShyati mR^ite.arjune. tasminhi vijayaH kR^itsnaH pANDavena samAhitaH.. 7-79-20 (47682) yadi no.asti kR^itaM ki~nchidyadi dattaM hutaM yadi. phalena tasya sarvasya savyasAchI jayatvarIn.. 7-79-21 (47683) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-79-22x (4466) evaM kathayatAM teShAM jayamAshaMsatAM prabho. kR^ichChreNa mahatA rAjanrajanI vyatyavartata.. 7-79-22 (47684) tasyA rajanyA madhye tu pratibuddho janArdanaH. smR^itvA pratij~nAM pArthasya dArukaM pratyabhAShata.. 7-79-23 (47685) arjunena pratij~nAtamArtena hatabandhunA. jayadrathaM vadhiShyAmi shvobhUta iti dAruka.. 7-79-24 (47686) tattu duryodhanaH shrutvA mantribhirmantrayiShyati. yathA jayadrathaM pArtho na hanyAditi saMyuge.. 7-79-25 (47687) akShauhiNyo hi tAH sarvA rakShiShyanti jayadratham. droNashcha sahaputreNa sarvAstravidhipAragaH.. 7-79-26 (47688) eko vIraH sahasrAkSho daityadAnavadarpahA. so.api taM notsahetAjau hantuM droNena rakShitam.. 7-79-27 (47689) so.ahaM shvastatkariShyAmi yathA kuntIsuto.arjunaH. aprApte.astaM dinakare haniShyati jayadratham.. 7-79-28 (47690) na hi dArA na mitrANi j~nAtayo na cha bAndhavAH. kashchidanyaH priyataraH kuntIputrAnmamArjunAt.. 7-79-29 (47691) anarjunamimaM lokaM muhUrtamapi dAruka. udIkShituM na shakto.ahaM bhavitA na cha tattathA.. 7-79-30 (47692) ahaM vijitya tAnsarvAnsahasA sahayadvipAn. arjunArthe haniShyAmi sakarNAnsasuyodhanAn.. 7-79-31 (47693) shvo nirIkShantu me vIryaM trayo lokA mahAhave. dhana~njayArthe samare parAkrAntasya dAruka.. 7-79-32 (47694) shvo narendrasahasrANi rAjaputrashatAni cha. sAshvadviparathAnyAjau vidraviShyAmi dAruka.. 7-79-33 (47695) shvastAM chakrapramathitAM drakShyase nR^ipavAhinIm. mayA kruddhena samare pANDavArthe nipAtitAm.. 7-79-34 (47696) shvaH sadevAH sagandharvAH pishAchoragarAkShasAH. j~nAsyanti lokAH sarve mAM suhR^idaM savyasAchinaH.. 7-79-35 (47697) yastaM dveShTi sa mAM dveShTi yastaM chAnu sa mAmanu. iti sa~NkalpyatAM buddhyA sharIrArdhaM mamArjunaH.. 7-79-36 (47698) yathA tvaM me prabhAtAyAmasyAM nishi rathottamam. kalpayitvA yathAshAstramAdAya vraja saMyataH.. 7-79-37 (47699) gadAM kaumodakIM divyAM shaktiM chakraM dhanuH sharAn.
