Aropya vai rathe sUta sarvopakaraNAni cha.. 7-79-38 (47700) sthAnaM cha kalpayitvA.atha rathopasthe dhvajasya me. vainateyasya vIrasya samare rathashobhinaH.. 7-79-39 (47701) ChatraM jAmbUnadairjAlairarkajvalanasaprabhaiH.. vishvakarmakR^itairdivyairashvAnapi vibhUShaya.. 7-79-40 (47702) balAhakaM meghapuShpaM shaibyaM sugrIvameva cha. yuktvA vAjivarAMstatra kavachI tiShTha dAruka.. 7-79-41 (47703) pA~nchajanyasya nirghoShaM parjanyaninadopamam. shrutvA cha bhairavaM nAdamupeyAstvaM javena mAm.. 7-79-42 (47704) ekAhnA.ahamamarShaM cha sarvaduHkhAni chaiva ha. bhrAtuH paitR^iShvaseyasya vyapaneShyAmi dAruka.. 7-79-43 (47705) sarvopAyairyatiShyAmi yathA bIbhatsurAhave. pashyatAM dhArtarAShTrANAM haniShyati jayadratham.. 7-79-44 (47706) yasyayasya cha bIbhatsurvadhe yatnaM kariShyati. AshaMse.ahaM raNe tantaM tatratatra haniShyati.. 7-79-45 (47707) dAruka uvAcha. 7-79-46x (4467) jaya eva dhruvastasya kuta eva parAjayaH. yasya tvaM puruShavyAghra sArathyamupajagmivAn.. 7-79-46 (47708) evaM chaitatkariShyAmi yathA mAmanubhAShase. suprabhAtAmimAM rAtriM jayAya vijayasya hi.. .. 7-79-47 (47709) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi pratij~nAparvaNi ekonAshItitamo.adhyAyaH.. 79 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-79-3 lAjairakShataiH.. 5-79-4 tasmai tryambakAya.. 5-79-8 pArthAya tAdarthye chaturthI. tejaH pratApaH.. 5-79-13 mahAtmanA ityasyAnantaraM sa cha rAjA mahAvIryaH pArayatvarjunaH sa tAm ityekamardha ~Na. cha.jha.~na. pustakeShu adhikaM vartate.. 5-79-31 sahasA balena.. 5-79-36 anu anugataH.. 5-79-79 ekonAshItitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 080

.. shrIH ..

7.80. adhyAyaH 080

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

arjunasya svapne kR^iShNena saha kailAsagamanam.. 1 .. tathA stutyA rudraprasAdanam.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-80-0 (47710) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-80-0x (4468) dhArtarAShTrasya taM mantraM smaranneva dhana~njayaH. pratij~nAmAtmano rakShanmumohAchintyavikramaH.. 7-80-1 (47711) taM tu shokena santaptaM svapne kapivaradhvajam. AsasAda mahAtejA dhyAyantaM garuDadhvajaH.. 7-80-2 (47712) pratyutthAnaM cha kR^iShNasya sarvAvasthAsu phalgunaH. na lopayati dharmAtmA bhaktyA premNA cha sarvadA.. 7-80-3 (47713) pratyutthAya cha govindaM svaM tasmai chAsanaM dadau. na chAsane svayaM buddhiM bIbhatsurvyadadhAttadA.. 7-80-4 (47714) tataH kR^iShNo mahAtejA jAna.Nllokasya nishchayam. kuntIputramidaM vAkyamAsInaH sthitamabravIt.. 7-80-5 (47715) mA viShAde manaH pArtha kR^ithAH kAlo hi durjayaH. kAlaH sarvANi bhUtAni niyachChati bhavAbhave.. 7-80-6 (47716) kimarthaM cha viShAdaste tadbrUhi dvipadAM vara. na shochyaM viduShAM shreShTha shokaH kAryavinAshanaH.. 7-80-7 (47717) yattu kAryaM bhavetkAryaM karmaNA tatsamAchara. hInacheShTasya yaH shokaH sa hi shatrurdhana~njaya.. 7-80-8 (47718) shochannandayate shatrUnkarshayatyapi bAndhavAn. kShIyate cha narastasmAnna tvaM shochitumarhasi.. 7-80-9 (47719) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-80-10x (4469) ityukto vAsudevena bIbhatsuraparAjitaH. AbabhAShe tadA vidvAnidaM vachanamarthavat.. 7-80-10 (47720) mayA pratij~nA mahatI jayadrathavadhe kR^itA. shvo.asmi hantA durAtmAnaM putraghnamiti keshava.. 7-80-11 (47721) matpratij~nAvighAtArthaM dhArtarAShTraiH kilAchyuta. pR^iShThataH saindhavaH kAryaH sarvairgupto mahArathaiH.. 7-80-12 (47722) dasha chaikA cha tAH kR^iShNa akShauhiNyaH sudurjayAH. hatAvasheShAstatremA hanta mAdhava sa~NkhyayA.. 7-80-13 (47723) tAbhiH parivR^itaH sa~Nkhye sarvaishchaiva mahArathaiH. kathaM shakyeta sandraShTuM durAtmA kR^iShNa saindhavaH.. 7-80-14 (47724) pratij~nApAraNaM chApi na bhaviShyati keshava. pratij~nAyAM cha hInAyAM kathaM jIvati madvidhaH.. 7-80-15 (47725) duHkhApAyasya me vIra vikA~NkShA parivartate. drutaM cha yAti savitA tata etadbravImyaham.. 7-80-16 (47726) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-80-17x (4470) shokasthAnaM tu tachChrutvA pArthasya dvijaketanaH. saMspR^ishyAmbhastataH kR^iShNaH prA~NmukhaH samavasthitaH.. 7-80-17 (47727) idaM vAkyaM mahAtejA babhAShe puShkarekShaNaH. hitArthaM pANDuputrasya saindhavasya vadhe kR^itI.. 7-80-18 (47728) shrIbhagavAnuvAcha. 7-80-19x (4471) pArtha pAshupataM nAma paramAstraM sanAtanam. yena sarvAnmR^idhe detyA~njaghne devo maheshvaraH.. 7-80-19 (47729) yadi tadviditaM te.adya shvo hantA.asi jayadratham. atha j~nAtaM prapadyasya manasA vR^iShabhadhvajam.. 7-80-20 (47730) taM devaM manasA dhyAtvA joShamAssva dhana~njaya. tatastasya prasAdAttvaM bhaktyA prApsyasi tanmahat.. 7-80-21 (47731) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-80-22x (4472) tataH kR^iShNavachaH shrutvA saMspR^ishyAmbho dhana~njayaH. bhUmAvAsIna ekAgro jagAma manasA bhavam.. 7-80-22 (47732) tataH praNihito brAhme muhUrte shubhalakShaNe. AtmAnamarjuno.apashyadgane sahakeshavam.. 7-80-23 (47733) puNyaM himavataH pAdaM maNimantaM cha parvatam. jyotirbhishcha samAkIrNaM siddhachAraNasevitam.. 7-80-24 (47734) vAyuvegagatiH pArthaH khaM bheje sahakeshavaH. keshavena gR^ihItaH sa dakShiNe vibhunA bhuje.. 7-80-25 (47735) prekShamANo bahUnbhAvA~njagAmAdbhutadarshanAn. udIchyAM dishi dharmAtmA sopashyachChvetaparvatam.. 7-80-26 (47736) kuberasya virAhe cha nalinIM padmabhUShitAm. sarichChreShThAM cha tAM ga~NgAM vIkShamANo bahUdakAm.. 7-80-27 (47737) sadA puShpaphalairvR^ikShairupetAM sphaTikopalAm. siMhavyAghrasamAkIrNAM nAnAmR^igasamAkulAm.. 7-80-28 (47738) puNyAshramavatIM ramyAM manoj~nANDajasevitAm. mandarasya pradeshAMshcha kinnarodgItanAditAn.. 7-80-29 (47739) hemarUpyamayaiH shR^i~NgairnAnauShadhividIpitAn. tathA mandAravR^ikShaishcha puShpitairupashobhitAn. 7-80-30 (47740) snigdhA~njanachayAkAraM samprAptaH kAlaparvatam. brahmatu~NgaM nadIshchAnyAstathA janapadAnapi.. 7-80-31 (47741) sa tu~NgaM shatashR^i~NgaM cha sharyAtivanameva cha. puNyamashvashirasthAnaM sthAnamAtharvaNasya cha.. 7-80-32 (47742) vR^iShadaMshaM cha shailendraM mahAmandarameva cha. apsarobhiH samAkIrNaM kinnaraishchopashobhitam.. 7-80-33 (47743) tasmi~nshaile vrajanpArthaH sakR^iShNaH samavaikShata. shubhaiH prasravaNairjuShTAM hemadhAtuvibhUShitAm.. 7-80-34 (47744) chandrarashmiprakAshA~NgIM pR^ithivIM puramAlinIm. samudrAMshchAdbhutAkArAnapashyadbahulAkarAn.. 7-80-35 (47745) viyaddyAM pR^ithivIM chaiva tathA viShNupadaM vrajan. vismitaH saha kR^iShNena kShipto bANa ivAbhyagAt.. 7-80-36 (47746) grahanakShatrasomAnAM sUryAgnyoshcha samatviSham. apashyata tadA pArtho jvalantamiva parvatam.. 7-80-37 (47747) samAsAdya tu taM shailaM shailAgre samavasthitam. taponityaM mahAtmAnamapashyadvR^IShabhadhvajam. 7-80-38 (47748) sahasramiva sUryANAM dIpyamAnaM svatejasA. shUlinaM jaTilaM gauraM valkalAjinavAsasam.. 7-80-39 (47749) nayanAnAM sahasraishcha vichitrA~NgaM mahaujasam. pArvatyA sahitaM devaM bhUtasa~Nghaishcha bhAsvaraiH.. 7-80-40 (47750) gItavAditrasannAdairhAsyalAsyasamanvitam. vaglitAsphoTitotkruShTaiH puNyairgandhaishcha sevitam.. 7-80-41 (47751) stUyamAnaM stavairdivyairR^iShibhirbrahmavAdibhiH. goptAraM sarvabhUtAnAmIshAnaM varadaM shivam.. 7-80-42 (47752) vAsudevastu taM dR^iShTvA jagAma shirasA kShitim. pArthena saha dharmAtmA gR^iNanbrahma sanAtanam.. 7-80-43 (47753) lokAdiM vishvakarmANamajamIshAnamavyayam. manasaH paramaM yoniM khaM vAyuM jyotiShAM nidhim.. 7-80-44 (47754) sraShTAraM vAridhArANAM bhuvashcha prakR^itiM parAm. devadAnavayakShANAM mAnavAnAM cha shAsakam.. 7-80-45 (47755) yogAnAM cha paraM dhAma dR^iShTaM brahmavidAM nidhim. chAracharasya sraShTAraM pratihartArameva cha.. 7-80-46 (47756) kAlakopaM mahAtmAnaM shakrasUryaguNodayam. vavandatustadA kR^iShNau vA~NmanobuddhikarmabhiH.. 7-80-47 (47757) yaM prapadyanti vidvAMsaH sUkShmAdhyAtmapadaiShiNaH. tamajaM kAramAtmAnaM jagmatuH sharaNaM bhavam.. 7-80-48 (47758) arjunashchApi taM devaM bhUyo bhUyo.apyavandata. j~nAtvA taM sarvabhUtAdiM bhUtabhavyabhavodbhavam.. 7-80-49 (47759) `sharaNyaM sharaNaM devamIshAnaM parameshvaram. jagAma jagatAM nAthamarjunaH sajanArdanaH'.. 7-80-50 (47760) tatastAvAgatau dR^iShTvA naranArAyaNAvubhau. suprasannamanAH sharvaH provAcha prahasanniva.. 7-80-51 (47761) svAgataM vAM narashcheShThAvuttiShThetAM gataklamau. ki~ncha vAmIpsitaM vIrau manasaH kShipramuchyatAm.. 7-80-52 (47762) yena kAryeNa samprAptau yuvAM tatsAdhayAmi kim. vriyatAmAtmanaH shreyastatsarvaM pradadAni vAm.. 7-80-53 (47763) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-80-54x (4473) tatastadvachanaM shrutvA pratyutthAya kR^itA~njalI. vAsudevArjunau sharvaM tuShTuvAte mahAmatI. bhaktyAstavena divyena mahAtmAnAvaninditau.. 7-80-54 (47764) kR^iShNArjunAvUchatuH. 7-80-55x (4474) namo bhavAya sharvAya rudrAya varadAya cha. pashUnAM pataye nityamugrAya cha kapardine.. 7-80-55 (47765) mahAdevAya bhImAya tryambakAya cha shAntaye. IshAnAya makhaghnAya namo.astvandhakaghAtine.. 7-80-56 (47766) kumAragurave tubhyaM nIlagrIvAya vedhase. pinAkine haviShyAya satyAya vibhave sadA.. 7-80-57 (47767) vilohitAya dhrUmrAya vyAdhAyAnaparAjite. nityaM nIlashikhaNDAya shUline divyachakShuShe.. 7-80-58 (47768) hotre potre trinetrAya vyAdhAya vasuretase. achintyAyAmbikAbhartre sarvadevastutAya cha.. 7-80-59 (47769) vR^iShadhvajAya muNDAya jaTine brahmachAriNe. tapyamAnAya salile brahmaNyAyAjitAya cha.. 7-80-60 (47770) vishvAtmane vishvasR^ije vishvamAvR^itya tiShThate. namonamaste sevyAya bhUtAnAM prabhave sadA.. 7-80-61 (47771) brahmavaktrAya sarvAya shaMkarAya shivAya cha. namostu vAchaspataye prajAnAM pataye namaH.. 7-80-62 (47772) `abhigamyAya kAmyAya stutyAyAryAya sarvadA. namo.astu devadevAya mahAbhUtadharAya cha. namo vishvasya pataye pattInAM pataye namaH'.. 7-80-63 (47773) namo vishvasya pataye mahatAM pataye namaH. namaH sahasrashirase sahasrabhujamR^ityave.. sahasranetrapAdAya namo.asa~NkhyeyakarmaNe. 7-80-64 (47774) namo hiraNyavarNAya hiraNyakavachAya cha. bhaktAnukampine nityaM sidhyatAM no varaH prabho.. 7-80-65 (47775) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-80-66x (4475) evaM stutvA mahAdevaM vAsudevaH sahArjunaH. prasAdayAmAsa bhavaM tadA hyastropalabdhaye.. .. 7-80-66 (47776) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi pratij~nAparvaNi ashItitamo.adhyAyaH.. 80 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-80-7 na shochyaM shoko nAcharaNIyaH.. 5-80-8 kArye kR^ityaM kAryaM karaNIyaM bhavedityanvayaH.. 5-80-23 praNihitaH samAtixxxx.. 5-80-32 atharvaNasya muneH.. 5-80-36 tathA cha vrajanviShNupadamAkAshamabhyagAdityanvayaH.. 5-80-41 lAsyaM nR^ittam. valgitamitastataH prachAraH. AsphoTitaM bhujADambaraH. uktruShTamuchchaiH svanitam.. 5-80-44 vishvaM jagatkarma prApyaM yasya. IshAnamapratihatechCham. avyayamavikAram. manasaH paramaM pravR^ittinivR^ittikAraNam. yonimutpattisthAnaM cha. jyotiShAM tejasAM nidhimadhiShThAnam.. 5-80-46 yogAnAM yogadarshinAM paraM dhAma paramAshrayam. dR^iShTaM sAkShAdbhUtaM brahmatattvaM tadvidAM nirdhi rahasyam.. 5-80-47 kAla_iva kopo yasya. shakrasya guNA aishvaryAdayaH sUryasya guNAH pratApAdayaH teShAmudayo yasmAt. kAlakeshaM iti ka. pAThaH.. 5-80-48 kAraNAtmAnaM kAraNaikasvabhAvam.. 5-80-55 bhAvaH sarvaprabhutvAt. sharvaH saMharaNAt.. 5-80-56 shAntiH shamapradhAnatvAt.. 5-80-57 haviShyaH haviShyayogyatvAt. vibhurvyApakatvAt.. 5-80-58 vyAdhAya mR^igahananAt. dviruktirdvistathAkaraNAt. anAtprANinaH parAjayatIti anaparAjitsarvabhUtottamatvAt. nIlashikhaNDo nIlakeshatvAt.. 5-80-59 hotA dIkShitaH bhAvena havanashIlatvAt. vasuretA agnau retaH kShepaNAt.. 5-80-60 muNDo dIkShitatvAt. brahmachArI retovidhAraNAt.. 5-80-61 bhUtAnAM prANinAM pramathAdInAm.. 5-80-62 brahmavakro vedapUrNamukhatvAt. shivo mokShahetutvAt. vAchaspatirvA~NyayapravartanAt.. 5-80-80 ashItitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 081

.. shrIH ..

7.81. adhyAyaH 081

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

arjunena svapne shaMkarAtpAshupatAstramupalakShya kR^iShNenasaha punaH shibiraM pratyAgamanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-81-0 (47777) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-81-0x (4476) tataH pArthaH prasannAtmA prA~njalirvR^iShabhadhvajam. dadarshotphullanayanaH samastaM tejasAM nidhim.. 7-81-1 (47778) taM chopahAraM sukR^itaM naishaM naityakamAtmanA. dadarsha tryambakAbhyAshe vAsudevaniveditam.. 7-81-2 (47779) tato.abhipUjya manasA kR^iShNaM sharvaM cha pANDavaH. ichChAmyahaM divyamastramityabhAShata sha~Nkaram.. 7-81-3 (47780) tataH pArthasya vij~nAya varArthe vachanaM tadA. vAsudevArjunau devaH smayamAno.abhyabhAShata.. 7-81-4 (47781) svAgataM vAM narashreShThau vij~nAtaM manasepsitam. yena kAmena samprAptau bhavaddhyAM taM dadAmyaham.. 7-81-5 (47782) saro.amR^itamayaM divyamabhyAshe shatrusUdanau. tatra me taddhanurdivyaM sharashcha nihitaH purA.. 7-81-6 (47783) yena devArayaH sarve mayA yudhi nipAtitAH. tata AnIyatAM kR^iShNau sasharaM dhanuruttamam.. 7-81-7 (47784) tathetyuktvA tu tau vIrau sarvapAriShadaiH saha. prasthitau tatsaro divyaM divyaishvaryashatairyutam.. 7-81-8 (47785) nirdiShTaM yadvR^iShA~NkeNa puNyaM sarvArthasAdhakam. tau jagmaturasambhrAntau naranArAyaNAvR^iShI.. 7-81-9 (47786) tatastau tatsaro gatvA sUryamaNDalasannibham. nAgamantarjale ghoraM dadR^ishAte.arjunAchyutau.. 7-81-10 (47787) dvitIyaM chAparaM nAgaM sahasrashirasaM varam. vamantaM vipulA jvAlA dadR^ishAte.agnivarchasam.. 7-81-11 (47788) tataH kR^iShNashcha pArthashcha saMspR^ishyAmbhaH kR^itA~njalI. tau nAgAvupatasthAte namasyantau vR^iShadhvajam.. 7-81-12 (47789) gR^iNantau vedavidvAMsau tadbrahma shatarudriyam. aprameyapramANaM tau gatvA sarvAtmanA bhavam.. 7-81-13 (47790) tatastau rudramAhAtmyAddhitvA rUpaM mahoragau. dhanurbANashcha shatrughnaM taddvandvaM samapadyata.. 7-81-14 (47791) tau tajjagR^ihatuH prItau dhanurbANaM cha suprabham. AjahUturmahAtmAnau dadatushcha mahAtmane.. 7-81-15 (47792) tataH pAshvAdvR^IShA~Nkasya brahmachArI nyavartata. pi~NgAkShastapasaH kShetraM balavAnnIlalohitaH. 7-81-16 (47793) sa tadgR^ihya dhanuHshreShThaM tasthau sthAnaM samAhitaH. vichakarShAtha vidhivatsasharaM dhanuruttamam.. 7-81-17 (47794) tasya maurvI cha muShTiM cha sthAnaM chAlakShya pANDavaH. shrutvA mantraM bhavaproktaM jagrAhAchintyavikramaH.. 7-81-18 (47795) sa sarasyeva taM bANaM mumochAtibalaH prabhuH. chikShepa cha punarvIrastasminsarasi taddhanuH.. 7-81-19 (47796) tataH prItaM bhavaM j~nAtvA smR^itimAnarjunastadA. varamAraNyake dattaM darshanaM sha~Nkarasya cha. manasA chintayAmAsa tanme sampadyatAM bhava.. 7-81-20 (47797) tasya tanmatamAj~nAya prItaH prAdAdvaraM bhavaH. tachcha pAshupataM ghoraM pratij~nAyAshcha pAraNam.. 7-81-21 (47798) tataH pAshupataM divyamavApya punarIshvarAt. saMhR^iShTaromA durdharShaH kR^itaM kAryamamanyata.. 7-81-22 (47799) `tato.arjunahR^iShIkaishau punaH punarariMdamau'. vavandatushcha saMhR^iShTau shirobhyAM taM maheshvaram.. 7-81-23 (47800) anuj~nAtau kShaNe tasminbhavenArjunakeshavau. prAptau svashibiraM vIrau mudA paramayA yutau.. 7-81-24 (47801) tathA bhavenAnumatau mahAsuranighAtinA. idrAvIShNU yathA prItau jambhasya vadhakA~NkShiNau.. .. 7-81-25 (47802) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi pratij~nAparvaNi ekAshItitamo.adhyAyaH.. 81 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-81-2 AtmanA sukR^itaM sUpakalpitam.. 5-81-14 dvandvaM yugalam.. 5-81-16 nIlalohitaH bhagavato.aparA tanuH.. 5-81-17 sthAnaM sthApanakam 5-81-18 jagrAha manasi kR^itavAn.. 5-81-81 ekAshItitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 082

.. shrIH ..

7.82. adhyAyaH 082

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

shrIkR^iShNasya kR^itAhnikaM yudhiShThiraM pratyAgamanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-82-0 (47803) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-82-0x (4477) tayoH saMvadatoreva kR^iShNadArukayostathA. sA.atyagAdrajanI rAjannatha rAjA sma bodhyate.. 7-82-1 (47804) paThanti pANidhvanikA mAgadhAH stavagAyakAH. vaitAlikAshcha sUtAshcha tuShTuvuH puruSharShabham.. 7-82-2 (47805) nartakAshchApyanR^ityanta jagurgItAni gAyakAH. kuruvaMshastavArthAni madhuraM raktakaNThinaH.. 7-82-3 (47806) mR^ida~NgA jharjharA bheryaH paNavAnakagomukhAH. ADambarAshcha sha~NkhAshcha dundubhyashcha mahAsvanAH.. 7-82-4 (47807) evametAni sarvANi tathAnyAnyapi bhArata. vAdayanti sma saMhR^iShTAH kushalAH sAdhushikShitAH.. 7-82-5 (47808) sa meghasamanirghoSho mahA~nshabdo.aspR^ishaddivam. pArthivapravaraM suptaM yudhiShThiramabodhayat.. 7-82-6 (47809) pratibuddhaH sukhaM supto mahArhe shayanottame. utthAyAvashyakAryArthaM yayau snAnagR^ihaM nR^ipaH.. 7-82-7 (47810) tataH shuklAmbarAH snAtAstaruNAH shatamaShTa cha. snApakAH kA~nchanaiH kumbhaiH pUrNaiH samupatasthire.. 7-82-8 (47811) bhadrAsane sUpaviShTaH paridhAyAmbaraM laghu. sasnau chandanasaMyuktaiH pAnIyairabhimantritaiH.. 7-82-9 (47812) utsAditaH kaShAyeNa balavadbhiH sushikShitaiH. AplutaH sAdhivAsena jalena sasugandhinA.. 7-82-10 (47813) rAjahaMsanibhaM prApya uShNIShaM shithilArpitam. jalakShayanimittaM vai veShTayAmAsa mUrdhani.. 7-82-11 (47814) hariNA chandanenA~Ngamupalipya mahAbhujaH. sragvI chAkliShTavasanaH prA~NmukhaH prA~njaliH sthitaH.. 7-82-12 (47815) `kR^itvendriyANAmaikAgryaM manasashcha mahAmanAH'. jajApa japyaM kaunteyaH satAM mArgamanuShThitaH. tatrAgnisharaNaM dIptaM pravivesha vinItavat.. 7-82-13 (47816) samidbhiH sa pavitrAbhiragnimAhutibhistathA. mantrapUtAbhirarchitvA nishchakrAma gR^ihAttataH.. 7-82-14 (47817) dvitIyAM puruShavyAghraH kakShyAM nirgamya pArthivaH. tato vedavido vR^iddhAnapashyadbrAhmaNarShabhAn.. 7-82-15 (47818) dAntAnvedavratasnAtAnsnAtAnavabhR^itheShu cha. sahasrAnucharAnsaurAnsahasraM chAShTa chAparAn.. 7-82-16 (47819) akShataiH sumanobhishcha vAchayitvA mahAbhujaH. tAndvijAnmadhusarpirbhyAM phalaiH shreShThaiH suma~NgalaiH.. 7-82-17 (47820) prAdAtkA~nchanamekaikaM niShkaM viprAya pANDavaH. ala~NkR^itaM chAshvashataM vAsAMsIShTAshcha dakShiNAH.. 7-82-18 (47821) tathA gAH kapilA dogdhrIH savatsAH pANDunandanaH. hemashR^i~NgA raupyakhurA dattvA tebhyaH pradakShiNam.. 7-82-19 (47822) svastikAnvardhamAnAMshcha nandyAvartAMshcha kA~nchanAn. mAlyaM cha jalakumbhAMshcha jvalitaM cha hutAshanam.. 7-82-20 (47823) pUrNAnyakShatapAtrANi ruchakaM rochanAstathA. svala~NkR^itAH shubhAH kanyA dadhisarpirmadhUdakam.. 7-82-21 (47824) ma~NgalyAnpakShiNashchaiva yachchAnyadapi pUjitam. dR^iShTvA spR^iShTvA cha kaunteyo bAhyAM kakShyAM tato.agamat.. 7-82-22 (47825) tatastasyAM nahAbAhostiShThataH parichArakAH. sauvarNaM sarvatobhadraM muktAvaidUryamaNDitam.. 7-82-23 (47826) parArdhyAstaraNAstIrNaM sottarachChadamR^iddhimat. vishvakarmakR^itaM divyamupajahrurvarAsanam.. 7-82-24 (47827) tatra tasyopaviShTasya bhUShaNAni mahAtmanaH. upAjahrurmahArhANi prepyAH shubhrANi sarvashaH.. 7-82-25 (47828) yuktAbharaNaveShasya kaunteyasya mahAtmanaH. rUpamAsInmahArAja dviShatAM shokavardhanam.. 7-82-26 (47829) chAmaraishchandrarashmyAbhairhemadaNDaiH sushobhanaiH. dodhUyamAnaiH shushubhe vidyudbhiriva toyadaH.. 7-82-27 (47830) saMstUyamAnaH sUtraishcha vandyamAnashcha vandibhiH. upagIyamAno gandharvairAste sma kurunandanaH.. 7-82-28 (47831) tato muhUrtamAsIchcha vandinAM ninado mahAn. rathAnAM nemighoShashcha khuraghoShashcha vAjinAm.. 7-82-29 (47832) hAdena gajaghaNTAnAM sha~NkhAnAM ninadena cha. narANAM padashabdaishcha kampatIva sma medinI.. 7-82-30 (47833) tataH shuddhAntamAsAdya jAnubhyAM bhUtale sthitaH. shirasA vandanIyaM tamabhivAdya janeshvaram.. 7-82-31 (47834) kuNDalI baddhanistriMshaH sannaddhakavacho yuvA. abhipraNamya shirasA dvAstho dharmAtmajAya vai.. 7-82-32 (47835) nyavedayaddhR^iShIkeshamupayAntaM mahAtmane. so.abravItpuruShavyAghraH svAgatenaiva mAdhavaH.. 7-82-33 (47836) `praveshyatAM samIpaM me kimarthaM pravilambase'. AsanaM cha madhughnAya dIyatAM paramArchitam. tataH praveshya vArShNeyamupaveshya varAsane.. 7-82-34 (47837) satkR^itya satkR^itastena paryapR^ichChadyudhiShThiraH.. .. 7-82-35 (47838) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi pratij~nAparvaNi dvyashItitamo.adhyAyaH.. 82 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-82-2 pANidhvanikA hastena tAlasvanaM kurvate.. 5-82-3 raktakaNThino ra~njakasvarAH.. 5-82-4 jharjharA jhillikAH. bheryo bR^ihaDhDhakkAH. paNavA murajAH. AnakAH paTahAH. gomukhAH trAgaDAH. ADambarAshcha kShudrapaTahAH. dundubhyo DhakkAH.. 5-82-9 bhadrAsane chatuHsamAsane.. 5-82-10 kaShAyeNa sarvauShadhyAdikalkena.. 5-82-12 akliShTamanupahataM vasanaM yasya.. 5-82-13 dIptaM jvaladagnim.. 5-82-16 saurAnsUryopAsakAn.. 5-82-19 pradakShiNaM kR^itveti sheShaH.. 5-82-20 svastikAnAli~NganAni. vardhamAnAn sharAvAn. nandyAvartAnsampuTitAdyarghapAtrANi.. 5-82-21 ruchakaM mAtulu~Ngakam.. 5-82-24 vishvakarmakR^itaM vishvakarmapraNItena vidhinA nirmitam.. 5-82-28 vandyamAnaH stUyamAnaH. stutyarthasya vade rUpam.. 5-82-31 shuddhAntaM kakShyAbhyantaram.. 5-82-82 dvyashItitatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 083

.. shrIH ..

7.83. adhyAyaH 083

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

jayadrathavadhasya duShkaratvAsha~Nkino yudhiShThirasya kR^iShNena samAshvAsanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-83-0 (47839) yudhiShThira uvAcha. 7-83-0x (4478) sukhena rajanI vyuShTA kachchitte madhusUdana. kachchijj~nAnAni sarvANi prasannAni tavAchyuta.. 7-83-1 (47840) sa~njAya uvAcha. 7-83-2x (4479) vAsudevo.api tadyuktaM pratyuvAcha yudhiShThiram. darshanAdeva te saumya na ki~nchidashubhaM mama.. 7-83-2 (47841) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-83-3x (4480) tatashcha prakR^itIH kShattA nyavedayadupasthitAH. anuj~nAtashcha rAj~nA sa prAveshayata taM janam.. 7-83-3 (47842) virATaM bhImasenaM cha dhR^iShTadyumnaM cha sAtyakim. chedipaM dhR^iShTaketuM cha drupadaM cha mahAratham.. 7-83-4 (47843) shikhaNQDinaM yamau chaiva chekitAnaM sakekayam. yuyupsuM chaiva kauravyaM pA~nchAlyaM chottamaujasam.. 7-83-5 (47844) yudhAmanyu subAhuM cha draupadeyAMshcha sarvashaH. etAMshcha suhR^idashchAnyAndarshayAmAsa pANDavam.. 7-83-6 (47845) anuj~nAtAshcha pArthena svAsInA AsaneShu te. sarveShvatha parArdhyeShu yathArhaM vandya pANDavam.. 7-83-7 (47846) ekasminnAsane vIrAvupaviShTau mahAbalau. kR^iShNashcha yuyudhAnashcha vedyAmiva hutAshanau.. 7-83-8 (47847) tato yudhiShThirasteShAM shR^iNvatAM madhusUdanam. abravItpuNDarIkAkShamAbhAShya madhuraM vachaH.. 7-83-9 (47848) ekaM tvAM vayamAshritya sahasrAkShamivAmarAH. prArthayAmo jayaM yuddhe shAshvatAni sukhAni cha.. 7-83-10 (47849) tvaM hi rAjyavinAshaM cha dviShadbhishcha nirAkriyAm. kleshAMshcha vividhAnkR^iShNa sarvAMstAnapi vettha naH.. 7-83-11 (47850) tvayi sarvesha sarveShAmasmAkaM bhaktavatsala. sukhamAyattamatyarthaM yAtrA cha madhusUdana.. 7-83-12 (47851) sa tathA kuru vArShNeya yathA tvayi mano mama. arjunasya yathA satyA pratij~nA syAchchikIrShitA.. 7-83-13 (47852) sa bhavAMstArayatvasmAdduHkhAmarShamahArNavAt. parAM titIrShatAmadya pluvo no bhava mAdhava.. 7-83-14 (47853) nahi tatkurute yodhaH kArtavIryasamo.api yaH. yudhi yatkuruShe kR^iShNa sArathyaM tvaM samAsthitaH.. 7-83-15 (47854) yathaiva sarvAsvApatsu pAsi vR^iShNI~njanArdana. tathaivAsmAnmahAbAho vR^ijinAttrAtumarhasi.. 7-83-16 (47855) tvamagAdhe.aplave magnAnpANDavAnkurusAgare. samuddhara pluvo bhUtvA sha~NkhachakragadAdhara.. 7-83-17 (47856) namaste devadevesha sanAtana vishAtana. viShNo jiShNo hare kR^iShNa vaikuNTha puruShottama.. 7-83-18 (47857) nAradastvAM samAchakhyau purANamR^iShisattamam. varadaM shAr~NgiNaM shreShThaM tatsatyaM kuru mAdhava.. 7-83-19 (47858) ityuktaH puNDarIkAkSho dharmarAjena saMsadi. toyameghasvano vAgmI pratyuvAcha yudhiShThiram.. 7-83-20 (47859) vAsudeva uvAcha. 7-83-21x (4481) sAmareShvapi lokeShu sarveShu na tathAvidhaH. sharAsanadharaH kashchidyathA pArtho dhana~njayaH.. 7-83-21 (47860) vIryavAnastrasampannaH parAkrAnto mahAbalaH. yuddhashauNDaH sadAmarShI tejasA paramo nR^iNAm.. 7-83-22 (47861) sa yuvA vR^iShabhaskandho dIrghabAhurmahAbalaH. siMharShabhagatiH shrImAndviShataste haniShyati.. 7-83-23 (47862) ahaM cha tatkariShyAmi tathA kuntIsuto.arjunaH. dhArtarAShTrasya sainyAni dhakShyatyagnirivendhanam.. 7-83-24 (47863) adya taM pApakarmANaM kShudraM saubhadraghAtinam. apunardarshanaM mArgamiShubhiH kShepsyate.arjunaH.. 7-83-25 (47864) tasyAdya gR^idhrAH shyenAshcha chaNDagomAyavastathA. bhakShayiShyanti mAMsAni ye chAnye puruShAdakAH.. 7-83-26 (47865) yadyasya devA goptAraH sendrAH sarve tathA.apyasau. rAjadhAnIM yamasyAdya hataH prApsyati durmatiH.. 7-83-27 (47866) nihatya saindhavaM jiShNuradya tvAmupayAsyati. vishoko vijvaro rAjanbhava shAnti puraskR^itaH.. .. 7-83-28 (47867) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi pratij~nAparvaNi tryashItitamo.adhyAyaH.. 83 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-83-11 nirAkriyAmapasAraNam.. 5-83-12 yAtrA sthitiH.. 5-83-16 vR^ijinAt vyasanAt.. 5-83-18 sanAtana anAdinidhana. vishA tana saMhartaH. kR^iShNa saMsArakarShaka. puruShottama paramAtman .. 5-83-22 yuddhashauNDaH yuddhapravINaH.. 5-83-83 tryashItitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 084

.. shrIH ..

7.84. adhyAyaH 084

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

jayadrathamprati gachChatA.arjunena yudhiShThirarakShaNAya sAtyakimprati chodanA.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-84-0 (47868) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-84-0x (4482) tathA tu vadatAM teShAM prAdurAsIddhana~njayaH. didR^ikShurbharatashreShThaM rAjAnaM sasuhR^idgaNam.. 7-84-1 (47869) taM praviShTaM shubhAM kakShyAmabhivandyAgrataH syitam. tamutthAyArjunaM premNA sasvaje pANDavarShabhaH.. 7-84-2 (47870) mUrdhni chainamupAghrAya pariShvajya cha bAhunA. AshiShaH paramAH prochya smayamAno.abhyabhAShata.. 7-84-3 (47871) vyaktamarjuna sa~NgrAme dhruvaste vijayo mahAn. tAdR^igrUpA cha te chChAyA prasannashcha janArdanaH.. 7-84-4 (47872) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-84-5x (4483) tamabravIttato jiShNurmahadAshcharyamuttamam. dR^iShTavAnasmi bhadraM te keshavasya prasAdajam.. 7-84-5 (47873) tatastatkathayAmAsa yathAdR^iShTaM dhana~njayaH. AshvAsanArthaM suhR^idAM tryambakeNa samAgamam.. 7-84-6 (47874) tataH shirobhiravaniM spR^iShTvA sarve cha vismitAH. namaskR^itya vR^iShA~NkAya sAdhusAdhvityathAbruvan.. 7-84-7 (47875) anuj~nAtAstataH sarve suhR^ido dharmasUnunA. tvaramANAH susannaddhA hR^iShTA yuddhAya niryayuH.. 7-84-8 (47876) abhivAdya tu rAjAnaM yuyudhAnAchyutArjunAH. hR^iShTA viniryayuste vai yudhiShThiraniveshanAt.. 7-84-9 (47877) rathenaikena durdharShau yuyudhAnajanArdanau. jagmatuH sahitau vIrAvarjunasya niveshanam.. 7-84-10 (47878) tatra gatvA hR^iShIkeshaH kalpayAmAsa shAstravit. rathaM rathavarasyAjau vAnararShabhalakShaNam.. 7-84-11 (47879) sa meghasamanirghoShastaptakA~nchanasaprabhaH. babhau rathavaraH klR^iptaH shishurdivasakR^idyathA.. 7-84-12 (47880) tataH puruShashArdUlaH sajjaM sarvaM nyavedayat. rathaM puruShasiMhasya sadhvajaM supatAkinam.. 7-84-13 (47881) sa tu lokavaraH puMsAM kirITI hemavarmabhR^it. chApabANadharo vAhaM pradakShiNamavartata.. 7-84-14 (47882) tapovidyAvayovR^iddhaiH kriyAvadbhirjitendriyaiH. stUyamAno jayAshIrbhirAruroha mahAratham.. 7-84-15 (47883) jaitraiH sA~NgrAmikairmantraiH pUrvameva rathottamam. abhimantritamarchiShmAnudayaM bhAskaro yathA.. 7-84-16 (47884) sa rathe rathinAM shreShThaH kA~nchane kA~nchanAvR^itaH. vibabhau vimalo.archiShmAnmerAviva divAkaraH. 7-84-17 (47885) anvAruruhatuH pArthaM yuyudhAnajanArdanau. sharyAteryaj~namAyAntaM yathendraM devamashvinau.. 7-84-18 (47886) atha jagrAha govindo rashmInrashmividAMvaraH. mAtalirvAsavasyeva vR^itraM hantuM prayAsyataH.. 7-84-19 (47887) sa tAbhyAM sahitaH pArtho rathapravaramAsthitaH. sahito budhashukrAbhyAM tamo nighnanyathA shashI.. 7-84-20 (47888) saindhavasya vadhaprepsuH prayAtaH shatrupUgahA. sahAmbupatimitrAbhyAM yathendrastArakAmaye.. 7-84-21 (47889) tato vAditranirghoShairmA~Ngalyaishcha stavaiH shubhaiH. prayAntamarjunaM vIraM mAgadhAshchaiva tuShTuvuH.. 7-84-22 (47890) sajayAshIH sapuNyAhaH sUtamAgadhaniHsvanaH. yukto vAditraghoSheNa teShAM ratikaro.abhavat.. 7-84-23 (47891) tamanupravaNo vAyuH puNyagandhavahaH shubhaH. vavau saMharShayanpArthaM dviShatashchApi shoShayan.. 7-84-24 (47892) tatastasminkShaNe rAjanvividhAni shubhAni cha. prAdurAsannimittAni vijayAya bahUni cha.. 7-84-25 (47893) pANDavAnAM tvadIyAnAM viparItAni mAriSha. dR^iShTvA.arjuno nimittAni vijayAya pradakShiNam. yuyudhAnaM maheShvAsamidaM vachanamabravIt.. 7-84-26 (47894) yuyudhAnAdya yuddhe me dR^ishyate vijayo dhruvaH. yathAhImAni li~NgAni dR^ishyante shinipu~Ngava.. 7-84-27 (47895) so.ahaM tatra gamiShyAmi yatra saindhavako nR^ipaH. yiyAsuryamalokAya mama vIryaM pratIkShate.. 7-84-28 (47896) yathA paramakaM kR^ityaM saindhavasya vadho mama. tathaiva sumahatkR^ityaM dharmarAjasya rakShaNam.. 7-84-29 (47897) sa tvamadya mahAbAho rAjAnaM paripAlaya. yathaiva hi mayA guptastvayA gupto bhavettathA.. 7-84-30 (47898) na pashyAmi cha taM loke yastvAM yuddhe parAjayet. vAsudevasamaM yuddhe svayamapyamareshvaraH.. 7-84-31 (47899) tvayi chAhaM parAshvastaH pradyumne vA mahArathe. shaknuyAM saindhavaM hantumanapekSho nararShabha.. 7-84-32 (47900) mayyapekShA na kartavyA goptA.ayaM mama keshavaH. rAj~na eva parA guptiH kAryA sarvAtmanA tvayA.. 7-84-33 (47901) na hi yatra mahAbAhurvAsudevo vyavasthitaH. ki~nchidvyApadyate tatra yatrAhamapi cha dhruvam.. 7-84-34 (47902) evamuktastu pArthena sAtyakiH paravIrahA. tathetyuktvA.agamattatra yatra rAjA yudhiShThiraH.. .. 7-84-35 (47903) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi pratij~nAparvaNi chaturashItitamo.adhyAyaH.. 84 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-84-12 shishurdivasakR^it bAlaH sUryaH.. 5-84-18 yathA chyavanamashvinau iti ka.Ta.Da.pAThaH.. 5-84-26 pradakShiNaM Chandonuvartinam.. 5-84-33 apekShA anurodhaH.. 5-84-84 chaturashItitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 085

.. shrIH ..

7.85. adhyAyaH 085

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

dhR^itarAShTreNa putrAnprati shochanapUrvakaM sa~njayampratyabhimanyunidhanAnantarIyakayuddhakathanachodanA.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-85-0 (47904) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-85-0x (4484) shvobhUte kimakArShuste duHkhashokasamanvitAH. abhimanyau hate tatra kairvA.ayudhyanta pANDavAH.. 7-85-1 (47905) jAnantastasya karmANi kuravaH savyasAchinaH. kathaM tatkilbiShaM kR^itvA nirbhayA brUhi mAmakAH.. 7-85-2 (47906) putrashokAbhisantaptaM kruddhaM mR^ityumivAntakam. AyAntaM puruShavyAghraM kathaM dadR^ishurAhave.. 7-85-3 (47907) kapirAjadhvanaM sa~Nkhye vidhunvAnaM mahaddhanuH. dR^iShTvA putraparidyUnaM kimakurvata mAmakAH.. 7-85-4 (47908) kintu sa~njaya sa~Ngrame vR^ittaM duryodhanaM prati. paridevo mahAnadya shrUyate hi gR^ihegR^ihe.. 7-85-5 (47909) bhUyA~nshabdAnatItyAnyA~nshabdaH saindhavaveshmani. paurANikAnAM tUryANAM sha~NkhadundubhighoShavAn.. 7-85-6 (47910) sUtamAgadhabandInAM nartakAnAM cha niHsvanaH. so.adya na shrUyate shabdaH sUta putra yathA purA.. 7-85-7 (47911) shabdo nAnAvidho.abhIShTamabhavadyatra me shrutaH. dInAnAmadya taM shabdaM na shR^iNomi samIritam.. 7-85-8 (47912) niveshane satyadhR^iteH somadattasya sa~njaya. AsIno.ahaM purA tAta shabdamashrauShamuttamam.. 7-85-9 (47913) tadadya puNyahIno.ahamArtasvaraninAditam. niveshanaM gatotsAhaM vikR^itaM tAta lakShaye.. 7-85-10 (47914) viviMshaterdurmukhasya chitrasenavikarNayoH. anyeShAM cha sutAnAM me na tathA shrUyate dhvaniH.. 7-85-11 (47915) brAhmaNaAH kShatriyA vaishyA yaM shiShyAH paryupAsate. droNaputraM maheShvAsaM putrANAM me parAyaNam.. 7-85-12 (47916) vitaNDAlApasaMlApairdrutavAditravAditaiH. gItaishcha vividhairiShTai ramate yo divAnisham.. 7-85-13 (47917) upAsyamAno bahubhiH kurupANDavasAtvataiH. shlakShNastasya gR^ihe shabdo nAdya drauNeryathA purA.. 7-85-14 (47918) droNaputraM maheShvAsaM gAyanA nartakAshcha ye. atyarthamupatiShThanti teShAM na shrUyate dhvaniH.. 7-85-15 (47919) vindAnuvindayoH sAyaM shibire yo mahAdhvaniH. shrUyate so.adya na tathA kekayAnAM cha veshmasu.. 7-85-16 (47920) nityaM pramuditAnAM cha tAlagItasvano mahAn. nR^ityatAM shrUyate tAta gaNAnAM so.adya na svanaH.. 7-85-17 (47921) saptatantUnvitanvAnA yAjakA yamupAsate. saumadattiM shrutanidhiM teShAM na shrUyate dhvaniH.. 7-85-18 (47922) jyAghoSho brahmaghoShashcha tomarAsirathadhvaniH. droNasyAsIdavirato gR^ihe taM na shR^iNomyaham.. 7-85-19 (47923) nAnAdeshasamutthAnAM gItAnAM yo.abhavatsvanaH. vAditranAditAnAM cha so.adya na shrUyate mahAn.. 7-85-20 (47924) yadAprabhR^ityupapluvyAchChAntimichCha~njanArdanaH. AgataH sarvabhUtAnAmanukampArthamachyutaH.. 7-85-21 (47925) tato.ahamabruvaM sUta mandaM duryodhanaM tadA. vAsudevena tIrthena putra saMshAmya pANDavaiH.. 7-85-22 (47926) kAlaprAptamahaM manye mA tvaM duryodhanAtigAH. `saMshAmya bhrAtR^ibhistaistu kShatriyAnabhipAlaya'.. 7-85-23 (47927) shamaM chedyAchamAnaM tvaM pratyAkhyAsyasi keshavam. hitArthamabhijalpantaM na tavAsti raNe jayaH.. 7-85-24 (47928) pratyAchaShTa sa dAshArhamR^iShabhaM sarvadhanvinAm. anuneyAni jalpantamanayAnnAnvapadyata.. 7-85-25 (47929) `karNaduHshAsanamataH saubalasya cha durmateH. pratyAkhyAto mahAbAhuHkulAntakaraNena vai'.. 7-85-26 (47930) tato duHshAsanasyaiva karNasya cha mataM dvayoH. anvavartata mAM hitvA kR^iShTaH kAlena durmatiH.. 7-85-27 (47931) na hyahaM yuddhamichChAmi viduro droNa eva vA. bAhlIkaH somadatto vA bhIShmo drauNAyanistathA.. 7-85-28 (47932) shalo bhUrishravAshchaiva purumitro viviMshatiH. jayaH kR^ipo vA dharmAtmA ye chAnye mama bAndhavAH.. 7-85-29 (47933) eteShAM matamAsthAya yadi vatsyati putrakaH. etebhyashcha madUrdhvaM cha abhokShyadvasudhAmimAm.. 7-85-30 (47934) shlakShNA madhurasambhAShA j~nAtimadhye priyaMvadAH. kulInAH sammatAH prAj~nAH sukhaM jIvanti mAnavAH. 7-85-31 (47935) dharmApekShI naro nityaM sarvatra labhate sukham. pretyabhAve cha kalyANaM prasAdaM pratipadyate.. 7-85-32 (47936) arhAste pR^ithivIM bhoktuM samarthAH sAdhane.api cha. teShAmapi samudrAntA pitR^ipaitAmahI mahI.. 7-85-33 (47937) `na cha tvA.abhibhaviShyanti hitvA dharmaM pR^ithAtmajAH. niyujyamAnAH sthAsyanti pANDavA dharmavartmani.. 7-85-34 (47938) santi me j~nAtayastAta yeShAM shroShyanti pANDavAH. shalyasya somadattasya bhIShmasya cha mahAtmanaH.. 7-85-35 (47939) droNasyAtha vikarNasya bAhlIkasya kR^ipasya cha. anyeShAM chaiva vR^iddhAnAM bharatAnAM mahAtmanAm. tvadarthamabravaM tAta na jahurvachanAni te.. 7-85-36 (47940) kaM vA tvaM manyase teShAM yastvAM brUyAdato.anyathA. kR^iShNo na dharmaM sa~njahyAtsarve te hi tadanvayAH.. 7-85-37 (47941) mayA.api choktAste vIrA vachanaM dharmasaMhitam. nAnyathA prakariShyanti dharmAtmAno hi pANDavAH.. 7-85-38 (47942) ityahaM vilapansUta bahushaH putramuktavAn. na cha me shrutavAnmUDho manye kAlasya paryayam.. 7-85-39 (47943) vR^ikodarArjunau yatra vR^iShNivIrashcha sAtyakiH. uttamaujAshcha pA~nchAlyo yudhAmanyushcha durjayaH.. 7-85-40 (47944) dhR^iShTadyumnashcha durdharShaH shikhaNDI chAparAjitaH. ashmakAH kekayAshchaiva kShatradharmA cha saumakiH.. 7-85-41 (47945) chaidyashcha chekitAnashcha putraH kAshyasya chAbhibhUH. draupadeyA virATashcha drupadashcha mahArathaH.. 7-85-42 (47946) yamau cha puruShavyAghrau mantrI cha madhusUdanaH. ka etA~njAtu yudhyeta loke.asminvai jijIviShuH.. 7-85-43 (47947) divyamastraM vikurvANAnprasahedvA parAnmama. anyo duryodhanAtkArNAchChakuneshchApi saubalAt. duHshAsanachaturthAnAM nAnyaM pashyAmi pa~nchamam.. 7-85-44 (47948) yeShAM vachanakR^itsa syAdviShvakseno rathe sthitaH. sannaddhashchArjuno yoddhA teShAM nAsti parAjayaH.. 7-85-45 (47949) tathA mama vilApAnAM nAyaM duryodhanaH smaret. hatau hi puruShavyAghrau bhIShmadroNau tvamAttha vai.. 7-85-46 (47950) teShAM viduravAkyAnAmuktAnAM dIrghadarshanAt. dR^iShTvemAM phalanirvR^ittiM manye shochanti putrakAH.. 7-85-47 (47951) senAM dR^iShTvA.abhibhUtAM me shaineyenArjunena cha. shUnyAndR^iShTvA rathopasthAnmanye shochanti putrakAH.. 7-85-48 (47952) himAtyaye yathA kakShaM shuShkaM vAterito mahAn. agnirdahettathA senAM mAmikAM sa dhana~njayaH.. 7-85-49 (47953) AchakShva mama tatsarvaM kushalo hyasi sa~njaya. yadopayAtAH sAyAhne kR^itvA pArthasya kilbiShaM.. 7-85-50 (47954) abhimanyau hate tAta kathamAsInmano hi vaH.. 7-85-51 (47955) na jAtu tasya karmANi yudhi gANDIvadhanvanaH. apakR^itya mahattAta soDhuM shakShyanti mAmakAH.. 7-85-52 (47956) kinnuH duryodhanaH kR^ityaM karNaH kR^ityaM kimabravIt. duHshAsanaH saubalashcha teShAmevaM gate sati.. 7-85-53 (47957) sarveShAM samavetAnAM putrANAM mama sa~njaya. yadvR^ittaM tAta sa~NgrAme mandasyApanayairbhR^isham.. 7-85-54 (47958) lobhAnugasya durbuddheH krodhena vikR^itAtmanaH. rAjyakAmasya mUDhasya rAgopahatachetasaH. durnItaM vA sunItaM vA tanmamAchakShva sa~njaya.. .. 7-85-55 (47959) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi pa~nchAshItitamo.adhyAyaH.. 85 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-85-4 putraparidyUnaM putravadhaduHkhitam.. 5-85-13 svapakShasthApanahInaH pratipakShe pratikShepo vitaNDA. alApo bhAShaNam. saMlApo metho bhAShaNam.. 5-85-17 gaNAnAM sa~NghAnAm.. 5-85-22 tIrthena nidAnena upAyena vA.. 5-85-23 kAlaprAptaM samayochitam.. 5-85-25 anuneyani anukUlAni.. 5-85-31 shlakShNa R^ijavaH.. 5-85-33 sAdhane svIkaraNe.. 5-85-44 divyamastraM vikurvANAH saMhareyurariMdamAH iti ka.Ta.pAThaH.. 5-85-47 dIrghadarshanAdanAgatAnusandhAnAt.. 5-85-52 mahadatyartham.. 5-85-53 teShAM madhye.. 5-85-55 rAgo mAtsarthaM rAgastu mAtsarye iti medinI.. 5-85-85 pa~nchAshItitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 086

.. shrIH ..

7.86. adhyAyaH 086

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sa~njayena dhR^itarAShTropAlambhapUrvakaM yuddhakathanopakramaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-86-0 (47960) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-86-0x (4485) hanta te sampravakShyAmi sarvaM pratyakShadarshivAn. shushrUShasva sthiro bhUtvA tava hyapanayo mahAn.. 7-86-1 (47961) gatodake setubandho yAdR^iktAdR^igayaM tava. vilApo niShphalo rAjanmA shucho bharatarShabha.. 7-86-2 (47962) anatikramaNIyo.ayaM kR^itAntasyAdbhuto vidhiH. mA shucho bharatashreShTha diShTametatpurAtanam.. 7-86-3 (47963) yadi tvaM hi purA dyUtAtkuntIputraM yudhiShThiram. nivartayethAH putrAMshcha na tvAM vyasanamAvrajet.. 7-86-4 (47964) yuddhakAle punaH prApte tadaiva bhavatA yadi. nivartitAH syuH saMrabdhA na tvAM vyasanamAvrajet.. 7-86-5 (47965) duryodhanaM chAvidheyaM badhnIyAstvaM purA yadi. avekShya kauravAnrAjanprApsyase tvaM mahadyashaH.. 7-86-6 (47966) tatte buddhivyatIchAramupalapsyanti tajjanAH. pA~nchAlA vR^iShNayaH sarve ye chAnye.api narAdhipAH.. 7-86-7 (47967) sa kR^itvA pitR^ikarma tvaM putraM saMsthApya satpathe. vartethA yadi dharmeNa na tvAM vyasanamAvrajet.. 7-86-8 (47968) tvaM tu prAj~natamo loke hitvA dharmaM sanAtanam. duryodhanasya karNasya shakuneshchAnvagA matam.. 7-86-9 (47969) tatte vilapitaM sarvaM mayA rAjannishAmitam. arthe nivishamAnasya viShamishraM yathA madhu.. 7-86-10 (47970) na tathA manyate kR^iShNo na cha rAjA yudhiShThiraH. na bhIShmo naiva cha droNo yathA tvaM manyase nR^ipa.. 7-86-11 (47971) vyajAnIta yadA tu tvAM lubdhaM dharmapravAdinam. tadAprabhR^iti kR^iShmastvAM na tathA bahumanyate.. 7-86-12 (47972) paruShANyuchyamAnAMshcha yathA pArthAnupekShase. tasyAnubandhaH prAptastvAM putrAmAM rAjyakAmuka.. 7-86-13 (47973) pitR^ipaitAmahaM rAjyamapAvR^ittaM tvayA.anagha. atha pArthairjitAM kR^itsnAM pR^ithivIM pratyapadyathAH.. 7-86-14 (47974) pANDunA nirjitaM rAjyaM kauravANAM yashastathA. etachchApyadhikaM bhUyaH pANDavairdharmachAkhibhiH.. 7-86-15 (47975) teShAM tattAdR^ishaM karma tvAmAsAdya suniShphalam. yatpitryAddhaMshitA rAjyAttvayehAmiShagR^iddhinA.. 7-86-16 (47976) yatpunaryuddhakAle tvaM putrAngarhayase nR^ipa. bahudhA vyAharandoShAnna tadadyopapadyate.. 7-86-17 (47977) na hi rakShanti rAjAno yudhyanto jIvitaM raNe. chamUM vigAhya pArthAnAM yudhyante kShatriyarShabhAH.. 7-86-18 (47978) yAM tu kR^iShNArjunau senAM yAM sAtyakivR^ikodarau. rakSheranko nu tAM yudhyechchamUmanyatra kauravAt.. 7-86-19 (47979) yeShAM yoddhA guDAkesho yeShAM mantrI janArdanaH. yeShAM cha sAtyakiryoddhA yeShAM yoddhA vR^ikodaraH.. 7-86-20 (47980) ko hi tAnviShahedyoddhuM martyadharmA dhanurdharaH. anyatra kauraveyebhyo ye vA teShAM padAnugAH.. 7-86-21 (47981) yAvattu shakyate kartumantaraj~nairjanAdhipaiH. kShatradharmarataiH shUraistAvatkurvanti kauravAH.. 7-86-22 (47982) yathA tu puruShavyAghrairyuddhaM paramasa~NkaTam. kurUNAM pANDavaiH sArdhaM tatsarvaM shR^iNu tattvataH.. .. 7-86-23 (47983) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi ShQaDashItitamo.adhyAyaH.. 86 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-86-17 te tava buddhervyatichAraM vaiShamyamupalapsyantyanubhaviShyanti.. 5-86-13 arthe nivishamAnAnAM yathA pArthAnupekShase iti ka.Ta. pAThaH.. 5-86-22 antaraj~nairavasaravedibhiH.. 5-86-86 ShaDashItitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 087

.. shrIH ..

7.87. adhyAyaH 087

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

droNena shakaTavyUhanirmANam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-87-0 (47984) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-87-0x (4486) tasyAM nishAyAM vyuShTAyAM droNaH shastrabhR^itAM varaH. svAnyanIkAni sarvANi prAkrAmadvyUhituM tataH.. 7-87-1 (47985) shUrANAM garjatAM rAjansa~NkruddhAnAmamarShiNAm. shrUyante sma girashchitrAH parasparavadhaiShiNAm.. 7-87-2 (47986) viShphArya cha dhanUMShyanye jyAH pare parimR^ijya cha. viniHshvasantaH prAkroshankvedAnIM sa dhana~njayaH.. 7-87-3 (47987) vikoshAnsutsarUnanye kR^itadhArAnsamAhitAn. pItAnAkAshasa~NkAshAnasInkechichcha chikShipuH.. 7-87-4 (47988) charantastvasimArgAMshcha dhanurmArgAMshcha shikShitAH. sa~NgrAmamanasaH shUrA dR^ishyante sma sahasrashaH.. 7-87-5 (47989) saghaNTAshchandanAdigdhAH svarNavajravibhUShitAH. samutkShipya gadAshchAnye paryapR^ichChanta pANDavam. 7-87-6 (47990) anye balamadonmattAH parighairbAhushAlinaH. chakruH sambAdhamAkAshamuchChritendradhvajopamaiH.. 7-87-7 (47991) nAnApraharaNaishchAnye vichitrasragala~NkR^itAH. sa~NgrAmamanasaH shUrAstatratatra vyavasthitAH.. 7-87-8 (47992) kvArjunaH kva sa govindaH kva cha mAnI vR^ikodaraH. kva cha te suhR^idasteShAmAhvayante raNe tadA.. 7-87-9 (47993) tataH sha~NkhamupAdhmAya tvarayanvAjinaH svayam. itastatastAnrachayandroNashcharati vegitaH.. 7-87-10 (47994) teShvanIkeShu sarveShu sthiteShvAhavanandiShu. bhAradvAjo mahArAja jayadrathamathAbravIt.. 7-87-11 (47995) tvaM chaiva saumadattishcha karNashchaiva mahArathaH. ashvatthAmA cha shalyashcha vR^iShasenaH kR^ipastathA.. 7-87-12 (47996) shataM chAshvasahasrANAM rathAnAmayutAni ShaT. dviradAnAM prabhinnAnAM sahasrANi chaturdasha.. 7-87-13 (47997) padAtInAM sahasrANi daMshitAnyekaviMshatiH. gavyUtiShu trimAtrAsu mAmanAsAdya tiShThata.. 7-87-14 (47998) tatrasthaM tvAM na saMsoDhuM shaktA devAH savAsavAH. kiM punaH pANDavAH sarve samAshvasihi saindhava.. 7-87-15 (47999) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-87-16x (4487) evamuktaH samAshvastaH sindhurAjo jayadrathaH. samprAyAtsahagAndhArairvR^itastaishcha mahArathaiH. varmibhiH sAdibhiryattaiH prAsapANihayasthitaiH.. 7-87-16 (48000) chAmarApIDinaH sarve jAmbUnadavibhUShitAH. jayadrathasya rAjendra hayAH sAdhupravAhinaH.. 7-87-17 (48001) te chaikasaptasAhasrAstrisAhasrAshcha saindhavAH.. 7-87-18 (48002) mattAnAM suvirUDhAnAM hastyArohairvishAradaiH. hastinAM bhImarUpANAM varmiNAM raudrakarmiNAm.. 7-87-19 (48003) adhyardhena sahasreNa putro durmarShaNastava. agrataH sarvasainyAnAM yotsyamAno vyavasthitaH.. 7-87-20 (48004) tato duHshAsanashchaiva vikarNashcha tavAtmajau. sindhurAjArthasiddhyarthamagrAnIke vyavasthitau.. 7-87-21 (48005) dIrgho dvAdashagavyUtiH pashchArdhe pa~nchavistR^itaH. vyUhastu chakrashakaTo bhAradvAjena nirmitaH.. 7-87-22 (48006) nAnAnR^ipatibhirvIraistatratatra vyavasthitaiH. rathAshvagajapattyoghairdroNena vihitaH svayam.. 7-87-23 (48007) pashchArdhe tasya padmastu garbhavyUhaH punaH kR^itaH. sUchIpadmasya garbhastho gUDho vyUhaH kR^itaH punaH.. 7-87-24 (48008) evametaM mahAvyUhaM vyUhya droNo vyavasthitaH. sUchImukhe maheShvAsaH kR^itavarmA vyavasthitaH.. 7-87-25 (48009) anantaraM cha kAmbhojo jalasandhashcha mAriSha. duryodhanashcha karNashcha tadanantarameva cha.. 7-87-26 (48010) tataH shatasahasrANi yodAnAnamanivartinAm. vyavasthitAni sarvANi shakaTe mukharakShiNAm.. 7-87-27 (48011) teShAM cha pR^iShThato rAjA balena mahatA vR^itaH. jayadrathastato rAjA sUchIpArshve vyavasthitaH.. 7-87-28 (48012) shakaTasya tu rAjendra bhAradvAjo mukhe sthitaH. nAtra tasyAbhavadbhodo jugopainaM tataH svayam.. 7-87-29 (48013) shvetavarmAmbaroShNISho vyUDhorasko mahAbhujaH. dhanurvisphArayandroNastasthau kruddha ivAntakaH. `tasya sainyasya sarvasya netA goptA cha vIryavAn'.. 7-87-30 (48014) tAkinaM shoNahayaM vedIkR^iShNAjinadhvajam. droNasya rathamAlokya prahR^iShTAH kuravo.abhavan.. 7-87-31 (48015) siddhachAraNasa~NghAnAM vismayaH sumahAnabhUt. droNena vihitaM dR^iShTvA vyUhaM kShubdhArNavopamam.. 7-87-32 (48016) sashailasAgaravanAM nAnAjanapadAkulAm. grasedvyUhaH kShitiM sarvAmiti bhUtAni menire.. 7-87-33 (48017) bahurathamanujAshvapattinAgaM pratibhayaniHsvanamadbhutAnurUpam. ahitahR^idayabhedanaM mahadvai shakaTamavekShya kR^itaM nananda rAjA.. .. 7-87-34 (48018) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadisayuddhe saptAshItitamo.adhyAyaH.. 87 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-87-4 pItAn pAyitodakAn.. 5-87-9 kvacheti chakAra ityarthe. ityAhvayanta ityanvayaH.. 5-87-14 trimAtrAsu trisakhyAsu tisR^iShvityarthaH.. 5-87-22 pashchArdhe pashchAdbhAge pa~nchagavyUtiH. chakrashakaTaH chakragarbhaH shakaTaH.. 5-87-34 adbhutAnurUpamAshcharyarUpaM etatsamayayogyaM cha.. 5-87-87 saptAshItitamo.adhyAyaH.. 87 ..
droNaparva - adhyAya 088

.. shrIH ..

7.88. adhyAyaH 088

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

arjunasya raNA~NgaNapraveshaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-88-0 (48019) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-88-0x (4488) vyUDheShu tava sainyeShu samutkruShTeShu mAriSha. tADyamAnAsu bherIShu mR^ida~NgeShvAnakeShu cha.. 7-88-1 (48020) anIkAnAM cha saMhrAde vAditrANAM cha niHsvane. pradhmApiteShu sha~NkheShu sannAde romaharShaNe.. 7-88-2 (48021) pragR^ihIteShu shastreShu bhArateShu yuyutsuShu. raudre muhUrte samprApte savyasAchI vyadR^ishyata.. 7-88-3 (48022) balAnAM vAyasAnAM cha purastAtsavyasAchinaH. pishitAsR^igbhujAM sa~NghAH pralIyante sahasrashaH.. 7-88-4 (48023) mR^igAshcha ghorasannAdaH shivAshchAshivadarshanAH.. dakShiNena prayAtAnAmasmAkaM neduradhvani.. 7-88-5 (48024) `lokakShaye mahArAja yAdR^ishAstAdR^ishA hi te. ashivA dhArtarAShTrANAM shivAH pArthasya saMyuge'.. 7-88-6 (48025) sanirghAtA jvalantyashcha peturulkAH sahasrashaH. chachAla cha mahI kR^itsnA bhaye ghore samutthite.. 7-88-7 (48026) viShvagvAtAH sanIhArA rUkShAH sharkarakarShiNaH. vavurAyAti kaunteye sa~NgrAme samupasthite.. 7-88-8 (48027) nAkulishcha shatAnIko dhR^iShTadyumnashcha pArShataH. pANDavAnAmanIkAni prAj~nau tau vyUhatustadA.. 7-88-9 (48028) tato rathasahasreNa dviradAnAM shatena cha. tribhirashvasahasraishcha padAtInAM shataiH shataiH.. 7-88-10 (48029) adhyardhamAtre dhanuShAM sahasre tanayastava. agrataH sarvasainyAnAM sthitvA durmarShaNo.abravIt.. 7-88-11 (48030) adya gANDIvadhanvAnaM tapantaM yuddhadurmadam. ahamAvArayiShyAmi veleva makarAlayam.. 7-88-12 (48031) adya pashyantu sa~NgrAme dhana~njayamamarShaNam. viShaktaM mayi durdharShaM bhinnaM kumbhamivAshmani.. 7-88-13 (48032) tiShThadhvaM rathino yUyaM sa~NgrAmamabhikA~NkShiNaH. yudhyAmi saMhatAnetAnyasho mAnaM cha vardhayan.. 7-88-14 (48033) evaM bruvanmahArAja mahAtmA sa mahIpatiH. maheShvAsairvR^ito rAjanmaheShvAso vyavasthitaH.. 7-88-15 (48034) tato.arjuno mahArAja mahAtmA mahatAM patiH. mahArathasamAkhyAto maheShvAso vyavasthitaH.. 7-88-16 (48035) kakShAgniriva duHsparshaH savajra iva vAsavaH. daNDapANirivAsahyo mR^ityuH kAlena choditaH.. 7-88-17 (48036) shUlapANirivAkShobhyo varuNaH pAshavAniva. yugAntAgnirivArchiShmAndidhakShuH sthAsnuja~Ngamam.. 7-88-18 (48037) krodhAmarShabaloddhUto nivAtakavachAntakaH. yuddhe jetA sthitaH satye pArayiShyanmahAvratam.. 7-88-19 (48038) AmuktakavachaH kha~NgI jAmbUnadakirITabhR^it. shubhramAlyAmbaradharaH sva~NgadashchArukuNQDalaH.. 7-88-20 (48039) rathapravaramAsthAya naro nArAyaNAnugaH. vidhunvangANDivaM sa~Nkhye babhau sUrya ivoditaH.. 7-88-21 (48040) agrAnIkasya so.adhyardha iShupAte dhana~njayaH. vyavasthApya rathaM rAja~nsha~NkhaM dadhmau pratApavAn.. 7-88-22 (48041) atha kR^iShNo.apyasambhrAntaH pArthena saha mAriSha. prAdhmApayatpA~nchajanyaM sha~NkhapravaramojasA.. 7-88-23 (48042) tayoH sha~NkhapraNAdena tava sainye vishAmpate. AsansaMhR^iShTaromANaH kampitA gatachetasaH.. 7-88-24 (48043) yathA trasyanti bhUtAni sarvANyashaniniHsvanAt. tathA sha~NkhapraNAdena vitresustava sainikAH.. 7-88-25 (48044) prasusruvuH shakR^inmUtraM vAhanAni cha sarvashaH. evaM savAhanaM sarvamAvignamabhavadbalam.. 7-88-26 (48045) sIdanti sma narA rAja~nsha~Nkhashabdena mAriSha. visaMj~nAshchAbhavankechitkechidrAjanvitatrasuH.. 7-88-27 (48046) tataH kapirmahAnAdaM sahabhUtairdhvajAlayaiH. akarodvyAditAsyashcha bhIShayaMstava sainikAn.. 7-88-28 (48047) tataH sha~NkhAshcha bheryashcha mR^ida~NgAshchAnakaiH saha. punarevAbhyahanyanta tava sainyapraharShaNAH.. 7-88-29 (48048) nAnAvAditrasaMhAdaiH kShveDitAsphoTitAkulaiH. siMhanAdaiH samutkruShTaiH samAdhUtairmahArathaiH.. 7-88-30 (48049) tasmiMstu tumule shabde bhIrUNAM bhayavardhane. atIva hR^iShTo dAshArhamabravItpAkashAsaniH.. .. 7-88-31 (48050) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe aShTAMshItitamo.adhyAyaH.. 88 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-88-10 shataiH shatairdashasahasraiH.. 5-88-30 samAdhUtaiH sa~nchAlitaiH.. 5-88-88 aShTAshItitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 089

.. shrIH ..

7.89. adhyAyaH 089

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

arjunayuddhavarNanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-89-0 (48051) arjuna uvAcha 7-89-0x (4489) chodayAshvAnhR^iShIkesha yatra durmarShaNaH sthitaH. etadbhittvA gajAnIkaM pravekShyAmyarivAhinIm.. 7-89-1 (48052) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-89-2x (4490) evamukto mahAbAhuH keshavaH savyasAchinA. achodayaddhayAMstatra yatra durmarShaNaH sthitaH.. 7-89-2 (48053) sa samprahArastumulaH sampravR^ittaH sudAruNaH. ekasya cha bahUnAM cha rathanAganarakShayaH.. 7-89-3 (48054) tataH sAyakavarSheNa parjanya iva vR^iShTimAn. parAnavAkiratpArthaH parvatAniva nIradaH.. 7-89-4 (48055) te chApi rathinaH sarve tvaritAH kR^itahastavat. avAkiranbANajAlaistatra kR^iShNadhana~njayau.. 7-89-5 (48056) tataH kruddho mahAbAhurvAryamANaH parairyudhi. shirAMsi rathinAM pArthaH kAyebhyo.apAharachCharaiH.. 7-89-6 (48057) uddhAntanayanairvakraiH sandaShTauShThapuTaiH shubhaiH. sakuNDalashirastrANairvasudhA samakIryata.. 7-89-7 (48058) puNDarIkavanAnIva vidhvastAni samantataH. vinikIrNAni yodhAnAM vadanAni chakAshire.. 7-89-8 (48059) suvarNachitrAbharaNAH saMsiktA rudhireNa cha. saMsaktA iva dR^ishyante meghasa~NghAH savidyutaH.. 7-89-9 (48060) shirasAM patatAM rAja~nshabdo.abhUdvasudhAtale. kAlena paripakvAnAM tAlAnAM patatAmiva.. 7-89-10 (48061) kabandha utthitaH kashchidviShphArya sasharaM dhanuH. ki~nchitkha~NgaM viniShkR^iShya bhujenodyamya tiShThati. `gR^ihItvA.anyasya kesheShu shiro nR^ityati chAparaH'.. 7-89-11 (48062) patitAni na jAnanti shirAMsi puruSharShabhAH. amR^iShyamANAH sa~NgrAme kaunteyaM jayagR^iddhinaH.. 7-89-12 (48063) hayAnAmuttamA~Ngaishcha hastihastaishcha medinI. bAhubhishcha shirobhishcha vIrANAM samakIryata.. 7-89-13 (48064) ayaM pArthaH kutaH pArthaH pArtho.ayamiti sarvashaH. `tiShTha pArthehi mAM pArtha kva yAsIti cha jalpatAm'. tava sainyeShu yodhAnAM pArthabhUtamivAbhavat.. 7-89-14 (48065) anyonyamapi chAjaghnurAtmAnamapi chApare. pArthabhUtamamanyanta janAH kAlena mohitAH.. 7-89-15 (48066) niShTanantaH sarudhirA visaMj~nA gADhavedanAH. shayAnA bahavo vIrAH kIrtayantaH svabAndhavAn.. 7-89-16 (48067) sabhiNDipAlAH saprAsAH sashaktyR^iShTiparashvathAH. sanirvyUhAH sanistriMshAH sasharAsanatomarAH.. 7-89-17 (48068) sabANavarmAbharaNAH sagadAH sA~NgadA raNe. mahAbhujagasa~NkAshA bAhavaH parighopamAH.. 7-89-18 (48069) udveShTanti vicheShTanti sa~ncheShTanti cha sarvashaH. vegaM kurvanti saMrabdhA nikR^ittAH parameShubhiH.. 7-89-19 (48070) yo yaH sma samare pArthaM pratisa~ncharate naraH. tasyatasyAntako bANaH sharIramupasarpati.. 7-89-20 (48071) nR^ityato rathamArgeShu dhanurvyAyachChatastathA. na kashchittatra pArthashcha dadR^ishe.antaramaNvapi.. 7-89-21 (48072) yattasya ghaTamAnasya kShipraM vikShipataH sharAn. lAghavAtpANDuputrasya vyasmayanta pare janAH.. 7-89-22 (48073) hastinaM hastiyantAramashvamAshvikameva cha. abhinatphalguno bANai rathinaM cha sasArathim.. 7-89-23 (48074) AvartamAnamAvR^ittaM yudhyamAnaM cha pANDavaH. pramukhe tiShThamAnaM cha na ka~nchinna nihanti saH.. 7-89-24 (48075) yathodayanvai gagane sUryo hanti mahattamaH. tathA.arjuno gajAnIkamavadhItka~NkapatribhiH.. 7-89-25 (48076) hastibhiH patitairbhinnaistava sainyamadR^ishyata. antakAle yathA bhUmirvyavakIrNA mahIdharaiH.. 7-89-26 (48077) yathA madhyaMdine sUryo duShprekShyaH prANibhiH sadA. tathA dhana~njayaH kruddho duShprekShyo yudhi shatrubhiH.. 7-89-27 (48078) tattathA tava putrasya sainyaM yudhi parantapa. prabhagnaM drutamAvignamatIva sharapIDitam.. 7-89-28 (48079) mAruteneva mahatA meghAnIkaM vyadIryata. prakAlyamAnaM tatsainyaM nAshakatprativIkShitum.. 7-89-29 (48080) pratodaishchApakoTIbhirhuMkAraiH sAdhuvAhitaiH. kashApArShNyabhighAtaishcha vAgbhirugrAbhireva cha.. 7-89-30 (48081) chodayanto hayAMstUrNaM palAyante sma tAvakAH. sAdino rathinashchaiva pattayashchArjunArditAH.. 7-89-31 (48082) pArShNya~NguShThA~NkushairnAgaM chodayantastathA.apare. sharaiH sammohitAshchAnye tamevAbhimukhA yayuH.. 7-89-32 (48083) tava yogha hatotsAhA vibhrAntamanasastadA.. .. 7-89-33 (48084) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe ekonanavatitamo.adhyAyaH.. 89 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-89-17 nirvyUha AyudhavisheShaH.. 5-89-20 pratisa~ncharate pratyudrachChati.. 5-89-22 yattasyAvahitasya.. 5-89-28 drutaM vidrutam. AvignaM bhItam.. 5-89-30 sAdhuvAhitaiH suShThu vyApArItaiH.. 5-89-89 ekonanavatitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 090

.. shrIH ..

7.90. adhyAyaH 090

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

arjunena duHshAsanaparAjayaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-90-0 (48085) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-90-0x (4491) tasminprabhagne sainyAgre vadhyamAne kirITinA. ketu tatra raNe vIrAH pratyudIyurdhana~njayam.. 7-90-1 (48086) AhosvichChakaTavyUhaM praviShTA moghanishchayAH.. droNamAshritya tiShThanti prAkAramakutobhayAH.. 7-90-2 (48087) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-90-3x (4492) tathA.arjunena sambhagne tasmiMstava bale.anagha. hatavIre hatotsAhe palAyanakR^itakShaNe.. 7-90-3 (48088) pAkashAsaninA.abhIkShNaM vadhyamAne sharottamaiH. na tatra kashchitsa~NgrAme shashAkArjunamIkShitum.. 7-90-4 (48089) tatastava suto rAjandR^iShTvA sainyaM tathAgatam. duHshAsano bhR^ishaM kruddho yuddhAyArjunamabhyagAt.. 7-90-5 (48090) sakA~nchanavichitreNa kavachena samAvR^itaH. jAmbUnadashirastrANaH shUrastIvraparAkramaH.. 7-90-6 (48091) nAgAnIkena mahatA grasanniva mahImimAm. duHshAsano mahArAja savyasAchinamAvR^iNot.. 7-90-7 (48092) hAdena gajaghaNTAnAM sha~NkhAnAM ninadena cha. jyAkShepaninadaishchaiva virAveNa cha dantinAm.. 7-90-8 (48093) bhUrdishashchAntarikShaM cha shabdenAsItsamAvR^itam. `yuvarAjo balashlAghI pi~NgalaH priyadarshanaH'. sa muhUrtaM pratibhayo dAruNaH samapadyata.. 7-90-9 (48094) tAndR^iShTvA patatastUrNama~NkushairabhichoditAn. vyAlambahastAnsaMrabdhAnsapakShAniva parvatAn.. 7-90-10 (48095) siMhanAdena mahatA narasiMho dhana~njayaH. `tadAchalaghanaprakhyaM patAkAshatasa~Nkulam'. gajAnIkamamitrANAmabhito vyadhamachCharaiH.. 7-90-11 (48096) mahormiNamivoddhUtaM shvasanena mahArNavam. kirITI tadgajAnIkaM prAvishanmakaro yathA.. 7-90-12 (48097) khamAshrita ivAdityaH pratapansa yugakShaye. dadR^ishe dikShu sarvAsu pArthaH parapura~njanaH.. 7-90-13 (48098) khurashabdena chAshvAnAM nemighoSheNa tena cha. tena chotkruShTashabdena jyAninAdena tena cha.. 7-90-14 (48099) nAnAvAditrashabdena pA~nchajanyasvanena cha. devadattasya ghoSheNa gANDIvaninadena cha. mandavegA narA nAgA babhUvuste vichetasaH.. 7-90-15 (48100) sharairAshIviShasparshairnirbhinnAH savyasAchinA. te gajAH samasIdanta magnAH pa~NkArNaveShviva.. 7-90-16 (48101) yugapachcha samAviShTaiH sharairgANDIvadhanvanaH. anekashatasAhasrairdrumA madhukarairiva. `pu~NkhAvashiShTairbahubhiH shoNitotpIDavAhibhiH'.. 7-90-17 (48102) ArAvaM paramaM kR^itvA vadhyamAnAH kirITinA. nipeturanishaM bhUmau ChinnapakShA ivAdrayaH.. 7-90-18 (48103) apare dantaveShTeShu kumbheShu cha kaTeShu cha. sharaiH samarpitA nAgAH krau~nchavadvyanadanmuhuH.. 7-90-19 (48104) gajaskandhagatAnAM cha puruShANAM kirITinA. Chidyante chottamA~NgAni bhullaiH sannataparvabhiH.. 7-90-20 (48105) sakuNDalAnAM patatAM shirasAM dharaNItale. padmAnAmiva sa~NghAtaiH pArthashchakre nivedanam.. 7-90-21 (48106) yantrabaddhA vikavachA vraNArtA rudhirokShitAH. bhramatsu yudhi nAgeShu manuShyA vilalambire.. 7-90-22 (48107) kechidekena bANena suyuktena supatriNA. dvau trayashcha vinirbhinnA nipeturdharaNItale.. 7-90-23 (48108) apare madasaMrabdhA mAta~NgAH parvatopamAH. sArohA nyapatanbhUmau drumavanta ivAchalAH.. 7-90-24 (48109) maurvI dhvajaM dhanushchaiva yugamIShAM tathaiva cha. rathinAM kuTTayAmAsa bhallaiH sannataparvabhiH.. 7-90-25 (48110) na sandadhanna chAkarShanna vimu~nchanna chodvahan. maNDalenaiva dhanuShA nR^ityanpArthaH sma dR^ishyate.. 7-90-26 (48111) atividdhAshcha nArAchairvamanto rudhiraM mukhaiH. muhUrtAnnyapatannanye vAraNA vasudhAtale.. 7-90-27 (48112) utthitAnyagaNeyAni kabandhAni samantataH. adR^ishyanta mahArAja tasminparamasa~Nkule.. 7-90-28 (48113) sachApAH sA~NgulitrANAH sakha~NgAH sA~NgadA raNe. adR^ishyanta bhujAshChinnA hemAbharaNabhUShitAH.. 7-90-29 (48114) sUpaskarairadhiShThAnairIShAdaNDakabandhuraiH. chakrairvimathitairakShairbhagnaishcha bahudhA yugaiH.. 7-90-30 (48115) charmachApadharaishchaiva vyavakIrNaistatastataH. sragbhirAbharaNairvastraiH patitaishcha mahAdhvajaiH.. 7-90-31 (48116) nihatairvAraNairashvaiH kShatriyaishcha nipAtitaiH. adR^ishyata mahI tatra dAruNapratidarshanA.. 7-90-32 (48117) evaM duHshAsanabalaM vadhyamAnaM kirITinA. samprAdravanmahArAja vyathitaM sahanAyakam.. 7-90-33 (48118) `evaM bale drute yAte rAjaputraM mahAratham. vivyAdha dashabhirbANaistiShThatiShTheti chAbravIt.. 7-90-34 (48119) jIvitena kathaM gantA duruktaM yAvadadya te. tadvAkyasadR^ishaM karma kuru tvaM yadi manyase.. 7-90-35 (48120) evamuktvA tato rAjA pArthaH pArthivamardanaH. bhR^ishaM kruddho mahArAja avidhyattanayaM tava'.. 7-90-36 (48121) tato duHshAsanastrastaH sahAnIkaH sharArditaH. droNaM trAtAramAkA~NkSha~nshakaTavyUhamabhyagAt.. .. 7-90-37 (48122) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe navatitamo.adhyAyaH.. 90 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-90-3 palAyane kR^itaH kShaNo.avasaro yena.. 5-90-9 pratibhayo bhaya~NkaraH. dAruNaH krUraH.. 5-90-19 dantaveShTeShu dantamUleShu. kaTeShu kaTiShu.. 5-90-21 nivedanamupAhAram.. 5-90-22 yantrabaddhA yantrairAlikhitAH.. 5-90-90 navatitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 091

.. shrIH ..

7.91. adhyAyaH 091

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

arjunasya vyUhamukhasthena droNena ka~nchitkAlaM yuddhvA tamapahAya vyUhapraveshaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-91-0 (48123) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-91-0x (4493) duHshasanabalaM hatvA savyasAchI mahArathaH. sindhurAjaM parIpsanvai droNAnIkamupAdravat.. 7-91-1 (48124) sa tu droNaM samAsAdya vyUhasya pramukhe sthitam. kR^itA~njaliridaM vAkyaM kR^iShNasyAnumate.abravIt.. 7-91-2 (48125) shivena dhyAhi mAM brahmansvasti chaiva vadasva me. bhavatprasAdAdichChAmi praveShTaM durbhidAM chamUm.. 7-91-3 (48126) bhavAnpitR^isamo mahyaM dharmarAjasamo.api cha. dhaumyakR^iShNasamashchaiva satyametadbravImi te.. 7-91-4 (48127) ashvatthAmA yathA tAta rakShaNIyastvayA.anagha. tathA.ahamapi te rakShyaH sadaiva dvijasattama.. 7-91-5 (48128) tava prasAdAdichCheyaM sindhurAjAnamAhave. nihantuM dvipadAM shreShTha pratij~nAM rakSha me prabho.. 7-91-6 (48129) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-91-7x (4494) evamuktastadA.a.achAryaH pratyuvAcha smayanniva. mAmajitvA na bIbhatso shakyo jetuM jayadrathaH.. 7-91-7 (48130) etAvaduktvA taM droNaH sharavrAtairavAkirat. sarathAshvadhvajaM tIkShNaiH prahasanvai sasArathim.. 7-91-8 (48131) tato.arjunaH sharavrAtAndroNasyAvArya sAyakaiH. droNamabhyardayadbANairghorarUpairhattaraiH.. 7-91-9 (48132) vivyAdha cha raNe droNamanumAnya vishAmpate. kShatradharmaM samAsthAya navabhiH sAyakaiH punaH.. 7-91-10 (48133) tasyeShUniShubhishChittvA droNo vivyAdha tAvubhau. viShAgnijvalitaprakhyairiShubhiH kR^iShNapANDavau.. 7-91-11 (48134) iyepa pANDavastasya bANaishChettuM sharAsanam. tasya chintayatastveva phalgunasya mahAtmanaH.. 7-91-12 (48135) droNaH sharairasambhrAnto jyAM chichChedAshu vIryavAn. vivyAdha cha hayAnasya dhvajaM sArathimeva cha.. 7-91-13 (48136) arjunaM cha sharairvIraH smayamAno.abhyavAkirat. etasminnantare pArthaH sajyaM kR^itvA mahaddhanuH.. 7-91-14 (48137) visheShayiShyannAchAryaM sarvAstraviduShAM varaH. mumocha ShaTshatAnbANAngR^ihItvaikamiva drutam.. 7-91-15 (48138) punaH saptashatAnanyAnsahasraM chAnivartinaH. chikShepAyutashashchAnyAMste.aghnandroNasya tAM chamUm.. 7-91-16 (48139) taiH samyagastairbalinA kR^itinA chitrayodhinA. manuShyavAjimAta~NgA viddhAH peturgatAsavaH.. 7-91-17 (48140) visUtAshvadhvajAH petuH sa~nChinnAyudhajIvitAH. rathino rathamukhyebhyaH sahasA sharapIDitAH.. 7-91-18 (48141) chUrNitAkShiptadagdhAnAM vajrAnilahutAshanaiH. tulyarUpA gajAH peturgiryagrAmbudaveshmanAm.. 7-91-19 (48142) peturashvasahasrANi prahatAnyarjuneShubhiH. haMsA himavataH pR^iShThe vAriviprahatA iva.. 7-91-20 (48143) rathAshvadvipapattyoghAH salilaughA ivAdbhutAH. yugAntAdityarashmyAbhaiH pANDavAstrasharairhatAH.. 7-91-21 (48144) taM pANDavAdityasharAMshujAlaM kurupravIrAnyudhi niShTapantam. sa droNameghaH sharavR^iShTivegaiH prAchChAdayanmegha ivArkarashmIn.. 7-91-22 (48145) athAtyarthaM visR^iShTena dviShatAmasubhojinA. Ajaghne vakShasi droNo nArAchena dhana~njayam.. 7-91-23 (48146) sa vihvalitasarvA~NgaH kShitikampe yathA.achalaH. dhairyamAlambya bIbhatsurdroNaM vivyAdha patribhiH.. 7-91-24 (48147) droNastu pa~nchabhirbANairvAsudevamatADayat. arjunaM cha trisaptatyA dhvajaM chAsya tribhiH sharaiH.. 7-91-25 (48148) visheShayiShya~nshiShyaM cha droNo rAjanparAkramI. adR^ishyamarjunaM chakre nimeShAchCharavR^iShTibhiH.. 7-91-26 (48149) prasaktAnpatato.adrAkShma bhAradvAjasya sAyakAn. maNDalIkR^itamevAsya dhanushchAdR^ishyatAdbhutam.. 7-91-27 (48150) te.abhyayuH samare rAjanvAsudevadhana~njayau. droNasR^iShTAH subahavaH ka~NkapatraparichChadAH.. 7-91-28 (48151) tatrAdbhutamapashyAma shilAnAmiva sarpaNam. yaddroNaM tarasA pArtho vR^iddhaM bAlo.api nAtarat.. 7-91-29 (48152) chintayAmAsa vArShNeyo dR^iShTvA droNasya vikramam. nAtivartiShyate hyonaM velAmiva mahArNavaH.. 7-91-30 (48153) tataH pArthaM samudvignaM lakShya chintayate.achyutaH. droNasya chApi vikrAntaM dR^iShTvA madhuniShUdanaH. ityabravIdvAsudevo dhana~njayamudAradhIH.. 7-91-31 (48154) pArthapArtha mahAbAho na naH kAlAtyayo bhavet. droNamutsR^ijya gachChAmo brAhmaNo.asau gataklamaH.. 7-91-32 (48155) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-91-33x (4495) pArthashchApyabravItkR^iShNaM yatheShTamiti keshavam.. 7-91-33 (48156) tataH pradakShiNaM kR^itvA droNaM prAyAnmahAbhujam. parivR^ittashcha bIbhatsuragachChadvisR^ija~nsharAn.. 7-91-34 (48157) tato.abravItsvayaM droNaH kvedaM pANDava gamyate. nanu nAma raNe shatrumajitvA na nivartase.. 7-91-35 (48158) arjuna uvAcha. 7-91-36x (4496) gururbhavAnna me shatruH shiShyaH putrasamo.asmi te. na chAsti sa pumA.Nlloke yastvAM yudhi parAjayet.. 7-91-36 (48159) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-91-37x (4497) evaM bruvANo bIbhatsurjayadrathavadhotsukaH. tvarAyukto mahAbAhustvatsainyaM samupAdravat.. 7-91-37 (48160) taM chakrarakShau pA~nchAlyau yudhAmanyUttamaujasau. anvayAtAM mahAtmAnau vishantaM tAvakaM balam.. 7-91-38 (48161) tato jayo mahArAja kR^itavarmA cha sAtvataH. kAmbhojashcha shrutAyushcha dhana~njayamavArayan.. 7-91-39 (48162) teShAM dashasahasrANi rathAnAmanuyAyinAm. abhIShAhAH shUrasenAH shibayo.atha vasAtayaH.. 7-91-40 (48163) mAvellakA lalitthAshcha kekayA madrakAstathA. nArAyaNAshcha gopAlAH kAmbhojAnAM cha ye gaNAH.. 7-91-41 (48164) karNena vijitAH pUrvaM sa~NgrAme shUrasammatAH. bhAradvAjaM puraskR^itya hR^iShTAtmAno.arjunaM prati.. 7-91-42 (48165) putrashokAbhisantaptaM kruddhaM mR^ityumivAntakam. tyajantaM tumule prANAnsannaddhaM chitrayodhinam.. 7-91-43 (48166) gAhamAnamanIkAni mAta~Ngamiva yUthapam. maheShvAsaM parAkrAntaM naravyAghramavArayan.. 7-91-44 (48167) tataH pravavR^ite yuddhaM tumulaM romaharShaNam. anyonyaM vai prArthayatAM yodhAnAmarjunasya cha.. 7-91-45 (48168) jayadrathavadhaprepsumAyAntaM puruSharShabham. nyavArayanta sahitAH kriyA vyAdhimivotthitaM.. .. 7-91-46 (48169) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashodisayuddhe ekanavatitatamo.adhyAyaH.. 91 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-91-19 giryagrAmbudaveshmanAM vajrAnilahutAshanaiH chUrNitAkShiptadagdhAnAM iti yathAsa~NkhyenAnvayaH.. 5-91-91 ekanavatitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 092

.. shrIH ..

7.92. adhyAyaH 092

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

arjunena shrutAyudhasudakShiNayorvadhaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-92-0 (48170) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-92-0x (4498) sanniruddhastu taiH pArtho mahAbalaparAkramaH. drutaM samanuyAtashcha droNena rathinAM varaH.. 7-92-1 (48171) kiranniShugaNAMstIkShNAnsa rashmIniva bhAskaraH. tApayAmAsa tatsainyaM dehaM vyAdhigaNo yathA.. 7-92-2 (48172) ashvo viddho rathashChinnaH sArohaH pAtito gajaH. ChatrANi chApaviddhAni rathAshchakrairvinA kR^itAH.. 7-92-3 (48173) vidrutAni cha sainyAni sharArtAni samantataH. ityAsIttumulaM yuddhaM na prAj~nAyata ki~nchana.. 7-92-4 (48174) teShAM saMyachChatAM sa~Nkhye parasparamajihmagaiH. arjuno dhvajinIM rAjannabhIkShNaM samakampayat.. 7-92-5 (48175) satyAM chikIrShamANastu pratij~nAM satyasa~NgaraH. abhyadravadrathashreShThaM shoNAshvaM shvetavAhanaH.. 7-92-6 (48176) taM droNaH pa~nchaviMshatyA marmabhidbhirajihmagaiH. antevAsinamAchAryo maheShvAsaM samArpayat.. 7-92-7 (48177) taM tUrNamiva bIbhatsuH sarvashastrabhR^itAM varaH. abhyadhAvadiShUnasyanniShuvegavighAtakAn.. 7-92-8 (48178) tasyAshu kShipato bhallAnbhallaiH sannataparvabhiH. pratyavidhyadameyAtmA brahmAstraM samudIrayan.. 7-92-9 (48179) tadadbhutamapashyAma droNasyAchAryakaM yudhi. yatamAno yuvA nainaM pratyavidhyadyadarjunaH.. 7-92-10 (48180) kSharanniva mahAmegho vAridhArAH sahasrashaH. droNameghaH pArthashailaM vavarSha sharavR^iShTibhiH.. 7-92-11 (48181) arjunaH sharavarShaM tachCharavarSheNa vIryavAn. avArayadasambhrAnto na tvAchAryamapIDayat.. 7-92-12 (48182) droNastu pa~nchaviMshatyA shvetavAhanamArdayat. vAsudevaM cha saptatyA bAhvorurasi chAshugaiH.. 7-92-13 (48183) pArthastu prahasandhImAnAchAryaM sa sharaughiNam. visR^ijantaM shitAnbANAnavArayata taM yudhi.. 7-92-14 (48184) atha tau vadhyamAnau tu droNena rathasattamau. avarjayetAM durdharShaM yugAntAgnimivotthitam.. 7-92-15 (48185) varjayannishitAnbANAndroNachApaviniH sR^itAn. kirITamAlI kaunteyo bhojAnIkamathAvishat.. 7-92-16 (48186) so.antarA kR^itavarmANaM kAmbhojaM cha sudakShiNam. abhyayAdvarjayandroNaM mainAkamiva parvatam.. 7-92-17 (48187) tato bhojo naravyAghro durdharShaM kurusattamam. avidhyattUrNamavyagro dashabhiH ka~NkapatribhiH.. 7-92-18 (48188) tamarjunaH shatenAjau rAjanvivyAdha patriNAm. punashchAnyaistribhirbANairmohayanniva sAtvatam.. 7-92-19 (48189) bhojastu prahasanpArthaM vAsudevaM cha mAdhavam. ekaikaM pa~nchaviMshatyA sAyakAnAM samArpayat.. 7-92-20 (48190) tasyArjuno dhanushChittvA viyAdhainaM trisaptabhiH. sharairagnishikhAkAraiH kruddhAshIviShasannibhaiH.. 7-92-21 (48191) athAnyaddhanurAdAya kR^itavarmA mahArathaH. pa~nchabhiH sAyakaistUrNaM vivyAdhorasi bhArata.. 7-92-22 (48192) punashcha nishitairbANaiH pArthaM vivyAdha pa~nchabhiH. taM pArtho navabhirbANairAjaghAna stanAntare.. 7-92-23 (48193) dR^iShTvA viShaktaM kaunteyaM kR^itavarmarathaM prati. chintayAmAsa vArShNeyo na naH kAlAtyayo bhavet.. 7-92-24 (48194) tataH kR^iShNo.abravItpArthaM kR^itavarmaNi mA dayAm. kuru sambandhakaM hitvA pramathyainaM vishAtaya.. 7-92-25 (48195) tataH sa kR^itavarmANaM mahoyitvA.arjunaH sharaiH. abhyagAjjavanairashvaiH kAmbhojAnAmanIkinIm.. 7-92-26 (48196) amarShitastu hArdikyaH praviShTe shvetavAhane. vidhunvansasharaM chApaM pA~nchAlyAbhyAM samAgataH.. 7-92-27 (48197) chakrarakShau tu pA~nchAlyAvarjunasya padAnugau. paryavArayadAyAntau kR^itavarmA ratheShubhiH.. 7-92-28 (48198) tAvavidhyattato bhojaH kR^itavarmA shitaiH sharaiH. tribhireva yudhAmanyuM chaturbhishchottamaujasam.. 7-92-29 (48199) tAvapyenaM vividhaturdashabhirdashabhiH sharaiH. tribhireva yudhAmanyuruttagaujAstribhistathA. sa~nchichChidaturapyasya dhvajaM kArmukameva cha.. 7-92-30 (48200) athAnyaddhanurAdAya hArdikyaH krodhamUrchChitaH. kR^itvA vidhanuShau vIrau sharavarShairavAkirat.. 7-92-31 (48201) tAvanye dhanuShI sajye kR^itvA bhojaM vijaghnatuH. tenAntareShu bIbhatsurviveshAmitravAhinIm.. 7-92-32 (48202) na lebhAte tu tau dvAraM vAritau kR^itavarmaNA. dhArtarAShTreShvanIkeShu yatamAnau nararShabhau.. 7-92-33 (48203) anIkAnyardayanyuddhe tvaritaH shvetavAhanaH. nAvadhItkR^itavarmANaM prAptamapyarisUdanaH.. 7-92-34 (48204) taM dR^iShTvA tu tathA.a.ayAntaMshUro rAjA shrutAyudhaH. abhyadravatsusa~Nkruddho vidhunvAno mahaddhanuH.. 7-92-35 (48205) sa pArthaM tribhirAnarchChatsaptatyA cha janArdanam. kShurapreNa sutIkShNena pArthaketumatADayat.. 7-92-36 (48206) tato.arjuno navatyA tu sharANAM nataparvaNAm. AjaghAna bhR^ishaM kruddhastotrairiva mahAdvipam.. 7-92-37 (48207) sa tanna mamR^iShe rAjanpANDaveyasya vikramam. athainaM saptasaptatyA nArAchAnAM samArpayat.. 7-92-38 (48208) tasyArjuno dhanushChittvA sharAvApaM nikR^itya cha. AjaghAnorasi kruddhaH saptabhirnataparvabhiH.. 7-92-39 (48209) athAnyaddhanurAdAya sa rAjA krodhamUrchChitaH. vAsaviM navabhirbANairbAhvorurasi chArpayat.. 7-92-40 (48210) tato.arjunaH smayanneva shrutAyudhamarindamaH. sharairanekasAhasraiH pIDayAmAsa bhArata.. 7-92-41 (48211) ashvAMshchAsyAvadhIttUrNaM sArathiM cha mahArathaH. vivyAdha chainaM saptatyA nArAchAnAM mahAbalaH.. 7-92-42 (48212) hatAshvaM rathamutsR^ijya sa tu rAjA shrutAyudhaH. abhyadruvadruNe pArthaM gadAmudyamya vIryavAn.. 7-92-43 (48213) varuNasyatmajo vIraH sa tu rAjA shrutAyudhaH. parNAshAjananI yasya shItatoyA mahAnadI.. 7-92-44 (48214) tasya mAtA.abravIdrAjanvaruNaM putrakAraNAt. avadhyo.ayaM bhavelloke shatrUNAM tanayo mama.. 7-92-45 (48215) varuNastvabravItprIto dadAmyasmai varaM hitam. divyamastraM sutaste.ayaM yenAvadhyo bhaviShyati.. 7-92-46 (48216) nAsti chApyamaratvaM vai manuShyasya katha~nchana. sarveNAvashyamartavyaM jAtena saritAM vare.. 7-92-47 (48217) durdharShastveSha shatrUNAM raNeShu bhavitA sadA. astrasyAsya prabhAvAdvai vyetu te mAnaso jvaraH.. 7-92-48 (48218) ityuktvA varuNaH prAdAdgadAM mantrapuraskR^itAm. yAmAsAdya durAdharShaH sarvaloke shrutAyudhaH.. 7-92-49 (48219) uvAcha chainaM bhagavAnpunareva jaleshvaraH. ayudhyati na moktavyA sA tvayyeva patediti.. 7-92-50 (48220) hanyAdeShA pratIpaM hi prayoktAramapi prabho. na chAkarotsa tadvAkyaM prApte kAle shrutAyudhaH.. 7-92-51 (48221) sa tayA vIraghAtinyA janArdanamatADayat. pratijagrAha tAM kR^iShNaH pInenAMsena vIryavAn. nAkampayata shauriM sA vindhyaM girimivAnilaH.. 7-92-52 (48222) `tato.arjunaH kShuraprAbhyAM bhujau parighasannibhau. chichCheda pANQDavaH shIghraM jaleshvarasutasya vai.. 7-92-53 (48223) sa jvalantI maholkeva samAsAdya janArdanam'. pratyAgatA mahAvegA kR^ityeva duradhiShThitA.. 7-92-54 (48224) jaghAna chAsthitaM vIraM shrutAyudhamamarShaNam. `sa papAta hato bhUmau vishirA vibhujo balI. sambhagna iva vAtena bahushAkho vanaspatiH.. 7-92-55 (48225) sA visphurantI jvalitA vajravegasamA gadA'. hatvA shrutAyudhaM vIraM dharaNImanvapadyata.. 7-92-56 (48226) gadAM nivartitAM dR^iShTvA nihataM cha shrutAyudham. hAhAkAro mahAMstatra sainyAnAM samajAyata. svenAstreNa hataM dR^iShTvA shrutAyudhamarindamam.. 7-92-57 (48227) ayudhyamAnAya tataH keshavAya narAdhipa. kShiptA shrutAyudhenAtha tasmAttamavadhIdgadA.. 7-92-58 (48228) yathoktaM varuNenAjau tathA sa nidhanaM gataH. vyasushchApyapatadbhUmau prekShatAM sarvadhanvinAm.. 7-92-59 (48229) patamAnastu sa babhau parNAshAyAH priyaH sutaH. sambhagna iva vAtena bahushAkho vanaspatiH.. 7-92-60 (48230) tataH sarvANi sainyAni senAmukhyAshcha sarvashaH. prAdravanta hataM dR^iShTvA shrutAyudhamarindamam.. 7-92-61 (48231) tataH kAmbhojarAjasya putraH shUraH sudakShiNaH. abhyayAjjavanairashvaiH phalgunaM shatrusUdanam.. 7-92-62 (48232) tasya pArthaH sharAnsapta preShayAmAsa bhArata. te taM shUraM vinirbhidya prAvishandharaNItalam.. 7-92-63 (48233) so.atividdhaH sharaistIkShNairgANDIvapreShitairmR^idhe. arjunaM prativivyAdha dashabhiH ka~NkapatribhiH.. 7-92-64 (48234) vAsudevaM tribhirviddhvA punaH pArthaM cha pa~nchabhiH. tasya pArtho dhanushChittvA ketuM chichCheda mAriSha.. 7-92-65 (48235) bhallAbhyAM bhR^ishatIkShNAbhyAM taM cha vivyAdha pANDavaH. sa tu pArthaM tribhirviddhvA siMhanAdamathAnadat.. 7-92-66 (48236) sarvapArashavIM chaiva shaktiM shUraH sudakShiNaH. saghaNTAM prAhiNoddhorAM kruddho gANDIvadhanvane.. 7-92-67 (48237) sA jvalantI maholkeva tamAsAdya mahAratham. savisphuli~NgA nirbhidya nipapAta mahItale.. 7-92-68 (48238) shakyA tvabhihato gADhaM mUrchChayA.abhipariplutaH. samAshvAsya mahAtejAH sR^ikviNI parilelihan.. 7-92-69 (48239) taM chaturdashabhiH pArtho nArAchaiH ka~NkapatribhiH. sAshvadhvajadhanuHsUtaM vivyAdhAchintyavikramaH.. 7-92-70 (48240) rathaM chAnyaiH subahubhishchakre vishakalaM sharaiH. sudakShiNaM taM kAmbhojaM moghasa~Nkalpavikramam. bibheda hR^idi bANena pR^ithudhAreNa pANDavaH.. 7-92-71 (48241) sa bhinnavarmA srastA~NgaH prabhraShTamukuTA~NgadaH. papAtAbhimukhaH shUro yantramukta iva dhvajaH.. 7-92-72 (48242) gireH shikharajaH shrImAnsushAkhaH supratiShThitaH. nirbhagna iva vAtena karNikAro himAtyaye. vishIrNaH patito rAjA prasArya vipulau bhujau.. 7-92-73 (48243) shete sma nihato bhUmau kAmbhojAstaraNochitaH. mahArhAbharaNopetaH sAnumAniva parvataH.. 7-92-74 (48244) sudarshanIyastAmrAkShaH karNinA sa sudakShiNaH. putraH kAmbhojarAjasya pArthena vinipAtitaH.. 7-92-75 (48245) dhArayannagnisa~NkAshAM shirasA kA~nchanIM srajam. ashobhata mahAbAhurvyasurbhUmau nipAtitaH.. 7-92-76 (48246) tataH sarvANi sainyAni vyadravanta sutasya te. hataM shrutAyudhaM dR^iShTvA kAmbhojaM cha sudakShiNam.. .. 7-92-77 (48247) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe dvinavatitamo.adhyAyaH.. 92 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-92-15 teShAM saMyachChatAM vidhArayatAm.. 5-92-10 AchAryakaM shikShAm.. 5-92-28 ratheShubhiH adUrasthAyibhirbANaiH.. 5-92-54 kR^ityA abhichAradevatA.. 5-92-72 dhvajaH shakradhvajaH.. 5-92-92 dvinavatitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 093

.. shrIH ..

7.93. adhyAyaH 093

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

arjunena shrutAyuHprabhR^itInAM vadhaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-93-0 (48248) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-93-0x (4499) hate sudakShiNe rAjanvIre chaiva shrutAyudhe. javenAbhyadravanpArthaM kupitAH sainikAstava.. 7-93-1 (48249) abhIShAhAH shUrasenAH shibayo.atha vasAtayaH. abhyavarShaMstato rAja~nsharavarShairdhana~njayam.. 7-93-2 (48250) teShAM ShaShTishatAnanyAnprAmathnAtpANDavaH sharaiH. te sma bhItAH palAyante vyAghrAtkShudramR^igA iva.. 7-93-3 (48251) te nivR^ittAH punaH pArthaM sarvataH paryavArayan. raNe sapatnAnnighnantaM jigIShantaM parAnyudhi.. 7-93-4 (48252) teShAmApatatAM tUrNaM gANDIvapreShitaiH sharaiH. shirAMsi pAtayAmAsa bAhUMshchApi dhana~njayaH.. 7-93-5 (48253) shirobhiH pAtitaistatra bhUmirAsInnirantarA. abhrachChAyeva chaivAsIddhvA~NkShagR^idhrabalairyudhi.. 7-93-6 (48254) teShu tUtsAdyamAneShu krodhAmarShasamanvitau. srutAyushchAshrutAyushcha dhana~njayamayudhyatAm.. 7-93-7 (48255) balinau spardhinau vIrau kulajau bAhushAlinau. tAvenaM sharavarShANi savyadakShiNamasyatAm.. 7-93-8 (48256) tvarAyuktau maharAja prArthayAnau mahadyashaH. arjunasya vadhaprepsU putrArthe tava dhanvinau.. 7-93-9 (48257) tAvarjunaM sahasreNa patriNAM nataparvaNAm. pUrayAmAsatuH kruddhau taTAkaM jaladau yathA.. 7-93-10 (48258) shrutAyushcha tataH kruddhastomareNa dhana~njayam. AjaghAna rathashreShThaH pItena nishitena cha.. 7-93-11 (48259) so.atividdho balavatA shatruNA shatrukarshanaH. jagAma paramaM mohaM mohayankeshavaM raNe.. 7-93-12 (48260) etasminneva kAle tu so.ashrutAyurmahArathaH. shUlena bhR^ishatIkShNena tADayAmAsa pANDavam.. 7-93-13 (48261) kShate kShAraM sa hi dadau pANDavasya mahAtmanaH. pArtho.api bhR^ishasaMviddho dhvajayaShTiM samAshritaH.. 7-93-14 (48262) tataH sarvasya sainyasya tAvakasya vishAmpate. siMhanAdo mahAnAsIddhataM matvA dhana~njayam.. 7-93-15 (48263) kR^iShNashcha bhR^ishasantapto dR^iShTvA pArthaM vichetanam. AshvAsayatsuhR^idyAbhirvAgbhistatra dhana~njayam.. 7-93-16 (48264) tatastau rathinAM shreShThau labdhalakShau dhana~njayam. vAsudevaM cha vArShNeyaM sharavarShaiH samantataH.. 7-93-17 (48265) sachakrakUbararathaM sAshvadhvajapatAkinam. adR^ishyaM chakraturyuddhe tadadbhutamivAbhavat.. 7-93-18 (48266) pratyAshvastastu bIbhatsuH shanakairiva bhArata. pretarAjapuraM prApya punaH pratyAgato yathA.. 7-93-19 (48267) sa~nChannaM sharajAlena rathaM dR^iShTvA sakeshavam. shatrU chAbhimukhau dR^iShTvA dIpyamAnAvivAnalau.. 7-93-20 (48268) prAdushchakre tataH pArthaH shAkramastraM mahArathaH. tasmAdAsansahasrANi sharANAM nataparvaNAm.. 7-93-21 (48269) te jaghnustau maheShvAsau tAbhyAM muktAMshcha sAyakAn. vicherurAkAshagatAH pArthachApaviniHsR^itAH.. 7-93-22 (48270) pratihatya sarAMstUrNaM sharavegena pANDavaH. pratasthe tatratatraiva yodhayanvai mahArathAn.. 7-93-23 (48271) tau cha phalgunabANaughairvibAhushirasau kR^itau. vasudhAmanvapadyetAM vAtanunnAviva drumau.. 7-93-24 (48272) shrutAyuShashcha nidhanaM vadhashchevAshrutAyuShaH. lokavismApanamabhUtsamudrasyeva shoShaNam.. 7-93-25 (48273) tayoH padAnugAnhatvA punaH pa~nchashataM rathAn. pratyagAdbhAratIM senAM nighnanpArtho varAnvarAn.. 7-93-26 (48274) shrutAyuShaM cha nihataM prekShya chaivAshrutAyuSham. niyatAyushcha sa~Nkruddho dIrghAyushchaiva bhArata.. 7-93-27 (48275) putrau tayornarashreShThau kaunteyaM prati jagmatuH. kirantau vividhAnbANAnpitR^ivyasanakarshitau.. 7-93-28 (48276) tAvarjuno muhUrtena sharaiH sannataparvabhiH. praiShayatparamakruddho yamasya sadanaM prati.. 7-93-29 (48277) loDayantamanIkAni dvipaM padmasaro yathA. nAshaknuvanvArayituM pArthaM kShatriyapu~NgavAH.. 7-93-30 (48278) a~NgAstu gajasa~Nghaishcha pANDavaM paryavArayan. kruddhAH sahasrasho rAja~nshikShitA hastisAdinaH.. 7-93-31 (48279) duryodhanasamAdiShTAH ku~njaraiH parvatopamaiH. prAchyAshcha dAkShiNAtyAshcha kali~NgapramukhA nR^ipAH.. 7-93-32 (48280) teShAmApatatAM shIghraM gANDIvapreShitaiH sharaiH. nichakarta shirAMsyugro bAhUnapi subhUShaNAn.. 7-93-33 (48281) taiH shirobhirmahI kIrNA bAhubhishcha sahA~NgadaiH. babhau kanakapAShANA bhujagairiva saMvR^itA.. 7-93-34 (48282) bAhavo vishikhaishChinnAH shirAMsyunmathitAni cha. patamAnAnyadR^ishyanta drumebhya iva pakShiNaH.. 7-93-35 (48283) sharaiH sahasrasho viddhA dvipAH prasR^itashoNitAH. adR^ishyantAdrayaH kAle gairikAmbusravA iva.. 7-93-36 (48284) nihatAH sherate smAnye bIbhatsornishitaiH sharaiH. gajapR^iShThagatA mlechChA nAnAvikR^itadarshanAH.. 7-93-37 (48285) nAnAveShadharA rAjannAnAshastraughasaMvR^itAH. rudhireNAnuliptA~NgA bhAnti chitraiH sharairhatAH.. 7-93-38 (48286) shoNitaM nirvamanti sma dvipAH pArthasharAhatAH. sahasrashashChinnagAtrAH sArohAH sapadAnugAH.. 7-93-39 (48287) chukrushushcha nipetushcha babhramushchApare dishaH. bhR^ishaM trastAshcha bahavaH svAneva mamR^idurgajAH.. 7-93-40 (48288) sottarAyudhinashchaiva dvipAstIkShNaviShopamAH. vidantyasuramAyAM ye sughorA ghorachakShuShaH.. 7-93-41 (48289) yavanAH pAradAshchaiva shakAshcha saha bAhlikaiH. kAkavarNA durAchArAH strIlolAH kalahapriyAH.. 7-93-42 (48290) drAviDAstatra yudhyante mattamAta~NgavikramAH. goyoniprabhavA mlechChAH kAlakalpAH prahAriNaH.. 7-93-43 (48291) dArvAtisArA daradAH puNDrAshchaiva sahasrashaH. te na shakyAH sma sa~NkhyAtuM vrAtAH shatasahasrashaH.. 7-93-44 (48292) abhyavarShanta te sarve pANDavaM nishitaiH sharaiH. avAkiraMshcha te mlechChA nAnAyuddhavishAradAH.. 7-93-45 (48293) teShAmapi sasarjAshu sharavR^iShTiM dhana~njayaH. sR^iShTistathAvidhA hyAsIchChalabhAnAmivAyatiH.. 7-93-46 (48294) abhrachChAyAmiva sharaiH sainye kR^itvA dhana~njayaH. muNDArdhamuNDA~njaTilAnashuchI~njaTilAnanAn. mlechChAnashAtayatsarvAnsametAnastratejasA.. 7-93-47 (48295) sharaishcha shatasho viddhAste sa~NghA girichAriNaH. prAdravanta raNe bhItA girigahvaravAsinaH.. 7-93-48 (48296) gajAshvasAdimlechChAnAM patitAnAM shitaiH sharaiH. bakAH ka~NkA vR^ikA bhUmAvapibanrudhiraM mudA.. 7-93-49 (48297) pattyashvarathanAgaishcha prachChannakR^itasa~NkramAm. sharavarShaplavAM ghorAM keshashaivalashAdvalAm. prAvartayannadImugrAM shoNitaughatara~NgiNIm.. 7-93-50 (48298) ChinnA~NgulIkShudramatsyAM yugAnte kAlasannibhAm. prAkarodgajasambAdhAM nadImuttarashoNitAm.. 7-93-51 (48299) dehebhyo rAjaputrANAM nAgAshvarathasAdinAm. yathA sthalaM cha nimnaM cha na syAdvarShati vAsave. tathA.a.asItpR^ithivI sarvA shoNitena pariplutA.. 7-93-52 (48300) ShaTsahasrAnhayAnvIrAnpunardashashatAnvarAn. prAhiNonmR^ityulokAya kShatriyAnkShatriyarShabhaH.. 7-93-53 (48301) sharaiH sahasrasho viddhA vidhivatkalpitA dvipAH. sherate
