bhUmimAsAdya shailA vajrahatA iva.. 7-93-54 (48302) sa vAjirathamAta~NgAnnighnanvyacharadarjunaH. prabhinna iva mAta~Ngo mR^idgannalavanaM yathA.. 7-93-55 (48303) bhuridrumalatAgulmaM shuShkendhanatR^iNolapam. nirdahedanalo.araNyaM yathA vAyusamIritaH.. 7-93-56 (48304) senAraNyaM tava tathA kR^iShNAnilasamIritaH. sharArchiradahatkruddhaH pANDavo.agnirdhana~njayaH.. 7-93-57 (48305) shUnyAnkurvanrathopasthAnmAnavaiH saMstaranmahIm. prAnR^ityadiva sambAdhe chApahasto dhana~njayaH. vajrakalpaiH sharairbhUmiM kurvannuttarashoNitAm.. 7-93-58 (48306) `tataH prAvartata nadI shoNitaughatara~NgiNI. narAshvadvipakAyebhyaH parvatebhya ivApagA.. 7-93-59 (48307) asthisharkarasambAdhA dhvajavR^ikShA rathahadA. sa~nChinnashIrShapANANA hastihastamahAgrahA.. 7-93-60 (48308) mAMsamajjAsthipa~NkADhyAM hatAshvamakarAkulA. uShNIShaphenasa~nChannA sharaghorajhaShAkulA.. 7-93-61 (48309) rudrasyAkrIDasadR^ishIM bhUmiM kurvanvibhIShaNAm'. prAvishadbhAratIM senAM sa~Nkruddho vai dhana~njayaH.. 7-93-62 (48310) taM shrutAyustathAmbaShTho vrajamAnaM nyavArayat.. 7-93-63 (48311) tasyArjunaH sharaistIkShNaiH ka~NkapatraparichChadaiH. nyapAtayaddhayA~nshIghraM yatamAnasya mAriSha. dhanushchAsyAparaishChittvA sharaiH pArtho vichakrame.. 7-93-64 (48312) ambaShThastu gadAM gR^ihya krodhaparyAkulekShaNaH. AsasAda raNe pArthaM keshavaM cha mahAratham.. 7-93-65 (48313) tataH sampraharanvIro gadAmudyamya bhArata. rathamAvArya gadayA keshavaM samatADayat.. 7-93-66 (48314) gadayA tADitaM dR^iShTvA keshavaM paravIrahA. arjuno.atha bhR^ishaM kruddhaH so.ambaShThaM prati bhArata.. 7-93-67 (48315) tataH sharairhemapu~NkhaiH sagadaM rathinAM varam. ChAdayAmAsa samare meghaH sUryamivoditam.. 7-93-68 (48316) athAparaiH sharaishchApi gadAM tasya mahAtmanaH. achUrNayattadA pArthastidadbhutamivAbhavat.. 7-93-69 (48317) atha tAM patitAM dR^iShTvA gR^ihyAnyAM cha mahAgadAm. arjunaM vAsudevaM cha punaH punaratADayat.. 7-93-70 (48318) tasyArjunaH kShuraprAbhyAM sagadAvudyatau bhujau. chichChedendradhvajAkArau shirashchAnyena patriNA.. 7-93-71 (48319) sa papAta hato rAjanvasudhAmanunAdayan. indradhvaja ivotsR^iShTo yantranirmuktabandhanaH.. 7-93-72 (48320) ambaShThe tu tadA bhagne tava sainyamabhajyata.. 7-93-73 (48321) rathAnIkAvagADhashcha vAraNAshvashatairvR^itaH. adR^ishyata padA pArtho ghanaiH sUrya ivAvR^itaH.. 7-93-74 (48322) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdhashadivasayuddhe trinavatitamo.adhyAyaH.. 93 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-93-43 goyoniprabhavA nandinyAM jAtAH.. 5-93-46 sR^iShTiH saMsR^iShTiH.. 5-93-47 jaTilAnanAn jaTilAni rUDhashmashrUNyAnanAni yeShAm.. 5-93-50 prachChannena prachChAdanena kR^ito rachitaH sa~Nkamo yasyAm.. 5-93-51 uttarashoNittAM shoNitapradhAnAm.. 5-93-53 hayAn ashvArohAn.. 5-93-93 trinavatitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 094

.. shrIH ..

7.94. adhyAyaH 094

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

arjunAdbhItena duryodhanena droNametya tadupAlambhapUrvakaM jayadrathamprati shochanam.. 1 .. droNena duryodhanasya mantrochchAraNapUrvakaM kavachamAbadhyArjunena saha yuddhAya preShaNam.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-94-0 (48323) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-94-0x (4500) tataH praviShTe kaunteye sindhurAjajighAMsayA. droNAnIkaM vinirbhidya bhojAnIkaM cha dustaram.. 7-94-1 (48324) kAmbhojasya cha dAyAde hate rAjansudakShiNe. shrutAyuShi cha vikrAnte nihate savyasAchinA.. 7-94-2 (48325) vipradruteShvanIkeShu vidhvasteShu samantataH. prabhagnaM svabalaM dR^iShTvA putraste droNamabhyayAt.. 7-94-3 (48326) tvarannekarathenaiva sametya droNamabravIt. gataH sa puruShavyAghraH pramathyaitAM mahAchamUm.. 7-94-4 (48327) atha buddhyA samIkShasva kinnu kAryamanantaram. arjunasya vighAtAya dAruNe.asmi~njanakShaye.. 7-94-5 (48328) yathA sa puruShavyAghro na hanyeta jayadrathaH. tathA vidhatsva bhadraM te tvaM hi naH paramA gatiH.. 7-94-6 (48329) asau dhana~njayAgnirhi kopamArutachoditaH. senAkakShaM dahati me vahniH kakShamivotthitaH.. 7-94-7 (48330) atikrAnte hi kaunteye bhittvA sainyaM parantapa. jayadrathasya goptAraH saMshayaM paramaM gatAH.. 7-94-8 (48331) sthirA buddhirnarendrANamAsIdbrahmavidAM vara. nAtikramiShyati droNaM jAtu jIvandhana~njayaH.. 7-94-9 (48332) yo.asau pAtho vyatikrAnto miShataste mahAdyute. sarvaM hyadyAturaM manye nedamasti balaM mama.. 7-94-10 (48333) jAnAmi tvAM mahAbhAga pANDavAnAM hite ratam. tato muhyAmi cha brahmankAryavattAM vichintayan.. 7-94-11 (48334) yathAshakti cha te brahmanvardhayanvR^ittimuttamAm. prINAmi cha yathAshakti tachcha tvaM nAvabudhyase.. 7-94-12 (48335) asmAnna tvaM sadA bhaktAnichChasyamitavikrama. pANDavAnsatataM prINAsyAsmAkaM vipriye ratAn.. 7-94-13 (48336) asmAnevopajIvaMstvamasmAkaM vipriye rataH. na hyahaM tvAM vijAnAmi madhudigdhamiva kShuram.. 7-94-14 (48337) `nahyahaM tvAM vijAnAmi sarvaM maNDUkarAviNam'. nAdAsyachchedvaraM mahyaM bhavAnpANDavanigrahe. nAvArayiShyaM gachChantamahaM sindhupatiM gR^ihAn.. 7-94-15 (48338) mayA tvAshaMsamAnena tvattastrANamabuddhinA. AshvAsitaH sindhupatirmohAddattashcha mR^ityave.. 7-94-16 (48339) yamadaMShTrAntaraM prApto muchyetApi hi mAnavaH. nArjunasya vashaM prApto muchyetAjau jayadrathaH.. 7-94-17 (48340) sa tathA kuru shoNashva yathA muchyeta saindhavaH. mama chArtapralApAnAM mAkrudhaH pAhi saindhavam.. 7-94-18 (48341) droNa uvAcha. 7-94-19x (4501) nAbhyasUyAmi te vAkyamashvatthAmnA.asi me samaH. satyaM tu te pravakShyAmi tajjuShasva vishAmpate.. 7-94-19 (48342) sArathiH pravaraH kR^iShNaH shIghrAshchAsya hayottamAH. alpaM cha vivaraM kR^itvA pUrNaM yAti dhana~njayaH.. 7-94-20 (48343) kiM na pashyasi bANaughAnkroshamAtre kirITinaH. pashchAdrathasya patitAnkShiptA~nshIghraM hi gachChataH.. 7-94-21 (48344) na tAbaM shIghrayAne.adya samartho vayasAnvitaH. senAmukhe cha pArthAnAmetadbalamupasthitam.. 7-94-22 (48345) yudhiShThirashcha me grAhyo miShatAM sarvadhanvinAm. evaM mayA pratij~nAtaM kShatramadhye mahAbhuja.. 7-94-23 (48346) dhana~njayena chotsR^iShTo vartate pramukhe nR^ipa. tasmAdvyUhamukhaM hitvA nAhaM yAsyAmi phalgunam.. 7-94-24 (48347) tulyAbhijanakarmANaM shatrumekaM sahAyavAn. gatvA yodhaya mA bhaistvaM tvaM hyasya jagataH patiH.. 7-94-25 (48348) rAjA shUraH kR^itI dakSho vairamutpAdya pANDavaiH. vIraH svayaM prayAhyAshu yatra pArtho dhana~njayaH.. 7-94-26 (48349) duryodhana uvAcha. 7-94-27x (4502) kathaM tvAmapyatikrAntaH sarvashastrabhR^itAM varam. dhana~njayo mayA shakya AchArya pratibAdhitum.. 7-94-27 (48350) api shakyo raNe jetuM vajrahastaH purandaraH. nArjunaH samare shakyo jetuM parapura~njayaH.. 7-94-28 (48351) yena bhojashcha hArdikyo bhavAMshcha tridashopamaH. astrapratApena jitau shrutAyushcha nibarhitaH.. 7-94-29 (48352) sudakShiNashcha nihataH sa cha rAjA shrutAyudhaH. shrutAyushchAshrutAyushcha bhlechChAshchAyutasho hatAH.. 7-94-30 (48353) taM kathaM pANDavaM yuddhe dahantamiva pAvakam. pratiyotsyAmi durdharShaM tanmamAchakShva sattam. 7-94-31 (48354) kShamaM chenmanyase yuddhaM mama tenAdya shAdhi mAm. paravAnasmi bhavataH preShyavadrakSha me yashaH.. 7-94-32 (48355) droNa uvAcha. 7-94-33x (4503) satyaM vadasi kauravya durAdharSho dhana~njayaH. ahaM tu tatkariShyAmi yathainaM prasahiShyasi.. 7-94-33 (48356) adbhutaM chAdya pashyantu loke sarvadhanurdharAH. viShaktaM tvayi kaunteyaM vAsudevasya pashyataH.. 7-94-34 (48357) eSha te kavachaM rAjaMstathA badhnAmi kA~nchanam. yathA na bANA nAstrANi prahariShyanti te raNe.. 7-94-35 (48358) yadi tvAM sAsurasurAH sayakShoragarAkShasAH. yodhayanti trayo lokAH sanarA nAsti te bhayam.. 7-94-36 (48359) na kR^iShNo na cha kaunteyo na chAnyaH shastrabhR^idraNe. sharAnarpayituM kashchitkavache tava shakShyati.. 7-94-37 (48360) sa tvaM kavachamAsthAya kruddhamadya raNe.arjunam. tvaramANaH svayaM yAhi na tvA.asau viShahiShyati.. 7-94-38 (48361) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-94-39x (4504) evamuktvA tvarandroNaH spR^iShTvAmbho varma bhAsvaram. AbabandhAdbhutatamaM japanmantraM yathAvidhi.. 7-94-39 (48362) raNe tasminsumahati vijayasya sutasya te. visiShmApayiShurlokAnvidyayA brahmavittamaH.. 7-94-40 (48363) droNa uvAcha. 7-94-41x (4505) karotu svasti te brahmA svasti kurvantu brAhmaNAH. sarIsR^ipAshcha ye shreShThAstebhyaste svasti bhArata.. 7-94-41 (48364) yayAtirnahuShashchaiva dhundhumAro bhagIrathaH. tubhyaM rAjarShayaH sarve svasti kurvantu te sadA.. 7-94-42 (48365) svasti te.astvekapAdebhyo bahupAdebhya eva cha. svastyastvapAdakebhyashcha nityaM tava mahAraNe.. 7-94-43 (48366) svAhA svadhA shachI chaiva svasti kurvantu te sadA. lakShmIrarundhatI chaiva kurutAM svasti te.anagha.. 7-94-44 (48367) amito devalashchaiva vishvAmitrastathA~NgirAH. vasiShThaH kashyapashchaiva svasti kurvantu te nR^ipa.. 7-94-45 (48368) dhAtA vidhAtA lokesho dishashcha sadigIshvarAH. svasti te.adya prayachChantu kArtikeyashcha ShaNmukhaH.. 7-94-46 (48369) `yena devAH sakR^idbhagnAH sa~Ngrame tArakAmaye. dhR^itAH sa cha hataH shUro hyavadhyo devatAgaNaiH.. 7-94-47 (48370) vivasvAnkurutAM svasti tathA vaivasvato yamaH. pArShidA vashagA yasya svasti tubhyaM prayachChatu'.. 7-94-48 (48371) diggajAshchaiva chatvAraH kShitishcha gaganaM grahAH. `dishashcha vidishashchaiva siddhA lokahite ratAH. svasti kurvantu te nityaM mantreNAnena rastutAH'.. 7-94-49 (48372) adhastAddharaNIM yo.asau sadA dhArayate nR^ipa. sheShashcha pannagashreShThaH svasti tubhyaM prayachChatu.. 7-94-50 (48373) gAndhAre yudhi vikramya nirjite pAkashAsaneH. purA vR^itreNa daityena bhinnadehAH sahasrashaH.. 7-94-51 (48374) hR^itatejobalAH srave tadA sendrA divaukasaH. brahmANaM sharaNaM jagmurvR^itrAdbhItAM mahAsurAt.. 7-94-52 (48375) devA UchuH. 7-94-53x (4506) pramArditAnAM vR^itreNa devAnAM devasattama. gatirbhava surashreShTha trAhi no mahato bhayAt.. 7-94-53 (48376) atha pArshve sthitaM viShNuM shakrAdIMshcha surottamAn. prAha pathyamidaM vAkyaM viShaNNAnsurasattamAn.. 7-94-54 (48377) rakShyA me satataM devAH sahendrAH sadvijAtayaH. tvaShTuH sudurdharaM tejo yena vR^itro vinirmitaH.. 7-94-55 (48378) tvaShTrA purA tapastaptvA varShAyutashataM tadA. vR^itro vinirmito devAH prApyAnuj~nAM maheshvarAt.. 7-94-56 (48379) shaMkarasya prasAdAdvai hanyAddevaripurbalI. nAgatvA shaMkarasthAnaM bhagavAndR^ishyate haraH.. 7-94-57 (48380) dR^iShTvA jeShyatha vR^itraM taM kShipraM gachChata mandaram. yatrAste tapasAM yonirdakShayaj~navinAshanaH.. 7-94-58 (48381) pinAkI sarvabhUtesho bhaganetranipAtanaH. te gatvA sahitA devA brahmaNA saha mandaram.. 7-94-59 (48382) apashyaMstejasAM rAshiM sUryakoTisamaprabham. so.abravItsvAgataM devA brUta kiM karavANyaham.. 7-94-60 (48383) amoghaM darshanaM mahyaM kAmaprAptirato.astu vaH. evamuktAstu te sarve pratyuchUstaM divaukasaH.. 7-94-61 (48384) hR^itaujasAM no vR^itreNa gatirbhava divaukasAm. mUrtIrIkShasva no deva prahArairjarjarIkR^itAH. sharaNaM tvAM prapannAH sma gatirbhava maheshvara.. 7-94-62 (48385) sharve uvAcha. viditaM vo yathA devAH kR^ityeyaM sumahAbalA. 7-94-63 (48386) tvaShTustejobhavA ghorA durnivAryA.akR^itAtmabhiH.. avashyaM tu mayA kAryaM sAhyaM sarvadivaukasAm. 7-94-64 (48387) mamedaM gAtrajaM shakra kavachaM gR^ihya bhAsvaram.. badhAnAnena mantreNa mAnasena sureshvara. 7-94-65 (48388) vadhAyAsuramukhyasya vR^itrasya suraghAtinaH.. 7-94-66 (48389) droNa uvAcha. 7-94-66x (4507) ityuktvA varadaH prAdAdvarma tanmantrameva cha. sa tena varmaNA guptaH prAyAdvR^itrachamUM prati.. 7-94-66 (48390) nAnAvidhaishcha shastraughaiH pAtyamAnairmahAraNe. na sandhiH shakyate bhettuM varmabandhasya tasya tu.. 7-94-67 (48391) sa tena varmaNA gupto vR^itraM devaripuM tadA. jaghAna samare.abhItaH shakro devAgraNIstadA.. 7-94-68 (48392) taM cha mantramayaM bandhaM varma chA~Ngirase dadau. a~NgirAH prAha putrasya mantraj~nasya bR^ihaspateH. bR^ihaspatirathovAcha agniveshyAya dhImate.. 7-94-69 (48393) agniveshyo mama prAdAttena badhnAmi varma te. tavAhya deharakShArthaM mantreNa nR^ipasattama.. 7-94-70 (48394) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-94-71x (4508) evamuktvA tato droNastava putraM mahAdyutim. punare vachaH prAha shanairAchAryapu~NgavaH.. 7-94-71 (48395) brahmasUtreNa badhnAmi kathachaM tava bhArata. hiraNyagarbheNa yathA baddhaM viShNoH purA raNe.. 7-94-72 (48396) yathA cha brahmaNA baddhaM sa~NgrAme tArakAmaye. shakrasya kavachaM divyaM tathA badhnAmyahaM tava.. 7-94-73 (48397) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-94-74x (4509) baddhA tu kavachaM tasya mantreNa vidhipUrvakam. preShayAmAsa rAjAnaM yuddhAya mahate dvijaH.. 7-94-74 (48398) sa sannaddho mahAbAhurAchAryeNa mahAtmanA. `prasthitaH sahasA rAjanyatra yAto dhana~njayaH'.. 7-94-75 (48399) rathAnAM cha sahasreNa trigartAnAM prahAriNAm. tathA dantisahasreNa mattAnAM vIryashAlinAm.. 7-94-76 (48400) ashvAnAM niyutenaiva tathA.anyaishcha mahArathaiH. vR^itaH prAyAnmahAbAhurarjunasya rathaM prati.. 7-94-77 (48401) nAnAvAditraghoSheNa yathA vairochanistathA.. 7-94-78 (48402) tataH shabdo mahAnAsItsainyAnAM tava bhArata. agAdhaM prasthitaM dR^iShTvA samudramiva kauravam.. .. 7-94-79 (48403) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe chaturnavatitamo.adhyAyaH.. 94 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-94-10 Aturamanavaspitam.. 5-94-12 nAvabudhyase na smarasi.. 5-94-13 nechChasi nAnurudhyate.. 5-94-14 vachasA lalitaM sadA. hR^idayena bhR^ishaM tIkShNaM iti ka. pAThaH.. 5-94-35 te tvAm.. 5-94-49 chatvAra airAvatavAmanA~njanasArvabhaumAH.. 5-94-56 anuj~nAM varam.. 5-94-57 hanyAddhantumarhati.. 5-94-65 mAnasena manasochchAraNIyena.. 5-94-72 brahmasUtreNa brahmaNA sUchiteno padeshena.. 5-94-94 chaturnavatitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 095

.. shrIH ..

7.95. adhyAyaH 095

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

rAj~nAM dvandvIbhUya yuddhAya samAgamaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-95-0 (48404) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-95-0x (4510) praviShTayormahArAja pArthavArShNeyayo raNe. duryodhane prayAte cha pR^iShThataH puruSharShabhe.. 7-95-1 (48405) javenAbhyadravandroNaM mahatA niHsvanena cha. pANDavAH somakaiH sArdhaM tato yuddhamavartata.. 7-95-2 (48406) tadyuddhamabhavattIvraM tumulaM romaharShaNam. kurUNAM pANDavAnAM cha vyUhasya purato.adbhutam.. 7-95-3 (48407) rAjankadAchinnAsmAbhirdR^iShTaM tAdR^i~Nka cha shrutam. yAdR^i~Nmadhyagate sUrye yuddhamAsIdvishAmpate.. 7-95-4 (48408) dhR^iShTadyumnamukhAH pArthA vyUDhAnIkAH prahAriNaH. droNasya sainyaM te sarve sharavarShairavAkiran.. 7-95-5 (48409) vayaM droNaM puraskR^itya sarvashastrabhR^itAM varam. pArShatapramukhAnpArthAnabhyavarShAma sAyakaiH.. 7-95-6 (48410) mahAmeghAvivodIrNau mishravAtau himAtyaye. senAgre prachakAshete ruchire rathabhUShite.. 7-95-7 (48411) sametya tu mahAsene chakraturvegamuttamam. jAhnavIyamune nadyau prAvR^iShIvolbaNodake.. 7-95-8 (48412) nAnAshastrapurovAto dvipAshvarathasaMvR^itaH. gadAvidyunmahAraudraH sa~NgrAmajalado mahAn.. 7-95-9 (48413) bhAradvAjAnilodbhUtaH sharadhArAsahasravAn. abhyavarShanmahAraudraM pANDusenAgnimuddhatam.. 7-95-10 (48414) samudramiva gharmAnte vishanghoro mahAnilaH. vyakShobhayadanIkAni pANDavAnAM dvijottamaH.. 7-95-11 (48415) te.api sarvaprayatnena droNameva samAdravan. bibhitsanto mahAsetuM vAryoghAH prabalA iva.. 7-95-12 (48416) vArayAmAsa tAndroNo jalaughamachalo yathA. pANDavAnsamare kruddhAnpA~nchAlAMshcha sakekayAn.. 7-95-13 (48417) athApare cha rAjAnaH parivR^itya samantataH. mahAbalA raNe shUrAH pA~nchAlAnanvavArayan.. 7-95-14 (48418) tato raNe naravyAghraH pArShataH pANDavaiH saha. sa~njaghAnAsakR^iddroNaM bibhitsurarivAhinIm.. 7-95-15 (48419) yathaiva sharavarShANi droNo varShati pArShate. tathaiva sharavarShANi dhR^iShTadyumno.apyavarShata.. 7-95-16 (48420) sanistriMshapurovAtaH shaktiprAsarShTisaMvR^itaH. jyAvidyuchchApasaMhAdo dhR^iShTadyumnabalAhakaH.. 7-95-17 (48421) sharadhArAshmavarShANi vyasR^ijatsarvato disham. nighnanrathavarAshvaughAnplAvayAmAsa vAhinIm.. 7-95-18 (48422) yaMyamArchChachCharairdroNaH pANDavAnAM rathavrajam. tatastataH sharairdroNamapAkarShata pArShataH.. 7-95-19 (48423) tathA tu yatamAnasya droNasya yudhi bhArata. dhR^iShTadyumnaM samAsAdya tridhA sainyamabhidyata.. 7-95-20 (48424) bhojameke.abhyavartanta jalasandhaM tathA.apare. pANDavairhanyamAnAshcha droNamevApare yayuH.. 7-95-21 (48425) sa~NghaTTayati sainyAni droNastu rathinAM varaH. vyadhamachchApi tAnyasya dhR^iShTadyumno mahArathaH.. 7-95-22 (48426) dhArtarAShTrAstathA bhUtA vadhyante pANDusR^i~njayaiH. agopAH pashavo.araNye bahubhiH shvApadairiva.. 7-95-23 (48427) kAlaH sma grasate yodhAndhR^iShTadyumnena mohitAn. sa~NgrAme tumule tasminniti sammenire janAH.. 7-95-24 (48428) kunR^ipasya yathA rAShTraM durbhikShavyAdhitaskaraiH. drAvyate tadvadApannA pANDavaistava vAhinI.. 7-95-25 (48429) arkarashmivimishreShu shastreShu kavacheShu cha. chakShUMShi pratyahanyanta sainyena rajasA tathA.. 7-95-26 (48430) tridhA bhUteShu sainyeShu vadhyamAneShu pANDavaiH. amarShitastato droNaH pA~nchAlAnvyadhamachCharaiH.. 7-95-27 (48431) mR^idgatastAnyanIkAni nighnatashchApi sAyakaiH. babhUva rUpaM droNasya kAlAgneriva dIpyataH.. 7-95-28 (48432) rathaM nAgaM hayaM chApi pattinashcha vishAmpate. ekaikeneShuNA sa~Nkhye nirbibheda mahArathaH.. 7-95-29 (48433) pANQDavAnAM tu sainyeShu nAsti kashchitsa bhArata. dadhAra yo raNe bANAndroNachApachyutAnprabho.. 7-95-30 (48434) tatpachyamAnamarkeNa droNasAyakatApitam. babhrAma pArShataM sainyaM tatratatraiva bhArata.. 7-95-31 (48435) `hanyamAnaM tu tatsainyaM bhAradvAjena sarvataH. sharairagnishikhAkArairdahyate bharatarShabha'.. 7-95-32 (48436) tathaiva pArShatenApi kAlyamAnaM balaM tava. abhavatsarvato dIptaM shuShkaM vanamivAgninA.. 7-95-33 (48437) bAdhyamAneShu sainyeShu droNapArShatasAyakaiH. tyaktvA prANAnparaM shaktyA yudhyante svargalipsavaH.. 7-95-34 (48438) tAvakAnAM pareShAM cha yudhyatAM bharatarShabha. nAsItkashchinmahArAja yo.atyAkShItsaMyugaM bhayAt.. 7-95-35 (48439) bhImasenaM tu kaunteyaM sodaryAH paryavArayan. viviMshatishchitraseno vikarNashcha mahArathaH.. 7-95-36 (48440) vindAnuvindAvAvantyau kShemadhUrtishcha vIryavAn. trayANAM tava putrANAM traya evAnuyAyinaH.. 7-95-37 (48441) bAhlIkarAjastejasvI kulaputro mahArathaH. sahasenaH sahAmAtyo draupadeyAnavArayat.. 7-95-38 (48442) shaibyo govAsano rAjA yodhairdashashatAvaraiH. kAshyasyAbhibhuvaH putraM parAkrAntamavArayat.. 7-95-39 (48443) ajAtashatruM kaunteyaM jvalantamiva pAvakam. madrANAmIshvaraH shalyo rAjA rAjAnamAvR^iNot. 7-95-40 (48444) duHshAsanastvavasthApya svamanIkamamarShaNaH. sAtyakiM prayayau kruddhaH shUro rathavaraM yudhi.. 7-95-41 (48445) svakenAhamanIkena sannaddhaH kavachAvR^itaH. chatuHshatairmaheShvAsaishchekitAnamavArayam.. 7-95-42 (48446) shakunistu sahAnIko mAdrIputrAvavArayat. gAndhArakaiH saptashataishchApashaktyasipANibhiH.. 7-95-43 (48447) vindAnuvindAvAvantyau virATaM matsyamArchChatAm. prANAMstaktvA maheShvAsau mitrArthe.abhyudyatAyudhau.. 7-95-44 (48448) shikhaNDinaM yAj~naseniM rundhAnamaparAjitam. bAhlIkaH pratisaMyattaH parAkrAntamavArayat.. 7-95-45 (48449) dhR^iShTadyumnaM tu pA~nchAlyaM krUraiH sArdhaM prabhadrakaiH. AvantyaH sahasauvIraiH kruddharUpamavArayat.. 7-95-46 (48450) ghaTotkachaM tathA shUraM rAkShasaM krUrakarmiNam. alAmudho.adravattUrNaM kruddhamAyAntamAhave.. 7-95-47 (48451) alambusaM rAkShasendraM kuntibhojo mahArathaH. sainyena mahatA yuktaH kruddharUpamavArayat.. 7-95-48 (48452) saindhavaH pR^iShThatastvAsItsarvasainyasya bhArata. rakShitaH parameShvAsaiH kR^ipaprabhR^itibhI rathaiH.. 7-95-49 (48453) tasyAstAM chakrarakShau dvau saindhavasya bR^ihattamau. drauNirdakShiNato rAjansUtaputrashcha vAmataH.. 7-95-50 (48454) pR^iShThagopAstu tasyAsansaumadattipurogamAH. kR^ipashcha vR^iShasenashcha shalaH shalyashcha durjayaH.. 7-95-51 (48455) nItimanto maheShvAsAH sarve yuddhavishAradAH. saindhavasya vidhAyaivaM rakShAM yuyudhire tataH.. .. 7-95-52 (48456) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe pa~nchanavatitamo.adhyAyaH.. 95 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-95-7 himAtyaye shishire. senAgre pradhAne sene.. 5-95-18 plAvayAmAsa vidrAvitavAn.. 5-95-19 apAkarShata vyAvartitavAn.. 5-95-22 sa~NghaTTayati sammelayati.. 5-95-39 kAshyasya kAshirAjasya.. 5-95-46 Avantyo.anyaH.. 5-95-95 pa~nchanavatitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 096

.. shrIH ..

7.96. adhyAyaH 096

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

rAj~nAM dvandvayuddhavarNanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-96-0 (48457) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-96-0x (4511) rAjansa~NgrAmamAshcharyaM shR^iNu kIrtayato mama. kurUNAM pANDavAnAM cha yathA yuddhamavartata.. 7-96-1 (48458) bhAradvAjaM samAsAdya vyUhasya pramukhe sthitam. ayodhayanraNe pArthA droNAnIkaM bibhitsavaH.. 7-96-2 (48459) rakShamANaH svathaM vyUhaM droNo.api saha sainikaiH. ayodhayadraNe pArthAnprArthayAno mahadyashaH.. 7-96-3 (48460) vindAnuvindAvAvantyau virATaM dashabhiH sharaiH. ayodhayadraNe pArthAnprArthayAno mahadyashaH.. 7-96-4 (48461) vindAnuvindAvAvantyau virATaM dashabhiH sharaiH. parAkrAntau parAkramya yodhayAmAsa sAnugau.. 7-96-5 (48462) teShAM yuddhaM samabhavaddAruNaM shoNitodakam. siMhasya dvipamukhyAbhyAM prabhinnAbhyAM yathA vane.. 7-96-6 (48463) bAhlIkaM rabhasaM yuddhe yAj~nasenirmahAbalaH. Ajaghne vishikhaistIkShNairghorairmarmAsthibhedibhiH.. 7-96-7 (48464) bAhlIko yAj~naseniM tu hemapu~NkhaiH shilAshitaiH. AjaghAna bhR^ishaM kruddho navabhirnataparvabhiH.. 7-96-8 (48465) tadyuddhamabhavaddhoraM sharashaktisamAkulam. bhIrUNAM trAsajananaM shUrANAM harShavardhanam.. 7-96-9 (48466) tAbhyAM tatra sharairmuktairantarikShaM dishastathA. abhavatsaMvR^itaM sarvaM na prAj~nAyata ki~nchana.. 7-96-10 (48467) shaibyo govAsano yuddhe kAshyaputraM mahAratham. sasainyo yodhayAmAsa gajaH pratigajaM yathA.. 7-96-11 (48468) bAhlIkarAjaH sa~Nkruddho draupadeyAnmahArathAn. manaH pa~nchendriyANIva shushubhe yodhayanraNe.. 7-96-12 (48469) ayodhayaMste subhR^ishaM taM sharaughaiH samantataH. indriyANi yathA dehaM shashvaddehavatAM vara.. 7-96-13 (48470) vArShNeyaM sAtyakiM yuddhe putro duHshAsanastava. Ajaghne sAyakaistIkShNairnavabhirnataparvabhiH.. 7-96-14 (48471) so.atividdho balavatA maheShvAsena dhanvinA. IShanmUrchChAM jagAmAshu sAtyakiH satyavikramaH.. 7-96-15 (48472) samAshvastastu vArShNeyastava putraM mahAratham. vivyAdha dashabhistUrNaM sAyakaiH ka~NkapatribhiH.. 7-96-16 (48473) tAvanyonyaM dR^iDhaM viddhAvanyonyasharapIDitau. rajetuH samare rAjanpuShpitAviva kiMshukau.. 7-96-17 (48474) alambusastu sa~NkruddhaH kR^intibhojasharArditaH. ashobhata bhR^ishaM lakShmyA puShpADhya iva kiMshukaH.. 7-96-18 (48475) kuntibhojaM tato rakSho viddhvA bahubhirAyasaiH. anadadbhairavaM nAdaM vAhinyAH pramukhe tava.. 7-96-19 (48476) tatastau samare shUrau yodhayantau parasparam. dadR^ishuH sarvasainyAni shakrajambhau yathA purA.. 7-96-20 (48477) shakuniM rabhasaM yuddhe kR^itavairaM cha bhArata. mAdrIputrau cha saMrabdhau sharaishchArdayatAM bhR^isham.. 7-96-21 (48478) tumulaH sa mahAnrAjanprAvartata janakShayaH. tvayA sa~njanito.atyarthaM karNena cha vivardhitaH.. 7-96-22 (48479) rakShitastava putraishcha krodhamUlo hutAshanaH. ya imAM pR^ithivIM rAjandagdhuM sarvAM samudyataH.. 7-96-23 (48480) shakuniH pANDuputrAbhyAM kR^itaH sa vimukhaH sharaiH. na sma jAnAti kartavyaM yuddhe ki~nchitparAkramam.. 7-96-24 (48481) vimukhaM chainamAlokya mAdrIputrau mahArathau. vavarShatuH punarbANairyathA meghau mahAgirim.. 7-96-25 (48482) sa vadhyamAno bahubhiH sharaiH sannataparvabhiH. samprAyAjjavanairashvairdroNAnIkAya saubalaH.. 7-96-26 (48483) ghaTotkachastathA shUraM rAkShasaM tamalAmudham. abhyayAdrabhasaM yuddhe vegamAsthAya madhyamam.. 7-96-27 (48484) tayoryuddhaM mahArAja chitrarUpamivAbhavat. yAdR^ishaM hi purAvR^ittaM rAmarAvaNayormR^idhe.. 7-96-28 (48485) tato yudhiShThiro rAjA madrarAjAnamAhave. viddhvA pa~nchAshatA bANaiH punarvivyAdha saptabhiH.. 7-96-29 (48486) tataH pravavR^ite yuddhaM tayoratyadbhutaM nR^ipa. yathA pUrvaM mahadyuddhaM shambarAmararAjayoH.. 7-96-30 (48487) viviMshatishchitraseno vikarNashcha tavAtmajaH. ayodhayanbhImasenaM mahatyA senayA vR^itAH.. .. 7-96-31 (48488) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe ShaNNavatitamo.adhyAyaH.. 96 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-96-23 hutAshanaH prAvartatetyanuShajyate.. 5-96-96 ShaNNavatitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 097

.. shrIH ..

7.97. adhyAyaH 097

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

droNadhR^iShTadyumnayoryuddham.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-97-0 (48489) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-97-0x (4512) tathA tasminpravR^itte tu sa~Ngrame romaharShaNe. kauraveyAMstridhAbhUtAnpANDavAH samupAdravan.. 7-97-1 (48490) jalasandhaM mahAbAhuM bhImaseno.abhyavartata. yudhiShThiraH sahAnIkaH kR^itavarmANamAhave.. 7-97-2 (48491) kiraMstu sharavarShANi rochamAna ivAMshumAn. dhR^iShTadyumno mahArAja droNamabhyadravadraNe.. 7-97-3 (48492) tataH pravavR^ite yuddhaM tvaratAM sarvadhanvinAm. kurUNAM pANDavAnAM cha sa~NkruddhAnAM parasparam.. 7-97-4 (48493) sa~NkShaye tu tathAbhUte vartamAne mahAbhaye. dvandavIbhUteShu sainyeShu yudhyamAneShvabhItavat.. 7-97-5 (48494) droNaH pA~nchAlaputreNa balI balavatA saha. yadakShipatpR^iShatkaughAMstadadbhutamivAbhavat.. 7-97-6 (48495) puNDarIkavanAnIva vidhvastAni samantataH. chakrAte droNapA~nchAlyau nR^iNAM shIrShANyanekashaH.. 7-97-7 (48496) vinikIrNAni vIrANAmanIkeShu samantataH. vastrAbharaNashastrANi dhvajavarmAyudhAni cha.. 7-97-8 (48497) tapanIyatanutrANAH saMsiktA rudhireNa cha. kovidArA ivAbhAnti puShpitAstatra bhArata. tAvakAH samare yodhAH pANDaveyAshcha vikShatAH.. 7-97-9 (48498) ku~njarAshvanarAnye pAtayanti sma patribhiH. tAlamAtrANi chApAni vikarShanto mahArathAH.. 7-97-10 (48499) asicharmANi chApAni shirAMshi kavachAni cha. viprakIryanta shUrANAM samprahAre mahAtmanAm.. 7-97-11 (48500) utthitAnyagaNeyAni kabandhAni samantataH. adR^ishyanta mahArAja tasminparamasa~Nkule.. 7-97-12 (48501) gR^idhrAH ka~NkA bakAH shyenA vAyasA jambukAstathA. bahushaH pishitAshAshcha tatrAdR^ishyanta mAriSha.. 7-97-13 (48502) bhakShayantashcha mAMsAni pibantashchApi shoNitam. vilumpamAnAH keshAMshcha majjAshcha bahudhA nR^ipa.. 7-97-14 (48503) AkarShantaH sharIrANi sharIrAvayavAMstathA. narAshvagajasa~NghAnAM shirAMshi cha tatastataH.. 7-97-15 (48504) kR^itAstrA raNashikShAbhirdIkShitA raNashAlinaH. raNe jayaM prArthayAnA bhR^ishaM yuyudhire tadA.. 7-97-16 (48505) asimArgAnbahuvidhAnvicheruH sainikA raNe. R^iShTibhiH shaktibhiH prAsaiH shUlatomarapaTTasaiH.. 7-97-17 (48506) gadAbhiH parighaishchAnyairAyudhaishcha bhujairapi. anyonyaM jaghnire kruddhA yuddhara~NgatA narAH.. 7-97-18 (48507) rathino rathibhiH sArdhamashvArohAshcha sAdibhiH. mAta~NgA varamAta~NgaiH padAtAshcha padAtibhiH.. 7-97-19 (48508) kShIbA ivAnye chonmattA ra~NgeShviva cha vAraNAH. uchchukrushurathAnyonyaM jaghnuranyonyameva cha.. 7-97-20 (48509) vartamAne tathA yuddhe nirmaryAde vishAmpate. dhR^iShTadyumno hayAnashchairdroNasya vyatyamishrayat.. 7-97-21 (48510) te hayAH sAdhvashobhanta mishritA vAtaraMhasaH. pArAvatasavarNAshcha raktashoNAshcha saMyuge.. 7-97-22 (48511) pArAvatasavarNAste raktashoNavimishritAH. hayAH shushubhire rAjanmeghA iva savidyutaH.. 7-97-23 (48512) dhR^iShTadyumnastu samprekShya droNamabhyAshamAgatam. asicharmAdade vIro dhanurutsR^ijya bhArata.. 7-97-24 (48513) chikIrShurduShkaraM karma pArShataH paravIrahA. IShAyAH samatikramya droNasya rathamAvishat.. 7-97-25 (48514) atiShThadyugamadhye sa yugasannahaneShu cha. jaghanArdheShu chAshvAnAM tatsainyAnyabhyapUjayan.. 7-97-26 (48515) kha~Ngena charatastasya shoNAshvAnadhitiShThataH. na dadArshAntaraM droNastadadbhutamivAbhavat.. 7-97-27 (48516) yathA shyenasya patanaM vaneShvAmiShagR^iddhinaH. tathaivAsIdabhIsArastasya droNaM jighAMsataH.. 7-97-28 (48517) tataH sharashatenAsya shatachandraM samAkShipat. droNo drupada putrasya kha~NgaM cha dashabhiH sharaiH.. 7-97-29 (48518) hayAMshchaiva chatuHShaShTyA sharANAM jaghnivAnbalI. dhvajaM ChatraM cha bhallAbhyAM tathA tau pArShNisArathI.. 7-97-30 (48519) athAsmai tvarito bANamaparaM jIvitAntakam. dhR^iShTadyumnAya chikShepa vajraM vajradharo yathA.. 7-97-31 (48520) taM chaturdashabhistIkShNairbANaishchichCheda sAtyakiH. grastamAchAryamukhyena dhR^iShTadyumnaM vyamochayat.. 7-97-32 (48521) siMheneva mR^igaM grastaM narasiMhena mAriSha. droNAdvai mochayAmAsa pA~nchAlyaM shinipu~NgavaH.. 7-97-33 (48522) sAtyakiM prekShya goptAraM pA~nchAlyaM cha mahAhave. sharANAM tvarito droNaH ShaDviMshatyA samArpayat.. 7-97-34 (48523) tato droNaM shineH pautro grasantamapi sR^i~njayAn. pratyavidhyachChitairbANaiH ShaDviMshatyA stanAntare.. 7-97-35 (48524) tataH sarve rathAstUrNaM pA~nchAlyA jayagR^iddhinaH. sAtvatAbhisR^ite droNe dhR^iShTadyumnamavAkShipan.. .. 7-97-36 (48525) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe saptanavatitamo.adhyAyaH.. 97 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-97-26 yugasannahaneShu yugabandheShu.. 5-97-36 avAkShit apanItavantaH.. 5-97-97 saptanavatitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 098

.. shrIH ..

7.98. adhyAyaH 098

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

droNasAtyakyoryuddham.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-98-0 (48526) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-98-0x (4513) bANe tasminnikR^itte tu dhR^iShTadyumne cha mokShite. tena vR^iShNipravIreNa yuyudhAnena sa~njaya.. 7-98-1 (48527) amarShito maheShvAsaH sarvashastrabhR^itAM varaH. naravyAghraM shineH pautraM droNaH kimakarodyudhi.. 7-98-2 (48528) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-98-3x (4514) samprasrutakrodhaviSho vyAditAsyasharAsanaH. tIkShNadhAreShudashanaH sitanArAchadaMShTravAn.. 7-98-3 (48529) saMrambhAmarShatAmrAkSho mahoraga iva shvasan. naravIraH pramuditaH shoNairashvairmahAjavaiH.. 7-98-4 (48530) utpatadbhirivAkAshe krAmadbhiriva parvatam. rukmapu~NkhA~nsharAnasyanyuyudhAnamupAdravat.. 7-98-5 (48531) sharapAtamahAvarShaM rathaghoShabalAhakam. kArmukairAvR^itaM rAjannArAchabahuvidyutam.. 7-98-6 (48532) shaktikha~NgAshanidharaM krodhavegasamutthitam. droNameghamanAvAryaM hayamArutachoditam.. 7-98-7 (48533) dR^iShTvaivAbhipatantaM taM shUraH parapura~njayaH. uvAcha sUtaM shaineyaH prahasanyuddhadurmadaH.. 7-98-8 (48534) enaM vai brAhmaNaM shUraM svakarmaNyanavasthitam. AshrayaM dhArtarAShTrasya dharmarAjabhayAvaham.. 7-98-9 (48535) shIghraM prajavitairashvaiH pratyudyAhi prahR^iShTavat. AchAryaM rAjaputrANAM satataM shUramAninam.. 7-98-10 (48536) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-98-11x (4515) `evamuktastataH sUtaH sAtyakasyAvahadratham'. tato rajatasa~NkAshA mAdhavasya hayottamAH. droNasyAbhimukhAH shIghramagachChanvAtaraMhasaH.. 7-98-11 (48537) tatastau droNashaineyau yuyudhAte parantapau. sharairanekasAhasraistADayantau parasparam.. 7-98-12 (48538) iShujAlAvR^itaM vyoma chakratuH puruSharShabhau. pUrayAmAsaturvIrAvubhau dasha dishaH sharaiH. meghAvivAtapApAye dhArAbhiritaretaram.. 7-98-13 (48539) na sma sUryastadA bhAti na vavau cha samIraNaH. haShujAlAvR^itaM ghoramandhakAraM samantataH.. 7-98-14 (48540) anAdhR^iShyamivAnyeShAM shUrANAmabhavattadA. andhakArIkR^ite loke droNashaineyayoH sharaiH.. 7-98-15 (48541) tayoH shIghrAstraviduShordroNasAtvatayostadA. nAntaraM sharavR^iShTInAM dadR^ishe narasiMhayoH.. 7-98-16 (48542) iShUNAM sannipAtena shabdo dhArAbhighAtajaH. shushruve shakramuktAnAmashanInAmiva svanaH.. 7-98-17 (48543) nArAchairvyatividdhAnAM sharANAM rUpamAbabhau. AshIviShavidaShTAnAM sarpANAmiva bhArata.. 7-98-18 (48544) tayorjyAtalanirghoShaH shushruve yuddhashauNDayoH. ajasraM shailashR^i~NgANAM vajreNAhanyatAmiva.. 7-98-19 (48545) ubhayostau rathau rAjaMste chAshvAstau cha sArathI. rukmapu~NkhaiH sharaiChannAshchitrarUpA babhustadA.. 7-98-20 (48546) nirmalAnAmajihmAnAM nArAchAnAM vishAmpate. nirmuktAshIvipAbhAnAM sampAto.abhUtsudAruNaH.. 7-98-21 (48547) ubhayoH patite Chatre tathaiva patitau dhvajau. `nikR^intatoH sharaistIkShNairdroNasAtyakayo raNe'.. 7-98-22 (48548) ubhau rudhirasiktA~NgAvubhau cha vijayaiShiNau. sravadbhiH shoNitaM gAtraiH prasrutAviva vAraNau. anyonyamabhyavidhyetAM jIvitAntakaraiH sharaiH.. 7-98-23 (48549) garjitotkR^iShTasannAdAH sha~NkhadundubhiniHsvanAH. upAramanmahArAja vyAjahAra na kashchana.. 7-98-24 (48550) tuShNIMbhUtAnyanaukAni yodhA yuddhAdupAraman. dadarsha dvairathaM tAbhyAM jAtakautUhalo janaH.. 7-98-25 (48551) rathino hastiyantAro hayArohAH padAtayaH. avaikShantAchalairnetraiH parivArya nararShabhau.. 7-98-26 (48552) hastyanIkAnyatiShThanta tathAnIkAni vAjinAm. tathaiva rathavAhinyaH prativyUhya vyavasthitAH.. 7-98-27 (48553) muktAvidrumachitraishcha maNikA~nchanabhUShitaiH. dhvajairAbharaNaishchitraiH kavachaishcha hiraNmayaiH.. 7-98-28 (48554) vaijayantIpatAkAbhiH paristomA~NgakambalaiH. vimalairnishitaiH shastrairhayAnAM cha prakIrNakaiH.. 7-98-29 (48555) jAtarUpamayIbhishcha rAjatIbhishcha mUrdhasu. gajAnAM kumbhamAlAbhirdantaveShTaishcha bhArata.. 7-98-30 (48556) sabalAkAH sakhadyotAH sairAvatashatahadAH. adR^ishyantoShNaparyAye meghAnAmiva vAgurAH.. 7-98-31 (48557) apashyannasmadIyAshcha te cha yaudhiShThirAH sthitAH. tadyuddhaM yuyudhAnasya droNasya cha mahAtmanaH.. 7-98-32 (48558) vimAnAgragatA devA brahmasomapurogamAH. siddhachAraNasa~NkhAshcha vidyAdharamahoragAH.. 7-98-33 (48559) `gandharvA dAnavA yakShA rAkShasApsarasaH khagAH'. gatapratyAgatAkShepaishchitairastravighAtibhiH. vividhairvismayaM jagmustayoH puruShasiMhayoH.. 7-98-34 (48560) hastalAghavamastreShu darshayantau mahAbalau. anyonyamabhividhyetAM sharaistau droNasAtyakI.. 7-98-35 (48561) tato droNasya dAshArhaH sharAMshchichCheda saMyuge. patribhiH sudR^iDhairAshu dhanushchaiva mahAdyuteH.. 7-98-36 (48562) nimeShAntaramAtreNa bhAradvAjo.aparaM dhanuH. sajyaM chakAra tadapi chichChedAsya sa sAtyakiH.. 7-98-37 (48563) tatastvaranpunardroNo dhanurhasto vyatiShThata. sajyaM sajyaM dhanushchAsya chichCheda nishithaiH sharaiH.. 7-98-38 (48564) evamekashataM ChinnaM dhanuShAM dR^iDhadhanvinA. na chAntaraM tayordR^iShTaM sandhAne chChedane.api cha.. 7-98-39 (48565) tato.asya saMyuge droNo dR^iShTvA karmAtimAnuSham. yuyudhAnasya rAjendra manasaitadachintayat.. 7-98-40 (48566) etadastrabalaM rAme kArtavIrye dhana~njaye. bhIShme cha puruShavyAghre yadidaM sAtvatAM vare.. 7-98-41 (48567) taM chAsya manasA droNaH pUjayAmAsa vikramam. lAghavaM vAsavasyeva samprekShya dvijasattamaH.. 7-98-42 (48568) tutoShAstravidAM shreShThastathA devAH savAsavAH. na tAmAlakShayAmAsurlaghutAM shIghrachAriNaH.. 7-98-43 (48569) devAshcha yuyudhAnasya gandharvAshcha vishAmpate. siddhachAraNasa~NghAshcha vidurdroNasya karma tat.. 7-98-44 (48570) tato.anyaddhanurAdAya droNaH kShatriyamardanaH. astrairastravidAM shreShTho yodhayAmAsa bhArata.. 7-98-45 (48571) tasyAstrANyastramAyAbhiH pratihatya sa sAtyakiH. jaghAna nishitairbANaistadadbhutamivAbhavat.. 7-98-46 (48572) tasyAtimAnuShaM karma dR^iShTvA.anyairasamaM raNe. yuktaM yogena yogaj~nAstAvakAH samapUjayan.. 7-98-47 (48573) yadastramasyati droNastadevAsyati sAtyakiH. tamAchAryo.atha sambhrAnto.ayodhayachChatrutApanaH.. 7-98-48 (48574) tataH kruddho mahArAja dhanurvedasya pAragaH. vadhAya yuyudhAnasya divyamastramudairayat.. 7-98-49 (48575) tadAgneyaM mahAghoraM ripughnamupalakShya saH. divyamastraM maheShvAso vAruNaM samudairayat.. 7-98-50 (48576) hAhAkAro mahAnAsIddR^iShTvA divyAstradhAriNau. na vicherustadA.a.akAshe bhUtAnyAkAshagAnyapi.. 7-98-51 (48577) astre te vAruNAgneye yadA bANaiH samAhite. na yAvadabhyapadyetAM vyAvartadatha bhAskaraH.. 7-98-52 (48578) tato yudhiShThiro rAjA bhImasenashcha pANDavaH. nakulaH sahadevashcha paryarakShanta sAtyakim.. 7-98-53 (48579) dhR^iShTadyumnamukhaiH sArdhaM virATashcha sakekayaH. matsyAH sAlveyasenAshcha droNamAjagmura~njasA.. 7-98-54 (48580) duHshAsanaM puraskR^itya rAjaputrAH sahasrashaH. droNamabhyupapadyanta sapatnaiH parivAritam.. 7-98-55 (48581) rajasA saMvR^ite loke sharajAlasamAvR^ite.. sarvamAvignamabhavanna prAj~nAyata ki~nchana. 7-98-56 (48582) sainyena rajasA dhvaste nirmaryAdamavartata.. `tenAntareNa pArthastu raNe jitvA mahAripUn. 7-98-57 (48583) atikrAntastadA yuddhaM kR^itvA paryavatasthivAn'.. .. 7-98-58 (48584) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe aShTanavatitamo.adhyAyaH.. 98 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-98-16 antaramavachChedaH.. 5-98-27 rathavAhinyo rathasenAH.. 5-98-29 vaijayantI vilakShaNAbhiH patAkAbhiH. paristomairvarNakambalaiH. a~NgakambalaiH sUkShmakambalaiH.. 5-98-31 airAvatamindradhanuH. airAvatobhramAta~Ngai ityupakramya napuMsakaM mahendrasya R^ijudIrghasharAsane iti medinI.. uShNasya paryAye apagame vAgurAH jAlAni samUhA itiyAvat.. 5-98-34 pratyAgataM nivartanam. AkShepaH praharaNam.. 5-98-43 AlakShayAmAsurlakShitavantaH.. 5-98-44 vidurnetyanuShajyate.. 5-98-47 yogena yuktyA.. 5-98-52 na yAvadabhyapadyetAM yAvadeva na parAbhUte. vyAvartat madhyAhnataH parAvR^itto.abhUt.. 5-98-98 aShTanavatitamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 099

.. shrIH ..

7.99. adhyAyaH 099

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

arjunena raNA~NkaNe hayApyAyanAya sharaiH saronirmANam.. 1 .. tathA sharamayaveshmanirmANam.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-99-0 (48585) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-99-0x (4516) `vartamAne tadA yuddhe droNasya saha pANDubhiH'. parivartamAna Aditye tatra sUrye cha rashmibhiH. rajasA kIryamANAshcha mandIbhUtAshcha kauravAH.. 7-99-1 (48586) tiShThatAM yudhyamAnAnAM punarAvartatAmapi. bhajyatAM jayatAM chaiva jagAma tadahaH shanaiH.. 7-99-2 (48587) tathA teShu viShakteShu sainyeShu jayagR^iddhiShu. arjuno vAsudevashcha saindhavAyaiva jagmatuH.. 7-99-3 (48588) rathamArgapramANaM tu kaunteyo nishitaiH sharaiH. chakAra yaM cha panthAnaM yayau tena janArdanaH.. 7-99-4 (48589) yatrayatra ratho yAti pANDavasya mahAtmanaH. tatratatraiva dIryante senAstava vishAmpate.. 7-99-5 (48590) rathashikShAM tu dAshArho darshayAmAsa vIryavAn. uttamAdhamamadhyAni maNDalAni vidarshayan.. 7-99-6 (48591) te tu nAmA~NkitA bANAH kAlajvalanasannibhAH. snAyunaddhAH suparvANaH pR^ithavo dIrghagAminaH.. 7-99-7 (48592) vaiNavAshchAyasAshchogrA grasanto vividhAnarIn. rudhiraM patagaiH sArdhaM prANinAM papurAhave.. 7-99-8 (48593) rathasthito.agrataH kroshaM yAnasyatyarjunaH sharAn. rathe kroshamatikrAnte tasya te ghnanti shAtravAn.. 7-99-9 (48594) tArkShyamArutaraMhobhirvAjibhiH sAdhuvAhibhiH. yathA.agachChaddhR^iShIkeshaH kR^itsnaM vismApaya~njagat.. 7-99-10 (48595) na tathA gachChati rathastapanasya vishAmpate. nendrasya na tu rudrasya nApi vaishravaNasya cha.. 7-99-11 (48596) nAnyasya samare rAjangatapUrvastathA rathaH. yathA yayAvarjunasya manobhiprAyashIghragaH.. 7-99-12 (48597) pravishya tu raNe rAjankeshavaH paravIrahA. senAmadhye hayAMstUrNaM chodayAmAsa bhArata.. 7-99-13 (48598) tatastasya rathaughasya madhyaM prApya hayottamAH. kR^ichChreNarathamUhustaM kShutpipAsAsamanvitAH.. 7-99-14 (48599) kShatAshcha bahubhiH shastrairyuddhashauNDairanekashaH. maNDalAni vichitrANi vicheruste muhurmuhuH.. 7-99-15 (48600) hatAnAM vAjinAgAnAM rathAnAM cha naraiH saha. upariShTAdatikrAntAH shailAbhAnAM sahasrashaH.. 7-99-16 (48601) `shrameNa mahatA yuktAste hayA vAtaraMhasaH. mandavegagatA rAjansaMvR^ittAstatra saMyuge'.. 7-99-17 (48602) etasminnantare vIrAvAvantyau bhrAtarau nR^ipa. sahasenau samArchChetAM pANDavaM klAntavAhanam.. 7-99-18 (48603) tAvarjunaM chatuHShaShTyA saptatyA cha janArdanam. sharANAM cha shatairashvAnavidhyetAM mudAnvitau.. 7-99-19 (48604) tAvarjuno mahArAja navabhirnataparvabhiH. AjaghAna raNe kruddho marmaj~no marmabhedibhiH.. 7-99-20 (48605) tatastau tu sharaugheNa bIbhatsuM sahakeshavam. AchChAdayetAM saMrabdhau siMhanAdaM cha chakratuH.. 7-99-21 (48606) tayostu dhanuShI muShTau bhallAbhyAM shvetavAhanaH. chichCheda samare tUrNaM bhUya eva dhana~njayaH. athAnyairvishikhaistUrNaM dhvajau cha kanakojjvalau.. 7-99-22 (48607) athAnye dhanuShI rAjanpragR^ihya samare tadA. pANDavaM bhR^ishasa~NkruddhAvardayAmAsatuH sharaiH.. 7-99-23 (48608) tayostu bhR^ishasa~NkruddhaH sharAbhyAM pANDunandanaH. dhanuShI chichChide tUrNaM bhUya eva dhana~njayaH.. 7-99-24 (48609) tathAnyairvishikhaistUrNaM rukmapu~NkhaiH shilAshitaiH. jaghAnAshvAMstathA sUtau pArShNI cha sapadAnugau.. 7-99-25 (48610) jyeShThasya cha shiraH kAyAtkShurapreNa nyakR^intata. sa papAta hataH pR^ithvyAM vAtarugNa iva drumaH.. 7-99-26 (48611) vindaM tu nihataM dR^iShTvA hyanuvindaH pratApavAn. hatAshvaM rathamutsR^ijya gadAM gR^ihya mahAbalaH.. 7-99-27 (48612) abhyavartata sa~NgrAme bhrAturvadhamanusmaran. gadayA rathinAM shreShTho nR^ityanniva mahArathaH.. 7-99-28 (48613) anuvindastu gadayA lalATe madhusUdanam. spaShTvA nAkampayatkruddho mainAkamiva parvatam.. 7-99-29 (48614) tasyArjunaH sharaiH ShaDbhirgrIvAM pAdau bhujau shiraH. nichakarta sa sa~nChannaH papAtAdrichayo yathA.. 7-99-30 (48615) tatastau nihatau dR^iShTvA tayo rAjanpadAnugAH. abhyadruvanta sa~NkruddhAH kirantaH shatashaH sharAn.. 7-99-31 (48616) tAnarjunaH sharaistUrNaM nihatya bharatarShabha. vyarochata yathA vahnirdAvaM dagdhvA himAtyaye.. 7-99-32 (48617) tayoH senAmatikramya kR^ichChrAdiva dhana~njayaH. vibabhau jaladaM hitvA divAkara ivoditaH.. 7-99-33 (48618) taM dR^iShTvA kuravastrastAH prahR^iShTAshchAbhavanpunaH. abhyavartanta pArthaM cha samantAdbharatarShabha.. 7-99-34 (48619) shrAntaM chainaM samAlakShya j~nAtvA dUre cha saindhavam. siMhanAdena mahatA sarvataH paryavArayan.. 7-99-35 (48620) tAMstu dR^iShTvA susaMrabdhAnutsmayanpuruSharbhaH. shanakairiva dAshArhamarjuno vAkyamabravIt.. 7-99-36 (48621) sharArditAshcha glAnAshcha hayA dUre cha saindhavaH. kimihAnantaraM kAryaM sAdhiShThaM tava rochate.. 7-99-37 (48622) brUhi kR^iShNa yathAtattvaM tvaM hi prAj~natamaH sadA. bhavannetrA raNe shatrUnvijeShyantIha pANDavAH.. 7-99-38 (48623) mama tvanantaraM kR^ityaM yadvai tattvaM nibodha me. hayAnvimuchya hi sukhaM vishalyAnkuru mAdhava.. 7-99-39 (48624) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-99-40x (4517) evamuktastu pArthena keshavaH pratyuvAcha tam. mamApyetanmataM pArtha yaditaM te prabhAShitam.. 7-99-40 (48625) arjuna uvAcha. 7-99-41x (4518) ahamAvArayiShyAmi sarvasainyAni keshava. tvamapyatra yathAnyAyaM kuru kAryamanantaram.. 7-99-41 (48626) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-99-42x (4519) so.avatIrya rathopasthAdasambhrAnto dhana~njayaH. gANDIvaM dhanurAdAya tasthau girivivAchalaH).. 7-99-42 (48627) tamabhyadhAvankroshantaH kShatriyA jayakA~NkShiNaH. idaM Chidramiti j~nAtvA dharaNIsthaM dhana~njayam.. 7-99-43 (48628) tamekaM rathavaMshena mahatA paryavArayan. vikarShantashcha chApAni visR^ijantashcha sAyakAn.. 7-99-44 (48629) shastrANi cha vichitrANi kruddhAstatra vyadarshayan. ChAdayantaH sharaiH pArthaM meghA iva divAkaram.. 7-99-45 (48630) abhyadravanta vegena kShatriyAH kShatriyarShabham. narasiMhaM rathodArAH siMhaM mattA iva dvipAH.. 7-99-46 (48631) tatra pArthasya bhujayormahadbalamadR^ishyata. yatkruddho bahulAH senAH sarvataH samavArayat.. 7-99-47 (48632) astrairastrANi saMvArya dviShatAM sarvato vibhuH. iShubhirbubhistUrNaM sarvAneva samAvR^iNot.. 7-99-48 (48633) tatrAntarikShe bANAnAM pragADhAnAM vishAmpate. sa~NgharSheNa mahArchiShmAnpAvakaH samajAyata.. 7-99-49 (48634) tatratatra maheShvAsaiH shvasadbhiH shoNitokShitaiH. hayairnAgaishcha sambhinnairnadadbhishchArikarshana.. 7-99-50 (48635) saMrabdhaishchAribhirvIraiH prArthayadbhirjayaM mR^idhe. ekasthairbahubhiH kruddhairUShmeva samajAyata.. 7-99-51 (48636) sharormiNaM dhvajAvartaM nAganakraM duratyayam. padAtimatsyakalilaM sha~NkhadundubhiniHsvanam.. 7-99-52 (48637) asa~NkhyeyamapAraM cha rajo nIramatIva cha. uShNIShakamaThaM ChatrapatAkAphenamAlinam.. 7-99-53 (48638) rathasAgaramakShobhyaM mAta~NgA~NgashilAchitam. velAbhUtastadA pArthaH patribhiH samavArayat.. 7-99-54 (48639) [dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-99-55x (4520) arjune dharaNIM prApte hayahaste cha keshave. etadantaramAsAdya kathaM pArtho na ghAtitaH.. 7-99-55 (48640) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-99-56x (4521) sadyaH pArthiva pArthena niruddhAH sarvapArthivAH. rathasthA dharaNIsthena vAkyamachChAndasaM yathA.. 7-99-56 (48641) sa pArthaH pArthivAnsarvAnbhUmisthopi rathasthitAn. eko nivArayAmAsa lobhaH sarvaguNAniva..] 7-99-57 (48642) tato janArdanaH sa~Nkhye priyaM puruShasattamam. asambhrAnto mahAbAhurarjunaM vAkyamabravIt.. 7-99-58 (48643) udapAnamihAshvAnAM nAlamasti raNe.arjuna. parIpsante jalaM cheme peyaM na tvavagAhanam.. 7-99-59 (48644) idamastItyasambhrAnto bruvannastreNa medinIm. abhihatyArjunashchakre vAjipAnaM saraH shubham.. 7-99-60 (48645) [haMsakAraNDavAkIrNaM chakravAkopashobhitam. suvistIrNaM prasannAmbhaH praphullavarapa~Nkajam.. 7-99-61 (48646) kUrmamatsyagaNAkIrNamagAdhamR^iShisevitam. AgachChannAradamunirdarshanArthaM kR^itaM kShaNAt..] 7-99-62 (48647) sharavaMshaM sharasthUNaM sharAchChAdanamadbhutam. sharaveshmAkarotpArthastvaShTevAdbhutakarmakR^it.. 7-99-63 (48648) tataH prahasya govindaH sAdhusAdhvityathAbravIt. sharaveshmani pArthena kR^ite tasminmahAtmanA.. .. 7-99-64 (48649) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe ekonashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 99 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-99-17 snAyunaddhAH sUkShmacharmAgragrathitAH.. 5-99-9 kroshaM koshamuddishya.. 5-99-25 sUtau sArathI. pAShNIM pR^iShTharakShau.. 5-99-30 adrichayo nirishR^i~Ngam.. 5-99-49 pragADhAnAM vyavagADhAnAm.. 5-99-54 velAbhUto maryAdArUpaH.. 5-99-55 kuNDalitAstrayaH shlokAH jha. pAThe eva vartante.. 5-99-59 alaM paryAptam.. 5-99-60 abhihatya khAtvA. dAjipAnaM ashvapAnIyam.. 5-99-61 haMsakAraNDavAkIrNamityAdiyogyatayA varNanam.. kuNDalitau dvau shlokau gha.jha.pAThayoreva.. 5-99-63 vaMshaH shAlAdhArakAShTham. sthUNA madhyastambhaH.. 5-99-99 ekonashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 100

.. shrIH ..

7.100. adhyAyaH 100

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

shrIkR^iShNenArjunanirmitasarasi snApanAdinA.a.apyAyitAnAM turagANAM punA rathe yojanam.. 1 .. punA rathamArUDhayoH kR^iShNaH rjunayorjayadrathamprati gamanam.. 3 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-100-0 (48650) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-100-0x (4522) salile janite tasminkaunteyena mahAtmanA. nistArite dviShatsainye kR^ite cha sharaveshmani.. 7-100-1 (48651) vAsudevo rathAttUrNamavatIrya mahAdyutiH. mochayAmAsa turagAnvinunnAnka~NkapatribhiH.. 7-100-2 (48652) adR^iShTapUrvaM taddR^iShTvA sAdhuvAdo mahAnabhUt. siddhachAraNasa~NghAnAM sainikAnAM cha sarvashaH.. 7-100-3 (48653) padAtinaM tu kaunteyaM yudhyamAnaM mahArathAH. nAshaknuvanvArayituM tadadbhutamivAbhavat.. 7-100-4 (48654) Apatatsu rathaugheShu prabhUtagajavAjiShu. nAsambhramattadA pArthastadasya puruShAnati.. 7-100-5 (48655) vyasR^ijanta sharaughAMste pANDavaM prati pArthivAH. na chAvyathata dharmAtmA vAsaviH paravIrahA.. 7-100-6 (48656) shatAni sharajAlAni gadAH prAsAMshcha vIryavAn. AgatAnagrasatpArthaH saritaH sAgaro yathA.. 7-100-7 (48657) astravegena mahatA pArtho bAhubalena cha. sarveShAM pArthivendrANAmagrasattA~nsharottamAn.. 7-100-8 (48658) tattu pArthasya vikrAntaM vAsudevasya chobhayoH. apUjayanmahArAja kauravA mahadadbhutam.. 7-100-9 (48659) kauravA UchuH. 7-100-10x (4523) kimadbhutatamaM loke bhavitA.apyathavA hyabhUt. yadashvAnpArtha govindau pAyayAmAsatU raNe.. 7-100-10 (48660) bhayaM vipulamasmAsu tAvadhattAM narottamau. tejo vidadhatushchograM yatsainyaM tAvakaM vibho. `dadhAraiko raNe pArtho velevodvR^ittamarNavam.. 7-100-11 (48661) pArthasya sharasa~nChanne tasminsadmani bhArata. AkAshamiva samprApya vicherustatra pakShiNaH.. 7-100-12 (48662) na chainaM yudhi tiShThantaM sainyeShu tava mAriSha. abhyadravatsusa~NkruddhaH pumAnkashchittu tAvakaH.. 7-100-13 (48663) sarve vimanaso.abhUvaMstava yodhA vishAmpate. samprekShya tatra govindaM pANDavaM cha dhana~njayam'.. 7-100-14 (48664) atha smayanhR^iShIkeshaH strImadhya iva bhArata. arjunena kR^ite sa~Nkhye sharagarbhagR^ihe tadA.. 7-100-15 (48665) upAvartayadavyagrastAnashvAnpuShkarekShaNaH. miShatAM sarvasainyAnAM tvadIyAnAM vishAmpate.. 7-100-16 (48666) `upAvR^ittyotthitAnashvAnpANibhyAM puShkarekShaNaH. sammArjayanraNe rAjanpashyatAM sarvayodhinAm'.. 7-100-17 (48667) teShAM shramaM cha glAniM cha vamathuM vepathuM vraNAn. sarvaM vyapAnudatkR^iShNaH kushalo hyashvakarmaNi.. 7-100-18 (48668) shalyAnuddhR^itya pANibhyAM parimR^ijya cha tAnhayAn. upAvartya yathAnyAyaM pAyayAmAsa vAri saH.. 7-100-19 (48669) sa tA.NllabdhodakAnsnAtA~njagdhAnnAnvigataklamAn. yojayAmAsa saMhR^iShTaH punareva rathottame.. 7-100-20 (48670) sa taM rathavaraM shauriH sarvashastrabhR^itAM varaH. samAsthAya mahAtejAH sArjunaH prayayau drutam.. 7-100-21 (48671) `yojayitvA hayAMstasya vidhidR^iShTena karmaNA. raNe chachAra govindastR^iNIkR^itya mahArathAn'.. 7-100-22 (48672) rathaM rathavarasyAjau yuktaM labdhodakairhayaiH. dR^iShTvA kurubalashreShThAH punarvimanaso.abhavan.. 7-100-23 (48673) viniHsvasantaste rAjanbhagnadaMShTrA ivoragAH. ghigaho.atigataH pArthaH kR^iShNashchetyabruvanpR^ithak.. 7-100-24 (48674) tatsainyaM sarvato dR^iShTvA romaharShaNamadbhutam. tvaradhvamiti chAkrandannaitadastIti chAvuvan.. 7-100-25 (48675) sarvakShatrasya miShato rathenaikena daMshitau. bAlaH krIDanakeneva kadarthIkR^itya no balam.. 7-100-26 (48676) kroshatAM yatamAnAnAmasaMsaktau parantapau. darshayitvA.atmano vIryaM prayAtau sarvarAjasu.. 7-100-27 (48677) `yathA devAsure yuddhe tR^iNIkR^itya cha dAnavAn. indrAviShNU purA rAja~njambhasya vadhakA~NkShiNau'.. 7-100-28 (48678) tau prayAtau punardR^iShTvA tadA.anye sainikAbruvan. tvaradhvaM kuravaH sarve vadhe kR^iShNakirITinoH.. 7-100-29 (48679) rathaM yu~NktvA hi dAshArho miShatAM sarvadhanvinAm. jayadrathAya yAtyeSha kadarthIkR^itya no raNe.. 7-100-30 (48680) tatra kechinmitho rAjansamabhAShanta bhUmipAH. adR^iShTapUrvaM sa~NgrAme tadR^iShTvA mahadadbhutam.. 7-100-31 (48681) sarvasainyAni rAjA cha dhR^itarAShTro.atyayaM gataH. duryodhanAparAghena kShatraM kR^itsnA cha medinI.. 7-100-32 (48682) vilayaM samanuprAptA tachcha rAjA na budhyate. ityevaM kShatriyAstatra bruvantyanye cha bhArata.. 7-100-33 (48683) sindhurAjasya yatkR^ityaM gatasya yamasAdanam. tatkarotu vR^ithAdR^iShTirdhArtarAShTro.anupAyavit.. 7-100-34 (48684) tataH shIghrataraM prAyAtpANDavaH saindhavaM prati. vivartamAne tigmAMshau hR^iShTaiH pItodakairhayaiH.. 7-100-35 (48685) taM prayAntaM mahAbAhuM sarvashastrabhR^itAM varam. nAshaknuvanvArayituM yodhAH kruddhamivAntakam.. 7-100-36 (48686) vidrAvya tu tataH sainyaM pANDavaH shatrutApanaH. yathA mR^igagaNAnsiMhaH saindhavArthe vyaloDayat.. 7-100-37 (48687) gAhamAnastvanIkAni tUrNamashvAnachodayat. balAkAbhaM tu dAshArhaH pA~nchajanyaM vyanAdayat.. 7-100-38 (48688) kaunteyenAgrataH sR^iShTA nyapatanpR^iShThataH sharAH. tUrNAttUrNataraM hyashvAH prAvahanvAtaraMhasaH.. 7-100-39 (48689) tato nR^ipatayaH kruddhAH parivavrurdhana~njayam. kShatriyA bahavashchAnye jayadrathavadhaiShiNam.. 7-100-40 (48690) sainyeShu viprayAteShu dhiShThitaM puruSharShabham. duryodhano.atvayAtpArthaM tvaramANo mahAhave.. 7-100-41 (48691) vAtoddhUtapatAkaM taM rathaM jaladaniHsvanam. ghoraM kapidhvajaM dR^iShTvA viShaNNA rathino.abhavan.. 7-100-42 (48692) divAkare.atha rajasA sarvataH saMvR^ite bhR^isham. sharArtAshcharaNe yodhAH shekuH kR^iShNau na vIkShitum.. .. 7-100-43 (48693) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe shatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 100 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-100-5 puruShAnati puruShebhyo.atishayaH. asambhramat. upasargAtpUrvamArSho.aT.. 5-100-11 vidadhaturdarshitavantau.. 5-100-16 upAvartayatpariloDitavAn.. 5-100-18 shramaM manaHkAyakhedam. glAni balApachayam. vamathuM phenodramam.. 5-100-39 prAvahan atyakrAman.. 5-100-49 dhiShThitaM ki~nchidavasthitam.. 5-100-100 shatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 101

.. shrIH ..

7.101. adhyAyaH 101

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

jayadrathaM yiyAsorarjunasya duryodhanena nirodhaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-101-0 (48694) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-101-0x (4524) sraMsanta iva majjAnastAvakAnAM bhayAnnR^ipa. tau dR^iShTvA samatikrAntau vAsudevadhana~njayau.. 7-101-1 (48695) sarve tu pratisaMrabdhA hImantaH satvachoditAH. sthirIbhUtA mahAtmAnaH pratyagachChandhana~njayam.. 7-101-2 (48696) ye gatAH pANDavaM yuddhe roShAmarShasamanvitAH. te.adyApi na nivartante sindhavaH sAgarAdiva.. 7-101-3 (48697) asantastu nyavartanta vedebhya iva nAstikAH. narakaM bhajamAnAste pratyapadyanta kilbiSham.. 7-101-4 (48698) tAvatItya rathAnIkaM vimuktau puruSharShabhau. dadR^ishAte yathA rAhorAsyAnmuktau prabhAkarau.. 7-101-5 (48699) matsyAviva mahAjAlaM vidArya vigataklamau. tathA kR^iShNAvadR^ishyetAM senAjAlaM vidArya tat.. 7-101-6 (48700) vimuktau shastrasambAdhAdroNAnIkAtsudurbhidAt. adR^ishyetAM mahAtmAnau kAlasUryAvivoditau.. 7-101-7 (48701) astrasambAdhanirmuktau vimuktau shastrasa~NkaTAt. adR^ishyetAM mahAtmAnau shatrusambAdhakAriNau.. 7-101-8 (48702) vimuktau jvalanasparshAnmakarAsyAjjhaShAviva. akShobhayetAM senAM tau samudraM makarAviva.. 7-101-9 (48703) tAvakAstava putrAshcha droNAnIkasthayostayoH. naitau tariShyato droNamiti chakrustadA matim.. 7-101-10 (48704) tau tu dR^iShTvA vyatikrAntau droNAnIkaM mahAdyutI. nAshashaMsurmahArAja sindhurAjasya jIvitam.. 7-101-11 (48705) AshA balavatI rAjansindhurAjasya jIvite. droNahArdikyayoH kR^iShNau na mokShyete iti prabho.. 7-101-12 (48706) tAmAshAM viphalIkR^itya santIrNau tau parantapau. droNAnIkaM mahArAja bhojAnIkaM cha dustaram.. 7-101-13 (48707) atha dR^iShTvA vyatikrAntau jvalitAviva pAvakau. nirAshAH sindhurAjasya jIvitaM na shashaMsire.. 7-101-14 (48708) mithashcha samabhAShetAmabhItau bhayavardhanau. jayadrathavadhe vAchastAstAH kR^iShNadhana~njayau.. 7-101-15 (48709) asau madhye kR^itaH Sha~NbhirdhArtarAShTrairmahArathaiH. chakShurviShayasamprApto na me mokShyati saindhavaH.. 7-101-16 (48710) yadyasya samare goptA shakro devagaNaiH saha. tathApyenaM nihaMsyAva iti kR^iShNAvabhAShatAm.. 7-101-17 (48711) iti kR^iShNau mahAbAhU mithaH kathayatAM tadA. sindhurAjamavekShantau tvatputrA bahu chukrushuH.. 7-101-18 (48712) atItya marudhanvAnaM prayAntau tR^iShitau gajau. pItvA vAri samAshvastau tathaivAstAmarindamau.. 7-101-19 (48713) vyAghrasiMhagajAkIrNAnatikramya cha parvatAn. vaNijAviva dR^ishyetAM hInamR^ityU jarAtigau.. 7-101-20 (48714) tathAhi mukhavarNo.ayamanayoriti menire. tAvakA vIkShya muktau tau vikroshanti sma sarvashaH.. 7-101-21 (48715) droNAdAshIviShAkArAjjvalitAdiva pAvakAt. anyebhyaH pArthivebhyashcha bhAsvantAviva bhAskarau.. 7-101-22 (48716) vimuktau sAgaraprakhyAdroNAnIkAdarridamau. adR^ishyetAM mudA yuktau samuttIryArNavaM yathA.. 7-101-23 (48717) astraughAnmahato muktau droNahArdikyarakShitAt. rochamAnAvadR^ishyetAmindrAgnyoH sadR^ishau raNe.. 7-101-24 (48718) udbhinnarudhirau kR^iShNau bhAradvAjasya sAyakaiH. shitaishchitau vyarochetAM karNikArairivAchalau.. 7-101-25 (48719) droNagrAhahUdAnmuktau shaktyAshIviShasa~NkaTAt. ayaHsharogramakarAtkShatriyapravarAmbhasaH.. 7-101-26 (48720) jyAghoShatalanirhAdAdgadAnistriMshavidyutaH. droNAstrameghAnnirmuktau sUryendU timirAdiva.. 7-101-27 (48721) bAhubhyAmiva santIrNau sindhuShaShThAH samudragAH. tapAnte saritaH pUrNA mahAgrAhasamAkulAH.. 7-101-28 (48722) `mahAshailochchayAM ghorAM la~NghayitvA mahAnadIm. nistIrNAvadhvagau yadvattadvattau tAritau raNe'.. 7-101-29 (48723) iti kR^iShNau maheShvAsau prashastau lokavishrutau. sarvabhUtAnyamanyanta droNAstrabalavAraNAt.. 7-101-30 (48724) jayadrathaM samIpasthamavekShantau jighAMsayA. ruruM vanAnte lipsantau vyAghravattAvatiShThatAm.. 7-101-31 (48725) yathA hi mukhavarNo.ayamanayoriti menire. tava yodhA mahArAja hatameva jayadratham.. 7-101-32 (48726) lohitAkShau mahAbAhU saMyuktau kR^iShNapANDavau. sindhurAjamabhiprekShya hR^iShTau vyanadatAM muhuH.. 7-101-33 (48727) shaurerabhIShuhastasya pArthasya cha dhanuShmataH. tayorAsItprabhA rAjansUryapAvakayoriva.. 7-101-34 (48728) harSha eva tayorAsIddroNAnIkapramuktayoH. samIpe saindhavaM dR^iShTvA shyenayorAmiShaM yathA.. 7-101-35 (48729) tau tu saindhavamAlokya vartamAnamivAntike. sahasA petatuHkruddhau kShipraM shyenAvivAmipam.. 7-101-36 (48730) tau dR^iShTvA tu vyatikrAntau hR^iShIkeshadhana~njayau. sindhurAjasya rakShArthaM parAkrAntaH sutastava.. 7-101-37 (48731) droNenAbaddhakavacho rAjA duryodhanastataH. yayAvekarathenAjau hayasaMskarAvitprabho.. 7-101-38 (48732) kR^iShNapArthau maheShvAsau vyatikramyAtha te sutaH. agrataH puNDarIkAkShaM pratIyAya narAdhipa.. 7-101-39 (48733) tataH sarveShu sainyeShu vAditrANi prahR^iShTavat. prAvAdyanta vyatikrAnte tava putre dhana~njayam.. 7-101-40 (48734) siMhanAdaravAshchAsa~nsha~NkhashabdavimishritAH. dR^iShTvA duryodhanaM tatra kR^iShNayoH pramukhe sthitam.. 7-101-41 (48735) ye cha te sindhurAjasya goptAraH pAvakopamAH. te prAhR^iShyanta samare dR^iShTvA putraM tava prabho.. 7-101-42 (48736) dR^iShTvA duryodhanaM kR^iShNo vyatikrAntaM sahAnugam. abravIdarjunaM rAjanprAptakAlamidaM vachaH.. .. 7-101-43 (48737) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe ekAdhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 101 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-101-3 amarShashchirAnuMvaddhaH kopaH.. 5-101-5 prabhAkarau chandrAdityau.. 5-101-19 marudhanvAnaM marusthalam.. 5-101-28 sindhuH ShaShThI yAsAm. tAshcha shatadruvipAsherAvatIchandrabhAgAvitastAH. etAhi nitAntadustarAH.. 5-101-31 ruruM nipAne iti Ta. pAThaH. rUrunnipAte iti ka. pAThaH.. 5-101-39 agrataH pramukhe.. 5-101-101 ekAdhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 102

.. shrIH ..

7.102. adhyAyaH 102

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

duryodhane nirundhAne kR^iShNena tadduShkR^itAnusmAraNapUrvakamarjunamprati tadvadhachodanA.. 1 .. arjunamprati duryodhanasya vIravAdaH.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-102-0 (48738) vAsudeva uvAcha. 7-102-0x (4525) duryodhanamatikrAntametaM pashya dhana~njaya. ApadgatamimaM manye nAstyasya sadR^isho rathaH.. 7-102-1 (48739) dUrapAtI maheShvAsaH kR^itAstro yuddhadurmadaH. dR^iDhahastashchitrayodhI dhArtarAShTro mahAbalaH.. 7-102-2 (48740) atyantasukhasaMvR^iddho mAnitashcha mahArathaiH. kR^itI cha satataM pArtha nityaM dveShTi cha pANDavAn.. 7-102-3 (48741) tena yuddhamahaM manye prAptakAlaM tavAnagha. atra no dyUtamAyattaM vijayAyetarAya vA.. 7-102-4 (48742) atra krodhaviShaM pArtha vimu~ncha chirasambhR^itam.. eSha mUlamanarthAnAM pANQvAnAM mahAtmanAm.. 7-102-5 (48743) so.ayaM prAptastavAkShepaM pashya sAphalyamAtmanaH. kathaM hi rAjA rAjyArthI tvayA gachCheta saMyugam.. 7-102-6 (48744) diShTyA tvidAnIM samprApta eSha te bANagocharam. yathA.ayaM jIvitaM jahyAttathA kuru dhana~njaya.. 7-102-7 (48745) aishvaryamadasammUDho naiSha duHkhamupeyivAn. na cha te saMyuge vIryaM jAnAti puruSharShabha.. 7-102-8 (48746) tvAM hi lokAstrayaH pArtha sasurAsuramAnavAH. notsahante raNe jetuM kimutaikaH suyodhanaH.. 7-102-9 (48747) sa diShTyA samanuprAptastava pArtha rathAntikam. jahyenaM tvaM mahAbAho yathA vR^itraM purandaraH.. 7-102-10 (48748) eSha hyanarthe satataM parAkrAntastavAnagha. nikR^ityA dharmarAjaM cha dyUte va~nchitavAnayam.. 7-102-11 (48749) bahUni sunR^ishaMsAni kR^itAnyetena mAnada. yuShmAsu pApamatinA apApeShvapi nityadA.. 7-102-12 (48750) tamanAryaM sadA kruddhaM puruShaM kAmarUpiNam. AryAM yuddhe matiM kR^itvA jahi pArthAvichArayan.. 7-102-13 (48751) nikR^ityA rAjyaharaNaM vanavAsaM cha pANDava. parikleshaM cha kR^iShNAyA hR^idi kR^itvA parAkrama.. 7-102-14 (48752) diShTyaiSha tava bANAnAM gochare parivartate. pratighAtAya kAryasya diShTyA cha yatate.agrataH.. 7-102-15 (48753) diShTyA jAnAti sa~NgrAme yoddhavyaM hi tvayA saha. diShTyA cha saphalAH pArtha sarve kAmA hyakAmitAH.. 7-102-16 (48754) tasmAjjahi raNe pArtha dhArtarAShTraM kulAdhamam. yathendreNa hataH pUrvaM jambho devAsure mR^idhe.. 7-102-17 (48755) asminhate tvayA sainyamanAthaM bhidyatAmidam. vairasya diShTyA sahajaM mUlaM Chindhi durAtmanAm.. 7-102-18 (48756) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-102-19x (4526) taM tathetyabravItpArthaH kR^ityarUpamidaM mama. sarvamanyadanAdR^itya gachCha yatra suyodhanaH.. 7-102-19 (48757) yenaitaddIrghakAlaM no bhuktaM rAjyamakaNTakam. apyasya yudhi vikramya chChindyAM mUrdhAnamAhave.. 7-102-20 (48758) api tasya hyanarhAyAH parikleshasya mAdhava. kR^iShNAyAH shaknuyAM gantuM padaM keshapradharShaNe.. 7-102-21 (48759) `apyahaM tAni duHkhAni pUrvavR^ittAni mAdhava. duryodhanaM raNe hatvA pratimokShye katha~nchana'.. 7-102-22 (48760) ityevaMvAdinau kR^iShNau hR^iShTau shvetAnhayottamAn. preShayAmAsatuH sa~Nkhye prepsantau taM narAdhipam.. 7-102-23 (48761) tayoH samIpaM samprApya putraste bharatarShabha. na chakAra bhayaM prApte bhaye mahati mAriSha.. 7-102-24 (48762) tadasya kShatriyAH karma sarva evAbhyapUjayan. yadarjunahR^iShIkeshau pratyudyAtau nyavArayat.. 7-102-25 (48763) tataH sarvasya sainyasya tAvakasya vishAmpate. mahAnAdo hyabhUttatra dR^iShTvA rAjAnamAhave.. 7-102-26 (48764) tasmi~njanasamunnAde pravR^itte bhairave sati. kadarthIkR^itya te putraH pratyamitramavArayat.. 7-102-27 (48765) AvAritastu kaunteyastava putreNa dhanvinA. saMrambhamagamadbhUyaH sa cha tasminparantapaH.. 7-102-28 (48766) tau dR^iShTvA pratisaMrabdhau duryodhanadhana~njayau. abhyavaikShanta rAjAno bhImarUpAH samantataH.. 7-102-29 (48767) dR^iShTvA tu pArthaM saMrabdhaM vAsudevaM cha mAriSha. prahasanneva putraste yoddhukAmaH samAhvayat.. 7-102-30 (48768) tataH prahR^iShTo dAshArhaH pANDavashcha dhana~njayaH. vyakroshetAM mahAnAdaM dadhmatushchAmbujottamau.. 7-102-31 (48769) tau hR^iShTarUpau samprekShya kauraveyAstu sarvashaH. nirAshAH samapadyanta putrasya tava jIvite.. 7-102-32 (48770) shokamApuH paraM chaiva kuravaH sarva eva te. amanyanta cha putraM te vaishvAnaramukhe hutam.. 7-102-33 (48771) tathA tu dR^iShTvA yodhAste prahR^iShTau kR^iShNapANDavau. hato rAjA hato rAjetyUchire cha bhayArditAH.. 7-102-34 (48772) janasya sanninAdaM tu shrutvA duryodhano.abravIt. vyetu vo bhIrahaM kR^iShNau preShayiShyAmi mR^ityave.. 7-102-35 (48773) ityuktvA sainikAnsarvA~njayApekShI narAdhipaH. pArthamAbhAShya saMrambhAdidaM vachanamabravIt.. 7-102-36 (48774) pArtha yachChikShitaM te.astraM divyaM pArthivameva cha. taddarshaya mayi kShipraM yadi jAto.asi pANQDunA.. 7-102-37 (48775) yadbalaM tava vIryaM cha keshavasya tathaiva cha. tatkuruShva mayi kShipraM pashyAmastava pauruSham.. 7-102-38 (48776) asmatparokShaM karmANi kR^itAni pravadanti te. svAmisatkArayuktAni yAni tAnIha darshaya.. .. 7-102-39 (48777) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe dvyadikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 102 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-102-1 nAstItyarjunottejanam.. 5-102-6 AkShepaM sharagocharam.. 5-102-15 kAryasya jayadrathavadharUpasya.. 5-102-19 kR^ityarUpamatyantakaraNIyam.. 5-102-29 padaM pratipadam. gantuM padavIM kalahasya cha iti ka. pAThaH.. 5-102-39 svAmisatkAro vIrapradhAno.ayamiti yadanyaiH satkaraNaM tena yuktAni yogyatAM gatAni.. 5-102-102 dvyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 103

.. shrIH ..

7.103. adhyAyaH 103

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

arjunena duryodhanaparAjayaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-103-0 (48778) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-103-0x (4527) evamuktvA.arjunaM rAjA tribhirmarmAtigaiH sharaiH. abhyavidhyanmahAvegaishchaturbhishchaturo hayAn.. 7-103-1 (48779) vAsudevaM cha dashabhiH pratyavidhyatstanAntare. pratodaM chAsya bhallena chChittvA bhUmAvapAtayat.. 7-103-2 (48780) taM chaturdashabhiH pArthashchitrapu~NkhaiH shilAshitaiH. avidhyattUrNamavyagraste chAbhrashyanta varmaNi.. 7-103-3 (48781) teShAM naiShphalyamAlokya punarnava cha pa~ncha cha. prAhiNonnishitAnbANAMste chAbhrashyanta varmaNaH.. 7-103-4 (48782) aShTAviMshAMstu tAnbANAnastAnviprekShya niShphalAn. abravItparavIraghnaH kR^iShNo.arjunamidaM vachaH.. 7-103-5 (48783) adR^iShTapUrvaM pashyAmi shilAnAmiva sarpaNam. tvayA sampreShitAH pArtha nArthaM kurvanti patriNaH.. 7-103-6 (48784) kachchidgANDIvajaH prANastathaiva bharatarShabha. muShTishcha te yathA pUrvaM bhujayoshcha balaM tava.. 7-103-7 (48785) na vA kachchidayaM kAlaH prAptaH syAdadya pashchimaH. tava chaivAsya shatroshcha tanmamAchakShva pR^ichChataH.. 7-103-8 (48786) vismayo me mahAnpArtha tava dR^iShTvA sharAnimAn. vyarthAnnipatitAnsa~Nkhe duryodhanarathaM prati.. 7-103-9 (48787) vajrAshanisamA ghorAH parakAyAvabhedinaH. sharAH kurvanti te nArthaM pArtha kA.adya viDambanA.. 7-103-10 (48788) arjuna uvAcha. 7-103-11x (4528) droNena niyataM kR^iShNa dhArtarAShTre nidarshitam. ante vihitamastrANAmetatkavachadhAraNam.. 7-103-11 (48789) asminnantarhitaM kR^iShNa trailokyamapi varmaNi. eko droNo hi vaidaitadahaM tasmAchcha sattamAt.. 7-103-12 (48790) na shakyametatkavachaM bANairbhettuM katha~nchana. api vajreNa govinda svayaM maghavatA yudhi.. 7-103-13 (48791) jAnaMstvamapi vai kR^iShNa mAM vimohayase katham. yadvR^ittaM triShu lokeShu yachcha keshava vartate.. 7-103-14 (48792) yathA bhaviShyadyachchaiva tatsarvaM viditaM tava. na tvidaM veda vai kashchidyathA tvaM madhusUdana.. 7-103-15 (48793) eSha duryodhanaH kR^iShNa droNena vihitAmimAm. tiShThatyabhItavatsa~Nkhye bibhratkavachadhAraNAm.. 7-103-16 (48794) yattvatra vihitaM kAryaM naiSha tadvetti mAdhava. strIvadeSha bibhartyetAM yuktAM kavachadhAraNAm.. 7-103-17 (48795) pashya bAhvoshcha me vIryaM dhanuShashcha janArdana. parAjayiShye kauravyaM kavachenApi rakShitam.. 7-103-18 (48796) idama~Ngirase prAdAddevesho varma bhAsvaram. tasmAdvR^ihaspatiH prApa tataH prApa purandaraH.. 7-103-19 (48797) punardadau surapatirmahyaM varma sasa~Ngraham. daivaM yadyasya varmaitadbrahmaNA vA svayaM kR^itam. nainaM gopsyati durbuddhimadya bANahataM mayA.. 7-103-20 (48798) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-103-21x (4529) evamuktvA.arjuno bANAnabhimantrya vyakarShayat. mAnavAstreNa mAnArhastIkShNAvaraNabhedinA.. 7-103-21 (48799) vikR^iShyamANAMstenaiva dhanurmadhyagatA~nCharAn. tAnasyAstreNa chichCheda drauNiH sarvAstraghAtinA.. 7-103-22 (48800) tAnnikR^ittAniShUndR^iShTvA dUrato brahmavAdinA. nyavedayatkeshavAya vismitaH shvetavAhanaH.. 7-103-23 (48801) naitadastraM mayA shakyaM dviH prayoktuM janArdana. astraM mAmeva hanyAddhi hanyAchchApi balaM mama.. 7-103-24 (48802) tato duryodhanaH kR^iShNau navabhirnavabhiH sharaiH. avidhyata raNe rAja~nsharairAshIviShopamaiH.. 7-103-25 (48803) bhUya evAbhyavarShachcha samare kR^iShNapANDavau. sharavarSheNa mahatA tato.ahR^iShyanta tAvakAH. chakrurvAditraninadAnsiMhanAdaravAMstathA.. 7-103-26 (48804) tataH kruddho raNe pArthaH sR^ikviNI parisaMlihan. nApashyachcha tato.asyA~NgaM yanna syAdvarmarakShitam.. 7-103-27 (48805) tato.asya nishitairbANaiH sumuktairantakopamaiH. hayAMshchakAra nirdehAnubhau cha pArShNisArathI.. 7-103-28 (48806) dhanurasyAchChinattUrNaM hastAvApaM cha vIryavAn. rathaM cha shakalIkartuM savyasAchI prachakrame.. 7-103-29 (48807) duryodhanaM cha bANAbhyAM tIkShNAbhyAM virathIkR^itam. AviddhyaddhastatalayorubhayorarjunastadA.. 7-103-30 (48808) [prayatnaj~no hi kauntayo nakhamAMsAntareShubhiH. sa vedanAbhirAvignaH palAyanaparAyaNaH..] 7-103-31 (48809) taM kR^ichChrAmApadaM prAptaM dR^iShTvA paramadhanvinaH. samApetuH parIpsanto dhana~njayasharArditam.. 7-103-32 (48810) taM rathairbahusAhasraiH kalpitaiH ku~njarairhayaiH. padAtyoghaishcha saMrabdhaiH parivavrurdhana~njayam.. 7-103-33 (48811) atha nArjunagovindau na ratho vA vyadR^ishyata. astravarSheNa mahatA sharaughaishchApi saMvR^itau.. 7-103-34 (48812) tato.arjuno.astravIryeNa nijaghne tAM varUthinIm. tatra vya~NgI kR^itAH petuH shatasho.atha rathadvipAH.. 7-103-35 (48813) te hatA hanyamAnAshcha nyagR^ihNaMstaM rathottamam. sa rathaH stambhitastasthau kroshamAtre samantataH.. 7-103-36 (48814) tato.arjunaM vR^iShNivIrastvarito vAkyamabravIt. dhanurviShphArayAtyarthamahaM dhmAsyAmi chAmbujam.. 7-103-37 (48815) tato viShphArya balavadgANDIvaM jaghnivAnripUn. mahatA sharavarSheNa talashabdena chArjunaH.. 7-103-38 (48816) pA~nchajanyaM cha balavAndadhmau tAreNa keshavaH. rajasA dhvastapakShmAntaH prasvinnavadano bhR^isham.. 7-103-39 (48817) `tenAchyutoShThapuTapUritamArutena sha~NkhAntarodaravivR^iddhaviniHsR^itena. nAdena sAsuraviyatsuralokapAla-- mudvignamIshvara jagatsphuTatIva sarvam'.. 7-103-40 (48818) tasya sha~Nkhasya nAdena dhanuSho niHsvanena cha. niHsatvAshcha sasatvAshcha kShitau petustadA janAH.. 7-103-41 (48819) tairvimukto ratho reje vAyvIrita ivAmbudaH. jayadrathasya goptArastataH kShubdhAH sahAnugAH.. 7-103-42 (48820) te dR^iShTvA sahasA pArthaM goptAraH saindhavasya tu. chakrurnAdAnmaheShvAsAH kampayanto vasundharAm.. 7-103-43 (48821) bANashabdaravAMshchogrAnvimishrA~nsha~NkhaniHsvanaiH. prAdushchakrurmahAtmAnaH siMhanAdaravAnapi.. 7-103-44 (48822) taM shrutvA ninadaM ghoraM tAvakAnAM samutthitam. pradadhmatuH sha~Nkhavarau vAsudevadhana~njayau.. 7-103-45 (48823) tena shabdena mahatA pUriteyaM vasundharA. sashailA sArNavadvIpA sapAtAlA vishAmpate.. 7-103-46 (48824) sa shabdo bharatashreShTha vyApya sarvA disho dasha. pratisasvAna tatraiva kurupANDavayorbale.. 7-103-47 (48825) tAvakA rathinastatra dR^iShTvA kR^iShNadhana~njayau. sambhramaM paramaM prAptAstvaramANA mahArathAH.. 7-103-48 (48826) atha kR^iShNau mahAbhAgau tAvakA vIkShya daMshitau. abhyadravanta sa~NkruddhAstadadbhutamivAbhavat.. .. 7-103-49 (48827) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe tryadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 103 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-103-7 gANDIvato bANAH iti Da.pAThaH. gaNDIvataH prANA iti ka.Ta.pAThaH.. 5-103-17 yuktAM anyaprayuktAm.. 5-103-20 sasa~NgrahaM sopadesham. daivaM daivaH kR^itam.. 5-103-28 nirdehAn nikR^ittAvayavAn.. 5-103-31 nakhamAMsAntare iShubhirAviddhyaditi pUrveNAnvayaH. sandhirArShaH. ayaM shlokaH jha.pATha evAsti.. 5-103-36 kroshamAtre saiMdhavatorthAt.. 5-103-103 tryadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 104

.. shrIH ..

7.104. adhyAyaH 104

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

arjunasya bhUrishravaHprabhR^itibhiraShTabhiryuddham.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-104-0 (48828) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-104-0x (4530) tAvakAstvabhisamprekShya vR^iShNyandhakarUdvahau. satvarAstau jighAMsantastathaiva vijayaH parAn.. 7-104-1 (48829) suvarNachitrairvaiyAghraiH svanavadbhirmahArathaiH. dIpayanto dishaH sarvA jvaladbhiriva pAvakaiH.. 7-104-2 (48830) rukmapu~Nkhaishcha duShprekShyaiH kArmukaiH pR^ithivIpate. kUjadbhiratulAnnAdanroShitairuragairiva.. 7-104-3 (48831) bhUrishravAH shalaH karNo vR^iShaseno jayadrathaH. kR^ipashcha madrarAjashcha droNishcha rathinAM varaH.. 7-104-4 (48832) te pibanta ivAkAshamashvairaShTau mahArathAH. vyarAjayandasha disho vaiyArghrairhemachandrakaiH.. 7-104-5 (48833) te daMshitAH susaMrabdhA rathairmeghaughaniHsvanaiH. samAvR^iNvandasha dishaH pArthasya nishitaiH sharaiH.. 7-104-6 (48834) kaulUtakA hayAshchitrA vahantastAnmahArathAn. vyashobhanta tadA shIghrA dIpayanto disho dasha.. 7-104-7 (48835) AjAneyairmahAvegairnAnAdeshasamutthitaiH. pArvatIyairnadIjaishcha saindhavaishcha hayottamaiH.. 7-104-8 (48836) kuruyodhavarA rAjaMstava putraM parIpsavaH. dhana~njayarathaM shIghraM sarvataH samupAdravan.. 7-104-9 (48837) te pragR^ihya mahAsha~NkhAndadhmuH puruShasattamAH. pUrayanto divaM rAjanpR^ithivIM cha sasAgarAm.. 7-104-10 (48838) tathaiva dadhmatuH sha~Nkhau vAsudevadhana~njayau. pravarau sarvadevAnAM sarvasha~Nkhavarau bhuvi.. 7-104-11 (48839) devadattaM cha kaunteyaH pA~nchajanyaM cha keshavaH. shabdastu devadattasya dhana~njayasamIritaH.. 7-104-12 (48840) pR^ithivIM chAntarikShaM cha dishashchaiva samAvR^iNot. tathaiva pA~nchajanyo.api vAsudevasamIritaH.. 7-104-13 (48841) sarvashabdAnatikramya pUrayAmAsa rodasI. tasmiMstathA vartamAne dAruNe nAdasa~Nkule.. 7-104-14 (48842) bhIrUNAM trAsajanane shUrANAM harShavardhane. pravAditAsu bherIShu jharjhareShvAnakeShu cha.. 7-104-15 (48843) mR^ida~NgeShvapi rAjendra vAdyamAneShvenakashaH. mahArathasamAkhyAtA duryodhanahitaiShiNaH.. 7-104-16 (48844) amR^iShyamANAstaM shabdaM kruddhAH paramadhanvinaH. karNAdayo maheShvAsAstvatsainyaparirakShiNaH.. 7-104-17 (48845) amarShitA mahAsha~NkhAndadhmurvIrA mahArathAH. kR^ite pratikariShyantaH keshavasyArjunasya cha.. 7-104-18 (48846) babhUva tava tatsainyaM sha~Nkhashabde samIrite. udvignarathanAgAshvamasvasthamiva chAbhibhoM.. 7-104-19 (48847) tatprahR^iShTajanAbAdhaM bherIsha~NkhaninAditam. babhUva bhR^ishamudvignaM nirghAtairiva saMvR^itam.. 7-104-20 (48848) sa shabdaH sumahAnrAjandishaH sarvA vyanAdayat. trAsayAmAsa tatsainyaM yugAnta iva sambhR^itaH.. 7-104-21 (48849) tato duryodhano.aShTau cha rAjAnaste mahArathAH. jayadrathasya rakShArthaM pANDavaM paryavArayan.. 7-104-22 (48850) tato drauNistrisaptatyA vAsudevamatADayat. arjunaM cha tribhirbhallairdhvajamashvAMshcha pa~nchabhiH.. 7-104-23 (48851) tamarjunaH pR^iShatkAnAM shataiH Sha~NbhiratADayat. atyarthamiva sa~NkruddhaH pratividdhe janArdane.. 7-104-24 (48852) karNaM cha dashabhirviddhvA vR^iShasenaM tribhistathA. shalyasya sasharaM chApaM muShTau chichCheda vIryavAn.. 7-104-25 (48853) gR^ihItvA dhanuranyattu shalyo vivyAdha pANDavam. bhUrishravAstribhirbANairhemapu~NkhaiH shilAshitaiH.. 7-104-26 (48854) karNo dvAtriMshatA chaiva vR^iShasenashcha saptabhiH. jayadrathastrisaptatyA kR^ipashcha dashabhiH sharaiH. madrAjashcha dashabhirvivyadhuH phalgunaM raNe.. 7-104-27 (48855) tataH sharANAM ShaShTyA tu drauNiH pArthamavAkirat. vAsudevaM cha viMshatyA punaH pArthaM cha pa~nchabhiH.. 7-104-28 (48856) prahasaMstu naravyAghraH shvetAshvaH kR^iShNasArathiH. pratyavidhyatsa tAnsarvAndarshayanpANilAghavam.. 7-104-29 (48857) karNaM dvAdashabhirvidvvA vR^iShasenaM tribhiH sharaiH. shalyasya sasharaM chApaM muShTideshe vyakR^intata.. 7-104-30 (48858) saumadattiM tribhirvidvvA shalyaM cha dashabhiH sharaiH. shitairagnishikhAkArairdrauNiM vivyAdha chAShTabhiH.. 7-104-31 (48859) gautamaM pa~nchaviMshatyA saindhavaM cha shatena ha. punardrauNiM cha saptatyA sharANAM so.abhyatADayat.. 7-104-32 (48860) bhUrishravAstu sa~NkruddhaH pratodaM chichChide hareH. arjunaM cha trisaptatyA bANAnAmAjaghAna ha.. 7-104-33 (48861) tataH sharashataistIkShNaistAnarInshvetavAhanaH. pratyaShedhaddrutaM kruddho mahAvAto ghanAniva.. .. 7-104-34 (48862) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe chaturadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 104 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-104-2 vaiyAghrairvyAghracharmachitraiH.. 5-104-7 kaulatakAH kulUtadeshajAH pArvatIyasamAnalakShaNAH.. 5-104-8 AjAneyaiH kulInaiH. nadIjairnadItIrajaiH.. 5-104-104 chaturadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 105

.. shrIH ..

7.105. adhyAyaH 105

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sa~njayena rathAnAM dhvajavarNanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-105-0 (48863) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-105-0x (4531) dhvajAnbahuvidhAkArAnbhrAjamAnAnatishriyA. pArthAnAM mAmakAnAM cha tAnmamAchakShva sa~njaya.. 7-105-1 (48864) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-105-2x (4532) dhvajAnbahuvidhAkArA~nshR^iNu teShAM mahAtmanAm. rUpato varNatashchaiva nAmatashcha nibodha me.. 7-105-2 (48865) teShAM tu rathamukhyAnAM ratheShu vividhA dhvajAH. pratyadR^ishyanta rAjendra jvalitA iva pAvakAH.. 7-105-3 (48866) kA~nchanAH kA~nchanApIDAH kA~nchanasragala~NkR^itAH. kA~nchanAnIva shR^i~NgANi kA~nchanasya mahAgireH.. 7-105-4 (48867) anekavarNA vividhA dhvajAH paramashobhanAH. te dhvajAH saMvR^itAsteShAM patAkAbhiH samantataH. nAnAvarNavirANAbhiH shushubhuH sarvato vR^itAH.. 7-105-5 (48868) patAkAshcha tatastAstu shvasanena samIritAH. nR^ityamAnA vyadR^ishyanta ra~Ngamadhye vilAsikAH.. 7-105-6 (48869) indrAyudhasavarNAbhAH patAkA bharatarShabha. dodhUyamAnA rathinAM shobhayanti mahArathAn.. 7-105-7 (48870) siMhalA~NgUla ugrAsyo dhvajo vAnaralakShaNaH. dhana~njayasya sa~NgrAme pratyadR^ishyata bhArata.. 7-105-8 (48871) sa vAnaradhvajo rAjanpatAkAbhirala~NkR^itaH. trAsayAmAsa tatsainyaM dhvajo gANDIvadhanvanaH.. 7-105-9 (48872) tathaiva siMhalA~NgUlaM droNaputrasya bhArata. dhvajAghraM samapashyAma bAlasUryasamaprabham.. 7-105-10 (48873) kA~nchanaM pavanoddhUtaM shakradhvajasamaprabham. nandanaM kauravendrANAM drauNerlakShma samuchChritam.. 7-105-11 (48874) hastikakShyA punarhaimI babhUvAdhiratherdhvajaH. Ahave khaM mahArAja dadR^ishe pUrayanniva.. 7-105-12 (48875) patAkI kA~nchanaH sragvI dhvajaH karNasya saMyuge. nR^ityatIva rathopasthe shvasanena samIritaH.. 7-105-13 (48876) AchAryasya tu pANDUnAM brAhmaNasya tapasvinaH. govR^iSho gautamasyAsItkR^ipasya supariShkR^itaH.. 7-105-14 (48877) sa tena bhrAjate rAjangovR^iSheNa mahArathaH. tripuraghnaratho yadvadgovR^iSheNa virAjatA.. 7-105-15 (48878) mayUro vR^iShasenasya kA~nchano maNiratnavAn. vyAhariShyannivAtiShThatsenAgramupashobhayan.. 7-105-16 (48879) tena tasya ratho bhAti mayUreNa mahAtmanaH. yathA skandasya rAjendra mayUreNa virAjatA.. 7-105-17 (48880) madrarAjasya shalyasya dhvajAgre.agnishikhAmiva. sauvarNIM pratipashyAma sItAmapratimAM shubhAm.. 7-105-18 (48881) sA sItA bhrAjate tasya rathamAsthAya mAriSha. sarvabIjavirUDheva yathA sItA shriyA vR^itA.. 7-105-19 (48882) varAhaH sindhurAjasya rAjato.abhivirAjate. dhvajAgre lohitA~NgAbho hemajAlapariShkR^itaH.. 7-105-20 (48883) shushubhe ketunA tena rAjatena jayadrathaH. yathA devAsure yuddhe purA pUShA sma shobhate.. 7-105-21 (48884) saumadatteH punaryUpo yaj~nashIlasya dhImataH. dhvajaH sUrya ivAbhAti somashchAtra pradR^ishyate.. 7-105-22 (48885) sa yUpaH kA~nchano rAjansaumadattervirAjate. rAjasUye makhashreShThe yathA yUpaH samuchChritaH.. 7-105-23 (48886) shalasya tu mahArAja rAjato dvirado mahAn. ketuH kA~nchanachitrA~NgairmayUrairupashobhitaH.. 7-105-24 (48887) sa ketuH shobhayAmAsa sainyaM te bharatarShabha. yathA shveto mahAnAgo devarAjachamUM tathA.. 7-105-25 (48888) nAgo maNimayo rAj~no dhvajaH kanakasaMvR^itaH. ki~NkiNIshatasaMhAdo bhrAjaMshchitro rathottame.. 7-105-26 (48889) vyabhrAjata bhR^ishaM rAjanputrastava vishAmpate. dhvajena mahatA sa~Nkhye kurUNAmR^iShabhastadA.. 7-105-27 (48890) navaite tava vAhinyAmuchChritAH paramadhvajAH. vyadIpayaMste pR^itanAM yugAntAdityasannibhAH.. 7-105-28 (48891) dashamastvarjunasyAsIdeka eva mahAkapiH. adIpyatArjuno yena himavAniva shambhunA.. 7-105-29 (48892) tatashchitrANi shubhrANi sumahAnti mahArathAH. kArmukANyAdadustUrNamarjunArthe parantapAH.. 7-105-30 (48893) tathaiva dhanurAyachChatpArthaH shatruvinAshanaH. gANDIvaM divyakarmA tadrAjandurmantrite tava.. 7-105-31 (48894) tavAparAdhAdrAjAno nihatA bahusho yudhi. nAnAdigbhyaH samAhUtAH sahayAH sarathadvipAH.. 7-105-32 (48895) teShAmAsIdvyAtikShepo gajartAmitaretaram. duryodhanamukhAnAM cha pANDUnAmR^iShabhasya cha.. 7-105-33 (48896) tatrAdbhutaM paraM chakre kaunteyaH kR^iShNasArathiH. yadeko bahubhiH sArghaM samAgachChadabhItavat.. 7-105-34 (48897) ashobhata mahAbAhurgANDIvaM vikShipandhanuH. jigIShustAnnaravyAghro jighAMsushcha jayadratham.. 7-105-35 (48898) tatrArjuno naravyAghraH sharairmuktaiH sahasrashaH. adR^ishyAMstAvakAnyodhAnprachakre shatrutApanaH.. 7-105-36 (48899) tataste.api naravyAghrAH pArthaM sarve mahArathAH. adR^ishyaM samare chakruH sAyakaughaiH samantataH.. 7-105-37 (48900) saMvR^ite narasiMhaistu kUrUNAmR^iShabhe.arjune. mahAnAsItsamudbhUtastasya sainyasya niHsvanaH.. .. 7-105-38 (48901) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe pa~nchAdhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 105 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-105-2 rUpamAkAraH.. 5-105-10 dhvajAgraM dhvajamukhyam.. 5-105-11 kA~nchanam kA~nchanamayam.. 5-105-16 vyAhariShyanvadiShyan.. 5-105-33 vyatikShepaH anyonyAbhighAtaH.. 5-105-105 pa~nchAdhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 106

.. shrIH ..

7.106. adhyAyaH 106

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

droNayudhiShThirayoryuddham.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-106-0 (48902) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-106-0x (4533) arjune saindhavaM prApte bhAradvAjena saMvR^itAH. pA~nchAlAH kurubhiH sArdhaM kimakurvata sQa~njaya.. 7-106-1 (48903) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-106-2x (4534) aparAhNe mahArAja sa~Ngrame romaharShaNe. pA~nchAlAnAM kurUNAM cha droNadyUtamavartata.. 7-106-2 (48904) pA~nchAlA hi jighAMsanto droNaM saMhR^iShTachetasaH. abhyamu~nchanta garjantaH sharavarShANi mAriSha.. 7-106-3 (48905) tatastula tumulasteShAM sa~NgrAmo.avartatAdbhutaH. pA~nchAlAnAM kurUNAM cha ghoro devAsuropamaH.. 7-106-4 (48906) sarve droNarathaM prApya pA~nchAlAH pANDavaiH saha. tadanIkaM bibhitsanto mahAstrANi vyadarshayan.. 7-106-5 (48907) droNasya rathaparyantaM rathino rathamAsthitAH. kampayanto.abhyavartanta vegamAsthAya madhyamam.. 7-106-6 (48908) tamabhyayAdbR^ihatkShatraH kekayAnAM mahArathaH. vimu~nchannishitAnbANAnmahendrAshanisannibhAn.. 7-106-7 (48909) taM tu pratyudyayau shIghraM kShemadhUrtirmahAyashAH. vimu~nchannishitAnbANA~nshatasho.atha sahasrashaH.. 7-106-8 (48910) dhR^iShTaketushcha chedInAmR^iShabho.atibaloditaH. tvarito.abhyadravaddroNaM mahendramiva shambaraH.. 7-106-9 (48911) tamApatantaM sahasA vyAditAsyamivAntakam. vIradhanvA maheShvAsastvaramANaH samabhyayAt.. 7-106-10 (48912) yudhiShThiraM mahArAjaM jigIShuM samavasthitam. sahAnIkaM tato droNo nyavArayata vIryavAn.. 7-106-11 (48913) nakulaM kushalaM yuddhe parAkrantaM parAkramI. abhyagachChatsamAyAntaM vikarNaste sutaH prabho.. 7-106-12 (48914) sahadevaM tathA.a.ayAntaM durmukhaH shatrukarshanaH. shairaranekasAhasraiH
