samavAkiradAshugaiH.. 7-106-13 (48915) sAtyakiM tu naravyAghraM vyAghradattastvavArayat. sharaiH sunishitaistIkShNaiH kampayanvai muhurmuhuH.. 7-106-14 (48916) draupadeyAnnaravyAghrAnmu~nchataH sAyakottamAn. saMrabdhAnrathinaH shreShThAnsaumadattiravArayat.. 7-106-15 (48917) bhImasenaM tadA kruddhaM bhImarUpo bhayAnakaH. pratyavArayadAyAntamArshyashR^i~NgirmahAbalaH.. 7-106-16 (48918) tayoH samabhavadyuddhaM nararAkShasayormR^idhe. yAdR^igeva purAvR^ittaM rAmarAvaNayornR^ipa.. 7-106-17 (48919) tato yudhiShThiro droNaM navatyA nataparvaNAm. Ajaghne bharatashreShThaH sarvamarmasu bhArata.. 7-106-18 (48920) taM droNaH pa~nchaviMshatyA nijaghAna stanAntare. roShito bharatashreShTha kaunteyena yashasvinA.. 7-106-19 (48921) adR^ishyaM samare chakre rAjAnaM sAyakottamaiH. sAshvasUtadhvajaM droNaH pashyatAM sarvadhanvinAm.. 7-106-20 (48922) tA~nsharAndroNamuktAMstu sharavarSheNa pANDavaH. avArayata dharmAtmA darshayanpANilAghavam.. 7-106-21 (48923) tato droNo bhR^ishaM kruddho darmarAjasya saMyuge. chichCheda samare dhanvI dhanustasya mahAtmanaH.. 7-106-22 (48924) athainaM ChinnadhanvAnaM tvaramANo mahArathaH. sharairanekasAhasraiH pUrayAmAsa sarvataH.. 7-106-23 (48925) adR^ishyaM vIkShya rAjAnaM bhAradvAjasya sAyakaiH. sarvabhUtAnyamanyanta hatameva yudhiShThiram.. 7-106-24 (48926) kechichchainamamanyanta tathaiva vimukhIkR^itam. hR^ito rAjeti rAjendra brAhmaNena mahAtmanA.. 7-106-25 (48927) sa kR^ichChraM paramaM prApto dharmarAjo yudhiShThiraH. tyaktvA tatkArmukaM ChinnaM bhAradvAjena saMyuge. Adade.anyaddhanurdivyaM bhAraghnaM vegavattaram.. 7-106-26 (48928) tatastAnsAyakAMstatra doNanunnAnsahasrashaH. chichCheda samare vIrastadadbhutamivAbhavat.. 7-106-27 (48929) ChittvA tu tA~nsharAnrAjakrodhasaMraktalochanaH. shaktaM jagrAha samare girINAmapi dAriNIm. svarNadaNDAM mahAghorAmaShTaghaNTAM bhayAvahAm.. 7-106-28 (48930) samutkShipya cha tAM hR^iShTo nanAda balavadbalI. nAdena sarvabhUtAni trAsayanniva bhArata.. 7-106-29 (48931) shaktiM samudyatAM dR^iShTvA dharmarAjena saMyuge. svasti droNAya sahasA sarvabhUtAnyathAbruvan.. 7-106-30 (48932) sA rAjabhujanirmuktA nirmuktoragasannibhA. prajvAlayantI gaganaM dishaH sapradishastathA. droNAntikamanuprAptA dIptAsyA pannagI yathA.. 7-106-31 (48933) tAmApatantIM sahasA dR^iShTvA droNo vishAmpate. prAdushchakrai tato brAhmamastramastravidAM varaH.. 7-106-32 (48934) tadastraM bhasmasAtkR^itvA tAM shaktiM ghoradarshanAm. jagAma syandanaM tUrNaM pANDavasya yashasvinaH.. 7-106-33 (48935) tato yudhiShThiro rAjA droNAstraM tatsamudyatam. ashAmayanmahAprAj~no brahmAstreNaiva mAriSha.. 7-106-34 (48936) vidvvA taM cha raNe droNaM pa~nchabhirnataparvabhiH. kShurapreNa sutIkShNena chichChedAsya mahaddhanuH.. 7-106-35 (48937) tadapAsya dhanushChinnaM droNaH kShatriyamardanaH. gadAM chikShepa sahasA dharmaputrAya mAriSha.. 7-106-36 (48938) tAmApatantIM sahasA gadAM dR^iShTvA yudhiShThiraH. gadAmevAgrahItkruddhashchikShepa cha parantapa.. 7-106-37 (48939) te gade sahasA mukte samAsAdya parasparam. sa~NgharShAtpAvakaM muktvA sameyAtAM mahItale.. 7-106-38 (48940) tato droNo bhR^ishaM kruddho dharmarAjasya mAriSha. chaturbhirnishitaistIkShNairhayA~njaghne sharottamaiH.. 7-106-39 (48941) chichChedaikena bhallena dhanushchendradhvajopamam. ketumekena chichCheda pANDavaM chArdayattribhiH.. 7-106-40 (48942) hatAshvAttula rathAttUrNamavaplutya yudhiShThiraH. tasthAvUrdhvabhujo rAjA vyAyudho bharatarShabha.. 7-106-41 (48943) virathaM taM samAlokya vyAyudhaM cha visheShataH. droNo vyamohayachChatrUnsarvasainyAni chAbhibho.. 7-106-42 (48944) mu~nchaMshcheShugaNAMstIkShNA.Nllaghuhasto dR^iDhavrataH. abhidudrAva rAjAnaM siMho mR^igamivolbaNaH.. 7-106-43 (48945) tamabhidrutamAlokya droNenAmitraghAtinA. hAheti sumahA~nshabdaH pANDUnAM samajAyata.. 7-106-44 (48946) hR^ito rAjA hR^ito rAjA bhAradvAjena mAriSha. ityAMsItsumahA~nshabdaH pANDUsainyasya sarvataH.. 7-106-45 (48947) tatastvaritamAruhya sahadevarathaM nR^ipaH. apAyAjjavanairashvaiH kuntIputro yudhiShThiraH.. .. 7-106-46 (48948) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe ShaDadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 106 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-106-2 droNe yuddhamavartata ka. ~Na. pAThaH. ghoraM yuddhamavartata iti Ta.pAThaH.. 5-106-6 kampayanto bhuvamiti sheShaH.. 5-106-15 saumadattiH shalaH.. 5-106-25 ito rAjeti amanyantetyanuSha~NgaH.. 5-106-106 ShQaDadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..

7.107. adhyAyaH 107

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sa~NkulayuddhavarNanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-107-0 (48949) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-107-0x (4535) bR^ihatkShatramathAyAntaM kekayaM dR^iDhavikramam. kShemadhUrtirmahArAja vivyAdhorasi mArgaNaiH.. 7-107-1 (48950) bR^ihatkShatrastu taM rAjA navatyA nataparvaNAm. Ajaghne tvarito rAjandroNAnIkabibhitsayA.. 7-107-2 (48951) kShemadhUrtistu sa~NkruddhaH kekayasya mahAtmanaH. dhanushchichCheda bhallena pItena nishitena ha.. 7-107-3 (48952) athainaM ChinnadhanvAnaM shareNAnataparvaNA. vivyAdha samare tUrNaM pravaraM sarvadhanvinAm.. 7-107-4 (48953) athAnyaddhanurAdAya bR^ihatkShatro hasanniva. vyashvasUtarathaM chakre kShamadUrtiM mahAratham.. 7-107-5 (48954) tato.apareNa bhallena pItena nishitena cha. jahAra nR^ipateH kAyAchChiro.ajvalitakuNQDalam.. 7-107-6 (48955) tachChinnaM sahasA tasya shiraH ku~nchitamUrdhajam. sakirITaM mahIM prApya babhau jyotirivAmbarAt.. 7-107-7 (48956) taM nihatya raNe hR^iShTo bR^ihatkShatro mahArathaH. sahasA.abhyapatatsainyaM tAvakaM pArthakAraNAt.. 7-107-8 (48957) dhR^iShTaketuM tathA.a.ayAntaM droNahetoH parAkramI. vIradhanvA maheShvAso vArayAmAsa bhArata.. 7-107-9 (48958) tau parasparamAsAdya sharadaMShTrau tarasvinau. sharairanekasAhasreranyonyamabhijaghnatuH.. 7-107-10 (48959) tAvubhau narashArdUlau yuyudhAte parasparam. mahAvane tIvramadau vAraNAviva yUthapau.. 7-107-11 (48960) girigahvaramAsAdya shArdUlAviva roShitau. yuyudhAte mahAvIryau parasparajighAMsayA.. 7-107-12 (48961) tadyuddhamAsIttumulaM prekShaNIyaM vishAmpate. siddhachAraNasa~NghAnAM vismayAdbhutadarshanam.. 7-107-13 (48962) vIradhanvA tataH kruddho dhR^iShTaketoH sharAsanam. dvidhA chichCheda bhallena prahasanniva bhArata.. 7-107-14 (48963) tadutsR^ijya dhanuchChinnaM chedirAjo mahArathaH. shaktiM jagrAha vipulAM hemadaNDAmayasmayIm.. 7-107-15 (48964) tAM tu shaktiM mahAvIryAM dorbhyAmAyasya bhArata. chikShepa sahasA yatto vIradhanvarathaM prati.. 7-107-16 (48965) tayA tu vIraghAtinyA shaktyA tvabhihato bhR^isham. nirbhinnahR^idayastUrNaM nipapAta rathAnmahIm.. 7-107-17 (48966) tasminvinihate vIre traigartAnAM mahArathe. balaM te.abhajyata vibho pANDaveyaiH samantataH.. 7-107-18 (48967) sahadeve tataH ShaShTiM sAyakAndurmukho.akShipat. nanAda cha mahAnAdaM tarjayanpANDavaM raNe.. 7-107-19 (48968) mAdreyastu tataH kruddho durmukhaM cha shitaiH sharaiH. bhrAtA bhrAtaramAyatto vivyAdha prahasanniva.. 7-107-20 (48969) taM raNe rabhasaM dR^iShTvA sahadevaM mahAbalam. durmukho navabhirbANaistADayAmAsa bhArata.. 7-107-21 (48970) durmukhasya tu bhallena chChittvA ketuM mahAbalaH. jaghAna chaturo vAhAMshchaturbhirnishitaiH sharaiH.. 7-107-22 (48971) athApareNa bhallena pItena nishitena ha. chichCheda sAratheH kAyAchChiro jvalitakuNDalam.. 7-107-23 (48972) kShurapreNa cha tIkShNena kauravyasya mahaddhanuH. sahadevo raNe ChittvA taM cha vivyAdha pa~nchabhiH.. 7-107-24 (48973) hatAshvaM tu rathaM tyaktvA durmukho vimanAstadA. Aruroha rathaM rAjanniramitrasya bhArata.. 7-107-25 (48974) sahadevastataH kruddho niramitraM mahAhave. jaghAna pR^ithudhAreNa bhallena paravIrahA.. 7-107-26 (48975) sa papAta rathopasthAnniramitro janeshvaraH. trigartarAjasya suto vyathayaMstava vAhinIm.. 7-107-27 (48976) taM tu hatvA mahAbAhuH sahadevo vyarochata. yathA dAsharathI rAmaH kharaM hatvA mahAbalam.. 7-107-28 (48977) hAhAkAro mahAnAsIttrigartAnAM janeshvara. rAjaputraM hataM dR^iShTvA niramitraM mahAratham.. 7-107-29 (48978) nakulaste sutaM rAjanvikarNaM pR^ithulochanam. muhUrtAjjitavA.Nlloke tadadbhutamivAbhavat.. 7-107-30 (48979) sAtyakiM vyAghradattastu sharaiH sannataparvabhiH. chakre.adR^ishyaM sAshvasUtaM sadhvajaM pR^itanAntare.. 7-107-31 (48980) tAnnivArya sharA~nshUraH shaineyaH kR^itahastavat. sAshvasUtadhvajaM bANairvyAghradattamapAtayat.. 7-107-32 (48981) kumAre nihate tasminmAgadhasya sute prabho. mAgadhAH sarvato yattA yuyudhAnamupAdravan.. 7-107-33 (48982) visR^ijantaH sharAMshchaiva tomarAMshcha sahasrashaH. miNDipAlAMstathA prAsAnmudrAnmusalAnapi.. ayodhayanraNe shUrAH sAtvataM yuddhadurmadam.. 7-107-34 (48983) tAMstu sarvAnsa balavAnsAtyakiryuddhadurmadaH. nAtikR^ichChrAddhasanneva vijigye puruSharShabhaH.. 7-107-35 (48984) mAgadhAndravato dR^iShTvA hatasheShAnsamantataH. balaM te.abhajyata vibho yuyudhAnasharArditam.. 7-107-36 (48985) nAshayitvA raNe sainyaM tvadIyaM tu samantataH. vidhunvAno dhanuHshreShThaM vyabhrAjata mahAyashAH.. 7-107-37 (48986) bhajyamAnaM balaM rAjansAtvatena mahAtmanA. nAbhyavartata yuddhAya trAsitaM dIrghabAhunA.. 7-107-38 (48987) tato droNo bhR^ishaM kruddhaH sahasodvR^itya chakShuShI. sAtyakiM satyakarmANaM svayamevAbhidudruve.. .. 7-107-39 (48988) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe saptAdhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 107 ..
droNaparva - adhyAya 108

.. shrIH ..

7.108. adhyAyaH 108

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

draupadeyaiH shalavadhaH.. 1 .. bhImasenenAlambusaparAjayaH.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-108-0 (48989) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-108-0x (4536) draupadeyAnmaheShvAsAnsaumadattirmahAyashAH. ekaikaM pa~nchabhirvidvvA punarvivyAdha saptabhiH.. 7-108-1 (48990) te pIDitA bhR^ishaM tena raudreNa sahasA vibho. pramUDhA naiva vividurmR^idhe kR^ityaM sma kiMchana.. 7-108-2 (48991) nAkulishcha shatAnIkaH saumadattiM nararShabham. dvAbhyAM vidvvA.anadadvR^iShTaH sharAbhyAM shatrukarshanaH.. 7-108-3 (48992) tathetare raNe yattAstribhistribhirajihmagaiH. vivyadhuH samare tUrNaM saumadattimamarShaNam.. 7-108-4 (48993) sa tAnprati mahArAja pa~ncha chikShepa sAyakAn. ekaikaM hR^idi chAjaghne ekaikena mahAyashAH.. 7-108-5 (48994) tataste bhrAtaraH pa~ncha sharairviddhA mahAtmanA. parivArya raNe vIraM vivyadhuH sAyakairbhR^isham.. 7-108-6 (48995) arjunistu hayAMstasya chaturbhirnishitaiH sharaiH. preShayAmAsa sa~Nkruddho yamasya sadanaM prati.. 7-108-7 (48996) bhaimasenirdhanushChittvA saumadattermahAtmanaH. nanAda balavannAdaM vivyAdha cha shitaiH sharaiH.. 7-108-8 (48997) yaudhiShThirirdhvajaM tasya chChittvA bhUmAvapAtayat. nAkulishchAtha yantAraM rathanIDAdapAharat.. 7-108-9 (48998) sAhadevistu taM j~nAtvA bhrAtR^ibhirvimukhIkR^itam. kShurapreNa shiro rAjannichakarta mahAtmanaH.. 7-108-10 (48999) tachChiro nyapatadbhUtau tapanIyavibhUShitam. abhAsayadruNoddeshaM bAlasUryasamaprabham.. 7-108-11 (49000) saumadatteH shiro dR^iShTvA nipatattanmahAtmanaH. vitrastAstAvakA rAjanpradudruvuranekadhA.. 7-108-12 (49001) alambusastu samare bhImasenaM mahAbalam. yodhayAmasa sa~Nkruddho lakShmaNaM rAvaNiryathA.. 7-108-13 (49002) samprayuddhau rame dR^iShTvA tAvubhau nararAkShasau. vismayaH sarvabhUtAnAM bhayaM chAsItsudAruNam.. 7-108-14 (49003) ArshyashR^i~NgiM tato bhImo navabhirnishitaiH sharaiH. vivyAdha prahasanrAjanrAkShasendramamarShaNam.. 7-108-15 (49004) tadrakShaH samare viddhaM kR^itvA nAdaM bhayAvaham. abhyadravattato bhImaM ye cha tasya padAnugAH.. 7-108-16 (49005) sa bhImaM pa~nChabhirvidvvA sharaiH sannataparvabhiH. bhaimAnparijaghAnAshu rathAMstrishatamAhave. punashchatuHshatAnhatvA bhImaM vivyAdha patriNA.. 7-108-17 (49006) so.atividdhastathA bhImo rAkShasena mahAbalaH. niShasAda rathopasthe mUrchChayA.abhipariplutaH.. 7-108-18 (49007) pratilabhya tataH saMj~nAM mArutiH krodhamUrchChitaH. vikR^iShya kArmukaM ghoraM bhArasAdhanamuttamam. alambusaM sharaistIkShNairardayAmAsa sarvataH.. 7-108-19 (49008) sa viddho bahubhirbANairnIlA~njanachayopamaH. shushubhe sarvato rAjanpraphulla iva kiMshukaH.. 7-108-20 (49009) sa vadhyamAnaH samare bhImachApachyutaiH sharaiH. smaranbhrAtR^ivadhaM chaiva pANDavena mahAtmanA. ghoraM rUpamatho kR^itvA bhImasenamabhAShata.. 7-108-21 (49010) tiShThedAnIM raNe pArtha pashya me.adya parAkramam.. bAko nAma sudurbuddhe rAkShasapravaro balI. 7-108-22 (49011) parokShaM mama tadvR^ittaM yaddhAtA me hatastvayA.. 7-108-23 (49012) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-108-24x (4537) evamuktvA tato bhImamantardhAnaM gatastadA. mahatA sharavarSheNa bhR^ishaM taM samavAkirat.. 7-108-24 (49013) bhImastu samare rAjannadR^ishye rAkShase tadA. AkAshaM pUrayAmAsa sharaiH sannataparvabhiH.. 7-108-25 (49014) sa vadhyamAno bhImena nimeShAdrathamAsthitaH. jagAma dharaNIM chaiva kShudraH khaM sahasA.agamat.. 7-108-26 (49015) uchchAvachAni rUpANi chakAra subahUni cha. aNurbR^ihatpunaH sthUlo nAdAnmu~nchannivAmbudaH.. 7-108-27 (49016) [nipeturgaganAchatchaiva sharadhArAH sahasrashaH. shaktayaH kaNapAH prAsAH shUlapaTTasatomarAH.. 7-108-28 (49017) shataghnyaH parighAshchaiva bhiNQDipAlAH parashvathAH. shilAH kha~NghA guDAshchaiva R^iShTIrvajrANi chaiva ha.. 7-108-29 (49018) sA rAkShasavisR^iShTA tu shastravR^iShTiH sudAruNA. jaghAna pANDuputrasya sainikAnraNamUrdhani..] 7-108-30 (49019) uchchAvachAstathA vAcho vyAjahAra samantataH. tena pANDavasainyAnAM sUditA yudhi vAraNAH.. 7-108-31 (49020) hayAshcha bahavo rAjanpattayashcha tathA punaH. rathebhyo rathinaH petustasya nunnAH sma sAyakaiH.. 7-108-32 (49021) shoNitodAM rathAvartAM hastigrAhasamAkulAm. ChatrahaMsAM kardaminIM bAhupannagasa~NkulAm.. 7-108-33 (49022) nadIM pravartayAmAsa rakShogaNasamAkulAm. vahantIM bahudhA rAjaMshchedipA~nchAlasR^i~njayAn.. 7-108-34 (49023) taM tathA samare rAjanvicharantamabhItavat. pANDavA bhR^ishasaMvignAH prApashyaMstasya vikramam.. 7-108-35 (49024) tAvakAnAM tu sainyAnAM praharShaH samajAyata. vAditraninadashchograH sumahAnromaharShaNaH.. 7-108-36 (49025) taM shrutvA ninadaM ghoraM tava sainyasya pANDavaH. nAmR^iShyata yathA nAgastalashabdaM samIritam.. 7-108-37 (49026) tataH krodhAbhitAmrAkSho nirdahanniva pAvakaH. sandadhe tvAShTramastraM sa svayaM tvaShTeva mArutiH.. 7-108-38 (49027) tataH sharasahasrANi prAdurAsansamantataH. taiH sharaistava sainyasya vidravaH sumahAnabhUt.. 7-108-39 (49028) tadastraM preritaM tena bhImasenena saMyuge. rAkShasasya mahAmAyAM hatvA rAkShasamArdayat.. 7-108-40 (49029) sa vadhyamAno bahudhA bhImasenena rAkShasaH. santyajya samare bhImaM droNAnIkamupAdravat.. 7-108-41 (49030) tasmiMstu nirjite rAjanrAkShasendre mahAtmanA. anAdayansiMhanAdaiH pANDavAH sarvato disham.. 7-108-42 (49031) apUjayanmArutiM cha saMhR^iShTAste mahAbalam. prahAdamiva daiteyA yathA shakraM marudgaNAH.. .. 7-108-43 (49032) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe aShTAdhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 108 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-108-12 saumadatteH shalasya.. 5-108-27 bR^ihat bR^ihan.. 5-108-28 kuNDalitaH pATho ~Na. jha.~na. pustakeShu dR^ishyate.. 5-108-29 R^iShTIH R^iShTayaH.. 5-108-108 aShTAdhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 109

.. shrIH ..

7.109. adhyAyaH 109

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

ghaTotkachenAlambusavadhaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-109-0 (49033) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-109-0x (4538) `kirantaM sharavarShANi roShAddoNaM mahAhave. vitrAsayantaM tAM senAM kaunteyAnAM mahIpate.. 7-109-1 (49034) dR^iShTvA tato maheShvAso nighnantaM cha rathAnbhR^isham. ghaTotkacho mahAbAhU raNAyAbhijagAma ha.. 7-109-2 (49035) pishAchavadanairyuktaM rathaM kA~nchanabhUShitam. samAsthAya mahArAja nAnApraharaNairyutaH.. 7-109-3 (49036) daMshitastapanIyena kavachena suvarchasA. bhUShaNairAchitA~Ngashcha nadanniva cha toyadaH.. 7-109-4 (49037) haiDimbeyaH susa~Nkruddho droNamabhyadravadbalI. tamabhyadhAvadAyAntaM kraddharUpalambusaH.. 7-109-5 (49038) R^ikShacharmaparikShiptaM rathamAsthAya daMshitaH. raktoShThaH sadhanuShpANiH prAMshuH kalpa iva sthitaH.. 7-109-6 (49039) kShipa~nChataghnIrvipulA musalopamatomarAn. musaNThIrbahulAshchaiva trishUlAnapi paTTasAn.. 7-109-7 (49040) karparA~nChatadhArAMshcha pinAkAnvividhAMstathA. chakrANi cha kShuraprANi kShepaNIshcha kaTa~NkaTAn.. 7-109-8 (49041) nArAyAnvividhAnasyansaka~NkolUkavAyasAn. chikShepa dhanurAdAya ninadanbhairavAnravAn.. 7-109-9 (49042) taM raudraM krUramAyAntaM dR^iShTvA kAlamivAgatam. prAdravadbhayasaMvignA rAjanpANDavavAhinI.. 7-109-10 (49043) sAtyakistu rathavyAghro dR^iShTvA taM rAkShasaM yudhi. abhyayAdamaraprakhyo bhrAmayitvA mahaddhanuH.. 7-109-11 (49044) abhyadravachcha tadrakShastiShThatiShTheti chAbravIt. alambusaM rAkShasendaraM so.astravarShairavAkirat.. 7-109-12 (49045) tataH pANDavasainyAni vidrutAnyatha bhArata. nirIkShyAbhyadravattUrNaM tvaramANo ghaTotkachaH.. 7-109-13 (49046) chikShepa cha gadAshaktIstomarAnatha paTTasAn. hemachitratsarUnugrAnkha~NgAnAkAshasaprabhAn.. 7-109-14 (49047) anyonyamarAdAlokya rAkShasau tau mahAbalau. bhairavaM nadaturnAdAnsatoyAviva toyadau.. 7-109-15 (49048) tataH pravavR^ite yuddhaM ghoraM rAkShasasiMhayoH. yAdR^igeva purA vR^ittaM rAmarAvaNayormR^idhe.. 7-109-16 (49049) sa shaktIshcha pinAkAMshcha vajrAnkha~NgAnparashvathAn. anyonyamabhisa~Nkruddhau tadA vyasR^ijatAmubhau.. 7-109-17 (49050) AkR^iShyamANe dhanuShi tayorbAhubalena cha. yantreNeva tadA rAjanbhR^ishaM nAdAnprachakratuH.. 7-109-18 (49051) alambusastatashchakraM kR^itAntajvalanaprabham. ghaTotkachAya chikShepa yatnamAsthAya vIryavAn.. 7-109-19 (49052) tadbhaimaseniH samprekShya chakraM vegavadantare. gadayA tADayAmAsa taddIrNaM shatadhA.abhavat.. 7-109-20 (49053) tato.agnichUrNaiH sahasA chakraghAtaviniHsR^itaiH. daMshakairiva sA senA patadbhirbhR^ishasaMkulA.. 7-109-21 (49054) tataH pratihate chakre sa vIro roShasaMkulaH. prAhiNottarasA shUlaM shaktIrdashashataM tadA... 7-109-22 (49055) jvalantIshcha kirantIshcha jvAlAmAlAH samantataH. yugAntolkAnibhAstIkShNA hemadaNDA mahAsvanAH.. 7-109-23 (49056) tAshchApatantIH samprekShya rAkShasasya ghaTotkachaH. ardhachandraiH prachichCheda nArAchaiH ka~NkapatribhiH.. 7-109-24 (49057) tato roShaparItA~NgaH pramumocha sa rAkShasaH. sharavarShaM mahAghoraM ghaTotkacharathaM prati'.. 7-109-25 (49058) tayoH pratibhayaM yuddhamAsIdrAkShasasiMhayoH. kurvatorvividhA mAyAH shakrashambarayoriva.. 7-109-26 (49059) alambuso bhR^ishaM kruddho ghaTotkachamatADayat.. 7-109-27 (49060) tayoryuddhaM samabhavadrakShogrAmaNimukhyayoH. yAdR^igeva purA vR^ittaM rAmarAvaNayoH prabho.. 7-109-28 (49061) ghaTotkachastu viMshatyA nArAchAnAM stanAntare. alambusamatho viddhA siMhavadvyanadanmuhuH.. 7-109-29 (49062) tathaivAlambuso rAjanhaiDimbiM yuddhadurmadam. vidvvA vidvR^i.anadadvR^iShTaH pUrayankhaM samantataH.. 7-109-30 (49063) tathA tau bhR^ishasa~Nkruddhau rAkShasendrau mahAbalau. nirvisheShamayudhyetAM mAyAbhiritaretaram.. 7-109-31 (49064) mAyAshatasR^ijau nityaM mohayantau parasparam. mAyAyuddheShu kushalau mAyAyuddhamayudhyatAm.. 7-109-32 (49065) yAMyAM ghaTotkacho yuddhe mAyAM darshayate nR^ipa. tAM tAmalambuso rAjanmAyayaiva nijaghnivAn.. 7-109-33 (49066) taM tathA yudhyamAnaM tu mAyAyuddhavishAradam. alambusaM rAkShasendraM dR^iShTvA.akrudhyanta pANDavAH.. 7-109-34 (49067) ta enaM bhR^ishasaMvignAH sarvataH pravarA rathaiH. abhyadravanta sa~NkuddhA bhImasenAdayo nR^ipa.. 7-109-35 (49068) ta enaM koShThakIkR^itya rathavaMshena mAriSha. sarvato vyakiranbANairulkAbhiriva ku~njaram.. 7-109-36 (49069) sa teShAmastravegaM taM pratihatyAstramAyayA. tasmAdrathavrajAnmukto vanadAhAdiva dvipaH.. 7-109-37 (49070) sa viShphArya anurdhoramindrAshanisamasvanam. mArutiM pa~nchaviMshatyA bhaimaseniM cha pa~nchabhiH.. 7-109-38 (49071) yudhiShThiraM tribhirviddhA sahadevaM cha saptabhiH. nakulaM cha trisaptatyA dropadeyAMshcha mAriSha. pa~nchabhiHpa~nchabhirviddhvA ghoraM nAdaM nanAda ha.. 7-109-39 (49072) taM bhImaseno navabhiH sahadevastu pa~nchabhiH. yudhiShThiraH shatenaiva rAkShasaM pratyavidhyata. nakulastu chatuHShaShTyA draupadeyAstribhistribhiH.. 7-109-40 (49073) haiDimbo rAkShasaM viddhvA yuddhe pa~nchAshatA sharaiH. punarvivyAdha saptatyA nanAda cha mahAbalaH.. 7-109-41 (49074) tasya nAdena mahatA kampiteyaM vasundharA. saparvatavanA rAjansapAdapajalAshayA.. 7-109-42 (49075) so.atividdho maheShvAsaiH sarvatastairmahArathaiH. prativivyAdha tAnsarvAnpa~nchabhiH pa~nchabhiH sharaiH.. 7-109-43 (49076) taM kruddhaM rAkShasaM yuddhe pratikruddhastu rAkShasaH. haiDimbo bharatashreShTha sharairvivyAdha saptabhiH.. 7-109-44 (49077) so.atividdho balavatA rAkShasendro mahAbalaH. vyasR^ijatsAyakAMstUrNaM rukmapu~NkhA~nshilAshitAn.. 7-109-45 (49078) te shar^A nataparvANo bhaimasenivinirbhidaH. ruShitAH pannagA yadvadyodhamukhyAnupAgaman.. 7-109-46 (49079) tataste pANDavA rAjansamantAnnishitA~nsharAn. preShayAmAsurudvignA haiDimbashcha ghaTotkachaH.. 7-109-47 (49080) sa vidhyamAnaH samare pANDavairjitakAshibhiH. `*nAbhyapadyata kartavyamArshyashR^i~NgirmahAbalaH.. 7-109-48 (49081) ghaTotkachaM mahArAja sharavarShairavAkirat. dagdhAdrikUTasadR^ishaM tama~njanachayoparamam.. 7-109-49 (49082) ghaTotkacho.apyasambhrAntaH sharavarShaM mahattaram. alambusavadhaprepsurmumochAgniriva jvalan.. 7-109-50 (49083) alambusavadhAchchogrAddhaTotkachavadhAdapi. sharAH prAdurbhavanti sma dvirephA iva shAkhinaH.. 7-109-51 (49084) abhrachChAyeva rachitA bANaistatra nareshvara. na sma vij~nAyate ki~nchidandhakAre kR^ite sharaiH.. 7-109-52 (49085) tata AkarNamuktena bhallena cha ghaTotkachaH. alambusasya chichCheda shiro yanturmahAbalaH.. 7-109-53 (49086) tato.aparairvegavadbhiH kShuraistasya ghaTotkachaH. akShamIShAM yugaM chaiva chichCheda yudhi tADayan.. 7-109-54 (49087) avaskandya rathAttUrNaM kairmIraH krodhamUrchChitaH. tasminmAyAmayaM ghoramastravarShaM vavarSha ha.. 7-109-55 (49088) ghaTotkacho.apyAshu rathAtpraskandya sa tameva cha. mAyAstreNaiva mAyAstraM vyadhamatsamare ripoH.. 7-109-56 (49089) haiDimbenArdyamAnastu yudhi so.alambuso.adravat. antarhito mahArAja ghaTotkachamayodhayat.. 7-109-57 (49090) antardhAnagataM dR^iShTvA tatratatra ghaTotkachaH. gadayA tADayAmAsa vegavatyA mahAbalaH.. 7-109-58 (49091) utpapAta tato vyomni prahAraparipIDitaH. alambuso rAkShasendraH sahasA pakShirADiva.. 7-109-59 (49092) ghaTotkacho.apyasambhrAntaH kha~NgapANirathotpatat. tato vegena mahatA vivarShiShurivAmbudaH.. 7-109-60 (49093) tamApatantaM samprekShya kairmIrI rAkShasottamaH. abhidudrAva vegena siMhaH siMhamiva sthitam.. 7-109-61 (49094) dakShiNenAsimudyamya vakShaH prachChAdya varmaNA. abhidudrAva vegena vegavantaM ghaTotkachaH.. 7-109-62 (49095) tAvubhau vegasaMrabdhAvalambusaghaTotkachau. anyonyasya tathaivorU samAjaghnatura~njasA.. 7-109-63 (49096) anyonyasyAbhighAtena tayo rAkShasasiMhayoH. shailenAbhihatasyeva shailasyAbhUnmahAsvanaH.. 7-109-64 (49097) tato.apasR^itya sahasA punarApetaturbhR^isham. charantAvasimArgAMstAnvividhAnrAkShasottamau.. 7-109-65 (49098) tayorgAtreShu patitAvasI bhinnau nipetatuH. vegotsR^iShTe maghavatA vajre shailataTeShviva.. 7-109-66 (49099) tataH sainyAni dadR^ishustadyuddhamatidAruNam. yuddhaM tayo rAkShasayorAmiShe shyenayoriva.. 7-109-67 (49100) tato lohitaraktAkShAvubhau tau rAkShasottamau. tathaikShyetAM tu shArdUlau sandhyAraktAvivAmbudau.. 7-109-68 (49101) chakrAte shyenavachchaiva maNDalAni sahasrashaH. ubhau nistriMshahastau tau sapakShAviva pakShiNau.. 7-109-69 (49102) bhrAmayitvA tu taM kha~NgaM pANDoH kirmIranandanaH. chikShepAsya shiro hartuM sa cha tasya ghaTotkachaH.. 7-109-70 (49103) tAvasI yugapaddIptau sametya vipulau bhuvi. patitau tau tu bAhubhyAM rAkShasau samasajjatAm.. 7-109-71 (49104) shIrShAghAtAMsadhAtaishcha parasparamathAhatau. punarvimishritau vIrau vyAyudhyete muhurmuhuH.. 7-109-72 (49105) bhaimasenirathotkShipya samAvidhya punaH punaH. niShpipeSha kShitau kShipraM pUrNakumbhamivAshmani.. 7-109-73 (49106) balalAghavasampannaH sampanno vikrameNa cha. bhaimaseniratha kruddhaH sarvasainyasya pashyataH.. 7-109-74 (49107) asR^ikkSharitasarvA~NgashchUrNitAsthivibhUShaNaH. ghaTotkachena niShpiShTo hataH sAlakaTa~NkaTaH.. 7-109-75 (49108) pANDavAnAM tataH senA taM dR^iShTvA vinipAtitam. nanAda sumahAnAdaM harShavegasamAplutA.. 7-109-76 (49109) tatastu nipapAtAshu gatAsurbhuvi rAkShasaH. shikharaM parvatasyeva vajravegena pAtitam.. 7-109-77 (49110) patatA tena mahatA rathinAM dantinAM dasha. tava sainye mahArAja nihatAH subR^ihattayA.. 7-109-78 (49111) tato ghaTotkacho hatvA tadrakSho vR^itrasannibham. punaH sa rathamAsthAya vijigIShurnanAdaha'.. 7-109-79 (49112) tataH sumanasaH pArthA hate tasminnishAchare. chukrushuH siMhanAdAMshcha vAsAMsyAdudhuvushcha ha.. 7-109-80 (49113) tAvakAshcha hataM dR^iShTvA rAkShasendraM mahAbalam. alambusaM tathA shUrA vishIrNamiva parvatam. hAhAkAramakArShushcha sainyAni bharatarShabha.. 7-109-81 (49114) janAshcha taddadR^ishire rakShaH kautUhalAnvitAH. yadR^ichChayA nipatitaM bhUmAva~NgArakaM yathA.. 7-109-82 (49115) ghaTotkachastu taddhatvA rakSho balavatAM varam. mumocha balavannAdaM balaM hatveva vAsavaH.. 7-109-83 (49116) sa pUjyamAnaH pitR^ibhiH sabAndhavai-- rghaTotkachaH karmaNi duShkare kR^ite. ripuM nihatyAbhinananda vai tadA hyalambusaM pakvamalambuShaM yathA.. 7-109-84 (49117) tato ninAdaH sumahAnsamutthitaH sasha~NkhanAnAvidhabANaghoShavAn. nishamya taM pratyanadaMstu pANDavA-- stato dhvanirbhuvanamathA.aspR^ishadbhR^isham.. 7-109-85 (49118) `tato.abhigamya rAjAnaM dharmaputraM yudhiShThiram. svakarmAvedayanmUrdhnA prA~njalirnipapAta ha.. 7-109-86 (49119) mUrdhnyupAghrAya taM jyeShThaH pariShvajya cha pANDavaH. prito.asmItyabravIdrAjanharShAdutphullalochanaH.. 7-109-87 (49120) ghaTotkachena niShpiShTe hate sAlakaTa~NkaTe. babhUvurmuditAH sarve hate tasminnishAchare'.. .. 7-109-88 (49121) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe navAdhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 109 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-109-1 rakShogrAmaNimukhyayoH rakShaHpatipraghAnayoH.. 5-109-* nAbhyapadyatetyArabhya vijigIShurnanAdaheti 79 tamashlokaparyantaM vidyamAnAnAM shlokAnAM sthAne adholikhitAH sArdhaShaTshlokA eva jha.pustake santi. martyadharmamanuprAptaH kartavyaM nAnvapadyata. tataHsamarashauNDo vai bhaimasenirmahAbalaH.. samIkShya tadavasthaM taM vadhAyAsya mano dadhe. vegaM chakre mahAntaM cha rAkShasendrathaM prati.. dagdhAdrikUTashR^i~NgAbhaM bhinnA~nQjanachayopamam. rathAdrathamabhidrutya kruddho haiDimbirAkShipat.. udvabarha rathAchchApi pannAgaM garuDo yathA. samutkShipya cha bAhubhyAmAvidvya cha punaH punaH.. niShpipeSha kShitau kShipraM pUrNakumbhamivAshmani. balalAghavasampannaH sampanno vikrameNa cha.. bhaimasenI raNe kruddhaH sarvasainyAnyabhIShayat. sa viShphAritasarvA~NgashchUrNitAsthirvibhIShaNaH.. ghaTotkachena vIreNa hataH sAlakaTa~NkaTaH. 5-109-15 bhuvanaM svarlokam.. 5-109-109 navAdhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 110

.. shrIH ..

7.110. adhyAyaH 110

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

raNA~NkaNo pA~nchajanyasvane shrute ashrutecha gANDIvaghoShe arjunasya vipadamAsha~NkamAnena yudhiShThireNa sAtyakimprati arjunavR^ittAntaparij~nAnAya gamanachodanA.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-110-0 (49122) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-110-0x (4539) bhAradvAjaM kathaM yuddhe yuyudhAno nyavArayat. sa~njayAchakShva tattvena paraM kautUhalaM hi me.. 7-110-1 (49123) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-110-2x (4540) shR^iNu rAjanmahAprAj~na sa~NgrAmaM romaharShaNam. droNasya pANDavaiH sArdhaM yuyudhAnapurogamaiH.. 7-110-2 (49124) vadhyamAnaM balaM dR^iShTvA yuyudhAnena mAriSha. abhyadravatsvayaM droNaH sAtyakiM satyavikramam.. 7-110-3 (49125) tamApatantaM sahasA bhAradvAjaM mahAratham. sAtyakiH pa~nchaviMshatyA kShudrakANAM samArpayat.. 7-110-4 (49126) droNo.api yudhi vikrAnto yuyudhAnaM samAhitaH. avidhyatpa~nchabhistUrNaM hemapu~NkhaiH sharaiH shitaiH.. 7-110-5 (49127) te varma bhittvA sudR^iDhaM dviShatpishitabhojanAH. abhyayurdharaNIM rAjanvalmIkamiva pannagAH.. 7-110-6 (49128) dIrghabAhurabhikruddhastotrArdita iva dvipaH. droNaM pa~nchAshatA.avidhyannArAchairagnisannibhaiH.. 7-110-7 (49129) bhAradvAjo raNe viddho yuyudhAnena satvaram. sAtyakiM bahubhirbANairyatamAnamavidhyata.. 7-110-8 (49130) tataH kruddho maheShvAso bhUya eva mahAbalaH. sAtvataM pIDayAmAsa vrAtena nataparvaNAm.. 7-110-9 (49131) sa vadhyamAnaH samare bhAradvAjena sAtyakiH. nAnvapadyata kartavyaM ki~nchideva vishAmpate.. 7-110-10 (49132) viShaNNavadanashchApi yuyudhAno.abhavannR^ipa. bhAradvAjaM raNe dR^iShTvA visR^ijantaM shitA~nsharAn.. 7-110-11 (49133) taM tu samprekShya te putrAH sainikAshcha vishAmpate. prahR^iShTamanaso bhUtvA siMhavadvyanadanmuhuH.. 7-110-12 (49134) taM shrutvA ninadaM ghoraM pIDyamAnaM cha mAdhavam. yudhiShThiro.abravIdrAjA sarvasainyAni bhArata.. 7-110-13 (49135) eSha vR^iShNivaro vIraH sAtyakiH satyavikramaH. grasyate yudhi vIreNa bhAnumAniva rAhuNA. abhidravata gachChadhvaM sAtyakiryatra yudhyate.. 7-110-14 (49136) abhidravata gachChadvaM sAtyakiryatra yudhyate.. dhR^iShTadyumnaM cha pA~nchAlyamidamAha janAdhipaH. `droNaM vAraya sukShitraM sAtyakiM mAvadhIddvijaH'.. 7-110-15 (49137) abhidrava drutaM droNaM kimu tiShThasi pArpata. na pashyasi bhayaM droNAddhoraM naH samupasthitam.. 7-110-16 (49138) asau droNo maheShvAso yuyudhAnena saMyuge. krIDate sUtrabaddhena pakShiNA bAlako yathA.. 7-110-17 (49139) tatraiva sarve gachChantu bhImasenapurogamAH. tvayaiva sahitAH sarve yuyudhAnarathaM prati.. 7-110-18 (49140) pR^iShThato.anugamiShyAmi tvAmahaM sahasainikaH. sAtyakiM mokShayasvAdya yamadaMShTrAntaraM gatam.. 7-110-19 (49141) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-110-20x (4541) evamuktvA tato rAjA sarvasainyena bhArata. abhyadravadraNe droNaM yuyudhAnasya kAraNAt.. 7-110-20 (49142) tatrArAvo mahAnAsIddroNamekaM yuyutsatAm. pANDavAnAM cha bhadraM te sR^i~njayAnAM cha sarvashaH.. 7-110-21 (49143) te sametya naravyAghrA bhAradvAjaM mahAratham. abhyavarSha~nsharaistIkShNaiH ka~NkabarhiNavAjitaiH.. 7-110-22 (49144) smayanneva tu tAnvIrAndroNaH pratyagrahItsvayam. atithInAgatAnyadvatsalilenAsanena cha.. 7-110-23 (49145) tarpitAste sharaistasya bhAradvAjasya dhanvinaH. AtitheyaM gR^ihaM prApya tarpyante.atithayo yathA.. 7-110-24 (49146) bhAradvAjaM cha te sarve na shekuH prativIkShitum. madhyandinamanuprAptaM sahasrAMshumiva prabho.. 7-110-25 (49147) tAMstu sarvAnmaheShvAsAndroNaH shastrabhR^itAM varaH. atApayachCharavrAtairgabhastibhirivAMshumAn.. 7-110-26 (49148) vadhyamAnA mahArAja pANDavAH sR^i~njayAstathA. trAtAraM nAdhyagachChanta pa~NkamagnA iva dvipAH.. 7-110-27 (49149) droNasya cha vyadR^ishyanta visarpanto mahAsharAH. gabhastaya ivArkasya pratapantaH samantataH.. 7-110-28 (49150) tasmindroNena nihatAH pA~nchAlAH pa~nchaviMshatiH. mahArathAH samAkhyAtA dhR^iShTadyumnasya sammatAH.. 7-110-29 (49151) pANDUnAM sarvasainyeShu pA~nchAlAnAM tathaiva cha. droNaM sma dadR^ishuH shUraM vinighnantaM varAnvarAn.. 7-110-30 (49152) kekayAnAM shataM hatvA vidrAvya cha samantataH. droNastasthau mahArAja vyAditAsya ivAntakaH.. 7-110-31 (49153) pA~nchAlAnsR^i~njayAnmatsyAnkekayAMshcha narAdhipa. droNo.ajayanmahAbAhuH shatasho.atha sahasrashaH.. 7-110-32 (49154) teShAM samabhavachChabdo viddhAnAM droNasAyakaiH. vanaukasAmivAraNye vyAptAnAM dhR^imaketunA.. 7-110-33 (49155) tatra devAH sagandharvAH pitarashchAbruvannR^ipa. ete dravanti pA~nchAlAH pANDavAshcha sasainikAH.. 7-110-34 (49156) taM tathA samare droNaM nighnantaM saumakAnraNe. na chApyabhiyayuH kechidapare naiva vivyadhuH.. 7-110-35 (49157) vartamAne tathA raudre tasminvIravarakShaye. ashR^iNotsahasA pArthaH pA~nchajanyasya niHsvanam.. 7-110-36 (49158) pUrite vAsudevena sha~NkharAje mahAtmanA. yudhyamAneShu vIreShu saindhavasyAbhirakShiShu.. 7-110-37 (49159) nadatsu dhArtarAShTreShu vijayasya rathaM prati. gANDIvasya cha nirghoShe vipranaShTe samantataH.. 7-110-38 (49160) kashmalAbhihato rAjA chintayAmAsa pANDavaH. na nUnaM svasti pArthAya yathA nadati sha~NkharAT.. 7-110-39 (49161) kauravAshcha yathA hR^iShTA vinadanti muhurmuhuH. `vyaktamadya vinashyanti sarvalokamahArathAH'.. 7-110-40 (49162) evaM sa~nchintayitvA tu vyAkulenAntarAtmanA. ajatAshatruH kaunteyaH sAtvataM pratyabhAShata.. 7-110-41 (49163) bAShpagadgadayA vAchA muhyamAno muhurmuhuH. kR^ityasyAnantarApekShI shaineyaM shinipu~Ngavam.. 7-110-42 (49164) yudhiShThira uvAcha. 7-110-43x (4542) yaH sa dharmaH purA dR^iShTaH sadbhiH shaineya shAshvataH. sAmparAye suhR^itkR^itye tasya kAlo.ayamAgataH.. 7-110-43 (49165) sarveShvapi cha yodheShu chintaya~nshinipu~Ngava. tvattaH suhR^ittamaM ka~nchinnAbhijAnAmi sAtyake.. 7-110-44 (49166) yo hi prItamanA nityaM yashcha nityamanuvrataH. sa kArye sAmparAye tu niyojya iti me matiH.. 7-110-45 (49167) yathA cha keshavo nityaM pANDavAnAnaM parAyaNam. tathA tvamapi vArShNeya kR^iShNatulyaparAkramaH.. 7-110-46 (49168) so.ahaM bhAraM samAdhAsye tvayi taM voDhumarhasi. abhiprAyaM cha me nityaM na vR^ithA kartumarhasi.. 7-110-47 (49169) sa tvaM bhrAturvayasyasya gurorapi cha saMyuge. kuru kR^ichChre sahAyArthamarjunasya nararShabha.. 7-110-48 (49170) tvaM hi satyavrataH shUro mitrANAmabhaya~NkaraH. loke vikhyAyase vIra karmabhiH satyavAgiti.. 7-110-49 (49171) yo hi shaineya mitrArthe yudhyamAnastyajettanum. pR^ithivIM cha dvijAtibhyo yo dadyAtsa samo bhavet.. 7-110-50 (49172) shrutAshcha bahavo.asmAbhI rAjAno ye divaM gatAH. dattvemAM pR^ithivIM kR^itsnAM brAhmaNebhyo yathAvidhi.. 7-110-51 (49173) `dIyamAnA cha bahubhirdAsyate cha muhurmahI. na hi kashchidraNe prANAnmitrArthe tyaktavAniha'.. 7-110-52 (49174) evaM tvAmapi dharmAtmanprayAche.ahaM kR^itA~njaliH. pR^ithivIdAnatulyaM syAdadhikaM vA phalaM vibho.. 7-110-53 (49175) eka eva sadA kR^iShNo mitrANAmabhaya~NkaraH. raNe santajati prANAndvitIyastvaM cha sAtyake.. 7-110-54 (49176) vikrAntasya cha vIrasya yuddhe prArthayato yashaH. shUra eva sahAyaH syAnnetaraH prAkR^ito janaH.. 7-110-55 (49177) IdR^ishe tu parAmarde vartamAnasya mAdhava. tvadanyo hi raNe goptA vijayasya na vidyate.. 7-110-56 (49178) shlAghanneva hi karmANi shatashastava pANDavaH. mama sa~nchanayanharShaM punaH punarakIrtayat.. 7-110-57 (49179) laghuhastashchitrayodhI tathA laghuparAkramaH. prAj~naH sarvAstravichChUro muhyate na cha saMyuge.. 7-110-58 (49180) mahAskandho mahorasko mahAbAhurmahAhanuH. mahAbalo mahAvIryaH sa mahAtmA mahArathaH.. 7-110-59 (49181) shiShyo mama sakhA chaiva priyo.asyAhaM priyashcha me. yuyudhAnaH sahAyo me pramathiShyati kauravAn.. 7-110-60 (49182) asmadarthaM cha rAjendra sannahyedyadi keshavaH. rAmo vApyaniruddho vA pradyumno vA mahArathaH.. 7-110-61 (49183) gado vA mAraNo vApi sAmvo vA saha vR^iShNibhiH. sahAyArthaM mahArAja sa~NgrAmottamamUrdhani.. 7-110-62 (49184) tathApyahaM naravyAghraM shaineyaM satyavikramam. sAhAyye viniyokShyAmi nAsti me.anyohi tatsamaH.. 7-110-63 (49185) iti dvaitavane tAta mAmuvAcha dhana~njayaH. parokShe tvadguNAMstathyAnkathayannAryasaMsadi.. 7-110-64 (49186) tasya tvamevaM sa~NkalpaM na vR^ithA kartumarhasi. dhana~njayasya vArShNeya mama bhImasya chobhayoH.. 7-110-65 (49187) yachchApi tIrthAni charannagachChaM dvArakAM prati. tatrAhamapi te bhaktimarjunaM prati dR^iShTavAn.. 7-110-66 (49188) na tansauhR^idananyepu mayA shaineya lakShitam. yathA tvamasmAnbhajase vartamAnAnupaplave.. 7-110-67 (49189) so.abhijAtyA cha bhaktyA cha sakhyasyAchAryakasya cha. sauhR^idasya cha vIryasya kulInatvasya mAdhava.. 7-110-68 (49190) satyasya cha mahAvAho anukampArthameva cha. anurUpaM mahepvAsa karma tvaM kartumarhasi.. 7-110-69 (49191) suyodhano hi sahasA gato droNena daMshitaH. pUrvamevAnuyAtAste kauravANAM mahArathAH.. 7-110-70 (49192) sumahAnninadashchaiva shrUyate vijayaM prati. sa shaineya javenAshu gantumarhasi mAnada.. 7-110-71 (49193) bhImaseno vayaM chaiva saMyattAH sahasainikAH. droNamAvArayiShyAmo yadi tvAM pratiyotsyate.. 7-110-72 (49194) pashya shaineya sainyAni dravamANAni saMyuge. mahAntaM charaNe shabdaM dIryamANAM cha bhAratIm.. 7-110-73 (49195) mahAmArutavegena samudramiva parvasu. dhArtarAShTabalaM tAta vikShiptaM savyasAchinA.. 7-110-74 (49196) rathairviparidhAvadbhirmanuShyaishcha hayaishcha ha. sainyaM rajaHsamudbhUtametatsamparivartate.. 7-110-75 (49197) saMvR^itaH sindhusauvIrairnakharaprAsayodhibhiH. atyantopachitaiH shUraiH phalgunaH paravIrahA.. 7-110-76 (49198) naitadbalamasaMvAryaM shakyo jetuM jayadrathaH. ete hi saindhavasyArthe sarve santyaktajIvitAH.. 7-110-77 (49199) sharashaktidhvajavaraM hayanAgasamAkulam. pashyaitaddhArtarAShTrANAmanIkaM sudurAsadam.. 7-110-78 (49200) shR^iNu dundubhinirghoShaM sha~NkhashabdAMshcha puShkalAn. siMhanAdaravAMshchaiva rathanemisvanAMstathA.. 7-110-79 (49201) nAgAnAM shR^iNu shabdaM cha pattInAM cha sahasrashaH. sAdinAM dravatAM chaiva shR^iNu kampayatAM mahIm.. 7-110-80 (49202) purastAtsaindhavAnIkaM droNAnIkaM cha pR^iShThataH. bahutvAddhi naravyAghra devendramapi pIDayet.. 7-110-81 (49203) aparyante bale magno jahyAdapi cha jIvitam. tasmiMshcha nihate yuddhe kathaM jIveta mAdR^ishaH.. 7-110-82 (49204) sarvathA samanuprAptaH sukR^ichChraM tvayi jIvati. shyAmo yuvA guDAkesho darshanIyashcha pANDavaH.. 7-110-83 (49205) laghvastrashchitrayodhI cha praviShTasyAta bhAratIm. sUryodaye mahAbAhurdivasashchAtivartate.. 7-110-84 (49206) tanna jAnAmi vArShNeya yadi jIvati vA na vA. kurUNAM chApi tatsainyaM sAgarapratimaM mahat.. 7-110-85 (49207) eka eva cha bIbhatsuH praviShTastAta bhAratIm. avipahyAM mahAbAhuH surairapi mahAhave.. 7-110-86 (49208) na hi me vartate buddhiradya yuddhe katha~nchana. droNo.api rabhaso yuddhe mama pIDayate balam.. 7-110-87 (49209) pratyakShaM te mahAbAho yathA.asau charati dvijaH. yugapachcha sametAnAM kAryANAM tvaM vichakShaNaH. mahArthaM laghusaMyuktaM kartumarhasi mAnada.. 7-110-88 (49210) tasya me sarvakAryeShu kAryametanmataM mahat. arjunasya paritrANAM kartavyamiti saMyuge.. 7-110-89 (49211) nAhaM shochAmi dAshArhaM goptAraM jagataH patim. sa hi shakto raNe tAta trI.NllokAnapi sa~NgatAn.. 7-110-90 (49212) vijetuM puruShavyAghraH satyametadbravImi te. kimpunardhArtarAShTrasya balametatsudurbalam.. 7-110-91 (49213) arjunastveSha vArShNeya pIDito bahubhiryudhi. prajahyAtsamare prANAMstasmAdvindAmi kashmalam.. 7-110-92 (49214) tasya tvaM padavIM gachCha gachCheyustvAdR^ishA yathA. tAdR^ishasyedR^ishe kAle mAdR^ishenAbhinoditaH.. 7-110-93 (49215) raNe vR^iShNipravIrANAM dvAvevAtirathau smR^itau. pradyumnashcha mahAbAhustvaM cha sAtvata vishrutaH.. 7-110-94 (49216) astre nArAyaNasamaH sa~NkarShaNasamo bale. vIratAyAM naravyAghra dhana~njayasamo hyasi.. 7-110-95 (49217) bhIShmadroNAvatikramya sarvayuddhavishAradam. tvAmeva puruShavyAghraM loke santaH prachakShate.. 7-110-96 (49218) `sadevAsuragandharvAnsakinnaramahoragAn. yodhayechcha jagatsarvaM vijayeta ripUnbahUn.. 7-110-97 (49219) iti bruvanti lokeShu janAstava guNAMstathA. samAgameShu sarveShu pR^ithageva cha sarvadA'. nAshakyaM vidyate loke sAtyakeriti mAdhava.. 7-110-98 (49220) tattvAM yadabhivakShyAmi tatkuruShva mahAbala.. 7-110-99 (49221) sambhAvanA hi lokasya mama pArthasya chobhayoH. nAnyathA tAM mahAbAho samprakartumihArhasi.. 7-110-100 (49222) parityajya priyAnprANAnraNe chara vibhItavat. na hi shaineya dAshArhA raNe rakShanti jIvitam.. 7-110-101 (49223) ayuddhamanavasthAnaM sa~NgrAme cha palAyanam. bhIrUNAmasatAM mArge naiSha dAshArhasevitaH.. 7-110-102 (49224) tavArjuno gurustAta dharmAtmA shinipu~Ngacha. vAsudevo gurushchApi tava pArthasya dhImataH.. 7-110-103 (49225) kAraNadvayametaddhi jAnaMstvAmahamabruvam. mAvamaMsthA vacho mahyaM gurustava gurorhyaham.. 7-110-104 (49226) vAsudevamataM chaiva mama chaivArjunasya cha. satyametanmayoktaM te yAhi yatra dhana~njayaH.. 7-110-105 (49227) etadvachanamAj~nAya mama satyaparAkrama. pravishaitadbalaM tAta dhArtarAShTrasya durmateH.. 7-110-106 (49228) pravishya cha yathAnyAyaM sa~Ngamya cha mahArathaiH. yathArhamAtmanaH karma raNe sAtvata darshaya.. .. 7-110-107 (49229) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe dashAdhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 110 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-110-29 tasminnavasare.. 5-110-42 kR^ityasya jayadrathavadhasyAnantarApekShI avighnAkA~NkShI.. 5-110-43 yaH sa dharmo maitrIlakShaNaH. sAmparAye ApatkAle.. 5-110-47 vayasyasya srigdhasya. sahAyArthaM sahAyarUpaprayojanam.. 5-110-67 upapluve vimarde.. 5-110-68 sakhyAderanurUpamityanenAnvayaH.. 5-110-69 satyasyA~NgIkArasya. anukampArthamarjunAnupAlananimittam.. 5-110-79 shrUyate hi raNaM prati iti ka.pAThaH.. 5-110-88 mahArthaM mahAntamartham. laghusaMyuktamavilambasampannam.. 5-110-101 vibhItavadabhItaH.. 5-110-102 anabasthAnamasthairyam.. 5-110-110 dashAdhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 111

.. shrIH ..

7.111. adhyAyaH 111

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

arjunamprati gachCheti yudhiShThirachoditena sAtyakinA tamprati svasyArjunena tadrakShaNAya niyogAbhidhAnapUrvakaM svena tasyAparityAjyatvakathanam.. 1 .. yudhiShThireNa bhImAdibhiH svasya rakShaNakathanapUrvakaM punaH sAtyakerarjunamprati gamane niyojanam.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-111-0 (49230) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-111-0x (4543) prItiyuktaM cha hR^idyaM cha mAnanIyaM cha sarvashaH. kAlayuktaM cha chitraM cha svadhiyA chAbhibhAShitam.. 7-111-1 (49231) dharmarAjasya tadvAkyaM nishyamya shinipu~NgavaH. sAtyakirbharatashreShTha pratyuvAcha yudhiShThiram.. 7-111-2 (49232) shrutaM te gadato vAkyaM sarvametanmayA.achyuta. nyAyayuktaM cha satyaM cha phalgunArthe yashaskaram.. 7-111-3 (49233) evaMvidhe tathA kAle mAdR^ishaM prekShya sattama. vaktumarhasi rAjendra yathA pArthaM tathaiva mAm.. 7-111-4 (49234) na me dhana~njayasyArthe prANA rakShyAH katha~nchana. tvatprayuktaH punarahaM kiM nakuryAM mahAhave.. 7-111-5 (49235) lokatrayaM yodhayeyaM sadevAsuramAnuSham. tvatprayukto narendrendra kimpunastAnsudurbalAn.. 7-111-6 (49236) suyodhanabalaM tvadya yodhayiShye samantataH. vijeShye cha raNe rAjansatyametadbravImi te.. 7-111-7 (49237) kushalyahaM kuMshalinaM samAsAdya dhana~njayam. hate jayadrathe rAjanpunareShyAmi te.antikam.. 7-111-8 (49238) avashyaM tu mayA sarvaM vij~nApyastvaM narAdhipa. vAsudevasya yadvAkyaM phalgunasya cha dhImataH.. 7-111-9 (49239) dR^iDhaM tvabhihitashchAhamarjunena punaHpunaH. madhye sarvasya sainyasya vAsudevasya shR^iNvataH.. 7-111-10 (49240) adya mAdhava rAjAnamapramatto.anupAlaya. AryAM yuddhe matiM kR^itvA yAvaddhanmi jayadratham.. 7-111-11 (49241) tvayi chAhaM mahAbAho pradyumne vA mahArathe. nR^ipaM nikShipya gachCheyaM nirapekSho jayadratham.. 7-111-12 (49242) jAnIShe hi raNe droNaM kuruShu shreShThasammatam. pratij~nA chApi te nityaM shrutA droNasya mAdhava.. 7-111-13 (49243) grahame dharmarAjasya bhAradvAjo.api gR^idhyati. shaktashchApi raNe droNo nigrahItuM yudhiShThiram.. 7-111-14 (49244) evaM tvayi samAghAya dharmarAjaM narottamam. ahamadya gamiShyAmi saindhavasya vadhAya hi.. 7-111-15 (49245) `sa tvamadya raNe yatto rakSha mAdhava pANDavam. rakSheNe dharmarAjasya dhruvo hi vijayo mama'.. 7-111-16 (49246) jayadrathaM cha hatvA.ahaM drutameShyAmi mAdhava. dharmarAjaM na cheddroNo nigR^ihNIyAdraNe balAt.. 7-111-17 (49247) nigR^ihIte narashreShThe bhAradvAjena mAdhava. saindhavasya vadho na syAnmamAprItistathA bhavet.. 7-111-18 (49248) eva~Ngate narashreShThe pANDave satyavAditi. asmAkaM gamanaM vyaktaM vanaM prati bhavetpunaH.. 7-111-19 (49249) so.ayaM mama jayo vyaktaM vyartha eva bhaviShyati. yadi droNo raNe kruddho nigR^ihNIyAdyudhiShThiram.. 7-111-20 (49250) sa tvamadya mahAbAho priyArthaM mama mAdhava. jayArthaM cha yashorthaM cha rakSha rAjAnamAhave.. 7-111-21 (49251) sa bhavAnmayi nikShepo nikShiptaH savyasAchinA. bhAradvAjAdbhayaM nityaM manyamAnena vai prabho.. 7-111-22 (49252) tasyApi cha mahAbAho nityaM pashyAmi saMyuge. nAnyaM hi pratiyoddhAraM raukmiNeyAdR^ite prabho.. 7-111-23 (49253) mAM chApi manyate yuddhe bhAradvAjasya dhImataH. so.ahaM saMbhAvanAnaM chaitAmAchAryavachanaM cha tat. pR^iShThato notsahe kartuM tvAM vA tyaktuM mahIpate.. 7-111-24 (49254) AchAryo laghuhastatvAdabhedyakavachAvR^itaH. upalabhya raNe krIDedyathA shakuninA shishuH.. 7-111-25 (49255) yadi kArShNirdhanuShpANiriha syAnmakaradhvajaH. tasmai tvAM visR^ijeyaM vai sa tvAM rakShedyathA.arjunaH.. 7-111-26 (49256) kuru tvamAtmano guptiM kaste goptA gate mayi. yaH pratIyAdrame droNaM yAvadgachChAmi pANDavam.. 7-111-27 (49257) mA cha te bhayamadyAstu rAjannarjunasambhavam. na sa jAtu mahAbAhurbhAramudyamya sIdati.. 7-111-28 (49258) ye cha sauvIrakA yodhAstathA saindhavapauravAH. udIchyA dAkShiNAtyAshcha ye chAnye.api mahArathAH.. 7-111-29 (49259) ye cha karNamukhA rAjanrathodArAH prakIrtitaH. ete.arjunasya kruddhasya kalAM nArhanti ShoDashIm.. 7-111-30 (49260) udyuktAH pR^ithivIpAla sasurAsuramAnuShAH. sarAkShasagaNA rAjansakinnaramahoragAH.. 7-111-31 (49261) ja~NgamasthAvaraiH sArdhaM nAlaM pArthasya saMyuge. evaM j~nAtvA mahArAja vyetu te bhIrdhana~njaye.. 7-111-32 (49262) evaM vIrau maheShvAsau kR^iShNau satyaparAkramau. na tatra karmaNo vyApatkathaMchidapi vidyate. 7-111-33 (49263) daivaM kR^itAstratAM yogamamarShaM shauryamAhave. kR^itaj~natAM dayAM chaiva bhrAtustvamanuchintaya.. 7-111-34 (49264) mayi chApi sahAye te gachChamAne.arjunaM prati. droNe chitrAstratAM sahkhye rAjaMstvamanuchintaya.. 7-111-35 (49265) AchAryo hi bhR^ishaM rAjannigrahe tava gR^idhyati. pratij~nAmAtmano rakShansatyAM kartuM cha bhArata.. 7-111-36 (49266) kuruShvAdyAtmano guptiM kaste goptA gate mayi. yasyAhaM pratyayAtpArthaM gachCheyaM phalgunaM prati.. 7-111-37 (49267) na hyahaM tvAM mahArAja anikShipya mahAhave. kvachidyAsyAmi kauravya satyametadbravImi te.. 7-111-38 (49268) `na pashyAmi rathaM ka~nchidyaste goptA bhavediha. shaktaM yaM manyase rAjangoptAraM prati pANDava'.. 7-111-39 (49269) etadvichArya bahusho buddhyA buddhimatAM vara. dR^iShTvA shreyaH paraM buddhyA tato rAjanprashAdhi mAm.. 7-111-40 (49270) yudhiShThira uvAcha. 7-111-41x (4544) evametanmahAbAho yathA vadasi mAdhava. na tu me shuddhyate bhAvaH shvetAshvaM prati mAriSha.. 7-111-41 (49271) kariShye paramaM yatnamAtmano rakShaNe hyaham. gachCha tvaM samanuj~nAto yatra yAto dhana~njayaH.. 7-111-42 (49272) AtmasaMrakShaNaM sa~Nkhye gamanaM chArjunaM prati. vichAryaitatsvayaM buddhyA gamanaM tatra rochaye.. 7-111-43 (49273) sa tvamAtiShTha yAnAya yatra yAto dhana~njayaH. mamApi rakShaNaM bhImaH kariShyati mahAbalaH.. 7-111-44 (49274) pArShatashcha sasodaryaH pArthivAshcha mabAhalAH. draupadeyAshcha mAM tAta rakShiShyanti na saMshayaH.. 7-111-45 (49275) kekayA bhrAtaraH pa~ncha rAkShasashcha ghaTotkachaH. virATo drupadashchaiva shikhaNDI cha mahArathaH.. 7-111-46 (49276) dhR^iShTaketushcha balavAnkuntibhojashcha mAtulaH. nakulaH sahadevashcha pA~nchAlAH sR^i~njayAstathA. ete samAhitAstAta rakShiShyanti na saMshayaH.. 7-111-47 (49277) na droNaH saha sainyena kR^itavarmA cha saMyuge. samAsAdayituM shakto na cha mAM dharShayiShyati.. 7-111-48 (49278) dhR^iShTadyumnashcha samare droNaM kruddhaM parantapaH. vArayiShyati vikramya veleva makarAlayam.. 7-111-49 (49279) yatra sthAsyati sa~NgrAme pArShataH paravIrahA. na droNasya balaM tAta kramettatra katha~nchana.. 7-111-50 (49280) eSha droNavinAshAya samutpanno hutAshanAt. kavachI sa sharI kha~NgI dhanvI cha varabhUShaNaH.. 7-111-51 (49281) `eSha droNaM raNe kruddhaM vArayeta sa vai prabho. pA~nchAlaH sahitaiH sarvaiH pANDavAnAM cha dhanvibhiH'.. 7-111-52 (49282) vikrudhaM gachCha shaineya mA kArShIrmayi sambhramam. dhR^iShTadyumno raNe kruddhaM droNamAvArayiShyati.. .. 7-111-53 (49283) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe ekAdashAdhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 111 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-111-15 evamIdR^ishyAmapi kAryagatau. samAdhAya nikShipya.. 5-111-19 eva~Ngate grahaNaM prApte. asmAkaM chintitaM vyaktaM vyarthameva bhavedyudhi iti. ka.kha.~Na.pAThaH.. 5-111-27 yAvadrachChAmi gamiShyAmi.. 5-111-28 arjunasambhavamarjunaviShayam.. 5-111-34 daivamamAnuShatAm. yogamabhij~nAnam.. 5-111-38 kvachitkasmiMshchit anikShipyetyanvayaH.. 5-111-40 dR^iShTvA nishchitya.. 5-111-44 AtiShTha prakramasva.. 5-111-47 mAtulaH purujit.. 5-111-53 mayi mAmadhikR^itya. sambhramamudvegam.. 5-111-111 ekAdashAdhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 112

.. shrIH ..

7.112. adhyAyaH 112

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sAtyakeH yudhiShThirarakShaNe bhImaM niyojyArjunadarshanAya prasthAnam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-112-0 (49284) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-112-0x (4545) dharmarAjasya tadvAkyaM nishamya shinipu~NgavaH. sa pArthAdbhayamAshaMsanparityAgAnmahIpateH.. 7-112-1 (49285) apavAdaM hyAtmanashcha lokAdrakShanvisheShataH. na mAM bhItamiti brUyAtprayAntaM phalgunaM prati.. 7-112-2 (49286) nishchitya bahudhaivaM sa sAtyakiryuddhadurmadaH. nAtivyaktamivAbhAShya dharmarAjaM mahAyashAH.. 7-112-3 (49287) shokagadgadayA vAchA shokopahatachetanaH. yathedAnImiti dhyAtvA dharmarAjamathAbravIt.. 7-112-4 (49288) kR^itAM chenmanyase rakShAM svasti te.astu vishAmpate. anuyAsyAmi bIbhatsuM kariShye vachanaM tava.. 7-112-5 (49289) na hi me pANDavAtkashchittriShu lokeShu vidyate. yo me priyataro rAjansatyametadbravImi te.. 7-112-6 (49290) tasyAhaM padavIM yAsye sandeshAttava mAnada. tvatkR^ite na cha me ki~nchidakartavyaM katha~nchana.. 7-112-7 (49291) yathA hi me gurorvAkyaM vishiShTaM dvipadAM vara. tathA tavApi vachanaM vishiShTatarameva me.. 7-112-8 (49292) priye hi tava vartete bhrAtarau kR^iShNapANDavau. tayoH priye sthitaM chaiva viddhi mAM rAjapu~Ngava.. 7-112-9 (49293) tavAj~nAM shirasA gR^ihya pANDavArthamahaM prabho. bhittvedaM durbhidaM sainyaM prayAsye narapu~Ngava.. 7-112-10 (49294) draNAnIkaM vishAmyeSha kruddho jhaSha ivArNavam. tatra yAsyAmi yatrAsau rAjanrAjA jayadrathaH.. 7-112-11 (49295) yatra senAntamAshritya bhItastiShThati pANDavAt. gupto rathavarashreShThairdrauNikarNakR^ipAdibhiH.. 7-112-12 (49296) itistriyojanaM manye tamadhvAnaM vishAmpate. yatra tiShThati pArtho.asau jayadrathavadhodyataH.. 7-112-13 (49297) triyojanagatasyApi tasya yAsyAbhyahaM padam. AsaindhavavadhAdrAjansudR^iDhenAntarAtmanA.. 7-112-14 (49298) anAdiShTastu guruNA ko nu yudhyeta mAnavaH. AdiShTastu yathA rAjanko na yudhyeta mAdR^ishaH.. 7-112-15 (49299) abhijAnAmi taM deshamitaH pUrNaM triyojanam. yatra tiShThati rAjA.asau saindhavo bAlaghAtakaH.. 7-112-16 (49300) sAgarapratimaM sainyaM garjantamiva sAgaram. halashaktigadAprAsacharmakha~NgarShTitomaram. iShvastravarasambAdhaM kShobhayitvA vrajAmyaham.. 7-112-17 (49301) yadetatku~njarAnIkaM sahasramanupashyasi. kulamA~njanakaM nAma yatraite vIryashAlinaH.. 7-112-18 (49302) AsthitA bahubhirmlechChairyuddhashauNDaiH prahAribhiH. nAgA naganibhA rAjankSharanta iva toyadAH.. 7-112-19 (49303) naite jAtu nivarteranpreShitA hastisAdibhiH. anyatra hi vadhAdeShAM nAsti rAjanparAjayaH.. 7-112-20 (49304) atha yAnrathino rAjansahasramanupashyasi. ete rukmarathA nAma rAjaputrA mahArathAH.. 7-112-21 (49305) ratheShvastreShu nipuNA nAgeShu cha vishAmpate. dhanurvede gatAH pAraM muShTiyuddhe cha kovidAH.. 7-112-22 (49306) gadAyuddhavisheShaj~nA niyuddhakushalAstathA. kha~NgapraharaNe yuktAH sampAte chAsicharmaNoH.. 7-112-23 (49307) shUrAshcha kR^itavidyAshcha spardhante cha parasparam. nityaM hi samare rAjanvijigIShanti mAnavAn.. 7-112-24 (49308) karNena vihitA rAjanduHshAsanamanuvratAH. etAMstu vAsudevo.api rathodArAnprashaMsati.. 7-112-25 (49309) satataM priyakAmAshcha karNasyaite vashe sthitAH. tasyaiva vachanAdrAjannivR^ittAH shvetavAhanAt.. 7-112-26 (49310) te na klAntA na cha shrAntA dR^iDhAvaraNakArmukAH. madarthe.adhiShThitA nUnaM dhArtarAShTrasya shAsanAt.. 7-112-27 (49311) etAnpramathya sa~NgrAme priyArthaM tava kaurava. prayAsyAmi tataH pashchAtpadavIM savyasAchinaH.. 7-112-28 (49312) yAMstvetAnaparAnrAjannAgAnsaptashatAnimAn. prekShase varmasa~nChannAnkirAtaiH samadhiShThitAn.. 7-112-29 (49313) kirAtarAjo yAnprAdAdgR^ihItaH savyasAchinA. svala~NkR^itAMstadA preShyAnichCha~njIvitamAtmanaH.. 7-112-30 (49314) Asannete purA rAjaMstava karmakarA dR^iDham. tvAmevAdya yuyutsante pashya kAlasya paryayam.. 7-112-31 (49315) eShAmete mahAmAtrAH kirAtA yuddhadurmadAH. hastishikShAvidashchaiva sarve chaivAgniyonayaH.. 7-112-32 (49316) ete vinirjitAH sa~Nkhye sa~NgrAme savyasAchinA. madarthamadya saMyattA duryodhanavashAnugAH.. 7-112-33 (49317) etAnhatvA sharai rAjankirAtAnyuddhadurmadAn. saindhavasya vadhe yattamanuyAsyAmi pANDavam.. 7-112-34 (49318) ye tvete sumahAnAga a~njanasya kulodbhavAH. karkashAshcha vinItAshcha prabhinnakaraTAmukhAH.. 7-112-35 (49319) jAmbUnadamayaiH sarvairvarmabhiH suvibhUShitAH. labdhalakShA raNe rAjannairAvaNasamA yudhi.. 7-112-36 (49320) AsthitA dasyubhistIkShNaiH shUrairuttamapArvataiH. karkashaiH pravarairyodhaiH kAShNAryasatanuchChadaiH.. 7-112-37 (49321) santi goyonayashchAtra santi vAnarayonayaH. anekayonayashchAnye tathA mAnuShayonayaH.. 7-112-38 (49322) anIkamasatAmetadbhUmravarNamudIryate. mlechChAnAM pApakartR^INAM himadurganivAsinAm.. 7-112-39 (49323) etadduryodhano labdhvA samagraM rAjamaNDalam. kR^ipaM cha saumadattiM cha droNaM cha rathinAM varam.. 7-112-40 (49324) sindhurAjaM tathA karNamavamanyata pANDavAn. kR^itArthamatha chAtmAnaM manyate kAlachoditaH.. 7-112-41 (49325) te tu sarve.adya samprAptA mama nArAchagocharam. nabhaviShyanti kaunteya yadyapi syurmanojavAH.. 7-112-42 (49326) tena saMbhAvitA nityaM paravIryopajIvinA. vinAshamupayAsyanti machCharaughanipIDitAH.. 7-112-43 (49327) ye tvete rathino rAjandR^ishyante kA~nchanadhvajAH. ete durvAraNA nAma kAmbhojA yadi te shrutAH.. 7-112-44 (49328) shUrAshcha kR^itavidyAshcha dhanurvede cha niShThitAH. saMhatAshcha bhR^ishaM hyete anyonyasya hitaiShiNaH.. 7-112-45 (49329) akShauhiNyashcha saMrabdhA dhArtarAShTrasya bhArata. yattA madarthe tiShThanti kuruvIrAbhirakShitAH.. 7-112-46 (49330) apramattA mahArAja mAmeva pratyupasthitAH. tAnahaM pramathiShyAmi tR^iNAnIva hutAshanaH.. 7-112-47 (49331) tasmAtsarvAnupAsa~NgAnsarvopakaraNAni cha. rathe kurvantu me rAjanyathAvadrathakalpakAH.. 7-112-48 (49332) asmiMstu kila sammarde grAhyaM vividhamAyudham. yathopadiShTamAchAryaiH kAryaH pa~nchaguNo rathaH.. 7-112-49 (49333) kAmbhojairhi sameShyAmi tIkShNairAshIviShopamaiH. nAnAshastrasamAvAyairvividhAyudhayodhibhiH.. 7-112-50 (49334) kirAtaishcha sameShyAmi viShakalpaiH prahAribhiH. lAlitaiH satataM rAj~nA duryodhanahitaiShibhiH.. 7-112-51 (49335) shakaishchApi sameShyAmi shakratulyaparAkramaiH. agnikalpairyurAdharShaiH pradIptairiva pAvakaiH.. 7-112-52 (49336) tathA.anyairvividhairyodhaiH kAlakalpairdurAsadaiH. sameShyAmi raNe rAjanbahubhiryuddhadurmadaiH.. 7-112-53 (49337) `triyojanagatasyApi padavIM savyasAchinaH. yAsyAmi rathinAM shreShThaM pravaraM cha dhanuShmatAm.. 7-112-54 (49338) sUryodayagatasyAhaM pANDavasya gatiM charan. aparAhNagate sUrye gamiShyAmi na saMshayaH'.. 7-112-55 (49339) tasmAdvai vAjino mukhyAnvishrutA~nshubhalakShaNaiH. upAvR^ittAMshcha pItAMshcha punaryu~njantu me rathe.. 7-112-56 (49340) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-112-57x (4546) tasya sarvAnupAsa~NgAnsarvopakaraNAni cha. rathe chAsthApayadrAjA shastrANi vividhAni cha.. 7-112-57 (49341) tatastAnsarvatomuktAnsadashvAMshchaturo janAH. rasavatpAyayAmAsuH pAnaM madasamIraNam.. 7-112-58 (49342) pItopavR^ittAnsnAtAMshcha jagdhAnnAnsamala~NkR^itAn. vinItashalyAMsturagAMshchaturo hemamAlinaH.. 7-112-59 (49343) tAnyuktAnrukmavarNAbhAnvinItA~nshIghragAminaH. saMhR^iShTamanaso vyagrAnvidhivatkalpitAnrathe.. 7-112-60 (49344) mahAdhvajena siMhena hemakesaramAlinA. saMvR^ite ketakairhairmairmaNividrumachitritaiH.. 7-112-61 (49345) pANDurAbhraprakAshAbhiH patAkAbhirala~NkR^ite. hemadaNDochChritachChatre bahushastraparichChade. yojayAmAsa vidhivaddhemabhANDavibhUShitAn.. 7-112-62 (49346) dArukasyAnujo bhrAtA sUtastasya priyaH sakhA. nyavedayadrathaM yuktaM vAsavasyeva mAtaliH.. 7-112-63 (49347) tataH snAtaH shuchirbhUtvA kR^itakautukama~NgalaH. snAtakAnAM sahasrasya svarNaniShkAnatho dadau.. 7-112-64 (49348) AshIrvAdaiH pariShvaktaH sAtyakiH shrImatAM varaH. tataH samadhuparkAmbhaH pItvA kairAtakaM madhu.. 7-112-65 (49349) lohitAkSho babhau tatra madavihvalalochanaH. Alabhya vIrakAMsyaM cha harSheNa mahatA.anvitaH.. 7-112-66 (49350) dviguNIkR^itatejobhiH prajvalanniva pAvakaH. utsa~Nge dhanurAdAya sasharaM rathinAM varaH.. 7-112-67 (49351) `AshIrvAdaiH pariShvaktaH sAtyakiH shrImatAM varaH'. kR^itasvastyayano vipraiH kavachI samala~NkR^itaH.. 7-112-68 (49352) lAjairgandhaistathA mAlyaiH kanyAbhishchAbhinanditaH. yudhiShThirasya charaNAvabhivAdya kR^itA~njaliH.. 7-112-69 (49353) tena mUrdhanyupAghrAtaH kR^itasvasyayano.api cha. AshiSho vividhAH shrutvA dharmarAjamukheritAH. harSheNa mahatA yukta Aruroha mahAratham.. 7-112-70 (49354) tataste vAjino hR^iShTAH supuShTA vAtaraMhasaH. ajayyA jaitramUhustaM vikurvANAH sma saindhavAH. yathA shakrarathaM rAjannUhuste harayaH purA.. 7-112-71 (49355) tathaiva bhImaseno.api dharmarAjena pUjitaH. prAyAtsAtyakinA sArdhamabhivAdya yudhiShThiram.. 7-112-72 (49356) tau dR^iShTvA pravivikShantau tava senAmariMdamau. saMyattAstAvakAH sarve tasthurdroNapurogamAH.. 7-112-73 (49357) sannaddhamanugachChantaM dR^iShTvA bhImaM sa sAtyakiH. abhinandyAbravIdvIrastadA harShakaraM vachaH.. 7-112-74 (49358) tvaM bhIma rakSha rAjAnametatkAryatamaM hi te. ahaM bhittvA pravekShyAmi kAlapakvamidaM balam.. 7-112-75 (49359) AyatyAM cha tadAtve cha shreyo rAj~no.abhirakShaNam. jAnIShe mama vIryaM tvaM tava chAhamarindama. tasmAdbhIma nivartasva mama chedichChasi priyam.. 7-112-76 (49360) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-112-77x (4547) tathoktaH sAtyakiM prAha vraja tvaM kAryasiddhaye. ahaM rAj~naH kariShyAmi rakShAM puruShasattama.. 7-112-77 (49361) evamuktaH pratyuvAcha bhImasenaM sa mAdhavaH. gachCha gachCha dhruvaM pArtha dhruvo hi vijayo mama.. 7-112-78 (49362) yanme snigdho.anuraktashcha tvamadya vashamAsthitaH. nimittAni cha dhanyAni yathA bhIma vadanti mAM.. 7-112-79 (49363) nihate saindhave pApe pANDavena mahAtmanA. pariShvajiShye rAjAnaM dharmAtmAnaM yudhiShThiram. `apramAdashcha te kAryo droNaM prati mahAratham'.. 7-112-80 (49364) sa~nchaya uvAcha. 7-112-81x (4548) etAvaduktvA bhImaM tu visR^ijya cha mahAyashAH. sampraikShattAvakaM sainyaM vyAghro mR^igagaNAniva.. 7-112-81 (49365) taM dR^iShTvA pravivikShantaM sainyaM tava janAdhipa. bhUya evAbhavanmUDhaM subhR^ishaM chApyakampata.. 7-112-82 (49366) tataH prayAtaH sahasA tava sainyaM sa sAtyakiH. didR^ikShurarjunaM rAjandharmarAjasya shAsanAt .. .. 7-112-83 (49367) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe dvAdashAdhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 112 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-112-2 te mAM bhItamiti brUyurayAntaM iti jha. pAThaH.. 5-112-14 AsaindhavavadhAt saindhavavadhAtprAgeva.. 5-112-17 halAditomarAntamArsha Adyajantam.. 5-112-23 sampAte viharaNe.. 5-112-30 tadA digvijaye.. 5-112-35 a~njanasya varuNopavAhyasya.. 5-112-35 tena duryodhanena. 5-112-43 sambhAvitaH samvardhitAH.. 5-112-49 pa~nchaguNaH pa~nchaguNasnamagrIkaH.. 5-112-50 nAnAshastrANAM samAvAyaH samUho yeShu.. 5-112-56 pItAH pAyitapeyAH.. 5-112-61 ketakaiH kundaghaTitashalAkAbhiH.. 5-112-64 svarNaniShkAn dInArAn.. 5-112-65 tataH samadhuparkArhaH pItvA kailAtakaM madhu iti jha.~na.pAThaH. kailAvataM madhu iti ~Na.pAThaH.. 5-112-76 AyatyAmuttarakAle. tadAtve tatkShaNe.. 5-112-112 dvAdashAdhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 113

.. shrIH ..

7.113. adhyAyaH 113

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

arjunaM gachChataH sAtyakeH kR^itavarmaNAsaha yuddham.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-113-0 (49368) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-113-0x (4549) prayAte tava sainyaM tu yuyudhAne yuyutsayA. dharmarAjo mahArAja svenAnIkena saMvR^itaH. prAyAddroNarathaM prepsuryuyudhAnasya pR^iShThataH.. 7-113-1 (49369) tataH pA~nchAlarAjasya putraH samaradurmadaH. `prayAte mAdhave rAjannidaM vachanamabravIt'.. 7-113-2 (49370) prAkroshatpANDavAnIke vasudAnashcha pArthivaH. AgachChata praharata drutaM viparidhAvata.. 7-113-3 (49371) yathA sukhena gachCheta sAtyakiryuddhadurmadaH. mahArathA hi bahavo yatiShyante.asya nirjaye.. 7-113-4 (49372) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-113-5x (4550) `senApativachaH shrutvA pANDaveyAH samantataH. abhyudyayurmahArAja tava sainyaM samantataH.. 7-113-5 (49373) jahi prahara gR^ihNIhi vidhya vidrava chAdrava'. iti bruvantau vegena nipetuste mahArathAH.. 7-113-6 (49374) vayaM pratijigIShantastatra tAnsamabhidrutAH. `bANasha~NkharavAnkR^itvA vimishrAnvAdyanisvanaiH.. 7-113-7 (49375) yuyudhAnarathaM dR^iShTvA tAvakA abhidudruvuH'. tataH shabdo mahAnAsIdyuyudhAnarathaM prati.. 7-113-8 (49376) AkIryamANA dhAvantI tava putrasya vAhinI. sAtvatena mahArAja shatadhA.abhivyashIryata.. 7-113-9 (49377) tasyAM vidIryamANAyAM shineH putro mahArathaH. saptavIrAnmaheShvAsAnagrAnIkeShvapothayat.. 7-113-10 (49378) athAnyAnapi rAjendra nAnAjanapadeshvarAn. sharairanalasa~NkAshairninye vIrAnyamakShayam.. 7-113-11 (49379) shatamekena vivyAdha shatenaikaM cha patriNAm. dvipArohAndvipAMshchaiva hayArohAnhayAMstathA. rathinaH sAshvasUtAMshcha jaghAneshaH pashUniva.. 7-113-12 (49380) taM tathA.adbhutakarmANaM sharasampAtavarShiNam. na kechanAbhyadhAvanvai sAtyakiM tava sainikAH.. 7-113-13 (49381) te bhItA mR^idyamAnAshcha pramR^iShTA dIrghabAhunA. AyodhanaM jahurvIrA dR^iShTA tamatimAninam.. 7-113-14 (49382) tamekaM bahudhA pashyanmohitAstasya tejasA.. 7-113-15 (49383) rathairvimathitaishchaiva bhagnanIDaishcha mAriSha. chakrairvimathitaishChatrairdhvajaishcha vinipAtitaiH.. 7-113-16 (49384) anukarShaiH patAkAbhiH shirastrANaiH sakA~nchanaiH. bAhubhishchandanAdigdhaiH sA~Ngadaishcha vishAmpate.. 7-113-17 (49385) hastihastopamaishchApi bhuja~NgAbhogasannibhaiH. UrubhiH pR^ithivI chChannA manujAnAM narAdhipa.. 7-113-18 (49386) shashA~Nkusannibhaishchaiva vadanaishchArukuNDalaiH. patitairR^iShabhAkShANAM babhau bhArata medinI.. 7-113-19 (49387) gajaishcha bahudhA ChinnaiH shayAnaiH parvatopamaiH. rarAjAtibhR^ishaM bhUmirvikIrNairiva parvataiH.. 7-113-20 (49388) tapanIyamayairyoktrairmuktAjAlavibhUShitaiH. urashChadairvichitraishcha vyashobhanta tura~NgamAH. gatasatvA mahIM prApya pramR^iShTA dIrghabAhunA.. 7-113-21 (49389) nAnAvidhAni sainyAni tava hatvA tu sAtvataH. praviShTastAvakaM sainyaM drAvayitvA chamUM bhR^isham.. 7-113-22 (49390) tatastenaiva mArgeNa yena yAto dhana~njayaH. iyeSha sAtyakirgantuM tato droNena vAritaH.. 7-113-23 (49391) bhAradvAjaM samAsAdya yuyudhAnashcha sAtyakiH. na nyavartata sa~Nkruddho velAmiva jalAshayaH.. 7-113-24 (49392) nivArya tu raNe droNo yuyudhAnaM mahAratham. vivyAdha nishitairbANaiH pa~nchabhirmarmabhedibhiH.. 7-113-25 (49393) sAtyakistu raNe droNaM rAjanvivyAdha saptabhiH. hemapu~NghaiH shilAdhautaiH ka~NkabarhiNavAjitaiH.. 7-113-26 (49394) ShaM ShaDbhiH sAyakairdroNaH sAshvayantAramArdayat. sa taM na mamR^iShe droNaM yuyudhAno mahArathaH.. 7-113-27 (49395) siMhanAdaM tataH kR^itvA droNaM vivyAdha sAtyakiH. dashabhiH sAyakaishchAnyaiH ShaDbhiraShTAbhireva cha.. 7-113-28 (49396) yuyudhAnaH punardroNaM vivyAdha dashabhiH sharaiH. ekena sArathiM chAsya chaturbhishchaturo hayAn. dhvajamekena bANena vivyAdha yudhi mAriSha.. 7-113-29 (49397) taM droNaH sAshvayantAraM sarathadhvajamAshugaiH. tvaranprAchChAdayadbANaiH shalabhAnAmiva vrajaiH.. 7-113-30 (49398) tathaiva yuyudhAno.api droNaM bahubhirAshugaiH. `prAchChAdayadasambhrAntastvaramANo mahArathaH.. 7-113-31 (49399) droNastu paramakruddhaH sAtyakiM paravIrahA. avAkrichChitairbANairvAsudevaparAkramam.. 7-113-32 (49400) taM tathA sharajAlena prachChAdya mahatA punaH. droNaH prahasya shaineyamidaM vachanamabravIt'.. 7-113-33 (49401) tavAchAryo raNaM hitvA gataH kApuruSho yathA. yudhyamAnaM cha mAM hitvA pradakShiNamavartata.. 7-113-34 (49402) tvaM hi me yudhyato nAdya jIvanyAsyasi mAdhava. yadi mAM tvaM raNe hitvA na yAsyAchAryavaddrutam.. 7-113-35 (49403) sAtyakiruvAcha. 7-113-36x (4551) dhana~njayasya padavIM dharmarAjasya shAsanAt. gachChAmi svasti te brahmanna me kAlAtyayo bhavet.. 7-113-36 (49404) AchAryAnugato mArgaH shiShyairanvAsyate sadA. tasmAdeva vrajAmyAshu yathA me sa gururgataH.. 7-113-37 (49405) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-113-38x (4552) etAvaduktvA shaineya AchAryaM parivarjayan. prayAtaH sahasA rAjansArathiM chedamabravIt.. 7-113-38 (49406) droNaH kariShyate yatnaM sarvathA mama vAraNe. yatto yAhi raNe sUta shR^iNu chedaM vachaH param.. 7-113-39 (49407) etadAlokyate sainyamAvantyAnAM mahAprabham. asyAnantaratastvetaddAkShiNAtyaM mahadbalam.. 7-113-40 (49408) tadanantarametachcha bAhlikAnAM mahadbalam. bAhlikAbhyAshato yuktaM karNasya cha mahadbalam.. 7-113-41 (49409) anyonyena hi sainyAni bhinnAnyetAni sArathe. anyonyaM samupAshritya na tyakShyanti raNAjiram.. 7-113-42 (49410) etadantaramAsAdya chodayAshvAnprahR^iShTavat. madhyamaM javamAsthAya vaha mAmatra sArathe.. 7-113-43 (49411) bAhlikA yatra dR^ishyante nAnApraharaNodyatAH. dAkShiNAtyAshcha bahavaH sUtaputrapurogamAH.. 7-113-44 (49412) hastyashvarathasambAdhaM yachchAnIkaM vilokyate. nAnAdeshasamutthaishcha padAtibhiradhiShThitam.. 7-113-45 (49413) `*tataH shakyo mahAvyUho bhettuM sa sahasA raNe. taM deshaM tvaritA yAmo mR^idgranto yudhi shAtravAn.. 7-113-46 (49414) tatraite samprahR^iShTatvAnnAsmAnprati yuyutsavaH.. 7-113-47 (49415) ayudhyamAno bahubhirekaM prApya sudurbalam. balaM pramathya gachChAmi miShatAM sarvadhanvinAm.. 7-113-48 (49416) madhyato yAhi yatrograM karNasya sumahadbalam. yatraite paramakruddhA dAkShiNAtyA mahArathAH. etAnvijitya sa~NgrAme tato yAmo dhana~njayam.. 7-113-49 (49417) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-113-50x (4553) yuyudhAnavachaH shrutvA yuyudhAnasya sArathiH. yathoktamagamadrAjanvarjayandroNamAhave'.. 7-113-50 (49418) taM droNo.anuyayau kruddho vikiranvishikhAnbahUn. yuyudhAnaM mahAbhAgaM gachChantamanivartinam.. 7-113-51 (49419) sa cha sainyaM mahadbhittvA dAkShiNAtyabalaM cha tat. karNasya sainyaM sumahadabhihatya shitaiH sharaiH.. 7-113-52 (49420) prAvishadbhAratIM senAmaparyantAM sa sAtyakiH. sAtyako hi tataH sainyaM drAvayansa samantataH.. 7-113-53 (49421) praviShTe yuyudhAne tu sainikeShu druteShu cha. amarShI kR^itavarmA tu sAtyakiM paryavArayat.. 7-113-54 (49422) tamApatantaM vishikhaiH ShaDbhirAhatya sAtyakiH. chaturbhishchaturo.asyAshvAnAjaghAnAshu vIryavAn.. 7-113-55 (49423) tataH punaH ShoDashabhirnataparvabhirAshugaiH. sAtyakiH kR^itavarmANaM pratyavidhyatstanAntare.. 7-113-56 (49424) sa tADyamAno vishikhairbahubhistigmatejanaiH. sAtvatena mahArAja kR^itavarmA na chakShame.. 7-113-57 (49425) sa vatsandataM sandhAya tigmAMshvanalasaprabham. AkR^iShya rAjannAkarNAdvivyAdhorasi sAtyakim.. 7-113-58 (49426) sa tasya dehAvaraNaM bhittvA dehaM cha sAyakaH. sapu~NkhapatraH pR^ithivIM vivesha rudhirokShitaH.. 7-113-59 (49427) athAsya bahubhirbANairachChinatparamAstravit. sa mArgaNagaNaM rAjankR^itavarmA sharAsanam.. 7-113-60 (49428) vivyAdha cha raNe rAjansAtyakiM satyavikramam. dashabhirvishikhaistIkShNairabhikruddhaH stanAntare.. 7-113-61 (49429) tataH prashIrNe dhanuShi shaktyA shaktimatAM varaH. jaghAna dakShiNaM bahuM sAtyakiH kR^itavarmaNaH.. 7-113-62 (49430) tato.anyatsudR^iDhaM chApaM pUrNamAyamya sAtyakiH. vyasR^ijadvishikhAMstUrNaM shatasho.atha sahasrashaH.. 7-113-63 (49431) sarathaM kR^itavarmANaM samantAtparyavArayat. ChAdayitvA raNe rAjanhArdikyaM sa tu sAtyakiH. athAsya bhallena shiraH sAratheH samakR^intata.. 7-113-64 (49432) sa papAta hataH sUto hArdikyasya mahArathAt. tataste yantR^irahitAH prAdravaMsturagA bhR^isham.. 7-113-65 (49433) atha bhojastu sambhrAnto nigR^ihya turagAmansvayam. tasthau vIro dhanuShpANistatsainyAnyabhyapUjayan.. 7-113-66 (49434) sa muhUrtamivAshvAsya sadashvAnsamanodayat. vyapeta bhIramitrANAmAvahatsumahadbhayam.. 7-113-67 (49435) sAtyakishchAtyagAttasmAtsa tu bhImamupAdravat.. 7-113-68 (49436) yuyudhAno.api rAjendra bhojAnIkAdviniHsR^itaH. prayayau tvaritastUrNaM kAmbhojAnAM mahAchamUm.. 7-113-69 (49437) sa tatra bahubhiH shUraiH sanniruddho mahArathaiH. na chachAla tadA rAjansAtyakiH satyavikramaH.. 7-113-70 (49438) sandhAya cha chamUM droNo bhoje bhAraM niveshya cha. abhyadhAvadraNe yatto yuyudhAnaM yuyutsayA.. 7-113-71 (49439) tathA tamanudhAvantaM yuyudhAnasya pR^iShThataH. nyavArayanta saMhR^iShTAH pANDusainye brR^ihattamAH. samAsAdya tu hArdikyaM rathAnAM pravaraM ratham.. 7-113-72 (49440) pA~nchAlA vigatotsAhA bhImasenapurogamAH. vikramya vAritA rAjanvIreNa kR^itavarmaNA.. 7-113-73 (49441) yatamAnAMshcha tAnsarvAnIShadvigatachetasaH. abhitastA~nsharaugheNa klAntavAhAnakArayat.. 7-113-74 (49442) nigR^ihItAstu bhojena bhojAnIkepsavo raNe. atiShThannAryavadvIrAH prArthayanto mahadyashaH. `hArdikyaM samare yattA na shekuH prativIkShitum'.. .. 7-113-75 (49443) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe trayodhashAdhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-113-12 Isho rudraH.. 5-113-19 R^iShobhasyevAkShINi yeShAm.. 5-113-35 tvaMhi tvamapi.. 5-113-42 bhinnAni pR^ithagbhUtAni.. 5-113-* etadAdi pa~nchashlokAnAM sthAne adho likhita ekaeva shlokaH jha. pustake.asti. etAvaduktvA yantAraM brAhmaNaM parivarjayan. madhyato yAhi yachchograM karNasya cha mahadvalam.. 5-113-58 jihmAgAnilasannibham iti. jha. pAThaH.. 5-113-71 sandhAya yathAsthAnamAnIya.. 5-113-75 AryavatkulInavat. kulInatvAditiyAvat.. 5-113-113 trayodashAdhikarashathatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 114

.. shrIH ..

7.114. adhyAyaH 114

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

dhR^itarAShTrasya svasainyaparAjayashravaNena shochanam.. 1 .. sa~njayena tadupAlambhapUrvakaM kR^itavarmaparAkramakathanam.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-114-0 (49444) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-114-0x (4554) evaM bahuguNaM sainyamevaM pravichitaM balam. vyUDhamevaM yathAnyAyamevaM bahu cha sa~njaya.. 7-114-1 (49445) nityaM pUjitamasmAbhirabhikAmaM cha naH sadA. prauDhamatyadbhutAkAraM purastAddR^iShTavikramam.. 7-114-2 (49446) nAtivR^idvamabAlaM cha nAkR^ishaM nAtipIvaram. laghuvR^ittAyataprAyaM sAragAtramanAmayam.. 7-114-3 (49447) AttasannAhasa~nChannaM bahushastraparichChadam. shastragrahaNavidyAsu bahvIShu pariniShThitam.. 7-114-4 (49448) Arohe paryavaskande saraNe sAntaraplute. samyakpraharaNe yAne vyapayAne cha kovidam.. 7-114-5 (49449) nAgeShvashveShu bahusho ratheShu cha parIkShitam. `charmanistriMshayuddhe cha niyuddhe cha vishAradam'. parIkShya cha yathAnyAyaM vetanenopapAditam.. 7-114-6 (49450) na goShThyA nopakAreNa na sambandhanimittataH. nAnAhUtaM nApyabhR^itaM mama sainyaM babhUva ha.. 7-114-7 (49451) kulInAryajanopetaM tuShTapuShTamanuddhatam. kR^itamAnopachAraM cha yashasvi cha manasvi cha.. 7-114-8 (49452) sachivaishchAparairmukhyairbahubhiH puNyakarmabhiH. lokapAlopamaistAta pAlitaM narasattamaiH.. 7-114-9 (49453) bahubhiH pArthivairguptamasmatpriyachikIrShubhiH. asmAnabhisR^itaiH kAmAtsabalaiH sapadAnugaiH.. 7-114-10 (49454) mahodadhimivApUrNamApagAbhiH samantataH. apakShaiH pakShisa~NkAshai rathairashvaishcha saMvR^itam.. 7-114-11 (49455) prabhinnakaraTaishchaiva dviradairAvR^itaM mahat. yadahanyata me sainyaM kimanyadbhAgadheyataH.. 7-114-12 (49456) yodhAkShayyajalaM bhImaM vAhanormitara~NgiNam. kShepaNyasigadAshaktisharaprAsajhaShAkulam.. 7-114-13 (49457) dhvajabhUShaNasambAdharatnopalasusa~nchitam. vAhanairabhidhAvadbhirvAyuvegavikampitam.. 7-114-14 (49458) droNagambhIrapAtAlaM kR^itavarmamahAhadam. jalasandhamahAgrAhaM karmachandrodayoddhatam.. 7-114-15 (49459) gate sainyArNavaM bhittvA tarasA pANDavarShabhe. sa~njayaikarathenaiva yuyudhAne cha mAmakam.. 7-114-16 (49460) tatra sheShaM na pashyAmi praviShTe savyasAchini. sAtvate cha rathodAre mama sainyasya sa~njaya.. 7-114-17 (49461) tau tatra samatikrAntau dR^iShTvA.atIva tarasvinau. sindhurAjaM tu samprekShya gANDIvasya cha gocharam.. 7-114-18 (49462) kiM nu vA kuravaH kR^ityaM vidadhuH kAlachoditAH. dAruNaikAyane.akAle kathaM vA pratipedire.. 7-114-19 (49463) grastAnhi kauravAnmanye mR^ityunA tAta sa~NgatAn. vikramo.api raNe teShAM na tathA dR^ishyate hi vai.. 7-114-20 (49464) akShatau saMyuge tatra praviShTau kR^iShNapANDavau. na cha vArayitA kashchittayorastIha sa~njaya.. 7-114-21 (49465) bhR^itAshcha bahavo yodhAH parIkShyaiva mahArathAH. vetanena yathAyogaM priyavAdena chApare.. 7-114-22 (49466) asatkArabhR^itastAta mama sainye na vidyate. karmaNA hyanurUpeNa labhyate bhaktavetanam.. 7-114-23 (49467) na cha yodho.abhavatkashchinmama sainye tu sa~njaya. alpadAnabhR^itastAta tathA chAbhR^itako naraH.. 7-114-24 (49468) pUjito hi yathAshaktyA dAnamAnAsanairmayA. tathA putraishcha me tAta j~nAtibhishcha sabAndhavaiH.. 7-114-25 (49469) te cha prApyaiva sa~NgrAme nirjitAH savyasAchinA. shaineyena parAmR^iShTAH kimanyadbhAgadheyataH.. 7-114-26 (49470) rakShyate yashcha sa~NgrAme ye cha sa~njaya rakShiNaH. ekaH sAdhAraNaH panthAra rakShyasya saha rakShibhiH.. 7-114-27 (49471) arjunaM samare dR^iShTvA saindhavasyAgrataH sthitam. putro mama bhR^ishaM mUDhaH kiM kAryaM pratyapadyata.. 7-114-28 (49472) sAtyakiM cha raNe dR^iShTvA pravishantamabhItavat. kiM nu duryodhanaH kR^ityaM prAptakAlamamanyata.. 7-114-29 (49473) sarvashastrAtigau senAM praviShTau rathisattamau. dR^iShTvA kAM vai dhR^itiM yuddhe pratyapadyanta mAmakAH.. 7-114-30 (49474) dR^iShTvA kR^iShNaM tu dAshArhamarjunArthe vyavasthitam. shinInAmR^iShabhaM chaiva manye shochanti putrakAH.. 7-114-31 (49475) dR^iShTA senAM vyatikrAntAM sAtvatenArjunena cha. palAyamAnAMshcha kurUnmanye shochanti putrakAH.. 7-114-32 (49476) vidrutAnrathino dR^iShTvA nirutsAhAndviShajjaye. palAyanakR^itotsAhAnmanye shochanti putrakAH.. 7-114-33 (49477) shUnyAnkR^itAnrathopasthAnsAtvatenArjunena cha. hatAMshcha yodhAnsaMdR^ishya manye shochanti putrakAH.. 7-114-34 (49478) vyashvanAgarathAndR^iShTvA tatra vIrAnsahR^israshaH. dhAvamAnAnraNe vyagrAmanyanye shochanti putrakAH.. 7-114-35 (49479) mahAnAgAnvidravato dR^iShTvA.arjunasharAhatAn. patitAnpatatashchAnyAnmanye shochanti putrakAH.. 7-114-36 (49480) vihInAMshcha kR^itAnashvAnvirathAMshcha kR^itAnnarAn. tatra sAtyakipArthAbhyAM manye shochanti putrakAH.. 7-114-37 (49481) hayaughAnnihatAndR^iShTvA dravamANAMstatastataH. raNe mAdhavapArthAbhyAM manye shochanti putrakAH.. 7-114-38 (49482) pattisa~NghAnraNe dR^iShTvA dhAvamAnAMshcha sarvashaH. nirAshA vijaye sarve manye shochanti putrakAH.. 7-114-39 (49483) droNasya samatikrAntAvanIkamaparAjitau. kShaNena dR^iShTvA tau vIrau manye shochanti putrakAH.. 7-114-40 (49484) sammUDho.asmi bhR^ishaM tAta shrutvA kR^iShNadhana~njayau. praviShTau mAmakaM sainyaM sAtvatena sahAchyutau.. 7-114-41 (49485) tasminpraviShTe pR^itanAM shinInAM pravare rathe. bhojAnIkaM vyatikrAnte kimakurvata kauravAH.. 7-114-42 (49486) tathA droNena samare nigR^ihIteShu pANDuShu. kathaM yuddhamabhUttatra tanmamAchakShva sa~njaya.. 7-114-43 (49487) droNo hi balavAnshreShThaH kR^itAstro yuddhadurmadaH. pA~nchAlAstaM maheShvAsaM pratyayudhyankathaM raNe.. 7-114-44 (49488) baddhavairAstato droNe dhana~njayajayaiShiNaH. bhAradvAjasutasteShu dR^iDhavairo mahArathaH.. 7-114-45 (49489) arjunashchApi yachchakre sindhurAjavadhaM prati. tanme sarvaM samAchakShva kushalo hyasi sa~njaya.. 7-114-46 (49490) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-114-47x (4555) AtmAparAdhAtsambhUtaM vyasanaM bharatarShabha. prApya prAkR^itavadvIra na tvaM shochitumarhasi.. 7-114-47 (49491) purA yaduchyase prAj~naiH suhR^idbhirvidurAdibhiH. mA hArShIH pANDavAnrAjanniti tanna tvayA shrutam.. 7-114-48 (49492) suhR^idAM hitakAmAnAM vAkyaM yo na shR^iNoti ha. sa mahadvyasanaM prApya shochate vai yathA bhavAn.. 7-114-49 (49493) yAchito.asi purA rAjandAshArheNa shamaM prati. na cha taM labdhavAnkAmaM tvattaH kR^iShNo mahAyashAH.. 7-114-50 (49494) tava nirguNatAM j~nAtvA pakShapAtaM suteShu cha. dvaidhIbhAvaM tathA dharme pANDaveShu cha matsaram.. 5-114-52 tava jihmamabhiprAyaM viditvA pANDavAnprati. ArtapralApAMshcha bahUnmanujAdhipa sattama.. 7-114-51 (49495) sarvalokasya tattvaj~naH sarvalokeshvaraH prabhuH. vAsudevastato yuddhaM kurUNAmakaronmahat.. 7-114-53 (49496) AtmAparAdhAtsumahAnprAptaste vipulaH kShayaH. nainaM duryodhane doShaM kartumarhasi mAnada.. 7-114-54 (49497) na hi tai sukR^itaM ki~nchidAdau madhye cha bhArata. dR^ishyate pR^iShThatashchaiva tvanmUlo hi parAjayaH.. 7-114-55 (49498) tasmAdadya sthiro bhUtvA j~nAtvA lokasya nirNayam. shR^iNu yuddhaM yathAvR^ittaM ghoraM devAsuropamam.. 7-114-56 (49499) praviShTe tava sainyaM tu shaineye satyavikrame. bhImasenamukhAH pArthAH pratIyurvAhinIM tava.. 7-114-57 (49500) AgachChatastAnsahasA kruddharUpAnsahAnugAn. dadhAraiko raNe pANDUnkR^itavarmA mahArathaH.. 7-114-58 (49501) yathodvR^ittaM vArayate velA vai salilArNavam. pANDusainyaM tathA sa~Nkhye hArdikyaH samavArayat.. 7-114-59 (49502) tatrAdbhutamapashyAma hArdikyasya parAkramam. yadenaM sahitAH pArthA nAtichakramurAhave.. 7-114-60 (49503) tato bhImastribhirviddhvA kR^itavarmANamAshugaiH. sha~NkhaM dadhmau mahAbAhurharShuyansarvapANDavAn.. 7-114-61 (49504) sahadevastu viMshatyA dharmarAjashcha pa~nchabhiH. shatena nakulashchApi hArdikyaM samavidhyata.. 7-114-62 (49505) draupadeyAstrisaptatyA saptabhishcha ghaTotkachaH. dhR^iShTadyumnastribhishchApi kR^itavarmANamArdayat.. 7-114-63 (49506) virATo drupadashchaiva yAj~nasenishcha pa~nchabhiH. shikhaNDI chaiva hArdikyaM viddhvA pa~nchabhirAshugaiH.. 7-114-64 (49507) punarvivyAdha viMshatyA sAyakAnAM hasanniva. kR^itavarmA tato rAjansarvatastAnmahArathAn.. 7-114-65 (49508) ekaikaM pa~nchabhirviddhvA bhImaM vivyAdha saptabhiH. dhanurdhvajaM chAsya tadA rathAdbhUmAvapAtayat.. 7-114-66 (49509) athainaM ChinnadhanvAnaM tvaramANo mahArathaH. AjaghAnorasi kruddhaH saptatyA nishitaiH sharaiH.. 7-114-67 (49510) sa gADhaviddho balavAnhArdikyasya sharottamaiH. chachAla rathamadhyasthaH kShitikampe yathA.achalaH.. 7-114-68 (49511) bhImasenaM tathA dR^iShTvA dharmarAjapurogamAH. visR^ijantaH sharAnrAjankR^itavarmANamArdayan.. 7-114-69 (49512) taM tathA koShThakIkR^itya rathavaMshena mAriSha. vivyadhuH sAyakairhR^iShTA rakShArthaM mArutermR^idhe.. 7-114-70 (49513) pratilabhya tataH saMj~nAM bhImaseno mahAbalaH. shaktiM jagrAha samare hemadaNDAmayasmAyIm.. 7-114-71 (49514) chikShepa cha rathAttUrNaM kR^itavarmarathaM prati. sA bhImabhujanirmuktA nirmuktoragasannibhA.. 7-114-72 (49515) kR^itavarmANamabhitaH prajajvAla sudAruNA. tAmApatantIM sahasA yugAntAgnisamaprabhAm.. 7-114-73 (49516) dvAbhyAM sharAbhyAM hArdikyo nijaghAna dvidhA tadA. sA ChinnA patitA bhUmau shaktiH kanakabhUShaNA.. 7-114-74 (49517) dyotayantI disho rAjanmaholkeva nabhashchyutA. shaktiM vinihatAM dR^iShTvA bhImashchukrodha vai bhR^isham.. 7-114-75 (49518) tato.anyaddhanurAdAya vegavatsumahAsvanam. bhImaseno raNe kruddho hArdikyaM samavArayat.. 7-114-76 (49519) athainaM pa~nchabhirbANairAjaghAna stanAntare. bhImo bhImabalo rAjaMstava durmantritena cha.. 7-114-77 (49520) bhojastu kShatasarvA~Ngo bhImasenena mAriSha. raktAshoka ivotphullo vyabhrAjata raNAjire.. 7-114-78 (49521) tataH kruddhastribhirbANairbhImasenaM hasanniva. abhihatya dR^iDhaM yuddhe tAnsarvAnpratyavidhyata.. 7-114-79 (49522) tribhistribhirmaheShvAso yatamAnAnmahArathAn. te.api taM pratyavidhyanta saptabhiH saptabhiH sharaiH.. 7-114-80 (49523) shikhaNDinastataH kruddhaH kShurapreNa mahArathaH. dhanushchichCheda sAmare prahasanniva sAtvataH.. 7-114-81 (49524) shikhaNDI tu tataH kruddhashChinne dhanuShi satvaraH. asiM jagrAha samare shatachandraM cha bhAsvaram.. 7-114-82 (49525) bhrAmayitvA mahachcharma chAmIkaravibhUShitam. tamasiM preShayAmAta kR^itavarmarathaM prati.. 7-114-83 (49526) sa tasya sasharaM chApaM ChittvA rAjanmahAnasiH. abhyagAddharaNIM rAjaMshchyutaM jyotirivAmbarAt.. 7-114-84 (49527) etasminneva kAle tu tvaramANaM mahArathAH. vivyadhuH sAyakairgADhaM kR^itavarmANamAhave.. 7-114-85 (49528) athAnyaddhanurAdAya tyaktvA tachcha mahaddhanuH. vishIrNaM bharatashreShTha hArdikyaH paravIrahA.. 7-114-86 (49529) vivyAdha pANDavAnyuddhe tribhistribhirajihmagaiH. shikhaNDinaM cha vivyAdha tribhiH pa~nchabhireva cha.. 7-114-87 (49530) dhanuranyatsamAdAya shikhaNDI tu mahAyashAH. avArayatkUrmanakhairAshugairhR^idikAtmajam.. 7-114-88 (49531) tataH kruddho raNe rAjanhR^idikasyAtmasambhavaH. abhidudrAva vegena yAj~naseniM mahAratham.. 7-114-89 (49532) bhIShmasya samare rAjanmR^ityorhetuM mahAtmanaH. vidarshayanbalaM shUraH shArdUla iva ku~njaram.. 7-114-90 (49533) tau dishAgajasa~NkAshau jvalitAviva pAvakau. samApetaturanyonyaM sharasa~Nghairarindamau.. 7-114-91 (49534) vidhunvAnau dhanuHshreShThe sandadhAnau cha sAyakAn. visR^ijantau cha shatasho gabhastIniva bhAskarau.. 7-114-92 (49535) tApayantau sharaistIkShNairanyonyaM tau mahArathau. yugAntapratimau vIrau rejaturbhAskarAviva.. 7-114-93 (49536) kR^itavarmA cha samare yAj~naseniM mahAratham. viddhveShubhistrisaptatyA punarvivyAdha saptabhiH.. 7-114-94 (49537) sa gADhaviddho vyathito rathopastha upAvishat. visR^ijya sasharaM chApaM mUrchChayA.abhipariplutaH.. 7-114-95 (49538) taM viShaNNaM raNe dR^iShTvA tAvakAH puruSharShabha. hArdikyaM pUjayAmAsurvAsAMsyAdudhuvushcha ha.. 7-114-96 (49539) shikhaNDinaM tathA j~nAtvA hArdikyasharapIDitam. apovAha raNAdyantA tvaramANo mahAratham.. 7-114-97 (49540) sAditaM tu rathopasthe dR^iShTvA pArthAH shikhaNDinam. parivavrU rathaistUrNaM kR^itavarmANamAhave.. 7-114-98 (49541) tatrAdbhutaM paraM chakre kR^itavarmA mahArathaH. yadekaH samare pArthAnvArayAmAsa sAnugAn..
