7-114-99 (49542) pArthA~njitvA.ajayachchedInpA~nchAlAnsR^i~njayAnapi. kekayAMshcha mahAvIryAnkR^itavarmA mahArathaH.. 7-114-100 (49543) te vadhyamAnAH samare hArdikyena sma pANDavAH. itashchetashcha dhAvanto naiva chakrurdhR^itiM raNe.. 7-114-101 (49544) jitvA pANDusutAnyuddhe bhImasenapurogamAn. hArdikyaH samare.atiShThadvidhUma iva pAvakaH.. 7-114-102 (49545) te drAvyamANAH samare hArdikyena mahArathAH. vimukhAH samapadyanta sharavR^iShTibhirArditAH.. .. 7-114-103 (49546) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe chaturdashAdhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 114 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-114-1 bahuguNaM bahavo guNAH shauryAdayaH saMdhyAdayo vA yasmin. balaM prabalam.. 5-114-2 naH abhikAmamanuraktam.. 5-114-3 laghuno manoj~nasya vR^ittasyAyatanamAyAsaH prAyaH prachuraM yatra. sAragAtraM nibiDAvayavam.. 5-114-5 paryavaskande avarohaNe. saraNe prasaraNe. sAntaraplute pluvanAntarItAyAM gatau. vyapayAne.apasaraNe.. 5-114-6 vetanena dinamAsavarShadeyena dhanena.. 5-114-7 goShThyA saMlApamAtreNa.. 5-114-13 vAhanAnyevormitara~NgaparamparA vidyate yatra. kShepaNyo yantrANi.. 5-114-14 ratnairupalaishcha susa~nchitaM suShThusa~nChAditam. vAhanAbhidhAvanAnyeva vAyuvegatayA rUpitAni.. 5-114-17 mama sainyasya seShamityanvayaH.. 5-114-19 dAruNaikAyane atibhIShaNe.ananyagatike. akAle atIte samaye.. 5-114-23 labhyate sainyenArthAt.. 5-114-30 dhR^itiM dhAraNAm.. 5-114-35 vyagrAnanekAgrAn. avyagrAn palAyanaikamanasa iti vA.. 5-114-51 nirguNatAM guNavaiShamyam. dvaidhIbhAvamanishchayam.. 5-114-54 sumahAn vipula iti paryAyAbhyAM mahattvodrekaH.. 5-114-56 nirNayaM niyatasvabhAvam.. 5-114-65 sarvataH sarvAn.. 5-114-74 dvidhA sthAnadvaye.. 5-114-88 kUrmanakhaiH kUrmanakhAkR^itiphalakaiH.. 5-114-114 chaturdashAdhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 115

.. shrIH ..

7.115. adhyAyaH 115

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sAtyakinA jalasandhasya vadhaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-115-0 (49547) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-115-0x (4556) shR^iNuShvaikamanA rAjanyanmAM tvaM paripR^ichChasi. drAvyamANe bale tasminhArdikyena mahAtmanA.. 7-115-1 (49548) lajjayAvanate chApi parihR^iShTe cha tAvake. dvIpo ya AsItpANDUnAmagAdhe gAdhamichChatAm.. 7-115-2 (49549) shrutvA sa ninadaM bhImaM tAvakAnAM mahAhave. shaineyastvarito rAjankR^itavarmANamabhyayAt.. 7-115-3 (49550) uvAcha sArathiM tatra krodhAmarShasamanvitaH. hArdikyAbhimukhaM sUta kuru me rathamuttamam.. 7-115-4 (49551) kurute kadanaM pashya pANDusainye hyamarShitaH. enaM jitvA punaH sUta yAsyAmi vijayaM prati.. 7-115-5 (49552) evamukte tu vachane sUtastasya mahAmate. nimeShAntaramAtreNa kR^itavarmANamabhyayAt.. 7-115-6 (49553) kR^itavarmA tu hArdikyaH shaineyaM nishitaiH sharaiH. avAkiratsusaMkruddhastato.akruddhyatsa sAtyakiH.. 7-115-7 (49554) athAshu nishitaM bhalluM shaineyaH kR^itavarmaNaH. preShayAmAsa samare sharAMshcha chaturo.aparAn.. 7-115-8 (49555) te tasya jaghnire vAhAnbhallenAsyAchChinaddhanuH. pR^iShTharakShaM tathA sUtamavidhyannishitaiH sharaiH.. 7-115-9 (49556) tatastaM virathaM kR^itvA sAtyakiH satyavikramaH. senAmasyArdayAmAsa sharaiH sannataparvabhiH.. 7-115-10 (49557) abhajyatAtha pR^itanA shaineyasharapIDitA. `palAyanakR^itotsAhA bhramantI tatratatra ha'. tataH prAyAtsa tvaritaH sAtyakiH satyavikramaH.. 7-115-11 (49558) shR^iNu rAjanyadakarottava sainyeShu vIryavAn. atItya sa mahArAja droNAnIkamahArNavam.. 7-115-12 (49559) parAjitya tu saMhR^iShTaH kR^itavarmANamAhave. yantAramabravIchChUraH shanairyAhItyasambhramam.. 7-115-13 (49560) dR^iShTvA tu tava tatsainyaM rathAshvadvi pasa~Nkulam. padAtijanasampUrNamabravItsArathiM punaH.. 7-115-14 (49561) yadetanmeghasa~NkAshaM droNAnIkasya savyataH. sumahatku~njarAnIkaM yasya rukmaratho mukham.. 7-115-15 (49562) ete hi bahavaH sUta durnivAryAshcha saMyuge. duryodhanasamAdiShTA madarthe tyaktajIvitAH.. 7-115-16 (49563) rAjaputrA maheShvAsAH sarve vikrAntayodhinaH. `na chAjitvA raNe hyetA~nshakyaH prAptuM jayadrathaH.. 7-115-17 (49564) nApi sUta mayA pArthaH shakyaH prAptuM katha~nchana. ete tiShThanti sahitAH sarvavidyAsu niShThitAH'.. 7-115-18 (49565) trigartAnAM rathodArAH suvarNavikR^itadhvajAH. mAmevAbhimukhA vIrA yotsyamAnA vyavasthitAH.. 7-115-19 (49566) atra mAM prApaya kShipramashvAMshchodaya sArathe. trigartaiH saha yotsyAmi bhAradvAjasya pashyataH.. 7-115-20 (49567) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-115-21x (4557) tataH prAyAchChanaiH sUtaH sAtvatasya mate sthitaH. rathenAdityavarNena bhAsvareNa patAkinA.. 7-115-21 (49568) tamUhuH sArathervashyA valgamAnA hayottamAH. vAyuvegasamAH sa~Nkhye kundendurajataprabhAH.. 7-115-22 (49569) ApatantaM raNe taM tu sha~NkhavarNairhayottamaiH. parivavustataH shUrA gajAnIkena sarvataH. kiranto vividhAMstIkShNAnsAyakA.NllaghuvedhinaH.. 7-115-23 (49570) sAtvato.api shitairbANairgajAnIkamayodhayat. parvatAniva varSheNa tapAnte jalado mahAn.. 7-115-24 (49571) vajrAshanisamasparshairvadhyamAnAH sharairgajAH. prAdravanraNamutsR^ijya shinivIrasamIritaiH.. 7-115-25 (49572) shIrNadantA virudhirA bhinnamastakapiNDikAH. vishIrNakarNAsyakarA viniyantR^ipatAkinaH.. 7-115-26 (49573) sambhinnavarmaghaNTAshcha vinikR^ittamahAdhvajAH. hatArohA disho rAjanbhejire bhraShTakambalAH.. 7-115-27 (49574) ruvanto vividhAnnAdA~njaladopamaniHsvanAH. nArachairvatsadantaishcha bhallaira~njalikaistathA.. 7-115-28 (49575) kShuraprairardhachandraishcha sAtvatena vidAritAH. kSharanto.asR^iktathA mUtraM purIShaM cha pradudruvuH. babhrumushchaskhalushchAnye peturmamlustathA.apare.. 7-115-29 (49576) evaM tatku~njarAnIkaM yuyudhAnena pIDitam. sharairagnyarkasa~NkAshaiH pradudrAva samantataH.. 7-115-30 (49577) tasminhate gajAnIke jalasandho mahAbalaH. yattaH samprApayannAgaM rajatAshvarathaM prati.. 7-115-31 (49578) rukmavarmadharaH shUrastapanIyA~NgadaH shuchiH. kuNDalI makuTI kha~NgI raktachandanarUShitaH.. 7-115-32 (49579) shirasA dhArayandIptAM tapanIyamayIM srajam. urasA dhArayanniShkaM kaNThasUtraM cha bhAsvaram.. 7-115-33 (49580) chApaM cha rukmavikR^itaM vidhunvangajamUrdhani. ashobhata mahArAja savidyudiva toyadaH.. 7-115-34 (49581) tamApatantaM sahasA mAgadhasya gajottamam. sAtyakirvArayAmAsa veleva makarAlayam.. 7-115-35 (49582) nAgaM nivAritaM dR^iShTvA shaineyasya sharottamaiH. akrudhyata raNe rAja~njalasandho mahAbalaH.. 7-115-36 (49583) tataH kruddho mahArAja mArgaNairbhArasAdhanaiH. avidhyata shineH pautraM jalasandho mahorasi.. 7-115-37 (49584) tato.apareNa bhallena pItena nishitena cha. asyato vR^iShNivIrasya nichakarta sharAsanam.. 7-115-38 (49585) sAtyakiM ChinnadhanvAnAM prahasanniva bhArata. avidhyanmAgadho vIraH pa~nchabhirnishitaiH sharaiH.. 7-115-39 (49586) sa viddho bahubhirbANairjalasandhena vIryavAn. nAkampata mahAbAhustadadbhutamivAbhavat.. 7-115-40 (49587) achintayanvai sa sharAnnAtyarthaM sambhramAdbalI. dhanuranyatsamAdAya tiShThatiShThetyuvAcha ha.. 7-115-41 (49588) etAvaduktvA shaineyo jalasandhaM mahorasi. vivyAdha ShaShTyA subhR^ishaM sharANAM prahasanniva.. 7-115-42 (49589) kShurapreNa sutIkShNena muShTideshe mahaddhanuH. jalasandhasya chichCheda vivyAdha cha tribhiH sharaiH.. 7-115-43 (49590) jalasandhastu tattyaktvA sasharaM vai sharAsanam. tomaraM vyasR^ijattUrNaM sAtyakiM prati mAriSha.. 7-115-44 (49591) sa nirbhidya bhujaM savyaM mAdhavasya mahAraNe. abhyagAddharaNIM ghoraH shvasanniva mahoragaH.. 7-115-45 (49592) nirbhinne tu bhuje savye sAtyakiH satyavikramaH. triMshadbhirvishikhaistIkShNairjalasandhamatADayat.. 7-115-46 (49593) pragR^ihya tu tataH kha~NgaM jalasandho mahAbalaH. ArShabhaM charma cha mahachChatachandrakasa~Nkulam. Avidhya cha tataH kha~NgaM sAtvatAyotsasarja ha.. 7-115-47 (49594) shaineyasya dhanushChittvA sa kha~Ngo nyapatanmahIm. alAtachakravachchaiva vyarochata mahIM gataH.. 7-115-48 (49595) athAnyaddhanurAdAya sarvakAyAvadAraNam. `jalasandhamabhiprekShya utsmayitvA cha mAdhavaH'.. 7-115-49 (49596) shAlaskandhapratIkAshamindrAshanisamasvanam. viShphArya vivyadhe kruddho jalasandhaM shareNa ha.. 7-115-50 (49597) tataH sAbharaNau bAhU kShurAbhyAM mAdhavottamaH. sA~Ngadau jalasandhasya chichCheda prahasanniva.. 7-115-51 (49598) tau bAhU parighaprakhyau petaturgajasattamAt. vasundharAdharAddhaShTau pa~nchashIrShAvivoragau.. 7-115-52 (49599) tataH sudaMShTraM suhanu chArukuNDalamaNDitam. kShureNAsya tR^itIyena shirashchichCheda sAtyakiH.. 7-115-53 (49600) tatpAtitashirobAhukabandhaM bhImadarshanam. dviradaM jalasandhasya rudhireNAbhyaShi~nchata.. 7-115-54 (49601) jalasandhaM nihatyAjau tvaramANastu sAtvataH. vimAnaM pAtayAmAsa gajaskandhAdvishAMpate.. 7-115-55 (49602) rudhireNAvasiktA~Ngau jalasandhasya ku~njaraH. vilambamAnamavahatsaMshliShTaM paramAsanam.. 7-115-56 (49603) sharArditaH sAtvatena mardamAnaH svavAhinIm. ghoramArtasvaraM kR^itvA vidudrAva mahAgajaH.. 7-115-57 (49604) hAhAkAro mahAnAsIttava sainyasya mAriSha. jalasandhaM hataM dR^iShTvA vR^iShNInAmR^ipabheNa tu.. 7-115-58 (49605) vimukhAshchAbhyadhAvanta tava yodhAH samantataH. palAyanakR^itotsAhA nirutsAhA dviSha~njaye.. 7-115-59 (49606) etasminnantare rAjandroNaH shastrabhR^itAM varaH. `sannyasya bhAraM sumahatkR^itavarmaNi bhArata.. 7-115-60 (49607) abhyayAjjavanairashvairyuyudhAnaM mahAratham. sa hi pArthAnraNe yattAndadhAraiko mahAbalaH'.. 7-115-61 (49608) tamudIrNaM tathA dR^iShTvA shaineyaM kurupu~NgavAH. droNenaiva saha kruddhA sAtyakiM samupAdravan.. 7-115-62 (49609) tataH pravavR^ite yuddhaM kurUNAM sAtvatasya cha. droNasya cha raNe rAjanghoraM devAsuropamam.. .. 7-115-63 (49610) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe pa~nchadashAdhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 115 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-115-23 droNo 5-115-26 piNDikrA gaNDaH.. 5-115-33 kaNThasUtraM hAram.. 5-115-47 tato grahaNAnantaram. Avidhya bhrAmayitvA.. 5-115-52 vasundharAdharAt parvatAm.. 5-115-115 pa~nchadashAdhikashatatamo.adhyAya..
droNaparva - adhyAya 116

.. shrIH ..

7.116. adhyAyaH 116

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sAtyakinA duryodhanakR^itavarmaNoH parAjayaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-116-0 (49611) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-116-0x (4558) `sAtvatasya raNe karma dR^iShTvA yoddhuM mahArathAH. amR^iShyamANAH saMyattAH shaineyaM samupAdravan'.. 7-116-1 (49612) te kirantaH sharavrAtAnsarve yattAH prahAriNaH. tvaramANA mahArAja yuyudhAnamayodhayan.. 7-116-2 (49613) taM droNaH saptasaptyA jaghAna nishitaiH sharaiH. durmarShaNo dvAdashabhirduHsaho dashabhiH sharaiH.. 7-116-3 (49614) vikarNashchApi nishitaistriMshadbhiH ka~NkapatribhiH. vivyAdha mArgaNaistUrNaM vAmapArshve stanAntare.. 7-116-4 (49615) durmukho dashabhirbANaistathA duHshAsano.aShTabhiH. chitrasenashcha shaineyaM dvAbhyAM vivyAdha mAriSha.. 7-116-5 (49616) duryodhanashcha mahatA sharavarSheNa mAdhavam. apIDayadrame rAja~nshUrAshchAnye mahArathAH.. 7-116-6 (49617) sarvataH pratividdhastu tava putrairmahArathaiH. `sa tudyamAnashcha tadA sarvataH kurupu~NgavaiH'.. 7-116-7 (49618) tAnpratyavidhyadvArShNeyaH pR^ithakpR^ithagajihmagaiH. `sAtyakiH puNDarIkAkSho hyastreShu pariniShThitaH'.. 7-116-8 (49619) bhAradvAjaM tribhirbANairduHsahaM navabhiH sharaiH. vikarNaM pa~nchaviMshatyA chitrasenaM cha saptabhiH.. 7-116-9 (49620) durmarShaNaM dvAdashabhiraShTAbhishcha viviMshatim. satyavrataM cha navabhirvijayaM dashabhiH sharaiH.. 7-116-10 (49621) `duryodhanaM tribhirviddhvA supu~NkhaistigmatejanaiH'. tato rukmA~NgadaM chApaM vidhunvAno mahArathaH. abhyayAtsAtyakistUrNaM putraM tava mahAratham.. 7-116-11 (49622) rAjAnaM sarvalokasya sarvalokamahAratham. sharairabhyahanadgADhaM tato yuddhamabhUttayoH.. 7-116-12 (49623) vimu~nchatau sharAMstIkShNAnsandadhAnau cha sAyakAn. adR^ishyaM samare.anyonyaM chakratustau mahArathau.. 7-116-13 (49624) sAtyakiH kururAjena nirviddho bahvashobhata. asravadrudhiraM bhUri svarasaM chandano yathA.. 7-116-14 (49625) sAtvatena cha bANaudhairnirviddhastanayastava. shAtakumbhamayApIDo babhau yUpa ivochChritaH.. 7-116-15 (49626) mAdhavastu rame rAjankururAjasya dhanvinaH. dhanushchichCheda samare kShurapreNa hasanniva.. 7-116-16 (49627) athainaM ChinnadhanvAnaM sharairbahubhirAchinot. nirbhinnashcha sharaistena dviShatA kShiprakAriNA. nAmR^iShyata raNe rAjA shatrorvijayalakShaNam.. 7-116-17 (49628) athAnyaddhanurAdAya hemapR^iShThaM durAsadam. vivyAdha sAtyakiM tUrNaM sAyakAnAM shatena ha.. 7-116-18 (49629) so.atividdho balavatA tava putreNa dhanvinA. amarShavashamApannastava putramapIDayat.. 7-116-19 (49630) pIDitaM nR^ipatiM dR^iShTvA tava putraM mahArathAH. sAtyakiM sharavarSheNa ChAdayAmAsurojasA.. 7-116-20 (49631) sa chChAdyamAno bahubhistava putrairmahArathaiH. ekaikaM pa~nchabhirviddhvA punarvivyAdha saptabhiH. duryodhanaM va tvarito vivyAdhAShTabhirAshugaiH.. 7-116-21 (49632) prahasaMshchAsya chichCheda kArmukaM ripubhIShaNam. nAgaM maNimayaM chaiva sharairdhvajamapAtayat.. 7-116-22 (49633) hatvA tu chaturo vAhAMshchaturbhirnishitaiH sharaiH. sArathiM pAtayAmAsa kShurapreNa mahAyashAH.. 7-116-23 (49634) etasminnantare chaiva kururAjaM mahAratham. avArikachCharairhR^iShTo bahubhirmarmabhedibhiH.. 7-116-24 (49635) sa vidhyamAnaH samare shaineyasya sharottamaiH. prAdravatsahasA rAjanputro duryodhanastava. Aplutashcha tato yAnaM chitrasenasya dhanvinaH.. 7-116-25 (49636) hAhAbhUtaM jagachchAsIddR^iShTvA rAjAnamAhave. grasyamAnaM sAtyakinA khe momamiva rAhuNA.. 7-116-26 (49637) taM tu shabdamatha shrutvA kR^itavArmA mahArathaH. abhyayAtsahasA tatra yatrAste mAdhavaH prabhuH.. 7-116-27 (49638) vidhunvAno dhanuH shreShThaM chodayaMshchaiva vAjinaH. bhartsayansArathiM chAgre yAhiyAhIti satvaram.. 7-116-28 (49639) tamApatantaM samprekShya vyAditAsyamivAntakam. yuyudhAno mahArAja yantAramidamabravIt.. 7-116-29 (49640) kR^itavarmA rathenaiSha drutamApatate sharI. pratyudyAhi rathenainaM pravaraM sarvadhanvinAm.. 7-116-30 (49641) `prayAhi satvaraM sUta rathena rathasattamam. nihaniShyAmi taM sa~Nkhye vR^iShNivIramarindamam'.. 7-116-31 (49642) tataH prajavitAshvena rathena rathinAMvaraH. AsasAda raNe bhojaM pratimAnaM dhanuShmatAm.. 7-116-32 (49643) tato gabhastimatprakhyau jvalitAviva pAvakau. sameyAtAM naravyAghrau vyAghrAviva tarasvinau.. 7-116-33 (49644) kR^itavarmA tu shaineyaM ShaDviMshatyA samArpayat. nishitaiH sAyakaistIkShNairyantAraM chAsya pa~nchabhiH.. 7-116-34 (49645) chaturashchaturo vAhAMshchaturbhiH parameShubhiH. avidhyatsAdhudAntAnvai saindhavAnsAtvatasya hi.. 7-116-35 (49646) rukmadhvajo rukmapR^iShThaM mahadviShphArya kArmukam. rukmA~NgadI rukmavarmA rukmapu~NkhairavArayat.. 7-116-36 (49647) tato.ashItiM shineH pautraH sAyakAnkR^itavarmaNe. prAhiNottvarayA yukto draShTukAmo dhana~njayam.. 7-116-37 (49648) so.atividdho balavatA shatruNA shatrutApanaH. samakampataH durdharShaH kShitikampe yathA.achalaH.. 7-116-38 (49649) triShaShTyA chaturo.asyAshvAnsaptabhiH sArathiM tathA. vivyAdha nishitaistUrNaM sAtyakiH satyavikramaH.. 7-116-39 (49650) `hatAshvasUte tu rathe sthitAya shinipu~NgavaH'. suvarNapu~NkhaM vishikhaM samAdAya cha sAtyakiH. vyasR^ijattaM mahAjvAlaM sa~Nkruddhamiva pannagam.. 7-116-40 (49651) so.avidhyatkR^itavarmANaM yamadaNDopamaH sharaH. jAmbUnadavichitraM cha varma nirbhidya bhAnumat. abhyagAddharaNImugro rudhireNa samukShitaH.. 7-116-41 (49652) sa~njAtarudhirashchAjau sAtvateShubhirarditaH. sasharaM dhanurutsR^ijya nyapatatsyandanottamAt.. 7-116-42 (49653) sa siMhadaMShTro jAnubhyAM patito.amitavikramaH. sharArditaH sAtyakinA rathopasthe nararShabhaH.. 7-116-43 (49654) sahasrabAhusadR^ishamakShobhyamiva sAgaram. nivArya kR^itavarmANaM sAtyakiH prayayau tataH.. 7-116-44 (49655) `na hi tasya sharo.apArthaH katha~nchidapi pArthiva. didR^ikShuH sa hi vegena prAyAdyatra dhana~njayaH.. 7-116-45 (49656) sa shaktyA kShatriyaistatra niruddho balavattaraH. yuyudhe sAtvato rAjandidR^ikShuH pANDunandanam'.. 7-116-46 (49657) kha~NgashaktidhanuHkIrNAM gajAshvarathasa~NkulAm. pravartitograrudhirAM shatashaH kShatriyarShabhaiH.. 7-116-47 (49658) prekShatAM sarvasainyAnAM madhyena shinipu~NgavaH. abhyagAdvAhinIM hitvA vR^itrahevAsurIM chamUm.. 7-116-48 (49659) samAshvasya cha hArdikyo gR^ihya chAnyanmahaddhanuH. tasthau sa tatra balavAnvArayanyudhi pANDavAn.. .. 7-116-49 (49660) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe poDashAdhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 116 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-116-11 rukmA~NgadaM chApi iti ~Na.pAThaH.. 5-116-14 chandano raktachandanaH.. 5-116-43 daMShTrAshchatasro yasya syurdashanebhyaH samuchChritAH. siMhadaMShTraH sa gaditashchaturdaMShTrashcha sUribhiH.. 5-116-116 ShoDashAdhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 117

.. shrIH ..

7.117. adhyAyaH 117

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sAtyakiparAkramavarNanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-117-0 (49661) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-117-0x (4559) kAlyamAneShu sainyeShu shaineyena tatastataH. bhAradvAjaH sharavrAtairmarmabhidbhiravAkirat.. 7-117-1 (49662) sa samprahArastumulo droNasAtvatayorabhUt. pashyatAM sarvasainyAnAM balivAsavayoriva.. 7-117-2 (49663) tato droNaH shineH pautraM chitraiH sarvAyasaiH sharaiH. tribhirAshIvipAkArairlalATe samavidhyata.. 7-117-3 (49664) tairlalATArpitairbANairyuyudhAnastvajihmagaiH. vyarochata mahArAja trishR^i~Nga iva parvataH.. 7-117-4 (49665) tato.asya bANAnaparAnindrAshanisamasvanAn. bhAradvAjo.antaraprekShI preShayAmAsa saMyuge.. 7-117-5 (49666) tAndroNachApanirmuktAndAshArhaH patataH sharAn. dvAbhyAMdvAbhyAM supu~NkhAbhyAM chichCheda paramAstravit.. 7-117-6 (49667) tAmasya laghutAM droNaH samavekShya vishAmpate. prahasya sahasA.avidhyattriMshatAM shinipu~Ngavam.. 7-117-7 (49668) punaH pa~nchashateShUNAM shitena cha samArpayat. laghutAM yuyudhAnasya lAghavena visheShayan.. 7-117-8 (49669) samutpatanti valmIkAdyathA kruddhA mahoragAH. tathA droNarathAdrAjannApatanti tanuchChidaH.. 7-117-9 (49670) tathaiva yuyudhAnena sR^iShTAH satasahasrashaH. avAkirandroNarathaM sharA rudhirabhojanAH.. 7-117-10 (49671) lAghavAddijamukhyasya sAtvatasya cha mAriSha. visheShaM nAdhyagachChAma samAvAstAM nararShabhau.. 7-117-11 (49672) sAtyakistu tato droNaM navabhirnataparvabhiH. AjaghAna bhR^ishaM kruddho dhvajaM cha nishitaiH sharaiH.. 7-117-12 (49673) sArathiM cha shatenaiva bhAradvAjasya pashyataH. lAghavaM yuyudhAnasya dR^iShTvA droNo mahArathaH.. 7-117-13 (49674) saptatyA sArathiM vidvvA tura~NgAMshcha tribhistribhiH. dhvajamekena chichCheda mAdhavasya rathe sthitam.. 7-117-14 (49675) athApareNa bhallena hemapu~Nkhena patriNA. dhanushchichCheda samare mAdhavasya mahAtmanaH.. 7-117-15 (49676) sAtyakistu tataH kruddho dhanustyaktvA mahArathaH. gadAM jagrAha mahatIM bhAradvAjAya chAkShipat.. 7-117-16 (49677) tAmApatantIM sahasA paTTabaddhAmayasmayIm. nyavArayachCharairdroNo bahubhirbahurUpibhiH.. 7-117-17 (49678) athAnyaddhanurAdAya sAtyakiH satyavikramaH. vivyAdha bahubhirvIraM bhAradvAjaM shilAshitaiH.. 7-117-18 (49679) sa vidvA samare droNaM siMhanAdamamu~nchata. taM vai na mR^imaShe droNaH siMhanAdaM mahAtmanaH.. 7-117-19 (49680) tataH shaktiM raNe droNo rukmadaNDAmayasmayIm. tarasA preShayAmAsa mAdhavasya rathaM prati.. 7-117-20 (49681) anAsAdya tu shaineyaM sA shaktiH kAlasannibhA. bhittvA rathaM jagAmognA dharaNIM dAruNasvanA.. 7-117-21 (49682) tato droNaM shineH pautro rAjanvivyAdha patriNA. dakShiNaM bhujamAsAdya pIDayanbharatarShabha.. 7-117-22 (49683) droNo.api samare rAjanmAdhavasya mahaddhanuH. ardhachandreNa chichCheda rathashaktyA cha sArathim.. 7-117-23 (49684) mumoha sArathistasya rathashaktyA samAhataH. sa rathopasthamAsAdya muhUrtaM sannyaShIdata.. 7-117-24 (49685) chakAra sAtyakI rAjaMstatra karmAtimAnuSham. ayodhayachcha yaddroNaM rashmI~njagrAha cha svayam.. 7-117-25 (49686) tataH sharashatenaiva yuyudhAno mahArathaH. avidhyadbrAhmaNaM sa~Nkhye hR^iShTarUpo vishAmpate.. 7-117-26 (49687) tasya droNaH sharAnpa~ncha preShayAmAsa bhArata. te ghorAH kavachaM bhittvA papuH shoNitamAhave.. 7-117-27 (49688) nirviddhastu sharairghorairakruddhyatsAtyakirbhR^isham. sAyakAnvyasR^ijachchApi vIro rukmarathaM prati.. 7-117-28 (49689) tato droNasya yantAraM nipAtyaikeShuNA bhuvi. ashvAnvyadrAvayadbANairhatasUtAMstatastataH.. 7-117-29 (49690) sa rathaH pradrutaH sa~Nkhye maNDalAni sahasrashaH. chakAra rAjato rAjanbhrAjamAna ivAMshumAn.. 7-117-30 (49691) abhidravata gR^ihNIta hayAndroNasya dhAvata. iti sma chukrushuH sarve rAjaputrAH sarAjakAH.. 7-117-31 (49692) te sAtyakimapAsyAshu rAjanyudhi mahArathAH. yato droNastataH sarve sahasA samupAdravan.. 7-117-32 (49693) tAndR^iShTvA pradrutAnsa~Nkhye sAtvatena sharArditAn. prabhagnaM punarevAsIttava sainyaM samAkulam.. 7-117-33 (49694) vyUhasyaiva punardvAraM gatvA droNo vyavasthitaH. vAtAyamAnaistairashvairnIto vR^iShNisharArditaiH.. 7-117-34 (49695) pANDupA~nchAlasambhinnaM vyUhamAlokya vIryavAn. shaineye nAkarodyatnaM vyUhamevAbhyarakShata.. 7-117-35 (49696) nivArya pANQDupA~nchAlAndroNAgniH pradahanniva. tasthau krodhedhmasandIptaH kAlasUrya ivodyataH.. .. 7-117-36 (49697) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe saptadashAdhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 117 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-117-23 rathashaktyA ketakapatrAkAramukhayA shaktyA.. 5-117-117 saptadashAdhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 118

.. shrIH ..

7.118. adhyAyaH 118

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sAtyakinA sudarshananAmno rAj~no vadhaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-118-0 (49698) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-118-0x (4560) droNaM sa jitvA puruShapravIra-- stathaiva hArdikyamukhAMstvadIyAn. prahasya sUtaM vachanaM babhAShe shinipravIraH kurupu~NgavAgrya.. 7-118-1 (49699) nimittamAtraM vayamadya sUta dagdhA rathAH keshavaphalgunAbhyAm. hatAnnihanmeha nararShabheNa vayaM sureshAtmasamudbhaveta.. 7-118-2 (49700) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-118-3x (4561) tamevamuktvA shinipu~NgavastadA mahAmR^idhe so.agryadhanurdharo.arihA. kiransamantAtsahasA sharAnbalI samApatachChayena ivAmiShAshayA.. 7-118-3 (49701) taM yAntamashvaiH shashisha~NkhavarNai-- rvigAhya sainyaM puruShapravIram. nAshaknuvanvArayituM samantA-- dAdityarashmipratimaM rathAgryam.. 7-118-4 (49702) asahyavikrAntamadInasatvaM sarve gaNA bhArata ye tvadIyAH. sahasranetrapratimaprabhAvaM divIva sUryaM jaladavyapAye.. 7-118-5 (49703) amarShapUrNastvatichitrayodhI sharAsanI kA~nchanavarmadhArI. sudarshanaH sAtyakimApatantaM nyavArayadrAjavaraH prasahya.. 7-118-6 (49704) tayorabhUdbhAratasamprahAraH sudAruNastaM samatiprashaMsan. yodhAstvadIyAshcha hi somakAshcha vR^itrendrayoryuddhamivAmaraughAH.. 7-118-7 (49705) sharaiH sutIkShNaiH shatasho.abhyavidhya-- tsudarshanaH sAtvatamukhyamAjau. anAgatAneva tu tAnpR^iShatkAM-- shchichCheda rAja~nshinipu~Ngavo.api.. 7-118-8 (49706) tathaiva shakrapratimo.api sAtyakiH sudarshane yAnkShipati sma sAyakAn. dvidhA tridhA tAnakarotsudarshanaH sharottamaiH syandanavaryamAsthitaH.. 7-118-9 (49707) tAnvIkShya bANAnnihatAMstadAnIM sudarshanaH sAtyakibANavegaiH. krodhAddidhakShanniva tigmatejAH sharAnamu~nchattapanIyachitrAn.. 7-118-10 (49708) punaH sa bANaistribhiragnikalpai-- rAkarNapUrNairnishitaiH supu~NkhaiH. vivyAdha dehAvaraNaM vibhidya te sAtyakerAvivishuH sharIram.. 7-118-11 (49709) tathaiva tasyAvanipAlaputraH sandhAya bANairaparairjvaladbhiH. AjaghnivAMstAnrajataprakAshAM-- shchaturbhirashvAMshchaturaH prasahya.. 7-118-12 (49710) tathA tu temAbhihatastarasvI naptA shinerindrasamAnavIryaH. sudarshanasyeShugaNaiH sutIkShNai-- rhayAnnihatyAshu nanAda nAdam.. 7-118-13 (49711) athAsya sUtasya shiro nikR^itya bhallena shakrAshanisannibhena. sudarshanasyApi shinipravIraH kShureNa kAlAnalasannibhena.. 7-118-14 (49712) sakuNDalaM pUrNashashiprakAshaM bhrAjiShNu vaktraM vichakarta dehAt. yathA purA vajradharaH prasahya balasya sa~Nkhye.atibalasya rAjan.. 7-118-15 (49713) nihatya taM pArthivaputrapautraM raNe yadUnAmR^iShabhastarasvI. mudA sametaH parayA mahAtmA rarAja rAjansurarAjakalpaH.. 7-118-16 (49714) tato yayAvarjunameva vIro nivArya sainyaM tava mArgaNaughaiH. sadashvayuktena rathena rAja.N-- llokaM visismApayiShurnR^ivIraH.. 7-118-17 (49715) tattasya vismApayanIyamagrya-- mapUjayanyodhavarAH sametAH. pravartamAnAniShugochare.arI-- ndadAha bANairhutabhugyathaiva.. .. 7-118-18 (49716) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe aShTAdashAdhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 118 ..
droNaparva - adhyAya 119

.. shrIH ..

7.119. adhyAyaH 119

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sAtyakiparAkramavarNanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-119-0 (49717) `sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-119-0x (4562) nirjitya kR^itavarmANaM bhAradvAjaM cha saMyuge. sa sAtyakiH satyadhR^itirmahAtmA shinipu~NgavaH.. 7-119-1 (49718) *duryodhanaM cha nirjitya shUraM chaiva suyodhanam. jalasandhaM nihatyAjau shUrasenaM cha pArthivam.. 7-119-2 (49719) mlechChAMshcha bahudhA rAjankAshyaputraM cha saMyuge. niShAdAMsta~NkaNAMshchaiva kali~NgAnmagadhAnapi.. 7-119-3 (49720) kekayA~nChUrasenAMshcha tathA parvatavAsinaH. kAmbhojAnyavanAMshchaiva vasAtIMshcha shibInapi.. 7-119-4 (49721) kosalAnmagadhAMshchaiva yAtudhAnAnsatittirAn. etAMshchAnyAnraNe hatvA.agachChadyuddhe sa sAtyakiH.. 7-119-5 (49722) rudhiraughanadIM ghorAM keshashaivAlashAdvalAm. shaktigrAhasamAkIrNAM ChatrahaMsopashobhitAm.. 7-119-6 (49723) dustarAM bhIrubhirnityaM shUralokapravAhinIm. pravartya hR^iShito rAjanpunaryantAramabravIt.. 7-119-7 (49724) dhvajanAgAshvakalilaM sharashaktyUrmimAlinam'. kha~NkamatsyaM gadAgrAhaM shUrAyudhamahAsvanam.. 7-119-8 (49725) prANApahAriNaM raudraM vAditroddhuShTanAditam. shUrANAM sukhasaMsparshamaspR^ishyamatha bhIruNAm. tIrNAH sma dustaraM tAta droNAnIkamahArNavam.. 7-119-9 (49726) jalasandhabalenAjau puruShAdairivAvR^itam. ato.anyatpR^itanAsheShaM manye kunadikAmiva.. 7-119-10 (49727) tartavyAmalpasalilAM chodayAshvAnasambhramam. hastaprAptamahaM manye sAmprataM savyasAchinam.. 7-119-11 (49728) nirjitya durdharaM droNaM sapadAnugamAhave. hArdikyaM yodhavaryaM cha manye prAptaM dhana~njayam.. 7-119-12 (49729) na hi me jAyate trAso dR^iShTvA sainyAnyanekashaH. vahneriva pradIptasya vane shuShkatR^iNAlayam.. 7-119-13 (49730) pashya pANDavamukhyena yAtAM bhUmiM kirITinA. pattyashvarathanAgaughaiH patitairviShamIkR^itAm.. 7-119-14 (49731) dravate tadyathA sainyaM tena bhagnaM mahAtmanA. rathairviparidhAvadbhirgajairashvaishcha sArathe. kausheyAruNasaMkAshametadudvUyate rajaH.. 7-119-15 (49732) abhyAshasthamahaM manye shvetAshvaM kR^iShNasArathim.. 7-119-16 (49733) shrUyate hyeSha nirghoSho jaladasyeva garjataH. viShphAryamANasya raNe gANDIvasyAmitaujasaH.. 7-119-17 (49734) abhyAshasthamahaM manye saindhavasya kirITinam. tAdR^ishaH shrUyate shabdaH sainyAnAM sAgaropamaH.. 7-119-18 (49735) yAdR^ishAni nimittAni mama prAdurbhavanti vai. anastaMgata Aditye hantA saindhavamarjunaH.. 7-119-19 (49736) shanairvisrambhayannashvAnyAhi yatrArivAhinI.. 7-119-20 (49737) yatraite satalatrAmAH suyodhanapurogamAH. daMshitAH krUrakarmANaH kAmbhojA yuddhadurmadAH.. 7-119-21 (49738) sharabANAsanadharA yavanAshcha prahAriNaH. shakAH kirAtA daradA barbarAstAmraliptakAH.. 7-119-22 (49739) anye cha bahavo mlechChA vividhAyudhapANayaH. mAmevAbhimukhAH sarve tiShThanti samarArthinaH.. 7-119-23 (49740) etAnsarathanAgAshvAnnihatyAjau sapattinaH. idaM durgaM mahAghoraM tIrNamevopadhAraya.. 7-119-24 (49741) sUta uvAcha. 7-119-25x (4563) na sambhramo me vArShNeya vidyate satyavikrama. yadyapi syAttava kruddho jAmadagnyo.agrataH sthitaH.. 7-119-25 (49742) droNo vA rathinAM shreShThaH kR^ipo madreshvaro.api vA. tathApi sambhrAmo na syAttvAmAshritya mahAbhuja.. 7-119-26 (49743) tvayA subahavo yuddhe nirjitAH shatrusUdana. daMshitAHkrUrakarmANaH kAmbhojA yuddhadurmadAH.. 7-119-27 (49744) sharavANAsanadharA yavanAshcha prahAriNaH. shakAH kirAtA daradA barbarAstAmraliptakAH. anye cha bahavo mlechChA vividhAyudhapANayaH.. 7-119-28 (49745) na cha me sambhramaH kashchidbhUtapUrvaH katha~nchana. kimutaitatsamAsAdya dhIraM saMyugagoShpadam.. 7-119-29 (49746) AyuShmankatareNa tvAM prApayAmi dhana~njayam. kebhyaH kruddho.asi vArShNeya kAnsvinmR^ityurupasthitaH.. 7-119-30 (49747) keShAM sa~NghamanIkasya hantumutsahate manaH. ketvAM yudhi parAkrAntaM kAlAntakayamopamam.. 7-119-31 (49748) dR^iShTvA vikramasampannaM vidraviShyanti saMyuge. keShAM vaivasvato rAjA smarate.adya mahAbhuja.. 7-119-32 (49749) sAtyakiruvAcha. 7-119-33x (4564) muNDAnetAnhaniShyAmi dAnavAniva vAsavaH. pratij~nAM pArayiShyAmi kAmbhojAneva mAM vaha.. 7-119-33 (49750) xxxxxkadanaM kR^itvA kShipraM yAsyAmi pANDavam.. 7-119-34 (49751) xxxxxyanti me vIryaM kauravAH sasuyodhanAH. xxxxxxnAke hate sUta sarvasainyeShu chAsakR^it.. 7-119-35 (49752) adya kauravasainyasya dIrghamANasya saMyuge. shrutvA virAvaM bahudhA santapsyati suyodhanaH.. 7-119-36 (49753) adya pANDavamukhyasya shvetAshvasya mahAtmanaH. AchAryakakR^itaM mArgaM darshayiShyAmi saMyuge.. 7-119-37 (49754) adya madbANanihatAnyodhamukhyAnsahasrashaH. dR^iShTvA duryodhano rAjA pashchAttApaM gamiShyati.. 7-119-38 (49755) adya me kShiprahastasya kShipataH sAyakottamAn. alAtachakrapratimaM dhanurdrakShyanti kauravAH.. 7-119-39 (49756) matsAyakachitA~NgAnAM rudhiraM sravatAM muhuH. sainikAnAM vadhaM dR^iShTvA santapsyati suyodhanaH.. 7-119-40 (49757) adya me kruddharUpasya nighnatashcha varAnvarAn. dviphalgunAmimaM lokaM maMsyate.adya suyodhanaH.. 7-119-41 (49758) adya rAjasahasrANi nihatAni mayA raNe. dR^iShTvA duryodhano rAjA santapsyati mahAmR^idhe.. 7-119-42 (49759) adya snehaM cha bhaktiM cha pANDaveShu mahAtmasu. hatvA rAjasahasrANi darshayiShyAmi rAjasu.. 7-119-43 (49760) balaM vIryaM kR^itaj~natvaM mama j~nAsyanti kauravAH.. 7-119-44 (49761) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-119-45x (4565) evamuktastadA sUtaH shikShitAnsAdhuvAhinaH. shashA~NkasannikAshAnvai vAjino vyanudadbhR^isham.. 7-119-45 (49762) te pibanta ivAkAshaM yuyudhAnaM hayottamAH. prApayanyavanA~nshanIghraM manaH pavanaraMhasaH.. 7-119-46 (49763) sAtyakiM te samAsAdya pR^itanAsvanivartinam. bahavo laghuhastAshcha sharavarShairavAkiran.. 7-119-47 (49764) teShAmiShUnathAstrANi vegavAnnataparvabhiH. achChinatsAtyakI rAjannainaM te prApnuva~nsharAH.. 7-119-48 (49765) rukmapu~NkhaiH sunishitairgArdhrapatrairajihmagaiH. uchchakarta shirAMsyugro yavanAnAM bhujAnapi.. 7-119-49 (49766) shaikyAyasAni varmANi kAMsyAni cha samantataH. bhittvA dehAMstathA teShAM sharA jagmurmahItalam.. 7-119-50 (49767) te hanyamAnA vIreNa mlechChAH sAtyakinA raNe. shatasho.abhyapataMstatra vyasavo vasudhAtale.. 7-119-51 (49768) supUrNAyatamuktaistAnavyavachChinnapiNDitaiH. pa~ncha ShaT sapta chAShTau cha bhibheda yavanA~nsharaiH.. 7-119-52 (49769) kAmbhojAnAM sahasraishcha shakAnAM cha vishAmpate. shabarANAM kirAtAnAM barbarANAM tathaiva cha.. 7-119-53 (49770) agamyarUpAM pR^ithivIM mAMsashoNitakardamAm. kR^itavAMstatra shaineyaH kShapayaMstAvakaM balam.. 7-119-54 (49771) dasyUnAM sashirastrANaiH shirobhirlUnamUrdhadauH. dIrghakUrchairmahI kIrNA vibarhairaNDajairiva.. 7-119-55 (49772) rudhirokShitasarvA~NgaistaistadAyodhanaM babhau. kabandhaiH saMvR^itaM sarvaM tAmrAbhraiH khamivAvR^itam.. 7-119-56 (49773) vajrAshanisamasparshaiH suparvabhirajihmagaiH. te sAtvatena nihatAH samAvavrurvasundharAm.. 7-119-57 (49774) `teShAmastrANi bANAMshcha shaineyo nataparvabhiH. nichakarta mahArAja yavanAnAM shirodharAH.. 7-119-58 (49775) te sharA nataparvANo yuyudhAnaprachoditAH. hitvA dehAMstathA teShAM patanti sma mahItale.. 7-119-59 (49776) te hanyamAnA vIrAstu vR^iShNivIreNa saMyuge. shastrAhatAH patantyurvyAM kAmbhojAH sapadAnugAH.. 7-119-60 (49777) kAmbhojAnAM bhujaishChinnairyavanAnAM cha bhArata. tatratatra mahI bhAti pa~nchAsyairiva pannagaiH'.. 7-119-61 (49778) alpAvashiShTAH sambhagnAH kR^ichChraprANA vichetasaH. jitAH sa~Nkhye mahArAja yuyudhAnena daMshitAH.. 7-119-62 (49779) pArShNibhishcha kashAbhishcha tADayantastura~NgamAn. javamuttamamAsthAya sarvataH prAdravanbhayAt.. 7-119-63 (49780) kAmbhojasainyaM vidrAvya durjayaM yudhi bhArata. yavanAnAM cha tatsainyaM shakAnAM cha mahadbalam.. 7-119-64 (49781) tataH sa puruShavyAghraH sAtyakiH satyavikramaH. prahR^iShTastAvakA~njitvA sUtaM yAhItyachodayat.. 7-119-65 (49782) tattasya samare karma dR^iShTvA.anyairakR^itaM purA. chAraNAH sahagandharvAH pUjayA~nchakrire bhR^isham.. 7-119-66 (49783) taM yAntaM pR^iShThagoptAramarjunasya vishAmpate. chAraNAH prekShya saMhR^iShTAstvadIyAshchAbhyapUjayan.. .. 7-119-67 (49784) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe ekonaviMshatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 119 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-119-* etadAdisArdhasaptashlokasthAne vakShyamANaH sArdhaeva shlokaH jha.pustake.asti. sa~njaya uvAcha. tataH sa sAtyakirdhAmInmahAtmA vR^iShNipu~NgavaH. sudarshanaM nihatyAjau yantAraM punarabravIt.. rathAshvanAgakalilaM sharashattayUrmimAlinam. 5-119-20 visrambhayan AshvAsayan.. 5-119-33 pArayiShyAmi samApayiShyAmi.. 5-119-50 vaikyAyasAni shoNitAyomayAni.. 5-119-52 supUrNayatamuktairAkarNajyotsR^iShTaiH. avyavachChinnapiNDitairanavachChinnasaMhataiH.. 5-119-119 ekonaviMshatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 120

.. shrIH ..

7.120. adhyAyaH 120

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sAtyakiyuddhavarNanam..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-120-0 (49785) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-120-0x (4566) jitvA yavanakAmbhojAnyuyudhAnastato.arjunam. jagAma tava sainyasya madhyena rathinAM varaH.. 7-120-1 (49786) sharadaMShTro naravyAghro vichitrakavachachChaviH. mR^igaM vyAghra ivAjighraMstava sainyamabhIShayat.. 7-120-2 (49787) sa rathena charanmArgAndhanuruddhAmayadbhR^isham. rukmapR^iShThaM mahAvegaM rukmachandrakasa~Nkulam.. 7-120-3 (49788) rukmA~NgadashirastrANo rukmavarmasamAvR^itaH. rukmadhvajadhanuH shUro merushR^i~NgamivAbabhau.. 7-120-4 (49789) sadhanurmaNDalaH sa~Nkhye tejobhAsurarashmivAn. sharadIvoditaH sUryo nR^isUryo virarAja ha.. 7-120-5 (49790) vR^iShabhaskandhavikrAnto vR^iShabhAkSho nararShabhaH. tAvakAnAM babhau madhye gavAM madhye yathA vR^iShaH.. 7-120-6 (49791) mattadviradasa~NkAshaM mattadviradagAminam. prabhinnamiva mAta~NgaM yUthamadhye vyavasthitam.. 7-120-7 (49792) vyAdhA iva jighAMsantastvadIyAH samupAdravan. `sAtyakiM samare rAjanparivavrustavAtmajAH'.. 7-120-8 (49793) droNAnIkamatikrAntaM bhojAnIkaM cha dustaram. jalasandhArNavaM tIrtvA kAmbhojAnAM cha vAhinIm.. 7-120-9 (49794) hArdikyamakarAnmuktaM tIrNaM vai sainyasAgaram. parivavruH susa~NkrudvAstvadIyAH sAtyakiM rathAH.. 7-120-10 (49795) duryodhanashchitraseno duHshAsanaviviMshatI. shakunirduHsahashchaiva yuvA durdharShaNaH krathaH.. 7-120-11 (49796) anye cha bahavaH shUrAH shastravanto durAsadAH. pR^iShThataH sAtyakiM yAntamanvadhAvannamarShiNaH.. 7-120-12 (49797) atha shabdo mahAnAsIttava sainyasya mAriSha. mArutoddhUtavegasya sAgarasyeva parvaNi.. 7-120-13 (49798) tAnabhidravataH sarvAnsamIkShya shinipu~NgavaH. shanairyAhIti yantAramabravItprahasanniva.. 7-120-14 (49799) idameti samuddhUtaM dhArtarAShTrabalaM mahat. mAmevAbhimukhaM tUrNaM gajAshvarathapattimat. nAdayadvai dishaH sarvA rathaghoSheNa sArathe.. 7-120-15 (49800) pR^ithivIM chAntarikShaM cha kampayansAgarAnapi. etadbalArNavaM sUta vArayiShye mahAraNe. paurNamAsyAmivoddhUtaM veleva makarAlayam.. 7-120-16 (49801) pashya me sUta vikrAntamindrasyeva mahAmR^idhe. eSha sainyAni shatrUNAM vidhamAmi shitaiH sharaiH.. 7-120-17 (49802) nihatAnAhave pashya padAtyashvarathadvipAn. machCharairagnisa~NkAshairviddhadehAnsahasrashaH.. 7-120-18 (49803) ityevaM bruvatastasya sAtyakeramitaujasaH. samIpe sainikAste tu shIghramIyuryuyutsavaH. jahyAdravasva tiShTheti pashyapashyeti vAdinaH.. 7-120-19 (49804) tAnevaM bruvato vIrAnsAtyakirnishitaiH sharaiH. jaghAnaM trishatAnashvAnku~njarAMshcha chatuHshatAn. `ladhvastrashchitrayodhI cha prahara~nshinipu~NgavaH'.. 7-120-20 (49805) sa samprahArastumulastasya teShAM cha dhanvinAm. devAsuraraNaprakhyaH prAvartata janakShayaH.. 7-120-21 (49806) meghajAlanibhaM sainyaM tava putrasya mAriSha. pratyagR^ihNAchChineH pautraH sharairAshIviShopamaiH.. 7-120-22 (49807) prachChAdyamAnaH samare sharajAlaiH sa vIryavAn. asambhramanmahArAja tAvakAnavadhIdbahUn.. 7-120-23 (49808) AshcharyaM tatra rAjendra sumahaddR^iShTavAnaham. na moghaH sAyakaH kashchitsAtyakerabhavatprabho.. 7-120-24 (49809) rathanAgAshvakalilaH padAtyUrmisamAkulaH. shaineyavelAmAsAdya sthitaH sainyamahArNavaH.. 7-120-25 (49810) sambhrAntanaranAgAshvamAvartata muhurmuhuH. tatsainyamiShubhistena vadhyamAnaM samantataH. babhrAma tatratatraiva gAvaH shItArditA iva.. 7-120-26 (49811) padAtinaM rathaM nAgaM sAdinaM turagaM tathA. avidvaM tatra nAdrAkShaM yuyudhAnasya sAyakaiH.. 7-120-27 (49812) na tAdR^ikkadanaM rAjankR^itavAMstatra phalgunaH. yAdR^ikkShayamanIkAnAmakarotsAtyakirnR^ipa.. 7-120-28 (49813) atyarjunaM shineH pautro yudhyate puruSharShabhaH. vItabhIrlAghavopetaH kR^ititvaM sampradarshayan.. 7-120-29 (49814) tato duryodhano rAjA sAtvatasya tribhiH sharaiH. vivyAdha sUtaM nishitaishchaturbhishchaturo hayAn.. 7-120-30 (49815) sAtyakiM cha tribhirvidvvA punaraShTAbhireva cha. duHshAsanaH ShoDashabhirvivyAdha shinipu~Ngavam.. 7-120-31 (49816) shakuniH pa~nchaviMshatyA chitrasenashcha pa~nchabhiH. duHsahaH pa~nchadashabhirvivyAdhorasi sAtyakim.. 7-120-32 (49817) utsmayanvR^iShNishArdUlastathA bANaiH samAhataH. tAnavidhyanmahArAja sarvAneva tribhistribhiH.. 7-120-33 (49818) gADhaviddhAnarInkR^itvA mArgaNaiH so.atitejanaiH. shaineyaH shyenavatsa~Nkhye vyacharallaghuvikramaH.. 7-120-34 (49819) saubalasya dhanushChittvA hastAvApaM nikR^itya cha. duryodhanaM tribhirbANairabhyavidhyatstanAntare.. 7-120-35 (49820) chitrasenaM shatenaiva dashabhirduHsahaM tathA. duHshAsanaM tu viMshatyA vivyAdha shinipu~NgavaH.. 7-120-36 (49821) athAnyaddhanurAdAya shyAlastava vishAmpate. aShTAbhiH sAtyakiM vidvvA punarvivyAdha pa~nchabhiH.. 7-120-37 (49822) duHshAsanashcha dashabhirduHsahashcha tribhiH sharaiH. durmukhashcha dvAdashabhI rAjanvivyAdha sAtyakim.. 7-120-38 (49823) duryodhanastrisaptatyA kidvvA bhArata mAdhavam. tatosya nishitairbANaistribhirvivyAdha sArathim.. 7-120-39 (49824) tAnsarvAnsahitA~nshUrAnyatamAnAnmahArathAn. pa~nchabhiH pa~nchabhirbANaiH punarvivyAdha sAtyakiH.. 7-120-40 (49825) tataH sa rathinAM shreShThastava putrasya sArathim. AjaghAnAshu bhallena sa hato nyapatadbhuvi.. 7-120-41 (49826) patite sArathau tasmiMstava putrarathaH prabho. vAtAyamAnaistairashvairapAnIyata sa~NgarAt.. 7-120-42 (49827) tatastava suto rAjansainikAshcha vishAmpate. rAj~no rathamabhiprekShya vidrutAH shatasho.abhavan.. 7-120-43 (49828) vidrutaM tatra tatsainyaM dR^iShTvA bhArata sAtyakiH. avAkirachCharaistIkShNai rukmapu~NkhaiH shilAshitaiH.. 7-120-44 (49829) vidrAvya sarvasainyAni tAvakAni sahasrashaH. prayayau sAtyakI rAja~nshvetAshvasya rathaM prati.. 7-120-45 (49830) `taM prayAntaM mahAbAhuM tAvakAH prekShya mAriSha. dR^iShTaM chAdR^iShTavatkR^itvA kriyAmanyAmayojayan'.. 7-120-46 (49831) taM sharAnAdadAnaM cha rakShamANaM cha sArathim. AtmAnaM pAlayAnaM cha tAvakAH samapUjayan.. .. 7-120-47 (49832) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe viMshatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 120 ..
droNaparva - adhyAya 121

.. shrIH ..

7.121. adhyAyaH 121

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sAtyakiyuddhavarNanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-121-0 (49833) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-121-0x (4567) sampradya mahatsainyaM yAntaM shaineyamarjunam. nirhIkA mama te putrAH kimakurvata sa~njaya.. 7-121-1 (49834) kathaM vaiShAM tadA yuddhe dhR^itirAsInmumUrShatAm. shaineyacharitaM dR^iShTvA yAdR^ishaM savyasAchinaH.. 7-121-2 (49835) kiM nu vakShyanti te kShAtraM sainyamadhye parAjitAH. kathaM nu sAtyakiryuddhe vyatikrAnto mahAyashAH.. 7-121-3 (49836) kathaM cha mama putrANAM jIvatAM tatra sa~njaya. shaineyo.abhiyayau yuddhe tanmamAchakShva sa~njaya.. 7-121-4 (49837) atyadbhutamidaM tAta tvatsakAshAchChR^iNomyaham. ekasya bahubhiH sArdhaM shatrubhistairmahArathaiH.. 7-121-5 (49838) viparItamahaM manye mandabhAgyaM sutaM prati. yatrAvadhyanta samare sAtvatena mahArathAH.. 7-121-6 (49839) ekasya hi na paryAptaM yatsainyaM tasya sa~njaya. kruddhasya yuyudhAnasya sarve tiShThantu pANQDavAH.. 7-121-7 (49840) nirjitya samare droNaM kR^itinaM chitrayodhinam. yathA pashugaNAnsiMhastadvaddhantA sutAnmama.. 7-121-8 (49841) kR^itavarmAdibhiH shUrairyattairbahubhirAhave. yuyudhAno na shakito hantuM yatpuruSharShabhaH.. 7-121-9 (49842) naitadIdR^ishakaM yuddhaM kR^itavAMstatra phalgunaH. yAdR^ishaM kR^itavAnyuddhaM shinernaptA mahAyashAH.. 7-121-10 (49843) sQa~njaya uvAcha. 7-121-11x (4568) tava durmantrite rAjanduryodhanakR^itena cha. shR^iNuShvAvahito bhUtvA yatte vakShyAmi bhArata.. 7-121-11 (49844) te punaH sannyavartanta kR^itvA saMshapathAnmithaH. parAM yuddhe matiM krUrAM tava putrasya shAsanAt.. 7-121-12 (49845) trINi sAdisahasrANi duryodhanapurogamAH. shakakAmbhojabAlahlIkA yavanAH pAradAstathA.. 7-121-13 (49846) kulindAsta~NkaNAmbaShThAH paishAchAshcha sabarbarAH. pArvatIyAshcha rAjendra kruddhAH pAShANapANayaH. abhyadravanta shaineyaM shalabhAH pAvakaM yathA.. 7-121-14 (49847) yuktAshcha pArvatIyAnAM rathAH pAShANayodhinAm. shUrAH pa~nchashataM rAja~nshaineyaM samupAdravan.. 7-121-15 (49848) tato rathasahasreNa mahArathashatena cha. dviradAnAM sahasreNa dvisAhasraishcha vAjibhiH.. 7-121-16 (49849) sharavarShANi mu~nchanto vividhAni mahArathAH. abhyadravanta shaineyamasa~NkhyeyAshcha pattayaH.. 7-121-17 (49850) tAMshcha sa~nchodayansarvAnghnatainamiti bhArata. duHshAsano mahArAja sAtyakiM paryavArayat.. 7-121-18 (49851) tatrAdbhutamapashyAma shaineyacharitaM mahat. yadeko bahubhiH sArdhamasambhrAntamayudhyata.. 7-121-19 (49852) avadhIchcha rathAnIkaM dviradAnAM cha tadbalam. sAdinashchaiva tAnsarvAndasyUnapi cha sarvashaH.. 7-121-20 (49853) tatra chakrairvimathitairbhagnaishcha paramAyudhaiH. akShaishcha bahudhA bhagnairIShAdaNDakabandhuraiH.. 7-121-21 (49854) ku~njarairmathitaishchApi dhvajaishcha vinipAtitaiH. varmabhishcha tathA.anIkairvyavakIrNA vasundharA.. 7-121-22 (49855) sragbhirAbharaNairvastrairanukarShaishcha mAriSha. sa~nChannA vasudhA tatra dyaurgrahairiva bhArata.. 7-121-23 (49856) girirUpadharaishchApi patitaishcha mahAgajaiH. `mlechChasthitairmahArAja bhinnA~njanachayopamaiH.. 7-121-24 (49857) mR^igairmandraishcha bhadraishcha mR^igamandraistathA.aparaiH. bhadrairmandramR^igaishchaiva mR^igabhadraistathaiva cha.. 7-121-25 (49858) bhadramandraishchaiva tathA tathA bhadramR^igairapi. tatratatra dharA kIrNA shayAnaiH parvatopamaiH'.. 7-121-26 (49859) a~njanasya kule jAtA vAmanasya cha bhArata. supratIkakule jAtA mahApadmakule tathA.. 7-121-27 (49860) airAvatakule chaiva tathA.anyeShu kuleShu cha. jAtA dantivarA rAja~nsherate bahavo hatAH.. 7-121-28 (49861) vanAyujAnpArvatIyAnkAmbhojAnbAhlikAnapi. tathA hayavarAnrAjannijaghne tatra sAtyakiH.. 7-121-29 (49862) nAnAdeshasamutthAMshcha nAnAjAtIMshcha dantinaH. nijaghne tatra shaineyaH shatasho.atha sahasrashaH.. 7-121-30 (49863) teShu prakAlyamAneShu dasyUnduHshAsano.abravIt. nivartadhvamadharmaj~nA yudhyadhvaM kiM sR^itena vaH.. 7-121-31 (49864) tAMshchAtibhagnAsansamprekShya putro duHshAsanastava. pAShANayodhinaH shUrAnpArvatIyAnachodayat.. 7-121-32 (49865) ashmayuddheShu kushalA naita~njAnApi sAtyakiH. ashmayuddhamajAnantaM hatainaM yuddhakAmukam.. 7-121-33 (49866) tathaiva kuravaH sarve nAshmayuddhavishAradAH. abhidravata mAbhaiShTa na vaH prApsyati sAtyakiH.. 7-121-34 (49867) te pArvatIyA rAjAnaH sarve pAShANayodhinaH. abhyadravanta shaineyaM rAjAnamiva mantriNaH.. 7-121-35 (49868) tato gajashiraHprakhyairupalaiH shailavAsinaH. udyatairyuyudhAnasya puratastasthurAhave.. 7-121-36 (49869) kSheraNIyaistathApyanye sAtvatasya vadhaiShiNaH. choditAstava putreNa sarvato rurudhurdishaH.. 7-121-37 (49870) teShAmApatatAmeva shilAyuddhaM chikIrShatAm. sAtyakiH pratisandhAya nishitAnprAhiNochCharAn.. 7-121-38 (49871) tAmashmavR^iShTiM tumulAM pArvatIyaiH samIritAm. chichChedoragasaMkAshairnArAchaiH shinipu~NgavaH.. 7-121-39 (49872) tairashmachUrNairdIpyadbhiH khadyotAnAmiva vrajaiH. prAyaH sainyAnyahanyanta hAhAbhUtAni mAriSha.. 7-121-40 (49873) tataH pa~nchashataM shUrAH samudyatamahAshilAH. nikR^ittabAhavo rAjannipeturdharaNItale.. 7-121-41 (49874) sAtvatasya cha bhallena niShpiShTaistaistathA.adribhiH. nyapatannihatA mlechChAstatratatra gatAsavaH.. 7-121-42 (49875) te hanyamAnAH samare sAtvatena mahAtmanA. ashmavR^iShTiM mahAghorAM pAtayanti sma sAtvate.. 7-121-43 (49876) pAShANayodhinaH shUrAnyatamAnAnavasthitAn. nyavadhIdbahusAhasrAMstadadbhutamivAbhavat.. 7-121-44 (49877) tataH punarbastamukhairashmavR^iShTIH samantataH. adhobastaiH sthUlabastairdaradaiH khasata~NkaNaiH.. 7-121-45 (49878) lambakaishcha kuNindaishcha kShiptAH kShiptAshcha sAtyakiH. nArAchaiH pratichichCheda pratipattivishAradaH.. 7-121-46 (49879) adrINAM bhidyamAnAnAmantarikShe shitaiH sharaiH. shabdena prAdravansa~Nkhye rathAshvagajapattayaH.. 7-121-47 (49880) ashmachUrNairavAkIrNA manuShyagajavAjinaH. nAshaknuvannavasthAtuM bhramarairiva daMshitAH.. 7-121-48 (49881) hatashiShTAH sarudhirA bhinnamastakapiNQDikAH. `vibhinnashiraso rAjandantaishChinnaishcha dantinaH. nirdhUtaishcha karairnAgA vya~NgAshcha shatashaH kR^itAH.. 7-121-49 (49882) hatvA pa~nchashataM yodhAMstatkShaNenaiva mAriSha. vyacharatpR^itanAmadhye shaineyaH kR^itahastavat.. 7-121-50 (49883) ku~njarAH sannyavartanta yuyudhAnena mohitAH.. 7-121-51 (49884) ashmanAM bhidyamAnAnAM sAyakaiH shrUyate dhvaniH. padmapatreShudhArANAM patantInAmiva dhvaniH'.. 7-121-52 (49885) tataH shabdaH samabhavattava sainyasya mAriSha. mAdhavenArdyamAnasya sAgarasyeva parvaNi.. 7-121-53 (49886) taM shabdaM tumulaM shrutvA droNo yantAramabravIt. eSha sUta raNe kruddhaH sAtvatAnAM mahArathaH.. 7-121-54 (49887) dArayanbahudhA sainyaM raNe charati kAlavat. yatraiSha shabdastumulastatra sUta rathaM naya.. 7-121-55 (49888) pAShANayodhibhirnUnaM yuyudhAnaH samAgataH. tathAhi rathinaH sarve hiyante vidrutairhayaiH.. 7-121-56 (49889) vishastrakavachA rugNAstatratatra patanti cha. na shaknuvanti yantAraH saMyantuM tumule hayAn.. 7-121-57 (49890) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-121-58x (4569) ityetadvachanaM shrutvA bhAradvAjasya sArathiH. pratyuvAcha tato droNaM sarvashastrabhR^itAM varam.. 7-121-58 (49891) sainyaM dravati chAyuShmankauraveyaM samantataH. pashya yodhAnraNe bhagnAndhAvato vai tatastataH.. 7-121-59 (49892) ime cha saMhatAH shUrAH pA~nchAlAH pANDavaiH saha. tvAmeva hi jighAMsanta Adravanti samantataH.. 7-121-60 (49893) atra kAryaM samAdhatsva prAptakAlamarindama. svAne vA gamane vApi dUraM yAtashcha sAtyakiH.. 7-121-61 (49894) sa~nchaya uvAcha. 7-121-62x (4570) tathaivaM vadatastasya bhAradvAjasya sAratheH. pratyadR^ishyata shaineyo nighnanbahuvidhAnrathAn.. 7-121-62 (49895) te vadhyamAnAH samare yuyudhAnena tAvakAH. yuyudhAnarathaM tyaktvA droNAnIkAya dudruvuH.. 7-121-63 (49896) yaistu duHshAsanaH sArdhaM rathaiH pUrvaM nyavartata. te bhItAstvabhyadhAvanta sarve droNarathaM prati.. .. 7-121-64 (49897) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe ekaviMshatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 121 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-121-11 duryodhanasya kR^itena karmaNA.. 5-121-12 matiM kR^itvetyanvayaH.. 5-121-25 mR^igamandrAdayo gajavisheShAH.. 5-121-27 vAmanasya yamopavAhyasya. supratIkasya IshopavAhyasya. mahApadmasya kumudasya kule.. 5-121-28 anyeShu kuleShu puNDarIkapuShpadantasArvabhaumIyeShu.. 5-121-37 kShepaNIyaiH shastraiH.. 5-121-45 tataH punarvyAttamukhAste.ashmavR^iShTIH samantataH. ayohastAH shUlahastA daradAsta~NkaNAH khasAH. lampakAshcha kulindAshcha chikShipustAMshcha sAtyakiH. iti jha.~na.gha.pAThaH.. 5-121-47 adrINAM prastarANAm.. 5-121-121 ekaviMshatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 122

.. shrIH ..

7.122. adhyAyaH 122

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sAtyakibhayAtpalAyamAnasya dushshAsanasya droNenopAlambhaH.. 1 .. droNadhR^iShTadyumnayoryuddham.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-122-0 (49898) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-122-0x (4571) duHshAsanarathaM dR^iShTvA samIpe paryavasthitam. bhAradvAjastato vAkyaM duHshAsanamathAbravIt.. 7-122-1 (49899) duHshAsana rathAH sarve kasmAchchaite pravidrutAH. kachchitkShemaM tu nR^ipateH kachchijjIvati saindhavaH.. 7-122-2 (49900) rAjaputro bhavAnatra rAjabhrAtA mahArathaH. kimarthaM dravate yuddhe yauvarAjyamavApya cha.. 7-122-3 (49901) dAsI jitA.asi dyUte tvaM yathA kAmacharI bhava. vAsasAM vAhikA rAj~no bhrAturjyeShThasya me bhava.. 7-122-4 (49902) na santi patayaH sarve te.adya ShaNDhatilaiH samAH. duHshAsanaivaM kasmAttvaM pUrvamuktvA palAyase.. 7-122-5 (49903) svayaM vairaM mahatkR^itvA pA~nchAlaiH pANDavaiH saha. ekaM sAtyakimAsAdya kathaM bhIto.asi saMyuge.. 7-122-6 (49904) na jAnIShe purA tvaM tu gR^ihNannakShAndurodare. sharA hyete bhaviShyanti dAruNAshIviShopamAH.. 7-122-7 (49905) apriyANAM hi vachanaM pANDavasya visheShataH. draupadyAshcha parikleshastvanmUlo hyabhavatpurA.. 7-122-8 (49906) kva te mAnashcha darpashcha kva te vIryaM kva garjitam. AshIviShasamAnpArthAnkopayitvA kva yAsyasi.. 7-122-9 (49907) shochyeyaM bhAratI senA rAjyaM chaiva suyodhanaH. yasya tvaM karkasho bhrAtA palAyanaparAyaNaH.. 7-122-10 (49908) nanu nAma tvayA vIra dAryamANA bhayArditA. svabAhubalamAsthAya rakShitavyA hyanIkinI.. 7-122-11 (49909) sa tvamadya raNaM hitvA bhIto harShayase parAn. vidrute tvayi sainyasya nAyake shatrumUdana. ko.anyaH sthAsyati sa~NgrAme bhIto bhIte vyapAshraye.. 7-122-12 (49910) ekena sAtvatenAdya yudhyamAnasya tena vai. palAyane tava matiH sa~NgrAmAddhi pravartate.. 7-122-13 (49911) yadA gANDIvadhanvAnaM bhImasenaM cha kaurava. yamau cha drakShyasi raNe tadA vai kiM kariShyasi.. 7-122-14 (49912) yudhi phalgunabANAnAM mUryAgnisamavarchasAm. na tulyAH sAtyakisharA yebhyo bhItaH palAyase.. 7-122-15 (49913) tvarito vIra gachCha tvaM gAndhAryudaramAvisha. pR^ithivyAM dhAvamAnasya nAnyatpashyAmi jIvanam.. 7-122-16 (49914) yadi tAvatkR^itA buddhiH palAyanaparAyaNA. pR^ithivI dharmarAjAya shamenaiva pradIyatAm.. 7-122-17 (49915) yAvatphalgunanArAchA nirmuktoragasannibhAH. nAvishanti sharIraM te tAvatsaMshAmya pANDavaiH.. 7-122-18 (49916) yAvatte pR^ithivIM pArthA hatvA bhrAtR^ishataM raNe. nAkShipanti mahAtmAnastAvatsaMshAmya pANDavaiH.. 7-122-19 (49917) yAvanna krudhyate rAjA dharmaputro yudhiShThiraH. kR^iShNashcha samarashlAghI tAvatsaMshAmya pANDavaiH.. 7-122-20 (49918) yAvadbhImo mahAbAhurvigAhya mahatIM chamUm. sodarAMste na mR^idrAti tAvatsaMshAmya pANDavaiH.. 7-122-21 (49919) pUrvamuktashcha te bhrAtA bhIShmeNAsau suyodhanaH. ajeyAH pANDavAH sa~Nkhye saumya saMshAmya taiH saha.. 7-122-22 (49920) `mayA shamavatA chokto rakSha sheShaM suyodhana. saMshAmya pArthaistvaM rakSha vIra sarvAnmahIkShitaH'.. 7-122-23 (49921) na cha tatkR^itavAnmandastava bhrAtAM suyodhanaH. sa yuddhe dhR^itimAsthAya yatto yudhyasva pANDavaiH.. 7-122-24 (49922) tavApi shoNitaM bhImaH pAsyatIti mayA shrutam. tachchApyavitathaM tasya tattathaiva bhaviShyati.. 7-122-25 (49923) kiM bhImasya na jAnAsi vikramaM tvaM subAlisha. yattvayA vairamArabdhaM saMyuge prapalAyinA.. 7-122-26 (49924) gachCha tUrNaM rathenaiva yatra tiShThati sAtyakiH. tvayA hInaM balaM hyetadvidraviShyati bhArata.. AtmArthaM yodhaya raNe sAtyakiM satyavikramam.. 7-122-27 (49925) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-122-28x (4572) evamuktastava suto nAbravItki~nchidapyasau. shrutaM chAshrutavatkR^itvA prAyAdyena sa sAtyakiH.. 7-122-28 (49926) sainyena mahatA yukto mlechChAnAmanivartinAm. AsAdya cha raNe yatto yuyudhAnamayodhayat.. 7-122-29 (49927) droNo.api rathinAM shreShThaH pA~nchAlAnpANDavAMstathA. abhyadravata sa~Nkruddhau javamAsthAya madhyamam.. 7-122-30 (49928) pravishya cha raNe droNaH pANDavAnAM varUthinIm. drAvayAmAsa yodhAnvai shatasho.atha sahasrashaH.. 7-122-31 (49929) tato droNo mahArAja nAma vishrAvya saMyuge. pANDupA~nchAlamatsyAnAM prachakre kadanaM mahat.. 7-122-32 (49930) taM jayantamanIkAni bhAradvAjaM tatastataH. pA~nchAlaputro dyutimAnvIraketuH samabhyayAt.. 7-122-33 (49931) sa droNaM pa~nchabhirvidvvA sharaiH sannataparvabhiH. dhvajamekena vivyAdha sArathiM chAsya saptabhiH.. 7-122-34 (49932) tatrAdbhutaM mahArAja dR^iShTvAnasmi saMyuge. yaddroNo rabhasaM yuddhe pA~nchAlyaM nAtyavartata.. 7-122-35 (49933) sanniruddhaM rame droNaM pA~nchalA vIkShya mAriSha. AvavruH sarvato rAjandharmaputrajayaiShiNaH.. 7-122-36 (49934) te sharairagnisaMkAshaistomaraishcha mahAdhanaiH. shastraishcha vividhai rAjandroNamekamavAkiran.. 7-122-37 (49935) nivArya tAnbANagaNAndroNo rAjansamantataH. mahAjaladharAnvyomni mAtarishveva chAbabhau.. 7-122-38 (49936) tataH sharaM mahAghoraM mUryapAvakasannibham. sandadhe paravIraghno vIraketo rathaM prati.. 7-122-39 (49937) sa bhittvA tu sharo rAjanpA~nchAlakulanandanam. abhyagAddharaNIM tUrNaM lohitArdro jvalanniva.. 7-122-40 (49938) tato.apatadrathAttUrNaM pA~nchAlakulanandanaH. parvatAgrAdiva mahAMshchampako vAyupIDitaH.. 7-122-41 (49939) tasminhate maheShvAse rAjaputre mahAbale. pA~nchAlAstvaritA droNaM samantAtparyavArayan.. 7-122-42 (49940) chitraketuH sudhanvA cha chitravarmA cha bhArata. tathA chitrarathashchaiva bhrAtR^ivyasanakarshitAH.. 7-122-43 (49941) abhyadravanta sahitA bhAradvAjaM yuyutsavaH. mu~nchantaH sharavarShANi tapAnte jaladA iva.. `adR^ishyaM samare chakrurbhAradvAjaM sudhanvinaH'.. 7-122-44 (49942) sa vadhyamAno bahudhA rAjaputrairmahArathaiH. krodhamAhArayatteShAmabhAvAya dvijarShabhaH.. 7-122-45 (49943) tataH sharamayaM jAlaM droNasteShAmavAsR^ijat. te hanyamAnA droNasya sharairAkarNachoditaiH. kartavyaM nAbhyajAnanvai kumArA rAjasattama.. 7-122-46 (49944) tAnvimUDhAnraNe droNaH prahasanniva bhArata. vyashvasUtarathAMshchakre kumArAnkupito raNe.. 7-122-47 (49945) athAparaiH sunishitairbhallaisteShAM mahAyashAH. puShpANIva vivAnvAyuH sottamA~NgAnyapAtayat.. 7-122-48 (49946) te rathebhyo hatAH petuH kShitau rAjansuvarchasaH. devAsure purA yuddhe yathA daiteyadAnavAH.. 7-122-49 (49947) tAnnihatya raNe rAjanbhAradvAjaH pratApavAn. kArmukaM bhrAmayAmAsa hemapR^iShThaM durAsadam.. 7-122-50 (49948) `tadasya bhrAjate rAjanmeghamadhye taDidyathA'.. 7-122-51 (49949) pA~nchAlAnnihatAndR^iShTvA devakalpAnmahArathAn. dhR^iShTadyumno bhR^ishodvigno netrAbhyAM pAtaya~njalam. abhyavartata sa~NgArame kruddho droNarathaM prati.. 7-122-52 (49950) tato hAheti sahasA nAdaH samabhavannR^ipa. pA~nchAlyena raNe dR^iShTvA droNamAvAritaM sharaiH.. 7-122-53 (49951) se chChAdyamAno bahudhA pArShatena mahAtmanA. na vivyathe tato droNaH smayannevAnvayudhyata.. 7-122-54 (49952) tato droNaM mahArAja pA~nchAlyaH krodhamUrchChitaH. AjaghAnorasi kruddho navatyA nataparvaNAm.. 7-122-55 (49953) sa gADhaviddho balinA bhAradvAjo mahAyashAH. niShasAda rathopasthe kashmalaM cha jagAma ha.. 7-122-56 (49954) taM vai tathAgataM dR^iShTvA dhR^iShTadyumnaH parAkramI. chApamutsR^ijya shIghraM tu asiM jagrAha vIryavAn.. 7-122-57 (49955) avaplutya rathAchchApi tvaritaH sa mahArathaH. Aruroha rathaM tUrNaM bhAradvAjasya mAriSha. hartumichCha~nshiraH kAyAtkrodhasaMrakralochanaH.. 7-122-58 (49956) pratyAshvastastato droNo dhanurgR^ihya mahAravam. AsannamAgataM dR^iShTvA dhR^iShTadyumnaM jighAMsayA.. 7-122-59 (49957) sharairvaitastikai rAjanvivyAdhAsannavedhibhiH. yodhayAmAsa samare dhR^iShTadyumnaM mahAratham.. 7-122-60 (49958) te hi vaitastikA nAma sharA AmannayodhinaH. droNasya vihitA rAjanyairdhR^iShTadyumnamAkShiNot.. 7-122-61 (49959) sa vadhyamAno bahubhiH sAyakaistairmahAbalaH. avaplutya rathAttUrNaM bhagnavegaH parAkramI.. 7-122-62 (49960) Aruhya svarathaM vIraH pragR^ihya cha mahaddhanuH. vivyAdha samare droNaM dhR^iShTadyumno mahArathaH.. 7-122-63 (49961) droNashchApi mahArAja sharairvivyAdha pArShatam.. 7-122-64 (49962) tadadbhutamabhUdyuddhaM droNapA~nchAlayostadA. trailokyakA~NkShiNorAsIchChakraprahlAdayoriva.. 7-122-65 (49963) maNDalAni vichitrANi yamakAnItarANi cha. charantau yuddhamArgaj~nau tatakShaturatheShubhiH.. 7-122-66 (49964) mohayantau manAMsyAjau yodhAnAM droNapArShatau. sR^ijantau sharavarShANi varShAsviva balAhakau. ChAdayantau mahAtmAnau sharairvyoma disho mahIm.. 7-122-67 (49965) tadadbhutaM tayoryuddhaM bhUtasa~NghA hyapUjayan. kShatriyAshcha mahArAja ye chAnye tava sainikAH.. 7-122-68 (49966) avashyaM samare droNo dR^iShTadyumnena sa~NgataH. vashameShyati no rAjanpA~nchAlA iti chukrushuH.. 7-122-69 (49967) droNastu tvarito yuddhe dhR^iShTadyumnasya sAratheH. shiraH prachyAvayAmAsa phalaM pakvaM taroriva.. 7-122-70 (49968) tatastu pradrutA vAhA rAjaMstasya mahAtmanaH.. 7-122-71 (49969) teShu pradravamANeShu pA~nchAlAnsR^i~njayAMstathA. ayodhayadraNe droNastatratatra parAkramI.. 7-122-72 (49970) vijitya pANDupA~nchAlAnbhAradvAjaH pratApavAn. svaM vyUhaM punarAsthAya sthito.abhavadarindamaH. na chainaM pANQDavA yuddhe jetumutsehire prabho.. .. 7-122-73 (49971) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe dvAviMshatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 122 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-122-48 visheSheNa vAtIti vivAn. puShpANIva vanAdvAyuH iti Ta.pAThaH. puShpANIva vichanvanhi iti jha.~na. pAThaH.. 5-122-61 droNasya vividhA rAjan iti Ta. pAThaH. droNasya viditA iti ka. pAThaH.. 5-122-122 dvAviMshatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 122 ..
droNaparva - adhyAya 123

.. shrIH ..

7.123. adhyAyaH 123

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sAtyakinA duHshAsanaparAjayaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-123-0 (49972) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-123-0x (4573) tato duHshAsano rAja~nshaineyaM samupAdravat. kira~nsharasahasrANi parjanya iva vR^iShTimAn.. 7-123-1 (49973) sa vidvvA sAtyakiM ShaShTyA tathA ShoDashabhiH sharaiH. nAkampayatsthitaM yuddhe mainAkamiva parvatam.. 7-123-2 (49974) taM tu duHshAsanaH shUraH sAyakairAvR^iNodbhR^isham. rathavrAtena mahatA nAnAdeshodbhavena cha.. 7-123-3 (49975) sarvato bharatashreShTha visR^ijansAyakAnbahUn. parjanya iva ghoSheNa nAdayanvai disho dasha.. 7-123-4 (49976) tamApatantamAlokya sAtyakiH kauravaM raNe. abhidrutya mahAbAhushChAdayAmAsa sAyakaiH.. 7-123-5 (49977) te ChAdyamAnA bANaughairduHshAsanapurogamAH. prAdravansamare bhItAstava sainyasya pashyataH.. 7-123-6 (49978) teShu dravatsu rAjendra putro duHshAnastava. tasthau vyapetabhI rAjansAtyakiM chArdayachCharaiH.. 7-123-7 (49979) chaturbhirvAjinastasya sArathiM cha tribhiH sharaiH. sAtyakiM cha shatenAjau viddhvA nAdaM mumocha saH.. 7-123-8 (49980) tataH kruddho mahArAja mAdhavastasya saMyuge. rathaM sUtaM dhvajaM taM cha chakre.adR^ishyamajihmagaiH.. 7-123-9 (49981) sa tu duHshAsanaM shUraM sAyakairAvR^iNodbhR^isham. mashakaM samanuprAptamUrNanAbhirivorNayA.. 7-123-10 (49982) tvaransamAvR^iNodbANairduHshAsanamamitrajit.. dR^iShTvA duHshAsanaM rAjA tathA sharashatAchitam. 7-123-11 (49983) trigartAMshchodayAmAsa yuyudhAnarathaM prati.. 7-123-12 (49984) te.agachChanyuyudhAnasya samIpaM krurakarmaNaH. trigartAnAM trisAhasrA rathA yuddhavishAradAH.. 7-123-13 (49985) te tu taM rathavaMshena mahatA paryavArayan. sthirAM kR^itvA matiM yuddhe bhUtvA saMshaptakA mithaH.. 7-123-14 (49986) teShAM prayatamAnAnAM sharavarShANi mu~nchatAm. yodhAnpa~nchashatAnmukhyAnagryAnIke vyapothayat.. 7-123-15 (49987) te.apatannihatAstUrNaM shinipravarasAyakaiH. mahAmArutavegena bhagnA iva nagAddrumAH.. 7-123-16 (49988) nAgaishcha bahudhA chChinnairdhvajaishchaiva vishAmpate. hayaishcha kanakApIDaiH patitaistatra medinI.. 7-123-17 (49989) shaineyasharasa~NkR^ittaiH shoNitaughapariplutaiH. ashobhata mahArAja kiMshukairiva puShpitaiH.. 7-123-18 (49990) te vadhyamAnAH samare yuyudhAnena tAvakAH. trAtAraM nAdhyagachChanta pa~NkamagnA iva dvipAH.. 7-123-19 (49991) tataste paryavartanta sarve droNarathaM prati. bhayAtpatagarAjasya gartAnIva mahoragAH.. 7-123-20 (49992) hatvA pa~nchashatAnyodhA~nCharairAshIviShopamaiH. prAyAtsa shanakairvIro dhana~njayarathaM prati.. 7-123-21 (49993) taM prayAntaM narashreShThaM putro duHshAsanastava. vivyAdha navabhistUrNaM sharaiH sannataparvabhiH.. 7-123-22 (49994) sa tu taM prativivyAdha pa~nchabhirnishitaiH sharaiH. rukmapu~NkhairmaheShvAso gArdhrapatrairajihmagaiH.. 7-123-23 (49995) sAtyakiM tu mahArAja prahasanniva bhArata. duHshAsanastribhirviddhvA punarvivyAdha pa~nchabhiH.. 7-123-24 (49996) shaineyastava putraM tu hatvA pa~nchabhirAshugaiH. dhanushchAsya raNe ChittvA vismayannarjunaM yayau.. 7-123-25 (49997) tato duHshAsanaH kruddho vR^iShNivIrAya gachChate. sarvapArashavIM shaktiM visasarja jighAMsayA.. 7-123-26 (49998) tAM tu shaktiM tadA ghorAM tava putrasya sAtyakiH. chichCheda shatadhA rAjannishitaiH ka~NkapatribhiH.. 7-123-27 (49999) athAnyaddhanurAdAya putrastava janeshvara. sAtyakiM cha sharairviddhvA siMhanAdaM nanAda cha.. 7-123-28 (50000) sAtyakistu raNe kruddho mohayitvA sutaM tava. sharairagnishikhAkArairAjaghAna stanAntare.. 7-123-29 (50001) tribhireva mahAbhAgaH sharaiH sannataparvabhiH. sarvAyasaistIkShNavaktraiH punarvivyAdha chAShTabhiH.. 7-123-30 (50002) duHshAsanastu viMshatyA sAtyakiM pratyavidhyata. sAtvato.api mahArAja taM vivyAdha stanAntare.. 7-123-31 (50003) tribhireva mahAbhAgaH sharaiH sannataparvabhiH. tato.asya vAhAnnishitaiH sharairjaghne mahArathaH.. 7-123-32 (50004) sArathiM cha surA~NkruddhaH sharaiH sannataparvabhiH. dhanurekena bhallena hastAvApaM cha pa~nchabhiH.. 7-123-33 (50005) dhvajaM cha rathashaktiM cha bhallAbhyAM paramastrivit. chichCheda vishikhaistIkShNaistathobhau pArShNisArathI.. 7-123-34 (50006) sa chChinnadhanvA viratho hatAshvo hatasArathiH. trigartasenApatinA svarathenApavAhitaH.. 7-123-35 (50007) tamabhidrutya shaineyo muhUrtamiva bhArata. na jaghAna mahAbAhurbhImasenavachaH smaran.. 7-123-36 (50008) bhImasenena tu vadhaH sutAnAM tava bhArata. pratij~nAtaH sabhAmadhye sarveShAmeva saMyuge.. 7-123-37 (50009) tato duHshAsanaM jitvA sAtyakiH saMyuge prabho. jagAma tvarito rAjanyena yAto dhana~njayaH.. .. 7-123-38 (50010) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe trayoviMshatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 123 ..
droNaparva - adhyAya 124

.. shrIH ..

7.124. adhyAyaH 124

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sa~NkulayuddhavarNanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-124-0 (50011) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-124-0x (4574) kiM tasyAM mama senAyAM nAsankechinmahArathAH. ye tathA sAtyakiM yAntaM naivAghnannApyavArayan.. 7-124-1 (50012) eko hi samare karma kR^itavAnsatyavikramaH. shakratulyabalo yuddhe mahendro dAnaveShviva.. 7-124-2 (50013) athavA shUnyamAsIttadyena yAtaH sa sAtyakiH. hatabhUyiShThamathavA yena yAtaH sa sAtyakiH.. 7-124-3 (50014) yatkR^itaM vR^iShNivIreNa karma shaMsasi me raNe. naitadutsahate kartuM karma shakro.api sa~njaya.. 7-124-4 (50015) ashraddheyamachintyaM cha karma tasya mahAtmanaH. vR^iShNyandhakapravIrasya shrutvA me vyathitaM manaH.. 7-124-5 (50016) na santi tasmAtputrA me yathA sa~njaya bhAShase. eko vai bahulAH senAH prAmR^idgAtsatyavikramaH.. 7-124-6 (50017) kathaM cha yudhyamAnAnAmapakrAntI mahAtmanAm. eko bahUnAM shaineyastanmamAchakShva sa~njaya.. 7-124-7 (50018) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-124-8x (4575) rAjansenAsamudyogo rathanAgAshvapattimAn. atulyastava senAyAM yugAntasadR^isho.abhavat.. 7-124-8 (50019) AhUteShu samUheShu tava sainyasya mAnada. nAsti loke samaH kashchitsamUha iti me matiH.. 7-124-9 (50020) tatrava devAstvabhAShanta chAraNAshcha samAgatAH. etadantAH samUhA vai bhaviShyanti mahItale.. 7-124-10 (50021) na cha vai tAdR^isho vyUha AsItkashchidvishAmpate. yAdR^igjayadrathavadhe droNena vihito.abhavat.. 7-124-11 (50022) `uddhR^itA pR^ithivI nUnaM yuddhahetoH samAgataiH. iti tatra janAshchAhurdR^iShTA tAM janasaMsadam'.. 7-124-12 (50023) chaNDavAtavibhinnAnAM samudrANAmiva svanaH. raNe.abhavadbalaughAnAmanyonyamabhidhAvatAm.. 7-124-13 (50024) pArthivAnAM sametAnAM bahUnyAsannarottama. tvadbale prANDavAnAM cha sahasrANi shatAni cha.. 7-124-14 (50025) saMrabdhAnAM pravIrANAM samare dR^iDhakarmaNAm. tatrAsItsumahAshabdastumulo romaharShaNaH.. 7-124-15 (50026) `pANQDavAnAM kurUNAM cha garjatAmitaretaram. kShvelAH kilakilAshabdAstatrAsanvai sahasrashaH.. 7-124-16 (50027) bherIshabdAshcha tumulA bANashabdAshcha bhArata. anyonyaM nighnatAM chaiva narANAM shushruve svanaH'.. 7-124-17 (50028) athAkrandanbhIsameno dhR^iShTadyumnashcha mAriSha. nakulaH sahadevashcha dharmarAjashcha pANDavaH.. 7-124-18 (50029) AgachChata praharata drutaM viparidhAvata. praviShTAvarisenAM hi vIrau mAdhavapANDavau.. 7-124-19 (50030) yathA sukhena gachChetAM jayadrathavadhaM prati. tathA prakuruta kShipramiti sainyAnyachodayan.. 7-124-20 (50031) tayorabhAve kuravaH kR^itArthAH syurvayaM jitAH.. 7-124-21 (50032) `yatra yAtau mahAtmAnau tUrNaM parapura~njayau'. te yUyaM sahitA bhUtvA tUrNameva balArNavam. kShobhayadhvaM mahAvegAH pavanaH sAgaraM yathA.. 7-124-22 (50033) bhImasenena te rAjanpA~nchAlyena cha noditAH. AjaghnuH kauravAnsa~Nkhye tyaktvA.asUnAtmanaH priyAn.. 7-124-23 (50034) ichChanto nidhanaM yuddhe shastrairuttamatejasaH. svargepsavo mitrakArye nAbhyanandanta jIvitam.. 7-124-24 (50035) tathaiva tAvakA rAjanprArthayanto mahadyashaH. AryAM yuddhe matiM kR^itvA yuddhAyaivAvatasthire.. 7-124-25 (50036) tasminsutumule yuddhe vartamAne bhayAvahe. jitvA sarvANi sainyAni prAyAtsAtyakirarjunaM .. 7-124-26 (50037) kavachAnAM prabhAstatra sUryarashmivirAjitAH. dR^iShTIH sa~Nkhye sainikAnAM pratijaghnuH samantataH. `dhvajashastrapratihatA lokAnsamavadIpayan.. 7-124-27 (50038) chaNDavAtoddhatAnmeghAnvikiranrashmimAniva. tathA tava mahatsainyaM tadvyarochata tApayan.. 7-124-28 (50039) samprahR^iShTaH sa sahasA tava sainyArNavaM prati. lolayansarvato gatvA samudraM makaro yathA.. 7-124-29 (50040) tatra rAjanmahAnAsItsa~NgrAmo bhItivardhanaH. pANDavasya mahAbAho tAvakAnAM cha dAruNaH.. 7-124-30 (50041) rudrasyAkrIDasa~NkAshaH saMhAraH sarvadehinAm. tataH shabdo mahAnAsItprAyAdyatra dhana~nchayaH.. 7-124-31 (50042) tatra sma kadanaM ghoraM vartate pANDupUrvaja. arjunasya mahAbAhostAvakAnAM cha dhanvinAm.. 7-124-32 (50043) madhye bhAratasainyasya mAdhavasya mahAraNe. droNasyApi paraiH sArdhaM vyUhadvAre sudAruNam.. 7-124-33 (50044) evameSha kShayo vR^ittaH pR^ithivyAM pR^ithivIpate. kruddhe.arjune tathA droNe sAtvate cha mahArathe'.. 7-124-34 (50045) tathA prayatamAnAnAM pANDavAnAM mahAtmanAm. duryodhano mahArAjanvyagAhata mahadbalam.. 7-124-35 (50046) sa sannipAtastumulasteShAM tasya cha bhArata. abhavatsarvabhUtAnAmabhAvakaraNo mahAn.. 7-124-36 (50047) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-124-37x (4576) tathA yAteShu sainyeShu tathA kR^ichChragataH svayam. kachchidduryodhanaH sUta nAkArShItpR^iShThato raNam.. 7-124-37 (50048) ekasya cha bahUnAM cha sannipAto mahAhave. visheShato narapaterviShamaH pratibhAti me.. 7-124-38 (50049) so.atyantasukhasaMvR^iddho lakShmyA lokasya cheshvaraH. eko bahUnsamAsAdya kachchinnAsItparA~NmukhaH.. 7-124-39 (50050) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-124-40x (4577) rAjansa~NgrAmamAshcharyaM tava putrasya bhArata. ekasya bahubhiH sArdhaM shR^iNuShva gadato mama.. 7-124-40 (50051) duryodhanena samare pR^itanA pANDavI raNe. nalinI dvarideneva samantAtpratiloDitA.. 7-124-41 (50052) tatastAM prahatAM senAM dR^iShTvA putreNa te nR^ipa. bhImasenapurogAstaM pA~nchAlAH samupAdruvan.. 7-124-42 (50053) sa bhImasenaM dashabhiH sharairvivyAdha pANDavam. tribhistribhiryamau vIrau dharmarAjaM cha saptabhiH.. 7-124-43 (50054) virATadrupadau ShadbhiH shatena cha shikhaNDinam. dhR^iShTadyumnaM cha viMshatyA draupadeyAMstribhistribhiH.. 7-124-44 (50055) shatashashchAparAnyodhAnsadvipAMshcha rathAnraNe. sharairavachakartograiH kruddho.antaka iva prajAH.. 7-124-45 (50056) na sandadhadvimu~nchanvA maNDalIkR^itakArmukaH. adR^ishyata ripUnnighna~nChikShayA.astabalena cha.. 7-124-46 (50057) tasya tAnnighnataH shatrUnhemapR^iShThaM mahaddhanuH. ajasraM maNDalIbhUtaM dadR^ishuH samare janAH.. 7-124-47 (50058) tato yudhiShThiro rAjA bhallAbhyAmachChinaddhanuH. tava putrasya kauravya yatamAnasya saMyuge.. 7-124-48 (50059) vivyAdha chainaM dashabhiH samyagastaiH sharottamaiH. varma chAshu samAsAdya te bhittvA kShitimAvishan.. 7-124-49 (50060) tataH pramuditAH pArthAH parivavruryudhiShThiram. yathA vR^itravadhe devAH purA shakraM maharShayaH.. 7-124-50 (50061) tato.anyaddhanurAdAya tava putraH pratApavAn. tiShThetiShTheti rAjAnaM bruvanpANDavamabhyayAt.. 7-124-51 (50062) tamAyAntamabhiprekShya tava putraM mahAmR^idhe. pratyudyayuH samuditAH pA~nchAlA jayagR^iddhinaH.. 7-124-52 (50063) tAndroNaH pratijagrAha parIpsanyudhi pANDavam. chaNDavAtoddhutAnmeghAngirirambumucho yathA.. 7-124-53 (50064) tatra rAjanmahAnAsItsa~NgrAmo romaharShaNaH. pANDavAnAM mahAbAho tAvakAnAM cha saMyuge.. 7-124-54 (50065) rudrasyAkrIDasadR^ishaH saMhAraH sarvadehinAm.. 7-124-55 (50066) tataH shabdo mahAnAsIdyAto yena dhana~njayaH. atIva sarvashabdebhyo romaharShakaraH prabho.. 7-124-56 (50067) arjunasya mahAbAho tAvakAnAM cha dhanvinAm. madhye bhAratasainyasya mAdhavasya mahAraNe. droNasyApi paraiH sArdhaM vyUhadvAre mahAraNe.. 7-124-57 (50068) evameSha kShayo vR^ittaH pR^ithivyAM pR^ithivIpate. kruddhe.arjune tathA droNe sAtvate cha mahArathe.. .. 7-124-58 (50069) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe chaturviMshatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 124 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-124-9 anIkeShu samUheShu iti ka.kha.pAThaH.. 5-124-39 lakShmyeti visheShaNe tR^itIyA.. 5-124-125 chaturviMshatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 125

.. shrIH ..

7.125. adhyAyaH 125

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

droNaparAkramavarNanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-125-0 (50070) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-125-0x (4578) aparAhNe mahArAja sa~NgrAmaH sumahAnabhUt. parjanyasamanirghoShaH punardroNasya somakaiH.. 7-125-1 (50071) shoNAshvaM rathamAsthAya naravIraH samAhitaH. samare.abhyadravatpANDU~njavamAsthAya madhyamam.. 7-125-2 (50072) tava priyahite yukto maheShvAso mahAbalaH. chitrapu~NkhaiH shitairbANaiH kalashottamasambhavaH. `jaghAna somakAnrAjansR^i~njayAnkekayAnapi'.. 7-125-3 (50073) varAnvarAnhi yodhAnAM vichinvanniva bhArata. AkrIData rame rAjanbhAradvAjaH pratApavAn.. 7-125-4 (50074) tamabhyayAdbR^ihatkShatraH kekayAnAM mahArathaH. bhAtR^INAM nR^ipa pa~nchAnAM shreShThaH samarakarkashaH.. 7-125-5 (50075) vimu~nchanvishikhAMstIkShNAnAchAryaM bhR^ishamArdayat. mahAmegho yathA varShaM vimu~nchangandhamAdane.. 7-125-6 (50076) tasya droNo mahArAja svarNapu~NkhA~nshilAshitAn. preShayAmAsa sa~Nkruddha- sAyakAndasha pa~ncha cha.. 7-125-7 (50077) tAMstu droNavinirmuktAnkruMddhAshIviShasannibhAn. ekaikaM pa~nchabhirbANairyudhi chichCheda hR^iShTavat.. 7-125-8 (50078) tadasya lAghavaM dR^iShTvA prahasya dvijapu~NgavaH. preShayAmAsa vishikhAnaShTau sannataparvaNaH.. 7-125-9 (50079) tAndR^iShTvA patatastUrNaM droNachApachyutA~nsharAn. avArayachCharaireva tAvadbhirnishitairmR^idhe.. 7-125-10 (50080) tato.abhavanmahArAja tava sainyasya vismayaH. bR^ihatkShatreNa tatkarma kR^itaM dR^iShTvA suduShkaram.. 7-125-11 (50081) tato droNo mahArAja bR^ihatkShatraM visheShayan. prAdushchakre raNe divyaM brAhmamastraM sudurjayam.. 7-125-12 (50082) kaikeyo.astraM samAlokya muktaM droNena saMyuge. brahmAstreNaiva rAjendra brAhmamastramashAtayat.. 7-125-13 (50083) tato.astre nihate brAhme bR^ihatkShatrastu bhArata. vivyAdha brAhmaNaM ShaShTyA svarNapu~NkhaiH shilAshitaiH.. 7-125-14 (50084) taM droNo dvipadAM shreShTho nArAchena samArpayat. sa tasya kavachaM bhittvA prAvishaddharaNItalam.. 7-125-15 (50085) kR^iShNasarpo yathA mukto valmIkaM nR^ipasattama. tathA.atyagAnmahIM bANo bhittvA kaikeyamAhave.. 7-125-16 (50086) so.atividdho mahArAja kaikeyo droNasAyakaiH. krodhena mahatA.a.aviShTo vyAvR^itya nayane shubhe.. 7-125-17 (50087) droNaM vivyAdha saptatyA svarNapu~NkhaiH shilAshitaiH. sArathiM chAsya bANena bhR^ishaM marmasvatADayat.. 7-125-18 (50088) droNastu bahubhirviddho bR^ihatkShatreNa mAriSha. asR^ijadvishikhAMstIkShNAnkaikeyasya rathaM prati.. 7-125-19 (50089) vyAkulIkR^itya taM droNo bR^ihatkShatraM mahAratham. ashvAMshchaturbhiranyavadhIchchaturo.asya patattribhiH.. 7-125-20 (50090) sUtaM chaikena bANena rathanIDAdapAtayat. dvAbhyAM dhvajaM cha chChatraM cha chChittvA bhUmAvapAtayat.. 7-125-21 (50091) tataH sAdhuvisR^iShTena nArAchena dvijarShabhaH. hR^idyavidhyadbR^ihatkShatraM sa chChinnahR^idayo.apatat.. 7-125-22 (50092) bR^ihatkShatre hate rAjankekayAnAM mahArathe. shaishupAlirabhikruddho yantAramidamabravIt.. 7-125-23 (50093) sArathe yAhi yatraiSha droNastiShThati daMshitaH. vinighnankekayAnsarvAnpA~nchAlAnAM cha vAhinIM.. 7-125-24 (50094) tasya tadvachanaM shrutvA sArathI rathinAM varam. droNAya prApayAmAsa kAmbhojairjavanairhayaiH.. 7-125-25 (50095) dhR^iShTaketushcha chedInAmR^iShabho.atibaloditaH. vadhAyAbhyadravaddroNaM pata~Nga iva pAvakam.. 7-125-26 (50096) so.avidhyata tadA droNaM ShaShTyA sAshvarathadhvajam. punashchAnyaiH sar^aistIkShNaiH suptaM vyAghraM tudanniva.. 7-125-27 (50097) tasya droNo dhanurmadhye kShurapreNa shitena cha.. chakarta gArdhrapatreNa yatamAnasya shuShmiNaH.. 7-125-28 (50098) athAnyaddhanurAdAya shaishupAlirmahArathaH. vivyAdha sAyakairdroNaM ka~NkabarhiNavAjitaiH.. 7-125-29 (50099) tasya droNo hayAnhatvA chaturbhishchaturaH sharaiH. sAratheshcha shiraH kAyAchchakarta prahasanniva.. 7-125-30 (50100) athainaM pa~nchaviMshatyA sAyakAnAM samArpayat.. 7-125-31 (50101) avaplutya rathAchchaidyo gadAmAdAya satvaraH. bhAradvAjAya chikShepa rupitAmiva pannagIm.. 7-125-32 (50102) tAmApatantImAlokya kAlarAtrimivodyatAm. ashmasAramayIM gurvIM tapanIyavibhUShitAm. sharairanekasAhasrairbhAdvAjo.achChinachChitaiH.. 7-125-33 (50103) sA ChinnA bahubhirbANaibhAradvAjena mAriSha. gadA papAta kauravya nAdayantI dharAtalam.. 7-125-34 (50104) gadAM vinihatAM dR^iShTvA dhR^iShTaketuramarShaNaH. tomaraM vyasR^ijadvIraH shaktiM cha kana kojjvalAm.. 7-125-35 (50105) tomaraM pa~nchabhirbhittvA shaktiM chichCheda pa~nchabhiH. tau jagmaturmahIM Chinnau sarpAviva garutmatA.. 7-125-36 (50106) tato.asya vishikhaM tIkShNaM vadhAya vadhakA~NkShiNaH. preShayAmAsa samare bhAradvAjaH pratApavAn.. 7-125-37 (50107) sa tasya kavachaM bhittvA hR^idayaM chAmitaujasaH. abhyagAddharaNIM bANo haMsaH padmavanaM yathA.. 7-125-38 (50108) pata~NgaM hi grasechchASho yathA kShudraM bubhukShitaH. tathA droNo.agrasachChUro dhR^iShTaketuM mahAhave.. 7-125-39 (50109) nihate chedirAje tu tatkhaNDaM pitryamAvishat. amarShavashamApannaH putro.asya paramAstravit.. 7-125-40 (50110) tamapi prahasandroNaH sharairnitye yamakShayam. mahAvyAghro mahAraNye mR^igashAvaM yathA balI.. 7-125-41 (50111) teShu prakShIyamANeShu pANDaveyeShu bhArata. jarAsandhasuto vIraH svayaM droNamupAdravat.. 7-125-42 (50112) sa tu droNaM mahAbAhuH sharadhArAbhirAhave. adR^ishyamakarottUrNaM jalado bhAskaraM yathA.. 7-125-43 (50113) tasya tallAghavaM dR^iShTvA droNaH kShatriyamardanaH. vyasR^ijatsAyakAMstUrNaM shatasho.atha sahasrashaH.. 7-125-44 (50114) ChAdayitvA rame droNaM rathasthaM rathinAM varam. jArAsandhiM jaghAnAshu miShatAM sarvadhanvinAm.. 7-125-45 (50115) yoyo vidhIyate khaNDastaMtaM droNo.antakopamaH. Adatta sarvabhUtAni prApte kAle yathAntakaH.. 7-125-46 (50116) tato droNo mahArAja nAma vishrAvya saMyuge. sharairanekasAhasraiH pANDaveyAnsamAvR^iNot.. 7-125-47 (50117) te tu nAmA~NkitA bANA droNenAstAH shilAshitAH. narAnnAgAnhayAMshchaiva nijaghnuH shatasho mR^idhe.. 7-125-48 (50118) te vadhyamAnA droNena shakreNeva mahAsurAH. samakampanta pA~nchAlA gAvaH shItArditA iva.. 7-125-49 (50119) tato niShTAnako ghoraH pANDavAnAmajAyata. droNena vadhyamAneShu sainyeShu bharatarShabha.. 7-125-50 (50120) pratApyamAnAH sUryeNa hanyamAnAshcha sAyakaiH. anvapadyanta pA~nchAlAstadA santrastachetasaH.. 7-125-51 (50121) mohitA bANajAlena bhAradvAjena saMyuge. UrugrAhagR^ihItAnAM pA~nchAlAnAM mahArathAH.. 7-125-52 (50122) chedayashcha mahArAja sR^i~njayAH kAshikosalAH. abhyadravanta saMhR^iShTA bhAradvAjaM yuyutsayA.. 7-125-53 (50123) bruvantashcha raNe.anyonyaM chedipA~nchAlasR^i~njayAH. hata droNaM hata droNamiti te droNamabhyayuH.. 7-125-54 (50124) yatantaH purupavyAghrAH sarvashaktyA mahAdyutim. ninIpavo raNe droNaM yamasya sadanaM prati.. 7-125-55 (50125) yatamAnAMstu tAnvIrAnbhAradvAjaH shilImukhaiH. yamAya prepayAmAsa chedimukhyAnvishepataH.. 7-125-56 (50126) teShu prakShIyamANeShu chedimukhyeShu sarvashaH. pA~nchalAH samakampanta droNasAyakapIDitAH.. 7-125-57 (50127) prAkroshanbhImasenaM te dhR^iShTadyumnaM cha bhArata. dR^iShTvA droNasya karmANi tathArUpANi mAriSha.. 7-125-58 (50128) bhIma uvAcha. 7-125-59x (4579) brAhmaNena tapo nUnaM charitaM dushcharaM mahat. tathA hi yudhi sa~Nkruddho dahati kShatriyarpabhAn.. 7-125-59 (50129) dharmo yuddhaM kShatriyasya brAhmaNasya paraM tapaH. tapasvI kR^itavidyashcha prekShitenApi nirdahet.. 7-125-60 (50130) droNAgnimastrasaMsparshaM praviShTAH kShatriyarpabhAH. bahavo dustaraM ghoraM yatrAdahyanta bhArata.. 7-125-61 (50131) yathAbalaM yathotsAhaM yathAsatvaM mahAdyutiH. mohayansarvabhUtAni droNo hanti balAni naH.. 7-125-62 (50132) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-125-63x (4580) tasya tadvachanaM shrutvA kShatradharmA vyavasthitaH. ardhachandreNa chichCheda droNasya sasharaM dhanuH.. 7-125-63 (50133) sa saMrabdhataro bhUtvA droNaH kShatriyamardanaH.. 7-125-64 (50134) anyatkArmukamAdAya bhAsvaraM vegavattaram. tatrAdhAya sharaM tIkShNaM parAnIkavishAtanam.. 7-125-65 (50135) AkarNapUrNamAchAryo balavAnabhyavAsR^ijat. sa hatvA kShatradharmANaM jagAma dharaNItalam.. 7-125-66 (50136) sa bhinnahR^idayo vAhAnnyapatanmedinItale. tataH sainyAnyakampanta dhR^iShTadyumnasute hate.. 7-125-67 (50137) atha droNaM samArohachchekitAno mahAbalaH. sa droNaM dashabhirviddhvA pratyaviddhyatstanAntare.. 7-125-68 (50138) chaturbhiH sArathiM chAsya chaturbhishchaturo hayAn. tamAchAryastribhirbANairbAhvorurasi chArdayat.. 7-125-69 (50139) dhvajaM saptabhirunmathya yantAramavadhIttribhiH. tasya sUte hate te.ashvA rathamAdAya vidrutAH.. 7-125-70 (50140) samare sharasaMvItA bhAradvAjena mAriSha. chekitAnarathaM dR^iShTvA hatAshvaM hatasArathim.. 7-125-71 (50141) tAnsametAnraNe shUrAMshchedipA~nchAlasR^i~njayAn. samantAddrAvayandroNo bahvashobhata mAriSha.. 7-125-72 (50142) AkarNapalitaH shyAmo vayasA.ashItipa~nchakaH. raNe paryacharaddroNo vR^iddhaH ShoDashavarShavat.. 7-125-73 (50143) atha droNaM mahArAja vicharantamabhItavat. vajrahastamamanyanta shatravaH shatrusUdanam.. 7-125-74 (50144) tato.abravInmahAbAhurdrupado buddhimAnnR^ipa. lubdho.ayaM kShatriyAnhanti vyAghraH kShudramR^igAniva.. 7-125-75 (50145) kR^ichChrAnduryodhano lokAnpApaH prApsyati durmatiH. yasya lobhAdvinihatAH samare kShatriyarShabhAH.. 7-125-76 (50146) shatashaH sherate bhUmau nikR^ittA govR^iShA iva. rudhireNa parItA~NgAH shvashR^igAlAdanIkR^itAH.. 7-125-77 (50147) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-125-78x (4581) evamuktvA mahArAja drupado.akShauhiNIpatiH. puraskR^itya raNe pArthAndroNamabhyadravaddrutam.. .. 7-125-78 (50148) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvami chaturdashadivasayuddhe pa~nchaviMshatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 125 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-125-50 niShTAnakaH kaShTasvanaH.. 5-125-52 UrugrAhaH UrustambhaH.. 5-125-73 AkarNamupAgataM palitaM keshAdeH shauklyaM yasya. vayasA kAlapiNDasaMyogena. ashItipa~nchakaH chatuHshatAbdaH.. 5-125-125 pa~nchaviMshatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 126

.. shrIH ..

7.126. adhyAyaH 126

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

arjunavR^ittAntaparij~nAnAya sAtyakiM preShitavatA yudhiShThireNa punastayorvR^ittAntaparij~nAnAya bhImasenasya tatra gamanachodanA.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-126-0 (50149) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-126-0x (4582) vyUheShvAloDyamAneShu pANDavAnAM tatastataH. sudUramanvayuH pArthAH pA~nchAlAH saha somakaiH.. 7-126-1 (50150) vartamAne tathA raudre sa~NgrAme romaharShaNe. sa~NkShaye jagatastIvre yugAnta iva bhArata.. 7-126-2 (50151) droNe yudhi parAkrAnte nardamAne muhurmuhuH. pA~nchAleShu cha kShINeShu vadhyamAneShu pANDuShu.. 7-126-3 (50152) nApashyachCharaNaM ka~nchidvarmarAjo yudhiShThiraH. chintayAmAsa rAjendra kathametadbhaviShyati.. 7-126-4 (50153) tato vikShya dishaH sarvAH savyasAchididR^ikShayA. yudhiShThiro dadarshAtha naiva pArthaM na mAdhavam.. 7-126-5 (50154) so.apashyannarashArdUlaM vAnararShabhalakShaNam. gANQDIvasya cha nirghoShamashR^iNvanvyathitendriyaH.. 7-126-6 (50155) apashyansAtyakiM chApi vR^iShNInAM pravaraM ratham. chintayAbhiparItA~Ngo dharmarAjo yudhiShThiraH. nAdhyagachChattadA shAnti tAvapashyannarottamau.. 7-126-7 (50156) lokopakroshabhIrutvAdvarmarAjo mahAmanAH. achintayanmahAbAhuH shaineyasya rathaM prati.. 7-126-8 (50157) padavIM preShitashchaiva phalgunasya mayA raNe. shaineyaH sAtyakiH satyo mitrANAmabhaya~NkaraH.. 7-126-9 (50158) tadidaM hyekamevAsIdddvidhA jAtaM mamA.adya vai. sAtyakishcha hi vij~neyaH pANDavashcha dhana~njayaH.. 7-126-10 (50159) sAtyakiM preShayitvA tu pANDavasya padAnugam. sAtvatasyApi kaM yuddhe preShayiShye padAnugam.. 7-126-11 (50160) pariShyAmi prayatnena bhrAturanveShaNaM yadi. yuyudhAnamananviShya loko mAM garhayiShyati.. 7-126-12 (50161) bhrAturanveShaNaM kR^itvA dharmaputro yudhiShThiraH. parityajati vArShNeyaM sAtyakiM satyavikramam..
