7-126-13 (50162) lokApavAdabhIrutvAtso.ahaM pArthaM vR^ikodaram. padavIM preShayiShyAmi mAdhavasya mahAtmanaH.. 7-126-14 (50163) yathaiva cha mama prItirarjune shatrumUdane. tathaiva vR^iShNivIre.api sAtvate yuddhadurmade.. 7-126-15 (50164) atibhAre niyuktashcha mayA shaineyanandanaH. sa tu mitroparodhena gauravAttu mahAbalaH. praviShTo bhAratIM senAM makaraH sAgaraM yathA.. 7-126-16 (50165) asau hi shrUyate shabdaH shUrANAmanivartinAm. mithaH saMyudhyamAnAnaM vR^iShNivIreNa dhImatA.. 7-126-17 (50166) prAptakAlaM subalavannishchitaM bahudhA hi me. tatraiva pANDaveyasya bhImasenasya dhanvinaH. gamanaM rochate mahyaM yatra yAtau mahArathau.. 7-126-18 (50167) na chApyasahyaM bhImasya vidyate bhuvi ki~nchina.. 7-126-19 (50168) shakto hyeSha raNe yattaH pR^ithivyAM sarvadhanvinAm. svabAhubalamAsthAya prativyUhituma~njasA.. 7-126-20 (50169) yasya bAhubalaM sarve samAshritya mahAtmanaH. vanavAsAnnivR^ittAH sma na cha yuddheShu nirjitAH.. 7-126-21 (50170) ito gate bhImasene sAtvataM prati pANQDave. sanAthau bhavitArau hi yudhi sAtvataphalgunau.. 7-126-22 (50171) kAmaM tvashochanIyau tau raNe sAtvataphalgunau. rakShitau vAsudevena svayaM shastravishAradau.. 7-126-23 (50172) avashyaM tu mayA kAryamAtmanaH shokanAshanam. tasmAdbhImaM niyokShyAmi sAtvatasya padAnugam.. 7-126-24 (50173) tataH pratikR^itaM manye vidhAnaM sAtyakiM prati.. evaM nishchitya manasA dharmaputro yudhiShThiraH. 7-126-25 (50174) yantAramabravIdrAjA bhImaM prati nayasva mAm.. 7-126-26 (50175) dharmarAjavachaH shrutvA sArathirhayakovidaH. rathaM hemapariShkAraM bhImAntikamupAnayat.. 7-126-27 (50176) bhImasenamanuj~nApya prAptakAlamachintayat. kashmalaM prAvishadrAjA bahu tatra samAdishat.. 7-126-28 (50177) sa kashmalasamAviShTo bhImamAhUya pArthivaH. abravIdvachanaM rAjankuntIputro yudhiShThiraH. 7-126-29 (50178) abravIdvachanaM rAjankuntIputro yudhiShThiraH.. yaH sadevAnsagandharvAndaityAMshchaikaratho.ajayat. 7-126-30 (50179) tasya lakShma na pashyAmi bhImasenAnujasya te.. 7-126-31 (50180) sa~njaya uvAcha. tato.abravIddharmarAjaM bhImasenastathAgatam. naivAdrAkShaM nachAshrauShaM tava kashmalamIdR^isham.. 7-126-31x (4583) purAtiduHkhadIrNAnAM bhavAngatirabhUddhi naH. uttiShThottiShTha rAjendra shAdhi kiM karavANi te.. 7-126-32 (50181) na hyasAdhyamakAryaM vA vidyate mama mAnada. Aj~nApaya kurushreShTha mA cha shoke manaH kR^ithAH.. 7-126-33 (50182) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-126-34x (4584) tamabravIdashrupUrNaH kR^iShNasarpa iva shvasan. bhImasenamidaM vAkyaM pramlAnavadano nR^ipaH.. 7-126-34 (50183) shrUyate pA~nchajanyasya yathA sha~Nkhasya nisvanaH. pUrito vAsudevena saMrabdhena yashasvinA.. 7-126-35 (50184) nUnamadya hataH shete tava bhrAtA dhana~njayaH. tasminvinihate nUnaM yudhyate.asau janArdanaH.. 7-126-36 (50185) yasya satvavato vIryaM hyupajIvanti pANDavAH. yaM bhayeShvabhigachChanti sahasrAkShamivAmarAH.. 7-126-37 (50186) sa shUraH saindhavaprepsuranvayAdbhAratIM chamUm. tasya vai gamanaM vidmo bhIma nAvartanaM punaH.. 7-126-38 (50187) shyAmo yuvA guDAkesho darshanIyo mahArathaH. vyUDhorasko mahAbAhurmattadviradavikramaH.. 7-126-39 (50188) chakoranetrastAmrAsyo dviShatAM bhayavardhanaH. `mama priyahitArthaM cha shakralokAdihAgataH.. 7-126-40 (50189) vR^iddhopasevI dhR^itimAnkR^itaj~naH satyasa~NgaraH. praviShTo mahatIM senAmaparyantAM dhana~njayaH.. 7-126-41 (50190) praviShTe cha chamUM ghorAmarjune shatrunAshane. preShitaH sAtvato vIraH phalgunasya padAnugaH.. 7-126-42 (50191) tasyAbhigamanaM jAne bhIma nAvartanaM punaH'. tadidaM mama bhadraM te shokasthAnamarindama.. 7-126-43 (50192) arjunArthe mahAbAho sAtvatasya cha kAraNAt. vardhate haviShevAgniridhyamAnaH punaH punaH.. 7-126-44 (50193) tasya lakShma na pashyAmi tena vindAmi kashmalam. taM viddhi puruShavyAghraM sAtvataM cha mahAratham.. 7-126-45 (50194) sa taM mahArathaM pashchAdanuyAtastavAnujam. tamapashyanmahAbAhumadaM vindAmi kashmalam.. 7-126-46 (50195) `athainaM punarAchakShva lohitAkShaM sakeshavam. dR^iShTvA kushalinaM pArthaM saindhavAnte sasAtyakim.. 7-126-47 (50196) saMvidaM mama kuryAstvaM siMhanAdena pANDava.. 7-126-48 (50197) nUnaM vinihataH shUraH savyAsAchI parantapa'. pArthe tasminhate chaiva yudhyate garuDadhvajaH.. 7-126-49 (50198) sahayo nAsya vai kashchittena vindAmi kashmalam. tasmAtkR^iShNo raNe nUnaM yudhyate yuddhakovidaH.. 7-126-50 (50199) na hi me shudhyate bhAvastayoreva parantapa. sa tatra gachCha kaunteya yatra yAto dhana~njayaH.. 7-126-51 (50200) sAtyakishcha mahAvIryaH kartavyaM yadi manyase. vachanaM mama dharmaj~na bhrAtA jyeShTho bhavAmi te.. 7-126-52 (50201) na me.arjunastathA j~neyo j~nAtavyaH sAtyakiryathA.. 7-126-53 (50202) chikIrShurmatpriyaM pArtha sa yAtaH savyasAchinaH. padavIM durgamAM ghorAmagamyAmakR^itAtmabhiH.. 7-126-54 (50203) dR^iShTvA kushalinau kR^iShNau sAtvataM chaiva sAtyakim. saMvidaM chaiva kuryAstvaM siMhanAdena pANQDava.. .. 7-126-55 (50204) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe ShaDviMshatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 126 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-126-6 vAnararShabhalakShaNaM vAnarapradhAnadhvajam. varavAnaraketanamiti pATho vA.. 5-126-9 satyo dR^iDhapratij~naH.. 5-126-25 sAtyakimprati pratividhAnaM kR^itamityanvayaH.. 5-126-40 chakoranetro raktAntAyatanayanaH. tAmrAsyo raktagauramukhaH.. 5-126-126 ShaDviMshatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 126 ..
droNaparva - adhyAya 127

.. shrIH ..

7.127. adhyAyaH 127

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

katichana dhArtarAShTrAnnihatya nirgachChatA bhImena svapathaM nirundhAnasya droNasya rathabha~njanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-127-0 (50205) bhImasena uvAcha. 7-127-0x (4585) brahmeshAnendravaruNAnavahadyaH purA rathaH. tamAsthAya gatau kR^iShNau na tayorvidyate bhayam.. 7-127-1 (50206) tavAj~nAM shirasA bibhradeSha gachChAmi mA shuchaH. sametya tAnnaravyAghrAstava dAsyAmi saMvidam.. 7-127-2 (50207) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-127-3x (4586) etAvaduktvA prayayau paridAya yudhiShThiram. dhR^iShTadyumnAya balavAnsuhR^idbhyashcha punaHpunaH. dhR^iShTadyumnaM chedamAha bhImaseno mahAbalaH.. 7-127-3 (50208) viditaM te mahAbAho yathA droNo mahArathaH. grahaNe dharmarAjasya sarvopAyena vartate.. 7-127-4 (50209) na cha me gamane kR^ityaM tAdR^ikpArShata vidyate. yAdR^ishaM rakShaNe rAj~naH kAryamAtyayikaM hi naH.. 7-127-5 (50210) evamukto.asmi pArthena prativaktuM na chotsahe. prayAsye tatra yatrAsau mumUrShuH saindhavaH sthitaH.. 7-127-6 (50211) dharmarAjasya vachane sthAtavyamavisha~NkayA. yAsyAmi padavIM bhrAtuH sAtvatasya cha dhImataH.. 7-127-7 (50212) so.adya yatto raNe rArthaM parirakSha yudhiShThiram. etaddhi sarvakAryANAM paramaM kR^itsamAhave.. 7-127-8 (50213) tamabravInmahArAja dhR^iShTadyumno vR^ikodaram. IpsitaM te kariShyAmi gachCha pArthAvichArayan.. 7-127-9 (50214) nAhatvA samare droNo dhR^iShTadyumnaM katha~nchana. nigrahaM dharmarAjasya prakariShyati saMyuge.. 7-127-10 (50215) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-127-11x (4587) tato nikShipya rAjAnaM dhR^iShTadyumne cha pANDavam. abhivAdya guruM jyeShThaM prayayau yena phalgunaH.. 7-127-11 (50216) pariShvaktashcha kaunteyo dharmarAjena mArutiH. AghrAtashcha tathA mUrdhni shrAvitashchAshiShaH shubhAH.. 7-127-12 (50217) [kR^itvA pradakShiNAnviprAnarchitAMstuShTamAnasAn. Alabhya ma~NgalAnyaShTau pItvA kairAtakaM madhu.. 7-127-13 (50218) dviguNadraviNo vIro madaraktAntalochanaH. vipraiH kR^itasvastyayano vijayotpAdasUchitaH.. 7-127-14 (50219) pashyannevAtmano buddhiM vijayAnandakAriNIm. anulomAnilaishchAshu pradarshitajayodayaH.. 7-127-15 (50220) bhImaseno mahAbAhuH kavachI shubhakuNDalI. sagadaH satalatrANaH sasharI rathinAM varaH. rathamAruhya niryuktaM sarvopakaraNAnvitam'.. 7-127-16 (50221) tasya kArShNAyasaM varma hemachitraM maharddhimat. vibabhau sarvataH shliShTaM savidyudiva toyadaH.. 7-127-17 (50222) pItaraktAsitasitairvAsaubhishcha suveShTitaH. kaNThasUtreNa vibabhau sendrAyudha ivAmbudaH.. 7-127-18 (50223) prayAte bhImasene tu tava sainyaM yuyutsayA. pA~nchajanyaravo ghoraH punarAsIdvishAmpate.. 7-127-19 (50224) taM shrutvA ninadaM ghoraM trailokyatrAsanaM mahat. punarbhImaM mahAbAhuM dharmaputro.abhyabhAShata.. 7-127-20 (50225) eSha vR^iShNipravIreNa dhmAtaH salilajo bhR^isham. pR^ithivIM chAntarikShaM cha vinAdayati sha~NkharAT.. 7-127-21 (50226) nUnaM vyasanamApanne sumahatsavyasAchini. kurubhiryudhyate sArdhaM sarvaishchakragadAdharaH.. 7-127-22 (50227) nUnamAryA mahatkuntI pApaM vyasanamIdR^isham. draupadI cha subhadrA cha pashyanti saha bandhubhiH. tadbhIma tvarayA yukto yAhi yatra dhana~njayaH.. 7-127-23 (50228) muhyatIva hi me chittaM dhana~njayadidR^ikShayA. dishashcha pradishaH pArtha sAtvatasya cha kAraNAt.. 7-127-24 (50229) gachChagachCheti guruNA so.anuj~nAto vR^ikodaraH. tataH pANDusuto rAjanbhImasenaH pratApavAn.. 7-127-25 (50230) baddhagodhA~NgulitrANaH pragR^ihItasharAsanaH. jyeShThena prahito bhrAtrA bhrAtA bhrAtuH priya~NkaraH.. 7-127-26 (50231) Ahatya dundubhiM bhImaH sha~NkhaM pradhmApya chAsakR^it. vinadya siMhanAdena jyAM vikarShanpunaHpunaH.. 7-127-27 (50232) tena shabdena vIrANAM pAtayitvA manAMsyuta. darshayanghoramAtmAnamamitrAnsahasA.abhyayAt.. 7-127-28 (50233) tamUhurjavanA dAntA viruvanto hayottamAH. vishokena susaMyattA manomArutaraMhasaH.. 7-127-29 (50234) ArujanvirujanpArtho jyAM vikarShaMshcha pANinA. samprakarShanvikarShaMshcha senAgraM samaloDayat.. 7-127-30 (50235) taM prayAntaM mahAbAhuM pA~nchAlAH sahasomakAH. pR^iShThato.anuyayuH shUrA maghavantamivAmarAH.. 7-127-31 (50236) taM sametya mahArAja tAvakAH paryavArayan. duHshAsanashchitrasenaH kuNDabhedI viviMshatiH.. 7-127-32 (50237) durmukho duHsahashchaiva vikarNashcha shalastathA. vindAnuvindau sumukho dIrghabAhuH sudarshanaH.. 7-127-33 (50238) vR^indArakaH suhastashcha suSheNo dIrghalochanaH. abhayo raudrakarNA cha suvarmA durvimochanaH.. 7-127-34 (50239) shobhanto rathinAM shreShThAH sahasainyapadAnugAH. saMyattAH samare vIrA bhImasenamupAdravan.. 7-127-35 (50240) taiH samantAdvR^itaH shUraiH samareShu mahArathaH. tAnsamIkShya tu kaunteyo bhImasenaH parAkramI. abhyavartata vegena siMhaH kShudramR^igAniva.. 7-127-36 (50241) te mahAstrANi divyAni tatra vIrA adarshayan. ChAdayantaH sharairbhImaM meghAH sUryamivoditam.. 7-127-37 (50242) tataH kruddho mahArAja bhImasenaH parAkramI. agrataH syandanAnIkaM sharavarShairavAkirat.. 7-127-38 (50243) te vadhyamAnAH samare tava putrA mahArathAH. bhImaM bhImabalA yuddhe yodhayanti jayaiShiNaH.. 7-127-39 (50244) tato duHshAsanaH kruddho rathashaktiM samAkShipat. sarvapArasavIM tIkShNAM jighAMsuH pANDunandanam.. 7-127-40 (50245) ApatantIM mahAshaktiM tava putrapraNoditAm. dvidhA chichCheda tAM bhImastadadbhutamivAbhavat.. 7-127-41 (50246) athAnyairvishikhaistIkShNaiH sa~NkruddhaH kuNDabhedinam. suSheNaM dIrghanetraM cha tribhistrInavadhIdbalI.. 7-127-42 (50247) tato vR^indArakaM vIraM kurUNAM kIrtivardhanam. putrANAM tava vIrANAM yudhyatAmavadhItpunaH.. 7-127-43 (50248) abhayaM raudrakarmANaM durvimochanameva cha. tribhistrInavadhIdbhImaH punareva sutAMstava.. 7-127-44 (50249) vadhyamAnA mahArAja putrAstava balIyasA. bhImaM praharatAM shreShThaM samantAtparyavArayan.. 7-127-45 (50250) te sharairbhImakarmANaM vavarShuH pANDavaM yudhi. meghA ivAtapApAye dhArAbhirdharaNIdharam.. 7-127-46 (50251) sa tadbANamayaM varShamashmavarShamivAchalaH. pratIchChanpANDudAyAdo na prAvyathata shatruhA.. 7-127-47 (50252) vindAnuvindau sahitau suvarmANaM cha te sutam. prahasanneva kaunteyaH sharairninyaM yamakShayam.. 7-127-48 (50253) tataH sudarshanaM vIraM putraM te bharatarShabha. vivyAdha samare tUrNaM sa papAta mamAra cha.. 7-127-49 (50254) so.achireNaiva kAlena tadrathAnIkamAshugaiH. dishaH sarvAH samAlokya vyadhamatpANDunandanaH.. 7-127-50 (50255) tato vai rathaghoSheNa garjitena mR^igA iva. bhajyamAnAshcha samare tava putrA vishAmpate. prAdravansahasA sarve bhImasenabhayarditAH.. 7-127-51 (50256) anuyAyAchcha kaunteyaH putrANAM te mahadbalam. vivyAdha samare rAjankauraveyAnsamantataH.. 7-127-52 (50257) vadhyamAnA mahArAja bhImasenena tAvakAH. tyaktvA bhImaM raNAjjagmushchodayanto hayottamAn. 7-127-53 (50258) tAMstu nirjitya samare bhImaseno mahAbalaH. siMhanAdaravaM chakre bAhushabdaM cha pANDavaH.. 7-127-54 (50259) *mahAntaM talashabdaM cha kR^itvA droNAntikaM yayau. tamAvArayadAchAryo velevodvR^ittamarNavam.. 7-127-55 (50260) tasya droNo rathaM rAja~nChAdayAmAsa saMyuge. sAshvasUtadhvajaM tUrNaM tadadbhutamivAbhavat.. 7-127-56 (50261) lalATe.atADayachchainaM nArAchena smayanniva. UrdhvarashmirivAdityo vibabhau tatra pANDavaH.. 7-127-57 (50262) sa manyamAnastvAchAryo mamAyaM phalguno yathA. bhImaH kariShyate pUjAmityuvAcha vR^ikodaram.. 7-127-58 (50263) bhImasena na te shakyaM praveShTumarivAhinIm. mAmanirjitya samare shatrumadya mahAbala.. 7-127-59 (50264) yadi te sAnujaH kR^iShNaH praviShTo.anumate mama. anIkaM na tu shakyaM me praveShTumiha vai tvayA.. 7-127-60 (50265) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-127-61x (4588) atha bhImastu tachChrutvA gurorvAkyamasheShataH. kruddhaH provAcha vai droNaM raktatAmrekShaNaH shvasan.. 7-127-61 (50266) tavArjuno nAnumate brahbandho ramAjiram. praviShTaH sa hi durdharShaH shakrasyApi vishedbalam.. 7-127-62 (50267) yena tvaM paramAM pUjAM kurvatA mAnito hyasi. nArjuno.ahaM ghR^iNI vipra bhImaseno.asmi te ripuH.. 7-127-63 (50268) pitA nastvaM gururbandhustadA putrA hi rte vayam. iti manyAmahe sarve bhavantaM praNatAH sthitAH.. 7-127-64 (50269) tadadya viparItaM te vadato.asmAsu dR^ishyate. yadi shatruM tvamAtmAnaM manyase tattathA.astviha. eSha te sadR^ishaM karma shatrorbhImaH kariShyati.. 7-127-65 (50270) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-127-66x (4589) athoddhAmya gadAM vIraH kAladaNDamivAntakaH. droNAyAvAsR^ijadrAjansa rathAdavapupluve.. 7-127-66 (50271) sAshvasUtadhvajaM yAnaM droNasyApothayattadA. tadadbhutamapashyAma pANDaveyasya vikramam.. 7-127-67 (50272) droNaM tu virathaM kR^itvA bhImaseno mahAbalaH. abhyavartata sainyAni tAvakAni samantataH.. 7-127-68 (50273) sa mR^idraMstarasA yodhAnvAyurvR^ikShAnivaujasA. vichachAra raNe rAjanvAyutulyaparAkramaH.. 7-127-69 (50274) nirjitastu tadA tena pANDavena mahAtmanA. anyaM tu rathamAtiShThaddroNaH praharatAM varaH.. .. 7-127-70 (50275) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe saptaviMshatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 127 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-127-1 saMvidaM j~nApanam.. 5-127- AtyayikaM atishayitam.. 5-127- idaM shlokatrayaM jha. pustaka eva vartate. analo gohiraNyaM cha dUrvAgorochanAmR^itam. akShataM dadhi chetyaShTau ma~NgalAni prachakShate.. 5-127- vijayotpAdasUchitaH sUchitavijayotpAdaH.. 5-127- rathamAruhya prayayAviti pUrveNAnvayaH.. 5-127- Aha kuntI nUnamAryA pApamadya nidarshanam. dropadrI cha subhadrA cha pashyantyau saha bandhubhiH. iti jha. pAThaH.. 5-127- Arujan kR^intan. virujanviShyan. vikarShan atyarthaM karShan. samprakarShan samyakprakarSheNa vilikhan. vikarShan vikShipan.. 5-127-* iyaM kathA jha. pAThe pUrvAdhyAye 37 tamashlokAdanantaraM kathitAsti.
droNaparva - adhyAya 128

.. shrIH ..

7.128. adhyAyaH 128

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

punardroNarathAnbha~NktvA gachChato bhImasyArjunadarshanena siMhanAdaH.. 1 .. tachChravaNena yudhiShThirasya harShodayaH.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-128-0 (50276) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-128-0x (4590) samuttIrNaM rathAnIkaM pANDavaM vihasanraNe. vivArayiShurAchAryaH sharavarShairavAkirat.. 7-128-1 (50277) pibanniva sharaughAMstAndroNachApaparichyutAn. so.abhyadravata sodaryAnmohayanbalamAyayA.. 7-128-2 (50278) taM mR^idhe vegamAsthAya paraM paramadhanvinaH. choditAstava putraishcha sarvataH paryavArayan.. 7-128-3 (50279) sa taistu saMvR^ito bhImaH krodhena pradahanniva. udyachChansa gadAM tebhyaH sughorAM siMhavannadan. avAsR^ijachcha vegena shatrupakShavinAshinIm.. 7-128-4 (50280) indrAshanirivendreNa praviddhA saMhatAtmanA. prAmathnAtsA mahArAja sainikAMstava saMyuge.. 7-128-5 (50281) ghoSheNa mahatA rAjanpUrayantIva medinIm. jvalantI tejasA bhImA trAsayAmAsa te sutAn.. 7-128-6 (50282) tAM patantIM mahAvegAM dR^iShTvA tejobhisaMvR^itAm. prAdravaMstAvakAH sarve nadanto bairavAnravAn.. 7-128-7 (50283) siMhanAdamasahyaM hi shrutvA bhImasya saMyuge. prApatanmunujAstrastA rathebhyo rathinastadA.. 7-128-8 (50284) te hanyamAnA bhImena gadAhastena tAvakAH. prAdravanta raNe bhItA vyAghraghrAtA mR^igA iva.. 7-128-9 (50285) sa tAnvidrAvya kaunteyaH sa~Nkhye.amitrAndurAsadAn. suparNa iva vegena pakShirADatyagAchchamUm.. 7-128-10 (50286) tathA tu viprakurvANaM rathayUthapayUthapam. bhAradvAjo mahArAja bhImasenaM samabhyayAt.. 7-128-11 (50287) bhImaM tu samare droNo vArayitvA sharormibhiH. akarotsahasA nAdaM ShANDUnAM bhayamAdadhat.. 7-128-12 (50288) tadyuddhamAsItsumahaddhoraM devAsuropamam. droNasya cha mahArAja bhImasya cha mahAtmanaH.. 7-128-13 (50289) yadA tu vishikhaistIkShNairdroNachApaviniHsR^itaiH. vadhyante samare vIrAH shatasho.atha sahasrashaH.. 7-128-14 (50290) tato rathAdavaplutya vegamAsthAya pANDavaH. nimIlya nayane rAjanpadAtirdroNamabhyayAt.. 7-128-15 (50291) aMse shiro bhImasenaH karau kR^itvorasi sthirau. vegamAsthAya balavAnmanonilagarutmatAm.. 7-128-16 (50292) yathA hi govR^iSho varShaM pratigR^ihNAti lIlayA. tathA bhImo naravyAghraH sharavarShaM samagrahIt.. 7-128-17 (50293) sa vadhyamAnaH samare rathaM droNasya mAriSha. IShAyAM pANinA gR^ihya prachikShepa mahAbalaH.. 7-128-18 (50294) droNastu satvaro rAjankShipto bhImena saMyuge. `dadR^ishe tAvakairyodhairvismayotphullalochanaiH. parihR^itya rathaM droNashchUrNitaM taM mahItale'.. 7-128-19 (50295) rathamanyaM samAruhya vyUhadvAraM yayau punaH. tamAyAntaM tathA dR^iShTvA bhagnotsAhaM guruM tadA.. 7-128-20 (50296) gatvA vegAtpunarbhImo dhuraM gR^ihya rathasya tu. tamapyatirathaM bhImashchikShepa bhR^isharoShitaH.. 7-128-21 (50297) evamaShTau rathAH kShiptA bhImasenena lIlayA.. 7-128-22 (50298) vyadR^ishyata nimeSheNa punaH svarathamAsthitaH. dR^ishyate tAvakairyodhairvismayotphullalochanaiH.. 7-128-23 (50299) tasminkShaNe tasya yantA tUrNamashvAnachodayat. bhImasenasya kauravya tadadbhutamivAbhavat.. 7-128-24 (50300) tataH svarathamAsthAya bhImaseno mahAbalaH. abhyadravata vegena tava putrasya vAhinIm.. 7-128-25 (50301) sa mR^idgankShatriyAnAjau vAto vR^ikShAnivoddhataH. agachChaddArayansenAM sindhuvego nagAniva.. 7-128-26 (50302) bhojAnIkaM samAsAdya hArdikyenAbhirakShitam. pramathya tarasA vIrastadapyatibalo.abhyayAt.. 7-128-27 (50303) santrAsayannanIkAni talashabdena pANDavaH. ajayatsarvasainyAni shArdUla iva govR^iShAn.. 7-128-28 (50304) bhojAnIkamatikramya daradAnAM cha vAhinIm. tathA mlechChagaNAnanyAnbahUnyuddhavishAradAn.. 7-128-29 (50305) sAtyakiM chaiva samprekShya yudhyamAnaM mahAratham. rathena yattaH kaunteyo vegena prayayau tadA.. 7-128-30 (50306) bhImaseno mahArAja draShTukAmo dhana~njayam. atItya samare yodhAMstAvakAnpANDunandanaH.. 7-128-31 (50307) so.apashyadarjunaM tatra yudhyamAnaM mahAratham. saindhavasya vadhArthaM hi parAkrAntaM parAkramI.. 7-128-32 (50308) taM dR^iShTvA puruShavyAghrashchukrosha mahato ravAn. prAvR^iTkAle mahArAja nardanniva balAhakaH.. 7-128-33 (50309) taM tasya ninadaM ghoraM pArthaH shushrAva nardataH. vAsudevashcha kauravya bhImasenasya saMyuge.. 7-128-34 (50310) tau shrutvA yugapadvIrau ninadaM tasya shuShmiNaH. punaH punaH prANadatAM didR^ikShantau vR^ikodaram.. 7-128-35 (50311) tataH pArtho mahAnAdaM mu~nchanvai mAdhavashcha ha. abhyayAtAM mahArAja nardantau govR^iShAviva.. 7-128-36 (50312) bhImasenaravaM shrutvA phalgunasya cha dhanvinaH. aprIyata mahArAja dharmaputro yudhiShThiraH.. 7-128-37 (50313) vishokashchAbhavadrAjA shrutvA taM ninadaM tayoH. dhana~njayasya samare jayamAshAstavAnvibhiH.. 7-128-38 (50314) tathA tu nardamAne vai bhImasene madotkaTe. smitaM kR^itvA mahAbAhurdharmaputro yudhiShThiraH.. 7-128-39 (50315) hR^idgataM manasA prAha dhyAtvA dharmabhR^itAM varaH. dattA bhIma tvayA saMvitkR^itaM guruvachastathA.. 7-128-40 (50316) na hi teShAM jayo yuddhe yeShAM dveShTA.asi pANDava. diShTyA jIvati sa~Ngrame savyasAchI dhana~njayaH.. 7-128-41 (50317) diShTyA cha kushalI vIraH sAtyakiH satyavikramaH. diShTyA shR^iNomi garjantau vAsudevadhana~njayau.. 7-128-42 (50318) yena shakraM raNe jitvA tarpito havyavAhanaH. sa hantA dviShatAM sa~Nkhye diShTyA jIvati phalgunaH.. 7-128-43 (50319) yasya bAhubalaM sarve vayamAshritya jIvitAH. sa hantA ri pusainyAnAM diShTyA jIvati phalgunaH.. 7-128-44 (50320) nivAtakavachA yena devairapi sudurjayAH. nirjitA dhanuShaikena diShTyA pArthaH sa jIvati.. 7-128-45 (50321) kauravAnsahitAnsarvAngograhArthe samAgatAn. yo.ajayanmatsyanagare diShTyA pArthaH sa jIvati.. 7-128-46 (50322) kAlakeyasahasrANi chaturdasha mahAraNe. yo.avadhIdbhujavIryeNa diShTyA pArthaH sa jIvati.. 7-128-47 (50323) gandharvarAjaM balinaM duryodhanakR^ite cha vai. jitavAnyo.astravIryeNa diShTyA pArthaH sa jIvati.. 7-128-48 (50324) kirITamAlI balavA~nChetAshvaH kR^iShNasArathiH. mama priyashcha satataM diShTyA pArthaH sa jIvati.. 7-128-49 (50325) putrashokAbhisantaptashchikIrShankarma duShkaram. jayadrathavadhAnveShI pratij~nAM kR^itavAnhi yaH. kachchitsa saindhavaM sa~Nkhye haniShyati dhana~njayaH.. 7-128-50 (50326) kachchittIrNapratij~naM hi vAsudevena rakShitam. anastamita Aditye sameShyAmyahamarjunam.. 7-128-51 (50327) kachchitsaindhavako rAjA duryodhanahite rataH. nandayiShyatyamitrAnhi phalgunena nipAtitaH.. 7-128-52 (50328) kachchidduryodhano rAjA phalgunena nipAtitam. dR^iShTvA saindhavakaM sa~Nkhye shamamasmAsu dhAsyati.. 7-128-53 (50329) dR^iShTvA vinihatAnbhrAtR^InbhImasenena saMyuge. kachchidduryodhano mandaH shamamasmAsu yAsyati.. 7-128-54 (50330) dR^iShTvA chAnyAnmahAyodhAnpAtitAndharaNItale. kachchidduryodhano mandaH pashchAttApaM gamiShyati.. 7-128-55 (50331) sheShasya rakShaNArthaM cha sandhAsyati suyodhanaH.. evaM bahuvidhaM tasya rAj~nashchintayatastadA. 7-128-56 (50332) kR^ipayA.abhiparItasya ghoraM yuddhamavartata.. .. 7-128-57 (50333) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe aShTAviMshatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 128 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-128-24 bhImasenasya kamenti sheShaH.. 5-128-128 aShTAviMshatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 129

.. shrIH ..

7.129. adhyAyaH 129

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

bhImena karNaparAjayo duHshalavadhashcha.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-129-0 (50334) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-129-0x (4591) ninadantaM tathA taM tu bhImasenaM mahAbalam. meghastanitanirghoShaM ke vIrAH paryavArayan.. 7-129-1 (50335) na hi pashyAmyahaM taM vai triShu lokeShu ka~nchana. kruddhasya bhImasenasya yastiShThedagrato raNe.. 7-129-2 (50336) gadAM yuyutsamAnasya kAlasyeveha sa~nchaya. na hi pashyAmyahaM yuddhe yastiShThedagrataH pumAn.. 7-129-3 (50337) rathaM rathena yo hanyAtku~njaraM ku~nchareNa cha. kastasya samare sthAtA sAkShAdapi purandaraH.. 7-129-4 (50338) kruddhasya bhImasenasya mama putrA~njighAMsataH. duryodhanahite yuktAH samatiShThanta ke.agrataH.. 7-129-5 (50339) bhImasenadavAgnestu mama putrAMstR^iNolapam. pradhakShyato raNamukhe ke.atiShThannagrato narAH.. 7-129-6 (50340) kAlyamAnAMstu putrAnme dR^iShTvA bhImasya saMyuge. kAleneva prajAH sarvAH ke bhImaM paryavArayan.. 7-129-7 (50341) na me.arjunAdbhayaM tAdR^ikkR^iShNAnnApi cha sAtvatAt. hutabhugjanmano naiva yAdR^igbhImAdbhayaM mama.. 7-129-8 (50342) bhImavahneH pradIptasya mama putrAndidhakShataH. ke shUrAH paryavartanta tanmamAchakShva sa~njaya.. 7-129-9 (50343) sa~nchaya uvAcha. 7-129-10x (4592) tathA tu nardamAnaM taM bhImasenaM mahAbalam. tumulenaiva shabdena karNo.apyabhyadravadbalI.. 7-129-10 (50344) vyAkShipansumahachchApamatimAtramamarShaNaH. karNaH suyuddhamAkA~NkShandarshayiShyanbalaM mR^idhe.. 7-129-11 (50345) rurodha mArgaM bhImasya vAtasyeva mahIruhaH. bhImo.api dR^iShTvA sAvegaM puro vaikartanaM sthitam.. 7-129-12 (50346) chukopa balavadvIrashchikShepAsya shilAshitAn. tAnpratyagR^ihNAtkarNo.api pratIpaM prApayachCharAn.. 7-129-13 (50347) tatastu sarvayodhAnAM yatanAM prekShatAM tadA. prAvepanniva gAtrANi karNabhImasamAgame.. 7-129-14 (50348) rathinAM sAdinAM chaiva tayoH shrutvA talasvanam. bhImasenasya ninadaM shrutvA ghoraM raNAjire.. 7-129-15 (50349) khaM cha bhUmiM cha saMruddhAM menire kShatriyarShabhAH. punarghoreNa nAdena pANDavasya mahAtmanaH.. 7-129-16 (50350) samare sarvayodhAnAM dhanUMShyabhyapatankShitau. shastrANi nyapatandorbhyaH keShA~nchichchAsavo.adravan.. 7-129-17 (50351) vitrastAni cha sarvANi shakR^inmUtraM prasusruvuH. vAhanAni cha sarvANi babhUvurvimanAMsi cha.. 7-129-18 (50352) prAdurAsannimittAni ghorANi subahUnyuta. gR^idhraka~NkabalaishchAsIdantarikShaM samAvR^itam.. 7-129-19 (50353) tasminsutumule rAjankarNabhImasamAgame. tataH karNastu viMshatyA sharANAM bhImamArdayat.. 7-129-20 (50354) vivyAdha chAsya tvaritaH sUtaM pa~nchabhirAshugaiH. prahasya bhImaseno.api karNaM pratyAdravadraNe.. 7-129-21 (50355) sAyakAnAM chatuH ShaShTyA kShiprakArI mahAyashAH. tasya karNo maheShvAsaH sAyakAMshchaturo.akShipat.. 7-129-22 (50356) asamprAptAMshcha tAnbhImaH sAyakairnataparvabhiH. chichCheda bahudhA rAjandarshayanpANilAghavam.. 7-129-23 (50357) taM karNashchAdayAmAsa sharavrAtairanekashaH. sa~nChAdyamAnaH karNena bahudhA pANQDunandanaH.. 7-129-24 (50358) chichCheda chApaM karNasya muShTideshe mahArathaH. vivyAdha chainaM bahubhiH sAyakairnataparvabhiH.. 7-129-25 (50359) athAnyaddhanurAdAya sa~nyaM kR^itvA cha sUtajaH. vivyAdha samare bhImaM bhImakarmA mahArathaH.. 7-129-26 (50360) tasya bImo bhR^ishaM kruddhastrI~nsharAnnataparvaNaH. nichakhAnorasi kruddhaH sUtaputrasya vegataH.. 7-129-27 (50361) taiH karNo.arAjata sharairuromadhyagataiH sadA. mahIdhara ivodagrastrishR^i~Ngo bharatarShabha.. 7-129-28 (50362) susrAva chAsya rudhiraM viddhasya parameShubhiH. dhAtuprasyandinaH shailAdyathA gairikadhAtavaH.. 7-129-29 (50363) ki~nchidvichalitaH karNaH suprahArAbhipIDitaH. AkarNapUrNamAkR^iShya bhImaM vivyAdha sAyakaiH.. 7-129-30 (50364) chikShepa cha punarbANA~nshatasho.atha sahasrashaH. sa sharairarditastena karNena dR^iDhadhanvinA. dhanurjyAmachChinattUrNaM bhImastasya kShureNa ha.. 7-129-31 (50365) sArathiM chAsya bhallena rathanIDAdapAtayat. vAhAMshcha chaturastasya vyasUMshchakre mahArathaH.. 7-129-32 (50366) hatAshvAttu rathAtkarNaH samAplutya vishAmpate. syandanaM vR^iShasenasya tUrNamApupluve bhayAt.. 7-129-33 (50367) nirjitya tu raNe karNaM bhImasenaH pratApavAn. nanAda balavAnnAdaM parjanyaninadopamam.. 7-129-34 (50368) tasya taM ninadaM shrutvA prahR^iShTo.abhUdyudhiShThiraH. karNaM parAjitaM matvA bhImasenena saMyuge.. 7-129-35 (50369) samantAchCha~NkhaninadaM pANDusenA.akarottadA. shatrusenAdhvaniM shrutvA tAvakA hyanadanbhR^isham.. 7-129-36 (50370) sa sha~NkhabANaninadairharShAdrAjA svavAhinIm. chakre yudhiShThiraH sa~Nkhye harShanAdaishcha sa~NkulAm.. gANDIvaM vyAkShipatpArthaH kR^iShNo.apyabjamavAdayat 7-129-37 (50371) tamantardhAya ninadaM bhImasya nadato dhvaniH. ashrUyata tadA rAjansarvasainyeShu dAruNaH.. 7-129-38 (50372) tato vyAyachChatAmastraiH pR^ithakpR^ithagajihmagaiH. mR^idupUrvaM tu rAdheyo dR^iDhapUrvaM tu pANDavaH.. 7-129-39 (50373) `bhImo.api cha mahArAja vaikartanamupAdravat. Asure tu mahAsainye tArakaM pAvakiryathA.. 7-129-40 (50374) tayorevaM mahadyuddhamabhavadbhImakarNayoH. taM bhImaseno mahatA sharavarSheNa vArayan.. 7-129-41 (50375) vivyAdha sArathiM chAsya hayAMshcha chaturaH sharaiH. dhvajaM chAsya patAkAM cha bhallaiH sannataparvabhiH. rathaM cha chakrarakShau cha bhImashchichCheda mAriSha.. 7-129-42 (50376) karNo.api rathinAM shreShTho bhImasenena kampitaH. kha~Ngacharmadharo rAjanbhImamabhyadravadbalI.. 7-129-43 (50377) bhImashchichCheda kha~NgaM cha charmaNA saha mAriSha.. 7-129-44 (50378) dR^iShTvA karNaM cha pArthena bAdhitaM bahubhiH sharaiH. duryodhano mahArAja dushshalaM pratyabhAShata. karNaM kR^ichChragataM pashya shIghraM yAnaM prayachChaha.. 7-129-45 (50379) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-129-46x (4593) evamuktastato rAj~nA dushshalaH samupAdravat. dushshalasya rathaM karNashchAruroha mahArathaH.. 7-129-46 (50380) tau pArthaH sahasA gatvA vivyAdha dashabhiH sharaiH. punashcha karNaM viddhvA.api dushshalasya shiro.aharat.. 7-129-47 (50381) dushshalaM nihataM dR^iShTvA bhImasenena mAriSha. tasyaiva dhanurAdAya karNo vivyAdha pANDavam.. 7-129-48 (50382) anyonyaM samare vIrau yuyudhAte mahAbalau. shatrughnau shatrumadhye tu balavajrabhR^itAviva.. 7-129-49 (50383) bhImo viddhA hayAMshchaiva sArathiM cha punaH punaH. karNamabhyadravatpArthaH prahasaMshcha mahAbalaH.. 7-129-50 (50384) tato vyAyachChamAnasya bhImasenasya saMyuge. tatsainyaM kalilIbhUtaM na prAj~nAyata ki~nchana.. .. 7-129-51 (50385) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe ekonatriMshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 129 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-129-1 yuyutsamAnasya vyApArayataH.. 5-129- sAvegaM satvaram.. 5-129- saMruddhAmekatAmApannAm.. 5-129- vyAyachChatAM praharatAm.. 5-129- ekonatriMshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 129 ..
droNaparva - adhyAya 130

.. shrIH ..

7.130. adhyAyaH 130

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

droNaduryodhanasaMvAdo duryodhanayuddhaM cha.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-130-0 (50386) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-130-0x (4594) tasminvilulite sainye saindhavAyArjune gate. sAtvate bhImasene cha putraste droNamabhyayAt. tvarannekarathenaiva bahu kR^ityaM vichintayan.. 7-130-1 (50387) sa rathastava putrasya tvarayA parayA yutaH. tUrNamabhyadravaddroNaM manomArutavegavAn.. 7-130-2 (50388) `iha dR^iShTa ito naShTaH sarathaH prAdravannR^ipaH. muhUrtAdiva putraste droNamAsAdya mAriSha'. sasambhramAmidaM vAkyamabravItkuranandanaH.. 7-130-3 (50389) arjuno bhImasenashcha sAtyakishchAparAjitaH. vijitya sarvasainyAni sumahAnti mahArathAH.. 7-130-4 (50390) samprAptAH sindhurAjasya samIpamanivAritAH. vyAyachChanti cha tatrApi sarva evAparAjitAH.. 7-130-5 (50391) yadi tAvadraNe pArtho vyatikrAnto mahArathaH. kathaM sAtyakibhImAbhyAM vyatikrAnto.asi mAnada.. 7-130-6 (50392) AshcharyabhUto loke.asminsamudrasyeva shoShaNam. nirjayastava viprAgrya sAtvatenArjunena cha. tathaiva bhImasenena lokaH saMvadate bhR^isham.. 7-130-7 (50393) kathaM droNo jitaH sa~Nkhye dhanurvedasya pAragaH. ityevaM bruvate yodhA ashraddheyamidaM tava.. 7-130-8 (50394) nAsha eva tu me nUnaM mandabhAgyasya saMyuge. yatra tvAM puruShavyAghraM vyatikrAntAstrayo rathAH.. 7-130-9 (50395) droNa uvAcha. 7-130-10x (4595) evaM gate tu kR^itye.asminbrUhi yatte vivakShitam. yadgataM gatamevedaM sheShaM chintaya mAnada.. 7-130-10 (50396) duryodhana uvAcha. 7-130-11x (4596) yatkR^ityaM sindhurAjasya prAptakAlamanantaram. tatsaMvidhIyatAM kShipraM sAdhu sa~nchintya no dvija.. 7-130-11 (50397) droNa uvAcha. 7-130-12x (4597) chintyaM bahuvidhaM tAta yatkR^ityaM tachChR^iNuShva me. trayo hi samatikrAntAH pANDavAnAM mahArathAH.. 7-130-12 (50398) yAvatteShAM bhayaM pashchAttAvadeShAM puraHsaram. tadgarIyastaraM manye yatra kR^iShNadhana~njayau.. 7-130-13 (50399) sA purastAchcha pashchAchcha gR^ihItA bhAratI chamUH. tatra kR^ityamahaM manye saindhavasyAbhirakShaNam.. 7-130-14 (50400) sa no rakShyatamastAta kruddhAdbhIto dhana~njayAt. gatau cha saindhavaM bhImau yuyudhAnavR^ikodarau.. 7-130-15 (50401) samprAptaM tadidaM dyUtaM yattachChakunibuddhijam. na sabhAyAM jayo vR^itto nApi tatra parAjayaH. iha no glahamAnAnAmadya tAvajjayAjayau.. 7-130-16 (50402) yAnsma tAnglahate ghorA~nChakuniH kurusaMsadi. akShAnsa manyamAnaH prAksharAste hi durAsadAH.. 7-130-17 (50403) yatra te bahavastAta kauraveyA vyavasthitAH. sennAM durodaraM viddhi sharAnakShAnvishAmpate. glahaM cha saindhavaM rAjaMstatra dyUtasya nishchayaH.. 7-130-18 (50404) saindhave tu mahaddyUMta samAsaktaM paraiH saha. atra te dhruvamAyatto jayo vA.ajaya eva vA.. 7-130-19 (50405) atra sarve mahArAja tyaktvA jIvitamAtmanaH. saindhavasya raNe rakShAM vidhivatkartumarhatha. tatra no glahamAnAnAM dhruvau jayaparAjayau.. 7-130-20 (50406) yatra te parameShvAsA yattA rakShanti saindhavam. tatra gachCha svayaM shIghraM tAMshcha rakShasva rakShiNaH.. 7-130-21 (50407) ihaiva tvahamAsiShye preShayiShyAmi chAparAn. nirotsyAmi cha pA~nchAlAnsahitAnpANDusR^i~njayaiH.. 7-130-22 (50408) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-130-23x (4598) tato duryodhano.agachChattUrNamAchAryashAsanAt. udyamyAtmAnamugrAya karmaNe sa padAnugaH.. 7-130-23 (50409) chakrarakShau tu pA~nchAlyau yudhAmanyUttamaujasau. bAhyena senAmabhyetya jagmatuH savyasAchinam.. 7-130-24 (50410) yau tu pUrvaM mahArAja vAritau kR^itavarmaNA. praviShTe tvarjune rAjaMstava sainyaM yuyutsayA.. 7-130-25 (50411) pArshve bhittvA chamUM vIrau praviShTau tava vAhinIm. pArshvena sainyamAyAntau kururAjo dadarsha ha.. 7-130-26 (50412) tAbhyAM duryodhanaH sArdhamakarotsa~Nkhyamuttamam. tvaritastvaramANAbhyAM bhrAtR^ibhyAM bhArato balI.. 7-130-27 (50413) tAvenamabhyadravatAmubhAvudyatakArmukau. mahArathasamAkhyAtau kShatriyapravarau yudhi.. 7-130-28 (50414) tamavidhyadyudhAmanyustriMshatA ka~NkapatribhiH. viMshatyA sArathiM chAsya chaturbhishchaturo hayAn.. 7-130-29 (50415) duryodhano yudhAmanyordhvajamekeShuNA.achChinat. ekena kArmukaM chAsya chakarta tanayastava.. 7-130-30 (50416) sArathiM chAsya bhallena rathanIDAdapAharat. tato.avidhyachCharaistIkShNaishchaturbhishchaturo hayAn.. 7-130-31 (50417) yudhAmanyushcha sa~NkruddhaH sarAMstriMshatamAhave. vyasR^ijattava putrasya tvaramANaH stanAntare.. 7-130-32 (50418) tathottamaujAH sa~NkruddhaH sharairhemavibhUShitaiH. avidhyatsArathiM chAsya prAhiNodyamasAdanam.. 7-130-33 (50419) duryodhano.api rAjendra pA~nchAlyasyauttamaujasaH. jaghAna chaturo.asyAshchAnubhau tau pArShNisArathI.. 7-130-34 (50420) uttamaujA hatAshvastu hatasUtashcha saMyuge. Aruroha rathaM bhrAturyudhAmanyorabhitvaran.. 7-130-35 (50421) sa rathaM prApya taM bhrAturduryodhanahayA~nsharaiH. bahubhistADayAmAsa te hatAH prApatanbhuvi.. 7-130-36 (50422) hayeShu patiteShvasya chichCheda parameShuNA. yudhAmanyurdhanuH shIghraM sharAvApaM cha saMyuge. `avidhyatsArathiM chAsya prAhiNodyamasAdanam'.. 7-130-37 (50423) hatAshvasUtAtsarathAdavatIrya narAdhipaH. gadAmAdAya te putraH pA~nchalyAvabhyadhAvata.. 7-130-38 (50424) tamApatantaM samprekShya kruddhaM kurupatiM tadA. avaplutau rathopasthAdyudhAmanyUttamaujasau.. 7-130-39 (50425) tataH sa hemachitraM taM gadayA syandanaM gatI. sa~NkruddhaH pothayAmAsa sAshvasUtadhvajaM nR^ipa.. 7-130-40 (50426) `etadIdR^ishakaM putrastavAkArShIjjanAdhipa. gadayA gadinAM shreShThaH sarvalokamahArathaH'.. 7-130-41 (50427) bha~NktvA rathaM sa putraste hatAshvo hatasArathiH. madrarAjarathaM tUrNamAruroha parantapaH.. 7-130-42 (50428) pA~nchAlAnAM tato mukhyau rAjaputrau mahArathau. rathAvanyau samAruhya bIbhatsumabhijagmutaH.. .. 7-130-43 (50429) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe triMshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 130 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-130-17 tAnprasiddhAn yAnakShAn. akShAn manyamAnaH prAg glahatesma ityanvayaH.. 5-130-18 yatra sabhAyAma. dUrodaraM dyUtakAriNam.. 5-130-20 jayaparAjayau jayaH parAjayo vetyarthaH.. 5-130-130 triMshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 131

.. shrIH ..

7.131. adhyAyaH 131

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

bhImena karNasya parAjayaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-131-0 (50430) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-131-0x (4599) vartamAne mahArAja sa~NgrAme romaharShaNe. vyAkuleShu cha sarveShu pIDyamAneShu sarvashaH.. 7-131-1 (50431) rAdheyo bhImamAnarchCha yuddhAya bharatarShabha. yathA nAgo vane nAgaM matto mattamabhidravet.. 7-131-2 (50432) `tato vyAyachChatAmastraiH pR^ithakpR^ithagarindamau. mR^idupUrvaM cha rAdheyo dR^iDhapUrvaM cha pANDavaH'.. 7-131-3 (50433) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-131-4x (4600) yau tau karNashcha bhImashcha samprayuddhau mahAbalau. arjunasya rathopAnte kIdR^ishaH so.abhavadraNaH.. 7-131-4 (50434) pUrvaM hi nirjitaH karNo bhImasenena saMyuge. kathaM bhUyaH sa rAdheyo bhImamAgAnmahArathaH.. 7-131-5 (50435) bhImo vA sUtatanayaM pratyudyAtaH kathaM raNe. mahArathasamAkhyAtaM pR^ithivyAM pravaraM ratham.. 7-131-6 (50436) bhIShmadroNAvatikramya dharmarAjo yudhiShThiraH. nAnyato bhayamAdatta vinA karNAnmahArathAt.. 7-131-7 (50437) bhayAdyasya mahAbAho na shete bahulAH samAH. chintayannityasho vIryaM rAdheyasya mahAtmanaH. taM kathaM sUtaputraM tu bhImo.ayodhayatAhave.. 7-131-8 (50438) brahmaNyaM vIryasampannaM samareShvanivartinam. kathaM karNaM yudhAM shreShThaM yodhayAmAsa pANDavaH.. 7-131-9 (50439) yau tau samIyaturvIrau vaikartanavR^ikodarau. kathaM tAvatra yudhyetAM mahAbalaparAkramau.. 7-131-10 (50440) bhrAtR^itvaM darshitaM pUrvaM ghR^iNI chApi sa sUtajaH. kathaM bhImena yuyudhe kuntyA vAkyamanusmaran.. 7-131-11 (50441) bhImo vA sUtaputreNa smaranvairaM purA kR^itam. ayudhyata kathaM shUraH karNena saha saMyuge.. 7-131-12 (50442) AshAste cha sadA sUtaputre duryodhano mama. karNo jeShyati sa~NgrAme samastAnpANDavAniti.. 7-131-13 (50443) jayAshA yatra putrasya mama mandasya saMyuge. sa kathaM bhImakarmANaM bhImasenamayodhayat.. 7-131-14 (50444) yaM samAsAdya putrairme kR^itaM vairaM mahArathaiH. taM sUtatanayaM tAta kathaM bhImo hyayodhayat.. 7-131-15 (50445) anekAnviprakArAMshcha sUtaputrasamudbhavAn. smaramANaH kathaM bhImo yuyudhe sUtasUnunA.. 7-131-16 (50446) yo.ajayatpR^ithivIM sarvAM rathenaikena vIryavAn. taM sUtatanayaM yuddhe kathaM bhImo hyayodhayat.. 7-131-17 (50447) yo jAtaH kuNDalAbhyAM cha kavachena sahaiva cha. taM sUtaputraM samare bhImaH kathamayodhayat.. 7-131-18 (50448) `astrahetoH purA tAta bhArgavaM samapUjayat. tasya prasAdAdbrahmAstraM labdhavAMshcha bhR^igUttamAt'.. 7-131-19 (50449) yathA tayoryuddhamabhUdyashchAsIdvijayI tayoH. tanmamAchakShva tattvena kushalo hyasi sa~njaya.. 7-131-20 (50450) sa~nchaya uvAcha. 7-131-21x (4601) bhImasenastu rAdheyamutsR^ijya rathinAM varam. iyeSha gantuM yatrAstAM vIrau kR^iShNadhana~nchayau.. 7-131-21 (50451) taM prayAntamabhidrutya rAdheyaH ka~NkapatribhiH. abhyavarShanmahArAja megho vR^iShTyeva parvatam.. 7-131-22 (50452) phullatA pa~Nkajeneva vaktreNa vihasanbalI. AjuhAva raNe yAntaM bhImamAdhirathistadA.. 7-131-23 (50453) karNa uvAcha. bhImAhitaistava raNaH svapne.api na vibhAvitaH. 7-131-24 (50454) taddarshayasi kasmAnme pR^iShThaM pArthadidR^ikShayA.. kuntyAH putrasya sadR^ishaM nedaM pANDavanandana. 7-131-25 (50455) tena mAmabhitaH sthitvA sharavarShairavAkira.. 7-131-26 (50456) sa~njaya uvAcha. bhImasenastadAhvAnaM karNAnnAmarShayadyudhi. ardhamaNDalamAvR^itya sUtaputramayodhayat.. 7-131-26x (4602) avakragAmibhirbANairabhyavarShanmahAyashAH. daMshitaM dvairathe yattaM sarvashastravishAradam.. 7-131-27 (50457) vidhitsuH kalahasyAntaM jighAMsuH karNamakShiNot.. 7-131-28 (50458) hatvA tasyAnugAMstaM cha hantukAmo mahAbalaH. tasmai vyasR^ijadugrANi vividhAni parantapaH. amarShAtpANDavaH kruddhaH sharavarShANi mAriSha.. 7-131-29 (50459) tasya tAnIShuvarShANi mattadviradagAminaH. sUtaputro.astramAyAbhiragrasatparamAstravit.. 7-131-30 (50460) sa yathAvanmahAbAhurvidyayA vai supUjitaH. AchAryavanmaheShvAsaH karNaH paryacharadbalI.. 7-131-31 (50461) yudhyamAnaM tu saMrambhAdbhImasenaM hasanniva. abhyapadyata kaunteyaM karNo rAjanvR^ikodaram.. 7-131-32 (50462) tannAmR^iShyata kaunteyaH karNasya smitamAhave. yudhyamAneShu vIreShu pashyatsu cha samantataH.. 7-131-33 (50463) taM bhImasenaH sa~NgrAptaM vatsadantaiH stanAntare. vivyAdha balavAnkruddhastotrairiva mahAdvipam.. 7-131-34 (50464) punashcha sUtaputraM tu svarNapu~NkhaiH shilAshitaiH. sumuktaishchitravarmANaM nirbibheda trisaptabhiH.. 7-131-35 (50465) karNo jAmbUnadairjAlaiH sa~nChannAnvAtaraMhasaH. hayAnvivyAdha bhImasya pa~nchabhiH pa~nchabhiH sharaiH.. 7-131-36 (50466) tato bANamayaM jalaM bhImasenarathaM prati. karNena vihitaM rAjannimeShArdhAdadR^ishyata.. 7-131-37 (50467) sarathaH sadhvajastatra sasUtaH pANDavastadA. prAchChAdyata mahArAja karNachApachyutaiH sharaiH.. 7-131-38 (50468) tasya karNashchatuHShaShTyA vyadhamatkavachaM dR^iDham. kruddhashchApyahanatpArthaM nArAchairmarmabhedibhiH.. 7-131-39 (50469) tato.achintya mahAbAhuH karNakArmukaniHsR^itAn. samAshliShyadasambhrAntaH sUtaputraM vR^ikodaraH.. 7-131-40 (50470) sa karNachApaprabhavAniShUnAshIviShopamAn. bibhradbhImo mahArAja na jagAma vyathAM raNe.. 7-131-41 (50471) tato dvAtriMshatA bhallairnishitaistigmatejanaiH. vivyAdha samare karNaM bhImasenaH pratApavAn.. 7-131-42 (50472) ayatnenaiva taM karNaH sharairbhR^ishamavAkirat. bhImasenaM mahAbAhuM saindhavasya vadhaiShiNam.. 7-131-43 (50473) mR^idupUrvaM tu rAdheyo bhImamAjAvayodhayat. krodhapUrvaM tathA bhImaH pUrvavairamanusmaran.. 7-131-44 (50474) taM bhImaseno nAmR^iShyadavamAnamamarShaNaH. sa tasmai vyasR^ijattUrNaM sharavarShamamitrahA.. 7-131-45 (50475) te sharAH preShitAstena bhImasenena saMyuge. nipetuH sarvato vIre kUjanta iva pakShiNaH.. 7-131-46 (50476) hemapu~NkhA mahAvegA bhImasenadhanushchyutAH. prAchChAdayaMste rAdheyaM shalabhA iva pAvakam.. 7-131-47 (50477) karNastu rathinAM shreShThashChAdyamAnaH samantataH. rAjanvyasR^ijadugrANi sharavarShANi bhArata.. 7-131-48 (50478) tasya tAnashaniprakhyAniShUnsamarashobhinaH. chichCheda bahubhirbhallairasamprAptAnvR^ikodaraH.. 7-131-49 (50479) punashcha sharavarSheNa chChAdayAmAsa bhArata. karNo vaikartano yuddhe bhImasenamarindamaH.. 7-131-50 (50480) tatra bhArata bhImaM tu dR^iShTavantaH sma sAyakaiH. samAchitatanuM sa~Nkhye shvAvidhaM shalalairiva.. 7-131-51 (50481) hemapu~NkhA~nChilAdhautAnkarNachApachyutA~nCharAn. dadhAra samare vIraH svarashmIniva rashmimAn'.. 7-131-52 (50482) rudhirokShitasarvA~Ngo bhImaseno vyarAjata. samR^iddhakusumApIDo vasante.ashokavR^ikShavat.. 7-131-53 (50483) tattu bhImo mahAbAhoH karNasya charitaM raNe. nAmR^iShyata mahAbAhuH krodhAdudvR^ittalochanaH.. 7-131-54 (50484) sa karNaM pa~nchaviMshatyA nArAchAnAM samArpayat. mahIdharamiva shvetaM gUDhapAdairviSholbaNaiH.. 7-131-55 (50485) punareva cha vivyAdha Sha~NbhiraShTAbhireva cha. marmasvamaravikrAntaH sUtaputraM tanutyajam.. 7-131-56 (50486) punaranyena bANena bhImasenaH pratApavAn. chichCheda kArmukaM tUrNaM karNasya prahasanniva.. 7-131-57 (50487) jaghAna chaturashchAshvAnsUtaM cha tvaritaH sharaiH. nArAchairarkarashmyAbhaiH karNaM vivyAdha chorasi.. 7-131-58 (50488) te jagmurdharaNImAshu karNaM nirbhidya patriNaH. yathA jaladharaM bhittvA divAkaramarIchayaH.. 7-131-59 (50489) sa vaiklavyaM mahatprApya chChinnadhanvA sharAhataH. tathA puruShamAnI sa lajjAmutsR^ijya bhArata. bhImasenabhayAtkarNaH pratyapAyAdrathAntaram.. .. 7-131-60 (50490) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe ekatriMshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 131 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-131-11 pUrvamudyoge darshitamudbhAvivaM bhrAtUtvaM kuntyA vAkyaM cha chaturNamavadhyatvalakShaNaM chAnusmarannityanvayaH.. 5-131-25 abhitaH sammukhe.. 5-131-131 ekatriMshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 132

.. shrIH ..

7.132. adhyAyaH 132

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

bhImakarNayoryuddham.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-132-0 (50491) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-132-0x (4603) [svayaM shiShyo maheshasya bhR^igUttamadhanurdharaH. shiShyatvaM prAptavAnkarNastasya tulyo.astravidyayA.. 7-132-1 (50492) tadvishiShTo.api vA karNaH shiShyaH shiShyaguNairyutaH. kuntIputreNa bhImena nirjitaH sa tu lIlayA..] 7-132-2 (50493) yasmi~njayAshA mahatI putrANAM mama sa~njaya. taM bhImAdvimukhaM dR^iShTvA kinnu duryodhano.abravIt.. 7-132-3 (50494) kathaM cha yuyudhe bhImo vIryashlAghI mahAbalaH.. 7-132-4 (50495) karNo vA samare tAta kimakArShIdataH param. bhImasenaM raNe dR^iShTvA jvalantamiva pAvakam.. 7-132-5 (50496) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-132-6x (4604) rathamanyaM samAsthAya vidhivatkalpitaM punaH. abhyayAtpANDavaM karNo vAtoddhUta ivArNavaH.. 7-132-6 (50497) kruddhamAdhirathiM dR^iShTvA putrAstava vishAmpate. bhImasenamamanyanta vaishvAnaramukhe hutam.. 7-132-7 (50498) chApashabdaM tataH kR^itvA talashabdaM cha bhairavam. abhyadravata rAdheyo bhImasenarathaM prati.. 7-132-8 (50499) punareva tayo rAjanghora AsItsamAgamaH. vaikartanasya shUrasya bhImasya cha mahAtmanaH.. 7-132-9 (50500) saMrabdhau hi mahAbAhU parasparavadhaiShiNau. anyonyabhIkShA~nchakrAte dahantAviva lochanaiH.. 7-132-10 (50501) krodharakrekShaNau tIvrau niHshvasantAvivoragau. shUrAvanyonyamAsAdya tatakShaturarindamau.. 7-132-11 (50502) vyAghrAviva susaMrabdhau shyenAviva cha shIghragau. sharabhAviva sa~Nkruddhau yuyudhAte parasparam.. 7-132-12 (50503) tato bhImaH smarankleshAnakShadyUte vane.api cha. virATanagare chaiva duHkhaM prAptamarindamaH.. 7-132-13 (50504) rAShTrANAM sphItaratnAnAM haraNaM cha tavAtmajaiH. satataM cha parikleshAnsaputreNa tvayA kR^itAn.. 7-132-14 (50505) dagdhumaichChashcha yaH kuntIM saputrAM tvamanAgasam. kR^iShNAyAshcha parikleshaM sabhAmadhye durAtmabhiH.. 7-132-15 (50506) keshapakShagrahaM chaiva duHshAsanakR^itaM tathA. paruShANi cha vAkyAni karNonoktAni bhArata.. 7-132-16 (50507) patimanyaM parIpsasva na santi patayastava. patitA narake pArthAH sarve ShaNDatilopamAH.. 7-132-17 (50508) samakShaM tava kauravya yadUchuH kauravAstadA. dAsIbhAvena kR^iShNAM cha bhoktukAmAH sutAstava.. 7-132-18 (50509) yachchApi tAnpravrajataH kR^iShNAjinanivAsinaH. paruShANyuktavAnkarNaH sabhAyAM sannidhau tava.. 7-132-19 (50510) tR^iNIkR^itya cha yatpArthAMstava putro vavalga ha. viShamasthAnsamastho hi saMrabdho gatachetanaH.. 7-132-20 (50511) bAlyAtprabhR^iti chArighnaH svAni duHkhAni chintayan. niravidyata dharmAtmA jIvitena vR^ikodaraH.. 7-132-21 (50512) tato viShphArya sumahaddhemapR^iShThaM durAsadam. chApaM bharatashArdUlastyaktAtmA karNamabhyayAt.. 7-132-22 (50513) sa sAyakayairjAlairbhImaH karNarathaM prati. bhAnumadbhiH shilAdhautairbhAnoH prAchChAdayatprabhAM 7-132-23 (50514) tataH prahasyAdhirathistUrNamasya~nshitA~nsharAn. vyadhamadbhImasenasya sharajAlAni patribhiH.. 7-132-24 (50515) mahAratho mahAbAhurmahAbANairmahAbalaH. vivyAdhAdhirathirbhImaM navabhirnishitaistadA.. 7-132-25 (50516) sa totrairiva mAta~Ngo vAryamANaH patattribhaH. abhyadhAvadasambhrAntaH sUtaputraM vR^ikodaraH.. 7-132-26 (50517) tamApatantaM vegena rabhasaM pANDavarShabham. karNaH pratyudyayau yuddhe matto mattamiva dvipam.. 7-132-27 (50518) tataH pradhyApya jalajaM bherIshatasamasvanam. akShubhyata balaM harShAduddhUta iva sAgaraH.. 7-132-28 (50519) taduddhUtaM balaM dR^iShTvA nAgAshvarathapattimat. bhImaH karNaM samAsAdya chChAdayAmAsa sAyakaiH.. 7-132-29 (50520) ashvAnR^ikShasavarNAMshcha haMsavarNairhayottamaiH. vyAmishrayadraNe karNaH pANDavaM ChAdaya~nCharaiH.. 7-132-30 (50521) R^ikShavarNAnhayAnkarkairmishrAnmArutaraMhasaH. nirIkShya tava putrANAM hAhAkR^itamabhUdbalam.. 7-132-31 (50522) te hayA bahvashobhanta mishritA vAtaraMhasaH. sitAsitA mahArAja yathA vyomni valAhakAH.. 7-132-32 (50523) saMrabdhau krodhatAmrAkShau prekShya karNavR^ikodarau. santrastAH samakampanta tvadIyAnAM mahArathAH.. 7-132-33 (50524) yamarAShTropamaM ghoramAsIdAyodhanaM tayoH. durdarshaM bharatashreShTha pretarAjaputraM yathA.. 7-132-34 (50525) samAjamiva tachchitraM prekShamANA mahArathAH. nAlakShaya~njayaM vyaktamekasyaiva mahAraNe.. 7-132-35 (50526) tayoH praikShanta sammardaM sannikR^iShTaM mahAstrayoH. tava durmantrite rAjansaputrasya vishAmpate.. 7-132-36 (50527) ChAdayantau hi shatrughnAvanyonyaM sAyakaiH shitaiH. sharajAlAvR^itaM vyoma chakrAte.adbhutavikramau.. 7-132-37 (50528) tAvanyonyaM jighAMsantau sharaistIkShNairmahArathau. prekShaNIyatarAvAstAM vR^iShTimantAvivAmbudau.. 7-132-38 (50529) suvarNavikR^itAnvANAnvimu~nchantAvarindamau. bhAsvaraM vyoma chakrAte maholkAbhiriva prabho.. 7-132-39 (50530) tAbhyAM muktAH sharA rAjangArdhrapatrAshchakAshire. shreNyaH sharadi mattAnAM sArasanAmivAmbare.. 7-132-40 (50531) saMsaktaM sUtaputreNa dR^iShTvA bhImamarindamam. atibhAramamanyetAM bhIme kR^iShNadhana~njayau.. 7-132-41 (50532) tatrAdhirathibhImAbhyAM sharairmuktairdR^iDhaM hatAH. iShupAtamatikramya peturashvanaradvipAH.. 7-132-42 (50533) patadbhiH patitaishchAnyairgatAsubhiranekashaH. kR^ito rAjanmahArAja putrANAM te janakShayaH.. 7-132-43 (50534) manupyAshvagajAnAM cha sharIrairgatajIvitaiH. kShaNena bhUmiH sa~njaj~ne saMvR^itA bharatarShabha.. .. 7-132-44 (50535) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe dvAtriMshadadhikarashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 132 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-132-1 kuNDalitau dvau shlokau jha. pustake eva vartete. bhR^igUttamadhanurdharo rAmaH.. 5-132-31 karkaiH shvetairashvaiH.. 5-132-35 samAjaM ra~NgaM. ekasyaiva kasyachit nAnyasya.. 5-132-132 dvAtriMshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 133

.. shrIH ..

7.133. adhyAyaH 133

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

bhImena karNasahakAriNo durjayasya vadhaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-133-0 (50536) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-133-0x (4605) atyadbhutamahaM manye bhImasenasya vikramam. yatkarNaM yodhayAmAsa samare laghuvikramaH.. 7-133-1 (50537) tridashAnapi vA yuktAnsarvashastradharAnyudhi. vArayedyo raNe karNaH sayakShAsuramAnuShAn.. 7-133-2 (50538) sa kathaM pANDavaM yuddhe bhrAjamAnamiva shriyA. nAtaratsaMyuge tAta tanmamAchakShva sa~njaya.. 7-133-3 (50539) kathaM cha yuddhaM sambhUtaM tayoH prANadurodare. atra manye samAyatto jayo vA.ajaya eva cha.. 7-133-4 (50540) karNaM prApya raNe sUta mama putraH suyodhanaH. jetumutsahate pArthAnsagovindAnsasAtvatAn.. 7-133-5 (50541) shrutvA tu nirjitaM karNamasakR^idbhImakarmaNA. bhImasenena samare moha AvishatIva mAm.. 7-133-6 (50542) vinaShTAnkauravAnmanye mama putrasya durnayaiH. nahi karNo maheShvAsAnpArthA~njeShyati sa~njaya.. 7-133-7 (50543) kR^itavAnyAni yuddhAni karNaH pANDusutaiH saha. sarvatra pANDavAH karNamajayaMste raNAjire.. 7-133-8 (50544) ajeyAH pANDavAstAta devairapi savAsavaiH. na cha tadbudhyate mandaH putro duryodhano mama.. 7-133-9 (50545) dhanaM dhaneshvarasyeva hR^itvA pArthasya me sutaH. madhuprepsurivAbuddhiH prapAtaM nAvabudhyate.. 7-133-10 (50546) nikR^ityA nikR^itipraj~no rAjyaM hR^itvA mahAtmanAm. jitamityeva manvAnaH pANDavAnavamanyate.. 7-133-11 (50547) putrasnehAbhibhUtena mayA chApyakR^itAtmanA. dharme sthitA mahAtmAno nikR^itAH pANDunandanAH.. 7-133-12 (50548) shamakAmaH sasodaryo dIrghaprekShI yudhiShThiraH. ashakta iti matvA tu mama putrairnirAkR^itaH.. 7-133-13 (50549) tAni duHkhAnyanekAni viprakArAMshcha sarvashaH. hR^idi kR^itvA mahAbAhurbhImo.ayudhyata sUtajam.. 7-133-14 (50550) tasmAnme sa~njaya brUhi karNabhImau yathA raNe. ayudhyetAM yudhAMshreShThau parasparavadhaiShiNau.. 7-133-15 (50551) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-133-16x (4606) shR^iNu rAjanyathAvR^ittaM sa~NgrAmaM karNabhImayoH. parasparavadhaprepsvorvanaku~njarayoriva.. 7-133-16 (50552) rAjanvaikartano bhImaM kruddhaH kruddhamarindamam. parAkrAntaM parAkramya vivyAdha triMshatA sharaiH.. 7-133-17 (50553) mahAvegaiH prasannAgraiH shAtakumbhapariShkR^itaiH. nAtaradbharatashreShTha bhImaM vaikartanaH sharaiH.. 7-133-18 (50554) tasyAsyato dhanurbhImashchakarta vishikhaistribhiH. rathanIDAchcha yantAraM bhallenApAtayatkShitau.. 7-133-19 (50555) sa kA~NkShanbhImasenasya vadhaM vaikartano bhR^isham. shaktiM kanakavaidUryachitradaNDAM parAmR^ishat.. 7-133-20 (50556) pragR^ihya cha mahAshaktiM kAlarAtrimivAparAm. samutkShipya cha rAdheyaH sandhAya cha mahAbalaH. chikShepa bhImasenAya jIvitAntakarImiva.. 7-133-21 (50557) shaktiM visR^ijya rAdheyaH purandara ivAshanim. nanAda sumahAnAdaM balavAnsUtanandanaH.. 7-133-22 (50558) taM cha nAdaM tataH shrutvA putrAste harShitA.abhavan.. 7-133-23 (50559) shaktiM viyati chichCheda bhImaH saptabhirAshugaiH.. 7-133-24 (50560) ChittvA shaktiM tato bhImo nirmuktoragasannibhAm. mArgamANAmiva prANAnsUtaputrasya mAriSha.. 7-133-25 (50561) prAhiNotkR^itasaMrambhaH sharAnbarhiNavAsasaH. svarNapu~NkhA~nshilAdhautAnyamadaNDopamAnmR^idhe.. 7-133-26 (50562) karNo.apyanyaddhanurgR^ihya hemapR^iShThaM durAsadam. vikR^iShya tanmahachchApaM vyasR^ijatsAyakAMstadA.. 7-133-27 (50563) tAnpANDuputrashchichCheda navabhirnataparvabhiH. vasuSheNena nirmuktAnnava rAjanmahAsharAn. ChittvA bhImo mahArAja nAdaM siMha ivAnadat.. 7-133-28 (50564) tau vR^iShAviva nardantau balinau vAsitAntare. shArdUlAviva chAnyonyamAmiShArthe.abhyagarjatAm.. 7-133-29 (50565) anyonyaM prajihIrShantAvanyonyasyAntaraiShiNau. anyonyamabhivIkShantau goShTheShviva maharShabhau.. 7-133-30 (50566) mahAgajAvivasAdya viShANAgraiH parasparam. sharaiH pUrNAyatotsR^iShTairanyonyamabhijaghnatuH.. 7-133-31 (50567) nirdahantau mahArAja shastravR^iShTyA parasparam. anyonyamabhivIkShantau kopAdvivR^italochanau.. 7-133-32 (50568) prahasantau tathA.anyonyaM bhartsayantau muhurmuhuH. sha~NkhashabdaM cha kurvANau yuyudhAte parasparam.. 7-133-33 (50569) tasya bhImaH punashchApaM muShTau chichCheda mAriSha. sha~NkhavarNAMshcha tAnashvAnbANairninye yamakShayam. sArathiM cha tathApyasya rathanIDAdapAtayat.. 7-133-34 (50570) tato vaikartanaH karNashchintAM prApa duratyayAm. sa chChAdyamAnaH samare hatAshvo hatasArathiH. mohitaH sharajAlena kartavyaM nAbhyapadyata.. 7-133-35 (50571) tathA kR^ichChragataM dR^iShTvA karNaM duryodhano nR^ipaH. vepamAna iva krodhAdvyAdideshAtha durjayam.. 7-133-36 (50572) gachCha durjaya rAdheyaM purA grasati pANDavaH. jahi tUbarakaM kShipraM karNasya balamAdadhat.. 7-133-37 (50573) evamuktastathetyuktvA tava putraM tavAtmajaH. abhyadravadbhImasenaM vyAsaktaM vikira~nCharaiH.. 7-133-38 (50574) sa bhImaM navabhirbANairashvAnaShTabhirArdayat. Sha~NbhiH sUtaM tribhiH ketaM punastaM chApi saptabhiH.. 7-133-39 (50575) bhImaseno.api sa~NkruddhaH sAshvayantAramAshugaiH. durjayaM bhinnamarmANamanayadyamasAdanam.. 7-133-40 (50576) bADhaM hataM kShitau kShuNNaM veShTamAnaM yathoragam. rudannArtastava sutaM karNashchakre pradakShiNam.. 7-133-41 (50577) sa tu taM virathaM kR^itvA smayannatyantavairiNam. samAchinodbANagaNaiH shataghnIbhishcha sha~NkubhiH.. 7-133-42 (50578) tathApyatirathaH karNo bhidyamAno.asya sAyakaiH. na jahau samare bhImaM kruddharUpaM parantapaH.. .. 7-133-43 (50579) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe trayastriMshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 133 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-133-4 prANadurodare prANadyute.. 5-133-133 trayastriMshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 134

.. shrIH ..

7.134. adhyAyaH 134

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

bhImena parAjitasya karNasya palAyanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-134-0 (50580) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-134-0x (4607) sarvathA virathaH karNaH punarbhImena nirjitaH. rathamanyaM samAsthAya punarvivyAdha pANDavam.. 7-134-1 (50581) mahAgajAvivAsAdya viShANAgraiH parasparam. sharaiH pUrNAyatotsR^iShTairanyonyamabhijaghnatuH.. 7-134-2 (50582) atha karNaH sharavrAtairbhImasenaM samArpayat. nanAda cha mahAnAdaM punarvivyAdha chorasi.. 7-134-3 (50583) taM bhImo dashabhirbANaiH pratyavidhyadajihmagaiH. punarvivyAdha saptatyA sharANAM nataparvaNAm.. 7-134-4 (50584) karNastu navabhirbhImaM bhittvA rAjaMstanAntare. dhvajamekena vivyAdha vishokaM cha tribhiH sharaiH.. 7-134-5 (50585) sAyakAnAM tataH pArthastriShaShTyA pratyavidhyata. totrairiva mahAnAgaM kashAbhiriva vAjinam.. 7-134-6 (50586) so.atividdho mahArAja pANDavena yashasvinA. sR^ikviNI lelihanvIraH krodharaktAntalochanaH.. 7-134-7 (50587) tataH sharaM mahArAja sarvakAyAvadAraNam. prAhiNodbhImasenAya balAyendra ivAshanim.. 7-134-8 (50588) sa nirbhidya raNe pArthaM sUtaputradhanushchyutaH. agachChaddArayanbhUmiM chitrapu~NkhaH shilImukhaH.. 7-134-9 (50589) tato bhImo mahAbAhuH krodhasaMraktalochanaH. vajrakalpAM chatuShkiShkuM gurvI rukmA~NgadAM gadAm. prAhiNotmUtaputrAya ShaDasrAmavichArayan.. 7-134-10 (50590) tayA jaghAnAdhiratheH sadashvAnsAdhuvAhinaH. gadayA bhArataH kruddho vajreNendra ivAsurAn.. 7-134-11 (50591) tato bhImo mahAbAhuH kShurAbhyAM bharatarShabha. dhvajamAghiratheshChittvA sUtamabhyahanachCharaiH.. 7-134-12 (50592) hatAshvasUtamutsR^ijya sa rathaM patitadhvajam. viShphArayandhanuH karNastasthau bhArata durmanAH.. 7-134-13 (50593) tatrAdbhutamapashyAma rAdheyasya parAkramam. viratho rathinAM shreShTho vArayAmAsa yadripum.. 7-134-14 (50594) virathaM taM narashreShThaM dR^iShTvA.a.adhirathimAhave. duryodhanastato rAjannabhyabhAShata durmukham.. 7-134-15 (50595) eSha durmukha rAdheyo bhImena virathIkR^itaH. taM rathena narashreShTha sampAdaya mahAratham.. 7-134-16 (50596) tato duryodhanavachaH shrutvA bhArata durmukhaH. tvaramANo.abhyayAtkarNaM bhImaM chAvArayachCharaiH.. 7-134-17 (50597) durmukhaM prekShya sa~NgrAme sUtaputrapadAnugam. vAyuputraH prahR^iShTo.abhUtsR^ikviNI parisaMlihan.. 7-134-18 (50598) tataH karNaM mahArAja vArayitvA shilImukhaiH. durmukhAya rathaM tUrNaM preShayAmAsa pANDavaH.. 7-134-19 (50599) tasminkShaNe mahArAja navabhirnataparvabhiH. sumukhairdurmukhaM bhImaH sharairninye yamakShayam.. 7-134-20 (50600) tatastamevAdhirathiH syandanaM durmukhe hate. AsthitaH prababhau rAjandIpyamAna ivAMshumAn.. 7-134-21 (50601) shayAnaM bhinnamarmANaM durmukhaM shoNitokShitam. dR^iShTvA karNo.ashrupUrNAkSho muhUrtaM nAbhyavartata.. 7-134-22 (50602) taM gatAsumatikramya kR^itvA karNaH pradakShiNam. dIrghamuShNaM shvasanvIro na ki~nchitpratyapadyata.. 7-134-23 (50603) tasmiMstu vivare rAjannArAchAngArdhavAsasaH. prAhiNotsUtaputrAya bhImasenashchaturdasha.. 7-134-24 (50604) te tasya kavachaM bhittvA svarNachitraM mahojasaH. hemapu~NkhA mahArAja vyashobhanta disho dasha.. 7-134-25 (50605) apibansUta putrasya shoNitaM raktabhojanAH. kruddhA iva manuShyendra bhuja~NgAH kAlachoditAH.. 7-134-26 (50606) prasarpamANA medinyAM te vyarochanta mArgaNAH. ardhapraviShTAH saMrabdhA bilAnIva mahoragAH.. 7-134-27 (50607) taM pratyavidhyadrAdheyo jAmbUnadavibhUShitaiH. chaturdashabhiratyugrairnArAchairavichArayan.. 7-134-28 (50608) te bhImasenasya bhujaM savyaM nirbhidya patriNaH. prAvishanmedinIM bhImAH krau~nchaM patrarathA iva.. 7-134-29 (50609) te vyarochanta nArAchAH pravishanto vasundharAm. gachChatyastaM dinakare dIpyamAnA ivAMshavaH.. 7-134-30 (50610) sa nirbhinno raNe bhImo nArAchairmarmabhedibhiH. susrAva rudhiraM bhUri parvataH salilaM yathA.. 7-134-31 (50611) sa bhImastribhirAyastaH sUtaputraM patatribhiH. suparNavegairvivyAdha sArathiM chAsya saptabhiH.. 7-134-32 (50612) sa vihvalo mahArAja karNo bhImasharAhataH. prAdravajjavanairashvai raNaM hitvA mahAbhayAt.. 7-134-33 (50613) bhImasenastu viShphArya chApaM hemapariShkR^itam. Ahave.atiratho.atiShThajjvalanniva hutAshanaH.. .. 7-134-34 (50614) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe chatustriMshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 134 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-134-10 tataH shaikyAM chatuShkiShkuM iti ka.kha.~Na.pAThaH.. 5-134-32 suShThu parNAnAM patrANAM vego yeShAm.. 32 .. 5-134-134 chatustriMshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 135

.. shrIH ..

7.135. adhyAyaH 135

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

bhImena durmarShaNAdiduryodhanAnujAnAM pa~nchAnAM hananam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-135-0 (50615) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-135-0x (4608) daivameva paraM manye dhikpauruShamanarthakam. yatrAdhirathirAyattau nAtaratpANDavaM raNe.. 7-135-1 (50616) karNaH pArthAnsagovindA~njetumutsahate raNe. na cha karNasamaM loke pashyAmi ka~nchana. iti duryodhanasyAhamashrauShaM jalpato muhuH.. 7-135-2 (50617) karNo hi balavA~nChUro dR^iDhadhanvA jitaklamaH. iti mAmabravItsUta mando duryodhanaH purA.. 7-135-3 (50618) vasuSheNasahAyaM mAM nAlaM devA.api saMyuge. kiM nu pANDusutA rAjangatasatvA vichetasaH.. 7-135-4 (50619) tatra taM nirjitaM dR^iShTvA bhuja~Ngamiva nirviSham. yuddhAtkarNamapakrAntaM kiMsvidduryodhano.abravIt.. 7-135-5 (50620) aho durmukhamevaikaM yuddhAnAmavishAradam. prAveshayaddhutavahaM pata~Ngamiva mohitaH.. 7-135-6 (50621) ashvatthAmA madrarAjaH kR^ipaH karNashcha sa~NgatAH. na shaktyAH pramukhe sthAtuM nUnaM bhImasya sa~njaya.. 7-135-7 (50622) te.api chAsya mahAghoraM balaM nAgAyutopamam. jAnanto vyavasAyaM cha krUraM mArutatejasaH.. 7-135-8 (50623) kimarthaM krUrakarmANaM yamakAlAntakopamam. balasaMrambhavIryaj~nAH kopayiShyanti saMyuge.. 7-135-9 (50624) karNastveko mahAbAhuH svabAhubaladarpitam. bhImasenamanAdR^itya raNe.ayudhyata sUtajaH.. 7-135-10 (50625) yo.ajayatsamare karNaM purandara ivAsuram. na sa pANDusuto jetuM shakyaH kenachidAhave.. 7-135-11 (50626) droNaM yaH sampramathyaikaH praviShTo mama vAhinIm. bhImo dhana~njayAnveShI kastamArchChejjijIviShu.. 7-135-12 (50627) ko hi sa~njaya bhImasya sthAtumutsahate.agrataH. udyatAshanihastasya mahendrasyeva dAnavaH.. 7-135-13 (50628) pretarAjapuraM prApya nivartetApi mAnavaH. na bhImasenaM samprApya nivarteta kadAchana.. 7-135-14 (50629) pata~NgA iva vahniM te prAvishannalpachetasaH. ye bhImasenaM sa~NkruddhamanvadhAvanvimohitAH.. 7-135-15 (50630) yattatsabhAyAM bhImena mama putravadhAshrayam. uktaM saMrambhiNogreNa kurUNAM shR^iNvatAM tadA.. 7-135-16 (50631) tannUnamabhisa~nchintya dR^iShTvA karNaM cha nirjitam. duHshAsanaH saha bhrAtrA bhayAdbhImAdupAramat.. 7-135-17 (50632) yashcha sa~njaya durbuddhirabravItsamitau muhuH. karNo duHshAsano.ahaM cha jeShyAmo yudhi pANDavAn.. 7-135-18 (50633) sa nUnaM virathaM dR^iShTvA karNaM bhImena nirjitam. pratyAkhyAnAchcha kR^iShNasya bhR^ishaM tapyati putrakaH.. 7-135-19 (50634) dR^iShTvA bhrAtR^InhatAnsa~Nkhye bhImasenena daMshitAn. AtmAparAdhAtsammUDho nUnaM tapyati putrakaH.. 7-135-20 (50635) ko hi jIvitamanvichChanpratIpaM pANDavaM vrajet. bhImaM bhImAyudhaM kruddhaM sAkShAtkAlamiva sthitam.. 7-135-21 (50636) baDabAmukhamadhyastho muchyetApi hi mAnavaH. na bhImamukhasamprApto muchyediti matirmama.. 7-135-22 (50637) na pArthA na cha pa~nchAlA na cha keshavasAtyakI. jAnate yudhi saMrabdhA jIvitaM parirakShitum.. 7-135-23 (50638) aho mama sutAnAM hi vipannaM sUta jIvitam.. 7-135-24 (50639) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-135-25x (4609) yastvaM shochasi kauravya vartamAne mahAbhaye. tvamasya jagato mUlaM vinAshasya na saMshayaH.. 7-135-25 (50640) svayaM vairaM mahatkR^itvA putrANAM vachane sthitaH. uchyamAno na gR^ihNIShe martyaH pathyamivauShadham.. 7-135-26 (50641) svayaM pItvA mahArAja kAlakUTaM sudurjaram. tasyedAnIM phalaM kR^itsnamavApnuhi narottama.. 7-135-27 (50642) yattu kutsayase yodhAnyudhyamAnAnmahAbalAn. tatra te vartayiShyAmi yathA yuddhamavartata.. 7-135-28 (50643) dR^iShTvA karNaM tu putrAste bhImasenaparAjitam. nAmR^iShyanta maheShvAsAH sodaryAH pa~ncha bhArata.. 7-135-29 (50644) durmarShaNo duHsahashcha durmado durdharo jayaH. pANDavaM chitrasannAhAstaM pratIpamupAdravan.. 7-135-30 (50645) te samantAnmahAbAhuM parivArya vR^ikodaram. dishaH sharaiH samAvR^iNva~nshalabhAnAmiva vrajaiH.. 7-135-31 (50646) AgachChatastAnsahasA kumArAndevarUpiNaH. pratijagrAha samare bhImaseno hasanniva.. 7-135-32 (50647) tava dR^iShTvA tu tanayAndurmarShaNapurogamAn. abhyavartata rAdheyo bhImasenaM mahAbalam.. 7-135-33 (50648) visR^ijanvishikhAMstIkShNAnsvarNapu~NkhAM~nChilAshitAn. taM tu bhImo.abhyayAttUrNaM vAryamANaH sutaistava.. 7-135-34 (50649) kuravastu tataH karNaM parivArya samantataH. avAkiranbhImasenaM sharaiH sannataparvabhiH.. 7-135-35 (50650) tAnbANaiH pa~nchaviMshatyA sAshvAnrAjannararShabhAn. sasUtAnbhImadhanuSho bhImo ninye yamakShayam.. 7-135-36 (50651) prApatansyandanebhyaste sArdhaM sUtairgatAsavaH. chitrapuShpadharA bhagnA vAteneva mahAdrumAH.. 7-135-37 (50652) tatrAdbhutamapashyAma bhImasenasya vikramam. saMvAryAdhirathiM bANairyajjaghAna tavAtmajAn.. 7-135-38 (50653) sa vAryamANo bhImena shitairbANaiH samantataH. sUtaputro mahArAja bhImasenamavaikShata.. 7-135-39 (50654) taM bhIsasenaH saMrambhAtkrodhasaMraktalochanaH. viShphArya sumahachchApaM muhuH karNamavaikShata.. .. 7-135-40 (50655) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe pa~nchatriMshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 135 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-135-9 yamaH saMyamanavyApAraH kAlaH kalanavyAparaH antako mAraNavyApAraH tadupamam.. 5-135-135 pa~nchatriMshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 136

.. shrIH ..

7.136. adhyAyaH 136

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

bhImena chitropachitrAdiduryodhanAnujavadhaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-136-0 (50656) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-136-0x (4610) tavAtmajAMstu patitAndR^iShTvA karNaH pratApavAn. krodhena mahatA.a.aviShTo nirviNNo.abhUtsa jIvito.. 7-136-1 (50657) AgaskR^itamivAtmAnaM mene chAdhirathistadA. yatpratyakShaM tava sutA bhImena nihatA raNe.. 7-136-2 (50658) bhImasenastataH kruddhaH karNasya nishitA~nsharAn. nichakhAn sa sambhrAntaH pUrvavairamanusmaran.. 7-136-3 (50659) sa bhImaM pa~nchabhirviddhvA rAdheyaH prahasanniva. punarvivyAdha saptatyA svarNapu~NkhaiH shilAshitaiH.. 7-136-4 (50660) avichintyAtha tAnbANAnkarNenAstAnvR^ikodaraH. raNe vivyAdha rAdheyaM shareNAnataparvaNA.. 7-136-5 (50661) punashcha vishikhaistIkShNairviddhvA marmasu pa~nchabhiH. dhanushchichCheda bhallena sUta putrasya mAriSha.. 7-136-6 (50662) athAnyaddhanurAdAya karNo bhArata durmanAH. iShubhishChAdayAmAsa mImasenaM parantapaH.. 7-136-7 (50663) tasya bhImo hayAnhatvA vinihatya cha sArathim. prajahAsa mahAhAsaM kR^itapratikR^itaM mahat.. 7-136-8 (50664) iShubhiH kArmukaM chAsya chakarta puruSharShabhaH. tatpapAta mahArAja svarNapR^iShThaM mahAsvanam.. 7-136-9 (50665) avArohadrathAttasmAdatha karNo mahArathaH. gadAM gR^ihItvA samare bhImAya prAhiNodruShA.. 7-136-10 (50666) tAmApatantImAlakShya bhImaseno mahAgadAm. sharairavArayadrAjansarvasainyasya pashyataH.. 7-136-11 (50667) tato bANasahasrANi preShayAmAsa pANDavaH. sUtaputravadhAkA~NkShI tvaramANaH parAkramI.. 7-136-12 (50668) tAniShUniShubhiH karNo vArayitvA mahAmR^idhe. kavachaM bhImasenasya pATayAmAsa sAyakaiH.. 7-136-13 (50669) athainaM pa~nchaviMshatyA nArAchAnAM samArpayat. pashyatAM sarvasainyAnAM tadadbhutamivAbhavat.. 7-136-14 (50670) tato bhImo mahAbAhurnavabhirnataparvabhiH. preShayAmAsa sa~NkruddhaH sUtaputrasya mAriSha.. 7-136-15 (50671) te tasya kavachaM bhittvA tathA bAhuM cha dakShiNam. abhyayurdharaNIM tIkShNA valmIkamiva pannagAH.. 7-136-16 (50672) sa chChAdyamAno bANaudhairbhImasenadhanushchyutaiH. punarevAbhavatkarNo bhImasenAtparA~NmukhaH.. 7-136-17 (50673) taM parA~NmukhamAlokya padAtiM sUtanandanam. kaunteyasharasa~nChannaM rAjA duryodhano.abravIt.. 7-136-18 (50674) tvaradhvaM sarvato yattA rAdheyasya rathaM prati. tatastava sutA rAja~nshrutvA bhrAturvacho drutam.. 7-136-19 (50675) abhyayuH pANDavaM yuddhe visR^ijantaH shilImukhAn. chitropachitrashchitrAkShashchAruchitraH sharAsanaH.. 7-136-20 (50676) chitrAyudhashchitravarmA samare chitrayodhinaH. tAnApatata evAshu bhImaseno mahArathaH.. 7-136-21 (50677) ekaikena shareNAjau pAtayAmAsa te sutAn. te hatA nyapatanbhUmau vAtarUgNA iva drumAH.. 7-136-22 (50678) dR^iShTvA vinihatAnputrAMstava rAjanmahArathAn. ashrupUrNamukhaH karNaH kShattuH sasmAra tadvachaH.. 7-136-23 (50679) rathaM chAnyaM samAsthAya vidhivatkalpitaM punaH. abhyayAtpANDavaM yuddhe tvaramANaH parAkramI.. 7-136-24 (50680) tAvanyonyaM sharairbhittvA svarNapu~NkhaiH shilAshitaiH. vyabhrAjetAM yathA meghau saMsyUtau sUryarashmibhiH.. 7-136-25 (50681) ShaTtriMshadbhistato bhallairnishitaistigmatejanaiH. vyadhamatkavanaM kruddhaH sUtaputrasya pANDavaH.. 7-136-26 (50682) sUtaputro.api kaunteyaM sharaiH sannataparvabhiH. pa~nchAshatA mahAbAhurvivyAdha bharatarShabha.. 7-136-27 (50683) raktachandanadigdhA~Ngau sharaiH kR^itamahAvraNau. shoNitAktau vyarAjetAM kAlasUryAvivoditau.. 7-136-28 (50684) tau shoNitokShitairgAtraiH sharaishChinnatanuchChadau. vivR^itA~Ngau vyarAjetAM nirmuktAviva pannagau.. 7-136-29 (50685) `krodhAgnitejasA diptau saMrambhAdraktalochanau. vyabhrAjetAM mahArAja vidhUmAviva pAvakau'.. 7-136-30 (50686) vyAghrAviva naravyAghrau daMShTrAbhiritaretaram. sharadhArAsR^ijau vIrau meghAviva vavarShatuH.. 7-136-31 (50687) vAraNAviva chAnyonyaM viShANAbhyAmarindamau. nirbhindantau svagAtrANi sAyakaishchAru rejatuH.. 7-136-32 (50688) nAdayantau praharShantau vikrIDantau parasparam. maNDalAni vikurvANau rathAbhyAM rathiShUttamau.. 7-136-33 (50689) vR^iShAvivAtha nardantau balinau vAsitAntare. siMhAviva parAkrAntau narasiMhau mahAbalau.. 7-136-34 (50690) parasparaM vIkShamANau krodhasaMraktalochanau. yuyudhAte mahAvIryau shakravairochanI yathA.. 7-136-35 (50691) tato bhImo mahAbAhurbAhubhyAM vikShipandhanuH. vyarAjata raNe rAjansavidyudiva toyadaH.. 7-136-36 (50692) sanemighoShastanitashchApavidyuchCharAmbubhiH. bhImasenamahAmeghaH karNaparvatamAvR^iNot.. 7-136-37 (50693) tataH sharasahasreNa samyagastena bhArata. pANDavo vyakiratkarNaM bhImo bhImaparAkramaH.. 7-136-38 (50694) tatrApashyaMstava sutA bhImasenasya vikramam. supu~NkhaiH ka~NkavAsobhiryatkarNaM ChAdaya~nsharaiH.. 7-136-39 (50695) sa nandayanraNe pArthaM keshavaM cha yashasvinam. sAtyakiM chakrarakShau cha bhImaH karNamayodhayat.. 7-136-40 (50696) vikramaM bhujayorvIryaM dhairyaM cha viditAtmanaH. putrAstava mahArAja dR^iShTvA vimanaso.abhavan.. .. 7-136-41 (50697) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe ShaTtriMshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 136 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-136-10 avArohadavAtarat.. 5-136-20 chitropachitraH chitrashchAsAvupachitrashcheti chitropachitraH.. 5-136-136 ShaTtriMshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 137

.. shrIH ..

7.137. adhyAyaH 137

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-137-0 (50698) .. 7-137-53 (50751) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi droNAbhiShekaparvaNi

droNaparva - adhyAya 138

7.138. adhyAyaH 138

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-16-0 (50752) .. 7-16-29 (50781) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi droNAbhiShekaparvaNi

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-16-1 5-16- 5-16- 5-16- 5-16- 5-16- 5-16- 5-16- 5-16- 5-16- 5-16- 5-16-
droNaparva - adhyAya 139

.. shrIH ..

7.139. adhyAyaH 139

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

bhImakarNayuddhavarNanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-139-0 (50782) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-139-0x (4613) tataH karNo mahArAja bhImaM viddhA tribhiH shUraiH. `punashcha ShaDbhistIkShNAgrairavidhyatka~NkapatribhiH'. mumocha sharavarShANi vichitrANi bahUni cha.. 7-139-1 (50783) vadhyamAno mahAbAhuH sUtaputreNa pANDavaH. na vivyathe bhImaseno bhidyamAna ivAchalaH.. 7-139-2 (50784) sa karNaM karNinA karNe pItena nishitena cha. vivyAdha subhR^ishaM sa~Nkhye tailadhautena mAriSha.. 7-139-3 (50785) sa kuNDalaM mahachchAru karNasyApAtayadbhuvi. tapanIyaM mahArAja dIptaM jyotirivAmbarAt.. 7-139-4 (50786) athApareNa bhallena sUtaputraM stanAntare. AjaghAna bhR^ishaM kruddho hasanniva vR^ikodaraH.. 7-139-5 (50787) punarasya tvaranbhIpo nArAchAndasha bhArata. raNe praiShInmahAbAhurnirmuktAshIviShopamAn.. 7-139-6 (50788) te lalATaM vinirbhidya sUtaputrasya bhArata. vivishushchoditAstena valmIkamiva pannagAH.. 7-139-7 (50789) lalATasthaistato bANaiH sUtaputro vyarochata. nIlotpalamayIM mAlAM dhArayanvai yathA purA.. 7-139-8 (50790) so.atividdho bhR^ishaM karNaH pANDavena tarasvinA. rathakUbaramAlambya nyamIlayata lochane.. 7-139-9 (50791) sa muhUrtAtpunaH saMj~nAM lebhe karNaH parantapaH. rudhirokShitasarvA~NgaH krodhamAhArayatparam.. 7-139-10 (50792) tataH kruddho raNe karNaH pIDito dR^iDhadhanvanA. vegaM chakre mahAvego bhImasenarathaM prati.. 7-139-11 (50793) tasmai karNaH shataM rAjanniShUNAM gArdhravAsasAm. amarShI balavAnkruddhaH preShayAmAsa bhArata.. 7-139-12 (50794) tataH prAsR^ijadugrANi sharavarShANi pANDavaH. samare tamanAdR^itya tasya vIryamachintayan.. 7-139-13 (50795) karNastato mahArAja pANDavaM navabhiH sharaiH. AjaghAno.asi kruddhaH kruddharUpaM parantapa.. 7-139-14 (50796) tAvubhau narashArdUlau shArdUlAviva daMShTriNau. `sharadaMShTrau samAsAdya tatakShaturarindamau'. jimUtAviva chAnyonyaM pravavarShaturAhave.. 7-139-15 (50797) talashabdaravaishchaiva trAsayetAM parasparam. sharajAlaishcha vividhaistrAsayAmAsaturmR^idhe.. 7-139-16 (50798) anyonyaM samare kruddhau kR^itapratikR^itaiShiNau. tato bhImo mahAbAhuH sUtaputrasya bhArata.. 7-139-17 (50799) kShurapreNa dhanushChittvA nanAda paravIrahA. tadapAsya dhanushChinnaM sUtaputro mahArathaH.. 7-139-18 (50800) anyatkArmukamAdatta bhAraghnaM vegavattaram. tadapyatha nimeShArdhAchchichChedAsya vR^ikodaraH.. 7-139-19 (50801) tR^itIyaM cha chaturthaM cha pa~nchamaM ShaShThameva hi. saptamaM chAShTamaM chaiva navamaM dashamaM tathA.. 7-139-20 (50802) ekAdashaM dvAdashaM cha trayodhashamathApi cha. chaturdashaM pa~nchadashaM ShoDashaM cha vR^ikodaraH.. 7-139-21 (50803) tathA saptadashaM vegAdaShTAdashamathApi vA. bahUni bhImashchichCheda karNasyaivaM dhanUMShi hi. nimeShArdhAttataH karNo dhanurhasto vyatiShThata.. 7-139-22 (50804) dR^iShTvA sa kurusauvIrasindhuvIrabalakShayam. sa varmadhvajashastraishcha patitaiH saMvR^itAM mahIm.. 7-139-23 (50805) `rathairvimathitairbhallairashvaishchAnyaiH pravalgitaiH. bhraShTashrIkairnaravaraiH pAMsukuNThitamUrdhajaiH'.. 7-139-24 (50806) hastyashvarathadehAMshcha gatAsUnprekShya sarvashaH. sUtaputrasya saMrambhAddIptaM vapurajAyata.. 7-139-25 (50807) sa viShphArya mahachchApaM kArtasvaravibhUShitam. bhImaM praikShata rAdheyo ghoraM ghoreNa chakShuShA.. 7-139-26 (50808) tataH kruddhaH sharAnasyansUtaputro vyaro chata. madhyandinagato.archiShmA~nsharadIva divAkaraH.. 7-139-27 (50809) marIchivikachasyeva rAjanbhAnumato vapuH. AsIdAdhiratherghoraM vapuH sharashatAchitam.. 7-139-28 (50810) karAbhyAmAdadAnasya sandadhAnasya chAshugAn. karShato mu~nchato bANAnnAntaraM dadR^ishe raNe.. 7-139-29 (50811) agnichakropamaM ghoraM maNDalIkR^itamAyudham. karNasyAsInmahIpAla savyaM dakShiNamasyataH.. 7-139-30 (50812) svarNapu~NkhAH sunishitAH karmachApachyutAH sharAH. prAchChAdayanmahArAja dishaH sUrya ivAMshubhiH.. 7-139-31 (50813) tataH kanakapu~NkhAnAM sharANAM nataparvaNAm. dhanushchyutAnAM viyati dadR^ishe bahudhA vrajaH.. 7-139-32 (50814) bANAsanAdAdhiratheH prabhavanti sma sAyakAH. shreNIkR^itA vyarochanta rAjankrau~nchA ivAmbare.. 7-139-33 (50815) gArdhrapatrA~nshilAdhautAnkArtasvaravibhUShitAn. mahAvegAnpradIptAgrAnmumochAdhirathiH sharAn.. 7-139-34 (50816) te tu chApabaloddhUtAH shAtakumbhavibhUShitAH. ajasramapatanbANA bhImasenarathaM prati.. 7-139-35 (50817) te vyomni rukmavikR^itA vyakAshanta sahasrashaH. shalabhAnAmiva vrAtAH sharAH karNasamIritAH.. 7-139-36 (50818) chApAdAdhirathermuktAH prapatantashchakAshire. eko dIrgha ivAtyarthamAkAshe saMsthitaH sharaH.. 7-139-37 (50819) parvataM vAridhArAbhichChAdayanniva toyadaH. karNaH prAchChAdayatkruddho bhImaM sAyakavR^iShTibhiH.. 7-139-38 (50820) tatra bhArata bhImasya balaM vIryaM parAkramam. vyavasAyaM cha putrAste dadR^ishuH sahasainikAH.. 7-139-39 (50821) tAM samudramivodbhUtAM sharavR^iShTiM samutthitAm. achintayitvA bhImastu kruddhaH karNamupAdravat.. 7-139-40 (50822) rukmapR^iShThaM mahachchApaM bhImasyAsIdvishAmpate. AkarShAnmaNDalIbhUtaM shakrachApamivAparam. tasmAchCharAH prAdurAsanpUrayanta ivAmbaram.. 7-139-41 (50823) suvarNapu~NkhairbhImena sAyakairnataparvabhiH. gagane rachitA mAlA kA~nchanIva vyarochataM.. 7-139-42 (50824) tato vyomni viShaktAni sharajAlAni bhAgashaH. AhatAni vyashIryanta bhImasenasya patribhiH.. 7-139-43 (50825) karNasya sharajAlaughairbhImasenasya chobhayoH. agnisphuli~NgasaMsparshaira~njogatibhirAhave. taistaiH kanakapu~NkhAnAM dyaurAsItsaMvR^itA vrajaiH.. 7-139-44 (50826) na sma sUryastadA bhAti na sma vAti samIraNaH. sharajAlAvR^ite vyomni na prAj~nAyata ki~nchana.. 7-139-45 (50827) sa bhimaM ChAdayanbANaiH sUtaputraH pR^ithagvidhaiH. upArohadanAdR^itya tasya vIryaM mahAtmanaH.. 7-139-46 (50828) tayorvisR^ijatostatra sharajAlAni mAriSha. vAyubhUtAnyadR^ishyanta saMsaktAnItaretaram.. 7-139-47 (50829) anyonyasharasaMsamparshAttayormanujasiMhayoH. AkAshe bharatashreShTha pAvakaH samajAyata.. 7-139-48 (50830) tathA karNaH shitAnbANAnkarmAraparimArjitAn. suvarNavikR^itAnkruddhaH prAhiNodvadhakA~NkShayA.. 7-139-49 (50831) tAnantarikShe vishikhaistridhaikaikamashAtayat. visheShayansUtaputraM bhImastiShTheti chAbravIt.. 7-139-50 (50832) punashchAsR^ijadugrANi sharavarShANi pANDavaH. amarShI balavAnkruddhau didhakShanniva pAvakaH.. 7-139-51 (50833) tatashchaTachaTAshabdo godhAghAtAdabhUttayoH.. 7-139-52 (50834) talashabdashcha subhahAnsiMhanAdashcha bhairavaH. rathanemininAdashcha jyAshabdashchaiva dAruNaH.. 7-139-53 (50835) yodhA vyupAramanyuddhAddidR^ikShantaH parAkramam. karNapANDavayo rAjanparasparavadhaiShiNoH.. 7-139-54 (50836) devarShisiddhagandharvAH sAdhusAdhvityapUjayan. mumuchuH puShpavarShaM cha vidyAdharagaNAstathA.. 7-139-55 (50837) tato bhImo mahAbAhuH saMrambhI dR^iDhavikramaH. astrairastrANi saMvArya sharairvivyAdha sUtajam.. 7-139-56 (50838) karNo.api bhImasenasya nivAryeShUnmahAbalaH. prAhiNonnava nArAchAnAshIviShasamAnraNe.. 7-139-57 (50839) tAvadbhiratha tAnbhImo vyomni chichCheda patribhiH. nArAchAnsUta putrasya tiShThatiShTheti chAbravIt.. 7-139-58 (50840) tato bhImo mahAbAhuH sharaM kruddhAntakopamam. mumochAdhirathervIro yamadaNDamivAparam.. 7-139-59 (50841) tamApatantaM chichCheda rAdheyaH prahasanniva. tribhiH sharaiH sharaM rAjanpANDavasya pratApavAn.. 7-139-60 (50842) punashchAsR^ijadugrANi sharavarShANi pANDavaH. tasya tAnyAdade karNaH sarvANyastrANyabhItavat. yudhyamAnasya bhImasya sUtaputro.astramAyayA.. 7-139-61 (50843) tasyeShudhI dhanurjyAM cha bANaiH sannataparvabhiH. rashmInyoktrANi chAshvAnAM kruddhaH karNo.achChinanmR^idhe. 7-139-62 (50844) tasyAshvAMshcha punarhatvA sUtaM vivyAdha pa~nchabhiH. sopasR^itya drutaM sUto yudhAmanyo rathaM yayau.. 7-139-63 (50845) vihasanniva bhImasya kruddhaH kAlAnaladyutiH. dhvajaM chichCheda rAdheyaH patAkAM cha vyapAtayat.. 7-139-64 (50846) sa vidhanvA mahAbAhuratha shaktiM parAmR^ishat. tAM vyavAsR^ijadAvidhya kruddhaH karNarathaM prati.. 7-139-65 (50847) tAmAdhirathirAyastaH shaktiM kA~nchanabhUShaNAm. ApatantIM maholkAbhAM chichCheda dashabhiH sharaiH.. 7-139-66 (50848) sA.apataddR^ishadhA ChinnA karNasya nishitaiH sharaiH. asyataH sUtaputrasya mitrArthe chitrayodhinaH.. 7-139-67 (50849) sa charmAdatta kaunteyo jAtarUpapariShkR^itam. kha~NgaM chAnyataraprepsurjayaM maraNameva vA.. 7-139-68 (50850) tadasya tarasA kruddho vyadhamachcharma suprabham. sharairbahubhiratyugraiH prahasanniva bhArata.. 7-139-69 (50851) sa vicharmA mahArAja virathaH krodhamUrchChitaH. asiM prAsR^ijadAvidhya tvarankarNarathaM prati.. 7-139-70 (50852) sa dhanuH sUtaputrasya sajyaM ChittvA mahAnasiH. papAta bhuvi rAjendra kruddhaH sarpa ivAmbarAt.. 7-139-71 (50853) tataH prahasyAdhirathiranyadAdAya kArmukam. shatrughnaM samare kruddho dR^iDhajyaM vegavattaram.. 7-139-72 (50854) vyAyachChatsa sharAnkarNaH kuntIputrajighAMsayA. sahasrasho mahArAja rukmapu~NkhAnsutejanAn.. 7-139-73 (50855) sa vadhyamAno balavAnkarNachApachyutaiH sharaiH. vaihAyasaM prAkramaddhai karNasya rathamAvishat.. 7-139-74 (50856) sa tasya charitaM dR^iShTvA sa~NgrAme vijayaiShiNaH. dhvajAlayastho rAdheyo bhImasenamava~nchayat.. 7-139-75 (50857) tamadR^iShTvA rathopasthe nilInaM vyathitendriyam. dhvajamasya samAruhya tasmai bhImo mahItale.. 7-139-76 (50858) tadasya kuravaH sarve chANAshchAbhyapUjayan. yadiyeSha rathAtkarNaM hartuM tArkShya ivoragam.. 7-139-77 (50859) sa chChinnadhanvA virathaH svadharmamanupAlayan. svarathaM pR^iShThataH kR^itvA yuddhAyaiva vyavasthitaH.. 7-139-78 (50860) tadvichintya sa rAdheyastata enaM samabhyayAt. saMrambhAtpANDavaM sa~Nkhye yuddhAya samupasthitam.. 7-139-79 (50861) tau sametau mahArAja spardhamAnau mahAbalau. jImUtAviva gharmAnte garjamAnau nararShabhau.. 7-139-80 (50862) tayorAsItsaMprahAraH kruddhayornarasiMhayoH. amR^iShyamANayoH sa~Nkhye devadAnavayoriva.. 7-139-81 (50863) kShINashastrastu kaunteyaH karNena samabhidrutaH. dR^iShTvA.arjunahatAnnAgAnpatitAnparvatopamAn. rathamArgavighAtArthaM vyAyudhaH pravivesha ha.. 7-139-82 (50864) hastinAM vrajamAsAdya rathadurgaM pravishya cha. pANDavo jIvitAkA~NkShI rAdheyaM nAbhyavartata.. 7-139-83 (50865) vyavasthAnamathAkA~NkShandhana~njayasharairhatam. udyamya ku~njaraM pArthastasthau parapura~njayaH.. 7-139-84 (50866) mahauShadhisamAyuktaM hanUmAniva parvatam. tamasya vishikhaiH karNo vyadhamatku~njaraM punaH.. 7-139-85 (50867) hastya~NgAnyatha karNAya prAhiNotpANDunandanaH. chakrANyashchAMstathA chAnyadyadyatpashyati bhUtale.. 7-139-86 (50868) tattadAdAya chikShepa kruddhaH karNAya pANDavaH. tadasya sarvaM chichCheda kShiptaMkShiptaM shitaiH sharaiH.. 7-139-87 (50869) bhImo.api muShTimudyamya vajragarbhaM sudAruNam. hantumaichChatsUtaputraM saMsparannarjunaM kShaNAt.. 7-139-88 (50870) shakto.api nAvadhItkarNaM samarthaH pANDunandanaH. rakShamANaH pratij~nAM tAM yA kR^itA savyasAchinA.. 7-139-89 (50871) tamevaM vyAkulaM bhImaM bhUyobhUyaH shitaiH sharaiH. mUrchChayAbhiparItA~NgamakarotsUtanandanaH.. 7-139-90 (50872) vyAyudhaM nAvadhIchchainaM karNaH kuntyA vachaH smaran. dhanuShogreNa taM karNaH so.abhidrutya parAmR^ishat.. 7-139-91 (50873) dhanuShA spR^iShTamAtreNa kruddhaH sarpa iva shvasan.
