AchChidya sa dhanustasya karNaM mUrdhanyatADayat.. 7-139-92 (50874) tADito bhImasenena krodhAdAraktalochanaH. vihasanniva rAdheyo vAkyametaduvAcha ha.. 7-139-93 (50875) punaH punastUbaraka mUDha audariketi cha. akR^itAstraka mA yotsIrbAla sa~NgrAmakAtara.. 7-139-94 (50876) yatra bhojyaM bahuvidhaM bhakShyaM peyaM cha pANDava. tatra tvaM durmate yogyo na yuddheShu kadAchana.. 7-139-95 (50877) mUlapuShpaphalAhAro vrateShu niyameShu cha. uchitastvaM vane bhIma na tvaM yuddhavishAradaH.. 7-139-96 (50878) kva yudvaM kva munitvaM cha vanaM gachCha vR^ikodara. na tvaM yuddhochitastAta vanavAsaratirbhavAn.. 7-139-97 (50879) sUdAnbhR^ityajanAndAsAMstvaM gR^ihe tvarayanbhR^isham. yogyastADayituM krodhAdbhojanArthaM vR^ikodara.. 7-139-98 (50880) munirbhUtvA.athavA bhIma phalAnyAdatsva durmate. vanAya vraja kaunteya na tvaM yuddhavishAradaH.. 7-139-99 (50881) phalamUlAshane shaktastvaM tathA.atithipUjane. na tvAM shastrasamudyoge yogyaM manye vR^ikodara.. 7-139-100 (50882) `sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-139-101x (4614) evaM taM virathaM dR^iShTvA smR^itvA karNo.abravIdvachaH'.. 7-139-101 (50883) kaumAre yAni vR^ittAni vipriyANi vishAmpate. tAni sarvANi chApyeva rUkShANyashrAvayadbhR^isham.. 7-139-102 (50884) athainaM tatra saMlInamaspR^ishaddhanuShA punaH. prahasaMshcha punarvAkyaM bhImamAha vR^iShastadA.. 7-139-103 (50885) yoddhavyaM mAriShAnyatra na yoddhavyaM cha mAdR^ishaiH. mAdR^ishairyudhyamAnAnAmetachchAnyachcha vidyate.. 7-139-104 (50886) gachCha vA yatra tau kR^iShNau tau tvAM rakShiShyato raNe. gR^ihaM vA gachCha kaunteya kiM te yuddhena bAlaka.. 7-139-105 (50887) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-139-106x (4615) karNasya vachanaM shrutvA bhImaseno.atidAruNam. uvAcha karNaM prahasansarveShAM shR^iNvatAM vachaH.. 7-139-106 (50888) jitastvamasakR^idduShTa katthase kiM vR^ithAtmanA. jayAjayau mahendrasya loke dR^iShTau purAtanaiH.. 7-139-107 (50889) mallayuddhaM mayA sArdhaM kuru duShkulasambhava. mahAbalo mahAbhogI kIchako nihato yathA. tathA tvAM ghAtayiShyAmi pashyatsu sarvarAjasu.. 7-139-108 (50890) bhImasya matamAj~nAya karNo buddhimatAM varaH. virarAma raNAttasmAtpashyatAM sarvadhanvinAm.. 7-139-109 (50891) evaM taM virathaM kR^itvA karNo rAjanvyakatthayat. prasukhe vR^iShNisiMhasya pArthasya cha mahAtmanaH.. 7-139-110 (50892) taM bruvANaM tu bhImaH sa kA~NkShanbhImaparAkramaH. na chAkArShInmR^itaM smR^itvA hyarjunasya mahAbalam.. 7-139-111 (50893) tasya kArmukamArujya babha~njAshuparAkramI.. 7-139-112 (50894) tato dR^iShTvA mahArAja vAsudevo mahAdyutiH. arjunArjuna pashyemaM bhImaM karNena bAdhitam.. 7-139-113 (50895) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-139-114x (4616) evamuktastadA pArthaH keshavena mahAtmanA. bhImasenaM tathAbhUtaM krodhasaMraktalochanaH. amarShavashamApanno nirdahanniva chakShuShA'.. 7-139-114 (50896) tato rAja~nshilAdhautA~nsharA~nshAkhAmR^igadhvajaH. prAhiNotsUtaputrAya keshavena prachoditaH.. 7-139-115 (50897) tataH pArthabhujotsR^iShTAH sharAH kanakabhUShaNAH. gANDIvaprabhavAH karNaM haMsAH krau~nchamivAvishan.. 7-139-116 (50898) sa bhuja~NgairivAviShTairgANDIvapreShitaiH sharaiH. bhImasenAdapAsedhatsUtaputraM dhana~njayaH.. 7-139-117 (50899) sa chChinnadhanvA bhImena dhana~njayasharAhataH. karNo bhImAdapAyAsIdrathena mahatA drutam.. 7-139-118 (50900) bhImo.api sAtyakervAhaM samAruhya nararShabhaH. anvayAddhAtaraM sa~Nkhye pANDavaM savyasAchinam.. 7-139-119 (50901) tataH karNaM samuddishya tvaramANo dhana~nchayaH. nArAchaM krodhatAmrAkShaH praiShInmR^ityumivAntakaH.. 7-139-120 (50902) sa garutmAnivAkashe prArthayanbhujagottamam. nArAcho.abhyapatatkarNaM tUrNaM gANDIvachoditaH.. 7-139-121 (50903) tamantarikShe nArAchaM drauNishchichCheda patriNA. dhana~njayabhayAtkarNamujjihIrShanmahArathaH.. 7-139-122 (50904) tato drauNiM chatuHShaShTyA vivyAdha kupito.arjunaH. shilImukhairmahArAja mAgAstiShTheti chAbravIt.. 7-139-123 (50905) sa tu mattagajAkIrNamanIkaM rathasa~Nkulam. tUrNamabhyAvishaddrauNirdhana~njayasharArditaH.. 7-139-124 (50906) tataH suvarNapR^iShThAnAM chApAnAM kUjatAM raNe. shabdaM gANDIvaghoSheNa kaunteyo.abhyabhavadbalI.. 7-139-125 (50907) dhana~njayastathA.a.ayAntaM pR^iShThato drauNimabhyagAt. nAtidIrghamivAdhvAnaM sharaiH santrAsayanbalam.. 7-139-126 (50908) vidArya dehAnnArAchairnaravAraNavAjinAm. ka~NkabarhiNavAsobhirbalaM vyadhamadarjunaH.. 7-139-127 (50909) tadbalaM bharatashreShTha savAjidvipamAnavam. pAkashAsanirAyattaH pArthaH sa nijaghAna ha.. .. 7-139-128 (50910) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe ekonachatvAriMshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 139 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-139-46 upArohatsannikarShamagAt.. 5-139-47 vAyubhUtAni vAtodbhUtAnyativegavanti vA.. 5-139-74 vaihAyasamAkAsham.. 5-139-75 layama~Ngasa~Nkocham.. 5-139-87 tadrathAdisAdhanam.. 5-139-88 vajragarbhamantarvihitA~NguShTham.. 5-139-89 samarthaH samIchInArtho dharmApekShIti yAvat.. 5-139-94 tUbarakaH puMshchihnarahitaH ShaNDa itiyAvat. tUbaro.ashmashrupuruShe ityupakramya puruShavya~njanatyakto iti medinI. audariko bahvAshI.. 5-139-96 vrateShu niyameShu AgantukeShu.. 5-139-103 saMlInaM sa~NkuchitA~Ngam.. 5-139-110 vyakatthayat bhartsitavAn.. 5-139-139 ekonachatvAriMshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 140

.. shrIH ..

7.140. adhyAyaH 140

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sAtyakinA alambusadadhaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-140-0 (50911) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-140-0x (4617) `dAtavyamadya manye.ahaM pANDavAnAM svakaM punaH. na vigraho hi balinA shreyase syAdyathAtathA.. 7-140-1 (50912) pAdayoH praNatenApi bhuktvA.apyuchChiShTamapyareH. ato.anyadvApi kR^itvaiva jIvyaM loke nareNa vai.. 7-140-2 (50913) jIvataiva paro lokaH sAdhyate chaiva sarvathA. ajIvatastathaivAsInna sukhaM na parA gatiH.. 7-140-3 (50914) vinAshe sarvathotpanne na bAlo budhyate kriyAm. mithyAbhimAnadagdho hi na buddhyeta kR^itAkR^ite'.. 7-140-4 (50915) ahanyahani me dIptaM yashaH patati sa~njaya. hatA me bahavo yodhA manye kAlasya paryayam.. 7-140-5 (50916) dhana~njayaH susa~NkraddhaH praviShTo mAmakaM balam. rakShitaM drauNikarNAbhyAmapraveshyaM surairapi.. 7-140-6 (50917) tAbhyAmUrjitavIryAbhyAmApyAyitaparAkramaH. sahitaH kR^iShNabhImAbhyAM shinInAmR^iShabheNa cha.. 7-140-7 (50918) tadAprabhR^iti mAM shoko dahatyagnirivAshayam. grastAniva prapashyAmi bhUmipAlAnsasaindhavAn.. 7-140-8 (50919) apriyaM sumahatkR^itvA sindhurAjaH kirITinaH. `kruddhasya devarAjasya shakrasyeva mahAdyuteH'. chakShurviShayamApannaH kathaM jIvitamApnuyAt.. 7-140-9 (50920) anumAnAchcha pashyAmi nAsti sa~njaya saindhavaH. yuddhaM tu tadyathAvR^ittaM tanmamAchakShva tattvataH.. 7-140-10 (50921) yachcha vikShobhya mahatIM senAmAloDya chAsakR^it. ekaH praviShTaH sa~Nkruddho nalinImiva ku~njaraH.. 7-140-11 (50922) tasya me vR^iShNivIrasya brUhi yuddhaM yathAtatham. dhana~njayArthe yattasya kushalo hyasi sa~njaya .. 7-140-12 (50923) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-140-13x (4618) tathA tu vaikarta napIDitaM taM bhImaM prayAntaM puruShapravIram. samIkShya rAjannaravIramadhye shinipravIro.anuyayau rathena.. 7-140-13 (50924) nadanyathA vajradharastapAnte jvalanyathA jaladAnte cha sUryaH. nighnannamitrAndhanuShA dR^iDhena sa kampayaMstava putrasya senAm.. 7-140-14 (50925) taM yAntamashvai rajataprakAshai-- rAyodhane vIrataraM nadantam. nAshaknuvanvArayituM tvadIyAH sarve rathA bhArata mAdhavAgryam.. 7-140-15 (50926) amarShapUrNastvanivR^ittayodhI sharAsanI kA~nchanavarmadhArI. alambusaH sAtyakiM mAdhavAgrya-- mavArayadrAjavaro.abhipatya.. 7-140-16 (50927) tayorabhUdbhArata samprahAro yathAvidho naiva babhUva kashchit. prekShanta evAhavashobhinau tau yodhAstvadIyAshcha pare cha sarve.. 7-140-17 (50928) AvidhyadenaM dashabhiH pR^iShatkai-- ralambuso rAjavaraH prasahya. anAgatAneva tu tAnpR^iShatkAM-- shchichCheda bANaiH shinipu~Ngavo.api.. 7-140-18 (50929) punaH sa bANaistribhiragnikalpai-- rAkarNapUrNairnishitaiH sapu~NkhaiH. vivyAdha dehAvaraNaM vidArya te sAtyakerAvivishuH sharIram.. 7-140-19 (50930) taiH kAyamasyAgnyanilaprabhAvai-- rvidArya bANairnishitairjvaladbhiH. AjaghnivAMstAnrajataprakAshA-- nashvAMshchaturbhishchaturaH prasahya.. 7-140-20 (50931) tathA tu tenAbhihatastarasvI naptA shineshchakradharaprabhAvaH. alambusasyottamavegavadbhi-- rashvAMshaachaturbhirnijaghAna bANaiH.. 7-140-21 (50932) athAsya sUtasya shiro nikR^itya bhallena kAlAnalasannibhena. sakuNDalaM pUrmashashiprakAshaM bhrAjiShNu vaktraM nichakarta dehAt.. 7-140-22 (50933) nihatya taM pArthivaputrapautraM sa~Nkhye yadUnAmR^iShabhaH pramAthI. tato.anvayAdarjunameva vIraH sainyAni rAjaMstava sannivArya.. 7-140-23 (50934) anvAgataM vR^iShNivIraM samIkShya tathArimadhye parivartamAnam. ghnantaM kurUNAmiShubhirbalAni punaHpunarvAyumivAbhrapUgAn.. 7-140-24 (50935) tato.avahansaindhavAH sAdhudAntA gokShIrakundenduhimaprakAshAH. suvarNajAlAvatatAH sadashvA yatoyataH kAmayate nR^isiMhaH.. 7-140-25 (50936) athAtmajAste sahitA.abhipetu-- ranye cha yodhAstvaritAstvadIyAH. kR^itvA mukhaM bhAratayodhamukhyaM duHshAsanaM tvatsutamAjamIDha.. 7-140-26 (50937) te sarvataH samparivArya sa~Nkhye shaineyamAjaghnuranIkasAhAH. sa chApi tAnpravaraH sAtvatAnAM nyavArayadbANajAlena vIraH.. 7-140-27 (50938) nivArya tAMstUrNamamitraghAtI naptA shineH patribhiragnikalpaiH. duHshAsanasyAbhijaghAna vAhA-- ~njavIyasastanmanaso.api bANaiH.. 7-140-28 (50939) tato.arjuno harShamavApa sa~Nkhye kR^iShNashcha dR^iShTvA puruShapravIram.. .. 7-140-29 (50940) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe chatvAriMshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 140 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-140-17 prekShantaH prekShakAH. babhUvetyetat bahuvachanatayA pariNatamanuShajyate.. 5-140-18 prasahya anAdR^itya.. 5-140-140 chatvAriMshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 141

.. shrIH ..

7.141. adhyAyaH 141

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sAtyakerarjunadarshanaM bhUrishravasA samAgamashcha.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-141-0 (50941) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-141-0x (4619) tamudyataM mahAbAhuM duHshAsanarathaM prati. tvaritaM tvaraNIyeShu dhana~njayajayaiShiNam.. 7-141-1 (50942) trigartAnAM maheShvAsAH suvarNavikR^itadhvajAH. senAsamudramAviShTamanantaM paryavArayan.. 7-141-2 (50943) athainaM rathavaMshena sarvataH sannivArya te. avAkira~nCharavrAtaiH kruddhAH paramadhanvinaH.. 7-141-3 (50944) ajayadrAjaputrAMstAnbhrAjamAnAnmahAraNe. ekaH pa~nchAshataM shatrUnsAtyakiH satyavikramaH.. 7-141-4 (50945) samprApya bhAratImadhyaM talaghoShasamAkulam. asishaktigadApUrNamapluvaM sAgaraM yathA.. 7-141-5 (50946) `athainamanuvR^ittAstu trigartAH sahitAH punaH. tIvreNa rathavaMshena mahatA paryavArayan. vikarShanto.atimAtrANi chApAni bharatarShabha'.. 7-141-6 (50947) tatrAdbhutamapashyAma shaineyacharitaM raNe. pratIchyAM dishi taM dR^iShTvA prAchyAM pashyAmi lAghavAt.. 7-141-7 (50948) udIchIM dakShiNAM prAchIM pratIchIM vidishastathA. punarmadhyagato vIra Ahave yuddhadurmadaH.. 7-141-8 (50949) ekaH paryacharanra~Nge bahudhA sa mahAbalaH. nR^ityannivAcharachChUro yathA rathashataM tathA.. 7-141-9 (50950) taddR^iShTvA charitaM tasya siMhavikrAntagAminaH. trigartAH sannyavartanta santaptAH svajanaM prati.. 7-141-10 (50951) tamanye shUrasenAnAM shUrAH sa~Nkhye nyavArayan. niyachChantaH sharavrAtairmattaM dvipamivA~NkushaiH.. 7-141-11 (50952) tairvyavAharadAryAtmA muhUrtAdeva sAtyakiH. tataH kali~Ngairyuyudhe so.achintyabalavikramaH.. 7-141-12 (50953) tAM cha senAmatikramya kali~NgAnAM duratyayAm. atha pArthaM mahAbAhurdhana~njayamupAsadat.. 7-141-13 (50954) taranniva jale shrAnto yathA sthalamupeyivAn. taM dR^iShTvA puruShavyAghraM yuyudhAnaH samAshvasat.. 7-141-14 (50955) tamAyAntamabhiprekShya keshavaH pArthamabravIt. asAvAyAti shaineyastava pArtha padAnugaH.. 7-141-15 (50956) eSha shiShyaH sakhA chaiva tava satyaparAkramaH. sarvAnyodhAMstR^iNIkR^itya vijigye puruSharShabhaH.. 7-141-16 (50957) eSha kauravayodhAnAM kR^itvA ghoramupadravam. tava prANaiH priyatamaH kirITinneti sAtyakiH.. 7-141-17 (50958) eSha droNaM tathA bhojaM kR^itavarmANameva cha. kadarthIkR^itya vishikhaiH phalgunAbhyeti sAtyakiH.. 7-141-18 (50959) dharmarAjapriyAnveShI hatvA yodhAnvarAnvarAn. shUrashchaiva kR^itAstrashcha phalgunAbhyeti sAtyakiH.. 7-141-19 (50960) kR^itvA suduShkaraM karma sainyamadhye mahAbalaH. tava darshanamanvichChanpANDavAbhyeti sAtyakiH.. 7-141-20 (50961) bahUnekarathenAjau yodhayitvA mahArathAn. AchAryapramukhAnpArtha prayAtyeSha sa sAtyakiH.. 7-141-21 (50962) svabAhubalamAshritya vidArya cha varUthinIm. preShito dharmarAjena pArthaiSho.abhyeti sAtyakiH.. 7-141-22 (50963) priyaH shiShyashcha te pArtha tvayA tulyaparAkramaH. vidrAvyaM mahatIM senAmeSha hyAyAti sAtyakiH.. 7-141-23 (50964) yasya nAsti samo yodhaH kauraveShu katha~nchana. so.ayamAyAti kaunteya sAtyakiryuddhadurmadaH.. 7-141-24 (50965) kurusainyAdvimukto vai siMho madhyAdgavAmiva. nihatya bahulAH senAH pArthaiSho.abyeti sAtyakiH.. 7-141-25 (50966) eSha rAjasahasrANAM vaktraiH pa~NkajasannibhaiH. AstIrya vasudhAM pArtha kShipramAyAti sAtyakiH.. 7-141-26 (50967) eSha duryodhanaM jitvA bhrAtR^ibhiH sahitaM raNe. nihatya jalasandhaM cha kShipramAyAti sAtyakiH.. 7-141-27 (50968) rudhiraughavatIM kR^itvA nadIM shoNitakardamAm. tR^iNavadvyasya kauravyAneSha hyAyAti sAtyakiH.. 7-141-28 (50969) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-141-29x (4620) tataH prahR^iShTaH kaunteyaH keshavaM vAkyamabravIt. na me priyaM mahAbAho yanmAmabhyeti sAtyakiH.. 7-141-29 (50970) na hi jAnAmi vR^ittAntaM dharmarAjasya keshava. sAtvatena vihInaH sa yadi jIvati vA na vA.. 7-141-30 (50971) etena hi mahAbAho rakShitavyaH sa pArthivaH. tameSha kathamutsR^ijya mama kR^iShNa padAnugaH.. 7-141-31 (50972) rAjA droNAya chotsR^iShTaH saindhavashchAnipAtitaH. pratyudyAti cha shaineyameSha bhUrishravA raNe.. 7-141-32 (50973) so.ayaM gurutaro bhAraH saindhavArthe samAhitaH. j~nAtavyashcha hi me rAjA rakShitavyashcha sAtyakiH.. 7-141-33 (50974) jayadrathashcha hantavyo lambate cha divAkaraH. shrAntashchaiSha mahAbAhuralpaprANashcha sAmpratam.. 7-141-34 (50975) parishrAntA hayAshchAsya hayayantA cha mAdhava. na cha bhUrishravAH shrAntaH sasahAyashcha keshava.. 7-141-35 (50976) apIdAnIM bhavedasya kShemamasminsamAgame. kachchinna sAgaraM tIrtvA sAtyakiH satyavikramaH. goShpadaM prApya sIdeta mahaujAH shinipu~NgavaH.. 7-141-36 (50977) api kauravamukhyena kR^itAstreNa mahAtmanA. sametya bhUrishravasA svastimAnsAtyakirbhavet.. 7-141-37 (50978) vyatikramamimaM manye dharmarAjasya keshava. AchAryAdbhayamutsR^ijya yaH praiShayata sAtyakim.. 7-141-38 (50979) grahaNaM dharmarAjasya khagaH shyena ivAmiSham. nityamAshaMsate droNaH kachchitsyAtkushalI nR^ipaH.. .. 7-141-39 (50980) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe ekachatvAriMshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 141 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-141-1 turaNIyeShu kR^ityeShu.. 5-141-141 ekachatvAriMshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 142

.. shrIH ..

7.142. adhyAyaH 142

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sAtyakibhUrishravasoryuddham.. 1 .. sAtyakishirachChedAyonnamitasya sva~NgabhR^ito bhUrishravobhujasyArjunena sa~nChedaH.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-142-0 (50981) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-142-0x (4621) tamApatantaM samprekShya sAtvataM yuddhadurmadam. krodhAdbhUrishravA rAjansahasA samupAdravat.. 7-142-1 (50982) tamabravInmahArAja kauravyaH shinipu~Ngavam. adya prApto.api diShTyA me chakShurviShayamityuta.. 7-142-2 (50983) chirAbhilaShitaM kAmamahaM prApsyAmi saMyuge. na hi me mokShyase jIvanyadi notsR^ijase raNam.. 7-142-3 (50984) adya tvAM samare hatvA nityaM shUrAbhimAninam. nandayiShyAmi dAshArha kururAjaM suyodhanam.. 7-142-4 (50985) adya madbANanirdagdhaM patitaM dharaNItale. drakShyatastvAM raNe vIrau sahitau keshavArjunau.. 7-142-5 (50986) adya dharmasuto rAjA shrutvA tvAM nihataM mayA. savrIDo bhavitA sadyo yenAsIha praveshitaH.. 7-142-6 (50987) adya me vikramaM pArtho vij~nAsyati dhana~njayaH. tvayi bhUmau vinihate shayAne rudhirokShite.. 7-142-7 (50988) chirAbhilaShito hyeSha tvayA saha samAgamaH. purA devAsure yuddhe shakrasya balinA yathA.. 7-142-8 (50989) adya yuddhaM mahAghoraM tava dAsyAmi sAtvata. tato j~nAsyasi tattvena madvIryabalapauruSham.. 7-142-9 (50990) adya saMyamanIM yAtA mayA tvaM nihato raNe. yathA rAmAnujenAjau rAvaNirlakShmaNena ha.. 7-142-10 (50991) adya kR^iShNashcha pArthashcha dharmarAjashcha mAdhava. hate tvayi nirutsAhAraNaM tyakShyantyasaMshayam.. 7-142-11 (50992) adya te.apachitiM kR^itvA shitairmAdhava sAyakaiH. tatstriyo nandayiShyAmi ye tvayA nihatA raNe.. 7-142-12 (50993) machchakShurviShaye prApto na tvaM mAdhava mokShyase. siMhasya viShayaM prApto yathA kShudramR^igastathA.. 7-142-13 (50994) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-142-14x (4622) yuyudhAnastu taM rAjanpratyuvAcha hasanniva. kauraveya na santrAso vidyate mama saMyuge.. 7-142-14 (50995) nAhaM bhIShayituM shakyo vA~NmAtreNa tu kevalam. sa mAM nihanyAtsa~NgrAme yo mAM kuryAnnirAyudham.. 7-142-15 (50996) samAstu shAshvatIrhanyAdyo mAM hanyAddhi saMyuge. kiM vR^ithoktena bahunA karmaNA tatsamAchara.. 7-142-16 (50997) shAradasyeva meghasya garjitaM niShphalaM hite. shrutvA tvadgarjitaM vIra hAsyaM hi mama jAyate.. 7-142-17 (50998) chirakAlepsitaM loke yuddhamadyAstu kaurava. tvarate me matistAta tava yuddhAbhikA~NkShiNI. nAhatvA.ahaM nivartiShye tvAmadya puruShAdhama.. 7-142-18 (50999) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-142-19x (4623) anyonyaM tau tathA vAgbhistakShantau narapu~Ngavau. jighAMsU paramakruddhabhijaghnaturAhave.. 7-142-19 (51000) sametau tau maheShvAsau shuShmiNau spardhinau raNe. dviradAviva sa~Nkruddhau vAsitArthe madotkaTau.. 7-142-20 (51001) bhUrishravAH sAtyakishcha vavarShaturarindamau. sharavarShANi ghorANi meghAviva parasparam.. 7-142-21 (51002) saumadattistu shaineyaM prachChAdyeShubhirAshugaiH. jighAMsurbharatashreShTha vivyAdha nishitaiH sharaiH.. 7-142-22 (51003) dashabhiH sAtyakiM viddhvA saumadattirathAparAn. mumocha nishitAnbANA~njighAMsuH shinipu~NgavaM.. 7-142-23 (51004) tAnasya vishikhAMstIkShNAnantarikShe vishAmpate. aprAptAnastramAyAbhiragrasatsAtyakiH prabho.. 7-142-24 (51005) tau pR^ithakshastravarShAbhyAmavarShetAM parasparam. uttamAbhijanau vIrau kuruvR^iShmiyashaskarau.. 7-142-25 (51006) tau nakhairiva shArdUlau dantairiva mahAdvipau. rathashaktibhiranyonyaM vishikhaishchApyakR^intatAm.. 7-142-26 (51007) nirbhidantau hi gAtrANi vikSharantau cha shoNitam. vyaShTambhayetAmanyonyaM prANadyUtAbhidevinau.. 7-142-27 (51008) evamuttamakarmANau kuruvR^iShNiyashaskarau. parasparamayudhyetAM vAraNAviva yUthapau.. 7-142-28 (51009) tAvadIrgheNa kAlena brahmalokapuraskR^itau. yiyAsantau paraM sthAnamanyonyaM sa~njagarjatuH.. 7-142-29 (51010) sAtyakiH saumadattishcha sharavR^iShTyA parasparam. hR^iShTavaddhArtarAShTrANAM pashyatAmabhyavarShatAm.. 7-142-30 (51011) sampraikShanta janAstau tu yudhyamAnau yudhAmpatI. yUthapau vAsitAhetoH prayuddhAviva ku~njarau.. 7-142-31 (51012) `bhUyobhUyaH sharai rAjaMstakShantau krodhamUrchChitau. ayudhyetAM mahAra~Nge vane kesariNAviva.. 7-142-32 (51013) marmaj~nAviva sa~Nkruddhau jighAMsantau jagarjatuH. vimardantAvathAnyonyaM balavajradharAviva.. 7-142-33 (51014) athAnyonyaM patAkAshcha rathopakaraNAni cha. sa~nchichChidaturAyAntau bANaiH sannataparvabhiH.. 7-142-34 (51015) punashcha sharavarShAbhyAmanyonyamabhivarShatAm. ubhau tu jaghnatustUrNamitaretarasArathI'.. 7-142-35 (51016) anyonyasya hayAnhatvA dhanuShI vinikR^itya cha. virathAvasiyuddhAya sameyAtAM mahAraNe.. 7-142-36 (51017) ArShabhe charmaNI chitre pragR^ihya vipule shubhe. vikoshau chApyasI kR^itvA samare tau vicheratuH.. 7-142-37 (51018) charantau vividhAnmArgAnmaNDalAni cha bhAgashaH. muhurAjaghnatuH kruddhAvanyonyamarimardanau. sakha~Ngau chitravarmANau saniShkA~NgadabhUShaNau.. 7-142-38 (51019) bhrAntamuddhAntamAviddhamAplutaM viplutaM sR^itam. sampAtaM samudIrNaM cha darshayantau yashasvinau.. 7-142-39 (51020) asibhyAM samprajahAte parasparamarindamau. ubhau ChidraiShiNau vIrAvubhau chitraM vavalgatuH.. 7-142-40 (51021) darshayantAvubhau shikShAM lAghavaM sauShThavaM tathA. raNe raNakR^itAM shreShThAvanyonyaM paryakarShatAm.. 7-142-41 (51022) muhUrtamiva rAjendra samAhatya parasparam. pashyatAM sarvasainyAnAM vIrAvAshvasatAM punaH.. 7-142-42 (51023) asibhyAM charmaNI chitre shatachandre narAdhipa. nikR^itya puruShavyAghrau bAhuyuddhaM prachakratuH.. 7-142-43 (51024) vyUDhoraskau dIrghabhujau niyuddhakushalAvubhau. bAhubhiH samasajjetAmAyasaiH paridhairiva.. 7-142-44 (51025) tayo rAjanbhujAghAtanigrahapragrahAstathA. shikShAbalasamudbhUtAH sarvayodhapraharShaNAH.. 7-142-45 (51026) tayornR^ivarayo rAjansamare yudhyamAnayoH. bhImo.abhavanmahAshabdo vajraparvatayoriva.. 7-142-46 (51027) dvipAviva viShANAgraiH shR^i~Ngairiva maharShabhau. bhujayokrAvabandhaishcha shirobhyAM chAvaghAtanaiH.. 7-142-47 (51028) pAdAvakarShasandhAnaistomarA~NkashalAsanaiH. pAdodaravibandhaishcha bhUmAvuddhamaNaistathA.. 7-142-48 (51029) gatapratyAgatAkShepaiH pAtanotthAnasamputaiH. yuyudhAte mahAtmAnau kurusAtvatapu~Ngavau.. 7-142-49 (51030) dvAtriMshatkAraNAni syuryAni yuddhAni bhArata. tAnyadarshayatAM tatra yudhyamAnau mahAbalau.. 7-142-50 (51031) kShINAyudhe sAtvate yudhyamAne tato.abravIdarjunaM vAsudevaH. pashyasvainaM virathaM yudhyamAnaM raNe varaM sarvadhanurdharANAm.. 7-142-51 (51032) `sindhurAjavadhe saktaM pArthaM kR^iShNo.abravItpunaH. sIdantaM sAtyakiM pashya pArthainaM parirakSha cha'.. 7-142-52 (51033) praviShTo bhAratIM bhittvA tava pANDava pR^iShThataH. yodhitashcha mahAvIryaiH sarvairbhArata bhArataiH.. 7-142-53 (51034) dhArtarAShTrAshcha ye mukhyA ye cha mukhyA mahArathAH. nihatA vR^iShNivIreNa shatasho.atha sahasrashaH.. 7-142-54 (51035) parishrAntaM yudhAM shreShThaM samprApto bhUridakShiNaH. yuddhAkA~NkShI samAyAntaM naitatsamamivArjuna.. 7-142-55 (51036) tato bhUrishravAH kruddhaH sAtyakiM yuddhadurmadaH. udyamyAbhyAhanadrAjanmatto mattamiva dvipam.. 7-142-56 (51037) tato jaladanirghoShaH samIpe nR^ipasattama. hAhAkAro mahAnAsItsainyAnAM bharatarShabha. yadudyamya mahAbAhuH sAtyakiM nyahanadbhuvi.. 7-142-57 (51038) rathasthayordvayoryuddhe kruddhayoryodhamukhyayoH. keshavAryunayo rAjansamare prekShamANayoH.. 7-142-58 (51039) atha kR^iShNo mahAbAhurarjunaM pratyabhAShata. pashya vR^iShNyandhakavyAghraM saumadattivashaM gatam.. 7-142-59 (51040) parishrAntaM gataM bhUmau kR^itvA karma suduShkaram. tavAntevAsinaM vIraM pAlayArjuna sAtyakim.. 7-142-60 (51041) na vashaM yaj~nashIlasya gachChedeSha varo.arjuna. tvatkR^ite puruShavyAghra tadA.a.ashu kriyatAM vibho.. 7-142-61 (51042) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-142-62x (4624) sa siMha iva mAta~NgaM vikarShanbhUridakShiNaH. vyarochata kurushreShThaH sAtvatapravaraM yudhi.. 7-142-62 (51043) athAbravIddhR^iShTamanA vAsudevaM dhana~njayaH. pashya vR^iShNipravIreNa krIDantaM kurupu~Ngavam. mahAdvipeneva vane mattena hariyUthapam.. 7-142-63 (51044) `mAmeva cha mahAbAho pariyAnti mahArathAH. yathAshakti yatanto mAM yodhayanto janArdana.. 7-142-64 (51045) dhruvaM cha yodhayAmyetA~nChidrAnveShaNatatparAn. rakShAmi sAtyakiM chaiva saumadattivashaM gatam.. 7-142-65 (51046) aprApto.ayaM mayA kR^iShma hantuM bhUrishravA raNe. anyena tu samAsaktaM mama notsahate manaH.. 7-142-66 (51047) avashyaM cha mayA kR^iShNa vR^iShNivIrasya rakShaNam. madarthaM yudhyamAnasya kAryaM prANairapi prabho.. 7-142-67 (51048) adharmo vA.astu dharmo vA mama mAdhava mAdhavaH. pareNa nihato mA sma prANAnhAsInmahArathaH.. 7-142-68 (51049) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-142-69x (4625) evamuktvA.arjunaH kR^iShNaM parAnAshu shitaiH sharaiH. ChAdayAmAsa sa~NkruddhaH pare chApi dhana~njayam.. 7-142-69 (51050) evaM sma yudhyate vIraH sAtyakiM cha muhurmuhuH. prekShate sma naravyAghro bhUrishravasameva cha'.. 7-142-70 (51051) tathA tu kR^iShyamANaM taM dR^iShTvA sAtyakimAhave. vAsudevastadA vAkyaM bhUyo.apyarjunamabravIt.. 7-142-71 (51052) pashya vR^iShNyandhakavyAghraM saumadattivaMshaM gatam. tava shiShyaM mahAbAho dhanuShyanavamaM tvayA.. 7-142-72 (51053) anityo vikramaH pArtha yatra bhUrishravA raNe. visheShayati vArShNeyaM sAtyakiM satyavikramam.. 7-142-73 (51054) `bahubhirmahArathaireSha parAkrAntairyuyutsubhiH. yuddhvA bhR^ishaM parishrAntaH kShINAyudharaparichChadaH'.. 7-142-74 (51055) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-142-75x (4626) evamukto mahArAja vAsudevena pANDavaH. manasA pUjayAmAsa bhUrishravasamAhave.. 7-142-75 (51056) vikarShansAtvatAM shreShThaM krIDamAna ivAhave. sa harShayati mAM bhUyaH kurUNAM nandivardhanaH.. 7-142-76 (51057) pravaraM vR^iShNivIrANAM yannihantyeSha sAtyakim. mahAdvipamivAraNye karShanniva harirbhR^isham.. 7-142-77 (51058) evaM tu manasA rAjanpArthaH sampUjya kauravam. `ayudhyatAribhirvIrastaM cha samprekShate muhuH'.. 7-142-78 (51059) atha koshAdviniShkR^iShya kha~NgaM bhUrishravAH shitam. mUrdhajeShu cha jagrAha padA chorasyAtADayat. `Akramya chApyathodyamya sahAsiM subhujo bhujam.. 7-142-79 (51060) shushubhe sa bhujastasya tapanIyavibhUShaNaH. madhye rathasamUhasya indradhvaja ivochChritaH.. 7-142-80 (51061) hAhAkR^itamabhUtsarvaM pANDavAnAM mahadbalam. tAvakAshcha mudA yuktAH siMhanAdaM vichukrushuH.. 7-142-81 (51062) nimIlitAkShAstvabhava~njanAH sa~NgrAmabhIravaH. tathA bhUrishravograste sAtvate naShTavikrame.. 7-142-82 (51063) vAsudevaM mahAbAhurarjunaH pratyabhAShata. saindhave saktadR^iShTitvAnna taM pashyAmi mAdhavam.. 7-142-83 (51064) eSha tvasukaraM karma yAdavArthe karomyaham. mama shiShyo mamArthAya yudhyate mama shatrubhiH. taM kR^iShNa mokShayiShyAmi dAvAtsiMhashishuM yathA'.. 7-142-84 (51065) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-142-85x (4627) ityuktvA vachanaM kurvanvAsudevasya pANDavaH. tataH kShurapraM nishitaM gANDIve samayojayat.. 7-142-85 (51066) pArthabAhuvisR^iShTaH sa maholkeva nabhashchyutA. sakha~NgaM yaj~nashIlasya bAhuM dakShiNamachChinat.. .. 7-142-86 (51067) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe dvichatvAriMshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 142 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-142-2 utAtyartham.. 5-142-16 shAshvatIH samAH sarvakAlam. turavadhAraNe. nityameva asau hanyAt. jaya eva tasyetyarthaH.. 5-142-29 brahmalokapuraskR^itau brAhmaNasamUha satkR^itau.. 5-142-45 bhujAghAto bhujasphoTaH. nigraho hastadhAraNam. pragraho galahastakaH.. 5-142-47 bhujayoktrAvabandhairbAhupAshaveShTanaiH. avaghAtanaistADanaiH.. 5-142-48 pAdashabdaH pratyekaM sambadhyate. pAdAvakarShaishcharaNAvakarShaNaiH. pAdasandhAnaishcharaNachChanditakaiH. tomarairatisphoTanaiH. a~Nkushairavalu~nchanaiH. pAdodaravibandhaiH pAdAbhyAmudarakroDIkaraNaiH. udbhramaNaiH parivartanaiH.. 5-142-49 gatairgamanaiH pratyAgatairAvartanaiH. AkShepairAsphAlanaiH. pAtanairbhUmiprApaNaiH utthAnaiH utpatanaiH. samplutaiH viShphArAnubandhaiH.. 5-142-55 samara nurUpam.. 5-142-56 abhyAhanadAsphAlitavAn.. 5-142-142 dvichatvArishadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 143

.. shrIH ..

7.143. adhyAyaH 143

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

arjunachChinnabhujasya bhUrishravasaH tadupAlambhapUrvakaM prAyopaveshaH.. 1 .. sAtyakinA bhUrishravashshirashChedaH.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-143-0 (51068) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-143-0x (4628) sa bAhurnyapatadbhUmau sakha~NgaH sashubhA~NgadaH. AdadhajjIvalokasya duHkhamadbhutamuttamaH. `yantramukto mahendrasya dhvajo vR^ittotsavo yathA'.. 7-143-1 (51069) prahariShyanhR^ito bAhuradR^ishyate kirITinA. vegena nyapatadbhUmau pa~nchAsya iva pannagaH.. 7-143-2 (51070) sa moghaM kR^itamAtmAnaM dR^iShTvA pArthena kauravaH. utsR^ijya sAtyakiM krodhAdgrarhayAmAsa pANDavam.. 7-143-3 (51071) `sa vibAhurmahArAja ekapakSha ivANDajaH. ekachakro ratho yadvaddharaNImAsthito nR^ipaH. uvAcha pANDavaM chaiva sarvakShatrasya pashyataH.. 7-143-4 (51072) bhUrishravA uvAcha. 7-143-5x (4629) nR^ishaMsaM bata kaunteya karmedaM kR^itavAnasi. apashyato viShaktasya yanme tvaM bAhumachChinaH.. 7-143-5 (51073) yeShu yeShu naraH pArtha vartate susamAhitaH. Ashu tachChIlatAmeti tadidaM dR^ishyate tvayi.. 7-143-6 (51074) kiM nu vakShyasi rAjAnaM dharmaputraM yudhiShThiram kiM kurvANo mayA sa~Nkhye hato bhUrishravA iti.. 7-143-7 (51075) idamindreNa te sAkShAdupadiShTaM mahAtmanA. astraM rudreNa vA pArtha droNenAtha kR^ipeNa vA.. 7-143-8 (51076) nanu nAmAstradharmaj~nastvaM loke.abhyadhikaH paraiH. so.ayudhyamAnasya kathaM raNe prahR^itavAnasi.. 7-143-9 (51077) na pramattAya bhItAya virathAya prayAchate. vyasane vartamAnAya praharanti manIShiNaH.. 7-143-10 (51078) idaM tu nIchAcharitamasatpuruShasevitam. kathamAcharitaM pArtha pApakarma suduShkaram.. 7-143-11 (51079) AryeNa sukaraM tvAhurAryakarma dhana~njaya. anAryakarma tvAryeNa suduShkaratamaM bhuvi.. 7-143-12 (51080) kathaM hi rAjavaMshyastvaM kauraveyo visheShataH. kShatradharmAdapakrAntaH suvR^ittashchAritavrataH.. 7-143-13 (51081) `alpastavAparAdho.atra na tvAM tAta vigarhaye. vArShNeyApashadaM prApya kShudraM kR^itamidaM tvayA'.. 7-143-14 (51082) idaM tu yadatikShudraM vArShNeyArthe kR^itaM tvayA. vAsudevamataM nUnaM naitattvayyupapadyate.. 7-143-15 (51083) ko hi nAma pramattAya pareNa saha yudhyate. IdR^ishaM vyasanaM dadyAdyo na kR^iShNasakho bhavet.. 7-143-16 (51084) vrAtyAH sa~NkliShTakarmANaH prakR^ityaiva cha garhitAH. vR^iShNyandhakAH kathaM pArtha pramANaM bhavatA kR^itAH.. 7-143-17 (51085) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-143-18x (4630) evamukto raNe pArtho bhUrishravasamabravIt. vyaktaM hi jIryamANo.api buddhiM jarayate naraH. anarthakamidaM sarvaM yattvayA vyAhR^itaM prabho.. 7-143-18 (51086) jAnanneva hR^iShIkeshaM garhase mAM cha pANDavam. sa~NgAmANAM hi dharmaj~naH sarvashAstrArthapAragaH.. 7-143-19 (51087) na chAdharmamahaM kuryAM jAnaMshchaiva hi muhyase.. 7-143-20 (51088) yudhyante kShatriyAH shatrUnsvaiHsvaiH parivR^itA narAH. bhrAtR^ibhiH pitR^ibhiH putraistathA sambandhibAndhavaiH. vayasyairatha mitraishcha svabAhubalamAshritAH.. 7-143-21 (51089) sa kathaM sAtyakiM shiShyaM sukhasambandhimeva cha. asmadarthe cha yudhyantaM tyaktvA prANAnsudustyajAn.. 7-143-22 (51090) mama bAhuM raNe rAjandakShiNaM yuddhadurmadam. *tvayA nikR^iShyamANaM cha dR^iShTavAnasmi niShkriyam.. 7-143-23 (51091) na cha tvaM rakShitavyo hi eko raNagatena hi. yo yasya yudhyate.arthAya saMrakShyo narAdhipa. tai rakShyamANaiH sa nR^ipo rakShitavyo mahAmR^idhe.. 7-143-24 (51092) yadyahaM sAtyakiM dR^iShTvA tUShNImAsiShya Ahave. tatastena viyogashcha prApyaM narakameva cha.. 7-143-25 (51093) rakShitavyo mayA yasmAttasmAllabdho mayA sa cha. yashashchaiva svapakShebhyaH phalaM mitrasya rakShaNAt.. 7-143-26 (51094) yachcha mAM garhase rAjankR^iShNena saha sa~Ngatam. kastena sa~NgamaM nechChettatra te buddhivibhramaH.. 7-143-27 (51095) Abaddhakavachasyeha rathamAruhya tiShThataH. sarvAyudhairupetasya pratiyoddhR^ipratIkShiNaH.. 7-143-28 (51096) asminrathagajAnIke hayapattisamAkule. siMhanAdoddhatarave gambhIre sainyasAgare.. 7-143-29 (51097) svaishchApi samupetasya vikrAntasya tathA raNe. sAtyakena kathaM yogyaH sa~NgrAmaste bhaviShyati.. 7-143-30 (51098) bahubhiH saha sa~Ngamya nirjitya cha mahArathAn. shrAntashcha shrAntavAhashcha kShINasarvAyudhastvayA. sametaH sAtyakiH sa~Nkhye nirjitashcha mahArathaH.. 7-143-31 (51099) IdR^ishaM sAtyakiM sa~Nkhye nirjitya cha mahAratham. adhikatvaM vijAnIpe svavIryavashamAgatam.. 7-143-32 (51100) ichChasi tvaM shirastasya asinA hartumAhave. tathA kR^ichChragataM dR^iShTvA sAtyakiM kaH kShamiShyati. ekasyaikena hi kathaM sa~NgrAmaH sambhaviShyati.. 7-143-33 (51101) tvaM tu garhaya chAtmAnaM svadharmaM yo na rakShasi. kathaM rakShiShyase vIra ye vai tvAM saMshritA janAH.. 7-143-34 (51102) Attashastrasya hi raNe vR^iShNiputraM jighAMsataH. ChinnavAnyadahaM bAhuM naitallokavigarhitam.. 7-143-35 (51103) nyastashastrasya hi punarvikalasya vivarmaNaH. abhimanyorvadhaM tAta dhArmikaH ko nu pUjayet.. 7-143-36 (51104) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-143-37x (4631) evamukto mahArbAhuryUpaketurmahAyashAH. yuyudhAnaM samutsR^ijya raNe prAyamupAvishat.. 7-143-37 (51105) sharAnAstIrya savyena pANinA puNyalakShaNaH. yiyAsurbrahmalokAya prANAnprANeShvathAjuhot.. 7-143-38 (51106) sUrye chakShuH samAdhAya prasannaM salile manaH. dhyAyanmahopaniShadaM yogayukto.abhavanmuniH.. 7-143-39 (51107) tataste sarvasenAsu janAH kR^iShNadhana~njayau. garhayAmAsurapyetau shashaMsurbhUridakShiNam.. 7-143-40 (51108) nindyamAnau tathA kR^iShNau nochatuH ki~nchidapriyam. tataH prashasyamAnashcha nAhR^iShyadyUpaketanaH.. 7-143-41 (51109) tAMstathAvAdino rAjanputrAMstava dhana~njayaH. amUShyamANo manasA teShAM tasya cha bhAShitam.. 7-143-42 (51110) asa~NkruddhamanA vAchaH smArayanniva bhArata. uvAcha pANDutanayaH sAkShepamiva phalgunaH.. 7-143-43 (51111) mama sarve.api rAjAno jAnantyetanmahAvratam. na shakyo mAmako hantuM yo me syAdbANagochare.. 7-143-44 (51112) yUpaketuM samIkShyaitanna mAM garhitumarhatha. na hi dharmamavij~nAya yuktaM garhayituM param.. 7-143-45 (51113) nyastashastrasya bAlasya virathasya vivarmaNaH. `nAbhimanyorvadhaM yUyaM garhayadhvaM kutastadA.. 7-143-46 (51114) duryodhanasya kShudrasya apramANe cha tiShThataH. saumadatterathaM sAdhuH sarvasAhAyyakAriNaH.. 7-143-47 (51115) asmadIyA mayA rakShyAH prANabAdha upasthite. ye me pratyakShato vIrA hanyeranniti me matiH.. 7-143-48 (51116) sAtyakashcha vashaM nItaH kauraveNa mahAtmanA. tato mayaitachcharitaM pratij~nArakShaNaM prati.. 7-143-49 (51117) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-143-50x (4632) punashcha kR^ipayA.a.aviShTo bahu tattadvichintayan. uvAcha chainaM kauravyamarjunaH shokapIDitaH.. 7-143-50 (51118) dhigastu kShatradharmaM tu yatra tvaM puruSheshvaraH. avasthAmIdR^ishIM prAptaH sharaNyaH sharaNapradaH.. 7-143-51 (51119) nAtibhAraH kR^itAntasya vidyate kurunandana. yatra tvaM puruShavyAghraH prAptaH pApAmimAM dashAm.. 7-143-52 (51120) nAtmanaH sukR^itasyAsya phalaM vai nR^ipasattama. yatra tvaM kurushArdUla prAptaH pApAmimAM dashAm.. 7-143-53 (51121) rauravaM narakaM bhImaM gamiShyati suyodhanaH. yatkR^ite narashArdUlaH prAptaH pApAmimAM dashAm.. 7-143-54 (51122) ko hi nAma pumA.Nlloke mAdR^ishaH puruShottama. praharettvadvidhe tvadya pratij~nA yadi no bhavet'.. 7-143-55 (51123) evamuktaH sa pArthena shirasA bhUmimaspR^ishat. pANinA chaiva savyena prAhiNodasya dakShiNam.. 7-143-56 (51124) etatpArthasya tu vachastataH shrutvA mahAdyutiH. yupaketurmahArAja tUShNImAsIdavA~NmukhaH.. 7-143-57 (51125) arjuna uvAcha. 7-143-58x (4633) yA prItirdharmarAje me bhIme cha balinAM vare. nakule sahadeve cha sA me tvayi shalAgraja.. 7-143-58 (51126) mayA tvaM samanuj~nAtaH kR^iShNena cha mahAtmanA. gachCha puNyakR^itAM lokA~nChibiraushInaro yathA.. 7-143-59 (51127) vAsudeva uvAcha. 7-143-60x (4634) ye lokA mama vimalAH sakR^idvibhAtA brahmAdyaiH suravR^iShabhairapIShyamANAH. tAnkShipraM vraja satatAgnihotrayAji-- nmattulyo bhava garuDottamA~NgayAnaH.. 7-143-60 (51128) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-143-61x (4635) `dhana~njaye bruvatyevaM ghR^iNayA cha pariplute. avA~NmukhA babhUvushcha sainikAH sarva eva te.. 7-143-61 (51129) muhUrtAdiva vishramya sAtyakiH krodhamUrchChitaH. amarShavashamApannaH saumadattinirAkR^itaH'.. 7-143-62 (51130) utthitaH sa tu shaineyo vimuktaH saumadattinA. sa~NgamAdAya chichChitsuH shirastasya mahAtmanaH.. 7-143-63 (51131) nihataM pANDuputreNa prasaktaM bhUridakShiNam. iyeSha sAtyakirhantuM shalAgrajamakalmaSham.. 7-143-64 (51132) nikR^ittabhujamAsInaM Chinnahastamiva dvipam. kroshatAM sarvasainyAnAM nindyamAnaH sudurmanAH.. 7-143-65 (51133) vAryamANaH sa kR^iShNena pArthena cha mahAtmanA. bhImena chakrakShAbhyAmashvatthAmnA kR^ipeNa cha.. 7-143-66 (51134) karNena vR^iShasenena saindhavena tathaiva cha. vikroshatAM cha sainyAnAmavadhIttaM dhR^itavratam.. 7-143-67 (51135) prAyopaviShTasya raNe pArthena chChinnabAhunaH. sAtyakiH kauraveyasya kha~NgenApAharachChiraH.. 7-143-68 (51136) nAbhyanandanta taM sainyAH sAtyakiM tena karmaNA. arjunena hataM pUrvaM yajjaghAna kurUdvaham.. 7-143-69 (51137) sahasrAkShasamaM chaiva siddhachAraNamAnavAH. bhUrishravasamAlokya yuddhe prAyagataM hatam.. 7-143-70 (51138) apUjayanta taM devA vismitAste.asya karmabhiH. pakShavAdAMshcha subahUnprAvadaMstava sainikAH.. 7-143-71 (51139) na vArShNeyasyAparAdho bhavitavyaM hi tattathA. tasmAnmanyurna vaH kAryaH krodho duHkhataro nR^iNAm.. 7-143-72 (51140) hantavyashchaiSha vIreNa nAtra kAryA vichAraNA. vihito hyasya dhAtraiva mR^ityuH sAtyakirAhave.. 7-143-73 (51141) `martavyameva sarveNa charamaM pUrvameva vA. manyadhvaM mR^ita ityeSha mAbhUdvo buddhilAghavam.. 7-143-74 (51142) tasminhate mahAbAhau yUpaketau mahAtmani. dhigenamiti chAkrandankShatriyAH krodhamUrchChitAH.. 7-143-75 (51143) anye na yuktamityeva bhavitavyaM tatheti cha. kechidAsanvimanasaH kechidduHkhasamanvitAH'.. 7-143-76 (51144) sAtyakiruvAcha. 7-143-77x (4636) na hantavyo na hantavya iti mandAH prabhAShata. dharmavAdairadharmiShThA dharmaka~nchukamAsthitAH.. 7-143-77 (51145) yadA bAlaH subhadrAyAH sutaH shastraninAkR^itaH. yuShmAbhirnihato yuddhe tadA dharmaH kva vo gataH.. 7-143-78 (51146) mayA tvetatpratij~nAtaM kShepe kasmiMshchideva hi. `shrutvA tatsarvabhAvena garhayadhvaM na chArjunam. shR^iNudhvaM sarvameveha shrutvA garhatha mAnavAH'.. 7-143-79 (51147) yo mAM niShpiShya sa~Ngrame jIvanhanyAtpadA ruShA. sa me vadhyo bhavechChatruryadyapi syAnmunivrataH.. 7-143-80 (51148) cheShTamAnaM pratIghAte sabhujaM mAM sachakShuShaH. manyadhvaM mR^ita ityevametadvo buddhilAghavam.. 7-143-81 (51149) yukto hyasya pratIghAtaH kR^ito me kurupu~NgavAH.. 7-143-82 (51150) yattu pArthena mAM dR^iShTvA pratij~nAmabhirakShatA. sakha~Ngo.asya hR^ito bAhuretenaivAsmi va~nchitaH.. 7-143-83 (51151) bhavitavyaM hi yadbhAvi daivaM cheShTayate hi tat. soyaM hato vimarde.asminkimatrAdharmacheShTitam.. 7-143-84 (51152) api chApaM purA gItaH shloko vAlmIkinA bhuvi. na hantavyAH striya iti yadbravIShi plava~Ngama.. 7-143-85 (51153) sarvakAlaM manuShyeNa vyavasAyavatA sadA. pIDAkaramamitrANAM yatsyAtkartavyameva tat. anuShThitaM mayA tachcha kasmAdgarhatha mUDhavat.. 7-143-86 (51154) sa~nchaya uvAcha. 7-143-87x (4637) evamukte mahArAja sarve kauravapu~NgavAH. na sma kiMchidabhAShanta manasA samapUjayan.. 7-143-87 (51155) mantrabhipUtasya mahAdhvareShu yashasvino bhUrisahasradasya. munerivAraNyagatasya tasya na tatra kashchidvadhamabhyanandat.. 7-143-88 (51156) sunIlakeshaM varadasya tasya sUrasya pArAvatalohitAkSham. ashvasya medhyasya shiro nikR^ittaM nyastaM havirdhAnamivAntareNa.. 7-143-89 (51157) sa tejasA shastrakR^itena pUto mahAhave dehavaraM visR^ijya. AkrAmadUrdhvaM varado varArho vyAvR^ittya dharmeNa parema rodasI.. .. 7-143-90 (51158) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe trichatvAriMshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 143 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-143-5 viShaktasyAnyAsaktasya.. 5-143-6 yeShuyeShu satsvasatsu vA.. 5-143-* etadAdi 35 ttamashlokaparyantaM vidyamAnAnAM shlokAnAM sthAne adholikhitAH shlokAH jha. pustake santi. nachAtmA rakShitavyo vai rAjanraNagatena hi. yo yasya yujyate.artheShu sa vai rakShyo narAdhipa.. 1 .. tai rakShyamANaiH sa nR^ipo rakShitavyo mahAmR^idhe. yadyahaM sAtyakiM pashye vadhyamAnaM mahAraNe.. 2 .. tatastasya viyogena pApaM me.anarthato bhavet. rakShitashcha mayA yasmAttasmAtkrudhyasi kiM mayi.. 3 .. yachcha me garhase rAjannanyena saha sa~Ngatam. ahaM tvayA vinikR^itastatra me buddhivibhramaH.. 4 .. kavachaM dhunvatastubhyaM rathaM chArohataH svayam. dhanurjyAM karShatashchaiva yudhyataH saha shatrubhiH.. 5 .. evaM rathagajAkIrNe hayapattisamAkule. siMhanAdodbhatarave gambhIre sainyasAgare.. 6 .. svaiH paraishcha sametebhyaH sAtvatena cha sa~Ngame. ekasyaikena hi kathaM sa~NgramaH sambhaviShyati.. 7 .. bahubhiH saha sa~Ngamya nirjitya cha mahArathAn. shrAntashcha shrAntavAhashcha vimanAH shastrapIDitaH.. 8 .. IdR^ishaM sAtyakiM saMkhye nirjitya cha mahAratham. adhikatvaM vijAnIShe svavIryavashamAgatam.. 9 .. yadichChasi shirashchAsya asinA hantumAhave. tathA kR^ichChragataM chaiva sAtyakiM kaH kShamiShyati.. 10 .. tvaM vai vigarhayAtmAnamAtmAnaM yo na rakShasi. kathaM kariShyase vIra yo vA tvAM saMshrayejjanaH.. 11 .. 5-143-23 dakShiNaM bAhuM tatsthanIyam.. 5-143-37 prAyaM AmaraNAnashanaM prArabdhavAn.. 5-143-38 prANAnasUn prANeShuvAyuShu ajuhodAhitavAn.. 5-143-39 prasannamakalpamaSham.. 5-143-49 sa kathaM cha vadhaM nItaH iti ~Na. pAThaH. saH sAtyakiH vadhasuddisyeti sheShaH.. 5-143-52 nAtihAraH kR^itAntasyeti Tha.pAThaH. atihAraH parihAraH.. 5-143-56 dakShiNaM kR^ittamAtmanaH pANiM asyArjunasya samIpe prAhiNot prahitavAn.. 5-143-60 ye lokA iti shlokaH jha.gha.~na. pustakeShvevAsti. sakR^idvibhAtAH sahaprakAshAH. garuDasyottamA~Ngena pR^iShThena yAnaM yasya.. 5-143-64 prasaktamanyAsaktam.. 5-143-79 kShepe nindAmAm. jIvanniti dvitIyArthe prathamA.. 5-143-85 na hantavyA ityarthaM gha.~Na.jha.~na. pATheShvevAsti.. 5-143-89 varadasyArthitArthapradAtuH. havirdhAnamantareNa havirgR^ihasya madhye.. 5-143-143 trichatvAriMshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 144

.. shrIH ..

7.144. adhyAyaH 144

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sa~njayena dhR^itarAShTramprati sAtyakeH bhUrishravasA parAbhavakAraNakathanam.. 1 .. tathA yAdavAnAM prashaMsanam.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-144-0 (51159) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-144-0x (4638) ajito droNarAdheyavikarNakR^itavarmabhiH. `yashchaivotsahate vetuM samastaM mAmakaM balama'. tIrNaH sainyArNavaM vIraH pratishrutya yudhiShThire.. 7-144-1 (51160) sa kathaM kauraveyeNa samareShvanivAritaH. nigR^ihya bhUrishravasA balAdbhuvi nipAtitaH.. 7-144-2 (51161) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-144-3x (4639) shR^iNu rAjannihotpattiM shaineyasya yathA purA. yathA cha bhUrishravaso yatra te saMshayo nR^ipa.. 7-144-3 (51162) `brahmaNastvabhavatputro mAnaso.atrirmahAtapAH'. atreH putro.abhavatsomaH somasya tu budhaH smR^itaH.. 7-144-4 (51163) budhasyailo mahAbAhuH putra AsItpurUravAH. purUravasa Ayustu AyuSho nahuShaH sutaH.. 7-144-5 (51164) nahuShasya yayAtistu rAjA devarShisammataH. yayAterdevayAnyAM tu yadurjyeShTho.abhavatsutaH.. 7-144-6 (51165) yadorabhUdanvavAye AjamIDha iti smR^itaH. yAdavastasya tu sutaH shUrastrailokyasammataH.. 7-144-7 (51166) shUrasya shaurirnR^ivaro vasudevo mahAyashAH. dhanuShyanavaraH shUraH kArtavIryasamo yudhi. dhanuShyanavaraH shUraH kArtavIryasamo yudhi. tadvAryashchApi tatraiva kule shinirabhUnnR^ipa.. 7-144-8 (51167) etasminneva kAle tu devakasya mahAtmanaH. duhitaH svayaMvare rAjansarvakShatrasamAgame.. 7-144-9 (51168) tatra vai devakIM devIM vasudevArthamAshu vai. nirjitva pArthivAnsarvAnrathamAropayachChiniH.. 7-144-10 (51169) tAM dR^iShTvA devakIM shUro rathasthAM puruSharShabhaH. nAmR^iShyata mahAtejAH somadattaH shinernR^ipa.. 7-144-11 (51170) tayoryuddhamabhUdrAjandinArdhaM chitramudbhatam. bAhuyuddhaM subalinoH prasaktaM puruSharShabhaH.. 7-144-12 (51171) shininA somadattastu prasahya bhuvi pAtitaH. asimudyamya kesheShu pragR^ihya cha padA hataH.. 7-144-13 (51172) madhye rAjasahasrANAM prekShakANAM samantataH. kR^ipayA cha punastena sa jIveti visarjitaH.. 7-144-14 (51173) tadavasthaH kR^itastena somadatto.atha mAriSha. prAsAdayanmahAdevamamarShavashamAsthitaH.. 7-144-15 (51174) tasya tuShTo mahAdevo varANAM varadaH prabhuH. vareNa chChandayAmAsa sa tu vavre varaM nR^ipaH.. 7-144-16 (51175) putramichChAmi bhagavanyo nipAtya shineH sutam. madhye rAjasahasrANAM padA hanyAchcha saMyuge.. 7-144-17 (51176) tasya tadvachanaM shrutvA somadattasya pArthiva. evamastviti tatroktvA sa devo.antaradhIyata. sa tena varadAnena labdhavAnbhUridakShiNam.. 7-144-18 (51177) apAtayachcha samare saumadattiH shineH sutam. pashyatAM sarvasainyAnAM padA chainamatADayat.. 7-144-19 (51178) etatte kathitaM rAjanyanmAM tvaM paripR^ichChasi. na hi shakyo raNe jetuM sAtvato manujarShabhaiH.. 7-144-20 (51179) labdhalakShyAshcha sa~NgrAme bahushashchitrayodhinaH. devadAnavagandharvAnvijetAro hyavismitAH. svavIryavijaye yuktA naite paraparigrahAH.. 7-144-21 (51180) na tulyaM vR^iShNibhiriha dR^ishyate ki~nchana prabho. bhUtaM bhavyaM bhaviShyachcha balena bharatarShabha.. 7-144-22 (51181) na j~nAtimavamanyante vR^iddhAnAM shAsane ratAH.. 7-144-23 (51182) na devAsuragandharvA na yakShoragarAkShasAH. jetAro vR^iShNivIrANAM kiM punarmAnavA raNe.. 7-144-24 (51183) brahmadravye gurudravye j~nAtisve chApyahiMsakAH. eteShAM rakShitArashcha ye syuH kasyA~nchidApadi.. 7-144-25 (51184) arthavanto na chotsiktA brahmaNyAH satyavAdinaH. samarthAnnAvamanyante dInAnabhyudvaranti cha.. 7-144-26 (51185) nityaM devaparA dAntAstrAtArashchAvikatthanAH. tena vR^iShNipravIrANAM chakraM na pratihanyate.. 7-144-27 (51186) api meruM vahetkashchittaredvA makarAlayam. na tu vR^iShNipravIrANAM sametyAntaM vrajennR^ipa.. 7-144-28 (51187) etatte sarvamAkhyAtaM yatra te saMshayaH prabho. kururAja narashreShTha tava vyapanayo mahAn.. .. 7-144-29 (51188) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe chatushchatvAriMshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 144 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-144-21 parapagrahAH riparAdhInAH.. 21 .. 5-144-27 chakraM pratApaH.. 5-144-144 chatushchatvAriMshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 145

.. shrIH ..

7.145. adhyAyaH 145

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

kR^iShNArjunayoH saMvAdaH karNasAtyakyoryuddhaM cha.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-145-0 (51189) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-145-0x (4640) tadavasthe he tasminbhUrishravasi kaurave. yathA bhUyo.abhavadyuddhaM tanmamAchakShva sa~njaya.. 7-145-1 (51190) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-145-2x (4641) bhUrishravasi sa~NkrAnte paralokAya bhArata. vAsudevaM mahAbAhurarjunaH samachUchudat.. 7-145-2 (51191) arjuna uvAcha. 7-145-3x (4642) chodayAshvAnbhR^ishaM kR^iShNa yato rAjA jayadrathaH. [shrUyate puNDarIkAkSha triShu dharmeShu vartate.] pratij~nAM saphalAM chApi kartumarhasi me.anagha.. 7-145-3 (51192) astameti mahAbAho tvaramANo divAkaraH.. 7-145-4 (51193) etaddhi puruShavyAghra mahadabyudyataM mayA. kAryaM saMrakShyate chaiSha kurusenAmahArathaiH.. 7-145-5 (51194) yathA nAbhyeti sUryo.astaM yathA satyaM bhavedvachaH. chodayAshvAMstathA kR^iShNa yathA hanyAM jayadratham.. 7-145-6 (51195) `tataH kR^iShNo mahAbAhurashvAnrajatasannibhAn. hayaj~nashchodayAmAsa jayadrathavadhaM prati.. 7-145-7 (51196) taM prayAntamamogheShumutpatadbhirivAshugaiH. tvaramANA mahArAja senAmukhyAH samAdravan.. 7-145-8 (51197) duryodhanashcha karNashcha vR^iShaseno.atha madrarAT. ashvatthAmA kR^ipashchaiva svayameva cha saindhavaH.. 7-145-9 (51198) samAsAdya cha bIbhatsuH saindhavaM samupasthitam. netrAbhyAM krodhadIptAbhyAM sampraikShannirdahanniva'.. 7-145-10 (51199) yathAgnirindhaneddhau vai krodhendhanasamIritaH. saindhavasya mukhaM tyaktvA karNaH sAtvatamabhyayAt.. 7-145-11 (51200) upAyAntaM* tu rAdheyaM dR^iShTvA pArtho mahArathaH. prahasandevakIputramidaM vachanamabravIt.. 7-145-12 (51201) eSha prayAtyAdhirathiH sAtyakeH syandanaM prati. na mR^iShyati hataM nUnaM bhUrishravasamAhave.. 7-145-13 (51202) yatra yAtyeSha tatra tvaM chodayAshvA~njanArdana. na saumadattipadavIM gamayetsAtyakiM vR^iShaH.. 7-145-14 (51203) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-145-15x (4643) evamukto mahAbAhuH keshavaH savyasAchinA. pratyuvAcha mahAtejAH kAlayuktamidaM vachaH.. 7-145-15 (51204) alameSha mahAbAhuH karNAyaiko.api pANDava. kiM punardraupadeyAbhyAM sahitaH sAtvatarShabhaH.. 7-145-16 (51205) na cha tAvatkShamaH pArtha tava karNena sa~NgaraH. prajvalantI maholkeva tiShThatyasminhi vAsavI. tvadarthaM pUjyamAnaiShA rakShyate paravIrahan.. 7-145-17 (51206) `na karNaM prAkR^itaM manye tena yoddhuM na sAmpratam. yaH karNo balavAneSha shakto.asmA~njetumojasA.. 7-145-18 (51207) karNasyaiSha mahAndoSho yaddUyena padepade. pramAdAchcha ghR^iNitvAchcha tena shochiti me manaH'.. 7-145-19 (51208) ataH karNaH prayAtvatra sAtvatasya yathA tathA. ahaM j~nAsyAmi kaunteya kAlamasya durAtmanaH.. 7-145-20 (51209) yatrainaM vishikhaistIkShNaiH pAtayiShyasi bhUtale. tadA gantAsi pArtha tvaM tena yoddhuM durAtmanA.. 7-145-21 (51210) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-145-22x (4644) yo.asau karNena vIrasya vArShNeyasya samAgamaH. hate tu bhUrishravasi tadyuddhamabhavatkatham.. 7-145-22 (51211) sAtyakishchApi virathaH kaM samArUDhavAnratham. chakrarakShau cha pA~nchAlyau tanmamAchakShva sa~njaya.. 7-145-23 (51212) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-145-24x (4645) hanta te kathayiShyAmi yathAvR^ittaM mahAraNe. pashyatAM sarvasainyAnAM keshavAryunayorapi. shushrUShasva sthiro bhUtvA durAcharitamAtmanaH.. 7-145-24 (51213) xxmeva hi kR^iShNasya manogatamidaM prabho. vijetavyo yathA vIraH sAtyakiH saumadattinA.. 7-145-25 (51214) atItAnAgate rAjansa hi vetti janArdanaH. tataH sUtaM samAhUya dArukaM saMdidesha ha. 7-145-26 (51215) ratho me yujyatAM kalyamiti rAjanmahAbAlaH.. na hi devA na gandharvA na yakShoragarAkShasAH. mAnavA vA.api jetAraH kR^iShNayoH santi kechana. 7-145-27 (51216) pitAmahapurogAshcha devAH siddhAshcha taM viduH. tayoH prabhAvamatulaM shR^iNu yuddhaM tu tattathA.. 7-145-28 (51217) sAtyakiM virathaM dR^iShTvA karNaM chAbhyudyataM raNe. dadhmau sha~NkhaM mahAnAdamArShabheNAtha mAdhavaH.. 7-145-29 (51218) dAruko.avetya sandeshaM shrutvA sha~Nkhasya cha svanam. rathamanvAnayattasmai suparNochChritaketanam.. 7-145-30 (51219) sa keshavasyAnumate rathaM dArukasaMyutam. Aruroha shineH pautro jvalanAdityasannibham.. 7-145-31 (51220) kAmagaiH shaivyasugrIvameghapuShpavalAhakaiH. hayodagrairmahAvegairhemabhANDavibhUShitaiH.. 7-145-32 (51221) yuktaM samAruhya cha taM vimAnapratimaM ratham. abhyadravata rAdheyaM pravapansAyakAnbahUn.. 7-145-33 (51222) chakrarakShAvapi tadA yudhAmanyUttamaujasau. dhana~njayarathaM hitvA rAdheyaM pratyudIyatuH.. 7-145-34 (51223) rAdheyo.api mahArAja sharavarShaM samutsR^ijan. abhyadravatsusa~Nkruddho raNe shaineyamachyutam.. 7-145-35 (51224) naiva daivaM na gAndharvaM nAsuraM na cha rAkShasam. tAdR^ishaM bhuvi no yuddhaM divi vA shrutamityuta. upArasata tatsainyaM sarathAshvanaradvipam.. 7-145-36 (51225) tayordR^iShTvA mahArAja karma sammUDhachetasaH. sarve cha samapashyanta tadyuddhamatimAnuSham.. 7-145-37 (51226) tayornR^ivarayo rAjansArathyaM dArukasya cha.. 7-145-38 (51227) gatapratyAgatAvR^ittairmaNDalaiH sannivartanaiH. sArathestu rathasthasya kAshyapeyasya vismitAH.. 7-145-39 (51228) nabhastalagatAshchaiva devagAndharvadAnavAH. atIvAvahitA draShTuM karNashaineyayo raNam.. 7-145-40 (51229) mitrArthe tau parAkrAntau shuShmiNau spardhinau rame.. 7-145-41 (51230) karNashchAmarasa~NkAsho yuyudhAnashcha sAtyakiH. anyonyaM tau mahArAja sharavarShairavarShatAm.. 7-145-42 (51231) pramamAtha shineH pautraM karNaH sAyakavR^iShTibhiH. amR^iShyamANo nidhanaM kauravyajalasandhayoH.. 7-145-43 (51232) karNaH shokasamAviShTo mahoraga iva shvasan. sa shaineyaM raNe kruddhaH pradahanniva chakShuShA. abhyadhAvata vegena punaHpunararindama.. 7-145-44 (51233) taM tu sakrodhamAlokya sAtyakiH pratyayudhyata. mahatA sharavarSheNa gajaM pratigajo yathA.. 7-145-45 (51234) tau sametau naravyAghrau vyAghrAviva tarasvinau. anyonyaM santatakShAte raNe.anupamavikramau.. 7-145-46 (51235) tataH karNaM shineH pautraH sarvapArasavaiH sharaiH. bibheda sarvagAtreShu punaHpunararindama.. 7-145-47 (51236) sArathiM chAsya bhallena rathanIDAdapAtayat. ashvAMshcha chaturaH shvetAnnijaghAna shitaiH sharaiH.. 7-145-48 (51237) ChittvA dhvajaM rathaM chaiva shatadhA punarSharShabha. chakAra virathaM karNaM tava putrasya pashyataH.. 7-145-49 (51238) tato vimanaso rAjaMstAvakAste mahArathAH. vR^iShasenaH karNasutaH shalyo madrAdhipastathA. 7-145-50 (51239) droNaputrashcha shaineyaM sarvataH paryavArayan.. tataH paryAkulaM sarvaM na prAj~nAyata kiMchana.. 7-145-51 (51240) tathA sAtyakinA vIre virathe sUtaje kR^ite. hAhAkArastato rAjansarvasainyeShvabhUnmahAn.. 7-145-52 (51241) karNo.api viratho rAjansAtvatena kR^itaH sharaiH. duryodhanarathaM tUrNamAruroha viniHshvasan.. 7-145-53 (51242) mAnayaMstava putrasya bAlyAtprabhR^iti sauhR^idam. kR^itAM rAjyapradAnena pratij~nAM paripAlayan.. 7-145-54 (51243) tathA tu virathaM karNaM putrAMshcha paripAlayan.. duHshAsanamukhAnvIrAnnAvadhItsAtyakirvashI.. 7-145-55 (51244) rakShanpratij~nAM bhImena pArthena cha purAkR^itAm. virathAnvihvalAMshchakre na tu prANairvyayojayat.. 7-145-56 (51245) bhImasenena tu vadaH putrANAM te pratishrutaH. anudyUte cha pArthena vadhaH karNasya saMshrutaH.. 7-145-57 (51246) vadhe tvakurvanyatnaM te tasya karNamukhAstadA. nAshaknuvaMstato hantuM sAtyakiM pravarA rathAH.. 7-145-58 (51247) drauNishcha kR^itavarmA cha tathaivAnye mahArathAH. nirjitA dhanuShaikena shatashaH kShatriyarShabhAH. kA~NkShatA paralokaM cha dharmarAjasya cha priyam.. 7-145-59 (51248) kR^iShNayoH sadR^isho vIrye sAtyakiH shatrutApanaH. jitavAnsarvasainyAni tAvakAni hasanniva.. 7-145-60 (51249) kR^iShNo vA.api bhavelloke pArtho bA.api dhanurdharaH. shaineyo vA naravyAghra chaturthastu na vidyate.. 7-145-61 (51250) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-145-62x (4646) ajayyaM vAsudevasya rathamAsthAya sAtyakiH. virathaM kR^itavAnkarNaM vAsudevasamo yudhi. dArukeNa samAyuktaH svabAhubaladarpitaH.. 7-145-62 (51251) kachchidanyaM samArUDhaH sAtyakiH shatrutApanaH. etadichChAmyahaM shrotuM kushalo hyasi bhAShitum. asahyaM tamahaM manye tanmamAchakShva sa~njaya.. 7-145-63 (51252) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-145-64x (4647) shR^iNu rAjanyathAvR^ittaM rathamanyaM mahAmatiH. dArukasyAnujastUrNaM kalpanAvidikalpitam.. 7-145-64 (51253) AyasaiH kA~nchanaishchApi paTTaiH sannaddhakUbaram. tArAsahasrakhachitaM siMhadhvajapatAkinam.. 7-145-65 (51254) ashvairvAtajavairyuktaM hemabhANDaparichChadaiH. saindhavairindusa~NkAshaiH sarvashabdAtigairdR^iDhaiH.. 7-145-66 (51255) chitrakA~nchanasannAhairvAjimukhyairvishAmpate. ghaNTAjAlAkularavaM shaktitomaravidyutam.. 7-145-67 (51256) yuktaM sA~NgrAmikairdravyairbahushastraparichChadaiH. rathaM sampAdayAmAsa meghagambhIraniHsvanam.. 7-145-68 (51257) taM samAruhya shaineyastava sainyamupAdravat. dAruko.api yathAkAmaM prayayau keshavAntikam.. 7-145-69 (51258) karNasyApi rathaM rAja~nsha~NkhagokShIrapANDuraiH. chitrakA~nchanasannAhaiH sadashvairvegavattaraiH.. 7-145-70 (51259) hemakakShyAdhvajopetaM klR^iptayantrapatAkinam. agryaM rathaM suyantAraM bahushastraparichChadam. upAjahrustamAsthAya karNo.apyabhyadravadripUn.. 7-145-71 (51260) etatte sarvamAkhyAtaM yanmAM tvaM paripR^ichChasi. bhUyashchApi nibodhemaM tavApannayajaM kShayam.. 7-145-72 (51261) ekatriMshattava sutA bhImasenena pAtitAH. durmukhaM pramukhe kR^itvA satataM chitrayodhinam.. 7-145-73 (51262) shatasho nihatAH shUrAH sAtvatenArjunena cha. bhIShmaM pramukhataH kR^itvA bhagadattaM cha bhArata. evameSha kShayo vR^itto rAjandurmantrite tava.. .. 7-145-74 (51263) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe pa~nchatvAriMshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 145 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-145-3 hepuNDarIkAkSha sa jayadrathastriShu dharmeShu vartate iti shrUyate ke punaste trayo dharmAH. atrochyate. yadi yudhyamAno hanyate tadA tUrNaM svargaprAptireva tasya dharmaH. atha palAyamAno hanyate tadA narakaprAptireva tasya dharmaH. atha madbhayAtsvadeshaM gachChati tadA yashaHsharIranAsha eva tasya dharmaH. yAvadasau yuddhAbhimukhaH prathamadharme tiShThati tAvadeva hantumuchitaH ataH shIghramashvAMshchodayeti. kuNDalito.ayaM shlokArdhaH jha.pustaka eva dR^ishyate.. 5-145-7 hayaj~naH hayahR^idayaj~naH.. 5-145-8 AshugaiH mArutaiH.. 5-145-14 vR^iShaH karNaH.. 5-145-* ita Arabhya uttarAdhyAyastha--mandarashmiH sahasrAMshurasta~NgirimupAdravat iti 25 tamashlokaparyantaM vidyamAnAH shlokaH jha. pustake jayadrathavadhAdanantaraM vartante. 5-145-17 vAsavI shaktiriti sheShaH.. 5-145-20 yathA prayAti tathA prayAtviti yojyam. j~nAsyami j~nApayiShyAmi.. 5-145-21 yatra kAle.. 5-145-25 pUrvaM pUrvedyuH.. 5-145-26 kalyaM prAtaH.. 5-145-29 ArShabheNa svArthe tadvitaH. R^iShabhasvareNa.. 5-145-39 kAshyapeyasya dArukasya.. 5-145-57 anudyUte punardyUte.. 5-145-145 pa~nchachatvAriMshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 146

.. shrIH ..

7.146. adhyAyaH 146

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

arjunena karNeMprati tatkutabhImagarhaNAtitikShayA tadgarhaNapUrvakaM tatsutavadhapratij~nA.. 1 .. karNaduryodhanasaMvAdaH sa~NkulayuddhaM cha.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-146-0 (51264) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-146-0x (4648) tathA gateShu shUreShu teShAM mama cha sa~njaya. kiMsvidbhImArjunau chaiva sAtyakishchAkarottadA.. 7-146-1 (51265) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-146-2x (4649) viratho bhImaseno vai karNavAkshalyapIDitaH. amarShavashamApannaH phalgunaM vAkyamabravIt.. 7-146-2 (51266) punaHpunastUbaraka mUDha audariketi cha. akR^itAstraka mA yotsIrbAla sa~NgrAmakAtara.. 7-146-3 (51267) iti mAmabravItkarNaH pashyataste dhana~njaya. evaM vaktA cha me vadhyastena choktastathA hyaham.. 7-146-4 (51268) etadvrataM mahAbAho tvayA saha kR^itaM mayA. tathaitanmama kaunteya yathA tava na saMshayaH.. 7-146-5 (51269) tadvadhAya narashreShTha smaraitadvachanaM mama. yathA bhavati tatsatyaM tathA kuru dhana~njaya.. 7-146-6 (51270) tachChrutvA vachanaM tasya bhImasyAmitavikramaH. tato.arjuno.abravItkarNaM ki~nchidabhyetya saMyuge.. 7-146-7 (51271) karNakarNa vR^ithAdR^iShTe sUtaputrAtmasaMstuta. adharmabuddhe shR^iNu me yattvAM vakShyAmi sAmpratam.. 7-146-8 (51272) dvAvevaM karNa shUrANAM raNe dR^iShTau jayAjayau. tau chApyanityau rAdheya vAsavasyApi yudhyataH.. 7-146-9 (51273) `raNamutsR^ijya nirlajja gachChase cha punaH punaH. mAhAtmyaM pashya bhImasya karma janma kule tathA. noktavAnparuShaM yattvAM palAyanaparAyaNam.. 7-146-10 (51274) bhUyastvamapi sa~NgamyaM sakR^ideva yadR^ichChayA. virathaM kR^itavAnvIraM pANDavaM sUtadAyada.. 7-146-11 (51275) kulasya sadR^ishaM chApi rAdheya kR^itavAnasi. naikAntasiddhiH sa~NgrAme vAsavasyApi vidyate'.. 7-146-12 (51276) mumUrShuryuyudhAnena viratho vikalendriyaH. madvadhyastvamiti j~nAtvA jitvA jIvanvisarjitaH.. 7-146-13 (51277) yadR^ichChayA raNe bhImaM yudhyamAnaM mahAbalam. katha~nchidvirathaM kR^itvA yattvaM rUkShamabhAShathAH. adharmastveSha sumahAnanAryacharitaM cha tat.. 7-146-14 (51278) nAriM jitvA.atikatthante na cha jalpanti durvachaH. na cha ka~nchana nindanti santaH shUrA nararShabhAH.. 7-146-15 (51279) tvaM tu prAkR^itavij~nAnastattadvadasi sUtaja. bahvabaddhamakarNyaM cha chApalAdaparIkShitam.. 7-146-16 (51280) yudhyamAnaM parAkrAntaM shUramAryavrate ratam. yadavocho.apriyaM bhImaM naitatsatyaM vachastava. pashyatAM sarvasainyAnAM keshavasya mamaiva cha.. 7-146-17 (51281) viratho bhImasenena kR^ito.asi bahusho raNe. na cha tvAM paruShaM ki~nchiduktavAnpANDunandanaH.. 7-146-18 (51282) yasmAttu bahu rUkShaM cha shrAvitaste vR^ikodaraH. parokShaM yachcha saubhadro yuShmAbhirbahubhirhataH. tasmAdasyAvalepasya sadyaH phalamavApnuhi.. 7-146-19 (51283) tvayA tasya dhanushChinnamAtmanAshAya durmate. tasmAdvadhyo.asi me mUDha sabhR^ityasutabAndhavaH.. 7-146-20 (51284) kuru tvaM sarvakR^ityAni mahatte bhayamAgatam. hantA.asmi vR^iShasenaM te prekShamANasya saMyuge.. 7-146-21 (51285) ye chAnye.apyupayAsyanti buddhimohena mAM nR^ipAH. tAMshcha sarvAnhaniShyAmi satyenAyudhamAlabhe.. 7-146-22 (51286) tvAM cha mUDhAkR^itapraj~namatimAninamAhave. dR^iShTvA duryodhano mando bhR^ishaM tapsyati pAtitam.. 7-146-23 (51287) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-146-24x (4650) arjunena pratij~nAte vadhe karNasutasya tu. mahAnsutumulaH shabdo babhUva rathinAM tadA.. 7-146-24 (51288) tasminnAkulasa~NgrAme vartamAne mahAbhaye. mandarashmiH sahasrAMshurasta~NgirimupAdravat.. 7-146-25 (51289) tato duryodhano rAjA rAdheyaM tvarito.abravIt. arjunaM prekShya saMyAtaM jayadrathavadhaM prati.. 7-146-26 (51290) `amAnuShANi karmANi kurvantau bharatarShabha. sAtyakiM bhImasenaM cha yattau tau darshayanniva.. 7-146-27 (51291) ayaM sa vaikartana yuddhakAlo vidarshayasvAtmabalaM mahAtman. yathA na vadhyeta raNe.arjunena jayadrathaH karNa tathA kuruShva.. 7-146-28 (51292) alpAvasheSho divaso hi sAmprataM nivArayehAdya ripuM sharaughaiH. dinakShayaM prApya narapravIra dhruvo hi naH karNa jayo bhaviShyati.. 7-146-29 (51293) saindhave rakShyamANe tu sUryasyAstamanaM prati. mithyApratij~naH kaunteyaH pravekShyati hutAshanam.. 7-146-30 (51294) anarjunAyAM cha bhuvi muhUrtamapi mAnada. jIvituM notsaheranvai bhrAtaro.asya sahAnugAH.. 7-146-31 (51295) pANDaveShu vinaShTeShu sashailavanakAnanAm. vasundharAmimAM karNa bhokShyAmo mahatakaNTakAm.. 7-146-32 (51296) daivenopahataH pArtho viparItashcha mAnada. kAryAkAryamajAnAnaH pratij~nAM kR^itavAnraNe.. 7-146-33 (51297) nUnamAtmavinAshAya pANDavena kirITinA. mithyApratij~naiva kR^itA jayadrathavadhaM prati.. 7-146-34 (51298) kathaM jIvati durdharShe tvapi rAdheya phalgunaH. anasta~Ngata Aditye hanyAtsaindhavakaM nR^ipam.. 7-146-35 (51299) rakShitaM madrarAjena kR^ipeNa cha mahAtmanA. jayadrathaM raNamukhe kathaM hanyAddhana~njayaH.. 7-146-36 (51300) drauNinA rakShyamANaM cha mayA duHshAsanena cha. kathaM prApsyati bIbhatsuH saindhavaM kAlachoditaH.. 7-146-37 (51301) yudhyante bahavaH shUrA lambate cha divAkaraH. sha~Nke jayadrathaM pArtho naiva prApsyati mAnada.. 7-146-38 (51302) sa tvaM karNa mayA sArdhaM shUraishchAnyairmahArathaiH. drauNinA tvaM hi sahito madreshena kR^ipeNa cha. yudhyasva yatnamAsthAya paraM pArthena saMyuge.. 7-146-39 (51303) evamuktastu rAdheyastava putreNa mAriSha. duryodhanamidaM vAkyaM pratyuvAcha kurUttamam.. 7-146-40 (51304) dR^iDhalakShyeNa vIreNa bhImasenena dhanvinA. bhR^ishaM bhinnatanuH sa~Nkhye sharajAlairanekashaH.. 7-146-41 (51305) sthAtavyamiti tiShThAmi raNe samprati mAnada. nA~Ngami~Ngati ki~nchinme santaptasya maheShubhiH. yotsyAmi tu yathAshaktyA tvadarthaM jIvitaM mama.. 7-146-42 (51306) `tattathA prayatiShye.ahaM paraM shaktyAxxxxsuyodhana'. yathA pANDavamukhyo.asau na haniShyAti saindhavam.. 7-146-43 (51307) na hi me yudhyamAnasya sAyakAnasyataH shitAn. saindhavaM prApsyate vIraH savyasAchI dhana~njayaH.. 7-146-44 (51308) yattu bhaktimatA kAryaM satataM hitakA~NkShiNA. tatkariShyAmi kauravya jayo daive pratiShThitaH.. 7-146-45 (51309) saindhavArthe paraM yatnaM kariShyAmyadya saMyuge. tvatpriyArthaM mahArAja jayo daive pratiShThitaH.. 7-146-46 (51310) adya yotsye.arjumahaM pauruShaM svaM vyapAshritaH. tvadarthe puruShavyAghra jayo daive pratiShThitaH.. 7-146-47 (51311) adya yuddhaM kurushreShTha mama pArthasya chobhayoH. pashyantu sarvasainyAni dAruNaM romaharShaNam.. 7-146-48 (51312) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-146-49x (4651) karNakauravayorevaM raNe saMbhAShamANayoH. arjuno nishitairbANairjaghAna tava vAhinIm.. 7-146-49 (51313) chichCheda nishitairbANaiH shUrANAmanivartinAm.. 7-146-50 (51314) bhujAnparighasa~NkAshAnhastihastopamAnraNe. shirAMsi cha mahAbAhushchichCheda nishitaiH sharaiH.. 7-146-51 (51315) hastihastAndvipaskandhAnrathAkShAMshcha samantataH. shoNitAktAnhayArohAngR^ihItaprAsatomarAn.. 7-146-52 (51316) kShuraishchichCheda bIbhatsurdvidhaikaikaM tridhaiva cha. hayAnvAraNamukhyAMshcha padAtIMshcha samantataH. dhvajAMshChatrANi chApAni chAmarANi shirAMsi cha.. 7-146-53 (51317) kakShamagnirivoddhUtaH prAdahattava vAhinIm. achireNa mahIM pArthashchakAra rudhirottarAm.. 7-146-54 (51318) hatabhUyiShThayodhaM tatkR^itvA tava balaM balI. AsasAda durAdharShaH saindhavaM satyavikramaH.. 7-146-55 (51319) bIbhatsurbhImasenena sAtvatena cha rakShitaH. prababhau bharatashreShTha jvalanniva hutAshanaH.. 7-146-56 (51320) taM tathA.avasthitaM dR^iShTvA tvadIyA vIrasaMmatAH. nAmR^iShyanta maheShvAsAH pANDavaM puruSharShabhAH.. 7-146-57 (51321) duryodhanashcha karNashcha vR^iShaseno.atha madrarAT. ashvatthAmA kR^ipashchaiva svayameva cha saindhavaH.. 7-146-58 (51322) sannaddhAH saindhavasyArthe samAvR^iNvankirITinam. nR^ityantaM rathamArgeShu dhanurjyAtalaniHsvanaiH.. 7-146-59 (51323) sa~NgrAmakovidaM pArthaM sarve yuddhavishAradAH. abhItAH paryavartanta vyAditAsyamivAntakam.. 7-146-60 (51324) saindhavaM pR^iShThataH kR^itvA jighAMsanto.achyutArjunau. sUryAstamanamichChanto lohitAyati bhAskare.. 7-146-61 (51325) te bhujairbhogibhogAbhairdhanUMShyAnamya sAyakAn. mumuchuHsUryarashmyAbhA~nChatashaH phalgunaM prati.. 7-146-62 (51326) tatastAnasyamAnAMshcha kirITI yuddhadurmadaH. dvidhA tridhA.aShTadhaikaikaM ChittvA vivyAdha tAnrathAn.. 7-146-63 (51327) siMhalA~NgUlaketustu darshayanvIryamAtmanaH. shAradvatIsuto rAjannarjunaM pratyavArayan.. 7-146-64 (51328) sa vidvA dashabhiH pArthaM vAsudevaM cha saptabhiH. atiShThadrathamArgeShu saindhavaM pratipAlayan.. 7-146-65 (51329) athainaM kauravashreShThAH sarva eva mahArathAH. mahatA rathavaMshena sarvataH pratyavArayan.. 7-146-66 (51330) viShphArayantashchApAni visR^ijantashcha sAyakAn. saindhavaM paryarakShanta shAsanAttanayasya te.. 7-146-67 (51331) tataH pArthasya shUrasya bAhvorbalamadR^ishyata. iShUNAmakShayatvaM cha dhanuSho gANDivasya cha.. 7-146-68 (51332) astrairastrANi saMvArya drauNeH shAradvatasya cha. ekaikaM dashabhirbANaiH sarvAneva samArpayat.. 7-146-69 (51333) taM drauNiH pa~nchaviMshatyA vR^iShasenashcha saptabhiH. duryodhanashcha viMshatyA karNashalyau tribhistribhiH.. 7-146-70 (51334) ta enamabhigarjanto vidhyantashcha punaHpunaH. vidhunvantashcha chApAni sarvataH pratyavArayan.. 7-146-71 (51335) shliShTaM cha sarvatashchakrU rathamaNDalamAshu te. sUryAstamanamichChantastvaramANA mahArathAH.. 7-146-72 (51336) ta enamabhinardantau vidhunvAnA dhanUMShi cha. siShichurmArgaNaistIkShNairgiriM meghA ivAmbubhiH.. 7-146-73 (51337) te mahAstrANi divyAni tatra rAjanvyadarshayan. dhana~njayasya gAtre tu shUrAH parighabAhavaH.. 7-146-74 (51338) `nivArya tA~nsharavrAtairdivyAnyastrANi darshayan'. hatabhUyiShThayodhaM tatkR^itvA tava balaM balI. AsasAda durAdharShaH saindhavaM satyavikramaH.. 7-146-75 (51339) taM karNaH saMyuge rAjanpratyavArayadAshugaiH. miShato bhImasenasya sAtvatasya cha bhArata.. 7-146-76 (51340) taM pArtho dashabhirbANaiH pratyavidhyadrANAjire. sUtapUtraM mahAbAhuH sarvasainyasya pashyataH.. 7-146-77 (51341) sAtvatashcha tribhirbANaiH karNaM vivyAdha mAriSha. bhImasenastribhishchaiva punaH pArthashcha saptabhiH.. 7-146-78 (51342) tAnkarNaH prativivyAdha ShaShTyAShaShTyA mahArathaH. tadyuddhamabhavadrAjankarNasya bahubhiH saha.. 7-146-79 (51343) tatrAdbhUtamapashyAma sUtaputrasya mAriSha. yadekaH samare kruddhastrInrathAnparthavArayat.. 7-146-80 (51344) phalgunastu mahAbAhuH karNaM vaikartanaM raNe. sAyakAnAM shatenaiva sarvamarmasvatADayat.. 7-146-81 (51345) rudhirokShitasarvA~NgaH sUtaputraH pratApavAn. sharaiH pa~nchAshatA vIraH phalgunaM pratyavidhyata.. 7-146-82 (51346) tasya tallAghavaM dR^iShTvA nAmR^iShyata raNe.arjunaH. tasya pArtho dhanushChittvA vivyAdhainaM stanAntare. sAyakairnavabhirvIrastvaramANo dhana~njayaH.. 7-146-83 (51347) athAnyaddhanurAdAya sUtaputraH pratApavAn. sAyakairaShTasAhasraishChAdayAmAsa pANDavam.. 7-146-84 (51348) tAM bANavR^iShTimatulAM karNachApasamutthitAm. vyadhamatsAyakaiH pArthaH shalabhAniva mArutaH.. 7-146-85 (51349) ChAdayAmAsa cha tadA sAyakairarjuno raNe. pashyatAM sarpayodhAnAM darshayanpANilAghavam.. 7-146-86 (51350) vadhArthaM chAsya samare sAyakaM sUryavarchasam. chikShepa tvarayA yuktastvarAkAle dhana~njayaH.. 7-146-87 (51351) tamApatantaM vegena drauNishchichCheda sAyakam. ardhachandreNa tIkShNena sa chChinnaH prApatadbhUvi.. 7-146-88 (51352) karNo.api dviShatAM hantA ChAdayAmAsa phalgunam. sAyakairbahusAhasraiH kR^itapratikR^itepsayA.. 7-146-89 (51353) tau vR^iShAviva nardantau narasiMhau mahArathau. sAyakaistu pratichChannaM chakratuH khamajihmagaiH.. 7-146-90 (51354) adR^ishyau cha sharauthaistau nighntAvitaretaram. karNa pArtho.asti tiShThatvaM karNo.ahaM tiShTha phalgunna.. 7-146-91 (51355) ityevaM tarjayantau tau vAkshalyaistu parasparam. vidhyetAM samare vIrau chitraM laghu cha suShThu cha.. 7-146-92 (51356) prekShaNIyau chAbhavatAM sarvayodhasamAgame. prashasyAmAnau samare siddhachAraNapannagaiH.. 7-146-93 (51357) ayudhyetAM mahArAja parasparavadhaiShiNau. tato duryodhano rAjaMstAvakAnabhyabhAShata.. 7-146-94 (51358) yatnAdrakShata rAdheyaM nAhatvA samare.arjunam. nivartiShyati rAdheyo na vA.ajitvA.adya phalgunaM.. 7-146-95 (51359) etasminntare rAjandR^iShTvA karNasya vikramam. AkarNamuktairiShubhiH karNasya chaturo hayAn. anayatpretalokAya chaturbhiH shvetavAhanaH.. 7-146-96 (51360) sArathiM chAsya bhallena rathanIDAdapAtayat. ChAdayAmAsa sa sharaistava putrasya pashyataH.. 7-146-97 (51361) sa~nChAdyamAnaH samare hatAshvo hatasArathiH. mohitaH sharajAlena kartavyaM nAbhyapadyata.. 7-146-98 (51362) taM tathA virathaM dR^iShTvA rathamAropya taM tadA. ashvatthAmA mahArAja bhUyo.arjunamayodhayat.. 7-146-99 (51363) madrarAjashcha kaunteyamavidhyattriMshatA sharaiH. `Avavre.arjunamArgaM cha sharajAlena bhArata'.. 7-146-100 (51364) shAradvatastu viMshatyaM vAsudevaM samArpayat. dhana~njayaM dvAdashabhirAjaghAna shilImukhaiH.. chaturbhiH sindhurAjashcha vR^iShasenashcha saptabhiH. pR^ithakpR^itha~NmahArAja vivyadhuH kR^iShNapANDavau.. 7-146-101 (51365) tathaiva tAnpratyavidhyatkuntIputro dhana~njayaH. droNaputraM chatuHShaShTyA madrarAjaM shatena cha.. saindhavaM dashabhirbANairvR^iShasenaM tribhiH sharaiH. shAradvataM cha viMshatyA vidvvA pArtho nanAda ha.. 7-146-102 (51366) te pratij~nApratIghAtamichChantaH savyasAchinaH. sahitAstAvakAstUrNamabhipeturdhana~njayam.. 7-146-103 (51367) athArjunaH sarvato vAruNAstraM prAdushchakre trAsayandhArtarAShTrAn. taM pratyudIyaH kuruvaH pANDuputraM rathairmahArhaiH sharavarShaM sR^ijantaH.. 7-146-104 (51368) tatastu tasmiMstumale samutthite sudAruNe bhAratamohanIye. no muhyata prApya sa rAjaputraH kirITamAlI vyasR^ijachCharaughAn.. 7-146-105 (51369) vadhaprepsuH savyasAchI kurUNAM smarankleshAndvAdashavarShavR^ittAn. gANDIvamuktairiShubhirmahAtmA sarvA disho vyAvR^iNodaprameyaH.. 7-146-106 (51370) pradIptolkamabhavachchAntarikShaM mR^iteShu deheShvapatanvayAMsi. yatpi~Ngalajyena kirITamAlI kruddho ripUnAjagavena hanti.. 7-146-107 (51371) tataH kirITi mahatA mahAyashAH sharAsanenAsya sharAnanIkajit. hayapravekottamanAgaghUrNitA-- nkurupravIrAniShubhirvyApAtayat.. 7-146-108 (51372) gadAshcha gurvIH parighAnayasmayA-- nasIMshcha shaktIshcha raNe narAdhipAH. mahAnti shastrANi cha bhImadarshanAH pragR^ihya pArthaM sahasA.abhidudruvuH.. 7-146-111 (51373) tato yugAntAbhrasamasvanaM maha-- nmahendrachApapratimaM cha gANDivam. chakarSha dorbhyoM vihasanbhR^ishaM yayau dahaMstvahIyAnyamarAShTravardhanaH.. 7-146-112 (51374) sa tAnudIrNAnsarathAnsavAraNA-- npadAtisa~NghAMshcha mahAdhanurdharaH. vipannasarvAyudhajIvitAnraNe chakAra vIro yamarAShTravardhanAn.. .. 7-146-113 (51375) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe ShaTchatvAriMshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 146 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-146-33 upahato mohitaH. viparIto.anyathAbhUtaprakR^itiH.. 5-146-41 dR^iDhalakShyeNa dR^iDhaprahAreNa.. 5-146-45 pratiShThitaH adhInaH.. 5-146-106 sarvartodAramastraM iti. ka.kha.Ta.pAThaH. sarvataH sAramastraM iti ~Na. pAThaH.. 5-146-107 prApya yuddhamiti sheShaH.. 5-146-110 Asya samantataH kShiptvA.. 5-146-146 ShaTchatvAriMshadadhikachatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 147

.. shrIH ..

7.147. adhyAyaH 147

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

alpasheShe divase tirohite cha jayadrathe kR^iShNenAndhakArasarjanena sUryabimbapidhAnam.. 1 .. adR^ishyamAne bhAnau jayadrathe cha niHsha~NkamAtmAnamAviShkurvati arjunena kR^iShNachodanayA tachChirashChedaH.. 2 .. kR^iShNenArjunamprati jayadrathashiraH bUtale na nipAtanIyamityukte tena tamprati tatkAraNakathanaprArthanA.. 3 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-147-0 (51376) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-147-0x (4652) shrutvA ninAdaM dhanuShashcha tasya vispaShR^imutkaShTamivAntakasya. shakrAshanisphoTasamaM sughoraM vikR^iShyamANasya dhana~njayena.. 7-147-1 (51377) trAsodvignaM tathoddhAntaM tvadIyaM tadbalaM nR^ipa. yugAntavAtasa~NkShubdhaM chaladvIchitara~Ngitam. pralInamInamakaraM sAgarAmbha ivAbhavat.. 7-147-2 (51378) `madhyandinagataM sUryamApatantamivAmbare. na shekuH sarvabhUtAni pANDavaM prativIkShitum'.. 7-147-3 (51379) sa raNe vyacharatpArthaH prekShyamANo dhana~njayaH. yugapaddikShu sarvAsu sarvANyastrANi darshayan.. 7-147-4 (51380) AdadAnaM mahArAja sandadhAnaM cha pANDavam. utkarShantaM sR^ijantaM cha na sma pashyAma lAghavAt.. 7-147-5 (51381) [tataH kruddho mahAbAhuraindramastraM durAsadam. prAdushchakre mahArAja trAsayansarvabhAratAn.. 7-147-6 (51382) tataH sharAH prAdurAsandivyAstrapratimantritAH. pradIpAshcha shikhimukhAH shatasho.atha sahasrashaH.. 7-147-7 (51383) AkarNapUrNanirmuktairagnyarkAMshunibhaiH sharaiH. nabho.abhavattadduShprekShyamulkAbhiriva saMvR^itam.. 7-147-8 (51384) tataH shastrAndhakAraM tatkauravaiH samudIritam. ashakyaM manasA.apyanyaiH pANDavaH sambhramanniva.. 7-147-9 (51385) nAshayAmAsa vikramya sharairdivyAstramantritaiH. naishaM tamoMshubhiH kShipraM dinAdAviva bhAskaraH.. 7-147-10 (51386) tatastu tAvakaM sainyaM dIptaiH sharagabhastibhiH. AkShipatpalvalAmbUni nidAghArka iva prabhuH.. 7-147-11 (51387) tato divyAstraviduShA prahitAH sAyakAMshavaH. samAplavandviShatsainyaM lokaM bhAgorivAMshavaH.. 7-147-12 (51388) athApare samutsR^iShTA vishikhAstigmatejasaH. hR^idayAnyAshu vIrANAM vivishuH priyabandhuvat.. 7-147-13 (51389) ya enamIyuH samare tvadyodhAH shUramAninaH. shalabhA iva te dIptamagniM prApya yayuH kShayam.. 7-147-14 (51390) evaM sa mR^idra~nshatrUNAM jIvitAni yashAMsi cha. pArthashchachAra sa~NgrAme mR^ityurvigrahavAniva.. 7-147-15 (51391) sa kirITAni vastrANi sA~NgadAnvipulAnbhujAn. sakuNDalayugAnkarNAnkeShA~nchidaharachCharaiH.. 7-147-16 (51392) satomarAngajasthAnAM saprAsAnhayasAdinAm. sacharmaNaH padAtInAM rathinAM cha sadhanvanaH. sapratodAnniyantR^INAM bAhUMshchichCheda pANDavaH.. 7-147-17 (51393) pradIptograsharArjiShmAnbabhau tatra dhana~njayaH. savisphuli~NgAgrashikho jvalanniva hutAshanaH.. 7-147-18 (51394) taM devarAjapratimaM sarvashastrabhR^itAM varam. yugapaddikShu sarvAsu rathasthaM puruSharShabham.. 7-147-19 (51395) nikShipantaM mahAstrANi prekShaNIyaM dhana~njayam. nR^ityantaM rathamArgeShu dhanurjyAtalanAdinam.. 7-147-20 (51396) nirIkShituM na shekuste yatnavanto.api pArthivAH. madhyandinagataM sUryaM pratapantamivAmbare.. 7-147-21 (51397) dIptograsambhR^itasharaH kirITI virarAja ha. varShAsvivodIrNajalaH sendradhanvAmbudo mahAn.. 7-147-22 (51398) mahAstrasaMpluve tasmi~njiShNunA sampravartite. sudustare mahAghore mamajjuryodhapu~NgavAH.. 7-147-23 (51399) utkR^ittavadanairdehaiH sharIraiH kR^ittabAhubhiH. bhujaishcha pANinirmuktaiH pANibhirvya~NgulIkR^itaiH.. 7-147-24 (51400) kR^ittAgrahastaiH karibhiH kR^ittadantairmadotkaTaiH. hayaishcha vidhuragrIvai rathaishcha shakalIkR^itaiH.. 7-147-25 (51401) nikR^ittAntraiH kR^ittapAdaistathA.anyaiH kR^ittasandhibhiH. nishcheShTairvisphuradbhishcha shatasho.atha sahasrashaH.. 7-147-26 (51402) mR^ityorAghAtalalitaM tatpArthAyodhanaM mahat. apashyAma mahIpAla bhIrUNAM bhayavardhanam.. 7-147-27 (51403) AkrIDamiva rudrasya purAbhyardayataH pashUn. gajAnAM kShuranirmuktaiH karaiH sabhujageva bhUH.. 7-147-28 (51404) kvajidbabhau sragviNIva vaktrapadmaiH samAchitA. vichitroShNIShamukuTaiH keyUrA~NgadakuNDalaiH.. 7-147-29 (51405) svarNachitratanutraishcha bhANDaishcha gajavAjinAm. kirITashatasa~NgIrNA tatra tatra samAchitA. virAja bhR^ishaM chitrA mahI navavadhUriva.. 7-147-30 (51406) majjAmedaHkardaminIM shoNitaughatara~NgiNIm. marmAsthibhiragAdhAM cha keshashaivalashAdvalAm.. 7-147-31 (51407) shirobAhUpalataTAM rugNakroDAsthisa~NkaTAm. chitradhvajapatAkADhyAM ChatrAchApormimAlinIm.. 7-147-32 (51408) vigatAsumahAkAyAM gajadehAbhisa~NkulAm. rathoDupashatAkIrNAM hayasa~NghAtarodhasam.. 7-147-33 (51409) rathachakrayugeShAkShakUbarairatidurgamAm. prAsAsishaktiparashuvishikhAhidurAsadAm.. 7-147-34 (51410) balaka~NkumahAnakrAM gomAyumakarotkaTAm. gR^ighrodagramahAgrAhAM shivAvirutabhairavAm.. 7-147-35 (51411) nR^ityatpretapishAchAdyairbhUtAkIrNAM sahasrashaH. gatAsuyodhanishcheShTasharIrashatavAhinIm.. 7-147-36 (51412) mahApratibhayAM raudrAM ghorAM vaitaraNImiva. nadIM pravartayAmAsa bhIrUNAM bhayavardhinIm.. 7-147-37 (51413) taM dR^iShTvA tasya vikrAntamantakasyeva rUpiNaH. abhUtapUrvaM kuruShu bhayamAgAdraNAjire.. 7-147-38 (51414) tata AdAya vIrANAmastrairastrANi pANDavaH. AtmAnaM raudramAchaShTa raudrakarmaNyadhiShThitaH.. 7-147-39 (51415) tato rathavarAnrAjannatyatikrAmadarjunaH..] 7-147-40 (51416) madhyandinagataM sUryaM pratapantamivAmbare. na shekuH sarvabhUtAni pANDavaM prativIkShitum.. 7-147-41 (51417) prasR^itAMstasya gANDIvAchCharavrAtAnmahAtmanaH. sa~NgrAme samprapashyAmo haMsapa~NktirivAmbare.. 7-147-42 (51418) vinivArya sa vIrANAmastrairastrANi sarvataH. darshayanraudramAtmAnamugre karmaNi dhiShThitaH.. 7-147-43 (51419) sa tAnrathavarAnrAjannatyAkrAmattadA.arjunaH. mohayanniva nArAchairjayadrathavadhepsayA.. 7-147-44 (51420) visR^ijandikShu sarvAsu sharAnachyutasArathiH. saratho vyacharattUrNaM prekShaNIyo dhana~njayaH.. 7-147-45 (51421) bhramanta iva shUrasya sharavrAtAH mahAtmanaH. adR^ishyantAntarikShasthAH shatasho.atha sahasrashaH.. 7-147-46 (51422) AdadAnaM maheShvAsaM sandadhAnaM cha sAyakam. visR^ijantaM cha kaunteyaM nAnupashyAma vai tadA.. 7-147-47 (51423) tathA sarvA disho rAjansarvAMshcha rathino raNe. AkulIkR^itya kaunteyo jayadrathamupAdravat. vivyAdha cha chatuHShaShTyA sharANAM nataparvaNAm.. 7-147-48 (51424) [saindhavAbhimukhaM yAntaM yodhAH samprekShya pANDavam. nyavartanta raNAdvIrA nirAshAstasya jIvite.. 7-147-49 (51425) yo yo.abhyadhAvadAkrande tAvakaH pANDavaM raNe. tasyatasyAntagA bANAH sharIre nyapatanprabho.. 7-147-50 (51426) kabandhasa~NkulaM chakre tava sainyaM mahArathaH. arjuno jayatAM shreShThaH sharairagnyaMshusannibhaiH.. 7-147-51 (51427) evaM tattava rAjendra chatura~NgabalaM tadA. vyAkulIkR^itya kaunteyo jayadrathamupAdravat.. 7-147-52 (51428) drauNiM pa~nchAshatA.avidhyadvR^iShasenaM tribhiH sharaiH. kR^ipAyamANaH kaunteyaH kR^ipaM navabhirArdayat.. 7-147-53 (51429) shalyaM ShoDashabhirbANaiH karNaM dvAtriMshatA sharaiH. saindhavaM tu chatuHShaShTyA vidvvA siMha ivAnadat..] 7-147-54 (51430) saindhavastu tathA viddhaH sharairgANDIvadhanvanA. na chakShame susa~NkruddhastotrArdita iva dvipaH.. 7-147-55 (51431) sa varAhadhvajastUrNaM gArdhrapatrAnajihmagAn. kruddhAshIviShasa~NkAshAnkarmAraparimArjitAn.. 7-147-56 (51432) AkarNapUrNAMshchikShepa phalgunasya rathaM prati. tribhistu vidvA govindaM nArAchaiH ShaDbhirarjunam.. 7-147-57 (51433) aShTabhirvAjino.avidhyaddhvajaM chaikena patriNA. `bhUyashchaivArjunaM sa~Nkhye sharavarShairavAkirat'.. 7-147-58 (51434) sa vikShipyArjunastUrNaM saindhavaprahitA~nsharAn. yugapattasya chichCheda sharAbhyAM saindhavasya ha. sAratheshcha shiraH kAyAdvvajaM cha samala~NkR^itam.. 7-147-59 (51435) sa chChinnayaShTiH sumahAndhana~njayasharAhataH. varAhaH sindhurAjasya papAtendusamaprabhaH.. 7-147-60 (51436) AdityaM prekShamANastu bIbhatsuH sR^ikviNI lihan. apashyannAntaraM tasya rakShibhiH saMvR^itasya vai.. 7-147-61 (51437) abhavaktrodharaktAkSho vyAttAnana ivAntakaH. athAbravIdvAsudevaH kuntIputraM dhana~njayam.. 7-147-62 (51438) naiva shakyastvayA hantuM nirvyAjaM bharatarShabha. srakShyAmyahamupAyaM tamAdityasyApavAraNe. tato.astaM gatamAdityaM maMsyate sindhurADiha.. 7-147-63 (51439) tato.asya vismayaH pArtha harShashchaiva bhaviShyati. AtmajIvitalAbhAchcha pratij~nAyAshcha nAshanAt.. 7-147-64 (51440) asta~NgatamivAdityaM dR^iShTvA mohena bAlishaH. na hi shakShyatyathA.a.atmAnaM rakShituM harShasambhavAt.. 7-147-65 (51441) etasminneva kAle tu prahartavyaM dhana~njaya. jayadrathasya kShudrasya savidurdarshanArthinaH.. 7-147-66 (51442) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-147-67x (4653) evamuktvA tataH pArthaM kShipramevAharatprabhAm. janArdanena sR^iShTaM vai tama AdityanAshanam.. 7-147-67 (51443) pArthasya balamaj~nAnAttamo dR^iShTvA suduHkhitam. abhavaMstAvakA yodhA harShasa~NkulachetasaH.. 7-147-68 (51444) te prahR^iShTA raNe rAjannapashyansainikA ravim. unnAmya vaktrANi tadA sa cha rAjA jayadrathaH.. 7-147-69 (51445) vIkShamANe tatastasminsindhurAje divAkaram. unnamayya shirogrIvAM vIkShate sUryamaNDalam. tasya shIghraM pR^iShatkena kAyAchChIrShamapAhara.. 7-147-70 (51446) keshavenaivamuktaH sannamarShAdraktalochanaH. udbabarha sharaM tIkShNamamarairapi duHsaham.. 7-147-71 (51447) evaM tUNIshayaM ghoramindrAshanisamaprabham. varmabhedinamatyarthaM gandhamAlyArchitaM sadA. visasarja tatastUrNaM saindhavasya rathaM prati.. 7-147-72 (51448) sa tu gANDIvanirmuktaH sharaH shyena ivAshunaH. shakuntamiva vR^ikShAgrAtsaindhavasyAharachChiraH.. 7-147-73 (51449) prapatiShyati shIrShe tu kR^iShNo.arjunamathAbravIt. pArtha pArtha shiro hyetadyathA neyAnmahItalam. tathA kuru kurushreShTha vakShye tasyApi kAraNam.. 7-147-74 (51450) shrutvA tu vachanaM tasya tvaramANo.astramAyayA. tathA.aharachChirastasya sharairUrdhvaM dhana~njayaH. durhR^idAmapaharShAya suhR^idAM harShaNAya cha.. 7-147-75 (51451) tiryagUrdhvamadhashchaiva punarUrdhvamathApi cha. dIrghakAlamavAkvaiva samprakrIDannivArjunaH.. 7-147-76 (51452) tatsainyaM sarvatopashyanmahadAshcharyamadbhutam. prApayatsa shiro yasmAdyodhayanneva pArthivAn.. 7-147-77 (51453) sharaiH kandukavatkR^itvA tasyAlokAya pANDavaH. syamantapa~nchakAdbAhye shirastadaharachCharaiH.. 7-147-78 (51454) jayadrathasyArjunabANanAlaM mukhAravindaM rudhirAmbusiktam. dR^iShTaM naraishchoparivartamAnaM vidyAdharotsR^iShTamivaikapadmam.. 7-147-79 (51455) sa devashatrUniva devarAjaH kirITamAlI vyadhamatsapatnAn. yathA
