tamAMsyabhyuditastamoghnaH pUrNAM pratij~nAM sa samApya vIraH.. 7-147-80 (51456) athAbravItkeshavaM pANDaveyaH kiyantamadhyavAnamidaM harAmi. kimarthametanna nipAtyamurvyAM kva cha prayAtavyamidaM cha shaMsa. shaknomyahaM yatra bhavAnbravIti 7-147-81 (51457) 7-147-81f" taM bhUmideshaM cha shiro vinetum.. .. iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe saptachatvAriMshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 147 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-147-6 kuNQDalitaH pATho jha. pustaka evAsti.. 5-147-49 kuNDalitaH pAThaH jha.pustaka eva vidyate.. 5-147-67 uktA sR^iShTaM tamaH kartR^i prabhAmaharadityanvayaH.. 5-147-68 balaM sainyaM kartR^i.. 5-147-147 saptachatvAriMshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 5-147-* athAbravIdityAdInAM vIkShate sUryamaNDalaM ityantAnAM shlokAnAM sthAne adholikhitAH shlokAH ~Na.pustake vartante. anastamita Aditye atAnnirjitya saindhavaH. na shakyohantumityevaM manyamAno janArdanaH.. 1 .. sasmAra chakraM daityArirharishchakraM sudarshanam. tadAdidesha bhagavAnsmR^itamAtramupasthitam.. 2 .. astaM gatamivAdityaM tamasA chChAdayeti cha. tattathoktaM bhagavatA tamo bhUtvA vishAmpate.. 3 .. andhaM tama ivAj~nAnAmAdityasyAharatprabhAm. unnamayya shirogrIvAmapashyatsaindhavo ravim.. 4 .. athArjunaM hR^iShIkeshaH shokapUrNamathAdhravIt. pashya kaunteya sindhUnAmadhipaM pApakAriNam.. 5 .. eSha tiShThati madhye vai syandanasya dhana~njaya.
droNaparva - adhyAya 148

.. shrIH ..

7.148. adhyAyaH 148

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

kR^iShNenArjunaM prati saindhavamUrdhno dharaNyAmanipAtanIyatve kAraNAbhidhAnam.. 1 .. kR^iShNAj~nayA.arjunena syamantapa~nchake sandhya mupAsamAnasya vR^iddhakShatrasyotsa~Nge jayadrathashiraso nipAtanam.. 2 .. uttiShThamAnasya tasyotsa~NgAchChirasi dharaNau patite vR^iddha kShatramUrdhno vidAraNam.. 3 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-148-0 (51458) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-148-0x (4654) evasminneva kAle tu tvaramANe divAkare. abravItpANDavaM tatra tvaramANo janArdanaH.. 7-148-1 (51459) pArtha pArtha shiro hyenadyatkR^ite na patedbhuvi. shrUyatAM tadyathAvR^ittaM kAraNaM saindhavaM *prati.. 7-148-2 (51460) vR^iddhakShatraH saindhavasya pitA jagati vishrutaH. sa cha ghoreNa tapasA daindhavaM prAptavAnsutam.. 7-148-3 (51461) jayadrathamamitraghnaM vAguvAchAsharIriNI. nR^ipamantarhitA vANI meghadundubhiniHsvanA.. 7-148-4 (51462) tavAtmajo manuShyendra kulashIladamAdibhiH. guNairbhaviShyati vibho sadR^isho vaMshayordvayoH. kShatriyapravaro loke nityaM shUrAbhisatkR^itaH.. 7-148-5 (51463) shirashChetsyati sa~NkruddhaH shatrushchAlakShito bhuvi.. 7-148-6 (51464) etachChrutvA sindhurAjo dhyAtvA chiramarindamaH. j~nAtInsarvAnuvAchedaM putrasnehAbhichoditaH.. 7-148-7 (51465) sa~NgrAme yudhyamAnasya vahato mahatIM dhuram. dharaNyAM mama putrasya pAtayiShyati yaH shiraH.. 7-148-8 (51466) tasyApi shatadhA mUrdhA phaliShyati na saMshayaH. `yadi chedasti me lAbhastapaso vA damasya vA'.. 7-148-9 (51467) evamuktvA tato rAjye sthApayitvA jayadratham. vR^iddhakShatro vanaM yAtastapashchograM samAsthitaH.. 7-148-10 (51468) so.ayaM tapyati tejasvI tapo ghoraM durAsadam. syamantapa~nchakAdasmAdbahirvAnaraketana.. 7-148-11 (51469) tasmAjjayadrathasya tvaM shirashChittvA mahAmR^idhe. divyenAstreNa ripuhanghoreNAdbhutakarmaNA.. 7-148-12 (51470) sakuNDalaM sindhupateH prabha~njanasutAnuja. utsa~Nge pAtayasvAsya vR^iddhakShatrasya bhArata.. 7-148-13 (51471) atha tvamasya mUrdhAnaM pAtayiShyasi bhUtale. tavApi shatadhA mUrdhA phaliShyati na saMshayaH.. 7-148-14 (51472) yathA chedaM na jAnIyAtsa rAjA tapasi sthitaH. tathA kuru kurushreShTha divyamastramupAshritaH.. 7-148-15 (51473) na hyasAdhyamakAryaM vA vidyate tava ki~nchana. samasteShvapi lokeShu triShu vAsavanandana.. 7-148-16 (51474) `yathaitatsaindhavashiraH sharaireva dhana~njaya. vR^iddhakShatre patatyeva tathA nItirvidhIyatAm'.. 7-148-17 (51475) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-148-18x (4655) tataH sumahadAshcharyaM tatrApashyAma bhArata. syamantapa~nchakAdbAhyaM shiro yadvyaharattataH.. 7-148-18 (51476) etasminneva kAle tu vR^iddhakShatro mahIpatiH. sandhyAmupAste tejasvI sambandhI tava mAriSha.. 7-148-19 (51477) upAsInasya tasyAtha kR^iShNakeshaM sakuNDalam. sindhurAjasya mUrdhAnamutsa~Nge samapAtayat.. 7-148-20 (51478) tasyotsa~Nge nipatitaM shirastachchArukuNDalam. vR^iddhakShatrasya nR^ipateralakShitamarindama.. 7-148-21 (51479) kR^itajapyasya tasyAtha vR^iddhakShatrasya bhArata. prottiShThatastatsahasA shiro.agachChadvarAtalam.. 7-148-22 (51480) tatastasya narendrasya putramUrdhani bhUtale. gate tasyApi shatadhA mUrdhA.agachChadarindama.. 7-148-23 (51481) tataH sarvANi sainyAni vismayaM jagmuruttamam. vAsudevashcha bIbhatsuM prashashaMsa mahAratham.. 7-148-24 (51482) `tato dR^iShTvA vinihataM sindhurAjaM jayadratham. karmaNA tena pArthasya vismitAH sarvadevatAH.. 7-148-25 (51483) sarvadA samare yasya goptA nityaM janArdanaH. kathaM tasya jayo na syAditi bhUtAni menire.. 7-148-26 (51484) etadarthaM shirastasya vyApayAmAsa pANDavaH. syamantapa~nchakAdbAhyaM sharaireva yathAkramam.. 7-148-27 (51485) kR^itvA tachcha mahatkarma nihatya cha jayadratham. astraM pAshupataM pArthaH saMhartumupachakrame.. 7-148-28 (51486) saMharatyapi kaunteye tadastraM tatra bhArata. vavau shItaH sugandhashcha pavano hlAdayanniva.. 7-148-29 (51487) saMhAraM cha pramokShaM cha dR^iShTvA tatra divaukasaH. vismayaM paramaM jagmuH prashashaMsushcha pANDavam.. 7-148-30 (51488) evamastreNa tAnvIro yodhayitvA dhana~njayaH. jayadrathashiraH pashchAdvyApayAmAsa pANDavaH.. 7-148-31 (51489) tachChirashchyAvamAnaM tu dadR^ishustAvakA yudhi. shalyakarNakR^ipA rAjanmohitAH savyasAchinA.. 7-148-32 (51490) shirasi chyAvite tasya sharairAshIviShopamaiH. pashchAtkAyo.apatadbhUmiM shochayansarvapArthivAn.. 7-148-33 (51491) dR^iShTvA tu nihataM sa~Nkhye sindhurAjaM mahAratham. putrANAM tava netrebhyo duHkhAdAsraM pravartata'.. 7-148-34 (51492) tato vinihate rAjansindhurAje kirITinA. tamastadvAsudevena saMhR^itaM bharatarShabha.. 7-148-35 (51493) pashchAjj~nAtaM mahIpAla tava putraiH sahAnugaiH. vAsudevaprayukteyaM mAyeti nR^ipasattama.. 7-148-36 (51494) evaM sa nihato rAjanpArthenAmitatejasA. akShauhiNIraShTa hatvA jAmAtA tava saindhavaH.. 7-148-37 (51495) hataM jayadrathaM dR^iShTvA tava putrA narAdhipa. duHkhAdashrUNi mumuchurnirAshAshchAbhava~njaye.. 7-148-38 (51496) tato jayadrathe rAjanhate pArthena keshavaH. dadhmau sha~NkhaM mahAbAhurarjunashcha parantapaH.. 7-148-39 (51497) bhImashcha vR^iShNisiMhashcha yudhAmanyushcha bhArata. uttamaujAshcha vikrAntaH sha~NkhAndadhmuH pR^ithakpR^ithak.. 7-148-40 (51498) shrutvA mahAntaM taM shabdaM dharmarAjo yudhiShThiraH. saindhanaM nihataM mene phalgunena mahAtmanA.. 7-148-41 (51499) tato vAditraghoSheNa svAnyodhAnparyaharShayat. abhyavartata sa~NgrAme bhAradvAjaM yuyutsayA.. 7-148-42 (51500) tataH pravavR^ite rAjannastaM gachChati bhAskare. droNasya somakaiH sArdhaM sa~NgrAmo romaharShaNaH.. 7-148-43 (51501) te tu sarve prayatnena bhAradvAjaM jighAMsavaH. saindhave nihate rAjannayudhyanta mahArathAH.. 7-148-44 (51502) pANDavAstu jayaM labdhvA saindhavaM vinihatya cha. ayodhayaMstu te droNaM jayo.anmattAstatastataH.. 7-148-45 (51503) arjuno.api tato yodhAMstAvakAnrathasattamAn. ayodhayanmahAbAhurhatvA saindhavakaM nR^ipam.. .. 7-148-46 (51504) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadisayuddhe aShTachatvAriMshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 148 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-148-* 147 tamAdhyAye AdityaM prekShamANastu ityAdi 61 tamashlokamArabhya 148 tamAdhyAye shrUyatAM tadyathAvR^ittaM kAraNaM saindhavaM pratIti 2 tIyashlokaparyantaM vidyamAnAnAM 23 viMshatishlokAnAM sthAne ga.gha.~Na.jha.pustakeShu adholikhitAH 45 shlokA dR^ishyante. etasminneva kAle tu drutaM gachChati bhAskare. abravItpANDavaM rAjaMstvaramANo janArdanaH.. 1 .. eSha madhye kR^itaH ShaDbhiH pArtha vIrairmahArathaiH. jIvitepsurmahAbAho bhItastiShThati saindhavaH.. 2 .. etAnanirjitya raNe ShaDrathAnpuruSharShabha. na shakyaH shaindhavo hantuM yato nirvyAjamarjuna.. 3 .. yogamatra vidhAsyAmi sUryasyAvaraNaM prati. astaM gata iti vyaktaM drakShyatyekaH sa sindhurAT.. 4 .. harSheNa jIvitAkA~NkShI vinAshArthaM tava prabho. na gopsyati durAchAraH sa AtmAnaM katha~nchana.. 5 .. tatra chChidre prahartavyaM tvayAsta kurusattama. vyapekShA naiva kartavyA gato.astamiti bhAskaraH.. 6 .. evamastviti bIbhatsuH keshavaM pratyabhAShata. tato.asR^ijattamaH kR^iShNaH sUryasyAvaraNaM prati.. 7 .. yogI yogena saMyukto yoginAmIshvaro hariH.. 8 .. sR^iShTe tamasi kR^iShNena gato.astamiti bhAskaraH. tvadIyA jahR^iShuryodhAH pArthanAshAnnarAdhipa.. 9 .. te prahR^iShTA raNe rAjannApashyansainikA ravim. unnAmya vaktrANi tadA sa cha rAjA jayadrathaH.. 10 .. vIkShamANe tatastasminsindhurAje divAkaram. punarevAbravItkR^iShNo dhana~njayamidaM vachaH.. 11 .. pashya sindhupatiM vIraM prekShamANaM divAkaram. bhayaM hi vipramuchyaitattvatto bharatasattama.. 12 .. ayaM kAlo mahAbAho vadhAyAsya durAtmanaH. Chindhi mUrdhAnamasyAshu kuru sAphalyamAtmanaH.. 13 .. ityevaM keshavonoktaH pANDuputraH pratApavAn. nyavadhIttAvakaM sainyaM sharairarkAgnisannibhaiH.. 14 .. kR^ipaM vivyAdha viMshatyA karNaM pa~nchAshatA sharaiH. shalyaM duryodhanaM chaiva ShaDbhiH ShaDbhiratADayat.. 15 .. vR^iShasenaM tathAShTAbhiH ShaShTyA saindhavameva cha. tathaiva sa mahAbAhustvadIyAnpANDunandanaH. gADhaM viddhvA sharai rAja~njayadrathamupAdravat.. 16 .. taM samIpasthitaM dR^iShTvA lelihAnamivAnalam. jayadrathasya goptAraH saMshayaM paramaM gatAH.. 17 tataH sarve mahArAja tava yodhA jayaiShiNaH. siShichuH sharadhArAbhiH pAkashAsanimAhave.. 18 sa~nChAdyamAnaH kaunteyaH sharajAlairanekashaH. akrudhyatsa mahAbAhurajitaH kurunandanaH.. 19 .. tataH sharamayaM jAlaM tumulaM pAkashAsaniH. vyasR^ijatpuruShavyAghrastava sainyajighAMsayA.. 20 .. te hanyamAnA vIraNe yodhA rAjanraNe tava. prajahuH saindhavaM bhItA dvau samaM nApyadhAvatAm.. 21 .. tatrAdbhutamapashyAma kuntIputrasya vikramam. tAdR^i~Nga bhAvI bhUto vA yachchakAra mahAyashAH.. 22 .. dvipAndvipagatAMshchaiva hayAnhayagatAnapi. tathA sa rathinashchaiva nyahanrudraH pashUniva.. 23 .. na tatra samare kashchinmayA dR^iShTo narAdhipa. gajo vAjI naro vApi yo na pArthasharAhataH.. 24 .. rajasA tamasA chaiva yodhAH sa~nChannachakShuShaH. kashmalaM prAvishanghoraM nAnvajAnanparasparam.. 25 .. te sharairbhinnamarmANaH sainikAH pArthachoditaiH. vabhramushchaskhaluH petuH sedurmamlushcha bhArata.. 26 .. tasmiMnmahAbhIShaNake prajAnAmiva sa~NkShaye. raNe mahati duShpAre vartamAne sudAruNe.. 27 .. shoNitasya prasekena shIghratvAdanilasya cha. ashAmyattadrajo bhaumamasR^iksikte dharAtale.. 28 .. AnAbhi niramajjaMshcha rathachakrANi shoNite. mattA vegavatA rAjaMstAvakAnAM raNA~NgaNe.. 29 .. hastinashcha hatArohA dAritA~NgAH sahasrashaH. svAnyanIkAni mR^idganta ArtanAdAH pradudruvuH.. 30 .. hayAshcha patitArohAH pattayashcha narAdhipa. pradudruvurbhayAdrAjandhana~njayasharAhatAH.. 31 .. muktakeshA vikavachAH kSharantaH kShatajaM kShataiH. prApalAyanta santrastAstyaktvA raNashiro janAH.. 32 .. UrugrAhagR^ihItAshcha kechittatrAbhavanbhUvi. hatAnAM chApare madhye dviradAnAM nililyire.. 33 .. evaM tava balaM rAjandrAvayitvA dhana~njayaH. nyavadhItsAyakairghoraiH sindhurAjasya rakShiNaH.. 34 .. drauNiM kR^ipaM karNashalyau vR^iShasenaM suyodhanam. ChAdayAmAsa tIvreNa sharajAlena pANDavaH.. 35 .. na gR^ihNannakShiparanrAjanmu~nchannApi cha sandadhat. adR^ishyatArjunaH sa~Nkhye shIghrAstratvAtkatha~nchana.. 36 .. dhanurmaNDalamevAsya dR^ishyate smAsyataH sadA. sAyakAshcha vyadR^ishyanta nishcharantaH samantataH.. 37 .. karNasya tu dhanushChittvA vR^iShasenasya chaiva ha. shalyasya sUtaM bhallena rathanIDAdapAtayat.. 38 .. gADhaviddhAvubhau kR^itvA sharaiH svasrIyamAtulau. arjuno jayatAM shreShTho drauNishAradvatau raNe.. 39 .. evaM tAnvyAkulIkR^itya tvadIyAnAM mahArathAn. ujjahAra sharaM ghoraM pANDavo.analasannibham.. 40 .. indrAshanisamaprakhyaM divyamastrAbhimantritam. sarvabhArasahaM shashvadgrandhamAlyArchitaM mahat.. 41 .. vajreNAstreNa saMyojya vidhivatkurunandanaH. samAdadhanmahAbAhurgANDIve kShipramarjunaH.. 42 .. tasminsandhIyamAne tu share jvalanatejasi. antarikShe mahAnAdo bhUtAnAmabhavannR^ipa.. 43 .. abravIchcha punastatra tvaramANo janArdanaH. dhana~njaya shirashChindhi saindhavasya durAtmanaH.. 44 .. astaM mahIdharashreShThaM yiyAsati divAkaraH. shR^iNuShvaitachcha vAkyaM me jayadrathavadhaM parti.. 45 ..
droNaparva - adhyAya 149

.. shrIH ..

7.149. adhyAyaH 149

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

arjunena nijasharAhatimohitaM kR^ipamprati shochanam.. 1 .. sArjunena kR^iShNena yudhiShThirametya jayadrathavadhakathanam.. 2 .. bhImAdInAM yudhiShThirasamIpasamAgamanam.. 3 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-149-0 (51505) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-149-0x (4656) tasminvinihate vIre saindhave savyasAchinA. mAmakA yadakurvanta tanmamAchakShva sa~njaya.. 7-149-1 (51506) `pashyatAM sarvasainyAnAM mAmakAnAM mahAraNe. ahanyata kathaM yuddhe saindhavaH savyasAchinA.. 7-149-2 (51507) kathaM drauNikR^ipairguptaH karNena cha mahAraNe. phalgunAgnimukhaM ghoraM praviShTaH sAdhu saindhavaH.. 7-149-3 (51508) tasminhate maheShvAse mandAtmA sa suyodhanaH. bhrAtR^ibiH sahitaH sUta kimakArShIdanantaram'.. 7-149-4 (51509) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-149-5x (4657) saindhavaM nihataM dR^iShTvA raNe pArthena bhArata. amarShavashamApannaH kR^ipaH shAradvatastataH.. 7-149-5 (51510) mahatA sharavarSheNa pANDavaM samavAkirat. drauNishchAbhyadravadrAjanrathamAsthAya phalgunam.. 7-149-6 (51511) tAvetau rathinAM shreShThau rathAbhyAM rathasattamau. ubhAvubhayatastIkShNairvishikhairabhyavarShatAm.. 7-149-7 (51512) sa tathA sharavarShAbhyAM sumahaddhyAM mahAbhujaH. pIDyamAnaH parAmArtimagamadrathinAM varaH.. 7-149-8 (51513) so.ajighAMsurguruM sa~Nkhye gurostanayameva cha. chakArAchAryakaM tatra kuntIputro dhana~njayaH.. 7-149-9 (51514) astrairastrANi saMvArya drauNeH shAradvatasya cha. mandavegAniShUMstAbhyAmajighAMsuravAsR^ijat.. 7-149-10 (51515) tena nAtibhR^ishaM trastau vishikhairbhR^ishapIDitau. bahutvAttu parAmArtiM sharANAM tAvagachChatAm.. 7-149-11 (51516) atha shAradvato rAjankaunteyasharapIDitaH. avAsIdadrathopasthe mUrchChAmabhijagAma ha.. 7-149-12 (51517) vihvalaM tamabhij~nAya bhartAraM sharapIDitam. hato.ayamiti cha j~nAtvA sArathistamapAvahat.. 7-149-13 (51518) tasminbhagne mahArAja kR^ipe shAradvate yudhi. ashvatthAmApyapAyAsItpANDaveyAdrathAntaram.. 7-149-14 (51519) dR^iShTvA shAradvataM pArtho mUrchChitaM sharapIDitam. dhigdhi~NmAmiti chaivoktvA kR^ipaNaM paryadevayat. ashrupUrNamukho dIno vachanaM chedamabravIt.. 7-149-15 (51520) pashyannidaM mahAprAj~naH kShattA rAjAnamuktavAn. kulAntakaraNe pApe jAtamAtre suyodhane.. 7-149-16 (51521) nIyatAM paralokAya sAdhvayaM kulapAMsanaH. asmAddhi kurumukhyAnAM mahadutpatsyate bhayam.. 7-149-17 (51522) tadidaM samanuprAptaM vachanaM satyavAdinaH. tatkR^ite hyadya pashyAmi sharatalpagataM gurum.. 7-149-18 (51523) dhigastu kShAtramAchAraM dhigastu balapauruSham. ko hi brAhmaNamAchAryamabhidruhyeta mAdR^ishaH.. 7-149-19 (51524) R^iShiputro mamAchAryo droNasya paramaH sakhA. eSha shete rathopasthe kR^ipo madbANapIDitaH.. 7-149-20 (51525) akAmayAnena mayA vishikhairardito bhR^isham. avasIdanrathopasthe prANAnpIDayatIva me.. 7-149-21 (51526) putrashokAbhitaptena sharairabhyarditena cha. abhyasto bahubhirbANairdashadharmagatena vai.. 7-149-22 (51527) `sharArditaH sa hi mayA prekShamANo mahAdyutiH'. shochayatyeSha niyataM bhUyaH putravadhAddhi mAm. kR^ipaNaM svarathe sannaM pashya kR^iShNa yathAgatam.. 7-149-23 (51528) upAkR^itya tu vai vidyAmAchAryebhyo nararShabhAH. prayachChantIha ye kAmAndevatvamupayAnti te.. 7-149-24 (51529) ye cha vidyAmupAdAya gurubhyaH puruShAdhamAH. 7-149-25 (51530) ghnanti tAneva durvR^ittAste vai nirayagAminaH.. 7-149-25 (51531) tadidaM narakAyAdya kR^itaM karma mayA dhruvam. AchAryaM sharavarSheNa rathe sAdayatA kR^ipam.. 7-149-26 (51532) yattatpUrvamupAkurvannastraM mAmabravItkR^ipaH. na katha~nchana kauravya prahartavyaM gurAviti.. 7-149-27 (51533) tadidaM vachanaM sAdhorAchAryasya mahAtmanaH. nAnuShThitaM tamevAjau vishikhairabhivarShatA.. 7-149-28 (51534) namastasmai supUjyAya gautamAyApalAyine. dhigastu mama vArShNeya yadasmai praharAmyaham.. 7-149-29 (51535) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-149-30x (4658) tathA vilapamAne tu savyasAchini taM prati. *tato rAjanhR^iShTIkeshaH saM~NgAmashirasi sthitam. tIrNapratij~naM bIbhatsuM pariShvajyainamabravIt.. 7-149-30 (51536) diShThyA sampAditA jiShNo pratij~nA mahatI tvayA. diShTyA vinihataH pApo vR^iddhakShatraH sahAtmajaH.. 7-149-31 (51537) dhArtarAShTrabalaM prApya devasenApi bhArata. sIdeta samare jiShNo nAtra kAryA vichAraNA.. 7-149-32 (51538) na taM pashyAmi lokeShu chintayanpuruShaM kvachit. tvadR^ite puruShavyAghra ya etadyodhayedbalam.. 7-149-33 (51539) mahAprabhAvA bahavastvayA tulyAdhikApi vA. sametAH pR^ithivIpAlA dhArtarAShTrasya kAraNAt.. 7-149-34 (51540) te tvAM prApya raNe kruddhA nAbhyavartanta daMshitAH. tava vIryaM balaM chaiva rudrashakrAntakopamam.. 7-149-35 (51541) nedR^ishaM shaknuyAtkashchidrame kartuM parAkramam. yAdR^ishaM kR^itavAnadya tvamekaH shatrutApanaH.. 7-149-36 (51542) evameva hate karNe sAnubandhe durAtmani. vardhayiShyAmi bhUyastvAM vijitAriM hatadviSham.. 7-149-37 (51543) tamarjunaH pratyuvAcha prasAdAttava mAdhava. pratij~neyaM mayA tIrNA vibudhairapi dustarA.. 7-149-38 (51544) anAshchAryo jayasteShAM yeShAM nAtho.asi keshava. tvatprasAdAnmahIM kR^itsnAM saMprApsyati yudhiShThiraH.. 7-149-39 (51545) tavaiSha bhAro dhArShNeya tavaiva vijayaH prabho. vardhanIyAstava vayaM preShyAshcha madhusUdana.. 7-149-40 (51546) evamuktastataH kR^iShNaH shanakairvAhayanhayAn. darshayAmAsa pArthAya krUramAyodhanaM mahat.. 7-149-41 (51547) shrIkR^iShNa uvAcha. 7-149-42x (4659) prArthayanto jaye yuddhe prathitaM cha mahadyashaH. pR^ithivyAM sherate shUrAH pArthivAstvachCharairhatAH.. 7-149-42 (51548) vikIrNashastrAbharaNA vipannAshvarathadvipAH. sa~nChinnabhinnamarmANo vaiklavyaM paramaM gatAH.. 7-149-43 (51549) sasatvA gatasatvAshcha prabhayA parayA yutAH. sajIvA iva lakShyante gatasatvA narAdhipAH.. 7-149-44 (51550) teShAM sharaiH svarNapu~NkhaiH shastraishcha vividhaiH shitaiH. vAhanairAyudhaishchaiva sampUrNAM pashya medinIm.. 7-149-45 (51551) varmabhishcharmabhirhAraiH shirobhishcha sakuNDalaiH. uShNIShairmakuTaiH sragbhishchUDAmaNibhirambaraiH.. 7-149-46 (51552) kaNThasUtraira~Ngadaishcha niShkairapi cha saprabhaiH. anyaishchAbharaNaishchitrairbhAti bhArata medinI.. 7-149-47 (51553) [anukarShairupAsa~NgaiH patAkAbhirdhvajaistathA. upaskarairadhiShThAnairIShAdaNDakabandhuraiH.. 7-149-48 (51554) chakraiH pramathitaishchitrairakShaishcha bahudhA raNe. yugairyoktraiH kalApaishcha dhanurbhiH sAyakaistathA.. 7-149-49 (51555) paristomaiH kuthAbhishcha parighaira~NkushaistathA. shaktibhirbhiNDipAlaishcha tUNaiH shUlaiH parashvathaiH.. 7-149-50 (51556) prAsaishcha tomaraishchaiva kuntairyaShTibhireva cha. shataghnIbhirbhushuNDIbhiH kha~NgaiH parashubhistathA.. 7-149-51 (51557) musalairmudgaraishchaiva gadAbhiH kuNapaistathA. suvarNavikR^itAbhishcha kashAbhirbharatarShabha.. 7-149-52 (51558) ghaNTAbhishcha gajendrANAM bhANDaishcha vividhairapi. sragbhishcha nAnAbharaNairbastraishchaiva mahAdhanaiH. apaviddhairbabhau bhUmirgrahairdyauriva shAradI.. 7-149-53 (51559) pR^ithivyAM pR^ithivIhetoH pR^ithivIpatayo hatAH. pR^ithivImupaguhyA~NgaiH suptAH kAntAmiva priyAm.. 7-149-54 (51560) imAMshcha girikUTAbhAnnAgAnairAvatopamAn. kSharataH shoNitaM bhUri shastrachChedadarImukhaiH. darImukhairiva girIngairikAmbuparisravAn.. 7-149-55 (51561) tAMshcha bANahatAnvIra pashya niShTanataH kShitau. hayAMshcha patitAnpashya svarNabhANDavibhUShitAn.. 7-149-56 (51562) gandharvanagarAkArAnrathAMshcha nihateshvarAn. ChinnadhvajapatAkAkShAnvichakrAnhatasArathIn.. 7-149-57 (51563) nikR^ittakUbarayugAnbhagneShAnbandhurAnprabho. pashya pArtha hayAnbhUmau vimAnopamadarshanAn.. 7-149-58 (51564) pattIMshcha nihatAnvIra shatasho.atha sahasrashaH. dhanurbhR^itashcharmabhR^itaH shayAnAnrudhirokShitAn.. 7-149-59 (51565) mahImAli~Ngya sarvA~NgaiH pAMsudhvastashiroruhAn. pashya yodhAnmahAbAho tvachCharairbhinnavigrahAn.. 7-149-60 (51566) nipAtitadviparathAjisa~Nkula-- masR^igvasApishitasamR^iddhakardamam. nishAcharashvavR^ikapishAchamodanaM mahItalaM naravara pashya durdR^isham.. 7-149-61 (51567) idaMmahattvayyupapadyate prabho raNAjire karma yasho.abhivardhanam. shatakratau chApi cha devasattame mahAhave jaghnuShi daityadAnavAn..] 7-149-62 (51568) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-149-63x (4660) evaM sandarshayankR^iShNo raNabhUmiM kirITine. svaiH sametaH samuditaiH pA~nchajanyaM vyanAdayat.. 7-149-63 (51569) `sAtyakiH pArthamabhyAyAdbhImasenashcha pANDavaH. yudhAmanyUttamaujau cha pA~nchAlasyAtmajAvubhau.. 7-149-64 (51570) te nivArya sharairdrauNiM karNaM cha saha bhUmipaiH. AgachChanrathinashchaiva yatra rAjA yudhiShThiraH'.. 7-149-65 (51571) sa darshayanneva kirITine.arihA janArdanastAmaribhUmima~njasA. ajAtashatruM samupetya pANDavaM nivedayAmAsa hataM jayadratham.. .. 7-149-66 (51572) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe ekonapa~nchAshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 149 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-149-9 ajighAMsurhantamanichChan. AchAryakaM guroH sammAnam.. 5-149-12 avAsIdadavasannaH.. 5-149-16 idaM kulakShayagurudrohAdikam.. 5-149-18 sharatalpagataM sharapa~njaragatam.. 5-149-22 abhyasto.asakR^innihataH. dashadharmagatena duravasthAgatena.. 5-149-23 shochayati shokaM kArayati. eSha droNaH. bhUyo.adhikaM putravadhAt.. 5-149-24 upAkR^itya adhItya.. 5-149-27 upAkurvan AdhyApayan.. 5-149-* tato rAjanhR^iShIkesha ityAdi mahAprabhAvA bahavastvayA tulyAdhikApi vA ityantAH sArdhachatvAraH shlokAH jha. pustake 146 tamAdhyAyasya 25 tamashlokAdupari vidyante. 5-149-48 kuNDalitAH shlokAH jha.pustaka eva dR^ishyante.. 5-149-149 ekonapa~nchAshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 150

.. shrIH ..

7.150. adhyAyaH 150

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

yudhiShThireNa svAbhivAdakAnAM kR^iShNabhImArjunasAtyakInAmAli~NganAdinA satkAraH.. 1 .. kR^iShNayudhiShThirayoH saMlApaH.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-150-0 (51573) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-150-0x (4661) tato rAjAnamabhyetya dharmaputraM yudhiShThiram. vavande samprahR^iShTAtmA hate pArthena saindhave.. 7-150-1 (51574) diShTyA vardhasi rAjendra hatashatrurnarottama. diShTyA nistIrNavAMshaiva pratij~nAmanujastava.. 7-150-2 (51575) sa tvevamuktaH kR^iShNena hR^iShTaH parapura~njayaH. tato yudhiShThiro rAjA rathAdAplutya bhArata. paryaShvajattadA kR^iShNAvAnandAshrupariplutaH.. 7-150-3 (51576) pramR^ijya vadanaM shubhraM puNDarIkasamaprabham. abravIdvAsudevaM cha pANDavaM cha dhana~njayam.. 7-150-4 (51577) priyametadupashrutya tvattaH puShkaralochana. nAntaM gachChAmi harShasya titIrShurudadheriva.. 7-150-5 (51578) atyadbhutamidaM kR^iShNa kR^itaM pArthena dhImatA. diShTyA pashyAmi sa~NgrAme tIrNabhArau mahArathau.. 7-150-6 (51579) diShTyA cha nihataH pApaH saindhavaH puruShAdhamaH. `diShTyA shatrugaNAshchaiva nimagnAH shokasAgare'.. 7-150-7 (51580) kR^iShNa diShTyA mama prItirmahatI pratipAditA. tvayA guptena govinda ghnatA pApaM jayadratham.. 7-150-8 (51581) kintu nAtyadbhutaM teShAM yeShAM nastvaM samAshrayaH. na teShAM duShkR^itaM ki~nchittriShu lokeShu vidyate. sarvalokagururyeShAM tvaM nAtho madhusUdana.. 7-150-9 (51582) tvatprasAdAddhi govinda vayaM jeShyAmahe ripUn. `yathA purA prasAdAtte dAnavAnpAkashAsanaH.. 7-150-10 (51583) pR^ithivyA vijayo vApi trailokyavijayo.api vA. dhruvo hi teShAM vArShNeya yeShAM tuShTo.asi mAnada.. 7-150-11 (51584) na teShAM vidyate pApaM sa~NgrAme vA parAjayaH. tridasheshvara nAthastvaM yeShAM tuShTo.asi mAdhava.. 7-150-12 (51585) tvatprasAdAddhR^iShIkesha shakraH suragaNeshvaraH. trailokyavijayaM shrImAnprAptavAnraNamUrdhani.. 7-150-13 (51586) tava chaiva prasAdena tridashAstridasheshvarAH. amaratvaM gatAH kR^iShNa lokAMshchAshnuvate.akShayAn'.. 7-150-14 (51587) sthitaH sarvAtmanA nityaM priyeShu cha hiteShu cha. tvAM chaivAsmAbhirAshritya kR^itaH shastrasamudyamaH. surairivAsuravadhe shakraM shakrAnujAhave.. 7-150-15 (51588) asaMbhAvyamidaM karma devairapi janArdana. tvadbuddhibalavIryeNa kR^itavAneSha phalgunaH.. 7-150-16 (51589) bAlyAtprabhR^iti te kR^iShNa karmANi shrutavAnaham. amAnuShANi divyAni mahAnti cha bahUni cha. tadaivAj~nAsiShaM shatrUnhatAnprAptAM cha medinIm.. 7-150-17 (51590) tvatprasAdasamutthena vikrameNArisUdana. sureshatvaM gataH shakro hatvA daityAnsahasrashaH.. 7-150-18 (51591) tvatprasAdAdvR^iShIkesha jagatsthAvaraja~Ngamam. svavartmani sthitaM vIra japarahomeShu vartate.. 7-150-19 (51592) ekArNavamidaM pUrvaM sarvamAsIttamomayam. tvatprasAdAnmAhAbAho jagatprAptaM narottama.. 7-150-20 (51593) sraShTAraM sarvalokAnAM paramAtmAnamavyayam. ye pashyanti hR^iShIkesha na te muhyanti karhichit.. 7-150-21 (51594) purANaM paramaM devaM devadevaM sanAtanam. ye prapannAH suraguruM na te muhyanti karhichit.. 7-150-22 (51595) anAdinidhanaM devaM lokakartAramavyayam. ye bhaktAstvAM hR^iShIkesha durgANyatitaranti te.. 7-150-23 (51596) paraM purANaM puruShaM parANAM paramaM cha yat. prapadyatastatparamaM parA bhUtirvidhIyate.. 7-150-24 (51597) gAyanti chaturo vedA yashcha deveShu gIyate. taM prapadya mahAtmAnaM bhUtimashnAmyanuttamAm.. 7-150-25 (51598) paramesha pareshesha tiryagIsha nareshvara. sarveshvareshvareshena namaste puruShottama.. 7-150-26 (51599) tvamIshesheshvareshAna prabho vardhasva mAdhava. prabhavApyaya sarvasya sarvAtmanpR^ithulochana.. 7-150-27 (51600) dhana~njayasakhA yashcha dhana~njayahitashcha yaH. dhana~njayasya goptA taM prapadya sukhamedhate.. 7-150-28 (51601) [mArkaNDeyaH purANarShishcharitaj~nastavAnagha. mAhAtmyamanubhAvaM purA phIrtitavAnmuniH.. 7-150-29 (51602) asito devalashchaiva nAradashcha mahAtapAH. pitAmahashcha me vyAsastvAmAhurvidhimuttamam.. 7-150-30 (51603) tvaM tejastvaM paraM brahma tvaM satyaM tvaM mahattapaH. tvaM shreyastvaM yashashchAgryaM kAraNaM jagatastathA.. 7-150-31 (51604) tvayA sR^iShTamidaM sarvaM jagatsthAvaraja~Ngamam. pralaye samanuprApte tvAM vai nivishate punaH.. 7-150-32 (51605) anAdinidhanaM devaM vishvasyeshaM jagatpate. dhAtAramajamavyaktamAhurvedavido janAH.. 7-150-33 (51606) bhUtAtmAnaM mahAtmAnamanantaM vishvatomukham. api devA na jAnanti guhyamAdyaM jagatpatim. nArAyaNaM paraM devaM paramAtmAnamIshvaram.. 7-150-34 (51607) j~nAnayoniM hariM viShNuM mumukShUNAM parAyaNam. paraM purANaM puruShaM purANAnAM paraM cha yat.. 7-150-35 (51608) evamAdiguNAnAM te karmaNAM divi cheha cha. atItabhUtabhavyAnAM sa~NkhyAtA.atra na vidyate.. 7-150-36 (51609) sarvato rakShaNIyAH sma shakreNeva divaukasaH. yaistvaM sarvaguNopetaH suhR^inna upapAditaH.. 7-150-37 (51610) ityevaM dharmarAjena harirukto mahAyashAH. anurUpamidaM vAkyaM pratyuvAcha janArdanaH.. 7-150-38 (51611) bhavatA tapasogreNa dharmeNa parameNa cha. sAdhutvAdArjavAchchaiva hataH pApo jayadrathaH.. 7-150-39 (51612) ayaM cha puruShavyAghra tvadanudhyAnasaMvR^itaH. hatvA yodhasahasrANi nyaha~njiShNurjayadratham.. 7-150-40 (51613) kR^ititve bAhuvIrye cha tathaivAsambhrame.api cha. shIghratAmodhabuddhitve nAsti pArthasamaH kvachit.. 7-150-41 (51614) tadayaM bharatashreShTha bhrAtA te.adya yadarjunaH. sainyakShayaM raNe kR^itvA sindhurAjashiro.aharat.. 7-150-42 (51615) tato dharmasuto jiShNuM pariShvajya vishAmpate. pramR^ijya vadanaM tasya paryAshvAsayata prabhuH.. 7-150-43 (51616) atIva sumahatkarma kR^itavAnasi phalguna. asahyaM chAviShahyaM cha devairapi savAsavaiH.. 7-150-44 (51617) diShTA nistIrNabhAro.asi hatArishchAsi shatruhan. diShTyA satyA pratij~neyaM kR^itA hatvA jayadratham.. 7-150-45 (51618) evamuktvA guDAkeshaM dharmarAjo mahAyashAH. pasparsha puNyagandhena pR^iShThe hastena pArthivAH..] 7-150-46 (51619) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-150-47x (4662) evamuktau mahAtmAnAvubhau keshavapANDavau. tAvabrUtAM tadA kR^iShNau rAjAnaM pR^ithivIpatim.. 7-150-47 (51620) tava kopAgninA dagdhaH pApo rAja~njayadrathaH. uttIrNaM chApi sumahaddhArtarAShTrabalaM raNe.. 7-150-48 (51621) yudhiShThira uvAcha. 7-150-49x (4663) hanyante nihatAshchaiva vina~NkShyanti cha keshava. tava krodhahatA hyete kauravAH shatrusUdana.. 7-150-49 (51622) tvAM hi chakShurhaNaM vIra kopayitvA suyodhanaH. samitrabandhuH samare prANAMstyakShyati durmatiH.. 7-150-50 (51623) tava krodhahataH pUrvaM devairapi sudurjayaH. sharatalpagataH shete bhIShmaH kurupitAmahaH.. 7-150-51 (51624) durlabho vijayasteShAM samprAme ripughAtinAm. yAtA mR^ityuvashaM te vai yeShAM kruddho.api mAdhava.. 7-150-52 (51625) rAjyaM prANAH shriyaH putrAH saukhyAni vividhAni cha. achirAttasya nashyanti yeShAM kruddho.asi mAnada.. 7-150-53 (51626) bhagavAnuvAcha. 7-150-54x (4664) vinaShTAnkauravAnmanye saputrapashubAndhavAn. rAjadharmapare nityaM tvayi kruddhe parantapa.. 7-150-54 (51627) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-150-55x (4665) tato bhImo mahAbAhuH sAtyakishcha mahArathaH. abhivAdya guruM jyeShThaM mArgaNaiH kShatavikShatau. kShitAvAstAM maheShvAsau pA~nchAlyaparivAritau.. 7-150-55 (51628) tau dR^iShTvA mudito vIrau prA~njalI chAgrataH sthitau. abhyanandata kaunteyastAvubhau bhImasAtyakI.. 7-150-56 (51629) diShTyA pashyAmi vA shUrau vimuktau sainyasAgarAt. droNagrAhadurAdharShAddhArdikyamakarAlayAt.. 7-150-57 (51630) diShTyA vinirjitAH sa~Nkhye pR^ithivyAM sarvapArthivAH. yuvAM vijayinau chApi diShTyA pashyAmi saMyuge.. 7-150-58 (51631) diShTyA droNo jitaH sa~Nkhye hArdikyashcha mahAbalaH. diShTyA vikarNibhiH karNoraNe nItaH parAbhavam.. 7-150-59 (51632) vimukhashcha kR^itaH shalyo yuvAbhyAM puruSharShabhau. diShTyA yuvAM kushalinau sa~NgrAmAtpunarAgatau. pashyAmi rathinAM shreShThAvubhau yuddhavishAradau.. 7-150-60 (51633) mama vAkyakarau vIrau mama gauravayantritau. sainyArNavaM samuttIrNau diShTyA pashyAmi vAmaham.. 7-150-61 (51634) samarashlAghinau vIrau samareShvaparAjitau. mama vAkyasamau chaiva diShTyA pashyAmi vAmaham.. 7-150-62 (51635) ityuktvA pANDavo rAjanyuyudhAnavR^ikodarau. sasvaje puruShavyAghrau harShAdbAShpaM mupocha ha.. 7-150-63 (51636) tataH pramuditaM sarvaM balamAsIdvishAmpate. pANDavAnAM raNe hR^iShTaM yuddhAya tu mano dadhe.. .. 7-150-64 (51637) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe pQa~nchAshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 150 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-150-8 guptena arjuneneti sheShaH.. 8 .. 5-150-15 shakrAnujeti kR^iShNaM prati sambodhanam.. 5-150-25 chaturashchatvAraH.. 5-150-27 tvamiti. heIshesha rudrAdyArAdhya. IshvarA rAjAnasteShAmapIshAno dharmaH. tadetatkShatrasya kShatraM yaddharma iti shrutestasyApi prabho. dharmasya prabhurachyuta iti smR^iteH.. 5-150-28 sakhA vayasyaH. hitaH priyakR^it. goptA duHkhanivArakaH.. 5-150-29 kuNDalitaH pAThaH jha. pustaka eva dR^ishyate.. 5-150-48 uttIrNaM la~Nghitam.. 5-150-50 chakShurhaNaM krodhadR^iShTimAtreNa hantAram.. 5-150-150 pa~nchAshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 151

.. shrIH ..

7.151. adhyAyaH 151

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

saindhavavadhaduHkhitena duryodhanena droNametya AtmopAlambhapUrvakaM parishochanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-151-0 (51638) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-151-0x (4666) saindhave nihate rAjanputrastava suyodhanaH. [ashrupUrNamukho dIno nirutsAho dviShajjaye.. 7-151-1 (51639) durmanA niHshvasanduShTo bhagnadaMShTra ivoragaH. AgaskR^itsarvalokasya putraste.artiM parAmagAt.. 7-151-2 (51640) dR^iShTvA tatkadanaM ghoraM svabalasya kR^itaM mahat. jiShNunA bhImasenena sAtvatena cha saMyuge.. 7-151-3 (51641) sa vivarNaH kR^isho dIno bAShpaviplutalochanaH.] amanyatArjunasamo na yoddhA bhuvi vidyate.. 7-151-4 (51642) na droNo na cha rAdheyo nAshvatthAmA kR^ipo na cha. pArthasya sammakhe sthAtuM paryAptA iti mAriSha.. 7-151-5 (51643) nirjitya hi raNe pArthaH sarvAnmama mahArathAn. avadhItsaindhavaM sa~Nkhye na cha kashchidavArayat.. 7-151-6 (51644) sarvathA hatamevedaM kauravANAM mahadbalam. na hyasya vidyate trAtA sAkShAdapi purandaraH.. 7-151-7 (51645) yamupAshritya sa~NgrAme kR^itaH shastrasamudyamaH. sa karNo nirjitaH sa~Nkhye hatashchaiva jayadrathaH.. 7-151-8 (51646) `paruShANi sabhAmadhye proktavAnyo hi pANDavAn. sa karNo nirjitaH sa~Nkhye saindhavashcha nipAtitaH.. 7-151-9 (51647) yasya vIryaM samAshritya shamaM yAchantamachyutam. tR^iNavattamahaM manye sa karNo nirjito yudhi.. 7-151-10 (51648) evaM klAntamanA rAjannupAyAdroNamIkShitum. AgaskR^itsarvalokasya putraste bharatarShabha.. 7-151-11 (51649) tatastatsarvamAchakhyau kurUNAM vaishasaM mahat. parAnvijayatashchApi dhArtarAShTrAnnimajjataH.. 7-151-12 (51650) duryodhana uvAcha. 7-151-13x (4667) pashya mUrdhAbhiShiktAnAmAchArya kadanaM mahat. kR^itvA pramukhataH shUraM bhIShmaM mama pitAmaham.. 7-151-13 (51651) taM nihatya pralubdho.ayaM shikhaNDI pUrNamAnasaH. pA~nchAlyaiH sahitaH sarvaiH senAgramabhivartate.. 7-151-14 (51652) aparashchApi durdharShaH shiShyaste savyasAchinA. akShauhiNIH sapta hatvA hato rAjA jayadrathaH.. 7-151-15 (51653) asmadvijayakAmAnAM suhR^idAmupakAriNAm. gantA.asmi kathamAnR^iNyaM gatAnAM yamasAdanam.. 7-151-16 (51654) ye madarthaM parIpsante vasudhAM vasudhAdhipAH. te hitvA vasudhaishvaryaM vasudhAmadhisherate.. 7-151-17 (51655) so.ahaM kApuruShaH ka-tvA mitrANAM kShayamIdR^isham. ashvamedhasahasreNa pAvituM na samutsahe.. 7-151-18 (51656) mama lubdhasya pApasya tathA dharmApachAyinaH. vyAyAmena jigIShantaH prAptA vaivasvatakShayam.. 7-151-19 (51657) kathaM patitavR^ittasya pR^ithivI suhR^idAM druhaH. vivaraM nAshakaddAtuM mama pArthivasaMsadi.. 7-151-20 (51658) yo.ahaM rudhirasiktA~NgaM rAj~nAM madhye pitAmaham. shayAnaM nAshakaM trAtuM bhIShmamAyodhane hatam.. 7-151-21 (51659) taM mAmanAryapuruShaM mitradruhamadhArmikam. kiM vakShyati hi durdharShaH sametya paralokajit.. 7-151-22 (51660) jalasandhaM maheShvAsaM pashya sAtyakinA hatam. madarthamudyataM shUraM prANAMstyaktvA mahAratham.. 7-151-23 (51661) kAmbhojaM nihataM dR^iShTvA tathAlambusameva cha. anyAnbahUMshcha suhR^ido jIvitArtho.adya ko mama.. 7-151-24 (51662) vyAyachChanto hatAH shUrA madarthe ye parA~NmukhAH. yatamAnAH paraM shaktyA vijetumahitAnmama.. 7-151-25 (51663) teShAM gatvA.ahamAnR^iNyamadya shaktyA parantapa. tarpayiShyAmi tAneva jalena yamunAmanu.. 7-151-26 (51664) satyaM te pratijAnAmi sarvashastrabhR^itAM vara. iShTApUrtena cha shape vIryeNa cha sutairapi.. 7-151-27 (51665) nihatya tAnrame sarvAnpA~nchAlAnpANDavaiH saha. sAntiM labdhA.asmi teShAM vA raNe gantA salokatAm 7-151-28 (51666) so.ahaM tatra gamiShyAmi yatra te puruSharShabhAH. hatA madarthe sa~NgrAme yudhyamAnAH kirITinA.. 5-151-30 na hIdAnIM sahAyA me parIpsantyanupaskR^itAH. shreyo hi pANDUnmanyante na tathAsmAnmahAbhuja.. 7-151-29 (51667) svayaM hi mR^ityurvihitaH satyasandhena saMyuge. bhavAnupekShAM kurute shiShyatvAdarjunasya hi.. 7-151-31 (51668) ato vinihatAH sarve ye.asmajjayachikIrShavaH. karNameva tu pashyAmi sampratyasmajjayaiShiNam.. 7-151-32 (51669) yo hi mitramavij~nAya yAthAtathyena mandadhIH. mitrArthe yojayatyenaM tasya so.artho.avasIdati.. 7-151-33 (51670) tAdR^igrUpaM kR^itamidaM mama kAryaM suhR^ittamaiH. mohAllubdhasya pApasya jihmasya dhanamIhataH.. 7-151-34 (51671) yau me yuddhasya kR^ityasya jihmAchAraiH samIyatuH. hato jayadrathashchaiva saumadattishcha viryavAn. abhIShAhAH shUrasenAH shibayo.atha vasAtayaH.. 7-151-35 (51672) so.ahamadya gamiShyAmi yatra te puruSharShabhAH. hatA madarthe sa~NgrAme yudhyamAnAH kirITinA.. 7-151-36 (51673) na hi me jIvitenArthastAnR^ite puruSharShabhAn. AchAryaH pANDuputrANAmanujAnAtu no bhavAn.. .. 7-151-37 (51674) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe ekapa~nchAshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 151 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-151-1 Artimiti chChedaH.. 5-151- pralubdhaH prakR^iShTo lubdhakastadvadva~nchakatvAt.. 5-151- dharmApachAyinaH dharmakShepakasya.. 5-151- AchAryaH pANDuputrANAmityapAlambhaH.. 5-151- ekapa~nchAshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 151 ..
droNaparva - adhyAya 152

.. shrIH ..

7.152. adhyAyaH 152

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

droNena sopAlambhaM duryodhanAshvAsanapUrvakaM raNAya niryANam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-152-0 (51675) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-152-0x (4668) sindhurAje hate tAta samare savyasAchinA. tathaiva bhUrishravasi kimAsIdvo manastadA.. 7-152-1 (51676) duryodhanena cha droNastathoktaH kurasaMsadi. kimuktavAnparaM tasmAttanmamAchakShva sa~njaya.. 7-152-2 (51677) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-152-3x (4669) niShTAnako mahAnAsItsainyAnAM tava bhArata. saindhavaM nihataM dR^iShTvA bhUrishravasameva cha.. 7-152-3 (51678) mantritaM tava putrasya te sarvamavamenire. yena mantraiNa nihatAH shatashaH kShatriyarShabhAH.. 7-152-4 (51679) droNastu tadvachaH shrutvA putrasya tava durmanAH. muhUrtamiva cha dhyAtvA bhR^ishamArto.abhyabhAShata.. 7-152-5 (51680) droNa uvAcha. 7-152-6x (4670) duryodhana kimevaM mAM vAksharairupakR^intasi. ajayyaM satataM sa~Nkhye bruvANaM savyasAchinam.. 7-152-6 (51681) etenavArjunaM j~nAtumalaM kaurava saMyuge. yachChikhaNDyavadhIdbhIShmaM pAlyamAnaH kirITinA.. 7-152-7 (51682) avadhyaM nihataM dR^iShTvA saMyuge devadAnavaiH. tadaivAj~nAsiShamahaM neyamastIti bhAratI.. 7-152-8 (51683) yaM puMsAM triShu lokeShu sarvashUramamaMsma hi. tasminnipatite bhIShme kaM sheShaM paryupAsmahe.. 7-152-9 (51684) yAnsma tAnglahate tAta shakuniH kurusaMsadi. akShAnna te.akShA nishitA bANAste shatrutApanAH. 7-152-10 (51685) `akShAMstu manyase bANA~nChobhamAnA~nChitA~nsharAn' ta ete ghnanti nastAta vishikhAH pArthachoditAH. tAMstadA.a.akhyAyamAnastvaM vidureNa na buddhavAn.. 7-152-11 (51686) yAstA vilapatashchApi vidurasya mahAtmanaH. dhIrasya vAcho nAshrauShIH kShemAya vadataH shivAH.. 7-152-12 (51687) tadidaM vartate ghoramAgataM vaishasaM mahat. tasyAvamAnAdvAkyasya duHshAsanakR^itena cha.. 7-152-13 (51688) yo.avamanya vachaH pathyaM suhR^idAmAptakAriNAm. svamataM kurute mUDhaH sa shochyo nachirAdiva.. 7-152-14 (51689) yachcha naH prekShamANAnAM kR^iShNAmAnAyya tatsabhAm. anarhantIM kule jAtAM sarvadharmAnuchAriNIm.. 7-152-15 (51690) tasyAdharmasya gAndhAre phalaM prAptamidaM mahat. nochetpApaM pare loke tvamR^ichChethAstato.adhikam.. 7-152-16 (51691) yachcha tAnpANDavAndyUte viShameNa vijitya ha. prAvrAjayastadA.araNye rauravAjinavAsasaH.. 7-152-17 (51692) putrANAmiva chaiteShAM dharmamAcharatAM sadA. druhyetko nu naro loke madanyo brAhmaNabruvaH.. 7-152-18 (51693) pANDavAnAmayaM kopastvayA shakuninA saha. AhR^ito dhR^itarAShTrasya sammate kuru saMsadi.. 7-152-19 (51694) duHshAsanena saMyuktaH karNena parivardhitaH. kShatturvAkyamanAdR^itya tvayA.abyastaH punaH punaH.. 7-152-20 (51695) `sa hi naH krodhavR^ikShashcha kR^itamUlo mahAtmanAm. tasya puShpaphale rAjannupabhu~NkShva mahAbala'.. 7-152-21 (51696) yattAH sarve parAbhUtAH paryavArayatArjunam. sindhurAjAnamAshritya sa vo madhye kathaM hataH.. 7-152-22 (51697) kathaM tvayi cha karNe cha kR^ipe shalye cha jIvati. ashvatthAmni cha kauravya nidhanaM saindhavo.agamat.. 7-152-23 (51698) yudhyantaH sarvarAjAnastejasvina upAsate. sindhurAjaM paritrAtuM vo madhye kathaM hataH.. 7-152-24 (51699) mayyeva hi visheSheNa tathA duryodhana tvayi. AshaMsata paritrANamarjunAtsa mahIpatiH.. 7-152-25 (51700) tatastasminparitrANamalabdhavati phalgunAt. na ki~nchidanupashyAmi jIvitasthAnamAtmanaH.. 7-152-26 (51701) majjantamiva chAtmAnaM dhR^iShTadyumnasya saMyuge. pashyAmyahatvA pA~nchAlAnsaha tena shikhaNDinA.. 7-152-27 (51702) tanmAM kimabhitapyantaM vAksharaireva kR^intasi. ashaktaH sindhurAjasya bhUtvA trANAya bhArata.. 7-152-28 (51703) sauvarNaM satyasandhasya dhvajamakliShTakarmaNaH. apashyanyudhi bhIShmasya kathamAshaMsase jayam.. 7-152-29 (51704) madhye mahArathAnAM kiM sheShaM tatra manyase. hato bhUrishravAshchaiva kiM sheShaM tatra manyase.. 7-152-30 (51705) kR^ipa eva cha durdharSho yadi jIvati pArthiva. yo nAgAtsindhurAjasya vartma taM pUjayAmyaham.. 7-152-31 (51706) yatrApashyaM hataM bhIShmaM pashyataste.anujasya vai. duHshAsanasya kauravya kurvANaM karma duShkaram.. 7-152-32 (51707) avadhyakalpaM sa~NgrAme devairapi savAsavaiH. na te vasundharA.astIti tadAhaM chintaye nR^ipa.. 7-152-33 (51708) imAni pANDavAnAM cha sR^ijjayAnAM cha bhArata. anIkAnyAdravante mAM sahitAnyadya bhArata.. 7-152-34 (51709) nAhatvA sarvapA~nchalAnkavachasya vimokShaNam. kartA.asmi samare karma dhArtarAShTra hitaM tava.. 7-152-35 (51710) rAjanbrUyAH sutaM me tvamashvatthAmAnamAhave. na somakAH pramoktavyA jIvitaM parirakShatA.. 7-152-36 (51711) yachcha pitrA.anushiShTo.asi tadvachaH paripAlaya. AnR^ishaMsye dame satye chArjave cha sthiro bhava.. 7-152-37 (51712) dharmArthakAmakushalo dharmArthAvapyapIDayan. dharmapradhAnakAryANi kuryAshcheti punaH punaH.. 7-152-38 (51713) chakShurmanobhyAM santoShyA viprAH pUjyAshcha shaktitaH. na chaiShAM vipriyaM kAryaM te hi vahnishikhopamAH.. 7-152-39 (51714) eSha tvahamanIkAni pravishAmyarisUdana. raNAya mahate rAjaMstvayA vAksharapIDitaH.. 7-152-40 (51715) tvaM cha duryodhana balaM yadi shakto.asi pAlaya. rAtrAvapi cha yoddhavyAH saMrabdhAH kurusR^i~njayAH.. 7-152-41 (51716) evamuktvA tataH prAyAddroNaH pANvasR^i~njayAn. muShNankShatriyatejAMsi nakShatrANAmivAMshumAn.. .. 7-152-42 (51717) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe dvipa~nchAshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 152 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-152-3 niShTAnakaH savyathaH shabdaH.. 5-152-8 iyaM senA nAstItyasya naShTetyarthaH.. 5-152-10 glahate pAtayati.. 5-152-16 nochediti. pareloke.adhikaH pApinAM klesha ihatvalpenaiva bhogena nistAra iti bhAvaH.. neha chetparaloke yatpApamichChettato.adhikam iti ka. pAThaH. na bhavetparaloke yattaptamichChettato.adhikam. iti kha. pAThaH. nochetpApaM paraM loke tvaM manyethAstato.adhikam iti ~Na.pAThaH. neha vai paralokAya pApamichCheta pArthivaH iti Ta.~Na.pAThaH.. 5-152-20 abhyasta AvartitaH.. 5-152-22 yastu sharvAdvaraM labdhvA paryavArayadarjunam. sindhurAjaH samAshritya sa vo madhye kathaM hataH iti ka.kha.pAThaH. yattAH sarve purA bhUtvA arjunaM paryavArayan. sindhurAjAH samAshritya sa vo madhye kathaM hataH iti Ta.pAThaH. yattatsarve paraM bhUtvA paryavArayatArjunam. sindhurAjAnamAshritya sa vo madhye kathaM hataH iti ~Na. pAThaH. yattatsarve parAbhUya paryavArayatArjunim. sindhurAjAnamAshritya sa vo madhye kathaM hataH iti ~Na. pAThaH.. 5-152-27 pashyAmyahaM vai pA~nchAlAnsaha tena shikhaNDinA iti ka.Ta.~Na.pAThaH. dhR^iShTadyumnasya kilpiShe iti jha.pAThaH.. 5-152-152 dvipa~nchAshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 153

.. shrIH ..

7.153. adhyAyaH 153

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

duryodhanena karNaMprati jayadrathavadhe droNasya pArthapakShapAtAdaudAsInyasya hetutve.abhihite karNena tannirAkaraNapUrvakaM daivasyaiva tatra hetutvakathanam.. 1 .. rAtriyuddhArambhaH.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-153-0 (51718) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-153-0x (4671) tato duryodhano rAjA droNenaivaM prachoditaH. amarShavashamApanno yuddhAyaiva mano dadhe. abravIchcha tadA karNaM putro duryodhanastava.. 7-153-1 (51719) pashya kR^iShNasahAyena pANDavena kirITinA. AchAryavihitaM vyUhaM bhittvA devaiH sudurbhidam.. 7-153-2 (51720) tava vyAyachChamAnasya droNasya cha mahAtmanaH. miShatAM yodhamukhyAnAM saindhavo vinipAtitaH.. 7-153-3 (51721) pashya rAdheya pR^ithvIshAH pR^ithivyAM pravarA yudhi. pArthenaikena nihatAH siMhenevetare mR^igAH.. 7-153-4 (51722) mama vyAyachChamAnasya samare shatrusUdana. alpAvasheShaM sainyaM me kR^itaM shakrAtmajena ha.. 7-153-5 (51723) kathaM vai yudhyamAnasya droNasya yudhi phalgunaH. bhindyAtsudurbhidaM vyUhaM yatamAno.api saMyuge.. 7-153-6 (51724) pratij~nAyA gataH pAraM hatvA saindhavamarjunaH.. 7-153-7 (51725) pashya rAdheya pR^ithvIshAnpR^ithivyAM pAtitAnbahUn. pArthena nihatAnsa~Nkhye mahendropamavikramAn.. 7-153-8 (51726) anichChataH kathaM vIra droNasya yudhi pANDavaH. bhindyAtsudurbhidaM vyR^ihaM yatamAnasya shupmiNaH.. 7-153-9 (51727) dayitaH phalguno nityamAchAryasya mahAtmanaH. tato.asya dattavAndvAramayuddhenaiva shatruhan.. 7-153-10 (51728) abhayaM sindhurAjAya dattvA droNaH parantapaH. prAdAtkirITine dvAraM pashyannirguNatAM mayi.. 7-153-11 (51729) yadyadAsyadanuj~nAM vai pUrvameva gR^ihAnprati. pramthAtuM sindhurAjasya na bhavejjIvitakShayaH.. 7-153-12 (51730) jayadratho jIvitArthI gachChamAno gR^ihAnprati. mayA.anAryeNa saMruddho droNAtprApyAbhayaM raNe.. 7-153-13 (51731) `rakShAmi saindhavaM yuddhe nainaM prApsyati phalgunaH. mama sainyavinAshAya ruddho vipreNa saindhavaH.. 7-153-14 (51732) tasya me mandabhAgyasya yatamAnasya saMyuge. hatAni sarvasainyAni hato rAjA jayadrathaH.. 7-153-15 (51733) pashya yodhavarAnkarNa shatasho.atha sahasrashaH. pArthanAmA~NkitairvANaiH sarve nItA yamakShayam.. 7-153-16 (51734) kathamekarathenAjau bahUnAM naH prapashyatAm. vipannaH saindhavo rAjA yodhAshchaiva sahasrashaH'.. 7-153-17 (51735) adya me bhrAtaraH kShINAshchitrasenAdayo raNe. bhAmasanaM samAsAdya pashyatAM nodurAtmanAm.. 7-153-18 (51736) karNa uvAcha. 7-153-19x (4672) AchAryaM mA vigarhasva shaktyA.asau yudhyate dvijaH. yathAbalaM yathotsAhaM tyaktvA jIvitamAtmanaH.. 7-153-19 (51737) yadyenaM samatikramya praviShTaH shvetavAhanaH. nAtra sUkShmo.api doShaHsyAdAchAryasya katha~nchana.. 7-153-20 (51738) kR^itI dakSho yuvA shUraH kR^itAstro laghuvikramaH. divyAstrayuktamAsthAya rathaM vAnaralakShaNam.. 7-153-21 (51739) kR^iShNena cha gR^ihItAshvamabhedyakachAvR^itaH. gANDIvamajaraM divyaM dhanurAdAya vIryavAn.. 7-153-22 (51740) pravarShannishitAnbANAnbAhudraviNadarpitaH. yadarjuno.abhyayAddroNamupapannaM hi tasya tat.. 7-153-23 (51741) AchAryaH sthaviro rAja~nshIghrayAne tathA.akShamaH. bAhuvyAyAmacheShTAyAmashaktastu narAdhipa.. 7-153-24 (51742) tenaivamabhyatikrAntaH shvetAshvaH kR^iShNasArathiH. tasya doShaM na pashyAmi droNasyAnena hetunA.. 7-153-25 (51743) ajayyAnpANDavAnmanye droNonAstravidA mR^idhe. tathA hyenamatikramya praviShTaH shvetavAhanaH.. 7-153-26 (51744) satataM cheShTamAnAnAM nikR^ityA vikrameNa cha. daivAdiShTo.anyathAbhAvo na manye vidyate kvachit.. 7-153-27 (51745) yato no yudhyamAnAnAM paraM shaktyA suyodhana. saindhavo nihato yuddhe daivamatra paraM smR^itam.. 7-153-28 (51746) paraM yatnaM kurvatAM cha tvayA sArdhaM raNAjire. hatvA.asmAkaM pauruShaM vai daivaM pashchAtkaroti naH.. 7-153-29 (51747) daivopasR^iShTapuruSho yatkarma kurute kvachit. kR^itaM kR^itaM hi tattasyaTa daivena vinipAtyate.. 7-153-30 (51748) yatkartavyaM manuShyeNa vyavasAyavatA sadA. tatkAryamavisha~Nkena siddhirdaive pratiShThitA.. 7-153-31 (51749) nikR^ityA va~nchitAH pArthA viShayogaishcha bhArata. dagdhA jatugR^ihe chApi dyUtena cha parAjitAH.. 7-153-32 (51750) rAjanItiM samAshritya prahitAshchaiva kAnanam. yatnena cha kR^itaM tattaddaivena vinipAtitam.. 7-153-33 (51751) yudhyasva yatnamAsthaya daivaM kR^itvA nirarthakam. yatatastava teShAM cha daivaM mArgeNa yAsyati.. 7-153-34 (51752) na teShAM matipUrvaM hi sukR^itaM dR^ishyate kvachit. duShkR^itaM tava vA vIra buddhyA hInaM kurUdvaha.. 7-153-35 (51753) daivaM pramANaM sarvasya sukR^itasyetarasya vA. ananyakarma daivaM hi jAgarti svapatAmapi. `tena yukto hi puruShaH kAryAkArye niyujyate'.. 7-153-36 (51754) bahUni tava sainyAni yodhAshcha bahavastava. na tathA pANDuputrANAmevaM yuddhamavartata.. 7-153-37 (51755) tairalpairbahavo yUyaM kShayaM nItAH prahAriNaH. sha~Nke daivasya tatkarma pauruShaM yena nAshitam.. 7-153-38 (51756) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-153-39x (4673) evaM saMbhAShamANAnAM bahu tattajjanAdhipa. pANDavAnAmanIkAni samadR^ishyanta saMyuge.. 7-153-39 (51757) tataH pravavR^ite yuddhaM vyatiShaktarathadvipam. tAvakAnAM paraiH sArdhaM rAjandurmantrite tava.. .. 7-153-40 (51758) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi jayadrathavadhaparvaNi chaturdashadivasayuddhe tripa~nchAshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 153 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-153-12 yadyadAsyat dadyAchchedityarthaH. sindhurAjasya nAbhavidhyajjanakShaya iti jha. pAThaH.. 5-153-27 anyathAbhAvaH parAjayo daivAdiShTaH. natu droNAparAdhaja iti bhAvaH.. daivadR^iShTyA.anyathAbhAvo na manyurvidyate kvachit iti ka. pAThaH. daivadiShTAnyathAbhAvo na manyurvidyate kvachit iti kha.pAThaH.. 5-153-30 daivopasR^iShTo durdaivaprastaH.. 5-153-35 teShAM jayahetuH sukR^itaM tava vA parAjayahetuH duShkR^itaM nAstItyAha. na teShAmiti.. 5-153-153 triSha~nchAshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 154

.. shrIH ..

7.154. adhyAyaH 154

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

yudhiShThireNa duryodhanaparAjayaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-154-0 (51759) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-154-0x (4674) tadudIrNaM rathAshvaughaM balaM tava janAdhipa. pANDusenAmatikramya yodhayAmAsa sarvataH.. 7-154-1 (51760) pA~nchAlAH kuravashchaiva yodhayantaH parasparam. yamarAShTrAya mahate paralokAya dIkShitAH.. 7-154-2 (51761) shUrAH shUraiH samAgamya sharatomarashaktibhiH. vivyadhuH samare.anyonyaM ninyushchaiva yamakShayam.. 7-154-3 (51762) rathinAM rathibhiH sArdhaM rudhirasrAvadAruNam. prAvartata mahadyuddhaM nighnatAmitaretaram.. 7-154-4 (51763) vAraNAshcha mahArAja samAsAdya parasparam. viShANairdArayAmAsuH susa~NkruddhA madotkaTAH.. 7-154-5 (51764) hayArohAnhayArohAH prAsashaktiparashvathaiH. bibhidustumule yuddhe prArthayanto mahadyashaH.. 7-154-6 (51765) pattayashcha mahAbAho shatashaH shastrapANayaH. anyonyamArdayanrAjannityaM yattAH parAkrame.. 7-154-7 (51766) gotrANAM nAmadheyAnAM kulAnAM chaiva mAriSha. shravaNAddhi vijAnImaH pA~nchAlAnkurubhiH saha.. 7-154-8 (51767) te.anyonyaM samare yodhAH sharashaktiparashvathaiH. praiShayanparalokAya vicharanto hyabhItavat.. 7-154-9 (51768) sharairdasha disho rAjaMsteShAM muktaiH sahasrashaH. na bhrAjante yathA pUrvaM bhAskarasya cha nAshanAt.. 7-154-10 (51769) tathA prayudhyamAneShu pANDaveyeShu bhArata. duryodhano mahArAja vyavAgAhata tadbalam.. 7-154-11 (51770) saindhavasya vadhenaiva bhR^ishaM duHkhasamanvitaH. martavyamiti saMchintya prAvishachcha dviShadbalam.. 7-154-12 (51771) nAdayanrathaghoSheNa kampayanniva medinIm. abhyavartata putraste pANDavAnAmanIkinIm.. 7-154-13 (51772) sa sannipAtastumulastasya teShAM cha bhArata. abhavatsarvasainyAnAmabhAvakaramo mahAn.. 7-154-14 (51773) `dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-154-15x (4675) tathA hateShu sainyeShu tathA kR^ichChragataH svayam. kachchidduryodhanaH sUta nAkArShItpR^iShThato raNam.. 7-154-15 (51774) ekasya cha bahunAM cha sannipAto mahAnabhUt. visheShato hi nR^ipaterviShamaM pratibhAti me.. 7-154-16 (51775) so.atyantasukhasaMvR^iddho rakShyo lokasya cheshvaraH. eko bahUnsamAsAdya kachchinnAsItparA~NmukhaH.. 7-154-17 (51776) droNaH karNaH kR^ipashchaiva kR^itavarmA cha sAtvataH. nAvArayankathaM yuddhe rAjAnaM rAjyakA~NkShiNaH.. 7-154-18 (51777) sarvopAyairhi yuddheShu rakShitavyo mahIpatiH. eShA nItiH parA yuddhe dR^iShTA tatra manIShibhiH.. 7-154-19 (51778) praviShTe vai mama sute pareShAM vai mahadbalam. mAmakA rathinAM shreShThAH kimakurvata sQa~njaya.. 7-154-20 (51779) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-154-21x (4676) rAjansa~NgrAmamAshcharyaM putrasya tava bhArata. ekasya cha bahUnAM cha shR^iNu me bruvato dhruvam.. 7-154-21 (51780) droNena vAryamANo.asau karNena cha kR^ipeNa cha. prAvishatpANDavIM senAM makaraH sAgaraM yathA.. 7-154-22 (51781) kiranniShusahasrANi tatratatra tathAtathA. pA~nchAlAnpANDavAMshchaiva vivyAdha nishitaiH sharaiH.. 7-154-23 (51782) yathodayagataH sUryo rashmibhirnAshayettamaH. tathA putrastava balaM nAshayattanmahAbalaH'.. 7-154-24 (51783) yathA madhyandine sUryaM pratapantaM gabhastibhiH. tathA tava sutaM madhye pratapantaM sharArchibhiH. na shekurbhArataM yuddhe pANDavAH samudIkShitum.. 7-154-25 (51784) palAyanakR^itotsAhA nirutsAhA dviShajjaye. paryadhAvanta pA~nchAlA vadhyamAnA mahAtmanA.. 7-154-26 (51785) rukmapu~NkhaiH prasannAgraistava putreNa dhanvinA. ardyamAnAH sharaistUrNaM nyapatanpANDusainikAH.. 7-154-27 (51786) `vyadravaMshcha bhayAdyodhA dR^iShTvA taM paramAhave. vyAttAnanamiva prAptamantakaM prANahAriNam'.. 7-154-28 (51787) na tAdR^ishaM rame karma kR^itavantastu tAvakAH. yAdR^ishaM kR^itavAnrAjA putrastava vishAmpate.. 7-154-29 (51788) putreNa tava sA senA pANDavI mathitA raNe. nalinI dviradeneva samantAtphullapa~NkajA.. 7-154-30 (51789) kShINatoyAnilArkAbhyAM hatatviDiva padminI. babhUva pANDavI senA tava putrasya tejasA.. 7-154-31 (51790) pANDusenAM hatAM dR^iShTvA tava putreNa bhArata. bhImasenapurogAstu pA~nchAlAH samupAdravan.. 7-154-32 (51791) sa bhImasenaM dashabhirmAdrIputrau tribhistribhiH. virATadrupadau ShaDbhiH shatena cha shikhaNDinam.. 7-154-33 (51792) dhR^iShTadyumnaM cha saptatyA dharmaputraM cha saptabhiH. kekayAMshchaiva chedIMshcha bahubhirnishitaiH sharaiH.. 7-154-34 (51793) sAtvataM pa~nchabhirviddhA draupadeyAMstribhistribhiH. ghaTotkachaM cha samare viddhvA siMha ivAnadat.. 7-154-35 (51794) shatashashchAparAnyodhAnsadvipAMshcha mahAraNe. sharairavachakartograiH kruddho.antaka iva prajAH.. 7-154-36 (51795) sA tena pANDavI senA vadhyamAnA shilImukhaiH. tava putreNa sa~NgrAme vidudrAva narAdhipa.. 7-154-37 (51796) taM tapantamivAdityaM kururAjaM mahAhave. nAshakanvIkShituM rAjanpANDuputrasya sainikAH.. 7-154-38 (51797) tato yudhiShThiro rAjA kupito rAjasattama. abhyadhAvatkurupatiM tava putraM jighAMsayA.. 7-154-39 (51798) tAvubhau yudhi kauravyau samIyaturarindamau. svArthahetoH parAkrAntau duryodhanayudhiShThirau.. 7-154-40 (51799) tato duryodhanaH kruddhaH sharaiH sannataparvabhiH. vivyAdha dashabhistUrNaM dhvajaM chichCheda cheShuNA.. 7-154-41 (51800) indrasenaM tribhishchaiva lalATe jaghnivAnnR^ipa. sArathiM dayitaM rAj~naH pANDavasya mahAtmanaH.. 7-154-42 (51801) dhanushcha punaranyena chakartAsya mahArathaH. chaturbhishchaturashchaiva bANairvivyAdha vAjinAH.. 7-154-43 (51802) tato yudhiShThiraH kruddho nimeShAdiva kArmukam. anyadAdAya vegena kauravaM pratyavArayat.. 7-154-44 (51803) tasya tAnnighnataH shatrUnrukmapR^iShThaM mahaddhanuH. bhallAbhyAM paNDavo jyeShThastridhA chichCheda mAriSha.. 7-154-45 (51804) vivyAdha chainaM dashabhiH samyagastaiH shitaiH sharaiH. marma bhittvA tu te sarve saMlagnAH kShitimAvishan.. 7-154-46 (51805) tataH parivR^itA yodhAH parivavruryudhiShThiram. vR^itreNa saha yudhyantaM yadvaddevAH shatakratum.. 7-154-47 (51806) tato yudhiShThiro rAjA tava putrasya mAriSha. sharaM cha sUryarashmyAbhamatyugramanivAraNam. hA hato.asIti rAjAnamuktvA.amu~nchadyudhiShThiraH.. 7-154-48 (51807) sa tenAkarNamuktena viddho bANena kauravaH. niShasAda rathopasthe bhR^ishaM sammUDhachetanaH.. 7-154-49 (51808) tataH pA~nchAlyasenAnAM bhR^ishamAsIdravo mahAn. hato rAjeti rAjendra muditAnAM samantataH.. 7-154-50 (51809) bANashabdaravashchograH shushruve tatra mAriSha. atha droNo drutaM tatra pratyadR^ishyata saMyuge.. 7-154-51 (51810) hR^iShTo duryodhanashchApi dR^iDhamAdAya kArmukam. tiShThatiShTheti rAjAnaM bruvanpANDavamabhyayAt.. 7-154-52 (51811) pratyudyayustaM tvaritAH pA~nchAlA jayagR^iddhinaH. tAndroNaH pratijagrAha parIpsankurusattamam. chaNDavAtaH samudvUto meghAnambumucho yathA.. 7-154-53 (51812) tato rAjanmahAnAsItsa~NgrAmo bhUrivardhanaH. tAvakAnAM pareShAM cha sametAnAM yuyutsayA.. .. 7-154-54 (51813) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi ghaTotkachavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe chatuHpa~nchAshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 154 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-154-8 gotraM pitrAdi nAma shaineya sAtyake ityAdi. kulaM pANDyapA~nchAlyetyAdi.. 5-154-46 samyagastaiH dR^iDhaM prakShiptaiH.. 5-154-51 bANashabdaravo bANashabdasahito ravaH prANishabdaH.. 5-154-54 bhUrivardhano bahuchChedanaH.. 5-154-154 chatuHpa~nchAshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 155

.. shrIH ..

7.155. adhyAyaH 155

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

droNayuddhavarNanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-155-0 (51814) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-155-0x (4677) yattadA prAvishatpANDUnAchAryaH kupito balI. uktA duryodhanaM mandaM mama shAstrAtigaM sutam.. 7-155-1 (51815) pravishya vicharantaM cha rathe shUramavasthitam. kathaM droNaM maheShvAsaM pANDavAH paryavArayan.. 7-155-2 (51816) ke.arakShandakShiNaM chakramAchAryasya mahAhave. ke chottaramarakShanta nighnataH shAstravAnbahUn.. 7-155-3 (51817) ke chAsya pR^iShThato.anvAsanvIrA vIrasya yodhinaH. ke purastAdavartanta rathinastasya shatravaH.. 7-155-4 (51818) manye tAnaspR^ishachChItamativelamanArtavam. manye te samavepanta gAvo vai shishire yathA.. 7-155-5 (51819) yatprAvishanmaheShvAsaH pA~nchAlAnaparAjitaH. nR^ityansa rathamArgeShu sarvashastrabhR^itAM varaH.. 7-155-6 (51820) nirdahansarvasainyAni pA~nchAlAnAM ratharShabhaH. dhUmaketuriva kruddhaH kathaM mR^ityumupeyivAn.. 7-155-7 (51821) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-155-8x (4678) sAyAhne saindhavaM hatvA rAj~nA pArthaH sametya cha. sAtyakishcha maheShvAso droNamevAbhyadhAvatAm.. 7-155-8 (51822) tathA yudhiShThirastUrNaM bhImasenashcha pANDavaH. pR^ithakchamUbhyAM saMyattau droNamevAbhyadhAvatAm.. 7-155-9 (51823) tathaiva nakulo dhImAnsahadevashcha durjayaH. dhR^iShTadyumnaH shatAnIko virATashcha sakekayaH. mAtsyAH sAlvAH sasenAshcha droNameva yayuryudhi.. 7-155-10 (51824) drupadashcha tathA rAjA pA~nchAlairabhirakShitaH. dhR^iShTadyumnapitA rAjandroNamevAbhyavartata.. 7-155-11 (51825) draupadeyA maheShvAsA rAkShasashcha ghaTotkachaH. sasainyAste nyavartanta droNameva mahAdyutim.. 7-155-12 (51826) prabhadrakAshcha pA~nchAlAH ShaTsahasrAH prahAriNaH. droNamevAbhyavartanta puraskR^itya shikhaNDinam.. 7-155-13 (51827) tathetare naravyAghrAH pANDavAnAM mahArathAH. sahitAH sannyavartanta droNameva dvijarShabham.. 7-155-14 (51828) teShu shUreShu yuddhAya gateShu bharatarShabha. babhUva rajanI ghorA bhIrUNAM bhayavardhinI.. 7-155-15 (51829) yodhAnAmashivA raudrA rAjannantakagAminI. ku~njarAshvamanuShyANAM prANAntakaraNI tadA.. 7-155-16 (51830) tasyAM rajanyAM ghorAyAM nadantyaH sarvataH shivAH. nyavedayanbhayaM ghoraM sajvAlakabalairmukhaiH.. 7-155-17 (51831) ulUkAshchApyadR^ishyanta shaMsanto vipulaM bhayam. visheShataH kauravANAM dhvajinyAmatidAruNAH.. 7-155-18 (51832) tataH sainyeShu rAjendra shabdaH samabhavanmahAn. bherIshabdena mahatA mR^ida~NgAnAM svanena cha.. 7-155-19 (51833) gajAnAM bR^iMhitaishchApi tura~NgANAM cha heShitaiH. khurashabdanipAtaishcha tumulaH sarvato.abhavat.. 7-155-20 (51834) tataH samabhavadyuddhaM sandhyAyAmatidAruNam. droNasya cha mahArAja sR^i~njayAnAM cha sarvashaH.. 7-155-21 (51835) tamasA chAvR^ite loke na prAj~nAyata ki~nchana. sainyena rajasA chaiva samantAdutthitena ha.. 7-155-22 (51836) narasyAshvasya nAgasya samasajjata shoNitam. nApashyAma rajo bhaumaM kashmalenAbhisaMvR^itAH.. 7-155-23 (51837) rAtrau vaMshavanasyeva dahyamAnasya parvate. ghorashchaTachaTAshabdaH shastrANAM patatAmabhUt.. 7-155-24 (51838) mR^ida~NgAnakanirhrAdairjharjharaiH paTahaistathA. phetkArairheShitaiH shabdaiH sarvamaivAkulaM babhau.. 7-155-25 (51839) naiva sve na pare rAjanprAj~nAyanta tamovR^ite. unmattamiva tatsarvaM babhUva rajanImukhe.. 7-155-26 (51840) bhaumaM rajo.atha rAjendra shoNitena praNAshitam. shAtakaumbhaishcha kavachairbhUShaNaishcha tamo.anashat.. 7-155-27 (51841) tataH sA bhAratI senA maNihemavibhUShitA. dyaurivAsItsanakShatrA rajanyAM bharatarShabha.. 7-155-28 (51842) gomAyubalasa~NghuShTA shaktidhvajasamAkulA. vAraNAbhirutA ghorA kShveDitotkruShTanAditA.. 7-155-29 (51843) tatrAbhavanmahAshabdastumulo romaharShaNaH. samAvR^iNvandishaH sarvA mahendrAshaniniHsvanaH.. 7-155-30 (51844) sA nishIthe mahArAja senA.adR^ishyata bhAratI. a~NgadaiH kuNDalairniShkaiH shastraishchaivAvabhAsitA.. 7-155-31 (51845) tatra nAgA rathAshchaiva jAmbUnadavibhUShitAH. nishAyAM pratyadR^ishyanta meghA iva savidyutaH.. 7-155-32 (51846) R^iShTishaktigadAbANamusalaprAsapaTTasAH. sampatanto vyadR^ishyanta bhrAjamAnA ivAgnayaH.. 7-155-33 (51847) duryodhanapurovAtAM rathanAgavalAhakAm. vAditraghoShastanitAM chApavidyudvvajairvR^itAm.. 7-155-34 (51848) droNapANDavaparjanyAM kha~NgashaktigadAshanim. sharadhArAstrapavanAM shastrapAtoShmasa~NkulAm.. 7-155-35 (51849) ghorAM vismApanImugrAM jIvitachChidamapluvAm. tAM prAvishannatibhayAM nadIM yuddhachikIrShavaH.. 7-155-36 (51850) tasminrAtrimukhe ghore mahAshabdaninAdite. bhIrUNAM trAsajanane shUrANAM harShavardhane.. 7-155-37 (51851) rAtriyuddhe mahAghore vartamAne sudAruNe. droNamabhyadruvankruddhAH sahitAH pANDusR^i~njayAH.. 7-155-38 (51852) ye ye pramukhato rAjannAvartanta mahArathAH. tAnsarvAnvimukhAMshchakre kAMshchinninye yamakShayam.. 7-155-39 (51853) tAni nAgasahasrANi rathAnAmayutAni cha. padAtihayasa~NghAnAM prayutAnyarbudAni cha. droNenaikena nArAchairnirbhinnAni nishAmukhe.. .. 7-155-40 (51854) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi ghaTotkachavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe pa~nchapa~nchAshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 155 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-155-1 shAstrAtigaM shAstramAj~nA.. 5-155-7 dhUmaketuragniH .. 5-155-14 sannyavartanta sammukhaM nitarAmavartanta.. 5-155-155 pa~nchapa~nchAshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 156

.. shrIH ..

7.156. adhyAyaH 156

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

bhImena durmadaduShkarNAdivadhaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-156-0 (51855) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-156-0x (4679) tasminpraviShTe durdharShe sR^i~njayAnamitaujasi. amR^iShyamANe saMrabdhe kA vo.abhUdvai matistadA.. 7-156-1 (51856) duryodhanaM tathA putramuktvA shAstrAtigaM mama. yatprAvishadameyAtmA kiM pArthaH pratyapadyata.. 7-156-2 (51857) nihate saindhave vIre bhUrishravasi chaiva ha. yadA.abhyagAnmahAtejAH pA~nchAlAnaparAjitaH.. 7-156-3 (51858) kimamanyata durdharShe praviShTe shatrutApane. duryodhanastu kiM kR^ityaM prAptakAlamamanyata.. 7-156-4 (51859) ke cha taM varadaM vIramanvayurdvijasattamam. ke chAsya pR^iShThato.agachChanvIrAH shUrasya yudhyataH. ke purastAdavartanta nighnantaH shAstravAnraNe.. 7-156-5 (51860) manye.ahaM pANDavAnsarvAnbhAradvAjasharArditAn. shishire kampamAnA vai kR^ishA gAva iva prabho.. 7-156-6 (51861) pravishya sa maheShvAsaH pA~nchAlAnarimardanaH. kathaM nu puruShavyAghraH pa~nchatvamupajagmivAn.. 7-156-7 (51862) sarveShu yodheShu cha sa~NgateShu rAtrau sameteShu mahAratheShu. saMloDyamAneShu pR^ithagbaleShu ke vastadAnIM matimanta Asan.. 7-156-8 (51863) hatAMshchaiva viShaktAMshcha parAbhUtAMshcha shaMsasi. rathino virathAMshchaiva kR^itAnyuddheShu mAmakAn.. 5-156-10 teShAM saMloDyamAnAnAM pANDavairhatachetasAm. andhe tamasi magnAnAmabhavatkA matistadA.. 7-156-9 (51864) prahR^iShTAMshchApyudagrAMshcha santuShTAMshchaiva pANDavAn. shaMsasIhAprahR^iShTAMshcha vibhraShTAMshchaiva mAmakAn.. 7-156-11 (51865) kathameShAM tadA tatra pArthAnAmapalAyinAm. prakAshamabhavadrAtrau kathaM kuruShu sa~njaya.. 7-156-12 (51866) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-156-13x (4680) rAtriyuddhe tadA rAjanvartamAne sudAruNe. droNamabhyadravansarve pANDavAH saha somakaiH.. 7-156-13 (51867) tato droNaH kekayAMshcha dhR^iShTadyumnasya chAtmajAn. sampraiShayatpretalokaM sarvAniShubhirAshugaiH.. 7-156-14 (51868) tasya pramukhato rAjanye.avartanta mahArathAH. tAnsarvAnpreShayAmAsa pitR^ilokaM sa bhArata.. 7-156-15 (51869) pramathnantaM tadA vIrAnbhAradvAjaM mahAratham. abhyavartata sa~NkruddhaH shibI rAjA pratApavAn.. 7-156-16 (51870) tamApatantaM samprekShya pANDavAnAM mahAratham. vivyAdha dashabhirdroNaH sarvapArashavaiH shitaiH.. 7-156-17 (51871) taM shibiH prativivyAdha triMshatA nishitaiH sharaiH. sArathiM chAsya bhullena smayamAno nyapAtayat.. 7-156-18 (51872) tasya droNo hayAnhatvA sArathiM cha mahAtmanaH. athA.asya sashirastrANaM shiraH kAyAdapAharat.. 7-156-19 (51873) tato.asya sArathiM kShipramanyaM duryodhano.adishat. sa tena sa~NgR^ihItAshvaH punarabhyadravadripUn.. 7-156-20 (51874) kali~NgAnAmanIkena kAli~Ngasya suto raNe. pUrvaM pitR^ivadhAtkruddhau bhImasenamupAdravat.. 7-156-21 (51875) sa bhImaM pa~nchabhirviddhvA punarvivyAdha saptabhiH. vishokaM tribhirAnarchChadvajamekena patriNA.. 7-156-22 (51876) kali~NgAnAM tu taM shUraM kruddhaM kruddho vR^ikodaraH. rathAdrathamabhidrutya muShTinA.abhijaghAna ha.. 7-156-23 (51877) tasya muShTihatasyAjau pANDavena balIyasA. sarvANyasthIni sahasA prApatanvai pR^ithakpR^ithak.. 7-156-24 (51878) `tasminhate tadA tena siMhanAdo mahAnabhUt. pA~nchAlAnAM mahArAja sAdhusAdhviti pANDavam'.. 7-156-25 (51879) taM karNo bhrAtarashchAsya nAmR^iShyanta parantapa. te bhImasenaM nArAchairjaghnurAshIviShopamaiH.. 7-156-26 (51880) tataH shatrurathaM tyaktvA bhImo drumarathaM gataH. drumaM chAsyantamanishaM muShTinA samapothayat.. 7-156-27 (51881) `yathA kAchamaNirnyasto muShTinaikena lIlayA. sa hataH sarvathA chUrNo raktamevodapadyata.. 7-156-28 (51882) tathA chUrNamabhUttatra karNabhrAtA drumastathA'. sa tadA pANQDuputreNa balinA.abhihato.apatat.. 7-156-29 (51883) taM nihatya mahArAja bhImaseno mahAbalaH. jayarAtarathaM prApya muhuH siMha ivAnadat.. 7-156-30 (51884) jayarAtaM tu charaNe gR^ihya bhImo mahAbalaH. sUtaM chAsya mahAbAhurgR^ihya rAjaMstathaiva cha.. 7-156-31 (51885) pAdayorgR^ihya tau vIrau bhImaH karNasya pashyataH. bhUmAvAviddhya jaghne sa tau cha prANairvyayujyatAm.. 7-156-32 (51886) karNastu pANDave shaktiM kA~nchanIM samavAsR^ijat. tatastAmeva jagrAha prahasanpANDunandanaH.. 7-156-33 (51887) karNAyaiva cha durdharShashchikShepAjau vR^ikodaraH. tAmApatantIM chichCheda shakunistailapAyinA.. 7-156-34 (51888) etatkR^itvA mahatkarma raNe.adbhutaparAkramaH. punaH svarathamAsthAya dudrAva tava vAhinIm.. 7-156-35 (51889) tamAyAntaM jighAMsantaM bhImaM kruddhamivAntakam. nyavArayanmahAbAhuM tava putrA vishAmpate. mahatA sharavarSheNa chChAdayanto mahArathAH.. 7-156-36 (51890) durmadasya tato bhImaH prahasanniva saMyuge. sArathiM cha hayAMshchaiva sharairninye yamakShayam.. 7-156-37 (51891) durmadastu tato yAnaM duShkarNasyAvachakrame. tAvekarathamArUDhau bhrAtarau paratApanau. 7-156-38 (51892) sa~NgrAmashiraso madhye bhImaM dvAvapyadhAvatAm. yathAmbupatimitrau hi tArakaM daityasattamam.. 7-156-39 (51893) tatastu durmadashchaiva duShkarNashcha tavAtmajau. rathamekaM samAruhya bhImaM bANairavidhyatAm.. 7-156-40 (51894) tataH karNasya miShato drauNerduryodhanasya cha. kR^ipasya somadattasya bAhlIkasya cha pANDavaH.. 7-156-41 (51895) durmadasya cha vIrasya duShkarNasya cha taM ratham. pAdaprahAreNa dharAM prAveshayadarindamaH.. 7-156-42 (51896) tataH sutau te balinau shUrau duShkarNadurmadau. muShTinA.a.ahatya sa~Nkruddhau mamarda charaNena ha.. 7-156-43 (51897) tato hAhAkR^ite sainye dR^iShTvA bhImaM nR^ipA.abruvan. rudro.ayaM bhImarUpeNa dhArtarAShTreShu yudhyati.. 7-156-44 (51898) evamuktvA palAyante sarve bhArata pArthivAH. visaMj~nA vAhayanvAhAnna cha dvau saha dhAvataH.. 7-156-45 (51899) tato bale bhR^ishalulite nishAmukhe supUjito nR^ipavR^iShabhairvR^ikodaraH. mahAbalaH kamalavibuddhalochano yudhiShThiraM nR^ipatimapUjayadbalI.. 7-156-46 (51900) tato yamau drupadavirATakekayA yudhiShThirashchApi parAM mudaM yayuH. vR^ikodaraM bhR^ishamanupUjayaMshcha te yathAndhake pratinihate haraM surAH.. 7-156-47 (51901) tataH sutAste varuNAtmajopamA rupAnvitAH saha guruNA mahAtmanA. vR^ikodaraM sarathapadAtiku~njarA yuyutsavo bhR^ishamabhiparyavArayan.. 7-156-48 (51902) `tato yamau drupadasutAH sasainikA yudhiShThiradrupadavirATasAtvatAH. ghaTotkacho jayavijayau drumo vR^ikaH sasR^i~njayAstava tanayAnavArayan'.. 7-156-49 (51903) tato.abhavattimiraghanairivAvR^ite mahAbhaye bhayadamatIva dAruNam. nishAmukhe vR^ikabalagR^idhramodanaM mahAtmanA nR^ipavara yuddhamadbhutam.. .. 7-156-50 (51904) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi ghaTotkachavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe ShaTpa~nchAshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 156 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-156-1 gAvaH gAH.. 5-156- kamalavibuddhalochano vilasatpadmanetraH.. 5-156- guruNA droNena.. 5-156- timirANyeva ghanAstaiH.. 5-156- ShaTpa~nchAshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 156 ..
droNaparva - adhyAya 157

.. shrIH ..

7.157. adhyAyaH 157

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sAtyakinA somadattaparAjayaH.. 1 .. ashvatthAmaghaTotkachayuddhamashvatthAmaparAkramashcha.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-157-0 (51905) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-157-0x (4681) prAyopaviShTe tu hate putre sAtyakinA tadA. somadatto bhR^ishaM kruddhaH sAtyakiM vAkyamabravIt.. 7-157-1 (51906) kShatradharmaH paro dR^iShTo yastu devairmahAtmabhiH. taM tvaM sAtvata santajya dasyudharme kathaM rataH.. 7-157-2 (51907) parA~NmukhAya dInAya nyastashastrAya yAchate. kShatradharmarataH prAj~naH kathaM nu praharedraNe.. 7-157-3 (51908) dvAveva kila vR^iShNInAM tatra khyAtau mahArathau. pradyumnashcha mahAbAhustvaM chaiva yudhi sAtvata.. 7-157-4 (51909) kathaM prAyopaviShTAya pArthena chChinnabAhave. nR^ishaMsaM bata dInaM cha tAdR^ishaM kR^itavAnasi.. 7-157-5 (51910) karmamastasya durvR^itta phalaM prApnuhi saMyuge. adya ChetsyAmi te mUDha shiro vikramya patriNA.. 7-157-6 (51911) shape sAtvata putrAbhyAmiShTena sukR^itena cha. anatItAmimAM rAtriM yadi tvAM vIramAninam.. 7-157-7 (51912) arakShyamANaM pArthena jiShNunA sasutAnujam. na hanyAM narake ghore pateyaM vR^iShNipAMsana.. 7-157-8 (51913) evamuktvA susa~NkruddhaH somadatto mahAbalaH. dadhmau sha~NkhaM cha tAreNa siMhanAdaM nanAda cha.. 7-157-9 (51914) tataH kamalapatrAkShaH siMhadaMShTro durAsadaH. sAtyakirbhR^ishasa~NkruddhaH somadattamathAbravIt.. 7-157-10 (51915) kauraveya na me trAsaH katha~nchidapi vidyate. tvayA sArdhamathAnyaishcha yudhyato hR^idi kashchana.. 7-157-11 (51916) yadi sarveNa sainyena gupto mAM yodhayiShyasi. tathApi na vyathA kAchittvayi syAnmama kaurava.. 7-157-12 (51917) yuddhasAreNa vAkyena asatAM sammatena cha. nAhaM bhIShayituM shakyaH kShatravR^itte sthitastvayA.. 7-157-13 (51918) yadi te.asti yuyutsA.adya mayA saha narAdhipa. nirdayo nishitairbANaiH prahara praharAmi te.. 7-157-14 (51919) hato bhUrishravA vIrastava putro mahArathaH. shalashchaiva mahArAja bhrAtR^ivyasanakarShitaH.. 7-157-15 (51920) tvAM chApyadya vadhiShyAmi sahaputraM sabAndhavam. tiShThedAnIM raNe yattaH kauravo.asi mahArathaH.. 7-157-16 (51921) yasmindAnaM damaH shauchamahiMsA hIrdhR^itiH kShamA. anapAyAni sarvANi nityaM rAj~ni yudhiShThire.. 7-157-17 (51922) mR^ida~Ngaketostasya tvaM tejasA nihataH purA. sakarNasaubalaH sa~Nkhye vinAshamupayAsyasi.. 7-157-18 (51923) shape.ahaM kR^iShNacharaNairiShTApUrtena chaiva ha. yadi tvAM sasutaM pApaM na hanyAM yudhi roShitaH.. 7-157-19 (51924) apayAsyasi chottyaktvA raNaM mukto bhaviShyasi.. 7-157-20 (51925) evamAbhAShya chAnyonyaM krodhasaMraktalochanau. pravR^ittau sharasampAtaM kartuM puruShasattamau.. 7-157-21 (51926) tato rathasahasreNa nAgAnAmayutena cha. duryodhanaH somadattaM parivArya vyavasthitaH.. 7-157-22 (51927) shakunishcha susa~NkruddhaH sarvashastrabhR^itAM varaH. putrapautraiH parivR^ito bhrAtR^ibhishchendravikramaiH. shyAlastava mahAbAhurvajrasaMhanano yuvA.. 7-157-23 (51928) sAgraM shatasahasraM tu hayAnAM tasya dhImataH. somadattaM maheShvAsaM samantAtparyarakShata.. 7-157-24 (51929) rakShyamANashcha balibhishChAdayAmAsa sAtyakim. taM ChAdyamAnaM vishikhairdR^iShTvA sannataparvabhiH.. 7-157-25 (51930) dhR^iShTadyumno.abhyayAtkruddhaH pragR^ihya mahatIM chamUm. `abhyarakShanmahAbAhuH sAtvataM satyavikramam'.. 7-157-26 (51931) chaNDavAtAbhisR^iShTAnAmudadhInAmiva svanaH. AsIdrAjanbalaughAnAmanyonyamabhinighnatAm.. 7-157-27 (51932) vivyAdha somadattastu sAtvataM navabhiH sharaiH. sAtyakirnavabhishchainamavadhItkurupu~Ngavam.. 7-157-28 (51933) so.atividdho balavatA samare dR^iDhadhanvinA. rathopasthaM samAsAdya mumoha gatachetanaH.. 7-157-29 (51934) taM vimUDhaM samAlakShya sArathistvarayA.anvitaH. apovAha raNAdvIraM somadattaM mahAratham.. 7-157-30 (51935) taM visaMj~naM samAlakShya yuyudhAnasharArditam. abhyadravattato droNo yaduvIrajighAMsayA.. 7-157-31 (51936) tamAyAntamabhiprekShya yudhiShThirapurogamAH. parivavrurmahAtmAnaM parIpsanto yadUttamam.. 7-157-32 (51937) tataH pravavR^ite yuddhaM droNasya saha pANDavaiH. baleriva suraiH pUrvaM trailokyajayakA~NkShayA.. 7-157-33 (51938) tataH sAyakajAlena pANDavAnIkamAvR^iNot. bhAradvAjo mahAtejA vivyAdha cha yudhiShThiram.. 7-157-34 (51939) sAtyakiM dashabhirbANairviMshatyA pArShataM sharaiH. bhImasenaM cha navabhirnakulaM pa~nchabhistathA.. 7-157-35 (51940) sahadevaM tathA.aShTAbhiH shatena cha shikhaNDinam. draupadeyAnmahAbAhuH pa~nchabhiH pa~njabhiH sharaiH.. 7-157-36 (51941) virATaM matsyamaShTAbhirdrupadaM dashabhiH sharaiH. yudhAmanyuM tribhiH ShaDbhiruttamaujasamAhave. anyAMshcha sainikAnvidvvA yudhiShThiramupAdravat.. 7-157-37 (51942) te vadhyamAnA droNena pANDuputrasya sainikAH. prAdravanvai bhayAdrAjansArtanAdA disho dasha.. 7-157-38 (51943) kAlyamAnaM tu tatsainyaM dR^iShTvA droNena phalgunaH. ki~nchidAgatasaMrambho guruM pArtho.abhyayAddrutam.. 7-157-39 (51944) dR^iShTvA droNaM tu bIbhatsumabhidhAvantamAhave. sannyavartata tatsainyaM punaryaudhiShThiraM balam.. 7-157-40 (51945) tato yuddhamabhUdbhUyo bhAradvAjasya pANDavaiH.. 7-157-41 (51946) droNastava sutai rAjansarvataH parivAritaH. vyadhamatpANDusainyAni tUlarAshimivAnalaH.. 7-157-42 (51947) taM jvalantamivAdityaM dIptAnalasamadyutim. rAjannanishamatyantaM dR^iShTvA droNaM sharArchiSham.. 7-157-43 (51948) maNDalIkR^itadhanvAnaM tapantamiva bhAskaram. dahantamahitAnsainye nainaM kashchidavArayat.. 7-157-44 (51949) yoyo hi pramukhe tasya tasthau droNasya purUShaH. tasyatasya shirashChittvA yayurdroNasharAH kShitim.. 7-157-45 (51950) evaM sA pANDavI senA vadhyamAnA mahAtmanA. pradudrAva punarbhItA pashyataH savyasAchinaH.. 7-157-46 (51951) samprabhagnaM balaM dR^iShTvA droNena nishi bhArata. govindamabravIjjiShNurgachCha droNarathaM prati.. 7-157-47 (51952) tato rajatagokShIrakundendusadR^ishaprabhAn. chodayAmAsa dAshArho hayAndroNarathaM prati.. 7-157-48 (51953) bhImaseno.api taM dR^iShTvA yAntaM droNAya phalgunam. svasArathimuvAchedaM droNAnIkAya mAM vaha.. 7-157-49 (51954) so.api tasya vachaH shrutvA vishoko.avahayadvayAn. pR^iShThataH satyasandhasya jiShNorbharatasattama.. 7-157-50 (51955) tau dR^iShTvA bhrAtarau yattau droNAnIkamabhidrutau. pA~nchAlAH sR^i~njayA mAtsyAshchedikArUshakosalAH. anvagachChanmahArAja kekayAshcha mahArathAH.. 7-157-51 (51956) tato rAjannabhUdvoraH sa~NgrAmo romaharShaNaH.. 7-157-52 (51957) bIbhatsurdakShiNaM pArshvamuttaraM cha vR^ikodaraH. mahadbhyAM rathabR^indAbhyAM balaM jagR^ihatustava.. 7-157-53 (51958) tau dR^iShTvA puruShavyAghrau bhImasenadhana~njayau. dhR^iShTadyumno.abhyayAdrAjansAtyakishcha mahAbalaH.. 7-157-54 (51959) chaNDavAtAbhipannAnAmudadhInAmiva svanaH. AsIdrAjanbalaughAnAM tadA.anyonyamabhighnatAM 7-157-55 (51960) saumadattivadhAtkruddho dR^iShTvA sAtyakimAhave. drauNirabhyadravadrAjanvadhAya kR^itanishchayaH.. 7-157-56 (51961) tamApatantaM samprekShya shaineyasya rathaM prati. bhaimaseniH susa~NkruddhaH pratyamitramavArayat.. 7-157-57 (51962) kArShNAyasaM mahAghoramR^ikShacharmaparichChadam. mahAntaM rathamAsthAya triMshannalvAntarAntaram.. 7-157-58 (51963) vikShiptayantrasannAhaM mahAmeghaughaniHsvanam. yuktaM gajanibhairvAhairna hayairnApi vAraNaiH.. 7-157-59 (51964) vikShiptapakShacharaNavivR^itAkSheNa kUjatA. dhvajenochChritadaNDena gR^idhrarAjena rAjitam.. 7-157-60 (51965) lohitArdrapatAkaM tu AntramAlAvibhUShitam. aShTachakrasamAyuktamAsthAya vipulaM ratham.. 7-157-61 (51966) shUlamudgaradhAriNyA shailapAdapahastayA. rakShasAM ghorarUpANAmakShauhiNyA samAvR^itaH.. 7-157-62 (51967) tamudyatamahAchApaM nishAmya vyathitA nR^ipAH. yugAntakAlasamaye daNDahastamivAntakam.. 7-157-63 (51968) tatastaM girishR^i~NgAbhaM bhImarUpaM bhayAvaham. daMShTrAkarAlogramukhaM sha~NkukarNaM mahAhanum.. 7-157-64 (51969) UrdhvakeshaM virUpAkShaM dIptAsyaM nimnitodaram. mahAshvabhragaladvAraM kirITachChannamUrdhajam.. 7-157-65 (51970) trAsanaM sarvabhUtAnAM vyAttAnanabhivAntakam. vIkShya dIptamivAyAntaM ripuvikShobhakAriNam.. 7-157-66 (51971) tamudyatamahAchApaM rAkShasendraM ghaTotkacham. bhayArditA prachukShobha putrasya tava vAhinI. vAyunA kShobhitAvartA ga~Ngevordhvatara~NgiNI.. 7-157-67 (51972) ghaTotkachaprayuktena siMhanAdena bhIShitAH. prasusruvurgajA mUtraM vivyathushcha narA bhR^isham.. 7-157-68 (51973) tato.ashmavR^iShTiratyarthamAsIttatra samantataH. sandhyAkAlAdhikabalaiH prayuktA rAkShasaiH kShitau.. 7-157-69 (51974) AyasAni cha chakrANi bhushuNDyaH prAsatomarAH. patantyaviratAH shUlAH shataghnyaH paTTasAstathA.. 7-157-70 (51975) tadugramatiraudraM cha dR^iShTvA yuddhaM narAdhipAH. tanayAstava karNashcha vyathitAH prAdravandishaH.. 7-157-71 (51976) tatraiko.astrabalashlAghI drauNirmAnI na vivyathe. vyadhamachcha sharairmAyAM ghaTotkachavinirbhitAm.. 7-157-72 (51977) vihatAyAM tu mAyAyAmamarShI sa ghaTotkachaH. visasarja sharAnghorAMste.ashvatthAmAnamAvishan. bhuja~NgA iva vegena valmIkaM krodhamUrchChitAH.. 7-157-73 (51978) te sharA rudhirAktA~NgA bhittvA shAradvatIsutam. vivishurdharaNIM shIghrA rukmapu~NkhAH shilAshitAH.. 7-157-74 (51979) ashvatthAmA tu sa~Nkruddho laghuhastaH pratApavAn. ghaTotkachamabhikruddhaM bibheda dashabhiH sharaiH.. 7-157-75 (51980) ghaTotkacho.atividdhastu droNaputreNa marmasu. chakraM shatasahasrAramagR^ihNAdvyathito bhR^isham.. 7-157-76 (51981) kShurAntaM bAlasUryAbhaM maNivajravibhUShitam. ashvatthAmni sa chikShepa bhaimasenirjighAMsayA.. 7-157-77 (51982) vegena mahatA gachChadvikShiptaM drauNinA sharaiH. abhAgyasyeva sa~Nkalpastanmoghamapatadbhuvi.. 7-157-78 (51983) ghaTotkachastatastUrNaM dR^iShTvA chakraM nipAtitam. drauNiM prAchChAdayadbANaiH svarbhAnuriva bhAskaram.. 7-157-79 (51984) ghaTotkachasutaH shrImAnbhinnA~njanachayopamaH. rurodha drauNimAyAntaM prabha~njanamivAdrirAT.. 7-157-80 (51985) pautreNa bhImasenasya sharaira~njanaparvaNA. babhau meghena dhArAbhirgirirmerurivAvR^itaH.. 7-157-81 (51986) ashvatthAmA tvasambhrAnto rudropendrendravikramaH. dhvajamekena bANena chichChedA~njanaparvaNaH.. 7-157-82 (51987) dvAbhyAM tu rathayantArau tribhishchAsya triveNukam. dhanurekena chichCheda chaturbhishchaturo hayAn.. 7-157-83 (51988) virathasyodyataM hastAddhemabindubhirAchitam. vishikhena satIkShNena kha~Ngamasya dvidhA.akarot.. 7-157-84 (51989) gadA hemA~NgadA rAjaMstUrNaM haiDimbisUnunA. bhrAmyotkShiptAsharaiHsApi drauNinAbhyAhatA.apatat.. 7-157-85 (51990) tato.antarikShamutplutya kAlamegha ivonnadan. vavarShA~njanaparvA sa drumavarShaM nabhastalAt.. 7-157-86 (51991) tato mAyAdharaM drauNirghaTotkachasutaM divi. mArgaNairabhivivyAdha dhanaM sUrya ivAMshubhiH.. 7-157-87 (51992) so.avatIrya purastasthau rathe hemavibhUShite. mahIgata ivAtyugraH shrImAna~njanaparvataH.. 7-157-88 (51993) tamayasmayavarmANaM drauNirbhImAtmajAtmajam. jaghAnA~njanaparvANaM maheshvara ivAndhakam.. 7-157-89 (51994) atha dR^iShTvA hataM putramashvatthAmnA mahAbalam. drauNeH sakAshamabhyetya roShAtprasphuritAdharaH.. 7-157-90 (51995) prAha vAkyamasambhrAnto vIraM shAradvatIsutam. dahantaM pANDavAnIkaM vanamagnimivochChritam.. 7-157-91 (51996) ghaTotkacha uvAcha. 7-157-92x (4682) tiShThatiShTha na me jIvandroNaputra gamiShyasi. tvAmadya nihaniShyAmi krau~nchamagnisuto yathA.. 7-157-92 (51997) ashvatthAmovAcha. 7-157-93x (4683) gachCha vatsa sahAnyaistvaM yudhyasvAmaravikrama. na hi putreNa haiDimba pitA nyAyyaH prabAdhitum.. 7-157-93 (51998) kAmaM khalu na roSho me haiDimbe vidyate tvayi. kiM tu roShAnvito janturhanyAdAtmAnamapyuta.. 7-157-94 (51999) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-157-95x (4684) shrutvaitatkrodhatAmrAkShaH putrashokasamanvitaH. ashvatthAmAnamAyasto bhaimasenirabhAShata.. 7-157-95 (52000) kimahaM kAtaro drauNe pR^ithagjana ivAhave.. yanmAM bhIShayase vAgbhirasadetadvachastava.. 7-157-96 (52001) bhImAtkhalu samutpannaH kurUNAM vipule kule. pANDavAnAmahaM putraH samareShvanivartinAm.. 7-157-97 (52002) rakShasAmadhirAjo.ahaM dashagrIvasamo bale. tiShThatiShTha na me jIvandroNaputra gamiShyasi.. 7-157-98 (52003) yuddhashraddhAmahaM te.adya vineShyAmi raNAjire.. 7-157-99 (52004) ityuktvA krodhatAmrAkSho rAkShasaH sumahAbalaH. drauNimabhyadravatkruddho gajendramiva kesarI.. 7-157-100 (52005) rathAkShamAtrairiShubhirabhyavarShaddhaTotkachaH. rathinAmR^iShabhaM drauNiM dhArAbhiriva toyadaH.. 7-157-101 (52006) sharavR^iShTiM sharairdrauNiraprAptAM tAM vyashAtayat. tatontarikShe bANAnAM sa~NgrAmo.anya ivAbhavat.. 7-157-102 (52007) athAstrasammardakR^itairvisphuli~NgaistadA babhau. vibhAvarImukhe vyoma khadyotairiva chitritam.. 7-157-103 (52008) nishAmya nihatAM mAyAM drauNinA raNamAninA. ghaTotkachastato mAyAM sasarjAntarhitaH punaH.. 7-157-104 (52009) so.abhavadgiriratyuchchaH shikharaistarusa~NkaTaiH. shUlaprAsAsimusalajalaprasravaNo mahAn.. 7-157-105 (52010) tama~njanagiriprakhyaM drauNirdR^iShTvA mahIdharam. prapatadbhishcha bahubhiH shastrasa~Nghairna vivyathe.. 7-157-106 (52011) tato hasanniva drauNirvajramastramudairayat. sa te nAstraiNa shailendraH kShiptaH kShipraM vyanashyata.. 7-157-107 (52012) tataH sa toyado bhUtvA nIlaH sendrAyudho divi. ashmavR^iShTibhiratyugro drauNimAchChAdayadraNe.. 7-157-108 (52013) atha sandhAya vAyavyamastramastravidAM varaH. vyadhamaddroNatanayo nIlameghaM samutthitam.. 7-157-109 (52014) sa mArgaNagaNairdrauNirdishaH prachChAdya sarvashaH. shataM rathasahasrANAM jaghAna dvipadAM varaH.. 7-157-110 (52015) sa dR^iShTvA punarAyAntaM rathenAyatakArmukam. ghaTotkachamasambhrAntaM
