rAkShasairbahubhirvR^itam.. 7-157-111 (52016) siMhashArdUlasadR^ishairmattadviradavikramaiH. gajasthaishcha rathasthaishcha vAjipR^iShThagatairapi.. 7-157-112 (52017) vikR^itAsyashirogrIvairhiDimbAnucharaiH saha. paulastyairyAtudhAnaishcha tAmasaishchendravikramaiH.. 7-157-113 (52018) nAnAshastradharairvIrairnAnAkavachabhUShaNaiH. mahAbalairbhImaravaiH saMrambhodvR^ittalochanaiH.. 7-157-114 (52019) upasthitaistato yuddhe rAkShasairyuddhadurmadaiH. viShaNNamabhisamprekShya putraM te drauNirabravIt.. 7-157-115 (52020) tiShTha duryodhanAdya tvaM na kAryaH sambhramastvayA. sahaibhirbhrAtR^ibhirvIraiH pArthivaishchendravikramaiH.. 7-157-116 (52021) nihaniShyAmyamitrAMsta na tavAsti parAjayaH. satyaM te pratijAnAmi paryAshvAsaya vAhinIm.. 7-157-117 (52022) duryodhana uvAcha 7-157-118x (4685) na tvetadadbhutaM manye yatte mahadidaM manaH. asmAsu cha parA bhaktistava gautaminandana.. 7-157-118 (52023) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-157-119x (4686) ashvatthAmAnamuktvaivaM tataH saubalamabravIt. vR^itaM rathasahasreNa hayAnAM raNashobhinAm.. 7-157-119 (52024) ShaShTyA rathasahasraishcha prayAhi tvaM dhana~njayam. karNashcha vR^iShasenashcha kR^ipo nIlastathaiva cha.. 7-157-120 (52025) udIchyAH kR^itavarmA cha purumitraH sutApanaH. duHshAsano nikumbhashcha kuNDabhedI parAkramaH.. 7-157-121 (52026) pUra~njayo dR^iDharathaH patAkI hemakampanaH. shalyAruNIndrasenAshcha sa~njayo vijayo jayaH.. 7-157-122 (52027) kamalAkShaH parakrAthI jayavarmA sudarshanaH. ete tvAmanuyAsyanti pattInAmayutAni ShaT.. 7-157-123 (52028) jahi bhImaM yamau chobhau dharmarAjaM cha mAtula. asurAniva devendro jayAshA me tvayi sthitA.. 7-157-124 (52029) dAritAndrauNinA bANairbhR^ishaM vikShatavigrahAn. jahi mAtula kaunteyAnasurAniva pAvakiH.. 7-157-125 (52030) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-157-126x (4687) evamukto yayau shIghraM putreNa tava saubalaH. piprIShuste sutAnrAjandidhakShushchaiva pANDavAn.. 7-157-126 (52031) atha pravavR^ite yuddhaM drauNirAkShasayormR^idhe. vibhAvaryAM sutumulaM shakraprahlAdayoriva.. 7-157-127 (52032) tato ghaTotkacho bANairdashabhirgautamIsutam. jaghAnorasi sa~Nkruddhau viShAgnipratimairdR^iDhaiH.. 7-157-128 (52033) sa tairabhyAhato gADhaM sharairbhImasuteritaiH. chachAla rathamadhyastho vAtoddhUta iva drumaH.. 7-157-129 (52034) bhUyashchA~njalikenAtha mArgaNena mahAprabham. drauNihastasthitaM chApaM chichChedAshu ghaTotkachaH.. 7-157-130 (52035) tato.anyaddrauNirAdaya dhanurbhArasahaM mahat. vavarSha vishikhAMstIkShNAnvAridhArA ivAmbudaH.. 7-157-131 (52036) tataH shAradvatIputraH preShayAmAsa bhArata. suvarNapu~NkhA~nChatrughnAnkhacharAnkhacharaM prati.. 7-157-132 (52037) tadbANairarditaM yUthaM rakShasAM pInavakShasAm. siMhairiva babhau mattaM gajAnAmAkulaM kulam.. 7-157-133 (52038) vidhamya rAkShasAnbANaiH sAshvasUtarathadvipAn. dadAha bhagavAnvahnirbhUtAnIva yugakShaye.. 7-157-134 (52039) sa dagdhvA.akShauhiNIM bAmairnairR^itIM ruruche nR^ipa. pureva tripuraM dagdhvA divi devo maheshvaraH.. 7-157-135 (52040) yugAnte sarvabhUtAni dagdhveva vasurulbaNaH. rarAja jayatAM shreShTho droNaputrastavAhitAn.. 7-157-136 (52041) tato ghaTotkachaH kruddho rakShasAM bhImakarmaNAm. drauNiM hateti mahatIM chodayAmAsa tAM chamUm.. 7-157-137 (52042) ghaTotkachasya tAmAj~nAM pratigR^ihyAtha rAkShasAH. daMShTrojjvalA mahAvaktrA ghorarUpA bhayAnakAH.. 7-157-138 (52043) vyAttAnanA ghorajihvAH krodhatAmrekShaNA bhR^isham. siMhanAdena mahatA nAdayanto vasundharAm.. 7-157-139 (52044) hantumabhyadravandrauNiM nAnApraharaNAyudhAH. shaktIH shataghnIH parighAnashanIH shUlapaTTashAn.. 7-157-140 (52045) kha~NgAngadAbhiNDipAlAnmusalAni parashvathAn. prAsAnasIMstomarAMshcha kaNapAnkampanA~nChitAn.. 7-157-141 (52046) sthUlAnbhushuNDyashmagadAsthUNAnkArShNyAyasAMstathA. mudgarA.Nshcha mahAghorAnsamare shatrudAraNAn.. 7-157-142 (52047) drauNimUrdhanyasantrastA rAkShasA bhImavikramAH. chikShipuH krodhatAmrAkShAH shatasho.atha sahasrashaH.. 7-157-143 (52048) tachChastravarShaM sumahaddroNaputrasya mUrdhani. patamAnaM samIkShyA.atha yodhAste vyathitA.abhavan.. 7-157-144 (52049) droNaputrastu vikrAntastadvarShaM ghoramuchChritam. sharairvidhvaMsayAmAsa vajrakalpaiH shilAshitaiH.. 7-157-145 (52050) tato.anyairvishikhaistUrNaM svarNapu~NkhairmahAmanAH. nijaghne rAkShasAndrauNirdivyAstrapratimantritaiH.. 7-157-146 (52051) tadbANairarditaM yUthaM rakShasAM pInavakShasAm. siMhairiva babhau mattaM gajAnAmAkulaM kulam.. 7-157-147 (52052) te rAkShasAH susa~NkruddhA droNaputreNa tADitAH. kruddhAH sma prAdravandrauNiM jighAMsanto mahAbalaH.. 7-157-148 (52053) tatrAdbhutamimaM drauNirdarshayAmAsa vikramam. ashakyaM kartumanyena sarvabhUteShu bhArata.. 7-157-149 (52054) yadeko rAkShasIM senAM kShaNAddrauNirmahAstravit. dadAha jvalitairbANai rAkShasendrasya pashyataH.. 7-157-150 (52055) sa hatvA rAkShasAnIkaM rarAja drauNirAhave. yugAnte sarvabhUtAni saMvartaka ivAnalaH.. 7-157-151 (52056) taM dahantamanIkAni sharairAshIviShopamaiH. teShu rAjasahasreShu pANDaveyeShu bhArata.. 7-157-152 (52057) nainaM nirIkShituM kashchidashaknoddrauNimAhave. R^ite ghaTotkachAdvIrAdrAkShasendrAnmahAbalAt.. 7-157-153 (52058) sa punarbharatashreShTha krodhAduddhAntalochanaH. talaM talena saMhatya sandashya dashanachChadam.. 7-157-154 (52059) sva sUtamabravItkruddho droNaputrAya mAM vaha. sa yayau ghorarUpeNa supatAkena bhAsvatA.. 7-157-155 (52060) dvairathaM droNaputreNa punarapyarisUdanaH. sa vinadya mahAnAdaM siMhavadbhImavikramaH.. 7-157-156 (52061) chikShepAviddhya sa~NgrAme droNaputrAya rAkShasaH. aShTaghaNTAM mahAghorAmashaniM devanirmitAm.. 7-157-157 (52062) tAmavaplutya jagrAha drauNirnyasya rathe dhanuH. chikShepa chainAM tasyaiva syandanAtso.avaplupluve.. 7-157-158 (52063) sAshvasUtadhvajaM yAnaM bhasma kR^itvA mahAprabhA. vivesha vasudhAM bhittvA sA.ashanirbhR^ishadAruNA.. 7-157-159 (52064) drauNestatkarma dR^iShTvA tu sarvabhUtAnyapUjayan. yadaplutya jagrAha ghorAM sha~NkaranirmitAm.. 7-157-160 (52065) dhR^iShTadyumnarathaM gatvA bhaimasenistato nR^ipa. dhanurghoraM samAdAya mahadindrAyudhopamam. mumocha nishitAnbANAnpunardrauNermahorasi.. 7-157-161 (52066) dhR^iShTadyumnastvasambhrAnto mumochAshIviShopamAn. suvarNapu~NkhAnvishikhAndroNaputrasya vakShasi.. 7-157-162 (52067) tato mumocha nArAchAndrauNistAMshcha sahasrashaH. tAvapyagnishikhaprakhyairjughnatustasya mArgaNAn.. 7-157-163 (52068) atitIvraM mahadyuddhaM tayoH puruShasiMhayoH. yodhAnaM prItijananaM drauNeshcha bharatarShabha.. 7-157-164 (52069) tato rathasahasreNa dviradAnAM shataistribhiH. ShaDbhirvAjisahasraishcha bhImastaM deshamAgamat.. 7-157-165 (52070) tato bhImAtmajaM rakSho dhR^iShTadyumnaM cha sAnugam. ayodhayata dharmAtmA drauNirakliShTavikramaH.. 7-157-166 (52071) tatrAdbhutatamaM drauNirdarshayAmAsa vikramam. ashakyaM kartumanyena sarvabhUteShu bhArata.. 7-157-167 (52072) nimeShAntaramAtreNa sAshvasUtarathadvipAm. akShauhiNIM rAkShasAnAM shitairbANairashAtayat.. 7-157-168 (52073) miShato bhImasenasya haiDimbeH pArShatasya cha. yamayordharmaputrasya vijayasyAchyutasya cha.. 7-157-169 (52074) pragADhama~njogatibhirnArAchairabhitADitAH. nipeturdviradA bhUmau sashR^i~NgA iva parvatAH.. 7-157-170 (52075) nikR^ittairhastihastaishcha vichaladbhiritastataH. rarAja vasudhA kIrNA visarpadbhirivoragaiH.. 7-157-171 (52076) kShiptaiH kA~nchanadaNDaishcha nR^ipachChatraiH kShitirbabhau. dyaurivoditachandrArkA grahAkIrNA yugakShaye.. 7-157-172 (52077) pravR^iddhadhvajamaNDUkAM bherIvistIrNakachChapAm.. ChatrahaMsAvalIjuShTAM phenachAmaramAlinIm.. 7-157-173 (52078) ka~NkagR^ighramahAgrAhAM naikAyudhajhaShAkulAm. vistIrNagajapAShANAM hatAshvamakarAkulAm.. 7-157-174 (52079) rathakShiptamahAvaprAM patAkAruchiradrumAm. sharamInAM mahAraudrAM prAsashaktyR^iShTiDuNDubhAm.. 7-157-175 (52080) majjAmAMsamahApa~NkAM kabandhAvarjitoDupAm. keshashaivalakalmAShAM bhIrUNAM kashmalAvahAm.. 7-157-176 (52081) nAgendrahayayodhAnAM sharIravyayasambhavAm. shoNitaughamahAghorAM drauNiH prAvartayannadIm.. 7-157-177 (52082) yodhArtaravanirghoShAM kShatajormisamAkulAm. prayAntIM sumahAghorAM yamarAShTramahodadhim.. 7-157-178 (52083) nihatya rAkShasAnbANairdrauNirhaiDimbimArdayat. punarapyatisa~NkruddhaH savR^ikodarapArShatAn.. 7-157-179 (52084) sa nArAchagaNaiH pArthAndrauNirviddhA mahAbalaH. jaghAna surathaM nAma drupadasya sutaM vibhuH.. 7-157-180 (52085) punaH shatru~njayaM nAma drupadasyAtmajaM raNe. balAnIkaM jayAnIkaM jayAshvaM chAbhijaghnivAn.. 7-157-181 (52086) shrutAhvayaM cha rAjAnaM drauNirninye yamakShayam. tribhishchAnyaiH sharaistIkShNaiH supu~NkhairhemamAlinam.. 7-157-182 (52087) jaghAna sa pR^iShadhraM cha chandrasenaM cha mAriSha. kuntibhojasutAMshchAsau dashabhirdasha jaghnivAn.. 7-157-183 (52088) asvatthAmA susa~NkruddhaH sandhAyogramajihmagam. mumochAkarNapUrNena dhanuShA sharamuttamam. yamadaNDopamaM ghoramuddishyAshu ghaTotkacham.. 7-157-184 (52089) sa bhittvA hR^idayaM tasya rAkShasasya mahAsharaH. vivesha vasudhAM shIghraM sapu~NkhaH pR^ithivIpate.. 7-157-185 (52090) taM hataM patitaM j~nAtvA dhR^iShTadyumno mahArathaH. drauNeH sakAshAdrAjendra vyapaninye rathottamam.. 7-157-186 (52091) tataH parA~NmukhanR^ipaM sainyaM yaudhiShThiraM nR^ipa. parAjitya raNe vIro droNaputro nanAda ha. pUjitaH sarvabhUteShu tava putraishcha bhArata.. 7-157-187 (52092) atha sharashatabhinnakR^ittadehai-- rhatapatitaiH kShaNadAcharaiH samantAt. nidhanamupagatairmahI kR^itA.abhU-- dgirishikharairiva durgamA.atiraudrA.. 7-157-188 (52093) taM siddhagandharvapishAchasa~NghA nAgAH suparNAH pitaro vayAMsi. rakShogaNA bhUtagaNAshcha drauNi-- mapUjayannapsarasaH surAshcha.. .. 7-157-189 (52094) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi ghaTotkachavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe saptapa~nchAshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 157 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-157-9 tAreNochchasvareNa.. 5-157-19 kR^iShNacharaNaiH kR^iShNayoshcharaNaiH.. 5-157-40 droNamabhidhAvantaM bIbhatsuM dR^iShTvA yaudhiShThiraM balaM tatsainyaM droNasainyamprati punaH sannyavartateti sambandhaH.. 5-157-58 kArShNAyasaM tIkShNalohamayam.. 5-157-59 na hayairnApi vAraNairgajaiH kintu pishAchaiH.. 5-157-93 gachCha vatseti putreNeti cha bhImasenasambandhAt. prabAdhituM manaH--khedamutpAdayitum.. 5-157-94 AtmAnamapi hanyAtkimu putramato jIvanArthI tvaM nivartasveti bhAvaH.. 5-157-95 AyastaH kopitaH.. 5-157-132 shAradvatI kR^ipI. kacharAnbANAn. khacharaM rAkShasam.. 5-157-136 vasurulbaNaH agniH pralayakAlikaH.. 5-157-157 saptapa~nchAshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 158

.. shrIH ..

7.158. adhyAyaH 158

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

bhImenaH bAhlIkavadhaH.. 1 .. tathA duryodhanAnujadashakasya shakunibhrAtR^ipa~nchakasya cha vadhaH.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-158-0 (52095) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-158-0x (4688) drupadasyAtmajAndR^iShTvA kuntibhojasutAMstathA. droNaputreNa nihatAnrAkShasAMshcha sahasrashaH.. 7-158-1 (52096) yudhiShThiro bhImaseno dhR^iShTadyumnashcha pArShataH. yuyudhAnashcha saMyattA yuddhAyaiva mano dadhuH.. 7-158-2 (52097) somadattaH punaH kruddho dR^iShTvA sAtyakimAhave. mahatA sharavarSheNa chChAdayAmAsa bhArata.. 7-158-3 (52098) tataH samabhavadyuddhamatIva bhayavardhanam. tvadIyAnAM pareShAM cha ghoraM vijayakA~NkShiNAm.. 7-158-4 (52099) taM dR^iShTvA samupAyAntaM rukmapu~NkhaiH shilAshitaiH. dashabhiH sAtvatasyArthe bhImo vivyAdha sAyakaiH.. 7-158-5 (52100) somadatto.api taM vIraM shatena pratyavidhyata. sAtvatastvabhisaMkruddhaH putrAdhibhirabhiplutam.. 7-158-6 (52101) vR^iddhaM vR^iddhaguNairyuktaM yayAtimiva nAhuSham. vivyAdha dashabhistIkShNaiH sharairvajranipAtanaiH. shaktyA chainaM vinirbhidya punarvivyAdha saptabhiH.. 7-158-7 (52102) tatastu sAtyakerarthe bhImaseno navaM dR^iDham. mumocha parighaM ghoraM somadattasya mUrdhani.. 7-158-8 (52103) sAtvato.apyagnisa~NkAshaM mumocha sharamuttamam. somadattorasi kruddhaH supatraM nishitaM yudhi.. 7-158-9 (52104) yugapatpetaturvIra ghorau parighamArgaNau. sharIre somadattasya sa papAta mahArathaH.. 7-158-10 (52105) vyAmohite tunaye bAhlIkastamupAdravat. visR^ija~nCharavarShANi kAlavarShIva toyadaH.. 7-158-11 (52106) bhImo.atha sAtvatasyArthe bAhlIkaM navabhiH sharaiH. prAtipeyaM mahAtmAnaM vivyAdha raNamUrdhani.. 7-158-12 (52107) prAtipeyastu sa~NkruddhaH shaktiM bhImasya vakShasi. nichakhAna mahAbAhuH purandara ivAshanim.. 7-158-13 (52108) sa tathA.abhihato bhImashchakampe cha mumoha cha. prApya chetashcha balavAngadAmasmai sasarja ha.. 7-158-14 (52109) sA pANDavena prahitA bAhlIkasya shiro.aharat. sa papAta hataH pR^ithvyAM vajrAhata ivAdrirAT.. 7-158-15 (52110) tasminvinihate vIre bAhlIke puruSharShabha. putrAste.abhyardayanbhImaM dasha dAsharatheH samAH.. 7-158-16 (52111) nAgadatto dR^iDharatho mahAbAhurayobhujaH. dR^iDhaH suhasto virajAH pramAthyugro.anuyAyyapi.. 7-158-17 (52112) tAndR^iShTvA chukrudhe bhImo jagR^ihe bhArasAdhanAn. ekamekaM samuddishya pAtayAmAsa marmasu.. 7-158-18 (52113) te viddhA vyasavaH petuH syandanebhyo hataujasaH. chaNDavAtaprabhagnAstu parvatAgrAnmahIruhAH.. 7-158-19 (52114) nArAchairdashabhirbhImastAnnihatya tavAtmajAn. karNasya dayitaM putraM vR^iShasenamavAkirat.. 7-158-20 (52115) tato vR^ikaratho nAma bhrAtA karNasya vishrutaH. jaghAna bhImaM nArAchaistamapyabhyadravadbalI.. 7-158-21 (52116) tataH saptarathAnvIraH shyAlAnAM tava bhArata. nihatya bhImo nArAchaiH shatachandramapothayat.. 7-158-22 (52117) amarShayanto nihataM shatachandraM mahAratham. shakunerbhrAtaro vIrA gavAkShaH sharabho vibhuH.. 7-158-23 (52118) subhago bhAnudattashcha shUrAH pa~ncha mahArathAH. abhidrutya sharaistIkShNairbhImasenamatADayan.. 7-158-24 (52119) sa tADyamAno nArAchairvR^iShTivegairivAchalaH. jaghAna pa~nchabhirbANaiH pa~nchaivAtirathAnbalI.. 7-158-25 (52120) tAndR^iShTvA nihatAnvIrAnvichelurnR^ipasattamAH.. 7-158-26 (52121) tato yudhiShThiraH kruddhastavAnIkamashAtayat.. miShataH kumbhayonestu putrANAM tava chAnagha.. 7-158-27 (52122) ambaShThAnmAlavA~nChUrAMstrigartAnsashibInapi. prAhiNonmR^ityulokAya kruddho yuddhe yudhiShThiraH.. 7-158-28 (52123) abhIShAhA~nChUrasenAnbAhlIkAnsavasAtikAn. nihatya pR^ithivIM rAjA chakre shoNitakardamAm.. 7-158-29 (52124) yaudheyAnmAlavAnrAjanmadrakANAM gaNAnyudhi. prAhiNonmR^ityulokAya shUrAnbANairyudhiShThiraH.. 7-158-30 (52125) hatAharata gR^ihNIta vidhyata vyavakR^intata. ityAsIttumulaH shabdo yudhiShThirarathaM prati.. 7-158-31 (52126) sainyAni drAvayantaM taM droNo dR^iShTvA yudhiShThiram. choditastava putreNa sAyakairabhyavAkirat.. 7-158-32 (52127) droNastu paramakruddho vAyavyAstreNa pArthivam. vivyAdha so.api taddivyamastramastreNa jaghnivAn.. 7-158-33 (52128) tasminvinihate chAstre bhAradvAjo yudhiShThire. vAruNaM yAmyamAgneyaM tvAShTraM sAvitrameva cha. chikShepa paramakruddho jighAMsuH pANDunandanam.. 7-158-34 (52129) kShiptAni kShipyamANAni tAni chAstrANi dharmajaH. jaghAnAstrairmahAbAhuH kumbhayoneravitrasan.. 7-158-35 (52130) satyAM chikIrShamANastu pratij~nAM kumbhasambhavaH.. 7-158-36 (52131) prAdushchakre.astramaindraM vai prAjApatyaM cha bhArata. jighAMsurdharmatanayaM tava putrahite rataH.. 7-158-37 (52132) patiH kurUNAM gajasiMhagAmI vishAlavakShAH pR^ithulohitAkShaH. prAdushchakArAstramahInatejA mAhendramastraM sa jaghAna tena.. 7-158-38 (52133) vihanyamAneShvastreShu droNaH krodhasamanvitaH. yudhiShThiravadhaM prepsurbrAhmamastramudairayat.. 7-158-39 (52134) tato nAj~nAsiShaM ki~nchiddhoreNa tamasA.a.avR^ite. sarvabhUtAni cha paraM trAsaM jagmurmahIpate.. 7-158-40 (52135) brahmAstramudyataM dR^iShTvA kuntIputro yudhiShThiraH. brahmAstreNaiva rAjendra tadastraM pratyavArayat.. 7-158-41 (52136) tataH sainikamukhyAste prashashaMsurnararShabhau. droNapArthau maheShvAsau sarvayuddhavishAradau.. 7-158-42 (52137) tataH pramuchya kaunteyaM droNo drupadavAhinIm. vyadhamatkrodhatAmrAkSho vAyavyAstreNa bhArata.. 7-158-43 (52138) te hanyamAnA droNena pA~nchAlAH prAdravanbhayAt. pashyato bhImasenasya pArthasya cha mahAtmanaH.. 7-158-44 (52139) tataH kirITI bhImashcha sahasA sannyavartatAm. mahaddhyAM rathavaMshAbhyAM parigR^ihya balaM tadA.. 7-158-45 (52140) bIbhatsurdakShiNaM pArshvamuttaraM cha vR^ikodaraH. bhAradvAjaM sharaughAbhyAM mahadbhyAmabhyavarShatAm.. 7-158-46 (52141) kekayAH sR^i~njayAshchaiva pA~nchAlAshcha mahaujasaH. anvagachChanmahArAja mAtsyAshcha saha sAtvataiH.. 7-158-47 (52142) tataH sA bhAratI senA vadhyamAnA kirITinA. tamasA nidrayA chaiva punareva vyadIryata.. 7-158-48 (52143) droNena vAryamANAste svayaM tava sutena cha. nAshakyanta mahArAja yodhA vArayituM tadA.. .. 7-158-49 (52144) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi ghaTotkachavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe aShTapa~nchAshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 158 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-158-12 prAtipeyaM pratIpaputram.. 5-158-38 patiH kurUNAM yudhiShThiraH. mAhendramanyatsa jaghAneti jha.pAThaH.. 5-158-158 aShTapa~nchAshadadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 159

.. shrIH ..

7.159. adhyAyaH 159

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

karNena pANDavahananaM pratijAnAnamAtmAnamadhikShipataH kR^ipasya jihvAchChedapratij~nAnam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-159-0 (52145) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-159-0x (4689) udIryamANaM taddR^iShTvA pANDavAnAM mahadbalam. aviShahyaM cha manvAnaH karNaM duryodhano.abravIt.. 7-159-1 (52146) ayaM sa kAlaH samprApto mitrANAM mitravatsala. trAyasva samare karNa sarvAnyodhAnmahArathAn.. 7-159-2 (52147) pA~nchAlairmatsyakaikeyaiH pANDavaishcha mahArathaiH. vR^itAnsamantAtsahkruddhairniH shvasadbhirivoragaiH.. 7-159-3 (52148) ete nadanti saMhR^iShTAH pANDavA jitakAshinaH. shakropamAshcha bahavaH pA~nchAlAnAM rathavrajAH.. 7-159-4 (52149) karNa uvAcha. 7-159-5x (4690) paritrAtumiha prApto yadi pArthaM purandaraH. tamapyAshu parAjitya tato hantA.asmi pANDavam.. 7-159-5 (52150) satyaM te pratijAnAmi samAshvasihi bhArata. hantAsmi pANDutanayAnpA~nchAlAMshcha samAgatAn.. 7-159-6 (52151) jayaM te pratidAsyAmi vAsavasyeva pAvakiH. priyaM tava mayA kAryamiti jIvAmi pArthiva.. 7-159-7 (52152) sarveShAmeva pArthAnAM phalguno balavattaraH. tasyAmoghAM vimokShyAmishaktiM shakravinirmitAM.. 7-159-8 (52153) tasminhate maheShvAse bhrAtarastasya mAnada. tava vashyA bhaviShyanti vanaM yAsyanti vA punaH.. 7-159-9 (52154) mayi jIvati kauravya viShAdaM mA kR^ithAH kvachit. ahaM jeShyAmi samare sahitAnsarvapANDavAn.. 7-159-10 (52155) pA~nchAlAnkekayAMshchaiva vR^iShNIMshchApi samAgatAn. bANaughaiH shakalIkR^itya tava dAsyAmi medinIm.. 7-159-11 (52156) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-159-12x (4691) evaM bruvANaM karNaM tu kR^ipaH shAradvato.abravIt. smayanniva mahAbAhuH sUtaputramidaM vachaH.. 7-159-12 (52157) shobhanaM shobhanaM karNa sanAthaH kurupu~NgavaH. tvayA nAthena rAdheya vachasA yadi sidhyati.. 7-159-13 (52158) bahushaH katthase karNa kauravasya samIpataH. na tu te vikramaH kashchiddR^ishyate phalameva vA.. 7-159-14 (52159) samAgamaH pANDusutairdR^iShTaste bahusho yudhi. sarvatra nirjitashchAsi pANDavaiH sUtanandana.. 7-159-15 (52160) hiyamANe tadA karNa gandharvairdhR^itarAShTraje. tadA.ayudhyanta sainyAni tvameko.agre.apalAyithAH.. 7-159-16 (52161) virATanagare chApi sametAH sarvakauravAH. pArthena nirjitA yuddhe tvaM cha karNa sahAnujaH.. 7-159-17 (52162) ekasyApyasamarthastvaM phalgunasya raNAjire. kathamutsahase jetuM sakR^iShNAnsarvapANDavAn.. 7-159-18 (52163) abruvankarNa yudhyasva katthase bahu sUtaja. anuktvA vikramedyastu tadvai satpuruShavratam.. 7-159-19 (52164) garjitvA sUtaputra tvaM shAradAbhra ivAjalaH. niShphalo dR^ishyase karNa tachcha rAjA na budhyate.. 7-159-20 (52165) tAvadgarjasva rAdheya yAvatpArthaM na pashyasi. ArAtpArthaM hi te dR^iShTvA durlabhaM garjitaM punaH.. 7-159-21 (52166) tvamanAsAdya tAnbANAnphalgunasya vigarjasi. pArthasAyakaviMddhasya durlabhaM garjitaM tava.. 7-159-22 (52167) bAhubhiH kShatriyAH shUrA vAgbhiH shUrA dvijAtayaH. dhanuShA phalgunaH shUraH karNaH shUro manorathaiH. toShito yena rudro.api kaH pArthaM pratighAtayet.. 7-159-23 (52168) evaM saMruShitastena tadA shAradvatena ha. karNaH praharatAM shreShThaH kR^ipaM vAkyamathAbravIt.. 7-159-24 (52169) shUrA garjanti satataM prAvR^iShIva valAhakAH. phalaM chAshu prayachChanti bIjamuptamanUShare.. 7-159-25 (52170) doShamatra na pashyAmi shUrANAM raNamUrdhani. tattadvikatthamAnAnAM bhAraM chodvahatAM mR^idhe.. 7-159-26 (52171) yaM bhAraM puruSho voDhuM manasA hi vyavasyati. daivamasya dhruvaM tatra sAhAyyAyopapadyate.. 7-159-27 (52172) vyavasAyadvitIyo.ahaM manasA bhAramudvahan. hatvA pANDusutAnAjau sakR^iShNAnsahasAtvatAn. garjAmi yadyahaM vipra tava kiM tatra nashyati.. 7-159-28 (52173) vR^ithA shUrA na garjanti sajalA iva toyadAH. sAmarthyamAtmano j~nAtvA tato garjanti paNDitAH.. 7-159-29 (52174) so.ahamadya raNe yattau sahitau kR^iShmapANDavau. utsahAmi raNe jetuM tato garjAmi gautama.. 7-159-30 (52175) pashya tvaM garjitasyAsya phalaM me vipra sAnugAn. hatvA pANDusutAnAjau sahakR^iShNAnsasAtvatAn. duryodhanAya dAsyAmi pR^ithivIM hatakaNTakAm.. 7-159-31 (52176) kR^ipa uvAcha. 7-159-32x (4692) manorathapralApA me na grAhyAstava sUtaja.. 7-159-32 (52177) sadA kShipasi vai kR^iShNau dharmarAjaM cha pANDavam. dhruvastatra jayaH karNa yatra yuddhavishAradau.. 7-159-33 (52178) devagandharvayakShANAM manuShyoragarakShasAm. daMshitAnAmapi raNe ajeyau kR^iShNapANDavau.. 7-159-34 (52179) brahmaNyaH satyavAgdAnto gurudaivatapUjakaH. nityaM dharmaratashchaiva kR^itAstrashcha visheShataH.. 7-159-35 (52180) dhR^itimAMshcha kR^itaj~nashcha dharmaputro yudhiShThiraH. bhrAtarashchAsya balinaH sarvAstreShu kR^itashramAH.. 7-159-36 (52181) guruvR^ittiratAH prAj~nA dharmanityA yashasvinaH. sambandhinashchendravIryAH svanurtAH prahAriNaH.. 7-159-37 (52182) dhR^iShTadyumnaH shikhaNDI cha daurmukhirjanamejayaH. chandraseno rudrasenaH kIrtidharmA dhruvo dharaH.. 7-159-38 (52183) vasuchandro dAmachandraH siMhachandraH sutejanaH. drupadasya tathA putrA drupadashcha mahAstravit.. 7-159-39 (52184) yeShAmarthAya saMyatto matsyarAjaH sahAnujaH. shatAnIkaH sUryadattaH shrutAnIkaH shrutadhvajaH.. 7-159-40 (52185) balAnIko jayAnIko jayAshvo rathavAhanaH. chandrodayaH samaratho virATabhrAtaraH shubhAH.. 7-159-41 (52186) yamau cha draupadeyAshcha rAkShasashcha ghaTotkachaH. yeShAmarthAya yudhyante na teShAM vidyate kShayaH.. 7-159-42 (52187) ete chAnye cha bahavo gaNAH pANDusutasya vai.. 7-159-43 (52188) kAmaM khalu jagatsarvaM sadevAsuramAnuSham. sayakSharAkShasagaNaM sabhUtabhujagadvipam. niHsheShamastravIryeNa kurvAte bhImaphalgunau.. 7-159-44 (52189) yudhiShThirashcha pR^ithivIM nirdaheddhorachakShuShA.. 7-159-45 (52190) aprameyabalaH shauriryeShAmarthe cha daMshitaH. kathaM tAnsaMyuge karNa jetumutsahase parAn.. 7-159-46 (52191) mahAnapanayastveSha nityaM hi tava sUtaja. yastvamutsahase yoddhuM samare shauriNA saha.. 7-159-47 (52192) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-159-48x (4693) evamuktastu rAdheyaH prahasanbharatarShabha. abravIchcha tadA karNo guraM shAradvataM kR^ipam.. 7-159-48 (52193) satyamuktaM tvayA brahmanpANDavAnprati yadvachaH. ete chAnye cha bahavo guNAH pANDusuteShu vai.. 7-159-49 (52194) ajayyAshcha raNe pArthA devairapi savAsavaiH. sadaityayakShagandharvaiH pishAchoragarAkShasaiH.. 7-159-50 (52195) tathApi pArthA~njeShyAmi shaktyA vAsavadattayA. mama hyamoghA datteyaM shaktiH shakreNa vai dvija. etayA nihaniShyAmi savyasAchinamAhave.. 7-159-51 (52196) hate tu pANDave kR^iShNe bhrAtarashchAsya sodarAH. anarjunA na shakShyanti mahIM bhoktuM katha~nchana.. 7-159-52 (52197) teShu naShTeShu sarveShu pR^ithivIyaM sasAgarA. ayatnAtkauravendrasya vashe sthAsyati gautam.. 7-159-53 (52198) sunItairiha sarvArthAH sidhyante nAtra saMshayaH. etamarthamahaM j~nAtvA tato garjAmi gautama.. 7-159-54 (52199) tvaM tu viprashcha vR^iddhashcha ashaktashchApi saMyuge. kR^itasnehashcha pArtheShu mohAnmAmavamanyase.. 7-159-55 (52200) yadyevaM vakShyase bhUyo mamApriyamiha dvija. tataste kha~Ngamudyamya jihvAM ChetsyAmi durmate.. 7-159-56 (52201) yachchApi pANDavAnvipra stotumichChasi saMyuge. bhIShayansarvasainyAni kauraveyAMshcha durmate.. 7-159-57 (52202) atrApi shR^iNu me vAkyaM yathAvadbruvato dvija. duryodhanashcha droNashcha shakunirdurmukho jayaH.. 7-159-58 (52203) duHshAsano vR^iShaseno madrAjastvameva cha. somadattashcha bhUrishcha tathA drauNirviviMshatiH.. 7-159-59 (52204) tiShTheyurdaMshitA yatrA sarve yuddhavishAradAH. jayedetAnnaraH ko nu shakratulyabalo.apyariH.. 7-159-60 (52205) shUrAshcha hi kR^itAstrAshcha balinaH svargalipsavaH. dharmaj~nA yuddhakushalA hanyuryuddhe surAnapi.. 7-159-61 (52206) ete sthAsyanti sa~NgrAme pANDavAnAM vadhArthinaH. jayamAkA~NkShamANA hi kauraveyasya daMshitAH.. 7-159-62 (52207) daivAyattamahaM manye jayaM subalinAmapi. yatra bhIShmo mahAbAhuH shete sharashatAchitaH.. 7-159-63 (52208) vikarNashchitrasenashcha bAhlIko.atha jayadrathaH. bhUrishravA jayashchaiva jalasandhaH sudakShiNaH.. 7-159-64 (52209) shalashcha rathinAM shreShTho bhagadattashcha vIryavAn. ete chAnye cha rAjAno devairapi sudurjayAH.. 7-159-65 (52210) nihatAH samare shUrAH pANDavairbalavattarAH. kimanyaddaivasaMyogAnmanyase puruShAdhama.. 7-159-66 (52211) yAMshcha tAMstauShi satataM duryodhanaripUndvija. teShAmapi hatAH shUrAH shatasho.atha sahasrashaH.. 7-159-67 (52212) kShIyante sarvasainyAni kurUNAM pANDavaiH saha. prabhAvaM nAtra pAshyAmi pANDavAnAM katha~nchana.. 7-159-68 (52213) yastAnbalavato nityaM manyase tvaM dvijAdhama. yatiShye.ahaM yathAshakti yoddhuM taiH saha saMyuge. duryodhanahitArthAya jayo daive pratiShThitaH.. .. 7-159-69 (52214) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi ghaTotkachavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe ekonaShaShTyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 159 ..
droNaparva - adhyAya 160

.. shrIH ..

7.160. adhyAyaH 160

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

kR^ipagarhaNAtitikShayA karNavadhAyAkShyuttiShThato.ashvatthAmnaH kR^ipaduryodhanAkShyAM nivAraNam.. 1 .. arjunena karNaparAjayo duryodhanena raNAya drauNichodanA cha.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-160-0 (52215) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-160-0x (4694) tathA paruShitaM dR^iShTvA sUtaputreNa mAtulam. kha~Ngamudyamya vegena drauNirabhyapataddrutam.. 7-160-1 (52216) tataH paramasa~NkruddhaH siMho mattamiva dvipam. prekShataH kururAjasya drauNiH karNaM samabhyayAt.. 7-160-2 (52217) ashvatthAmovAcha. 7-160-3x (4695) yadaryunaguNAMstathyAnkIrtayAnaM narAdhama. shUraM dveShAtsudurbuddhe tvaM bhartsayasi mAtulam.. 7-160-3 (52218) vikatthamAnaH shauryeNa sarvalokadhanurdharam.. darpotsedhagR^ihIto.adya na ka~nchidgaNayanmR^idhe.. 7-160-4 (52219) kva te vIryaM kva chAstrANi yaM tvAM nirjitya saMyuge. gANDIvadhanvA hatavAnprekShataste jayadratham.. 7-160-5 (52220) yena sAkShAnmahAdevo yodhitaH samare purA. tamichChasi vR^ithA jetuM sUtAdhama manorathaiH.. 7-160-6 (52221) yaM hi kR^iShNena sahitaM sarvashastrabhR^itAM varam. jetuM na shaktAH sahitAH sendrA api surAsurAH.. 7-160-7 (52222) lokaikavIramajitamarjunaM sUta saMyuge. kiM punastvaM sudurbuddhe sahaibhirvasudhAdhipaiH.. 7-160-8 (52223) karNa pashya sudurbuddhe tiShThedAnIM narAdhama. eSha te.adya shiraH kAyAduddharAmi sudurmate.. sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-160-9 (52224) tamudyataM tu vegena rAjA duryodhanaH svayam. nyavArayanmahAtejAH kR^ipashcha dvipadAM varaH.. 7-160-10 (52225) karNa uvAcha. 7-160-11x (4696) shUro.ayaM samarashlAghI durmatishcha dvijAdhamaH. AsAdayatu madvIryaM mu~nchemaM kurusattama.. 7-160-11 (52226) ashvatthAmovAcha. 7-160-12x (4697) taivatatkShamyate.asmAbhiH sUtAtmaja sudurmate. darpamutsiktametatte phalguno nAshayiShyati.. 7-160-12 (52227) duryodhana uvAcha. 7-160-13x (4698) ashvatthAmanprasIdasva kShantumarhasi mAnada. kopaH khalu na kartavyaH sUtaputraM katha~nchana.. 7-160-13 (52228) tvayi karNe kR^ipe droNe madrarAje.atha saubale. mahatkAryaM samAsaktaM prasIda dvijasattama.. 7-160-14 (52229) ete hyabhimukhAH sarve rAdheyena yuyutsavaH. AyAnti pANDavA brahmannAhvayantaH samantataH.. 7-160-15 (52230) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-160-16x (4699) prasAdyamAnastu tato rAj~nA drauNirmahAmanAH. prasasAda mahArAja krodhavegasamanvitaH.. 7-160-16 (52231) tataH kR^ipo.apyuvAchedamAchAryaH sumahAmanAH. saumyasvabhAvAdrAjanendra kShipramAgatamArdavaH.. 7-160-17 (52232) kR^ipa uvAcha. 7-160-18x (4700) tavaitatkShamyate.asmAbhiH sUtAtmaja sudurmate. darpamutsiktametatte phalguno nAshayiShyati.. 7-160-18 (52233) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-160-19x (4701) tataste pANDavA rAjanpA~nchAlAshcha yashasvinaH. AjagmuH sahitAH karNaM tarjayantaH samantataH.. 7-160-19 (52234) karNo.api rathinAM shreShThashchApamudyamya vIryavAn. kauravAgryaiH parivR^itaH shakro devagaNairiva. paryatiShThata tejasvI svabAhubalamAshritaH.. 7-160-20 (52235) tataH pravavR^ite yuddhaM karNasya saha pANDavaiH. bhIShaNaM sumahArAja siMhanAdavirAjitam.. 7-160-21 (52236) tataste pANDavA rAjanpA~nchAlAshcha yashasvinaH. dR^iShTvA karNaM mahAbAhumuchchaiH shabdamathAnadan.. 7-160-22 (52237) ayaM karNaH kutaH karNastiShTha karNa mahAraNe. yudhyasva sahito.asmAbhirdurAtmanpuruShAdhama.. 7-160-23 (52238) anye tu dR^iShTvA rAdheyaM krodharakrekShaNA.abruvan. hanyatAmayamutsiktaH sUtaputro.alpachetanaH. sarvaiH pArthivashArdUlairnAnenArtho.asti jIvatA. 7-160-24 (52239) atyantavairI pArthAnAM satataM pApapUruShaH. eSha mUlamanarthAnAM duryodhanamate sthitaH.. 7-160-25 (52240) ghnatainamiti jalpantaH kShatriyAH samupAdravan. mahatA sharavarSheNa chChAdayanto mahArathAH. vadhArthaM sUtaputrasya pANDaveyena choditAH.. 7-160-26 (52241) tAMstu sarvAMstathA dR^iShTvA dhAvamAnAnmahArathAn. na vivyathe sUtaputro na cha trAsamagachChata.. 7-160-27 (52242) dR^iShTvA sAgaskalpaM tamuddhUtaM sainyasAgaram. piprIShustava putrANAM sa~NgrAmeShvaparAjitaH.. 7-160-28 (52243) sAyakaudhena balavAnkShiprakArI mahAbalaH. vArayAmAsa tatsainyaM samantAdbharatarpabha.. 7-160-29 (52244) tatastu sharavarSheNa pArthivAstamavArayan. dhanumpi te vidhunvAnAH shatasho.atha sahasrashaH. ayodhayanta rAdheyaM shakraM daityagaNA iva.. 7-160-30 (52245) sharavarpaM tu tatkarNaH pArthivaiH samudIritam. sharavarSheNa mahatA samantAdvyakiratprabho.. 7-160-31 (52246) tadyuddhamabhavatteShAM kR^itapratikR^itaiShiNAm. yathA devAsure yuddhe shakrasya saha dAnaivaH.. 7-160-32 (52247) tatrAdbhutamapashyAma sUtaputrasya lAghavam. yadenaM sarvato yattA nApnuvanti pare yudhi.. 7-160-33 (52248) nivArya cha sharaughAMstAnpArthivAnAM mahArathaH. yugeShvIShAsu chChatreShu dhvajeShu cha hayeShu cha. AtmanAmA~NkitAnghorAnrAdheyaH prAhiNochCharAn.. 7-160-34 (52249) tataste vyAkulIbhUtA rAjAnaH karNapIDitAH. babhrumustatra tatraiva gAvaH shItArditA iva.. 7-160-35 (52250) hayAnAM vadhyamAnAnAM gajAnAM rathinAM tathA. tatratatrAbhyavekShAma sa~NghAnkarNena tADitAn.. 7-160-36 (52251) shirobhiH patitai rAjanbAhubhishcha samantataH. AstIrNA vasudhA sarvA shUrANAmanivartinAm.. 7-160-37 (52252) hataishcha hanyamAnaishcha niShTanadbhishcha sarvashaH. babhUvAyodhanaM raudraM vaivasvatapuropamam.. 7-160-38 (52253) tato duryodhano rAjA dR^iShTvA karNasya vikramam. ashvatthAmAnamAsAdya vAkyametaduvAcha ha.. 7-160-39 (52254) yudhyate.asau raNe karNo daMshitaH sarvapArthivaiH.. 7-160-40 (52255) pashyaitAM dravatIM senAM karNasAyakapIDitAm. kArtikeyena vidhvastAmAsurIM pR^itanAmiva.. 7-160-41 (52256) dR^iShTvaitAM nirjitAM senAM raNe karNena dhImatA. abhiyAtyeSha bIbhatsuH sUtaputrajighAMsayA.. 7-160-42 (52257) tadyathA prekShamANAnAM sUtaputraM mahAratham. na hanyAtpANDavaH sa~Nkhye tathA nItirvidhIyatAM.. 7-160-43 (52258) tato drauNiH kR^ipaH shalyo hArdikyashcha mahArathaH. pratyudyayustadA pArthaM sUtaputraparIpsayA. AyAntaM vIkShya kaunteyaM shakraM daityachamUmiva.. 7-160-44 (52259) bIbhatsurapi rAjendra pA~nchAlairabhisaMvR^itaH. pratyudyayau tadA karNaM yathA vR^itraM shatakratuH.. 7-160-45 (52260) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-160-46x (4702) saMrabdhaM phalgunaM dR^iShTvA kAlAntakayamopamam. karNo vaikartanaH sUta pratyapadyatkimuttaram.. 7-160-46 (52261) yo hyaspardhata pArthena nityameva mahArathaH. AshaMsate cha bIbhatsuM yuddhe jetuM sudAruNam.. 7-160-47 (52262) sa tu taM sahasA prAptaM nityamatyantavairiNam. karNo vaikartanaH sUta kimuttaramapadyata.. 7-160-48 (52263) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-160-49x (4703) AyAntaM pANDava dR^iShTvA gajaM pratigajo yathA. asambhrAnto raNe karNaH pratyudIyAddhana~njayam.. 7-160-49 (52264) tamApatantaM vegena vaikartanamajihmagaiH. ChAdayAmAsa pArtho.atha karNastu vijayaM sharaiH.. 7-160-50 (52265) sa karNaM sharajAlena chChAdayAmAsa pANQDavaH. tataH karNaH susaMrabdhaH sharaistribhiravidhyata.. 7-160-51 (52266) tasya tallAghavaM pArtho nAmR^iShyata mahAbalaH.. 7-160-52 (52267) tasmai bANA~nshilAdhautAnprasannAgrAnajihmagAn. prAhiNotsUtaputrAya trishataM shatrutApanaH.. 7-160-53 (52268) vivyAdha chainaM saMrabdho bANenaikena vIryavAn. savye bhujAgre balavAnnArAchena hasanniva.. 7-160-54 (52269) tasya viddhasya bANena karAchchApaM papAta ha.. 7-160-55 (52270) punarAdAya tachchApaM nimeShArdhAnmahAbalaH. ChAdayAmAsa bANaughaiH phalgunaM kR^itahastavat.. 7-160-56 (52271) sharavR^iShTiM tu tAM muktAM sUtaputreNa bhArata. vyadhamachCharavarSheNa smayanniva dhana~njayaH.. 7-160-57 (52272) tau parasparamAsAdya sharavarSheNa pArthiva. ChAdayetAM maheShvAsau kR^itapratikR^itaiShiNau.. 7-160-58 (52273) tadadbhutaM mahadyuddhaM karNapANDavayormR^idhe. kruddhayorvAsitAhetorvanyayorgajayoriva.. 7-160-59 (52274) tataH pArtho maheShvAso dR^iShTvA karNasya vikramam. muShTideshe dhanustasya chichCheda tvarayA.anvitaH.. 7-160-60 (52275) ashvAMshcha chaturo bhallairanayadyamasAdanam. sAratheshcha shisaH kAyAdaharachChatrutApanaH.. 7-160-61 (52276) athainaM ChinnadhanvAnaM hatAshvaM hatasArathim. vivyAdha sAyakaiH pArthashchaturbhiH pANDunandanaH.. 7-160-62 (52277) hatAshvAttu rathAttUrNamavaplutya nararShabhaH. Aruroha rathaM tUrNaM kR^ipasya sharapIDitaH.. 7-160-63 (52278) sa nunno.arjunabANaughairAchitaH shalyako yathA. jIvitArthamabhiprepsuH kR^ipasya rathamAruhat.. 7-160-64 (52279) rAdheyaM nirjitaM dR^iShTvA tAvakA bharatarShabha. dhana~njayasharairnunnAH prAdravanta disho dasha.. 7-160-65 (52280) dravatastAnsamAlokya rAjA duryodhano nR^ipa. nivartayAmAsa tadA vAkyametaduvAcha ha.. 7-160-66 (52281) alaM drutena vaH shUrAstiShThadhvaM kShatriyarShabhAH. eSha pArthavadhAyAhaM svayaM gachChAmi saMyuge. ahaM pArthAnhaniShyAmi sapA~nchAlAnsasomakAn.. 7-160-67 (52282) adya me yudhyamAnasya saha gANDIvadhanvanA. drakShyanti vikramaM pArthAH kAlasyeva yugakShaye.. 7-160-68 (52283) adya madbANajAlAni vimuktAni sahasrashaH. drakShyanti samare yodhAH shalabhAnAmivAyatIH.. 7-160-69 (52284) adya bANamayaM varShaM sR^ijato mama dhanvinaH. jImUtasyeva gharmAnte drakShyanti yudhi sainikAH.. 7-160-70 (52285) jeShyAmyadya raNe pArthaM sAyakairnataparvabhiH. tiShThadhvaM samare shUrA bhayaM tyajata phalgunAt.. 7-160-71 (52286) na hi madvIryamAsAdya phalgunaH prasahiShyati. yathA velAM samAsAdya sAgaro makarAlayaH.. 7-160-72 (52287) ityuktvA prayayau rAjA sainyena mahatA vR^itaH. phalgunaM pratidurdharShaH krodhAtsaMraktalochanaH.. 7-160-73 (52288) taM prayAntaM mahAbAhuM dR^iShTvA shAradvatastadA. ashvatthAmAnamAsAdya vAkyametaduvAcha ha.. 7-160-74 (52289) eSha rAjA mahAbAhuramarShI krodhamUrchChitaH. pata~NgavR^ittimAsthAya phalgunaM yoddhumichChati.. 7-160-75 (52290) yAvannaH pashyamAnAnAM prANAnpArthena saMgataH. na jahyAtpuruShavyAghrastAvadvAraya kauravam.. 7-160-76 (52291) yAvatphalgunabANAnAM gocharaM nAdya gachChati. kauravaH pArthivo vIrastAvadvAraya saMyuge.. 7-160-77 (52292) yAvatpArthasharairghorairnirmuktoragasannibhaiH. na bhasmIkriyate rAjA tAvadyuddhAnnivAryatAm.. 7-160-78 (52293) ayuktamiva pashyAmi tiShThatsvasmAsu mAnada. svayaM yuddhAya yadrAjA pArthaM yAtyasahAyavAn.. 7-160-79 (52294) durlabhaM jIvitaM manye kauravyasya kirITinA. yudhyamAnasya pArthena shArdUleneva hastinaH.. 7-160-80 (52295) mAtulenaivamuktastu drauNiH shastrabhR^itAM varaH. duryodhanamidaM vAkyaM tvaritaH samabhAShata.. 7-160-81 (52296) mayi jIvati gAndhAre na yuddhaM gantumarhasi. mAmanAdR^itya kauravya tava nityaM hitaiShiNam.. 7-160-82 (52297) na hi sambhramaH kAryaH pArthasya vijayaM prati. ahamAvArayiShyAmi pArthaM tiShTha suyodhana.. 7-160-83 (52298) duryodhana uvAcha. 7-160-84x (4704) AchAryaH pANDuputrAnvai putravatparirakShati. tvamapyupekShAM kuruShe teShu nityaM dvijottam.. 7-160-84 (52299) mama vA mandabhAgyatvAnmandaste vikramo yudhi. dharmarAjapniyArthaM vA draupadyA vA na vidma tat.. 7-160-85 (52300) dhigastu mama lubdhasya yatkR^ite sarvabAndhavAH. sukhArhAH paramaM duHkhaM prApnuvantyaparAjitAH.. 7-160-86 (52301) ko hi shastravidAM mukhyo maheshvarasamo yudhi. shatruM na kShapayechChakto yo na syAdgautamIsutaH.. 7-160-87 (52302) ashvatthAmanprasIdasva nAshayaitAnmamAhitAn. tavAstragochare shaktAH sthAtuM devA na dAnavAH.. 7-160-88 (52303) pA~nchAlAnsomakAMshchaiva jahi drauNe sahAnugAn. vayaM sheShAnhaniShyAmastvayaiva parirakShitAH.. 7-160-89 (52304) ete hi somakA vipra pA~nchAlAshcha yashasvinaH. mama sainyeShu sa~NkruddhA vicharanti davAgnivat.. 7-160-90 (52305) tAnvAraya mahAbAho kekayAMshcha narottama. purA kurvanti niHsheShaM rakShyamANAH kirITinA.. 7-160-91 (52306) ashvatthAmaMstvarAyukto yAhi shIghramarindama. Adau vA yadi vA pashchAttavedaM karma mAriSha.. 7-160-92 (52307) tvamutpanno mahAbAho pA~nchAlAnAM vadhaM prati. kariShyasi jagatsarvamapA~nchAlaM kilodyataH.. 7-160-93 (52308) evaM siddhA.abruvanvAcho bhaviShyati cha tattathA. tasmAttvaM puruShavyAghra pA~nchAlA~njahi sAnugAn.. 7-160-94 (52309) na te.astragochare shaktAH sthAtuM devAH savAsavAH. kimu pArthAH sapA~nchAlAH satyametadbravImi te.. 7-160-95 (52310) na tvAM samarthAH sa~NgrAme pANDavAH saha somakaiH. balAdyodhayituM vIra satyametadbravImi te.. 7-160-96 (52311) gachChagachCha mahAbAho na naH kAlAtyayo bhavet. iyaM hi dravate senA pArtasAyakapIDitA.. 7-160-97 (52312) shakto hyasi mahAbAho divyena svena tejasA. nigrahe pANDuputrANAM pA~nchAlAnAM cha mAnada.. .. 7-160-98 (52313) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi ghaTotkachavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe ShaShTyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 160 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-160-4 ka~nchiddhanurdharaM nagaNayannityanvayaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 161

.. shrIH ..

7.161. adhyAyaH 161

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

drauNidhR^iShTadyumnayoryuddham. drauNiparAkramaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-161-0 (52314) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-161-0x (4705) duryodhanenaivamukto drauNirAhavadurmadaH. chakArArivadhe yatnamindro daityavadhe yathA. pratyuvAcha mahAbAhustava putramidaM vachaH.. 7-161-1 (52315) satyametanmahAbAho yathA vadasi kaurava. priyA hi pANDavA nityaM mama chApi pitushcha me.. 7-161-2 (52316) tathaivAvAM priyau teShAM na tu yuddhe kurUdvaha. shaktitastAta yudhyAmastyaktvA prANAnabhItavat.. 7-161-3 (52317) ahaM karNashcha shalyashcha kR^ipo hArdikya eva cha. nimeShAtpANDavIM senAM kShapayema nR^ipottama.. 7-161-4 (52318) te chApi kauravIM senAM nimeShArdhAtkurUdvaha. kShapayeyurmahAbAho na syAma yadi saMyuge.. 7-161-5 (52319) yudhyAma pANDavAchChaktyA te chApyasmAnyathAbalam. tejastejaH samAsAdya prashamaM yAtu bhArata.. 7-161-6 (52320) ashaktyA tarasA jetuM pANDavAnAmanIkinI. jIvatsu pANDuputreShu taddhi satyaM bravImi te.. 7-161-7 (52321) AtmArthaM yudhyamAnAste samarthAH pANDunandanAH. kimarthaM tava sainyAni na haniShyanti bhArata.. 7-161-8 (52322) tvaM tu lubdhatamo rAjannikR^itij~nashcha kaurava. sarvAbhisha~NkI mAnI cha tato.asmAnabhisha~Nkase.. 7-161-9 (52323) manye tvaM kutsito rAjanpApAtmA pApapUruShaH. anyAnapi sa naH kShudra sha~Nkase pApabhAvitaH.. 7-161-10 (52324) ahaM tu yatnamAsthAya tvadarthe tyaktajIvitaH. eSha gachChAmi sa~NgrAmaM tvatkR^ite kurunandana. yotsye.ahaM shatrubhiH sArdhaM jeShyAmi cha varAnvarAn.. 7-161-11 (52325) pA~nchAlaiH saha yotsyAmi somakaiH kekayaistathA. pANDaveyaishcha sa~NgrAme tvatpriyArthamarindama.. 7-161-12 (52326) adya madbANanirdagdhAH pA~nchAlAH somakAstathA. siMhenevArditA gAvo vidraviShyanti sarvashaH.. 7-161-13 (52327) adya dharmasuto rAjA dR^iShTvA mama parAkramam. ashvatthAmamayaM lokaM maMsyate saha somakaiH.. 7-161-14 (52328) AgamiShyati nirvedaM dharmaputro yudhiShThiraH. dR^iShTvA vinihatAnsa~Nkhye pA~nchAlAnsomakaiH saha.. 7-161-15 (52329) ye mAM yuddhe.abhiyotsyanti tAnhaniShyAmi bhArata. na hi te vIra mokShyante madbAhvantaramAgatAH.. 7-161-16 (52330) evamuktvA mahAbAhuH putraM duryodhanaM tava. abhyavartata yuddhAya trAsayansarvadhanvinaH. chikIrShustava putrANAM priyaM prANabhR^itAM varaH.. 7-161-17 (52331) tato.abravItsakaikeyAnpA~nchAlAngautamIsutaH.. 7-161-18 (52332) praharadhvamitaH sarve mama gAtre mahArathAH. sthirIbhUtAshcha yudhyadhvaM darshayanto.astralAghavam.. 7-161-19 (52333) evamuktAstu te sarve shastravR^iShIrapAtayan. drauNiM prati mahArAja jalaM jaladharA iva.. 7-161-20 (52334) tAnnihatya sharAndrauNirdasha vIrAnapothayat. pramukhe pANDuputrANAM dhR^iShTadyumnasya cha prabho.. 7-161-21 (52335) te hanyamAnAH samare pA~nchAlAH somakAstathA. parityajya raNe drauNiM vyadravanta disho dasha.. 7-161-22 (52336) tAndR^iShTvA dravataH shUrAnpA~nchAlAnsahasomakAn. dhR^iShTadyumno mahArAja drauNimabhyadravadraNe.. 7-161-23 (52337) tataH kA~nchanachitrANAM sajalAmbudanAdinAm. vR^itaH shatena shUrANAM rathAnAmanivartinAm.. 7-161-24 (52338) putraH pA~nchAlarAjasya dhR^iShTadyumno mahArathaH. drauNimityabravIdvAkyaM dR^iShTvA yodhAnnipAtitAn.. 7-161-25 (52339) AchAryaputra bhadraM te kimanyairnihataistava. samAgachCha mayA sArdhaM yadi shUro.asi saMyuge. ahaM tvAM nihaniShyAmi tiShThedAnIM mamAgrataH.. 7-161-26 (52340) tatastamAchAryasutaM dhR^iShTadyumnaH pratApavAn. marmabhidbhiH sharaistIkShNairjaghAna bharatarShabha.. 7-161-27 (52341) te tu pa~NktIkR^itA drauNiM sharA vivishurAshugAH. rukmapu~NkhAH prasannAgrAH sarvakAyAvadAraNAH. madhvarthina ivoddAmA bhramarAH puShpitaM drumam.. 7-161-28 (52342) so.atividdho bhR^ishaM kruddhaH padAkrAnta ivoragaH. mAnI drauNirasambhrAnto bANapANirabhAShata.. 7-161-29 (52343) dhR^iShTadyumna sthiro bhUtvA muhUrtaM pratipAlaya. yAvattvAM nishitairbANaiH preShayAmi yamakShayam.. 7-161-30 (52344) drauNirevamathAbhAShya pArShataM paravIrahA. ChAdayAmAsa bANaughaiH samantAllughuhastavat.. 7-161-31 (52345) sa bAdhyamAnaH samare drauNinA yuddhadurmadaH. drauNiM pA~nchAlatanayo vAgbhirAtarjayattadA.. 7-161-32 (52346) na jAnIShe pratij~nAM me viprotpattiM tathaiva cha. droNaM hatvA kila mayA hantavyastvaM sudurmate.. 7-161-33 (52347) tatastvA.ahaM na hanmyadya droNe jIvati saMyuge.. 7-161-34 (52348) imAM tu rajanIM prAptAmaprabhAtAM sudurmate. nihatya pitaraM te.adya tatastvAmapi saMyuge. neShyAmi pretalokAya hyetanme manasi sthitam.. 7-161-35 (52349) yaste pArtheShu vidveSho yA bhaktiH kauraveShu cha. tAM darshaya sthiro bhUtvA na me jIvanvimokShyase.. 7-161-36 (52350) yo hi brAhmaNyamutsR^ijya kShatradharmarato dvijaH. sa vadhyaH sarvalokasya yathA tvaM puruShAdhamaH.. 7-161-37 (52351) ityuktaH paruShaM vAkyaM pArShatena dvijottamaH. krodhamAhArayattIvraM tiShThatiShTheti chAbravIt.. 7-161-38 (52352) nirdahanniva chakShurbhyAM pArShataM so.abhyavaikShata. ChAdayAmAsa cha sharairniHshvasanpannago yathA.. 7-161-39 (52353) sa chChAdyamAnaH samare drauNinA rAjasattama. sarvapA~nchAlasenAbhiH saMvR^ito rathasattamaH.. 7-161-40 (52354) nAkampata mahAbAhuH svavIryaM samupAshritaH. sAyakAMshchaiva vividhAnashvatthAmni mumocha ha.. 7-161-41 (52355) tau punaH sannyavartetAM prANadyUtapaNe raNe. nipIDayantau bANaughaiH parasparamamarShiNau. utsR^ijantau maheShvAsau sharavR^iShTIH samantataH.. 7-161-42 (52356) drauNipArShatayoryuddhaM ghorarUpaM bhayAnakam. dR^iShTvA sampUjayAmAsuH siddhachAraNavAdikAH.. 7-161-43 (52357) sharaughaiH pUrayantau tAvAkAshaM cha dishastathA. alakShyau samayudhyetAM mahatkR^itvA sharaistamaH.. 7-161-44 (52358) nR^ityamAnAviva raNe maNDalIkR^itakArmukau. parasparavadhe yattau sarvabhUtabhaya~Nkarau.. 7-161-45 (52359) ayudhyetAM mahAbAhU chitraM laghu cha suShThu cha. sampUjyamAnau samare yodhamukhyaiH sahasrashaH.. 7-161-46 (52360) tau prabuddhau raNe dR^iShTvA vane vanyau gajAviva. ubhayoH senayorharShastumulaH samapadyata.. 7-161-47 (52361) siMhanAdaravAshchAsandadhmuH sha~NkhAMshcha sainikAH. vAditrANyabhyavAdyanta shatasho.atha sahasrashaH.. 7-161-48 (52362) tasmiMstu tumule yuddhe bhIruNAM bhayavardhane. muhUrtamapi tadyuddhaM samarUpaM tadA.abhavat.. 7-161-49 (52363) tato drauNirmahArAja pArShatasya mahAtmanaH. dhvajaM dhanustathA Chatramubhau cha pArShNisArathI. sUtamashvAMshcha chaturo nihatyAbhyadravadraNe.. 7-161-50 (52364) pA~nchAlAMshchaiva tAnsarvAnbANaiH sannataparvabhiH. vyadrAvayadameyAtmA shatasho.atha sahasrashaH.. 7-161-51 (52365) tatastu vivyathe senA pANDavI bharatarShabha. dR^iShTvA drauNermahatkarma vAsavasyeva saMyuge.. 7-161-52 (52366) shatena cha shataM hatvA pA~nchAlAnAM mahArathaH. tribhishcha nishitairbANairhatvA trInvai mahArathAn.. 7-161-53 (52367) drauNirdrupadaputrasya phalgunasya cha pashyataH. nAshayAmAsa pA~nchAlAnbhUyiShThaM ye vyavasthitAH.. 7-161-54 (52368) te vadhyamAnAH pA~nchAlAH samare saha sR^i~njayaiH. agachChandrauNimutsR^ijya viprakIrNarathadhvajAH.. 7-161-55 (52369) sa jitvA samare shatrUndroNaputro mahArathaH. nanAda sumahAnAdaM tapAnte jalado yathA.. 7-161-56 (52370) sa nihatya bahU~nChUrAnashvatthAmA vyarochata. yugAnte sarvabhUtAni bhasma kR^itveva pAvakaH.. 7-161-57 (52371) sampUjyamAno yudhi kauraveyai-- rnirjitya sa~Nkhye.arigaNAnsahasrashaH. vyarochata droNasutaH pratApavA-- nyathA surendro.arigaNAnnihatya vai.. .. 7-161-58 (52372) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi ghaTotkachavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe ekaShaShTyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 161 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-161-9 nikR^itirva~nchanam.. 5-161-43 vAdikAH vandinaH.. 5-161-161 ekaShaShTyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 162

.. shrIH ..

7.162. adhyAyaH 162

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sa~NkulayuddhavarNanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-162-0 (52373) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-162-0x (4706) tato yudhiShThirashchaiva bhImasenashcha pANDavaH. droNaputraM mahArAja samantAtparyavArayan.. 7-162-1 (52374) tato duryodhano rAjA bhAradvAjena saMvR^itaH. abhyayAtpANDavAnsa~Nkhye tato yuddhamavartata. ghorarUpaM mahArAja bhIrUNAM bhayavardhanam.. 7-162-2 (52375) ambaShThAnmAlavAnva~NgA~nChibIMstraigartakAnapi. prAhiNonmR^ityulokAya gaNAnkruddho vR^ikodaraH.. 7-162-3 (52376) abhIShAhA~nChUrasenAnkShatriyAnyuddhadurmadAn. nikR^ittya pR^ithivIM chakre bhImaH shoNitakardamAm.. 7-162-4 (52377) yaudheyAnadrijAnrAjanmadrakAnmAlavAnapi. prAhiNonmR^ityulokAya kirITI nishitaiH sharaiH.. 7-162-5 (52378) pragADhama~nchogatibhirnArAchairabhitADitAH. nipeturdviradA bhUmau dvishR^i~NgA iva parvatAH.. 7-162-6 (52379) nikR^ittairhastihastaishcha cheShTamAnairitastataH. rarAja vasudhA.a.akIrNA visarpadbhirivoragaiH.. 7-162-7 (52380) kShiptaiH kanakachitraishcha nR^ipachChatraiH kShitirbabhau. dyaurivAdityachandrAdyairgrahaiH kIrNA yugakShaye.. 7-162-8 (52381) hata praharatAbhItA vidhyata vyavakR^intata. ityAsIttumulaH shabdaH shoNAshvasya rathaM prati.. 7-162-9 (52382) droNastu paramakruddho vAyavyAstreNa saMyuge. vyadhamattAnmahavAyurmeghAniva duratyayaH.. 7-162-10 (52383) te hanyamAnA droNena pA~nchAlAH prAdravanbhayAt. pashyato bhImasenasya pArthasya cha mahAtmanaH.. 7-162-11 (52384) tataH kirITi bhImashcha sahasA sannyavartatAm. mahatA rathavaMshena parigR^ihya balaM mahat.. 7-162-12 (52385) bIbhatsurdakShiNaM vArshvamuttaraM tu vR^ikodaraH. bhAradvAjaM sharaughAbhyAM mahadbhAmabhyavarShatAm.. 7-162-13 (52386) tau tathA sR^i~njayAshchaiva pA~nchAlAshcha mahaujasaH. anvagachChanmahArAja mAtsyaishcha saha somakaiH.. 7-162-14 (52387) tathaiva tava putrasya rathodArAH prahAriNaH. mahatyA senayA rAja~njagmurdroNarathaM prati.. 7-162-15 (52388) tataH sA bhAratI senA hanyamAnA kirITinA. tamasA nidrayA chaiva punareva vyadIryata.. 7-162-16 (52389) droNena vAryamANAste svayaM tava sutena cha. nAshakyanta mahArAja yodhA vArayituM tadA.. 7-162-17 (52390) sA pANDuputrasya sharairdIryamANA mahAchamUH. tamasA saMvR^ite loke vyadravatsarvatomukhI.. 7-162-18 (52391) utsR^ijya shatasho vAhAMstatra kechinnarAdhipAH. prAdravanta mahArAja bhayAviShTAH samantataH.. .. 7-162-19 (52392) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi ghaTotkachavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe dviShaShTyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 162 ..
droNaparva - adhyAya 163

.. shrIH ..

7.163. adhyAyaH 163

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sAtyakinA somadattavadhaH.. 1 .. droNayudhiShThirayuddham.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-163-0 (52393) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-163-0x (4707) somadattaM tu samprekShya vidhunvAnaM mahaddhanuH. sAtyakiH prAha yantAraM somadattAya mAM vaha.. 7-163-1 (52394) na hyahatvA raNe shatruM somadattaM mahAbalam. nivartiShye raNAtsUta satyametadvacho mama.. 7-163-2 (52395) tataH sampraiShayadyantA saindhavAMstAnmanojavAn. tura~NgAmA~nCha~NkhavarNAnsarvashabdAtigAnraNe.. 7-163-3 (52396) te.avahanyuyudhAnaM tu manomArutaraMhasaH. yathendraM harayo rAjanpurA daityavadhodyatam.. 7-163-4 (52397) tamApatantaM samprekShya sAtvataM rabhasaM raNe. somadatto mahAbAhurasambhrAnto nyavartata.. 7-163-5 (52398) vimu~ncha~nCharavarShANi parjanya iva vR^iShTimAn. ChAdayAmAsa shaineyaM jalado bhAskaraM yathA.. 7-163-6 (52399) asambhrAntashcha samare sAtyakiH kurupu~Ngavam. ChAdayAmAsa bANaughaiH samantAdbharatarShabha.. 7-163-7 (52400) somadattastutaM ShaShTyA vivyAdhorasi mAdhavam. sAtyakishchApi taM rAjannavidhyatsAyakaiH shitaiH.. 7-163-8 (52401) tAvanyonyaM sharaiH kR^ittau vyarAjetAM nararShabhau. supuShpau puShpasamaye puShpitAviva kiMshakau.. 7-163-9 (52402) rudhirokShitasarvA~Ngau kuruvR^iShNiyashaskarau. parasparamavekShetAM dahantAviva lochanaiH.. 7-163-10 (52403) rathamaNDalamArgeShu charantAvarimardanau. ghorarUpau hitAvAstAM vR^iShTimantAvivAmbudau.. 7-163-11 (52404) sharasambhinnagAtrau tu sarvataH shakhalIkR^itau. shvAvidhAviva rAjendra dR^ishyetAM sharavikShatau.. 7-163-12 (52405) suvarNapu~NkhairiShubhirAchitau tau vyarAjatAm. khadyotairAvR^itau rAjanprAvR^iShIva vanaspatI.. 7-163-13 (52406) sampradIpitasarvA~Ngau sAyakaistairmahArathau. adR^ishyetAM raNe kruddhAvulkAbhiriva ku~njarau.. 7-163-14 (52407) tato yudhi mahAraja somadatto mahArathaH. ardhachandrema chichCheda mAdhavasya mahaddhanuH.. 7-163-15 (52408) athainaM pa~nchaviMshatyA sAyakAnAM samArpayat. tvaramANastvarAkAle punashcha dashabhiH sharaiH.. 7-163-16 (52409) athAnyaddhanurAdAya sAtyakirvegavattaram. pa~nchabhiH sAyakaistUrNaM somadattamavidhyata.. 7-163-17 (52410) tato.apareNa bhallena dhvajaM chichCheda kA~nchanam. bAhlIkasya raNe rAjansAtyakiH prahasanniva.. 7-163-18 (52411) somadattastvasambhrAnto dR^iShTvA ketuM nipAtitam. shaineyaM pa~nchaviMshatyA sAyakAnAM samAchinot.. 7-163-19 (52412) sAtvato.api raNe kruddhaH somadattasya dhanvinaH. dhanushChichCheda bhallena kShurapreNa shitena ha.. 7-163-20 (52413) athainaM rukmapu~NkhAnAM shatena nataparvaNAm. AchinodbahudhA rAjanbhagnadaMShTramiva dvipam.. 7-163-21 (52414) athAnyaddhanurAdAya somadatto mahArathaH. sAtyakiM ChAdayAmAsa sharavR^iShTyA mahAbalaH.. 7-163-22 (52415) somadattaM tu sa~Nkruddho raNe vivyAdha sAtyakiH. sAtyakiM sharajAlena somadatto.apyapIDayat.. 7-163-23 (52416) dashabhiH sAtvatasyArthe bhImo.ahanbAhlikAtmajam. somadattopyasambhrAnto bhImamArchChachChitaiH sharaiH.. 7-163-24 (52417) tatastu sAtvatasyArthe bhImaseno navaM dR^iDham. mumocha parighaM ghoraM somadattasya vakShasi.. 7-163-25 (52418) tamApatantaM vegena parighaM ghoradarshanam. dvidhA chichCheda samare prahasanniva kauravaH.. 7-163-26 (52419) sa papAta dvidhA chChinna AyasaH parigho mahAn. mahIdharasyeva mahachChikharaM vajradAritam.. 7-163-27 (52420) tatastu sAtyakI rAjansomadattasya saMyuge. dhanushchichCheda bhallena hastAvApaM cha pa~nchabhiH.. 7-163-28 (52421) tatashchaturbhishcha sharaistUrNaM tAMsturagottamAn. samIpaM preShayAmAsa pretarAjasya bhArata.. 7-163-29 (52422) sAratheshcha shiraH kAyAdbhallena nataparvaNA. jahAra narashArdUlaH prahasa~nChinipu~NgavaH.. 7-163-30 (52423) tataH sharaM mahAghoraM jvalantamiva pAvakam. mumocha sAtvato rAjansvarNapu~NgaM shilAshitam.. 7-163-31 (52424) sa vimukto balavatA shaineyena sharottamaH. ghorastasyorasi vibho nipapAtAshu bhArata.. 7-163-32 (52425) so.atividdho mahArAja sAtvatena mahArathaH. somadatto mahAbAhurnipapAta mamAra cha.. 7-163-33 (52426) taM dR^iShTvA nihataM tatra somadattaM mahArathAH. mahatA sharavarSheNa yuyudhAnamupAdravan.. 7-163-34 (52427) ChAdyamAnaM sharairdR^iShTvA yuyudhAnaM yudhiShThiraH. pANDavAshcha mahArAja saha sarvaiH prabhadrakaiH. mahatyA senayA sArdhaM droNAnIkamupAdravan.. 7-163-35 (52428) tato yudhiShThiraH kruddhastAvakAnAM mahAbalam. sharairvidrAvayAmAsa bhAradvAjasya pashyataH.. 7-163-36 (52429) sainyAni drAvayantaM tu droNo dR^iShTvA yudhiShThiram. abhidudrAva vegena krodhasaMraktalochanaH.. 7-163-37 (52430) tataH sunishitairbANaiH pArthaM vivyAdha saptabhiH. yudhiShThiro.api sa~NkruddhaH prativivyAdha pa~nchabhiH.. 7-163-38 (52431) so.atividdho mahAbAhuH sR^ikviNI parisaMlihan. yudhiShThirasya chichCheda dhvajaM kArmukameva cha.. 7-163-39 (52432) sa chChinnadhanvA tvaritastvarAkAle nR^ipottamaH. anyadAdatta vegena kArmukaM samare dR^iDham.. 7-163-40 (52433) tataH sharasahasreNa droNaM vivyAdha pArthivaH. sAshvasUtadhvajarathaM tadadbhutamivAbhavat.. 7-163-41 (52434) tato muhUrtaM vyathitaH sharapAtaprapIDitaH. niShasAda rathopasthe droNo bharatasattama.. 7-163-42 (52435) pratilabhya tataH saMj~nAM muhUrtAddvijasattamaH. krodhena mahatA.a.aviShTo vAyavyAstramavAsR^ijat.. 7-163-43 (52436) asambhrAntastataH pArtho vAyavyenaiva vIryavAn. tadastramastreNa raNe stambhayAmAsa bhArata.. 7-163-44 (52437) chichCheda cha dhanurdIrghaM brAhmaNasya cha pANDavaH. tato.anyaddhanurAdatta droNaH kShatriyamardanaH. tadapyasya shitairbhallaishchichCheda kurupu~NgavaH.. 7-163-45 (52438) tato.abravIdvAsudevaH kuntIputraM yudhiShThiram.. 7-163-46 (52439) yudhiShThira mahAbAho yattvAM vakShyAmi tachChraNu. upAramasva yuddhe tvaM droNAdbharatasattama.. 7-163-47 (52440) yatate hi sadA droNo grahaNe tava saMyuge. nAnurUpamahaM manye yuddhamasya tvayA saha.. 7-163-48 (52441) yo.asya sR^iShTo vinAshAya sa evainaM haniShyati. parivarjya guruM yAhi yatra rAjA suyodhanaH.. 7-163-49 (52442) rAjA rAj~nA hi yoddhavyo nArAj~nA yuddhamiShyate. tatra tvaM gachCha kaunteya hastyashvarathasaMvR^itaH.. 7-163-50 (52443) yAvanmAtreNa cha mayA sahAyena dhana~njayaH. bhImashcha rathashArdUlo yudhyate kauravaiH saha.. 7-163-51 (52444) vAsudevavachaH shrutvA dharmarAjo yudhiShThiraH. muhUrtaM chintayitvA tu tato dAruNamAhavam.. 7-163-52 (52445) prAyAddrutamamitraghno yatra bhImo vyavasthitaH. vinighnaMstAvakAnyodhAnvyAditAsya ivAntakaH.. 7-163-53 (52446) rathaghoSheNa mahatA nAdayanvasudhAtalam. parjanya iva dharmAnte nAdayanvai disho dasha. bhImasya nighnataH shatrUnpArShNiM jAgraha pANDavaH.. 7-163-54 (52447) droNo.api pANDupA~nchAlAnvyadhamadrajanImukhe. `nAdayaMstalaghoSheNa tava sainyAni mAriSha'.. .. 7-163-55 (52448) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi ghaTotkachavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe triShaShTyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 163 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-163-18 bAhlIkasya somadattasya.. 5-163-163 triShaShThyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 164

.. shrIH ..

7.164. adhyAyaH 164

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

senAdvaye dIpodyoxxxnam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-164-0 (52449) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-164-0x (4708) vartamAne yathA yaddhe ghorarUpe bhayAvahe. tamasA saMvR^ite loke rajasA cha mahIpate.. 7-164-1 (52450) nApashyanta raNe yodhAH parasparamavasthitAH. anumAnena saMj~nAbhiryuddhaM tadvavR^idhe mahat.. 7-164-2 (52451) naranAgAshvamathanaM paramaM romaharShaNam. droNakarNakR^ipA vIrA bhImapArShatasAtyakAH. anyonyaM kShobhayAmAsuH sainyAni nR^ipasattama.. 7-164-3 (52452) vadhyamAnAni sainyAni samantAttairmahArathaiH. tamasA saMvR^ite chaiva samantAdvipradudruvuH.. 7-164-4 (52453) te sarvato vidravanto yodhA vidhvastachetanAH. ahanyanta mahArAja dhAvamAnAshcha saMyuge.. 7-164-5 (52454) mahArathasahasrANi jaghnuranyonyamAhave. anye tamasi mUDhAni putrasya tava mantrite.. 7-164-6 (52455) tataH sarvANi sainyAni senAgopAshcha bhArata. vyamuhyanta raNe tatra tamasA saMvR^ite sati.. 7-164-7 (52456) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-164-8x (4709) teShAM saMloDyamAnAnAM pANDavairvihataujasAm. andhe tamasi magnAnAmAsItkiM vo manastadA.. 7-164-8 (52457) kathaM prakAshasteShAM vA mama sainyasya vA punaH. babhUva loke tamasA tathA sa~njaya saMvR^ite.. 7-164-9 (52458) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-164-10x (4710) tataH sarvANi sainyAni hatashiShTAni yAni vai. senAgoptR^InathAdishya punarvyUhamakalpayat.. 7-164-10 (52459) droNaH purastAjjaghane tu shalya-- stathA drauNiH kR^itavarmA saubalashcha. svayaM tu sarvANi balAni rAja-- nrAjA.abhyayAdgopayanvai nishAyAm.. 7-164-11 (52460) uvAcha sarvAMshcha padAtisa~NghA-- nduryodhanaH pArthivasAntvapUrvam. utsR^ijya sarve paramAyudhAni gR^ihNIta hastairjvalitAnpradIpAn.. 7-164-12 (52461) te choditAH pArthivasattamena tataH prahR^iShTA jagR^ihuH pradIpAn.. 7-164-13 (52462) devarShigandharvasurarShisa~NghA vidyAdharAshchApsarasAM gaNAshcha. nAgAH sayakShoragakinnarAshcha hR^iShTA divisthA jagR^ihuH pradIpAn.. 7-164-14 (52463) digdhairvatebhyashcha samApatanto-- .adR^ishyanta dIpAH sasugandhitailAH. visheShato nAradaparvatAbhyAM sambodhyamAnAH kurupANDavArtham.. 7-164-15 (52464) sA bhUya eva dhvajinI vibhaktA vyarochatAgniprabhayA nishAyAm. mahAdhanairAbharaNaishcha divyaiH shastraishcha dIptairapi sampatadbhiH.. 7-164-16 (52465) ratherathe pa~ncha vidIpakAstu pradIpakAstatra gaje trayashcha. pratyashvamekashcha mahApradIpaH kR^itAstu taiH pANDavaiH kauraveyaiH.. 7-164-17 (52466) kShaNena sarve vihitAH pradIpA vyAdIpayanto dhvajinIM tavAsu.. 7-164-18 (52467) sarvAstu senA vyatisevyamAnAH padAtibhiH pAvakatailahastaiH. prakAshyamAnA dadR^ishurnishAyAM yathAntarikShe jaladAstaDidbhiH.. 7-164-19 (52468) prakAshitAyAM tu tato dhvajinyAM droNo.agnikalpaH pratapansapatnAn. rarAja rAjendara suvarNavarmA madhyaM gataH sUrya ivAMshumAlI.. 7-164-20 (52469) jAmbUnadeShvAbharaNeShu chaiva niShkeShu shuddheShu sharAsaneShu. pIteShu shastreShu cha pAvakasya pratiprabhAstatra tadA babhUvuH.. 7-164-21 (52470) gadAshcha shaikyAH parighAshcha shubhrA ratheShu shaktyashcha vivartamAnAH. pratiprabhArashmibhirAjamIDha punaHpunaH sa~njanayanti dIpAn.. 7-164-22 (52471) ChatrANi vAlavyajanAni kha~NgA dIptA maholkAshcha tathaiva rAjan. vyAghUrNamAnAshcha suvarNamAlA vyAyachChatAM tatra tadA virejuH.. 7-164-23 (52472) shastraprabhAbhishcha virAjamAnaM dIpaprabhAbhishcha tadA balaM tat. prakAshitaM chAbharaNaprabhAbhi-- rbhR^ishaM prakAshaM nR^ipate babhUva.. 7-164-24 (52473) pItAni shastrANyasR^igukShitAni vIrAvadhUtAni tanuchChadAni. dIptAM prabhAM prAjanayanta tatra tapAtyaye vidyudivAntarikShe.. 7-164-25 (52474) prakampitAnAmabhidhAtavegai-- rabhighnatAM chApatatAM javena. vakrANyakAshanta tadA narANAM vAyvIritAnIva mahAmbujAni.. 7-164-26 (52475) mahAvane dArumaye pradIpte yathA prabhA bhAskarasyApi nashyet. tathA tadA.a.asIdvajinI pradIptA mahAbhayA bhArata bhImarUpA.. 7-164-27 (52476) tatsaMpradIptAM balamasmadIyaM nishAmya pArthAstvaritAstathaiva. sarveShu sainyeShu padAtisa~NghA-- nachodayaMste.api chakruH pradIpAn.. 7-164-28 (52477) gajegaje sapta kR^ipAH pradIpA ratherathe chaiva dasha pradIpAH. dvAvashvapR^iShThe paripArshvato.anye dhvajeShu chAnye jaghaneShu chAnye.. 7-164-29 (52478) senAsu sarvAsu cha pArshvato.anye pashchAtpurastAchcha samantatashcha. madhye tathA.anye jvalitAgnihastA vyadIpayanpANDusutasya senAm.. 7-164-30 (52479) madhye tathA.anye jvalitAgnihastAH senAdvaye.api sma narA vicheruH.. 7-164-31 (52480) sarveShu sainyeShu padAtisa~NghA vimishritA hastirathAshvabR^indaiH. vyadIpayaMste dhvajinIM pradIptA-- stathA balaM pANDaveyAbhiguptam.. 7-164-32 (52481) tena pradIptena tathA pradIptaM-- balaM tavAsIdbalavadbalena. bhAH kurvatA bhAnumatA graheNa divAkareNAgnirivAbhiguptaH.. 7-164-33 (52482) tayoH prabhAH pR^ithivImantarikShaM sarvA vyatikramya dishashcha vR^iddhAH. tena prakAshena bhR^ishaM prakAshaM babhUva teShAM tava chaiva sainyam.. 7-164-34 (52483) tena prakAshena divaM gatena sambodhitA devagaNAshcha rAjan. gandharvayakShAsurasiddhasa~NghAH samAgamannapsarasashcha sarvAH.. 7-164-35 (52484) taddevagandharvasamAkulaM cha yakShAsurendrApsarasAM gaNaishcha. hataishcha shUrairdivamAruhadbhi-- rAyodhanaM divyakalpaM babhUva.. 7-164-36 (52485) rathAshvanAgAkuladIpadIptaM saMrabdhayodhaM hatavidrutAshvam. mahadbalaM vyUDharathAshvanAgaM surAsuravyUhasamaM babhUva.. 7-164-37 (52486) tachChaktisa~NghAkulachaNQDavAtaM mahArathAbhraM gajavAjighoSham. shastraugavarShaM rudhirAmbudhAraM nishi pravR^ittaM rathadurdinaM tat.. 7-164-38 (52487) tasminmahAgnipratimo mahAtmA santApaMyanpANDavAnvipramukhyaH. gabhastibhirmadhyagato yathA.arko varShAtyaye tadvadabhUnnarendra.. .. 7-164-39 (52488) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi ghaTotkachavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe chatuHShaShThyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 164 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-164-6 andhe Andhyahetau.. 5-164-8 vo yuShmatsambandhinAM manaH kiM kiMvidham. kAtaraM dhR^iShTaM vetyarthaH.. 5-164-10 tata iti. droNa ityapakR^iyate. teShAM sainyAnAM vyUhamidhyAhR^itya yojyam.. 5-164-14 devarShIti. bhuvi padAtibhirdIpeShu gR^ihIteShu divisthA devA api dIpAn jagR^ihuryuddhotsavaprekShakAH.. 5-164-164 chatuHShaShThyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 165

.. shrIH ..

7.165. adhyAyaH 165

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sa~Nkulayuddham.. 3 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-165-0 (52489) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-165-0x (4711) prakAshite tadA loke rajasA tamasAvR^ite. samAjagmuratho vIrAH parasparavadhaiShiNaH.. 7-165-1 (52490) te sametya raNe rAja~nshastraprAsAsidhAriNaH. parasparamudaikShanta parasparakR^itAgasaH.. 7-165-2 (52491) pradIpAnAM sahasraishcha dIpyamAnaiH samantataH. ratnAchitaiH svarNadaNDairgandhatailAvasi~nchitaiH.. 7-165-3 (52492) devagandharvadIpAdyaiH prabhAbhiradhikojjvalaiH. virarAja tadA bhUmirgrahairdyauriva bhArata.. 7-165-4 (52493) ulkAshataiH prajvalitai raNabhUmirvyarAjata. dahyamAneva lokAnAmabhAve cha vasundharA.. 7-165-5 (52494) vyadIpyanta dishaH sarvAH pradIpaistaiH samantataH. varShApradoShe khadyotairvR^itA vR^ikShA ivAbabhuH.. 7-165-6 (52495) asajjanta tato vIrA vireShveva pR^ithakpR^ithak. nAgA nAgaiH samAjagmusturagA hayasAdibhiH. rathA rathavaraireva samajagmurmudA yutAH.. 7-165-7 (52496) tasminrAtrimukhe ghore tava putrasya shAsanAt. chatura~Ngasya sainyasya sampAtashcha mahAranabhUt.. 7-165-8 (52497) tato.arjuno mahArAja kauravANAmanIkinIm. vyadhamattvarayA yuktaH kShapayansarvapArthivAn.. 7-165-9 (52498) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-165-10x (4712) tasminpraviShTe saMrabdhe mama putrasya vAhinIm. amR^iShyamANe durdharShe kathamAsInmano hi vaH.. 7-165-10 (52499) kimakurvata sainyAni praviShTe paraShIDane. duryodhanashcha kiM kR^ityaM prAptakAlamamanyata.. 7-165-11 (52500) ke chainaM samare vIraM pratyudyayurarindamAH. droNaM cha ke vyarakShanta praviShTe shvetavAhane.. 7-165-12 (52501) ke.arakShandakShiNaM chakraM ke cha droNasya savyataH. ke pR^iShThatashchApyabhavanvIrA vIrAnvinighnataH. ke purastAdagachChanta nighnantaH shAstravAnraNe.. 7-165-13 (52502) yatprAvishanmaheShvAsaH pA~nchAlanAparAjitAH. nR^ityanniva naravyAghro rathamArgeShu vIryavAn.. 7-165-14 (52503) yo dadAha sharairdroNaH pA~nchAlAnAM rathavrajAn. dhUmaketuriva kruddhaH kathaM mR^ityumupeyivAn.. 7-165-15 (52504) avyagrAneva hi parAnkathayasyaparAjitAn. hR^iShTAnudIrNAnsa~NgrAme na tathA sUta mAmakAn.. 7-165-16 (52505) hatAMshchaiva vidIrNAMshcha viprakIrNAMshcha shaMsasi. rathino virathAMshchaiva kR^itAnyudveShu mAmakAn.. 7-165-17 (52506) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-165-18x (4713) droNasya matamAj~nAya yodvukAmasya tAM nishAm. duryodhano mahArAja vashyAnbhrAtR^InuvAcha ha.. 7-165-18 (52507) karNaM cha vR^iShasenaM cha madrarAjaM cha kaurava. durdharShaM dIrghabAhuM cha ye cha teShAM padAnugAH.. 7-165-19 (52508) droNaM yattAH parAkrAntAH sarve rakShantu pR^iShThataH. hArdikyo dakShiNaM chakraM shalyashchaivottaraM tathA.. 7-165-20 (52509) trigartAnAM cha ye shUrA hatashiShTA mahArathAH. tAMshchaiva purataH sarvAnputraste samachodayat.. 7-165-21 (52510) duryodhana uvAcha. 7-165-22x (4714) AchAryo hi susaMyatto bhR^ishaM yattAshcha pANDavAH. taM rakShata susaMyattA nighnantaM shAstravAnraNe.. 7-165-22 (52511) droNo hi balavAnyuddhe kShiprahastaH pratApavAn. nirjayettridashAnyuddhe kimu pArthAnsasomakAn.. 7-165-23 (52512) te yUyaM sahitAH sarve bhR^ishaM yattA mahArathAH. droNaM rakShata pA~nchAlAddhR^iShTadyumnAnmahArathAt.. 7-165-24 (52513) pANQDavIyeShu sainyeShu na taM pashyAma ka~nchana. yo yodhayedraNe droNaM dhR^iShTadyumnAdR^ite pumAn.. 7-165-25 (52514) tasmAtsarvAtmanA manye bhAradvAjasya rakShaNam. suguptaH pANDavAnhanyAtsR^i~njayAMshcha sasomakAn.. 7-165-26 (52515) sR^i~njayeShvatha sarveShu nihateShu chamUmukhe. dhR^iShTadyumnaM rame drauNirhaniShyati na saMshayaH.. 7-165-27 (52516) tathA.arjunaM cha rAdheyo haniShyati mahArathaH. bhImasenamahaM chApi yuddhejeShyAmi dIkShitaH. sheShAMshcha pANDavAnyodhAH prasabhaM hInatejasaH.. 7-165-28 (52517) soyaM mama jayo vyakto dIrghakAlaM bhaviShyati. tasmAdrakShata sa~NgrAme droNameva mahAratham.. 7-165-29 (52518) ityuktvA bharatashreShTha putro duryAdhanastava. vyAdidesha tathA sainyaM tasmiMstamasi dAruNe.. 7-165-30 (52519) tataH pravavR^ite yuddhaM rAtrau bharatasattama. ubhayoH senayorghoraM parasparajigIShayA.. 7-165-31 (52520) arjunaH kauravaM sainyamarjunaM chApi kauravAH. nAnAshastrasamAvAyairanyonyaM samapIDayan.. 7-165-32 (52521) drauNiH pA~nchAlarAjaM cha bhAradvAjashcha sR^i~njayAn. ChAdayAMchakrire sa~Nkhye sharaiH sannataparvabhiH.. 7-165-33 (52522) pANDupA~nchAlasainyAnAM kauravANAM cha bhArata. AsInniShTAnako ghoro nighnatAmitaretaram.. 7-165-34 (52523) naivAsmAbhistathA pUrvairdR^iShTapUrvaM tathAvidham. yuddhaM yAdR^ishamevAsIttAM rAtri subhayAvaham.. .. 7-165-35 (52524) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi ghaTotkachavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe pa~nchaShaShTyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 165 ..
droNaparva - adhyAya 166

.. shrIH ..

7.166. adhyAyaH 166

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

kR^itavarmaNA yudhiShThiraparAjayaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-166-0 (52525) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-166-0x (4715) vartamAne tadA raudre rAtriyuddhe vishAmpate. sarvabhUtakShayakare dharmaputro yudhiShThiraH.. 7-166-1 (52526) abravItpANDavAMshchaiva pA~nchAlAMshchaiva somakAn. abhidravata saMyAta droNameva jighAMsayA.. 7-166-2 (52527) rAj~naste vachanAdrAjanpA~nchAlAH sR^i~njayAstathA. droNamevAbhyavartanta nadanto bhairavAnravAn.. 7-166-3 (52528) tAnvayaM pratigarjantaH pratyudyAtAH sma harShitAH. yathAshakti yathotsAhaM yathAsatvaM cha saMyuge.. 7-166-4 (52529) kR^itavarmA tu hArdikyo yudhiShThiramupAdravat. droNaM prati samAyAntaM matto mattamiva dvipam.. 7-166-5 (52530) shaineyaM sharavarShANi vikirantaM samantataH. abhyayAtkauravo rAjanbhUriH sa~NgrAmamUrdhani.. 7-166-6 (52531) sahadevamathAyAntaM droNaprepsuM mahAratham. karNo vaikartano rAjanvArayAmAsa pANQDavam.. 7-166-7 (52532) bhImasenamathAyAntaM vyAditAsyAmivAntakam. svayaM duryodhano rAjA pratIpaM mR^ityumAvrajat.. 7-166-8 (52533) nakulaM cha yudhAM shreShThaM sarvayuddhavishAradam. shakuniH saubalo rAjanvArayAmAsa satvaraH.. 7-166-9 (52534) shikhaNDinamathAyAntaM rathena rathinAM varam. kR^ipaH shAradvato rAjanvArayAmAsa saMyuge.. 7-166-10 (52535) prativindhyamathAyAntaM mayUrasadR^ishairhayaiH. duHshAsano mahArAja yatto yattamavArayat.. 7-166-11 (52536) bhaimasenimathAyAntaM mAyAshatavishAradam. ashvatthAmA mahArAja rAkShasaM pratyaShedhayat.. 7-166-12 (52537) drupadaM vR^iShasenastu sasainyaM sapadAnugam. vArayAmAsa samare droNaprepsuM mahAratham.. 7-166-13 (52538) virATaM drutamAyAntaM droNasya nidhanaM prati. madrarAjaH susa~Nkruddho vArayAmAsa bhArata.. 7-166-14 (52539) shatAnIkamathAyAntaM nAkuliM rabhasaM raNe. chitraseno rurodhAshu sharairdroNaparIpsayA.. 7-166-15 (52540) arjunaM cha yudhAMshreShThaM prAdravantaM mahAratham. alAyudho mahArAja rAkShasendro nyavArayat.. 7-166-16 (52541) tathA droNaM maheShvAsaM nighnantaM shAtravAnraNe. dhR^iShTadyumno.atha pA~nchAlyo hR^iShTarUpamavArayat.. 7-166-17 (52542) tathA.anyAnpANDuputrANAM samAyAtAnmahArathAn. tAvakA rathino rAjanvArayAmAsurojasA.. 7-166-18 (52543) gajArohA gajaistUrNaM sannipatya mahAmR^idhe. yodhayantaH sma dR^ishyante shatasho.atha sahasrashaH.. 7-166-19 (52544) nishIthe turagA rAjandrAvayantaH parasparam. samadR^ishyanta vegena pakShavanto yathA.adrayaH.. 7-166-20 (52545) sAdinaH sAdibhiH sArdhaM prAsashaktyR^iShTipANayaH. samAgachChanmahArAja vinadantaH pR^ithakpR^ithak.. 7-166-21 (52546) narAstu bahavastatra samAjagmuH parasparam. gAdAbhirmusalaishchaiva nAnAshastraishcha saMyuge.. 7-166-22 (52547) kR^itavarmA tu hArdikyo dharmaputraM yudhiShThiram. vArayAmAsa sa~Nkruddho velevodvR^ittamarNavam.. 7-166-23 (52548) yudhiShThirastu hArdikyaM vidvvA pa~nchabhirAshugaiH. punarvivyAdha viMshatyA tiShThatiShTheti chAbravIt.. 7-166-24 (52549) kR^itavarmA tu sa~Nkruddho dharmaputrasya mAriSha. dhanushchichCheda bhallena taM cha vivyAdha saptabhiH.. 7-166-25 (52550) athAnyaddhanurAdAya dharmaputro mahArathaH. hArdikyaM dashabhirbANairbAhvorurasi chArpayat.. 7-166-26 (52551) mAdhavastu raNe viddho dharmaputreNa mAriSha. prAkampata cha roSheNa saptabhishchArdayachCharaiH.. 7-166-27 (52552) tasya pArtho dhanushChittvA hastAvApaM nikR^itya cha. prAhiNonnishitAnbANAnpa~ncha rAja~nChilAshitAn.. 7-166-28 (52553) te tasya kavachaM bhittvA hemachitraM mahAdhanam. prAvishandharaNIM bhittvA valmIkamiva pannagAH.. 7-166-29 (52554) akShNornimeShamAtreNa so.anyadAdAya kArmukam. vivyAdha pANDavaM ShaShTyA sUtaM cha navabhiH sharaiH.. 7-166-30 (52555) tasya shaktimameyAtmA pANDavo bhujagopamAm. chikShepa bharashreShTha rathe nyasya mahaddhanuH.. 7-166-31 (52556) sA hemachitrA mahatI pANDaveyena preritA. nirbhidya dakShiNaM bAhuM prAvishaddharaNItalam.. 7-166-32 (52557) etasminneva kAle tu gR^ihya pArthaH punardhanuH. hArdikyaM ChAdayAmAsa sharaiH sannataparvabhiH.. 7-166-33 (52558) tatastu samare shUro vR^iShNInAM pravaro rathI. vyashchasUtarathaM chakre nimeShArdhAdyudhiShThiram.. 7-166-34 (52559) tatastu pANDavo jyeShThaH kha~NgaM charma samAdade. tadasya nishitairbANairvyadhamanmAdhavo raNe.. 7-166-35 (52560) tomaraM tu tato gR^ihya svarNadaNDaM durAsadam. praiShayatsamare tUrNaM hArdikyasya yudhiShThiraH.. 7-166-36 (52561) tamApatantaM sahasA dharmarAjabhujachyutam. dvidhA chichCheda hArdikyaH kR^itahastaH smayanniva.. 7-166-37 (52562) tataH sharashatenAjau dharmaputramavAkirat. kavachaM chAsya sa~NkruddhaH sharaistIkShNairadArayat.. 7-166-38 (52563) hArdikyasharasa~nChannaM kavachaM tanmahAdhanam. vyashIryata raNe rAjaMstArAjAlamivAmbarAt.. 7-166-39 (52564) sa chChinnadhanvA virathaH shIrNavarmA sharArditaH. apAyAsIdraNAttUrNaM dharmaputro yudhiShThiraH.. 7-166-40 (52565) kR^itavarmA tu nirjitya dharmAtmAnaM yudhiShThiram. punardroNasya jugupe chakrameva mahAtmanaH.. .. 7-166-41 (52566) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi ghaTotkachavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe ShaTShaShTyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 166 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-166-12 bhaimaseniM ghaTotkacham.. 5-166-27 mAdhavaH kR^itavarmA.. 5-166-166 ShaTShaShThyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 167

.. shrIH ..

7.167. adhyAyaH 167

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sAtyakinA bhUrinAmno rAj~no vadhaH.. 1 .. drauNinA ghaTotkachaparAjayaH.. 2 .. bhImena duryodhanaparAbhavaH.. 3 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-167-0 (52567) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-167-0x (4716) bhUristu samare rAja~nshaineyaM rathinAM varam. ApatantamapAsedhatprayANAdiva ku~njaram.. 7-167-1 (52568) athainaM sAtyakiH kruddhaH pa~nchabhirnishitaiH sharaiH. vivyAdha hR^idaye tasya prAsravattasya shoNitam.. 7-167-2 (52569) tathaiva kauravo yuddhe shaineyaM yuddhadurmadam. dashibhirnishitaistIkShNairavidhyata bhujAntare.. 7-167-3 (52570) tAvanyonyaM mahArAja tatakShAte sharairbhR^isham. krodhasaMraktanayanau krodhAdviShphArya kArmuke.. 7-167-4 (52571) tayorAsInmahArAja shastravR^iShTiH sudAruNA. kruddhayoH sAyakamuchoryamAntakanikAshayoH.. 7-167-5 (52572) tAvanyonyaM sharaiH rAjansa~nChAdya samavasthitau. muhUrtaM chaiva tadyuddhaM samarUpamivAbhAvat.. 7-167-6 (52573) tataH kruddho mahArAja shaineyaH prahasanniva. dhanushchichCheda samare kauravyasya mahAtmanaH.. 7-167-7 (52574) athainaM ChinnadhanvAnaM navabhirnishitaiH sharaiH. vivyAdha hR^idaye tUrNaM tiShThatiShTheti chAbravIt.. 7-167-8 (52575) so.atividdho balavatA shatruNA shatrutApanaH. dhanuranyatsamAdAya sAtvataM pratyavidhyata.. 7-167-9 (52576) sa viddhvA sAtvataM bANaistribhireva vishAmpate. dhanushchichCheda bhallena sutIkShNena hasanniva.. 7-167-10 (52577) ChinnadhanvA mahArAja sAtyakiH krodhamUrchChitaH. prajahAra mahAvegAM shaktiM tasya mahorasi.. 7-167-11 (52578) sa tu shaktyA vibhinnA~Ngo nipapAta rathottamAt. lohitA~Nga ivAkAshAddIptarashmiryadR^ichChayA.. 7-167-12 (52579) taM tu dR^iShTvA hataM shUramashvatthAmA mahArathaH. abhyadhAvata vegena shaineyaM prati saMyuge.. 7-167-13 (52580) tiShThatiShTheti chAbhAShya shaineyaM sa narAdhipa. abhyavarShachCharaugheNa meruM vR^iShTyA yathAmbudaH.. 7-167-14 (52581) tamApatantaM saMrabdhaM shaineyasya rathaM prati. ghaTotkacho.abravIdrAjannAhaM muktvA mahArathaH.. 7-167-15 (52582) tiShThatiShTha na me jIvandroNaputra gamiShyasi. eSha tvAM nihaniShyAmi mahiShaM mR^igarADiva.. 7-167-16 (52583) yuddhashraddhAmahaM te.adya vineShyAmi raNAjire. ityuktvA krodhatAmrAkSho rAkShasaH paravIrahA. droNimabhyadravatkruddho gajendramiva kesarI.. 7-167-17 (52584) rathAkShamAtrairiShubhirabhyavarShaddhaTotkachaH. rathinAmR^iShabhaM drauNiM dhArAbhiriva toyadaH.. 7-167-18 (52585) sharavR^iShTiM tu tAM prAptAM sharairAshIviShopamaiH. shAtayAmAsa samare tarasA drauNirutsmayan.. 7-167-19 (52586) tataH sharashataistIkShNairmarmabhedibhirAshugaiH. samAchinodrAkShasendraM ghaTotkachamarindamam.. 7-167-20 (52587) sa sharairAchitastena rAkShaso raNamUrdhani. vyakAshata mahArAja shvAvichChalalato yathA.. 7-167-21 (52588) tataH krodhasamAviShTo bhaimaseniH pratApavAn. sharairavachakartograirdrauNiM vajrAshaniprabhaiH.. 7-167-22 (52589) kShuraprairardhachandraishcha nArAchaiH sashilImukhaiH. varAhakarNairnAlIkairvikarNaishchAbhyavIvR^iShat.. 7-167-23 (52590) tAM shastravR^iShTimatulAM vajrAshanisamasvanAm. patantImupari kruddho drauNiravyathitendriyaH.. 7-167-24 (52591) suduHsahAM sharairghorairdivyAstrapratimantritaiH. vyadhamatsumahAtejA mahAbhrANIva mArutaH.. 7-167-25 (52592) tato.antarikShe bANAnAM sa~NgrAmo.anya ivAbhavat. ghorarUpo mahArAja yodhAnAM harShavardhanaH.. 7-167-26 (52593) tato.astrasandharShakR^itairvisphuli~NgaiH samantataH. vamau nishAmukhe vyoma khadyotairiva saMvR^itam.. 7-167-27 (52594) sa mArgaNagaNairdrauNirdishaH prachChAdya sarvataH. priyArthaM tava putrANAM rAkShasaM samavAkirat.. 7-167-28 (52595) tataH pravavR^ite yuddhaM drauNirAkShasayormR^idhe. vigADhe rajanImadhye shakraprahlAdayoriva.. 7-167-29 (52596) tato ghaTotkacho bANairdashabhirdrauNimAhave. jaghAnorasi sa~NkruddhaH kAlajvalanasannibhaiH.. 7-167-30 (52597) sa tairabhyAyatairviddho rAkShasena mahAbalaH. chachAla samare drauNirvAtanunna iva drumaH.. 7-167-31 (52598) sa mohaM samare prApto dhvajayaShTiM samAshritaH.. 7-167-32 (52599) tato hAhAkR^itaM sainyaM tava sarvaM janAdhipa. hataM sma menire sarve droNasUnuM janAdhipAH.. 7-167-33 (52600) taM tu dR^iShTvA tathAvasthamashvatthAmAnamAhave. pA~nchAlAH sR^i~njayAshchaiva siMhanAdaM prachakrire.. 7-167-34 (52601) pratilabhya tataH saMj~nAmashvatthAmA mahAbalaH. dhanuH prapIDya vAmena kareNAmitrakarshanaH.. 7-167-35 (52602) mumochAkarNapUrNena dhanuShA sharamuttamam. yamadaNQDopamaM ghoramuddishyAshu ghaTotkacham.. 7-167-36 (52603) sa bhittvA hR^idayaM tasya rAkShasasya sharottamaH. vivesha vasudhAmugraH sapu~NkhaH pR^ithivIpate.. 7-167-37 (52604) so.atividdho mahArAja rathopastha upAvishat. rAkShasendraH pubalavAndrauNinA raNashAlinA.. 7-167-38 (52605) dR^iShTvA vimUDhaM haiDimbaM sArathistu raNAjirAt. drauNeH sakAshAtsambhrAntastvapaninyetvarAnvitaH.. 7-167-39 (52606) tathA tu samare viddhvA rAkShasendraM ghaTotkacham. nanAda sumahAnAdaM droNaputro mahArathaH.. 7-167-40 (52607) pUjitastava putraishcha sarvayodhaishcha bhArata. vapuShA.atiprajajvAla madhyAhna iva bhAskaraH.. 7-167-41 (52608) bhImasenaM tu yudhyantaM bhAradvAjarathaM prati. svayaM duryodhano rAjA pratyavidhyachChitaiH sharaiH.. 7-167-42 (52609) taM bhImaseno dashabhiH sharairvivyAdha mAriSha. duryodhano.api viMshatyA sharANAM pratyavidhyata.. 7-167-43 (52610) tau sAyakairavachChinnAvadR^ishyetAM raNAjire. meghajAlasamAchChannau nabhasIvendubhAskarau.. 7-167-44 (52611) atha duryodhano rAjA bhImaM vivyAdha patribhiH. pa~nchabhirbharatashreShTha tiShThatiShTheti chAbravIt.. 7-167-45 (52612) tasya bhImo dhanushChittvA dhvajaM cha dashabhiH sharaiH. vivyAdha kauravashreShThaM navatyA nataparvaNAm.. 7-167-46 (52613) tato duryodhanaH kruddho bhanuranyanmahattaram. gR^ihItvA bharatashreShTho bhImasenaM shitaiH sharaiH. apIDayadraNamukhe pashyatAM sarvadhanvinAm.. 7-167-47 (52614) tAnnihatya sharAnbhImo duryodhanadhanushchyutAn. kauravaM pa~nchaviMshatyA kShudrakANAM samArpayat.. 7-167-48 (52615) duryodhanastu sa~Nkruddho bhImasenasya mAriSha. kShurapreNa dhanushChittvA dashabhiH pratyavidhyata.. 7-167-49 (52616) athAnyaddhanurAdAya bhImaseno mahAbalaH. vivyAdha nR^ipatiM tUrNaM saptabhirnishitaiH sharaiH.. 7-167-50 (52617) tadapyasya dhanuH kShipraM chichCheda laghuhastavat. dvitIyaM cha tR^itIyaM cha chaturthaM pa~nchamaM tathA.. 7-167-51 (52618) AttamAttaM mahArAja bhImasya dhanurAchChinat. tava putro mahArAja jitakAshI madotkaTaH.. 7-167-52 (52619) sa tathA bhidyamAneShu kArmukeShu punaH punaH. shaktiM chikShepa samare sarvapArashavIM shubhAm.. 7-167-53 (52620) mR^ityoriva svasAraM hi dIptAM vahnishikhAmiva. sImantamiva kurvantIM nabhaso.agnisamaprabhAm.. 7-167-54 (52621) aprAptAmeva tAM shaktiM tridhA chichCheda kauravaH. pashyataH sarvalokasya bhImasya cha mahAtmanaH.. 7-167-55 (52622) tato bhImo mahArAja gadAM gurvIM mahAprabhAm. chikShepAvidhya vegena duryodhanarathaM prati.. 7-167-56 (52623) tataH sA sahasA vAhAMstava putrasya saMyuge. sArathiM cha gadA gurvI mamardAsya rathaM punaH.. 7-167-57 (52624) putrastu tava rAjendra bhImAdbhItaH praNashya cha. Aruroha rathaM chAnyaM nandakasya mahAtmanaH.. 7-167-58 (52625) tato bhImo hataM matvA tava putraM mahAratham. siMhanAdaM mahachchakre tarjayannishi kauravAn.. 7-167-59 (52626) tAvakAH sainikAshchApi menire nihataM nR^ipam. tato.atichukrushuH sarve te hAheti samantataH.. 7-167-60 (52627) teShAM tu ninadaM shrutvA trastAnAM sarvayodhinAm. bhImasenasya nAdaM cha shrutvA rAjanmahAtmanaH.. 7-167-61 (52628) tato yudhiShThiro rAjA hataM matvA suyodhanam. abhyavartata vegena yatra pArtho vR^ikodaraH.. 7-167-62 (52629) pA~nchalAH kekayA mAtsyAH sR^i~njayAshcha vishAmpate. sarvodyogenAbhijagmudroNameva yuyutsayA.. 7-167-63 (52630) tatrAsItsumahadyuddhaM droNasyAtha paraiH saha. ghore tamasi magnAnAM nighnatAmitaretaram.. .. 7-167-64 (52631) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi ghaTotkachavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe saptaShaShTyadhika shatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 167 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-167-1 prayANAdyAnasthAnAt. pravaNAditi pAThe pravaNaM prakR^iShTaM vanaM jalam.. 5-167-2 tasya sAtyakeH. tasya tasmAddhR^idayAt.. 5-167-12 lohitA~NgaH kujaH. yadR^ichChayA daivenetyabhUtopamA.. 5-167-16 mahiShamasuram. mahiShaM ShaNmukho yathA iti gha.~Na.jha.pAThaH.. 5-167-21 shvAvichChalyakaH. shalalataH shalalIbhiH.. 5-167-58 praNashya nilIno bhUtvA.. 5-167-167 saptaShaShTyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 167 ..
droNaparva - adhyAya 168

.. shrIH ..

7.168. adhyAyaH 168

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

karNena sahadevasya parAjayapUrvakamavahelanam.. 1 .. shalyena virATaparAjayaH.. 2 .. arjunenAlAyudhaparAjayaH.. 3 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text
