7-168-0 (52632) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-168-0x (4717) sahadevamathAyAntaM droNapreptuM vishAmpate. karNo vaikartano yuddhe vArayAmAsa bhArata.. 7-168-1 (52633) sahadevastu rAdheyaM viddhvA navabhirAshugaiH. punarvivyAdha dashabhirvishikhairnataparvabhiH.. 7-168-2 (52634) taM karNaH prativivyAdha shatena nataparvaNAm. sajyaM chAsya dhanuH shIghraM chichCheda laghuhastavat.. 7-168-3 (52635) tato.anyaddhanurAdAya mAdrIputraH pratApavAna. karNaM vivyAdha viMshatyA tadadbhutamivAbhavat.. 7-168-4 (52636) tasya karNo hayAnhatvA sharaiH sannataparvabhiH. sArathiM chAsya bhallena drutaM ninye yamakShayam.. 7-168-5 (52637) virathaH sahadevastu kha~NgaM charma samAdade. tadapyasya sharaiH karNo vyadhamatprahasanniva.. 7-168-6 (52638) atha gurvIM mahAghorAM hemachitrAM mahAgadAm. preShayAmAsa sa~Nkruddho vaikartanarathaM prati.. 7-168-7 (52639) tAmApatantIM sahasA sahadevaprachoditAm. vyaShTambhayachCharaiH karNo bhUmau chainAmapAtayat.. 7-168-8 (52640) gadAM vinihatAM dR^iShTvA sahadevastvarAnvitaH. shaktiM chikShepa karNAya tAmapyasyAchChinachCharaiH.. 7-168-9 (52641) sasambhramaM tatastUrNamavaplutya rathottamAt. sahadevo mahArAja dR^iShTvA karNaM vyavasthitam.. 7-168-10 (52642) rathachakraM pragR^ihyAjau mumochAdhirathaM prati. tadApatadvai sahasA kAlachakramivodyatam. sharairanekasAhasrairAchChinatsUtanandanaH.. 7-168-11 (52643) tasmiMstu nihate chakre sUtajena mahAtmanA. IShAdaNDakayokrAMshcha yugAni vividhAni cha.. 7-168-12 (52644) hastya~NgAni tathAshvAMshcha mR^itAMshcha puruShAnbahUn. chikShepa karNamuddishya karNastAnvyadhamachCharaiH.. 7-168-13 (52645) sa nirAyudhamAtmAnaM j~nAtvA mAdravatIsutaH. vAryamANastu vishikhaiH sahadevo raNaM jahau.. 7-168-14 (52646) tamabhidrutya rAdheyo muhUrtAdbharatarShabha. abravItprahasanvAkyaM sahadevaM vishAmpate.. 7-168-15 (52647) mA yudhyasva raNe.adhIra vishiShTai rathibhiH saha. 7-168-16 (52648) sadR^ishairyudhya mAdreya vacho me mA visha~NkithAH.. athainaM dhanuShogreNa tudanbhUyo.abravIdvachaH.. 7-168-17 (52649) eSho.arjuno raNe tUrNaM yudhyate kurubhiH saha. tatra gachChasva mAdreya gR^ihaM vA yadi manyase.. 7-168-18 (52650) evamuktvA tu taM karNo rathena rathinAM varaH. prAyAtpA~nchAlapANDUnAM sainyAni pradahanniva.. 7-168-19 (52651) vadhaM prAptaM tu mAdreyaM nAvadhItsamare.arihA. kuntyAHsmR^itvA vacho rAjansatyasandho mahAyashAH.. 7-168-20 (52652) sahadevastato rAjanvimanAH sharapIDitaH. karNavAksharataptashcha jIvitAnniravidyata.. 7-168-21 (52653) Aruroha rathaM chApi pA~nchAlyasya mahAtmanaH. janamejayasya samare tvarAyukto mahArathaH.. 7-168-22 (52654) virATaM sahasenaM tu droNArthe drutamAgatam. madrarAjaH sharaugheNa chChAdayAmAsa dhanvinam.. 7-168-23 (52655) tayoH samabhavadyuddhaM samare dR^iDhadhanvinoH. yAdR^ishaM hyabhavadrAja~njambhavAsavayoH purA.. 7-168-24 (52656) madrarAjo mahArAja virATaM vAhinIpatim. Ajaghne tvaritastUrNaM shatena nataparvaNAm.. 7-168-25 (52657) prativivyAdha taM rAjannavabhirnishitai sharaiH. punashchainaM trisaptatyA bhUyashchaiva shatena tu.. 7-168-26 (52658) tasya madrAdhipo hatvA chaturo rathavAjinaH. sUtaM dhvajaM cha samare sharAbhyAM sannyapAtayat.. 7-168-27 (52659) hatAshvAttuM rathAttUrNamavaplutya mahArathaH. tasthau viShphArayaMshchApaM vimu~nchaMshcha shitA~nCharAn.. 7-168-28 (52660) shatAnIkastato dR^iShTvA bhrAtaraM hatavAhanam. rathenAbhyapatattUrNaM sarvalokasya pashyataH.. 7-168-29 (52661) shatAnIkamathAyAntaM madrArAjo mahAmR^idhe. vishikhairbahubhirviddhvA tato ninye yamakShayam.. 7-168-30 (52662) tasmiMstu nihate vIre virATo rathasattamaH. Aruroha rathaM tUrNaM tameva dhvajamAlinam.. 7-168-31 (52663) tato viShphArya nayane krodhAddviguNavikramaH. madrarAjarathaM tUrNaM ChAdayAmAsa patribhiH.. 7-168-32 (52664) tato madrAdhipaH kruddhaH shareNAnataparvaNA. AjaghAnorasi dR^iDhaM virATaM vAhinIpatim.. 7-168-33 (52665) so.atividdho mahArAja rathopastha upAvishat. kashmalaM chAvishattIvraM virATo bharatarShabha. sArathistamapovAha samare sharavikShatam.. 7-168-34 (52666) tataH sA mahatI senA prAdravannishi bhArata. vadhyamAnA sharashataiH shalyenAhavashobhinA.. 7-168-35 (52667) tAM dR^iShTvA vidrutAM senAM vAsudevadhana~njayau. prayAtau tatra rAjendra yatra shalyo vyavasthitaH.. 7-168-36 (52668) tau tu pratyudyayau rAjanrAkShasendro hyalAyudhaH. aShTachakrasamAyuktamAsthAya pravaraM ratham.. 7-168-37 (52669) tura~NgamamukhairyuktaM pishAchairghoradarshanaiH. lohitArdrapatAkaM taM raktamAlyavibhUShitam. kArShNAyasamayaM ghoramR^ikShacharmasamAvR^itam.. 7-168-38 (52670) raudreNa chitrapakSheNa vivR^itAkSheNa kUjatA. dhvajenochChritadaNDena gR^idhrarAjena rAjatA. sa babhau rAkShaso rAjanbhinnA~njanachayopamaH.. 7-168-39 (52671) rurodhArjunamAyAntaM prabha~njanamivAdrirAT. kiranbANagaNAnrAja~nshatasho.arjunamUrdhani.. 7-168-40 (52672) atitIvraM mahAdyuddhaM nararAkShasayostadA. draShTR^INAM prItijananaM sarveShAM tatra bhArata. gR^idhrakAkabalolUkaka~NkagomAyuharShaNam.. 7-168-41 (52673) tamarjunaH shatenaiva patriNAM samatADayat. navabhishcha shitairbANairdhvajaM chichCheda bhArata.. 7-168-42 (52674) sArathiM cha tribhirbANaistribhireva triveNukam. dhanurekena chichCheda chaturbhishchaturo hayAn.. 7-168-43 (52675) punaH sajyaM kR^itaM chApaM tadapyasya dvidhA.achChinat. virathasyodyataM kha~NgaM shareNAsya dvidhA.akarot.. 7-168-44 (52676) athainaM nishitairbANaishchaturbhirbharatarShabha. pArtho.avidhyadrAkShasendraM sa vidvaH prAdravadbhayAt.. 7-168-45 (52677) taM vijityArjunastUrNaM droNAntikamupAyayau. kirQa~nsharagaNAnrAjannaravAraNavAjiShu.. 7-168-46 (52678) vadhyamAnA mahArAja pANDavena yashasvinA. sainikA nyapatannurvyAM vAtanunnA iva drumAH.. 7-168-47 (52679) teShu tUtsAdyamAneShu phalgunena mahAtmanA. samprAdravadbalaM sarvaM putrANAM te vishAmpate.. .. 7-168-48 (52680) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi ghaTotkachavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe aShTaShaShTyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 168 ..
droNaparva - adhyAya 169

.. shrIH ..

7.169. adhyAyaH 169

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sa~Nkulayuddham.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-169-0 (52681) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-169-0x (4718) shatAnIkaM sharaistUrNaM nirdahantaM chamUM tava. chitrasenastava suto vArayAmAsa bhArata.. 7-169-1 (52682) nAkulishchitrasenaM tu viddhvA pa~nchabhirAshugaiH. sa tu taM prativivyAdha dashabhirnishitaiH sharaiH.. 7-169-2 (52683) chitraseno mahArAja shatAnIkaM punaryudhi. navabhirnishitairbANairAjaghAna stanAntare.. 7-169-3 (52684) nAkulistasya vishikhairvarma sannataparvabhiH. gAtrAtsa~nchAvayAmAsa tadadbhutamivAbhavat.. 7-169-4 (52685) sopetavarmA putraste virarAja bhR^ishaM nR^ipa. utsR^ijya kAle rAjendra nirmokamiva pannagaH.. 7-169-5 (52686) tato.asya nishitairbANairdhvajaM chichCheda nAkuliH. dhanushchaiva mahArAja yatamAnasya saMyuge.. 7-169-6 (52687) sa chChinnadhanvA samare vivarmA cha mahArathaH. dhanuranyanmahArAja jagrAhArividAraNam.. 7-169-7 (52688) tatastUrNaM chitraseno nAkuliM navabhiH sharaiH. vivyAdha samare kruddho bharatAnAM mahArathaH.. 7-169-8 (52689) shatAnIko.atha sa~Nkruddhashchitrasenasya mAriSha. jaghAna chaturo vAhAnsArathiM cha narottamaH.. 7-169-9 (52690) avaplutya rathAttasmAchchitraseno mahArathaH. nAkuliM pa~nchaviMshatyA sharANAmArdayadbalI.. 7-169-10 (52691) tasya tatkurvataH karma nakulasya suto raNe. ardhachandreNa chichCheda chApaM ratnavibhUShitam.. 7-169-11 (52692) sa chChinnadhanvA viratho hatAshvo hatasArathiH. Aruroha rathaM tUrNaM hArdikyasya mahAtmanaH.. 7-169-12 (52693) drupadaM tu sahAnIkaM droNaprepsuM mahAratham. vR^iShaseno.abhyayAttUrNaM kira~nsharashataistadA.. 7-169-13 (52694) yaj~nasenastu samare karNaputraM mahAratham. ShaShTyA sharANAM vivyAdha bAhvorurasi chAnagha.. 7-169-14 (52695) vR^iShasenastu sa~Nkruddho yaj~nasenaM rathe sthitam. bahubhiH sAyakaistIkShNairAjaghAna stanAntare.. 7-169-15 (52696) tAvubhau sharanunnA~Ngau sharakaNTakitau raNe. vyabhrAjetAM mahArAja shvAvidhau shalalairiva.. 7-169-16 (52697) rukmapu~NkhaiH prasannAgraiH sharaishChinnatanuchChadau. rudhiraughapariklinnau vyabhrAjetAM mahAmR^idhe.. 7-169-17 (52698) tapanIyanibhau chitrau kalpavR^ikShAvivAdbhutau. kiMshukAviva chotphullau vyakAshetAM raNAjire.. 7-169-18 (52699) vR^iShasenastato rAjandrupadaM navabhiH sharaiH. viddhvA vivyAdha saptatyA punaranyaistribhistribhiH.. 7-169-19 (52700) tataH sharasahasrANi vimu~nchanvibabhau tadA. karNaputro mahArAja varShamANa ivAmbudaH.. 7-169-20 (52701) [drupadastu tataH kruddho vR^iShasenasya kArmukam. dvidhA chichCheda bhallena pItena nishitena cha.. 7-169-21 (52702) so.anyatkArmukamAdAya rukmabaddhaM navaM dR^iDham. tUNAdAkR^iShya vimalaM bhallaM pItaM shitaM dR^iDham.. 7-169-22 (52703) kArmuke yojayitvA taM drupadaM sannirIkShya cha. AkarNapUrNaM mumuche trAsayansarvasomakAn.. 7-169-23 (52704) hR^idayaM tasya bhittvA cha jagAma vasudhAtalam. kashmalaM prAvishadrAjA vR^iShasenasharAhataH.. 7-169-24 (52705) sArathistamapovAha smaransArathicheShTitam. tasminprabhagne rAjendra pA~nchAlAnAM mahArathe..] 7-169-25 (52706) tatastu drupadAnIkaM sharaishChinnatanuchChadam. samprAdravadraNAdrAjannishIthe bhairave sati.. 7-169-26 (52707) pradIpairaparityaktairjvaladbhistaiH samantataH. vyarAjadvasudhA tatra vItAbhrA dyauriva grahaiH.. 7-169-27 (52708) tathA~NgadairnipatitairvyarAjata vasundharA. prAvR^iTkAle mahArAja vidyudbhiriva toyadaH.. 7-169-28 (52709) tataH karNasutAttrastAH somakA vipradudruvuH. yathendrabhayavitrastA dAnavAstArakAmaye.. 7-169-29 (52710) tenArdyamAnAH samare dravamANAshcha somakAH. vyarAjanta mahArAja pradIpairavabhAsitAH.. 7-169-30 (52711) tAMstu nirjitya samare karNaputro vyarochata. madhyandinamanuprApto gharmAMshuriva bhArata.. 7-169-31 (52712) teShu rAjasahasreShu tAvakeShu pareShu cha. eka eva jvalaMstasthau vR^iShasenaH pratApavAn... 7-169-32 (52713) sa vijitya raNe shUrAnsomakAnAM mahArathAn. jagAma tvaritastatra yatra rAjA yudhiShThiraH.. 7-169-33 (52714) prativindhyamatha kruddhaM pradahantaM raNe ripUn. duHshAsanastava sutaH pratyagachChanmahArathaH.. 7-169-34 (52715) tayoH samAgamo rAjaMshchitrarUpo babhUva ha. vyapetajalade vyomni budhabhAskarayoriva.. 7-169-35 (52716) prativindhyaM tu samare kurvANAM karma duShkaram. `apUjayanmahArAja tava sainye mahArathAH'. duHshAsanastribhirbANairlalATe samavidhyata.. 7-169-36 (52717) so.atividdho balavatA tava putreNa dhanvinA. virarAja mahAbAhuH sashR^i~Nga iva parvataH.. 7-169-37 (52718) duHshAsanaM tu samare prativindhyo mahArathaH. navabhiH sAyakairviddhA punarvivyAdha saptabhiH.. 7-169-38 (52719) tatra bhArata putraste kR^itavAnkarma duShkaram. prativindhyahayAnugraiH pAtayAmAsa sAyakaiH.. 7-169-39 (52720) sArathiM chAsya bhallena dhvajaM cha samapAtayat. rathaM cha tilasho rAjanvyadhamattasya dhanvinaH.. 7-169-40 (52721) patAkAshcha satUNIrA rashmInyokrANi cha prabho. chichCheda tilashaH kruddhaHsharaiH sannataparvabhiH.. 7-169-41 (52722) virathaH sa tu dharmAtmA dhanuShpANiravasthitaH. ayodhayattava sutaM kira~nsharashatAnbahUn.. 7-169-42 (52723) kShurapreNa dhanustasya chichCheda tanayastava. athainaM dashabhirbANeshChinnadhanvAnamArdayat.. 7-169-43 (52724) taM dR^iShTvA virathaM tatra bhrAtaro.asya mahArathAH. anvavartanta sa~NgrAme mahatyA senayA saha.. 7-169-44 (52725) AplutaH sa tato yAnaM sutasomasya bhAsvaram. dhanurgR^ihya mahArAja vivyAdha tanayaM tava.. 7-169-45 (52726) tatastu tAvakAH sarve parivArya sutaM tava. abhyavartanta vegena mahatyA senayA vR^itAH.. 7-169-46 (52727) tataH pravavR^ite yuddhaM tava teShAM cha bhArata. nishIthe dAruNe kAle yamarAShTravivardhanam.. .. 7-169-47 (52728) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi ghaTotkachavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe ekonasaptatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 169 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-169-1 kuNDalitAH pa~ncha shlokAH gha.~Na.jha.pustakeShveva santi..
droNaparva - adhyAya 170

.. shrIH ..

7.170. adhyAyaH 170

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

nakulakR^ipAbhyAM shakunishikhaNDiparAjayaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-170-0 (52729) sa~nchaya uvAcha. 7-170-0x (4719) nakulaM rabhasaM yuddhe nighnantaM vAhinIM tava. abhyayAtsaubalaH kruddhastiShThatiShTheti chAbravIt.. 7-170-1 (52730) kR^itavairau tu tau vIrAvanyonyavadhakA~NkShiNau. sharaiH pUrNAyatotsR^iShTairanyonyamabhijaghnatuH.. 7-170-2 (52731) yathaiva nakulo rAja~nsharavarShANyamu~nchata. tathaiva saubalashchApi shikShAM sandarshayanyudhi.. 7-170-3 (52732) tAvubhau samare shUrau sharakaNTakinau tadA. vyarAjetAM mahArAja shvAvidhau shalalairiva.. 7-170-4 (52733) rukmapu~NkhairajihmAgraiH sharaishChinnatanuchChadau. rudhiraughapariklinnau vyabhrAjetAM mahAmR^idhe.. 7-170-5 (52734) tapanIyanibhau chitro kalpavR^ikShAviva drumau. kiMshukAviva chotphullau prakAshete raNAjire.. 7-170-6 (52735) tAvubhau samare shUrau sharakaNTakinau tadA. vyarAjetAM mahArAnkaNTakairiva shAlmalI.. 7-170-7 (52736) sujihmaM prekShamANau cha rAjanvivR^italochanau. krodhasaMraktanayanau nirdahantau parasparam.. 7-170-8 (52737) shyAlastu tava sa~Nkruddho mAdrIputraM hasanniva. karNinaikena vivyAdha hR^idaye nishitena ha.. 7-170-9 (52738) nakulastu bhR^ishaM vidvaH shyAlena tava dhanvinA. niShasAda rathopasthe kashmalaM chAvishanmahat.. 7-170-10 (52739) atyantavairiNAM dR^iptaM dR^iShTvA shatruM tathA.a.agatam. nanAda shakunI rAjaMstapAnte jalado yathA.. 7-170-11 (52740) pratilabhya tataH saMj~nAM nakulaH pANDunandanaH. abhyayAtsaubalaM bhUyo vyAttAnana ivAntakaH.. 7-170-12 (52741) sa~NkruddhaH shakuniM ShaShTyA vivyAdha bharatarShabha. punashchainaM shatenaiva nArAchAnAM stanAntare.. 7-170-13 (52742) athAsya sasharaM chApaM mR^iShTideshe.achChinattadA. dhvajaM cha tvaritaM ChittvA rathAdbhUmAvapAtayat.. 7-170-14 (52743) vishikhena cha tIkShNena pItena nishitena cha. UrU nirbhidya chaikena nakulaH pANDunandanaH. shyenaM sapakShaM vyAdhena pAtayAmAsa taM tadA.. 7-170-15 (52744) so.atividdho mahArAja rathopastha upAvishat. dhvajayaShTiM pariklishya kAmukaH kAminIM yathA.. 7-170-16 (52745) taM visaMj~naM nipatitaM dR^iShTvA shyAlaM tavAnagha. apovAha rathenAshu sArathirdhvajinImukhAt.. 7-170-17 (52746) tataH sa~nchukrushuH pArthA ye cha teShAM padAnugAH.. 7-170-18 (52747) nirjitya cha raNe shatruM nakulaH shatrutApanaH. abravItsArathiM kruddho droNAnIkAyaM mAM vaha.. 7-170-19 (52748) tasya tadvachanaM shrutvA mAdrIputrasya sArathiH. prAyAttena tadA rAjanyatra droNo vyavasthitaH.. 7-170-20 (52749) shikhaNDinaM tu samare droNaprepsuM vishAmpate. kR^ipaH shAradvato yattaH pratyagachChatsa vegitaH.. 7-170-21 (52750) gautamaM drutamAyAntaM droNAnIkamarindamam. vivyAdha navabhirbhallaiH shikhaNDI prahasanniva.. 7-170-22 (52751) tamAchAryo mahArAja viddhA pa~nchabhirAshugaiH.. punarvivyAdha viMshatyA putrANAM priyakR^ittava.. 7-170-23 (52752) mahadyuddhaM tayorAsIddhorarUpaM bhayAnakam.. yathA devAsure yuddhe shambarAmararAjayoH.. 7-170-24 (52753) sharajAlAvR^itaM vyoma chakratustau mahArathau. meghAviva tapApAye vIrau samaradurmadau. prakR^ityA ghorarUpaM tadAsIddhorataraM punaH.. 7-170-25 (52754) rAtrishcha bharatashreShTha yodhAnAM yuddhashAlinAm. kAlarAtrinibhA hyAsIddhorarUpA bhayAnakA.. 7-170-26 (52755) shikhaNDI tu mahArAja gautamasya mahaddhanuH. ardhachandreNa chichCheda sajyaM savishikhaM tadA.. 7-170-27 (52756) tasya kruddhaH kR^ipo rAja~nshaktiM chikShepa dAruNAm. svarNadaNDAmakuNThAgrAM karmAraparimArjitAm.. 7-170-28 (52757) tAmApatantIM chichCheda shikhaNDI bahubhiH sharaiH. sApatanmedinIM kR^ittA bhAsayantI mahAprabhA.. 7-170-29 (52758) athAnyaddhanurAdAya gautamo rathinAM vAraH. prAchChAdayachChitairbANairmahArAja shikhaNDinam.. 7-170-30 (52759) sa chChAdyamAnaH samare gautamena yashasvinA. nyaShIdata rathopasthe shikhaNDI rathinAM varaH.. 7-170-31 (52760) sIdantaM chainamAlokya kR^ipaH shAradvato yudhi. Ajaghne bahubhirbANairjighAMsanniva bhArata.. 7-170-32 (52761) vimukhaM tu raNe dR^iShTvA yAj~naseniM mahAratham. pA~nchAlAH somakAshchaiva parivavruH samantataH.. 7-170-33 (52762) tathaiva tava putrAshcha parivavrurdvijottamam. mahatyA senayA sArdhaM tato yuddhamavartata.. 7-170-34 (52763) rathAnAM cha raNe rAjannanyonyamabhidhAvatAm. babhUva tumulaH shabdo meghAnAM garjatAmiva.. 7-170-35 (52764) dravatAM sAdinAM chaiva gajAnAM cha vishAmpate. anyonyamabhito rAjankrUramAyodhanaM babhau.. 7-170-36 (52765) pattInAM dravatAM chaiva pAdashabdena medinI. akampata mahArAja bhayatrasteva chA~NganA.. 7-170-37 (52766) rathino rathamAruhya pradrutA vegavattaram. agR^ihNanbahavo rAja~nshalabhAnvAyasA iva.. 7-170-38 (52767) tathA gajAnprabhinnAMshcha samprabhinnA mahAgajAH. tasminneva pade yattA nigR^ihNanti sma bhArata.. 7-170-39 (52768) sAdI sAdinamAsAdya pattayashcha padAtinam. samAsAdya raNe.anyonyaM saMrabdhA nAtichakramuH.. 7-170-40 (52769) dhAvatAM dravatAM chaiva punarAvartatAmapi. babhUva tatra sainyAnAM shabdaH suvipulo nishi.. 7-170-41 (52770) dIpyamAnAH pradIpAshcha rathavAraNavAjiShu. adR^ishyanta mahArAja maholkA iva khAchchyutAH.. 7-170-42 (52771) sA nishA bharatashreShTha pradIpairavabhAsitA. divasapratimA rAjanbabhUva raNamUrdhani.. 7-170-43 (52772) Adityena yathA vyAptaM tamo loke praNashyati. tathA naShTaM tamo ghoraM dIpairdIptairitastataH.. 7-170-44 (52773) divaM cha pR^ithivIM chaiva dishashcha pradishastathA. rajasA tamasA vyAptA dyotitAH prabhayA punaH.. 7-170-45 (52774) astrANAM kavachanAnAM cha maNInAM cha mahAtmanAm. antardadhuH prabhAH sarvA dIpaistairavabhAsitAH.. 7-170-46 (52775) tasminkolAhale yuddhe vartamAne nishAmukhe. na ki~nchidvidurAtmAnamayamasmIti bhArata.. 7-170-47 (52776) avadhItsamare putraM pitA bharatasattama. putrashcha pitaraM mohAtsakhAyaM cha sakhA tathA. svasrIyaM mAtulashchApi svasrIyashchApi mAtulam.. 7-170-48 (52777) sve svAnpare parAMshchApi nijaghnuritaretaram. nirmaryAdamabhUdyuddhaM rAtrau bhIrubhayAnakam.. .. 7-170-49 (52778) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi ghaTotkachavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe saptatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 170 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-169-15 UrU iti. maNDalaM charataH shakunerdvAvUrU ekenaiva bANena bibheda yathA khe shyenAM pakShAbhyAM sahitaM vAmadakShiNagAminaM pAtayedevamiti luptopamA. vyAdhena bANena. vidhyatyaneneti vyAdho bANaH.. 5-170-16 pariklishya kleshena dhvajayaShTiM shrita iti sheShaH.. 5-170-38 pradutA rathino vegavattaraM rathamAruhya tatpatimagR^ihNan.. 5-170-170 saptatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 171

.. shrIH ..

7.171. adhyAyaH 171

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

droNadhR^iShTadyumnAdInAM sa~Nkulayuddham.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-171-0 (52779) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-171-0x (4720) tasminsutumule yuddhe vartamAne bhayAvahe. dhR^iShTadyumno mahArAja droNamevAbhyavartata.. 7-171-1 (52780) sandadhAno dhanuHshreShThaM jyAM vikurShanpunaH punaH. abhyadravata droNasya rathaM rukmavibhUShitam.. 7-171-2 (52781) dhR^iShTadyumnamathAyAntaM droNasyAntachikIrShayA. parivavrurmahArAja pA~nchAlAH pANDavaiH saha.. 7-171-3 (52782) tathA parivR^itaM dR^iShTvA droNamAchAryasattamam. putrAste sarvato yattA rarakShurdroNamAhave.. 7-171-4 (52783) balArNavau tatastau tu sameyAtAM nishAmukhe. gAtoddhUtau kShubdhasatvau bhairavau sAgarAviva.. 7-171-5 (52784) tato droNaM mahArAja pA~nchAlyaH pa~nchabhiH sharaiH. vivyAdha hR^idaye tUrNaM siMhanAdaM nanAda cha.. 7-171-6 (52785) taM droNaH pa~nchaviMshatyA viddhA bhArata saMyuge. chichChedAnyena bhallena dhanurasya mahAsvanam.. 7-171-7 (52786) dhR^iShTadyumnastu nirviddho droNena bharatarShabha. utsasarja dhanustUrNaM sandashya dashanachChadam.. 7-171-8 (52787) tataH kruddho mahArAja dhR^iShTadyumnaH pratApavAn. Adade.anyaddhanuHshreShThaM droNasyAntachikIrShayA.. 7-171-9 (52788) vikR^iShya cha dhanushchitramAkarNAtparavIrahA. droNasyAnatkaraM ghoraM vyasR^ijatsAyakaM tataH.. 7-171-10 (52789) sa visR^iShTo balavatA sharo ghoro mahAmR^idhe. bhAsayAmAsa tatsainyaM divAkara ivoditaH.. 7-171-11 (52790) taM tu dR^iShTvA sharaM ghoraM devagandharvamAnavAH. svastyastu samare rAjandroNAyetyabruvanvachaH.. 7-171-12 (52791) taM tu sAyakamAyAntamAchAryasya rathaM prati. karNo dvAdashadhaA rAjaMshchichCheda kR^itahastavat.. 7-171-13 (52792) sa chChinno bahudhA rAjansUtaputreNa dhanvinA. nipapAta sharastUrNaM nirviSho bhujago yathA.. 7-171-14 (52793) `ChittvA tu samare bANaM sharaiH sannataparvabhiH'. dhR^iShTadyumnaM tataH karNo vivyAdha dashabhiH sharaiH.. 7-171-15 (52794) pa~nchabhirdroNaputrastu svayaM droNastu saptabhiH. shalyashcha dashabhirbANaistribhirduHshAsanastathA.. 7-171-16 (52795) duryodhanastu viMshatyA shakunishchApi pa~nchabhiH. pA~nchAlyaM tvarayA.avidhyansarva eva mahArathAH.. 7-171-17 (52796) sa viddhaH saptabhirghorairdroNasyArthe mahAhave. sarvAnasambhramAdrAja pratyaviddhyattribhistribhiH. droNaM drauNiM cha karNaM cha vivyAdha cha tavAtmajam.. 7-171-18 (52797) te bhinnA dhanvinA tena dhR^iShTadyumnaM punarmR^idhe. vivyadhuH pa~nchabhistUrNamekaiko rathinAM varaH.. 7-171-19 (52798) drumasenastu sa~Nkruddho rAjanvivyAdha patriNA. tribhishchAnyaiH sharaistUrNaM tiShTha tiShTheti chAbravIt.. 7-171-20 (52799) sa tu taM prativivyAdha tribhistIkShNairajihmagaiH. svarNapu~NkhaiH shilAdhautaiH prANAntakaramairyudhi.. 7-171-21 (52800) bhallenAnyena tu punaH suvarNojjvalakuNDalam. nichakarta shiraH kAyAddrumasenasya vIryavAn.. 7-171-22 (52801) tachChiro nyapatadbhUmau sandaShTauShThapuTaM raNe. mahAvAtasamuddhUtaM pakvaM tAlaphalaM yathA.. 7-171-23 (52802) tAnsa viddhA punaryodhAnvIraH sunishitaiH sharaiH. rAdheyasyAchChinadbhallaiH kArmukaM chitrayodhinaH.. 7-171-24 (52803) na tu tanmamR^iShe karNo dhanuShashChedanaM tathA. nikartanamivAtyugraM lA~NgUlasya mahAhariH.. 7-171-25 (52804) so.anyaddhanuH samAdAya krodharaktekShaNaH shvasan. abhyadravachCharaughaistaM dhR^iShTadyumnaM mahAbalam.. 7-171-26 (52805) dR^iShTvA karNaM tu saMrabdhaM te vIrAH ShaDratharShabhAH. pA~nchAlyaputraM tvaritAH parivavrurjighAMsayA.. 7-171-27 (52806) ShaNNAM yodhapravIrANAM tAvakAnAM puraskR^itam. mR^ityorAsyamanuprAptaM dhR^iShTadyumnamamamaMsmahi.. 7-171-28 (52807) patasminneva kAle tu dAshArho vikira~nCharAn. dhR^iShTadyumnaM parAkrAntaM sAtyakiH pratyapadyata.. 7-171-29 (52808) tamAyAntaM maheShvAsaM sAtyakiM yuddhadurmadam. rAdheyo dashabhirbANaiH pratyavidhyadajihmagaiH.. 7-171-30 (52809) taM sAtyakirmahArAja vivyAdha dashabhiH sharaiH. pashyatAM sarvavIrANAM mA gAstiShTheti chAbravIt.. 7-171-31 (52810) sa sAtyakestu balinaH karNasya cha mahAtmanaH. AsItsamAgamo rAjanbalivAsavayoriva.. 7-171-32 (52811) trAsayanrathaghoSheNa kShatriyAnkShatriyarShabhaH. rAjIvalochanaM karNaM sAtyakiH pratyavidhyata.. 7-171-33 (52812) kampayanniva ghoSheNa dhanuSho vasudhAM balI. sUtaputro mahArAja sAtyakiM pratyayodhayat.. 7-171-34 (52813) vipAThakarNinArAchairvatsadantaiH kShurairapi. karNaH sharashataishchApi shaineyaM pratyanidvyata.. 7-171-35 (52814) tathaiva yudhyamAno.api vR^iShNInAM pravaro yudhi. abhyavarShachCharaiH karNaM tadyuddhamabhavatsamam.. 7-171-36 (52815) tAvakAshcha mahArAja karNaputrashcha daMshitaH. sAtyakiM vivyadhustUrNa samantAnnishitaiH sharaiH.. 7-171-37 (52816) astrairastrANi saMvArya teShAM karNasya vA vibho. avidvyatsAtyakiH kruddho vR^iShasenaM stanAntare.. 7-171-38 (52817) tena bANena nirviddho vR^iShaseno vishAmpate. nyapatatsa rathe mUDho dhanurutsR^ijya vIryavAn.. 7-171-39 (52818) tataH karNo hataM matvA vR^iShasenaM mahAratham. putrashokAbhisantaptaH sAtyakiM pratyapIDayat.. 7-171-40 (52819) pIDyamAnastu karNena yuyudhAno mahArathaH. vivyAdha bahubhiH karNaM tvaramANaH punaHpunaH.. 7-171-41 (52820) sa karNaM dashabhirviddhvA vR^iShasenaM cha saptabhiH. sa hastAvApadhanuShI tayoshchichCheda sAtvataH.. 7-171-42 (52821) tAvanye dhanuShI sajje kR^itvA shatrubhaya~Nkare.. yuyudhAnamAvidhyetAM samantAnnishitaiH sharaiH.. 7-171-43 (52822) vartamAne tu sa~Ngrame tasminvIravarakShaye. atIva shushruve rAjangANDIvasya mahAsvanaH.. 7-171-44 (52823) shrutvA tu rathanirghoShaM gANDIvasya cha niHsvanam. sUtaputro.abravIdrAjanduryodhanamidaM vachaH.. 7-171-45 (52824) eSha sarvAM chamUM hatvA mukhyAMshchaiva nararShabhAn. pauravAMshcha maheShvAso vikShipannuttamaM dhanuH.. 7-171-46 (52825) pArtho vijayate tatra gANDIvaninado mahAn. shrUyate rathaghoShashcha vAsavasyeva nardataH.. 7-171-47 (52826) karoti pANDavo vyaktaM karmaupayikamAtmanaH. eShA vidAryate rAjanbahudhA bhAratI chamUH.. 7-171-48 (52827) viprakIrNAnyanIkAni na hi tiShThanti karhichit. vAteneva samuddhUtamabhrajAlaM vidIryate.. 7-171-49 (52828) savyasAchinamAsAdya bhinnA nauriva sAgare.. 7-171-50 (52829) dravatAM yodhamukhyAnAM gANDIvapreShitaiH sharaiH. viddhAnAM shatasho rAja~nshrUyate niHsvano mahAn.. 7-171-51 (52830) shR^iNu dundubhinirghoShamarjunasya rathaM prati. nishIthe rAjashArdUla stanayitnorivAmbare.. 7-171-52 (52831) hAhAkAraravAMshchaiva siMhanAdAMshcha puShkalAn. shR^iNu shabdAnbahuvidhAnarjunasya rathaM prati.. 7-171-53 (52832) ayaM madhye sthito.asmAkaM sAtyakiH sAtvatAM varaH. iha chellabhyate lakShyaM kR^itsnA~njeShyAmahe parAn.. 7-171-54 (52833) eSha pA~nchAlarAjasya putro droNena sa~NgataH. sarvataH saMvR^ito yodhaiH shUraishcha rathasattamaiH.. 7-171-55 (52834) sAtyakiM yadi hanyAma dhR^iShTadyumnaM cha pArShatam. asaMshayaM mahArAja dhruvo no vijayo bhavet.. 7-171-56 (52835) saubhadravadimau vIrau parivArya mahArathau. prayatAyo mahArAja nihantuM vR^iShNipArShatau.. 7-171-57 (52836) savyasAchI puro.abhyeti droNAnIkAya bhArata. saMsaktaM sAtyakiM j~nAtvA bahubhiH kurupu~NgavaiH.. 7-171-58 (52837) tatra gachChantu bahavaH pravarA rathasattamAH. yAvatpArtho na jAnAti sAtyakiM bahubhirvR^itam.. 7-171-59 (52838) te tvaradhvaM tathA shUrAH sharANAM mokShaNe bhR^isham. yathA tviha vrajatyeSha paralokAya mAdhavaH. tathA kuru mahArAja sunItyA suprayuktayA.. 7-171-60 (52839) karNasya matamAsthAya putraste prAha saubalam. yathendraH samare rAjanprAha viShNuM yashasvinam.. 7-171-61 (52840) vR^itaH sahasrairdashabhirgajAnAmanivartinAm. rathaishcha dashasAhasraistUrNaM yAhi dhana~njayam. 7-171-62 (52841) duHshAsano durviShahaH subAhurduH pradharShaNaH. ete tvAmanuyAsyanti pattibhirbahubhirvR^itAH.. 7-171-63 (52842) jahi kR^iShNau mahAbAho dharmarAjaM cha mAtula. nakulaM sahadevaM cha bhImasenaM tathaiva cha.. 7-171-64 (52843) devAnAmiva devendre jayAshA tvayi me sthitA. jahi mAtula kaunteyAnasurAniva pAvakiH.. 7-171-65 (52844) evamukto yayau pArthAnputreNa tava saubalaH. mahatyA senayA sArdhaM saha putraishcha te vibho.. 7-171-66 (52845) priyArthaM tava putrANAM didhakShuH pANDunandanAn. tataH pravavR^ite yuddhaM tAvakAnAM paraiH saha.. 7-171-67 (52846) prayAte saubale rAjanpANDavAnAmanIkinIm. balena mahatA yuktAH sUtaputrastu sAtvatam.. 7-171-68 (52847) abhyayAttvarito yuddhe kira~nsharashatAnbahUn. tathaiva pArthivAH sarve sAtyakiM paryavArayan.. 7-171-69 (52848) bhAradvAjastato gatvA dhR^iShTadyumnarathaM prati. mahadyuddhaM tadAsIttuM droNasya nishi bhArata. dhR^iShTadyumnena vIreNa pA~nchAlaishcha sahAdbhutam.. .. 7-171-70 (52849) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi ghaTotkachavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe ekasaptatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 171 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-171-20 dyumatsena iti pAThAntaram.. 5-171-25 hariH siMhaH.. 5-171-27 ShaDratharShabhAH duryodhanaduHshasAsanadroNakarNashalyashakunayaH.. 5-171-48 aupayikaM yuktam.. 5-171-54 iha sAtyakirUpaM lakShyaM labhyatechet. ayaM vashIkriyatechedityarthaH.. 5-171-60 mAdhavo madhuvaMshajaH sAtyakiH.. 5-171-65 pAvikaH skandaH.. 5-171-171 ekasaptatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 172

.. shrIH ..

7.172. adhyAyaH 172

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sa~Nkulayuddham.. 1 .. dhR^iShTadyumnAdInAM harShAtsiMhanAdaH.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-172-0 (52850) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-172-0x (4721) tataste prAdravansarve tvaritA yuddhadurmadAH. amR^iShyamANAH saMrabdhA yuyudhAnarathaM prati.. 7-172-1 (52851) te rathaiH kalpitai rAjanhemarUpyavibhUShitaiH. sAdibhishcha gajaishchaiva parivavruH samantataH.. 7-172-2 (52852) athainaM koShThakIkR^itya sarvataste mahArathAH. siMhanAdAMstatashchakrustarjayanti sma sAtyakim.. 7-172-3 (52853) te.abhyavarSha~nCharaistIkShNaiH sAtyakiM satyavikramam. tvaramANA mahAvIrA mAdhavasya vadhaiShiNaH.. 7-172-4 (52854) tAndR^iShTvA patatastUrNaM shaineyaH paravIrahA. pratyagR^ihNAnmahAbAhuH pramu~nchanvishikhAnbahUn.. 7-172-5 (52855) tatra vIro maheShvAsaH sAtyakiryuddhadurmadaH. nichakarta shirAMsyugraiH sharaiH sannataparvabhiH.. 7-172-6 (52856) hastihastAnhayagrIvA bAhUnapi cha sAyudhAn. kShurapraiH shAtayAmAsa tAvakAnAM sa mAdhavaH.. 7-172-7 (52857) patitaishchAmaraishchaiva shvetachChatraishcha bhArata. babhUva dharaNI pUrNA nakShatrairdyauriva prabho.. 7-172-8 (52858) eteShAM yuyudhAnena yudhyatAM yudhi bhArata. babhUva tumulaH shabdaH pretAnAM krandatAmiva.. 7-172-9 (52859) tena shabdena mahatA pUritA.abhUdvasundharA. rAtriH samabhavachchaiva tIvrarUpA bhayAvahA.. 7-172-10 (52860) dIryamANaM balaM dR^iShTvA yuyudhAnasharAhatam. shrutvA cha vipulaM nAdaM nishIthe romaharShaNe.. 7-172-11 (52861) sutastavAbravIdrAjansArathiMrathinAM varaH. yatraiSha shabdastatrAshvAMshchodayeti punaHpunaH.. 7-172-12 (52862) tena sa~nchodyamAnastu tatastAMsturagottamAn. sUtaH sa~nchodayAmAsa yuyudhAnarathaM prati.. 7-172-13 (52863) tato duryodhanaH kruddho dR^iDhadhanvA jitaklamaH. shIghrahastashchitrayodhI yuyudhAnamupAdravat.. 7-172-14 (52864) tataH pUrNAyatotsR^iShTaiH sharaiH shoNitabhojanaiH. duryodhanaM dvAdashabhirmAdhavaH pratyavidhyata.. 7-172-15 (52865) duryodhanastena tathA pUrvamevArditaH sharaiH. shaineyaM dashabhirbANaiH pratyavidhyadamarShitaH.. 7-172-16 (52866) tataH samabhavadyuddhaM tumulaM bharatarShabha. pA~nchAlAnAM cha sarveShAM bharatAnAM cha dAruNam.. 7-172-17 (52867) shaineyastu raNe kruddhastava putraM mahAratham. sAyakAnAmashItyA tu vivyAdhorasi bhArata.. 7-172-18 (52868) tato.asya vAhAnsamare sharairninye yamakShayam. sArathiM cha rathAttUrNaM pAtayAmAsa patriNA.. 7-172-19 (52869) hatAshve tu rathe.atiShThanputrastava vishAmpate. mumocha nishitAnbANA~nshaineyasya rathaM prati.. 7-172-20 (52870) sharAnpa~nChasatAMstasmai shaineyaH kR^itahastavat. chichCheda samare rAjanpreShitAMstanayena te.. 7-172-21 (52871) athApareNa bhallena muShTideshe mahaddhanuH. chichCheda tarasA yuddhe tava putrasya mAdhava.. 7-172-22 (52872) viratho vidhanuShkashcha sarvalokeshvaraH prabhuH. Aruroha rathaM tUrNaM bhAsvaraM kR^itavarmaNaH.. 7-172-23 (52873) duryodhane parAvR^itte shaineyastava vAhinIm. drAvayAmAsa vishikhairnishAmadhye vishAmpate.. 7-172-24 (52874) shakunishchArjunaM rAjanparivArya samantataH. rathairanekasAhasrairgajaishchApi sahasrashaH. tathA hayasahasraishcha nAnAshastrairavAkirat.. 7-172-25 (52875) te mahAstrANi sarvANi vikiranto.arjunaM prati. arjunaM yodhayanti sma kShatriyAH kAlachoditAH.. 7-172-26 (52876) tAnyarjunaH sahasrANi rathavAraNavAjinAm. pratyavArayadAyastaH prakurvanvipulaM kShayam.. 7-172-27 (52877) tatastu samare shUraH shakuniH saubalastadA. vivyAdha nishitairbANairarjunaM prahasanniva.. 7-172-28 (52878) punashchaiva shatenAsya saMrurodha mahAratham.. 7-172-29 (52879) tamarjunastu viMshatyA vivyAdha yudhi bhArata. athetarAnmaheShvAsAMstribhistribhiravidhyata.. 7-172-30 (52880) nivArya tAnbANagaNairyudhi rAjandhana~njayaH. jaghAna tAvakAnyodhAnvajrapANirivAsurAn.. 7-172-31 (52881) bhujaishChinnairmahIpAla hastihastopamairmR^idhe. samAkIrNA mahI bhAti pa~nchAsyairiva pannagaiH.. 7-172-32 (52882) shirobhiH sakirITaishcha sunasaishchArukuNDalaiH. sandaShTauShThapuTaiH kruddhaistathaivodvR^ittalochanaiH.. 7-172-33 (52883) niShkachUDAmaNidharaiH kShatriyANAM piyaMvadaiH. pa~Nkajairiva vinyastaiH parvatairvibabhau mahI.. 7-172-34 (52884) kR^itvA tatkarma bIbhatsurugramugraparAkramaH. vivyAdha shakuniM bhUyaH pa~nchabhirnataparvabhiH.. 7-172-35 (52885) atADayadulUkaM cha tribhireva tathA sharaiH. ulUkaM punarAjaghne tribhireva mahAyashAH.. 7-172-36 (52886) sa tu tena samAviddha krodhAddviguNavikramaH. sharairanekasAhasraiH so.arjunaM pratyavidhyata.. 7-172-37 (52887) tamulUkastathA viddhA vAsudevamatADayat. nanAda cha mahAnAdaM pUrayanniva medinIm.. 7-172-38 (52888) arjunaH shakuneshchApaM sAyakairachChinadraNe. ninye cha chaturo vAhAnyamasya sadanaM prati.. 7-172-39 (52889) tato rathAdavaplutya saubalo bharatarShabha. ulUkasya rathaM tUrNamAruroha vishAmpate.. 7-172-40 (52890) tAvekarathamArUDhau pitAputrau mahArathau. pArthaM siShichaturbANairgiriM meghAvivAmbubhiH.. 7-172-41 (52891) tau tu viddhA mahArAja pANDavo nishitaiH sharaiH. vidrAvayaMstava chamUM shatasho vyadhamachCharaiH.. 7-172-42 (52892) anilena yathA.abhrANi vichChinnAni samantataH. vichChinnAni tathA rAjanbalAnyAsanvishAmpate.. 7-172-43 (52893) tadbalaM bharatashcheShTha vadhyamAnaM tadA nishi. pradudrAva dishaH sarvA vIkShamANaM bhayArditam.. 7-172-44 (52894) utsR^ijya vAhAnsamare chodayantastathA.apare. sambhrAntAH paryadhAvanta tasmiMstamasi dAruNe.. 7-172-45 (52895) vijitya samare yodhAMstAvakAnbharatarShabha. dadhmaturmuditau sha~Nkhau vAsudevadhana~njayau.. 7-172-46 (52896) dhR^iShTadyumno mahArAja droNaM viddhA tribhiH sharaiH. chichCheda dhanuShastUrNaM jyAM shareNa shitena ha.. 7-172-47 (52897) tannidhAya dhanurbhUmau droNaH kShatriyamardanaH. Adade.anyaddhanuH shUro vegavatsAravattaram.. 7-172-48 (52898) dhR^iShTadyumnaM tato droNo viddhA saptabhirAshugaiH. sArathiM pa~nchabhirbANai rAjanvivyAdha saMyuge.. 7-172-49 (52899) taM nivArya sharaistUrNaM dhR^iShTadyumno mahArathaH. vyadhamatkauravIM senAmAsurIM maghavAniva.. 7-172-50 (52900) vadhyamAne bale tasmiMstava putrasya mAriSha. prAvartata nadI ghorAM shoNitaughatara~NgiNI.. 7-172-51 (52901) ubhayoH senayormadhye narAdhadvipavAhinI. tathA vaitaraNI rAjanyatarAjupuraM prati.. 7-172-52 (52902) drAvayitvA tu tatsainyaM dhR^iShTadyumnaH pratApavAn. abhyarAjata tejasvI shakro devagaNeShviva.. 7-172-53 (52903) atha dadhmurmahAsha~NkhAndhR^iShTadyumnashikhaNDinau. yamau cha yuyudhAnashcha pANDakya vR^ikodaraH.. 7-172-54 (52904) jitvA rathasahasrANi tAvakAnAM mahArathAH. siMhanAdaravAMshchakruH pANQDavA jitakAshinaH.. 7-172-55 (52905) pashyatastava putrasya karNasya cha raNotkaTAH. tathA droNasya shUrasya drauNeshchaiva vishAmpate.. .. 7-172-56 (52906) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi ghaTotkachavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe dvisaptatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 172 ..
droNaparva - adhyAya 173

.. shrIH ..

7.173. adhyAyaH 173

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

droNakarNayoH sAtyakidhR^iShTadyumnAkShyAM yuddham.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-173-0 (52907) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-173-0x (4722) vidrutaM svabalaM dR^iShTvA vadhyamAnaM mahAtmabhiH. krodhena mahatA.aviShTaH putrastava vishAmpate.. 7-173-1 (52908) abhyetya sahasA karNaM droNaM cha jayatAM varam. amarShavashamApanno vAkyaj~no vAkyamabravIt.. 7-173-2 (52909) bhavaddhbhAmiha sa~NgrAmaH kruddhAbhyAM sampravartitaH. Ahave nihataM dR^iShTvA saindhavaM savyasAchinA.. 7-173-3 (52910) nihanyamAnAM pANQDUnAM balena mama vAhinIm. bhUtvA tadvijaye shaktAvashaktAviva pashyataH.. 7-173-4 (52911) yadyahaM bhavatostyAjyo na vAchyo.asmi tadaiva hi. AvAM pANDusutAnsa~Nkhye jeShyAva iti mAnadau.. 7-173-5 (52912) tadaivAhaM vachaH shrutvA bhavaddhyAmanusampatam. nAkariShyamidaM pArthairvairaM yodhavinAshanam.. 7-173-6 (52913) yadi nAhaM parityAjyo bhavadbhyAM puruSharShabhau.. yudhyatAmanurUpeNa vikrameNa suvikramau.. 7-173-7 (52914) vAkpratodena tau vIrau praNunnau tanayena te. prAvartayetAM sa~NgrAmaM ghaTTitAviva pannagau.. 7-173-8 (52915) tatastau rathinAM shreShThau sarvalokadhanurdharau. shaineyapramukhAnpArthAnabhidudruvat raNe.. 7-173-9 (52916) tathaiva sahitAH pArthAH sarvasainyena saMvR^itAH. abhyavartanta tau vIrau nardamAnau muhurmuhuH.. 7-173-10 (52917) atha droNo maheShvAso dashabhiH shinipu~Ngavam. avidhyattvaritaM kruddhaH sarvashastrabhR^itAM varaH.. 7-173-11 (52918) karNashcha dashabhirbANaiH putrashcha tava saptabhiH. dashabhirvR^iShasenashcha saubalashchApi saptabhiH. ete kaurava sa~Nkrande shaineyaM paryavAkiran.. 7-173-12 (52919) dR^iShTvA cha samare droNaM nighnantaM pANDavIM chamUm. vivyadhuH somakAstUrNaM samantAchCharavR^iShTibhiH.. 7-173-13 (52920) tatra droNo.aharatprANAnkShatriyANAM vishAmpate. rashmibhirbhAskaro rAjaMstamAMsIva samantataH.. 7-173-14 (52921) droNena vadhyamAnAnAM pA~nchAlAnAM vishAmpate. shushruve tumulaH shabdaH kroshatAmitaretaram.. 7-173-15 (52922) putrAnanye pitR^Inanye bhrAtR^Inanye cha mAtulAn. bhAgineyAnvayasyAMshcha tathA sambandhibAndhavAn. utsR^ijyotsR^ijya gachChanti tvaritA jIvitepsavaH.. 7-173-16 (52923) apare mohitA mohAttamevAbhimukhA yayuH. pANDavAnAM raNe yodhAH paralokaM gatAH pare.. 7-173-17 (52924) sA tathA pANQvI senA pIDyamAnA mahAtmanA. nishi samprAdravadrAjannutsR^ijyolkAH sahasrashaH.. 7-173-18 (52925) pashyato bhImasenasya vijayasyAchyutasya cha. yayamordharmaputrasya pArShatasya cha pashyataH.. 7-173-19 (52926) tamasA saMvR^ite loke na prAj~nAyata ki~nchana. kauravANAM prakAshena dR^ishyante vidrutAH pare.. 7-173-20 (52927) dravamANaM tu tatsainyaM droNakarNau mahArathau. jaghnatuH pR^iShThato rAjankirantau sAyakAnbahUn.. 7-173-21 (52928) pA~nchAleShu prabhagneShu kShIyamANeShu sarvataH. janArdano dInamAnAH pratyabhAShata phalgunam.. 7-173-22 (52929) droNakarNau maheShvAsAvetau pArShatasAtyakI. pA~nchAlAMshchaiva sahitau jaghnatuH sAyakairbhR^isham.. 7-173-23 (52930) etayoH sharavarSheNa prabhagnA no mahArathAH. vAryamANApi kaunteya pR^itanA nAvatiShThate.. 7-173-24 (52931) tAM tu vidravatIM dR^iShTvA UchatuH keshavArjunau. mA vidravata vitrastA bhayaM tyajata pANDavAH.. 7-173-25 (52932) tAvAvAM sarvasainyaishcha vyUhaiH samyagudAyudhaiH. droNaM cha sUtaputraM cha prayatAvaH prabAdhitum.. 7-173-26 (52933) etau hi balinau shUrau kR^itAstrau jitakAshinau. upekShitau balaM tUrNaM nAshayetAM nishAmimAm.. 7-173-27 (52934) sa~njaya uvAcha. tayoH saMvadatorevaM bhImakarmA mahAbalaH. 7-173-28 (52935) AyAdvR^ikodaraH shIghraM punarAvartya vAhinIm.. vR^ikodaramathAyAntaM dR^iShTvA tatra janArdanaH. 7-173-29 (52936) punarevAbravIdrAjanharShayanniva pANDavam.. eSha bhImo raNashlAghI vR^itaH somakapANDavaiH. 7-173-30 (52937) abhyavartata vegena droNakarNau mahArathau.. etena sahito yuddhya pA~nchAlaishcha mahArathaiH. 7-173-31 (52938) AshvAsanArthaM sainyAnAM sarveShAM pANQDunandana.. tatastau puruShavyAghrAvubhau mAdhavapANDavau. 7-173-32 (52939) droNakarNau samAsAdya dhiShThitau raNamUrdhani.. 7-173-33 (52940) sa~njaya uvAcha. tatastatpunarAvR^ittaM yudhiShThirabalaM mahat. tato droNashcha karNashcha parAnmamR^idaturyudhi.. 7-173-33x (4723) sa samprahArastumulo nishi pratyabhavanmahAn. yathA sAgarayo rAjaMshchandrodayaviruddhayoH.. 7-173-34 (52941) tata utsR^ijya pANibhyAM pradIpAMstava vAhinI. yuyudhe pANDavaiH sArdhamunmattavadasa~NkulA.. 7-173-35 (52942) rajasA tamasA chaiva saMvR^ite bhR^ishadAruNe. kevalaM nAmagotreNa prAyudhyanta jayaiShiNaH.. 7-173-36 (52943) ashrUyanta hi nAmAni shrAvyamANAni pArthivaiH. praharadbhirmahArAja svayaMvara ivAhave.. 7-173-37 (52944) niHshabdamAsItsahasA punaH shabdo mahAnabhUt. kruddhAnAM yudhyamAnAnAM jIyatAM jayatAmapi.. 7-173-38 (52945) yatrayatra sma dR^ishyante pradIpAH kurusattama. tatratatra sma shUrAste nipatanti pata~Ngavat.. 7-173-39 (52946) tathA saMyudhyamAnAnAM vigADhA.a.asInmahAnishA. pANDavAnAM cha rAjendra kauravANAM cha sarvashaH.. .. 7-173-40 (52947) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi ghaTotkachavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe trisaptatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 173 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-173-8 ghaTTitau marditau.. 5-173-12 sa~Nkrande yuddhe.. 5-173-23 sAtyakI iti dvitIyAntam.. 5-173-173 trisaptatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 174

.. shrIH ..

7.174. adhyAyaH 174

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

karNaM yuyutsorarjunasya kR^iShNena sahetukathanaM tena yuddhaniShedhaH.. 1 .. kR^iShNArjunachodanayA ghaTotkachasya karNena saha raNArambhaH.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-174-0 (52948) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-174-0x (4724) tataH karNo raNe dR^iShTvA pArShataM paravIrahA. AjaghAnarosi sharairdashabhirmarmabhedibhiH.. 7-174-1 (52949) prativivyAdha taM tUrNaM dhR^iShTadyumnopi mAriSha. dashabhiH sAyakairhR^iShTastiShThatiShTheti chAbravIt.. 7-174-2 (52950) tAvanyonyaM sharaiH sa~Nkhye sa~nChAdya sumahArathaiH. punaH pUrNAyatotsR^iShTairvivyadhAte parasparam.. 7-174-3 (52951) tataH pA~nchAlamukhyasya dhR^iShTadyumnasya saMyuge. sArathiM chaturashchAshvAnkarNo vivyAdha sAyakaiH.. 7-174-4 (52952) kArmukapravaraM chApi prachichCheda shitaiH sharaiH. sArathiM chAsya bhallena rathanIDAdapAtayat.. 7-174-5 (52953) dhR^iShTadyumnastu viratho hatAshvo hatasArathiH. gR^ihItvA parighaM ghoraM karNasyAshvAnapIDayat.. 7-174-6 (52954) viddhashcha bahubhistena sharairAshIviShopamaiH. tato yudhiShThirAnIkaM paddhyAmevAnvapadyata.. 7-174-7 (52955) Aruroha rathaM chApi sahadevasya mAriSha. prayAtukAmaH karNAya vArito dharmasUnunA.. 7-174-8 (52956) karNastu sumahAtejAH siMhanAdavimishritam. dhanuHshabdaM mahachchakre dadhmau tAreNa chAmbujam.. 7-174-9 (52957) dR^iShTvA vinirjitaM yuddhe pArShataM te mahArathAH. amarShavashamApannAH pA~nchAlAH sahasomakAH.. 7-174-10 (52958) sUtaputravadhArthAya shastrANyAdAya sarvashaH. prayayuH karNamuddishya mR^ityuM kR^itvA nivartanam.. 7-174-11 (52959) karNasyApi rathe vAhAnanyAnsUto.abhyayojayat. sha~NkhavarNAnmahAvegAnsaindhavAnsAdhuvAhinaH.. 7-174-12 (52960) labdhalakShastu rAdheyaH pa~nchAlAnAM mahArathAn. abhyapIDayadAyastaH sharairmegha ivAchalam.. 7-174-13 (52961) sA pIDyamAnA karNena pA~nchAlAnAM mahAchamUH. samprAdravatsusantrastA siMhenevArditA mR^igI.. 7-174-14 (52962) patitAsturagebhyashcha gajebhyashcha mahItale. rathebhyashcha narAstUrNamadR^ishyanta tatastataH.. 7-174-15 (52963) dhAvamAnasya yodhasya kShurapraiH sa mahAmR^idhe. bAhU chichCheda vai karNaH shirashchaiva sakuNDalam.. 7-174-16 (52964) UrU chichCheda chAnyasya gajasthasya vishAmpate. vAjipR^iShThagatasyApi bhUmiShThasya cha mAriSha.. 7-174-17 (52965) nAj~nAsiShurdhAvamAnA bahavashcha mahArathAH. sa~nChinnAnyAtmagAtrANi vAhanAni cha saMyuge.. 7-174-18 (52966) te vadhyamAnAH samare pA~nchAlAH sR^i~njayaiH saha. tR^iNapraspandanAchchApi sUtaputraM sma menire.. 7-174-19 (52967) api svaM samare yodhaM dhAvamAnaM vichetasam. karNamevAbhyamanyanta tato bhItA dravanti te.. 7-174-20 (52968) tAnyanIkAni bhagnAni dravamANAni bhArata. abhyadravaddrutaM karNaH pR^iShThato vikira~nCharAn.. 7-174-21 (52969) avekShamANAstvanyonyaM susammUDhA vichetasaH. nAshaknuvannavasthAtuM kAlyamAnA mahAtmanA.. 7-174-22 (52970) karNenAbhyAhatA rAjanpA~nchAlAH parameShubhiH. droNena cha dishaH sarvA vIkShamANAH pradudruvuH.. 7-174-23 (52971) tato yudhiShThiro rAjA svasainyaM prekShya vidrutam. apayAne manaH kR^itvA phalgunaM vAkyamabravIt.. 7-174-24 (52972) pashya karNaM maheShvAsaM dhanuShpANimavasthitam. nishIthe dAruNe kAle tapantamiva bhAskaram.. 7-174-25 (52973) karNasAyakanunnAnAM kroshatAmeSha niHsvanaH. anishaM shrUyate pArtha tvadbandhUnAmanAthavat.. 7-174-26 (52974) yathA visR^ijatashchAsya sandadhAnasya chAshugAn. pashyAmi nAntaraM pArtha kShapayiShyati no dhruvam.. 7-174-27 (52975) yadatrAnantaraM kAryaM prAptakAla cha pashyasi. karNasya vadhasaMyuktaM tatkuruShva dhana~njaya.. 7-174-28 (52976) evamukto mahArAja pArthaH kR^iShNamathAbravIt. bhItaH kuntIsuto rAjA rAdheyasyAdya vikramAt.. 7-174-29 (52977) evaM gate prAptakAlaM karNAnIke punaH punaH. bhavAnvyavasyatu kShipraM dravate hi varUthinI.. 7-174-30 (52978) droNasAyakanunnAnAM bhagnAnAM madhusUdana. karNena trAsyamAnAnAmavasthAnaM na vidyate.. 7-174-31 (52979) pashyAmi cha tathA karNaM vicharantamabhItavat. dravamANAnrathodArAnkirantaM nishitaiH sharaiH.. 7-174-32 (52980) nainaM shakShyAmi saMsoDhuM charantaM raNamUrdhani. pratyakShaM vR^iShNishArdUla pAdasparshamivoragaH.. 7-174-33 (52981) sa savAMstatra yAtvAshu yatra karNo mahArathaH. ahamenaM haniShyAmi mAM vaiSha madhusUdana.. 7-174-34 (52982) shrIvAsudeva uvAcha. 7-174-35x (4725) pashyAmi karNaM kaunteya devarAjamivAhave. vicharantaM naravyAghramatimAnuShavikramam.. 7-174-35 (52983) naitasyAnyo.asti sa~NgrAme pratyudyAtA dhana~njaya. R^ite tvAM puruShavyAghra rAkShasAdvA ghaTotkachAt.. 7-174-36 (52984) na tu tAvadahaM manye prAptakAlaM tavAnagha. samAgamaM mahAbAho sUtaputreNa saMyuge.. 7-174-37 (52985) dIpyamAnA maholkeva tiShThatyasya hi vAsavI. tvadarthaM hi mahAbAho sUtaputreNa saMyuge.. 7-174-38 (52986) rakShyate shaktireShA hi raudrAM rUpaM bibharti cha. ghaTotkachastu rAdheyaM pratyudyAtu mahAbalaH.. 7-174-39 (52987) sa hi bhImena balinA jAtaH suraparAkramaH. tasminnastrANi divyAni rAkShasAnyAsurANi cha.. 7-174-40 (52988) satataM chAnurakto vo hitaiShI cha ghaTotkachaH. vijeShyati raNe karNamiti me nAtra saMshayaH.. 7-174-41 (52989) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-174-42x (4726) evamukto mahAbAhuH pArthaH puShkaralochanaH. AjuhAvAtha tadrakShastachchAsItprAduraprataH.. 7-174-42 (52990) kavachI sasharaH kha~NgI sadhanvA cha vishAmpate. abhivAdya tataH kR^iShNaM pANDavaM cha dhana~njayam. abravIchcha tadA kR^iShNamayamasmyanushAdhi mAm.. 7-174-43 (52991) tatastaM meghasa~NkAshaM dIptAsyaM dIptakuNDalam. abhyabhAShata haiDimbiM dAshArhaH prahasanniva.. 7-174-44 (52992) vAsudeva uvAcha. 7-174-45x (4727) ghaTotkacha vijAnIhi yattvAM vakShyAmi putraka. prApto vikramakAlo.ayaM tava nAnyasya kasyAchit. sa tvaM nimajjatAM yuddhe bandhUnAM bAndhavo bhava.. 7-174-45 (52993) yAvanti cha tavAstrANi santi mAyAshcha rAkShasIH. `adyaiva samayasteShAM mAyAnAM chaiva rAkShasa'.. 7-174-46 (52994) pashya karNena haiDimbe pANDavAnAmanIkinIm. kAlyamAnAM raNe tAta siMhanevetarAnmR^igAn.. 7-174-47 (52995) eSha karNo maheShvAso matimAndR^iDhavikramaH. pANvAnAmanIkeShu nihanti kShatriyarShabhAn.. 7-174-48 (52996) kirantaH sharavarShANi mahAnti dR^iDhadhanvinaH. na shaknuvantyavasthAtuM pIDyamAnAH sharArchiShA.. 7-174-49 (52997) nishIthe sUtaputreNa sharavarSheNa pIDitAH. ete dravanti pA~nchAlAH siMhenevArditA mR^ishAH.. 7-174-50 (52998) etasyaivaM pravR^iddhasya sUtaputrasya saMyuge. niSheddhA vidyate nAnyastvAmR^ite bhImavikrama.. 7-174-51 (52999) sa tvaM kuru mahAbAho karma yuktamihAtmanaH. mAtulAnAM pitR^INAM cha tesajo.astrabalasya cha.. 7-174-52 (53000) etadarthe hi haiDimbe putrAnichChanti mAnavAH. kathaM nastArayedduHkhAtsa tvaM tAraya bAndhavAn.. 7-174-53 (53001) ichChanti pitaraH putrAnsvArthahetorghaTotkacha. hahalokAtpare loke tArayiShyanti ye hitAH.. 7-174-54 (53002) tava hyatra balaM bhImaM mAyAshcha tava dustarAH. sa~NkrAme yudhyamAnasya satataM bhImanandana.. 7-174-55 (53003) pANDavAnAM prabhagnAnAM karNena nishi sAyakaiH. majjatAM dhArtarAShTreShu bhava pAraM parantapa.. 7-174-56 (53004) rAtrau hi rAkShasA bhUyo bhavantyamitavikramAH. balavantaH sudurdharShAH shUrA vikrAntachAriNaH.. 7-174-57 (53005) jahi karNaM hameShvAsaM nishIthe mAyayA raNe. pArthA droNaM vadhiShyanti dhR^iShTadyumnapurogamAH.. 7-174-58 (53006) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-174-59x (4728) keshavasya vachaH shrutvA bIbhatsurapi rAkShasam. abhyabhAShata kauravya ghaTotkachamarindamam.. 7-174-59 (53007) ghaTotkacha bhavAMshchaiva dIrghabAhushcha sAtyakiH. matau me sarvasainyeShu bhImasenashcha pANDavaH.. 7-174-60 (53008) tadbhavAnyAtu karNena dvairathaM yudhyatAM nishi. sAtyakiH pR^iShThagopaste bhaviShyati mahArathaH.. 7-174-61 (53009) jahi karNaM raNe shUraM sAtvatena sahAyavAn. yathendrastArakaM pUrvaM skandena saha jaghnivAn.. 7-174-62 (53010) ghaTotkacha uvAcha. 7-174-63x (4729) `evameva mahAbAho yathA vadasi mAM prabho. tvayA niyukto gachChAmi karNasya badhakA~NkShayA'.. 7-174-63 (53011) alamevAsmi karNAya droNAyAlaM cha bhArata. anyeShAM kShatriyANAM cha kR^itAstrANAM mahAtmanAm.. 7-174-64 (53012) adya dAsyAmi sa~NgrAmaM sUtaputrAya taM nishi. yaM janAH sampravakShyanti yAvadbhUmirdhariShyati.. 7-174-65 (53013) na chAtra shUrAnmokShyAmi na bhItAnna kR^itA~njalIn. sarvAneva vadhiShyAmi rAkShasaM dharmamAsthitaH.. 7-174-66 (53014) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-174-67x (4730) evamuktvA mahAbAhurhaiDimbiH paravIrahA. abhyayAttumule karNaM tava sainyaM vibhIShayan.. 7-174-67 (53015) tamApatantaM sa~NkruddhaM dIptAsyaM dIptamUrdhajam. prahasanpuruShavyAghraH pratijagrAha sUtajaH.. 7-174-68 (53016) tayoH samabhavadyuddhaM karNarAkShasayornishi. garjato rAjashArdUla shakraprahlAdayoriva.. .. 7-174-69 (53017) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi ghaTotkachavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe chatuHsaptatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 174 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-174-13 AyastaH prayatnavAn.. 5-174-174 chatuHsaptatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 175

.. shrIH ..

7.175. adhyAyaH 175

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

ghaTotkachena jaTAsurasutavadhaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-175-0 (53018) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-175-0x (4731) dR^iShTvA ghaTotkachaM rAjansUtaputrarathaM prati. AyAntaM tu tathAyuktaM jighAMsuM karNamAhave. abravIttatra putraste duHshAsanamidaM vachaH.. 7-175-1 (53019) etadrakSho raNe tUrNaM dR^iShTvA karNasya vikramam. abhiyAti drutaM karNaM tadvAraya mahAratham.. 7-175-2 (53020) vR^itaH sainyena mahatA yAhi yatra mahAbalaH. karNo vaikartano yuddhe rAkShasena yuyutsati.. 7-175-3 (53021) rakSha karNaM raNe yatto vR^itaH sainyena mAnada. mA karNaM rAkShaso ghoraH pramAdAnnAshayiShyati.. 7-175-4 (53022) etasminnantare rAja~njaTAsurasuto balI. duryodhanamupAgamya prAha praharatAM varaH.. 7-175-5 (53023) duryodhana tavAmitrAnprakhyAtAnyuddhadurmadAn. pANDavAnhantumichChAmi tvayA.a.aj~naptaH sahAnugAn.. 7-175-6 (53024) jaTAsuro mama pitA rakShasAM grAmaNIH purA. prayujya karma rakShoghnaM kShudraiH pArthairnipAtitaH.. 7-175-7 (53025) tasyApachitimichChAmi shatrushoNitapUjayA. shatrumAMsaishcha rAjendra mAmanuj~nAtumarhasi.. 7-175-8 (53026) tamabravIttato rAjA prIyamANaH punaHpunaH. droNakarmAdibhiH sArdhaM paryApto.ahaM dviShadvadhe.. 7-175-9 (53027) tvaM tu gachCha mayA.a.aj~napto jahi yuddhe ghaTotkacham. rAkShasaM krUrakarmANaM rakShomAnuShasambhavam.. 7-175-10 (53028) pANDavAnAM hitaM nityaM hastyashvarathaghAtinam. vaihAyasagataM yuddhe preShayeryamasAdanam.. 7-175-11 (53029) tathetyuktvA mahAkAyaH samAhUya ghaTotkacham. jATAsurirbhaimaseniM nAnAshastrairavAkirat.. 7-175-12 (53030) alambalaM cha karNaM cha kurusainyaM cha dustaram. haiDimbiH pramamAthaiko mahAbAtombudAniva.. 7-175-13 (53031) tato mAyAbalaM dR^iShTvA rakShastUrNamalambalaH. ghaTotkachaM sharavrAtairnAnAli~NgaiH samArpayat.. 7-175-14 (53032) viddhA cha bahubhirbANairbhaimaseniM mahAbalaH. vyadrAvayachCharavrAtaiH pANDavAnAmanIkinIm.. 7-175-15 (53033) tena vidrAvyamANAni pANDusainyAni bhArata. nishIthe viprakIryante vAtanunnA ghanA iva.. 7-175-16 (53034) ghaTotkachasharairnunnA tathaiva tava vAhinI. nishIthe prAdravadrAjannutsR^ijyolkAH sahasrashaH.. 7-175-17 (53035) alambalastataH kruddho bhaimaseniM mahAmR^idhe. Ajaghne dashabhirbANaistotrairiva mahAdvipam.. 7-175-18 (53036) tixshastasya saMvAhaM sUtaM sarvAyudhAni cha. ghaTotkachaH prachichCheda praNadaMshchAtidAruNam.. 7-175-19 (53037) tataH karNaM sharavrAtaiH kurUnanyAnsahasrashaH. alambalaM chAbhyavarShanmegho merumivAchalam.. 7-175-20 (53038) tataH sa~nchukShubhe sainyaM kurUNAM rAkShasArditam. uparyupari chAnyonyaM chatura~NgaM mamarda ha.. 7-175-21 (53039) jATAsurirmahArAja viratho hatasArathiH. ghaTotkachaM raNe kruddho muShTinA.abhyahanaddR^iDham.. 7-175-22 (53040) muShTinA.abhyAhatastena prachachAla ghaTotkachaH. kShitikampe yathA shailaH savR^ikShastR^iNagulmavAn.. 7-175-23 (53041) tataH sa parighAbhena dviTsa~Nghaghnena bAhunA. jATAsuriM bhaimaseniravadhInmuShTinA bhR^isham.. 7-175-24 (53042) taM pramathya tataH kruddhastUrNaM haiDimbirAkShipat. dorbhyAmindradhvajAbhAbhyAM niShpipeSha cha bhUtale.. 7-175-25 (53043) jATAsurirmokShayitvA AtmAnaM cha ghaTotkachAt. punarutthAya vegena ghaTotkachamupAdrAvat.. 7-175-26 (53044) alambalo.api vikShipya samutkShipya cha rAkShasam. ghaTotkachaM raNe roShAnniShpipeSha cha bhUtale.. 7-175-27 (53045) tayo samabhavadyuddhaM garjatoratikAyayoH. ghaTotkachAlambalayostumulaM romaharShaNam.. 7-175-28 (53046) visheShayantAvanyonyaM mAyAbhiratimAyinau. yuyudhAte mahAvIryAvindravairochanAviva.. 7-175-29 (53047) pAvakAmbunidhI bhUtvA punargaruDatakShakau. punarmeghamahAbattau punarvajramahAchalau.. 7-175-30 (53048) punaH ku~njarashArdUlau punaH svarbhAnubhAskarau. evaM mAyAshatasR^ijAvanyonyavadhakA~NkShiNau. bhR^ishaM chitramayudhyetAmalambalaghaTotkachau.. 7-175-31 (53049) parighaishcha gadAbhishcha prAsamudrarapaTTasaiH. musalaiH parvatAgraishcha tAvanyonyaM vijaghnatuH.. 7-175-32 (53050) hayAbhyAM cha gajAbhyAM cha rathAbhyAM cha padAtibhiH. yuyudhAte mahAmAyau rAkShasapravarau yudhi.. 7-175-33 (53051) tato ghaTotkacho rAjannalambalavadhepsayA. utpatAta bhR^ishaM kruddhaH shyenavannipapAta cha.. 7-175-34 (53052) gR^ihItvA cha mahAkAyaM rAkShasendramalambalam. udyamya nyavadhIdbhUmau mayaM viShNurivAhave.. 7-175-35 (53053) tato ghaTotkachaH kha~NgamudvR^ityAdbhutadarshanam. raudrasya kAyAdvi shiro bhImaM vikR^itadarshanam.. 7-175-36 (53054) sphuratastasya samare nadatashchAtibhairavam. nichakarta mahArAja shatromitavikramaH.. 7-175-37 (53055) shirastachchApi sa~NgR^ihya kesheShu rudhirokShitam. yayau ghaTotkachastUrNaM duryodhanarathaM prati.. 7-175-38 (53056) `droNakarNakR^ipAnyodhAnatItya sumahAbalaH'. abhyetya cha mahAbAhuH smayamAnaH sa rAkShasaH.. 7-175-39 (53057) shiro rathe.asya nikShipya vikR^itAnanamUrdhajam. prANadadbhairavaM nAdaM prAvR^iShIva valAhakaH.. 7-175-40 (53058) abravIchcha tato rAjanduryodhanamidaM vachaH.. 7-175-41 (53059) eSha te nihato bandhustvayA dR^iShTo.asya vikramaH. punardraShTAsi karNasya niShThAmetAM tathA.a.atmanaH.. 7-175-42 (53060) svadharmamarthaM kAmaM cha tritayaM yo.abhivA~nChati. riktapANirna pashyeta rAjAnaM brAhmaNaM striyam. tiShThasva tAvatsuprIto yAvatkarNaM vadhAmyaham.. 7-175-43 (53061) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-175-44x (4732) evamuktvA tataH prAyAtkarNaM prati nareshvaraH. kira~nCharagaNAMstIkShNAnruShito raNamUrdhani.. 7-175-44 (53062) tataH samabhavadyuddhaM ghorarUpaM bhayAnakam. vismApanaM mahArAja nararAkShasayormR^idhe.. .. 7-175-45 (53063) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi ghaTotkachavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe pa~nchasaptatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 175 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-175-8 apachiniM niShkR^itim.. 5-175-42 niShThAM nAsham.. 5-175-175 pa~nchasaptatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 176

.. shrIH ..

7.176. adhyAyaH 176

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

karNaghaTotkachayoryuddham.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-176-0 (53064) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-176-0x (4733) yattadvaikartanaH karNo rAkShasashcha ghaTotkachaH. nishIthe samasajjetAM tadyuddhamabhavatkatham.. 7-176-1 (53065) kIdR^ishaM chAbhavadrUpaM tasya ghorasya rakShasaH. yena vaikartanaH karNaH sa~NgrAme tena nirjitaH.. 7-176-2 (53066) rathashcha kIdR^ishastasya mAyAH sarvAyudhAni cha. kimpramANA hayAstasya rathaketurdhanustathA.. 7-176-3 (53067) kIdR^ishaM varma chaivAsya shirastrANaM cha kIdR^isham. pR^iShTastvametadAchakShva kushalo hyasi sa~njaya.. 7-176-4 (53068) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-176-5x (4734) lohitokSho mahAkAyastAmrAsyo nimnitodaraH. UrdhvaromA harishmashruH sha~NkukarNo mahAhanuH.. 7-176-5 (53069) AkarNadAritAsyashcha tIkShNadaMShTraH karAlavAn. sudIrghatAmrajihvoShTho lambabhrUH sthUlanAsikaH.. 7-176-6 (53070) nIlA~Ngo lohitagrIvo girivarShmA bhaya~NkaraH. mahAkAyo mahAbAhurmahAshIrSho mahAbalaH.. 7-176-7 (53071) vikR^itaH paruShasparsho vikachodvR^iddhapiNDakaH. sthUlasphiggUDhanAbhishcha shithilopachayo mahAn.. 7-176-8 (53072) tathaiva hastAbharaNI mahAmAyo.a~NgadI tathA. urasA.adhArayanniShkamagnimAlAM yathA.achalaH.. 7-176-9 (53073) tasya hemamayaM chitraM bahurUpA~Ngashabhitam. toraNapratimaM shubhraM kirITaM mUrdhnyashobhata.. 7-176-10 (53074) kuNDale bAlasUryAbhe mAlAM hemamayIM shubhAm. dhArayanvipulaM kAMsyaM kavachaM cha mahAprabham. tArAjAlanibhaM rAjanpUrNachandrasamaprabham.. 7-176-11 (53075) kaNThasUtraM mahachchApi tapanIyamadhArayat. sa tena vibhrAjata vai savidyudiva toyadaH.. 7-176-12 (53076) ki~NkiNIshatanirghopaM raktadhvajapatAkinam. R^ikShacharmAvanadvA~NgaM nalvamAtraM mahAratham.. 7-176-13 (53077) sarvAyudhavaropetamAsthitaM dhvajamAlinam. aShTachakrasamAyuktaM meghagambhIraniHsvanam.. 7-176-14 (53078) mattamAta~Ngasa~NkAshA lohitAkShA vibhIpaNAH. kAlavarNAsamAyuktA balavantaH shataM hayAH.. 7-176-15 (53079) vahanto rAkShasaM ghoraM vAlavanto jitashramAH. vipulAbhiH saTAbhiste heShamANA muhurmuhuH.. 7-176-16 (53080) mukhairnAnAvidhAkArairvagavanto hayottamAH. rathe.asya yuktA gakarjanto.avahaMste rAkShasAdhipam.. 7-176-17 (53081) rAkShaso.asya virUpAkShaH sUto dIptAsyakuNDalaH. `ghorarUpo mahAkAyaH karAlo vikR^itAnanaH'. rashmibhiH sUryarashmyAhvaiH sa~njagrAha hayAnraNe.. 7-176-18 (53082) sa tena sahitastasthAvaruNena yathA raviH. saMsakta iva chAbhreNa yathA.adrirmahatA mahAn.. 7-176-19 (53083) divaspR^iksumahAnketuH syandane.asya samuchChritaH. raktottamA~NgaH kravyAdo gR^idhraH paramabhIShaNaH.. 7-176-20 (53084) vAsavAshaninirghoShaM dR^iDhajyamativikShipan. vyaktaM kiShkuparINAhaM dvAdashAratni kArmukam.. 7-176-21 (53085) rathAkShamAtrairipubhiH sarvAH prachChAdayandishaH. tasyAM vIrApahAriNyAM nishAyAM karNamabhyayAt.. 7-176-22 (53086) tasya vikShipatashchApaM rathe viShTabhya tiShThataH. ashrUyata dhanurghoSho visphUrjitamivAshaneH.. 7-176-23 (53087) tena vitrAsyamAnAni tava sainyAni bhArata. samakampanta sarvANi sindhoriva mahormayaH.. 7-176-24 (53088) tamApatantaM samprekShya virUpAkShaM vibhIShaNam. utsmayanniva rAdheyastvaramANo.abhyavArayat.. 7-176-25 (53089) tataH karNo.abhyayAdenamasyannasyantamantikAt. mAta~Nga iva mAta~NgaM yUtharShabhamivarShabhaH.. 7-176-26 (53090) sa sannipAtastumulastayorAsIdvishAmpate. karNarAkShasayo rAjannindrashambarayoriva.. 7-176-27 (53091) tau pragR^ihya mahAvege dhanuShI bhImaniHsvane. prAchChAdayetAmanyonyaM takShamANau maheShubhiH.. 7-176-28 (53092) tataH pUrNAyatotsR^iShTairiShubhirnataparvabhiH. nyavArayetAmanyonyaM kAMsye nirbhidya varmaNI.. 7-176-29 (53093) tau nakhairiva shArdUlau dantairiva mahAdvipau. rathashaktibhiranyonyaM vishikhaishcha tatakShatuH.. 7-176-30 (53094) sa~nChindantau cha gAtrANi sandadhAnau cha sAyakAn. dahantau cha sharolkAbhirduShprekShyau cha babhUvatuH.. 7-176-31 (53095) tau tu vikShatasarvA~Ngau rudhiraughapariplutau. vibhrAjetAM yathA vAri sravantau gairikAchalau.. 7-176-32 (53096) tau sharAgravinunnA~Ngau nirbhindantau parasparam. nAkampayetAmanyonyaM yatamAnau mahAdyutI.. 7-176-33 (53097) tatpravR^ittaM nishAyuddhaM chiraM samamivAbhavat. prANayordIvyato rAjankarNarAkShasayormR^idhe.. 7-176-34 (53098) tasya sandadhatastIkShNA~nCharAMshchAsaktamasyataH. dhanurghoSheNa vitrastAH sve pare cha tadA.abhavan.. 7-176-35 (53099) ghaTotkachaM yadA karNo visheShayati no nR^ipa. tataH prAduShkaroddivyamastramastravidAM varaH.. 7-176-36 (53100) karNena sandhitaM dR^iShTvA divyamastraM ghaTotkachaH. prAdushchakre mahAmAyAM rAkShasIM pANDunandanaH.. 7-176-37 (53101) shUlamudgaradhAriNyA shailapAdapahastayA. rakShasAM ghorarUpANAM mahatyA senayA vR^itaH.. 7-176-38 (53102) tamudyatamahAchApaM dR^iShTvA te vyathitA nR^ipAH. bhUtAntakamivAyAntaM kAladaNDogradhAriNam.. 7-176-39 (53103) ghaTotkachaprayuktena siMhanAdena bhIShitAH. prasusruvurgajA mUtraM vivyadhushcha narA bhR^isham.. 7-176-40 (53104) tato.ashmavR^iShTiratyugrA mahatyAsItsamantataH. ardharAtre.adhikabalairvimuktA rakShasAM balaiH.. 7-176-41 (53105) AyasAni cha chakrANi bhushuNQDyaH shaktitomarAH. patantyaviralAH shUlAH shataghnyaH paTTasAstathA.. 7-176-42 (53106) tadugramatiraudraM cha dR^iShTvA yuddhaM narAdhipa. putrAshcha tava yodhAshcha vyathitA vipradudruvuH.. 7-176-43 (53107) tatraiko.astabalashlAghI karNo mAnI na vivyathe. vyadhamachcha sharairmAyAM tAM ghaTotkachanirmitAm.. 7-176-44 (53108) mAyAyAM tu prahINAyAmamarShAchcha ghaTotkachaH. visasarja sharAndhorAnsUta putraM ta Avishan.. 7-176-45 (53109) tataste rudhirAbhyaktA bhittvA karNaM mahAhave. vivishurdharaNIM bANAH sa~NkruddhA iva pannagAH.. 7-176-46 (53110) sUtaputrastu sa~Nkraddho laghuhastaH pratApavAn. ghaTotkachamatikramya bibheda dashabhiH sharaiH.. 7-176-47 (53111) ghaTotkacho vinirbhinnaH sUtaputreNa marmasu. chakraM divyaM sahasrAramagR^ihNAdvyathito bhR^isham.. 7-176-48 (53112) kShurAntaM bAlasUryAbhaM maNiratnavibhUShitam. chikShepAdhiratheH kruddho bhaimasenirjighAMsayA.. 7-176-49 (53113) pravidvamativegena vikShiptaM karNasAyakaiH. abhAgyasyeva sa~Nkalpastanmoghamapatadbhuvi.. 7-176-50 (53114) ghaTotkachastu sa~Nkruddho dR^iShTvA chakraM nipAtitam. karNaM prAchChAdayadbANaiH svarbhAnuriva bhAskaram.. 7-176-51 (53115) sUtaputrastvasambhrAnto rudropendrendravikramaH. ghaTotkacharathaM tUrNaM ChAdayAmAsa patribhiH.. 7-176-52 (53116) ghaTotkachena kruddhena gadA hemA~NgadA tadA. kShiptA bhrAmya sharaiH sA.api karNenAbhyAhatA.apatat.. 7-176-53 (53117) tato.antarikShamutpatya kAlamegha ivonnadan. pravavarSha mahAkAyo drumavarShaM nabhastalAt.. 7-176-54 (53118) tato mAyAvinaM karNo bhImasenasutaM divi. mArgaNairabhivivyAdha ghanaM sUrya ivAMshubhiH.. 7-176-55 (53119) tasya sarvAnhayAnhatvA sa~nChidya shatadhA ratham. abhyavarShachCharaiH karNaH parjanya iva vR^iShTimAn.. 7-176-56 (53120) na chAsyAsIdanirbhinnaM gAtre dvya~Ngulamantaram. so.adR^ishyata muhUrtena shvAvichChalalito yathA.. 7-176-57 (53121) na hayAnna rathaM tasya na dhvajaM na ghaTotkacham. dR^iShTavantaH sma samare sharaughairabhisaMvR^itam.. 7-176-58 (53122) sa tu karNasya taddivyamastramastreNa shAtayan. mAyAyuddhena mAyAvI sUtaputramayodhayat.. 7-176-59 (53123) so.ayodhayattadA karNaM mAyayA lAghavena cha. alakShyamANAni divi sharajAlAni chApatan.. 7-176-60 (53124) bhaimasenirmahAmAyo mAyayA kurusattama. vichachAra mahAkAyo mohayanniva bhArata.. 7-176-61 (53125) sa tu kR^itvA virUpANi vadanAnyashubhAni cha. agrasatsUtaputrasya divyAnyastrANi mAyayA.. 7-176-62 (53126) punashchApi mahAkAyaH sa~nChinnaH shatadhA raNe. gatasatvo nirutsAhaH patitaH khAdvyadR^ishyata.. 7-176-63 (53127) taM hataM manyamAnAH sma prANadankurupu~NgavAH. atha dehairnavairanyairdikShu sarvAsvadR^ishyata.. 7-176-64 (53128) punashchApi mahAkAyaH shatashIrShaH shatodaraH. vyadR^ishyata mahAbAhurmainAka iva parvataH.. 7-176-65 (53129) a~NguShThamAtro bhUtvA cha punareva sa rAkShasaH. sAgarormirivodvUtastiryagUrdhvamavartata.. 7-176-66 (53130) vasudhAM dArayitvA cha punarapyu nyamajjata. adR^ishyata tadA tatra punarunmajjito.anyataH.. 7-176-67 (53131) so.avatIrya punastasthau rathe hemapariShkR^ite. kShitiM khaM cha dishashchaiva mAyayA.abhyetya daMshitaH.. 7-176-68 (53132) gatvA karNarathAbhyAshaM vyacharatkuNDalAnanaH. prAha vAkyamasambhrAntaH sUtaputraM vishAmpate.. 7-176-69 (53133) tiShThedAnIM kva me jIvansUtaputra gamiShyasi. yuddhashraddhAmahaM te.adya vineShyAmi ramAjire.. 7-176-70 (53134) ityuktvA roShatAmrAkShaM rakShaH krUraparAkramam. utpapAtAntarikShaM cha jahAsa cha suvistaram. karNamabhyahanachchaiva gajendramiva kesarI.. 7-176-71 (53135) rathAkShamAtreriShubhirabhyavarShaddhaTotkachaH. 7-176-72 (53136) sharavR^iShTiM cha tAM karNo dUrAtprAptAmashAtayat.. 7-176-73 (53137) dR^iShTvA cha vihatAM mAyAM karNena bharatarShabha. ghaTotkachastato mAyAM sasarjAntarhitaH punaH.. 7-176-74 (53138) so.abhavadgiriratyuchchaH shikharaistarusa~NkaTaiH. shUlaprAsAsimusalajalaprasravaNo mahAn.. 7-176-75 (53139) tama~njanachayaprakhyaM karNo dR^iShTvA mahIdharam. prapAtairAyudhAnyugrANyudvahantaM na chukShubhe.. 7-176-76 (53140) smayanniva tataH karNo divyamastramudairayat. tataH so.asreNa shailendro vikShipto vai vyanashyata.. 7-176-77 (53141) tataH sa toyado bhUtvA nIlaH sendrAyudho divi. ashmavR^iShTibhiratyugraH sUtaputramavAkirat.. 7-176-78 (53142) atha sandhAya vAyavyamastramastravidAM varaH. vyadhamatkAlameghaM taM karNo vaikartano vR^iShaH.. 7-176-79 (53143) sa mArgaNagaNaiH karNo dishaH prachChAdya sarvashaH. jaghAnAstraM mahArAja ghaTotkachasamIritam.. 7-176-80 (53144) tataH prahasya samare bhaimasenirmahAbalaH. prAdushchakre mahAmAyAM karNaM prati mahAratham.. 7-176-81 (53145) sa dR^iShTvA punarAyAntaM rathena rathinAM varam. ghaTotkachamasambhrAntaM rAkShasairbahubhirvR^itam.. 7-176-82 (53146) siMhashArdUlasadR^ishairmattamAta~NgavikramaiH. gajasthaishcha rathasthaishcha vAjipR^iShThagataistathA. 7-176-82 (53147) nAnAshastradharairghorairnAnAkavachabhUShaNaiH.. vR^itaM ghaTotkachaM krUrairmarudbhiriva vAsavam. 7-176-83 (53148) dR^iShTvA karNo maheShvAso yodhayAmAsa rAkShasam.. ghaTotkachastataH karNaM viddhA pa~nchabhirAshugaiH. 7-176-84 (53149) nanAda bhairavaM nAdaM bhIShayansarvapArthivAn.. bhUyashchA~njalikenAtha sa mArgaNagaNaM mahat. 7-176-85 (53150) karNahastasthitaM chApaM chichChedAshu ghaTotkachaH.. athAnyaddhanurAdAya dR^iDhaM bhArasahaM mahat. 7-176-86 (53151) vichakarSha balAtkarNa indrAyudhamivochChritam.. tataH karNo mahArAja preShayAmAsa sAyakAn. 7-176-87 (53152) suvarNapu~NkhA~nChatrughnAnkhecharAnrAkShasAnprati.. tadbANairarditaM yUthaM rakShasAM pInavakShasAm. 7-176-88 (53153) siMhenevArditaM vanyaM gajAnAmAkulaM kulam.. vidhamya rAkShasAnbANaiH sAshvasUtagajAnvibhuH. 7-176-89 (53154) dadAha bhagavAnvahnirbhUtAnIva yugakShaye.. sa hatvA rAkShasIM senAM shushubhe sUtanandanaH. 7-176-90 (53155) pureva tripuraM dagdhvA divi devo maheshvaraH.. teShu rAjasahasreShu pANDaveyeShu mAriSha. 7-176-91 (53156) nainaM nirIkShitumapi kashchichChaknoti pArthiva.. R^ite ghaTotkachAdrAjanrAkShasendrAnmahAbalAt. 7-176-92 (53157) bhImavIryabalopetAtkruddhdvaivasvatAdiva.. tasya kruddhasya netrAbhyAM pAvakaH samajAyata. 7-176-93 (53158) maholkAbhyAM yathA rAjansArjiShaH snehabindavaH.. talaM talena saMhatya sandashya dashanachChadam. 7-176-94 (53159) rathamAsthAya cha punarmAyayA nirmitaM tadA.. yuktaM gajanibhairvAhaiH pishAchavadanaiH kharaiH. 7-176-95 (53160) sa sUtamabravItkruddhaH sUtaputrAya mAM vaha.. 7-176-96 (53161) sa yayau ghorarUpeNa rathena rathinAM varaH. dvairathaM sUtaputreNa punareva vishAmpate.. sa chikShepa punaH kruddhaH sutaputrAya rAkShasaH. 7-176-97 (53162) aShTachakrAM mahAghorAmashaniM rudranirmitAm.. 7-176-98 (53163) dviyojanasamutsedhAM yojanAyAmavistarAm. AyasIM nichitAM shUlaiH kadambamiva kesharaiH.. 7-176-99 (53164) tAmavaplutya jagrAha karNo nyasya mahaddhanuH. chikShepa chainAM tasyaiva syandanAtso.avapupluve.. 7-176-100 (53165) sAshvasUtadhvajaM yAnaM bhasma kR^itvA mahAprabhA. vivesha vasudhAM bhittvA surAstatra visismiyuH.. 7-176-101 (53166) karNaM tu sarvabhUtAni pUjayAmAsura~njasA. yadaplutya jagrAha devasR^iShTAM mahAshanim.. 7-176-102 (53167) evaM kR^itvA raNe karNa Aruroha rathaM punaH. tato mumocha nArAchAnsUtaputraH parantapaH.. 7-176-103 (53168) ashakyaM kartumanyena sarvabhUteShu mAnada. yadakArShIttadA karNaH sa~NgrAme bhImadarshane.. 7-176-104 (53169) sa hanyamAno nArAchairdhArAbhiriva parvataH. gandharvanagarAkAraH punarantaradhIyata.. 7-176-105 (53170) evaM sa vai mahAkAyo mAyayA lAghavena cha. astrANi tAni divyAni jaghAna ripusUdanaH.. 7-176-106 (53171) nihanyamAneShvastreShu mAyayA tena rakShasA. asambhrAntastadA karNastadrakShaH pratyayudhyata.. 7-176-107 (53172) tataH kruddho mahArAja bhaimasenirmahAbalaH. chakAra bahudhA.a.atmAnaM bhIShayANo mahArathAn.. 7-176-108 (53173) tato digbhyaH samApetuH siMhavyAghratarakShavaH. agnijihvAshcha bhujagA vihagAshchApyayomukhAH.. 7-176-109 (53174) sa kIryamANo vishikhaiH karNachApachyutaiH sharaiH. nAgarADiva duShprekShyastatraivAntaradhIyata.. 7-176-110 (53175) rAkShasAshcha pishAchAshcha yAtudhAnAstathaiva cha. shAlAvR^ikAshcha bahavo vR^ikAshcha vikR^itAnanAH.. 7-176-111 (53176) te karNaM kShapayiShyantaH sarvataH samupAdravan. athainaM vAgbhirugrAbhistrAsayA~nchikrire tadA.. 7-176-112 (53177) udyatairbahubhirghorairAyudhaiH shoNitokShitaiH. teShAmanekairekaikaM karNo vivyAdha sAyakaiH.. 7-176-113 (53178) pratihatya tu tAM mAyAM divyenAstreNa rAkShasIm. AjaghAna hayAnasya sharaiH sannataparvabhiH.. 7-176-114 (53179) te bhagnA vikShatA~NgAshcha bhinnapR^iShThAshcha sAyakaiH. vasudhAmanvapadyanta pashyatastasya rakShasaH.. 7-176-115 (53180) sa bhagnamAyo haiDimbiH karNaM vaikartanaM tadA. eSha te vidadhe mR^ityumityuktvAntaradhIyata.. .. 7-176-116 (53181) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi ghaTotkachavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe ShaTsaptatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 176 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-176-5 nimnitodaraH nimnitaM pR^iShThavaMshasaMlagnamashanahInasyevodaraM yasyetyarthaH.. 5-176-6 karAlavAn unnatadantachatuShkaH.. 5-176-8 vikachashchAsAvudvR^ipiNDo dR^iDhA~NgaH ko mUrdhA yasya sa vikachodvR^iddhapiNDakaH. shithilopachayaH sphikpradeshe eva shithilaH shlatha upachayo vR^iddhiryasya.. 5-176-13 nalvo hastachatuHshatam.. 5-176-29 viShkurhastastanmitaH parINAho vistAro yasya. aratnirniraShTamAMshaH karaH.. 5-176-30 rathaH syandanadehayoriti koshAddehAnukUlashaktimadbhiriti vA.. 5-176-35 tasya ghaTotkachasyA. AsaktamanyonyasaMsaktaM yathAsyAttathAsharAnasyataH.. 5-176-94 ulkAbhyAM sajarrasamishrolmukAbhyAm. tato hi dIptasya sarjarasasya kaNAH sasnehatvAtsArchiSha eva patantIti prasiddham.. 5-176-176 ShaTsaptatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 177

.. shrIH ..

7.177. adhyAyaH 177

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

bakAdibandhuvadhAdbhIme chiravairiNA alAyudharAkShasena suyodhanAdAyodhanAkShyanuj~nAmupalakShya ghaTotkachaM pratyabhigamanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-177-0 (53182) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-177-0x (4735) tasmiMstathA vartamAne karNarAkShasayormR^idhe. alAyudho rAkShasendro vIryavAnabhyavartata.. 7-177-1 (53183) mahatyA senayA yukto duryodhanamupAgamat. rAkShasAnAM virUpANAM sahasraiH parivAritaH. nAnArUpadharairvIraiH pUrvavairamanusmaran.. 7-177-2 (53184) tasya j~nAtirhi vikrAnto brAhmaNAdo bako hataH. kirNIrashcha mahAtejA hiDimbashcha sakhA tadA.. 7-177-3 (53185) sa dIrghakAlAdhyupitaM pUrvavairamanusmaran. vij~nAyaitannishAyuddhaM jighAMsurbhImamAhave.. 7-177-4 (53186) sa matta iva mAta~NgaH sa~Nkrudva iva choragaH. duryodhanamidaM vAkyamabravIdyudvalAlasaH.. 7-177-5 (53187) viditaM te mahArAja yathA bhImena rAkShasAH. hiDimbabakakirmIrA nihatA mama bAndhavAH.. 7-177-6 (53188) parAmarshashcha kanyAyA hiDimbAyAH kR^itaH purA. kimanyadrAkShasAnanyAnasmAMshcha paribhUya ha.. 7-177-7 (53189) tamahaM sagaNaM rAjansavAjirathaku~njaram. haiDimbiM cha sahAmAtyaM hantumabhyAgataH svayam.. 7-177-8 (53190) adya kuntIsutAnsarvAnvAsudevapurogamAn. hatvA sambhakShayiShyAmi sarvairanucharaiH saha.. 7-177-9 (53191) nivAraya balaM sarvaM vayaM yotsyAma pANDavAn.. 7-177-10 (53192) tasyaitadvachanaM shrutvA hR^iShTo duryodhanastadA. pratipUjyAbravIdvAkyaM bhrAtR^ibhiH parivAritaH.. 7-177-11 (53193) tvAM puraskR^itya sagaNaM vayaM yotsyAmahe parAn. na hi vairAntamanasaH sthAsyanti mama sainikAH.. 7-177-12 (53194) evamastviti rAjAnamuktvA rAkShasapu~NgavaH. abhyayAttvarito bhaimiM sahitaH puruShAdakaiH.. 7-177-13 (53195) dIpyamAnena vapuShA rathenAdityavarchasA. tAdR^ishenaiva rAjendra yAdR^ishena ghaTotkachaH.. 7-177-14 (53196) tasyApyatulanirghopo bahutoraNachitritaH. R^ikShacharmAvanadvA~Ngo nalvamAtro mahArathaH.. 7-177-15 (53197) tasyApi turagAH shIghrA hastikAyAH kharasvanAH. shataM yuktA mahAkAyA mAMsashoNitabhojanAH.. 7-177-16 (53198) tasyApi rathanirghopo mahAmegharavopamaH. syApi sumahachchApaM dR^iDhajyaM kanakojjvalam.. tasyApyakShasamA bANA rukma pu~NkhAH shilAshitAH. so.api vIro mahAbAhuryathaiva sa ghaTotkachaH.. 7-177-17 (53199) tasyApi gomAyubalAbhigupto babhUva keturjvalanArkatulyaH. sa chApi rUpeNa ghaTotkachasya shrImattamo hyantakasannikAshaH.. 7-177-19 (53200) dIptA~Ngado dIptakirITamAlI baddhasraguShNIShanibaddhakha~NgaH. gadI bhushuNDI musalI halI cha sharAsanI vAraNatulyavarShmA.. 7-177-20 (53201) rathena tenAnalavarchasA tadA vidrAvayanpANDavavAhinIM tAm. rarAja sahkhye parivartamAno vidyunmAlI megha ivAntarikShe.. 7-177-21 (53202) te chApi sarvapravarA narendrA mahAbalA varmimashcharmiNashcha. harShAnvitA yuyudhustasya rAjan samantataH pANDavayodhavIrAH.. .. 7-177-22 (53203) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi ghaTotkachavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe saptasaptatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 177 ..
droNaparva - adhyAya 178

.. shrIH ..

7.178. adhyAyaH 178

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

bhImAlAyudhayoryuddham.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-178-0 (53204) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-178-0x (4736) tamAgatamabhiprekShya bhImakarmANamAhave. harShamAhArayA~nchakruH kuravaH sarva eva te.. 7-178-1 (53205) tathaiva tava putrAste duryodhanapurogamAH. apluvAH plavamAsAdya tartukAmA ivArNavam.. 7-178-2 (53206) punarjAtamivAtmAnaM manvAnAH puruSharShabhAH. alAyudhaM rAkShasendraM svAgatenAbhyapUjayan.. 7-178-3 (53207) tasmiMstvamAnuShe yuddhe vartamAne mahAbhaye. karNarAkShasayornaktaM dAruNapratidarshane.. 7-178-4 (53208) `na drauNirna kR^ipadroNau na shalyo na cha mAdhavaH. eka eva tu tenAsIdyoddhA karNo raNe vR^iShA'.. 7-178-5 (53209) upapraikShanta pA~nchAlAH smayamAnAH sarAjakAH. vyabhramaMstAvakAshchApi ghUrNamAnAstatastataH.. 7-178-6 (53210) chukrushurnedamastIti droNadrauNikR^ipAdayaH. tatkarma dR^iShTvA sambhrAntA haiDimbasya raNAjire.. 7-178-7 (53211) sarvamAvignamabhavaddhAhAbhUtamachetanam. tava sainyaM mahArAja nirAshaM karNajIvite.. 7-178-8 (53212) duryodhanastu samprekShya karNamArtiM parAM gatam. alAyudhaM rAkShasendraM samAhUyedamabravIt.. 7-178-9 (53213) eSha vaikartanaH karNo haiDimbena samAgataH. kurute karma sumahadyadasyopayikaM mR^idhe.. 7-178-10 (53214) pashyaitAnpArthivA~nshUrAnnihatAnbhaimaseninA. nAnAshastrairabhihatAnpAdapAniva dantinA.. 7-178-11 (53215) tavaiSha bhAraH samare j~nAtimadhye mayA kR^itaH. tavaivAnumate vIra taM vikramya nibarhaya.. 7-178-12 (53216) purA vaikartanaM karNameSha pApo ghaTotkachaH. mAyAbalaM samAshritya karShayatyarikarshana.. 7-178-13 (53217) evamuktaH sa rAj~nA tu rAkShaso bhImavikramaH. tathetyuktvA mahAbAhurghaTotkachamupAdravat.. 7-178-14 (53218) tataH karNaM samutsR^ijya bhaimasenirapi prabho. pratyamitramupAyAntamardayAmAsa mArgaNaiH.. 7-178-15 (53219) tayoH samabhavadyuddhaM kruddhayo rAkShasendrayoH. mattayorvAsitAhetordIpayoriva kAnane.. 7-178-16 (53220) rakShasA vipramuktastu karNo.api rathinAM varaH. abhyadravadbhImasenaM rathenAdityavarchasA.. 7-178-17 (53221) tamAyAntamanAdR^itya dR^iShTvA grastaM ghaTotkacham. alAyudhena samare siMheneva gavAM patim.. 7-178-18 (53222) rathenAdityavapuShA bhImaH praharatAM varaH. kira~nCharaughAnprayayAvalAyudharathaM prati.. 7-178-19 (53223) tamAyAntamabhiprekShya sa tadA.alAyudhaH prabho. ghaTotkachaM samutsR^ijya bhImasenaM samAhvayat.. 7-178-20 (53224) taM bhImaH sahasA.abhyetya rAkShasAntakaraH prabho. sagaNaM rAkShasendraM taM sharavarShairavAkirat.. 7-178-21 (53225) tathaivAlAyudho rAja~nshilAdhautairajihmagaiH. abhyavarShata kaunteyaM punaHpunararindama.. 7-178-22 (53226) tathA te rAkShasAH sarve bhImasenamupAdravan. nAnApraharaNA bhImAstvatsutAnAM jayaiShiNaH.. 7-178-23 (53227) sa tADyamAno bahubhirbhImaseno mahAbalaH. pa~nchabhiH pa~nchabhiH sarvAMstAnavidhyachChitaiH sharaiH.. 7-178-24 (53228) te vadhyamAnA bhImena rAkShasAH krUrabuddhayaH. vinedustumulAnnAdAndudruvuste disho dasha.. 7-178-25 (53229) tAMstrAsyamAnAnbhImena dR^iShTvA rakSho mabahAlam. abhidudrAva vegena sharaishchainamavAkirat.. 7-178-26 (53230) taM bhImasenaH samare tIkShNAgrairakShiNochCharaiH.. 7-178-27 (53231) alAyudhastu tAnastAnbhImena vishikhAnraNe. chichCheda kAMshchitsamare tvarayA kAMshchidagrahIt.. 7-178-28 (53232) sa taM dR^iShTvA rAkShasendraM bhImo bhImaparAkramaH. gadAM chikShepa vegena vajrapAtopamAM tadA.. 7-178-29 (53233) tAmApatantIM vegena gadAM jvAlAkulAM tataH. gadayA tADayAmAsa sA gadA bhImamAvrajat.. 7-178-30 (53234) sa rAkShasendraM kaunteyaH sharavarShairavAkirat. tAnapyasyAkaronmoghAnrAkShaso nishitaiH sharaiH.. 7-178-31 (53235) te chApi rAkShasAH sarve rajanyAM bhImarUpiNaH. shAsanAdrAkShasendrasya nijaghnU rathaku~njarAn.. 7-178-32 (53236) pA~nchAlAH sR^i~njayAshchaiva vAjinaH paramadvipAH. na shAntiM lebhire tatra rAkShasairbhR^ishapIDitAH.. 7-178-33 (53237) taM tu dR^iShTvA mahAghoraM vartamAnaM mahAhavam. abravItpuNDarIkAkSho dhana~njayamidaM vachaH.. 7-178-34 (53238) pashya bhImaM mahAbAhuM rAkShasendravashaM gatam. padamasyAnugachCha tvaM mA vichAraya pANDava.. 7-178-35 (53239) dhR^iShTadyumnaH shikhaNDI cha yudhAmanyUttamaujasau. sahitau draupadeyAshcha karNaM yAntu mahArathAH.. 7-178-36 (53240) nakulaH sahadevashcha yuyudhAnashcha vIryavAn. itarAnrAkShasAnghnantu shAsanAttava pANDava.. 7-178-37 (53241) tvamapImAM mahAbAho chamUM droNapuraskR^itAm. mArayasva naravyAghra mahaddhi bhayamAgatam.. 7-178-38 (53242) evamukte tu kR^iShNena yathoddiShTA mahArathAH. jagmurvaikartanaM karNaM rAkShasAMshchaiva tAnraNe.. 7-178-39 (53243) atha pUrNAyatotsR^iShTaiH sharairAshIviShopamaiH. dhanushchichCheda bhImasya rAkShasendraH pratApavAn.. 7-178-40 (53244) hayAMshchAsya shitairbANaiH sArathiM cha mahAbalaH. jaghAna miShataH sa~Nkhye bhImasenasya rAkShasaH.. 7-178-41 (53245) so.avatIrya rathopasthAddhatAshvo hatasArathiH. tasmai gurvIM gadAM ghorAM vinadannutsasarja ha.. 7-178-42 (53246) tatastAM bhImanirghoShAmApatantIM mahAgadAm. gadayA rAkShaso ghoro nijaghAna nanAda cha.. 7-178-43 (53247) taddR^iShTvA rAkShasendrasya ghoraM karma bhayAvaham. bhImasenaH prahR^iShTAtmA gadAmAshu parAmR^ishat.. 7-178-44 (53248) tayoH samabhavadyuddhaM tumulaM nararakShasoH. gadAnipAtasaMhAdairbhuvaM kampayatorbhR^isham.. 7-178-45 (53249) gadAvimuktau tau bhUyaH samAsAdyetaretaram. muShTibhirvajrasaMhAdairanyonyamabhijaghnatuH.. 7-178-46 (53250) rathachakrairyugairakShairadhiShThAnairupaskaraiH. yathAsannamupAdAya nijaghnaturamarShaNau.. 7-178-47 (53251) tau vikSharantau rudhiraM samAsAdyetaretaram. mattAviva mahAnAgau chakR^ipAte punaH punaH.. 7-178-48 (53252) tAvapashyadvR^iShIkeshaH pANDavAnAM hite rataH. sa bhImasenarakShArthaM haiDimbiM paryachodayat.. .. 7-178-49 (53253) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi ghaTotkachavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe aShTasaptatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 178 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-178-5 mAdhavaH kR^itavarmA.. 5-178-7 idamasmatsainyam.. 5-178-178 aShTasaptatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 179

.. shrIH ..

7.179. adhyAyaH 179

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

ghaTotkachenA.alAyudhavadhaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-179-0 (53254) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-179-0x (4737) saMdR^ishya samare bhImaM rakShasA grastamantikAt. vAsudevo.avravIdrAjanghaTotkachamidaM vachaH.. 7-179-1 (53255) pashya bhImaM mahAbAho rakShasA grastamAhave. pashyatAM sarvasainyAnAM tava chaiva mahAdyute.. 7-179-2 (53256) sa karNaM tvaM samutsR^ijya rAkShasendramalAyudham. jahi kShipraM mahAbAho pashchAtkarNaM badhiShyasi.. 7-179-3 (53257) sa vArShNeyavachaH shrutvA karNamutsR^ijya vIryavAn. yuyudhe rAkShasendreNa bakabhrAtrA ghaTotkachaH.. 7-179-4 (53258) tayoH sutumulaM yuddhaM babhUva nishi rakShasoH. alAyudhasya chaivograM heDimbeshchApi bhArata.. 7-179-5 (53259) alAyudhasya yodhAMshcha rAkShasAnbhImadarshanAn. vegenApatataH shUrAnpragR^ihItasharAsanAn.. 7-179-6 (53260) AttAyudhaH susa~Nkruddho yuyudhAno mahArathaH. nakulaH sahadevashcha chichChidurnishitaiH sharaiH.. 7-179-7 (53261) sarvAMshcha samare rAjankirITI kShatriyarShabhAn. parichikShepa bIbhatsuH sarvataH prakira~nCharAn.. 7-179-8 (53262) karNashcha samare rAjanvyadrAvayata pArthivAn. dhR^iShTadyumnashikhaNDyAdInpA~nchAlAnAM pahArathAn.. 7-179-9 (53263) tAnvadhyamAnAndR^iShTvA.atha bhImo bhImaparAkramaH. abhyayAttvaritaH karNaM vishikhAnprakiranraNe.. 7-179-10 (53264) tataste.apyAyayurhatvA rAkShasAnyatra sUtajaH. nakulaH sahadevashcha sAtyakishcha mahArathaH. te karNe yodhayAmAsuH pA~nchAlA droNameva tu.. 7-179-11 (53265) alAyudhastu sa~Nkruddho ghaTotkachamarindamam. parigheNAtikAyena tADayAmAsa mUrdhani.. 7-179-12 (53266) sa tu tena prahAreNa bhaimasenirmahAbalaH. IShanmUrChitamAtmAnamastambhayata vIryavAn.. 7-179-13 (53267) tato dIptAgnisa~NkAshAM shataghaNTAmala~NkR^itAm. chikShepa tasmai samare gadAM kA~nchanabhUShitAm.. 7-179-14 (53268) sA hayAMshcha rathaM chAsya sArathiM cha mahAsvanA. chUrNayAmAsa vegena visR^iShTA bhImakarmaNA.. 7-179-15 (53269) sa bhagnahayachakrAkShAdvishIrNadhvajakUbarAt. utpapAta rathAttUrNaM mAyAmAsthAya rAkShasIm.. 7-179-16 (53270) sa samAsthAya mAyAM tu vavarSha rudhiraM bahu. vidyudvibhrAjitaM chAsIttumulAbhrAkulaM nabhaH.. 7-179-17 (53271) tato vajranipAtAshcha sAshanistanayitnavaH. mahAMshchaTachaTAshabdastatrAsIchcha mahAhave.. 7-179-18 (53272) tAM prekShya mahatIM mAyAM rAkShaso rAkShasasya cha. Urdhvamutpatya haiDimbistAM mAyAM mAyayA.avadhIt.. 7-179-19 (53273) so.abhivIkShya hatAM mAyAM mAyAvI mAyayaiva hi. ashmavarShaM sutumulaM visasarja ghaTotkache.. 7-179-20 (53274) ashmavarShaM sa taM ghoraM sharavarSheNa vIryavAn. dikShu vidhvaMsayAmAsa tadadbhutamivAbhavat.. 7-179-21 (53275) tato nAnApraharaNairanyonyamabhivarShatAm. AyasaiH parighaiH shUlairgadAmusalamudgaraiH.. 7-179-22 (53276) pinAkaiH karavAlaishcha tomaraprAsakampanaiH. nArAchairnishitairbhallaiH sharaishchakraiH parashvathaiH.. 7-179-23 (53277)
