ayoguDairbhiNDipAlairgoshIrSholUkhalairapi. utpATitairmahAshAkhairvividhairjagatIruhaiH.. 7-179-24 (53278) shamIpIlUkadambaishcha champakaishchaiva bhArata. i~NgudairbadarIbhishcha kovidAraishcha puShpitaiH.. 7-179-25 (53279) palAshaishchArimedaishcha plukShanyagrodhapippalaiH. mahadbhiH samare tasminnyonyamabhijaghnatuH.. 7-179-26 (53280) vipulaiH parvatAgraishcha nAnAdhAtubhirAchitaiH. teShAM shabdo mahAnAsIdvajrANAM bhidyatAmiva.. 7-179-27 (53281) yuddhaM samabhavaddhoraM bhaimyalAyudhayornR^ipa. harIndrayoryathA rAjanvAlisugrIvayoH purA.. 7-179-28 (53282) tau yuddhvA vividhairghorairAyudhairvishikhaistathA. utsR^ijya cha shitau kha~NkhAgavanyomabhipetatuH.. 7-179-29 (53283) tAvanyonyamabhidrutya kesheShu sumahAbalau. bhujAbhyAM paryagR^ihNItAM mahAkAyau mahAbalau.. 7-179-30 (53284) tau svinnagAtrau prasvedaM susruvAte janAdhipa. rudhiraM cha mahAkAyAvativR^iShTAvivAmbudau.. 7-179-31 (53285) athAbhipatya vegena samuddhAmya cha rAkShasam. balenAkShipya haiDimbishchakartAsya shiro mahat.. 7-179-32 (53286) so.apahR^itya shirastasya kuNDalAbhyAM vibhUpitam. tadA sutumulaM nAdaM nanAda sumahAbalaH.. 7-179-33 (53287) hataM dR^iShTvA mahAkAyaM bakaj~nAtimarindamam. pA~nchAlAH pANDavAshchaiva siMhanAdAnvinedire.. 7-179-34 (53288) tato bherIsahasrANi sha~NkhAnAmayutAni cha. avAdayanpANDaveyA rAkShase nihate yudhi.. 7-179-35 (53289) atIva sA nishA teShAM babhUva vijayAvahA. vidyotamAnA vibabhau samantAddIpamAlinI.. 7-179-36 (53290) alAyudhasya tu shiro bhaimasenirmahAbalaH. duryodhanasya pramukhe chikShepa gatachetasaH.. 7-179-37 (53291) atha duryodhano rAjA dR^iShTvA hatamalAyudham. babhUva paramodvignaH saha sainyena bhArata.. 7-179-38 (53292) tena hyasya pratij~nAtaM bhImasenamahaM yudhi. hanteti svayamAgamya smaratA vairamuttamam.. 7-179-39 (53293) dhruvaM sa tena hantavya ityamanyata pArthivaH. jIvitaM chirakAlaM bhrAtR^INAM chApyamanyata.. 7-179-40 (53294) sa taM dR^iShTvA vinihataM bhImasenAtmajena vai. pratij~nAM bhImasenasya pUrNAmevAbhyamanyata.. .. 7-179-41 (53295) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi ghaTotkachavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe ekonAshItyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 179 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-179-28 harIndrayoH siMhamukhyayoH.. 5-179-179 ekonAshItyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 180

.. shrIH ..

7.180. adhyAyaH 180

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

karNena ghaTotkachavadhaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-180-0 (53296) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-180-0x (4738) nihatyAlAyudhaM rakShaH prahR^iShTAtmA ghaTotkachaH. nanAda vividhAnnAdAnvAhinyA pramukhe tava.. 7-180-1 (53297) tasya taM tumulaM shabdaM shrutvA hR^idayakampanam. tAvakAnAM mahArAja bhayamAsItsudAruNam.. 7-180-2 (53298) alAyudhaviShaktaM tu bhaimaseniM mahAbalam. dR^iShTvA karNo mahAbAhuH pA~nchAlAnsamupAdravat.. 7-180-3 (53299) dashabhirdashabhirbANairdhR^iShTadyumnashikhaNDinau. dR^iDhaiH pUrNAyatotsR^iShTairbibheda nataparvabhiH.. 7-180-4 (53300) tataH paramanArAchairyudhAmanyUttamaujasau. sAtyakiM cha rathodAraM kampayamAsa mArgaNaiH.. 7-180-5 (53301) teShAmapyasyatAM sa~Nkhye sarveShAM savyadakShiNam. maNDalAnyeva chApAni vyadR^ishyanta janAdhipa.. 7-180-6 (53302) teShAM jyAtalanirghoSho rathanemisvanashcha ha. meghAnAmiva gharmAnte babhUva tumulo nishi.. 7-180-7 (53303) jyAnemighoShastanayitnumAnvai dhanustaTinmaNDalaketushR^i~NgaH. sharaughavarShAkulavR^iShTimAMshcha sa~NkrAmameghaH sa babhUva rAjan.. 7-180-8 (53304) tadadbhutaM shaila ivAprakampo varShaM mahAshailasamAnasAraH. vidhvaMsayAmAsa raNe narenadra vaikartanaH shatrugaNAvamardI.. 7-180-9 (53305) tato.atulairvajranipAtakalpaiH shitaiH sharaiH kA~nchanachitrapu~NkhaiH. shatrUnvyapohatsamare mahAtmA vaikartanaH putrahite rataste.. 7-180-10 (53306) sa~nChinnabhinnadhvajinashcha kechi-- tkechichCharairarditabhinnadehAH. kechidvisUtA vihayAshcha kechi-- dvaikartanenAshu kR^itA babhUvuH.. 7-180-11 (53307) avindamAnAstvatha sharma sa~Nkhye yaudhiShThiraM te balamabhyapadyan. tAnprekShya bhagnAnvimukhIkR^itAMshcha ghaTotkacho roShamatIva chakre.. 7-180-12 (53308) AsthAya taM kA~nchanaratnachitraM rathottamaM siMhavatsannanAda. vaikartanaM karNamupetya chApi vivyAdha vajrapratimaiH pR^iShatkaiH.. 7-180-13 (53309) tau karNinArAchashilImukhaishcha nAlIkadaNDAsanavatsadantaiH. varAhakarNaiH savipAThashR^i~Ngai- kShurapravarShaishcha vinedatuH kham.. 7-180-14 (53310) tadbANadhArAvR^itamantarikShaM tiryaggatAbhiH samare rarAja. suvarNapu~NkhajvalitaprabhAbhi-- rvichitrapuShpAbhiriva prajAbhiH.. 7-180-15 (53311) samAhitAvapratimaprabhAvA-- vanyonyamAjaghnaturuttamAstraiH. tayorhi vIrottamayorna kashchi-- ddadarsha tasminsamare visheSham.. 7-180-16 (53312) atIva tachchitramatulyarUpaM babhUva yuddhaM ravibhImasUnvoH. samAkulaM shastranipAtaghoraM divIva rAhvaMshumatoH pramattam.. 7-180-17 (53313) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-180-18x (4739) ghaTotkachaM yadA karNo na visheShayate nR^ipa. tataH prAdushchakArogramattramastravidAM varaH.. 7-180-18 (53314) tenAstreNAvadhIttasya rathaM sahayasArathim. virathashchApi haiDimbiH kShipramantaradhIyata.. 7-180-19 (53315) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-180-20x (4740) tasminnantarhite tUrNaM kuTayodhini rAkShase. mAmakaiH pratipannaM yattanmamAchakShva sa~njaya.. 7-180-20 (53316) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-180-21x (4741) antarhitaM rAkShasendraM viditvA samprAkroshankuravaH sarva eva. kathaM nAyaM rAkShasaH kUTayodhI hanyAtkarNaM samare.adR^ishyamAnaH.. 7-180-21 (53317) tataH karNo laghuchitrAstrayodhI sarvA dishaH prAvR^iNodbANajAlaiH. na vai ki~nchitprApatattatra bhUtaM tamobhUte sAyakairantarikShe.. 7-180-22 (53318) naivAdadAno na cha sandadhAno na cheShudhIspR^ishamAnaH kAragraiH. adR^ishyadvai lAghavAtsUtaputraH sarvaM bANaishChAdayAno.antarikSham.. 7-180-23 (53319) tato mAyAM dAruNAmantarikShe ghorAM bhImAM vihitAM rAkShasena. apashyAma lohitAbhraprakAshAM dedIpyantImagnishikhAmivogrAm.. 7-180-24 (53320) tatastasyAM vidyutaH prAdurAsa-- nnulkAshchApi jvalitAH kauravendra. ghopashchAsyaH prAdurAsItsughoraH sahasrasho nadatAM dundubhInAm.. 7-180-25 (53321) tataH sharAH prApatanrukmapu~NkhAH shaktyR^iShTiprAsamusalAnyAyudhAni. parashvathAstailadhautAshcha kha~NgAH pradIptAgrAstomarAH paTTasAshcha.. 7-180-26 (53322) mayUkhinaH parighA lohabaddhA gadAshchitrAH shitadhArAshcha shUlAH. gurvyo gadA hemapaTTAvanaddhAH shataghnyashcha prAdurAsansamantAt.. 7-180-27 (53323) mahAshilAshchApataMstatratatra sahasrashaH sAshanayashcha vajrAH. chakrANi chAnekashatakShurANi prAdurbabhUvurjvalanaprabhANi.. 7-180-28 (53324) tAM shaktipAShANaparashvathAnAM prAsAsivajrAshanimudgarANAm. vR^iShTiM vishAlAM jvalitAM patantIM karNaH sharaughairna shashAka hantum.. 7-180-29 (53325) sharAhatAnAM patatAM hayAnAM vajrAhatAnAM cha tathA gajAnAm. shilAhatAnAM cha mahArathAnAM mahAnninAdaH patatAM babhUva.. 7-180-30 (53326) subhImanAnAvidhashastrapAtai-- rghaTotkachenAbhihataM samantAt. dauryodhanaM vai balamArtarUpa-- mAvartamAnaM dadR^ishe bhramattat.. 7-180-31 (53327) hAhAkR^itaM samparivartamAnaM saMlIyamAnaM cha viShaNNarUpam. te tvAryabhAvAtpuruShapravIrAH parA~NmukhA no babhUvustadAnIm.. 7-180-32 (53328) tAM rAkShasIM bhImarUpAM sughorAM vR^iShTiM mahAshastramayIM patantIm. dR^iShTvA balaughAMshcha nipAtyamAnA-- nmahadbhayaM tava putrAnvivesha.. 7-180-33 (53329) shivAshcha vaishvAnaradIptajihvAH subhImanAdAH shatasho nadantIH. rakShogaNAnnardatashchApi vIkShya narendra yodhA vyathitA babhUvuH.. 7-180-34 (53330) te dIptajihvAnalatIkShNadaMShTrA vibhIShaNAH shailanikAshakAyAH. nabhogatAH shaktiviShaktahastA meghA vyamu~nchanniva vR^iShTimugrAm.. 7-180-35 (53331) tairAhatAste sharashaktishUlai-- rgadAbhirugraiH parighaishcha dIptaiH. vajraiH pinAkairashaniprahAraiH shataghnichakrairbhathitAshcha petuH.. 7-180-36 (53332) shUlA bhushuNDyo.ashmaguDAH shataghnyaH sthUlAshcha kArShNAyasapaTTanadvAH. te.avAkiraMstava putrasya sainyaM tato raudraM kashmalaM prAdurAsIt.. 7-180-37 (53333) vikIrNAntrA vihatairuttamA~NgaiH sambhagnA~NgaH shishyire tatra shUrAH. ChinnA hayAH ku~njarAshchApi bhagnA na muchyante yAchamAnAH subhItAH.. 7-180-38 (53334) evaM mahachChastravarShaM sR^ijanta-- ste yAtudhAnA bhuvi ghorarUpAH. mAyAH sR^iShTAstatra ghaTotkachena nAmu~nchanvai yAchamAnaM na bhItam.. 7-180-39 (53335) tasminghore kuruvIrAvamarde kAlotsR^iShTe kShatriyANAmabhAve. te vai bhagnAH sahasA vyadravanta prAkroshantaH kauravAH sarva eva.. 7-180-40 (53336) palAyadhvaM kuravo naitadasti sendrA devA ghnanti naH pANDavArthe. tathA teShAM majjatAM bhAratAnAM tasmindvIpaH sUtaputro babhUva.. 7-180-41 (53337) tasminsa~Nkrande tumule vartamAne sainye bhagne lIyamAne kurUNAm. annIkAnAM pravibhAge prakAshe na j~nAyante kuravo netare cha.. 7-180-42 (53338) nirmaryAde vidrave ghorarUpe sarvA dishaH prekShamANAH sma shUnyAH. tAM shastravR^iShTimurasA gAhamAnaM karNaM smaikaM tatra rAjannapashyan.. 7-180-43 (53339) tato bANairAvR^iNodantarikShaM divyAM mAyAM yodhayanrAkShasasya. hImAnkurvanduShkaraM chAryakarma naivAmuhyatsaMyuge sUtaputraH.. 7-180-44 (53340) tato bhItAH samudaikShanta karNaM rAjansarve saindhavA bAhlikAshcha. asammohaM pUjayanto.asya sa~Nkhye sampashyanto vijayaM rAkShasasya.. 7-180-45 (53341) tenotsR^iShTA chakrayuktA shataghnI samaM sarvAMshchaturo.ashvA~njaghAna. te jAnubhirjagatImanvapadya-- ngatAsavo nirdashanAkShijihvAH.. 7-180-46 (53342) tato hatAshvAdavaruhya yAnA-- dantarmanAH kuruShu prAdruvatsu. divye chAstre mAyayA vadhyamAne naivAmuhyachchintayantprAptakAlam.. 7-180-47 (53343) tato.abruvankuravaH sarva eva karNaM dR^iShTvA ghorarUpAM cha mAyAm. shaktyA rakSho jahi karNAdya tUrNaM nashyantyete kuravo dhArtarAShTrAH.. 7-180-48 (53344) kariShyataH ki~ncha no bhImapArthau tapantamenaM jahi pApaM nishIthe. yo naH sa~NgrAmAddhorarUpAdvimuchye-- tsa naH pArthAnsabAlAnyodhayeta.. 7-180-49 (53345) tasmAdenaM rAkShasaM ghorarUpaM shaktyA jahi tvaM dattayA vAsavena. mA kauravAH sarva evendrakalpA rAtriyuddhe karNa neshuH sayodhAH.. 7-180-50 (53346) sa vadhyamAno rakShasA vai nishIthe dR^iShTvA rAjaMstrAsyamAnaM balaM cha. mahachChrutvA ninadaM kauravANAM matiM dadhre shaktimokShAya karNaH.. 7-180-51 (53347) sa vai kruddhaH siMha ivAtyamarShI nAmarShayanpratighAtaM raNe.asau. shaktiM shreShThAM vaijayantImasahyAM samAdade tasya vadhaM chikIrShan.. 7-180-52 (53348) yA.asau rAjannihitA varShapUgA-- nvadhAyAjau satkR^itA phalgunasya. yAM vai prAdAtsUta putrAya shakraH shaktiM shreShThAM kuNDalAbhyAM nimAya.. 7-180-53 (53349) tAM vai shaktiM lelihAnAM pradIptAM pAshairyuktAmantakasyeva jihvAm. mR^ityoH svasAraM jvalitAmivolkAM vaikartanaH prAhiNodrAkShasAya.. 7-180-54 (53350) tAmuttamAM parakAyAvahantrIM dR^iShTvA shaktiM bAhusaMsthAM jvalantIm. bhItaM rakSho vipradudrAva rAjan kR^itvA.a.atmAnaM vindhyatulyapramANam.. 7-180-55 (53351) dR^iShTvA shaktiM karNabAhvantarasthAM nedurbhUtAnyantarikShe narendra. vavurvAtAstumulAshchApi rAja-- nsanirghAtA chAshanirgAM jagAma.. 7-180-56 (53352) sA tAM mAyAM bhasma kR^itvA jvalantI bhittvA gADhaM hR^idayaM rAkShasasya. UrdhvaM yayau dIpyamAnA nishAyAM nakShatrANAmantarANyAvivesha.. 7-180-57 (53353) sa nirbhinno vividhairastrapUgai-- rdivyairnAgairmAnuShai rAkShasaishcha. nadannAdAnvividhAnbhairavAMshcha prANAniShTAMstyAjitaH shakrashaktyA.. 7-180-58 (53354) idaM chAnyachchitramAshcharyarUpaM chakArAsau karma shatrukShayAya. tasminkAle shaktinirbhinnamarmA babhau rAja~nshailameghaprakAshaH.. 7-180-59 (53355) tato.antarikShAdapatadgatAsuH sa rAkShasendro bhuvi bhinnadehaH. avAkshirAH stabdhagAtro vijihvo ghaTotkacho mahadAsthAya rUpam.. 7-180-60 (53356) sa tadrUpaM bhairavaM bhImakarmA bhImaM kR^itvA bhaimaseniH papAta. hato.apyevaM tava sainyaikadesha-- mapothayatsvena dehena rAjan.. 7-180-61 (53357) patadrakShaH svena kAyena tUrNa-- matipramANena vivardhatA cha. priyaM kurvanpANDavAnAM gatAsu-- rakShauhiNIM tava tUrNaM jaghAna.. 7-180-62 (53358) tato mishrAH prANadansiMhanAdai-- rbheryaH sha~NkhA murajAshchAnakAshcha. dagdhAM mAyAM nihataM rAkShasaM cha dR^iShTvA hR^iShTvAH prANadankauraveyAH.. 7-180-63 (53359) tataH karNaH kurubhiH pUjyamAno yathA shakro vR^itravadhe marudbhiH. anvArUDhastava putrasya yAnaM hR^iShTashchApi prAvishattatsvasainyam.. .. 7-180-64 (53360) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi ghaTotkachavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe ashItyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 180 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-180-8 ketushR^i~NgaH dhvajashikharaH.. 5-180-15 tiryaggatAbhiriShupa~Nktibhiriti sheShaH.. 5-180-20 pratipannaM kartavyatvena j~nAtamanuShThitaM cha.. 5-180-23 adR^ishyAt adR^ishyata.. 5-180-43 urasA hArdabalena.. 5-180-180 ashItyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 181

7.181. adhyAyaH 181

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

ghaTotkachanidhanAtsarveShu shochatsu harShAdAtmAnaM pariShvajamAnaM kR^iShNaM pratyarjunena harSha~NetuprashnaH.. 1 .. kR^iShNena tadabhidhAnapUrvakaM karNaprabhAvaprashaMsanam.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-181-0 (53361) `dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-181-0x (4742) tasminhate mahAmAye mahAtejasi rAkShase. amarShitAH pANDaveyAH kimakurvanmahAraNe.. 7-181-1 (53362) marditAshcha bhR^ishaM yuddhe kimakurvanta sa~njaya.. 7-181-2 (53363) ye cha te.abhyadravandroNaM vyUDhAnIkaM prahAriNaH. sR^i~njayAH saha pA~nchAlaiste.arurvankiM mahAraNe.. 7-181-3 (53364) saumadattivadhAddroNamAyattaM saindhavasya cha. amarShAjjIvitaM tyaktvA gAhamAnaM varUthinIm.. 7-181-4 (53365) jR^imbhamANamiva vyAghraM vyAttAnanamivAntakam. kathaM pratyudyayurdroNamajayyaM kurusR^i~njayAH.. 7-181-5 (53366) AchAryaM ye cha rakShanti duryodhanapurogamAH. drauNikarNakR^ipAstAta te hyakurvankimAhave.. 7-181-6 (53367) bhAradvAjaM jighAMsantau savyasAchivR^ikodarau. ArchChatAM mAmakAnyuddhe kathaM sa~njaya shaMsa me.. 7-181-7 (53368) sindhurAjavadheneme ghaTotkachavadhena te. amarShitAshcha sa~NkruddhA raNaM chakruH kathaM yudhi'.. 7-181-8 (53369) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-181-9x (4743) haiDimbiM nihataM dR^iShTvA vishIrNamiva parvatam. babhUvuH pANDavAH sarve shokabAShpAkulekShaNAH.. 7-181-9 (53370) vAsudevastu harSheNa mahatA.abhipariplutaH. nanAda siMhavannAdaM vyathayanniva bhArata.. 7-181-10 (53371) hataM ghaTotkachaM j~nAtvA vAsudevaH pratApavAn. vinadya cha mahAnAdaM paryaShvajata phalgunam.. 7-181-11 (53372) sa vinadya mahAnAdamabhIshUnsanniyamya cha. nanarta harShasaMvIto vAtoddhUta iva drumaH.. 7-181-12 (53373) tataH pariShvajya punaH pArthamAsphoTya chAsakR^it. rathopasthagato dhImAnprANadatpunarachyutaH.. 7-181-13 (53374) prahR^iShTamanasaM j~nAtvA vAsudevaM mahAbalaH. arjuno.athAbravIdrAjannAtihR^iShTamanA iva.. 7-181-14 (53375) atiharSho.ayamasthAne tavAdya madhusUdana. shokasthAne tu samprApte haiDimbasya vadhena tu.. 7-181-15 (53376) vimukhAnIha sainyAni hataM dR^iShTvA ghaTotkacham. vayaM cha bhR^ishamudvignA heDimbestu nipAtanAt.. 7-181-16 (53377) naitatkAraNamalpaM hi bhaviShyati janArdana. tadadya shaMsa me pR^iShTaH satyaM satyavatAM vara.. 7-181-17 (53378) yadyetanna rahasyaM te vaktumarhasyarindama. dhairyasya vikR^itiM brUhi tvamadya madhusUdana.. 7-181-18 (53379) samudrasyeva saMshoShaM meroriva visarpaNam. tathaitadadya manye.ahaM tava karma janArdana.. 7-181-19 (53380) vAsudeva uvAcha. 7-181-20x (4744) atiharShamimaM prAptaM shR^iNu me tvaM dhana~njaya. atIva manasaH sadyaH prasAdakaramuttamam.. 7-181-20 (53381) shaktiM ghaTotkachenemAM vyaMsayitvA mahAdyute. karNaM nihatamevAjau viddhi sadyo dhana~njaya.. 7-181-21 (53382) shaktihastaM punaH karNaM ko loke.asti pumAniha. ya enamabhitastiShThetkArtikeyamivAhave.. 7-181-22 (53383) diShTyA.apanItakavacho diShTyA.apahR^itakuNDalaH. diShTyA sA vyaMsitA shaktiramoghA.asya ghaTotkache.. 7-181-23 (53384) yadi hi syAtsakavachastathaiva syAtsakuNDalaH. sAmarAnapi lokAMstrInekaH karNo jayedraNe.. 7-181-24 (53385) vAsavo vA kubero vA varuNo vA jaleshvaraH. yamo vA notsahetkarNaM raNe pratisamAsitum.. 7-181-25 (53386) gANDIvamudyamya bhavAMshchakraM chAhaM sudarshanam. na shaktau svo raNe jetuM tathAyuktaM nararShabham.. 7-181-26 (53387) tvaddhitArthaM tu shakreNa mAyApahR^itakuNDalaH. vihInakavachashchAyaM kR^itaH parapura~njayaH.. 7-181-27 (53388) utkR^itya kavachaM yasmAtkuNDale vimale cha te. prAdAchChakrAya vai karNastasmAdvaikartanaH smR^itaH.. 7-181-28 (53389) AshiviSha iva krudvaH stambhito mantratejasA. tathA.adya bhAti karNo me shAntajvAla ivAnalaH.. 7-181-29 (53390) yadAprabhR^iti karNAya shaktirdattA mahAtmanA. vAsavena mahAbAho kShiptA yA.asau ghaTatkache.. 7-181-30 (53391) kuNDalAbhyAM nimAyAtha divyena kavachena cha. tAM prApyAmanyata vR^iShA satataM tvAM hataM raNe.. 7-181-31 (53392) evaM gato.api shakyo.ayaM hatuM nAnyena kenachit. R^ite tvAM puruShavyAghra shape satyena chAnagha.. 7-181-32 (53393) brahmaNyaH satyavAdI cha sapasvI niyatavrataH. ripuShvapi dayAvAMshcha tasmAtkarNo vR^iShA smR^itaH.. 7-181-33 (53394) yuddhashauNDo mahAbAhurnityodyatasharAsanaH. kesarIva vane nardanmattamAta~NgayUthapAn. vimardanrathashArdUlAnrAjate raNamUrdhanixxx.. 7-181-34 (53395) madhyaMgata ivAdityo yo na shakyo nirIkShitum. tvadIyaiH puruShavyAghra yodhamukhyairmahAtsabhiH.. 7-181-35 (53396) sharajAlasahasrAMshuH sharadIva dixxxx.. 7-181-36 (53397) tapAnte jalado yadvachCharadhArAH kSharanmuhuH. divyAstrajaladaH karNaH parjanya iva vR^iShTimAn.. 7-181-37 (53398) tridashairapi chAsyadbhiH sharavarShaM samantataH. ashakyastadayaM jetuM sravadbhirmAMsashoNitam.. 7-181-38 (53399) kavachena vihInashcha kuNDalAbhyAM cha pANDava. so.adya mAnuShatAM prApto vimuktaH shakradattayA.. 7-181-39 (53400) eko hi yogo.asya bhavedvadhAya chChidre hyenaM svapramattaH pramattam. kR^ichChraM prAptaM rathachakre vimagne hanyAH pUrvaM tvaM tu saMj~nAM vichArya.. 7-181-40 (53401) na hyudyatAstraM yudhi hanyAdajayya-- mapyekavIro balabhitsavajraH.. 7-181-41 (53402) jarAsandhashchedirAjo mahAtmA mahAbAhushchaikalavyo niShAdaH. ekaikasho nihatAH sarva ete yogaistaistaistvaddhitArthaM mayaiva.. 7-181-42 (53403) athApare nihatA rAkShasendrA hiDimbakirmIrabakapradhAnAH. alAyudhaH parachakrAvamardI ghaTotkachashchograkarmA tarasvI.. .. 7-181-43 (53404) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi ghaTotkachavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe ekAshItyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 181 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-181-18 dhairyasya vaikR^itaM iti jha. pAThe asmatpakShakShayeNa tava harSho.asmaddhairyavinAshaka ityarthakhaH.. 5-181-31 kuNDalAbhyAM nimAya vinimayaM kR^itvA.. 5-181-33 vR^iShA dharmapradhAnaH.. 5-181-37 parjanya_iva vR^iShTimAn. netA netR^ibhirasyadbhiH sharavarShANi varShatAm. so.adya mAnuShatAmityAdi ka.Ta.Da.pAThaH.. 5-181-181 ekAshItyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 182

.. shrIH ..

7.182. adhyAyaH 182

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

shrIkR^iShNenArjunamprati jarAsandhAdiparAkramakathanapUrvakaM teShAM durjayatayA pUrvameva svenopAyairhananakathanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-182-0 (53405) arjuna uvAcha. 7-182-0x (4745) kathamasmaddhitArthaM te kaishcha yogairjanArdana. jarAsandhaprabhR^itayo ghAtitAH pR^ithivIshvarAH.. 7-182-1 (53406) vAsudeva uvAcha. 7-182-2x (4746) jarAsandhashchedirAjo naiShAdishcha mahAbalaH. yadi syurna hatAH pUrvamidAnIM syurbhaya~NkarAH.. 7-182-2 (53407) duryodhanastAnavashyaM vR^iNuyAdrathasattamAn. te.asmAsu nityavidviShTAH saMshrayeyushcha kauravAn.. 7-182-3 (53408) te hi vIrA maheShvAsAH kR^itAstrA dR^iDhayodhinaH. dhArtarAShTrachamUM kR^itsnAM rakSheyuramarA iva.. 7-182-4 (53409) sUtaputro jarAsandhashchedirAjo niShAdajaH. suyodhanaM samAshritya taperanpR^ithivImimAm.. 7-182-5 (53410) yogairabhihatA yaiste tanme shR^iNu dhana~njaya. ajayyA hi vinA yogairmR^idhe te daivatairapi.. 7-182-6 (53411) ekaiko hi pR^ithak teShAM samastAM ripuvAhinIm. yodhayetsamare pArtha lokapAlAbhirakShitAm.. 7-182-7 (53412) jarAsandho hi ruShito rauhiNeyapradharShitaH. asmadvadhArthaM chikShepa gadAM vai sarvaghAtinIm.. 7-182-8 (53413) sImantamiva kurvANA nabhasaH pAvakaprabhA. adR^ishyatApatantI sA shakrumuktA yathA.ashaniH.. 7-182-9 (53414) tAmApatantIM dR^iShTvaiva gadAM rohiNinandanaH. pratighAtArthamastraM vai sthUNAkarNamavAsR^ijat.. 7-182-10 (53415) astravegapratihatA sA gadA prApatadbhuvi. dArayantI dharAM devIM kampayantIva parvatAn.. 7-182-11 (53416) tatra sA rAkShasI ghorA jarAnAmnI suvikramA. sandadhe sA hi sa~njAtaM jarAsandhamarindamam.. 7-182-12 (53417) dvAbhyAM jAto hi mAtR^ibhyAmardhadehaH pR^ithakpR^ithak. jarayA sandhito yasmAjjarAsandhastato.abhavat.. 7-182-13 (53418) sA tu bhUmiM gatA pArtha hatA sasutabAndavA. gadayA tena chAstreNa sthUNAkarNena rAkShasI.. 7-182-14 (53419) vinAbhUtaH sa gadayA jarAsandho mahAmR^idhe. nihato bhImasenena pashyataste dhana~njaya.. 7-182-15 (53420) yadi hi syAdgadApANirjarAsandhaH pratApavAn. sendrA devA na taM hantuM raNe shaktA narottama.. 7-182-16 (53421) tvaddhitArthaM cha naiShAdira~NguShThena viyojitaH. droNenAchAryakaM kR^itvA ChadmanA satyavikramaH.. 7-182-17 (53422) sa tu baddhA~NgulitrANo naiShAdirdR^iDhavikramaH. atimAnI vachanaro babhau rAma ivAparaH.. 7-182-18 (53423) ekalavyaM hi sA~NguShThamashaktA devadAnavAH. sarAkShasoragAH pArtha vijetuM yudhi karhichit.. 7-182-19 (53424) kimu mAnuShamAtreNa shakyaH syAtprativIkShitum. dR^iDhamuShTiH kR^itI nityamasyamAno divAnisham.. 7-182-20 (53425) tvaddhitArthaM tu sa mayA hataH sa~NgrAmamUrdhani.. 7-182-21 (53426) chedirAjashcha vikrAntaH pratyakShaM nihatastava. sa chApyashakyaH sa~NgrAme jetuM sarvasurAsuraiH.. 7-182-22 (53427) vadhArthaM tasya jAto.ahamanyeShAM cha suradviShAm. tvatsahAyo naravyAghra lokAnAM hitakAmyayA.. 7-182-23 (53428) hiDimbabakakirmIrA bhImasenena pAtitAH. rAvaNena samaprANA brahmayaj~navinAshanAH.. 7-182-24 (53429) hatastathaiva mAyAvI haiDimbenApyalAyudhaH. haiDimbashchApyupAyena shaktyA karNena ghAtitaH.. 7-182-25 (53430) yadi hyenaM nAhaniShyatkarNaH shaktyA mahAmR^idhe. mayAM vadhyo.abhaviShyatsa bhaimasenirghaTotkachaH. mayA na nihataH pUrvameSha yuShmatpriyepsayA.. 7-182-26 (53431) eSha hi brAhmaNadveShI yaj~nadveShI cha rAkShasaH. dharmasya loptA pApAtmA tasmAdeva nipAtitaH. vyaMsitA chApyUpAyena shakradattA mayA.anagha.. 7-182-27 (53432) yehi dharmasya loptAro vadhyAste mama pANDava. dharmasaMsthApanArthaM hi pratij~naiShA mamAvyayA.. 7-182-28 (53433) brahma satyaM damaH shauchaM dharmo hIH shrIrdhR^itiH kShamA. yatra tatra rame nityamahaM satyena te shape.. 7-182-29 (53434) na viShAdastvayA kAryaH karNaM vaikartanaM prati. upadekShyAmyupAyaM te yena taM prasahiShyasi.. 7-182-30 (53435) suyodhanaM chApi raNe haniShyati vR^ikodaraH. tasyApi cha vadhopAyaM vakShyAmi tava pANDava.. 7-182-31 (53436) vardhate tumulastveSha shabdaH pacharamUM prati. vidravanti cha sainyAni tvadIyAni disho dasha.. 7-182-32 (53437) labdhalakShyA hi kauravyA vidhamanti chamUM tava. dahatyeSha cha vaH sainyaM droNaH praharatAM varaH.. .. 7-182-33 (53438) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi ghaTotkachavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe dvyashItyadhikathatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 182 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-182-1 yogairupAyaiH.. 5-182- raukmiNeyapradharShitaH iti ka.~Na.pAThaH.. 5-182- vyaMsitA vyarthIkR^itA shaktiriti sheShaH.. 5-182-dvyashItyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 182 ..
droNaparva - adhyAya 183

.. shrIH ..

7.183. adhyAyaH 183

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

dhR^itarAShTreNa sa~njayamprati karNena arjune shakteramokShaNakAraNaprashne sa~njayena sAtyakimprati kR^iShNoktataduttarakathanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-183-0 (53439) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-183-0x (4747) ekavIravadhe moghA shaktiH sUtAtmaje yadA. kasmAtsarvAnsamutsR^ijya sa tAM pArthe na muktavAn.. 7-183-1 (53440) tasminhate hatA hi syuH sarve pANDavasR^i~njayAH. ekavIravadhe kasmAdyuddhe na jayamAdadhe.. 7-183-2 (53441) AhUto na nivarteyamiti tasya mahAvratam. svayaM mArgayitavyaH sa sUtaputreNa phalgunaH.. 7-183-3 (53442) tato dvairathamAnIya phalgunaM shaktadattayA. jaghAna na vR^iShA kasmAttanmamAchakShva sa~njaya.. 7-183-4 (53443) nUnaM buddhivihInashchApyasahAyashcha me sutaH. shatrubhirvyaMsitaH pApaH kathaM nu sa jayedarIn.. 7-183-5 (53444) yA hyasya paramA shaktirjayasya cha parAyaNam. sA shakhtirvAsudevena vyaMsitA cha ghaTotkache.. 7-183-6 (53445) kuNeryathA hastagataM hiyedbilvaM balIyasA. tathA shaktiramoghA sA moghIbhUtA ghaTotkache.. 7-183-7 (53446) yathA varAhasya shunashcha yudhyato-- stayorabhAve shvapachasya lAbhaH. manye vidvanvAsudevasya tadva-- dyuddhe lAbhaH karNahaiDimbayorvai.. 7-183-8 (53447) ghaTotkacho yadi hanyAdvi karNaM paro lAbhaH sa bhavetpANDavAnAm. vaikartano vA yadi taM nihanyA-- ttathApi kR^ityaM shaktinAshAtkR^itaM syAt.. 7-183-9 (53448) iti prAj~naH praj~nayaitadvichintya ghaTotkachaM sUtaputreNa yuddhe. aghAtayadvAsudevo nR^isiMhaH priyaM kurvanpANDavAnAM hitaM cha.. 7-183-10 (53449) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-183-11x (4748) etachchikIrShitaM j~nAtvA karNe madhunihA nR^ipa. niyojayAmAsa tadA dvairathe rAkShaseshvaram.. 7-183-11 (53450) ghaTotkachaM mahAvIryaM mahAbuddhirjanArdanaH. amoghAyA vighAtArthaM rAjandurmantrite tava.. 7-183-12 (53451) tadaiva kR^itakAryA hi vayaM syAma kurUdvaha. na rakShedyadi kR^iShNastaM pArthaM karNAnmahArathAt.. 7-183-13 (53452) sAshvadhvajarathaH sa~Nkye dhR^itarAShTra patedbhuvi. vinA janArdanaM pArtho yogAnAmIshvaraM prabhum.. 7-183-14 (53453) taistairupAyairbahubhI rakShyamANaH sa pArthiva. jayatyabhimukhaH shatrUnpArthaH kR^iShNena pAlitaH.. 7-183-15 (53454) savisheShaM tvameyAtmA kR^iShNo rakShenna phalgunam. hanyAtkShipraM hi kaunteyaM shaktirvR^ikShamivAshaniH.. 7-183-16 (53455) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-183-17x (4749) virodhI cha kumantrI cha prAj~namAnI mamAtmajaH. yasyaiSha samatikrAnto vadhopAyo jayaM prati.. 7-183-17 (53456) sa vA karNo mahAbuddhiH sarvashastrabhR^itAM varaH. na muktavAnkathaM sUta tAmamoghAM dhana~njaye.. 7-183-18 (53457) tavApi samatikrAntametadgAvalgaNe katham. etamarthaM mahAbuddhe yattvayA nAvabodhitaH.. 7-183-19 (53458) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-183-20x (4750) duryodhanasya shakunermama duHshAsanasya cha. rAtrau rAtrau bhavatyeShA nityameva vikatthanA.. 7-183-20 (53459) shvaH sarvasainyAnutsR^ijya jahi karNa dhana~njayam. preShyavatpANDupA~nchAlAnupabhokShyAmahe tataH.. 7-183-21 (53460) athavA nihate pArthaM pANDavAnyatamaM tataH. sthApayedyadi vArShNeyastasmAtkR^iShNo hi hanyatAm.. 7-183-22 (53461) kR^iShNo hi mUlaM pANDUnAM pArthaH skandha ivodgataH. shAkhA ivetare pArthAH pA~nchAlAH patrasaMj~nitAH.. 7-183-23 (53462) kR^iShNAshrayAH kR^iShNabalAH kR^iShNanAthAshcha pANDavAH. kR^iShNaH parAyaNaM chaiShAM jyotiShAmiva chandramAH.. 7-183-24 (53463) tasmAtparNAni shAkhAshcha skandhaM chotsR^ijya sUtaja. kR^iShNaM hi vidvi pANDUnAM mUlaM sarvatra sarvadA.. 7-183-25 (53464) hanyAdyadi hi dAshArhaM karNo yAdavanandanam. kR^itsnA vasumatI rAjanvashe tasya na saMshayaH.. 7-183-26 (53465) yadi hi sa nihataH shayIta bhUmau yadukulapANDavanandano mahAtmA. nanu tava vasudhA narendra sarvA sagirisamudravanA vashaM vrajeta.. 7-183-27 (53466) sA tu buddhiH kR^itA.apyevaM jAgrati tridasheshvare. aprameye hR^iShIkeshe yuddhakAle tvamuhyata.. 7-183-28 (53467) arjunaM chApi rAdheyAtsadA rakShati keshavaH. na hyenamaichChatpramukhe sauteH sthApayituM raNe.. 7-183-29 (53468) anyAMshchAsmai rathodArAnupAsthApayadachyutaH. amoghAM tAM kathaM shaktiM moghAM kuryAmiti prabho.. 7-183-30 (53469) yashchaivaM rakShate pArthaM karNAtkR^iShNo mahAmanAH. AtmAnaM sa kathaM rAjanna rakShetpurupottamaH.. 7-183-31 (53470) parichintya tu pashyAmi chakrAyudhamarindamam. na so.asti triShu lokeShu yo jayeta janArdanam.. 7-183-32 (53471) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-183-33x (4751) tataH kR^iShNaM mahAbAhuM sAtyakiH satyavikramaH. paprachCha rathashArdUlaH karNaM prati mahArathaH.. 7-183-33 (53472) ayaM cha pratyayaH karNe shaktishchAmitavikramA. kimarthaM sUtaputreNa na muktA phalgune tu sA.. 7-183-34 (53473) vAsudeva uvAcha. 7-183-35x (4752) duHshAsanashcha karNashcha shakunishcha masaindhavaH. satataM mantrayanti sma duryodhanapurogamAH. 7-183-35 (53474) karNakarNa maheShvAsa raNe.amitaparAkrama. nAnyasya shaktireShA te moktavyA jayatAM vara.. 7-183-36 (53475) R^ite mahArathAtkarNa kuntIputrAdvana~njayAt. sa hi teShAmatiyashA devAnAmiva vAsavaH.. 7-183-37 (53476) tasminvinihate pArthe pANDavAH sR^i~njayaiH saha. bhaviShyanti gatAtmAnaH surA iva niragnayaH.. 7-183-38 (53477) tatheti cha pratij~nAtaM karNena shinipu~Ngava. hR^idi nityaM cha karNasya vadho gANDIvadhanvanaH.. 7-183-39 (53478) ahameva tu rAdheyaM mohayAmi yudhAMvara. tato nAvAsR^ijachChaktiM pANDave shvetavAhane.. 7-183-40 (53479) phalgunasya hi sA mR^ityuriti chintayato.anisham. na nidrA na cha me hArSho manaso.asti yudhAMvara.. 7-183-41 (53480) ghaTotkache vyaMsitAM tu dR^iShTvA tAM shinipu~Ngava. mR^ityorAsyAntarAnmuktaM pasyAmyadya dhana~njayam.. 7-183-42 (53481) na pitA na cha me mAtA na yUyaM bhrAtarastathA. na cha prANAstathA rakShyA yathA bIbhatsurAhave.. 7-183-43 (53482) trailokyarAjyAdyatki~nchidbhavedanyatsudurlabham. nechCheyaM sAtvatAhaM tadvinA pArthaM dhana~njayam.. 7-183-44 (53483) ataH praharShaH sumahAnyuyudhAnAdya me.abhavat. mR^itaM pratyAgatamiva dR^iShTvA pArthaM dhana~njayam.. 7-183-45 (53484) atashcha prahito yuddhe mayA karNAya rAkShasaH. na hyanyaH samare rAtrau shaktaH karNaM prabAdhitum.. 7-183-46 (53485) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-183-47x (4753) iti sAtyakaye prAha tadA devakinandanaH. dhana~njayahite yuktastatpriye satataM rataH.. .. 7-183-47 (53486) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi ghaTotkachavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe tryashItyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 183 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-183-7 hiyet hiyeta.. 5-183-11 etatprakR^itashaktyArjunahananam.. 5-183-17 savisheShAttvamoghAyAH kR^iShNo.arakShata pANDavama iti jha. pAThaH. eSha kR^itsnaH jayamprati arjunasyetyarthaH.. 5-183-38 niragnayo.agniMvinA mukhahInA ivetyarthaH.. 5-183-47 hite AmuShmike shreyasi. priye aihike kalyANe.. 5-183-183 vyashItyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 184

.. shrIH ..

7.184. adhyAyaH 184

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

karNashakterghaTotkachavadhena vaiphalyAddhR^itarAShTreNa shochanam.. 1 .. yudhiShThireNa kR^iShNe ghaTotkachakR^itopakAranivedanapUrvakaM shochana.. 2 .. vyAsena krodhAtkarNajighAMsayA gachChantaM yudhiShThirametya samAshvAsanena taM nivartya punarantardhAnam.. 3 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-184-0 (53487) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-184-0x (4754) karNaduryodhanAdInAM shakuneH saubalasya cha. apanItaM mahattAta tava chaiva visheShataH.. 7-184-1 (53488) yadi jAnItha tAM shaktimekaghnIM satataM raNe. anivAryAmasahyAM cha devairapi savAsavaiH.. 7-184-2 (53489) sA kimarthaM tu karNena pravR^itte samare purA. na devakIsute muktA phalgune vA.api sa~njaya.. 7-184-3 (53490) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-184-4x (4755) sa~NgrAmAdvinivR^ittAnAM sarveShAM no vishAmpate. rAtrau kurukulashreShTha mantro.ayaM samajAyata.. 7-184-4 (53491) prabhAtamAtre shvobhUte keshavAyArjunAya vA. shaktireShA hi moktavyA karNakarNeni nityashaH.. 7-184-5 (53492) tataH prabhAtasamaye rAjankarNasya daivataiH. anyeShAM chaiva yodhAnAM sA buddhirnAshyate punaH.. 7-184-6 (53493) daivameva paraM manye yatkarNo hastasaMsthayA. na jaghAna raNe pArthaM kR^iShNaM vA devakIsutam.. 7-184-7 (53494) tasya hastasthitA shaktiH kAlarAtririvodyatA. daivopahatabuddhitvAnna tAM karNo vimuktavAn.. 7-184-8 (53495) kR^iShNe vA devakIputre mohito devamAyayA. pArthe vA shakrakalpe vai vadhArthaM vAsavIM prabho.. 7-184-9 (53496) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-184-10x (4756) daivenopahatA yUyaM svabuddhyA keshavasya cha. gatA hi vAsavI hatvA tR^iNabhUtaM ghaTotkacham.. 7-184-10 (53497) karNashcha mama putrAshcha sarve chAnye cha pArthivAH. tena vai duShpraNItena gatA vaivasvatakShayam.. 7-184-11 (53498) bhUya eva tu me shaMsa yathA yuddhamavartata. kR^irUNAM pANDavAnAM cha haiDimbau nihate tadA.. 7-184-12 (53499) ye cha te.abhyadravandroNaM vyUDhAnIkAH prahAriNaH. sR^i~njayAH saha pA~nchAlaiste.apyakurvankathaM raNam.. 7-184-13 (53500) saumadattervadhAddroNamAyAntaM saindhavasya cha. amarShAjjIvitaM tyaktvA gAhamAnaM varUthinIm.. 7-184-14 (53501) jR^imbhamANamiva vyAghraM vyAttAnanamivAntakam. kathaM pratyudyayurdroNamasyantaM pANDusR^i~njayAH.. 7-184-15 (53502) AchAryaM ye cha te.arakShanduryodhanapurogamAH. drauNikarNakR^ipAstAta te vA.akurvankimAhave.. 7-184-16 (53503) bhAradvAjaM jighAMsantau savyasAchivR^ikIdarau. samArchChanmAmakA yuddhe kathaM sa~njaya shaMsa me.. 7-184-17 (53504) sindhurAjavadheneme ghaTotkachavadhena te. amarpitAH susa~NkruddhA raNaM chakruH kathaM nishi.. 7-184-18 (53505) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-184-19x (4757) hate ghaTotkache rAjankarNena nishi rAkShase. praNadatsu cha hR^iShTeShu tAvakeShu yuyutsuShu.. 7-184-19 (53506) Apatatsu cha vegena vadhyamAne bale.api cha. vigADhAyAM rajanyAM cha rAjA dainyaM paraM gataH.. 7-184-20 (53507) abravIchcha mahAbAhurbhImasenamidaM vachaH. AvAraya mahAbAho dhArtarAShTrasya vAhinIm.. 7-184-21 (53508) haiDimbeshchaiva ghAtena moho mAmAvishanmahAn. evaM bhImaM samAdishya svarathe samupAvishat.. 7-184-22 (53509) ashrupUrNamukho rAjA niHshvasaMshcha punaHpunaH. kashmalaM prAvishaddhoraM dR^iShTvA karNasya vikramam.. 7-184-23 (53510) taM tathA vyathitaM dR^iShTvA kR^iShNo vachanamabravIt.. 7-184-24 (53511) mA vyathAM kuru kaunteya naitattvayyupapadyate. vaiklavyaM bharatashreShTha yathA prAkR^itapUruShe.. 7-184-25 (53512) uttiShTha rAjanyudhvasva vaha gurvIM dhuraM vibho. tvayi vaiklavyamApanne saMshayo vijaye bhavet.. 7-184-26 (53513) shrutvA kR^iShNasya vachanaM dharmarAjo yudhiShThiraH. vimR^ijya netre pANibhyAM kR^iShNaM vachanamabravIt.. 7-184-27 (53514) viditA me mahAbAho dharmANAM paramA gatiH. brahmahatyAphalaM tasya yaH kR^itaM nAvabudhyate.. 7-184-28 (53515) asmAkaM hi vanasthAnAM haiDimbena mahAtsanA. bAlenApi satA tena kR^itaM sAhyaM janArdana.. 7-184-29 (53516) astrahetorgataM j~nAtvA pANDavaM svetavAhanam. asau kR^iShNa maheShvAsaH kAmyake mAmupasthitaH.. 7-184-30 (53517) uShitashcha sahAsmAbhiryAvannAsIddhana~njayaH. gandhamAdanayAtrAyAM durgebhyashcha sma tAritAH. pA~nchAlI cha parishrAntA pR^iShThenoDhA mahAtmanA.. 7-184-31 (53518) ArambhAMshchaiva yuddhAnAM yadeSha kR^itavAnprabho. madarthe duShkaraM karma kR^itaM tena mahAhave.. 7-184-32 (53519) svabhAvAdyA cha me prItiH sahadeve janArdana. saiva me dviguNA prItI rAkShasendre ghaTotkache.. 7-184-33 (53520) bhaktashcha mehAbAhuH priyo.asyAhaM priyashcha me. tena vindAmi vArShNeya kashmalaM shokatApitAH.. 7-184-34 (53521) pashya sainyAni vArShNeya drAvyamANAni kauravaiH. droNakarNau tu saMyattau pashya yuddhe mahArathau.. 7-184-35 (53522) nishIthe pANDavaM sainyamAbhyAM mAdhava marditam. gajAbhyAmiva mattAbhyAM yathA nalavanaM mahat.. 7-184-36 (53523) anAdR^itya balaM bAhvorbhImasenasya mAdhava. chitrAstratAM cha pArthasya vikramante cha kauravAH.. 7-184-37 (53524) eSha droNashcha karNashcha rAjA chaiva suyodhanaH. nihatya rAkShasaM yuddhe hR^iShTA nardanti saMyuge.. 7-184-38 (53525) kathaM vA.asamAsu jIvatsu tvayi chaiva janArdana. haiDimbiH prAptavAnmR^ityaM sUtaputreNa sa~NgataH.. 7-184-39 (53526) kadarthIkR^itya naH sarvAnpashyataH savyasAchinaH. nihato rAkShasaH kR^iShNa bhaimasenirmahAbalaH.. 7-184-40 (53527) yadA.abhimanyurnihato dhArtarAShTrairdurAtmabhiH. nAsIttatra raNe kR^iShNa savyasAchI mahArathaH.. 7-184-41 (53528) nirudvAshcha vayaM sarve saindhavena durAtmanA. nimittamabhavaddroNaH saputrastatra karmaNi.. 7-184-42 (53529) upadiShTo vadhopAyaH karNasya guruNA svayam. vyAyachChatashcha kha~Ngena dvidhA kha~NgaM chakAra ha.. 7-184-43 (53530) vyasane vartamAnasya kR^itavarmA nR^ishaMsavat. ashvA~njaghAna sahasA tathobhau pArShNisArathI. tathetare maheShvAsAH saubhadraM yudhyapAtayan.. 7-184-44 (53531) alpe cha kAraNe kR^iShNa hato gANDIvadhanvanA. saindhavo yAdavashreShTha tachcha nAtipriyaM mama.. 7-184-45 (53532) yadi shatruvadho nyAyyo bhavetkartuM hi pANDavaiH. karNadroNau raNe pUrvaM hantavyAviti me matiH.. 7-184-46 (53533) etau hi mUlaM duHkhAnAmasmAkaM puruSharShabha. etau raNe samAsAdya samAshvastaH suyodhanaH.. 7-184-47 (53534) yatra vadhyo bhaveddroNaH sUtaputrashcha sAnugaH. tatrAvadhInmahAbAhuH saindhavaM dUravAsinam.. 7-184-48 (53535) avashyaM tu mayA kAryaH sUtaputrasya nigrahaH. tato yAsyAmyahaM vIra svayaM karNajighAMsayA.. 7-184-49 (53536) bhImaseno mahAbAhurdroNAnIkena sa~NgataH.. 7-184-50 (53537) evamuktvA yayau tUrNaM tvaramANo yudhiShThiraH. sa viShphArya mahachchApaM sha~NkhaM pradhmApya bhairavam.. 7-184-51 (53538) tato rathasahasreNa gajAnAM cha shataistribhiH. vAjibhiH pa~nchasAhasraiH pA~nchAlaiH saprabhadrakaiH. vR^itaH shikhaNDI tavarito rAjAnaM pR^iShThato.anvayAt.. 7-184-52 (53539) tato bherIH samAjaghnuH paNavAnakagomukhAn. shahkhashabdaravAMshchaiva pANishabdAMshcha daMshitAH. pA~nchAlAH pANDavAshchaiva yudhiShThirapurogamAH.. 7-184-53 (53540) tato.abravInmahAbAhurvAsudevo dhana~njayam.. 7-184-54 (53541) eSha prayAti tvaritaH krodhAviShTo yudhiShThiraH. jighAMsuH sUtaputrasya tasyopekShA na yujyate.. 7-184-55 (53542) evamuktvA hR^iShIkeshaH shIghramashvAnachodayat. dUraM prayAntaM rAjAnamanvagachChajjanArdanaH.. 7-184-56 (53543) taM dR^iShTvA sahasA yAntaM bhUtaputrajighAMsayA. shokopahatasa~NkalpaM dahyamAnamivAgninA. abhigamyAbravIdvyAso dharmaputraM yudhiShThiram.. 7-184-57 (53544) vyAsa uvAcha. 7-184-58x (4758) karNamAsAdya sa~NgrAme diShTyA jIvati phalgunaH.. 7-184-58 (53545) savyasAchivadhAkA~NkShI shaktiM rakShitavAnhi saH. na chAgAddvairathaM jiShNurdiShTyA tena mahAraNe.. 7-184-59 (53546) sR^ijetAM spardhinAvetau divyAnyastrANi sarvashaH. vadhmAneShu chAstreShu pIDitaH sUtanandanaH.. 7-184-60 (53547) vAsavIM samare shaktiM dhruvaM mu~nchedyudhiShThira. tato bhavette vyasanaM ghoraM bharatasattama.. 7-184-61 (53548) diShTyA rakSho hataM yuddhe sUtaputreNa mAnada. vAsavIM kAraNaM kR^itvA kAlenopahato hyasau.. 7-184-62 (53549) tavaiva kAraNAdrakSho nihataM tAta saMyuge. mA krudho bharatashreShTha mA cha shoke manaH kR^ithAH.. 7-184-63 (53550) prANinAmiha sarveShAmeShA niShThA yudhiShThira. bhrAtR^ibhiH sahitaH sarvaiH pArthivaishcha mahAtmabhiH.. 7-184-64 (53551) kauravAnsamare rAjanpratiyudhyasva bhArata. pa~nchame divase tAta pR^ithivI te bhaviShyati.. 7-184-65 (53552) nityaM cha puruShavyAghra dharmamevAnuchintaya. AnR^ishaMsyaM tapo dAnaM kShamAM satyaM cha pANDava.. 7-184-66 (53553) sevethAH paramaprIto yato dharmastato jayaH. ityuktvA pANDavaM vyAsastatraivAntaradhIyata.. .. 7-184-67 (53554) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi ghaTotkachavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe chaturashItyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 184 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-184-1 mahat jayAlambanamamoghashaktirUpamiti sheShaH. apanItaM nA shitam. mahadapanItaM anyAya iti vA.. 5-184-11 duShpraNItena durna yena.. 5-184-32 abhij~nashchaiveti jha. pAThaH.. 5-184-184 chaturashItyadhikashatatamodhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 185

.. shrIH ..

7.185. adhyAyaH 185

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

nidropadrutAnAM sainyAnAmarjunAj~nayA svApena shrAntimapanIya chandrodayAnantaraM yuddhArambhaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-185-0 (53555) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-185-0x (4759) vyAsenaivamathoktastu dharmarAjo yudhiShThiraH. svayaM karNavadhAdvIro nivR^itto bharatarShabha.. 7-185-1 (53556) ghaTotkache tu nihate sUtaputreNa tA nishAm. duHkhAmarShavashaM prApto dharmarAjo yudhiShThiraH.. 7-185-2 (53557) dR^iShTvA bhImena mahatIM vAryamANAM chamUM tava. dhR^iShTadyumnamuvAchedaM kumbhayoniM nivAraya.. 7-185-3 (53558) tvaM hi droNavinAshAya samutpanno hutAshanAt. sasharaH kavachI kha~NgI dhanvI cha paratApanaH. abhidrava raNe hR^iShTo mA cha te bhIH katha~nchana.. 7-185-4 (53559) janamejayaH shikhaNDI cha daurmukhishcha yashodharaH. abhidravantu saMhR^iShTAH kumbhayoniM samantataH.. 7-185-5 (53560) nakulaH sahadevashcha draupadeyAH prabhadrakAH. drupadashcha virATashcha putrabhAtR^isamanvitau.. 7-185-6 (53561) sAtyakiH kekayAshchaiva pANDavashcha dhana~njayaH. abhidravantu vegena kumbhayonivadhepsayA.. 7-185-7 (53562) tathaiva rathinaH sarve hastyashvaM yachcha ki~nchana. padAtAshcha raNe droNaM pAtayantu mahAratham.. 7-185-8 (53563) tathA.a.aj~naptAstu te sarve pANDavena mahAtmanA. abhyadravanta vegena kumbhayonivadhepsayA.. 7-185-9 (53564) AgachChatastAnsahasA sarvodyogena pANDavAn. pratijagrAha samare droNaH shastrabhR^itAM varaH.. 7-185-10 (53565) tato duryodhano rAjA sarvodyogena pANDavAn. abhyadravatsusa~Nkruddha ichChandroNasya jIvitam.. 7-185-11 (53566) tataH pravavR^ite yuddhaM shrAntavAhanasainikam. pANDavAnAM kurUNAM cha garjatAmitaretaram.. 7-185-12 (53567) nidrAndhAste mahArAja parishrAntAshcha saMyuge. nAbhyapadyanta samare kA~nchichcheShTAM mahArathAH.. 7-185-13 (53568) triyAmA rajanI chaiShA ghorarUpA bhayAnakA. sahasrayAmapratimA babhUva prANahAriNI.. 7-185-14 (53569) vadhyatAM cha tathA teShAM kShatAnAM cha visheShataH. ghorA rAtriH samAjaj~ne nidrAndhAnAM visheShataH.. 7-185-15 (53570) sarve hyAsannirutsAhAH kShatriyA dInachetasaH. tava chaiva pareShAM cha gatAstrA vigateShavaH.. 7-185-16 (53571) te tadA pArayantashcha bhramantashcha visheShataH. svadharmamanupashyanto na jahuH svAmanIkinIm.. 7-185-17 (53572) astrANyanye samutsR^ijya nidrAndhAH sherate janAH. ratheShvanye gajeShvanye hayeShvanye cha bhArata.. 7-185-18 (53573) nidrAndhA no bubudhire kA~nchichcheShTAM narAdhipa. tAnanye samare yodhAH preShayanti yamakShayam.. 7-185-19 (53574) svapnAyamAnAMstvapare parAnativichetasaH. AtmAnaM samare jaghnuH svAneva cha parAnapi.. 7-185-20 (53575) nAnAvAcho vimu~nchanto nidrAndhAste mahAraNe.. 7-185-21 (53576) asmAkaM cha mahArAja parebhyo bahavo janAH. yoddhavyamiti tiShThanto nidAsaMraktalochanAH.. 7-185-22 (53577) saMsarpanto raNe kechinnidrAndhAste tathAparAn. jaghruH shUrA raNe shUrAMstasmiMstamasi dAruNe.. 7-185-23 (53578) hanyamAnamathAtmAvanaM paraishcha bahavo janAH. nAbhyajAnanta samare nidrayA mohitA bhR^isham.. 7-185-24 (53579) teShAmetAdR^ishIM cheShTAM vij~nAya puruSharShabhaH. uvAcha vAkyaM bIbhatsuruchchaiH sannAdayandishaH.. 7-185-25 (53580) shrAntA bhavanto nidrAndhAH sarva eva savAhanAH. tamasA cha vR^ite sainye rajasA bahulena cha.. 7-185-26 (53581) te yUyaM yadi manyadhvamupAramata sainikAH. nimIlayata chAtraiva raNabhUmau muhUrtakam.. 7-185-27 (53582) tato vinidrA vishrAntAshchandramasyudite punaH. saMsAdhayiShyathAnyonyaM svargAya kurupANDavAH.. 7-185-28 (53583) tadvachaH sarvadharmaj~nA dhArmikasya vishAmpate. arochayanta sainyAni tathA chAnyonyamabruvan.. 7-185-29 (53584) chukrushuH karNakarNeni tathA duryodhaneti cha. upAramata pANDUnAM viratA hi varUthinI.. 7-185-30 (53585) tathA vikroshamAnasya phalgunasya tatastataH. upAramata pANDUnAM senA tava cha bhArata.. 7-185-31 (53586) tAmasya vAchaM devAshcha R^iShayashcha mahAtmanaH. sarvasainyAni chAkShudrAM prahR^iShTAH pratyapUjayan.. 7-185-32 (53587) tatsampUjya vacho.akrUraM sarvasainyAni bhArata. muhUrtamasvapanrAja~nshrAntAni bharatarShabha.. 7-185-33 (53588) sA tu samprApya vishrAmaM dhvajinI tava bhArata. sukhamAptavatI vIramarjunaM pratyapUjayat.. 7-185-34 (53589) tvayi vedAstathAstrANi tvayi buddhiparAkramau. dharmastvayi mahAbAho dayA bhUteShu chAnagha.. 7-185-35 (53590) yachchAshvastAstavechChAmaH sharma pArtha tadastu te. manasashcha priyAnarthAnvIra kShipramavApnuhi.. 7-185-36 (53591) iti te taM naravyAghraM prashaMsanto mahArathAH. nidrayA samavAkShiptAstUShNImAsanvishAmpate.. 7-185-37 (53592) `vIrA vAraNakumbheShu suShupuryuddhakarshitAH. rAtrau ratiparishrAntAH kAminInAM kucheShviva'.. 7-185-38 (53593) ashvapR^iShTheShu chApyanye rathanIDeShu chApare. gajaskandhagatAshchAnye sherate chApare kShitau.. 7-185-39 (53594) sAyudhAH sagadAshchaiva sakha~NgAH saparashvathAH. saprAsakavachAshchAnye narAH suptAH pR^ithakpR^ithak.. 7-185-40 (53595) gajAste pannagAbhogairhastairbhUreNuguNThitaiH. nidrAndhA vasudhAM chakrurghrANaniH shvAsashItalAm.. 7-185-41 (53596) suptAH shushubhire tatra niHshvasanto mahItale. vikIrNA girayo yadvanniHshvasadbhirmahoragaiH.. 7-185-42 (53597) samAM cha viShamAM chakruH khurAgrairvikR^itAM mahIm. hayAH kA~nchanayoktrAste kesarAlambibhiryugaiH. suShupustatra rAjendra yuktA vAheShu sarvashaH.. 7-185-43 (53598) evaM hayAshcha nAgAshcha yodhAshcha bharatarpabha. yuddhAdviramya suShupuH shrameNa mahatA.anvitAH.. 7-185-44 (53599) tattathA nidrayA bhagnaM tadbabhau niHsvanaM balam. kushalaiH shilpibhirnyastaM paTe chitramivAdbhutam.. 7-185-45 (53600) te kShatriyAH kuNDalino yuvAnaH parasparaM sAyakavikShatA~NgAH. kumbheShu lInAH suShupurgajAnAM kucheShu lagnA iva kAminInAm.. 7-185-46 (53601) tataH kumudanAthena kAminIgaNDapANDunA. netrAnandena chandreNa mAhendrI digala~NkR^itA.. 7-185-47 (53602) dashashatAkShakakubdariniHsR^itaH kiraNakesarabhAsurapi~njaraH. timiravAraNavR^ithavidAraNaH samudiyAdudayAchalakesarI.. 7-185-48 (53603) haravR^iShottamagAtrasamadyutiH smarasharAsanapUrNasamaprabhaH. navavadhR^ismitachArumanoharaH pravisR^itaH kumudAkarabAndhavaH.. 7-185-49 (53604) tato muhUrtAdbhagavAnpurastAchChashalakShaNaH. aruNaM darshayAmAsa grasa~njyotiH prabhAM prabhuH.. 7-185-50 (53605) aruNasya tu tasyAnu jAtarUpasamaprabham. rashmijAlaM mahachchandro mandaM mandamavAsR^ijat.. 7-185-51 (53606) utsArayantaH prabhayA tamaste chandrarashmayaH. paryagachCha~nChanaiH sarvA dishaH khaM cha kShitiM tathA.. 7-185-52 (53607) tato muhUrtAdbhuvanaM jyotirbhUtamivAbhavat. aprakhyamaprakAshaM cha jagAmAshu tamastathA.. 7-185-53 (53608) pratiprakAshite loke divAbhUte nishAkare. vicherurna vicherushcha rAjannakta~ncharAstataH.. 7-185-54 (53609) bodhyamAnaM tu tatsainyaM rAjaMshchandrasya rashmibhiH. bubudhe shatapatrANAM vanaM sUryAMshubhiryathA.. 7-185-55 (53610) yathA chandrodayoddhUtaH kShubhitaH sAgaro.abhavat. tathA chandrodayoddhUtaH kShubhitashcha balArNavaH.. 7-185-56 (53611) tataH pravavR^ite yuddhaM punareva vishAmpate. loke lokavinAshAya paraM lokamabhIpsatAm.. .. 7-185-57 (53612) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi droNavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe pa~nchAshItyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 185 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-185-28 sa~NgrAmamiti jha.pAThaH.. 5-185-185 pa~nchAshItyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 186

.. shrIH ..

7.186. adhyAyaH 186

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

duryodhanopAlambhakopitena droNena pArthaduryodhanaprashaMsAdhikShepapUrvakaM raNAya niHsaraNam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-186-0 (53613) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-186-0x (4760) tato duryodhano dromamabhigamyAbravIdidam. amarShavashamApanno janayanharShatejasI.. 7-186-1 (53614) duryodhana uvAcha. 7-186-2x (4761) na marShaNIyAH sa~NgrAme vishramantaH shramAnvitAH. sapatnA glAnamanaso labdhalakShA visheShataH.. 7-186-2 (53615) yattu marShitamasmAbhirbhavataH priyakAmyayA. ta ete parivishrAntAH pANDavA balavattarAH.. 7-186-3 (53616) sarvathA parihInAH sma tejasA cha balena cha. bhavatA pAlyamAnAste vivardhante punaHpunaH.. 7-186-4 (53617) divyAnyastrANi sarvANi brAhmAdIni cha yAni ha. tAni sarvAmi tiShThanti bhavatyeva visheShataH.. 7-186-5 (53618) na pANDaveyA na vayaM nAnye loke dhanurdharAH. yudhyamAnasya te tulyAH satyametadbravImi te.. 7-186-6 (53619) sasurAsuragandharvAnimA.NlokAndvijottama. sarvAstravidbhavAnhanyAddivyairastrairna saMshayaH.. 7-186-7 (53620) sa bhavAnmarShayatyenAMstava tulyAnavetya cha. shiShyatvaM vA puraskR^itya mama vA mandabhAgyatAm.. 7-186-8 (53621) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-186-9x (4762) evamuddharShito droNaH kopitashcha sutena te. samanyurabravIdrAjanduryodhanamidaM vachaH.. 7-186-9 (53622) sthaviraH sanparaM shaktyA ghaTe duryodhanAhave. ataH paraM mayA kAryaM kShudraM vijayagR^iddhinA. anastravidayaM sarvo hantavyo.astravidA janaH.. 7-186-10 (53623) yadbhavAnmanyate chApi shubhaM vA yadi vA.ashubham. tadvai kartA.asmi kauravya vachanAttava nAnyathA.. 7-186-11 (53625) nihatya sarvapA~nchAlAnyuddhe kR^itvA parAkramam. vimokShye kavachaM rAjansatyenAyudhamAlabhe.. 7-186-12 (53626) manyase yachcha kaunteyamarjunaM shrAntamAhave. tasya vIryaM mahAbAho shR^iNu satyena kaurava.. 7-186-13 (53627) taM na devA na gandharvA na yakShA na cha rAkShasAH. utsahante raNe jetuM kupitaM savyasAchinam.. 7-186-14 (53628) khANDave yena bhagavAnpratyudyAtaH sureshvaraH. sAyakairvAritashchApi varShamANo mahAtmanA.. 7-186-15 (53629) yakShA nAgAstathA daityA ye chAnye balagarvitAH. nihatAH puruShendreNa tachchApi viditaM tava.. 7-186-16 (53630) gandharvA ghoShayAtrAyAM chitrasenAdayo jitAH. yUyaM tairhriyamANAshcha mokShitA dR^iDhadhanvanA.. 7-186-17 (53631) nivAtakavachAshchApi devAnAM shatravastathA. surairavadhyAH sa~NgrAme tena vIreNa nirjitAH.. 7-186-18 (53632) dAnavAnAM sahasrANi hiraNyapuravAsinAm. vijigye puruShavyAghraH sa shakyo mAnuShaiH katham.. 7-186-19 (53633) pratyakShaM chaiva te sarvaM yathA balamidaM tava. kShapitaM pANDuputreNa cheShTatAM no vishAmpate.. 7-186-20 (53634) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-186-21x (4763) taM tadA.abhiprashaMsantamarjunaM kupitastadA. droNaM tava suto rAjanpunarevedamabravIt.. 7-186-21 (53635) ahaM duHshAsanaH karNaH shakunirmAtulashcha me. haniShyAmo.arjunaM sa~Nkhye dvidhA kR^itvA.adya bhAratIm. `tiShTha sa tvaM mahAbAho nityaM shiShyaH priyastava'.. 7-186-22 (53636) tasya tadvachanaM shrutvA bhAradvAjo hasanniva. anvavartata rAjAnaM svasti te.astviti chAbravIt.. 7-186-23 (53637) ko hi gANDIvadhanvAnaM jvalantamiva tejasA. akShayaM kShapayetkashchitkShatriyaH kShatriyarShabham.. 7-186-24 (53638) taM na vittapatirnendro na yamo na jaleshvaraH. nAsuroragarakShAMsi kShapayeyuH sahAyudham.. 7-186-25 (53639) mUDhAstvetAni bhAShante yAnImAnyAttha bhArata. yuddhe hyarjunamAsAdya svastimAnko vrajedgR^ihAn.. 7-186-26 (53640) tvaM tu sarvAbhisha~NkitvAnniShThuraH pApanishchayaH. shreyasastvaddhite yuktAMstattadvaktumihechChasi.. 7-186-27 (53641) gachCha tvamapi kaunteyamAtmArthe jahi mAchiram. tvamapyAshaMsase yoddhuM kulajaH kShatriyo hyasi.. 7-186-28 (53642) imAnkiM kShatriyAnsarvAnghAtayiShyasyanAgasaH. tvasya mUlaM vairasya tasmAdAsAdayArjunam.. 7-186-29 (53643) eSha te mAtulaH prAj~naH kShatradharmamanuvrataH. durdyutadevI gAndhAre prayAtvarjunamAhave.. 7-186-30 (53644) eSho.akShakushalo jihmo dyUtakR^itkitavaH shaThaH. devitA nikR^itipraj~no yudhi jeShyati pANDavAn.. 7-186-31 (53645) tvayA kathitamatyarthaM karNena saha hR^iShTavat. asakR^ichChUnyavanmohAdvR^itarAShTrasya shR^iNvataH.. 7-186-32 (53646) ahaM cha tAta karNashcha bhrAtA duHshAnashcha me. pANDuputrAnhaniShyAmaH sahitAH samare trayaH.. 7-186-33 (53647) iti te katthamAnasya shrutaM saMsadisaMsadi. anutiShTha pratij~nAM tAM satyavAgbhava taiH saha.. 7-186-34 (53648) eSha te pANDavaH shatruravisha~Nko.agrataH sthitaH. kShatradharmamavekShasva shlAghyastava vadho jayAt.. 7-186-35 (53649) dattaM bhuktamadhItaM cha prAptamaishvaryamIpsitam. kR^itakR^ityo.anR^iNashchAsi mA bhairyudhyasva pANDavam.. 7-186-36 (53650) ityuktvA samare droNo nyavartata yataH pare. dvaidhIkR^itya tataH senAM yuddhaM samabhavattadA.. .. 7-186-37 (53651) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi droNavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe ShaDashItyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 186 ..
droNaparva - adhyAya 187

.. shrIH ..

7.187. adhyAyaH 187

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

droNena drupadavirATAdInAM vadhaH.. 1 .. bhImena niShThurabhAShaNena dhR^iShTadyumnamudyojya droNAnIkAbhigamanam.. 2 .. chaturdasharAtriyuddhasamAptiH.. 3 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-187-0 (53652) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-187-0x (4764) tribhAgamAtreShAyAM rAtryAM yuddhamavartata. kurUNAM pANDavAnAM cha saMhR^iShTAnAM vishAmpate.. 7-187-1 (53653) atha chandraprabhAM muShNannAdityasya puraHsaraH. aruNo.abhyudayA~nchakre tAmrIkR^irvannivAmbaram.. 7-187-2 (53654) `prakAshamakarodvyoma jagatsaMra~njayanniva'. prAchyAM dishi sahasrAMshoraruNenAruNIkR^itam. tApanIyaM yathA chakraM bhrAjate ravimaNDalam.. 7-187-3 (53655) tato rathAshvAMshcha manuShyayAnA-- nyutsR^ijya sarve kurupANDuyodhAH. divAkarasyAbhimukhaM japantaH sandhyAgatAH prA~njalayo babhUvuH.. 7-187-4 (53656) tato dvaidhIkR^ite sainye droNaH somakapANDavAn. abhyadravatsapA~nchAlAnduryodhanapurogamaH.. 7-187-5 (53657) dvaidhIkR^itAnkurUndR^iShTvA mAdhavo.arjunamabravIt. sapatnAnsavyataH kuryAH savyasAchinnimAnkurUn.. 7-187-6 (53658) sa mAdhavamanuj~nAya kuruShveti dhana~njayaH. droNakarNau maheShvAsau savyataH paryavartata.. 7-187-7 (53659) abhiprAyaM tu kR^iShNasya j~nAtvA parapura~njayaH. AjishIrShagataM pArthaM bhImaseno.abhyuvAcha ha.. 7-187-8 (53660) bhImasena uvAcha. 7-187-9x (4765) arjunArjuna bIbhatso shR^iNuShvaitadvacho mama. yadarthaM kShatriyA sUte tasya kAlo.ayamAgataH.. 7-187-9 (53661) asmiMshchedAgate kAle shreyo na pratipatsyase. asambhAvitarUpastvaM sunR^ishaMsaM kariShyasi.. 7-187-10 (53662) satyashrIdharmayashasAM vIryeNAnR^iNyamApnuhi. bhindhyanIkaM yudhAMshreShTha pratij~nAM saphalAM kuru.. 7-187-11 (53663) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-187-12x (4766) sa savyasAchI bhImena choditaH keshavena cha. karNadroNAvatikramya samantAtparyavArayat.. 7-187-12 (53664) tamAjishIrShamAyAntaM dahantaM kShatriyarShabhAn. parAkrAntaM parAkramya tataH kShatriyapu~NgavAH. nAshaknuvanvArayituM vardhamAnamivAnalam.. 7-187-13 (53665) atha duryodhanaH karNaH shakunishchApi saubalaH. abhyavarSha~nCharavrAtaiH kuntIputraM dhana~njayam.. 7-187-14 (53666) teShAmastrANi sarveShAmuttamAstravidAM varaH. kadarthIkR^itya rAjendra sharavarShairavAkirat.. 7-187-15 (53667) astrairastrANi saMvArya laghuhasto dhana~njayaH. sarvAnavidhyannishitairdashabhirdashabhiH sharaiH.. 7-187-16 (53668) uddhUtA rajaso vR^iShTiH sharavR^iShTistathaiva cha. tamashcha ghoraM shabdashcha tadA samabhavanmahAn.. 7-187-17 (53669) na dyaurna bhUmirna dishaH prAj~nAyanta tathAgate. sainyena rajasA mUDhaM sarvamanghamivAbhavat.. 7-187-18 (53670) naiva te na vayaM rAjanprAj~nAsiShma parasparam. `shabdamAtreNa jAnImo vayaM te cha parasparam'. uddeshena hi tena sma samayudhyanta pArthivAH.. 7-187-19 (53671) virathA rathino rAjansamAsAdya parasparam. kesheShu samasajjanta kavacheShu bhujeShu cha.. 7-187-20 (53672) hatAshvA hatasUtAshcha nishcheShTA rathino hatAH. jIvanta iva tatra sma vyadR^ishyanta bhayArditAH.. 7-187-21 (53673) hatAngajAnsamAshliShya parvatAniva vAjinaH. gatasatvA vyadR^ishyanta tathaiva saha sAdibhiH.. 7-187-22 (53674) tatastvabhyavasR^ityaiva sa~NgrAmAduttarAM disham. AtiShThadAhave droNo vidhUmo.agniriva jvalan.. 7-187-23 (53675) tamAjishIrShAdekAntamapakrAntaM nishamya tu. samakampanta sainyAni pANDavAnAM vishAmpate.. 7-187-24 (53676) bhrAjamAnaM shriyA yuktaM jvalantamiva tejasA. droNaM dR^iShTvA pare tresushcherurmamlushcha bhArata.. 7-187-25 (53677) AhvayantaM parAnIkaM prabhinnamiva vAraNam. nainamAshaMsire jetuM dAnavA vAsavaM yathA.. 7-187-26 (53678) kechidAsannirutsAhAH kechitkruddhA manasvinaH. vismitAshchAbhavankechitkechidvR^iShTA.abhavanyudhi.. 7-187-27 (53679) hastairhastAgramapare pratyapimpannarAdhipAH. apare dashanairoShThAnadashankrodhamUrchChitAH.. 7-187-28 (53680) vyAkShipannAyudhAnyanye mamR^idushchApare bhujAn. anye chAnvapatandroNaM tyaktAtmAno mahaujasaH.. 7-187-29 (53681) pA~nchAlAstu visheSheNa droNasAyakapIDitAH. samasajjanta rAjendra samare bhR^ishavedanAH.. 7-187-30 (53682) tato virATadrupadau droNaM prati yayU raNe. tathA charantaM sa~NgrAme bhR^ishaM samaradurjayam.. 7-187-31 (53683) drupadasya tataH pautrAstraya eva vishAmpate. chedayashcha maheShvAsA droNamevAbhyayuryudhi.. 7-187-32 (53684) teShAM drupadapautrANAM trayANAM nishitaiH sharaiH. tribhirdroNo.aharatprANAMste hatA nyapatanbhuvi.. 7-187-33 (53685) tato droNo.ajayadyuddhe chedikaikeyasR^i~njayAn. mAtsyAMshchaivAjayatkR^itsnAnbhAradvAjo mahArathAn.. 7-187-34 (53686) tatastu drupadaH krodhAchCharavarShamavAsR^ijat. droNaM prati mahArAja virATashchaiva saMyuge.. 7-187-35 (53687) taM nihatyeShuvarShaM tu droNaH kShatriyamardanaH. tau sharaishChAdayAmAsa virATadrupadAvubhau.. 7-187-36 (53688) droNena chChAdyamAnau tu kruddhau sa~NgrAmamUrdhani. droNaM sharairvivyadhatuH paramaM krodhamAsthitau.. 7-187-37 (53689) tata droNo mahArAja krodhAmarShasamanvitaH. bhallAbhyAM bhR^ishatIkShNAbhyAM chichCheda dhanuShI tayoH.. 7-187-38 (53690) tato virATaH kupitaH samare tomarAndasha. dasha chikShepa cha sharAndroNasya vadhakA~NkShayA.. 7-187-39 (53691) shaktiM cha drupado ghorAmAyasIM svarNabhUShitAm. chikShepa bhujagendrAbhAM kruddho droNarathaM prati.. 7-187-40 (53692) tato bhallaiH sunishitaishChittvA tAMstomArAndasha. shaktiM kanakavaidUryAM droNashchichCheda sAyakaiH.. 7-187-41 (53693) tato droNaH supItAbhyAM bhallAbhyAmarimardanaH. drupadaM cha virATaM cha preShayAmAsa mR^ityave.. 7-187-42 (53694) hate virATe drupade kekayeShu tathaiva cha. tathaiva chedimAtsyeShu pA~nchAleShu tathaiva cha.. 7-187-43 (53695) hateShu triShu vIreShu drupadasya cha naptR^iShu. droNasya karma taddR^iShTvA kopaduHkhasamanvitaH. shashApa rathinAM madhye dhR^iShTadyumno mahAmanAH.. 7-187-44 (53696) iShTApUrtAttathA kShAtrAdbrAhmaNyAchcha sa nashyatu. droNo yasyAdya muchyeta yaM vA droNaH parAbhavet.. 7-187-45 (53697) iti teShAM pratishrutya madhye sarvadhanuShmatAm. AyAddroNaM sahAnIkAH pA~nchAlyaR^i paravIrahA.. 7-187-46 (53698) pA~nchAlAstvekato droNabhyaghnanpANDavaiH saha. duryodhanashcha karNashcha shakunishchApi saubalaH. sodaryAshcha yathA mukhyAste.arakShandroNamAhave.. 7-187-47 (53699) rakShyamANaM tathA droNaM sarvaistaistu mahArathaiH. yatamAnAstu pA~nchAlA na shekuH prativIkShitum.. 7-187-48 (53700) tatrAkrudhyadbhImaseno dhR^iShTadyumnasya mAriSha. sa enaM vAgbhirugrAbhistatakSha puruSharShabhaH.. 7-187-49 (53701) bhImasena uvAcha. 7-187-50x (4767) drupadasya kule jAtaH sarvAstreShvastravittamaH. kaH kShatriyo manyamAnaH prekShetArimavasthitam.. 7-187-50 (53702) pitR^iputravadhaM prApya puMstvaM ko vA praharShayet. visheShatastu shapathaM shapitvA rAjasaMsadi.. 7-187-51 (53703) eSha vaishvAnara iva samiddhaH svena tejasA. sharachApendhano droNaH kShatraM dahati tejasA.. 7-187-52 (53704) purA karoti niHsheShAM pANDavAnAmanIkinIm. sthitAH pashyata me karma droNameva vrajAmyaham.. 7-187-53 (53705) ityuktvA prAvishatkruddho droNAnIkaM vR^ikodaraH. sharaiH pUrNAyatotsR^iShTaurdrAvayaMstava vAhinIm.. 7-187-54 (53706) dhR^iShTadyumno.api pA~nchAlyaH pravishya mahatIM chamUm. AsasAda raNe droNaM tadAsIttumulaM mahat.. 7-187-55 (53707) naiva nastAdR^ishaM yuddhaM dR^iShTapUrvaM na cha shrutam. yathA sUryodaye rAjansamutpi~njo.abhavanmahAn.. 7-187-56 (53708) saMsaktAnyeva chAdR^ishyanrathavR^indAni mAriSha. hatAni cha vikIrNAni sarIrANi sharIriNAm.. 7-187-57 (53709) kechidanyatra gachChantaH pathi chAnyairupadrutAH. vimukhAH pR^iShThatashchAnye tADyante pArshvataH pare.. 7-187-58 (53710) tathA saMsaktayuddhaM tadabhavadbhR^ishadAruNam. atha sandhyAgataH sUryaH kShaNena samapadyata.. .. 7-187-59 (53711) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi droNavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe saptAshItyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 187 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-187-1 tribhAgamAtrasheShAyAM muhUrtatrayAvashiShTAyAm. tatra sUryodayottaraM trayodashyAM droNasya nAshaH. trayodashyAM shuklayi yuddhArambhasya--hemante prathamemAse shuklapakShe trayodashIm. pravR^ittaM bhArataM yuddhamiti bhAratasAvitryAmuktasya chopapattiH sidhyati.. 5-187-44 shashApa shapathaM kR^itavAn.. 5-187-45 iShTaM yAgahomAdi. ApUrtaM kShetrArAmAdi. kShAtraM drupadakulotpannatvAt. brAhmaNyaM yAjopayAjayorbrAhmaNayestapasA brAhmaNarUpAdagneshcha jAtatvAt. etatsarvaM tasya nashyatu. yasya shatrurdroNo muchyeta maraNaM na prApnuyAt. yaM vA mAM vA. droNo yadi parAbhavediti.. 5-187-187 saptAshItyAdhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 188

.. shrIH ..

7.188. adhyAyaH 188

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

pa~nchadashadivasayuddhArambhaH.. 1 .. sa~Nkulayuddham. nakulena duryodhanaparAjayaH.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-188-0 (53712) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-188-0x (4768) te tathaiva mahArAja daMshitA raNamUrdhani. sandhyAgataM sahasrAMshumAdityamupatasthire.. 7-188-1 (53713) udite tu sahasrAMshau taptakA~nchanasaprabhe. prakAshiteShu lokeShu punaryuddhamavartata.. 7-188-2 (53714) dvandvAni tatra yAnyAsansaMsaktAni purodayAt. tAnyevAbhyudite sUrye samasajjanta bhArata.. 7-188-3 (53715) rathairhayA hayairnAgAH pAdAtaishchApi ku~njarAH. hayairhayAH samAjagmuH pAdAtAshcha padAtibhiH.. 7-188-4 (53716) rathA rathairibhairnAgAstathaiva bharatarShabha. saMsaktAshcha viyuktAshcha yodhAH sannyapatanraNe.. 7-188-5 (53717) te rAtrau kR^itakarmANaH shrAntAH sUryasya tejasA. kShutpipAsAparItA~NgA visaMj~nA bahavo.abhavan.. 7-188-6 (53718) sha~NkhaberImR^ida~NgAnAM ku~njarANAM cha garjatAm. viShphAritavikR^iShTAnAM kArmukANAM cha kUjatAm.. 7-188-7 (53719) shabdaH samabhavadrAjandivispR^igbharatarShabha. dravatAM cha padAtInAM shastrANAM patatAmapi.. 7-188-8 (53720) hayAnAM heShatAM chApi rathAnAM cha nivartatAm. kroshatAM garjatAM chaiva tadAsIttumulaM mahat.. 7-188-9 (53721) vivR^iddhastumulaH shabdo dyAmagachChanmahAMstadA. nAnAyudhanikR^ittAnAM cheShTatAmAturaH svanaH.. 7-188-10 (53722) bhUmAvashrUyata mahAMstadA.a.asItkR^ipaNaM mahat. patatAM pAtyamAnAnAM pattyashvarathadantinAm.. 7-188-11 (53723) teShu sarveShvanIkeShu vyatiShakteShvanekashaH. sve svA~njaghnuH pare svAMshcha svAnpareShAM pare parAn. 7-188-12 (53724) vIrabAhuvisR^iShTAshcha yodheShu cha gajeShu cha. rAshayaH pratyadR^ishyanta vAsasAM nejaneShviva.. 7-188-13 (53725) udyatapratipiShTAnAM kha~NgAnAM vIrabAhubhiH. sa eva shabdastadrUpo vAsasAM nijyatAmiva.. 7-188-14 (53726) ardhAsibhistathA kha~NgaistomaraiH saparashvathaiH. nikR^iShTayuddhaM saMsaktaM mahadAsItsudAruNam.. 7-188-15 (53727) gajAshvakAyaprabhavAM naradehapravAhinIm. shastramatsyasusampUrNAM mAMsashoNitakardamAm.. 7-188-16 (53728) ArtanAdasvanavatIM patAkAshastraphenilAm. nadIM prAvartayanvIrAH paralokaughagAminIm.. 7-188-17 (53729) sharashaktyarditA klAntA rAtrimUDhAtpachetasaH. viShTabhya sarvagAtrANi vyatiShThangajavAjinaH.. 7-188-18 (53730) saMshuShkavadanA vIrAH shirobhishchArukuNDalaiH. yuddhopakaraNaishchAnyaistatratatra chakAshire.. 7-188-19 (53731) kravyAdasa~NghairAkIrNaM mR^itairardhamR^itairapi. nAsIdrathapathastatra sarvamAyodhanaM prati.. 7-188-20 (53732) ma~njatsu chakreShu rathAnsatvamAsthAya vAjinaH. katha~nchidavahanshrAntA vepamAnAH sharArditAH. kulasatvabalopetA vAjino vAraNopamAH.. 7-188-21 (53733) vihvalaM tUrNamuddhAntaM sabhayaM bhAratAturam. balamAsIttadA sarvamR^ite droNArjunAvubhau.. 7-188-22 (53734) tAvevAstAM nilayanaM tAvArtAyanameva cha. tAvevAnye samAsAdya jagmurvaivasvatakShayam.. 7-188-23 (53735) AvignamabhavatsarvaM kauravANAM mahadbalam. pA~nchAlAnAM cha saMsaktaM na prAj~nAyata ki~nchana.. 7-188-24 (53736) antakAkrIDasadR^ishaM bhIrUNAM bhayavardhanam. pR^ithivyAM rAjavaMshyAnAmutthite mahati kShaye.. 7-188-25 (53737) na tatra karNaM droNaM vA nArjunaM na yudhiShThiram. na bhImasenaM na yamau na pA~nchAlyaM na sAtyakim.. 7-188-26 (53738) na cha duHshAsanaM drauNiM na duryodhanasaubalau. na kR^ipaM madrarAjaM cha kR^itavarmANameva cha.. 7-188-27 (53739) na chAnyAnnaiva chAtmAnaM na kShitiM na dishastathA. pashyAma rAjansaMsaktAnsainyena rajasA dhR^itAn.. 7-188-28 (53740) sambhrAnte tumule ghore rajomeghe samutthite. triyAmAmiva saMprAptAmamanyanta nishAcharAH.. 7-188-29 (53741) na j~nAyante kauraveyA na pA~nchAlA na pANDavAH. na disho dyaurna chorvI cha na samaM viShamaM tathA.. 7-188-30 (53742) hastasaMsparshamApannAnparAnapyathavA svakAn. nyapAtayaMstadA yuddhe narAH sma vijayaiShiNaH.. 7-188-31 (53743) uddhUtatvAttu rajasaH prasekAchChoNitasya cha. prAshAmyata rajo bhaumaM shIghratvAdanilasya cha.. 7-188-32 (53744) tatra nAgA hayA yodhA rathino.atha padAtayaH. pArijAtavanAnIva vyarochanrudhirokShitAH.. 7-188-33 (53745) tato duryodhanaH karNo droNo duHshAsanastathA. pANDavaiH samasajjanta chaturbhishchaturo rathAH.. 7-188-34 (53746) duryodhanaH saha bhrAtrA yamAbhyAM samasajjata. vR^ikodareNa rAdheyo bhAradvAjena chArjunaH.. 7-188-35 (53747) taddhoraM mahadAshcharyaM yuddhaM daivAsuropamam. ratharShabhANAmugrANAM sannipAtamamAnuSham.. 7-188-36 (53748) rathamArgairvichitraistairvichitrarathasa~Nkulam. apashyanrathino yuddhaM vichitraM chitrayodhinAm.. 7-188-37 (53749) yatamAnAH parAkrAntAH parasparajigIShavaH. jImUtA iva gharmAnte sharavarShairavAkiran.. 7-188-38 (53750) te rathAnsUryasa~NkAshAnAsthitAH puruSharShabhAH. ashobhanta yathA meghAH shAradAshchalavidyutaH.. 7-188-39 (53751) yodhAste tu mahArAja krodhAmarShasamanvitAH. spardhinashcha maheShvAsAH kR^itayatnA dhanurdharAH. abhyagachChaMstathA.anyonyaM mattA gajavR^iShA iva.. 7-188-40 (53752) na nUnaM dehabhedo.asti kAle rAjannanAgate. yatra sarve na yugapadvyashIryanta mahArathAH.. 7-188-41 (53753) bAhubhishchaparaNaishchinnaiH shirobhishcha sakuNDalaiH. kArmukairvishikhaiH prAsaiH kha~NgaiH parashupaTTasaiH.. 7-188-42 (53754) nAlIkaiH kShudranArAchairnakharaiH shaktitomaraiH. anyaishcha vividhAkArairdhautaiH praharaNottamaiH.. 7-188-43 (53755) vichitrairvividhAkAraiH sharIrAvaraNairapi. vichitraishcha rathairbhagnairhataishcha gajavAjibhiH.. 7-188-44 (53756) shUnyaishchaiva nagAkArairhatayodhadhvajai rathaiH. amanuShyairhayaistrastaiH kR^iShyamANaistatastataH.. 7-188-45 (53757) vAtAyamAnairasakR^iddhatavIrairalaMkR^itaiH. vyajanaiH ka~NkaTaishchaiva dhvajaishcha vinipAtitaiH.. 7-188-46 (53758) ChatrairAbharaNairvastrairmAlyaishcha sasugandhibhiH. hAraiH kirITairmukuTairuShNIShaiH ki~NkiNIgaNaiH.. 7-188-47 (53759) urasthairmaNibhirniShkaishchUDAmaNibhireva cha. AsIdAyodhanaM tatra nabhastArAgaNairiva.. 7-188-48 (53760) tato duryodhanasyAsInnakulena samAgamaH. amarShitena kruddhasya kruddhenAmarShitasya cha.. 7-188-49 (53761) apasavyaM chakArAtha mAdrIputrastavAtmajam. kira~nCharashatairhR^iShTastatra nAdo mahAnabhUt.. 7-188-50 (53762) apasavyaM kR^itaM sa~Nkhye bhrAtR^ivyenAtyamarShiNA. nAmR^iShyata tamapyAjau pratichakre parantapaH. putrastava mahArAja rAjA duryodhano drutam.. 7-188-51 (53763) tataH pratichikIrShantamapasavyaM tu te sutam. nyavArayata tejasvI nakulashchitramArgavit.. 7-188-52 (53764) sa sarvato nivAryainaM sharajAlena pIDayan. vimukhaM nakulashchakre tatsainyAH samapUjayan.. 7-188-53 (53765) tiShThatiShTheti nakulo babhAShe tanayaM tava. saMsmR^itya sarvaduHkhAni tava durmantritaM cha tat.. .. 7-188-54 (53766) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi droNavadhaparvaNi chaturdasharAtriyuddhe aShTAshItyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 188 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-188-12 sve kauravAH svAn svabhR^ityAnpare pANDavAH svAn svabhR^ityAn. sve ityanuvartate. pareShAM pANDavAnAM svAn sve kauravAH pareShAM pANDavAnAM parAn kauravAn pare pANDavA jaghnurityanvayaH. pareShAmityubhayatra sambadhyate. svaparavibhAgo vaktuH sa~njayasyAnurodhAt.. 5-188-13 nijyante prakShAlyante vAsAMsi yeShu te pradeshA nejanAni teShu yathA vAsasAM rAshayo bhavantyevamudyatAnAM pratikUlaM piShTAnAM cha kha~NgAnAM rAshayaH pratyadR^ishyanta. nijyatAM kShAlanaiH udyamyodyamya shilAyAM sphAlyamAnAnAm. slokadvayam.. 5-188-14 nijyante prakShAlyante vAsAMsi yeShu te pradeshA nejanAni teShu yathA vAsasAM rAshayo bhavantyevamudyatAnAM pratikUlaM piShTAnAM cha kha~NgAnAM rAshayaH pratyadR^ishyanta. nijyatAM kShAlanaiH udyamyodyamya shilAyAM sphAlyamAnAnAm. slokadvayam.. 5-188-15 ardhAsibhirekadhAraiH.. 5-188-23 nilayanamAshrayaH. ArtAyanaM ArtAnAM bhayavAraNaM svIyAnAm. shatrUNAM tu tAveva mR^ityukarAvityarthaH.. 5-188-34 chaturashchatvAraH.. 5-188-35 bhrAtrA duHshAsanena.. 5-188-188 aShTAshItyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 189

.. shrIH ..

7.189. adhyAyaH 189

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

droNArjunAdInAM sa~Nkulayuddham.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-189-0 (53767) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-189-0x (4769) tato duHshAsanaH kruddhaH sahadevamupAdravat. rathavegena tIvreNa kampayanniva medinIm.. 7-189-1 (53768) tasyApatata evAshu bhallenAmitrakarshanaH. mAdrIputraH shiro yantuH sashirastrANamachChinat.. 7-189-2 (53769) nainaM duHshAsanaH sUtaM nApi kashchana sainikaH. kR^ittottamA~NgamAshutvAtsahadevena buddhavAn.. 7-189-3 (53770) yadA tvasa~NgR^ihItatvAtprayAntyashvA yathAsukham. tato duHshAsanaH sUtaM bubudhe gatachetasam.. 7-189-4 (53771) sa hayAnsannigR^ihyAjau svayaM hayavishAradaH. yuyudhe rathinAM shreShTho laghu chitraM cha suShThu cha.. 7-189-5 (53772) tadasyApUjayankarma sve pare chApi saMyuge. hatasUtarathenAjau vyacharadyadabhItavat.. 7-189-6 (53773) sahadevastu tAnashvAMstIkShNairbANairavAkirat. pIDyamAnAH sharaishchAshu prAdravaMste tatastataH.. 7-189-7 (53774) sa rashmiShu viShaktatvAdutsarja sharAsanam. dhanuShA karma kurvaMstu rashmIMshcha punarutsR^ijat.. 7-189-8 (53775) ChidreShveteShu taM bANairmAdrIputro.abhyavAkirat. parIpsaMstvatsutaM karNastadantaramavApatat.. 7-189-9 (53776) vR^ikodarastataH karNaM tribhirbhallaiH samAhitaH. AkarNapUrNairabhyaghnadbAhvorurasi chAnadat.. 7-189-10 (53777) sa nivR^ittastataH karNaH sa~NghaTTita ivoragaH. bhImamAvArayAmAsa vikirannishitA~nCharAn. tato.abhUttumulaM yuddhaM bhImarAdheyayostadA.. 7-189-11 (53778) tau vR^iShAviva nardantau vivR^ittanayanAvubhau. vegena mahatA.anyonyaM saMrabdhAvabhipetatuH.. 7-189-12 (53779) abhisaMshliShTayostatra tayorAhavashauNDayoH. vichChinnasharapAtatvAdgadAyuddhamavartata.. 7-189-13 (53780) gadayA bhImasenastu karNasya rathakUbaram. bibheda shatadhA rAjaMstadadbhutamivAbhavat.. 7-189-14 (53781) tato bhImasya rAdheyo gadAmAvidhya vIryavAn. avAsR^ijadrathe tAM tu bibheda gadayA gadAm.. 7-189-15 (53782) tato bhImaH punargurvIM chikShepAdhirathergadAm. tAM gadAM bahubhiH karNaH supu~NkhaiH supravejitaiH.. 7-189-16 (53783) pratyavidhyatpunashchAnyaiH sA bhImaM punarAvrajat. vyAlIva mantrAbhihatA karNabANairabhidrutA.. 7-189-17 (53784) tasyAH pratinipAtena bhImasya vipulo dhvajaH. papAta sArathishchAsya mumoha cha gadAhataH.. 7-189-18 (53785) sa karNaM sAyakAnaShTau vyasR^ijatkrodhamUrchChitaH. taistasya nishitaistIkShNairbhImaseno mahAbalaH.. 7-189-19 (53786) chichCheda paravIraghnaH prahasanniva bhArata. dhvajaM sharAsanaM chaiva sharAvApaM cha bhArata.. 7-189-20 (53787) karNo.apyanyaddhanurgR^ihya hemapR^iShThaM durAsadam. tataH punastu rAdheyo hayAnasya ratheShubhiH. R^ikShavarNA~njaghAnAshu tathobhau pArShNisArathI.. 7-189-21 (53788) sa vipannaratho bhImo nakulasyApluto ratham. hariryathA gireH shR^i~NgaM samAkramadarindamaH.. 7-189-22 (53789) tathA droNArjunau chitramayudhyetAM mahArathau. AchAryashiShyau rAjendra kR^itapratikR^itau yudhi.. 7-189-23 (53790) laghusandhAnayogAbhyAM rathayoshcha raNena cha. mohayantau manuShyANAM chakShUMShi cha manAMsi cha.. 7-189-24 (53791) upAramanta te sarve yodhA.asmAkaM pare tathA. vichitrAnpR^itanAmadhye rathamArgAnudIrya tau. 7-189-25 (53792) anyonyamapasavyaM cha kartuM vIrau tadeShatuH.. 7-189-26 (53793) parAkramaM tayoryodhA dadR^ishuste suvismitAH.. 7-189-27 (53794) tayoH samabhavadyuddhaM droNapANDavayormahat. AmiShArthe mahArAja gagane shyenayoriva.. 7-189-28 (53795) yadyachchakAra droNastu kuntIputrajigIShayA. tattatpratijaghAnAshu prahasaMstasya pANDavaH.. 7-189-29 (53796) yadA droNo na shaknoti pANDavaM sma visheShitum. tataH prAdushchakArAstramastramArgavishAradaH.. 7-189-30 (53797) aindraM pAshupataM tvAShTraM vAyavyamatha vAruNam. muktaMmuktaM droNachApAttajjaghAna dhana~njayaH.. 7-189-31 (53798) astrANyastrairyadA tasya vidhivaddhanti pANDavaH. tato.astraiH paramairdivyairdroNaH pArthamavAkirat.. 7-189-32 (53799) yadyadastraM sa pArthAya prayu~Nkte vijigIShayA. tasyatasya vighAtAya tattaddhi kurute.arjunaH.. 7-189-33 (53800) sa vadhyamAneShvastreShu divyeShvapi yathAvidhi. arjunenArjunaM droNo manasaivAbhyapUjayat.. 7-189-34 (53801) mene chAtmAnamadhikaM pR^ithivyAmadhi bhArata. tena shiShyeNa sarvebhyaH shastravidbhya parantapaH.. 7-189-35 (53802) vAryamANastu pArthena tathA madhye mahAtmanAm. yatamAno.arjunaM prItyA prIyate smArjunena saH.. 7-189-36 (53803) tato.antarikShe devAshcha gandharvAshcha sahasrashaH. R^iShayaH siddhasa~NghAshcha vyatiShThanta didR^ikShayA.. 7-189-37 (53804) tadapsarobhirAkIrNaM yakShagandharvasa~Nkulam. shrImadAkAshamabhavadbhUyo meghAkulaM yathA.. 7-189-38 (53805) tatrAsmAntarhitA vAcho vyacharanta punaH punaH. droNapArthastavopetA vyashrUyanta narAdhipa.. 7-189-39 (53806) visR^ijyamAneShvastreShu jvAlayastu disho dasha. abruvaMstatra siddhAshcha R^iShayashcha samAgatAH.. 7-189-40 (53807) naivedaM mAnuShaM yuddhaM nAsuraM na cha rAkShasam. na daivaM na cha gAndharvaM brAhmaNaM dhruvamidaM param.. 7-189-41 (53808) vichitramidamAshcharyaM na no dR^iShTaM na cha shrutam. ati pANDavamAchAryo droNaM chApyati pANDavaH.. 7-189-42 (53809) nAnayorantaraM shakyaM draShTumanyena kenachit.. 7-189-43 (53810) yadi rudro dvidhAkR^itya yudhyetAtmAnamAtmanA. tatra shakyopamA kartumanyatra tu na vidyate.. 7-189-44 (53811) j~nAnamekasthamAchArye j~nAnaM yogashcha pANDave. shauryamekasthamAchArye balaM shauryaM cha pANDave. 7-189-45 (53812) nemau shakyau maheShvAsau yuddhe kShapayituM paraiH. ichChamAnau punarimau hanyetAM sAmaraM jagat.. 7-189-46 (53813) ityabruvanmahArAja dR^iShTvA tau puruSharShabhau. antarhitAni bhUtAni prakAshAni cha sarvashaH.. 7-189-47 (53814) `yadA droNaM mahArAja visheShayati pANDavaH'. tato droNo brAhmamastraM prAdushchakre mahAmatiH.. 7-189-48 (53815) `tadastraM saMhitaM rAjandhorarUpaM mahAhave'. santApayadraNe pArthaM bhUtAnyantarhitAni cha.. 7-189-49 (53816) tatashchachAla pR^ithivI saparvatavanadrumA. `saritashcha pratisrotaH pravahurvai kShaNAntaram'. vavau cha viShamo vAyuH sAgarAshchApi chukShubhuH.. 7-189-50 (53817) tatastrAso mahAnAsItkurupANDavasenayoH. sarveShAM chaiva bhUtAnAmudyate.astre mahAtmanA.. 7-189-51 (53818) tataH pArtho.apyasambhrAntastadastraM pratijaghnivAn. brahmAstreNaiva rAjendra tataH sarvamashIshamat.. 7-189-52 (53819) yadA na gamyate pAraM tayoranyatarasya vA. tataH sa~Nkulayuddhena tadyuddhaM vyAkulIkR^itam.. 7-189-53 (53820) nAj~nAyata tataH ki~nchitpunareva vishAmpate. pravR^itte tumule yuddhe droNapANDavayornR^ipa.. 7-189-54 (53821) `droNo muktvA raNe pArthaM pA~nchAlAnanvadhAvata. arjunopi raNe droNaM tyaktvA prAdravayatkurUn.. 7-189-55 (53822) sharaughairatha tAbhyAM tu ChAyAbhUtaM mahAmR^idhe. tumalaM prababhau rAjansarvasya jagato bhayam'.. 7-189-56 (53823) sharajAlaiH samAkIrNe meghajAlairivAmbare. nApatachcha tataH kashchidantarikShacharastadA.. .. 7-189-57 (53824) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi droNavadhaparvaNi pa~nchadashadisayuddhe ekonanavatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 189 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-189-45 j~nAnamekasthamiti AchAryo j~nAnasya shauryasya chAvadhirityarthaH. arjunastu yogena balena chAdhikaH. kR^iShNasArathigANDIvadivyarathadhvajabudbhyAdibhiryauvanena cha yuktatvAt. tathAcha yogabalAbhyAM mArchAryasAmyaM prApta ityarthaH.. 5-189-57 nApatat bANairantarikShasya pUritatvAditi bhAvaH.. 5-189-189 ekonanavatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 190

.. shrIH ..

7.190. adhyAyaH 190

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sAtyakiduryodhanAdInAM sa~NkulayuddhavarNanam.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-190-0 (53825) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-190-0x (4770) tasmiMstathA vartamAne gajAshvanarasaMkShaye. duHshAsano mahArAja dhR^iShTadyumnamayodhayat.. 7-190-1 (53826) sa tu rukmarathAsakto duHshAsanasharArditaH. amarShAttava putrasya sharairvAhAnavAkirat.. 7-190-2 (53827) kShaNena sa rathastasya sadhvajaH sahasArathiH. nAdR^ishyata mahArAja pArShatasya sharaishchitaH.. 7-190-3 (53828) duHshAsanastu rAjendra pA~nchAlyasya mahAtmanaH. nAshakatpramukhe sthAtuM sharajAlaprapIDitaH.. 7-190-4 (53829) sa tu duHshAsanaM bANairvimukhIkR^itya pArShataH. kirQa~nCharasahasrANi droNamevAbhyayAdraNe.. 7-190-5 (53830) abhyapadyata hArdikyaH kR^itavarmA tvanantaram. sodaryANAM trayashchaiva ta enaM paryavArayan.. 7-190-6 (53831) taM yamau pR^iShThato.anvaitAM rakShantau puruSharShabhau. droNAyAbhimukhaM yAntaM dIpyamAnamivAnalam.. 7-190-7 (53832) samprahAramakurvaMste sarve cha sumahArathAH. amarShitAH sattvavantaH kR^itvA maraNamagrataH.. 7-190-8 (53833) shuddhAtmAnaH shuddhavR^ittA rAjansvargapuraskR^itAH. AryaM yuddhamakurvanta parasparajigIShavaH.. 7-190-9 (53834) shuklAbhijanakarmANo matimanto janAdhipa. dharmayuddhamayudhyanta prepsanto gatimuttamAm.. 7-190-10 (53835) na tatrAsIdadharmiShThamashastaM yuddhameva cha. nAtra karNI na nAlIko na lipto na cha bastikaH.. 7-190-11 (53836) na sUchI kapisho naiva na gavAsthirgajAsthijaH. na chUlI balishastatra na yamI nApi pAchakaH. iShurAsInna saMshliShTo na pUtirna cha jihmagaH.. 7-190-12 (53837) R^ijUnyeva vishuddhAni sarve shastrANyadhArayan. suyuddhena parA.NllokAnIpsantaH kIrtimeva cha.. 7-190-13 (53838) tadAsIttumulaM yuddhaM sarvadoShavivarjitam. chaturNAM tava yodhAnAM taistribhiH pANDavaiH saha.. 7-190-14 (53839) dhR^iShTadyumnastu tAndR^iShTvA tava rAjanratharShabhAn. yamAbhyAM vAritAnvIrA~nChIghrAstro droNamabhyayAt.. 7-190-15 (53840) nivAritAstu te vIrAstayoH puruShasiMhayoH. samasajjanta chatvAro vAtAH parvatayoriva.. 7-190-16 (53841) dvAbhyAM dvAbhyAM yamau sArdhaM rathAbhyAM rathapu~Ngavau. samAsaktau tato droNaM dhR^iShTadyumno.abhyavartata.. 7-190-17 (53842) dR^iShTvA droNAya pA~nchAlyaM vrajantaM yuddhadurmadam. yamAbhyAM tAMshcha saMsaktAMstadantaramupAdravat.. 7-190-18 (53843) duryodhano mahArAja kira~nChoNitabhojanAn. taM sAtyakiH shIghrataraM punarevAbhyavartata.. 7-190-19 (53844) tau parasparamAsAdya samIpe kurumAdhavau. hasamAnau nR^ishArdUlAvabhItau samasajjatAm.. 7-190-20 (53845) bAlyavR^ittAni sarvANi prIyamANau vichintya tau. anyonyaM prekShamANau cha smayamAnau punaHpunaH.. 7-190-21 (53846) atha duryodhano rAjA sAtyakiM samabhAShata. priyaM sakhAyaM satataM garhayanvR^ittamAtmanaH.. 7-190-22 (53847) dhik krodhaM dhiksakhe lobhaM dhi~NmohaM dhigamarShitam. dhigastu kShAtramAchAraM dhigastu balamaurasam.. 7-190-23 (53848) yatra mAmabhisandhatse tvAM chAhaM shinipu~Ngava. tvaM hi prANaiH priyataro mamAhaM cha sadA tava.. 7-190-24 (53849) smarAmi tAni sarvANi bAlyavR^ittAni yAni nau. tAni sarvANi jIrNAni sAmprataM no raNAjire. kimanyatkrodhalobhAbhyAM yuddhamevAdya sAtvata.. 7-190-25 (53850) taM tathAvAdinaM tatra sAtyakiH pratyabhAShata. prahasanvishikhAMstIkShNAnudyamya paramAstravit.. 7-190-26 (53851) neyaM sabhA rAjaputra nAchAryasya niveshanam. yatra krIDitamasmAbhistadA rAjansamAgataiH.. 7-190-27 (53852) duryodhana uvAcha. 7-190-28x (4771) kva sA krIDA gatA.asmAkaM bAlye vai shinipu~Ngava. kva cha yuddhamidaM bhUyaH kAlo hi duratikramaH.. 7-190-28 (53853) kintu no vidyate kR^ityaM dhanena dhanalipsayA. yatra yudhyAmahe sarve dhanalobhAtsamAgatAH.. 7-190-29 (53854) sa~njaya uvAya. 7-190-30x (4772) taM tathAvAdinaM tatra rAjAnaM mAdhavo.abravIt. evaM vR^ittaM sadA kShAtraM yudhyantIha gurUnapi.. 7-190-30 (53855) yadi te.ahaM priyo rAja~njahi mAM mA chiraM kR^ithAH. tvatkR^ite sukR^itAMllokAngachCheyaM bharatarShabha.. 7-190-31 (53856) yA te shaktirbalaM yachcha tatkShipraM mayi darshaya. nechChAmi tadahaM draShTuM mitrANAM vyasanaM mahat.. 7-190-32 (53857) ityevaM vyaktamAbhAShya pratibhAShya cha sAtyakiH. abhyayAttUrNamavyagro dayAM nAkurutAtmani.. 7-190-33 (53858) tamAyAntaM mahAbAhuM pratyagR^ihNAttavAtmajaH. sharaishchAvAkiradrAja~nshaineyaM tanayastava.. 7-190-34 (53859) tataH pravavR^ite yuddhaM kurumAdhavasiMhayoH. anyonyaM kruddhayorghoraM yathA dviradasiMhayoH.. 7-190-35 (53860) tataH pUrNAyatotsR^iShTaiH sAtvataM yuddhadurmadam. duryodhanaH pratyavidhyatkupito dashabhiH sharaiH.. 7-190-36 (53861) taM sAtyakiH pratyavidhyattathaivAvAkirachCharaiH. pa~nchAshatA punashchAjau triMshatA dashabhishcha ha.. 7-190-37 (53862) sAtyakiM tu raNe rAjanprahasaMstanayastava. AkarNapUrNairnishitairvivyAdha triMshatA sharaiH.. 7-190-38 (53863) tato.asya sasharaM chApaM kShurapreNa dvidhA.achChinat.. 7-190-39 (53864) so.anyatkArmukamAdAya laghuhastastato dR^iDham. sAtyakirvyasR^ijachchApi sharashreNIM sutasya te.. 7-190-40 (53865) tAmApatantIM sahasA sharashreNIM jighAMsayA. chichCheda bahudhA rAjA tata uchchukrushurjanAH.. 7-190-41 (53866) sAtyakiM cha trisaptatyA pIDayAmAsa vegitaH. svarNapu~NkhaiH shilAdhautairAkarNApUrNaniHsR^itaiH.. 7-190-42 (53867) tasya sandadhatashcheShu saMhiteShu cha kArmukam. AchChinatsAtyakistUrNaM sharaishchaivApyavIvidhat.. 7-190-43 (53868) sa gADhaviddho vyathitaH pratyapAyAdrathAntare. duryodhano mahArAja dAshArhasharapIDitaH.. 7-190-44 (53869) samAshvasya tu putraste sAtyakiM punarabhyayAt. visR^ijanniShujAlAni yuyudhAnarathaM prati.. 7-190-45 (53870) tathaiva sAtyakirbANAnduryodhanarathaM prati. satataM visR^ijanrAjaMstatsa~Nkulamavartata.. 7-190-46 (53871) tatreShubhiH kShipyamANaiH patadbhishcha sharIriShu. agneriva mahAkakShaiH shabdaH samabhavanmahAn.. 7-190-47 (53872) tayoH sharasahasraishcha sa~nChannaM vasudhAtalam. agamyarUpaM cha sharairAkAshaM samapadyata.. 7-190-48 (53873) tatrApyadhikamAlakShya mAdhavaM rathasattamam. kShipramabhyapatatkarNaH parIpsaMstanayaM tava.. 7-190-49 (53874) na tu taM marShayAmAsa bhImaseno mahAbalaH. so.abhyayAttvaritaH karNaM visR^ijansAyakAnbahUn.. 7-190-50 (53875) tasya karNaH shitAnbANAnpratihanya hasanniva. dhanuH sharAMshcha chichCheda sUtaM chAbhyahanachCharaiH.. 7-190-51 (53876)
