bhImasenastu sa~Nkruddho gadAmAdAya pANDavaH. dhvajaM dhanushcha sUtaM cha sammamardAhave ripoH.. 7-190-52 (53877) rathachakraM cha karNasya babha~nja sa mahAbalaH. bhagnayakre rathe.atiShThadakampaH shailarADiva.. 7-190-53 (53878) ekachakraM rathaM tasya tamUhuH suchiraM hayAH. ekachakramivArkasya rathaM sapta hayA yathA.. 7-190-54 (53879) amR^iShyamANaH karNastu bhImasenamayudhyata. vividhairiShujAlaishcha nAnAshastraishcha saMyuge.. 7-190-55 (53880) bhImasenastu sa~NkruddhaH sUtaputramayodhayat. tasmiMstathA vartamAne kruddho dharmasuto.abravIt. pA~nchAlAnAM naravyAghrAnmAtsyAMshcha puruSharShabhAn.. 7-190-56 (53881) ye naH prANAH shiro ye cha ye no yodhA mahArathAH. ta ete dhArtarAShTreShu viShaktAH puruSharShabhAn.. 7-190-57 (53882) ye naH prANAH shiro ye cha ye no yodhA mahArathAH. ta ete dhArtarAShTreShu viShaktAH puruSharShabhAH.. 7-190-58 (53883) kiM tiShThata yathA mUDhAH sarve vigatachetasaH. tatra gachChata yatraite yudhyante mAmakA rathAH.. 7-190-59 (53884) kShatradharmaM puraskR^itya sarva eva gatajvarAH. jayanto vadhyamAnAshcha gatimiShTAM gamiShyatha.. 7-190-60 (53885) te rAj~nA choditA vIrA yotsyamAnA mahArathAH. chaturdhA vAhinIM kR^itvA tvaritA droNamabhyayuH.. 7-190-61 (53886) pA~nchAlAstvekato droNamabhyaghnannishitaiH sharaiH. bhImasenapurogAshchApyekataH paryavArayan.. 7-190-62 (53887) AsaMstu pANDuputrANAM trayo jihmA mahArathAH. yamau cha bhImasenashcha prAkroshaMste dhana~njayam.. 7-190-63 (53888) abhidravArjuna kShipraM kurUndroNAdapAnuda. tata enaM haniShyanti pA~nchAlA hatarakShiNam.. 7-190-64 (53889) kauraveyAMstataH pArthaH sasA samupAdravat. pA~nchAlAneva tu droNo dhR^iShTadyumnapurogamAn. mamardustarasA vIrAH pa~nchame.ahani bhArata.. .. 7-190-65 (53890) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi pa~nchadashadivasayuddhe navatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 190 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-190-6 trayo dhR^iShTadyumno.anyau dvau cha.. 5-190-10 shuklaH shuddho.abhijano vaMsho yeShAM te svayaM shodhitakarmANashcha.. 5-190-11 ashastamaprashasyam. prashasyatvamAha nAtreti. karNI vilomakaNTakadvayayuktaH. sahi uddriyamANo.antrANyuddharati. nAlIkaH alpatvAddehamagraH san duruddharaH. na lipto viSheNeti sheShaH. bastikaH shalyadaNDasandhau shithilastasyoddharaNe shalyaM bastimadhye majjati daNDamAtraM niH--sarati. (anye bastaka iti paThitvA shR^i~NgaghaTita iti vyAchakhyuH).. 5-190-20 hiMsamAnAviti ka.kha.pAThaH.. 5-190-33 abhyayAttUrNamavyagro nirapekSho vishAmpate ka.kha.pAThaH.. 5-190-190 navatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 191

.. shrIH ..

7.191. adhyAyaH 191

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

kR^iShNena yudhiShThiramprati droNajaye tasya shastranyAsasya tatrachAshvatthAmavadhashravaNasya hetutvakathanam.. 1 .. bhImenAshvatthAmanAmni gaje nihate yudhiShThireNa kR^iShNachodanayA droNamprati tadvivakShayA ashvatthAmA hata iti kathanam.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-191-0 (53891) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-191-0x (4773) pA~nchAlAnAM tato droNo.apyakarotkadanaM mahat. yathA kruddho raNe shakro dAnavAnAM kShayaM purA.. 7-191-1 (53892) droNAstreNa mahArAja vadhyamAnAH pare yudhi. nAtrasanta raNe droNatsatvavanto mahArathAH.. 7-191-2 (53893) yudhyamAnA mahArAja pA~nchAlAH sR^i~njayAstathA. droNamevAbhyayuryuddhe yodhayanto mahArathAH.. 7-191-3 (53894) teShAM tu chChAdyamAnAnAM pA~nchAlAnAM samantataH. abhavadbhairavo nAdo vadhyatAM sharavR^iShTibhiH.. 7-191-4 (53895) vadhyamAneShu sa~NgrAme pA~nchAleShu mahAtmanA. udIryamANe droNAstre pANQDavAnbhayamAvishat.. 7-191-5 (53896) dR^iShTvA.ashvanarayodhAnAM vipulaM cha kShayaM yudhi. pANQDaveyA mahArAja nAshashaMsurjayaM tadA.. 7-191-6 (53897) kachchiddroNo na naH sarvAnkShapayetparamAstravit. samiddhaH shishirApAye dahankakShamivAnalaH.. 7-191-7 (53898) na chainaM saMyuge kashchitsamarthaH prativIkShitum. na chainamarjuno jAtu pratiyudhyeta dharmavit.. 7-191-8 (53899) trastAnkuntIsutAndR^iShTvA droNasAyakapIDitAn. matimA~nshreyase yuktaH keshavo.arjunamabravIt.. 7-191-9 (53900) naiSha yuddhena sa~NgrAme jetuM shakyaH katha~nchana. sadhanurdhanvinAM shreShTho devairapi savAsavaiH.. 7-191-10 (53901) nyastashastrastu sa~NgArame shakyo hantuM bhavennR^ibhiH. AsthIyatAM jaye yogo dharmamutsR^ijya pANDavAH. yathA na saMyuge sarvAnnihanyAdrukmavAhanaH.. 7-191-11 (53902) ashvatthAmni hate naiSha yudhyediti matirmama. taM hataM saMyuge kashchidasmai shaMsatu mAnavaH.. 7-191-12 (53903) etannArochayadrAjankuntIputro dhana~njayaH. anye tvarochayansarve kR^ichChreNa tu yudhiShThiraH.. 7-191-13 (53904) tato bhImo mahAbAhuranIkeShu mahAgajam. jaghAna gadayA rAjannashvatthAmAnamityuta. parapramathanaM ghoraM mAlavasyendravarmaNaH.. 7-191-14 (53905) bhImasenastu savrIDamupetya droNamAhave. ashvatthAmA hata iti shabdamuchchaishchakAra ha.. 7-191-15 (53906) ashvatthAmeti hi gajaH khyAto nAmnA hato.abhavat. kR^itvA manasi taM bhImo mithyA vyAhR^itavAMstadA.. 7-191-16 (53907) bhImasenavachaH shrutvA droNastatparamApriyam. manasA sannAgAtro.abhUdyathA saikatamambhasi.. 7-191-17 (53908) sha~NkamAnaH sa tanmithyA vIryaj~naH svasutasya vai. hataH sa iti cha shrutvA naiva dhairyAdakampata.. 7-191-18 (53909) sa labdhvA chetanAM droNaH kShaNenaiva samAshvasat. anuchintyAtmanaH putramaviShahyamarAtibhiH.. 7-191-19 (53910) sa pArShatamabhidrutya jighAMsurmR^ityumAtmanaH. avAkiratsahasreNa tIkShNAnAM ka~NkapatriNAm.. 7-191-20 (53911) taM viMshatisahasrANi pA~nchAlAnAM nararShabhAH. yathA charantaM sa~NgrAme sarvato.avAkira~nCharaiH.. 7-191-21 (53912) sharaistairAchitaM droNaM nApashyAma mahAratham. bhAskaraM jaladai ruddhaM varShAsviva vishAmpate.. 7-191-22 (53913) vidhUya tAnbANagaNAnpA~nchAlAnAM mahArathaH. prAdushchakre tato droNo brAhmamastraM parantapaH.. 7-191-23 (53914) vadhAya teShAM shUrANAM pA~nchAlAnAmamarShitaH. tato vyarochata droNo vinighnansarvasainikAn.. 7-191-24 (53915) shirAMsyApAtayachchApi pA~nchAlAnAM mahAmR^idhe. tathaiva parighAkArAnbAhUnkanakabhUShaNAn.. 7-191-25 (53916) te vadhyamAnAH samare bhAradvAjena pArthivAH. medinyAmanvakIryanta vAtanunnA iva drumAH.. 7-191-26 (53917) ku~njarANAM cha patatAM hayaughAnAM cha bhArata. agamyarUpA pR^ithivI mAMsashoNitakardamA.. 7-191-27 (53918) hatvA viMshatisAhasrAnpA~nchAlAnAM rathavrajAn. atiShThadAhave droNo vidhUmo.agniriva jvalan.. 7-191-28 (53919) tathaiva cha punaH kruddho bhAradvAjaH pratApavAn. vasudAnasya bhallena shiraH kAyAdapAharat.. 7-191-29 (53920) punaH pa~nchashatAnmAtsyAnShaTsahasrAMshcha sR^i~njayAn. hastinAmayutaM hatvA jaghAnAshvAyutaM punaH.. 7-191-30 (53921) kShatriyANAmabhAvAya dR^iShTvA droNamavasthitam. R^iShayo.abhyAgatAstUrNaM havyavAhapurogamAH.. 7-191-31 (53922) vishvAmitro jamadagnirbharadvAjo.atha gautamaH. vasiShThaH kashyapo.atrishcha brahmalokaM ninIShavaH.. 7-191-32 (53923) sikatAH pR^ishnayo gargA vAlakhilyA marIchipAH. bhR^igavo.a~Ngirasashchaiva sUkShmAshchAnye maharShayaH.. 7-191-33 (53924) ta enamabruvansarve droNamAharavashobhinam. adharmataH kR^itaM yuddhaM samayo nidhanasya te.. 7-191-34 (53925) nyasyAyudhaM raNe droNa samIkShAsmAnavasthitAn. nAtaH krUrataraM karma punaH kartumihArhasi.. 7-191-35 (53926) vedavedA~NgaviduShaH satyadharmaratasya te. brAhmaNasya visheSheNa tavaitannopapadyate.. 7-191-36 (53927) tyajAyudhamamodheSho tiShTha vartmani shAshvate. paripUrNashcha kAlaste vastuM loke.adya mAnuShe.. 7-191-37 (53928) brahmAstreNa tvayA dagdhA anastraj~nA narA bhuvi. yadetadIdR^ishaM vipra kR^itaM karma na sAdhu tat.. 7-191-38 (53929) nyasyAyudhaM raNe vipra droNa mA tvaM chiraM kR^ithAH. mA pApiShThataraM karma kariShyasi punardvija.. 7-191-39 (53930) iti teShAM vachaH shrutvA bhImasenavachaH smaran. dhR^iShTadyumnaM cha samprekShya raNe sa vimanA.abhavat.. 7-191-40 (53931) sandihyamAno vyathitaH kuntIputraM yudhiShThiram. ahataM vA hataM veti paprachCha sutamAtmanaH.. 7-191-41 (53932) sthirA buddhirhi droNasya na pArtho vakShyate.anR^itam. trayANAmapi lokAnAmaishvaryArthe katha~nchana.. 7-191-42 (53933) tasmAttaM paripaprachCha nAnyaM ka~nChiddvijarShabhaH. tasmiMstasya hi satyAshA bAlyAtprabhR^iti pANDave.. 7-191-43 (53934) tato niShpANDavAmurvIM kariShyantaM yudhAmpatim. droNaM j~nAtvA dharmarAjaM govindo vyathito.abravIt.. 7-191-44 (53935) yadyardhadivasaM droNo yudhyate manyumAsthitaH. satyaM bravImi te senA vinAshaM samupaiShyati.. 7-191-45 (53936) sa bhavAMstrAtu no droNAtsatyAjjyAyo.anR^itaM vachaH. anR^itaM jIvitasyArthe vadanna spR^ishyate.anR^itaiH.. 7-191-46 (53937) tayoH saMvadatorevaM bhImaseno.abravIdidam.. 7-191-47 (53938) shrutvaivaM tu mahArAja vadhopAyaM mahAtmanaH. gAhamAnasya te senAM mAlavasyendravarmaNaH.. 7-191-48 (53939) ashvatthAmeti vikhyAto gajaH shakragajopamaH. nihato yudhi vikramya tato.ahaM droNamabruvam.. 7-191-49 (53940) ashvatthAmA hato brahmannivartasvAhavAditi. nUnaM nAshraddadhadvAkyameSha me puruSharShabhaH.. 7-191-50 (53941) sa tvaM govindavAkyAni mAnayasva jayaiShiNaH. droNAya nihataM shaMsa rAja~nshAradvatIsutam.. 7-191-51 (53942) tvayokte naiva yudhyeta jAtu rAjandvijarShabhaH. satyavAgiti loke.asminbhavAnkhyAto janAdhipa.. 7-191-52 (53943) tasya tadvachanaM shrutvA kR^iShNavAkyaprachoditaH. bhAvitvAchcha mahArAja vaktuM samupachakrame.. 7-191-53 (53944) tamatathyabhaye magno jaye sakto yudhiShThiraH. `ashvatthAmA hati shabdamuchchaishchakAra ha'. avyaktamabravIdrAjanhataH ku~njara ityuta.. 7-191-54 (53945) tasya pUrvaM rathaH pR^ithvyAshchatura~NgulamuchChritaH. babhUvaivaM cha tenokte tasya vAhAH spR^ishanmahIm.. 7-191-55 (53946) yudhiShThirAttu tadvAkyaM shrutvA droNo mahArathaH. putravyasanasantapto nirAsho jIvite.abhavat.. 7-191-56 (53947) AgaskR^itamivAtmAnaM pANDavAnAM mahAtmanAm. R^iShivAkyena manvAnaH shrutvA cha nihataM sutam.. 7-191-57 (53948) vichetAH paramodvigno dhR^iShTadyumnamavekShya cha. yoddhuM nAshaknuvadrAjanyathApUrvamarindamaH.. .. 7-191-58 (53949) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi droNavadhaparvaNi pa~nchadashadivasayuddhe ekanavatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 191 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-191-51 jayaiShiNa ityasya govindavAkyAnItyatraikadeshe govinde.anvayaH.. 5-191-191 ekanavatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 191 ..
droNaparva - adhyAya 192

.. shrIH ..

7.192. adhyAyaH 192

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

ashvatthAmavadhashravaNanirviNNadroNamAraNAya dhR^iShTadyumnasamudyamaH.. 1 .. droNagrastasya dhR^iShTadyumnasya sAtyakinA vimochanam.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-192-0 (53950) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-192-0x (4774) taM dR^iShTvA paramodvignaM shokopahatachetasam. pA~nchAlarAjasya suto dhR^iShTadyumnaH samAdravat.. 7-192-1 (53951) ya iShTvA manujendreNa drupadena mahAmakhe. labdho droNavinAshAya samiddhAddhavyavAhanAt.. 7-192-2 (53952) sa dhanurjaitramAdAya ghoraM jaladaniHsvanam. dR^iDhajyamajaraM divyaM sharaM chAshIviShopamam.. 7-192-3 (53953) sandadhe kArmuke tasmiMstatastamanalopamam. droNaM jighAMstuH pA~nchAlyo mahAjvAlamivAnalam.. 7-192-4 (53954) tasya rUpaM sharasyAsIddhanurjyAmaNDalAntare. dyotato bhAskarasyeva ghanAnte pariveShiNaH.. 7-192-5 (53955) pArShatena parAmR^iShTaM jvalantamiva taddhanuH. antakAlamanuprAptaM menire vIkShya sainikAH.. 7-192-6 (53956) tamiShuM saMhataM tena bhAradvAjaH pratApavAn. dR^iShTvA.amanyata dehasya kAlaparyAyamAgatam.. 7-192-7 (53957) tataH prayatnamAtiShThadAchAryastasya vArame. na chAsyAstrANi rAjendra pAdurAsanmahAtmanaH.. 7-192-8 (53958) tasya tvahAni chatvAri kShapA chaikA.asyato gatA. tasya chAhnastribhAgena kShayaM jagmuH patatriNaH.. 7-192-9 (53959) sa sharakShayamAsAdya putrashokena chArditaH. vividhAnAM cha divyAmAnamastrANAmaprasAdataH.. 7-192-10 (53960) utsraShTukAmaH shastrANi R^iShivAkyaprachoditaH. tejasA pUryamANashcha yuyudhe na yathA purA.. 7-192-11 (53961) bhUyashchAnyatsamAdAya divyamA~NgirasaM dhanuH. sharAMshcha brahmadaNDAbhAndhR^iShTadyumnamayodhayat.. 7-192-12 (53962) tatastaM sharavarSheNa mahatA samavAkirat. vyashAtayachcha sa~Nkruddho dhR^iShTadyumnamamarShaNam.. 7-192-13 (53963) sharAMshcha shatadhA tasya droNashchichCheda sAyakaiH. dhvajaM dhanushcha nishitaiH sArathiM chApyapAtayat.. 7-192-14 (53964) dhR^iShTadyumnaH prahasyAnyatpunarAdAya kArmukam. shitena chainaM bANena pratyavidhyatstanAntare.. 7-192-15 (53965) so.atividdho maheShvAso.asambhrAnta iva saMyuge. bhallena shitadhAreNa chichChedAsya punardhanuH.. 7-192-16 (53966) yachchAsya bANavikR^itaM dhanUMShi cha vishAmpate. sarvaM chichCheda durdharSho gadAM kha~NgaM cha varjayan.. 7-192-17 (53967) dhR^iShTadyumnaM cha vivyAdha navabhirnishitaiH sharaiH. jIvitAntakaraiH kruddhaH shilAdhautaiH parantapaH.. 7-192-18 (53968) dhR^iShTadyumno.atha tasyAshvAnkharathAshvairmahArathaH. vyAmishrayadameyAtmA brAhmamastramudIrayan.. 7-192-19 (53969) te mishrA bahvashobhanta javanA vAtaraMhasaH. pArAvatasavarNAshcha shoNAshcha bharatarShabha.. 7-192-20 (53970) yathA savidyuto meghA nadanto jaladAgame. tathA rejurmahArAja mishritA raNamUrdhani.. 7-192-21 (53971) IShAbandhaM chakrabandhaM rathabandhaM tathaiva cha. prANAshayadameyAtmA dhR^iShTadyumnasya sa dvijaH.. 7-192-22 (53972) sa chChinnadhanvA pA~nchAlyo nikR^ittadhvajasArathiH. uttamAmApadaM prApya gadAM vIraH parAmR^ishat.. 7-192-23 (53973) tAmasya vishikhaistIkShNaiH kShipyamANAM mahArathaH. nijaghAnaH sharairdroNaH kruddhaH satyaparAkramaH.. 7-192-24 (53974) tAM tu dR^iShTvA naravyAghro droNena nihatAM sharaiH. vimalaM kha~NgamAdatta shatachandraM cha bhAnumat.. 7-192-25 (53975) asaMshayaM tathAbhUtaH pA~nchAlyaH sAdhvamanyata. vadhamAchAryamukhyasya prAptakAlaM mahAtmanaH.. 7-192-26 (53976) tataH sa rathanIDasthaM svarathasya rathepayA. agachChadasimudyamya shatachandraM cha bhAnumat.. 7-192-27 (53977) chikIrShurduShkaraM karma dhR^iShTadyumno mahArathaH. iyeSha vakSho bhettuM sa bhAradvAjasya saMyuge.. 7-192-28 (53978) so.atiShThadyugamadhye vai yugasannahaneShu cha. jaghanArdheShu chAshvAnAM tatsainyAH samapUjayan.. 7-192-29 (53979) tiShThato yugapAlIpu shoNAnapyadhitiShThataH. nApashyadantaraM droNastadadbhutamivAbhavat.. 7-192-30 (53980) kShipraM shyenasya charato yathaivAmiShagR^iddhinaH. tadvadAsIdabhIsAro dromapArShatayo raNe.. 7-192-31 (53981) tasya pArAvatAnashvAnrathashaktyA parAbhinat. sarvAnekaikasho droNo raktAnashvAnvivarjayan.. 7-192-32 (53982) te hatA nyapatanbhUmau dhR^iShTadyumnasya vAjinaH. shoNAstu paryamuchyanta rathabandhAdvishAmpate.. 7-192-33 (53983) tAnhayAnnihatAndR^iShTvA dvijAgryeNa sa pArShataH. nAmR^iShyata yudhAM shreShTho yAj~nasenirmahArathaH.. 7-192-34 (53984) virathaH sa gR^ihItvA tu kha~NgaM kha~NgabhR^itAM varaH. droNamabhyapatadrAjanvainateya ivoragam.. 7-192-35 (53985) tasya rUpaM babhau rAjanbhAradvAjaM jighAMsataH. yathA rUpaM purA viShNorhiraNyakashiporvadhe.. 7-192-36 (53986) sa tadA vividhAnmargAnpravarAMshchaikaviMshatim. darshayAmAsa kauravya pArShato vicharanraNe.. 7-192-37 (53987) bhrAntumuddhAntamAviddhamAplutaM prasR^itaM sR^itam. parivR^ittaM nivR^ittaM cha kha~NgaM charma cha dhArayan.. 7-192-38 (53988) sampAtaM samudIrNaM cha darshayAmAsa pArShataH. bhArataM kaushikaM chaiva sAtvataM chaiva shikShayA. 7-192-39 (53989) darshayanvyacharadyuddhe droNasyAntachikIrShayA.. charatastasya tAnmargAnvichitrAnkha~NgacharmiNaH. vyasmayanta raNe yodhA devatAshcha samAgatAH.. 7-192-40 (53990) tataH sharasahasreNa shatachandramapAtayat. charma kha~NgaM cha sambAdhe dhR^iShTadyumnasya sa dvijaH.. 7-192-41 (53991) ye tu vaitastikA nAma sharA AsannayodhinaH. nikR^iShTayuddhe droNasya nAnyeShAM santi te sharAH.. 7-192-42 (53992) R^ite shAradvatAtparthAddrauNervaikartanAttathA. pradyumnayuyudhAnAbhyAmabhimanyoshcha bhArata.. 7-192-43 (53993) athAsyeShu samAdhatta dR^iDhaM paramasammatam. antevAsinamAchAryo jighAMsuH putrasammitam.. 7-192-44 (53994) taM sharairdashabhistIkShNaishchichCheda shinipu~NgavaH. pashyatastava putrasya karNasya cha mahAtmanaH. grastamAchAryamukhyena dhR^iShTadyumnamamochayat.. 7-192-45 (53995) charantaM rathamArgeShu sAtyakiM satyavikramam. droNakarmAntaragataM kR^ipasyApi cha bhArata. apashyetAM mahAtmAnau viShvaksenadhana~njayau.. 7-192-46 (53996) apUjayetAM vArShNeyaM bruvANau sAdhusAdhviti. divyAnyastrANi sarveShAM yudhi nighntamachyutam.. 7-192-47 (53997) dhana~njayastataH kR^iShNamabravItpashya keshava. AchAryarathamukhyAnAM madhye krIDanmadhUdvahaH.. 7-192-48 (53998) Anandayati mAM bhUyaH sAtyakiH paravIrahA. mAdrIputrau cha bhImaM cha rAjAnaM cha yudhiShThiram.. 7-192-49 (53999) yachChikShayA.anuddhataH sanraNe charati sAtyakiH. mahArathAnupakrIDanvR^iShNInAM kIrtivardhanaH.. 7-192-50 (54000) tamete pratinandanti siddhAH sainyAshcha vismitAH. ajayyaM samare dR^iShTvA sAdhusAdhviti sAtyakim. yodhAshchobhayataH sarve karmabhiH samapUjayan.. .. 7-192-51 (54001) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi droNavadhaparvaNi pa~nchadashadivasayuddhe dvinavatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 192 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-192-38 kha~NghaM charma cha dhArayanbhrAntAditrayodashavidhaM sa~ncharaNaM darshayAmAseti sambandhaH.. 5-192-41 sambAdhe raNasa~NkaTe.. 5-192-42 vaitastikAH vitastipramANAH.. 5-192-192 dvinavatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 193

.. shrIH ..

7.193. adhyAyaH 193

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

droNadhR^iShTadyumnayoryuddham.. 1 .. droNena sopAlambhabhImavachaH shravaNena shastranyAsapUrvakaM yogena shIratyAgaH.. 2 .. sharIrArnnirgachChatastejorUpasya droNasya sa~njayAdibhiH pa~nchabhirevAvalokanam.. 3 .. dhR^iShTadyumnena droNashirashChedaH.. 4 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-193-0 (54002) sa~nchaya uvAcha. 7-193-0x (4775) [sAtvatasya* tu tatkarma dR^iShTvA duryodhanAdayaH. shaineyaM sarvataH kruddhA vArayAmAsura~njasA.. 7-193-1 (54003) kR^ipakarNau cha samare putrAshcha tava mAriSha.. shaineyaM tvarayA.abhyetya vinighnannishitaiH sharaiH.. 7-193-2 (54004) yudhiShThirastato rAjA mAdrIputrau cha pANDavau. bhImasenashcha balavAnsAtyakiM paryavArayan.. 7-193-3 (54005) karNashcha sharavarSheNa gautamashcha mahArathaH. duryodhanAdayaste cha shaineyaM paryavArayan.. 7-193-4 (54006) tAM vR^iShTiM sahasA rAjannutthitAM ghorarUpiNIm. vArayAmAsa shaineyo yodhayaMstAnmahArathAn.. 7-193-5 (54007) teShAmastrANi divyAni saMhitAni mahAtmanAm. vArayAmAsa vidhivaddivyairastrairmahAmR^idhe.. 7-193-6 (54008) krUramAyodhanaM jaj~ne tasminrAjasamAgame. rudrasyeva hi kruddhasya nighnatastAnpashUnpurA.. 7-193-7 (54009) hastAnAmuttamA~NgAnAM kArmukANAM cha bhArata. ChatrANAM chApaviddhAnAM chAmarANAM cha sa~nchayaiH. rAshayaH sma vyadR^ishyanta tatratatra raNAjire.. 7-193-8 (54010) bhagnachakrai rathaishchApi pAtitaishcha mahAdhvajaiH. sAdibhishcha hataiH shUraiH sa~NkIrNA vasudhA.abhavat.. 7-193-9 (54011) bANapAtanikR^ittAstu yodhAste kurusattama. cheShTanto vividhAshcheShTA vyadR^ishyanta mahAhave.. 7-193-10 (54012) vartamAne tathA yuddhe ghore devAsuropame. abravItkShatriyAMstatra dharmarAjo yudhiShThiraH.. 7-193-11 (54013) abhidravata saMyattAH kumbhayoniM mahArathAH. eSho hi pArpato vIro bhAradvAjena sa~NgataH.. 7-193-12 (54014) ghaTate cha yathAshakti bhAradvAjasya nAshane. yAdR^ishAni hi rUpANi dR^ishyante.asya mahAraNe.. 7-193-13 (54015) adya droNaM raNe kruddho ghAtayiShyati pArpataH. te yUyaM sahitA bhUtvA yudhyadhvaM kumbhasambhavam. 7-193-14 (54016) yudhiShThirasamAj~naptAH sR^i~njayAnAM mahArathAH. abhyadravanta saMyattA bhAradvAjajighAMsavaH.. 7-193-15 (54017) tAnsamApatataH sarvAnbhAradvAjo mahArathaH. abhyavartata vegena martavyamiti nishchitaH.. 7-193-16 (54018) prayAte satyasandhe tu samakampata medinI. vavurvAtAH sanirghAtAstrAsayAnA varUthinIm.. 7-193-17 (54019) papAta mahatI cholkA AdityAnnishcharantyuta. dIpayantI ubhe sene shaMsantIva mahadbhayam.. 7-193-18 (54020) jajvalushchaiva shastrANi bhAradvAjasya mAriSha. rathAH svananti chAtyarthaM hayAshchAshrUNyavAsR^ijan.. 7-193-19 (54021) hataujA iva chApyAsIdbhAradvAjo mahArathaH. prAsphurannayanaM chAsya vAmabAhustathaiva cha.. 7-193-20 (54022) vimanAshchAbhavadyuddhe dR^iShTvA pArShatamagrataH.. 7-193-21 (54023) R^iShINAM brahmavAdAnAM svargasya gamanaM prati. suyuddhena tataH prANAnutsraShTumupachakrame..] 7-193-22 (54024) tatashchaturdishaM sainyairdrupadasyAbhisaMvR^itaH. nirdahankShatriyavrAtAndroNaH paryacharadraNe.. 7-193-23 (54025) hatvA viMshatisAhasrAnkShatriyAnarimardanaH. dashAyutAni kariNAmavadhIdvishikhaiH shitaiH.. 7-193-24 (54026) so.atiShThadAhave yatto vidhUmo.agniriva jvalan. kShatriyANAmabhAvAya brAhmamastraM samAsthitaH.. 7-193-25 (54027) pA~nchAlyaM virathaM bhImo hatasarvAyudhaM balI. suvipaNNaM mahAtmAnaM tvaramANaH samabhyayAt.. 7-193-26 (54028) tataH svarathamAropya pA~nchAlyamarimardanaH. abravIdabhisamprekShya droNamasyantamantikAt.. 7-193-27 (54029) na tvadanya ihAchAryaM yoddhumutsahate pumAn. tvarasva prAgvadhAyaiva tvayi bhAraH samAhitaH.. 7-193-28 (54030) sa tathokto mahAbAhuH sarvabhArasahaM dhanuH. abhipatyAdade kShipramAyudhapravaraM dR^iDham.. 7-193-29 (54031) saMrabdhashcha sharAnasyandroNaM durvAraNaM raNe. vivArayipurAchAryaM sharavarShairavAkirat.. 7-193-30 (54032) tau nyavArayatAM shreShThau saMrabdhau raNashobhinau. udIrayetAM brAhmANi divyAnyastrANyanekashaH.. 7-193-31 (54033) sa mahAstrairmahArAja droNamAchChAdayadraNe. nihatya sarvANyastrANi bhAradvAjasya pArShataH.. 7-193-32 (54034) sa vasAtI~nshivIMschaiva vAhlIkAnkauravAnapi. rakShiShyamANAnsa~NgrAme droNaM vyadhamadachyutaH.. 7-193-33 (54035) dhR^iShTadyumnastathA rAjangabhastibhirivAMshumAn. vabhau prachChAdayannAshAH sharajAlaiH samantataH.. 7-193-34 (54036) tasya droNo dhanushChittvA viddhvA chainaM shilImukhaiH. marmANyabhyahanadbhUyaH sa vyathAM paramAmagAt.. 7-193-35 (54037) tato bhImo dR^iDhakrodho droNasyAshliShya taM ratham. shanakairiva rAjendra droNaM vachanamabravIt.. 7-193-36 (54038) yadi nAma na yudhyera~nshikShitA brahmabandhavaH. svakarmabhirasantuShTA na sma kShatraM kShayaM vrajet.. 7-193-37 (54039) ahiMsAM sarvabhUteShu dharmaM jyAyastaraM viduH. tasya cha brAhmaNo mUlaM bhavAMshcha brahmavittamaH.. 7-193-38 (54040) shvapAkavanmlechChagaNAnhatvA chAnyAnpR^ithagvidhAn. `bharanti hi sutAndArAMstadvadaj~nAnamohitAH'.. 7-193-39 (54041) aj~nAnAnmUDhavadbrahmanputradAradhanepsayA. ekasyArthe bahUnhatvA putrasyAdharmavidyayA. svakarmasthAnvikarmastho na vyapatrapase katham.. 7-193-40 (54042) `AchArahIna nirlajja brahmavandho varAyudha. idAnIM tiShTha durbuddhe na me jIvanvimokShyase.. 7-193-41 (54043) yasyArthe shastramAdAya yamapekShya cha jIvasi. sa chAdya patitaH shete pR^iShTenAveditastavaH.. 7-193-42 (54044) `sa vai cha nihataH shete tava putraH sumandadhIH'. dharmarAjasya tadvAkyaM nAbhisha~Nkitumarhasi.. 7-193-43 (54045) evamuktastato droNo bhImenotsR^ijya tadvanuH. `sannyAsAya sharIrasya yokShyamANaH sa vai dvijaH'. sarvANyastrANi dharmAtmA hAtukAmo.abhyabhApata.. 7-193-44 (54046) `karNaM duryodhanaM rAjaMstvaramANaH parAkramam'. karNakarNa maheShvAsa kR^ipa duryodhaneti cha.. 7-193-45 (54047) sa~NgrAme kriyatAM yatno bravImyeSha punaHpunaH. pANDavebhyaH shivaM vostu shastramabhyutsR^ijAmyaham. iti tatra mahArAja prAkroshaddrauNimeva cha.. 7-193-46 (54048) utsR^ijya cha raNe shastraM rathopasthe nivishya cha. abhayaM sarvabhUtAnAM pradadau yogamIyivAn.. 7-193-47 (54049) tasya tachChidranAj~nAya dhR^iShTadyumnaH pratApavAn. sasharaM tadvanurghoraM sannyasyAtha rathe tataH. kha~NgI rathAdavaplutya sahasA droNamabhyayAt.. 7-193-48 (54050) `pradrute tvatha droNAya dhR^iShTadyumne mahArathe'. hAhAkR^itAni bhUtAni mAnuShANItarANi cha.. 7-193-49 (54051) droNaM tathAgataM dR^iShTvA dhR^iShTadyumnavashaM gatam. hAhAkAraM bhR^ishaM chakruraho dhigiti chAbuvan.. 7-193-50 (54052) droNo.api shastrANyutsR^ijya paramaM sA~NkhyamAsthitaH. tathoktvA yogamAsthAya jyotirbhUto mahAtapAH.. 7-193-51 (54053) purANaM puruShaM viShNuM jagAma manasA param. mukhaM ki~nchitsamunnAmya viShTabyorastathAgrataH.. 7-193-52 (54054) nimIlitAkShaH satvastho nikShipya hR^idi dhAraNAm. omityekAkSharaM brahma jyotirbhUto mahAtapAH.. 7-193-53 (54055) smaritvA devadeveshamakSharaM paramaM prabhum. divamAkrAmadAchAryaH sAkShAtsadbhirdurAkramAm.. 7-193-54 (54056) `mUrdhAnaM tasya nirbhidya jyotI rAjanmahAtmanaH. jagAma paramaM sthAnaM dehaM nyasya rathottame'.. 7-193-55 (54057) dvau sUryAviti no buddhirAsIttasmiMstathAgate. ekarUpamivAbhAsIjyotirbhiH pUritaM nabhaH.. 7-193-56 (54058) samapadyata cholkAbhaM droNasya nidhane tadA. nimeShamAtreNa cha tajjyotirantaradhIyata.. 7-193-57 (54059) AsItkilakilAshabdaH prahR^iShTAnAM divaukasAm. brahmalokagate droNe dhR^iShTadyumne cha mohite.. 7-193-58 (54060) vayameva tadA.adrAkShma pa~ncha mAnuShayonayaH. yogayuktaM mahAtmAnaM gachChantaM paramAM gatim.. 7-193-59 (54061) ahaM dhana~njayaH pArthaH kR^ipaH shAradvato dvijaH. vAsudevashcha vArShNeyo dharmaputrashcha pANDavaH.. 7-193-60 (54062) anye tu sarve nApashyanbhAradvAjasya dhImataH. mahimAnaM mahArAja yogayuktasya gachChataH. brahmalokaM mahaddivyaM devaguhyaM hi tatparam.. 7-193-61 (54063) gatiM paramikAM prAptamajAnanto nR^iyonayaH. nApashyangachChamAnaM hi taM sArdhamR^iShipu~NgavaiH. AchAryaM yogamAsthAya brahmalokamarindamam.. 7-193-62 (54064) vitunnA~NgaM sharavrAtairanyastAyudhamasR^ikkSharam. vikR^iShya pArShataH kha~NgaM krodhAmarShavashaM gataH. dR^ishyamAnaH sarvabhUtaiH keshapakShe parAmR^ishat.. 7-193-63 (54065) tasya mUrdhAnamAlambya gatasatvasya dehinaH. ki~nchidabruvataH kAyAdvichakartAsinA shiraH.. 7-193-64 (54066) harSheNa mahatA mahatA yukto bhAradvAje nipAtite. siMhanAdaravaM chakre bhrAmayankha~NgamAhave.. 7-193-65 (54067) AkarNapalitaH shyAmo vayasA.ashItipa~nchakaH. tvatkR^ite vyacharatsa~Nkhye sa tu ShoDashavarShavat.. 7-193-66 (54068) uktavAshcha mahAbAhuH kuntIputro dhana~njayaH. jIvantamAnayAchAryaM mA vadhIrdrupadAtmaja.. 7-193-67 (54069) na hantavyo na hantavya iti te sainikAshcha ha. utkroshannarjunashchaiva sAnukroshastamAvrajat.. 7-193-68 (54070) kroshamAne.arjune chaiva pArthiveShu cha sarvashaH. dhR^iShTadyumno.avadhIddroNaM rathatalpe nararShabham.. 7-193-69 (54071) shoNitena pariklinno rathAdbhUmimathApatat. lohitA~Nga ivAdityo durdharShaH samapadyata.. 7-193-70 (54072) evaM taM nihataM sa~Nkhye dadR^ishe sainiko janaH. dhR^iShTadyumnastu tadrAjanbhAradvAjashiro.aharat.. 7-193-71 (54073) tAvakAnAM maheShvAsaH pramukhe tatsamAkShipat. te tu dR^iShTvA shiro rAjanbhAradvAjasya tAvakAH.. 7-193-72 (54074) palAyanakR^itotsAhA dudruvaH sarvatodisham. droNastu divamAsthAya nakShatrapathamAvishat.. 7-193-73 (54075) ahameva tadA.adrAkShaM droNasya nidhanaM nR^ipa. R^iSheH prasAdAtkR^iShmasya satyavatyAH sutasya cha.. 7-193-74 (54076) vidhUmAmiha saMyAntImulkAM prajvalitAmiva. apashyAma divaM stabdhvA gachChantaM taM mahAdyutim.. 7-193-75 (54077) hate droNe nirutsAhAH kurupANDavasR^i~njayAH. abhyadravanmahAvegAstataH sainyaM vyadIryata.. 7-193-76 (54078) nihatA hatabhUyiShThAH sa~NgrAme nishitaiH sharaiH. tAvakA nihate droNe gatAsava ivAbhavan.. 7-193-77 (54079) parAjayamathAvApya paratra cha mahadbhayam. ubhayenaiva te hInA vyanindanmatimAtmanaH.. 7-193-78 (54080) anvichChantaH sharIraM tu bhAradvAjasya pArthivAH. nAnvagachChanmahArAja kabandhAyutasa~Nkule.. 7-193-79 (54081) `patite tvatha saMrabdhe senAyAM tatra bhArata. udiShThankabandhAnAM sahasrANyekaviMshatiH.. 7-193-80 (54082) shoNitena pariklinnA raNabhUmishcha bhArata. lohitArdra ivAdityo durdarshashchAbhavattadA'.. 7-193-81 (54083) pANDavAstu jayaM labdhvA paratra cha mahadyashaH. bANasha~NkharavAMshchakruH siMhanAdAMshcha puShkalAn.. 7-193-82 (54084) bhImasenastato rAjandhR^iShTadyumnashcha pArShataH. varUthinyAmanR^ityetAM pariShvajya parasparam.. 7-193-83 (54085) abravIchcha tadA bhImaH pArShataM shatrutApanam. bhUyo.ahaM tvAM pariShvajya parivakShyAmi pArShata. sUtaputre hate pApe dhArtarAShTre cha saMyuge.. 7-193-84 (54086) etAvaduktvA bhImastu harSheNa mahatA yutaH. bAhushabdena pR^ithivIM kampayAmAsa pANDavaH.. 7-193-85 (54087) tasya shabdena vitrastAH prAdravaMstAvakA yudhi. kShatradharmaM samutsR^ijya palAyanaparAyaNAH.. 7-193-86 (54088) pANDavAstu jayaM labdhA hR^iShTA hyAsanvishAmpate. arikShayaM cha sa~NgrAme tena te sukhamApnuvan.. .. 7-193-87 (54089) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi droNavadhaparvaNi pa~nchadashadivasayuddhe trinavatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 193 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-193-12 eSho hIti sandhirArShaH.. 5-193-22 brahmavAdAnAM vedatulyAnAM vachanAnAm. dvitIyArthe ShaShThI. shrutyeti sheShaH.. 5-193-* kuNDalitAH 22 shlokAH jhapustakaeva dR^ishyante. 5-193-42 pR^iShThena tvayA pR^iShThena yudhiShThireNa AveditaH hata iti niveditaH.. 5-193-78 paratra cha mahadbhayamiti palAyanasya paralokaviruddhatvAt. ubhayena lokadvayena hInA rahitAH.. 5-193-193 trinavatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 194

.. shrIH ..

7.194. adhyAyaH 194

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

dR^iryodhanachodanayA kR^ipeNa droNavadhaM shrAvitasyAshvatthAmnaH kopodayaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-194-0 (54090) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-194-0x (4776) tato droNe hate rAjankuravaH shastrapIDitAH. hatapravIrA vidhvastA bhR^ishaM shokaparAyaNAH.. 7-194-1 (54091) udIrNAMshcha parAndR^iShTvA harShamANAnpunaH punaH. ashrupUrNekShaNAstrastA dInAstvAsanvishAmpate.. 7-194-2 (54092) vichetaso hatotsAhAH kashmalAbhihataujasaH. ArtasvareNa mahatA putraM te paryavArayan.. 7-194-3 (54093) veShaNNavadanA dInA vIkShamANA disho dasha. ashrukaNThA yathA daityA hiraNyAkShe purA hate.. 7-194-4 (54094) sa taiH parivR^ito rAjA trastaiH kShudramR^igairiva. ashaknuvannavasthAtumapAyAttanayastava.. 7-194-5 (54095) kShutpipAsAparimlAnAste yodhAstava bhArata. Adityeneva santaptA bhR^ishaM vimanaso.abhavan.. 7-194-6 (54096) bhAskarasyeva patanaM samudrasyeva shoShaNam. viparyAsaM yathA merorvAsavasyeva nirjayam.. 7-194-7 (54097) aprekShaNIyaM taddR^iShTvA bhAradvAjasya pAtanam. trastarUpatarA rAjankauravAH prAdravanbhayAt.. 7-194-8 (54098) gAndhArarAjaH shakunistrastastrastataraiH saha. hataM rukmarathaM shrutvA prAdravatsahito rathaiH.. 7-194-9 (54099) varUthinIM vegavatIM vidrutAM sapatAkinIm. parigR^ihya mahAsenAM sUtaputro.apayAdbhayAt.. 7-194-10 (54100) rathanAgAshvakalilAM puraskR^itya tu vAhinIm. madrANAmIshvaraH shalyo vIkShamANo.apayAdbhayAt.. 7-194-11 (54101) hatapravIrairbhUyiShThairdhvajairbahupatAkibhiH. vR^itaH shAradvato.agachChatkaShTa~NkaShTamiti bruvan.. 7-194-12 (54102) bhojanIkena shiShTena kali~NgAraTTabAhlikaiH. kR^itavarmA vR^ito rAjanprAyAtsujavanairhayaiH.. 7-194-13 (54103) padAtigaNasaMyuktastrasto rAjanbhayArditaH. ulUkaH prAdravattatra dR^iShTvA droNaM nipAtitam.. 7-194-14 (54104) darshanIyo yuvA chaiva shauryeNa kR^italakShaNaH. duHshAsano bhR^ishodvignaH prAdravadgajasaMvR^itaH.. 7-194-15 (54105) rathAnAmayutaM gR^ihya trisAhasraM cha dantinAm. vR^iShaseno yayau tUrNaM dR^iShTvA droNaM nipAtitam.. 7-194-16 (54106) gajAshvarathasaMyukto vR^itashchaiva padAtibhiH. duryodhano mahArAja prAyAttatra mahArathaH.. 7-194-17 (54107) saMshaptakagaNAdgR^ihya hatasheShAnkirITinA. susharmA prAdrAvadrAjandR^iShTvA droNaM nipAtitam.. 7-194-18 (54108) gajAnrathAnsamAruhya vyudasya cha hayA~njanAH. prAdravansarvataH sa~Nkhye dR^iShTvA rukmarathaM hatam.. 7-194-19 (54109) tvarayantaH pitR^Inanye bhrAtR^Inanye.atha mAtulAn. putrAnanye vayasyAMshcha prAdravankuravastadA.. 7-194-20 (54110) chodayantashcha sainyAni svastrIyAMshcha tathA.apare. sambandhinastathA.anye cha prAdravanta disho dasha.. 7-194-21 (54111) prakIrNakeshA vidhvastA na dvAvekatra dhAvataH. nedamastIti manvAnA hatotsAhA hataujasaH.. 7-194-22 (54112) utsR^ijya kavachAnanye prAdravaMstAvakA vibho. anyonyaM te samAkroshanyainikA bharatarShabha.. 7-194-23 (54113) tiShThatiShTheti na cha te svayaM tatrAvatasthire. dhuryAnunmuchya cha rathAddhatasUtAtsvala~NkR^itAn. adhiruhya hayAnyodhAH kShipraM padbhirachodayan.. 7-194-24 (54114) dramANe tathA sainye trastarUpe hataujasi. pratisrota iva grAho droNaputraH parAniyAt.. 7-194-25 (54115) tasyAsItsumahadyuddhaM shikhaNDipramukhairgaNaiH. prabhadrakaishcha pA~nchAlaishchedibhishcha sakekayaiH.. 7-194-26 (54116) hatvA bahuvidhAH senAH pANDUnAM yuddhadurmadaH. katha~nchitsa~NkaTAnmukto mattadviradavikramaH.. 7-194-27 (54117) dravamANaM balaM dR^iShTvA palAyanakR^itakShaNam. duryodhanaM samAsAdya droNaputro.abravIdidam.. 7-194-28 (54118) kimiyaM dravate senA trastarUpeva bhArata. dravamANAM cha rAjendra nAvasthApayase raNe.. 7-194-29 (54119) tvaM chApi na yathA pUrvaM prakR^itistho narAdhipa. karNaprabhR^itayashcheme nAvatiShThanti pArthiva.. 7-194-30 (54120) anyeShvapi cha yuddheShu naiva senA.adravattadA. kachchitkShemaM mahAbAho tava sainyasya bhArata.. 7-194-31 (54121) kaspinnidaM hate rAjanrathasiMhe balaM tava. etAmavasthAM saMprAptaM tanmamAchakShva kaurava.. 7-194-32 (54122) tattu duryodhanaH shrutvA droNaputrasya bhAShitam. ghoramapriyamAkhyAtuM nAshaknotpArthivarShabhaH.. 7-194-33 (54123) bhinnA nauriva te putro magnaH shokamahArNave. bAShpeNApihito dR^iShTvA droNaputraM rathe sthitam.. 7-194-34 (54124) tataH shAradvataM rAjA savrIDamidamabravIt. shaMsAtra bhadraM te sarvaM yathA sainyamidaM drutam.. 7-194-35 (54125) atha shAradvato rAjannArtimArchChanpunaHpunaH. shashaMsa droNaputrAya yathA droNo nipAtitaH.. 7-194-36 (54126) kR^ipa uvAcha. 7-194-37x (4777) vayaM droNaM puraskR^itya pR^ithivyAM pravaraM ratham. prAvartayAma sa~NgrAmaM pA~nchAlaireva kevalam.. 7-194-37 (54127) tataH pravR^itte sa~Ngrame vimishrAH kurusomakAH. anyonyamabhigarjantaH shastrairdehAnapAtayan.. 7-194-38 (54128) vartamAne tathA yuddhe kShIyamANeShu saMyuge. dhArtarAShTreShu sa~NkruddhaH pitA te.astramudairayat.. 7-194-39 (54129) tato droNo brAhmamastraM vikurvANo nararShabhaH. vyahanachChAtravAnbhallaiH shatasho.atha sahasrashaH.. 7-194-40 (54130) pANDavAH kekayA mAtsyAH pA~nchAlAshcha visheShataH. sa~Nkhye droNarathaM prApya vyanashankAlachoditAH.. 7-194-41 (54131) sahasraM narasiMhAnAM dvisAhasraM cha dantinAm. droNo brahmAstrayogena preShayAmAsa mR^ityave.. 7-194-42 (54132) AkarNapalitashyAmo vayasA.ashItipa~nchakaH. raNe paryacharaddroNo vR^iddhaH ShoDashavarShavat.. 7-194-43 (54133) klishyamAneShu sainyeShu vadhyamAneShu rAjasu. amarShavashamApannAH pA~nchAlA vimukhA.abhavan.. 7-194-44 (54134) teShu ki~nchitprabhagneShu vimukheShu sapatnajit. divyamastraM vikurvANo babhUvArka ivoditaH.. 7-194-45 (54135) sa madhyaM prApya pANDUnAM shararashmiH pratApavAn. madhyaM gata ivAdityo duShprekShyaste pitA.abhavat.. 7-194-46 (54136) te dahyamAnA droNena sUryeNeva virAjatA. dagdhavIryA nirutsAhA babhUvurgatachetasAH.. 7-194-47 (54137) tAndR^iShTvA pIDitAnbANairdroNena madhusUdanaH. jayaiShI pANDuputrANAmidaM vachanamabravIt.. 7-194-48 (54138) naiSha jAtu naraiH shakyo jetuM shastrabhR^itAM varaH. api vR^itrahaNA sa~Nkhye rathayUthapayUthapaH.. 7-194-49 (54139) te yUyaM dharmamutsR^ijya jayaM rakShata pANDavAH. yathA vaH saMyuge sarvAnna hanyAdrukmavAhanaH.. 7-194-50 (54140) ashvatthAmni hate naiSha yudhyediti matirmama. hataM taM saMyuge kashchidAkhyAtvasmai mR^iShA naraH.. 7-194-51 (54141) etannArochayadvAkyaM kuntIputro dhana~njayaH. arochayaMstu sarve.anye kR^ichChreNa tu yudhiShThiraH.. 7-194-52 (54142) bhImasenastu savrIDamabravItpitaraM tava. ashvatthAmA hata iti taM nAbudhyata te pitA.. 7-194-53 (54143) sa sha~NkamAnastanmithyA dharmarAjamapR^ichChata. hataM vA.apyahataM vA.a.ajau tvAM pitA putravatsalaH.. 7-194-54 (54144) tamatathyabhaye magno jaye sakto yudhiShThiraH. ashvatthAmAnamAyodhe hataM dR^iShTvA mahAgajam.. 7-194-55 (54145) bhImena girivarShmANaM mAlavasyendravarmaNaH. upasR^itya tadA droNamuchchairidamuvAcha ha.. 7-194-56 (54146) yasyArthe shastramAdatse yamavekShya cha jIvasi. putraste dayito nityaM soshvatthAmA nipAtitaH.. 7-194-57 (54147) shete vinihato bhUmau vane siMhashishuryathA.. 7-194-58 (54148) jAnannapyanR^itasyAtha doShAnsa dvijasattamam. avyaktamabravIdrAjA hataH ku~njara ityuta.. 7-194-59 (54149) sa tvAM nihatamAkrande shrutvA santApatApitaH. niyamya divyAnyastrANi nAyudhyata yathA purA.. 7-194-60 (54150) taM dR^iShTvA paramodvignaM shokAturamachetasam. pA~nchAlarAjasya sutaH krurakarmA samAdravat.. 7-194-61 (54151) taM dR^iShTvA paramodvignaM shokAturamachetasam. divyAnyastrANyathotsR^ijya raNe prAyamupAvishat.. 7-194-62 (54152) tato.asya keshAnsavyena gR^ihItvA pANinA tadA. pArShataH kroshamAnAnAM vIrANAmachChinachChiraH.. 7-194-63 (54153) na hantavyo na hantavya iti te sarvato.abruvan. tathaiva chArjuno vAhAdavaruhyainamAdravat.. 7-194-64 (54154) udyamya tvarito bAhuM bruvANashcha punaHpunaH. jIvantamAnayAchAryaM mAvadhIriti dharmavit.. 7-194-65 (54155) tathA nivAryamANena kauravairarjunena cha. hata eva nR^ishaMsena pitA tava nararShabha.. 7-194-66 (54156) sainikAshcha tataH sarve prAdravanta bhayArditAH. vayaM chApi nirutsAhA hate pitari te.anagha.. 7-194-67 (54157) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-194-68x (4778) tachChrutvA droNaputrastu nidhanaM piturAhave. krodhamAhArayattIvraM daNDAhata ivoragaH.. 7-194-68 (54158) tataH kruddho raNe drauNirbhR^ishaM jajvAla mAriSha. yathendhanaM mahatprApya prAjvaladdhavyavAhanaH.. 7-194-69 (54159) talaM talena niShpiShya dantairdantAnupAspR^ishat. niHshvasannurago yadvallohitAkSho.abhavattadA.. .. 7-194-70 (54160) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi nArAyaNAstramokShaparvaNi pa~nchadashadivasayuddhe chaturnavatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 194 ..
droNaparva - adhyAya 195

.. shrIH ..

7.195. adhyAyaH 195

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

dhR^itarAShTreNa sa~njayamprati droNavadhashrAviNAshvatthAmnA kimuktamiti prashnaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-195-0 (54161) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-195-0x (4779) adharmeNa hataM shrutvA dhR^iShTadyumnena sa~njaya. brAhmaNaM pitaraM vR^iddhamashvatthAmA kimabravIt.. 7-195-1 (54162) mAnavaM vAruNAgneyaM brAhmamastraM cha vIryavAn. aindraM nArAyaNaM chaiva yasminnityaM pratiShThitam.. 7-195-2 (54163) tamadharmeNa dharmiShThaM dhR^iShTadyumnena saMyuge. shrutvA nihatamAchAryaM so.ashvatthAmA kimabravIt.. 7-195-3 (54164) yena rAmAdavApyeha dhanurvedaM mahAtmanA. proktAnyastrANi divyAni putrAya guNakA~NkShiNA.. 7-195-4 (54165) ekameva hi loke.asminnAtmato guNavattaram. ichChanti puruShAH putraM loke nAnyaM katha~nchana.. 7-195-5 (54166) AchAryANAM bhavantyeva rahasyAni mahAtmanAm. tAni putrAya vA dadyuH shiShyAyAnugatAya vA.. 7-195-6 (54167) sa shiShyaH prApya tatsarvaM savisheShaM cha sa~njaya. shUraH shAradvatIputraH sa~Nkhye droNAdanantaraH.. 7-195-7 (54168) rAmasya tu samaH shastre purandarasamo yudhi. kArtavIryasamo vIrye bR^ihaspatisamo matau .. 7-195-8 (54169) mahIdharasamaH sthairye tejasA.agnisamo yuvA. samudra iva gAmbhIrye krodhe chAshIviShopamaH.. 7-195-9 (54170) sa rathI prathamo loke dR^iDhadhanvA jitaklamaH. shIghro.anila ivAkrande charankruddha ivAntakaH.. 7-195-10 (54171) asyatA yena sa~NgrAme dharaNyabhinipIDitA. `meghastanitanirghoShaM kampate bhayavihvalAH'. yo na vyathati sa~Ngrame vIraH satyaparAkramaH.. 7-195-11 (54172) vedasnAto vratasnAto dhanurvede cha pAragaH. mahodadhirivAkShobhyo rAmo dAsharathiryathA.. 7-195-12 (54173) tamadharmeNa dharmiShThaM dhR^iShTadyumnena saMyuge. shrutvA nihatamAchAryamashvatthAmA kimabravIt.. 7-195-13 (54174) dhR^iShTadyumnasya yo mR^ityuH sR^iShTastena mahAtmanA. yathA droNasya pA~nchAlyo yaj~nasenasuto.abhavat.. 7-195-14 (54175) taM nR^ishaMsena pApena krUreNAdIrghadarshinA. shrutvA nihatamAchAryamashvatthAmA kimabravIt.. .. 7-195-15 (54176) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi nArAyaNAstramokShaparvaNi pa~nchadashadivasayuddhe pa~nchanavatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 195 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-195-4 putrAya gurukA~NkShiNe iti .ka.jha.pAThaH.. 5-195-195 pa~nchanavatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 196

.. shrIH ..

7.196. adhyAyaH 196

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

ashvatthAmnA sakrodhaM yudhiShThirAdyupAlabhyaH.. 1 .. tathA droNasya nArAyaNAstralAbhaprakArAdikathanapUrvakaM tena pANDavAdivadha pratij~nAnam.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-196-0 (54177) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-196-0x (4780) ChadmanA nihataM shrutvA pitaraM pApakarmaNA. bAShpeNApUryata drauNI roSheNa cha nararShabha.. 7-196-1 (54178) tasya kruddhasya rAjendra vapurdIptamadR^ishyata. antakasyeva bhUtAni jihIrShoH kAlaparyaye.. 7-196-2 (54179) ashrUpurNe tato netre vyapamR^ijya punaH punaH. uvAcha kopAnniHshvasya duryodhanamidaM vachaH.. 7-196-3 (54180) pitA mama yathA kShudrairnyastashastro nipAtitaH. dharmadhvajavatA pApaM kR^itaM tadviditaM mama. anAryaM sunR^ishaMsaM cha dharmaputrasya me shrutam.. 7-196-4 (54181) yuddheShvapi pravR^ittAnAM dhruvaM jayaparAjayau. dvayametadbhavedrAjanvadhastatra prashasyate.. 7-196-5 (54182) nyAyavR^itto vadho yastu saM~NgrAme yudhyato bhavet. na sa duHkhAya bhavati tathA dR^iShTo hi sa dvijaiH.. 7-196-6 (54183) gataH sa vIralokAya pitA mama na saMshayaH. na shochyaH puruShavyAghra yastadA nidhanaM gataH.. 7-196-7 (54184) yattu dharmapravR^itaH sankeshagrahaNamAptavAn. pashyatAM sarvasainyAnAM tanme marmANi kR^intati.. 7-196-8 (54185) mayi jIvati yattAtaH keshagrahamavAptavAn. kathamanye kariShyanti putrebhyaH putriNaH spR^ihAm.. 7-196-9 (54186) kAmAtkrodhAdavij~nAnAdvarShAdbAlyena vA punaH. vidharmakANi kurvanti tathA paribhavanti cha.. 7-196-10 (54187) tadidaM pArShateneha mahadAdharmikaM kR^itam. avaj~nAya cha mAM nUnaM nR^ishaMsena durAtmanA.. 7-196-11 (54188) tasyAnubandhaM draShTA.asau dhR^iShTadyumnaH sudAruNam. akAryaM paramaM kR^itvA mithyAvAdI cha pANDavaH.. 7-196-12 (54189) yo hyasau ChadmanA.a.achAryaM shastraM sannyAsayattadA. tasyAdya dharmarAjasya bhUmiH pAsyati shoNitam.. 7-196-13 (54190) shape satyena kauravya iShTApUrtena chaiva ha. ahatvA sarvapA~nchAlA~njIveyaM na katha~nchana.. 7-196-14 (54191) sarvopAyairyatiShyAmi pA~nchAlAnAmahaM vadhe. dhR^iShTadyumnaM cha samare hantA.ahaM pApakAriNam.. 7-196-15 (54192) karmaNA yena teneha mR^idunA dAruNena cha. pA~nchAlAnAM vadhaM kR^itvA shAntiM labdhAsmi kaurava.. 7-196-16 (54193) yadarthaM puruShavyAghra putrAnichChanti mAnavAH. pretya cheha cha samprAptAttrAyante mahato bhayAt.. 7-196-17 (54194) pitrA tu mama sA.avasthA prAptA nirbandhunA yathA. mayi shailapratIkAshe putre shiShye cha jIvati.. 7-196-18 (54195) dhi~NmamAstrANi divyAni dhigbAhU dhikparAkramam. yaM sma droNaH sutaM prApya keshagrahamavAptavAn.. 7-196-19 (54196) sa tathAhaM kariShyAsi yathA bharatasattama. paralokagatasyApi bhaviShyAmyanR^iNaH pituH.. 7-196-20 (54197) AryeNa hi na vaktavyA kadAchitstutirAtmanaH. piturvadhamamR^iShyaMstu vakShyAmyadyeha pauruSham.. 7-196-21 (54198) adya pashyantu me vIryaM pANDavAH sajanArdanAH. mR^idgataH sarvasainyAni yugAntamiva kurvataH.. 7-196-22 (54199) na hi devA na gandharvA nAsurA na cha rAkShasAH. adya shaktA raNe jetuM rathasthaM mAM nararShabhAH.. 7-196-23 (54200) madanyo nAsti loke.asminnarjunAdvA.astravitkvachit. ahaM hi jvalatAM madhye mayUkhAnAmivAMshumAn. prayoktA devasR^iShTAnAmastrANAM pR^itanAgataH.. 7-196-24 (54201) bhR^ishamiShvasanAdadya matprayuktA mahAhave. darshayantaH sharA vIryaM pramathiShyanti pANDavAn.. 7-196-25 (54202) adya sarvA disho rAjandhArAbhiriva sa~NkulAH. AvR^itAH patribhistIkShNairdraShTAro mAmakairiha.. 7-196-26 (54203) vikira~nCharajAlAni sarvato bhairavasvanAn. shatrUnnipAtayiShyAmi mahAvAta iva drumAn.. 7-196-27 (54204) na hi jAnAti bIbhatsustadastraM na janArdanaH. na bhImaseno na yamau na cha rAjA yudhiShThiraH.. 7-196-28 (54205) na pArShato durAtmA.asau na shikhaNDI na sAtyakiH. yadidaM mayi kauravya sakalyaM sanivartanam.. 7-196-29 (54206) nArAyaNAya me pitrA praNamya vidhipUrvakam. upahAraH purA datto brahmarUpa upasthitaH.. 7-196-30 (54207) taM svayaM pratigR^ihyAtha bhagavAnsa varaM dadau. vavre pitA me paramamastraM nArAyaNaM tataH.. 7-196-31 (54208) athainamabravIdrAjanbhAgavAndevasattamaH. bhavitA tvatsamo nAnyaH kashchidyudhi naraH kvachit.. 7-196-32 (54209) na tvidaM sahasA brahmanprayoktavyaM katha~nchana. na hyetadastramanyatra vadhAchChatrornivartate.. 7-196-33 (54210) na chaitachChakyate jetuM ko na vadhyeta vai prabho. avadhyamapi hanyAdvi tasmAnnaitatprayojayet.. 7-196-34 (54211) atha sa~Nkhye rathasyaiva shastrANAM cha visarjanam. prayAchanaM cha shatrUNAM gamanaM sharaNasya cha.. 7-196-35 (54212) ete prashamane yogA mahAstrasya parantapa. sarvathA pIDito hiMsyAdavadhyAnpIDayanraNe.. 7-196-36 (54213) tajjagrAha pitA mahyamabravIchchaiva sa prabhuH. tvaM vadhiShyasi sarvANi shastravarShANyanekashaH. anenAstreNa sa~NgrAme tejasA cha jvaliShyasi.. 7-196-37 (54214) evamuktvA sa bhagavAndivamAchakrame prabhuH. etannArAyaNAdastraM tatprAptaM pitR^ibandhunA.. 7-196-38 (54215) tenAhaM pANDavAMshchaiva pA~nchAlAnmAtsyakekayAn. vidrAvayiShyAmi raNe shachIpatirivAsurAn.. 7-196-39 (54216) yathAyathA.ahamichCheyaM tathA bhUtvA sharA mama. nipateyuH sapatneShu vikramatsvapi bhArata.. 7-196-40 (54217) yatheShTamashmavarSheNa pravarShiShye raNe sthitaH. ayomukhaishcha vihagairdrAvayiShye mahArathAn.. 7-196-41 (54218) parashvathAMshcha nishitAnutsrakShye.ahamasaMshayam.. 7-196-42 (54219) so.ahaM nArAyaNAstreNa mahatA shatrutApanaH. shatrUnvidhvaMsayiShyAmi kadarthIkR^itya pANDavAn.. 7-196-43 (54220) mitrabrahmagurudrohI jAlmakaH suvigarhitaH. pA~nchAlApashadashchAdya na me jIvanvimokShyate.. 7-196-44 (54221) tachChrutvA droNaputrasya paryavartata vAhinI. tataH sarve mahAsha~NkhAndadhmuH puruShasattamAH. bherIshchAbhyahananhR^iShTA DiNDibhAMshcha sahasrashaH.. 7-196-45 (54222) tathA nanAda vasudhA khuranemiprapIDitA. sa shabdastumulaH khaM dyAM pR^ithivIM cha vyanAdayat.. 7-196-46 (54223) taM shabdaM pANDavAH shrutvA parjanyaninadopamam. sametya rathinAM shreShThAH sahitAshchApyamantrayan.. 7-196-47 (54224) tathoktvA droNaputrastu vAryupaspR^ishya bhArata. prAdushchakAra taddivyamastraM nArAyaNaM tadA.. .. 7-196-48 (54225) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi nArAyaNAstramokShaparvaNi pa~nchadashadivasayuddhe ShaNNavatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 196 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-196-4 dharmadhvajavatA dAmbhikena. tat anR^itavachanarUpaM pApam. anAryaM nIchayogyaM karma.. 5-196-10 bAlyena chApakena. vidharmakANi dharmaviruddhAni.. 5-196-12 anubandhaM phalam. pANDavashcha anubandhaM draShTetyanuShajyate.. 5-196-24 mayUkhAnAM mayUkhavatAm.. 5-196-29 kalyaH prayogaH. nivartanamupasaMhAraH.. 5-196-30 brahmarUpo vedarUpaH. vaidikairmantraiH stutavAnityarthaH.. 5-196-34 shakyate j~nAtuM kena vadhyediti prabho iti jha. pAThaH. tatra kena pratyastreNa vadhyet vadhyeta iti j~nAtumityarthaH.. 5-196-35 rathasyaiva visarjanam. shastrANAmapi visarjanaM cha. prayAchanaM mAvadhIriti yAchanaM. sharaNasya gamanaM tvameva sharaNaM na iti kIrtanaM cha.. 5-196-36 pIDitaH pIDitaM shastrAntareNa bAdhitam. puMstvamArSham.. 5-196-38 pitR^ibandhunA mayA.. 5-196-44 jAlmako mUrkha.. 5-196-196 ShaNNavatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 197

.. shrIH ..

7.197. adhyAyaH 197

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

kurusenAharavashravaNabhItena yudhiShThireNa palAyitasenApratinivartakaprashne arjunena tatkathanapUrvakaM droNavadhopekShaNAdAtmopAlambhaH.. 1 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-197-0 (54226) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-197-0x (4781) prAdurbhUte tatastasminnastre nArAyaNe prabho. prAvAtsapR^iShato vAyuranabhre stanayitnumAn.. 7-197-1 (54227) chachAla pR^ithivI chApi chukShubhe cha mahodadhiH. pratisrotaH pravR^ittAshcha gantuM tatra samudragAH.. 7-197-2 (54228) shikharANi vyashIryanta girINAM tatra bhArata. apasavyaM mR^igAshchaiva pANDusenAM prachakrire.. 7-197-3 (54229) tamasA tAvakIryanta sUryashcha kaluSho.abhavat. sampatanti cha bhUtAni kravyAdAni prahR^iShTavat.. 7-197-4 (54230) devadAnavagandharvAstrastAstvAsanvishAmpate. katha~NkhathA.abhavattIvrA dR^iShTvA tadvyAkulaM mahat.. 7-197-5 (54231) vyathitAH sarvarAjAnastrastAshchAsanvishAmpate. taddR^iShTvA ghorarUpaM vai drauNerastraM bhayAvaham.. 7-197-6 (54232) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-197-7x (4782) nivartiteShu sainyeShu droNaputreNa saMyuge. bhR^ishaM shokAbhitaptena piturvadhamamR^iShyatA.. 7-197-7 (54233) kurUnApatato dR^iShTvA dhR^iShTadmumnasya rakShaNe. ko mantraH pANDaveShvAsIttanmamAchakShva sa~njaya.. 7-197-8 (54234) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-197-9x (4783) prAgeva vidrutAndR^iShTvA dhArtarAShTrAnyudhiShThiraH. punashcha tumulaM shabdaM shrutvA.arjunamathAbravIt.. 7-197-9 (54235) yudhiShThira uvAcha. 7-197-10x (4784) AchArye nihate droNe dhR^iShTadyumnena saMyuge. nihate vajrahastena yathA vR^itre mahAsure.. 7-197-10 (54236) nAshaMsanto jayaM yuddhe dInAtmAno dhana~njaya. AtmatrANe matiM kR^itvA prAdravankuravo raNAt.. 7-197-11 (54237) kechidvAntai rathaistUrNaM nihataiH pAShNiyantR^ibhiH. vipatAkadhvajachChatraiH pArthivAH shIrNakUbaraiH.. 7-197-12 (54238) bhagnanIDairAkulAshvaiH prAruhyAnyAnvichetasaH. bhItAH pAdairhayAnkechittvarayantaH svayaM rathAn.. 7-197-13 (54239) bhagnAkShayugachakraishcha vyAkR^iShyanta samantataH. rathAnvishIrNAnutsR^ijya padbhiH kechichcha vidrutAH.. 7-197-14 (54240) hayapR^iShThagatAshchAnye kR^iShyante.ardhachyutAsanAH. gajaskandheShu saMsyUtA nArAchaishchalitAsanAH.. 7-197-15 (54241) sharArtairvidrutairnAgairhR^itAH kechiddisho dasha. vishastrakavachanAshchAnye vAhanebhyaH kShitiM gatAH.. 7-197-16 (54242) sa~nChinnA nemibhishchaiva mR^iditAshcha hayadvipaiH. kroshantastAta putreti palAyante pare bhayAt.. 7-197-17 (54243) nAbhijAnanti chAnyonyaM kashmalAbhihataujasaH. putrAnpitR^InsakhInbhrAtR^InsamAropya dR^iDhakShatAn.. 7-197-18 (54244) jalena kledayantyanye vimuchya kavachanAnyapi. `palAyanaparAshchAnye yodhAH shatasahasrashaH'.. 7-197-19 (54245) avasthAM tAdR^ishIM prApya hate droNe drutaM balam. punarAvartitaM kena yadi jAnAsi shaMsa me.. 7-197-20 (54246) hayAnAM heShatAM shabdaH ku~njarANAM cha bR^iMhatAm. rathanemisvanaishchAtra vimishraH shrUyate mahAn.. 7-197-21 (54247) ete shabdA bhR^ishaM tIvrAH pravR^ittAH kurusAgare. mumurmuhurudIryante kampayantyapi mAmakAn.. 7-197-22 (54248) ya eSha tumulaH shabdaH shrUyate romaharShaNaH. sendrAnapyeSha lokAMstrIngrasediti matirmama.. 7-197-23 (54249) manye vajradharasyaiSha ninAdo bhairavasvanaH. droNe hate kauravAryaM vyaktamabhyeti vAsavaH.. 7-197-24 (54250) prahR^iShTaromakUpAH smaH saMvignarathaku~njarAH. dhana~njaya guruM shrutvA tatra nAdaM subhIShaNam.. 7-197-25 (54251) ka eSha kauravAndIrNAnavasthApya mahArathaH. nivartayati yuddhArthaM mR^idhe deveshvaro yathA.. 7-197-26 (54252) arjuna uvAcha. 7-197-27x (4785) udyamyAtmAnamugrAya karmaNe vIryamAsthitAH. dhamanti kauravAH sha~NkhAnyasya vIryaM samAshritAH.. 7-197-27 (54253) yatra te saMshayo rAjannyastashastre gurau hate. dhArtarAShTrAnavasthApya ka eSha nadatIti hi.. 7-197-28 (54254) hImantaM taM mahAbAhuM mattadviradagAminam. `indraviShmusamaM vIrye kope.antakamiva sthitam.. 7-197-29 (54255) bR^ihaspatisamaM buddhyA nItimantaM mahAratham'. AkhyAsyAmyugrakarmANaM kurUNAmabhaya~Nkaram.. 7-197-30 (54256) yasmi~njAte dadau droNo gavAM dashashataM dhanam. brAhmaNebhyo mahArhebhyaH so.ashvatthAmaiSha garjati.. 7-197-31 (54257) jAtamAtreNa vIreNa yenochchaiH shravasA yathA. heShatA kampitA bhUmirlokAshcha sakalAstrayaH.. 7-197-32 (54258) tachChrutvAntarhitaM bhUtaM nAma tasyAkarottadA. ashvatthAmeti so.adyaiSha shUro nadati pANDava.. 7-197-33 (54259) yo hyanAtha ivAkramya pArShatena hatastathA. karmaNA sunR^ishaMsena tasya nAtho vyavasthitaH.. 7-197-34 (54260) guruM me yatra pA~nchAlyaH keshapakShe parAmR^ishat. tanna jAtuM kShameddrauNirjAnanpauruShamAtmanaH.. `sa hi tenaiva naH sarvAnkShapayediti me matiH'.. 7-197-35 (54261) upachIrNo gururmithyA bhavatA rAjyakAraNAt. dharmaj~nena satA nAma so.adharmaH sumahAnkR^itaH.. 7-197-36 (54262) chiraM sthAsyati chAkIrtistrailokye sacharAchare. rAme vAlivadhAdyadvadevaM droNe nipAtite.. 7-197-37 (54263) sarvadharmopapanno.ayaM sa me shiShyashcha pANDavaH. nAyaM vakShyati mithyeti pratyayaM kR^itavAMstvayi.. 7-197-38 (54264) sa satyaka~nchukaM nAma praviShTena tato.anR^itam. AchArya ukto bhavatA hataH ku~njara ityuta.. 7-197-39 (54265) tataH shastraM samutsR^ijya nirmamo gatachetanaH. AsItsuvihvalo rAjanyathA dR^iShTastvayA vibhuH.. 7-197-40 (54266) sa tu shokasamAviShTo vimukhaH putravatsalaH. shAshvataM dharmamutsR^ijya guruH shiShyeNa ghAtitaH.. 7-197-41 (54267) nyastashastramadharmeNa ghAtayitvA guruM bhavAn. rakShatvidAnIM sAmAtyo yadi shaktosi pArShatam.. 7-197-42 (54268) grastamAchArya putreNa kruddhena hatabandhunA. sarve vayaM paritrAtuM na shakShyAmo.adya pArShatam.. 7-197-43 (54269) sauhArdaM sarvabhUteShu yaH karotyatimAnuShaH. so.adya keshagrahaM shrutvA piturdhakShyati no raNe.. 7-197-44 (54270) vikroshamAne hi mayi bhR^ishamAchAryagR^idvini. apAkIrya svayaM dharmaM shipyeNa nihato guruH.. 7-197-45 (54271) yadA gataM vayo bhUyaH shiShTamalpataraM cha naH. tasyedAnIM virodho.ayamadharmo.ayaM kR^ito mahAn.. 7-197-46 (54272) piteva nityaM sauhArdAtpiteva hi cha dharmataH. so.alpakAlasya rAjyasya kAramAdvAtito guruH.. 7-197-47 (54273) dhR^itarAShTreNa bhIShmAya droNAya cha vishAmpate. visR^iShTA pR^ithivI sarvA saha putraishcha tatparaiH.. 7-197-48 (54274) samprApya tAdR^ishIM vR^ittiM satkR^itaH satataM paraiH. abravItsatataM putrAnmAmevAbhyadhikaM guruH.. 7-197-49 (54275) avekShamANastvAM mAM cha nyastAstrashchAhave hataH. na tvenaM yudhyamAnaM vai hanyAdapi shatakratuH.. 7-197-50 (54276) tasyAchAryasya vR^iddhasya droho nityopakAriNaH. kR^ito hyanAryairasmAbhIra rAjyArthe lubdhabuddhibhiH.. 7-197-51 (54277) aho bata mahatpApaM kR^itaM karma sudAruNam. yadrAjyasukhalobhena droNo.ayaM sAdhughAtitaH.. 7-197-52 (54278) putrAnbhrAtR^InpitR^IndArA~njIvitaM chaiva vAsaviH. tyajetsarvaM mama premNA jAnAtyevaM hi me guruH.. 7-197-53 (54279) sa mayA rAjyakAmena hanyamAno hyupekShitaH. tasmAdarvAkshirA rAjanprApto.asmi narakaM prabho.. 7-197-54 (54280) brAhmaNaM vR^iddhamAchAryaM nyastashastraM mahAmunim. ghAtayitvA.adya rAjyArthe mR^itaM shreyo na jIvitam.. .. 7-197-55 (54281) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi nArAyaNAstramokShaparvaNi pa~nchadashadivasayuddhe saptanavatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 197 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-197-1 sapR^iShataH sajalabinduH. anabhre aprAvR^iShikAle.. 5-197-5 katha~NkathA kathaM kartavyaM kathaM kartavyamityevaMshabdaH.. 5-197-8 rakShaNe mantraH ka AsIditi sambandhaH.. 5-197-30 vyAghrAsyamugrakarmANamiti jha.pAThaH.. 5-197-31 yasminniti dashashatAmetyanena sarvagodhanaM dadAviti j~neyam. anyathA ekadhenvarthaM drupadaM prati droNagamanasyAsambhavaH. yadvA bhAvinIM sampadamabhilakShyaitaddAnaM draShTavyam. putrotpattikAle tasya nirdhanatvokteH.. 5-197-39 satyaka~njukaM satyAbhAsamanR^itam.. 5-197-53 vAsavirarjunaH.. 5-197-197 saptanavatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 198

.. shrIH ..

7.198. adhyAyaH 198

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sAdhikShepamashvatthAmato yudhiShThiraM bhIShayantaM pArthaMprati bhImena sAmarShamAtmabalavarNanAdipUrvakaM svenAshvatthAmAdivijayapratij~nAnam.. 1 .. dhR^iShTadyumnenApyarjunaM prati sakrodhaM kShAtradharmAdikathanapUrvakaM svakR^itadgroNavadhasya dhArmikatvakathanam.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-198-0 (54282) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-198-0x (4786) arjunasya vachaH shrutvA nochustatra mahArathAH. apriyaM vA priyaM vA.api mahArAja dhana~njayam.. 7-198-1 (54283) tataH kruddho mahAbAhurbhImaseno.abhyabhAShata. kutsayanniva kaunteyamarjunaM bharatarShabha.. 7-198-2 (54284) muniryathA.araNyagato bhAShate dharmasaMhitam. nyastadaNDo yathA pArthaM brAhmaNaH saMshitavrataH.. 7-198-3 (54285) kShatatrAtA kShatAjjIvankShantA strIShvapi sAdhuShu. kShatriyaH kShitimApnoti kShipraM dharmaM yashaH shriyaH.. 7-198-4 (54286) sa bhavAnkShatriyaguNairyuktaH sarvaiH kulodvahaH. avipashchidyathA vAchaM vyAharannAdya shobhase.. 7-198-5 (54287) parAkramaste kaunteya shakrasyeva shachIpateH. na chAtivartase dharmaM velAmiva mahodadhiH.. 7-198-6 (54288) na pUjayettvAM konvadya yattrayodashavArShikam. amarShaM pR^iShThataH kR^itvA dharmamevAbhikA~NkShase.. 7-198-7 (54289) diShTyA tAta manaste.adya svadharmamanuvartate. AnR^ishaMsye cha te diShTyA buddhiH satatamachyuta.. 7-198-8 (54290) yattu dharmapravR^ittasya hR^itaM rAjyamadharmataH. draupadI cha parAmR^iShTA sabhAmAnIya shatrubhiH.. 7-198-9 (54291) vanaM pravrAjitAshchAsma valkalAjinavAsasaH. anarhamANAstaM bhAvaM trayodasha samAH paraiH.. 7-198-10 (54292) `bahUni kShAmya shatrUNAM satyadharmaratA vayam. tathA tanmarShayitvA tu yathA te utpathe sthitAH'.. 7-198-11 (54293) etAnyamarShasthAnAni marShitAni tvayA.aghana. kShatradharmaprasaktena sarvametadanuShThitam.. 7-198-12 (54294) tamadharmamapAkR^iShTaM smR^itvA.adya sahitastvayA. sAnubandhAnhaniShyAmi kShudrAnrAjyaharAnaham.. 7-198-13 (54295) tvayA hi kathitaM pUrvaM yuddhAyAbhyAgatA vayam. ghaTAmahe yathAshakti tvaM tu no.adya jugupsase.. 7-198-14 (54296) svadharmaM nechChase j~nAtuM vR^ithA vachanameva te. bhayArditAnAmasmAkaM vAchA marmANi kR^intasi.. 7-198-15 (54297) vapanvraNe kShAramiva kShatAnAM shatrukarshana. vidIryate me hR^idayaM tvayA vAkshalyapIDitam.. 7-198-16 (54298) adharmamena vipulaM dhArmikaH sanna budhyase. yattvamAtmAnamasmAMshcha prashaMsyAnna prashaMsasi.. 7-198-17 (54299) vAsudeve sthite chApi droNaputraM prashaMsasi. yaH kalAM ShoDashIM pUrNAM dhana~njaya na te.arhati.. 7-198-18 (54300) svayamevAtmano doShAnbruvANaH kiM na lajjase.. 7-198-19 (54301) `mama nAgAyutaM pArtha balaM bAhvorvidhIyate'. dArayeyaM mahIM krodhAdvikireyaM cha parvatAn.. 7-198-20 (54302) AvidhyaitAM gadAM gurvI bhImAM kA~nchanamAlinIm. giriprakAshAnkShitijAnbha~njeyamanilo yathA.. 7-198-21 (54303) drAvayeyaM sharaishchApi sendrAndevAnsamAgatAn. sarAkShasagaNAnpArtha sAsuroragamAnavAn.. 7-198-22 (54304) sa tvamevaMvidhaM jAnanbhrAtaraM mAM nararShabha. droNaputrAdbhayaM kartuM nArhasyamitavikrama.. 7-198-23 (54305) athavA tiShTha bIbhatso saha sarvaiH sahodaraiH. ahamenaM gadApANirjeShyAmyeko mahAhave.. 7-198-24 (54306) tataH pA~nchAlarAjasya putraH pArthamathAbravIt. sa~Nkruddhamiva nardantaM hiraNyakashipurharim.. 7-198-25 (54307) dhR^iShTadyumna uvAcha. 7-198-26x (4787) bIbhatso viprakarmANi vihitAni manIShibhiH. yAjanAdhyApane dAnaM yathA yaj~napratigrahau.. 7-198-26 (54308) ShaShThamadhyayanaM nAma teShAM kasminpratiShThitaH. hato droNo mayA hyevaM kiM mAM pArtha vigarhase.. 7-198-27 (54309) apakrAntaH svadharmAchcha kShAtradharmaM vyapAshritaH. adharmeNa hatastasmAdastreNa kShudrakarmakR^it.. 7-198-28 (54310) tathA mAyAM prayu~njAnamasahyaM brAhmaNabruvam. pratimAyI nihanyAdyo na yuktaM pArtha tatra kim.. 7-198-29 (54311) tasmiMstathA mayA shaste yadi drauNAyanI ruShA. kurute bhairavaM nAdaM tatra kiM mama hIyate.. 7-198-30 (54312) na chAdbhutamidaM manye yaddrauNishchAtra garjati. ghAtayiShyati kauravyAnparitrAtumashaknuvan.. 7-198-31 (54313) yachcha mAM dhArmiko bhUtvA bravIShi gurughAtinam. tadarthamahamutpannaH pA~nchAlyasya suto.analAt.. 7-198-32 (54314) yasya kAryamakAryaM vA yudhyataH syAtsamaM raNe. taM kathaM brAhmaNaM brUyAH kShatriyaM vA dhana~njaya.. 7-198-33 (54315) yo hyanastravido hanyAdbrahmAstraiH krodhamUrchChitaH. sarvopAyairna sa kathaM vadhyaH puruShasattama.. 7-198-34 (54316) visheShAtpitR^ihantA me na sa vadhyaH kathaM mayA. yo.ayaM pApaH sudurmedhA bAndhavAnyudhi jaghnivAn. tasya viprabruvavadhe kathaM pApaM bhavenmama'.. 7-198-35 (54317) vidharmiNaM dharmavidbhiH proktaM teShAM viShopamam. jAnandharmArthatattvaj~na kiM mAmarjuna garhase.. 7-198-36 (54318) nR^ishaMsaH sa mayA.a.akramya ratha eva nipAtitaH. tanmAmanindyaM bIbhatso kimarthaM nAbhinandase.. 7-198-37 (54319) kAlAnalasamaM pArtha jvalArkaviShopamam. bhImaM droNashirashChinnaM na prashaMsasi me katham.. 7-198-38 (54320) yo.asau mamaiva nAnyasya bAndhavAnyudhi jaghnivAn. ChittvA.api tasya mUrdhAnaM naivAsmi vigatajvareH.. 7-198-39 (54321) tachcha me kR^intate marma yanna tasya shiro mayA. niShAdaviShaye kShiptaM jayadrathashiro yathA.. 7-198-40 (54322) athAvadhashcha shatrUNAmadharmaH shrUyate.arjuna. kShatriyasya hi dharmo.ayaM hanyAddhanyeta vA punaH.. 7-198-41 (54323) sa shatrurnihataH sa~Nkhye mayA dharmeNa pANDava. yathA tvayA hataH shUro bhagadattaH pituH sakhA.. 7-198-42 (54324) pitAmahaM raNe hatvA manyase dharmamAtmanaH. mayA shatrau hate kasmAtpApe dharmaM na manyase.. 7-198-43 (54325) sambandhAvanataM pArtha na mAM tvaM vaktumarhasi. svagAtrakR^itasopAnaM niShaNNamiva dantinam.. 7-198-44 (54326) kShamAmi te sarvameva vAgvyatikramamarjuna. draupadyA draupadeyAnAM kR^ite nAnyena hetunA.. 7-198-45 (54327) kulakramAgataM vairaM mamAchAryeNa vishrutam. tathA jAnAtyayaM loko na yUyaM pANDunandanAH.. 7-198-46 (54328) nAnR^itI pANDavo jyeShTho nAhaM vA.adhArmiko.arjuna. `na kShatriya iti prAhuryo na hanti raNAjire.. 7-198-47 (54329) pitaraM vA guruM vA.api jighAMsu putrashiShyayoH. jihmena vA.apyajihmena hanyAdevAvichArayan.. 7-198-48 (54330) ityuktaM brahmaNA pUrvaM kShatriyANAM dviShadvadhe. tasmAchChiShyeNa nihataH shatrurme brAhmaNabruvaH.. 7-198-49 (54331) yaH kShatriyasuto hanyAtpitaraM vA guruM cha vA. aniShTaM kShatriyo hanyAtsa vai kShatriya uchyate'. shiShyadrohI hataH pApo yudhyasva vijayastava.. .. 7-198-50 (54332) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi nArAyaNAstramokShaparvaNi aShTanavatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 198 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-198-25 hiraNyakashipuM haririti ka.kha.pAThaH.. 5-198-198 aShTanavatyadhikashatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 199

.. shrIH ..

7.199. adhyAyaH 199

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

sAtyakiniShThurabhAShaNaruShTena dhR^iShTadyumnena samarmoddhATanaM tadgarhaNam.. 1 .. dhR^iShTadyumnajighAMsayA gadAmudyamyApatataH sAtyakeH kR^iShNachoditena bhImena nivAraNam.. 2 .. sarveShAM punaryuddhodyamaH.. 3 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-199-0 (54333) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-199-0x (4788) sA~NgA vedA yathAnyAyaM yenAdhItA mahAtmanA. yasminsAkShAddhanurvedo hIniSheve pratiShThitaH.. 7-199-1 (54334) yasya prasAdAtkurvanti karmANi puruSharShabhAH. amAnuShANi sa~NgrAme devairasukarANi cha.. 7-199-2 (54335) tasminnAkrushyati droNe samakShaM pApakarmaNA. nIchaM karma kR^itaM tena kShudreNa gurughAtinA.. 7-199-3 (54336) nAmarShaM tatra kurvanti dhikkShAtraM dhigamarShitAm.. 7-199-4 (54337) pArthAH sarve cha rAjAnaH pR^ithivyAM ye dhanurdharAH. shrutvA kimAhuH pA~nchAlyaM tanmamAchakShva sa~njaya.. 7-199-5 (54338) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-199-6x (4789) shrutvA drupadaputrasya tA vAchaH krUrakarmaNaH. tUShNIM babhUvU rAjAnaH sarva eva vishAmpate.. 7-199-6 (54339) arjunastu kaTAkSheNa jihmaM viprekShya pArShatam. sabAShpamatiniHshvasya dhigdhigityeva chAbravIt.. 7-199-7 (54340) yudhiShThirashcha bhImashcha yamau kR^iShNastathA.apare. AsansuvrIDitA rAjansAtyakistvabravIdidam.. 7-199-8 (54341) nehAsti puruShaH kashchidya imaM pApapUruSham. bhAShamANamakalyANaM shIghraM hanyAnnarAdhamam.. 7-199-9 (54342) ete tvAM pANDavAH sarve kutsayanti vivitsayA. karmaNA tena pApena shvapAkaM brAhmaNA iva.. 7-199-10 (54343) etatkR^itvA mahatpApaM ninditaH sarvasAdhubhiH. na lajjase kathaM vaktuM samitiM prApya shobhanAm.. 7-199-11 (54344) kathaM cha shatadhA jihvA na te mUrdhA cha dIryate. gurumAkroshataH kShudra na chAdharmeNa pAtyase.. 7-199-12 (54345) vAchyastvamasi pArthaishcha sarvaishchAndhakavR^iShNibhiH. yatkarma kaluShaM kR^itvA shlAghase janasaMsadi.. 7-199-13 (54346) akAryaM tAdR^ishaM kR^itvA punareva guruM kShipan. vadhyastvaM na tvayArtho.asti muhUrtamapi jIvatA.. 7-199-14 (54347) kastvetadvyavasetpAyaM tvadanyaH puruShAdhama. nigR^ihya kesheShu vadhaM gurordharmAtmanaH sataH.. 7-199-15 (54348) saptAvare tathA pUrve bAndhavAste nima~njitAH. yashasA cha parityaktAstvAM prApya kulapAMsanam.. 7-199-16 (54349) uktavAMshchApi yatpArthe bhIShmaM prati nararShabha. tathAnto vihitastena svayameva mahAtmanA.. 7-199-17 (54350) tasyApi tava sodaryo nihantA pApakR^ittamaH. nAnyaH pA~nchAlaputrebhyo vidyate bhuvi pApakR^it.. 7-199-18 (54351) sa chApi sR^iShTaH pitrA te bhIShmasyAntakaraH kila. shikhaNDI rakShitastena sa cha mR^ityurmahAtmanaH.. 7-199-19 (54352) pA~nchAlAshchalitA dharmAtkShudrA mitragurudruhaH. tvAM prApya sahasodaryaM dhikkR^itaM sarvasAdhubhiH.. 7-199-20 (54353) punashchedIdR^ishIM vAchaM matsamIpe vadiShyasi. shiraste pothayiShyAmi gadayA vajrakalpayA.. 7-199-21 (54354) tvAM cha brahmahaNaM dR^iShTvA janaH sUryamavekShate. brahmahatyA hi te pApaM prAyashchittArthamAtmanaH.. 7-199-22 (54355) pA~nchAlaka sudurvR^itta mamaiva gurumagrataH. gurorguruM cha bhUyo.api kShipannaiva hi lajjase.. 7-199-23 (54356) tiShThatiShTha sahasvaikaM gadApAtamimaM mama. tava chApi sahiShye.ahaM gadApAtAnanekashaH.. 7-199-24 (54357) sAtvatenaivamAkShiptaH pArShataH paruShAkSharam. saMrabdhaM sAtyakiM prAha sa~NkruddhaH prahasanniva.. 7-199-25 (54358) dhR^iShTadyumna uvAcha. 7-199-26x (4790) shrUyateshrUyate cheti kShamyate cheti mAdhava. sadA.anAryo.ashubhaH sAdhuM puruShaM kSheptumichChati.. 7-199-26 (54359) kShamA prashasyate loke na tu pApo.arhati kShamAm. kShamAvantaM hi pApAtmA jito.ayamiti manyate.. 7-199-27 (54360) sa tvaM kShudrasamAchAro nIchAtmA pApanishchayaH. AkeshAgrAnnakhAgrAchcha vaktavyo vaktumichChasi.. 7-199-28 (54361) `varaM hi te mR^itiH pApa na cha te chittamIdR^isham. shrotuM vaktavyatAmUlaM nIchAchArAshcha mAnavAH. parAnkShipanti doSheNa sveShu doSheShvadR^iShTayaH'.. 7-199-29 (54362) yaH sa bhUrishravAshChinnabhujaH prAyagatastvayA. vAryamANena hi hatastataH pApataraM nu kim.. 7-199-30 (54363) preShamANo mayA droNo divyenAstreNa saMyuge. visR^iShTashastro nihataH kiM tatra kura duShkR^itam.. 7-199-31 (54364) ayudhyamAnaM yastvAjau tathA prAyagataM munim. ChinnabAhuM parairhanyAtsAtyake sa kathaM vadet.. 7-199-32 (54365) nihatya tvAM padA bhUmau sa vikarShati vIryavAn. kiM tadA na nihaMsyenaM bhUtvA puruShasattamaH.. 7-199-33 (54366) tvayA punaranAryeNa pUrvaM pArthena nirjitaH. yadA tadA hataH shUraH saumadattiH pratApavAn.. 7-199-34 (54367) yatrayatra tu pANDUnAM droNo drAvayate chamUm. kira~nCharasahasrANi tatratatra prayAmyaham.. 7-199-35 (54368) sa tvamevaMvidhaM kR^itvA karma chaNDAlavatsvayam. vaktumarhasi vaktavyaH kasmAttvaM paruShANyatha.. 7-199-36 (54369) kartA tvaM karmaNo hyasya nAhaM vR^iShNikulAdhama. pApAnAM cha tvamAvAsaH karmaNAM mA punarvada.. 7-199-37 (54370) joShamAsva na mAM bhUyo vaktumarhasyataH param. adharottarametadvi yanmAM tvaM vaktumarhasi.. 7-199-38 (54371) atha vakShyasi mAM maurkhyAdbhUyaH paruShamIdR^isham. gamayiShyAmi bANaistvAM yudhi vaivasvatakShayam.. 7-199-39 (54372) na chaiva mUrkha dharmeNa kevalenaiva shakyate. teShAmapi hyadharmeNa cheShTitaM shR^iNu yAdR^isham.. 7-199-40 (54373) va~nchitaH pANDavaH pUrvamadharmeNa yudhiShThiraH. draupadI cha parikliShTA tathA.adharmeNa sAtyake.. 7-199-41 (54374) pravrAjitA vanaM sarve pANDavAH saha kR^iShNayA. sarvasvamapakR^iShTaM cha tathA.adharmeNa bAlisha.. 7-199-42 (54375) adharmeNApakR^iShTashcha madrarAjaH parairitaH. adharmeNa tathA bAlaH saubhadro vinipAtitaH.. 7-199-43 (54376) ito.apyadharmeNa hato bhIShmaH parapura~njayaH. bhUrishravA hyadharmeNa tvayA dharmavidA hataH.. 7-199-44 (54377) evaM parairAcharitaM pANDaveyaishcha saMyuge. rakShamANairjayaM vIrairdharmaj~nairapi sAtvata.. 7-199-45 (54378) durj~neyaH sa paro dharmastathA.adharmashcha durvidaH. yudhyasva kauravaiH sArdhaM mA gAH pitR^iniveshanam.. 7-199-46 (54379) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-199-47x (4791) evamAdIni vAkyAni krUrANi paruShANi cha. shrAvitaH sAtyakiH shrImAnAkampita ivAbhavat.. 7-199-47 (54380) tachChrutvA krodhatAmrAkShaH sAtyakistvAdade gadAm. viniH shvasya yathA sarpaH praNidhAya rathe dhanuH.. 7-199-48 (54381) tato.abhipatya pA~nchAlyaM saMrambheNedamabravIt. na tvAM vakShyAmi paruShaM haniShye tvAM vadhakShamam.. 7-199-49 (54382) tamApatantaM sahasA mahAbalamamarShaNam. pA~nchAlyAyAbhisa~NkruddhamantakAyAntakopamam.. 7-199-50 (54383) chodito vAsudevena bhImaseno mahAbalaH. avaplutya rathAttUrNaM bAhubhyAM samavArayat.. 7-199-51 (54384) dravamANaM tathA kruddhaM sAtyakiM pANDavo balI. praspandamAnamAdAya jagAma balinaM balAt.. 7-199-52 (54385) sthitvA viShTabhya charaNau bhImena shinipu~NgavaH. nigR^ihItaH pade ShaShThe balena balinAM varaH.. 7-199-53 (54386) avaruhya rathAttUrNaM dhriyamANaM balIyasA. uvAcha shlakShNayA vAchA sahadevo vishAmpate.. 7-199-54 (54387) asmAkaM puruShavyAghra mitramanyanna vidyate. paramandhakavR^iShNibhyaH pA~nchalebhyashcha mAriSha.. 7-199-55 (54388) tathaivAndhakavR^iShNInAM tathaiva cha visheShataH. kR^iShNasya cha tathA.asmatto mitramanyanna vidyate.. 7-199-56 (54389) pA~nchAlAnAM cha vArShNeya samudrAntAM vichinvatAm. nAnyadasti paraM mitraM yathA pANDavavR^iShNayaH.. 7-199-57 (54390) sa bhavAnIdR^ishaM mitraM manyate cha yathA bhavAn. bhavantashcha yathA.asmAkaM bhavatAM cha tathA vayam.. 7-199-58 (54391) sa evaM sarvadharmaj~na mitradharmamanusmaran. niyachCha manyuM pA~nchAlyAtprashAmya shinipu~NgavA.. 7-199-59 (54392) pArShatasya kShama tvaM vai kShamatAM pArShatashcha te. vayaM kShamayitArashcha kimanyatra shamAdbhavet.. 7-199-60 (54393) prashAmyamAne shaineye sahadevena mAriSha. pA~nchAlarAjasya sutaH prahasannidamabravIt.. 7-199-61 (54394) mu~nchamu~ncha shineH pautraM bhIma yuddhamadAnvitam. AsAdayatu mAmeSha dharAdharamivAnilaH.. 7-199-62 (54395) yAvadasya shitairbANaiH saMrambhaM vinayAmyaham. yuddhashruddhAM cha kaunteya jIvitaM chAsya saMyuge.. 7-199-63 (54396) kiM nu shakyaM mayA kartuM yatkAryamidamuchyatAm. sumahatpANDuputrANAmAyAntyete hi kauravAH.. 7-199-64 (54397) athavA phalgunaH sarvAnvArayiShyati saMyuge. ahamapyasya mUrdhAnaM pAtayiShyAmi sAyakaiH.. 7-199-65 (54398) manyate chChinnabAhuM mAM bhUrishravasamAhave. utsR^ijainamahaM chainameSha vA mAM haniShyati.. 7-199-66 (54399) shR^iNvanpA~nchAlavAkyAni sAtyakiH sarpavachChvasan. bhImabAhvantare sakto visphuratyanishaM balI.. 7-199-67 (54400) tau vR^iShAviva nardantau balinau bAhushAlinau. tvarayA vAsudevashcha dharmarAjashcha mAriSha. yatnena mahatA vIrau vArayAmAsatustataH.. 7-199-68 (54401) nivArya parameShvAsau kopasaMraktalochanau. yuyutsUnaparAnsa~Nkhye pratIyuH kShatriyarShabhAH.. .. 7-199-69 (54402) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi nArAyaNAstramokShaparvaNi pa~nchadashadivasayuddhe ekonadvishatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 199 ..
droNaparva - adhyAya 200

.. shrIH ..

7.200. adhyAyaH 200

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

droNamAraNaruShTenAshvatthAmnA vairisenAyAM nArAyaNAstraprayogaH.. 1 .. astratejasA pIDyamAnAnAM kR^iShNavachanAt yAnAvarohaNashastranyAsAdinA AtmarakShaNam.. 2 .. bhIme ekasminneva shastradhAraNena pratiyudhyamAne sati tanmastake.astrasya prajvalanam.. 3 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-200-0 (54403) sa~njaya uvacha. 7-200-0x (4792) tataH sa kadanaM chakre ripUNAM droNanandanaH. yugAnte sarvabhUtAnAM kAlasR^iShTa ivAntakaH.. 7-200-1 (54404) dhvajadrumaM shastrashR^i~NgaM hatanAgamahAshilam. ashvakimpuruShAkIrNaM sharAsanalatAvR^itam.. 7-200-2 (54405) kravyAdapakShisa~NghuShTaM bhUtayakShaNAkulam. nihatya shAtravAnbhallaiH so.achinoddehaparvatam.. 7-200-3 (54406) tato vegena mahatA vinadya sa nararShabhaH. pratij~nAM shrAvayAmAsa punareva tavAtmajam.. 7-200-4 (54407) yadatra chChadmanA.a.achAryaM dharmaka~nchukamAsthitaH. mu~ncha shastramiti prAha kuntIputro yudhiShThiraH.. 7-200-5 (54408) tasmAtsampashyatastasya drAvayiShyAni vAhinIm. vidrAvyasarvAnhantA.asmi jAlmaM pA~nchAlyameva tu.. 7-200-6 (54409) sarvAnetAnhaniShyAmi yadi yotsyanti mAM raNe. satyaM te pratijAnAmi parivartaya vAhinIm.. 7-200-7 (54410) tachChrutvA tava putrastu vAhinIM paryavartayat. siMhanAdena mahatA vyapohya sumahadbhayam.. 7-200-8 (54411) tataH samAgamo rAjankurupANDavasenayoH. punarevAbhavattIvraH pUrNasAgarayoriva.. 7-200-9 (54412) saMrabdhA hi sthirIbhUtA droNa putreNa kauravAH. udagrAH pANDupA~nchAlA droNasya nidhanena cha.. 7-200-10 (54413) teShAM paramahR^iShTAnAM jayamAtmani pashyatAm. saMrabdhAnAM mahAvegaH prAdurAsIdvishAmpate.. 7-200-11 (54414) yathA shilochchaye shailaH sAgaraiH sAgaro yathA. pratihanyeta rAjendra tathA.asankurupANDavAH.. 7-200-12 (54415) `chukShubhe pR^ithivI sarvA dishashcha pratisasvanuH. sambhrAntAnyapi bhUtAni jalajAnyapi mAriSha. te cha sarve tadA yodhAH samprahR^iShTA yuyutsavaH'.. 7-200-13 (54416) tataH sha~NkhasahasrANi bherINAmayutAni cha. avAdayanta saMhR^iShTAH kurupANDavasainikAH.. 7-200-14 (54417) yathA nirmathyamAnasya sAgarasya tu niHsvanaH. abhavattava sainyasya sumahAnadbhutopamaH.. 7-200-15 (54418) `vartamAne tathA shabde raudre tasminbhayAnake. sampatatsu rathaugheShu tava teShAM cha bhArata'.. 7-200-16 (54419) prAdushchakre tato drauNirastraM nArAyaNaM tadA. abhisandhAya pANDUnAM pA~nchAlAnAM cha vAhinIM.. 7-200-17 (54420) prAdurAsaMstato bANA dIptAgrAH khe sahasrashaH. pANDavAnkShapayiShyanto dIptAsyaH pannagA iva.. 7-200-18 (54421) te dishaH khaM cha sainyaM cha samAvR^iNvanmahAhave. muhUrtAdbhAskarasyeva loke rAjangabhastayaH.. 7-200-19 (54422) tathA.apare dyotamAnA jyotIMShIvAmalAmbare. prAdurAsanmahArAja kArShNAyasamayA guDAH.. 7-200-20 (54423) chatushchakrA dvichakrAshcha shataghno bahulA gadAH. chakrANi cha kShurAntAni maNDalAnIva bhAsvataH.. 7-200-21 (54424) shastrAkR^itibhirAkIrNamatIva puruSharShabha. dR^iShTvAntarikShamAvignAH pANDupA~nchAlasR^i~njayAH.. 7-200-22 (54425) yathAyathA hyayudhyanta pANDavAnAM mahArathAH. tathAtathA tadastraM vai vyavardhata janAdhipa.. 7-200-23 (54426) vadhyamAnAstadA.astreNa tena nArAyaNena vai. dahyamAnA.analeneva sarvato.abhyarditA raNe.. 7-200-24 (54427) yathA hi shishirApAye dahetkakShaM hutAshanaH. tathA tadastraM pANDUnAM dadAha dhvajinIM prabho.. 7-200-25 (54428) ApUryamANenAstreNa sainye kShIyati cha prabho. jagAma paramaM trAsaM dharmaputro yudhiShThiraH.. 7-200-26 (54429) dravamANaM tu tatsainyaM dR^iShTvA vigatachetanam. madhyasthatAM cha pArthasya dharmaputro.abravIdidam.. 7-200-27 (54430) dhR^iShTadyumna palAyasva saha pA~nchAlasenayA. sAtyake tvaM cha gachChasva vR^iShNyandhakavR^ito mahAn.. 7-200-28 (54431) vAsudevo.api dharmAtmA kariShyatyAtmanaH kShamam. shreyo hyupadishatyeSha lokasya kimutAtmanaH.. 7-200-29 (54432) sa~NgrAmastu na kartavyaH sarvasainyAnbravImi vaH. ahaM hi saha sodaryaiH pravekShye havyavAhanam.. 7-200-30 (54433) bhIShmadroNArNavaM tIrtvA sa~NgrAme bhIrudustare. vimajjiShyAmi salile sagaNo drauNigoShpade.. 7-200-31 (54434) kAmaH sampadyatAmasya bIbhatsorAshu mAM prati. kalyANavR^ittirAchAryo mayA yudhi nipAtitaH.. 7-200-32 (54435) yena bAlaH sa saubhadro yuddhAnAmavishAradaH. samarthairbahubhiH krUrairghAtito nAbhipAlitaH.. 7-200-33 (54436) yena vibruvatI prashnaM tathA kR^iShNA sabhAM gatA. upekShitA saputreNa dAsIbhAvaM niyachChatI.. 7-200-34 (54437) `rakShaNe cha mahAnyatnaH saindhavasya kR^ito yudhi. arjunasya vighAtArthaM pratij~nA yena rakShitA.. 7-200-35 (54438) vyUhadvAri vayaM chaiva dhR^itA yena jigIShavaH. vAritaM cha mahatsainyaM pravishattadyathAbalam'.. 7-200-36 (54439) jighAMsurdhArtarAShTrashcha shrAnteShvanyeShu phalgunam. kavachena tathA gupto rakShArthaM saindhavasya cha.. 7-200-37 (54440) yena brahmAstraviduShA pA~nchAlAH satyajinmukhAH. kurvANA majjaye yatnaM samUlA vinipAtitAH.. 7-200-38 (54441) `grahaNe cha paro yatnaH kR^itastena yathA mama. viditaM sarvamevaitadbhavatAM sarvayodhinAm'.. 7-200-39 (54442) yena pravrAjyamAnAshcha rAjyAdvayamadharmataH. nivAryamANenAsmAbhiranugantuM tadeShitAH.. 7-200-40 (54443) `vanavAsAnnivR^ittAnAM samaye cha tathA kR^ite. snehashcha darshito nityaM pratyakShaM vo mahArathAH'.. 7-200-41 (54444) yo.asAvatyantamasmAsu kurvANaH sauhR^idaM param. hatastadarthe maraNaM gamiShyAmi sabAndhavaH.. 7-200-42 (54445) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-200-43x (4793) evaM bruvati kaunteye dAshArhastvaritastataH. nivArya sainyaM bAhubhyAmidaM vachanamabravIt.. 7-200-43 (54446) shIghraM nyasyata shastrANi vAhebhyashchAvarohata. eSha yogo.atra vihitaH pratighAte mahAtmanaH.. 7-200-44 (54447) dvipAshvasyandanebhyashcha kShitiM sarve.avarohata. evametanna vo hanyAdastraM bhUmau nirAyudhAn.. 7-200-45 (54448) yathAyathA hi yudhyante yodhA hyastramidaM prati. tathAtathA bhavantyete kauravA balavattarAH.. 7-200-46 (54449) nikShepsyanti cha shastrANi vAhanebhyo.avaruhya ye. ye.a~njaliM kurvate vIra namasti cha vivAhanAH. tAnnaitadastraM sa~NgrAme nihaniShyati mAnavAn.. 7-200-47 (54450) ye tvetatpratiyotsyanti manasA.apIha kechana. nihaniShyati tAnsarvAnrasAtalagatAnapi.. 7-200-48 (54451) te vachastasya tachChrutvA vAsudevasya bhArata. IShuH sarve samutsraShTuM manobhiH karaNena cha.. 7-200-49 (54452) tata utsraShTukAmAMstAnastrANyAlakShya pANDavaH. bhImaseno.abravIdrAjannidaM saMharShayanvachaH.. 7-200-50 (54453) na katha~nchana shastrANi moktavyAnIha kenachit. ahamAvArayiShyAmi droNaputrAstramAshugaiH.. 7-200-51 (54454) gadayA.apyanayA gurvyA hemavigrahayA raNe. kAlavatprahariShyAmi drauNerastraM vishAtayan.. 7-200-52 (54455) na hi me vikrame tulyaH kashchidasti pumAniha. yathaiva savitustulyaM jyotiranyanna vidyate.. 7-200-53 (54456) pashyatemau hi me bAhU nAgarAjakaropamau. samarthau parvatasyApi shaishirasya nipAtane.. 7-200-54 (54457) nAgAyutasamaprANo hyahameko nareShviha. shakro yathA.apratidvandvo divi deveShu vishrutaH.. 7-200-55 (54458) adya pashyata me vIryaM bAhvoH pInAMsayoryudhi. jvalamAnasya dIptasya drauNerastrasya vAraNe.. 7-200-56 (54459) yadi nArAyaNAstrasya pratiyodvA na vidyate. adyaitatpratiyotsyAmi pashyatsu kurupANDupu.. 7-200-57 (54460) arjunArjuna bIbhatso na nyasyaM gANDivaM tvayA. shashA~Nkasyeva te pa~Nko nairmalyaM pAtayiShyati.. 7-200-58 (54461) arjuna uvAcha. 7-200-59x (4794) bhIma nArAyaNAstre me goShu cha brAhmaNeShu cha. eteShu gANDivaM nyasyametaddhi vratamuttamam.. 7-200-59 (54462) evamuktastato bhImo droNaputramarindamam. abhyayAnmeghaghoSheNa rathenAdityavarchasA.. 7-200-60 (54463) `kampayanmedinIM sarvAM trAsayaMshcha chamUM tava. sha~NkhashabdaM mahatkR^itvA bhujashabdaM cha pANDavaH.. 7-200-61 (54464) tasya sha~NkhasvanaM shrutvA bAhushabdaM cha tAvakAH. samantAtkoShThakIkR^itya sharavrAtairavAkiran'.. 7-200-62 (54465) sa enamiShujAlena laghutvAchChIghravikramaH. nimeShamAtreNAsAdya kuntIputro.abhyavAkirat.. 7-200-63 (54466) tato drauNiH prahasyainaM dravantamabhibhAShya cha. avAkiratpradIptAgraiH sharaistairabhimantritaiH.. 7-200-64 (54467) pannagairiva dIptAsyairvamadbhirjvalanaM raNe. avakIrNo.abhavatpArthaH sphuli~Ngairiva kA~nchanaiH.. 7-200-65 (54468) tasya rUpamabhUdrAjanbhImasenasya saMyuge. khadyotairAvR^itasyeva parvatasya dinakShaye.. 7-200-66 (54469) tadastraM droNaputrasya tasminpratisamasyati. avardhata mahArAja yathA.agniraniloddhataH.. 7-200-67 (54470) vivardhamAnamAlakShya tadastraM bhImavikramam. pANDusainyamR^ite bhImaM sumahadbhayamAvishat.. 7-200-68 (54471) tataH shastrANi te sarve samutsR^ijya mahItale. avArohanrathebhyashcha hastyashvebhyashcha sarvashaH.. 7-200-69 (54472) teShu nikShiptashastreShu vAhanebhyashchyuteShu cha. tadastravIryaM vipulaM bhImamUrdhanyathApatat.. 7-200-70 (54473) hAhAkR^itAni bhUtAni pANDavAshcha visheShataH. bhImasenamapashyanta tejasA saMvR^itaM tathA.. .. 7-200-71 (54474) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi nArAyaNAstramokShaparvaNi pa~nchadashadivasayuddhe dvishatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 200 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-200-20 guDAH golAH halA iti ka. ka. pAThaH.. 5-200-40 asmAbhirasmadIyairvidurAdibhirnivAryamANena niShidhyamAnenApi tadvanamanugantuM praveShTumeShitA anumatA natu pratiShiddhA ityarthaH.. 5-200-200 dvishatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 201

.. shrIH ..

7.201. adhyAyaH 201

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

nArayaNAstreNAveShTite bhIme kR^iShNArjunAshyAM hastataH shastrApakarShaNapUrvakaM rathAdavaropite satyastrasya prashamanam.. 1 .. tataH sa~Nkulayuddham.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-201-0 (54475) sa~njaya uvAya. 7-201-0x (4795) bhImasenaM samAkIrNaM dR^iShTvA.astreNa dhana~njayaH. tejasaH pratighAtArthaM vAruNena samAvR^iNot.. 7-201-1 (54476) nAlakShayata tatkashchidvAruNAstreNa saMvR^itam. arjunasya laghutvAchcha saMvR^itatvAchcha tejasaH.. 7-201-2 (54477) sAshvasUtaratho bhImo droNaputrAstrasaMvR^itaH. agnAvagniriva nyasto jvAlAmAlI sudurdR^ishaH.. 7-201-3 (54478) yathA rAtrikShaye rAja~njyotIShyastagiriM prati. samApetustathA bANA bhImasenarathaM prati.. 7-201-4 (54479) sa hi bhImo rathashchAsya hayAH sUtashcha mAriSha. saMvR^itA droNaputreNa pAvakAntargatA.abhavan.. 7-201-5 (54480) yathA jagdhvA jagatkR^itsnaM samaye sacharAcharam. gachChedvahnirvibhorAsyaM tathA.astraM bhImamAvR^iNot.. 7-201-6 (54481) sUryamagniH praviShTaH syAdyathA chAgniM divAkaraH. tathA praviShTaM tattejo na Aj~nAyata pANDavaH.. 7-201-7 (54482) `tadastraM bhImahu~NkArAdapayAti punaHpunaH. punaH punastamAyAti huMkArAttaM vimu~nchati. tato devAH sagandharvA bhImaM dR^iShTvA suvismitAH'.. 7-201-8 (54483) vikIrNamastraM taddR^iShTvA tathA bhImarathaM prati. udIryamANaM drauNiM cha niShpratidvandvamAhave.. 7-201-9 (54484) sarvasainyaM cha pANDUnAM nyastashastramachetanam. yudhiShThirapurogAMshcha vimukhAMstAnmahArathanAn.. 7-201-10 (54485) arjuno vAsudevashcha tvaramANau mahAdyutI. avaplutya rathAdvIrau bhImamAdravatAM tataH.. 7-201-11 (54486) tatastaddroNaputrasya tejo.astrabalasambhavam. vigAhya tau subalinau mAyayA.avishatAM tathA.. 7-201-12 (54487) nyastashastrau tatastau tu nAdahatso.astrajo.analaH. vAruNAstraprayogAchcha
