vIryavattvAchcha kR^iShNayoH.. 7-201-13 (54488) tatashchakR^iShaturbhImaM sarvashastrAyudhAni cha. nArAyaNAstrashAntyarthaM naranArAyaNau balAt.. 7-201-14 (54489) AkR^iShyamANaH kaunteyo nadatyeva mahAravam. vardhate chaiva tadvoraM drauNerastraM sudurjayam.. 7-201-15 (54490) tamabravIdvAsudevaH kimidaM pANDunandana. vAryamANo.api kaunteya yadyudvAnna nivartase.. 7-201-16 (54491) yadi yudvena jeyAH syurime kauravanandanAH. vayamapyatra yudhyema tathA cheme nararShabhAH.. 7-201-17 (54492) rathebhyastvavatIrNAH sma sarva eva hi tAvakAH. tasmAttvamapi kaunteya rathAttUrNamapAkrama.. 7-201-18 (54493) evamuktvA tu taM kR^iShNo rathAdbhUmimavartayat. niHshvasantaM yathA nAgaM krodhasaMraktalochanam.. 7-201-19 (54494) yadA.apakR^iShTaH sa rathAnnyAsitashchAyudhaM bhuvi. tato nArAyaNAstraM tatprashAntaM shatrutApanam.. 7-201-20 (54495) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-201-21x (4796) tasminprashAnte vidhinA tena tejasi duHsahe. babhUvurvimalAH sarvA dishaH pradisha eva cha.. 7-201-21 (54496) pravavushcha shivA vAtAH prashAntA mR^igapakShiNaH. vAhanAni cha hR^iShTAni prashAnte.astre sudurjaye.. 7-201-22 (54497) vyapoDhe cha tato ghore tasmiMstejasi bhArata. babhau bhImo nishApAye dhImAnsUrya ivoditaH.. 7-201-23 (54498) hatasheShaM balaM tattu pANDavAnAmatiShThata. astravyuparamAdvR^iShTaM tava putrajighAMsayA.. 7-201-24 (54499) vyavasthite bale tasminnestre pratihate tathA. duryodhano mahArAja droNaputramathAbravIt.. 7-201-25 (54500) ashvatthAmanpunaH shIghramastrametatprayojaya. avasthitA hi pA~nchAlAH punarete jayaiShiNaH.. 7-201-26 (54501) ashvatthAmA tathoktastu tava putreNa mAriSha. sudInamabhiniH shvasya rAjAnamidamabravIt.. 7-201-27 (54502) naitadAvartate rAjannastraM dvirnopapadyate. AvR^itaM hi nivarteta prayoktAraM na saMshayaH.. 7-201-28 (54503) eSha chAstrapratIghAtaM vAsudevaH prayuktavAn. `asya tu hyeSha vai dAtA mAnuSheShu na vidyate.. 7-201-29 (54504) parAvaraj~no lokAnAM na tadasti na vetti yat. tadetadastraM prashamaM yAtaM kR^iShNasya mantritaiH'.. 7-201-30 (54505) dvividho vihitaH sa~Nkhye vadhaH shastrorjanAdhipa. parAjayo vA mR^ityurvA shreyAnmR^ityurna nirjayaH.. 7-201-31 (54506) vijitAshchArayo hyote shastrotsargAnmR^itopamAH.. 7-201-32 (54507) duryodhana uvAcha. 7-201-33x (4797) AchAryaputra yadyetaddvirastraM na prayujyate. anyairgurughnA vadhyantAmastrairastravidAM vara.. 7-201-33 (54508) tvayi shastrANi divyAni tryambake chAmitaujasi. `ghnataitAnsumahAvIrya shAtravAnyudvakovidaH'. ichChato na hi te muchyetsa~Nkruddho hi purandaraH.. 7-201-34 (54509) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-201-35x (4798) tasminnastre pratihate droNe chopadhinA hate. tathA duryodhanenokto drauNiH kimakarotpunaH.. 7-201-35 (54510) dR^iShTvA pArthAMshcha sa~NgrAme yuddhAya samupasthitAn. nArAyaNAstranirmuktAMshcharataH pR^itanAmukhe.. 7-201-36 (54511) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-201-37x (4799) jAnanpituH sa nidhanaM siMhalA~NgUlaketanaH. sakrodho bhayamutsR^ijya so.abhidudrAva pArShatam.. 7-201-37 (54512) abhidrutya cha viMshatyA kShudrakANAM nararShabha. pa~nchabhishchAtivegena vivyAdha puruSharShabhaH.. 7-201-38 (54513) dhR^iShTadyumnastato rAja~njvalantamiva pAvakam. droNaputraM triShaShTyA tu rAjanvivyAdha patriNAm.. 7-201-39 (54514) sArathiM chAsya viMshatyA svarNapu~NkhaiH shilAshitaiH. hayAMshcha chaturo.avidhyachchaturbhirnishitaiH sharaiH.. 7-201-40 (54515) vidvvA vidvA.anadaddrauNiM kampayanniva medinIm. Adade sarvalokasya prANAniva mahAraNe.. 7-201-41 (54516) pArShatastu balI rAjankR^itAstraH kR^itanishchayaH. drauNimevAbhidudrAva mR^ityuM kR^itvA nivartanam.. 7-201-42 (54517) tato bANamayaM varShaM droNaputrasya mUrdhani. avAsR^ijadameyAtmA pA~nchAlyo rathinAMvaraH.. 7-201-43 (54518) taM drauNiH samare kruddhaM ChAdayAmAsa patribhiH. vivyAdha chainaM dashabhiH piturvadhamanusmaran.. 7-201-44 (54519) dvAbhyAM cha suvisR^iShTAbhyAM kShurAbhyAM dhvajakArmuke. ChittvA pA~nchAlarAjasya drauNiranyaiH samArdayat.. 7-201-45 (54520) vyashvasUtarathaM chainaM drauNishchakre mahAhAve. tasya chAnucharAnsarvAnkruddhaH prAdrAvayachCharaiH.. 7-201-46 (54521) tataH pradudruve sainyaM pA~nchAlAnAM vishAmpate. sambhrAntarUpamArtaM cha na parasparamaikShata.. 7-201-47 (54522) dR^iShTvA tu vimukhAnyodhAndhR^iShTadyumnaM cha pIDitam. shaineyo.achodayattUrNaM rathaM drauNirathaM prati.. 7-201-48 (54523) aShTabhirnishitairbANairashvatthAmAnamArdayat. viMshatyA punarAhatya nAnArUpairamarShaNaH. vivyAdha cha tathA sUtaM chaturbhishchaturo hayAn.. 7-201-49 (54524) [dhanurdhvajaM* ; saMyattashchichCheda kR^itahastavat. sa sAshvaM vyadhamachchApi rathaM hemapariShkR^itam. hR^idi vivyAdha samare triMshatA sAyakairbhR^isham.. 7-201-50 (54525) evaM sa pIDito rAjannashvatthAmA mahAbAlaH. sharajAlaiH parivR^itaH kartavyaM nAnvapadyata.. 7-201-51 (54526) evaM gate guroH putre tava putro mahArathaH. kR^ipakarNAdibhiH sArdhaM sharaiH sAtvatamAvR^iNot.. 7-201-52 (54527) duryodhanastu viMshatyA kR^ipaH shAradvatastribhiH. kR^itavarmA.atha dashabhiH karNaH pa~nchAshatA sharaiH.. 7-201-53 (54528) duHshAsanaH shatenaiva vR^iShasenashcha saptabhiH. sAtyakiM vivyadhustUrNaM samantAnnishitaiH sharaiH.. 7-201-54 (54529) tataH sa sAtyakI rAjansarvAneva mahArathAn. virathAnvimukhAMshchaiva kShaNenaivAkaronnR^ipa.. 7-201-55 (54530) ashvatthAmA tu samprApya chetanAM bharatarShabha. chintayAmAsa duHkhArto niHshvasaMshcha punaHpunaH.. 7-201-56 (54531) atho rathAntaraM drauNiH samAruhya parantapaH. sAtyakiM vArayAmAsa kira~nsharashatAnbahUn.. 7-201-57 (54532) tamApatantaM samprekShya bhAradvAjasutaM raNe. virathaM vimukhaM chaiva punashchakre mahArathaH.. 7-201-58 (54533) tataste pANDavA rAjandR^iShTvA sAtyakivikramam. sha~NkhashabdAnbhR^ishaM chakruH siMhanAdAMshcha nedire.. 7-201-59 (54534) evaM taM virathaM kR^itvA sAtyakiH satyavikramaH. jaghAna vR^iShasenasya trisAhasrAnmahArathAn.. 7-201-60 (54535) ayutaM dantinAM sArdhaM kR^ipasya nijaghAna saH. pa~nchAyutAni chAshvAnAM shakunernijaghAna ha.. 7-201-61 (54536) tato drauNirmahArAja rathamAruhya vIryavAn. sAtyakiM prati sa~NkruddhaH prayayau tadvadhepsayA. 7-201-62 (54537) punastamAgataM dR^iShTvA shaneyo nishitaiH sharaiH. adArayatkrurataraiH punaHpunararindama..] 7-201-63 (54538) so.atividdho maheShvAso nAnAli~NgairamarShaNaH. yuyudhAnena vai drauNiH prahasanvAkyamabravIt.. 7-201-64 (54539) shaineyAbyupapattiM te jAnAmyAchAryaghAtini. na chainaM trAsyasi mayA grastamAtmAnameva cha.. 7-201-65 (54540) shapetmanA.ahaM shaineya satyena tapasA tathA. ahatvA sarvapA~nchAlAnyadi shAntimahaM labhe.. 7-201-66 (54541) yadbalaM pANDaveyAnAM vR^iShNInAmapi yadbalam. kriyatAM sarvameveha nihaniShyAmi somakAn.. 7-201-67 (54542) evamuktvA.arkaramyAbhaM sutIkShNaM taM sharottamam. vyasR^ijatsAtvate drauNirvajraM vR^itre yathA hariH.. 7-201-68 (54543) sa taM nirbhidya tenAstaH sAyakaH sharAvaram. vivesha vasudhAM bhittvA shvasanbilamivoragaH.. 7-201-69 (54544) sa bhinnakavachaH shUrastotrArdita iva dvipaH. vimuchya sasharaM chApaM bhUrivraNaparisravaH.. 7-201-70 (54545) sIdanrudhirasiktashcha rathopastha upAvishat. sUtenApahR^itastUrNaM droNaputrAdrathAntaram.. 7-201-71 (54546) athAnyena supu~Nkhena shareNAnataparvaNA. AjaghAna bhravormadhye dhR^iShTadyumnaM parantapaH.. 7-201-72 (54547) sa pUrvamatividdhashcha bhR^ishaM paschAchcha pIDitaH. sasadAtha cha pA~nchAlyo vyapAshrayata cha dhvajam.. 7-201-73 (54548) taM nAgamiva siMhena dR^iShTvA rAja~nsharArditam. javenAbhyadrava~nChUrAH pa~ncha pANQDavato rathAH.. 7-201-74 (54549) kirITI bhImasenashcha vR^idvakShatrashcha pauravaH. yuvarAjashcha chedInAM mAlavashcha sudarshanaH.. 7-201-75 (54550) ete hAhAkR^itAH sarve pragR^ihItasharAsanAH. vIraM drauNAyaniM vIrAH sarvataH paryavArayan.. 7-201-76 (54551) te viMshatipade yattA guruputramamarShaNam. pa~nchabhiH pa~nchabhirbANairabhyaghnansarvataH samam.. 7-201-77 (54552) AshIviShAbhairviMshatyA pa~nchabhistu shitaiH sharaiH. chichCheda yugapaddrauNiH pa~nchaviMshatisAyakAn.. 7-201-78 (54553) saptabhistu shitairbANaiH pauravaM drauNirArdayat. mAlavaM tribhirekena pArthaM ShQaDbhirvR^ikodaram. 7-201-79 (54554) tataste vivyadhuH sarve drauNiM rAjanmahArathAH. yugapachcha pR^ithakchaiva rukmapu~NkhaiH shilAshitaiH.. 7-201-80 (54555) yuvarAjashcha viMshatyA drauNiM vivyAdha patribhiH. pArthashcha punaraShTAbhistathA sarve tribhistribhiH.. 7-201-81 (54556) tato.arjunaM ShaDbhirathAjaghAna drauNAyanirdashabhirvAsudevam. bhImaM dashArdhairyuvArajaM chaturbhi- rdvAbhyAM dvAbhyAM mAlavaM pauravaM cha.. 7-201-82 (54557) sUtaM vidvvAH bhImasenasya ShaDbhi-- rdvAbhyAM vidvvA kArmukaM cha dhvajaM cha. punaH pArthaM sharavarSheNa vidvvA drauNirghoraM siMhanAdaM nanAda.. 7-201-83 (54558) tasyAsyatastAnnishitAnpItadhArA-- ndrauNeH sharAnpR^iShThatashchAgratashcha. dharA viyaddyauH pradisho dishashcha chChannA bANairabhavandhorarUpaiH.. 7-201-84 (54559) Asannasya svarathaM tIvratejAH sudarshanasyendraketuprakAshau. bhujau shirashchendrasamAnavIrya-- stribhiH sharairyugapatsa~nchakarta.. 7-201-85 (54560) sa pauravaM rathashaktyA nihatya chChittvA rathaM tilashashchAsya bANaiH. ChittvA cha bAhU varachandanAktau bhallena kAyAchChira uchchakarta.. 7-201-86 (54561) yuvAnamindIvaradAmavarNaM chediprabhuM yuvarAjaM prasahya. bANaistvarAvA~njvalitAgnikalpai-- rvidvvA prAdAnmR^ityeva sAshvasUtam.. 7-201-87 (54562) [*mAlavaM pauravaM chaiva yuvarAjaM cha chedipam. dR^iShTvA samakShaM nihataM droNaputroNa pANDavaH. bhImaseno mahAbAhuH krodhamAhArayatparam.. 7-201-88 (54563) tataH sharashataistIkShNaiH sa~NkruddhAshIviShopamaiH. ChAdayAmAsa samare droNaputraM parantapaH.. 7-201-89 (54564) tato drauNirmahAtejAH sharavarShaM nihatya tam. vivyAdha nishitairbANairbhImasenamamarShaNaH.. 7-201-90 (54565) tato bhImo mahAbAhudrauNeryudhi mahAbalaH. kShurapreNa dhanushChittvA drauNiM vivyAdha patriNA.. 7-201-91 (54566) tadapAsya dhanushChinnaM droNaputro mahAmanAH. anyatkArmukamAdAya bhImaM vivyAdha patribhiH.. 7-201-92 (54567) tau drauNibhImau samare parAkrAntau mahAbalau. avarShatAM sharavarShaM vR^iShTimantAvivAmbudau.. 7-201-93 (54568) bhImanAmA~NkitA bANAH svarNapu~NkhAH shilAshitAH. drauNiM sa~nChAdayAmAsurghanaughA iva bhAskaram.. 7-201-94 (54569) tathaiva drauNinirmuktairbhImaH sannataparvabhiH. avAkIryata sa kShipraM sharaiH shatasahasrashaH.. 7-201-95 (54570) sa chChAdyamAnaH samare drauNinA raNashAlinA. na vivyathe mahArAja tadadbhutamivAbhavat.. 7-201-96 (54571) tato bhImo mahAbAhuH kArtasvaravibhUShitAn. nArAchAndasha sampraiShIdyamadaNDanibhA~nChitAn.. 7-201-97 (54572) te jatrudeshamAsAdya droNaputrasya mAriSha. nirbhidya vivishustUrNaM valmIkamiva pannagAH.. 7-201-98 (54573) so.atividdho bhR^ishaM drauNiH pANDavena mahAtmanA. dhvajayaShTiM samAsAdya nyamIlayata lochane.. 7-201-99 (54574) sa muhUrtAtpunaH saMj~nAM labdhvA drauNirnarAdhipa. krodhaM paramamAtasthau samare rudhirokShitaH.. 7-201-100 (54575) dR^iDhaM so.abhihatastena pANDavena mahAtmanA. vegaM chakre mahAbAhurbhImasenarathaM prati.. 7-201-101 (54576) tata AkarNapUrNAnAM sharANAM tigmatejasAm. shatamAshIviShAbhAnAM preShayAmAsa bhArata.. 7-201-102 (54577) bhImo.api samarashlAghI tasya vIryamachintayat. tUrNaM prAsR^ijadugrANi sharavarShANi pANDavaH.. 7-201-103 (54578) tato drauNirmahArAja chChittvA.asya vishikhairdhanuH. AjaghAnorasi kruddhaH pANDavaM nishitaiH sharaiH.. 7-201-104 (54579) tato.anyaddhanurAdAya bhImaseno hyamarShaNaH. vivyAdha nishitairbANairdrauNiM pa~nchabhirAhave.. 7-201-105 (54580) jImUtAviva gharmAnte tau sharaughapravarShiNau. anyonyakrodhatAmrAkShau ChAdayAmAsaturyudhi.. 7-201-106 (54581) talashabdaistato ghoraistrAsayantau parasparam. ayudhyetAM susaMrabdhau kR^itapratikR^itaiShiNau.. 7-201-107 (54582) tato viShphArya sumahachchApaM rukmavibhUShitam. bhImaM praikShata sa drauNiH sharAnasyantamantikAt. sharadyaharmadhyagato drIptArchiriva bhAskaraH.. 7-201-108 (54583) AdadanAsya vishikhAnsandadhAnasya chAshugAn. vikarShato mu~nchatashcha nAntaraM dadR^ishurjanAH.. 7-201-109 (54584) alAtachakrapratimaM tasya maNDalamAyudham. drauNerAsInmahArAja bANAnvisR^ijatastadA.. 7-201-110 (54585) dhanushchyutAH sharAstasya shatasho.atha sahasrashaH. AkAshe pratyadR^ishyanta shalabhAnAmivAyatIH.. 7-201-111 (54586) te tu drauNivinirmuktAH sharA hemavibhUShitAH. ajasramanvakIryanta ghorA bhImarathaM prati.. 7-201-112 (54587) tatrAdbhutakamapashyAma bhImasenasya vikramam. balaM vIryaM prabhAvaM cha vyavasAyaM cha bhArata.. 7-201-113 (54588) tAM sa meghAdivodbhUtAM bANavR^iShTiM samantataH. jalavR^iShTiM mahAghorAM tapAnta iva chintayan.. 7-201-114 (54589) droNaputravadhaprepsurbhImo bhImaparAkramaH. amu~nchachCharavarShANi prAvR^iShIva balAhakaH.. 7-201-115 (54590) tadrukmapR^iShTaM bhImasya dhanurghAraM mahAraNe. vikR^iShyamANaM vibabhau shakrachApamivAparam.. 7-201-116 (54591) tasmAchCharAH prAdurAsa~nChatasho.atha sahasrashaH. sa~nChAdayantaH samare drauNimAhavashobhinam.. 7-201-117 (54592) tayorvisR^ijatorevaM sharajAlAni mAriSha. vAyurapyantarA rAjannAshaknotpratisarpitum.. 7-201-118 (54593) tathA drauNirmahArAja sharAnhemavibhUShitAn. tailadhautAnprasannAgrAnprAhiNodvadhakA~NkShayA.. 7-201-119 (54594) tAnantarikShe vishikhaistridhaikaikamashAtayat visheShayandroNasutaM tiShThatiShTheti chAbravIt.. 7-201-120 (54595) punashcha sharavarShANi ghorANyugrANi pANDavaH. vyasR^ijadbalavAnakruddho droNaputravadhepsayA.. 7-201-121 (54596) tato.astramAyayA tUrNaM sharavR^iShTiM nivArya tAm. dhanushchichCheda bhImasya droNaputro mahAstravit. sharaishchainaM subahubhiH kruddhaH sa~Nkhye parAbhinat.. 7-201-122 (54597) sa ChinnadhanvA balavAnrathashaktiM sudAruNAm.. vegenAvidhya chikShepa droNaputrarathaM prati.. 7-201-123 (54598) tAmApatantIM sahasA maholkAbhAM shitaiH sharaiH. chichCheda samare drauNirdarshayanpANilAghavam.. 7-201-124 (54599) etasminnantare bhImo dR^iDhamAdAya kArmukam. drauNiM vivyAdha vishikhaiH smayamAno vR^ikodaraH.. 7-201-125 (54600) tato drauNirmahArAja bhImasenasya sArathim. lalATe dArayAmAsa shareNAnataparvaNA.. 7-201-126 (54601) so.atividdho balavatA droNaputreNa sArathiH. vyAmohamagamadrAjanrashmInutsR^ijya vAjinAM.. 7-201-127 (54602) tato.ashvAH prAdravaMstUrNaM mohite rathasArathau. bhImasenasya rAjenadr pashyatAM sarvadhanvinAm.. 7-201-128 (54603) taM dR^iShTvA pradrutairashvairapakR^iShTaM raNAjirAt. dadhmau pramuditaH sha~NkhaM bR^ihantamaparAjitaH.. 7-201-129 (54604) tataH sarve cha pA~nchAlA bhImasenashcha pANQDavaH. dhR^iShTadyumnarathaM tyaktvA bhItAH samprAdravandishaH.. 7-201-130 (54605) tAnprabhagnAMstato drauNiH pR^iShThato vikira~nsharAn. abhyavartata vegena kAlayanpANDuvAhinIm.. 7-201-131 (54606) te vadhyamAnAH samare droNaputreNa pArthivAH. droNaputrabhayAdrAjandishaH sarvAshcha bhejire.. .. 7-201-132 (54607) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNa nArAyaNAstramokShaparvaNi pa~nchadashadivasayuddhe ekAdhikadvishatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 201 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-201-* etadAdi 14 shlokAH jha. pusta eva dR^ishyante. 5-201-* etadAdi 42 shlokAH jha. pATha eva santi.
droNaparva - adhyAya 202

.. shrIH ..

7.202. adhyAyaH 202

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

nArAyaNAstre viphalIkR^ite punarashvatthAmnA.a.agneyAstraprayogaH.. 1 .. tasyApi pArthena vyarthIkaraNe dUyamAnena drauNinA shastranyAsapUrvakaM raNA~NkaNAnnirgamanam.. 2 .. nirgachChatA cha tena yadR^ichChAsamAgataM vyAsaM prati nijAstravaiphalyakAraNaprashnaH.. 3 .. vyAsena kR^iShNArjunayornaranArAyaNAtmakatve kathite pratinivR^ittena drauNinA senAvahAraH.. 4 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-202-0 (54608) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-202-0x (4800) tatprabhagnaM balaM dR^iShTvA kuntIputro dhana~njayaH. nyavArayadameyAtmA droNaputrajayepsayA.. 7-202-1 (54609) tataste sainikA rAjansarve tatrAvatasthire. saMsthApyamAnA yatnena govindenArjunena cha.. 7-202-2 (54610) eka eva cha bIbhatsuH somakAvayavaiH saha. mAtsyairanyaishcha saMdhAya kauravAnsannyavartata.. 7-202-3 (54611) tato drutamatikramya siMhalA~NgUlaketanam. savyasAchI maheShvAsamashvatthAmAnamabravIt.. 7-202-4 (54612) ya shaktiryachcha vij~nAnaM yadvIryaM yachcha pauruSham. dhArtarAShTreShu yA prItirdeSho.asmAsu cha yachcha te.. 7-202-5 (54613) yachcha bhUyo.asti tejaste tatsarvaM mayi darshaya. sa eva droNahantA te darpaM Chetsyati pArShataH.. 7-202-6 (54614) kAlAnalasamaprakhyaM dviShAmantakopamam. samAsAdaya pA~nchAlyaM mAM chApi sahakeshavam. darpaM nAshayitAsmyadya tavodvR^ittasya saMyuge.. 7-202-7 (54615) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-202-8x (4801) AchAryaputro mAnArho balavAMshchApi sa~njaya. prItirdhana~njaye chAsya priyashchApi mahAtmanaH.. 7-202-8 (54616) na bhUtapUrvaM bIbhatsorvAkyaM paruShamIdR^isham.. atha kasmAtsa kaunteyaH sakhAyaM rUkShamuktavAn.. 7-202-9 (54617) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-202-10x (4802) yuvarAje hate chaiva vR^idvakShatre cha paurave. iShvastravidhisampanne mAlave cha sudarshane.. 7-202-10 (54618) dhR^iShTadyumne sAtyakau cha bhIme chApi pArajite. yudhiShThirasya tairvAkyairmarmaNyapi cha ghaTTite. 7-202-11 (54619) antarbhede cha sa~njAte duHkhaM saMsmR^itya cha prabho. abhUtapUrvo bIbhatsorduHkhAnmanyurajAyata.. 7-202-12 (54620) tasmAdanarhamashlIlamapriyaM droNimuktavAn. mAnyamAchAryatanayaM rUkShaM kApuruShaM yathA.. 7-202-13 (54621) evamuktaH shvasankrodhAnmaheShvAsatamo nR^ipa. pArthena paruShaM vAkyaM sarvamarmabhidA girA.. 7-202-14 (54622) drauNishchukopa pArthAya kR^iShNAya cha visheShataH. sa tu yatto rathe sthitvA vAryupaspR^ishya vIryavAn.. 7-202-15 (54623) devairapi sudurdharShamastramAgneyamAdade. dR^ishyAdR^ishyAnarigaNAnuddishyAchAryanandanaH.. 7-202-16 (54624) so.abhimantrya sharaM dIptaM vidhUmamiva pAvakam. sarvataH krodhamAvishya chikShepa paravIrahA.. 7-202-17 (54625) tatastumulamAkAshe sharavarShamajAyata. pAvakArchiparItaM tatpArthamevAbhipupluve.. 7-202-18 (54626) ulkAshcha gaganAtpeturdishashcha na chakAshire. tamashcha sahasA raudraM chamUmavatatAra tAm.. 7-202-19 (54627) rakShAMsi cha pishAchAshcha vineduratisa~NgatAH. vavushchAshishirA vAtAH sUryo naiva tatApa cha.. 7-202-20 (54628) vAyasAshchApi chAkrandandikShu sarvAsu bhairavam. rudhiraM chApi varShanto ninedustoyadA divi.. 7-202-21 (54629) pakShiNaH pashavo gAvo vinedushchApi suvratAH. paramaM prayatAtmAno na shAntimupalebhire.. 7-202-22 (54630) bhrAntasarvamahAbhUtamAvartitadivAkaram. trailokyamabhisantaptaM jvarAviShTamivAbhavat.. 7-202-23 (54631) astratejobhisantaptA nAgA bhUmishayAstathA. niHshvasantaH samutpetustejo ghoraM mumukShavaH.. 7-202-24 (54632) jalajAni cha satvAni dahyamAnAni bhArata. na shAntimupajagmurhi tapyamAnairjalAshayaiH.. 7-202-25 (54633) digbhyaH pradigbhyaH khAdbhUmeH sarvataH sharavR^iShTayaH. uchchAvachA nipeturvai garuDAnilaraMhasaH.. 7-202-26 (54634) taiH sharairdroNaputrasya vajravegaiH samAhatAH. pradagdhA ripavaH peturagnidagdhA iva drumAH.. 7-202-27 (54635) dahyamAnA mahAnAgAH petururvyAM samantataH. nadanto bhairavAnnAdA~nchaladopamanisvanAn.. 7-202-28 (54636) apare pradrutA nAgA bhayatrastA vishAmpate. tresurdisho yathA pUrvaM vane dAvAgnisaMvR^itAH.. 7-202-29 (54637) drumANAM shikharANIva dAvadagdhAni mAriSha. ashvabR^indAnyadR^ishyanta rathabR^indAni bhArata. apatanta rathaughAshcha tatratatra sahasrashaH.. 7-202-30 (54638) tatsainyaM bhayasaMvignaM dadAha yudhi bhArata. yugAnte sarvabhUtAni saMvartaka ivAnalaH.. 7-202-31 (54639) dR^iShTvA tu pANDavIM senAM dahyamAnAM mahAhave. prahR^iShTAstAvakA rAjansiMhanAdAnvinedire.. 7-202-32 (54640) tatastUryasahasrANi nAnAli~NgAni bhArata. tUrNamAjaghnire hR^iShTAstAvakA jitakAshinaH.. 7-202-33 (54641) kR^itsnA hyakShauhiNI rAjansavyasAchI cha pANDavaH. tamasA saMvR^ite loke nAdR^ishyanta mahAhave.. 7-202-34 (54642) naiva nastAdR^ishaM rAjandR^iShTapUrvaM na cha shrutam. yAdR^ishaM droNaputreNa sR^iShTamastramamarShiNA.. 7-202-35 (54643) arjunastu mahArAja brAhmamastramudairayat. sarvAstrapratighAtArthaM vihitaM padmayoninA.. 7-202-36 (54644) tato muhUrtAdiva tattamo vyupashashAma ha. pravavau chAnilaH shIto dishashcha vimalA babhuH.. 7-202-37 (54645) tatrAdbhutamapashyAma kR^itsnAmakShauhiNIM hatAm. anabhij~neyarUpAM cha pradagdhAmastratejasA.. 7-202-38 (54646) tato vIrau maheShvAsau vimuktau keshavArjunau. sahitau pratyadR^ishyetAM nabhasIva tamonudau. tato gaNDIvadhananvA cha keshavashchAkShatAvubhau.. 7-202-39 (54647) sapatAkadhvajahayaH sAnukarShavarAyudhaH. prababhau saratho yuktastAvakAnAM bhaya~NkaraH.. 7-202-40 (54648) tataH kilakilAshabdaH sha~NkhabherIsvanaiH saha. pANDavAnAM prahR^iShTAnAM kShaNena samajAyata.. 7-202-41 (54649) hatAviti tayorAsItsenayorubhayormatiH. tarasA.abhyAgatau dR^iShTvA sahitau kaishavArjunau.. 7-202-42 (54650) tAvakShatau pramuditau dadhmaturvArijottamau. dR^iShTvA pramuditAnpArthAMstvadIyA vyathitA.abhavan.. 7-202-43 (54651) vimuktau cha mahAtmAnau dR^iShTvA drauNiH suduHkhitaH. muhUrtaM chintayAmAsa kintvetaditi mAriSha.. 7-202-44 (54652) chintayitvA tu rAjendra dhyAnashokaparAyaNaH. niHshvasandIrghamuShNaM cha vimanAshchAbhavattataH.. 7-202-45 (54653) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-202-46x (4803) tato drauNirdhanustyaktvA rathAtpraskandya vegitaH. dhigdhiksarvamidaM mithyetyuktvA samprAdravadraNAt.. 7-202-46 (54654) tataH snigdhAmbudAbhAsaM vedAvAsamakalmaSham. vedavyAsaM sarasvatyAvAsaM vyAsaM dadarsha ha.. 7-202-47 (54655) taM drauNiragrato dR^iShTvA sthitaM kurukulodvaham. sannakaNTho.abravIdvAkyamabhivAdya sudInavat.. 7-202-48 (54656) bhobho mAyA yadR^ichChA vA daivaM vA kimidaM bhavet. astraM tvidaM kathaM mithyA mama kashcha vyatikramaH.. 7-202-49 (54657) adharottarametadvA lokAnAM vA parAbhavaH. yadimau jIvataH kR^iShNau kAlo hi duratikramaH.. 7-202-50 (54658) nAsurA na cha gandharvA na pishAchA na rAkShasAH. na sarpA yakShapatagA na manuShyAH katha~nchana.. 7-202-51 (54659) utsahante.anyathA kartumetadastraM mayeritam. tadidaM kevalaM hatvA shAntamakShauhiNIM jvalat.. 7-202-52 (54660) sarvaghAni mayA muktamastraM paramadAruNam. kenemau martyadharmANau nAdhAkShItkeshavArjunau.. 7-202-53 (54661) etatprabrUhi bhagavanmayA pR^iShTo yathAtatham. shrotumichChAmi tattvena sarvametanmahAmune.. 7-202-54 (54662) vyAsa uvAcha. 7-202-55x (4804) mahAntamevamarthaM mAM yaM tvaM pR^ichChasi vismayAt. taM pravakShyAmi te sarvaM samAdhAya manaH shR^iNu.. 7-202-55 (54663) yo.asau nArAyaNo nAma pUrveShAmapi pUrvajaH. `Adidevo jagannAtho lokakartA svayaM prabhuH.. 7-202-56 (54664) AdyaH sarvasya lokasya anAdinidhano.achyutaH. vyAkurvate yasya tattvaM shrutayo munayashcha ha.. 7-202-57 (54665) ato.ajayyaH sarvabhUtairmanasA.api jagatpatiH. tasmAdimaM jetukAma aj~nAnatamasA vR^itaH.. 7-202-58 (54666) mA shuchaH puruShavyAghra vidvi tadvadihArjunam. tasya shaktirasau pArthAstasmAchChokamimaM tyaja.. 7-202-59 (54667) vishveshvaro.ayaM lokAdiH paramAtmA hyadhokShajaH. sahasrasaMhitAdaMshAdekAMsho.ayamajAyata.. 7-202-60 (54668) devAnAM hitakAmArthaM lokAnAM chaiva sattamaH'. ajAyata cha kAryArthaM putro dharmasya vishvakR^it.. 7-202-61 (54669) sa tapastIvramAtasthe shishiraM girimAsthitaH. UrdhvabAhurmahAtejA jvalanAdityasannibhaH.. 7-202-62 (54670) ShaShTiM varShasahasrANi tAvantyeva shatAni cha. ashoShayattadA.a.atmAnaM vAyubhakSho.ambujekShaNaH.. 7-202-63 (54671) athAparaM tapastaptvA dvistato.anyatpunarmahat. dyAvApR^ithivyorvivaraM tejasA samapUrayat.. 7-202-64 (54672) sa tena tapasA tAta brahmabhUto yadA.abhavat. tato vishveshvaraM yoniM vishvasya jagataH patim. dadarsha bhR^ishadurdharShaM sarvadevairabhiShTutam.. 7-202-65 (54673) aNIyAMsamaNubhyashcha bR^ihadbhyashcha bR^ihattamam. rudramIshAnavR^iShabhaM haraM shaMbhuM kapardinam.. 7-202-66 (54674) chekitAnaM parAM yoniM tiShThato gachChatashcha ha. durvAraNaM sudurdharShaM durnirIkShyaM durAsadam. atimanyuM mahAtmAnaM sarvabhUtaprachetasam.. 7-202-67 (54675) divyaM chApamiShudhI chAdadAnaM hiraNyavarmANamanantavIryam. pinAkinaM vajriNaM dIptashUlaM parashvathiM gadinaM chAyatAsim.. 7-202-68 (54676) babhrUjaTAmaNDalachandramauliM vyAghrAjinaM parighiNaM daNDapANim. shubhA~NgadaM nAgayaj~nopavItaM vishvairgaNaiH shobhitaM bhUtasa~NghaiH. ekIbhUtaM tapasAM sannidhAnaM vachodhikaiH suShTutamiShTavAgbhiH.. 7-202-69 (54677) jalaM dishaM khaM kShitiM chandrasUryau hutAshavAyupratimaM suresham. nAlaM draShTuM yaM janA bhinnavR^ittA brahmadviShaghnamamR^itasya yonim.. 7-202-70 (54678) yaM pashyanti brAhmaNAH sAdhuvR^ittAH kShINe pApe manasA vItashokAH. tanniShThAtmA tapasA dharmamIDyaM tadbhaktyA vai vishvarUpaM dadarsha.. 7-202-71 (54679) dR^iShTvA chainaM vADmanobuddhidehaiH saMhR^iShTAtmA mumude vAsudevaH.. 7-202-72 (54680) akShamAlAparikShiptaM jyotiShAM paramaM nidhim. rudraM nArAyaNo dR^iShTvA vavande vishvasambhavam.. 7-202-73 (54681) varadaM pR^ithuchArva~NgyA pArvatyA sahitaM prabhum. krIDamAnaM mahAtmAnaM bhUtasa~NghagaNairvR^itam.. 7-202-74 (54682) ajamIshAnamavyaktaM kAraNAtmAnamachyutam. abhivAdyAtha rudrAya sadyo.andhakanipAtine. padmAkShastaM virupAkShamabhituShTAva bhaktimAn.. 7-202-75 (54683) shrInArAyaNa uvAcha. 7-202-76x (4805) tvatsambhUtA bhUtakR^ito vareNya gosAro.asya bhuvanasyAdideva. AvishyemAM dharaNIM ye.abhyarakShan purA purANIM tava deva sR^iShTim.. surAsurAnnAgarakShaHpishAchA-- nnarAnsuparNAnatha gandharvayakShAn. 7-202-76 (54684) pR^ithagvidhAnbhUtasa~NghAMshcha vishvAM-- stvatsambhUtAnvidma sarvAMstathaiva.. 7-202-77 (54685) aindraM yAmyaM vAruNaM vaittapAlyaM paitraM tvAShTraM karma saumyaM cha tubhyam.. 7-202-78 (54686) rUpaM jyotiH shabda AkAshavAyuH sparshaH svAdyaM salilaM gandha urvI. kAlo brahmA brahma cha brAhmaNAshcha tvatsambhUtAH sthAsnu chariShNu chedam.. 7-202-79 (54687) adbhyaH stokA yAnti yathA pR^ithaktvaM tAthishchaikyaM saMkShaye yAnti bhUyaH. evaM vidvAnprabhavaM chApyayaM cha tvasambhUtaM tava sAyujyameti.. 7-202-80 (54688) divyAmR^itau mAnasau dvau suparNA-- vavAkshAkhaH pippalaH saptagoptaH. vAchashchArthA devatAH lokapAlA lokAnanye ye purA dhArayitvA. gatA hi tebhyaH paramaM tatparaM cha tvatsambhUtAste cha tebhyaH parastvam.. 7-202-81 (54689) bhUtaM bhavyaM bhavitA chApradhR^iShyaM tvatsambhUtA bhuvanAnIha vishvA. bhaktaM cha mAM bhajamAnaM bhajasva prItyA mAM vai lokapitAmahesha.. 7-202-82 (54690) AtmAnaM tvamAtmano na vyabodhaM vidvAnevaM gachChi brahma shukram. astauShaM tvAM tava saMmAnamichCha-- nichinvanvai sadR^ishaM devavarya. sudurlabhAndehi parAnmameShTA-- nabhiShTutaH pravikArShIshcha mAyAm.. 7-202-83 (54691) vyAsa uvAcha. 7-202-84x (4806) tasmai varAnachintyAtmA devadevaH pinAkadhR^it. viShNave devamukhyAya prAyachChadR^iShisaMstutaH.. 7-202-84 (54692) shrIbhagavAnuvAcha. 7-202-85x (4807) matprasAdAnmanuShyeShu devagandharvayoniShu. aprameyabalAtmA tvaM nArAyaNa bhaviShyasi.. 7-202-85 (54693) na cha tvAM prasahiShyanti devAsuramahoragAH. na pishAchA na gandharvA na yakShA na cha rAkShasAH.. 7-202-86 (54694) na suparNAstathA nAgA na cha vishve viyonijAH. na kashchittvAM cha devo.api samareShu vijeShyati.. 7-202-87 (54695) na shastreNa na vajreNa nAgninA na cha vAriNA. na chArdreNa na shuShkeNa trasena sthAvareNa cha.. 7-202-88 (54696) na hastena na pAdena na kAShThena na loShTunA. kashchittava rujAM kartA matprasAdAtkatha~nchana. api vai samaraM gatvA bhaviShyasi mamAdhikaH.. 7-202-89 (54697) evamAdInvarA.NllabdhvA prasAdAdatha shUlinaH. sa eSha devashcharati mAyayA mohaya~njagat.. 7-202-90 (54698) tasyaiva tapasA jAto naro nAma mahAmuniH. tulyametena devena taM jAnIhyarjunaM sadA.. 7-202-91 (54699) tAvetau pUrvadevAnAM paramopachitAdR^iShI. lokayAtrAvidhAnArthaM dAnavAnAM vadhAya cha. dharmasaMsthApanArthAya sa~njAyete yugeyuge.. 7-202-92 (54700) tathaiva karmaNA kR^itsnaM mahatastaparaso.api cha. tejo vAgbhishcha vidvaMstvaM jAto rudrAnmahAmate.. 7-202-93 (54701) sa bhavAndevavatprAj~no j~nAtvA bhavamayaM jagat. avAkarShastvamAtmAnaM niyamaistatpriyepsayA.. 7-202-94 (54702) shubhramatra haviH kR^itvA mahApuruShavigraham. IjivAMstvaM japairhomairupahAraishcha mAnada.. 7-202-95 (54703) sa tathA pUjyamAnaste pUrvadevo.apyatUtuShat. puShkalAMshcha varAnprAdAttava vidvanhR^idi sthitAn.. 7-202-96 (54704) janmakarmatapoyogAstayostava cha puShkalAH. tAbhyAM li~Nge.archito devastvayA.archAyAM yugeyuge. devadevastvachintyAtmA ajeyo viShNusambhavaH.. 7-202-97 (54705) sarvarUpaM bhavaM j~nAtvA li~Nge yo.archayati prabhum. AtmayogAshcha tasminvai shAstrayogAshcha shAshvatAH.. 7-202-98 (54706) evaM devA yajanto hi siddhAshcha paramarShayaH. prArthayante paraM loke sthANumeva cha shAshvatam.. 7-202-99 (54707) [sa eSha* rudrabhaktashcha keshavo rudrasambhavaH.] kR^iShNa eva hi yaShTavyo yaj~naishchaiva sanAtanaH.. 7-202-100 (54708) sarvabhUtabhavaM j~nAtvA li~Ngamarchati yaH prabhoH. tasminnabhyadhikAM prItiM karoti vR^iShabhadhvajaH.. 7-202-101 (54709) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-202-102x (4808) tasya tadvachanaM shrutvA droNaputro mahArathaH. namashchakAra rudrAya bahumene cha keshavam.. 7-202-102 (54710) haShTaromA cha vashyAtmA so.abhivAdya maharShaye. varUthinImabhiprekShya hyavahAramakArayat.. 7-202-103 (54711) tataH pratyavahAro.abhUtpANDavAnAM vishAmpate. kauravANAM cha dInAnAM droNe yudhi nipAtite.. 7-202-104 (54712) yuddhaM kR^itvA dinAnpa~ncha droNo hatvA varUthinIm. brahmalokaM gato rAjanbrAhmaNo vedapAragaH.. .. 7-202-105 (54713) iti shrImanmahAbhArate droNaparvaNi nArAyaNAstramokShaparvaNi pa~nchadashadivasayuddhe dvyadhikadvishatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 202 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

5-202-2 rAjannaiva tatrAvatasthire iti Ta. pAThaH.. 5-202-3 somakAvayavaiH somakAnAmavayavarUpairmANDalikaiH.. 5-202-7 udvR^ittasya uchChAstravartinaH.. 5-202-10 yuvarAje chedipatau.. 5-202-12 antarbhede hR^idayavaiklavye. duHkhaM putravadhAdijam.. 5-202-13 ashlIlaM jugupsitam. apriyaM paruSham.. 5-202-21 kravyAdAshchApi chAkrandan iti Ta.pAThaH.. 5-202-22 prayatAtmAno yogino.api samAdhichyutA babhUvurityarthaH.. 5-202-23 AvartitadivAkaraM vishvaM sarvaM bhramatIvetyamanyatetyarthaH.. 5-202-24 tresuH shabdaM chakruH. yathA vane iti sambandhaH.. 5-202-29 yugAnte pralaye. saMvartakaH saMhArakaH.. 5-202-31 tamonudau chandrasUryau.. 5-202-39 tayorviShaye.. 5-202-42 vedAnAM vyAsaM shAkhAprashAkhAbhedena vibhAjakam. sarasvatyA agnopavedasmR^ityAdirUpAyAM AvAsam. vyAsamiti pAThe vistAram. AvAsaM cha sarasvatyAH sa vai vyAsa dadarshaha iti ka.ga.Ta.pAThaH.. 5-202-47 kuravo dhR^itarAShTrAdyAsteShAM kulodvaham.. 5-202-48 mAyA naShTayorapyanaShTatvena darshanam. yadR^ichChA astrashaktoraniyamaH.. 5-202-49 adharottaraM viparItam.. 5-202-50 shishiraM giriM himAchalam.. 5-202-62 yogI vishvasyeti ka.kha.ga.pAThaH. patiM pAlayitAram.. 5-202-65 IshAnAnAM brahmAdInAmapi vR^iShabhaM shreShTham. kapardinaM jaTAjUTavantam.. 5-202-66 chekitAnaM chetayatam. tiShThataH 5-202-67 sthAvarasyA. gachChato ja~Ngamasya. durvAraNaM durniShedham. atimanyuM tIvrakopaM duShTeShu.. 5-202-68 parashvathiM parashvathavantam.. 5-202-76 bhUtakR^itaH prajApatayaH.. 5-202-78 endraM indradaivatyaM karma tubhyaM tvadarthameva. sarveShAM devAnAM nAmnA tvameva tarpaNIya ityarthaH.. 5-202-79 AkAsha iti luptavibhaktikam. svAdyaM rasaH. brahma vedAH yaj~nAshcha. sthAsnu sthAvaram. chariShNu ja~Ngamam.. 5-202-80 adbhyAH samudrebhyaH stokAH varShabindavaH. saMkShaye playe ekArNave.. 5-202-83 abhiShTuto yAnakArShIriha tvam iti ka.kha.pAThaH.. 5-202-84 R^iShiNA nArAyaNena saMstutaH.. 5-202-87 viyonijAH siMhavyAghrAdayaH. nAgAna vishve vishvayonayaH iti ka.kha.pAThaH.. 5-202-88 trasena ja~Ngamena.. 5-202-89 gatvA prApya.. 5-202-92 pUrvadevAnAM brahmaviShNurudrANAM madhye etau viShNurUpiNAvR^iShI naranArAyaNau paramopachitAvatyantatapaH sampannau.. 5-202-94 devavat nArAyaNavat. avAkarShaH avamataM kR^ishaM kR^itavAnasyAtmAnaM shIram.. 5-202-95 shubhraM dIptitam. shubhabhaurvaM navaM kR^itveti ka.kha.ga.pAThaH.. 5-202-98 AtmayogAttamIshAnaM shAstrayogAchcha shAshvatamiti ka.kha.ga.pAThaH.. 5-202-103 maharShaye vyAsAya.. 5-202-202 dvyadhikadvishatatamo.adhyAyaH..
droNaparva - adhyAya 203

.. shrIH ..

7.203. adhyAyaH 203

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Topics

itarAlakShitaM purataH svAnukUlaM yudhyamAnaM shUlapANiM ka~nchana puruShapravaramavalokayatA pArthena sa ka iti yadR^ichChAsamAgataM vyAsaM prati prashnaH.. 1 .. tena tamprati tasya tasya pashupatitvoktyA shatarudrIyapaThanena savistaraM tadguNagaNavarNanam.. 2 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Text

7-203-0 (54714) dhR^itarAShTra uvAcha. 7-203-0x (4809) tasminnatirathe droNe nihate tatra sa~njaya. mAmakAH pANDavAshchaiva kimakurvannataH param.. 7-203-1 (54715) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-203-2x (4810) tasminnatirathe droNe nihate pArShatena vai. kauraveShu cha bhagneShu kuntIputro dhana~njayaH.. 7-203-2 (54716) dR^iShTvA sumahadAshcharyamAtmano vijayAvaham. muniM snigdhAmbudAbhAsaM vedavyAsamakalmaSham. yadR^ichChayA.a.agataM vyAsaM paprachCha bharatarShabha.. 7-203-3 (54717) arjuna uvAcha. 7-203-4x (4811) sa~NgrAme nyahanaM shatrU~nsharaughairvimalairaham. agrato lakShaye yAntaM puruShaM pAvakaprabham.. 7-203-4 (54718) jvalantaM shUlamudyamya yAM dishaM pratipadyate. tasyAM dishi vidIryante shatravo me mahAmune.. 7-203-5 (54719) tena bhagnAnarInsarvAnmadbhagnAnmanyate janaH. tena bhagnAni sainyAni pR^iShThato.anuvrajAmyaham.. 7-203-6 (54720) bhagavaMstanmamAchakShva ko vai sa puruShottamaH. shUlapANirmayA dR^iShTastejasA sUryasannibhaH.. 7-203-7 (54721) na padbhyAM spR^ishate bhUmiM na cha shUlaM vimu~nchati. shUlAchChUlasahasrANi niShpetustasya tejasA.. 7-203-8 (54722) vyAsa uvAcha. 7-203-9x (4812) prajApatInAM prathamaM taijasaM puruShaM prabhum. bhuvanaM bhUrbhuvaM devaM tejasAM pravaraM prabhum.. 7-203-9 (54723) IshAnaM varadaM pArtha dR^iShTavAnasi sha~Nkaram. taM gachCha sharaNaM devaM varadaM bhuvaneshvaram.. 7-203-10 (54724) mahAdevaM mahAtmAnamIshAnaM jaTilaM vibhum. tryakShaM mahAbhujaM rudraM shikhinaM chIvarAsasam.. 7-203-11 (54725) mahAdevaM haraM sthANuM varadaM bhuvaneshvaram. jagatpradhAnamajitaM jagatprItimadhIshvaram.. 7-203-12 (54726) jagadyoniM jagadbIjaM jayinaM jagato gatim. vishvAtmAnaM vishvasR^ijaM vishvamUrtiM yashasvinam.. 7-203-13 (54727) vishveshvaraM vishvanaraM karmaNAmIshvaraM prabhum. shaMbhuM svayaMbhuM bhUteshaM bhUtabhavyabhavodbhavam.. 7-203-14 (54728) yogaM yogeshvaraM sarvaM sarvalokeshvareshvaram. sarvashreShThaM jagachChreShThaM variShThaM parameShThinam.. 7-203-15 (54729) lokatrayavidhAtAramekaM lokatrayAshrayam. shuddhAtmAnaM bhavaM bhImaM shashA~NkakR^itashekharam.. 7-203-16 (54730) shAshvataM bhUdharaM devaM sarvavAgIshvareshvaram. sudurjayaM jagannAthaM janmamR^ityujarAtigam.. 7-203-17 (54731) j~nAnAtmAnaM j~nAnagamyaM j~nAnashreShThaM sudurvidam. dAtAraM chaiva bhaktAnAM prasAdavihitAnvarAn.. 7-203-18 (54732) tasya pAriShadA divyA rUpairnAnAvidhairvibhoH. vAmanA jaTilA muNDA hasvagrIvA mahodarAH.. 7-203-19 (54733) mahAkAyA mahotsAhA mahAkarNAstathA.apare. AnanairvikR^itaiH pAdaiH pArtha veShaishcha vaikR^itaiH.. 7-203-20 (54734) IdR^ishaiH sa mahAdevaH pUjyamAno maheshvaraH. sa shivastAta tejasvI prasAdAdyAti te.agrataH.. 7-203-21 (54735) tasminghore sadA pArtha sa~NgrAme romaharShaNe. drauNikarNakR^ipairguptAM maheShvAsaiH prahAribhiH.. 7-203-22 (54736) kastAM senAM tadA pArtha manasA.api pradharShayet. R^ite devAnmaheShvAsAdbahurUpAnmaheshvarAt.. 7-203-23 (54737) sthAtumutsahate kashchinna tasminnagrataH sthite. na hi bhUtaM samaM tena triShu lokeShu vidyate.. 7-203-24 (54738) gandhenApi hi sa~NgrAme tasya kruddhasya shatravaH. visaMj~nA hatabhUyiShThA vepanti cha patanti cha.. 7-203-25 (54739) tasmai namastu kurvanto devAstiShThanti vai divi. ye chAnye mAnavA loke ye cha svargajito narAH.. 7-203-26 (54740) ye bhaktA varadaM deva shivaM rudramumApatim. ananyabhAvena sadA sarveshaM samupAsate.. 7-203-27 (54741) `sa~NgrAmeShu jayaM prApya pAlayanti mahImimAm'. iha loke sukhaM prApya te yAnti paramAM gatim.. 7-203-28 (54742) namaskuruShva kaunteya tasmai shAntAya vai sadA. rudrAya shitikaNThAya kaniShThAya suvarchase.. 7-203-29 (54743) kapardine karAlAya haryakShavaradAya cha. yAmyAyAvyaktakeshAya sadvR^itte sha~NkarAya cha.. 7-203-30 (54744) kAmyAya harinetrAya sthANave puruShAya cha.. 7-203-31 (54745) `namo vR^ikShAya senAnye madhyamAya namonamaH'. harikeshAya muNDAya kR^ishAyottAraNAya cha. bhAskAraya sutIrthAya devadevAya raMhase.. 7-203-32 (54746) bahurUpAya sarvAya priyAya priyavAsase. uShNIShiNe suvaktrAya sahasrAkShAya mIDhuShe.. 7-203-33 (54747) girishAya prashAntAya pataye chIravAsase. hiraNyabAhave rAjannugrAya pataye dishAm.. 7-203-34 (54748) parjanyapataye chaiva bhUtAnAM pataye namaH. vR^ikShANAM pataye chaiva gavAM cha pataye namaH.. 7-203-35 (54749) vR^ikShairAvR^itakAyAya senAnye madhyamAya cha. sruvahastAya devAya dhanvine bhArgavAya cha.. 7-203-36 (54750) bahurUpAya vishvasya pataye mu~nchavAsase. sahasrashirase chaiva sahasracharaNAya cha. sahasrabAhave chaiva sahasravadanAya cha.. 7-203-37 (54751) sharaNaM gachCha kaunteya varadaM bhuvaneshvaram. umApatiM virUpAkShaM dakShayaj~nanibarhaNam.. 7-203-38 (54752) prajAnAM patimavyagraM bhUtAnAM patimavyayam. kapardinaM vR^iShAvartaM vR^iShanAbhaM vR^iShadhvajam.. 7-203-39 (54753) vR^iShadarpaM vR^iShapatiM vR^iShashR^i~NgaM vR^iSharShabham. vR^iShA~NgaM vR^iShabhodAraM vR^iShabhaM vR^iShabhekShaNam.. 7-203-40 (54754) vR^iShAyudhaM vR^iShasharaM vR^iShabhUtaM vR^iSheshvaram. mahodaraM mahAkAyaM dvIpicharmanivAsinam.. 7-203-41 (54755) lokeshaM varadaM puNyaM brahmaNyaM brAhmaNapriyam. trishUlapANiM varadaM kha~NgacharmadharaM prabhum.. 7-203-42 (54756) pinAkinaM kha~NghadharaM lokAnAM patimIshvaram. prapadye sharaNaM devaM sharaNyaM chIravAsasam.. 7-203-43 (54757) namastasmai sureshAya gaNAnAM pataye namaH. suvAsase namastubhyaM suvratAya sudhanvine.. 7-203-44 (54758) dhanurdharAya devAya priyadhanvAya dhanvine. dhanvantarAya dhanuShe dhanvAchAryAya te namaH.. 7-203-45 (54759) ugrAyudhAya devAya namaH suravarAya cha. namostu bahurUpAya namostu bahudhanvine.. 7-203-46 (54760) namostu sthANave nityaM namastasmai tapasvine. namostu tripuraghnAya bhagaghnAya cha vai namaH. 7-203-47 (54761) vanaspatInAM pataye narANAM pataye namaH. mAtR^INAM pataye chaiva gaNAnAM pataye namaH.. 7-203-48 (54762) gavAM cha pataye nityaM yaj~nAnAM pataye namaH. apAM cha pataye nityaM devAnAM pataye namaH.. 7-203-49 (54763) pUShNo dantavinAshAya tryakShAya varadAya cha. nIlakaNThAya pi~NgAya svarNakeshAya vai namaH.. 7-203-50 (54764) karmANi yAni divyAni mahAdevasya dhImataH. tAni te kIrtayiShyAmi tathApraj~naM yathAshrutam.. 7-203-51 (54765) na surA nAsurA loke na gandharvA na rAkShasAH. sukhamedhanti kupite tasminnapi gurAgatAH.. 7-203-52 (54766) dakShasya yajamAnasya vidhivatsaMbhR^itaM purA. vivyAdha kupito yaj~naM nirdayastvabhavattadA. dhanuShA bANamutsR^ijya saghoShaM vinanAda cha.. 7-203-53 (54767) tena sharma kutaH shAntiM lebhire sma surAstadA. vidrute sahasA yaj~ne kupite cha maheshvare.. 7-203-54 (54768) tena jyAtalaghoSheNa sarve lokAH samAkulAH. babhUvurvashagAH pArtha nipetushcha surAsurAH.. 7-203-55 (54769) ApashchukShubhire sarvAshchakampe cha vasundharA. parvatAshcha vyashIryanta disho nAgAshcha mohitAH.. 7-203-56 (54770) andhena tamasA lokA na prAkAshanta saMvR^itAH. jaghnivAnsaha sUryeNa sarveShAM jyotiShAM prabhAH.. 7-203-57 (54771) chukShubhurbhayabhItAshcha shAntiM chakrustathaiva cha. R^iShayaH sarvabhUtAnAmAtmanashcha sukhaiShiNaH.. 7-203-58 (54772) pUShANamabhyadravata sha~NkaraH prahasanniva. puroDAshaM bhakShayato dashanAnvai vyashAtayat.. 7-203-59 (54773) tato nishchakramurdevA vepamAnA bhayArditAH.. 7-203-60 (54774) punashcha sandadhe dIptAndevAnAM nishitA~nsharAn. sadhUmAnsasphuli~NgAMshcha vidyuttoyadasannibhAn.. 7-203-61 (54775) taM dR^iShTvA tu surAH sarve praNipatya maheshvaram. rudrasya yaj~nabhAgaM cha vishiShTaM te tvakalpayan.. 7-203-62 (54776) bhayena tridashA rAja~nCharaNaM cha prapedire. tena chaivAtikopena sa yaj~naH sandhitastadA. bhagnAshchApi surA AsanbhItAshchAdyApi taM prati.. 7-203-63 (54777) asurANAM purANyAsaMstrINi vIryavatAM divi. AyasaM rAjataM chaiva sauvarNaM paramaM mahat.. 7-203-64 (54778) sauvarNaM kamalAkShasya tArakAkShasya rAjatam. tR^itIyaM tu puraM teShAM vidyunmAlina Ayasam. na shaktastAni maghavAnbhettuM sarvAyudhairapi.. 7-203-65 (54779) atha sarve surA rudraM jagmuH sharaNamarditAH. te tamUchurmahAtmAnaM sarve devAH savAsavAH.. 7-203-66 (54780) brahmadattavarA hyete ghorAstripuravAsinaH. pIDayantyadhikaM lokaM yasmAtte varadarpitAH.. 7-203-67 (54781) tvadR^ite devadevesha nAnyaH shaktaH katha~nchana. hantuM daityAnmahAdeva jahi tAMstvaM suradvipaH.. 7-203-68 (54782) rudra raudrA bhaviShyanti pashavaH sarvakarmasu. nipAtayiShyase chaitAnasurAnbhuvaneshvara.. 7-203-69 (54783) sa tathoktastathetyuktvA devAnAM hitakAmyayA. gandhamAdanavindhyau cha kR^itvA vaMshadhvajau haraH.. 7-203-70 (54784) pR^ithvIM sasAgaravanAM rathaM kR^itvA tu sha~NkaraH. akShaM kR^itvA tu nAgendraM sheShaM nAma trilochanaH.. 7-203-71 (54785) chakre kR^itvA tu chandrArkau devadevaH pinAkadhR^it. aNI kR^itvailapatraM cha puShpadantaM cha tryambakaH.. 7-203-72 (54786) yUpaM kR^itvA tu malayamavanAhaM cha takShakam.. 7-203-73 (54787) yoktrA~NgAni cha satvAni kR^itvA sharvaH pratApavAn. vedAnkR^itvA.atha chaturashchaturashvAnmaheshvaraH.. 7-203-74 (54788) upadevAnkhalInAMshcha kR^itvA lokatrayeshvaraH. gAyatrIM pragrahaM kR^itvA sAvitrIM cha maheshvaraH.. 7-203-75 (54789) kR^itvoMkAraM pratodaM cha brahmANaM chaiva sArathim. gANDIvaM mandaraM kR^itvA guNaM kR^itvA tu vAsukim.. 7-203-76 (54790) viShNuM sharottamaM kR^itvA shalyamagniM tathaiva cha. vAyuM kR^itvA.atha vAjAbhyAM pu~Nkhe vaivasvataM yamam.. 7-203-77 (54791) vidyutkR^itvA.atha nishrANaM meruM kR^itvA.atha vai dhvajam. Aruhya sa rathaM divyaM sarvadevamayaM shivaH.. 7-203-78 (54792) tripurasya vadhArthAya sthANuH praharatAM varaH. asurANAmantakaraH shrImAnatulavikramaH.. 7-203-79 (54793) stUyamAnaH suraiH pArtha R^iShibhishcha tapodhanaiH. sthAnaM mAheshvaraM kR^itvA divyamapratimaM prabhuH. atiShThatsthANubhUtaH sa sahasraM parivatsarAn.. 7-203-80 (54794) yadA trINi sametAni antarikShe purANi cha. triparvaNA trishalyena tadA tAni bibheda saH.. 7-203-81 (54795) purANi na cha taM shekurdAnavAH prativIkShitum. sharaM kAlAgnisaMyuktaM viShNusomasamAyutam.. 7-203-82 (54796) purANi dagdhavantaM taM devI yAtA pravIkShitum. `devyAH svayaMvare vR^ittaM shR^iNuShvAnyaddhana~njaya'.. 7-203-83 (54797) bAlama~NkagataM kR^itvA svayaM pa~nchashikhaM punaH. umA jij~nAsamAnA vai koyamityabravItsurAn.. 7-203-84 (54798) asUyatashcha shakrasya vajreNa prahariShyataH. bAhuM savajraM taM tasya kruddhasyAstambhayatprabhuH. [prahasya* bhagavAMstUrNaM sarvalokeshvaro vibhuH.. 7-203-85 (54799) tataH sa stambhitabhujaH shakro devagaNairvR^itaH. jagAma sasurastUrNaM brahmANaM prabhumavyayam.. 7-203-86 (54800) te taM praNamya shirasA prochuH prA~njalayastadA.. 7-203-87 (54801) kimapya~NkagataM brahmanpArvatyA bhUtamadbhutam. bAlarUpadharaM dR^iShTvA nAsmAbhirabhilakShitaH.. 7-203-88 (54802) tasmAttvAM praShTumichChAmo nirjitA yena vai vayam. ayudhyatA hi bAlena lIlayA sapuraMdarAH.. 7-203-89 (54803) teShAM tadvachanaM shrutvA brahmA brahmavidAM varaH. dhyAtvA sa shaMbhuM bhagavAnbAlaM chAmitatejasam. uvAcha bhagavAnbrahmA shakrAdIMshcha surottamAn.. 7-203-90 (54804) charAcharasya jagataH prabhuH sa bhagavAnharaH. tasmAtparataraM nAnyatki~nchidasti maheshvarAt.. 7-203-91 (54805) yo dR^iShTo hyumayA sArdhaM yuShmAbhiramitadyutiH. sa pArvatyAH kR^ite sharvaH kR^itavAnbAlarUpatAm.. 7-203-92 (54806) te mayA sahitA yUyaM prApadyadhvaM tameva hi]. sa eSha bhagavAndevaH sarvalokeshvaraH prabhuH.. 7-203-93 (54807) na sambabudhire chainaM devAstaM bhuvaneshvaram. saprajApatayaH sarve bAlArkasadR^ishaprabham.. 7-203-94 (54808) athAbhyetya tato brahmA dR^iShTvA sa cha maheshvaram. ayaM shreShTha iti j~nAtvA vavande taM pitAmahaH.. 7-203-95 (54809) [brahmovAcha. 7-203-96x (4813) tvaM yaj~no bhunasyAsya tvaM gatistvaM parAyaNam. tvaM bhavastvaM mahAdevastvaM dhAma paramaM padam.. 7-203-96 (54810) tvayA sarvamidaM vyAptaM jagatsthAvaraja~Ngamam.. 7-203-97 (54811) bhagavanbhUtabhavyesha lokanAtha jagatpate. prasAdaM kuru shakrasya tvayA krodhArditasya vai.. 7-203-98 (54812) vyAsa uvAcha. 7-203-99x (4814) padmayonivachaH shrutvA tataH prIto maheshvaraH prasAdAbhimukho bhUtvA aTTahAsamathAkarot..] 7-203-99 (54813) tataH prasAdayAmAsurumAM rudraM cha te surAH. abhavachcha punarbAhuryathAprakR^iti vajriNaH.. 7-203-100 (54814) teShAM prasanno bhagavAnsapatnIko vR^iShadhvajaH. devAnAM tridashashreShTho dakShayaj~navinAshanaH.. 7-203-101 (54815) sa vai rudraH sa cha shivaH so.agniH sarvashcha sarvavit. sa chendrashchaiva vAyushcha so.ashvinau cha sa vidyutaH.. 7-203-10 (54816) sa bhavaH sa cha parjanyo mahAdevaH sanAtanaH. sa chandramAH sa cheshAnaH sa sUryo varuNashcha saH.. 7-203-10 (54817) sa kAlaH so.antako mR^ityuH sa yamo rAtryahAni tu. mAsArdhamAsA R^itavaH sandhye saMvatsarashcha saH.. 7-203-10 (54818) dhAtA cha sa vidhAtA cha vishvAtmA vishvakarmakR^it. sarvAmAM devatAnAM cha dhArayatyavapurvapuH.. 7-203-10 (54819) sarvadevaiH stuto devaH saikadhA bahudhA cha saH. shatadhA sahasradhA chaiva bhUyaH shatasahasradhAH.. 7-203-10 (54820) dve tanU tasya devasya vedaj~nA brAhmaNA viduH. ghorA chAnyA shivA chAnyA te tanU bahudhA punaH.. 7-203-10 (54821) ghorA tu yAtudhAnasya so.agnirviShNuH sa bhAskaraH. saumyAtu punarevAsya Apo jyotIMShi chandramAH.. 7-203-10 (54822) vedAH sA~NgopaniShadaH purANAdhyAtmanishchayAH. yadatra paramaM guhyaM sa vai devo maheshvaraH.. IdR^ishashcha mahAdevo bhUyAMshcha bhagavAnajaH. 7-203-10 (54823) na hi sarve mayA shakyA vaktuM bhagavato guNAH.. api varShasahasreNa satataM pANQDunandana. sarvairgrahairgR^ihItAnvai sarvapApasamanvitAn.. 7-203-10 (54824) sa mochayati suprItaH sharaNyaH sharaNAgatAn. AyurArogyamaishvaryaM vittaM kAmAMshcha puShkalAn.. 7-203-112 (54825) sa dadAti manuShyebhyaH sa chaivAkShipate punaH. sendrAdiShu cha deveShu tasya chaishvaryamuchyate.. 7-203-113 (54826) sa chaiva vetti lokeShu manuShyANAM shubhAshubhe. aishvaryAchchaiva kAmAnAmIshvarashcha sa uchyate.. 7-203-114 (54827) maheshvarashcha mahatAM bhUtAnAmIshvarashcha saH. bahubhirbahudhA rUpairvishvaM vyApnoti vai jagat.. 7-203-115 (54828) tasya devasya yadvaktraM samudre tadadhiShThitam. bQaDabAmukheti vikhyAtaM pibattoyamayaM haviH.. 7-203-116 (54829) eSha chaiva shmashAneShu devo vasati nityashaH. yajantyenaM janAstatra vIrasthAna itIshvaram.. 7-203-117 (54830) asya dIptAni rUpANi ghorANi cha bahUni cha. loke yAnyasya pUjyante manuShyAH pravadanti cha.. 7-203-118 (54831) nAmadheyAni lokeShu bahUnyasya yathArthavat. niruchyante mahattvAchcha vibhutvAtkarmaNastathA.. 7-203-119 (54832) vede chAsya samAmnAtaM shatarudriyamuttamam. nAmnA chAnantarudreti hyupasthAnaM mahAtmanaH.. 7-203-120 (54833) sa kAmAnAM prabhurdevo ye divyA ye cha mAnuShAH. sa vibhuH sa prabhurdevovishvaM vyApnoti vai mahat.. 7-203-121 (54834) jyeShThaM bhUtaM vadantyenaM brAhmaNA manuyastathA. prathamo hyeSha devAnAM mukhAdasyAnalo.abhavat.. 7-203-122 (54835) sarvathA yatpashUnpAti taishcha yadramate punaH. teShAmadhipatiryachcha tasmAtpashupatiH smR^itaH.. 7-203-123 (54836) divyaM cha brahmacharyeNa li~Ngamasya yathAsthitam. mahayatyeSha lokAMshcha maheshvara iti smR^itaH.. 7-203-124 (54837) R^iShayashchaiva devAshcha gandharvApyarasastathA. li~NgamasyArchayanti sma tachchApyUrdhvaM samAsthitam.. 7-203-125 (54838) pUjyamAne tatastasminmodate sa maheshvaraH. sukhI prItashcha bhavati prahR^iShTashchaiva sha~NkaraH.. 7-203-126 (54839) yadasya bahudhA rUpaM bhUtabhavyabhavasthitam. sthAvaraM ja~NgamaM chaiva bahurUpastataH smR^itaH.. 7-203-127 (54840) ekAkSho jAjvalannAste sarvatokShimayo.api vA. krodhAdyashchAvishallokAMstasmAtsarva iti smR^itaH.. 7-203-128 (54841) dhUmrarUpaM cha yattasya dhUrjaTistena chochyate. vishve devAshcha yattasminvishvarUpastataH smR^itaH.. 7-203-129 (54842) tisro devIryadA chaiva bhajate bhuvaneshvaraH. dyAmapaH pR^ithivIM chaiva tryambakashcha tataH smR^itaH.. 7-203-130 (54843) samedhayati yannityaM sarvArthAnsarvakarmasu. shivamichChanmanuShyANAM tasmAdeSha shivaH smR^itaH.. 7-203-131 (54844) sahasrAkSho.ayutAkSho vA sarvatokShimayo.api vA. yachcha vishvaM mahatpAti mahAdevastataH smR^itaH.. 7-203-132 (54845) mahatpUrvaM sthito yachcha prANotpattisthitashcha yat. sthitali~Ngashcha yannityaM tasmAtsthANuriti smR^itaH.. 7-203-133 (54846) [sUryAchandramasorloke prakAshante ruchashcha yAH. tAH keshasaMj~nitAstryakShe vyomakeshastataH smR^itaH.. 7-203-134 (54847) bhUtaM bhavyaM bhaviShyaM cha sarvaM jagadasheShataH. bhava eva tato yasmAdbhUtabhavyabhavodbhavaH.. 7-203-135 (54848) kapiH shreShTha iti prokto dharmashcha vR^iSha uchyate. sa devadevo bhagavAnkIrtyate.ato vR^iShAkapiH.. 7-203-136 (54849) brahmANamindraM varuNaM yamaM dhanadameva cha. nigR^ihya harate yasmAttasmAdvara iti smR^itaH.. 7-203-137 (54850) nimIlitAbhyAM netrAbhyAM balAddevo maheshvaraH. lalATe netramasR^ijattena tryakShaH sa uchyate..] 7-203-138 (54851) viShamasthaH sharIreShu samashcha prANinAmiha. sa vAyurviShamastheShu prANo.apAnaH sharIriShu.. 7-203-139 (54852) pUjayedvigrahaM yastu li~NgaM chApi mahAtmanaH. li~NgaM pUjayitA nityaM mahatIM shriyamashnute.. 7-203-140 (54853) UrubhyAmardhamAgneyaM somo.ardhaM cha shivA tanuH. Atmano.ardhaM tathA chAgniH somordhaM punaruchyate.. 7-203-141 (54854) taijasI mahatI dIptA devebhyo.asya shivA tanuH. bhAsvatI mAnuSheShvasya tanurghorA.agniruchyate.. 7-203-142 (54855) brahmacharyaM charatyeSha shivA yA.asya tanustayA. yA.asya ghoratarA mUrtiH sarvAnatti tayeshvaraH.. 7-203-143 (54856) yannirdahati yattIkShNo yadugro yatpratApavAn. mAMsashoNitamajjAdo yattato rudra uchyate.. 7-203-144 (54857) eSha devo mahAdevo yo.asau pArtha tavAgrataH. sa~NgrAme shAstravAnnighnaMstvayA dR^iShTaH pinAkadhR^ita.. 7-203-145 (54858) sindhurAjavadhArthAya pratij~nAte tvayA.anagha. kR^iShNena darshitaH svapne yastu shailendramUrdhani.. 7-203-146 (54859) eSha vai bhagavAndevaH sa~NgrAme yAti te.agrataH. yena dattAni te.astrANi yaistvayA dAnavA hatAH.. 7-203-147 (54860) dhanyaM yashasyamAyuShyaM puNyaM vedaishcha sammitam. devadevasya te pArtha vyAkhyAtaM shatarudriyam. 7-203-148 (54861) sarvArthasAdhanaM puNyaM sarvakilbiShanAshanam. sarvapApaprashamanaM sarvaduHkhabhayApaham.. 7-203-149 (54862) chaturvidhamidaM stotraM yaH shR^iNoti naraH sadA. vijitya shatrUnsarvAnsa rudraloke mahIyate.. 7-203-150 (54863) charitaM mahAtmano nityaM sA~NgrAmikamidaM smR^itam. paThanvai shatarudrIyaM shR^iNvaMshcha satatotthitaH.. 7-203-151 (54864) bhakto vishveshvaraM devaM mAnuSheShu cha yaH sadA. varAnkAmAnsa labhate prasanne tryambake naraH.. 7-203-152 (54865) gachCha yudhyasva kaunteya na tavAsti parAjayaH. gasya mantrI cha goptA cha pArshvastho hi janArdanaH.. 7-203-153 (54866) sa~njaya uvAcha. 7-203-154x (4815) evamuktvA.arjunaM sa~Nkhye parAsharasutastadA. jagAma bharatashreShTha yathAgatamarindama.. 7-203-154 (54867) `veshaMpAyana uvAcha. 7-203-155x (4816) etadAkhyAya vai sUto rAj~naH sarvaM tu sa~njayaH. prayAtaH shibirAyaiva draShTuM karNasya vaishasam.. 7-203-155 (54868) yuddhaM kR^itvA mahaddhoraM pa~nchAhAni mahAbalaH. brAhmaNo nihato rAjanbrahmalokamavAptavAn.. 7-203-156 (54869) svadhIte yatphalaM vede tadasminnapi parvaNi. kShatriyANAmabhIrUNAM yuktamatra mahadyashaH.. 7-203-157 (54870) ya idaM paThate parva shR^iNuyAdvA.api nityashaH. sa muchyate mahApApaiH kR^itairghoraishcha karmabhiH.. 7-203-158 (54871) yaj~nAvAptirbrAhmaNasyeha nityaM ghore yuddhe kShatriyANAM yashashcha. sheShau varNau kAmamiShTaM labhete putrAnpautrAnnityamiShTAMstathaiva.. .. 7-203-159 (54872)

iti shrImanmahAbhArate shatasAhasyAM saMhitAyAM vaiyAsikyAM droNaparvaNi nArAyaNAstramokShaparvaNi tryadhikadvishatatamo.adhyAyaH.. 203 .. samAptaM nArAyaNAstramokShaparva .. 8 .. droNaparva cha samAptam.. 7 ..

Mahabharata - Drona Parva - Chapter Footnotes

7-203-3 yadR^ichChayA.. 7-203-11 jaTilaM shikhinamiti rupabhedAbhiprAyeNa visheShaNadvayaM yojyam.. 7-203-12 jagatprItiM jagadAnandakaram.. 7-203-13 jagadyoniM jagadbIjamiti jagatAM mAtApitR^irUpam.. 7-203-14 vishvanaraM vishvasya netAram. bhUtasya bhavyasya bhavasya vartamAnasya chodbhavam.. 7-203-15 yogeshvaraM yoginAmIsham. yogAnAM phalapradaM vA.. 7-203-17 sudurjayamatyantaM duShprApamanadhikAribhiH.. 7-203-51 karmANi chaiva ghorANi mahAdevasya dhanvinaH iti ka.kha.pAThaH.. 7-203-52 guhAgatAH pAtAlagatA apItyarthaH.. 7-203-57 tamasA saMvR^itA na prAkAshanta na prAj~nAyanta.. 7-203-58 chakrurR^iShaya iti sambandhaH.. 7-203-59 pUShANaM pUShaNam.. 7-203-60 natAH sma te iti pAThe natA lInAH santo nishchakramuryaj~nadeshAdapakrAntAH.. 7-203-61 devAnAM lInAnAmapi vadhAyeti sheShaH.. 7-203-63 atikopena atikrAntakopena shAntenetyarthaH. tataH prabhR^iti pUrvaM bhagnAH santo.adyApi bhItAH santItyarthaH.. 7-203-70 vaMshadhvajau alpau dhvajau pArshvadvayasthau. mahAdhvajastu meruriti vakShyate.. 7-203-72 aNI yugAntabandhane dvau nAgau.. 7-203-73 yUpaM yugam. avanAhaM triveNuyugabandhanarajjum.. 7-203-74 yoktrANi. a~NgAni chAkarShAdIni. satvAni sarIsR^ipaparvatAdIni cha.. 7-203-75 upavedAn AyurvedadhanurvedagAndharvavedapashchimAmnAyAn. khalInAn khaDiyALIti prasiddhAn. gAyatrIsAvitryau pragrahaM rashmIn.. 7-203-77 vAjAbhyAM pakShAbhyAM pakShayorityarthaH.. 7-203-78 vidyut vidyutam. nishrANaM nishitam.. 7-203-80 sthAnaM sthIyatesminniti yogAdvyUham. sthANurachalaH.. 7-203-81 sametAni samasUtragatAni. triparvaNA trINi viShNuvAyuvaivasvatAkhyAni sharapakShapu~NkharUpANi parvANi yasya tena. trishalyena gArhapatyadakShiNAgnyAhavanIyarUpA.agnitrayashalyena.. 7-203-96 gatiH pAlakaH. parAyaNaM layasthAnam. bhava utpattikAraNam.. 7-203-98 IshaH shikShakaH. nAthaH nAyakaH. patiH pAlakaH.. 7-203-120 shatarudriyaM namaste rudra manyava iti yAjuShaH prapAThakaH. upasthAnaM rudropasthAnamantrabhUtam.. 7-203-121 kAmAnAM divyAnAM mAnuShANAM cha sa prabhurdAtA. vibhurvyApakaH.. 7-203-203 tryadhikadvishatatamo.adhyAyaH..
